yasmāt sarvam idaṃ prapañcaracitaṃ māyājagaj jāyate 
yasmiṃs tiṣṭhati yāti cāntasamaye kalpānukalpe punaḥ 
yaṃ dhyātvā munayaḥ prapañcarahitaṃ vindanti mokṣaṃ dhruvaṃ 
taṃ vande puruṣottamākhyam amalaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ niścalam 
yaṃ dhyāyanti budhāḥ samādhisamaye śuddhaṃ viyatsaṃnibham 
nityānandamayaṃ prasannam amalaṃ sarveśvaraṃ nirguṇam 
vyaktāvyaktaparaṃ prapañcarahitaṃ dhyānaikagamyaṃ vibhum 
taṃ saṃsāravināśahetum ajaraṃ vande hariṃ muktidam 
supuṇye naimiṣāraṇye pavitre sumanohare ।
nānāmunijanākīrṇe nānāpuṣpopaśobhite ।।
saralaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca panasair dhavakhādiraiḥ ।
āmrajambūkapitthaiś ca nyagrodhair devadārubhiḥ ।।
aśvatthaiḥ pārijātaiś ca candanāgurupāṭalaiḥ ।
bakulaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca puṃnāgair nāgakesaraiḥ ।।
śālais tālais tamālaiś ca nārikelais tathārjunaiḥ ।
anyaiś ca bahubhir vṛkṣaiś campakādyaiś ca śobhite ।।
nānāpakṣigaṇākīrṇe nānāmṛgagaṇair yute ।
nānājalāśayaiḥ puṇyair dīrghikādyair alaṃkṛte ।।
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ śūdraiś cānyaiś ca jātibhiḥ ।
vānaprasthair gṛhasthaiś ca yatibhir brahmacāribhiḥ ।।
saṃpannair gokulaiś caiva sarvatra samalaṃkṛte ।
yavagodhūmacaṇakair māṣamudgatilekṣubhiḥ ।।
cīnakādyais tathā medhyaiḥ sasyaiś cānyaiś ca śobhite ।
tatra dīpte hutavahe hūyamāne mahāmakhe ।।
yajatāṃ naimiṣeyāṇāṃ sattre dvādaśavārṣike ।
ājagmus tatra munayas tathānye api dvijātayaḥ ।।
tān āgatān dvijāṃs te tu pūjāṃ cakrur yathocitām ।
teṣu tatropaviṣṭeṣu ṛtvigbhiḥ sahiteṣu ca ।।
tatrājagāma sūtas tu matimāṃl lomaharṣaṇaḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā te munivarāḥ pūjāṃ cakrur mudānvitāḥ ।।
so api tān pratipūjyaiva saṃviveśa varāsane ।
kathāṃ cakrus tadānyonyaṃ sūtena sahitā dvijāḥ ।।
kathānte vyāsaśiṣyaṃ te papracchuḥ saṃśayaṃ mudā ।
ṛtvigbhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve sadasyaiḥ saha dīkṣitāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
purāṇāgamaśāstrāṇi setihāsāni sattama ।
jānāsi devadaityānāṃ caritaṃ janma karma ca ।।
na te asty aviditaṃ kiṃcid vede śāstre ca bhārate ।
purāṇe mokṣaśāstre ca sarvajño asi mahāmate ।।
yathāpūrvam idaṃ sarvam utpannaṃ sacarācaram ।
sasurāsuragandharvaṃ sayakṣoragarākṣasam ।।
śrotum icchāmahe sūta brūhi sarvaṃ yathā jagat ।
babhūva bhūyaś ca yathā mahābhāga bhaviṣyati ।।
yataś caiva jagat sūta yataś caiva carācaram ।
līnam āsīt tathā yatra layam eṣyati yatra ca ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
avikārāya śuddhāya nityāya paramātmane ।
sadaikarūparūpāya viṣṇave sarvajiṣṇave ।।
namo hiraṇyagarbhāya haraye śaṅkarāya ca ।
vāsudevāya tārāya sargasthityantakarmaṇe ।।
ekānekasvarūpāya sthūlasūkṣmātmane namaḥ ।
avyaktavyaktabhūtāya viṣṇave muktihetave ।।
sargasthitivināśāya jagato yo ajarāmaraḥ ।
mūlabhūto namas tasmai viṣṇave paramātmane ।।
ādhārabhūtaṃ viśvasyāpy aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām ।
praṇamya sarvabhūtastham acyutaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
jñānasvarūpam atyantaṃ nirmalaṃ paramārthataḥ ।
tam evārthasvarūpeṇa bhrāntidarśanataḥ sthitam ।।
viṣṇuṃ grasiṣṇuṃ viśvasya sthitau sarge tathā prabhum ।
sarvajñaṃ jagatām īśam ajam akṣayam avyayam ।।
ādyaṃ susūkṣmaṃ viśveśaṃ brahmādīn praṇipatya ca ।
itihāsapurāṇajñaṃ vedavedāṅgapāragam ।।
sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñaṃ parāśarasutaṃ prabhum ।
guruṃ praṇamya vakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam ।।
kathayāmi yathā pūrvaṃ dakṣādyair munisattamaiḥ ।
pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān abjayoniḥ pitāmahaḥ ।।
śṛṇudhvaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi kathāṃ pāpapraṇāśinīm ।
kathyamānāṃ mayā citrāṃ bahvarthāṃ śrutivistarām ।।
yas tv imāṃ dhārayen nityaṃ śṛṇuyād vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ ।
svavaṃśadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā svargaloke mahīyate ।।
avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tan nityaṃ sadasadātmakam ।
pradhānaṃ puruṣas tasmān nirmame viśvam īśvaraḥ ।।
taṃ budhyadhvaṃ muniśreṣṭhā brahmāṇam amitaujasam ।
sraṣṭāraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇam ।।
ahaṃkāras tu mahatas tasmād bhūtāni jajñire ।
bhūtabhedāś ca bhūtebhya iti sargaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
vistarāvayavaṃ caiva yathāprajñaṃ yathāśruti ।
kīrtyamānaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ vaḥ sarveṣāṃ kīrtivardhanam ।।
kīrtitaṃ sthirakīrtīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ puṇyavardhanam ।
tataḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ ।।
apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryam athāsṛjat ।
āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ ।।
ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
hiraṇyavarṇam abhavat tad aṇḍam udakeśayam ।।
tatra jajñe svayaṃ brahmā svayaṃbhūr iti naḥ śrutam ।
hiraṇyavarṇo bhagavān uṣitvā parivatsaram ।।
tad aṇḍam akarod dvaidhaṃ divaṃ bhuvam athāpi ca ।
tayoḥ śakalayor madhya ākāśam akarot prabhuḥ ।।
apsu pāriplavāṃ pṛthvīṃ diśaś ca daśadhā dadhe ।
tatra kālaṃ mano vācaṃ kāmaṃ krodham atho ratim ।।
sasarja sṛṣṭiṃ tadrūpāṃ sraṣṭum icchan prajāpatīn ।
marīcim atryaṅgirasau pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum ।।
vasiṣṭhaṃ ca mahātejāḥ so asṛjat sapta mānasān ।
sapta brahmāṇa ity ete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ ।।
nārāyaṇātmakānāṃ tu saptānāṃ brahmajanmanām ।
tato asṛjat purā brahmā rudraṃ roṣātmasaṃbhavam ।।
sanatkumāraṃ ca vibhuṃ pūrveṣām api pūrvajam ।
saptasv etā ajāyanta prajā rudrāś ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
skandaḥ sanatkumāraś ca tejaḥ saṃkṣipya tiṣṭhataḥ ।
teṣāṃ sapta mahāvaṃśā divyā devagaṇānvitāḥ ।।
kriyāvantaḥ prajāvanto maharṣibhir alaṃkṛtāḥ ।
vidyuto aśanimeghāṃś ca rohitendradhanūṃṣi ca ।।
vayāṃsi ca sasarjādau parjanyaṃ ca sasarja ha ।
ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni nirmame yajñasiddhaye ।।
sādhyān ajanayad devān ity evam anusaṃjaguḥ ।
uccāvacāni bhūtāni gātrebhyas tasya jajñire ।।
āpavasya prajāsargaṃ sṛjato hi prajāpateḥ ।
sṛjyamānāḥ prajā naiva vivardhante yadā tadā ।।
dvidhā kṛtvātmano deham ardhena puruṣo abhavat ।
ardhena nārī tasyāṃ tu so asṛjad dvividhāḥ prajāḥ ।।
divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ caiva mahimnā vyāpya tiṣṭhati ।
virājam asṛjad viṣṇuḥ so asṛjat puruṣaṃ virāṭ ।।
puruṣaṃ taṃ manuṃ vidyāt tasya manvantaraṃ smṛtam ।
dvitīyaṃ mānasasyaitan manor antaram ucyate ।।
sa vairājaḥ prajāsargaṃ sasarja puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ ।
nārāyaṇavisargasya prajās tasyāpy ayonijāḥ ।।
āyuṣmān kīrtimān puṇya- prajāvāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ ।
ādisargaṃ viditvemaṃ yatheṣṭāṃ cāpnuyād gatim ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
sa sṛṣṭvā tu prajās tv evam āpavo vai prajāpatiḥ ।
lebhe vai puruṣaḥ patnīṃ śatarūpām ayonijām ।।
āpavasya mahimnā tu divam āvṛtya tiṣṭhataḥ ।
dharmeṇaiva muniśreṣṭhāḥ śatarūpā vyajāyata ।।
sā tu varṣāyutaṃ taptvā tapaḥ paramaduścaram ।
bhartāraṃ dīptatapasaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyapadyata ।।
sa vai svāyaṃbhuvo viprāḥ puruṣo manur ucyate ।
tasyaikasaptatiyugaṃ manvantaram ihocyate ।।
vairājāt puruṣād vīraṃ śatarūpā vyajāyata ।
priyavratottānapādau vīrāt kāmyā vyajāyata ।।
kāmyā nāma sutā śreṣṭhā kardamasya prajāpateḥ ।
kāmyāputrās tu catvāraḥ samrāṭ kukṣir virāṭ prabhuḥ ।।
uttānapādaṃ jagrāha putram atriḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
uttānapādāc caturaḥ sūnṛtā suṣuve sutān ।।
dharmasya kanyā suśroṇī sūnṛtā nāma viśrutā ।
utpannā vājimedhena dhruvasya jananī śubhā ।।
dhruvaṃ ca kīrtimantaṃ ca āyuṣmantaṃ vasuṃ tathā ।
uttānapādo ajanayat sūnṛtāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ ।।
dhruvo varṣasahasrāṇi trīṇi divyāni bho dvijāḥ ।
tapas tepe mahābhāgaḥ prārthayan sumahad yaśaḥ ।।
tasmai brahmā dadau prītaḥ sthānam ātmasamaṃ prabhuḥ ।
acalaṃ caiva purataḥ saptarṣīṇāṃ prajāpatiḥ ।।
tasyābhimānam ṛddhiṃ ca mahimānaṃ nirīkṣya ca ।
devāsurāṇām ācāryaḥ ślokaṃ prāg uśanā jagau ।।
aho asya tapaso vīryam aho śrutam aho adbhutam ।
yam adya purataḥ kṛtvā dhruvaṃ saptarṣayaḥ sthitāḥ ।।
tasmāc chliṣṭiṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca dhruvāc chaṃbhur vyajāyata ।
śliṣṭer ādhatta succhāyā pañca putrān akalmaṣān ।।
ripuṃ ripuṃjayaṃ vīraṃ vṛkalaṃ vṛkatejasam ।
ripor ādhatta bṛhatī cakṣuṣaṃ sarvatejasam ।।
ajījanat puṣkariṇyāṃ vairiṇyāṃ cākṣuṣaṃ manum ।
prajāpater ātmajāyāṃ vīraṇyasya mahātmanaḥ ।।
manor ajāyanta daśa naḍvalāyāṃ mahaujasaḥ ।
kanyāyāṃ muniśārdūlā vairājasya prajāpateḥ ।।
kutsaḥ puruḥ śatadyumnas tapasvī satyavāk kaviḥ ।
agniṣṭud atirātraś ca sudyumnaś ceti te nava ।।
abhimanyuś ca daśamo naḍvalāyāṃ mahaujasaḥ ।
puror ajanayat putrān ṣaḍ āgneyī mahāprabhān ।।
aṅgaṃ sumanasaṃ svātiṃ kratum aṅgirasaṃ mayam ।
aṅgāt sunīthāpatyaṃ vai veṇam ekaṃ vyajāyata ।।
apacāreṇa veṇasya prakopaḥ sumahān abhūt ।
prajārtham ṛṣayo yasya mamanthur dakṣiṇaṃ karam ।।
veṇasya mathite pāṇau saṃbabhūva mahān nṛpaḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ prāhur eṣa vai muditāḥ prajāḥ ।।
kariṣyati mahātejā yaśaś ca prāpsyate mahat ।
sa dhanvī kavacī jāto jvalajjvalanasaṃnibhaḥ ।।
pṛthur vaiṇyas tathā cemāṃ rarakṣa kṣatrapūrvajaḥ ।
rājasūyābhiṣiktānām ādyaḥ sa vasudhāpatiḥ ।।
tasmāc caiva samutpannau nipuṇau sūtamāgadhau ।
teneyaṃ gaur muniśreṣṭhā dugdhā sasyāni bhūbhṛtā ।।
prajānāṃ vṛttikāmena devaiḥ sarṣigaṇaiḥ saha ।
pitṛbhir dānavaiś caiva gandharvair apsarogaṇaiḥ ।।
sarpaiḥ puṇyajanaiś caiva vīrudbhiḥ parvatais tathā ।
teṣu teṣu ca pātreṣu duhyamānā vasuṃdharā ।।
prādād yathepsitaṃ kṣīraṃ tena prāṇān adhārayan ।
pṛthos tu putrau dharmajñau yajñānte antardhipātinau ।।
śikhaṇḍinī havirdhānam antardhānād vyajāyata ।
havirdhānāt ṣaḍ āgneyī dhiṣaṇājanayat sutān ।।
prācīnabarhiṣaṃ śukraṃ gayaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vrajājinau ।
prācīnabarhir bhagavān mahān āsīt prajāpatiḥ ।।
havirdhānān muniśreṣṭhā yena saṃvardhitāḥ prajāḥ ।
prācīnabarhir bhagavān pṛthivītalacāriṇīḥ ।।
samudratanayāyāṃ tu kṛtadāro abhavat prabhuḥ ।
mahatas tapasaḥ pāre savarṇāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ ।।
savarṇādhatta sāmudrī daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ ।
sarvān pracetaso nāma dhanurvedasya pāragān ।।
apṛthagdharmacaraṇās te atapyanta mahat tapaḥ ।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi samudrasalileśayāḥ ।।
tapaś caratsu pṛthivīṃ pracetaḥsu mahīruhāḥ ।
arakṣamāṇām āvavrur babhūvātha prajākṣayaḥ ।।
nāśakan māruto vātuṃ vṛtaṃ kham abhavad drumaiḥ ।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi na śekuś ceṣṭituṃ prajāḥ ।।
tad upaśrutya tapasā yuktāḥ sarve pracetasaḥ ।
mukhebhyo vāyum agniṃ ca sasṛjur jātamanyavaḥ ।।
unmūlān atha vṛkṣāṃs tu kṛtvā vāyur aśoṣayat ।
tān agnir adahad ghora evam āsīd drumakṣayaḥ ।।
drumakṣayam atho buddhvā kiṃcic chiṣṭeṣu śākhiṣu ।
upagamyābravīd etāṃs tadā somaḥ prajāpatīn ।।
kopaṃ yacchata rājānaḥ sarve prācīnabarhiṣaḥ ।
vṛkṣaśūnyā kṛtā pṛthvī śāmyetām agnimārutau ।।
ratnabhūtā ca kanyeyaṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ varavarṇinī ।
bhaviṣyaṃ jānatā tāta dhṛtā garbheṇa vai mayā ।।
māriṣā nāma nāmnaiṣā vṛkṣāṇām iti nirmitā ।
bhāryā vo astu mahābhāgāḥ somavaṃśavivardhinī ।।
yuṣmākaṃ tejaso ardhena mama cārdhena tejasaḥ ।
asyām utpatsyate vidvān dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ ।।
sa imāṃ dagdhabhūyiṣṭhāṃ yuṣmattejomayena vai ।
agnināgnisamo bhūyaḥ prajāḥ saṃvardhayiṣyati ।।
tataḥ somasya vacanāj jagṛhus te pracetasaḥ ।
saṃhṛtya kopaṃ vṛkṣebhyaḥ patnīṃ dharmeṇa māriṣām ।।
daśabhyas tu pracetobhyo māriṣāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ ।
dakṣo jajñe mahātejāḥ somasyāṃśena bho dvijāḥ ।।
acarāṃś ca carāṃś caiva dvipado atha catuṣpadaḥ ।
sa sṛṣṭvā manasā dakṣaḥ paścād asṛjata striyaḥ ।।
dadau daśa sa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa ।
śiṣṭāḥ somāya rājñe ca nakṣatrākhyā dadau prabhuḥ ।।
tāsu devāḥ khagā gāvo nāgā ditijadānavāḥ ।
gandharvāpsarasaś caiva jajñire anyāś ca jātayaḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti viprendrāḥ prajā maithunasaṃbhavāḥ ।
saṃkalpād darśanāt sparśāt pūrveṣāṃ procyate prajā ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca gandharvoragarakṣasām ।
saṃbhavas tu śruto asmābhir dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ ।।
aṅguṣṭhād brahmaṇo jajñe dakṣaḥ kila śubhavrataḥ ।
vāmāṅguṣṭhāt tathā caivaṃ tasya patnī vyajāyata ।।
kathaṃ prācetasatvaṃ sa punar lebhe mahātapāḥ ।
etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ sūta vyākhyātuṃ tvam ihārhasi ।
dauhitraś caiva somasya kathaṃ śvaśuratāṃ gataḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
utpattiś ca nirodhaś ca nityaṃ bhūteṣu bho dvijāḥ ।
ṛṣayo atra na muhyanti vidyāvantaś ca ye janāḥ ।।
yuge yuge bhavanty ete punar dakṣādayo nṛpāḥ ।
punaś caiva nirudhyante vidvāṃs tatra na muhyati ।।
jyaiṣṭhyaṃ kāniṣṭham apy eṣāṃ pūrvaṃ nāsīd dvijottamāḥ ।
tapa eva garīyo abhūt prabhāvaś caiva kāraṇam ।।
imāṃ visṛṣṭiṃ dakṣasya yo vidyāt sacarācarām ।
prajāvān āyur uttīrṇaḥ svargaloke mahīyate ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca gandharvoragarakṣasām ।
utpattiṃ vistareṇaiva lomaharṣaṇa kīrtaya ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
prajāḥ sṛjeti vyādiṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣaḥ svayaṃbhuvā ।
yathā sasarja bhūtāni tathā śṛṇuta bho dvijāḥ ।।
mānasāny eva bhūtāni pūrvam evāsṛjat prabhuḥ ।
ṛṣīn devān sagandharvān asurān yakṣarākṣasān ।।
yadāsya mānasī viprā na vyavardhata vai prajā ।
tadā saṃcintya dharmātmā prajāhetoḥ prajāpatiḥ ।।
sa maithunena dharmeṇa sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ ।
asiknīm āvahat patnīṃ vīraṇasya prajāpateḥ ।।
sutāṃ sutapasā yuktāṃ mahatīṃ lokadhāriṇīm ।
atha putrasahasrāṇi vairaṇyāṃ pañca vīryavān ।।
asiknyāṃ janayām āsa dakṣa eva prajāpatiḥ ।
tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā mahābhāgān saṃvivardhayiṣūn prajāḥ ।।
devarṣiḥ priyasaṃvādo nāradaḥ prābravīd idam ।
nāśāya vacanaṃ teṣāṃ śāpāyaivātmanas tathā ।।
yaṃ kaśyapaḥ sutavaraṃ parameṣṭhī vyajījanat ।
dakṣasya vai duhitari dakṣaśāpabhayān muniḥ ।।
pūrvaṃ sa hi samutpanno nāradaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ ।
asiknyām atha vairaṇyāṃ bhūyo devarṣisattamaḥ ।।
taṃ bhūyo janayām āsa piteva munipuṃgavam ।
tena dakṣasya vai putrā haryaśvā iti viśrutāḥ ।।
nirmathya nāśitāḥ sarve vidhinā ca na saṃśayaḥ ।
tasyodyatas tadā dakṣo nāśāyāmitavikramaḥ ।।
brahmarṣīn purataḥ kṛtvā yācitaḥ parameṣṭhinā ।
tato abhisaṃdhiś cakre vai dakṣasya parameṣṭhinā ।।
kanyāyāṃ nārado mahyaṃ tava putro bhaved iti ।
tato dakṣaḥ sutāṃ prādāt priyāṃ vai parameṣṭhine ।
sa tasyāṃ nārado jajñe bhūyaḥ śāpabhayād ṛṣiḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathaṃ praṇāśitāḥ putrā nāradena maharṣiṇā ।
prajāpateḥ sūtavarya śrotum icchāma tattvataḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
dakṣasya putrā haryaśvā vivardhayiṣavaḥ prajāḥ ।
samāgatā mahāvīryā nāradas tān uvāca ha ।।
{nārada uvāca 
bāliśā bata yūyaṃ vai nāsyā jānīta vai bhuvaḥ ।
pramāṇaṃ sraṣṭukāmā vai prajāḥ prācetasātmajāḥ ।।
antar ūrdhvam adhaś caiva kathaṃ sṛjatha vai prajāḥ ।
te tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā prayātāḥ sarvato diśaḥ ।।
adyāpi na nivartante samudrebhya ivāpagāḥ ।
haryaśveṣv atha naṣṭeṣu dakṣaḥ prācetasaḥ punaḥ ।।
vairaṇyām atha putrāṇāṃ sahasram asṛjat prabhuḥ ।
vivardhayiṣavas te tu śabalāśvās tathā prajāḥ ।।
pūrvoktaṃ vacanaṃ te tu nāradena pracoditāḥ ।
anyonyam ūcus te sarve samyag āha mahān ṛṣiḥ ।।
bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ jñātuṃ gantavyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ।
jñātvā pramāṇaṃ pṛthvyāś ca sukhaṃ srakṣyāmahe prajāḥ ।।
te api tenaiva mārgeṇa prayātāḥ sarvato diśam ।
adyāpi na nivartante samudrebhya ivāpagāḥ ।।
tadā prabhṛti vai bhrātā bhrātur anveṣaṇe dvijāḥ ।
prayāto naśyati kṣipraṃ tan na kāryaṃ vipaścitā ।।
tāṃś caiva naṣṭān vijñāya putrān dakṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
ṣaṣṭiṃ tato asṛjat kanyā vairaṇyām iti naḥ śrutam ।।
tās tadā pratijagrāha bhāryārthaṃ kaśyapaḥ prabhuḥ ।
somo dharmaś ca bho viprās tathaivānye maharṣayaḥ ।।
dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa ।
saptaviṃśati somāya catasro ariṣṭanemine ।।
dve caiva bahuputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tathā ।
dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu ।।
arundhatī vasur yāmī lambā bhānur marutvatī ।
saṃkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
dharmapatnyo daśa tv etās tāsv apatyāni bodhata ।
viśvedevās tu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyān vyajāyata ।।
marutvatyāṃ marutvanto vasos tu vasavaḥ sutāḥ ।
bhānos tu bhānavaḥ putrā muhūrtās tu muhūrtajāḥ ।।
lambāyāś caiva ghoṣo atha nāgavīthī ca yāmijā ।
pṛthivī viṣayaṃ sarvam arundhatyāṃ vyajāyata ।।
saṃkalpāyās tu viśvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi ।
nāgavīthyāṃ ca yāminyāṃ vṛṣalaś ca vyajāyata ।।
parā yāḥ somapatnīś ca dakṣaḥ prācetaso dadau ।
sarvā nakṣatranāmnyas tā jyotiṣe parikīrtitāḥ ।।
ye tv anye khyātimanto vai devā jyotiṣpurogamāḥ ।
vasavo aṣṭau samākhyātās teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi vistaram ।।
āpo dhruvaś ca somaś ca dhavaś caivānilo analaḥ ।
pratyūṣaś ca prabhāsaś ca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
āpasya putro vaitaṇḍyaḥ śramaḥ śrānto munis tathā ।
dhruvasya putro bhagavān kālo lokaprakālanaḥ ।।
somasya bhagavān varcā varcasvī yena jāyate ।
dhavasya putro draviṇo hutahavyavahas tathā ।
manoharāyāḥ śiśiraḥ prāṇo atha ramaṇas tathā ।।
anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putro manojavaḥ ।
avijñātagatiś caiva dvau putrāv anilasya ca ।।
agniputraḥ kumāras tu śarastambe śriyā vṛtaḥ ।
tasya śākho viśākhaś ca naigameyaś ca pṛṣṭhajaḥ ।।
apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārttikeya iti smṛtaḥ ।
pratyūṣasya viduḥ putram ṛṣiṃ nāmnātha devalam ।।
dvau putrau devalasyāpi kṣamāvantau manīṣiṇau ।
bṛhaspates tu bhaginī varastrī brahmavādinī ।।
yogasiddhā jagat kṛtsnam asaktā vicacāra ha ।
prabhāsasya tu sā bhāryā vasūnām aṣṭamasya tu ।।
viśvakarmā mahābhāgo yasyāṃ jajñe prajāpatiḥ ।
kartā śilpasahasrāṇāṃ tridaśānāṃ ca vārdhakiḥ ।।
bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kartā śilpavatāṃ varaḥ ।
yaḥ sarveṣāṃ vimānāni daivatānāṃ cakāra ha ।।
mānuṣāś copajīvanti yasya śilpaṃ mahātmanaḥ ।
surabhī kaśyapād rudrān ekādaśa vinirmame ।।
mahādevaprasādena tapasā bhāvitā satī ।
ajaikapād ahirbudhnyas tvaṣṭā rudraś ca vīryavān ।।
haraś ca bahurūpaś ca tryambakaś cāparājitaḥ ।
vṛṣākapiś ca śaṃbhuś ca kapardī raivatas tathā ।।
mṛgavyādhaś ca śarvaś ca kapālī ca dvijottamāḥ ।
ekādaśaite vikhyātā rudrās tribhuvaneśvarāḥ ।।
śataṃ tv evaṃ samākhyātaṃ rudrāṇām amitaujasām ।
purāṇe muniśārdūlā yair vyāptaṃ sacarācaram ।।
dārāñ śṛṇudhvaṃ viprendrāḥ kaśyapasya prajāpateḥ ।
aditir ditir danuś caiva ariṣṭā surasā khasā ।।
surabhir vinatā caiva tāmrā krodhavaśā irā ।
kadrur muniś ca bho viprās tāsv apatyāni bodhata ।।
pūrvamanvantare śreṣṭhā dvādaśāsan surottamāḥ ।
tuṣitā nāma te anyonyam ūcur vaivasvate antare ।।
upasthite atiyaśasaś cākṣuṣasyāntare manoḥ ।
hitārthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ samāgamya parasparam ।।
āgacchata drutaṃ devā aditiṃ saṃpraviśya vai ।
manvantare prasūyāmas tan naḥ śreyo bhaviṣyati ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
evam uktvā tu te sarve cākṣuṣasyāntare manoḥ ।
mārīcāt kaśyapāj jātās tv adityā dakṣakanyayā ।।
tatra viṣṇuś ca śakraś ca jajñāte punar eva hi ।
aryamā caiva dhātā ca tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca ।।
vivasvān savitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca ।
aṃśo bhagaś cātitejā ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ ।।
saptaviṃśati yāḥ proktāḥ somapatnyo mahāvratāḥ ।
tāsām apatyāny abhavan dīptāny amitatejasaḥ ।।
ariṣṭanemipatnīnām apatyānīha ṣoḍaśa ।

kṛśāśvasya ca devarṣer devapraharaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
ete yugasahasrānte jāyante punar eva hi ।
sarve devagaṇāś cātra trayastriṃśat tu kāmajāḥ ।।

saṃhrādaś ca caturtho abhūd dhrādaputro hradas tathā ।।
hradasya putrau dvau vīrau śivaḥ kālas tathaiva ca ।
virocanaś ca prāhrādir balir jajñe virocanāt ।।
baleḥ putraśatam āsīd bāṇajyeṣṭhaṃ tapodhanāḥ ।
dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca sūryaś ca candramāś candratāpanaḥ ।।
kumbhanābho gardabhākṣaḥ kukṣir ity evamādayaḥ ।
bāṇas teṣām atibalo jyeṣṭhaḥ paśupateḥ priyaḥ ।।
purā kalpe tu bāṇena prasādyomāpatiṃ prabhum ।
pārśvato vihariṣyāmi ity evaṃ yācito varaḥ ।।
hiraṇyākṣasutāś caiva vidvāṃsaś ca mahābalāḥ ।
bharbharaḥ śakuniś caiva bhūtasaṃtāpanas tathā ।।
mahānābhaś ca vikrāntaḥ kālanābhas tathaiva ca ।
abhavan danuputrāś ca śataṃ tīvraparākramāḥ ।।
tapasvino mahāvīryāḥ prādhānyena bravīmi tān ।
dvimūrdhā śaṅkukarṇaś ca tathā hayaśirā vibhuḥ ।।
ayomukhaḥ śambaraś ca kapilo vāmanas tathā ।
mārīcir maghavāṃś caiva ilvalaḥ svasṛmas tathā ।।
vikṣobhaṇaś ca ketuś ca ketuvīryaśatahradau ।
indrajit sarvajic caiva vajranābhas tathaiva ca ।।
ekacakro mahābāhus tārakaś ca mahābalaḥ ।
vaiśvānaraḥ pulomā ca vidrāvaṇamahāśirāḥ ।।
svarbhānur vṛṣaparvā ca vipracittiś ca vīryavān ।
sarva ete danoḥ putrāḥ kaśyapād abhijajñire ।।
vipracittipradhānās te dānavāḥ sumahābalāḥ ।
eteṣāṃ putrapautraṃ tu na tac chakyaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
prasaṃkhyātuṃ bahutvāc ca putrapautram anantakam ।
svarbhānos tu prabhā kanyā pulomnas tu śacī sutā ।।
upadīptir hayaśirāḥ śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī ।
pulomā kālikā caiva vaiśvānarasute ubhe ।।
bahvapatye mahāpatye marīces tu parigrahaḥ ।
tayoḥ putrasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭir dānavanandanāḥ ।।
caturdaśaśatān anyān hiraṇyapuravāsinaḥ ।

avadhyā devatānāṃ hi hiraṇyapuravāsinaḥ ।।
pitāmahaprasādena ye hatāḥ savyasācinā ।
tato apare mahāvīryā dānavās tv atidāruṇāḥ ।।
siṃhikāyām athotpannā vipracitteḥ sutās tathā ।
daityadānavasaṃyogāj jātās tīvraparākramāḥ ।।
saiṃhikeyā iti khyātās trayodaśa mahābalāḥ ।
vaṃśyaḥ śalyaś ca balinau nalaś caiva tathā balaḥ ।।
vātāpir namuciś caiva ilvalaḥ svasṛmas tathā ।
añjiko narakaś caiva kālanābhas tathaiva ca ।।
saramānas tathā caiva svarakalpaś ca vīryavān ।
ete vai dānavāḥ śreṣṭhā danor vaṃśavivardhanāḥ ।।
teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।
saṃhrādasya tu daityasya nivātakavacāḥ kule ।।
samutpannāḥ sumahatā tapasā bhāvitātmanaḥ ।
tisraḥ koṭyaḥ sutās teṣāṃ maṇivatyāṃ nivāsinaḥ ।।
avadhyās te api devānām arjunena nipātitāḥ ।
ṣaṭ sutāḥ sumahābhāgās tāmrāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ ।।
krauñcī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrikā ।
krauñcī tu janayām āsa ulūkapratyulūkakān ।।
śyenī śyenāṃs tathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃś ca gṛdhry api ।
śucir audakān pakṣigaṇān sugrīvī tu dvijottamāḥ ।।
aśvān uṣṭrān gardabhāṃś ca tāmrāvaṃśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।
vinatāyās tu dvau putrau vikhyātau garuḍāruṇau ।।
garuḍaḥ patatāṃ śreṣṭho dāruṇaḥ svena karmaṇā ।
surasāyāḥ sahasraṃ tu sarpāṇām amitaujasām ।।
anekaśirasāṃ viprāḥ khacarāṇāṃ mahātmanām ।
kādraveyās tu balinaḥ sahasram amitaujasaḥ ।।
suparṇavaśagā nāgā jajñire naikamastakāḥ ।
yeṣāṃ pradhānāḥ satataṃ śeṣavāsukitakṣakāḥ ।।
airāvato mahāpadmaḥ kambalāśvatarāv ubhau ।
elāpattraś ca śaṅkhaś ca karkoṭakadhanaṃjayau ।।
mahānīlamahākarṇau dhṛtarāṣṭrabalāhakau ।
kuharaḥ puṣpadaṃṣṭraś ca durmukhaḥ sumukhas tathā ।।
śaṅkhaś ca śaṅkhapālaś ca kapilo vāmanas tathā ।
nahuṣaḥ śaṅkharomā ca maṇir ity evamādayaḥ ।।
teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।
caturdaśasahasrāṇi krūrāṇām anilāśinām ।।
gaṇaṃ krodhavaṃśaṃ viprās tasya sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ ।
sthalajāḥ pakṣiṇo abjāś ca dharāyāḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
gās tu vai janayām āsa surabhir mahiṣīs tathā ।
irā vṛkṣalatā vallīs tṛṇajātīś ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
khasā tu yakṣarakṣāṃsi munir apsarasas tathā ।
ariṣṭā tu mahāsiddhā gandharvān amitaujasaḥ ।।
ete kaśyapadāyādāḥ kīrtitāḥ sthāṇujaṅgamāḥ ।
yeṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।।
eṣa manvantare viprāḥ sargaḥ svārociṣe smṛtaḥ ।
vaivasvate atimahati vāruṇe vitate kratau ।।
juhvānasya brahmaṇo vai prajāsarga ihocyate ।
pūrvaṃ yatra samutpannān brahmarṣīn sapta mānasān ।।
putratve kalpayām āsa svayam eva pitāmahaḥ ।
tato virodhe devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
ditir vinaṣṭaputrā vai toṣayām āsa kaśyapam ।
kaśyapas tu prasannātmā samyag ārādhitas tayā ।।
vareṇa cchandayām āsa sā ca vavre varaṃ tadā ।
putram indravadhārthāya samartham amitaujasam ।।
sa ca tasmai varaṃ prādāt prārthitaḥ sumahātapāḥ ।
dattvā ca varam atyugro mārīcaḥ samabhāṣata ।।
indraṃ putro nihantā te garbhaṃ vai śaradāṃ śatam ।
yadi dhārayase śauca- tatparā vratam āsthitā ।।
tathety abhihito bhartā tayā devyā mahātapāḥ ।
dhārayām āsa garbhaṃ tu śuciḥ sā munisattamāḥ ।।
tato abhyupāgamad dityāṃ garbham ādhāya kaśyapaḥ ।
rodhayan vai gaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ devānām amitaujasam ।।
tejaḥ saṃhṛtya durdharṣam avadhyam amarair api ।
jagāma parvatāyaiva tapase saṃśitavratā ।।
tasyāś caivāntaraprepsur abhavat pākaśāsanaḥ ।
jāte varṣaśate cāsyā dadarśāntaram acyutaḥ ।।
akṛtvā pādayoḥ śaucaṃ ditiḥ śayanam āviśat ।
nidrāṃ cāhārayām āsa tasyāṃ kukṣiṃ praviśya saḥ ।।
vajrapāṇis tato garbhaṃ saptadhā taṃ nyakṛntayat ।
sa pāṭyamāno garbho atha vajreṇa praruroda ha ।।
mā rodīr iti taṃ śakraḥ punaḥ punar athābravīt ।
so abhavat saptadhā garbhas tam indro ruṣitaḥ punaḥ ।।
ekaikaṃ saptadhā cakre vajreṇaivārikarṣaṇaḥ ।
maruto nāma te devā babhūvur dvijasattamāḥ ।।
yathoktaṃ vai maghavatā tathaiva maruto abhavan ।
devāś caikonapañcāśat sahāyā vajrapāṇinaḥ ।।
teṣām evaṃ pravṛttānāṃ bhūtānāṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
rocayan vai gaṇaśreṣṭhān devānām amitaujasām ।।
nikāyeṣu nikāyeṣu hariḥ prādāt prajāpatīn ।
kramaśas tāni rājyāni pṛthupūrvāṇi bho dvijāḥ ।।
sa hariḥ puruṣo vīraḥ kṛṣṇo jiṣṇuḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
parjanyas tapano anantas tasya sarvam idaṃ jagat ।।
bhūtasargam imaṃ samyag jānato dvijasattamāḥ ।
nāvṛttibhayam astīha paralokabhayaṃ kutaḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
abhiṣicyādhirājendraṃ pṛthuṃ vaiṇyaṃ pitāmahaḥ ।
tataḥ krameṇa rājyāni vyādeṣṭum upacakrame ।।
dvijānāṃ vīrudhāṃ caiva nakṣatragrahayos tathā ।
yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva somaṃ rājye abhyaṣecayat ।।
apāṃ tu varuṇaṃ rājye rājñāṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ patim ।
ādityānāṃ tathā viṣṇuṃ vasūnām atha pāvakam ।।
prajāpatīnāṃ dakṣaṃ tu marutām atha vāsavam ।
daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ vai prahrādam amitaujasam ।।
vaivasvataṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca yamaṃ rājye abhyaṣecayat ।
yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca ।।
sarvabhūtapiśācānāṃ girīśaṃ śūlapāṇinam ।
śailānāṃ himavantaṃ ca nadīnām atha sāgaram ।।
gandharvāṇām adhipatiṃ cakre citrarathaṃ prabhum ।
nāgānāṃ vāsukiṃ cakre sarpāṇām atha takṣakam ।।
vāraṇānāṃ tu rājānam airāvatam athādiśat ।
uccaiḥśravasam aśvānāṃ garuḍaṃ caiva pakṣiṇām ।।
mṛgāṇām atha śārdūlaṃ govṛṣaṃ tu gavāṃ patim ।
vanaspatīnāṃ rājānaṃ plakṣam evābhyaṣecayat ।।
evaṃ vibhajya rājyāni krameṇaiva pitāmahaḥ ।
diśāṃ pālān atha tataḥ sthāpayām āsa sa prabhuḥ ।।
pūrvasyāṃ diśi putraṃ tu vairājasya prajāpateḥ ।
diśaḥ pālaṃ sudhanvānaṃ rājānaṃ so abhyaṣecayat ।।
dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi tathā kardamasya prajāpateḥ ।
putraṃ śaṅkhapadaṃ nāma rājānaṃ so abhyaṣecayat ।।
paścimasyāṃ diśi tathā rajasaḥ putram acyutam ।
ketumantaṃ mahātmānaṃ rājānaṃ so abhyaṣecayat ।।
tathā hiraṇyaromāṇaṃ parjanyasya prajāpateḥ ।
udīcyāṃ diśi durdharṣaṃ rājānaṃ so abhyaṣecayat ।।
tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sapattanā ।
yathāpradeśam adyāpi dharmeṇa pratipālyate ।।
rājasūyābhiṣiktas tu pṛthur etair narādhipaiḥ ।
vedadṛṣṭena vidhinā rājā rājye narādhipaḥ ।।
tato manvantare atīte cākṣuṣe amitatejasi ।
vaivasvatāya manave pṛthivyāṃ rājyam ādiśat ।।
tasya vistaram ākhyāsye manor vaivasvatasya ha ।
bhavatāṃ cānukūlyāya yadi śrotum ihecchatha ।
mahad etad adhiṣṭhānaṃ purāṇe tad adhiṣṭhitam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
vistareṇa pṛthor janma lomaharṣaṇa kīrtaya ।
yathā mahātmanā tena dugdhā veyaṃ vasuṃdharā ।।
yathā vāpi nṛbhir dugdhā yathā devair maharṣibhiḥ ।
yathā daityaiś ca nāgaiś ca yathā yakṣair yathā drumaiḥ ।।
yathā śailaiḥ piśācaiś ca gandharvaiś ca dvijottamaiḥ ।
rākṣasaiś ca mahāsattvair yathā dugdhā vasuṃdharā ।।
teṣāṃ pātraviśeṣāṃś ca vaktum arhasi suvrata ।
vatsakṣīraviśeṣāṃś ca dogdhāraṃ cānupūrvaśaḥ ।।
yasmāc ca kāraṇāt pāṇir veṇasya mathitaḥ purā ।
kruddhair maharṣibhis tāta kāraṇaṃ tac ca kīrtaya ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi pṛthor vaiṇyasya vistaram ।
ekāgrāḥ prayatāś caiva puṇyārthaṃ vai dvijarṣabhāḥ ।।
nāśuceḥ kṣudramanaso nāśiṣyasyāvratasya ca ।
kīrtayeyam idaṃ viprāḥ kṛtaghnāyāhitāya ca ।।
svargyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ dhanyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam ।
rahasyam ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ vai yathātatham ।।
yaś cemaṃ kīrtayen nityaṃ pṛthor vaiṇyasya vistaram ।
brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya na sa śocet kṛtākṛtam ।।
āsīd dharmasya saṃgoptā pūrvam atrisamaḥ prabhuḥ ।
atrivaṃśe samutpannas tv aṅgo nāma prajāpatiḥ ।।
tasya putro abhavad veṇo nātyarthaṃ dharmakovidaḥ ।
jāto mṛtyusutāyāṃ vai sunīthāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ ।।
sa mātāmahadoṣeṇa tena kālātmajātmajaḥ ।
svadharmaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā kāmalobheṣv avartata ।।
maryādāṃ bhedayām āsa dharmopetāṃ sa pārthivaḥ ।
vedadharmān atikramya so adharmanirato abhavat ।।
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārāḥ prajās tasmin prajāpatau ।
pravṛttaṃ na papuḥ somaṃ hutaṃ yajñeṣu devatāḥ ।।
na yaṣṭavyaṃ na hotavyam iti tasya prajāpateḥ ।
āsīt pratijñā krūreyaṃ vināśe pratyupasthite ।।
aham ijyaś ca yaṣṭā ca yajñaś ceti bhṛgūdvaha ।
mayi yajño vidhātavyo mayi hotavyam ity api ।।
tam atikrāntamaryādam ādadānam asāṃpratam ।
ūcur maharṣayaḥ sarve marīcipramukhās tadā ।।
vayaṃ dīkṣāṃ pravekṣyāmaḥ saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn ।
adharmaṃ kuru mā veṇa eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
nidhane atreḥ prasūtas tvaṃ prajāpatir asaṃśayam ।
prajāś ca pālayiṣye aham itīha samayaḥ kṛtaḥ ।।
tāṃs tathā bruvataḥ sarvān maharṣīn abravīt tadā ।
veṇaḥ prahasya durbuddhir imam artham anarthavit ।।
{veṇa uvāca 
sraṣṭā dharmasya kaś cānyaḥ śrotavyaṃ kasya vā mayā ।
śrutavīryatapaḥsatyair mayā vā kaḥ samo bhuvi ।।
prabhavaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ ।
saṃmūḍhā na vidur nūnaṃ bhavanto māṃ vicetasaḥ ।।
icchan daheyaṃ pṛthivīṃ plāvayeyaṃ jalais tathā ।
dyāṃ vai bhuvaṃ ca rundheyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।।
yadā na śakyate mohād avalepāc ca pārthivaḥ ।
apanetuṃ tadā veṇas tataḥ kruddhā maharṣayaḥ ।।
taṃ nigṛhya mahātmāno visphurantaṃ mahābalam ।
tato asya savyam ūruṃ te mamanthur jātamanyavaḥ ।।
tasmin nimathyamāne vai rājña ūrau tu jajñivān ।
hrasvo atimātraḥ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇaś ceti babhūva ha ।।
sa bhītaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthivān dvijasattamāḥ ।
tam atrir vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣīdety abravīt tadā ।।
niṣādavaṃśakartāsau babhūva vadatāṃ varāḥ ।
dhīvarān asṛjac cāpi veṇakalmaṣasaṃbhavān ।।
ye cānye vindhyanilayās tathā parvatasaṃśrayāḥ ।
adharmarucayo viprās te tu vai veṇakalmaṣāḥ ।।
tataḥ punar mahātmānaḥ pāṇiṃ veṇasya dakṣiṇam ।
araṇīm iva saṃrabdhā mamanthur jātamanyavaḥ ।।
pṛthus tasmāt samutpannaḥ karāj jvalanasaṃnibhaḥ ।
dīpyamānaḥ svavapuṣā sākṣād agnir iva jvalan ।।
atha so ajagavaṃ nāma dhanur gṛhya mahāravam ।
śarāṃś ca divyān rakṣārthaṃ kavacaṃ ca mahāprabham ।।
tasmiñ jāte atha bhūtāni saṃprahṛṣṭāni sarvaśaḥ ।
samāpetur mahābhāgā veṇas tu tridivaṃ yayau ।।
samutpannena bho viprāḥ satputreṇa mahātmanā ।
trātaḥ sa puruṣavyāghraḥ puṃnāmno narakāt tadā ।।
taṃ samudrāś ca nadyaś ca ratnāny ādāya sarvaśaḥ ।
toyāni cābhiṣekārthaṃ sarva evopatasthire ।।
pitāmahaś ca bhagavān devair āṅgirasaiḥ saha ।
sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni jaṅgamāni ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
samāgamya tadā vaiṇyam abhyaṣiñcan narādhipam ।
mahatā rājarājena prajās tenānurañjitāḥ ।।
so abhiṣikto mahātejā vidhivad dharmakovidaiḥ ।
ādhirājye tadā rājñāṃ pṛthur vaiṇyaḥ pratāpavān ।।
pitrāparañjitās tasya prajās tenānurañjitāḥ ।
anurāgāt tatas tasya nāma rājābhyajāyata ।।
āpas tastambhire tasya samudram abhiyāsyataḥ ।
parvatāś ca dadur mārgaṃ dhvajabhaṅgaś ca nābhavat ।।
akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī sidhyanty annāni cintanāt ।
sarvakāmadughā gāvaḥ puṭake puṭake madhu ।।
etasminn eva kāle tu yajñe paitāmahe śubhe ।
sūtaḥ sūtyāṃ samutpannaḥ sautye ahani mahāmatiḥ ।।
tasminn eva mahāyajñe jajñe prājño atha māgadhaḥ ।
pṛthoḥ stavārthaṃ tau tatra samāhūtau maharṣibhiḥ ।।
tāv ūcur ṛṣayaḥ sarve stūyatām eṣa pārthivaḥ ।
karmaitad anurūpaṃ vāṃ pātraṃ cāyaṃ narādhipaḥ ।।
tāv ūcatus tadā sarvāṃs tān ṛṣīn sūtamāgadhau ।
āvāṃ devān ṛṣīṃś caiva prīṇayāvaḥ svakarmabhiḥ ।।
na cāsya vidmo vai karma nāma vā lakṣaṇaṃ yaśaḥ ।
stotraṃ yenāsya kuryāva rājñas tejasvino dvijāḥ ।।
ṛṣibhis tau niyuktau tu bhaviṣyaiḥ stūyatām iti ।
yāni karmāṇi kṛtavān pṛthuḥ paścān mahābalaḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti vai loke staveṣu munisattamāḥ ।
āśīrvādāḥ prayujyante sūtamāgadhabandibhiḥ ।।
tayoḥ stavānte suprītaḥ pṛthuḥ prādāt prajeśvaraḥ ।
anūpadeśaṃ sūtāya magadhaṃ māgadhāya ca ।।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāḥ prajāḥ procur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
vṛttīnām eṣa vo dātā bhaviṣyati narādhipaḥ ।।
tato vaiṇyaṃ mahātmānaṃ prajāḥ samabhidudruvuḥ ।
tvaṃ no vṛttiṃ vidhatsveti maharṣivacanāt tadā ।।
so abhidrutaḥ prajābhis tu prajāhitacikīrṣayā ।
dhanur gṛhya pṛṣatkāṃś ca pṛthivīm ādravad balī ।।
tato vaiṇyabhayatrastā gaur bhūtvā prādravan mahī ।
tāṃ pṛthur dhanur ādāya dravantīm anvadhāvata ।।
sā lokān brahmalokādīn gatvā vaiṇyabhayāt tadā ।
pradadarśāgrato vaiṇyaṃ pragṛhītaśarāsanam ।।
jvaladbhir niśitair bāṇair dīptatejasam antataḥ ।
mahāyogaṃ mahātmānaṃ durdharṣam amarair api ।।
alabhantī tu sā trāṇaṃ vaiṇyam evānvapadyata ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā pūjyā lokais tribhis tadā ।।
uvāca vaiṇyaṃ nādharmaṃ strīvadhe paripaśyasi ।
kathaṃ dhārayitā cāsi prajā rājan vinā mayā ।।
mayi lokāḥ sthitā rājan mayedaṃ dhāryate jagat ।
madvināśe vinaśyeyuḥ prajāḥ pārthiva viddhi tat ।।
na mām arhasi hantuṃ vai śreyaś cet tvaṃ cikīrṣasi ।
prajānāṃ pṛthivīpāla śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama ।।
upāyataḥ samārabdhāḥ sarve sidhyanty upakramāḥ ।
upāyaṃ paśya yena tvaṃ dhārayethāḥ prajām imām ।।
hatvāpi māṃ na śaktas tvaṃ prajānāṃ poṣaṇe nṛpa ।
anukūlā bhaviṣyāmi yaccha kopaṃ mahāmate ।।
avadhyāṃ ca striyaṃ prāhus tiryagyonigateṣv api ।
yady evaṃ pṛthivīpāla na dharmaṃ tyaktum arhasi ।।
evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā rājā mahāmanāḥ ।
kopaṃ nigṛhya dharmātmā vasudhām idam abravīt ।।
{pṛthur uvāca 
ekasyārthe tu yo hanyād ātmano vā parasya vā ।
bahūn vā prāṇino anantaṃ bhavet tasyeha pātakam ।।
sukham edhanti bahavo yasmiṃs tu nihate aśubhe ।
tasmin hate nāsti bhadre pātakaṃ copapātakam ।।
so ahaṃ prajānimittaṃ tvāṃ haniṣyāmi vasuṃdhare ।
yadi me vacanān nādya kariṣyasi jagaddhitam ।।
tvāṃ nihatyādya bāṇena macchāsanaparāṅmukhīm ।
ātmānaṃ prathayitvāhaṃ prajā dhārayitā svayam ।।
sā tvaṃ śāsanam āsthāya mama dharmabhṛtāṃ vare ।
saṃjīvaya prajāḥ sarvāḥ samarthā hy asi dhāraṇe ।।
duhitṛtvaṃ ca me gaccha tata enam ahaṃ śaram ।
niyaccheyaṃ tvadvadhārtham udyantaṃ ghoradarśanam ।।
{vasudhovāca 
sarvam etad ahaṃ vīra vidhāsyāmi na saṃśayaḥ ।
vatsaṃ tu mama saṃpaśya kṣareyaṃ yena vatsalā ।।
samāṃ ca kuru sarvatra māṃ tvaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara ।
yathā visyandamānaṃ me kṣīraṃ sarvatra bhāvayet ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
tata utsārayām āsa śailāñ śatasahasraśaḥ ।
dhanuṣkoṭyā tadā vaiṇyas tena śailā vivardhitāḥ ।।
nahi pūrvavisarge vai viṣame pṛthivītale ।
saṃvibhāgaḥ purāṇāṃ vā grāmāṇāṃ vābhavat tadā ।।
na sasyāni na gorakṣyaṃ na kṛṣir na vaṇikpathaḥ ।
naiva satyānṛtaṃ cāsīn na lobho na ca matsaraḥ ।।
vaivasvate antare tasmin sāṃprataṃ samupasthite ।
vaiṇyāt prabhṛti vai viprāḥ sarvasyaitasya saṃbhavaḥ ।।
yatra yatra samaṃ tv asyā bhūmer āsīt tadā dvijāḥ ।
tatra tatra prajāḥ sarvā nivāsaṃ samarocayan ।।
āhāraḥ phalamūlāni prajānām abhavat tadā ।
kṛcchreṇa mahatā yukta ity evam anuśuśruma ।।
sa kalpayitvā vatsaṃ tu manuṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhum ।
svapāṇau puruṣavyāghro dudoha pṛthivīṃ tataḥ ।।
sasyajātāni sarvāṇi pṛthur vaiṇyaḥ pratāpavān ।
tenānnena prajāḥ sarvā vartante adyāpi sarvaśaḥ ।।
ṛṣayaś ca tadā devāḥ pitaro atha sarīsṛpāḥ ।
daityā yakṣāḥ puṇyajanā gandharvāḥ parvatā nagāḥ ।।
ete purā dvijaśreṣṭhā duduhur dharaṇīṃ kila ।
kṣīraṃ vatsaś ca pātraṃ ca teṣāṃ dogdhā pṛthak pṛthak ।।
ṛṣīṇām abhavat somo vatso dogdhā bṛhaspatiḥ ।
kṣīraṃ teṣāṃ tapo brahma pātraṃ chandāṃsi bho dvijāḥ ।।
devānāṃ kāñcanaṃ pātraṃ vatsas teṣāṃ śatakratuḥ ।
kṣīram ojaskaraṃ caiva dogdhā ca bhagavān raviḥ ।।
pitṝṇāṃ rājataṃ pātraṃ yamo vatsaḥ pratāpavān ।
antakaś cābhavad dogdhā kṣīraṃ teṣāṃ sudhā smṛtā ।।
nāgānāṃ takṣako vatsaḥ pātraṃ cālābusaṃjñakam ।
dogdhā tv airāvato nāgas teṣāṃ kṣīraṃ viṣaṃ smṛtam ।।
asurāṇāṃ madhur dogdhā kṣīraṃ māyāmayaṃ smṛtam ।
virocanas tu vatso abhūd āyasaṃ pātram eva ca ।।
yakṣāṇām āmapātraṃ tu vatso vaiśravaṇaḥ prabhuḥ ।
dogdhā rajatanābhas tu kṣīrāntardhānam eva ca ।।
sumālī rākṣasendrāṇāṃ vatsaḥ kṣīraṃ ca śoṇitam ।
dogdhā rajatanābhas tu kapālaṃ pātram eva ca ।।
gandharvāṇāṃ citraratho vatsaḥ pātraṃ ca paṅkajam ।
dogdhā ca suruciḥ kṣīraṃ teṣāṃ gandhaḥ śuciḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
śailaṃ pātraṃ parvatānāṃ kṣīraṃ ratnauṣadhīs tathā ।
vatsas tu himavān āsīd dogdhā merur mahāgiriḥ ।।
plakṣo vatsas tu vṛkṣāṇāṃ dogdhā śālas tu puṣpitaḥ ।
pālāśapātraṃ kṣīraṃ ca cchinnadagdhaprarohaṇam ।।
seyaṃ dhātrī vidhātrī ca pāvanī ca vasuṃdharā ।
carācarasya sarvasya pratiṣṭhā yonir eva ca ।।
sarvakāmadughā dogdhrī sarvasasyaprarohaṇī ।
āsīd iyaṃ samudrāntā medinī pariviśrutā ।।
madhukaiṭabhayoḥ kṛtsnā medasā samabhiplutā ।
teneyaṃ medinī devī ucyate brahmavādibhiḥ ।।
tato abhyupagamād rājñaḥ pṛthor vaiṇyasya bho dvijāḥ ।
duhitṛtvam anuprāptā devī pṛthvīti cocyate ।।
pṛthunā pravibhaktā ca śodhitā ca vasuṃdharā ।
sasyākaravatī sphītā purapattanaśālinī ।।
evaṃprabhāvo vaiṇyaḥ sa rājāsīd rājasattamaḥ ।
namasyaś caiva pūjyaś ca bhūtagrāmair na saṃśayaḥ ।।
brāhmaṇaiś ca mahābhāgair vedavedāṅgapāragaiḥ ।
pṛthur eva namaskāryo brahmayoniḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
pārthivaiś ca mahābhāgaiḥ pārthivatvam ihecchubhiḥ ।
ādirājo namaskāryaḥ pṛthur vaiṇyaḥ pratāpavān ।।
yodhair api ca vikrāntaiḥ prāptukāmair jayaṃ yudhi ।
ādirājo namaskāryo yodhānāṃ prathamo nṛpaḥ ।।
yo hi yoddhā raṇaṃ yāti kīrtayitvā pṛthuṃ nṛpam ।
sa ghorarūpāt saṃgrāmāt kṣemī bhavati kīrtimān ।।
vaiśyair api ca vittāḍhyair vaiśyavṛttividhāyibhiḥ ।
pṛthur eva namaskāryo vṛttidātā mahāyaśāḥ ।।
tathaiva śūdraiḥ śucibhis trivarṇaparicāribhiḥ ।
pṛthur eva namaskāryaḥ śreyaḥ param ihepsubhiḥ ।।
ete vatsaviśeṣāś ca dogdhāraḥ kṣīram eva ca ।
pātrāṇi ca mayoktāni kiṃ bhūyo varṇayāmi vaḥ ।।
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
manvantarāṇi sarvāṇi vistareṇa mahāmate ।
teṣāṃ pūrvavisṛṣṭiṃ ca lomaharṣaṇa kīrtaya ।।
yāvanto manavaś caiva yāvantaṃ kālam eva ca ।
manvantarāṇi bhoḥ sūta śrotum icchāma tattvataḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
na śakyo vistaro viprā vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api ।
manvantarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃkṣepāc chṛṇuta dvijāḥ ।।
svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ pūrvaṃ manuḥ svārociṣas tathā ।
uttamas tāmasaś caiva raivataś cākṣuṣas tathā ।।
vaivasvataś ca bho viprāḥ sāṃprataṃ manur ucyate ।
sāvarṇiś ca manus tadvad raibhyo raucyas tathaiva ca ।।
tathaiva merusāvarṇyaś catvāro manavaḥ smṛtāḥ ।
atītā vartamānāś ca tathaivānāgatā dvijāḥ ।।
kīrtitā manavas tubhyaṃ mayaivaite yathā śrutāḥ ।
ṛṣīṃs tv eṣāṃ pravakṣyāmi putrān devagaṇāṃs tathā ।।
marīcir atrir bhagavān aṅgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ ।
pulastyaś ca vasiṣṭhaś ca saptaite brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ ।।
uttarasyāṃ diśi tathā dvijāḥ saptarṣayas tathā ।
āgniidhraś cāgnibāhuś ca medhyo medhātithir vasuḥ ।।
jyotiṣmān dyutimān havyaḥ savalaḥ putrasaṃjñakaḥ ।
manoḥ svāyaṃbhuvasyaite daśa putrā mahaujasaḥ ।।
etad vai prathamaṃ viprā manvantaram udāhṛtam ।
aurvo vasiṣṭhaputraś ca stambaḥ kaśyapa eva ca ।।
prāṇo bṛhaspatiś caiva datto atriccyavanas tathā ।
ete maharṣayo viprā vāyuproktā mahāvratāḥ ।।
devāś ca tuṣitā nāma smṛtāḥ svārociṣe antare ।
havighnaḥ sukṛtir jyotir āpo mūrtir api smṛtaḥ ।।
pratītaś ca nabhasyaś ca nabha ūrjas tathaiva ca ।
svārociṣasya putrās te manor viprā mahātmanaḥ ।।
kīrtitāḥ pṛthivīpālā mahāvīryaparākramāḥ ।
dvitīyam etat kathitaṃ viprā manvantaraṃ mayā ।।
idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vakṣyāmi tad budhyadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
vasiṣṭhaputrāḥ saptāsan vāsiṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ ।।
hiraṇyagarbhasya sutā ūrjā jātāḥ sutejasaḥ ।
ṛṣayo atra mayā proktāḥ kīrtyamānān nibodhata ।।
auttameyān muniśreṣṭhā daśa putrān manor imān ।
iṣa ūrjas tanūrjas tu madhur mādhava eva ca ।।
śuciḥ śukraḥ sahaś caiva nabhasyo nabha eva ca ।
bhānavas tatra devāś ca manvantaram udāhṛtam ।।
manvantaraṃ caturthaṃ vaḥ kathayiṣyāmi sāṃpratam ।
kāvyaḥ pṛthus tathaivāgnir jahnur dhātā dvijottamāḥ ।।
kapīvān akapīvāṃś ca tatra saptarṣayo dvijāḥ ।
purāṇe kīrtitā viprāḥ putrāḥ pautrāś ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
tathā devagaṇāś caiva tāmasasyāntare manoḥ ।
dyutis tapasyaḥ sutapās tapobhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
taporatir akalmāṣas tanvī dhanvī paraṃtapaḥ ।
tāmasasya manor ete daśa putrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।।
vāyuproktā muniśreṣṭhāś caturthaṃ caitad antaram ।
devabāhur yadudhraś ca munir vedaśirās tathā ।।
hiraṇyaromā parjanya ūrdhvabāhuś ca somajaḥ ।
satyanetras tathātreya ete saptarṣayo apare ।।
devāś cābhūtarajasas tathā prakṛtayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।
vāriplavaś ca raibhyaś ca manor antaram ucyate ।।
atha putrān imāṃs tasya budhyadhvaṃ gadato mama ।
dhṛtimān avyayo yuktas tattvadarśī nirutsukaḥ ।।
āraṇyaś ca prakāśaś ca nirmohaḥ satyavāk kṛtī ।
raivatasya manoḥ putrāḥ pañcamaṃ caitad antaram ।।
ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu saṃpravakṣyāmi tad budhyadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
bhṛgur nabho vivasvāṃś ca sudhāmā virajās tathā ।।
atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca saptaite ca maharṣayaḥ ।
cākṣuṣasyāntare viprā manor devās tv ime smṛtāḥ ।।
ābālaprathitās te vai pṛthaktvena divaukasaḥ ।
lekhāś ca nāmato viprāḥ pañca devagaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
ṛṣer aṅgirasaḥ putrā mahātmāno mahaujasaḥ ।
nāḍvaleyā muniśreṣṭhā daśa putrās tu viśrutāḥ ।।
ruruprabhṛtayo viprāś cākṣuṣasyāntare manoḥ ।
ṣaṣṭhaṃ manvantaraṃ proktaṃ saptamaṃ tu nibodhata ।।
atrir vasiṣṭho bhagavān kaśyapaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ ।
gautamo atha bharadvājo viśvāmitras tathaiva ca ।।
tathaiva putro bhagavān ṛcīkasya mahātmanaḥ ।
saptamo jamadagniś ca ṛṣayaḥ sāṃprataṃ divi ।।
sādhyā rudrāś ca viśve ca vasavo marutas tathā ।
ādityāś cāśvinau cāpi devau vaivasvatau smṛtau ।।
manor vaivasvatasyaite vartante sāṃprate antare ।
ikṣvākupramukhāś caiva daśa putrā mahātmanaḥ ।।
eteṣāṃ kīrtitānāṃ tu maharṣīṇāṃ mahaujasām ।
teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca dikṣu sarvāsu bho dvijāḥ ।।
manvantareṣu sarveṣu prāg āsan sapta saptakāḥ ।
loke dharmavyavasthārthaṃ lokasaṃrakṣaṇāya ca ।।
manvantare vyatikrānte catvāraḥ saptakā gaṇāḥ ।
kṛtvā karma divaṃ yānti brahmalokam anāmayam ।।
tato anye tapasā yuktāḥ sthānaṃ tat pūrayanty uta ।
atītā vartamānāś ca krameṇaitena bho dvijāḥ ।।
anāgatāś ca saptaite smṛtā divi maharṣayaḥ ।
manor antaram āsādya sāvarṇasyeha bho dvijāḥ ।।
rāmo vyāsas tathātreyo dīptimanto bahuśrutāḥ ।
bhāradvājas tathā drauṇir aśvatthāmā mahādyutiḥ ।।
gautamaś cājaraś caiva śaradvān nāma gautamaḥ ।
kauśiko gālavaś caiva aurvaḥ kāśyapa eva ca ।।
ete sapta mahātmāno bhaviṣyā munisattamāḥ ।
vairī caivādhvarīvāṃś ca śamano dhṛtimān vasuḥ ।।
ariṣṭaś cāpy adhṛṣṭaś ca vājī sumatir eva ca ।
sāvarṇasya manoḥ putrā bhaviṣyā munisattamāḥ ।।
eteṣāṃ kalyam utthāya kīrtanāt sukham edhate ।
yaśaś cāpnoti sumahad āyuṣmāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ ।।
etāny uktāni bho viprāḥ sapta sapta ca tattvataḥ ।
manvantarāṇi saṃkṣepāc chṛṇutānāgatāny api ।।
sāvarṇā manavo viprāḥ pañca tāṃś ca nibodhata ।
eko vaivasvatas teṣāṃ catvāras tu prajāpateḥ ।।
parameṣṭhisutā viprā merusāvarṇyatāṃ gatāḥ ।
dakṣasyaite hi dauhitrāḥ priyāyās tanayā nṛpāḥ ।।
mahatā tapasā yuktā merupṛṣṭhe mahaujasaḥ ।
ruceḥ prajāpateḥ putro raucyo nāma manuḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
bhūtyāṃ cotpādito devyāṃ bhautyo nāma ruceḥ sutaḥ ।
anāgatāś ca saptaite kalpe asmin manavaḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sapattanā ।
pūrṇaṃ yugasahasraṃ tu paripālyā dvijottamāḥ ।।
prajāpatiś ca tapasā saṃhāraṃ teṣu nityaśaḥ ।
yugāni saptatis tāni sāgrāṇi kathitāni ca ।।
kṛtatretādiyuktāni manor antaram ucyate ।
caturdaśaite manavaḥ kathitāḥ kīrtivardhanāḥ ।।
vedeṣu sapurāṇeṣu sarveṣu prabhaviṣṇavaḥ ।
prajānāṃ patayo viprā dhanyam eṣāṃ prakīrtanam ।।
manvantareṣu saṃhārāḥ saṃhārānteṣu saṃbhavāḥ ।
na śakyate antas teṣāṃ vai vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api ।।
visargasya prajānāṃ vai saṃhārasya ca bho dvijāḥ ।
manvantareṣu saṃhārāḥ śrūyante dvijasattamāḥ ।।
saśeṣās tatra tiṣṭhanti devāḥ saptarṣibhiḥ saha ।
tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śrutena ca samanvitāḥ ।।
pūrṇe yugasahasre tu kalpo niḥśeṣa ucyate ।
tatra bhūtāni sarvāṇi dagdhāny ādityaraśmibhiḥ ।।
brahmāṇam agrataḥ kṛtvā sahādityagaṇair dvijāḥ ।
praviśanti suraśreṣṭhaṃ harinārāyaṇaṃ prabhum ।।
sraṣṭāraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ kalpānteṣu punaḥ punaḥ ।
avyaktaḥ śāśvato devas tasya sarvam idaṃ jagat ।।
atra vaḥ kīrtayiṣyāmi manor vaivasvatasya vai ।
visargaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ sāṃpratasya mahādyuteḥ ।।
atra vaṃśaprasaṅgena kathyamānaṃ purātanam ।
yatrotpanno mahātmā sa harir vṛṣṇikule prabhuḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe dākṣāyaṇyāṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
tasya bhāryābhavat saṃjñā tvāṣṭrī devī vivasvataḥ ।।
sureśvarīti vikhyātā triṣu lokeṣu bhāvinī ।
sā vai bhāryā bhagavato mārtaṇḍasya mahātmanaḥ ।।
bhartṛrūpeṇa nātuṣyad rūpayauvanaśālinī ।
saṃjñā nāma sutapasā sudīptena samanvitā ।।
ādityasya hi tad rūpaṃ maṇḍalasya sutejasā ।
gātreṣu paridagdhaṃ vai nātikāntam ivābhavat ।।
na khalv ayaṃ mṛto aṇḍasya iti snehād abhāṣata ।
ajānan kāśyapas tasmān mārtaṇḍa iti cocyate ।।
tejas tv abhyadhikaṃ tasya nityam eva vivasvataḥ ।
yenātitāpayām āsa trīṃl lokān kaśyapātmajaḥ ।।
trīṇy apatyāni bho viprāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ tapatāṃ varaḥ ।
ādityo janayām āsa kanyāṃ dvau ca prajāpatī ।।
manur vaivasvataḥ pūrvaṃ śrāddhadevaḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
yamaś ca yamunā caiva yamajau saṃbabhūvatuḥ ।।
śyāmavarṇaṃ tu tad rūpaṃ saṃjñā dṛṣṭvā vivasvataḥ ।
asahantī tu svāṃ chāyāṃ savarṇāṃ nirmame tataḥ ।।
māyāmayī tu sā saṃjñā tasyāṃ chāyāsamutthitām ।
prāñjaliḥ praṇatā bhūtvā chāyā saṃjñāṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
uvāca kiṃ mayā kāryaṃ kathayasva śucismite ।
sthitāsmi tava nirdeśe śādhi māṃ varavarṇini ।।
{saṃjñovāca 
ahaṃ yāsyāmi bhadraṃ te svam eva bhavanaṃ pituḥ ।
tvayaiva bhavane mahyaṃ vastavyaṃ nirviśaṅkayā ।।
imau ca bālakau mahyaṃ kanyā ceyaṃ sumadhyamā ।
saṃbhāvyās te na cākhyeyam idaṃ bhagavate kvacit ।।
{savarṇovāca 
ā kacagrahaṇād devi ā śāpān naiva karhicit ।
ākhyāsyāmi namas tubhyaṃ gaccha devi yathāsukham ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
samādiśya savarṇāṃ tu tathety uktā tayā ca sā ।
tvaṣṭuḥ samīpam agamad vrīḍiteva tapasvinī ।।
pituḥ samīpagā sā tu pitrā nirbhartsitā śubhā ।
bhartuḥ samīpaṃ gaccheti niyuktā ca punaḥ punaḥ ।।
āgacchad vaḍavā bhūtvā ācchādya rūpam aninditā ।
kurūn athottarān gatvā tṛṇāny atha cacāra ha ।।
dvitīyāyāṃ tu saṃjñāyāṃ saṃjñeyam iti cintayan ।
ādityo janayām āsa putram ātmasamaṃ tadā ।।
pūrvajasya manor viprāḥ sadṛśo ayam iti prabhuḥ ।
manur evābhavan nāmnā sāvarṇa iti cocyate ।।
dvitīyo yaḥ sutas tasyāḥ sa vijñeyaḥ śanaiścaraḥ ।
saṃjñā tu pārthivī viprāḥ svasya putrasya vai tadā ।।
cakārābhyadhikaṃ snehaṃ na tathā pūrvajeṣu vai ।
manus tasyāḥ kṣamat tat tu yamas tasyā na cakṣame ।।
sa vai roṣāc ca bālyāc ca bhāvino arthasya vānagha ।
padā saṃtarjayām āsa saṃjñāṃ vaivasvato yamaḥ ।।
taṃ śaśāpa tataḥ krodhāt sāvarṇajananī tadā ।
caraṇaḥ patatām eṣa taveti bhṛśaduḥkhitā ।।
yamas tu tat pituḥ sarvaṃ prāñjaliḥ pratyavedayat ।
bhṛśaṃ śāpabhayodvignaḥ saṃjñāvākyair viśaṅkitaḥ ।।
śāpo ayaṃ vinivarteta provāca pitaraṃ dvijāḥ ।
mātrā snehena sarveṣu vartitavyaṃ suteṣu vai ।।
seyam asmān apāsyeha vivasvan saṃbubhūṣati ।
tasyāṃ mayodyataḥ pādo na tu dehe nipātitaḥ ।।
bālyād vā yadi vā laulyān mohāt tat kṣantum arhasi ।
śapto aham asmi lokeśa jananyā tapatāṃ vara ।
tava prasādāc caraṇo na paten mama gopate ।।
{vivasvān uvāca 
asaṃśayaṃ putra mahad bhaviṣyaty atra kāraṇam ।
yena tvām āviśat krodho dharmajñaṃ satyavādinam ।।
na śakyam etan mithyā tu kartuṃ mātṛvacas tava ।
kṛmayo māṃsam ādāya yāsyanty avanim eva ca ।।
kṛtam evaṃ vacas tathyaṃ mātus tava bhaviṣyati ।
śāpasya parihāreṇa tvaṃ ca trāto bhaviṣyasi ।।
ādityaś cābravīt saṃjñāṃ kimarthaṃ tanayeṣu vai ।
tulyeṣv abhyadhikaḥ sneha ekasmin kriyate tvayā ।।
sā tat pariharantī tu nācacakṣe vivasvate ।
sa cātmānaṃ samādhāya yogāt tathyam apaśyata ।।
tāṃ śaptukāmo bhagavān nāśapan munisattamāḥ ।
mūrdhajeṣu nijagrāha sa tu tāṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
tataḥ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam ācacakṣe vivasvate ।
vivasvān atha tac chrutvā kruddhas tvaṣṭāram abhyagāt ।।
dṛṣṭvā tu taṃ yathānyāyam arcayitvā vibhāvasum ।
nirdagdhukāmaṃ roṣeṇa sāntvayām āsa vai tadā ।।
{tvaṣṭovāca 
tavātitejasāviṣṭam idaṃ rūpaṃ na śobhate ।
asahantī ca saṃjñā sā vane carati śāḍvale ।।
draṣṭā hi tāṃ bhavān adya svāṃ bhāryāṃ śubhacāriṇīm ।
ślāghyāṃ yogabalopetāṃ yogam āsthāya gopate ।।
anukūlaṃ tu te deva yadi syān mama saṃmatam ।
rūpaṃ nirvartayāmy adya tava kāntam ariṃdama ।।
tato abhyupagamāt tvaṣṭā mārtaṇḍasya vivasvataḥ ।
bhramim āropya tat tejaḥ śātayām āsa bho dvijāḥ ।।
tato nirbhāsitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasā saṃhatena vai ।
kāntāt kāntataraṃ draṣṭum adhikaṃ śuśubhe tadā ।।
dadarśa yogam āsthāya svāṃ bhāryāṃ vaḍavāṃ tataḥ ।
adhṛṣyāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tejasā niyamena ca ।।
vaḍavāvapuṣā viprāś carantīm akutobhayām ।
so aśvarūpeṇa bhagavāṃs tāṃ mukhe samabhāvayat ।।
maithunāya viceṣṭantīṃ parapuṃso avaśaṅkayā ।
sā tan niravamac chukraṃ nāsikābhyāṃ vivasvataḥ ।।
devau tasyām ajāyetām aśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau ।
nāsatyaś caiva dasraś ca smṛtau dvāv aśvināv iti ।।
mārtaṇḍasyātmajāv etāv aṣṭamasya prajāpateḥ ।
tāṃ tu rūpeṇa kāntena darśayām āsa bhāskaraḥ ।।
sā tu dṛṣṭvaiva bhartāraṃ tutoṣa munisattamāḥ ।
yamas tu karmaṇā tena bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasaḥ ।।
dharmeṇa rañjayām āsa dharmarāja imāḥ prajāḥ ।
sa lebhe karmaṇā tena śubhena paramadyutiḥ ।।
pitṝṇām ādhipatyaṃ ca lokapālatvam eva ca ।
manuḥ prajāpatis tv āsīt sāvarṇiḥ sa tapodhanāḥ ।।
bhāvyaḥ samāgate tasmin manuḥ sāvarṇike antare ।
merupṛṣṭhe tapo nityam adyāpi sa caraty uta ।।
bhrātā śanaiścaras tasya grahatvaṃ sa tu labdhavān ।
tvaṣṭā tu tejasā tena viṣṇoś cakram akalpayat ।।
tad apratihataṃ yuddhe dānavāntacikīrṣayā ।
yavīyasī tu sāpy āsīd yamī kanyā yaśasvinī ।।
abhavac ca saricchreṣṭhā yamunā lokapāvanī ।
manur ity ucyate loke sāvarṇa iti cocyate ।।
dvitīyo yaḥ sutas tasya manor bhrātā śanaiścaraḥ ।
grahatvaṃ sa ca lebhe vai sarvalokābhipūjitaḥ ।।
ya idaṃ janma devānāṃ śṛṇuyān narasattamaḥ ।
āpadaṃ prāpya mucyeta prāpnuyāc ca mahad yaśaḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
manor vaivasvatasyāsan putrā vai nava tatsamāḥ ।
ikṣvākuś caiva nābhāgo dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātir eva ca ।।
nariṣyantaś ca ṣaṣṭho vai prāṃśū riṣṭaś ca saptamaḥ ।
karūṣaś ca pṛṣadhraś ca navaite munisattamāḥ ।।
akarot putrakāmas tu manur iṣṭiṃ prajāpatiḥ ।
mitrāvaruṇayor viprāḥ pūrvam eva mahāmatiḥ ।।
anutpanneṣu bahuṣu putreṣv eteṣu bho dvijāḥ ।
tasyāṃ ca vartamānāyām iṣṭyāṃ ca dvijasattamāḥ ।।
mitrāvaruṇayor aṃśe manur āhutim āvahat ।
tatra divyāmbaradharā divyābharaṇabhūṣitā ।।
divyasaṃhananā caiva ilā jajña iti śrutiḥ ।
tām ilety eva hovāca manur daṇḍadharas tadā ।।
anugacchasva māṃ bhadre tam ilā pratyuvāca ha ।
dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ putrakāmaṃ prajāpatim ।।
{ilovāca 
mitrāvaruṇayor aṃśe jātāsmi vadatāṃ vara ।
tayoḥ sakāśaṃ yāsyāmi na māṃ dharmahatāṃ kuru ।।
saivam uktvā manuṃ devaṃ mitrāvaruṇayor ilā ।
gatvāntikaṃ varārohā prāñjalir vākyam abravīt ।।
{ilovāca 
aṃśe asmi yuvayor jātā devau kiṃ karavāṇi vām ।
manunā cāham uktā vāai anugacchasva mām iti ।।
tau tathāvādinīṃ sādhvīm ilāṃ dharmaparāyaṇām ।
mitraś ca varuṇaś cobhāv ūcatus tāṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
{mitrāvaruṇāv ūcatuḥ 
anena tava dharmeṇa praśrayeṇa damena ca ।
satyena caiva suśroṇi prītau svo varavarṇini ।।
āvayos tvaṃ mahābhāge khyātiṃ kanyeti yāsyasi ।।
manor vaṃśakaraḥ putras tvam eva ca bhaviṣyasi ।
sudyumna iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu śobhane ।।
jagatpriyo dharmaśīlo manor vaṃśavivardhanaḥ ।
nivṛttā sā tu tac chrutvā gacchantī pitur antikāt ।।
budhenāntaram āsādya maithunāyopamantritā ।
somaputrād budhād viprās tasyāṃ jajñe purūravāḥ ।।
janayitvā tataḥ sā tam ilā sudyumnatāṃ gatā ।
sudyumnasya tu dāyādās trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ ।।
utkalaś ca gayaś caiva vinatāśvaś ca bho dvijāḥ ।
utkalasyotkalā viprā vinatāśvasya paścimāḥ ।।
dik pūrvā muniśārdūlā gayasya tu gayā smṛtā ।
praviṣṭe tu manau viprā divākaram ariṃdamam ।।
daśadhā tat punaḥ kṣatram akarot pṛthivīm imām ।
ikṣvākur jyeṣṭhadāyādo madhyadeśam avāptavān ।।
kanyābhāvāt tu sudyumno naitad rājyam avāptavān ।
vasiṣṭhavacanāt tv āsīt pratiṣṭhāne mahātmanaḥ ।।
pratiṣṭhā dharmarājasya sudyumnasya dvijottamāḥ ।
tat purūravase prādād rājyaṃ prāpya mahāyaśāḥ ।।
mānaveyo muniśreṣṭhāḥ strīpuṃsor lakṣaṇair yutaḥ ।
dhṛtavāṃs tām ilety evaṃ sudyumneti ca viśrutaḥ ।।
nāriṣyantāḥ śakāḥ putrā nābhāgasya tu bho dvijāḥ ।
ambarīṣo abhavat putraḥ pārthivarṣabhasattamaḥ ।।
dhṛṣṭasya dhārṣṭakaṃ kṣatraṃ raṇadṛptaṃ babhūva ha ।
karūṣasya ca kārūṣāḥ kṣatriyā yuddhadurmadāḥ ।।
nābhāgadhṛṣṭaputrāś ca kṣatriyā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ ।
prāṃśor eko abhavat putraḥ prajāpatir iti smṛtaḥ ।।
nariṣyantasya dāyādo rājā daṇḍadharo yamaḥ ।
śaryāter mithunaṃ tv āsīd ānarto nāma viśrutaḥ ।।
putraḥ kanyā sukanyā ca yā patnī cyavanasya ha ।
ānartasya tu dāyādo raivo nāma mahādyutiḥ ।।
ānartaviṣayaś caiva purī cāsya kuśasthalī ।
raivasya raivataḥ putraḥ kakudmī nāma dhārmikaḥ ।।
jyeṣṭhaḥ putraḥ sa tasyāsīd rājyaṃ prāpya kuśasthalīm ।
sa kanyāsahitaḥ śrutvā gāndharvaṃ brahmaṇo antike ।।
muhūrtabhūtaṃ devasya tasthau bahuyugaṃ dvijāḥ ।
ājagāma sa caivātha svāṃ purīṃ yādavair vṛtām ।।
kṛtāṃ dvāravatīṃ nāma bahudvārāṃ manoramām ।
bhojavṛṣṇyandhakair guptāṃ vasudevapurogamaiḥ ।।
tatraiva raivato jñātvā yathātattvaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
kanyāṃ tāṃ baladevāya subhadrāṃ nāma revatīm ।।
dattvā jagāma śikharaṃ meros tapasi saṃsthitaḥ ।
reme rāmo api dharmātmā revatyā sahitaḥ sukhī ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathaṃ bahuyuge kāle samatīte mahāmate ।
na jarā revatīṃ prāptā raivataṃ ca kakudminam ।।
meruṃ gatasya vā tasya śaryāteḥ saṃtatiḥ katham ।
sthitā pṛthivyām adyāpi śrotum icchāma tattvataḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
na jarā kṣutpipāsā vā na mṛtyur munisattamāḥ ।
ṛtucakraṃ prabhavati brahmaloke sadānaghāḥ ।
kakudminaḥ svarlokaṃ tu raivatasya gatasya ha ।।
hṛtā puṇyajanair viprā rākṣasaiḥ sā kuśasthalī ।
tasya bhrātṛśataṃ tv āsīd dhārmikasya mahātmanaḥ ।।
tad vadhyamānaṃ rakṣobhir diśaḥ prākrāmad acyutāḥ ।
vidrutasya ca viprendrās tasya bhrātṛśatasya vai ।।
anvavāyas tu sumahāṃs tatra tatra dvijottamāḥ ।
teṣāṃ hy ete muniśreṣṭhāḥ śaryātā iti viśrutāḥ ।।
kṣatriyā guṇasaṃpannā dikṣu sarvāsu viśrutāḥ ।
śarvaśaḥ sarvagahanaṃ praviṣṭās te mahaujasaḥ ।।
nābhāgariṣṭaputrau dvau vaiśyau brāhmaṇatāṃ gatau ।
karūṣasya tu kārūṣāḥ kṣatriyā yuddhadurmadāḥ ।।
pṛṣadhro hiṃsayitvā tu guror gāṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
śāpāc chūdratvam āpanno navaite parikīrtitāḥ ।।
vaivasvatasya tanayā muner vai munisattamāḥ ।
kṣuvatas tu manor viprā ikṣvākur abhavat sutaḥ ।।
tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīd ikṣvākor bhūridakṣiṇam ।
teṣāṃ vikukṣir jyeṣṭhas tu vikukṣitvād ayodhatām ।।
prāptaḥ paramadharmajña so ayodhyādhipatiḥ prabhuḥ ।
śakunipramukhās tasya putrāḥ pañcaśataṃ smṛtāḥ ।।
uttarāpathadeśasya rakṣitāro mahābalāḥ ।
catvāriṃśad daśāṣṭau ca dakṣiṇasyāṃ tathā diśi ।।
vaśātipramukhāś cānye rakṣitāro dvijottamāḥ ।
ikṣvākus tu vikukṣiṃ vāai aṣṭakāyām athādiśat ।।
māṃsam ānaya śrāddhārthaṃ mṛgān hatvā mahābala ।
śrāddhakarmaṇi coddiṣṭo akṛte śrāddhakarmaṇi ।।
bhakṣayitvā śaśaṃ viprāḥ śaśādo mṛgayāṃ gataḥ ।
ikṣvākuṇā parityakto vasiṣṭhavacanāt prabhuḥ ।।
ikṣvākau saṃsthite viprāḥ śaśādas tu nṛpo abhavat ।
śaśādasya tu dāyādaḥ kakutstho nāma vīryavān ।।
anenās tu kakutsthasya pṛthuś cānenasaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
viṣṭarāśvaḥ pṛthoḥ putras tasmād ārdras tv ajāyata ।।
ārdras tu yuvanāśvas tu śrāvastas tatsuto dvijāḥ ।
jajñe śrāvastako rājā śrāvastī yena nirmitā ।।
śrāvastasya tu dāyādo bṛhadaśvo mahīpatiḥ ।
kuvalāśvaḥ sutas tasya rājā paramadhārmikaḥ ।।
yaḥ sa dhundhuvadhād rājā dhundhumāratvam āgataḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
dhundhor vadhaṃ mahāprājña śrotum icchāma tattvataḥ ।
yadvadhāt kuvalāśvo asau dhundhumāratvam āgataḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
kuvalāśvasya putrāṇāṃ śatam uttamadhanvinām ।
sarve vidyāsu niṣṇātā balavanto durāsadāḥ ।।
babhūvur dhārmikāḥ sarve yajvāno bhūridakṣiṇāḥ ।
kuvalāśvaṃ pitā rājye bṛhadaśvo nyayojayat ।।
putrasaṃkrāmitaśrīs tu vanaṃ rājā viveśa ha ।
tam uttaṅko atha viprarṣiḥ prayāntaṃ pratyavārayat ।।
{uttaṅka uvāca 
bhavatā rakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tac ca kartuṃ tvam arhasi ।
nirudvignas tapaś cartuṃ nahi śaknomi pārthiva ।।
mamāśramasamīpe vai sameṣu marudhanvasu ।
samudro vālukāpūrṇa uddālaka iti smṛtaḥ ।।
devatānām avadhyaś ca mahākāyo mahābalaḥ ।
antarbhūmigatas tatra vālukāntarhito mahān ।।
rākṣasasya madhoḥ putro dhundhur nāma mahāsuraḥ ।
śete lokavināśāya tapa āsthāya dāruṇam ।।
saṃvatsarasya paryante sa niśvāsaṃ vimuñcati ।
yadā tadā mahī tatra calati sma narādhipa ।।
tasya niḥśvāsavātena raja uddhūyate mahat ।
ādityapatham āvṛtya saptāhaṃ bhūmikampanam ।।
savisphuliṅgaṃ sāṅgāraṃ sadhūmam atidāruṇam ।
tena tāta na śaknomi tasmin sthātuṃ sva āśrame ।।
taṃ māraya mahākāyaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।
lokāḥ svasthā bhavanty adya tasmin vinihate tvayā ।।
tvaṃ hi tasya vadhāyaikaḥ samarthaḥ pṛthivīpate ।
viṣṇunā ca varo datto mahyaṃ pūrvayuge nṛpa ।।
yas taṃ mahāsuraṃ raudraṃ haniṣyati mahābalam ।
tasya tvaṃ varadānena tejaś cākhyāpayiṣyasi ।।
nahi dhundhur mahātejās tejasālpena śakyate ।
nirdagdhuṃ pṛthivīpāla ciraṃ yugaśatair api ।।
vīryaṃ ca sumahat tasya devair api durāsadam ।
sa evam ukto rājarṣir uttaṅkena mahātmanā ।
kuvalāśvaṃ sutaṃ prādāt tasmai dhundhunibarhaṇe ।।
{bṛhadaśva uvāca 
bhagavan nyastaśastro aham ayaṃ tu tanayo mama ।
bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha dhundhumāro na saṃśayaḥ ।।
sa taṃ vyādiśya tanayaṃ rājarṣir dhundhumāraṇe ।
jagāma parvatāyaiva nṛpatiḥ saṃśitavrataḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
kuvalāśvas tu putrāṇāṃ śatena saha bho dvijāḥ ।
prāyād uttaṅkasahito dhundhos tasya nibarhaṇe ।।
tam āviśat tadā viṣṇus tejasā bhagavān prabhuḥ ।
uttaṅkasya niyogād vai lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
tasmin prayāte durdharṣe divi śabdo mahān abhūt ।
eṣa śrīmān avadhyo adya dhundhumāro bhaviṣyati ।।
divyair gandhaiś ca mālyaiś ca taṃ devāḥ samavākiran ।
devadundubhayaś caiva praṇedur dvijasattamāḥ ।।
sa gatvā jayatāṃ śreṣṭhas tanayaiḥ saha vīryavān ।
samudraṃ khānayām āsa vālukāntaram avyayam ।।
tasya putraiḥ khanadbhiś ca vālukāntarhitas tadā ।
dhundhur āsādito viprā diśam āvṛtya paścimām ।।
mukhajenāgninā krodhāl lokān udvartayann iva ।
vāri susrāva vegena mahodadhir ivodaye ।।
saumasya muniśārdūlā varormikalilo mahān ।
tasya putraśataṃ dagdhaṃ tribhir ūnaṃ tu rakṣasā ।।
tataḥ sa rājā dyutimān rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahābalam ।
āsasāda mahātejā dhundhuṃ dhundhuvināśanaḥ ।।
tasya vārimayaṃ vegam āpīya sa narādhipaḥ ।
yogī yogena vahniṃ ca śamayām āsa vāriṇā ।।
nihatya taṃ mahākāyaṃ balenodakarākṣasam ।
uttaṅkaṃ darśayām āsa kṛtakarmā narādhipaḥ ।।
uttaṅkas tu varaṃ prādāt tasmai rājñe mahātmane ।
dadau tasyākṣayaṃ vittaṃ śatrubhiś cāparājitam ।।
dharme ratiṃ ca satataṃ svarge vāsaṃ tathākṣayam ।
putrāṇāṃ cākṣayāṃl lokān svarge ye rakṣasā hatāḥ ।।
tasya putrās trayaḥ śiṣṭā dṛḍhāśvo jyeṣṭha ucyate ।
candrāśvakapilāśvau tu kanīyāṃsau kumārakau ।।
dhaundhumārer dṛḍhāśvasya haryaśvaś cātmajaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
haryaśvasya nikumbho abhūt kṣatradharmarataḥ sadā ।।
saṃhatāśvo nikumbhasya suto raṇaviśāradaḥ ।
akṛśāśvakṛśāśvau tu saṃhatāśvasutau dvijāḥ ।।
tasya haimavatī kanyā satāṃ matā dṛṣadvatī ।
vikhyātā triṣu lokeṣu putraś cāsyāḥ prasenajit ।।
lebhe prasenajid bhāryāṃ gaurīṃ nāma pativratām ।
abhiśastā tu sā bhartrā nadī vai bāhudābhavat ।।
tasya putro mahān āsīd yuvanāśvo narādhipaḥ ।
māndhātā yuvanāśvasya trilokavijayī sutaḥ ।।
tasya caitrarathī bhāryā śaśabindoḥ sutābhavat ।
sādhvī bindumatī nāma rūpeṇāsadṛśī bhuvi ।।
pativratā ca jyeṣṭhā ca bhrātṝṇām ayutasya vai ।
tasyām utpādayām āsa māndhātā dvau sutau dvijāḥ ।।
purukutsaṃ ca dharmajñaṃ mucukundaṃ ca pārthivam ।
purukutsasutas tv āsīt trasadasyur mahīpatiḥ ।।
narmadāyām athotpannaḥ saṃbhūtas tasya cātmajaḥ ।
saṃbhūtasya tu dāyādas tridhanvā ripumardanaḥ ।।
rājñas tridhanvanas tv āsīd vidvāṃs trayyāruṇaḥ prabhuḥ ।
tasya satyavrato nāma kumāro abhūn mahābalaḥ ।।
parigrahaṇamantrāṇāṃ vighnaṃ cakre sudurmatiḥ ।
yena bhāryā kṛtodvāhā hṛtā caiva parasya ha ।।
bālyāt kāmāc ca mohāc ca sāhasāc cāpalena ca ।
jahāra kanyāṃ kāmārtaḥ kasyacit puravāsinaḥ ।।
adharmaśaṅkunā tena taṃ sa trayyāruṇo atyajat ।
apadhvaṃseti bahuśo vadan krodhasamanvitaḥ ।।
so abravīt pitaraṃ tyaktaḥ kva gacchāmīti vai muhuḥ ।
pitā ca tam athovāca śvapākaiḥ saha vartaya ।।
nāhaṃ putreṇa putrārthī tvayādya kulapāṃsana ।
ity uktaḥ sa nirākrāman nagarād vacanāt pituḥ ।।
na ca taṃ vārayām āsa vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ।
sa tu satyavrato viprāḥ śvapākāvasathāntike ।।
pitrā tyakto avasad vīraḥ pitāpy asya vanaṃ yayau ।
tatas tasmiṃs tu viṣaye nāvarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ ।।
samā dvādaśa bho viprās tenādharmeṇa vai tadā ।
dārāṃs tu tasya viṣaye viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ ।।
saṃnyasya sāgarānte tu cakāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ ।
tasya patnī gale baddhvā madhyamaṃ putram aurasam ।।
śeṣasya bharaṇārthāya vyakrīṇād gośatena vai ।
taṃ ca baddhaṃ gale dṛṣṭvā vikrayārthaṃ nṛpātmajaḥ ।।
maharṣiputraṃ dharmātmā mokṣayām āsa bho dvijāḥ ।
satyavrato mahābāhur bharaṇaṃ tasya cākarot ।।
viśvāmitrasya tuṣṭyartham anukampārtham eva ca ।
so abhavad gālavo nāma gale bandhān mahātapāḥ ।
maharṣiḥ kauśiko dhīmāṃs tena vīreṇa mokṣitaḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
satyavratas tu bhaktyā ca kṛpayā ca pratijñayā ।
viśvāmitrakalatraṃ tu babhāra vinaye sthitaḥ ।।
hatvā mṛgān varāhāṃś ca mahiṣāṃś ca vanecarān ।
viśvāmitrāśramābhyāśe māṃsaṃ vṛkṣe babandha ca ।।
upāṃśuvratam āsthāya dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīm ।
pitur niyogād avasat tasmin vanagate nṛpe ।।
ayodhyāṃ caiva rājyaṃ ca tathaivāntaḥpuraṃ muniḥ ।
yājyopādhyāyasaṃyogād vasiṣṭhaḥ paryarakṣata ।।
satyavratas tu bālyāc ca bhāvino arthasya vai balāt ।
vasiṣṭhe abhyadhikaṃ manyuṃ dhārayām āsa nityaśaḥ ।।
pitrā hi taṃ tadā rāṣṭrāt tyajyamānaṃ priyaṃ sutam ।
nivārayām āsa munir bahunā kāraṇena na ।।
pāṇigrahaṇamantrāṇāṃ niṣṭhā syāt saptame pade ।
na ca satyavratas tasmād dhatavān saptame pade ।।
jānan dharmaṃ vasiṣṭhas tu na māṃ trātīti bho dvijāḥ ।
satyavratas tadā roṣaṃ vasiṣṭhe manasākarot ।।
guṇabuddhyā tu bhagavān vasiṣṭhaḥ kṛtavāṃs tathā ।
na ca satyavratas tasya tam upāṃśum abudhyata ।।
tasminn aparitoṣaś ca pitur āsīn mahātmanaḥ ।
tena dvādaśa varṣāṇi nāvarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ ।।
tena tv idānīṃ vihitāṃ dīkṣāṃ tāṃ durvahāṃ bhuvi ।
kulasya niṣkṛtir viprāḥ kṛtā sā vai bhaved iti ।।
na taṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān pitrā tyaktaṃ nyavārayat ।
abhiṣekṣyāmy ahaṃ putram asyety evaṃmatir muniḥ ।।
sa tu dvādaśa varṣāṇi tāṃ dīkṣām avahad balī ।
avidyamāne māṃse tu vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ ।।
sarvakāmadughāṃ dogdhrīṃ sa dadarśa nṛpātmajaḥ ।
tāṃ vai krodhāc ca mohāc ca śramāc caiva kṣudhānvitaḥ ।।
deśadharmagato rājā jaghāna munisattamāḥ ।
tanmāṃsaṃ sa svayaṃ caiva viśvāmitrasya cātmajān ।।
bhojayām āsa tac chrutvā vasiṣṭho apy asya cukrudhe ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
pātayeyam ahaṃ krūra tava śaṅkum asaṃśayam ।
yadi te dvāv imau śaṅkū na syātāṃ vai kṛtau punaḥ ।।
pituś cāparitoṣeṇa gurudogdhrīvadhena ca ।
aprokṣitopayogāc ca trividhas te vyatikramaḥ ।।
evaṃ trīṇy asya śaṅkūni tāni dṛṣṭvā mahātapāḥ ।
triśaṅkur iti hovāca triśaṅkus tena sa smṛtaḥ ।।
viśvāmitrasya dārāṇām anena bharaṇaṃ kṛtam ।
tena tasmai varaṃ prādān muniḥ prītas triśaṅkave ।।
chandyamāno vareṇātha varaṃ vavre nṛpātmajaḥ ।
saśarīro vraje svargam ity evaṃ yācito varaḥ ।।
anāvṛṣṭibhaye tasmin gate dvādaśavārṣike ।
pitrye rājye abhiṣicyātha yājayām āsa pārthivam ।।
miṣatāṃ devatānāṃ ca vasiṣṭhasya ca kauśikaḥ ।
divam āropayām āsa saśarīraṃ mahātapāḥ ।।
tasya satyarathā nāma patnī kaikeyavaṃśajā ।
kumāraṃ janayām āsa hariścandram akalmaṣam ।।
sa vai rājā hariścandras traiśaṅkava iti smṛtaḥ ।
āhartā rājasūyasya samrāḍ iti ha viśrutaḥ ।।
hariścandrasya putro abhūd rohito nāma pārthivaḥ ।
harito rohitasyātha cañcur hārita ucyate ।।
vijayaś ca muniśreṣṭhāś cañcuputro babhūva ha ।
jetā sa sarvapṛthivīṃ vijayas tena sa smṛtaḥ ।।
rurukas tanayas tasya rājā dharmārthakovidaḥ ।
rurukasya vṛkaḥ putro vṛkād bāhus tu jajñivān ।।
haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca nirasyanti sma taṃ nṛpam ।
tatpatnī garbham ādāya aurvasyāśramam āviśat ।।
nāsatyo dhārmikaś caiva sa ha dharmayuge abhavat ।
sagaras tu suto bāhor yajñe saha gareṇa vai ।।
aurvasyāśramam āsādya bhārgaveṇābhirakṣitaḥ ।
āgneyam astraṃ labdhvā ca bhārgavāt sagaro nṛpaḥ ।।
jigāya pṛthivīṃ hatvā tālajaṅghān sahaihayān ।
śakānāṃ pahnavānāṃ ca dharmaṃ nirasad acyutaḥ ।
kṣatriyāṇāṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ pāradānāṃ ca dharmavit ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathaṃ sa sagaro jāto gareṇaiva sahācyutaḥ ।
kimarthaṃ ca śakādīnāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahaujasām ।।
dharmān kulocitān rājā kruddho nirasad acyutaḥ ।
etan naḥ sarvam ācakṣva vistareṇa mahāmate ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
bāhor vyasaninaḥ pūrvaṃ hṛtaṃ rājyam abhūt kila ।
haihayais tālajaṅghaiś ca śakaiḥ sārdhaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
yavanāḥ pāradāś caiva kāmbojāḥ pahnavās tathā ।
ete hy api gaṇāḥ pañca haihayārthe parākraman ।।
hṛtarājyas tadā rājā sa vai bāhur vanaṃ yayau ।
patnyā cānugato duḥkhī tatra prāṇān avāsṛjat ।।
patnī tu yādavī tasya sagarbhā pṛṣṭhato anvagāt ।
sapatnyā ca garas tasyai dattaḥ pūrvaṃ kilānaghāḥ ।।
sā tu bhartuś citāṃ kṛtvā vane tām abhyarohata ।
aurvas tāṃ bhārgavo viprāḥ kāruṇyāt samavārayat ।।
tasyāśrame ca garbhaḥ sa gareṇaiva sahācyutaḥ ।
vyajāyata mahābāhuḥ sagaro nāma pārthivaḥ ।।
aurvas tu jātakarmādīṃs tasya kṛtvā mahātmanaḥ ।
adhyāpya vedaśāstrāṇi tato astraṃ pratyapādayat ।।
āgneyaṃ tu mahābhāgā amarair api duḥsaham ।
sa tenāstrabalenājau balena ca samanvitaḥ ।।
haihayān vijaghānāśu kruddho rudraḥ paśūn iva ।
ājahāra ca lokeṣu kīrtiṃ kīrtimatāṃ varaḥ ।।
tataḥ śakāṃś ca yavanān kāmbojān pāradāṃs tathā ।
pahnavāṃś caiva niḥśeṣān kartuṃ vyavasito nṛpaḥ ।।
te vadhyamānā vīreṇa sagareṇa mahātmanā ।
vasiṣṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā praṇipetur manīṣiṇam ।।
vasiṣṭhas tv atha tān dṛṣṭvā samayena mahādyutiḥ ।
sagaraṃ vārayām āsa teṣāṃ dattvābhayaṃ tadā ।।
sagaraḥ svāṃ pratijñāṃ tu guror vākyaṃ niśamya ca ।
dharmaṃ jaghāna teṣāṃ vai veṣān anyāṃś cakāra ha ।।
ardhaṃ śakānāṃ śiraso muṇḍayitvā vyasarjayat ।
yavanānāṃ śiraḥ sarvaṃ kāmbojānāṃ tathaiva ca ।।
pāradā muktakeśāś ca pahnavāñ śmaśrudhāriṇaḥ ।
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārāḥ kṛtās tena mahātmanā ।।
śakā yavanakāmbojāḥ pāradāś ca dvijottamāḥ ।
koṇisarpā māhiṣakā darvāś colāḥ sakeralāḥ ।।
sarve te kṣatriyā viprā dharmas teṣāṃ nirākṛtaḥ ।
vasiṣṭhavacanād rājñā sagareṇa mahātmanā ।।
sa dharmavijayī rājā vijityemāṃ vasuṃdharām ।
aśvaṃ pracārayām āsa vājimedhāya dīkṣitaḥ ।।
tasya cārayataḥ so aśvaḥ samudre pūrvadakṣiṇe ।
velāsamīpe apahṛto bhūmiṃ caiva praveśitaḥ ।।
sa taṃ deśaṃ tadā putraiḥ khānayām āsa pārthivaḥ ।
āsedus te tadā tatra khanyamāne mahārṇave ।।
tam ādipuruṣaṃ devaṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ prajāpatim ।
viṣṇuṃ kapilarūpeṇa svapantaṃ puruṣaṃ tadā ।।
tasya cakṣuḥsamutthena tejasā pratibudhyataḥ ।
dagdhāḥ sarve muniśreṣṭhāś catvāras tv avaśeṣitāḥ ।।
barhiketuḥ suketuś ca tathā dharmaratho nṛpaḥ ।
śūraḥ pañcanadaś caiva tasya vaṃśakarā nṛpāḥ ।।
prādāc ca tasmai bhagavān harir nārāyaṇo varam ।
akṣayaṃ vaṃśam ikṣvākoḥ kīrtiṃ cāpy anivartinīm ।।
putraṃ samudraṃ ca vibhuḥ svarge vāsaṃ tathākṣayam ।
samudraś cārgham ādāya vavande taṃ mahīpatim ।।
sāgaratvaṃ ca lebhe sa karmaṇā tena tasya ha ।
taṃ cāśvamedhikaṃ so aśvaṃ samudrād upalabdhavān ।।
ājahārāśvamedhānāṃ śataṃ sa sumahātapāḥ ।
putrāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭis tasyeti naḥ śrutam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
sagarasyātmajā vīrāḥ kathaṃ jātā mahābalāḥ ।
vikrāntāḥ ṣaṣṭisāhasrā vidhinā kena sattama ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
dve bhārye sagarasyāstāṃ tapasā dagdhakilbiṣe ।
jyeṣṭhā vidarbhaduhitā keśinī nāma nāmataḥ ।।
kanīyasī tu mahatī patnī paramadharmiṇī ।
ariṣṭanemiduhitā rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi ।।
aurvas tābhyāṃ varaṃ prādāt tad budhyadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi gṛhṇātv ekā nitambinī ।।
ekaṃ vaṃśadharaṃ tv ekā yatheṣṭaṃ varayatv iti ।
tatraikā jagṛhe putrān ṣaṣṭisāhasrasaṃmitān ।।
ekaṃ vaṃśadharaṃ tv ekā tathety āha tato muniḥ ।
rājā pañcajano nāma babhūva sa mahādyutiḥ ।।
itarā suṣuve tumbīṃ bījapūrṇām iti śrutiḥ ।
tatra ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi garbhās te tilasaṃmitāḥ ।।
saṃbabhūvur yathākālaṃ vavṛdhuś ca yathāsukham ।
ghṛtapūrṇeṣu kumbheṣu tān garbhān nidadhe tataḥ ।।
dhātrīś caikaikaśaḥ prādāt tāvatīḥ poṣaṇe nṛpaḥ ।
tato daśasu māseṣu samuttasthur yathākramam ।।
kumārās te yathākālaṃ sagaraprītivardhanāḥ ।
ṣaṣṭiputrasahasrāṇi tasyaivam abhavan dvijāḥ ।।
garbhād alābūmadhyād vai jātāni pṛthivīpateḥ ।
teṣāṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tejaḥ praviṣṭānāṃ mahātmanām ।।
ekaḥ pañcajano nāma putro rājā babhūva ha ।
śūraḥ pañcajanasyāsīd aṃśumān nāma vīryavān ।।
dilīpas tasya tanayaḥ khaṭvāṅga iti viśrutaḥ ।
yena svargād ihāgatya muhūrtaṃ prāpya jīvitam ।।
trayo abhisaṃdhitā lokā buddhyā satyena cānaghāḥ ।
dilīpasya tu dāyādo mahārājo bhagīrathaḥ ।।
yaḥ sa gaṅgāṃ saricchreṣṭhām avātārayata prabhuḥ ।
samudram ānayac caināṃ duhitṛtve apy akalpayat ।।
tasmād bhāgīrathī gaṅgā kathyate vaṃśacintakaiḥ ।
bhagīrathasuto rājā śruta ity abhiviśrutaḥ ।।
nābhāgas tu śrutasyāsīt putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।
ambarīṣas tu nābhāgiḥ sindhudvīpapitābhavat ।।
ayutājit tu dāyādaḥ sindhudvīpasya vīryavān ।
ayutājitsutas tv āsīd ṛtuparṇo mahāyaśāḥ ।।
divyākṣahṛdayajño vai rājā nalasakho balī ।
ṛtuparṇasutas tv āsīd ārtaparṇir mahāyaśāḥ ।।
sudāsas tasya tanayo rājā indrasakho abhavat ।
sudāsasya sutaḥ proktaḥ saudāso nāma pārthivaḥ ।।
khyātaḥ kalmāṣapādo vai rājā mitrasaho abhavat ।
kalmāṣapādasya sutaḥ sarvakarmeti viśrutaḥ ।।
anaraṇyas tu putro abhūd viśrutaḥ sarvakarmaṇaḥ ।
anaraṇyasuto nighno nighnato dvau babhūvatuḥ ।।
anamitro raghuś caiva pārthivarṣabhasattamau ।
anamitrasuto rājā vidvān duliduho abhavat ।।
dilīpas tanayas tasya rāmasya prapitāmahaḥ ।
dīrghabāhur dilīpasya raghur nāmnā suto abhavat ।।
ayodhyāyāṃ mahārājo yaḥ purāsīn mahābalaḥ ।
ajas tu rāghavo jajñe tathā daśaratho apy ajāt ।।
rāmo daśarathāj jajñe dharmātmā sumahāyaśāḥ ।
rāmasya tanayo jajñe kuśa ity abhisaṃjñitaḥ ।।
atithis tu kuśāj jajñe dharmātmā sumahāyaśāḥ ।
atithes tv abhavat putro niṣadho nāma vīryavān ।।
niṣadhasya nalaḥ putro nabhaḥ putro nalasya ca ।
nabhasya puṇḍarīkas tu kṣemadhanvā tataḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
kṣemadhanvasutas tv āsīd devānīkaḥ pratāpavān ।
āsīd ahīnagur nāma devānīkātmajaḥ prabhuḥ ।।
ahīnagos tu dāyādaḥ sudhanvā nāma pārthivaḥ ।
sudhanvanaḥ sutaś cāpi tato jajñe śalo nṛpaḥ ।।
ukyo nāma sa dharmātmā śalaputro babhūva ha ।
vajranābhaḥ sutas tasya nalas tasya mahātmanaḥ ।।
nalau dvāv eva vikhyātau purāṇe munisattamāḥ ।
vīrasenātmajaś caiva yaś cekṣvākukulodvahaḥ ।।
ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavāḥ prādhānyena prakīrtitāḥ ।
ete vivasvato vaṃśe rājāno bhūritejasaḥ ।।
paṭhan samyag imāṃ sṛṣṭim ādityasya vivasvataḥ ।
śrāddhadevasya devasya prajānāṃ puṣṭidasya ca ।
prajāvān eti sāyujyam ādityasya vivasvataḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
pitā somasya bho viprā jajñe atrir bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ।
brahmaṇo mānasāt pūrvaṃ prajāsargaṃ vidhitsataḥ ।।
anuttaraṃ nāma tapo yena taptaṃ hi tat purā ।
trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi divyānīti hi naḥ śrutam ।।
ūrdhvam ācakrame tasya retaḥ somatvam īyivat ।
netrābhyāṃ vāri susrāva daśadhā dyotayan diśaḥ ।।
taṃ garbhaṃ vidhinādiṣṭā daśa devyo dadhus tataḥ ।
sametya dhārayām āsur na ca tāḥ samaśaknuvan ।।
yadā na dhāraṇe śaktās tasya garbhasya tā diśaḥ ।
tatas tābhiḥ sa tyaktas tu nipapāta vasuṃdharām ।।
patitaṃ somam ālokya brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ ।
ratham āropayām āsa lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
tasmin nipatite devāḥ putre atreḥ paramātmani ।
tuṣṭuvur brahmaṇaḥ putrās tathānye munisattamāḥ ।।
tasya saṃstūyamānasya tejaḥ somasya bhāsvataḥ ।
āpyāyanāya lokānāṃ bhāvayām āsa sarvataḥ ।।
sa tena rathamukhyena sāgarāntāṃ vasuṃdharām ।
triḥsaptakṛtvo atiyaśāś cakārābhipradakṣiṇām ।।
tasya yac caritaṃ tejaḥ pṛthivīm anvapadyata ।
oṣadhyas tāḥ samudbhūtā yābhiḥ saṃdhāryate jagat ।।
sa labdhatejā bhagavān saṃstavaiś ca svakarmabhiḥ ।
tapas tepe mahābhāgaḥ padmānāṃ darśanāya saḥ ।।
tatas tasmai dadau rājyaṃ brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ ।
bījauṣadhīnāṃ viprāṇām apāṃ ca munisattamāḥ ।।
sa tat prāpya mahārājyaṃ somaḥ saumyavatāṃ varaḥ ।
samājahre rājasūyaṃ sahasraśatadakṣiṇam ।।
dakṣiṇām adadāt somas trīṃl lokān iti naḥ śrutam ।
tebhyo brahmarṣimukhyebhyaḥ sadasyebhyaś ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
hiraṇyagarbho brahmātrir bhṛguś ca ṛtvijo abhavat ।
sadasyo abhūd dharis tatra munibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ ।।
taṃ sinīś ca kuhūś caiva dyutiḥ puṣṭiḥ prabhā vasuḥ ।
kīrtir dhṛtiś ca lakṣmīś ca nava devyaḥ siṣevire ।।
prāpyāvabhṛtham apy agryaṃ sarvadevarṣipūjitaḥ ।
virarājādhirājendro daśadhā bhāsayan diśaḥ ।।
tasya tat prāpya duṣprāpyam aiśvaryam ṛṣisatkṛtam ।
vibabhrāma matis tātā- vinayād anayāhṛtā ।।
bṛhaspateḥ sa vai bhāryām aiśvaryamadamohitaḥ ।
jahāra tarasā somo vimatyāṅgirasaḥ sutam ।।
sa yācyamāno devaiś ca tathā devarṣibhir muhuḥ ।
naiva vyasarjayat tārāṃ tasmāy aṅgirase tadā ।।
uśanā tasya jagrāha pārṣṇim aṅgirasas tadā ।
rudraś ca pārṣṇiṃ jagrāha gṛhītvājagavaṃ dhanuḥ ।।
tena brahmaśiro nāma paramāstraṃ mahātmanā ।
uddiśya devān utsṛṣṭaṃ yenaiṣāṃ nāśitaṃ yaśaḥ ।।
tatra tad yuddham abhavat prakhyātaṃ tārakāmayam ।
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca lokakṣayakaraṃ mahat ।।
tatra śiṣṭās tu ye devās tuṣitāś caiva ye dvijāḥ ।
brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmur ādidevaṃ sanātanam ।।
tadā nivāryośanasaṃ taṃ vai rudraṃ ca śaṃkaram ।
dadāv aṅgirase tārāṃ svayam eva pitāmahaḥ ।।
tām antaḥprasavāṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhaḥ prāha bṛhaspatiḥ ।
madīyāyāṃ na te yonau garbho dhāryaḥ kathaṃcana ।।
iṣīkāstambam āsādya garbhaṃ sā cotsasarja ha ।
jātamātraḥ sa bhagavān devānām ākṣipad vapuḥ ।।
tataḥ saṃśayam āpannās tārām ūcuḥ surottamāḥ ।
satyaṃ brūhi sutaḥ kasya somasyātha bṛhaspateḥ ।।
pṛcchyamānā yadā devair nāha sā vibudhān kila ।
tadā tāṃ śaptum ārabdhaḥ kumāro dasyuhantamaḥ ।।
taṃ nivārya tato brahmā tārāṃ papraccha saṃśayam ।
yad atra tathyaṃ tad brūhi tāre kasya sutas tv ayam ।।
uvāca prāñjaliḥ sā taṃ somasyeti pitāmaham ।
tadā taṃ mūrdhni cāghrāya somo rājā sutaṃ prati ।।
budha ity akaron nāma tasya bālasya dhīmataḥ ।
pratikūlaṃ ca gagane samabhyuttiṣṭhate budhaḥ ।।
utpādayām āsa tadā putraṃ vairājaputrikam ।
tasyāpatyaṃ mahātejā babhūvailaḥ purūravāḥ ।।
urvaśyāṃ jajñire yasya putrāḥ sapta mahātmanaḥ ।
etat somasya vo janma kīrtitaṃ kīrtivardhanam ।।
vaṃśam asya muniśreṣṭhāḥ kīrtyamānaṃ nibodhata ।
dhanyam āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ puṇyaṃ saṃkalpasādhanam ।।
somasya janma śrutvaiva pāpebhyo vipramucyate ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
budhasya tu muniśreṣṭhā vidvān putraḥ purūravāḥ ।
tejasvī dānaśīlaś ca yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ ।।
brahmavādī parākrāntaḥ śatrubhir yudhi durdamaḥ ।
āhartā cāgnihotrasya yajñānāṃ ca mahīpatiḥ ।।
satyavādī puṇyamatiḥ samyaksaṃvṛtamaithunaḥ ।
atīva triṣu lokeṣu yaśasāpratimaḥ sadā ।।
taṃ brahmavādinaṃ śāntaṃ dharmajñaṃ satyavādinam ।
urvaśī varayām āsa hitvā mānaṃ yaśasvinī ।।
tayā sahāvasad rājā daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca ।
ṣaṭ pañca sapta cāṣṭau ca daśa cāṣṭau ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
vane caitrarathe ramye tathā mandākinītaṭe ।
alakāyāṃ viśālāyāṃ nandane ca vanottame ।।
uttarān sa kurūn prāpya manoramaphaladrumān ।
gandhamādanapādeṣu meruśṛṅge tathottare ।।
eteṣu vanamukhyeṣu surair ācariteṣu ca ।
urvaśyā sahito rājā reme paramayā mudā ।।
deśe puṇyatame caiva maharṣibhir abhiṣṭute ।
rājyaṃ sa kārayām āsa prayāge pṛthivīpatiḥ ।।
evaṃprabhāvo rājāsīd ailas tu narasattamaḥ ।
uttare jāhnavītīre pratiṣṭhāne mahāyaśāḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
ailaputrā babhūvus te sapta devasutopamāḥ ।
gandharvaloke viditā āyur dhīmān amāvasuḥ ।।
viśvāyuś caiva dharmātmā śrutāyuś ca tathāparaḥ ।
dṛḍhāyuś ca vanāyuś ca bahvāyuś corvaśīsutāḥ ।।
amāvasos tu dāyādo bhīmo rājātha rājarāṭ ।
śrīmān bhīmasya dāyādo rājāsīt kāñcanaprabhaḥ ।।
vidvāṃs tu kāñcanasyāpi suhotro abhūn mahābalaḥ ।
suhotrasyābhavaj jahnuḥ keśinyā garbhasaṃbhavaḥ ।।
ājahre yo mahat sattraṃ sarpamedhaṃ mahāmakham ।
patilobhena yaṃ gaṅgā patitvena sasāra ha ।।
necchataḥ plāvayām āsa tasya gaṅgā tadā sadaḥ ।
sa tayā plāvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ samantataḥ ।।
sauhotrir aśapad gaṅgāṃ kruddho rājā dvijottamāḥ ।
eṣa te viphalaṃ yatnaṃ pibann ambhaḥ karomy aham ।।
asya gaṅge avalepasya sadyaḥ phalam avāpnuhi ।
jahnurājarṣiṇā pītāṃ gaṅgāṃ dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ ।।
upaninyur mahābhāgāṃ duhitṛtvena jāhnavīm ।
yuvanāśvasya putrīṃ tu kāverīṃ jahnur āvahat ।।
yuvanāśvasya śāpena gaṅgārdhena vinirgatā ।
kāverīṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ jahnor bhāryām aninditām ।।
jahnus tu dayitaṃ putraṃ sunadyaṃ nāma dhārmikam ।
kāveryāṃ janayām āsa ajakas tasya cātmajaḥ ।।
ajakasya tu dāyādo balākāśvo mahīpatiḥ ।
babhūva mṛgayāśīlaḥ kuśas tasyātmajo abhavat ।।
kuśaputrā babhūvur hi catvāro devavarcasaḥ ।
kuśikaḥ kuśanābhaś ca kuśāmbo mūrtimāṃs tathā ।।
ballavaiḥ saha saṃvṛddho rājā vanacaraḥ sadā ।
kuśikas tu tapas tepe putram indrasamaṃ prabhuḥ ।।
labheyam iti taṃ śakras trāsād abhyetya jajñivān ।
pūrṇe varṣasahasre vai tataḥ śakro hy apaśyata ।।
atyugratapasaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ ।
samarthaḥ putrajanane svayam evāsya śāśvataḥ ।।
putrārthaṃ kalpayām āsa devendraḥ surasattamaḥ ।
sa gādhir abhavad rājā maghavān kauśikaḥ svayam ।।
paurā yasyābhavad bhāryā gādhis tasyām ajāyata ।
gādheḥ kanyā mahābhāgā nāmnā satyavatī śubhā ।।
tāṃ gādhiḥ kāvyaputrāya ṛcīkāya dadau prabhuḥ ।
tasyāḥ prītaḥ sa vai bhartā bhārgavo bhṛgunandanaḥ ।।
putrārthaṃ sādhayām āsa caruṃ gādhes tathaiva ca ।
uvācāhūya tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhārgavas tadā ।।
upayojyaś carur ayaṃ tvayā mātrā svayaṃ śubhe ।
tasyāṃ janiṣyate putro dīptimān kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ ।।
ajeyaḥ kṣatriyair loke kṣatriyarṣabhasūdanaḥ ।
tavāpi putraṃ kalyāṇi dhṛtimantaṃ tapodhanam ।।
śamātmakaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ carur eṣa vidhāsyati ।
evam uktvā tu tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhṛgunandanaḥ ।।
tapasy abhirato nityam araṇyaṃ praviveśa ha ।
gādhiḥ sadāras tu tadā ṛcīkāśramam abhyagāt ।।
tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena sutāṃ draṣṭuṃ nareśvaraḥ ।
carudvayaṃ gṛhītvā sā ṛṣeḥ satyavatī tadā ।।
carum ādāya yatnena sā tu mātre nyavedayat ।
mātā tu tasyā daivena duhitre svaṃ caruṃ dadau ।।
tasyāś carum athājñānād ātmasaṃsthaṃ cakāra ha ।
atha satyavatī sarvaṃ kṣatriyāntakaraṃ tadā ।।
dhārayām āsa dīptena vapuṣā ghoradarśanā ।
tām ṛcīkas tato dṛṣṭvā yogenābhyupasṛtya ca ।।
tato abravīd dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ svāṃ bhāryāṃ varavarṇinīm ।
mātrāsi vañcitā bhadre caruvyatyāsahetunā ।।
janayiṣyati hi putras te krūrakarmātidāruṇaḥ ।
bhrātā janiṣyate cāpi brahmabhūtas tapodhanaḥ ।।
viśvaṃ hi brahma tapasā mayā tasmin samarpitam ।
evam uktā mahābhāgā bhartrā satyavatī tadā ।।
prasādayām āsa patiṃ putro me nedṛśo bhavet ।
brāhmaṇāpasadas tvatta ity ukto munir abravīt ।।
{ṛcīka uvāca 
naiṣa saṃkalpitaḥ kāmo mayā bhadre tathāstv iti ।
ugrakarmā bhavet putraḥ pitur mātuś ca kāraṇāt ।।
punaḥ satyavatī vākyam evam uktvābravīd idam ।
icchaṃl lokān api mune sṛjethāḥ kiṃ punaḥ sutam ।।
śamātmakam ṛjuṃ tvaṃ me putraṃ dātum ihārhasi ।
kāmam evaṃvidhaḥ pautro mama syāt tava ca prabho ।।
yady anyathā na śakyaṃ vai kartum etad dvijottama ।
tataḥ prasādam akarot sa tasyās tapaso balāt ।।
putre nāsti viśeṣo me pautre vā varavarṇini ।
tvayā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ tathā bhadre bhaviṣyati ।।
tataḥ satyavatī putraṃ janayām āsa bhārgavam ।
tapasy abhirataṃ dāntaṃ jamadagniṃ samātmakam ।।
bhṛgor jagatyāṃ vaṃśe asmiñ jamadagnir ajāyata ।
sā hi satyavatī puṇyā satyadharmaparāyaṇā ।।
kauśikīti samākhyātā pravṛtteyaṃ mahānadī ।
ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhavo reṇur nāma narādhipaḥ ।।
tasya kanyā mahābhāgā kāmalī nāma reṇukā ।
reṇukāyāṃ tu kāmalyāṃ tapovidyāsamanvitaḥ ।।
ārcīko janayām āsa jāmadagnyaṃ sudāruṇam ।
sarvavidyāntagaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dhanurvedasya pāragam ।।
rāmaṃ kṣatriyahantāraṃ pradīptam iva pāvakam ।
aurvasyaivam ṛcīkasya satyavatyāṃ mahāyaśāḥ ।।
jamadagnis tapovīryāj jajñe brahmavidāṃ varaḥ ।
madhyamaś ca śunaḥśephaḥ śunaḥpucchaḥ kaniṣṭhakaḥ ।।
viśvāmitraṃ tu dāyādaṃ gādhiḥ kuśikanandanaḥ ।
janayām āsa putraṃ tu tapovidyāśamātmakam ।।
prāpya brahmarṣisamatāṃ yo ayaṃ brahmarṣitāṃ gataḥ ।
viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā nāmnā viśvarathaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
jajñe bhṛguprasādena kauśikād vaṃśavardhanaḥ ।
viśvāmitrasya ca sutā devarātādayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
prakhyātās triṣu lokeṣu teṣāṃ nāmāny ataḥparam ।
devarātaḥ katiś caiva yasmāt kātyāyanāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
śālāvatyāṃ hiraṇyākṣo reṇur jajñe atha reṇukaḥ ।
sāṃkṛtir gālavaś caiva mudgalaś caiva viśrutaḥ ।।
madhucchando jayaś caiva devalaś ca tathāṣṭakaḥ ।
kacchapo hāritaś caiva viśvāmitrasya te sutāḥ ।।
teṣāṃ khyātāni gotrāṇi kauśikānāṃ mahātmanām ।
pāṇino babhravaś caiva dhyānajapyās tathaiva ca ।।
pārthivā devarātāś ca śālaṅkāyanabāṣkalāḥ ।
lohitā yamadūtāś ca tathā kārūṣakāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
pauravasya muniśreṣṭhā brahmarṣeḥ kauśikasya ca ।
saṃbandho apy asya vaṃśe asmin brahmakṣatrasya viśrutaḥ ।।
viśvāmitrātmajānāṃ tu śunaḥśepho agrajaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
bhārgavaḥ kauśikatvaṃ hi prāptaḥ sa munisattamaḥ ।।
viśvāmitrasya putras tu śunaḥśepho abhavat kila ।
haridaśvasya yajñe tu paśutve viniyojitaḥ ।।
devair dattaḥ śunaḥśepho viśvāmitrāya vai punaḥ ।
devair dattaḥ sa vai yasmād devarātas tato abhavat ।।
devarātādayaḥ sapta viśvāmitrasya vai sutāḥ ।
dṛṣadvatīsutaś cāpi vaiśvāmitras tathāṣṭakaḥ ।।
aṣṭakasya suto lauhiḥ prokto jahnugaṇo mayā ।
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi vaṃśam āyor mahātmanaḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
āyoḥ putrāś ca te pañca sarve vīrā mahārathāḥ ।
svarbhānutanayāyāṃ ca prabhāyāṃ jajñire nṛpāḥ ।।
nahuṣaḥ prathamaṃ jajñe vṛddhaśarmā tataḥ param ।
rambho rajir anenāś ca triṣu lokeṣu viśrutāḥ ।।
rajiḥ putraśatānīha janayām āsa pañca vai ।
rājeyam iti vikhyātaṃ kṣatram indrabhayāvaham ।।
yatra daivāsure yuddhe samutpanne sudāruṇe ।
devāś caivāsurāś caiva pitāmaham athābruvan ।।
{devāsurā ūcuḥ 
āvayor bhagavan yuddhe ko vijetā bhaviṣyati ।
brūhi naḥ sarvabhūteśa śrotum icchāma tattvataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
yeṣām arthāya saṃgrāme rajir āttāyudhaḥ prabhuḥ ।
yotsyate te vijeṣyanti trīṃl lokān nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
yato rajir dhṛtis tatra śrīś ca tatra yato dhṛtiḥ ।
yato dhṛtiś ca śrīś caiva dharmas tatra jayas tathā ।।
te devā dānavāḥ prītā devenoktā rajiṃ tadā ।
abhyayur jayam icchanto vṛṇvānās taṃ nararṣabham ।।
sa hi svarbhānudauhitraḥ prabhāyāṃ samapadyata ।
rājā paramatejasvī somavaṃśavivardhanaḥ ।।
te hṛṣṭamanasaḥ sarve rajiṃ vai devadānavāḥ ।
ūcur asmajjayāya tvaṃ gṛhāṇa varakārmukam ।।
athovāca rajis tatra tayor vai devadaityayoḥ ।
arthajñaḥ svārtham uddiśya yaśaḥ svaṃ ca prakāśayan ।।
{rajir uvāca 
yadi daityagaṇān sarvāñ jitvā vīryeṇa vāsavaḥ ।
indro bhavāmi dharmeṇa tato yotsyāmi saṃyuge ।।
devāḥ prathamato viprāḥ pratīyur hṛṣṭamānasāḥ ।
evaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nṛpate kāmaḥ saṃpadyatāṃ tava ।।
śrutvā suragaṇānāṃ tu vākyaṃ rājā rajis tadā ।
papracchāsuramukhyāṃs tu yathā devān apṛcchata ।।
dānavā darpasaṃpūrṇāḥ svārtham evāvagamya ha ।
pratyūcus taṃ nṛpavaraṃ sābhimānam idaṃ vacaḥ ।।
{dānavā ūcuḥ 
asmākam indraḥ prahrādo yasyārthe vijayāmahe ।
asmiṃs tu samare rājaṃs tiṣṭha tvaṃ rājasattama ।।
sa tatheti bruvann eva devair apy aticoditaḥ ।
bhaviṣyasīndro jitvainaṃ devair uktas tu pārthivaḥ ।।
jaghāna dānavān sarvān ye avadhyā vajrapāṇinaḥ ।
sa vipranaṣṭāṃ devānāṃ paramaśrīḥ śriyaṃ vaśī ।।
nihatya dānavān sarvān ājahāra rajiḥ prabhuḥ ।
tato rajiṃ mahāvīryaṃ devaiḥ saha śatakratuḥ ।।
rajiputro aham ity uktvā punar evābravīd vacaḥ ।
indro asi tāta devānāṃ sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
yasyāham indraḥ putras te khyātiṃ yāsyāmi karmabhiḥ ।
sa tu śakravacaḥ śrutvā vañcitas tena māyayā ।।
tathaivety abravīd rājā prīyamāṇaḥ śatakratum ।
tasmiṃs tu devaiḥ sadṛśo divaṃ prāpte mahīpatau ।।
dāyādyam indrād ājahrū rājyaṃ tattanayā rajeḥ ।
pañca putraśatāny asya tad vai sthānaṃ śatakratoḥ ।।
samākrāmanta bahudhā svargalokaṃ triviṣṭapam ।
te yadā tu svasaṃmūḍhā rāgonmattā vidharmiṇaḥ ।।
brahmadviṣaś ca saṃvṛttā hatavīryaparākramāḥ ।
tato lebhe svam aiśvaryam indraḥ sthānaṃ tathottamam ।।
hatvā rajisutān sarvān kāmakrodhaparāyaṇān ।
ya idaṃ cyāvanaṃ sthānāt pratiṣṭhānaṃ śatakratoḥ ।
śṛṇuyād dhārayed vāpi na sa daurgatyam āpnuyāt ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
rambho anapatyas tv āsīc ca vaṃśaṃ vakṣyāmy anenasaḥ ।
anenasaḥ suto rājā pratikṣatro mahāyaśāḥ ।।
pratikṣatrasutaś cāsīt saṃjayo nāma viśrutaḥ ।
saṃjayasya jayaḥ putro vijayas tasya cātmajaḥ ।।
vijayasya kṛtiḥ putras tasya haryatvataḥ sutaḥ ।
haryatvatasuto rājā sahadevaḥ pratāpavān ।।
sahadevasya dharmātmā nadīna iti viśrutaḥ ।
nadīnasya jayatseno jayatsenasya saṃkṛtiḥ ।।
saṃkṛter api dharmātmā kṣatravṛddho mahāyaśāḥ ।
anenasaḥ samākhyātāḥ kṣatravṛddhasya cāparaḥ ।।
