kṣatravṛddhātmajas tatra sunahotro mahāyaśāḥ ।
sunahotrasya dāyādās trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ ।।
kāśaḥ śalaś ca dvāv etau tathā gṛtsamadaḥ prabhuḥ ।
putro gṛtsamadasyāpi śunako yasya śaunakaḥ ।।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāḥ śūdrās tathaiva ca ।
śalātmaja ārṣṭiseṇas tanayas tasya kāśyapaḥ ।।
kāśasya kāśipo rājā putro dīrghatapās tathā ।
dhanus tu dīrghatapaso vidvān dhanvantaris tataḥ ।।
tapaso ante sumahato jāto vṛddhasya dhīmataḥ ।
punar dhanvantarir devo mānuṣeṣv iha janmani ।।
tasya gehe samutpanno devo dhanvantaris tadā ।
kāśirājo mahārājaḥ sarvarogapraṇāśanaḥ ।।
āyurvedaṃ bharadvājāt prāpyeha sa bhiṣakkriyaḥ ।
tam aṣṭadhā punar vyasya śiṣyebhyaḥ pratyapādayat ।।
dhanvantares tu tanayaḥ ketumān iti viśrutaḥ ।
atha ketumataḥ putro vīro bhīmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
putro bhīmarathasyāpi divodāsaḥ prajeśvaraḥ ।
divodāsas tu dharmātmā vārāṇasyadhipo abhavat ।।
etasminn eva kāle tu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ dvijāḥ ।
śūnyāṃ niveśayām āsa kṣemako nāma rākṣasaḥ ।।
śaptā hi sā matimatā nikumbhena mahātmanā ।
śūnyā varṣasahasraṃ vai bhavitrī tu na saṃśayaḥ ।।
tasyāṃ hi śaptamātrāyāṃ divodāsaḥ prajeśvaraḥ ।
viṣayānte purīṃ ramyāṃ gomatyāṃ saṃnyaveśayat ।।
bhadraśreṇyasya pūrvaṃ tu purī vārāṇasī abhūt ।
bhadraśreṇyasya putrāṇāṃ śatam uttamadhanvinām ।।
hatvā niveśayām āsa divodāso narādhipaḥ ।
bhadraśreṇyasya tad rājyaṃ hṛtaṃ yena balīyasā ।।
bhadraśreṇyasya putras tu durdamo nāma viśrutaḥ ।
divodāsena bāleti ghṛṇayā sa visarjitaḥ ।।
haihayasya tu dāyādyaṃ hṛtavān vai mahīpatiḥ ।
ājahre pitṛdāyādyaṃ divodāsahṛtaṃ balāt ।।
bhadraśreṇyasya putreṇa durdamena mahātmanā ।
vairasyānto mahābhāgāḥ kṛtaś cātmīyatejasā ।।
divodāsād dṛṣadvatyāṃ vīro jajñe pratardanaḥ ।
tena bālena putreṇa prahṛtaṃ tu punar balam ।।
pratardanasya putrau dvau vatsabhargau suviśrutau ।
vatsaputro hy alarkas tu saṃnatis tasya cātmajaḥ ।।
alarkas tasya putras tu brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ ।
alarkaṃ prati rājarṣiṃ śloko gītaḥ purātanaiḥ ।।
ṣaṣṭir varṣasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭir varṣaśatāni ca ।
yuvā rūpeṇa saṃpannaḥ prāg āsīc ca kulodvahaḥ ।।
lopāmudrāprasādena paramāyur avāptavān ।
tasyāsīt sumahad rājyaṃ rūpayauvanaśālinaḥ ।।
śāpasyānte mahābāhur hatvā kṣemakarākṣasam ।
ramyāṃ niveśayām āsa purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ punaḥ ।।
saṃnater api dāyādaḥ sunītho nāma dhārmikaḥ ।
sunīthasya tu dāyādaḥ kṣemo nāma mahāyaśāḥ ।।
kṣemasya ketumān putraḥ suketus tasya cātmajaḥ ।
suketos tanayaś cāpi dharmaketur iti smṛtaḥ ।।
dharmaketos tu dāyādaḥ satyaketur mahārathaḥ ।
satyaketusutaś cāpi vibhur nāma prajeśvaraḥ ।।
ānartas tu vibhoḥ putraḥ sukumāraś ca tatsutaḥ ।
sukumārasya putras tu dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sudhārmikaḥ ।।
dhṛṣṭaketos tu dāyādo veṇuhotraḥ prajeśvaraḥ ।
veṇuhotrasutaś cāpi bhārgo nāma prajeśvaraḥ ।।
vatsasya vatsabhūmis tu bhārgabhūmis tu bhārgajaḥ ।
ete tv aṅgirasaḥ putrā jātā vaṃśe atha bhārgava ।।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyās trayaḥ putrāḥ sahasraśaḥ ।
ity ete kāśyapāḥ proktā nahuṣasya nibodhata ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
utpannāḥ pitṛkanyāyāṃ virajāyāṃ mahaujasaḥ ।
nahuṣasya tu dāyādāḥ ṣaḍ indropamatejasaḥ ।।
yatir yayātiḥ saṃyātir āyātiḥ pārśvako abhavat ।
yatir jyeṣṭhas tu teṣāṃ vai yayātis tu tataḥ param ।।
kakutsthakanyāṃ gāṃ nāma lebhe paramadhārmikaḥ ।
yatis tu mokṣam āsthāya brahmabhūto abhavan muniḥ ।।
teṣāṃ yayātiḥ pañcānāṃ vijitya vasudhām imām ।
devayānīm uśanasaḥ sutāṃ bhāryām avāpa saḥ ।।
śarmiṣṭhām āsurīṃ caiva tanayāṃ vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ ।
yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata ।।
druhyaṃ cānuṃ ca puruṃ ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī ।
tasmai śakro dadau prīto rathaṃ paramabhāsvaram ।।
aṅgadaṃ kāñcanaṃ divyaṃ divyaiḥ paramavājibhiḥ ।
yuktaṃ manojavaiḥ śubhrair yena kāryaṃ samudvahan ।।
sa tena rathamukhyena ṣaḍrātreṇājayan mahīm ।
yayātir yudhi durdharṣas tathā devān sadānavān ।।
sarathaḥ kauravāṇāṃ tu sarveṣām abhavat tadā ।
saṃvartavasunāmnas tu kauravāj janamejayāt ।।
kuroḥ putrasya rājendra- rājñaḥ pārīkṣitasya ha ।
jagāma sa ratho nāśaṃ śāpād gargasya dhīmataḥ ।।
gargasya hi sutaṃ bālaṃ sa rājā janamejayaḥ ।
kālena hiṃsayām āsa brahmahatyām avāpa saḥ ।।
sa lohagandhī rājarṣiḥ paridhāvann itas tataḥ ।
paurajānapadais tyakto na lebhe śarma karhicit ।।
tataḥ sa duḥkhasaṃtapto nālabhat saṃvidaṃ kvacit ।
viprendraṃ śaunakaṃ rājā śaraṇaṃ pratyapadyata ।।
yājayām āsa ca jñānī śaunako janamejayam ।
aśvamedhena rājānaṃ pāvanārthaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
sa lohagandho vyanaśat tasyāvabhṛtham etya ca ।
sa ca divyaratho rājño vaśaś cedipates tadā ।।
dattaḥ śakreṇa tuṣṭena lebhe tasmād bṛhadrathaḥ ।
bṛhadrathāt krameṇaiva gato bārhadrathaṃ nṛpam ।।
tato hatvā jarāsaṃdhaṃ bhīmas taṃ ratham uttamam ।
pradadau vāsudevāya prītyā kauravanandanaḥ ।।
saptadvīpāṃ yayātis tu jitvā pṛthvīṃ sasāgarām ।
vibhajya pañcadhā rājyaṃ putrāṇāṃ nāhuṣas tadā ।।
yayātir diśi pūrvasyāṃ yaduṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ nyayojayat ।
madhye puruṃ ca rājānam abhyaṣiñcat sa nāhuṣaḥ ।।
diśi dakṣiṇapūrvasyāṃ turvasuṃ matimān nṛpaḥ ।
tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sapattanā ।।
yathāpradeśam adyāpi dharmeṇa pratipālyate ।
prajās teṣāṃ purastāt tu vakṣyāmi munisattamāḥ ।।
dhanur nyasya pṛṣatkāṃś ca pañcabhiḥ puruṣarṣabhaiḥ ।
jarāvān abhavad rājā bhāram āveśya bandhuṣu ।।
nikṣiptaśastraḥ pṛthivīṃ cacāra pṛthivīpatiḥ ।
prītimān abhavad rājā yayātir aparājitaḥ ।।
evaṃ vibhajya pṛthivīṃ yayātir yadum abravīt ।
jarāṃ me pratigṛhṇīṣva putra kṛtyāntareṇa vai ।।
taruṇas tava rūpeṇa careyaṃ pṛthivīm imām ।
jarāṃ tvayi samādhāya taṃ yaduḥ pratyuvāca ha ।।
{yadur uvāca 
anirdiṣṭā mayā bhikṣā brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutā ।
anapākṛtya tāṃ rājan na grahīṣyāmi te jarām ।।
jarāyāṃ bahavo doṣāḥ pānabhojanakāritāḥ ।
tasmāj jarāṃ na te rājan grahītum aham utsahe ।।
santi te bahavaḥ putrā mattaḥ priyatarā nṛpa ।
pratigrahītuṃ dharmajña putram anyaṃ vṛṇīṣva vai ।।
sa evam ukto yadunā rājā kopasamanvitaḥ ।
uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho yayātir garhayan sutam ।।
{yayātir uvāca 
ka āśramas tavānyo asti ko vā dharmo vidhīyate ।
mām anādṛtya durbuddhe yad ahaṃ tava deśikaḥ ।।
evam uktvā yaduṃ viprāḥ śaśāpainaṃ sa manyumān ।
arājyā te prajā mūḍha bhavitrīti na saṃśayaḥ ।।
druhyaṃ ca turvasuṃ caivāpy anuṃ ca dvijasattamāḥ ।
evam evābravīd rājā pratyākhyātaś ca tair api ।।
śaśāpa tān atikruddho yayātir aparājitaḥ ।
yathāvat kathitaṃ sarvaṃ mayāsya dvijasattamāḥ ।।
evaṃ śaptvā sutān sarvāṃś caturaḥ purupūrvajān ।
tad eva vacanaṃ rājā purum apy āha bho dvijāḥ ।।
taruṇas tava rūpeṇa careyaṃ pṛthivīm imām ।
jarāṃ tvayi samādhāya tvaṃ puro yadi manyase ।।
sa jarāṃ pratijagrāha pituḥ puruḥ pratāpavān ।
yayātir api rūpeṇa puroḥ paryacaran mahīm ।।
sa mārgamāṇaḥ kāmānām antaṃ nṛpatisattamaḥ ।
viśvācyā sahito reme vane caitrarathe prabhuḥ ।।
yadā ca tṛptaḥ kāmeṣu bhogeṣu ca narādhipaḥ ।
tadā puroḥ sakāśād vai svāṃ jarāṃ pratyapadyata ।।
yatra gāthā muniśreṣṭhā gītāḥ kila yayātinā ।
yābhiḥ pratyāharet kāmān sarvaśo aṅgāni kūrmavat ।।
na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati ।
haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate ।।
yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ ।
nālam ekasya tat sarvam iti kṛtvā na muhyati ।।
yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam ।
karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā ।।
yadā tebhyo na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati ।
yadā necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadā ।।
yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ ।
yo asau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham ।।
jīryanti jīryataḥ keśā dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ ।
dhanāśā jīvitāśā ca jīryato api na jīryati ।।
yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham ।
tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhanti ṣoḍaśīṃ kalām ।।
evam uktvā sa rājarṣiḥ sadāraḥ prāviśad vanam ।
kālena mahatā cāyaṃ cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ ।।
bhṛgutuṅge gatiṃ prāpa tapaso ante mahāyaśāḥ ।
anaśnan deham utsṛjya sadāraḥ svargam āptavān ।।
tasya vaṃśe muniśreṣṭhāḥ pañca rājarṣisattamāḥ ।
yair vyāptā pṛthivī sarvā sūryasyeva gabhastibhiḥ ।।
yados tu vaṃśaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ rājasatkṛtam ।
yatra nārāyaṇo jajñe harir vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥ ।।
susthaḥ prajāvān āyuṣmān kīrtimāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ ।
yayāticaritaṃ nityam idaṃ śṛṇvan dvijottamāḥ ।।
{brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ 
puror vaṃśaṃ vayaṃ sūta śrotum icchāma tattvataḥ ।
druhyasyānor yadoś caiva turvasoś ca pṛthak pṛthak ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ puror vaṃśaṃ mahātmanaḥ ।
vistareṇānupūrvyā ca prathamaṃ vadato mama ।।
puroḥ putraḥ suvīro abhūn manasyus tasya cātmajaḥ ।
rājā cābhayado nāma manasyor abhavat sutaḥ ।।
tathaivābhayadasyāsīt sudhanvā nāma pārthivaḥ ।
sudhanvanaḥ subāhuś ca raudrāśvas tasya cātmajaḥ ।।
raudrāśvasya daśārṇeyuḥ kṛkaṇeyus tathaiva ca ।
kakṣeyusthaṇḍileyuś ca sannateyus tathaiva ca ।।
ṛceyuś ca jaleyuś ca sthaleyuś ca mahābalaḥ ।
dhaneyuś ca vaneyuś ca putrakāś ca daśa striyaḥ ।।
bhadrā śūdrā ca madrā ca śaladā maladā tathā ।
khaladā ca tato viprā naladā surasāpi ca ।।
tathā gocapalā ca strī- ratnakūṭā ca tā daśa ।
ṛṣir jāto atrivaṃśe ca tāsāṃ bhartā prabhākaraḥ ।।
bhadrāyāṃ janayām āsa sutaṃ somaṃ yaśasvinam ।
svarbhānunā hate sūrye patamāne divo mahīm ।।
tamobhibhūte loke ca prabhā yena pravartitā ।
svasti te astv iti coktvā vai patamāno divākaraḥ ।।
vacanāt tasya viprarṣer na papāta divo mahīm ।
atriśreṣṭhāni gotrāṇi yaś cakāra mahātapāḥ ।।
yajñeṣv atrer balaṃ caiva devair yasya pratiṣṭhitam ।
sa tāsu janayām āsa putrikāsv ātmakāmajān ।।
daśa putrān mahāsattvāṃs tapasy ugre ratāṃs tathā ।
te tu gotrakarā viprā ṛṣayo vedapāragāḥ ।।
svastyātreyā iti khyātāḥ kiṃca tridhanavarjitāḥ ।
kakṣeyos tanayās tv āsaṃs traya eva mahārathāḥ ।।
sabhānaraś cākṣuṣaś ca paramanyus tathaiva ca ।
sabhānarasya putras tu vidvān kālānalo nṛpaḥ ।।
kālānalasya dharmajñaḥ sṛñjayo nāma vai sutaḥ ।
sṛñjayasyābhavat putro vīro rājā puraṃjayaḥ ।।
janamejayo muniśreṣṭhāḥ puraṃjayasuto abhavat ।
janamejayasya rājarṣer mahāśālo abhavat sutaḥ ।।
deveṣu sa parijñātaḥ pratiṣṭhitayaśā bhuvi ।
mahāmanā nāma suto mahāśālasya viśrutaḥ ।।
jajñe vīraḥ suragaṇaiḥ pūjitaḥ sumahāmanāḥ ।
mahāmanās tu putrau dvau janayām āsa bho dvijāḥ ।।
uśīnaraṃ ca dharmajñaṃ titikṣuṃ ca mahābalam ।
uśīnarasya patnyas tu pañca rājarṣivaṃśajāḥ ।।
nṛgā kṛmir navā darvā pañcamī ca dṛṣadvatī ।
uśīnarasya putrās tu pañca tāsu kulodvahāḥ ।।
tapasā caiva mahatā jātā vṛddhasya cātmajāḥ ।
nṛgāyās tu nṛgaḥ putraḥ kṛmyāṃ kṛmir ajāyata ।।
navāyās tu navaḥ putro darvāyāḥ suvrato abhavat ।
dṛṣadvatyās tu saṃjajñe śibir auśīnaro nṛpaḥ ।।
śibes tu śibayo viprā yaudheyās tu nṛgasya ha ।
navasya navarāṣṭraṃ tu kṛmes tu kṛmilā purī ।।
suvratasya tathāmbaṣṭhāḥ śibiputrān nibodhata ।
śibes tu śibayaḥ putrāś catvāro lokaviśrutāḥ ।।
vṛṣadarbhaḥ suvīraś ca kekayo madrakas tathā ।
teṣāṃ janapadāḥ sphītā kekayā madrakās tathā ।।
vṛṣadarbhāḥ suvīrāś ca titikṣos tu prajās tv imāḥ ।
titikṣur abhavad rājā pūrvasyāṃ diśi bho dvijāḥ ।।
uṣadratho mahāvīryaḥ phenas tasya suto abhavat ।
phenasya sutapā jajñe tataḥ sutapaso baliḥ ।।
jāto mānuṣayonau tu sa rājā kāñcaneṣudhiḥ ।
mahāyogī sa tu balir babhūva nṛpatiḥ purā ।।
putrān utpādayām āsa pañca vaṃśakarān bhuvi ।
aṅgaḥ prathamato jajñe vaṅgaḥ suhmas tathaiva ca ।।
puṇḍraḥ kaliṅgaś ca tathā bāleyaṃ kṣatram ucyate ।
bāleyā brāhmaṇāś caiva tasya vaṃśakarā bhuvi ।।
baleś ca brahmaṇā datto varaḥ prītena bho dvijāḥ ।
mahāyogitvam āyuś ca kalpasya parimāṇataḥ ।।
bale cāpratimatvaṃ vai dharmatattvārthadarśanam ।
saṃgrāme cāpy ajeyatvaṃ dharme caiva pradhānatām ।।
trailokyadarśanaṃ cāpi prādhānyaṃ prasave tathā ।
caturo niyatān varṇāṃs tvaṃ ca sthāpayiteti ca ।।
ity ukto vibhunā rājā baliḥ śāntiṃ parāṃ yayau ।
kālena mahatā viprāḥ svaṃ ca sthānam upāgamat ।।
teṣāṃ janapadāḥ pañca aṅgā vaṅgāḥ sasuhmakāḥ ।
kaliṅgāḥ puṇḍrakāś caiva prajās tv aṅgasya sāṃpratam ।।
aṅgaputro mahān āsīd rājendro dadhivāhanaḥ ।
dadhivāhanaputras tu rājā diviratho abhavat ।।
putro divirathasyāsīc chakratulyaparākramaḥ ।
vidvān dharmaratho nāma tasya citrarathaḥ sutaḥ ।।
tena dharmarathenātha tadā kālañjare girau ।
yajatā saha śakreṇa somaḥ pīto mahātmanā ।।
atha citrarathasyāpi putro daśaratho abhavat ।
lomapāda iti khyāto yasya śāntā sutābhavat ।।
tasya dāśarathir vīraś caturaṅgo mahāyaśāḥ ।
ṛṣyaśṛṅgaprasādena jajñe vaṃśavivardhanaḥ ।।
caturaṅgasya putras tu pṛthulākṣa iti smṛtaḥ ।
pṛthulākṣasuto rājā campo nāma mahāyaśāḥ ।।
campasya tu purī campā yā māliny abhavat purā ।
pūrṇabhadraprasādena haryaṅgo asya suto abhavat ।।
tato vaibhāṇḍakis tasya vāraṇaṃ śakravāraṇam ।
avatārayām āsa mahīṃ mantrair vāhanam uttamam ।।
haryaṅgasya sutas tatra rājā bhadrarathaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
putro bhadrarathasyāsīd bṛhatkarmā prajeśvaraḥ ।।
bṛhaddarbhaḥ sutas tasya yasmāj jajñe bṛhanmanāḥ ।
bṛhanmanās tu rājendro janayām āsa vai sutam ।।
nāmnā jayadrathaṃ nāma yasmād dṛḍharatho nṛpaḥ ।
āsīd dṛḍharathasyāpi viśvajij janamejayī ।।
dāyādas tasya vaikarṇo vikarṇas tasya cātmajaḥ ।
tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīd aṅgānāṃ kulavardhanam ।।
ete aṅgavaṃśajāḥ sarve rājānaḥ kīrtitā mayā ।
satyavratā mahātmānaḥ prajāvanto mahārathāḥ ।।
ṛceyos tu muniśreṣṭhā raudrāśvatanayasya vai ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi vaṃśaṃ rājñas tu bho dvijāḥ ।।
ṛceyos tanayo rājā matināro mahīpatiḥ ।
matinārasutās tv āsaṃs trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ ।।
vasurodhaḥ pratirathaḥ subāhuś caiva dhārmikaḥ ।
sarve vedavidaś caiva brahmaṇyāḥ satyavādinaḥ ।।
ilā nāma tu yasyāsīt kanyā vai munisattamāḥ ।
brahmavādiny adhistrī sā taṃsus tām abhyagacchata ।।
taṃsoḥ suto atha rājarṣir dharmanetraḥ pratāpavān ।
brahmavādī parākrāntas tasya bhāryopadānavī ।।
upadānavī tataḥ putrāṃś caturo ajanayac chubān ।
duṣyantam atha suṣmantaṃ pravīram anaghaṃ tathā ।।
duṣyantasya tu dāyādo bharato nāma vīryavān ।
sa sarvadamano nāma nāgāyutabalo mahān ।।
cakravartī suto jajñe duṣyantasya mahātmanaḥ ।
śakuntalāyāṃ bharato yasya nāmnā tu bhāratāḥ ।।
bharatasya vinaṣṭeṣu tanayeṣu mahīpateḥ ।
mātṝṇāṃ tu prakopeṇa mayā tat kathitaṃ purā ।।
bṛhaspater aṅgirasaḥ putro vipro mahāmuniḥ ।
ayājayad bharadvājo mahadbhiḥ kratubhir vibhuḥ ।।
pūrvaṃ tu vitathe tasya kṛte vai putrajanmani ।
tato atha vitatho nāma bharadvājāt suto abhavat ।।
tato atha vitathe jāte bharatas tu divaṃ yayau ।
vitathaṃ cābhiṣicyātha bharadvājo vanaṃ yayau ।।
sa cāpi vitathaḥ putrāñ janayām āsa pañca vai ।
suhotraṃ ca suhotāraṃ gayaṃ gargaṃ tathaiva ca ।।
kapilaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ suhotrasya sutadvayam ।
kāśikaṃ ca mahāsatyaṃ tathā gṛtsamatiṃ nṛpam ।।
tathā gṛtsamateḥ putrā brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā viśaḥ ।
kāśikasya tu kāśeyaḥ putro dīrghatapās tathā ।।
babhūva dīrghatapaso vidvān dhanvantariḥ sutaḥ ।
dhanvantares tu tanayaḥ ketumān iti viśrutaḥ ।।
tathā ketumataḥ putro vidvān bhīmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
putro bhīmarathasyāpi vārāṇasyadhipo abhavat ।।
divodāsa iti khyātaḥ sarvakṣatrapraṇāśanaḥ ।
divodāsasya putras tu vīro rājā pratardanaḥ ।।
pratardanasya putrau dvau vatso bhārgava eva ca ।
alarko rājaputras tu rājā sanmatimān bhuvi ।।
haihayasya tu dāyādyaṃ hṛtavān vai mahīpatiḥ ।
ājahre pitṛdāyādyaṃ divodāsahṛtaṃ balāt ।।
bhadraśreṇyasya putreṇa durdamena mahātmanā ।
divodāsena bāleti ghṛṇayāsau visarjitaḥ ।।
aṣṭāratho nāma nṛpaḥ suto bhīmarathasya vai ।
tena putreṇa bālasya prahṛtaṃ tasya bho dvijāḥ ।।
vairasyāntaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ kṣatriyeṇa vidhitsatā ।
alarkaḥ kāśirājas tu brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ ।।
ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣaśatāni ca ।
yuvā rūpeṇa saṃpanna āsīt kāśikulodvahaḥ ।।
lopāmudrāprasādena paramāyur avāpa saḥ ।
vayaso ante muniśreṣṭhā hatvā kṣemakarākṣasam ।।
ramyāṃ niveśayām āsa purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ nṛpaḥ ।
alarkasya tu dāyādaḥ kṣemako nāma pārthivaḥ ।।
kṣemakasya tu putro vai varṣaketus tato abhavat ।
varṣaketoś ca dāyādo vibhur nāma prajeśvaraḥ ।।
ānartas tu vibhoḥ putraḥ sukumāras tato abhavat ।
sukumārasya putras tu satyaketur mahārathaḥ ।।
suto abhavan mahātejā rājā paramadhārmikaḥ ।
vatsasya vatsabhūmis tu bhargabhūmis tu bhārgavāt ।।
ete tv aṅgirasaḥ putrā jātā vaṃśe atha bhārgave ।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca munisattamāḥ ।।
ājamīḍho aparo vaṃśaḥ śrūyatāṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
suhotrasya bṛhat putro bṛhatas tanayās trayaḥ ।।
ajamīḍho dvimīḍhaś ca purumīḍhaś ca vīryavān ।
ajamīḍhasya patnyas tu tisro vai yaśasānvitāḥ ।।
nīlī ca keśinī caiva dhūminī ca varāṅganāḥ ।
ajamīḍhasya keśinyāṃ jajñe jahnuḥ pratāpavān ।।
ājahre yo mahāsattraṃ sarvamedhamakhaṃ vibhum ।
patilobhena yaṃ gaṅgā vinīteva sasāra ha ।।
necchataḥ plāvayām āsa tasya gaṅgā ca tat sadaḥ ।
tat tayā plāvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ samantataḥ ।।
jahnur apy abravīd gaṅgāṃ kruddho viprās tadā nṛpaḥ ।
eṣa te triṣu lokeṣu saṃkṣipyāpaḥ pibāmy aham ।
asya gaṅge avalepasya sadyaḥ phalam avāpnuhi ।।
tataḥ pītāṃ mahātmāno dṛṣṭvā gaṅgāṃ maharṣayaḥ ।
upaninyur mahābhāgā duhitṛtvena jāhnavīm ।।
yuvanāśvasya putrīṃ tu kāverīṃ jahnur āvahat ।
gaṅgāśāpena dehārdhaṃ yasyāḥ paścān nadīkṛtam ।।
jahnos tu dayitaḥ putro ajako nāma vīryavān ।
ajakasya tu dāyādo balākāśvo mahīpatiḥ ।।
babhūva mṛgayāśīlaḥ kuśikas tasya cātmajaḥ ।
pahnavaiḥ saha saṃvṛddho rājā vanacaraiḥ saha ।।
kuśikas tu tapas tepe putram indrasamaṃ vibhum ।
labheyam iti taṃ śakras trāsād abhyetya jajñivān ।।
sa gādhir abhavad rājā maghavā kauśikaḥ svayam ।
viśvāmitras tu gādheyo viśvāmitrāt tathāṣṭakaḥ ।।
aṣṭakasya suto lauhiḥ prokto jahnugaṇo mayā ।
ājamīḍho aparo vaṃśaḥ śrūyatāṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
ajamīḍhāt tu nīlyāṃ vai suśāntir udapadyata ।
purujātiḥ suśānteś ca bāhyāśvaḥ purujātitaḥ ।।
bāhyāśvatanayāḥ pañca sphītā janapadāvṛtāḥ ।
mudgalaḥ sṛñjayaś caiva rājā bṛhadiṣus tadā ।।
yavīnaraś ca vikrāntaḥ kṛmilāśvaś ca pañcamaḥ ।
pañcaite rakṣaṇāyālaṃ deśānām iti viśrutāḥ ।।
pañcānāṃ te tu pañcālāḥ sphītā janapadāvṛtāḥ ।
alaṃ saṃrakṣaṇe teṣāṃ pañcālā iti viśrutāḥ ।।
mudgalasya tu dāyādo maudgalyaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ ।
indrasenā yato garbhaṃ vadhnyaṃ ca pratyapadyata ।।
āsīt pañcajanaḥ putraḥ sṛñjayasya mahātmanaḥ ।
sutaḥ pañcajanasyāpi somadatto mahīpatiḥ ।।
somadattasya dāyādaḥ sahadevo mahāyaśāḥ ।
sahadevasutaś cāpi somako nāma viśrutaḥ ।।
ajamīḍhasuto jātaḥ kṣīṇe vaṃśe tu somakaḥ ।
somakasya suto jantur yasya putraśataṃ babhau ।।
teṣāṃ yavīyān pṛṣato drupadasya pitā prabhuḥ ।
ājamīḍhāḥ smṛtāś caite mahātmānas tu somakāḥ ।।
mahiṣī tv ajamīḍhasya dhūminī putragṛddhinī ।
pativratā mahābhāgā kulajā munisattamāḥ ।।
sā ca putrārthinī devī vratacaryāsamanvitā ।
tato varṣāyutaṃ taptvā tapaḥ paramaduścaram ।।
hutvāgniṃ vidhivat sā tu pavitrā mitabhojanā ।
agnihotrakuśeṣv eva suṣvāpa munisattamāḥ ।।
dhūminyā sa tayā devyā tv ajamīḍhaḥ samīyivān ।
ṛkṣaṃ saṃjanayām āsa dhūmravarṇaṃ sudarśanam ।।
ṛkṣāt saṃvaraṇo jajñe kuruḥ saṃvaraṇāt tathā ।
yaḥ prayāgād atikramya kurukṣetraṃ cakāra ha ।।
puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca puṇyakṛdbhir niṣevitam ।
tasyānvavāyaḥ sumahān yasya nāmnātha kauravāḥ ।।
kuroś ca putrāś catvāraḥ sudhanvā sudhanus tathā ।
parīkṣic ca mahābāhuḥ pravaraś cārimejayaḥ ।।
parīkṣitas tu dāyādo dhārmiko janamejayaḥ ।
śrutaseno agrasenaś ca bhīmasenaś ca nāmataḥ ।।
ete sarve mahābhāgā vikrāntā balaśālinaḥ ।
janamejayasya putras tu suratho matimāṃs tathā ।।
surathasya tu vikrāntaḥ putro jajñe vidūrathaḥ ।
vidūrathasya dāyāda ṛkṣa eva mahārathaḥ ।।
dvitīyas tu bharadvājān nāmnā tenaiva viśrutaḥ ।
dvāv ṛkṣau somavaṃśe asmin dvāv eva ca parīkṣitau ।।
bhīmasenās trayo viprā dvau cāpi janamejayau ।
ṛkṣasya tu dvitīyasya bhīmaseno abhavat sutaḥ ।।
pratīpo bhīmasenāt tu pratīpasya tu śāṃtanuḥ ।
devāpir bāhlikaś caiva traya eva mahārathāḥ ।।
śāṃtanos tv abhavad bhīṣmas tasmin vaṃśe dvijottamāḥ ।
bāhlikasya tu rājarṣer vaṃśaṃ śṛṇuta bho dvijāḥ ।।
bāhlikasya sutaś caiva somadatto mahāyaśāḥ ।
jajñire somadattāt tu bhūrir bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ ।।
upādhyāyas tu devānāṃ devāpir abhavan muniḥ ।
cyavanaputraḥ kṛtaka iṣṭa āsīn mahātmanaḥ ।।
śāṃtanus tv abhavad rājā kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ ।
śāṃtanoḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi vaṃśaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।।
gāṅgaṃ devavrataṃ nāma putraṃ so ajanayat prabhuḥ ।
sa tu bhīṣma iti khyātaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ pitāmahaḥ ।।
kālī vicitravīryaṃ tu janayām āsa bho dvijāḥ ।
śāṃtanor dayitaṃ putraṃ dharmātmānam akalmaṣam ।।
kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāc caiva kṣetre vaicitravīryake ।
dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ ca viduraṃ cāpy ajījanat ।।
dhṛtarāṣṭras tu gāndhāryāṃ putrān utpādayac chatam ।
teṣāṃ duryodhanaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām api sa prabhuḥ ।।
pāṇḍor dhanaṃjayaḥ putraḥ saubhadras tasya cātmajaḥ ।
abhimanyoḥ parīkṣit tu pitā pārīkṣitasya ha ।।
pārīkṣitasya kāśyāyāṃ dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ ।
candrāpīḍas tu nṛpatiḥ sūryāpīḍaś ca mokṣavit ।।
candrāpīḍasya putrāṇāṃ śatam uttamadhanvinām ।
jānamejayam ity evaṃ kṣātraṃ bhuvi pariśrutam ।।
teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhas tu tatrāsīt pure vāraṇasāhvaye ।
satyakarṇo mahābāhur yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ ।।
satyakarṇasya dāyādaḥ śvetakarṇaḥ pratāpavān ।
aputraḥ sa tu dharmātmā praviveśa tapovanam ।।
tasmād vanagatā garbhaṃ yādavī pratyapadyata ।
sucāror duhitā subhrūr mālinī grāhamālinī ।।
saṃbhūte sa ca garbhe ca śvetakarṇaḥ prajeśvaraḥ ।
anvagacchat kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ mahāprasthānam acyutam ।।
sā tu dṛṣṭvā priyaṃ taṃ tu mālinī pṛṣṭhato anvagāt ।
sucāror duhitā sādhvī vane rājīvalocanā ।।
pathi sā suṣuve bālā sukumāraṃ kumārakam ।
tam apāsyātha tatraiva rājānaṃ sānvagacchata ।।
pativratā mahābhāgā draupadīva purā satī ।
kumāraḥ sukumāro asau giripṛṣṭhe ruroda ha ।।
dayārthaṃ tasya meghās tu prādurāsan mahātmanaḥ ।
śraviṣṭhāyās tu putrau dvau paippalādiś ca kauśikaḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā kṛpānvitau gṛhya tau prākṣālayatāṃ jale ।
nighṛṣṭau tasya pārśvau tu śilāyāṃ rudhiraplutau ।।
ajaśyāmaḥ sa pārśvābhyāṃ ghṛṣṭābhyāṃ susamāhitaḥ ।
ajaśyāmau tu tatpārśvau devena saṃbabhūvatuḥ ।।
athājapārśva iti vai cakrāte nāma tasya tau ।
sa tu remakaśālāyāṃ dvijābhyām abhivardhitaḥ ।।
remakasya tu bhāryā tam udvahat putrakāraṇāt ।
rematyāḥ sa tu putro abhūd brāhmaṇau sacivau tu tau ।।
teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca yugapattulyajīvinaḥ ।
sa eṣa pauravo vaṃśaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām ।।
śloko api cātra gīto ayaṃ nāhuṣeṇa yayātinā ।
jarāsaṃkramaṇe pūrvaṃ tadā prītena dhīmatā ।।
acandrārkagrahā bhūmir bhaved iyam asaṃśayam ।
apauravā mahī naiva bhaviṣyati kadācana ।।
eṣa vaḥ pauravo vaṃśo vikhyātaḥ kathito mayā ।
turvasos tu pravakṣyāmi druhyoś cānor yados tathā ।।
turvasos tu suto vahnir gobhānus tasya cātmajaḥ ।
gobhānos tu suto rājā aiśānur aparājitaḥ ।।
karaṃdhamas tu aiśānor maruttas tasya cātmajaḥ ।
anyas tv āvikṣito rājā maruttaḥ kathito mayā ।।
anapatyo abhavad rājā yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ ।
duhitā saṃyatā nāma tasyāsīt pṛthivīpateḥ ।।
dakṣiṇārthaṃ tu sā dattā saṃvartāya mahātmane ।
duṣyantaṃ pauravaṃ cāpi lebhe putram akalmaṣam ।।
evaṃ yayātiśāpena jarāsaṃkramaṇe tadā ।
pauravaṃ turvasor vaṃśaṃ praviveśa dvijottamāḥ ।।
duṣyantasya tu dāyādaḥ karūromaḥ prajeśvaraḥ ।
karūromād athāhrīdaś catvāras tasya cātmajāḥ ।।
pāṇḍyaś ca keralaś caiva kālaś colaś ca pārthivaḥ ।
druhyoś ca tanayo rājan babhrusetuś ca pārthivaḥ ।।
aṅgārasetus tatputro marutāṃ patir ucyate ।
yauvanāśvena samare kṛcchreṇa nihato balī ।।
yuddhaṃ sumahad apy āsīn māsān paricarad daśa ।
aṅgārasetor dāyādo gāndhāro nāma pārthivaḥ ।।
khyāyate yasya nāmnā vai gāndhāraviṣayo mahān ।
gāndhāradeśajāś caiva turagā vājināṃ varāḥ ।।
anos tu putro dharmo abhūd dyūtas tasyātmajo abhavat ।
dyūtād vanaduho jajñe pracetās tasya cātmajaḥ ।।
pracetasaḥ sucetās tu kīrtitās tv anavo mayā ।
babhūvus tu yadoḥ putrāḥ pañca devasutopamāḥ ।।
sahasrādaḥ payodaś ca kroṣṭā nīlo añjikas tathā ।
sahasrādasya dāyādās trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ ।।
haihayaś ca hayaś caiva rājā veṇuhayas tathā ।
haihayasyābhavat putro dharmanetra iti śrutaḥ ।।
dharmanetrasya kārtas tu sāhañjas tasya cātmajaḥ ।
sāhañjanī nāma purī tena rājñā niveśitā ।।
āsīn mahiṣmataḥ putro bhadraśreṇyaḥ pratāpavān ।
bhadraśreṇyasya dāyādo durdamo nāma viśrutaḥ ।।
durdamasya suto dhīmān kanako nāma nāmataḥ ।
kanakasya tu dāyādāś catvāro lokaviśrutāḥ ।।
kṛtavīryaḥ kṛtaujāś ca kṛtadhanvā tathaiva ca ।
kṛtāgnis tu caturtho abhūt kṛtavīryād athārjunaḥ ।।
yo asau bāhusahasreṇa saptadvīpeśvaro abhavat ।
jigāya pṛthivīm eko rathenādityavarcasā ।।
sa hi varṣāyutaṃ taptvā tapaḥ paramaduścaram ।
dattam ārādhayām āsa kārtavīryo atrisaṃbhavam ।।
tasmai datto varān prādāc caturo bhūritejasaḥ ।
pūrvaṃ bāhusahasraṃ tu prārthitaṃ sumahad varam ।।
adharme adhīyamānasya sadbhis tatra nivāraṇam ।
ugreṇa pṛthivīṃ jitvā dharmeṇaivānurañjanam ।।
saṃgrāmān subahūñ jitvā hatvā cārīn sahasraśaḥ ।
saṃgrāme vartamānasya vadhaṃ cābhyadhikād raṇe ।।
tasya bāhusahasraṃ tu yudhyataḥ kila bho dvijāḥ ।
yogād yogīśvarasyeva prādurbhavati māyayā ।।
teneyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sapattanā ।
sasamudrā sanagarā ugreṇa vidhinā jitā ।।
tena saptasu dvīpeṣu sapta yajñaśatāni ca ।
prāptāni vidhinā rājñā śrūyante munisattamāḥ ।।
sarve yajñā muniśreṣṭhāḥ sahasraśatadakṣiṇāḥ ।
sarve kāñcanayūpāś ca sarve kāñcanavedayaḥ ।।
sarve devair muniśreṣṭhā vimānasthair alaṃkṛtaiḥ ।
gandharvair apsarobhiś ca nityam evopaśobhitāḥ ।।
yasya yajñe jagau gāthāṃ gandharvo nāradas tathā ।
varīdāsātmajo vidvān mahimnā tasya vismitaḥ ।।
{nārada uvāca 
na nūnaṃ kārtavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti pārthivāḥ ।
yajñair dānais tapobhiś ca vikrameṇa śrutena ca ।।
sa hi saptasu dvīpeṣu carmī khaḍgī śarāsanī ।
rathī dvīpān anucaran yogī saṃdṛśyate nṛbhiḥ ।।
anaṣṭadravyatā caiva na śoko na ca vibhramaḥ ।
prabhāveṇa mahārājñaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ ।।
sa sarvaratnabhāk samrāṭ cakravartī babhūva ha ।
sa eva paśupālo abhūt kṣetrapālaḥ sa eva ca ।।
sa eva vṛṣṭyā parjanyo yogitvād arjuno abhavat ।
sa vai bāhusahasreṇa jyāghātakaṭhinatvacā ।।
bhāti raśmisahasreṇa śaradīva ca bhāskaraḥ ।
sa hi nāgān manuṣyeṣu māhiṣmatyāṃ mahādyutiḥ ।।
karkoṭakasutāñ jitvā puryāṃ tasyāṃ nyaveśayat ।
sa vai vegaṃ samudrasya prāvṛṭkāle ambujekṣaṇaḥ ।।
krīḍann iva bhujodbhinnaṃ pratisrotaś cakāra ha ।
luṇṭhitā krīḍatā tena nadī tadgrāmamālinī ।।
caladūrmisahasreṇa śaṅkitābhyeti narmadā ।
tasya bāhusahasreṇa kṣipyamāṇe mahodadhau ।।
bhayān nilīnā niśceṣṭhāḥ pātālasthā mahīsurāḥ ।
cūrṇīkṛtamahāvīciṃ calanmīnamahātimim ।।
mārutāviddhaphenaugham āvartakṣobhasaṃkulam ।
prāvartayat tadā rājā sahasreṇa ca bāhunā ।।
devāsurasamākṣiptaḥ kṣīrodam iva mandaraḥ ।
mandarakṣobhacakitā amṛtotpādaśaṅkitāḥ ।।
sahasotpatitā bhītā bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpottamam ।
natā niścalamūrdhāno babhūvus te mahoragāḥ ।।
sāyāhne kadalīkhaṇḍāḥ kampitā iva vāyunā ।
sa vai baddhvā dhanur jyābhir utsiktaṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ ।।
laṅkeśaṃ mohayitvā tu sabalaṃ rāvaṇaṃ balāt ।
nirjitya vaśam ānīya māhiṣmatyāṃ babandha tam ।।
śrutvā tu baddhaṃ paulastyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ tv arjunena ca ।
tato gatvā pulastyas tam arjunaṃ dadṛśe svayam ।।
mumoca rakṣaḥ paulastyaṃ pulastyenābhiyācitaḥ ।
yasya bāhusahasrasya babhūva jyātalasvanaḥ ।।
yugānte toyadasyeva sphuṭato hy aśaner iva ।
aho bata mṛdhe vīryaṃ bhārgavasya yad acchinat ।।
rājño bāhusahasrasya haimaṃ tālavanaṃ yathā ।
tṛṣitena kadācit sa bhikṣitaś citrabhānunā ।।
sa bhikṣām adadād vīraḥ sapta dvīpān vibhāvasoḥ ।
purāṇi grāmaghoṣāṃś ca viṣayāṃś caiva sarvaśaḥ ।।
jajvāla tasya sarvāṇi citrabhānur didhṛkṣayā ।
sa tasya puruṣendrasya prabhāveṇa mahātmanaḥ ।।
dadāha kārtavīryasya śailāṃś caiṣa vanāni ca ।
sa śūnyam āśramaṃ ramyaṃ varuṇasyātmajasya vai ।।
dadāha balavadbhītaś citrabhānuḥ sa haihayaḥ ।
yaṃ lebhe varuṇaḥ putraṃ purā bhāsvantam uttamam ।।
vasiṣṭhaṃ nāma sa muniḥ khyāta āpava ity uta ।
yatrāpavas tu taṃ krodhāc chaptavān arjunaṃ vibhuḥ ।।
yasmān na varjitam idaṃ vanaṃ te mama haihaya ।
tasmāt te duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtam anyo haniṣyati ।।
rāmo nāma mahābāhur jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān ।
chittvā bāhusahasraṃ te pramathya tarasā balī ।।
tapasvī brāhmaṇas tvāṃ tu haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ ।
anaṣṭadravyatā yasya babhūvāmitrakarṣiṇaḥ ।।
pratāpena narendrasya prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ ।
prāptas tato asya mṛtyur vai tasya śāpān mahāmuneḥ ।।
varas tathaiva bho viprāḥ svayam eva vṛtaḥ purā ।
tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīt pañca śeṣā mahātmanaḥ ।।
kṛtāstrā balinaḥ śūrā dharmātmāno yaśasvinaḥ ।
śūrasenaś ca śūraś ca vṛṣaṇo madhupadhvajaḥ ।।
jayadhvajaś ca nāmnāsīd āvantyo nṛpatir mahān ।
kārtavīryasya tanayā vīryavanto mahābalāḥ ।।
jayadhvajasya putras tu tālajaṅgho mahābalaḥ ।
tasya putraśataṃ khyātās tālajaṅghā iti smṛtāḥ ।।
teṣāṃ kule muniśreṣṭhā haihayānāṃ mahātmanām ।
vītihotrāḥ sujātāś ca bhojāś cāvantayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
tauṇḍikerāś ca vikhyātās tālajaṅghās tathaiva ca ।
bharatāś ca sujātāś ca bahutvān nānukīrtitāḥ ।।
vṛṣaprabhṛtayo viprā yādavāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ ।
vṛṣo vaṃśadharas tatra tasya putro abhavan madhuḥ ।।
madhoḥ putraśataṃ tv āsīd vṛṣaṇas tasya vaṃśakṛt ।
vṛṣaṇād vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve madhos tu mādhavāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
yādavā yadunāmnā te nirucyante ca haihayāḥ ।
na tasya vittanāśaḥ syān naṣṭaṃ prati labhec ca saḥ ।।
kārtavīryasya yo janma kathayed iha nityaśaḥ ।
ete yayātiputrāṇāṃ pañca vaṃśā dvijottamāḥ ।।
kīrtitā lokavīrāṇāṃ ye lokān dhārayanti vai ।
bhūtānīva muniśreṣṭhāḥ pañca sthāvarajaṅgamān ।।
śrutvā pañca visargāṃs tu rājā dharmārthakovidaḥ ।
vaśī bhavati pañcānām ātmajānāṃ tatheśvaraḥ ।।
labhet pañca varāṃś caiva durlabhān iha laukikān ।
āyuḥ kīrtiṃ tathā putrān aiśvaryaṃ bhūtim eva ca ।।
dhāraṇāc chravaṇāc caiva pañcavargasya bho dvijāḥ ।
kroṣṭor vaṃśaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ gadato mama ।।
yador vaṃśadharasyātha yajvinaḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ ।
kroṣṭor vaṃśaṃ hi śrutvaiva sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।
yasyānvavāyajo viṣṇur harir vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca kroṣṭor bhārye babhūvatuḥ ।
gāndhārī janayām āsa anamitraṃ mahābalam ।।
mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato anyaṃ devamīḍhuṣam ।
teṣāṃ vaṃśas tridhā bhūto vṛṣṇīnāṃ kulavardhanaḥ ।।
mādryāḥ putrau tu jajñāte śrutau vṛṣṇyandhakāv ubhau ।
jajñāte tanayau vṛṣṇeḥ śvaphalkaś citrakas tathā ।।
śvaphalkas tu muniśreṣṭhā dharmātmā yatra vartate ।
nāsti vyādhibhayaṃ tatra nāvarṣas tapam eva ca ।।
kadācit kāśirājasya viṣaye munisattamāḥ ।
trīṇi varṣāṇi pūrṇāni nāvarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ ।।
sa tatra cānayām āsa śvaphalkaṃ paramārcitam ।
śvaphalkaparivartena vavarṣa harivāhanaḥ ।।
śvaphalkaḥ kāśirājasya sutāṃ bhāryām avindata ।
gāndinīṃ nāma gāṃ sā ca dadau viprāya nityaśaḥ ।।
dātā yajvā ca vīraś ca śrutavān atithipriyaḥ ।
akrūraḥ suṣuve tasmāc chvaphalkād bhūridakṣiṇaḥ ।।
upamadgus tathā madgur meduraś cārimejayaḥ ।
avikṣitas tathākṣepaḥ śatrughnaś cārimardanaḥ ।।
dharmadhṛg yatidharmā ca dharmokṣāndhakarus tathā ।
āvāhaprativāhau ca sundarī ca varāṅganā ।।
akrūreṇograsenāyāṃ sugātryāṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
prasenaś copadevaś ca jajñāte devavarcasau ।।
citrakasyābhavan putrāḥ pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca ।
aśvagrīvo aśvabāhuś ca svapārśvakagaveṣaṇau ।।
ariṣṭanemir aśvaś ca sudharmā dharmabhṛt tathā ।
subāhur bahubāhuś ca śraviṣṭhāśravaṇe striyau ।।
asiknyāṃ janayām āsa śūraṃ vai devamīḍhuṣam ।
mahiṣyāṃ jajñire śūrā bhojyāyāṃ puruṣā daśa ।।
vasudevo mahābāhuḥ pūrvam ānakadundubhiḥ ।
jajñe yasya prasūtasya dundubhyaḥ prāṇadan divi ।।
ānakānāṃ ca saṃhrādaḥ sumahān abhavad divi ।
papāta puṣpavarṣaś ca śūrasya janane mahān ।।
manuṣyaloke kṛtsne api rūpe nāsti samo bhuvi ।
yasyāsīt puruṣāgryasya kāntiś candramaso yathā ।।
devabhāgas tato jajñe tathā devaśravāḥ punaḥ ।
anādhṛṣṭiḥ kanavako vatsavān atha gṛñjamaḥ ।।
śyāmaḥ śamīko gaṇḍūṣaḥ pañca cāsya varāṅganāḥ ।
pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthā caiva śrutadevā śrutaśravā ।।
rājādhidevī ca tathā pañcaitā vīramātaraḥ ।
śrutaśravāyāṃ caidyas tu śiśupālo abhavan nṛpaḥ ।।
hiraṇyakaśipur yo asau daityarājo abhavat purā ।
pṛthukīrtyāṃ tu saṃjajñe tanayo vṛddhaśarmaṇaḥ ।।
karūṣādhipatir vīro dantavakro mahābalaḥ ।
pṛthāṃ duhitaraṃ cakre kuntis tāṃ pāṇḍur āvahat ।।
yasyāṃ sa dharmavid rājā dharmo jajñe yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ।
bhīmasenas tathā vātād indrāc caiva dhanaṃjayaḥ ।।
loke pratiratho vīraḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥ ।
anamitrāc chanir jajñe kaniṣṭhād vṛṣṇinandanāt ।।
śaineyaḥ satyakas tasmād yuyudhānaś ca sātyakiḥ ।
uddhavo devabhāgasya mahābhāgaḥ suto abhavat ।।
paṇḍitānāṃ paraṃ prāhur devaśravasam uttamam ।
aśmakyaṃ prāptavān putram anādhṛṣṭir yaśasvinam ।।
nivṛttaśatruṃ śatrughnaṃ śrutadevā tv ajāyata ।
śrutadevātmajās te tu naiṣādir yaḥ pariśrutaḥ ।।
ekalavyo muniśreṣṭhā niṣādaiḥ parivardhitaḥ ।
vatsavate tv aputrāya vasudevaḥ pratāpavān ।
adbhir dadau sutaṃ vīraṃ śauriḥ kauśikam aurasam ।।
gaṇḍūṣāya hy aputrāya viṣvakseno dadau sutān ।
cārudeṣṇaṃ sudeṣṇaṃ ca pañcālaṃ kṛtalakṣaṇam ।।
asaṃgrāmeṇa yo vīro nāvartata kadācana ।
raukmiṇeyo mahābāhuḥ kanīyān dvijasattamāḥ ।।
vāyasānāṃ sahasrāṇi yaṃ yāntaṃ pṛṣṭhato anvayuḥ ।
cārūn adyopabhokṣyāmaś cārudeṣṇahatān iti ।।
tantrijas tantripālaś ca sutau kanavakasya tau ।
vīruś cāśvahanuś caiva vīrau tāv atha gṛñjimau ।।
śyāmaputraḥ śamīkas tu śamīko rājyam āvahat ।
jugupsamāno bhojatvād rājasūyam avāpa saḥ ।।
ajātaśatruḥ śatrūṇāṃ jajñe tasya vināśanaḥ ।
vasudevasutān vīrān kīrtayiṣyāmy ataḥ param ।।
vṛṣṇes trividham evaṃ tu bahuśākhaṃ mahaujasam ।
dhārayan vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ nānarthair iha yujyate ।।
yāḥ patnyo vasudevasya caturdaśa varāṅganāḥ ।
pauravī rohiṇī nāma madirāditathāvarā ।।
vaiśākhī ca tathā bhadrā sunāmnī caiva pañcamī ।
sahadevā śāntidevā śrīdevī devarakṣitā ।।
vṛkadevy upadevī ca devakī caiva saptamī ।
sutanur vaḍavā caiva dve ete paricārike ।।
pauravī rohiṇī nāma bāhlikasyātmajābhavat ।
jyeṣṭhā patnī muniśreṣṭhā dayitānakadundubheḥ ।।
lebhe jyeṣṭhaṃ sutaṃ rāmaṃ śaraṇyaṃ śaṭham eva ca ।
durdamaṃ damanaṃ śubhraṃ piṇḍārakam uśīnaram ।।
citrā nāma kumārī ca rohiṇītanayā nava ।
citrā subhadreti punar vikhyātā munisattamāḥ ।।
vasudevāc ca devakyāṃ jajñe śaurir mahāyaśāḥ ।
rāmāc ca niśaṭho jajñe revatyāṃ dayitaḥ sutaḥ ।।
subhadrāyāṃ rathī pārthād abhimanyur ajāyata ।
akrūrāt kāśikanyāyāṃ satyaketur ajāyata ।।
vasudevasya bhāryāsu mahābhāgāsu saptasu ।
ye putrā jajñire śūrāḥ samastāṃs tān nibodhata ।।
bhojaś ca vijayaś caiva śāntidevāsutāv ubhau ।
vṛkadevaḥ sunāmāyāṃ gadaś cāstāṃ sutāv ubhau ।।
agāvahaṃ mahātmānaṃ vṛkadevī vyajāyata ।
kanyā trigartarājasya bhāryā vai śiśirāyaṇeḥ ।।
jijñāsāṃ pauruṣe cakre na caskande ca pauruṣam ।
kṛṣṇāyasasamaprakhyo varṣe dvādaśame tathā ।।
mithyābhiśasto gārgyas tu manyunātisamīritaḥ ।
ghoṣakanyām upādāya maithunāyopacakrame ।।
gopālī cāpsarās tasya gopastrīveṣadhāriṇī ।
dhārayām āsa gārgyasya garbhaṃ durdharam acyutam ।।
mānuṣyāṃ gargabhāryāyāṃ niyogāc chūlapāṇinaḥ ।
sa kālayavano nāma jajñe rājā mahābalaḥ ।।
vṛttapūrvārdhakāyas tu siṃhasaṃhanano yuvā ।
aputrasya sa rājñas tu vavṛdhe antaḥpure śiśuḥ ।।
yavanasya muniśreṣṭhāḥ sa kālayavano abhavat ।
āyudhyamāno nṛpatiḥ paryapṛcchad dvijottamam ।।
vṛṣṇyandhakakulaṃ tasya nārado akathayad vibhuḥ ।
akṣauhiṇyā tu sainyasya mathurām abhyayāt tadā ।।
dūtaṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa vṛṣṇyandhakaniveśanam ।
tato vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ puraskṛtya mahāmatim ।।
sametā mantrayām āsur yavanasya bhayāt tadā ।
kṛtvā viniścayaṃ sarve palāyanam arocayan ।।
vihāya mathurāṃ ramyāṃ mānayantaḥ pinākinam ।
kuśasthalīṃ dvāravatīṃ niveśayitum īpsavaḥ ।।
iti kṛṣṇasya janmedaṃ yaḥ śucir niyatendriyaḥ ।
parvasu śrāvayed vidvān anṛṇaḥ sa sukhī bhavet ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
kroṣṭor athābhavat putro vṛjinīvān mahāyaśāḥ ।
vārjinīvatam icchanti svāhiṃ svāhākṛtāṃ varam ।।
svāhiputro abhavad rājā uṣadgur vadatāṃ varaḥ ।
mahākratubhir īje yo vividhair bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ ।।
tataḥ prasūtim icchan vai uṣadguḥ so agryam ātmajam ।
jajñe citrarathas tasya putraḥ karmabhir anvitaḥ ।।
āsīc caitrarathir vīro yajvā vipuladakṣiṇaḥ ।
śaśabinduḥ paraṃ vṛttaṃ rājarṣīṇām anuṣṭhitaḥ ।।
pṛthuśravāḥ pṛthuyaśā rājāsīc chāśibindavaḥ ।
śaṃsanti ca purāṇajñāḥ pārthaśravasam antaram ।।
antarasya suyajñas tu suyajñatanayo abhavat ।
uṣato yajñam akhilaṃ svadharme ca kṛtādaraḥ ।।
śineyur abhavat putra uṣataḥ śatrutāpanaḥ ।
marutas tasya tanayo rājarṣir abhavan nṛpaḥ ।।
maruto alabhata jyeṣṭhaṃ sutaṃ kambalabarhiṣam ।
cacāra vipulaṃ dharmam amarṣāt pratyabhāg api ।।
sa satprasūtim icchan vai sutaṃ kambalabarhiṣaḥ ।
babhūva rukmakavacaḥ śataprasavataḥ sutaḥ ।।
nihatya rukmakavacaḥ śataṃ kavacināṃ raṇe ।
dhanvināṃ niśitair bāṇair avāpa śriyam uttamām ।।
jajñe ca rukmakavacāt parajit paravīrahā ।
jajñire pañca putrās tu mahāvīryāḥ parājitāḥ ।।
rukmeṣuḥ pṛthurukmaś ca jyāmaghaḥ pālito hariḥ ।
pālitaṃ ca hariṃ caiva videhebhyaḥ pitā dadau ।।
rukmeṣur abhavad rājā pṛthurukmasya saṃśrayāt ।
tābhyāṃ pravrājito rājā jyāmagho avasad āśrame ।।
praśāntaś ca tadā rājā brāhmaṇaiś cāvabodhitaḥ ।
jagāma dhanur ādāya deśam anyaṃ dhvajī rathī ।।
narmadākūlam ekākīm ekalāṃ mṛttikāvatīm ।
ṛkṣavantaṃ giriṃ jitvā śuktimatyām uvāsa saḥ ।।
jyāmaghasyābhavad bhāryā śaibyā balavatī satī ।
aputro api sa rājā vai nānyāṃ bhāryām avindata ।।
tasyāsīd vijayo yuddhe tatra kanyām avāpa saḥ ।
bhāryām uvāca saṃtrastaḥ snuṣeti sa janeśvaraḥ ।।
etac chrutvābravīd devī kasya deva snuṣeti vai ।
abravīt tad upaśrutya jyāmagho rājasattamaḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
yas te janiṣyate putras tasya bhāryopapāditā ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
ugreṇa tapasā tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ sā vyajāyata ।
putraṃ vidarbhaṃ subhāgā śaibyā pariṇatā satī ।।
rājaputryāṃ tu vidvāṃsau snuṣāyāṃ krathakaiśikau ।
paścād vidarbho ajanayac chūrau raṇaviśāradau ।।
bhīmo vidarbhasya sutaḥ kuntis tasyātmajo abhavat ।
kunter dhṛṣṭaḥ suto jajñe raṇadhṛṣṭaḥ pratāpavān ।।
dhṛṣṭasya jajñire śūrās trayaḥ paramadhārmikāḥ ।
āvantaś ca daśārhaś ca balī viṣaharaś ca saḥ ।।
daśārhasya suto vyomā vyomno jīmūta ucyate ।
jīmūtaputro vikṛtis tasya bhīmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
atha bhīmarathasyāsīt putro navarathas tathā ।
tasya cāsīd daśarathaḥ śakunis tasya cātmajaḥ ।।
tasmāt karambhaḥ kārambhir devarāto abhavan nṛpaḥ ।
devakṣatro abhavat tasya vṛddhakṣatro mahāyaśāḥ ।।
devagarbhasamo jajñe devakṣatrasya nandanaḥ ।
madhūnāṃ vaṃśakṛd rājā madhur madhuravāg api ।।
madhor jajñe atha vaidarbhyāṃ purudvān puruṣottamaḥ ।
aikṣvākī cābhavad bhāryā madhos tasyāṃ vyajāyata ।।
satvān sarvaguṇopetaḥ sātvatā kīrtivardhanaḥ ।
imāṃ visṛṣṭiṃ vijñāya jyāmaghasya mahātmanaḥ ।
yujyate paramaprītyā prajāvāṃś ca bhavet sadā ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
satvataḥ sattvasaṃpannān kauśalyā suṣuve sutān ।
bhāginaṃ bhajamānaṃ ca divyaṃ devāvṛdhaṃ nṛpam ।।
andhakaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ vṛṣṇiṃ ca yadunandanam ।
teṣāṃ visargāś catvāro vistareṇeha kīrtitāḥ ।।
bhajamānasya sṛñjayyau bāhyakāthopabāhyakā ।
āstāṃ bhārye tayos tasmāj jajñire bahavaḥ sutāḥ ।।
krimiś ca kramaṇaś caiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śūraḥ puraṃjayaḥ ।
ete bāhyakasṛñjayyāṃ bhajamānād vijajñire ।।
āyutājit sahasrājic chatājit tv atha dāsakaḥ ।
upabāhyakasṛñjayyāṃ bhajamānād vijajñire ।।
yajvā devāvṛdho rājā cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ ।
putraḥ sarvaguṇopeto mama syād iti niścitaḥ ।।
saṃyujyamānas tapasā parṇāśāyā jalaṃ spṛśan ।
sadopaspṛśatas tasya cakāra priyam āpagā ।।
cintayābhiparītā sā na jagāmaiva niścayam ।
kalyāṇatvān narapates tasya sā nimnagottamā ।।
nādhyagacchat tu tāṃ nārīṃ yasyām evaṃvidhaḥ sutaḥ ।
bhavet tasmāt svayaṃ gatvā bhavāmy asya sahānugā ।।
atha bhūtvā kumārī sā bibhratī paramaṃ vapuḥ ।
varayām āsa nṛpatiṃ tām iyeṣa ca sa prabhuḥ ।।
tasyām ādhatta garbhaṃ sa tejasvinam udāradhīḥ ।
atha sā daśame māsi suṣuve saritāṃ varā ।।
putraṃ sarvaguṇopetaṃ babhruṃ devāvṛdhaṃ dvijāḥ ।
atra vaṃśe purāṇajñā gāyantīti pariśrutam ।।
guṇān devāvṛdhasyāpi kīrtayanto mahātmanaḥ ।
yathaivāgre tathā dūrāt paśyāmas tāvad antikāt ।।
babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devair devāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ ।
ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ ca puruṣāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta ca ।।
ete amṛtatvaṃ prāptā vai babhror devāvṛdhād api ।
yajvā dānapatir dhīmān brahmaṇyaḥ sudṛḍhāyudhaḥ ।।
tasyānvavāyaḥ sumahān bhojā ye sārtikāvatāḥ ।
andhakāt kāśyaduhitā caturo alabhatātmajān ।।
kukuraṃ bhajamānaṃ ca sasakaṃ balabarhiṣam ।
kukurasya suto vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭes tu tanayas tathā ।।
kapotaromā tasyātha tiliris tanayo abhavat ।
jajñe punar vasus tasmād abhijic ca punar vasoḥ ।।
tathā vai putramithunaṃ babhūvābhijitaḥ kila ।
āhukaḥ śrāhukaś caiva khyātau khyātimatāṃ varau ।।
imāṃ codāharanty atra gāthāṃ prati tam āhukam ।
śvetena parivāreṇa kiśorapratimo mahān ।।
aśītivarmaṇā yukta āhukaḥ prathamaṃ vrajet ।
nāputravān nāśatado nāsahasraśatāyuṣaḥ ।।
nāśuddhakarmā nāyajvā yo bhojam abhito vrajet ।
pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāgānāṃ bhojasya prayayuḥ kila ।।
somāt saṅgānukarṣāṇāṃ dhvajināṃ savarūthinām ।
rathānāṃ meghaghoṣāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi daśaiva tu ।।
raupyakāñcanakakṣāṇāṃ sahasrāṇy ekaviṃśatiḥ ।
tāvaty eva sahasrāṇi uttarasyāṃ tathā diśi ।।
ābhūmipālā bhojās tu santi jyākiṅkiṇīkinaḥ ।
āhuḥ kiṃ cāpy avantibhyaḥ svasāraṃ dadur andhakāḥ ।।
āhukasya tu kāśyāyāṃ dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ ।
devakaś cograsenaś ca devagarbhasamāv ubhau ।।
devakasyābhavan putrāś catvāras tridaśopamāḥ ।
devavān upadevaś ca saṃdevo devarakṣitaḥ ।।
kumāryaḥ sapta cāsyātha vasudevāya tā dadau ।
devakī śāntidevā ca sudevā devarakṣitā ।।
vṛkadevy upadevī ca sunāmnī caiva saptamī ।
navograsenasya sutās teṣāṃ kaṃsas tu pūrvajaḥ ।।
nyagrodhaś ca sunāmā ca tathā kaṅkaḥ subhūṣaṇaḥ ।
rāṣṭrapālo atha sutanur anāvṛṣṭis tu puṣṭimān ।।
teṣāṃ svasāraḥ pañcāsan kaṃsā kaṃsavatī tathā ।
sutanū rāṣṭrapālī ca kaṅkā caiva varāṅganā ।।
ugrasenaḥ sahāpatyo vyākhyātaḥ kukurodbhavaḥ ।
kukurāṇām imaṃ vaṃśaṃ dhārayann amitaujasām ।।
ātmano vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ prajāvān āpnuyān naraḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
bhajamānasya putro atha rathamukhyo vidūrathaḥ ।
rājādhidevaḥ śūras tu vidūrathasuto abhavat ।।
rājādhidevasya sutā jajñire vīryavattarāḥ ।
dattātidattau balinau śoṇāśvaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ ।।
śamī ca daṇḍaśarmā ca dantaśatruś ca śatrujit ।
śravaṇā ca śraviṣṭhā ca svasārau saṃbabhūvatuḥ ।।
śamiputraḥ pratikṣatraḥ pratikṣatrasya cātmajaḥ ।
svayaṃbhojaḥ svayaṃbhojād bhadikaḥ saṃbabhūva ha ।।
tasya putrā babhūvur hi sarve bhīmaparākramāḥ ।
kṛtavarmāgrajas teṣāṃ śatadhanvā tu madhyamaḥ ।।
devāntaś ca narāntaś ca bhiṣagvaitaraṇaś ca yaḥ ।
sudāntaś cātidāntaś ca nikāśyaḥ kāmadambhakaḥ ।।
devāntasyābhavat putro vidvān kambalabarhiṣaḥ ।
asamaujāḥ sutas tasya nāsamaujāś ca tāv ubhau ।।
ajātaputrāya sutān pradadāv asamaujase ।
sudaṃṣṭraś ca sucāruś ca kṛṣṇa ity andhakāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca kroṣṭubhārye babhūvatuḥ ।
gāndhārī janayām āsa anamitraṃ mahābalam ।।
mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato vai devamīdhuṣam ।
anamitram amitrāṇāṃ jetāram aparājitam ।।
anamitrasuto nighno nighnato dvau babhūvatuḥ ।
prasenaś cātha satrājic chatrusenājitāv ubhau ।।
praseno dvāravatyāṃ tu nivasan yo mahāmaṇim ।
divyaṃ syamantakaṃ nāma sa sūryād upalabdhavān ।।
tasya satrājitaḥ sūryaḥ sakhā prāṇasamo abhavat ।
sa kadācin niśāpāye rathena rathināṃ varaḥ ।।
toyakūlam apaḥ spraṣṭum upasthātuṃ yayau ravim ।
tasyopatiṣṭhataḥ sūryaṃ vivasvān agrataḥ sthitaḥ ।।
vispaṣṭamūrtir bhagavāṃs tejomaṇḍalavān vibhuḥ ।
atha rājā vivasvantam uvāca sthitam agrataḥ ।।
yathaiva vyomni paśyāmi sadā tvāṃ jyotiṣāṃ pate ।
tejomaṇḍalinaṃ devaṃ tathaiva purataḥ sthitam ।।
ko viśeṣo asti me tvattaḥ sakhyenopagatasya vai ।
etac chrutvā tu bhagavān maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam ।।
svakaṇṭhād avamucyātha ekānte nyastavān vibhuḥ ।
tato vigrahavantaṃ taṃ dadarśa nṛpatis tadā ।।
prītimān atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā muhūrtaṃ kṛtavān kathām ।
tam abhiprasthitaṃ bhūyo vivasvantaṃ sa satrajit ।।
lokān bhāsayase sarvān yena tvaṃ satataṃ prabho ।
tad etan maṇiratnaṃ me bhagavan dātum arhasi ।।
tataḥ syamantakamaṇiṃ dattavān bhāskaras tadā ।
sa tam ābadhya nagarīṃ praviveśa mahīpatiḥ ।।
taṃ janāḥ paryadhāvanta sūryo ayaṃ gacchatīti ha ।
svāṃ purīṃ sa visiṣmāya rājā tv antaḥpuraṃ tathā ।।
taṃ prasenajitaṃ divyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam ।
dadau bhrātre narapatiḥ premṇā satrājid uttamam ।।
sa maṇiḥ syandate rukmaṃ vṛṣṇyandhakaniveśane ।
kālavarṣī ca parjanyo na ca vyādhibhayaṃ hy abhūt ।।
lipsāṃ cakre prasenasya maṇiratne syamantake ।
govindo na ca taṃ lebhe śakto api na jahāra saḥ ।।
kadācin mṛgayāṃ yātaḥ prasenas tena bhūṣitaḥ ।
syamantakakṛte siṃhād vadhaṃ prāpa vanecarāt ।।
atha siṃhaṃ pradhāvantam ṛkṣarājo mahābalaḥ ।
nihatya maṇiratnaṃ tad ādāya prāviśad guhām ।।
tato vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prasenavadhakāraṇāt ।
prārthanāṃ tāṃ maṇer baddhvā sarva eva śaśaṅkire ।।
sa śaṅkyamāno dharmātmā akārī tasya karmaṇaḥ ।
āhariṣye maṇim iti pratijñāya vanaṃ yayau ।।
yatra praseno mṛgayāṃ vyacarat tatra cāpy atha ।
prasenasya padaṃ gṛhya puruṣair āptakāribhiḥ ।।
ṛkṣavantaṃ girivaraṃ vindhyaṃ ca girim uttamam ।
anveṣayan pariśrāntaḥ sa dadarśa mahāmanāḥ ।।
sāśvaṃ hataṃ prasenaṃ tu nāvindata ca tanmaṇim ।
atha siṃhaḥ prasenasya śarīrasyāvidūrataḥ ।।
ṛkṣeṇa nihato dṛṣṭaḥ padair ṛkṣas tu sūcitaḥ ।
padais tair anviyāyātha guhām ṛkṣasya mādhavaḥ ।।
sa hi ṛkṣabile vāṇīṃ śuśrāva pramaderitām ।
dhātryā kumāram ādāya sutaṃ jāmbavato dvijāḥ ।।
krīḍayantyā ca maṇinā mā rodīr ity atheritām ।।
{dhātry uvāca 
siṃhaḥ prasenam avadhīt siṃho jāmbavatā hataḥ ।
sukumāraka mā rodīs tava hy eṣa syamantakaḥ ।।
vyaktitas tasya śabdasya tūrṇam eva bilaṃ yayau ।
praviśya tatra bhagavāṃs tad ṛkṣabilam añjasā ।।
sthāpayitvā biladvāre yadūṃl lāṅgalinā saha ।
śārṅgadhanvā bilasthaṃ tu jāmbavantaṃ dadarśa saḥ ।।
yuyudhe vāsudevas tu bile jāmbavatā saha ।
bāhubhyām eva govindo divasān ekaviṃśatim ।।
praviṣṭe atha bile kṛṣṇe baladevapuraḥsarāḥ ।
purīṃ dvāravatīm etya hataṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nyavedayan ।।
vāsudevo api nirjitya jāmbavantaṃ mahābalam ।
lebhe jāmbavatīṃ kanyām ṛkṣarājasya saṃmatām ।।
maṇiṃ syamantakaṃ caiva jagrāhātmaviśuddhaye ।
anunīyarkṣarājaṃ tu niryayau ca tato bilāt ।।
upāyād dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa vinītaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ ।
evaṃ sa maṇim āhṛtya viśodhyātmānam acyutaḥ ।।
dadau satrājite taṃ vai sarvasātvatasaṃsadi ।
evaṃ mithyābhiśastena kṛṣṇenāmitraghātinā ।।
ātmā viśodhitaḥ pāpād vinirjitya syamantakam ।
satrājito daśa tv āsan bhāryās tāsāṃ śataṃ sutāḥ ।।
khyātimantas trayas teṣāṃ bhagaṃkāras tu pūrvajaḥ ।
vīro vātapatiś caiva vasumedhas tathaiva ca ।।
kumāryaś cāpi tisro vai dikṣu khyātā dvijottamāḥ ।
satyabhāmottamā tāsāṃ vratinī ca dṛḍhavratā ।।
tathā prasvāpinī caiva bhāryāṃ kṛṣṇāya tāṃ dadau ।
sabhākṣo bhaṅgakāris tu nāveyaś ca narottamau ।।
jajñāte guṇasaṃpannau viśrutau rūpasaṃpadā ।
mādryāḥ putro atha jajñe atha vṛṣṇiputro yudhājitaḥ ।।
jajñāte tanayau vṛṣṇeḥ śvaphalkaś citrakas tathā ।
śvaphalkaḥ kāśirājasya sutāṃ bhāryām avindata ।।
gāndinīṃ nāma tasyāś ca gāḥ sadā pradadau pitā ।
tasyāṃ jajñe mahābāhuḥ śrutavān atithipriyaḥ ।।
akrūro atha mahābhāgo jajñe vipuladakṣiṇaḥ ।
upamadgus tathā madgur mudaraś cārimardanaḥ ।।
ārikṣepas tathopekṣaḥ śatruhā cārimejayaḥ ।
dharmabhṛc cāpi dharmā ca gṛdhrabhojāndhakas tathā ।।
āvāhaprativāhau ca sundarī ca varāṅganā ।
viśrutāśvasya mahiṣī kanyā cāsya vasuṃdharā ।।
rūpayauvanasaṃpannā sarvasattvamanoharā ।
akrūreṇograsenāyāṃ sutau vai kulanandanau ।।
vasudevaś copadevaś ca jajñāte devavarcasau ।
citrakasyābhavan putrāḥ pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca ।।
aśvagrīvo aśvabāhuś ca supārśvakagaveṣaṇau ।
ariṣṭanemiś ca sutā dharmo dharmabhṛd eva ca ।।
subāhur bahubāhuś ca śraviṣṭhāśravaṇe striyau ।
imāṃ mithyābhiśastiṃ yaḥ kṛṣṇasya samudāhṛtām ।।
veda mithyābhiśāpās taṃ na spṛśanti kadācana ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
yat tu satrājite kṛṣṇo maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam ।
dadāv ahārayad babhrur bhojena śatadhanvanā ।।
sadā hi prārthayām āsa satyabhāmām aninditām ।
akrūro antaram anviṣyan maṇiṃ caiva syamantakam ।।
satrājitaṃ tato hatvā śatadhanvā mahābalaḥ ।
rātrau taṃ maṇim ādāya tato akrūrāya dattavān ।।
akrūras tu tadā viprā ratnam ādāya cottamam ।
samayaṃ kārayāṃ cakre nāvedyo ahaṃ tvayety uta ।।
vayam abhyutprapatsyāmaḥ kṛṣṇena tvāṃ pradharṣitam ।
mamādya dvārakā sarvā vaśe tiṣṭhaty asaṃśayam ।।
hate pitari duḥkhārtā satyabhāmā manasvinī ।
prayayau ratham āruhya nagaraṃ vāraṇāvatam ।।
satyabhāmā tu tad vṛttaṃ bhojasya śatadhanvanaḥ ।
bhartur nivedya duḥkhārtā pārśvasthāśrūṇy avartayat ।।
pāṇḍavānāṃ ca dagdhānāṃ hariḥ kṛtvodakakriyām ।
kulyārthe cāpi pāṇḍūnāṃ nyayojayata sātyakim ।।
tatas tvaritam āgamya dvārakāṃ madhusūdanaḥ ।
pūrvajaṃ halinaṃ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt ।।
{śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca 
hataḥ prasenaḥ siṃhena satrājic chatadhanvanā ।
syamantakas tu madnāmī tasya prabhur ahaṃ vibho ।।
tad āroha rathaṃ śīghraṃ bhojaṃ hatvā mahāratham ।
syamantako mahābāho asmākaṃ sa bhaviṣyati ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ bhojakṛṣṇayoḥ ।
śatadhanvā tato akrūraṃ sarvatodiśam aikṣata ।।
saṃrabdhau tāv ubhau tatra dṛṣṭvā bhojajanārdanau ।
śakto api śāpād dhārdikyam akrūro nānvapadyata ।।
apayāne tato buddhiṃ bhojaś cakre bhayārditaḥ ।
yojanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ hṛdayā pratyapadyata ।।
vikhyātā hṛdayā nāma śatayojanagāminī ।
bhojasya vaḍavā viprā yayā kṛṣṇam ayodhayat ।।
kṣīṇāṃ javena hṛdayām adhvanaḥ śatayojane ।
dṛṣṭvā rathasya svāṃ vṛddhiṃ śatadhanvānam ardayat ।।
tatas tasyā hatāyās tu śramāt khedāc ca bho dvijāḥ ।
kham utpetur atha prāṇāḥ kṛṣṇo rāmam athābravīt ।।
{śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca 
tiṣṭheha tvaṃ mahābāho dṛṣṭadoṣā hayā mayā ।
padbhyāṃ gatvā hariṣyāmi maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam ।।
padbhyām eva tato gatvā śatadhanvānam acyutaḥ ।
mithilām abhito viprā jaghāna paramāstravit ।।
syamantakaṃ ca nāpaśyad dhatvā bhojaṃ mahābalam ।
nivṛttaṃ cābravīt kṛṣṇaṃ maṇiṃ dehīti lāṅgalī ।।
nāstīti kṛṣṇaś covāca tato rāmo ruṣānvitaḥ ।
dhikśabdapūrvam asakṛt pratyuvāca janārdanam ।।
{balarāma uvāca 
bhrātṛtvān marṣayāmy eṣa svasti te astu vrajāmy aham ।
kṛtyaṃ na me dvārakayā na tvayā na ca vṛṣṇibhiḥ ।।
praviveśa tato rāmo mithilām arimardanaḥ ।
sarvakāmair upahṛtair mithilenābhipūjitaḥ ।।
etasminn eva kāle tu babhrur matimatāṃ varaḥ ।
nānārūpān kratūn sarvān ājahāra nirargalān ।।
dīkṣāmayaṃ sa kavacaṃ rakṣārthaṃ praviveśa ha ।
syamantakakṛte prājño gāndīputro mahāyaśāḥ ।।
atha ratnāni cānyāni dhanāni vividhāni ca ।
ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣāṇi dharmātmā yajñeṣv eva nyayojayat ।।
akrūrayajñā iti te khyātās tasya mahātmanaḥ ।
bahvannadakṣiṇāḥ sarve sarvakāmapradāyinaḥ ।।
atha duryodhano rājā gatvā sa mithilāṃ prabhuḥ ।
gadāśikṣāṃ tato divyāṃ baladevād avāptavān ।।
saṃprasādya tato rāmo vṛṣṇyandhakamahārathaiḥ ।
ānīto dvārakām eva kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā ।।
akrūraś cāndhakaiḥ sārdham āyātaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ ।
hatvā satrājitaṃ suptaṃ sahabandhuṃ mahābalaḥ ।।
jñātibhedabhayāt kṛṣṇas tam upekṣitavāṃs tadā ।
apayāte tadākrūre nāvarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ ।।
anāvṛṣṭyā tadā rāṣṭram abhavad bahudhā kṛśam ।
tataḥ prasādayām āsur akrūraṃ kukurāndhakāḥ ।।
punar dvāravatīṃ prāpte tasmin dānapatau tataḥ ।
pravavarṣa sahasrākṣaḥ kakṣe jalanidhes tadā ।।
kanyāṃ ca vāsudevāya svasāraṃ śīlasaṃmatām ।
akrūraḥ pradadau dhīmān prītyarthaṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
atha vijñāya yogena kṛṣṇo babhrugataṃ maṇim ।
sabhāmadhyagataḥ prāha tam akrūraṃ janārdanaḥ ।।
{śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca 
yat tad ratnaṃ maṇivaraṃ tava hastagataṃ vibho ।
tat prayaccha ca mānārha mayi mānāryakaṃ kṛthāḥ ।।
ṣaṣṭivarṣagate kāle yo roṣo abhūn mamānagha ।
sa saṃrūḍho asakṛt prāptas tataḥ kālātyayo mahān ।।
sa tataḥ kṛṣṇavacanāt sarvasātvatasaṃsadi ।
pradadau taṃ maṇiṃ babhrur akleśena mahāmatiḥ ।।
tatas tam ārjavāt prāptaṃ babhror hastād ariṃdamaḥ ।
dadau hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇas taṃ maṇiṃ babhrave punaḥ ।।
sa kṛṣṇahastāt saṃprāptaṃ maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam ।
ābadhya gāndinīputro virarājāṃśumān iva ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
aho sumahad ākhyānaṃ bhavatā parikīrtitam ।
bhāratānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca ।।
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca gandharvoragarakṣasām ।
daityānām atha siddhānāṃ guhyakānāṃ tathaiva ca ।।
atyadbhutāni karmāṇi vikramā dharmaniścayāḥ ।
vividhāś ca kathā divyā janma cāgryam anuttamam ।।
sṛṣṭiḥ prajāpateḥ samyak tvayā proktā mahāmate ।
prajāpatīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ guhyakāpsarasāṃ tathā ।।
sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ sarvam utpannaṃ vividhaṃ jagat ।
tvayā proktaṃ mahābhāga śrutaṃ caitan manoharam ।।
kathitaṃ puṇyaphaladaṃ purāṇaṃ ślakṣṇayā girā ।
manaḥkarṇasukhaṃ samyak prīṇāty amṛtasaṃmitam ।।
idānīṃ śrotum icchāmaḥ sakalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ ।
vaktum arhasi sarvajña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
yāvantaḥ sāgarā dvīpās tathā varṣāṇi parvatāḥ ।
vanāni saritaḥ puṇya- devādīnāṃ mahāmate ।।
yatpramāṇam idaṃ sarvaṃ yadādhāraṃ yadātmakam ।
saṃsthānam asya jagato yathāvad vaktum arhasi ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
munayaḥ śrūyatām etat saṃkṣepād vadato mama ।
nāsya varṣaśatenāpi vaktuṃ śakyo ativistaraḥ ।।
jambūplakṣāhvayau dvīpau śālmalaś cāparo dvijāḥ ।
kuśaḥ krauñcas tathā śākaḥ puṣkaraś caiva saptamaḥ ।।
ete dvīpāḥ samudrais tu sapta saptabhir āvṛtāḥ ।
lavaṇekṣusurāsarpir dadhidugdhajalaiḥ samam ।।
jambūdvīpaḥ samastānām eteṣāṃ madhyasaṃsthitaḥ ।
tasyāpi madhye viprendrā meruḥ kanakaparvataḥ ।।
caturaśītisāhasrair yojanais tasya cocchrayaḥ ।
praviṣṭaḥ ṣoḍaśādhastād dvātriṃśan mūrdhni vistṛtaḥ ।।
mūle ṣoḍaśasāhasrair vistāras tasya sarvataḥ ।
bhūpadmasyāsya śailo asau karṇikākārasaṃsthitaḥ ।।
himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhas tasya dakṣiṇe ।
nīlaḥ śvetaś ca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ ।।
lakṣapramāṇau dvau madhye daśahīnās tathāpare ।
sahasradvitayocchrāyās tāvadvistāriṇaś ca te ।।
bhārataṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ tataḥ kiṃpuruṣaṃ smṛtam ।
harivarṣaṃ tathaivānyan meror dakṣiṇato dvijāḥ ।।
ramyakaṃ cottaraṃ varṣaṃ tasyaiva tu hiraṇmayam ।
uttarāḥ kuravaś caiva yathā vai bhārataṃ tathā ।।
navasāhasram ekaikam eteṣāṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
ilāvṛtaṃ ca tanmadhye sauvarṇo merur ucchritaḥ ।।
meroś caturdiśaṃ tatra navasāhasravistṛtam ।
ilāvṛtaṃ mahābhāgāś catvāraś cātra parvatāḥ ।।
viṣkambhā vitatā meror yojanāyutavistṛtāḥ ।
pūrveṇa mandaro nāma dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ ।।
vipulaḥ paścime pārśve supārśvaś cottare sthitaḥ ।
kadambas teṣu jambūś ca pippalo vaṭa eva ca ।।
ekādaśaśatāyāmāḥ pādapā giriketavaḥ ।
jambūdvīpasya sā jambūr nāmahetur dvijottamāḥ ।।
mahāgajapramāṇāni jambvās tasyāḥ phalāni vai ।
patanti bhūbhṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhe śīryamāṇāni sarvataḥ ।।
rasena teṣāṃ vikhyātā tatra jambūnadīti vai ।
sarit pravartate sā ca pīyate tannivāsibhiḥ ।।
na khedo na ca daurgandhyaṃ na jarā nendriyakṣayaḥ ।
tatpānasvasthamanasāṃ janānāṃ tatra jāyate ।।
tīramṛt tadrasaṃ prāpya sukhavāyuviśoṣitā ।
jāmbūnadākhyaṃ bhavati suvarṇaṃ siddhabhūṣaṇam ।।
bhadrāśvaṃ pūrvato meroḥ ketumālaṃ ca paścime ।
varṣe dve tu muniśreṣṭhās tayor madhye tv ilāvṛtam ।।
vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ pūrve dakṣiṇe gandhamādanam ।
vaibhrājaṃ paścime tadvad uttare nandanaṃ smṛtam ।।
aruṇodaṃ mahābhadram asitodaṃ samānasam ।
sarāṃsy etāni catvāri devabhogyāni sarvadā ।।
śāntavāṃś cakrakuñjaś ca kurarī mālyavāṃs tathā ।
vaikaṅkapramukhā meroḥ pūrvataḥ kesarācalāḥ ।।
trikūṭaḥ śiśiraś caiva pataṃgo rucakas tathā ।
niṣadhādayo dakṣiṇatas tasya kesaraparvatāḥ ।।
śikhivāsaḥ savaidūryaḥ kapilo gandhamādanaḥ ।
jānudhipramukhās tadvat paścime kesarācalāḥ ।।
meror anantarās te ca jaṭharādiṣv avasthitāḥ ।
śaṅkhakūṭo atha ṛṣabho haṃso nāgas tathāparāḥ ।।
kālañjarādyāś ca tathā uttare kesarācalāḥ ।
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ mahāpurī ।।
meror upari viprendrā brahmaṇaḥ kathitā divi ।
tasyāṃ samantataś cāṣṭau diśāsu vidiśāsu ca ।।
indrādilokapālānāṃ prakhyātāḥ pravarāḥ puraḥ ।
viṣṇupādaviniṣkrāntā plāvayantīndumaṇḍalam ।।
samantād brahmaṇaḥ puryāṃ gaṅgā patati vai divi ।
sā tatra patitā dikṣu caturdhā pratyapadyata ।।
sītā cālakanandā ca cakṣur badhrā ca vai kramāt ।
pūrveṇa sītā śailāc ca śailaṃ yānty antarikṣagā ।।
tataś ca pūrvavarṣeṇa bhadrāśvenaiti sārṇavam ।
tathaivālakanandā ca dakṣiṇenaitya bhāratam ।।
prayāti sāgaraṃ bhūtvā saptabhedā dvijottamāḥ ।
cakṣuś ca paścimagirīn atītya sakalāṃs tataḥ ।।
paścimaṃ ketumālākhyaṃ varṣam anveti sārṇavam ।
bhadrā tathottaragirīn uttarāṃś ca tathā kurūn ।।
atītyottaram ambhodhiṃ samabhyeti dvijottamāḥ ।
ānīlaniṣadhāyāmau mālyavadgandhamādanau ।।
tayor madhyagato meruḥ karṇikākārasaṃsthitaḥ ।
bhāratāḥ ketumālāś ca bhadrāśvāḥ kuravas tathā ।।
pattrāṇi lokaśailasya maryādāśailabāhyataḥ ।
jaṭharo devakūṭaś ca maryādāparvatāv ubhau ।।
tau dakṣiṇottarāyāmāv ānīlaniṣadhāyatau ।
gandhamādanakailāsau pūrvapaścāt tu tāv ubhau ।।
aśītiyojanāyāmāv arṇavāntarvyavasthitau ।
niṣadhaḥ pāriyātraś ca maryādāparvatāv ubhau ।।
tau dakṣiṇottarāyāmāv ānīlaniṣadhāyatau ।
meroḥ paścimadigbhāge yathā pūrvau tathā sthitau ।।
triśṛṅgo jārudhiś caiva uttarau varṣaparvatau ।
pūrvapaścāyatāv etāv arṇavāntarvyavasthitau ।।
ity ete hi mayā proktā maryādāparvatā dvijāḥ ।
jaṭharāvasthitā meror yeṣāṃ dvau dvau caturdiśam ।।
meroś caturdiśaṃ ye tu proktāḥ kesaraparvatāḥ ।
śītāntādyā dvijās teṣām atīva hi manoharāḥ ।।
śailānām antaradroṇyaḥ siddhacāraṇasevitāḥ ।
suramyāṇi tathā tāsu kānanāni purāṇi ca ।।
lakṣmīviṣṇvagnisūryendra- devānāṃ munisattamāḥ ।
tāsv āyatanavaryāṇi juṣṭāni narakiṃnaraiḥ ।।
gandharvayakṣarakṣāṃsi tathā daiteyadānavāḥ ।
krīḍanti tāsu ramyāsu śailadroṇīṣv aharniśam ।।
bhaumā hy ete smṛtāḥ svargā dharmiṇām ālayā dvijāḥ ।
naiteṣu pāpakartāro yānti janmaśatair api ।।
bhadrāśve bhagavān viṣṇur āste hayaśirā dvijāḥ ।
vārāhaḥ ketumāle tu bhārate kūrmarūpadhṛk ।।
matsyarūpaś ca govindaḥ kuruṣv āste sanātanaḥ ।
viśvarūpeṇa sarvatra sarvaḥ sarveśvaro hariḥ ।।
sarvasyādhārabhūto asau dvijā āste akhilātmakaḥ ।
yāni kiṃpuruṣādyāni varṣāṇy aṣṭau dvijottamāḥ ।।
na teṣu śoko nāyāso nodvegaḥ kṣudbhayādikam ।
susthāḥ prajā nirātaṅkāḥ sarvaduḥkhavivarjitāḥ ।।
daśadvādaśavarṣāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi sthirāyuṣaḥ ।
naiteṣu bhaumāny anyāni kṣutpipāsādi no dvijāḥ ।।
kṛtatretādikā naiva teṣu sthāneṣu kalpanā ।
sarveṣv eteṣu varṣeṣu sapta sapta kulācalāḥ ।
nadyaś ca śataśas tebhyaḥ prasūtā yā dvijottamāḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
uttareṇa samudrasya himādreś caiva dakṣiṇe ।
varṣaṃ tad bhārataṃ nāma bhāratī yatra saṃtatiḥ ।।
navayojanasāhasro vistāraś ca dvijottamāḥ ।
karmabhūmir iyaṃ svargam apavargaṃ ca pṛcchatām ।।
mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣaparvataḥ ।
vindhyaś ca pāriyātraś ca saptātra kulaparvatāḥ ।।
ataḥ saṃprāpyate svargo muktim asmāt prayāti vai ।
tiryaktvaṃ narakaṃ cāpi yānty ataḥ puruṣā dvijāḥ ।।
itaḥ svargaś ca mokṣaś ca madhyaṃ cānte ca gacchati ।
na khalv anyatra martyānāṃ karma bhūmau vidhīyate ।।
bhāratasyāsya varṣasya nava bhedān niśāmaya ।
indradvīpaḥ kasetumāṃs tāmraparṇo gabhastimān ।।
nāgadvīpas tathā saumyo gandharvas tv atha vāruṇaḥ ।
ayaṃ tu navamas teṣāṃ dvīpaḥ sāgarasaṃvṛtaḥ ।।
yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ ca dvīpo ayaṃ dakṣiṇottarāt ।
pūrve kirātās tiṣṭhanti paścime yavanāḥ sthitāḥ ।।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā madhye śūdrāś ca bhāgaśaḥ ।
ijyāyuddhavaṇijyādya- vṛttimanto vyavasthitāḥ ।।
śatadrucandrabhāgādyā himavatpādaniḥsṛtāḥ ।
vedasmṛtimukhāś cānyāḥ pāriyātrodbhavā mune ।।
narmadāsuramādyāś ca nadyo vindhyaviniḥsṛtāḥ ।
tāpīpayoṣṇīnirvindhyā- kāverīpramukhā nadīḥ ।।
ṛkṣapādodbhavā hy etāḥ śrutāḥ pāpaṃ haranti yāḥ ।
godāvarībhīmarathī- kṛṣṇaveṇyādikās tathā ।।
sahyapādodbhavā nadyaḥ smṛtāḥ pāpabhayāpahāḥ ।
kṛtamālātāmraparṇī- pramukhā malayodbhavāḥ ।।
trisāṃdhyarṣikulyādyā- mahendraprabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ ।
ṛṣikulyākumārādyāḥ śuktimatpādasaṃbhavāḥ ।।
āsāṃ nadyupanadyaś ca santy anyās tu sahasraśaḥ ।
tāsv ime kurupañcāla- madhyadeśādayo janāḥ ।।
pūrvadeśādikāś caiva kāmarūpanivāsinaḥ ।
pauṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgā magadhā dākṣiṇātyāś ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
tathā parāntyāḥ saurāṣṭrāḥ śūdrābhīrās tathārbudāḥ ।
mārukā mālavāś caiva pāriyātranivāsinaḥ ।।
sauvīrāḥ saindhavāpannāḥ śālvāḥ śākalavāsinaḥ ।
madrārāmās tathāmbaṣṭhāḥ pārasīkādayas tathā ।।
āsāṃ pibanti salilaṃ vasanti saritāṃ sadā ।
samopetā mahābhāga hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulāḥ ।।
vasanti bhārate varṣe yugāny atra mahāmune ।
kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś cānyatra na kvacit ।।
tapas tapyanti yatayo juhvate cātra yajvinaḥ ।
dānāni cātra dīyante paralokārtham ādarāt ।।
puruṣair yajñapuruṣo jambūdvīpe sadejyate ।
yajñair yajñamayo viṣṇur anyadvīpeṣu cānyathā ।।
atrāpi bhārataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jambūdvīpe mahāmune ।
yato hi karmabhūr eṣā yato anyā bhogabhūmayaḥ ।।
atra janmasahasrāṇāṃ sahasrair api sattama ।
kadācil labhate jantur mānuṣyaṃ puṇyasaṃcayan ।।
gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni 
dhanyās tu ye bhāratabhūmibhāge 
svargāpavargāspadahetubhūte 
bhavanti bhūyaḥ puruṣā manuṣyāḥ 
karmāṇy asaṃkalpitatatphalāni 
saṃnyasya viṣṇau paramātmarūpe 
avāpya tāṃ karmamahīm anante 
tasmiṃl layaṃ ye tv amalāḥ prayānti 
jānīma no tatkūvayaṃ vilīne 
svargaprade karmaṇi dehabandham 
prāpsyanti dhanyāḥ khalu te manuṣyā 
ye bhāratenendriyaviprahīnāḥ 
navavarṣaṃ ca bho viprā jambūdvīpam idaṃ mayā ।
lakṣayojanavistāraṃ saṃkṣepāt kathitaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
jambūdvīpaṃ samāvṛtya lakṣayojanavistaraḥ ।
bho dvijā valayākāraḥ sthitaḥ kṣīrodadhir bahiḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
kṣārodena yathā dvīpo jambūsaṃjño abhiveṣṭitaḥ ।
saṃveṣṭya kṣāram udadhiṃ plakṣadvīpas tathā sthitaḥ ।।
jambūdvīpasya vistāraḥ śatasāhasrasaṃmitaḥ ।
sa eva dviguṇo viprāḥ plakṣadvīpe apy udāhṛtaḥ ।।
sapta medhātitheḥ putrāḥ plakṣadvīpeśvarasya vai ।
śreṣṭhaḥ śāntabhayo nāma śiśiras tadanantaram ।।
sukhodayas tathānandaḥ śivaḥ kṣemaka eva ca ।
dhruvaś ca saptamas teṣāṃ plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te ।।
pūrvaṃ śāntabhayaṃ varṣaṃ śiśiraṃ sukhadaṃ tathā ।
ānandaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva kṣemakaṃ dhruvam eva ca ।।
maryādākārakās teṣāṃ tathānye varṣaparvatāḥ ।
saptaiva teṣāṃ nāmāni śṛṇudhvaṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
gomedaś caiva candraś ca nārado dandubhis tathā ।
somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo vaibhrājaś caiva saptamaḥ ।।
varṣācaleṣu ramyeṣu varṣeṣv eteṣu cānaghāḥ ।
vasanti devagandharva- sahitāḥ sahitaṃ prajāḥ ।।
teṣu puṇyā janapadā vīrā na mriyate janaḥ ।
nādhayo vyādhayo vāpi sarvakālasukhaṃ hi tat ।।
teṣāṃ nadyaś ca saptaiva varṣāṇāṃ tu samudragāḥ ।
nāmatas tāḥ pravakṣyāmi śrutāḥ pāpaṃ haranti yāḥ ।।
anutaptā śikhā caiva viprāśā tridivā kramuḥ ।
amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitās tatra nimnagāḥ ।।
ete śailās tathā nadyaḥ pradhānāḥ kathitā dvijāḥ ।
kṣudranadyas tathā śailās tatra santi sahasraśaḥ ।।
tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadīr janapadās tu te ।
avasarpiṇī nadī teṣāṃ na caivotsarpiṇī dvijāḥ ।।
na teṣv asti yugāvasthā teṣu sthāneṣu saptasu ।
tretāyugasamaḥ kālaḥ sarvadaiva dvijottamāḥ ।।
plakṣadvīpādike viprāḥ śākadvīpāntikeṣu vai ।
pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi janā jīvanty anāmayāḥ ।।
dharmaś caturvidhas teṣu varṇāśramavibhāgajaḥ ।
varṇāś ca tatra catvāras tān budhāḥ pravadāmi vaḥ ।।
āryakāḥ kuravaś caiva viviśvā bhāvinaś ca ye ।
viprakṣatriyavaiśyās te śūdrāś ca munisattamāḥ ।।
jambūvṛkṣapramāṇas tu tanmadhye sumahātaruḥ ।
plakṣas tannāmasaṃjño ayaṃ plakṣadvīpo dvijottamāḥ ।।
ijyate tatra bhagavāṃs tair varṇair āryakādibhiḥ ।
somarūpī jagatsraṣṭā sarvaḥ sarveśvaro hariḥ ।।
plakṣadvīpapramāṇena plakṣadvīpaḥ samāvṛtaḥ ।
tathaivekṣurasodena pariveṣānukāriṇā ।।
ity etad vo muniśreṣṭhāḥ plakṣadvīpa udāhṛtaḥ ।
saṃkṣepeṇa mayā bhūyaḥ śālmalaṃ taṃ nibodhata ।।
śālmalasyeśvaro vīro vapuṣmāṃs tatsutā dvijāḥ ।
teṣāṃ tu nāma saṃjñāni saptavarṣāṇi tāni vai ।।
śveto atha haritaś caiva jīmūto rohitas tathā ।
vaidyuto mānasaś caiva suprabhaś ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
śālmanaś ca samudro asau dvīpenekṣurasodakaḥ ।
vistārād dviguṇenātha sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ sthitaḥ ।।
tatrāpi parvatāḥ sapta vijñeyā ratnayonayaḥ ।
varṣābhivyañjakās te tu tathā saptaiva nimnagāḥ ।।
kumudaś connataś caiva tṛtīyas tu balāhakaḥ ।
droṇo yatra mahauṣadhyaḥ sa caturtho mahīdharaḥ ।।
kaṅkas tu pañcamaḥ ṣaṣṭho mahiṣaḥ saptamas tathā ।
kakudmān parvatavaraḥ sarinnāmāny ato dvijāḥ ।।
śroṇī toyā vitṛṣṇā ca candrā śukrā vimocanī ।
nivṛttiḥ saptamī tāsāṃ smṛtās tāḥ pāpaśāntidāḥ ।।
śvetaṃ ca lohitaṃ caiva jīmūtaṃ haritaṃ tathā ।
vaidyutaṃ mānasaṃ caiva suprabhaṃ nāma saptamam ।।
saptaitāni tu varṣāṇi cāturvarṇyayutāni ca ।
varṇāś ca śālmale ye ca vasanty eṣu dvijottamāḥ ।।
kapilāś cāruṇāḥ pītāḥ kṛṣṇāś caiva pṛthak pṛthak ।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva yajanti tam ।।
bhagavantaṃ samastasya viṣṇum ātmānam avyayam ।
vāyubhūtaṃ makhaśreṣṭhair yajvāno yajñasaṃsthitam ।।
devānām atra sāṃnidhyam atīva sumanohare ।
śālmaliś ca mahāvṛkṣo nāmanirvṛttikārakaḥ ।।
eṣa dvīpaḥ samudreṇa surodena samāvṛtaḥ ।
vistārāc chālmaleś caiva samena tu samantataḥ ।।
surodakaḥ parivṛtaḥ kuśadvīpena sarvataḥ ।
śālmalasya tu vistārād dviguṇena samantataḥ ।।
jyotiṣmataḥ kuśadvīpe śṛṇudhvaṃ tasya putrakān ।
udbhido veṇumāṃś caiva svairatho randhano dhṛtiḥ ।।
prabhākaro atha kapilas tannāmnā varṣapaddhatiḥ ।
tasyāṃ vasanti manujaiḥ saha daiteyadānavāḥ ।।
tathaiva devagandharvā yakṣakiṃpuruṣādayaḥ ।
varṇās tatrāpi catvāro nijānuṣṭhānatatparāḥ ।।
daminaḥ śuṣmiṇaḥ snehā māndahāś ca dvijottamāḥ ।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś cānukramoditāḥ ।।
yathoktakarmakartṛtvāt svādhikārakṣayāya te ।
tatra te tu kuśadvīpe brahmarūpaṃ janārdanam ।।
yajantaḥ kṣapayanty ugram adhikāraphalapradam ।
vidrumo hemaśailaś ca dyutimān puṣṭimāṃs tathā ।।
kuśeśayo hariś caiva saptamo mandarācalaḥ ।
varṣācalās tu saptaite dvīpe tatra dvijottamāḥ ।।
nadyaś ca sapta tāsāṃ tu vakṣye nāmāny anukramāt ।
dhūtapāpā śivā caiva pavitrā saṃmatis tathā ।।
vidyud ambho mahī cānyā sarvapāpaharās tv imāḥ ।
anyāḥ sahasraśas tatra kṣudranadyas tathācalāḥ ।।
kuśadvīpe kuśastambaḥ saṃjñayā tasya tat smṛtam ।
tatpramāṇena sa dvīpo ghṛtodena samāvṛtaḥ ।।
ghṛtodaś ca samudro vai krauñcadvīpena saṃvṛtaḥ ।
krauñcadvīpo muniśreṣṭhāḥ śrūyatāṃ cāparo mahān ।।
kuśadvīpasya vistārād dviguṇo yasya vistaraḥ ।
krauñcadvīpe dyutimataḥ putrāḥ sapta mahātmanaḥ ।।
tannāmāni ca varṣāṇi teṣāṃ cakre mahāmanāḥ ।
kuśago mandagaś coṣṇaḥ pīvaro athāndhakārakaḥ ।।
muniś ca dundubhiś caiva saptaite tatsutā dvijāḥ ।
tatrāpi devagandharva- sevitāḥ sumanoramāḥ ।।
varṣācalā muniśreṣṭhās teṣāṃ nāmāni bho dvijāḥ ।
krauñcaś ca vāmanaś caiva tṛtīyaś cāndhakārakaḥ ।।
devavrato dhamaś caiva tathānyaḥ puṇḍarīkavān ।
dundubhiś ca mahāśailo dviguṇās te parasparam ।।
dvīpād dvīpeṣu ye śailās tathā dvīpāni te tathā ।
varṣeṣv eteṣu ramyeṣu varṣaśailavareṣu ca ।।
nivasanti nirātaṅkāḥ saha devagaṇaiḥ prajāḥ ।
puṣkalā puṣkarā dhanyās te khyātāś ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś cānukramoditāḥ ।
tatra nadyo muniśreṣṭhā yāḥ pibanti tu te sadā ।।
sapta pradhānāḥ śataśas tathānyāḥ kṣudranimnagāḥ ।
gaurī kumudvatī caiva saṃdhyā rātrir manojavā ।।
khyātiś ca puṇḍarīkā ca saptaitā varṣanimnagāḥ ।
tatrāpi varṇair bhagavān puṣkarādyair janārdanaḥ ।।
dhyānayogai rudrarūpa ījyate yajñasaṃnidhau ।
krauñcadvīpaḥ samudreṇa dadhimaṇḍodakena tu ।।
āvṛtaḥ sarvataḥ krauñca- dvīpatulyena mānataḥ ।
dadhimaṇḍodakaś cāpi śākadvīpena saṃvṛtaḥ ।।
krauñcadvīpasya vistāra- dviguṇena dvijottamāḥ ।
śākadvīpeśvarasyāpi bhavyasya sumahātmanaḥ ।।
saptaiva tanayās teṣāṃ dadau varṣāṇi sapta saḥ ।
jaladaś ca kumāraś ca sukumāro manīrakaḥ ।।
kusamodaś ca modākiḥ saptamaś ca mahādrumaḥ ।
tatsaṃjñāny eva tatrāpi sapta varṣāṇy anukramāt ।।
tatrāpi parvatāḥ sapta varṣavicchedakārakāḥ ।
pūrvas tatrodayagirir jaladhāras tathāparaḥ ।।
tathā raivatakaḥ śyāmas tathaivāmbhogirir dvijāḥ ।
āstikeyas tathā ramyaḥ kesarī parvatottamaḥ ।।
śākaś cātra mahāvṛkṣaḥ siddhagandharvasevitaḥ ।
yatpattravātasaṃsparśād āhlādo jāyate paraḥ ।।
tatra puṇyā janapadāś cāturvarṇyasamanvitāḥ ।
nivasanti mahātmāno nirātaṅkā nirāmayāḥ ।।
nadyaś cātra mahāpuṇyāḥ sarvapāpabhayāpahāḥ ।
sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī reṇukā ca yā ।।
ikṣuś ca dhenukā caiva gabhastī saptamī tathā ।
anyās tv ayutaśas tatra kṣudranadyo dvijottamāḥ ।।
mahīdharās tathā santi śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।
tāḥ pibanti mudā yuktā jaladādiṣu ye sthitāḥ ।।
varṣeṣu ye janapadāś caturthārthasamanvitāḥ ।
nadyaś cātra mahāpuṇyāḥ svargād abhyetya medinīm ।।
dharmahānir na teṣv asti na saṃharṣo na śuk tathā ।
maryādāvyutkramaś cāpi teṣu deśeṣu saptasu ।।
magāś ca māgadhāś caiva mānasā mandagās tathā ।
magā brāhmaṇabhūyiṣṭhā māgadhāḥ kṣatriyās tu te ।।
vaiśyās tu mānasās teṣāṃ śūdrā jñeyās tu mandagāḥ ।
śākadvīpe sthitair viṣṇuḥ sūryarūpadharo hariḥ ।।
yathoktair ijyate samyak karmabhir niyatātmabhiḥ ।
śākadvīpas tato viprāḥ kṣīrodena samantataḥ ।।
śākadvīpapramāṇena valayeneva veṣṭitaḥ ।
kṣīrābdhiḥ sarvato viprāḥ puṣkarākhyena veṣṭitaḥ ।।
dvīpena śākadvīpāt tu dviguṇena samantataḥ ।
puṣkare savanasyāpi mahāvīto abhavat sutaḥ ।।
dhātakiś ca tayos tadvad dve varṣe nāmasaṃjñite ।
mahāvītaṃ tathaivānyad dhātakīkhaṇḍasaṃjñitam ।।
ekaś cātra mahābhāgāḥ prakhyāto varṣaparvataḥ ।
mānasottarasaṃjño vai madhyato valayākṛtiḥ ।।
yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ūrdhvaṃ pañcāśad ucchritaḥ ।
tāvad eva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ ।।
puṣkaradvīpavalayaṃ madhyena vibhajann iva ।
sthito asau tena vicchinnaṃ jātaṃ varṣadvayaṃ hi tat ।।
valayākāram ekaikaṃ tayor madhye mahāgiriḥ ।
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi tatra jīvanti mānavāḥ ।।
nirāmayā viśokāś ca rāgadveṣavivarjitāḥ ।
adhamottamau na teṣv āstāṃ- na vadhyavadhakau dvijāḥ ।।
nerṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ roṣo doṣo lobhādikaṃ na ca ।
mahāvītaṃ bahir varṣaṃ dhātakīkhaṇḍam antataḥ ।।
mānasottaraśailasya devadaityādisevitam ।
satyānṛte na tatrāstāṃ dvīpe puṣkarasaṃjñite ।।
na tatra nadyaḥ śailā vā dvīpe varṣadvayānvite ।
tulyaveṣās tu manujā devais tatraikarūpiṇaḥ ।।
varṇāśramācārahīnaṃ dharmāharaṇavarjitam ।
trayīvārttādaṇḍanīti- śuśrūṣārahitaṃ ca tat ।।
varṣadvayaṃ tato viprā bhaumasvargo ayam uttamaḥ ।
sarvasya sukhadaḥ kālo jarārogavivarjitaḥ ।।
puṣkare dhātakīkhaṇḍe mahāvīte ca vai dvijāḥ ।
nyagrodhaḥ puṣkaradvīpe brahmaṇaḥ sthānam uttamam ।।
tasmin nivasati brahmā pūjyamānaḥ surāsuraiḥ ।
svādūdakenodadhinā puṣkaraḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ ।।
samena puṣkarasyaiva vistārān maṇḍalāt tathā ।
evaṃ dvīpāḥ samudrais tu sapta saptabhir āvṛtāḥ ।।
dvīpaś caiva samudraś ca samānau dviguṇau parau ।
payāṃsi sarvadā sarva- samudreṣu samāni vai ।।
nyūnātiriktatā teṣāṃ kadācin naiva jāyate ।
sthālīstham agnisaṃyogād udreki salilaṃ yathā ।।
tathenduvṛddhau salilam ambhodhau munisattamāḥ ।
anyūnānatiriktāś ca vardhanty āpo hrasanti ca ।।
udayāstamane tv indoḥ pakṣayoḥ śuklakṛṣṇayoḥ ।
daśottarāṇi pañcaiva aṅgulānāṃ śatāni ca ।।
apāṃ vṛddhikṣayau dṛṣṭau sāmudrīṇāṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
bhojanaṃ puṣkaradvīpe tatra svayam upasthitam ।।
bhuñjanti ṣaḍrasaṃ viprāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ sadaiva hi ।
svādūdakasya parito dṛśyate lokasaṃsthitiḥ ।।
dviguṇā kāñcanī bhūmiḥ sarvajantuvivarjitā ।
lokālokas tataḥ śailo yojanāyutavistṛtaḥ ।।
ucchrayeṇāpi tāvanti sahasrāṇy āvalohi saḥ ।
tatas tamaḥ samāvṛtya taṃ śailaṃ sarvataḥ sthitam ।।
tamaś cāṇḍakaṭāhena samantāt pariveṣṭitam ।
pañcāśatkoṭivistārā seyam urvī dvijottamāḥ ।।
sahaivāṇḍakaṭāhena sadvīpā samahīdharā ।
seyaṃ dhātrī vidhātrī ca sarvabhūtaguṇādhikā ।
ādhārabhūtā jagatāṃ sarveṣāṃ sā dvijottamāḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
vistāra eṣa kathitaḥ pṛthivyā munisattamāḥ ।
saptatis tu sahasrāṇi taducchrāyo api kathyate ।।
daśasāhasram ekaikaṃ pātālaṃ munisattamāḥ ।
atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva nitalaṃ sutalaṃ tathā ।।
talātalaṃ rasātalaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi saptamam ।
kṛṣṇā śuklāruṇā pītā śarkarā śailakāñcanī ।।
bhūmayo yatra viprendrā varaprāsādaśobhitāḥ ।
teṣu dānavadaiteya- jātayaḥ śataśaḥ sthitāḥ ।।
nāgānāṃ ca mahāṅgānāṃ jñātayaś ca dvijottamāḥ ।
svarlokād api ramyāṇi pātālānīti nāradaḥ ।।
prāha svargasadomadhye pātālebhyo gato divam ।
āhlādakāriṇaḥ śubhrā maṇayo yatra suprabhāḥ ।।
nāgābharaṇabhūṣāś ca pātālaṃ kena tatsamam ।
daityadānavakanyābhir itaś cetaś ca śobhite ।।
pātāle kasya na prītir vimuktasyāpi jāyate ।
divārkaraśmayo yatra prabhās tanvanti nātapam ।।
śaśinaś ca na śītāya niśi dyotāya kevalam ।
bhakṣyabhojyamahāpāna- madamattaiś ca bhogibhiḥ ।।
yatra na jñāyate kālo gato api danujādibhiḥ ।
vanāni nadyo ramyāṇi sarāṃsi kamalākarāḥ ।।
puṃskokilādilāpāś ca manojñāny ambarāṇi ca ।
bhūṣaṇāny atiramyāṇi gandhādyaṃ cānulepanam ।।
vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgānāṃ niḥsvanāś ca sadā dvijāḥ ।
etāny anyāni ramyāṇi bhāgyabhogyāni dānavaiḥ ।।
daityoragaiś ca bhujyante pātālāntaragocaraiḥ ।
pātālānām adhaś cāste viṣṇor yā tāmasī tanuḥ ।।
śeṣākhyā yadguṇān vaktuṃ na śaktā daityadānavāḥ ।
yo anantaḥ paṭhyate siddhair devadevarṣipūjitaḥ ।।
sahasraśirasā vyaktaḥ svastikāmalabhūṣaṇaḥ ।
phaṇāmaṇisahasreṇa yaḥ sa vidyotayan diśaḥ ।।
sarvān karoti nirvīryān hitāya jagato asurān ।
madāghūrṇitanetro asau yaḥ sadaivaikakuṇḍalaḥ ।।
kirīṭī sragdharo bhāti sāgniśveta ivācalaḥ ।
nīlavāsā madotsiktaḥ śvetahāropaśobhitaḥ ।।
sābhragaṅgāprapāto asau kailāsādrir ivottamaḥ ।
lāṅgalāsaktahastāgro bibhran muśalam uttamam ।।
upāsyate svayaṃ kāntyā yo vāruṇyā ca mūrtayā ।
kalpānte yasya vaktrebhyo viṣānalaśikhojjvalaḥ ।।
saṃkarṣaṇātmako rudro niṣkramyātti jagattrayam ।
sa bibhracchikharībhūtam aśeṣaṃ kṣitimaṇḍalam ।।
āste pātālamūlasthaḥ śeṣo aśeṣasurārcitaḥ ।
tasya vīryaṃ prabhāvaś ca svarūpaṃ rūpam eva ca ।।
nahi varṇayituṃ śakyaṃ jñātuṃ vā tridaśair api ।
yasyaiṣā sakalā pṛthvī phaṇāmaṇiśikhāruṇā ।।
āste kusumamāleva kas tadvīryaṃ vadiṣyati ।
yadā vijṛmbhate ananto madāghūrṇitalocanaḥ ।।
tadā calati bhūr eṣā sādritoyādhikānanā ।
gandharvāpsarasaḥ siddhāḥ kiṃnaroragavāraṇāḥ ।।
nāntaṃ guṇānāṃ gacchanti tato ananto ayam avyayaḥ ।
yasya nāgavadhūhastair lāpitaṃ haricandanam ।।
muhuḥ śvāsānilāyastaṃ yāti dikpaṭavāsatām ।
yam ārādhya purāṇarṣir gargo jyotīṃṣi tattvataḥ ।।
jñātavān sakalaṃ caiva nimittapaṭhitaṃ phalam ।
teneyaṃ nāgavaryeṇa śirasā vidhṛtā mahī ।
bibharti sakalāṃl lokān sadevāsuramānuṣān ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
tataś cānantaraṃ viprā narakā rauravādayaḥ ।
pāpino yeṣu pātyante tāñ śṛṇudhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
rauravaḥ śaukaro rodhas tāno viśasanas tathā ।
mahājvālas taptakuḍyo mahālobho vimohanaḥ ।।
rudhirāndho vasātaptaḥ kṛmīśaḥ kṛmibhojanaḥ ।
asipattravanaṃ kṛṣṇo lālābhakṣaś ca dāruṇaḥ ।।
tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpo vahnijvālo hy adhaḥśirāḥ ।
sadaṃśaḥ kṛṣṇasūtraś ca tamaś cāvīcir eva ca ।।
śvabhojano athāpratiṣṭhoma- āvīciś ca tathāparaḥ ।
ity evamādayaś cānye narakā bhṛśadāruṇāḥ ।।
yamasya viṣaye ghorāḥ śastrāgniviṣadarśinaḥ ।
patanti yeṣu puruṣāḥ pāpakarmaratāś ca ye ।।
kūṭasākṣī tathā samyak pakṣapātena yo vadet ।
yaś cānyad anṛtaṃ vakti sa naro yāti rauravam ।।
bhrūṇahā purahantā ca goghnaś ca munisattamāḥ ।
yānti te rauravaṃ ghoraṃ yaś cocchvāsanirodhakaḥ ।।
surāpo brahmahā hartā suvarṇasya ca śūkare ।
prayāti narake yaś ca taiḥ saṃsargam upaiti vai ।।
rājanyavaiśyahā caiva tathaiva gurutalpagaḥ ।
taptakumbhe svasṛgāmī hanti rājabhaṭaṃ ca yaḥ ।।
mādhvīvikrayakṛn vadhya- pālaḥ kesaravikrayī ।
taptalohe patanty ete yaś ca bhaktaṃ parityajet ।।
sutāṃ snuṣāṃ cāpi gatvā mahājvāle nipātyate ।
avamantā gurūṇāṃ yo yaś cākroṣṭā narādhamaḥ ।।
vedadūṣayitā yaś ca vedavikrayakaś ca yaḥ ।
agamyagāmī yaś ca syāt te yānti śabalaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
cauro vimohe patati maryādādūṣakas tathā ।
devadvijapitṛdveṣṭā ratnadūṣayitā ca yaḥ ।।
sa yāti kṛmibhakṣye vai kṛmīśe tu duriṣṭikṛt ।
pitṛdevātithīn yas tu paryaśnāti narādhamaḥ ।।
lālābhakṣye sa yāty ugre śarakartā ca vedhake ।
karoti karṇino yaś ca yaś ca khaḍgādikṛn naraḥ ।।
prayānty ete viśasane narake bhṛśadāruṇe ।
asatpratigrahītā ca narake yāty adhomukhe ।।
ayājyayājakas tatra tathā nakṣatrasūcakaḥ ।
kṛmipūye naraś caiko yāti miṣṭānnabhuk sadā ।।
lākṣāmāṃsarasānāṃ ca tilānāṃ lavaṇasya ca ।
vikretā brāhmaṇo yāti tam eva narakaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
mārjārakukkuṭacchāga- śvavarāhavihaṃgamān ।
poṣayan narakaṃ yāti tam eva dvijasattamāḥ ।।
raṅgopajīvī kaivartaḥ kuṇḍāśī garadas tathā ।
sūcī māhiṣikaś caiva parvagāmī ca yo dvijaḥ ।।
agāradāhī mitraghnaḥ śakunigrāmayājakaḥ ।
rudhirāndhe patanty ete somaṃ vikrīṇate ca ye ।।
madhuhā grāmahantā ca yāti vaitaraṇīṃ naraḥ ।
retaḥpānādikartāro maryādābhedinaś ca ye ।।
te kṛcchre yānty aśaucāś ca kuhakājīvinaś ca ye ।
asipattravanaṃ yāti vanacchedī vṛthaiva yaḥ ।।
aurabhrikā mṛgavyādhā vahnijvāle patanti vai ।
yānti tatraiva te viprā yaś cāpākeṣu vahnidaḥ ।।
vratopalopako yaś ca svāśramād vicyutaś ca yaḥ ।
saṃdaṃśayātanāmadhye patatas tāv ubhāv api ।।
divā svapneṣu syandante ye narā brahmacāriṇaḥ ।
putrair adhyāpitā ye tu te patanti śvabhojane ।।
ete cānye ca narakāḥ śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।
yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ pacyante yātanāgatāḥ ।।
tathaiva pāpāny etāni tathānyāni sahasraśaḥ ।
bhujyante jātipuruṣair narakāntaragocaraiḥ ।।
varṇāśramaviruddhaṃ ca karma kurvanti ye narāḥ ।
karmaṇā manasā vācā nirayeṣu patanti te ।।
adhaḥśirobhir dṛśyante nārakair divi devatāḥ ।
devāś cādhomukhān sarvān adhaḥ paśyanti nārakān ।।
sthāvarāḥ kṛmayo ajvāś ca pakṣiṇaḥ paśavo narāḥ ।
dhārmikās tridaśās tadvan mokṣiṇaś ca yathākramam ।।
sahasrabhāgaḥ prathamād dvitīyo anukramāt tathā ।
sarve hy ete mahābhāgā yāvan muktisamāśrayāḥ ।।
yāvanto jantavaḥ svarge tāvanto narakaukasaḥ ।
pāpakṛd yāti narakaṃ prāyaścittaparāṅmukhaḥ ।।
pāpānām anurūpāṇi prāyaścittāni yad yathā ।
tathā tathaiva saṃsmṛtya proktāni paramarṣibhiḥ ।।
pāpe gurūṇi guruṇi svalpāny alpe ca tadvidaḥ ।
prāyaścittāni viprendrā jaguḥ svāyaṃbhuvādayaḥ ।।
prāyaścittāny aśeṣāṇi tapaḥkarmātmakāni vai ।
yāni teṣām aśeṣāṇāṃ kṛṣṇānusmaraṇaṃ param ।।
kṛte pāpe anutāpo vai yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate ।
prāyaścittaṃ tu tasyaikaṃ harisaṃsmaraṇaṃ param ।।
prātar niśi tathā saṃdhyā- madhyāhnādiṣu saṃsmaran ।
nārāyaṇam avāpnoti sadyaḥ pāpakṣayān naraḥ ।।
viṣṇusaṃsmaraṇāt kṣīṇa- samastakleśasaṃcayaḥ ।
muktiṃ prayāti bho viprā viṣṇos tasyānukīrtanāt ।।
vāsudeve mano yasya japahomārcanādiṣu ।
tasyāntarāyo viprendrā devendratvādikaṃ phalam ।।
kva nākapṛṣṭhagamanaṃ punarāvṛttilakṣaṇam ।
kva japo vāsudeveti muktibījam anuttamam ।।
tasmād aharniśaṃ viṣṇuṃ saṃsmaran puruṣo dvijaḥ ।
na yāti narakaṃ śuddhaḥ saṃkṣīṇākhilapātakaḥ ।।
manaḥprītikaraḥ svargo narakas tadviparyayaḥ ।
narakasvargasaṃjñe vai pāpapuṇye dvijottamāḥ ।।
vastv ekam eva duḥkhāya sukhāyerṣyodayāya ca ।
kopāya ca yatas tasmād vastu duḥkhātmakaṃ kutaḥ ।।
tad eva prītaye bhūtvā punar duḥkhāya jāyate ।
tad eva kopālayataḥ prasādāya ca jāyate ।।
tasmād duḥkhātmakaṃ nāsti na ca kiṃcit sukhātmakam ।
manasaḥ pariṇāmo ayaṃ sukhaduḥkhādilakṣaṇaḥ ।।
jñānam eva paraṃ brahmā- jñānaṃ bandhāya ceṣyate ।
jñānātmakam idaṃ viśvaṃ na jñānād vidyate param ।।
vidyāvidye hi bho viprā jñānam evāvadhāryatām ।
evam etad mayākhyātaṃ bhavatāṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ ।।
pātālāni ca sarvāṇi tathaiva narakā dvijāḥ ।
samudrāḥ parvatāś caiva dvīpā varṣāṇi nimnagāḥ ।
saṃkṣepāt sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchatha ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathitaṃ bhavatā sarvam asmākaṃ sakalaṃ tathā ।
bhuvarlokādikāṃl lokāñ śrotum icchāmahe vayam ।।
tathaiva grahasaṃsthānaṃ pramāṇāni yathā tathā ।
samācakṣva mahābhāga yathāval lomaharṣaṇa ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
ravicandramasor yāvan mayūkhair avabhāsyate ।
sasamudrasaricchailā tāvatī pṛthivī smṛtā ।।
yāvatpramāṇā pṛthivī vistāraparimaṇḍalā ।
nabhas tāvatpramāṇaṃ hi vistāraparimaṇḍalam ।।
bhūmer yojanalakṣe tu sauraṃ viprās tu maṇḍalam ।
lakṣe divākarāc cāpi maṇḍalaṃ śaśinaḥ sthitam ।।
pūrṇe śatasahasre tu yojanānāṃ niśākarāt ।
nakṣatramaṇḍalaṃ kṛtsnam upariṣṭāt prakāśate ।।
dvilakṣe cottare viprā budho nakṣatramaṇḍalāt ।
tāvatpramāṇabhāge tu budhasyāpy uśanā sthitaḥ ।।
aṅgārako api śukrasya tatpramāṇe vyavasthitaḥ ।
lakṣadvayena bhaumasya sthito devapurohitaḥ ।।
saurir bṛhaspater ūrdhvaṃ dvilakṣe samavasthitaḥ ।
saptarṣimaṇḍalaṃ tasmāl lakṣam ekaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
ṛṣibhyas tu sahasrāṇāṃ śatād ūrdhvaṃ vyavasthitaḥ ।
meḍhībhūtaḥ samastasya jyotiś cakrasya vai dhruvaḥ ।।
trailokyam etat kathitaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa dvijottamāḥ ।
ijyāphalasya bhūr eṣā ijyā cātra pratiṣṭhitā ।।
dhruvād ūrdhvaṃ maharloko yatra te kalpavāsinaḥ ।
ekayojanakoṭī tu maharloko vidhīyate ।।
dve koṭyau tu jano loko yatra te brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ ।
sanandanādyāḥ kathitā viprāś cāmalacetasaḥ ।।
caturguṇottaraṃ cordhvaṃ janalokāt tapaḥ smṛtam ।
vairājā yatra te devāḥ sthitā dehavivarjitāḥ ।।
ṣaḍguṇena tapolokāt satyaloko virājate ।
apunarmārakaṃ yatra siddhādimunisevitam ।।
pādagamyaṃ tu yat kiṃcid vastv asti pṛthivīmayam ।
sa bhūrlokaḥ samākhyāto vistāro asya mayoditaḥ ।।
bhūmisūryāntaraṃ yat tu siddhādimunisevitam ।
bhuvarlokas tu so apy ukto dvitīyo munisattamāḥ ।।
dhruvasūryāntaraṃ yat tu niyutāni caturdaśa ।
svarlokaḥ so api kathito lokasaṃsthānacintakaiḥ ।।
trailokyam etat kṛtakaṃ vipraiś ca paripaṭhyate ।
janas tapas tathā satyam iti cākṛtakaṃ trayam ।।
kṛtakākṛtako madhye maharloka iti smṛtaḥ ।
śūnyo bhavati kalpānte yo antaṃ na ca vinaśyati ।।
ete sapta mahālokā mayā vaḥ kathitā dvijāḥ ।
pātālāni ca saptaiva brahmāṇḍasyaiṣa vistaraḥ ।।
etad aṇḍakaṭāhena tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā ।
kapitthasya yathā bījaṃ sarvato vai samāvṛtam ।।
daśottareṇa payasā dvijāś cāṇḍaṃ ca tad vṛtam ।
sa cāmbuparivāro asau vahninā veṣṭito bahiḥ ।।
vahnis tu vāyunā vāyur viprās tu nabhasāvṛtaḥ ।
ākāśo api muniśreṣṭhā mahatā pariveṣṭitaḥ ।।
daśottarāṇy aśeṣāṇi viprāś caitāni sapta vai ।
mahāntaṃ ca samāvṛtya pradhānaṃ samavasthitam ।।
anantasya na tasyāntaḥ saṃkhyānaṃ cāpi vidyate ।
tad anantam asaṃkhyātaṃ pramāṇenāpi vai yataḥ ।।
hetubhūtam aśeṣasya prakṛtiḥ sā parā dvijāḥ ।
aṇḍānāṃ tu sahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇy ayutāni ca ।।
īdṛśānāṃ tathā tatra koṭikoṭiśatāni ca ।
dāruṇy agnir yathā tailaṃ tile tadvat pumān iha ।।
pradhāne avasthito vyāpī cetanātmanivedanaḥ ।
pradhānaṃ ca pumāṃś caiva sarvabhūtānubhūtayā ।।
viṣṇuśaktyā dvijaśreṣṭhā dhṛtau saṃśrayadharmiṇau ।
tayoḥ saiva pṛthagbhāve kāraṇaṃ saṃśrayasya ca ।।
kṣobhakāraṇabhūtā ca sargakāle dvijottamāḥ ।
yathā śaityaṃ jale vāto bibharti kaṇikāgatam ।।
jagac chaktis tathā viṣṇoḥ pradhānapuruṣātmakam ।
yathā ca pādapo mūla- skandhaśākhādisaṃyutaḥ ।।
ādyabījāt prabhavati bījāny anyāni vai tataḥ ।
prabhavanti tatas tebhyo bhavanty anye pare drumāḥ ।।
te api tallakṣaṇadravya- kāraṇānugatā dvijāḥ ।
evam avyākṛtāt pūrvaṃ jāyante mahadādayaḥ ।।
viśeṣāntās tatas tebhyaḥ saṃbhavanti surādayaḥ ।
tebhyaś ca putrās teṣāṃ tu putrāṇāṃ parame sutāḥ ।।
bījād vṛkṣapraroheṇa yathā nāpacayas taroḥ ।
bhūtānāṃ bhūtasargeṇa naivāsty apacayas tathā ।।
saṃnidhānād yathākāśa- kālādyāḥ kāraṇaṃ taroḥ ।
tathaivāpariṇāmena viśvasya bhagavān hariḥ ।।
vrīhibīje yathā mūlaṃ nālaṃ pattrāṅkurau tathā ।
kāṇḍakoṣās tathā puṣpaṃ kṣīraṃ tadvac ca taṇḍulaḥ ।।
tuṣāḥ kaṇāś ca santo vai yānty āvirbhāvam ātmanaḥ ।
prarohahetusāmagryam āsādya munisattamāḥ ।।
tathā karmasv anekeṣu devādyās tanavaḥ sthitāḥ ।
viṣṇuśaktiṃ samāsādya praroham upayānti vai ।।
sa ca viṣṇuḥ paraṃ brahma yataḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat ।
jagac ca yo yatra cedaṃ yasmin vilayam eṣyati ।।
tad brahma paramaṃ dhāma sadasat paramaṃ padam ।
yasya sarvam abhedena jagad etac carācaram ।।
sa eva mūlaprakṛtir vyaktarūpī jagac ca saḥ ।
tasminn eva layaṃ sarvaṃ yāti tatra ca tiṣṭhati ।।
kartā kriyāṇāṃ sa ca ijyate kratuḥ 
sa eva tatkarmaphalaṃ ca tasya yat 
yugādi yasmāc ca bhaved aśeṣato 
harer na kiṃcid vyatiriktam asti tat 
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
tārāmayaṃ bhagavataḥ śiśumārākṛti prabhoḥ ।
divi rūpaṃ harer yat tu tasya pucche sthito dhruvaḥ ।।
saeṣa bhraman bhrāmayati candrādityādikān grahān ।
bhramantam anu taṃ yānti nakṣatrāṇi ca cakravat ।।
sūryācandramasau tārā nakṣatrāṇi grahaiḥ saha ।
vātānīkamayair bandhair dhruve baddhāni tāni vai ।।
śiśumārākṛti proktaṃ yad rūpaṃ jyotiṣāṃ divi ।
