nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ dhāma tasyādhāraḥ svayaṃ hṛdi ।।
uttānapādatanayas tam ārādhya prajāpatim ।
sa tārāśiśumārasya dhruvaḥ pucche vyavasthitaḥ ।।
ādhāraḥ śiśumārasya sarvādhyakṣo janārdanaḥ ।
dhruvasya śiśumāraś ca dhruve bhānur vyavasthitaḥ ।।
tad ādhāraṃ jagac cedaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam ।
yena viprā vidhānena tan me śṛṇuta sāṃpratam ।।
vivasvān aṣṭabhir māsair grasaty apo rasātmikāḥ ।
varṣaty ambu tataś cānnam annādam akhilaṃ jagat ।।
vivasvān aṃśubhis tīkṣṇair ādāya jagato jalam ।
somaṃ puṣyaty athenduś ca vāyunāḍīmayair divi ।।
jalair vikṣipyate abhreṣu dhūmāgnyanilamūrtiṣu ।
na bhraśyanti yatas tebhyo jalāny abhrāṇi tāny ataḥ ।।
abhrasthāḥ prapatanty āpo vāyunā samudīritāḥ ।
saṃskāraṃ kālajanitaṃ viprāś cāsādya nirmalāḥ ।।
saritsamudrā bhaumās tu tathāpaḥ prāṇisaṃbhavāḥ ।
catuṣprakārā bhagavān ādatte savitā dvijāḥ ।।
ākāśagaṅgāsalilaṃ tathāhṛtya gabhastimān ।
anabhragatam evorvyāṃ sadyaḥ kṣipati raśmibhiḥ ।।
tasya saṃsparśanirdhūta- pāpapaṅko dvijottamāḥ ।
na yāti narakaṃ martyo divyaṃ snānaṃ hi tat smṛtam ।।
dṛṣṭasūryaṃ hi tad vāri pataty abhrair vinā divaḥ ।
ākāśagaṅgāsalilaṃ tad gobhiḥ kṣipyate raveḥ ।।
kṛttikādiṣu ṛkṣeṣu viṣameṣv ambu yad divaḥ ।
dṛṣṭvārkaṃ patitaṃ jñeyaṃ tad gāṅgaṃ diggajohnitam ।।
yugmarkṣeṣu tu yat toyaṃ pataty arkodgitaṃ divaḥ ।
tat sūryaraśmibhiḥ sadyaḥ samādāya nirasyate ।।
ubhayaṃ puṇyam atyarthaṃ nṛṇāṃ pāpaharaṃ dvijāḥ ।
ākāśagaṅgāsalilaṃ divyaṃ snānaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
yat tu meghaiḥ samutsṛṣṭaṃ vāri tat prāṇināṃ dvijāḥ ।
puṣṇāty oṣadhayaḥ sarvā jīvanāyāmṛtaṃ hi tat ।।
tena vṛddhiṃ parāṃ nītaḥ sakalaś cauṣadhīgaṇaḥ ।
sādhakaḥ phalapākāntaḥ prajānāṃ tu prajāyate ।।
tena yajñān yathāproktān mānavāḥ śāstracakṣuṣaḥ ।
kurvate aharahaś caiva devān āpyāyayanti te ।।
evaṃ yajñāś ca vedāś ca varṇāś ca dvijapūrvakāḥ ।
sarvadevanikāyāś ca paśubhūtagaṇāś ca ye ।।
vṛṣṭyā dhṛtam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
sāpi niṣpādyate vṛṣṭiḥ savitrā munisattamāḥ ।।
ādhārabhūtaḥ savitur dhruvo munivarottamāḥ ।
dhruvasya śiśumāro asau so api nārāyaṇāśrayaḥ ।।
hṛdi nārāyaṇas tasya śiśumārasya saṃsthitaḥ ।
vibhartā sarvabhūtānām ādibhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhā brahmāṇḍaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
bhūsamudrādibhir yuktaṃ kim anyac chrotum icchatha ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni puṇyāny āyatanāni ca ।
vaktum arhasi dharmajña śrotuṃ no vartate manaḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaś caiva susaṃyatam ।
vidyā tapaś ca kīrtiś ca sa tīrthaphalam aśnute ।।
mano viśuddhaṃ puruṣasya tīrthaṃ 
vācāṃ tathā cendriyanigrahaś ca 
etāni tīrthāni śarīrajāni 
svargasya mārgaṃ pratibodhayanti 
cittam antargataṃ duṣṭaṃ tīrthasnānair na śudhyati ।
śataśo api jalair dhautaṃ surābhāṇḍam ivāśuci ।।
na tīrthāni na dānāni na vratāni na cāśramāḥ ।
duṣṭāśayaṃ dambharuciṃ punanti vyutthitendriyam ।।
indriyāṇi vaśe kṛtvā yatra yatra vasen naraḥ ।
tatra tatra kurukṣetraṃ prayāgaṃ puṣkaraṃ tathā ।।
tasmāc chṛṇudhvaṃ vakṣyāmi tīrthāny āyatanāni ca ।
saṃkṣepeṇa muniśreṣṭhāḥ pṛthivyāṃ yāni kāni vai ।।
vistareṇa na śakyante vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api ।
prathamaṃ puṣkaraṃ tīrthaṃ naimiṣāraṇyam eva ca ।।
prayāgaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi dharmāraṇyaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
dhenukaṃ campakāraṇyaṃ saindhavāraṇyam eva ca ।।
puṇyaṃ ca magadhāraṇyaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam eva ca ।
gayā prabhāsaṃ śrītīrthaṃ divyaṃ kanakhalaṃ tathā ।।
bhṛgutuṅgaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ bhīmāraṇyaṃ kuśasthalīm ।
lohākulaṃ sakedāraṃ mandarāraṇyam eva ca ।।
mahābalaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ tathā ।
rūpatīrthaṃ śūkaravaṃ cakratīrthaṃ mahāphalam ।।
yogatīrthaṃ somatīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ sāhoṭakaṃ tathā ।
tīrthaṃ kokāmukhaṃ puṇyaṃ badarīśailam eva ca ।।
somatīrthaṃ tuṅgakūṭaṃ tīrthaṃ skandāśramaṃ tathā ।
koṭitīrthaṃ cāgnipadaṃ tīrthaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ tathā ।।
dharmodbhavaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ bādhapramocanam ।
gaṅgādvāraṃ pañcakūṭaṃ madhyakesaram eva ca ।।
cakraprabhaṃ mataṅgaṃ ca kruśadaṇḍaṃ ca viśrutam ।
daṃṣṭrākuṇḍaṃ viṣṇutīrthaṃ sārvakāmikam eva ca ।।
tīrthaṃ matsyatilaṃ caiva badarī suprabhaṃ tathā ।
brahmakuṇḍaṃ vahnikuṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ satyapadaṃ tathā ।।
catuḥsrotaś catuḥśṛṅgaṃ śailaṃ dvādaśadhārakam ।
mānasaṃ sthūlaśṛṅgaṃ ca sthūladaṇḍaṃ tathorvaśī ।।
lokapālaṃ manuvaraṃ somāhvaśailam eva ca ।
sadāprabhaṃ merukuṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ somābhiṣecanam ।।
mahāsrotaṃ koṭarakaṃ pañcadhāraṃ tridhārakam ।
saptadhāraikadhāraṃ ca tīrthaṃ cāmarakaṇṭakam ।।
śālagrāmaṃ cakratīrthaṃ koṭidrumam anuttamam ।
bilvaprabhaṃ devahradaṃ tīrthaṃ viṣṇuhradaṃ tathā ।।
śaṅkhaprabhaṃ devakuṇḍaṃ tīrthaṃ vajrāyudhaṃ tathā ।
agniprabhaṃ ca puṃnāgaṃ devaprabham anuttamam ।।
vidyādharaṃ sagāndharvaṃ śrītīrthaṃ brahmaṇo hradam ।
sātīrthaṃ lokapālākhyaṃ maṇipuragiriṃ tathā ।।
tīrthaṃ pañcahradaṃ caiva puṇyaṃ piṇḍārakaṃ tathā ।
malavyaṃ goprabhāvaṃ ca govaraṃ vaṭamūlakam ।।
snānadaṇḍaṃ prayāgaṃ ca guhyaṃ viṣṇupadaṃ tathā ।
kanyāśramaṃ vāyukuṇḍaṃ jambūmārgaṃ tathottamam ।।
gabhastitīrthaṃ ca tathā yayātipatanaṃ śuci ।
koṭitīrthaṃ bhadravaṭaṃ mahākālavanaṃ tathā ।।
narmadātīrtham aparaṃ tīrthavajraṃ tathārbudam ।
piṅgutīrthaṃ savāsiṣṭhaṃ tīrthaṃ ca pṛthasaṃgamam ।।
tīrthaṃ daurvāsikaṃ nāma tathā piñjarakaṃ śubham ।
ṛṣitīrthaṃ brahmatuṅgaṃ vasutīrthaṃ kumārikam ।।
śakratīrthaṃ pañcanadaṃ reṇukātīrtham eva ca ।
paitāmahaṃ ca vimalaṃ rudrapādaṃ tathottamam ।।
maṇimattaṃ ca kāmākhyaṃ kṛṣṇatīrthaṃ kuśāvilam ।
yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva tathaiva brahmavālukam ।।
puṣpanyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ maṇipūraṃ tathottaram ।
dīrghasattraṃ hayapadaṃ tīrthaṃ cānaśanaṃ tathā ।।
gaṅgodbhedaṃ śivodbhedaṃ narmadodbhedam eva ca ।
vastrāpadaṃ dāruvalaṃ chāyārohaṇam eva ca ।।
siddheśvaraṃ mitravalaṃ kālikāśramam eva ca ।
vaṭāvaṭaṃ bhadravaṭaṃ kauśāmbī ca divākaram ।।
dvīpaṃ sārasvataṃ caiva vijayaṃ kāmadaṃ tathā ।
rudrakoṭiṃ sumanasaṃ tīrthaṃ sadrāvanāmitam ।।
syamantapañcakaṃ tīrthaṃ brahmatīrthaṃ sudarśanam ।
satataṃ pṛthivīsarvaṃ pāriplavapṛthūdakau ।।
daśāśvamedhikaṃ tīrthaṃ sarpijaṃ viṣayāntikam ।
koṭitīrthaṃ pañcanadaṃ vārāhaṃ yakṣiṇīhradam ।।
puṇḍarīkaṃ somatīrthaṃ muñjavaṭaṃ tathottamam ।
badarīvanam āsīnaṃ ratnamūlakam eva ca ।।
lokadvāraṃ pañcatīrthaṃ kapilātīrtham eva ca ।
sūryatīrthaṃ śaṅkhinī ca gavāṃ bhavanam eva ca ।।
tīrthaṃ ca yakṣarājasya brahmāvartaṃ sutīrthakam ।
kāmeśvaraṃ mātritīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ śītavanaṃ tathā ।।
snānalomāpahaṃ caiva māsasaṃsarakaṃ tathā ।
daśāśvamedhaṃ kedāraṃ brahmodumbaram eva ca ।।
saptarṣikuṇḍaṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ devyāḥ sujambukam ।
īṭāspadaṃ koṭikūṭaṃ kiṃdānaṃ kiṃjapaṃ tathā ।।
kāraṇḍavaṃ cāvedhyaṃ ca triviṣṭapam athāparam ।
pāṇiṣātaṃ miśrakaṃ ca madhūvaṭamanojavau ।।
kauśikī devatīrthaṃ ca tīrthaṃ ca ṛṇamocanam ।
divyaṃ ca nṛgadhūmākhyaṃ tīrthaṃ viṣṇupadaṃ tathā ।।
amarāṇāṃ hradaṃ puṇyaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ tathāparam ।
śrīkuñjaṃ śālitīrthaṃ ca naimiṣeyaṃ ca viśrutam ।।
brahmasthānaṃ somatīrthaṃ kanyātīrthaṃ tathaiva ca ।
brahmatīrthaṃ manastīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ vai kārupāvanam ।।
saugandhikavanaṃ caiva maṇitīrthaṃ sarasvatī ।
īśānatīrthaṃ pravaraṃ pāvanaṃ pāñcayajñikam ।।
triśūladhāraṃ māhendraṃ devasthānaṃ kṛtālayam ।
śākaṃbharī devatīrthaṃ suvarṇākhyaṃ kilaṃ hradam ।।
kṣīraśravaṃ virūpākṣaṃ bhṛgutīrthaṃ kuśodbhavam ।
brahmatīrthaṃ brahmayoniṃ nīlaparvatam eva ca ।।
kubjāmbakaṃ bhadravaṭaṃ vasiṣṭhapadam eva ca ।
svargadvāraṃ prajādvāraṃ kālikāśramam eva ca ।।
rudrāvartaṃ sugandhāśvaṃ kapilāvanam eva ca ।
bhadrakarṇahradaṃ caiva śaṅkukarṇahradaṃ tathā ।।
saptasārasvataṃ caiva tīrtham auśanasaṃ tathā ।
kapālamocanaṃ caiva avakīrṇaṃ ca kāmyakam ।।
catuḥsāmudrikaṃ caiva śatakiṃ ca sahasrikam ।
reṇukaṃ pañcavaṭakaṃ vimocanam athaujasam ।।
sthāṇutīrthaṃ kuros tīrthaṃ svargadvāraṃ kuśadhvajam ।
viśveśvaraṃ mānavakaṃ kūpaṃ nārāyaṇāśrayam ।।
gaṅgāhradaṃ vaṭaṃ caiva badarīpāṭanaṃ tathā ।
indramārgam ekarātraṃ kṣīrakāvāsam eva ca ।।
somatīrthaṃ dadhīcaṃ ca śrutatīrthaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।
koṭitīrthasthalīṃ caiva bhadrakālīhradaṃ tathā ।।
arundhatīvanaṃ caiva brahmāvartaṃ tathottamam ।
aśvavedī kubjāvanaṃ yamunāprabhavaṃ tathā ।।
vīraṃ pramokṣaṃ sindhūttham ṛṣa kulyā sakṛttikam ।
urvīsaṃkramaṇaṃ caiva māyāvidyodbhavaṃ tathā ।।
mahāśramo vaitasikā- rūpaṃ sundarikāśramam ।
bāhutīrthaṃ cārunadīṃ vimalāśokam eva ca ।।
tīrthaṃ pañcanadaṃ caiva mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ ।
somatīrthaṃ sitodaṃ ca tīrthaṃ matsyodarīṃ tathā ।।
sūryaprabhaṃ sūryatīrtham aśokavanam eva ca ।
aruṇāspadaṃ kāmadaṃ ca śukratīrthaṃ savālukam ।।
piśācamocanaṃ caiva subhadrāhradam eva ca ।
kuṇḍaṃ vimaladaṇḍasya tīrthaṃ caṇḍeśvarasya ca ।।
jyeṣṭhasthānahradaṃ caiva puṇyaṃ brahmasaraṃ tathā ।
jaigīṣavyaguhā caiva harikeśavanaṃ tathā ।।
ajāmukhasaraṃ caiva ghaṇṭākarṇahradaṃ tathā ।
puṇḍarīkahradaṃ caiva vāpī karkoṭakasya ca ।।
suvarṇasyodapānaṃ ca śvetatīrthahradaṃ tathā ।
kuṇḍaṃ ghargharikāyāś ca śyāmakūpaṃ ca candrikā ।।
śmaśānastambhakūpaṃ ca vināyakahradaṃ tathā ।
kūpaṃ sindhūdbhavaṃ caiva puṇyaṃ brahmasaraṃ tathā ।।
rudrāvāsaṃ tathā tīrthaṃ nāgatīrthaṃ pulomakam ।
bhaktahradaṃ kṣīrasaraḥ pretādhāraṃ kumārakam ।।
brahmāvartaṃ kuśāvartaṃ dadhikarṇodapānakam ।
śṛṅgatīrthaṃ mahātīrthaṃ tīrthaśreṣṭhā mahānadī ।।
divyaṃ brahmasaraṃ puṇyaṃ gayāśīrṣākṣayaṃ vaṭam ।
dakṣiṇaṃ cottaraṃ caiva gomayaṃ rūpaśītikam ।।
kapilāhradaṃ gṛdhravaṭaṃ sāvitrīhradam eva ca ।
prabhāsanaṃ sītavanaṃ yonidvāraṃ ca dhenukam ।।
dhanyakaṃ kokilākhyaṃ ca mataṅgahradam eva ca ।
pitṛkūpaṃ rudratīrthaṃ śakratīrthaṃ sumālinam ।।
brahmasthānaṃ saptakuṇḍaṃ maṇiratnahradaṃ tathā ।
kauśikyaṃ bharataṃ caiva tīrthaṃ jyeṣṭhālikā tathā ।।
viśveśvaraṃ kalpasaraḥ kanyāsaṃvetyam eva ca ।
niścīvā prabhavaś caiva vasiṣṭhāśramam eva ca ।।
devakūṭaṃ ca kūpaṃ ca vasiṣṭhāśramam eva ca ।
vīrāśramaṃ brahmasaro brahmavīrāvakāpilī ।।
kumāradhārā śrīdhārā gaurīśikharam eva ca ।
śunaḥ kuṇḍo atha tīrthaṃ ca nanditīrthaṃ tathaiva ca ।।
kumāravāsaṃ śrīvāsam aurvīśītārtham eva ca ।
kumbhakarṇahradaṃ caiva kauśikīhradam eva ca ।।
dharmatīrthaṃ kāmatīrthaṃ tīrtham uddālakaṃ tathā ।
saṃdhyātīrthaṃ kāratoyaṃ kapilaṃ lohitārṇavam ।।
śoṇodbhavaṃ vaṃśagulmam ṛṣabhaṃ kalatīrthakam ।
puṇyāvatīhradaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ badarikāśramam ।।
rāmatīrthaṃ pitṛvanaṃ virajātīrtham eva ca ।
mārkaṇḍeyavanaṃ caiva kṛṣṇatīrthaṃ tathā vaṭam ।।
rohiṇīkūpapravaram indradyumnasaraṃ ca yat ।
sānugartaṃ samāhendraṃ śrītīrthaṃ śrīnadaṃ tathā ।।
iṣutīrthaṃ vārṣabhaṃ ca kāverīhradam eva ca ।
kanyātīrthaṃ ca gokarṇaṃ gāyatrīsthānam eva ca ।।
badarīhradam anyac ca madhyasthānaṃ vikarṇakam ।
jātīhradaṃ devakūpaṃ kuśapravaṇam eva ca ।।
sarvadevavrataṃ caiva kanyāśramahradaṃ tathā ।
tathānyad vālakhilyānāṃ sapūrvāṇāṃ tathāparam ।।
tathānyac ca maharṣīṇām akhaṇḍitahradaṃ tathā ।
tīrtheṣv eteṣu vidhivat samyak śraddhāsamanvitaḥ ।।
snānaṃ karoti yo martyaḥ sopavāso jitendriyaḥ ।
devān ṛṣīn manuṣyāṃś ca pitṝn saṃtarpya ca kramāt ।।
abhyarcya devatās tatra sthitvā ca rajanītrayam ।
pṛthak pṛthak phalaṃ teṣu pratitīrtheṣu bho dvijāḥ ।।
prāpnoti hayamedhasya naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।
yas tv idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ tīrthamāhātmyam uttamam ।
paṭhec ca śrāvayed vāpi sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
pṛthivyām uttamāṃ bhūmiṃ dharmakāmārthamokṣadām ।
tīrthānām uttamaṃ tīrthaṃ brūhi no vadatāṃ vara ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
imaṃ praśnaṃ mama guruṃ papracchur munayaḥ purā ।
tam ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yat pṛcchadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
svāśrame sumahāpuṇye nānāpuṣpopaśobhite ।
nānādrumalatākīrṇe nānāmṛgagaṇair yute ।।
puṃnāgaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca saralair devadārubhiḥ ।
śālais tālais tamālaiś ca panasair dhavakhādiraiḥ ।।
pāṭalāśokabakulaiḥ karavīraiḥ sacampakaiḥ ।
anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣair nānāpuṣpopaśobhitaiḥ ।।
kurukṣetre samāsīnaṃ vyāsaṃ matimatāṃ varam ।
mahābhāratakartāraṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam ।।
adhyātmaniṣṭhaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvabhūtahite ratam ।
purāṇāgamavaktāraṃ vedavedāṅgapāragam ।।
parāśarasutaṃ śāntaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam ।
draṣṭum abhyāyayuḥ prītyā munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ ।।
kaśyapo jamadagniś ca bharadvājo atha gautamaḥ ।
vasiṣṭho jaiminir dhaumyo mārkaṇḍeyo atha vālmikiḥ ।।
viśvāmitraḥ śatānando vātsyo gārgyo atha āsuriḥ ।
sumantur bhārgavo nāma kaṇvo medhātithir guruḥ ।।
māṇḍavyaś cyavano dhūmro hy asito devalas tathā ।
maudgalyas tṛṇayajñaś ca pippalādo akṛtavraṇaḥ ।।
saṃvartaḥ kauśiko raibhyo maitreyo haritas tathā ।
śāṇḍilyaś ca vibhāṇḍaś ca durvāsā lomaśas tathā ।।
nāradaḥ parvataś caiva vaiśaṃpāyanagālavau ।
bhāskariḥ pūraṇaḥ sūtaḥ pulastyaḥ kapilas tathā ।।
ulūkaḥ pulaho vāyur devasthānaś caturbhujaḥ ।
sanatkumāraḥ pailaś ca kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇānubhautikaḥ ।।
etair munivaraiś cānyair vṛtaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ ।
rarāja sa muniḥ śrīmān nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ ।।
tān āgatān munīn sarvān pūjayām āsa vedavit ।
te api taṃ pratipūjyaiva kathāṃ cakruḥ parasparam ।।
kathānte te muniśreṣṭhāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ satyavatīsutam ।
papracchuḥ saṃśayaṃ sarve tapovananivāsinaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
mune vedāṃś ca śāstrāṇi purāṇāgamabhāratam ।
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca sarvaṃ jānāsi vāṅmayam ।।
kaṣṭe asmin duḥkhabahule niḥsāre bhavasāgare ।
rāgagrāhākule raudre viṣayodakasaṃplave ।।
indriyāvartakalile dṛṣṭormiśatasaṃkule ।
mohapaṅkāvile durge lobhagambhīradustare ।।
nimajjaj jagad ālokya nirālambam acetanam ।
pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahābhāgaṃ brūhi no munisattama ।।
śreyaḥ kim atra saṃsāre bhairave lomaharṣaṇe ।
upadeśapradānena lokān uddhartum arhasi ।।
durlabhaṃ paramaṃ kṣetraṃ vaktum arhasi mokṣadam ।
pṛthivyāṃ karmabhūmiṃ ca śrotum icchāmahe vayam ।।
kṛtvā kila naraḥ samyak karma bhūmau yathoditam ।
prāpnoti paramāṃ siddhiṃ narakaṃ ca vikarmataḥ ।।
mokṣakṣetre tathā mokṣaṃ prāpnoti puruṣaḥ sudhīḥ ।
tasmād brūhi mahāprājña yat pṛṣṭo asi dvijottama ।।
śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām ।
vyāsaḥ provāca bhagavān bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyavit ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ sarve vakṣyāmi yadi pṛcchatha ।
yaḥ saṃvādo abhavat pūrvam ṛṣīṇāṃ brahmaṇā saha ।।
merupṛṣṭhe tu vistīrṇe nānāratnavibhūṣite ।
nānādrumalatākīrṇe nānāpuṣpopaśobhite ।।
nānāpakṣirute ramye nānāprasavanākule ।
nānāsattvasamākīrṇe nānāścaryasamanvite ।।
nānāvarṇaśilākīrṇe nānādhātuvibhūṣite ।
nānāmunijanākīrṇe nānāśramasamanvite ।।
tatrāsīnaṃ jagannāthaṃ jagadyoniṃ caturmukham ।
jagatpatiṃ jagadvandyaṃ jagadādhāram īśvaram ।।
devadānavagandharvair yakṣavidyādharoragaiḥ ।
munisiddhāpsarobhiś ca vṛtam anyair divālayaiḥ ।।
kecit stuvanti taṃ devaṃ kecid gāyanti cāgrataḥ ।
kecid vādyāni vādyante kecin nṛtyanti cāpare ।।
evaṃ pramudite kāle sarvabhūtasamāgame ।
nānākusumagandhāḍhye dakṣiṇānilasevite ।।
bhṛgvādyās taṃ tadā devaṃ praṇipatya pitāmaham ।
imam artham ṛṣivarāḥ papracchuḥ pitaraṃ dvijāḥ ।।
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
bhagavañ śrotum icchāmaḥ karmabhūmiṃ mahītale ।
vaktum arhasi deveśa mokṣakṣetraṃ ca durlabham ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
teṣāṃ vacanam ākarṇya prāha brahmā sureśvaraḥ ।
papracchus te yathā praśnaṃ tat sarvaṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ sarve yad vo vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam ।
purāṇaṃ vedasaṃbaddhaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ śubham ।।
pṛthivyāṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ karmabhūmir udāhṛtā ।
karmaṇaḥ phalabhūmiś ca svargaṃ ca narakaṃ tathā ।।
tasmin varṣe naraḥ pāpaṃ kṛtvā dharmaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।
avaśyaṃ phalam āpnoti aśubhasya śubhasya ca ।।
brāhmaṇādyāḥ svakaṃ karma kṛtvā samyak susaṃyatāḥ ।
prāpnuvanti parāṃ siddhiṃ tasmin varṣe na saṃśayaḥ ।।
dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca dvijasattamāḥ ।
prāpnoti puruṣaḥ sarvaṃ tasmin varṣe susaṃyataḥ ।।
indrādyāś ca surāḥ sarve tasmin varṣe dvijottamāḥ ।
kṛtvā suśobhanaṃ karma devatvaṃ pratipedire ।।
anye api lebhire mokṣaṃ puruṣāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ ।
tasmin varṣe budhāḥ śāntā vītarāgā vimatsarāḥ ।।
ye cāpi svarge tiṣṭhanti vimānena gatajvarāḥ ।
te api kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma tasmin varṣe divaṃ gatāḥ ।।
nivāsaṃ bhārate varṣa ākāṅkṣanti sadā surāḥ ।
svargāpavargaphalade tat paśyāmaḥ kadā vayam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
yad etad bhavatā proktaṃ karma nānyatra puṇyadam ।
pāpāya vā suraśreṣṭha varjayitvā ca bhāratam ।।
tataḥ svargaś ca mokṣaś ca madhyamaṃ tac ca gamyate ।
na khalv anyatra martyānāṃ bhūmau karma vidhīyate ।।
tasmād vistarato brahmann asmākaṃ bhārataṃ vada ।
yadi te asti dayāsmāsu yathāvasthitir eva ca ।।
tasmād varṣam idaṃ nātha ye vāsmin varṣaparvatāḥ ।
bhedāś ca tasya varṣasya brūhi sarvān aśeṣataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ navabhedena bho dvijāḥ ।
samudrāntaritā jñeyās te samāś ca parasparam ।।
indradvīpaḥ kaśeruś ca tāmravarṇo gabhastimān ।
nāgadvīpas tathā saumyo gāndharvo vāruṇas tathā ।।
ayaṃ tu navamas teṣāṃ dvīpaḥ sāgarasaṃvṛtaḥ ।
yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ vai dvīpo ayaṃ dakṣiṇottaraḥ ।।
pūrve kirātā yasyāsan paścime yavanās tathā ।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś cānte sthitā dvijāḥ ।।
ijyāyuddhavaṇijyādyaiḥ karmabhiḥ kṛtapāvanāḥ ।
teṣāṃ saṃvyavahāraś ca ebhiḥ karmabhir iṣyate ।।
svargāpavargahetuś ca puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ ca vai tathā ।
mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣaparvataḥ ।।
vindhyaś ca pāriyātraś ca saptaivātra kulācalāḥ ।
teṣāṃ sahasraśaś cānye bhūdharā ye samīpagāḥ ।।
vistārocchrayiṇo ramyā vipulāś citrasānavaḥ ।
kolāhalaḥ sa vaibhrājo mandaro dardalācalaḥ ।।
vātaṃdhayo vaidyutaś ca mainākaḥ surasas tathā ।
tuṅgaprastho nāgagirir godhanaḥ pāṇḍarācalaḥ ।।
puṣpagirir vaijayanto raivato arbuda eva ca ।
ṛṣyamūkaḥ sa gomanthaḥ kṛtaśailaḥ kṛtācalaḥ ।।
śrīpārvataś cakoraś ca śataśo anye ca parvatāḥ ।
tair vimiśrā janapadā mlecchādyāś caiva bhāgaśaḥ ।।
taiḥ pīyante saricchreṣṭhās tā budhyadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
gaṅgā sarasvatī sindhuś candrabhāgā tathāparā ।।
yamunā śatadrur vipāśā vitastairāvatī kuhūḥ ।
gomatī dhūtapāpā ca bāhudā ca dṛṣadvatī ।।
vipāśā devikā cakṣur niṣṭhīvā gaṇḍakī tathā ।
kauśikī cāpagā caiva himavatpādaniḥsṛtāḥ ।।
devasmṛtir devavatī vātaghnī sindhur eva ca ।
veṇyā tu candanā caiva sadānīrā mahī tathā ।।
carmaṇvatī vṛṣī caiva vidiśā vedavaty api ।
siprā hy avantī ca tathā pāriyātrānugāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
śoṇā mahānadī caiva narmadā surathā kriyā ।
mandākinī daśārṇā ca citrakūṭā tathāparā ।।
citrotpalā vetravatī karamodā piśācikā ।
tathānyātilaghuśroṇī vipāpmā śaivalā nadī ।।
sadherujā śaktimatī śakunī tridivā kramuḥ ।
ṛkṣapādaprasūtā vai tathānyā vegavāhinī ।।
siprā payoṣṇī nirvindhyā tāpī caiva saridvarā ।
veṇā vaitaraṇī caiva sinīvālī kumudvatī ।।
toyā caiva mahāgaurī durgā cāntaḥśilā tathā ।
vindhyapādaprasūtās tā nadyaḥ puṇyajalāḥ śubhāḥ ।।
godāvarī bhīmarathī kṛṣṇaveṇā tathāpagā ।
tuṅgabhadrā suprayogā tathānyā pāpanāśinī ।।
sahyapādaviniṣkrāntā ity etāḥ saritāṃ varāḥ ।
kṛtamālā tāmraparṇī puṣyajā pratyalāvatī ।।
malayādrisamudbhūtāḥ puṇyāḥ śītajalās tv imāḥ ।
pitṛsomarṣikulyā ca vañjulā tridivā ca yā ।।
lāṅgulinī vaṃśakarā mahendraprabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ ।
suvikālā kumārī ca manūgā mandagāminī ।।
kṣayāpalāsinī caiva śuktimatprabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ ।
sarvāḥ puṇyāḥ sarasvatyaḥ sarvā gaṅgāḥ samudragāḥ ।।
viśvasya mātaraḥ sarvāḥ sarvāḥ pāpaharāḥ smṛtāḥ ।
anyāḥ sahasraśaḥ proktāḥ kṣudranadyo dvijottamāḥ ।।
prāvṛṭkālavahāḥ santi sadākālavahāś ca yāḥ ।
matsyā mukuṭakulyāś ca kuntalāḥ kāśikośalāḥ ।।
andhrakāś ca kaliṅgāś ca śamakāś ca vṛkaiḥ saha ।
madhyadeśā janapadāḥ prāyaśo amī prakīrtitāḥ ।।
sahyasya cottare yas tu yatra godāvarī nadī ।
pṛthivyām api kṛtsnāyāṃ sa pradeśo manoramaḥ ।।
govardhanapuraṃ ramyaṃ bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ ।
vāhīkarāṭadhānāś ca sutīrāḥ kālatoyadāḥ ।।
aparāntāś ca śūdrāś ca vāhlikāś ca sakeralāḥ ।
gāndhārā yavanāś caiva sindhusauvīramadrakāḥ ।।
śatadruhāḥ kaliṅgāś ca pāradā hārabhūṣikāḥ ।
māṭharāś caiva kanakāḥ kaikeyā dambhamālikāḥ ।।
kṣatriyopamadeśāś ca vaiśyaśūdrakulāni ca ।
kāmbojāś caiva viprendrā barbarāś ca salaukikāḥ ।।
vīrāś caiva tuṣārāś ca pahlavādhāyatā narāḥ ।
ātreyāś ca bharadvājāḥ puṣkalāś ca daśerakāḥ ।।
lampakāḥ śunaśokāś ca kulikā jāṅgalaiḥ saha ।
auṣadhyaś calacandrā ca kirātānāṃ ca jātayaḥ ।।
tomarā haṃsamārgāś ca kāśmīrāḥ karuṇās tathā ।
śūlikāḥ kuhakāś caiva māgadhāś ca tathaiva ca ।।
ete deśā udīcyās tu prācyān deśān nibodhata ।
andhā vāmaṅkurākāś ca vallakāś ca makhāntakāḥ ।।
tathāpare aṅgā vaṅgāś ca maladā mālavartikāḥ ।
bhadratuṅgāḥ pratijayā bhāryāṅgāś cāpamardakāḥ ।।
prāgjyotiṣāś ca madrāś ca videhās tāmraliptakāḥ ।
mallā magadhakā nandāḥ prācyā janapadās tathā ।।
athāpare janapadā dakṣiṇāpathavāsinaḥ ।
pūrṇāś ca kevalāś caiva golāṅgūlās tathaiva ca ।।
ṛṣikā muṣikāś caiva kumārā rāmaṭhāḥ śakāḥ ।
mahārāṣṭrā māhiṣakāḥ kaliṅgāś caiva sarvaśaḥ ।।
ābhīrāḥ saha vaiśikyā aṭavyāḥ saravāś ca ye ।
pulindāś caiva mauleyā vaidarbhā daṇḍakaiḥ saha ।।
paulikā maulikāś caiva aśmakā bhojavardhanāḥ ।
kaulikāḥ kuntalāś caiva dambhakā nīlakālakāḥ ।।
dākṣiṇātyās tv amī deśā aparāntān nibodhata ।
śūrpārakāḥ kālidhanā lolās tālakaṭaiḥ saha ।।
ity ete hy aparāntāś ca śṛṇudhvaṃ vindhyavāsinaḥ ।
malajāḥ karkaśāś caiva melakāś colakaiḥ saha ।।
uttamārṇā daśārṇāś ca bhojāḥ kiṣkindhakaiḥ saha ।
toṣalāḥ kośalāś caiva traipurā vaidiśās tathā ।।
tumburās tu carāś caiva yavanāḥ pavanaiḥ saha ।
abhayā ruṇḍikerāś ca carcarā hotradhartayaḥ ।।
ete janapadāḥ sarve tatra vindhyanivāsinaḥ ।
ato deśān pravakṣyāmi parvatāśrayiṇaś ca ye ।।
nīhārās tuṣamārgāś ca kuravas tuṅgaṇāḥ khasāḥ ।
karṇaprāvaraṇāś caiva ūrṇā darghāḥ sakuntakāḥ ।।
citramārgā mālavāś ca kirātās tomaraiḥ saha ।
kṛtatretādikaś cātra caturyugakṛto vidhiḥ ।।
evaṃ tu bhārataṃ varṣaṃ navasaṃsthānasaṃsthitam ।
dakṣiṇe parato yasya pūrve caiva mahodadhiḥ ।।
himavān uttareṇāsya kārmukasya yathā guṇaḥ ।
tad etad bhārataṃ varṣaṃ sarvabījaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
brahmatvam amareśatvaṃ devatvaṃ marutāṃ tathā ।
mṛgayakṣāpsaroyoniṃ tadvat sarpasarīsṛpāḥ ।।
sthāvarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ mito viprāḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ ।
prayānti karmabhūr viprā nānyā lokeṣu vidyate ।।
devānām api bho viprāḥ sadaivaiṣa manorathaḥ ।
api mānuṣyam āpsyāmo devatvāt pracyutāḥ kṣitau ।।
manuṣyaḥ kurute yat tu tan na śakyaṃ surāsuraiḥ ।
tatkarmanigaḍagrastais tatkarmakṣapaṇonmukhaiḥ ।।
na bhāratasamaṃ varṣaṃ pṛthivyām asti bho dvijāḥ ।
yatra viprādayo varṇāḥ prāpnuvanty abhivāñchitam ।।
dhanyās te bhārate varṣe jāyante ye narottamāḥ ।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ prāpnuvanti mahāphalam ।।
prāpyate yatra tapasaḥ phalaṃ paramadurlabham ।
sarvadānaphalaṃ caiva sarvayajñaphalaṃ tathā ।।
tīrthayātrāphalaṃ caiva gurusevāphalaṃ tathā ।
devatārādhanaphalaṃ svādhyāyasya phalaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
yatra devāḥ sadā hṛṣṭā janma vāñchanti śobhanam ।
nānāvrataphalaṃ caiva nānāśāstraphalaṃ tathā ।।
ahiṃsādiphalaṃ samyak phalaṃ sarvābhivāñchitam ।
brahmacaryaphalaṃ caiva gārhasthyena ca yat phalam ।।
yat phalaṃ vanavāsena saṃnyāsena ca yat phalam ।
iṣṭāpūrtaphalaṃ caiva tathānyac chubhakarmaṇām ।।
prāpyate bhārate varṣe na cānyatra dvijottamāḥ ।
kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ bhāratasyākhilān dvijāḥ ।।
evaṃ samyaṅ mayā proktaṃ bhārataṃ varṣam uttamam ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ dhanyaṃ buddhivivardhanam ।।
ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ paṭhed vā niyatendriyaḥ ।
sarvapāpair vinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatrāste bhārate varṣe dakṣiṇodadhisaṃsthitaḥ ।
oṇḍradeśa iti khyātaḥ svargamokṣapradāyakaḥ ।।
samudrād uttaraṃ tāvad yāvad virajamaṇḍalam ।
deśo asau puṇyaśīlānāṃ guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
tatra deśaprasūtā ye brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ ।
tapaḥsvādhyāyaniratā vandyāḥ pūjyāś ca te sadā ।।
śrāddhe dāne vivāhe ca yajñe vācāryakarmaṇi ।
praśastāḥ sarvakāryeṣu tatradeśodbhavā dvijāḥ ।।
ṣaṭkarmaniratās tatra brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ ।
itihāsavidaś caiva purāṇārthaviśāradāḥ ।।
sarvaśāstrārthakuśalā yajvāno vītamatsarāḥ ।
agnihotraratāḥ kecit kecit smārtāgnitatparāḥ ।।
putradāradhanair yuktā dātāraḥ satyavādinaḥ ।
nivasanty utkale puṇye yajñotsavavibhūṣite ।।
itare api trayo varṇāḥ kṣatriyādyāḥ susaṃyatāḥ ।
svakarmaniratāḥ śāntās tatra tiṣṭhanti dhārmikāḥ ।।
koṇāditya iti khyātas tasmin deśe vyavasthitaḥ ।
yaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāskaraṃ martyaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śrotum icchāma tad brūhi kṣetraṃ sūryasya sāṃpratam ।
tasmin deśe suraśreṣṭha yatrāste sa divākaraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
lavaṇasyodadhes tīre pavitre sumanohare ।
sarvatra vālukākīrṇe deśe sarvaguṇānvite ।।
campakāśokabakulaiḥ karavīraiḥ sapāṭalaiḥ ।
puṃnāgaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca bakulair nāgakesaraiḥ ।।
tagarair dhavabāṇaiś ca atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ ।
mālatīkundapuṣpaiś ca tathānyair mallikādibhiḥ ।।
ketakīvanakhaṇḍaiś ca sarvartukusumojjvalaiḥ ।
kadambair lakucaiḥ śālaiḥ panasair devadārubhiḥ ।।
saralair mucukundaiś ca candanaiś ca sitetaraiḥ ।
aśvatthaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca āmrair āmrātakais tathā ।।
tālaiḥ pūgaphalaiś caiva nārikeraiḥ kapitthakaiḥ ।
anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ sarvataḥ samalaṃkṛtam ।।
kṣetraṃ tatra raveḥ puṇyam āste jagati viśrutam ।
samantād yojanaṃ sāgraṃ bhuktimuktiphalapradam ।।
āste tatra svayaṃ devaḥ sahasrāṃśur divākaraḥ ।
koṇāditya iti khyāto bhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ ।।
māghe māsi site pakṣe saptamyāṃ saṃyatendriyaḥ ।
kṛtopavāso yatretya snātvā tu makarālaye ।।
kṛtaśauco viśuddhātmā smaran devaṃ divākaram ।
sāgare vidhivat snātvā śarvaryante samāhitaḥ ।।
devān ṛṣīn manuṣyāṃś ca pitṝn saṃtarpya ca dvijāḥ ।
uttīrya vāsasī dhaute paridhāya sunirmale ।।
ācamya prayato bhūtvā tīre tasya mahodadheḥ ।
upaviśyodaye kāle prāṅmukhaḥ savitus tadā ।।
vilikhya padmaṃ medhāvī raktacandanavāriṇā ।
aṣṭapattraṃ kesarāḍhyaṃ vartulaṃ cordhvakarṇikam ।।
tilataṇḍulatoyaṃ ca raktacandanasaṃyutam ।
raktapuṣpaṃ sadarbhaṃ ca prakṣipet tāmrabhājane ।।
tāmrābhāve arkapattrasya puṭe kṛtvā tilādikam ।
pidhāya tan muniśreṣṭhāḥ pātraṃ pātreṇa vinyaset ।।
karanyāsāṅgavinyāsaṃ kṛtvāṅgair hṛdayādibhiḥ ।
ātmānaṃ bhāskaraṃ dhyātvā samyak śraddhāsamanvitaḥ ।।
madhye cāgnidale dhīmān nairṛte śvasane dale ।
kāmārigocare caiva punar madhye ca pūjayet ।।
prabhūtaṃ vimalaṃ sāram ārādhyaṃ paramaṃ sukham ।
saṃpūjya padmam āvāhya gaganāt tatra bhāskaram ।।
karṇikopari saṃsthāpya tato mudrāṃ pradarśayet ।
kṛtvā snānādikaṃ sarvaṃ dhyātvā taṃ susamāhitaḥ ।।
sitapadmopari raviṃ tejobimbe vyavasthitam ।
piṅgākṣaṃ dvibhujaṃ raktaṃ padmapattrāruṇāmbaram ।।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam ।
surūpaṃ varadaṃ śāntaṃ prabhāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitam ।।
udyantaṃ bhāskaraṃ dṛṣṭvā sāndrasindūrasaṃnibham ।
tatas tat pātram ādāya jānubhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ gataḥ ।।
kṛtvā śirasi tat pātram ekacittas tu vāgyataḥ ।
tryakṣareṇa tu mantreṇa sūryāyārghyaṃ nivedayet ।।
adīkṣitas tu tasyaiva nāmnaivārghaṃ prayacchati ।
śraddhayā bhāvayuktena bhaktigrāhyo ravir yataḥ ।।
agninirṛtivāyvīśa- madhyapūrvādidikṣu ca ।
hṛc chiraś ca śikhāvarma- netrāṇy astraṃ ca pūjayet ।।
dattvārghyaṃ gandhadhūpaṃ ca dīpaṃ naivedyam eva ca ।
japtvā stutvā namas kṛtvā mudrāṃ baddhvā visarjayet ।।
ye vārghyaṃ saṃprayacchanti sūryāya niyatendriyāḥ ।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ śūdrāś ca saṃyatāḥ ।।
bhaktibhāvena satataṃ viśuddhenāntarātmanā ।
te bhuktvābhimatān kāmān prāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim ।।
trailokyadīpakaṃ devaṃ bhāskaraṃ gaganecaram ।
ye saṃśrayanti manujās te syuḥ sukhasya bhājanam ।।
yāvan na dīyate cārghyaṃ bhāskarāya yathoditam ।
tāvan na pūjayed viṣṇuṃ śaṃkaraṃ vā sureśvaram ।।
tasmāt prayatnam āsthāya dadyād arghyaṃ dine dine ।
ādityāya śucir bhūtvā puṣpair gandhair manoramaiḥ ।।
evaṃ dadāti yaś cārghyaṃ saptamyāṃ susamāhitaḥ ।
ādityāya śuciḥ snātaḥ sa labhed īpsitaṃ phalam ।।
rogād vimucyate rogī vittārthī labhate dhanam ।
vidyāṃ prāpnoti vidyārthī sutārthī putravān bhavet ।।
yaṃ yaṃ kāmam abhidhyāyan sūryāyārghyaṃ prayacchati ।
tasya tasya phalaṃ samyak prāpnoti puruṣaḥ sudhīḥ ।।
snātvā vai sāgare dattvā sūryāyārghyaṃ praṇamya ca ।
naro vā yadi vā nārī sarvakāmaphalaṃ labhet ।।
tataḥ sūryālayaṃ gacchet puṣpam ādāya vāgyataḥ ।
praviśya pūjayed bhānuṃ kṛtvā tu triḥ pradakṣiṇam ।।
pūjayet parayā bhaktyā koṇārkaṃ munisattamāḥ ।
gandhaiḥ puṣpais tathā dīpair dhūpair naivedyakair api ।।
daṇḍavat praṇipātaiś ca jayaśabdais tathā stavaiḥ ।
evaṃ saṃpūjya taṃ devaṃ sahasrāṃśuṃ jagatpatim ।।
daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ ।
sarvapāpavinirmukto yuvā divyavapur naraḥ ।।
saptāvarān sapta parān vaṃśān uddhṛtya bho dvijāḥ ।
vimānenārkavarṇena kāmagena suvarcasā ।।
upagīyamāno gandharvaiḥ sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati ।
bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।।
puṇyakṣayād ihāyātaḥ pravare yogināṃ kule ।
caturvedo bhaved vipraḥ svadharmanirataḥ śuciḥ ।।
yogaṃ vivasvataḥ prāpya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।
caitre māsi site pakṣe yātrāṃ damanabhañjikām ।।
yaḥ karoti naras tatra pūrvoktaṃ sa phalaṃ labhet ।
śayanotthāpane bhānoḥ saṃkrāntyāṃ viṣuvāyane ।।
vāre raves tithau caiva parvakāle athavā dvijāḥ ।
ye tatra yātrāṃ kurvanti śraddhayā saṃyatendriyāḥ ।।
vimānenārkavarṇena sūryalokaṃ vrajanti te ।
āste tatra mahādevas tīre nadanadīpateḥ ।।
rāmeśvara iti khyātaḥ sarvakāmaphalapradaḥ ।
ye taṃ paśyanti kāmāriṃ snātvā samyaṅ mahodadhau ।।
gandhaiḥ puṣpais tathā dhūpair dīpair naivedyakair varaiḥ ।
praṇipātais tathā stotrair gītair vādyair manoharaiḥ ।।
rājasūyaphalaṃ samyag vājimedhaphalaṃ tathā ।
prāpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ tathā ।।
kāmagena vimānena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā ।
upagīyamānā gandharvaiḥ śivalokaṃ vrajanti te ।।
āhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvad bhuktvā bhogān manoramān ।
puṇyakṣayād ihāgatya cāturvedā bhavanti te ।।
śāṃkaraṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣaṃ vrajanti te ।
yas tatra savituḥ kṣetre prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ ।।
sa sūryalokam āsthāya devavan modate divi ।
punar mānuṣatāṃ prāpya rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ ।।
yogaṃ raveḥ samāsādya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।
evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhāḥ proktaṃ kṣetraṃ sudurlabham ।।
koṇārkasyodadhes tīre bhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śruto asmābhiḥ suraśreṣṭha bhavatā yad udāhṛtam ।
bhāskarasya paraṃ kṣetraṃ bhuktimuktiphalapradam ।।
na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ śṛṇvantaḥ sukhadāṃ kathām ।
tava vaktrodbhavāṃ puṇyām ādityasyāghanāśinīm ।।
ataḥ paraṃ suraśreṣṭha brūhi no vadatāṃ vara ।
devapūjāphalaṃ yac ca yac ca dānaphalaṃ prabho ।।
praṇipāte namaskāre tathā caiva pradakṣiṇe ।
dīpadhūpapradāne ca saṃmārjanavidhau ca yat ।।
upavāse ca yat puṇyaṃ yat puṇyaṃ naktabhojane ।
arghaś ca kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kutra vā saṃpradīyate ।।
kathaṃ ca kriyate bhaktiḥ kathaṃ devaḥ prasīdati ।
etat sarvaṃ suraśreṣṭha śrotum icchāmahe vayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
arghyaṃ pūjādikaṃ sarvaṃ bhāskarasya dvijottamāḥ ।
bhaktiṃ śraddhāṃ samādhiṃ ca kathyamānaṃ nibodhata ।।
manasā bhāvanā bhaktir iṣṭā śraddhā ca kīrtyate ।
dhyānaṃ samādhir ity uktaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ susamāhitāḥ ।।
tatkathāṃ śrāvayed yas tu tadbhaktān pūjayīta vā ।
agniśuśrūṣakaś caiva sa vai bhaktaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
taccittas tanmanāś caiva devapūjārataḥ sadā ।
tatkarmakṛd bhaved yas tu sa vai bhaktaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
devārthe kriyamāṇāni yaḥ karmāṇy anumanyate ।
kīrtanād vā paro viprāḥ sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ ।।
nābhyasūyeta tadbhaktān na nindyāc cānyadevatām ।
ādityavratacārī ca sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ ।।
gacchaṃs tiṣṭhan svapañ jighrann unmiṣan nimiṣann api ।
yaḥ smared bhāskaraṃ nityaṃ sa vai bhaktataro naraḥ ।।
evaṃvidhā tv iyaṃ bhaktiḥ sadā kāryā vijānatā ।
bhaktyā samādhinā caiva stavena manasā tathā ।।
kriyate niyamo yas tu dānaṃ viprāya dīyate ।
pratigṛhṇanti taṃ devā manuṣyāḥ pitaras tathā ।।
pattraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yad bhaktyā samupāhṛtam ।
pratigṛhṇanti tad devā nāstikān varjayanti ca ।।
bhāvaśuddhiḥ prayoktavyā niyamācārasaṃyutā ।
bhāvaśuddhyā kriyate yat tat sarvaṃ saphalaṃ bhavet ।।
stutijapyopahāreṇa pūjayāpi vivasvataḥ ।
upavāsena bhaktyā vai sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
praṇidhāya śiro bhūmyāṃ namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ ।
tatkṣaṇāt sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
bhaktiyukto naro yo asau raveḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇām ।
pradakṣiṇīkṛtā tena saptadvīpā vasuṃdharā ।।
sūryaṃ manasi yaḥ kṛtvā kuryād vyomapradakṣiṇām ।
pradakṣiṇīkṛtās tena sarve devā bhavanti hi ।।
ekāhāro naro bhūtvā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ yo arcayate ravim ।
niyamavratacārī ca bhaved bhaktisamanvitaḥ ।।
saptamyāṃ vā mahābhāgāḥ so aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet ।
ahorātropavāsena pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram ।।
saptamyām athavā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ।
kṛṣṇapakṣasya saptamyāṃ sopavāso jitendriyaḥ ।।
sarvaratnopahāreṇa pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram ।
padmaprabheṇa yānena sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
śuklapakṣasya saptamyām upavāsaparo naraḥ ।
sarvaśuklopahāreṇa pūjayed yas tu bhāskaram ।।
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sūryalokaṃ sa gacchati ।
arkasaṃpuṭasaṃyuktam udakaṃ prasṛtaṃ pibet ।।
kramavṛddhyā caturviṃśam ekaikaṃ kṣapayet punaḥ ।
dvābhyāṃ saṃvatsarābhyāṃ tu samāptaniyamo bhavet ।।
sarvakāmapradā hy eṣā praśastā hy arkasaptamī ।
śuklapakṣasya saptamyāṃ yadādityadinaṃ bhavet ।।
saptamī vijayā nāma tatra dattaṃ mahat phalam ।
snānaṃ dānaṃ tapo homa upavāsas tathaiva ca ।।
sarvaṃ vijayasaptamyāṃ mahāpātakanāśanam ।
ye cādityadine prāpte śrāddhaṃ kurvanti mānavāḥ ।।
yajanti ca mahāśvetaṃ te labhante yathepsitam ।
yeṣāṃ dharmyāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sadaivoddiśya bhāskaram ।।
na kule jāyate teṣāṃ daridro vyādhito api vā ।
śvetayā raktayā vāpi pītamṛttikayāpi vā ।।
upalepanakartā tu cintitaṃ labhate phalam ।
citrabhānuṃ vicitrais tu kusumaiś ca sugandhibhiḥ ।।
pūjayet sopavāso yaḥ sa kāmān īpsitāṃl labhet ।
ghṛtena dīpaṃ prajvālya tilatailena vā punaḥ ।।
ādityaṃ pūjayed yas tu cakṣuṣā na sa hīyate ।
dīpadātā naro nityaṃ jñānadīpena dīpyate ।।
tilāḥ pavitraṃ tailaṃ vā tilagodānam uttamam ।
agnikārye ca dīpe ca mahāpātakanāśanam ।।
dīpaṃ dadāti yo nityaṃ devatāyataneṣu ca ।
catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu rūpavān subhago bhavet ।।
havirbhiḥ prathamaḥ kalpo dvitīyaś cauṣadhīrasaiḥ ।
vasāmedosthiniryāsair na tu deyaḥ kathaṃcana ।।
bhaved ūrdhvagatir dīpo na kadācid adhogatiḥ ।
dātā dīpyati cāpy evaṃ na tiryaggatim āpnuyāt ।।
jvalamānaṃ sadā dīpaṃ na haren nāpi nāśayet ।
dīpahartā naro bandhaṃ nāśaṃ krodhaṃ tamo vrajet ।।
dīpadātā svargaloke dīpamāleva rājate ।
yaḥ samālabhate nityaṃ kuṅkumāgurucandanaiḥ ।।
saṃpadyate naraḥ pretya dhanena yaśasā śriyā ।
raktacandanasaṃmiśrai raktapuṣpaiḥ śucir naraḥ ।।
udaye arghyaṃ sadā dattvā siddhiṃ saṃvatsarāl labhet ।
udayāt parivarteta yāvad astamane sthitaḥ ।।
japann abhimukhaḥ kiṃcin mantraṃ stotram athāpi vā ।
ādityavratam etat tu mahāpātakanāśanam ।।
arghyeṇa sahitaṃ caiva sarve sāṅgaṃ pradāpayet ।
udaye śraddhayā yuktaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
suvarṇadhenuanaḍvāha- vasudhāvastrasaṃyutam ।
arghyapradātā labhate saptajanmānugaṃ phalam ।।
agnau toye antarikṣe ca śucau bhūmyāṃ tathaiva ca ।
pratimāyāṃ tathā piṇḍyāṃ deyam arghyaṃ prayatnataḥ ।।
nāpasavyaṃ na savyaṃ ca dadyād abhimukhaḥ sadā ।
saghṛtaṃ guggulaṃ vāpi raver bhaktisamanvitaḥ ।।
tatkṣaṇāt sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ।
śrīvāsaṃ caturasraṃ ca devadāruṃ tathaiva ca ।।
karpūrāgarudhūpāni dattvā vai svargagāminaḥ ।
ayane tūttare sūryam athavā dakṣiṇāyane ।।
pūjayitvā viśeṣeṇa sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।
viṣuveṣūparāgeṣu ṣaḍaśītimukheṣu ca ।।
pūjayitvā viśeṣeṇa sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।
evaṃ velāsu sarvāsu sarvakālaṃ ca mānavaḥ ।।
bhaktyā pūjayate yo arkaṃ so arkaloke mahīyate ।
kṛsaraiḥ pāyasaiḥ pūpaiḥ phalamūlaghṛtaudanaiḥ ।।
baliṃ kṛtvā tu sūryāya sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt ।
ghṛtena tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvasiddho bhaven naraḥ ।।
kṣīreṇa tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā manas tāpair na yujyate ।
dadhnā tu tarpaṇaṃ kṛtvā kāryasiddhiṃ labhen naraḥ ।।
snānārtham āhared yas tu jalaṃ bhānoḥ samāhitaḥ ।
tīrtheṣu śucitāpannaḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ।।
chattraṃ dhvajaṃ vitānaṃ vā patākāṃ cāmarāṇi ca ।
śraddhayā bhānave dattvā gatim iṣṭām avāpnuyāt ।।
yad yad dravyaṃ naro bhaktyā ādityāya prayacchati ।
tat tasya śatasāhasram utpādayati bhāskaraḥ ।।
mānasaṃ vācikaṃ vāpi kāyajaṃ yac ca duṣkṛtam ।
sarvaṃ sūryaprasādena tad aśeṣaṃ vyapohati ।।
ekāhenāpi yad bhānoḥ pūjāyāḥ prāpyate phalam ।
yathoktadakṣiṇair viprair na tat kratuśatair api ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
aho devasya māhātmyaṃ śrutam evaṃ jagatpate ।
bhāskarasya suraśreṣṭha vadatas teṣu durlabham ।।
bhūyaḥ prabrūhi deveśa yat pṛcchāmo jagatpate ।
śrotum icchāmahe brahman paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
gṛhastho brahmacārī ca vānaprastho atha bhikṣukaḥ ।
ya icchen mokṣam āsthātuṃ devatāṃ kāṃ yajeta saḥ ।।
kuto hy asyākṣayaḥ svargaḥ kuto niḥśreyasaṃ param ।
svargataś caiva kiṃ kuryād yena na cyavate punaḥ ।।
devānāṃ cātra ko devaḥ pitṝṇāṃ caiva kaḥ pitā ।
yasmāt parataraṃ nāsti tan me brūhi sureśvara ।।
kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
pralaye ca kam abhyeti tad bhavān vaktum arhati ।।
{brahmovāca 
udyann evaiṣa kurute jagad vitimiraṃ karaiḥ ।
nātaḥ parataro devaḥ kaścid anyo dvijottamāḥ ।।
anādinidhano hy eṣa puruṣaḥ śāśvato avyayaḥ ।
tāpayaty eṣa trīṃl lokān bhavan raśmibhir ulbaṇaḥ ।।
sarvadevamayo hy eṣa tapatāṃ tapano varaḥ ।
sarvasya jagato nāthaḥ sarvasākṣī jagatpatiḥ ।।
saṃkṣipaty eṣa bhūtāni tathā visṛjate punaḥ ।
eṣa bhāti tapaty eṣa varṣaty eṣa gabhastibhiḥ ।।
eṣa dhātā vidhātā ca bhūtādir bhūtabhāvanaḥ ।
na hy eṣa kṣayam āyāti nityam akṣayamaṇḍalaḥ ।।
pitṝṇāṃ ca pitā hy eṣa devatānāṃ hi devatā ।
dhruvaṃ sthānaṃ smṛtaṃ hy etad yasmān na cyavate punaḥ ।।
sargakāle jagat kṛtsnam ādityāt saṃprasūyate ।
pralaye ca tam abhyeti bhāskaraṃ dīptatejasam ।।
yoginaś cāpy asaṃkhyātās tyaktvā gṛhakalevaram ।
vāyur bhūtvā viśanty asmiṃs tejorāśau divākare ।।
asya raśmisahasrāṇi śākhā iva vihaṃgamāḥ ।
vasanty āśritya munayaḥ saṃsiddhā daivataiḥ saha ।।
gṛhasthā janakādyāś ca rājāno yogadharmiṇaḥ ।
vālakhilyādayaś caiva ṛṣayo brahmavādinaḥ ।।
vānaprasthāś ca ye cānye vyāsādyā bhikṣavas tathā ।
yogam āsthāya sarve te praviṣṭāḥ sūryamaṇḍalam ।।
śuko vyāsasutaḥ śrīmān yogadharmam avāpya saḥ ।
ādityakiraṇān gatvā hy apunarbhāvam āsthitaḥ ।।
śabdamātraśrutimukhā brahmaviṣṇuśivādayaḥ ।
pratyakṣo ayaṃ paro devaḥ sūryas timiranāśanaḥ ।।
tasmād anyatra bhaktir hi na kāryā śubham icchatā ।
yasmād dṛṣṭer agamyās te devā viṣṇupurogamāḥ ।।
ato bhavadbhiḥ satatam abhyarcyo bhagavān raviḥ ।
sa hi mātā pitā caiva kṛtsnasya jagato guruḥ ।।
anādyo lokanātho asau raśmimālī jagatpatiḥ ।
mitratve ca sthito yasmāt tapas tepe dvijottamāḥ ।।
anādinidhano brahmā nityaś cākṣaya eva ca ।
sṛṣṭvā sasāgarān dvīpān bhuvanāni caturdaśa ।।
lokānāṃ sa hitārthāya sthitaś candrasarittaṭe ।
sṛṣṭvā prajāpatīn sarvān sṛṣṭvā ca vividhāḥ prajāḥ ।।
tataḥ śatasahasrāṃśur avyaktaś ca punaḥ svayam ।
kṛtvā dvādaśadhātmānam ādityam upapadyate ।।
indro dhātātha parjanyas tvaṣṭā pūṣāryamā bhagaḥ ।
vivasvān viṣṇur aṃśaś ca varuṇo mitra eva ca ।।
ābhir dvādaśabhis tena sūryeṇa paramātmanā ।
kṛtsnaṃ jagad idaṃ vyāptaṃ mūrtibhiś ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
tasya yā prathamā mūrtir ādityasyendrasaṃjñitā ।
sthitā sā devarājatve devānāṃ ripunāśinī ।।
dvitīyā tasya yā mūrtir nāmnā dhāteti kīrtitā ।
sthitā prajāpatitvena vividhāḥ sṛjate prajāḥ ।।
tṛtīyārkasya yā mūrtiḥ parjanya iti viśrutā ।
megheṣv eva sthitā sā tu varṣate ca gabhastibhiḥ ।।
caturthī tasya yā mūrtir nāmnā tvaṣṭeti viśrutā ।
sthitā vanaspatau sā tu oṣadhīṣu ca sarvataḥ ।।
pañcamī tasya yā mūrtir nāmnā pūṣeti viśrutā ।
anne vyavasthitā sā tu prajāṃ puṣṇāti nityaśaḥ ।।
mūrtiḥ ṣaṣṭhī raver yā tu aryamā iti viśrutā ।
vāyoḥ saṃsaraṇā sā tu deveṣv eva samāśritā ।।
bhānor yā saptamī mūrtir nāmnā bhageti viśrutā ।
bhūyiṣv avasthitā sā tu śarīreṣu ca dehinām ।।
mūrtir yā tv aṣṭamī tasya vivasvān iti viśrutā ।
agnau pratiṣṭhitā sā tu pacaty annaṃ śarīriṇām ।।
navamī citrabhānor yā mūrtir viṣṇuś ca nāmataḥ ।
prādurbhavati sā nityaṃ devānām arisūdanī ।।
daśamī tasya yā mūrtir aṃśumān iti viśrutā ।
vāyau pratiṣṭhitā sā tu prahlādayati vai prajāḥ ।।
mūrtis tv ekādaśī bhānor nāmnā varuṇasaṃjñitā ।
jaleṣv avasthitā sā tu prajāṃ puṣṇāti nityaśaḥ ।।
mūrtir yā dvādaśī bhānor nāmnā mitreti saṃjñitā ।
lokānāṃ sā hitārthāya sthitā candrasarittaṭe ।।
vāyubhakṣas tapas tepe sthitvā maitreṇa cakṣuṣā ।
anugṛhṇan sadā bhaktān varair nānāvidhais tu saḥ ।।
evaṃ sā jagatāṃ mūrtir hitā vihitā purā ।
tatra mitraḥ sthito yasmāt tasmān mitraṃ paraṃ smṛtam ।।
ābhir dvādaśabhis tena savitrā paramātmanā ।
kṛtsnaṃ jagad idaṃ vyāptaṃ mūrtibhiś ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
tasmād dhyeyo namasyaś ca dvādaśasthāsu mūrtiṣu ।
bhaktimadbhir narair nityaṃ tadgatenāntarātmanā ।।
ity evaṃ dvādaśādityān namaskṛtvā tu mānavaḥ ।
nityaṃ śrutvā paṭhitvā ca sūryaloke mahīyate ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
yadi tāvad ayaṃ sūryaś cādidevaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
tataḥ kasmāt tapas tepe varepsuḥ prākṛto yathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad vaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi paraṃ guhyaṃ vibhāvasoḥ ।
pṛṣṭaṃ mitreṇa yat pūrvaṃ nāradāya mahātmane ।।
prāṅ mayoktās tu yuṣmabhyaṃ raver dvādaśa mūrtayaḥ ।
mitraś ca varuṇaś cobhau tāsāṃ tapasi saṃsthitau ।।
abbhakṣo varuṇas tāsāṃ tasthau paścimasāgare ।
mitro mitravane cāsmin vāyubhakṣo abhavat tadā ।।
atha merugireḥ śṛṅgāt pracyuto gandhamādanāt ।
nāradas tu mahāyogī sarvāṃl lokāṃś caran vaśī ।।
ājagāmātha tatraiva yatra mitro acarat tapaḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tapasyantaṃ tasya kautūhalaṃ hy abhūt ।।
yo akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva vyaktāvyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
dhṛtam ekātmakaṃ yena trailokyaṃ sumahātmanā ।।
yaḥ pitā sarvadevānāṃ parāṇām api yaḥ paraḥ ।
ayajad devatāḥ kās tu pitṝn vā kān asau yajet ।
iti saṃcintya manasā taṃ devaṃ nārado abravīt ।।
{nārada uvāca 
vedeṣu sapurāṇeṣu sāṅgopāṅgeṣu gīyase ।
tvam ajaḥ śāśvato dhātā tvaṃ nidhānam anuttamam ।।
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavac caiva tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ।
catvāraś cāśramā deva gṛhasthādyās tathaiva hi ।।
yajanti tvām aharahas tvāṃ mūrtitvaṃ samāśritam ।
pitā mātā ca sarvasya daivataṃ tvaṃ hi śāśvatam ।।
yajase pitaraṃ kaṃ tvaṃ devaṃ vāpi na vidmahe ।।
{mitra uvāca 
avācyam etad vaktavyaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ sanātanam ।
tvayi bhaktimati brahman pravakṣyāmi yathātatham ।।
yat tat sūkṣmam avijñeyam avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam ।
indriyair indriyārthaiś ca sarvabhūtair vivarjitam ।।
sa hy antarātmā bhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñaś caiva kathyate ।
triguṇād vyatirikto asau puruṣaś caiva kalpitaḥ ।।
hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān saiva buddhir iti smṛtaḥ ।
mahān iti ca yogeṣu pradhānam iti kathyate ।।
sāṃkhye ca kathyate yoge nāmabhir bahudhātmakaḥ ।
sa ca trirūpo viśvātmā śarvo akṣara iti smṛtaḥ ।।
dhṛtam ekātmakaṃ tena trailokyam idam ātmanā ।
aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu sarveṣu nivasaty asau ।।
vasann api śarīreṣu na sa lipyeta karmabhiḥ ।
mamāntarātmā tava ca ye cānye dehasaṃsthitāḥ ।।
sarveṣāṃ sākṣibhūto asau na grāhyaḥ kenacit kvacit ।
saguṇo nirguṇo viśvo jñānagamyo hy asau smṛtaḥ ।।
sarvataḥpāṇipādāntaḥ sarvatokṣiśiromukhaḥ ।
sarvataḥśrutimāṃl loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati ।।
viśvamūrdhā viśvabhujo viśvapādākṣināsikaḥ ।
ekaś carati vai kṣetre svairacārī yathāsukham ।।
kṣetrāṇīha śarīrāṇi teṣāṃ caiva yathāsukham ।
tāni vetti sa yogātmā tataḥ kṣetrajña ucyate ।।
avyakte ca pure śete puruṣas tena cocyate ।
viśvaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jñeyaṃ sa ca sarvatra ucyate ।।
tasmāt sa bahurūpatvād viśvarūpa iti smṛtaḥ ।
tasyaikasya mahattvaṃ hi sa caikaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
mahāpuruṣaśabdaṃ hi bibharty ekaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
sa tu vidhikriyāyattaḥ sṛjaty ātmānam ātmanā ।।
śatadhā sahasradhā caiva tathā śatasahasradhā ।
koṭiśaś ca karoty eṣa pratyagātmānam ātmanā ।।
ākāśāt patitaṃ toyaṃ yāti svādvantaraṃ yathā ।
bhūme rasaviśeṣeṇa tathā guṇarasāt tu saḥ ।।
eka eva yathā vāyur deheṣv eva hi pañcadhā ।
ekatvaṃ ca pṛthaktvaṃ ca tathā tasya na saṃśayaḥ ।।
sthānāntaraviśeṣāc ca yathāgnir labhate parām ।
saṃjñāṃ tathā mune so ayaṃ brahmādiṣu tathāpnuyāt ।।
yathā dīpasahasrāṇi dīpa ekaḥ prasūyate ।
tathā rūpasahasrāṇi sa ekaḥ saṃprasūyate ।।
yadā sa budhyaty ātmānaṃ tadā bhavati kevalaḥ ।
ekatvapralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca pravartate ।।
nityaṃ hi nāsti jagati bhūtaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
akṣayaś cāprameyaś ca sarvagaś ca sa ucyate ।।
tasmād avyaktam utpannaṃ triguṇaṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
avyaktāvyaktabhāvasthā yā sā prakṛtir ucyate ।।
tāṃ yoniṃ brahmaṇo viddhi yo asau sadasadātmakaḥ ।
loke ca pūjyate yo asau daive pitrye ca karmaṇi ।।
nāsti tasmāt paro hy anyaḥ pitā devo api vā dvijāḥ ।
ātmanā sa tu vijñeyas tatas taṃ pūjayāmy aham ।।
svargeṣv api hi ye kecit taṃ namasyanti dehinaḥ ।
tena gacchanti devarṣe tenoddiṣṭaphalāṃ gatim ।।
taṃ devāḥ svāśramasthāś ca nānāmūrtisamāśritāḥ ।
bhaktyā saṃpūjayanty ādyaṃ gatiś caiṣāṃ dadāti saḥ ।।
sa hi sarvagataś caiva nirguṇaś caiva kathyate ।
evaṃ matvā yathājñānaṃ pūjayāmi divākaram ।।
ye ca tadbhāvitā loka ekatattvaṃ samāśritāḥ ।
etad apy adhikaṃ teṣāṃ yad ekaṃ praviśanty uta ।।
iti guhyasamuddeśas tava nārada kīrtitaḥ ।
asmadbhaktyāpi devarṣe tvayāpi paramaṃ smṛtam ।।
surair vā munibhir vāpi purāṇair varadaṃ smṛtam ।
sarve ca paramātmānaṃ pūjayanti divākaram ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam etat purākhyātaṃ nāradāya tu bhānunā ।
mayāpi ca samākhyātā kathā bhānor dvijottamāḥ ।।
idam ākhyānam ākhyeyaṃ mayākhyātaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
na hy anādityabhaktāya idaṃ deyaṃ kadācana ।।
yaś caitac chrāvayen nityaṃ yaś caiva śṛṇuyān naraḥ ।
sa sahasrārciṣaṃ devaṃ praviśen nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
mucyetārtas tathā rogāc chrutvemām āditaḥ kathām ।
jijñāsur labhate jñānaṃ gatim iṣṭāṃ tathaiva ca ।।
kṣaṇena labhate adhvānam idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate mune ।
yo yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ sa taṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam ।।
tasmād bhavadbhiḥ satataṃ smartavyo bhagavān raviḥ ।
sa ca dhātā vidhātā ca sarvasya jagataḥ prabhuḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ādityamūlam akhilaṃ trailokyaṃ munisattamāḥ ।
bhavaty asmāj jagat sarvaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam ।।
rudropendramahendrāṇāṃ viprendratridivaukasām ।
mahādyutimatāṃ caiva tejo ayaṃ sārvalaukikam ।।
sarvātmā sarvalokeśo devadevaḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
sūrya eva trilokasya mūlaṃ paramadaivatam ।।
agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyag ādityam upatiṣṭhate ।
ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ ।।
sūryāt prasūyate sarvaṃ tatra caiva pralīyate ।
bhāvābhāvau hi lokānām ādityān niḥsṛtau purā ।।
etat tu dhyānināṃ dhyānaṃ mokṣaś cāpy eṣa mokṣiṇām ।
tatra gacchanti nirvāṇaṃ jāyante asmāt punaḥ punaḥ ।।
kṣaṇā muhūrtā divasā niśā pakṣāś ca nityaśaḥ ।
māsāḥ saṃvatsarāś caiva ṛtavaś ca yugāni ca ।।
athādityād ṛte hy eṣāṃ kālasaṃkhyā na vidyate ।
kālād ṛte na niyamo nāgnau viharaṇakriyā ।।
ṛtūnām avibhāgaś ca tataḥ puṣpaphalaṃ kutaḥ ।
kuto vai sasyaniṣpattis tṛṇauṣadhigaṇaḥ kutaḥ ।।
abhāvo vyavahārāṇāṃ jantūnāṃ divi ceha ca ।
jagatprabhāvād viśate bhāskarād vāritaskarāt ।।
nāvṛṣṭyā tapate sūryo nāvṛṣṭyā pariśuṣyati ।
nāvṛṣṭyā paridhiṃ dhatte vāriṇā dīpyate raviḥ ।।
vasante kapilaḥ sūryo grīṣme kāñcanasaṃnibhaḥ ।
śveto varṣāsu varṇena pāṇḍuḥ śaradi bhāskaraḥ ।।
hemante tāmravarṇābhaḥ śiśire lohito raviḥ ।
iti varṇāḥ samākhyātāḥ sūryasya ṛtusaṃbhavāḥ ।।
ṛtusvabhāvavarṇaiś ca sūryaḥ kṣemasubhikṣakṛt ।
athādityasya nāmāni sāmānyāni dvijottamāḥ ।।
dvādaśaiva pṛthaktvena tāni vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ ।
ādityaḥ savitā sūryo mihiro arkaḥ prabhākaraḥ ।।
mārtaṇḍo bhāskaro bhānuś citrabhānur divākaraḥ ।
ravir dvādaśabhis teṣāṃ jñeyaḥ sāmānyanāmabhiḥ ।।
viṣṇur dhātā bhagaḥ pūṣā mitrendrau varuṇo aryamā ।
vivasvān aṃśumāṃs tvaṣṭā parjanyo dvādaśaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
ity ete dvādaśādityāḥ pṛthaktvena vyavasthitāḥ ।
uttiṣṭhanti sadā hy ete māsair dvādaśabhiḥ kramāt ।।
viṣṇus tapati caitre tu vaiśākhe cāryamā tathā ।
vivasvāñ jyeṣṭhamāse tu āṣāḍhe cāṃśumān smṛtaḥ ।।
parjanyaḥ śrāvaṇe māsi varuṇaḥ prauṣṭhasaṃjñake ।
indra āśvayuje māsi dhātā tapati kārttike ।।
mārgaśīrṣe tathā mitraḥ pauṣe pūṣā divākaraḥ ।
māghe bhagas tu vijñeyas tvaṣṭā tapati phālgune ।।
śatair dvādaśabhir viṣṇū raśmibhir dīpyate sadā ।
dīpyate gosahasreṇa śataiś ca tribhir aryamā ।।
dviḥsaptakair vivasvāṃs tu aṃśumān pañcabhis tribhiḥ ।
vivasvān iva parjanyo varuṇaś cāryamā tathā ।।
mitravad bhagavāṃs tvaṣṭā sahasreṇa śatena ca ।
indras tu dviguṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhir dhātaikādaśabhiḥ śataiḥ ।।
sahasreṇa tu mitro vai pūṣā tu navabhiḥ śataiḥ ।
uttaropakrame arkasya vardhante raśmayas tathā ।।
dakṣiṇopakrame bhūyo hrasante sūryaraśmayaḥ ।
evaṃ raśmisahasraṃ tu sūryalokād anugraham ।।
evaṃ nāmnāṃ caturviṃśad eka eṣāṃ prakīrtitaḥ ।
vistareṇa sahasraṃ tu punar anyat prakīrtitam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
ye tannāmasahasreṇa stuvanty arkaṃ prajāpate ।
teṣāṃ bhavati kiṃ puṇyaṃ gatiś ca parameśvara ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ sārabhūtaṃ sanātanam ।
alaṃ nāmasahasreṇa paṭhann evaṃ stavaṃ śubham ।।
yāni nāmāni guhyāni pavitrāṇi śubhāni ca ।
tāni vaḥ kīrtayiṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ bhāskarasya vai ।।
vikartano vivasvāṃś ca mārtaṇḍo bhāskaro raviḥ ।
lokaprakāśakaḥ śrīmāṃl lokacakṣur maheśvaraḥ ।।
lokasākṣī trilokeśaḥ kartā hartā tamisrahā ।
tapanas tāpanaś caiva śuciḥ saptāśvavāhanaḥ ।।
gabhastihasto brahmā ca sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ ।
ekaviṃśati ity eṣa stava iṣṭaḥ sadā raveḥ ।।
śarīrārogyadaś caiva dhanavṛddhiyaśaskaraḥ ।
stavarāja iti khyātas triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ ।।
ya etena dvijaśreṣṭhā dvisaṃdhye astamanodaye ।
stauti sūryaṃ śucir bhūtvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
mānasaṃ vācikaṃ vāpi dehajaṃ karmajaṃ tathā ।
ekajapyena tat sarvaṃ naśyaty arkasya saṃnidhau ।।
ekajapyaś ca homaś ca saṃdhyopāsanam eva ca ।
dhūpamantrārghyamantraś ca balimantras tathaiva ca ।।
annapradāne dāne ca praṇipāte pradakṣiṇe ।
pūjito ayaṃ mahāmantraḥ sarvapāpaharaḥ śubhaḥ ।।
tasmād yūyaṃ prayatnena stavenānena vai dvijāḥ ।
stuvīdhvaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
nirguṇaḥ śāśvato devas tvayā prokto divākaraḥ ।
punar dvādaśadhā jātaḥ śruto asmābhis tvayoditaḥ ।।
sa kathaṃ tejaso raśmiḥ striyā garbhe mahādyutiḥ ।
saṃbhūto bhāskaro jātas tatra naḥ saṃśayo mahān ।।
{brahmovāca 
dakṣasya hi sutāḥ śreṣṭhā babhūvuḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ śobhanāḥ ।
aditir ditir danuś caiva vinatādyās tathaiva ca ।।
dakṣas tāḥ pradadau kanyāḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa ।
aditir janayām āsa devāṃs tribhuvaneśvarān ।।
daityān ditir danuś cogrān dānavān baladarpitān ।
vinatādyās tathā cānyāḥ suṣuvuḥ sthānujaṅgamān ।।
tasyātha putradauhitraiḥ pautradauhitrakādibhiḥ ।
vyāptam etaj jagat sarvaṃ teṣāṃ tāsāṃ ca vai mune ।।
teṣāṃ kaśyapaputrāṇāṃ pradhānā devatāgaṇāḥ ।
sāttvikā rājasāś cānye tāmasāś ca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
devān yajñabhujaś cakre tathā tribhuvaneśvarān ।
sraṣṭā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ ।।
tān abādhanta sahitāḥ sāpatnyād daityadānavāḥ ।
tato nirākṛtān putrān daiteyair dānavais tathā ।।
hataṃ tribhuvanaṃ dṛṣṭvā aditir munisattamāḥ ।
ācchinad yajñabhāgāṃś ca kṣudhā saṃpīḍitān bhṛśam ।।
ārādhanāya savituḥ paraṃ yatnaṃ pracakrame ।
ekāgrā niyatāhārā paraṃ niyamam āsthitā ।
tuṣṭāva tejasāṃ rāśiṃ gaganasthaṃ divākaram ।।
{aditir uvāca 
namas tubhyaṃ paraṃ sūkṣmaṃ supuṇyaṃ bibhrate atulam ।
dhāma dhāmavatām īśaṃ dhāmādhāraṃ ca śāśvatam ।।
jagatām upakārāya tvām ahaṃ staumi gopate ।
ādadānasya yad rūpaṃ tīvraṃ tasmai namāmy aham ।।
grahītum aṣṭamāsena kālenāmbumayaṃ rasam ।
bibhratas tava yad rūpam atitīvraṃ natāsmi tat ।।
sametam agnisomābhyāṃ namas tasmai guṇātmane ।
yad rūpam ṛgyajuḥsāmnām aikyena tapate tava ।।
viśvam etat trayīsaṃjñaṃ namas tasmai vibhāvaso ।
yat tu tasmāt paraṃ rūpam om ity uktvābhisaṃhitam ।
asthūlaṃ sthūlam amalaṃ namas tasmai sanātana ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ sā niyatā devī cakre stotram aharniśam ।
nirāhārā vivasvantam ārirādhayiṣur dvijāḥ ।।
tataḥ kālena mahatā bhagavāṃs tapano dvijāḥ ।
pratyakṣatām agāt tasyā dākṣāyaṇyā dvijottamāḥ ।।
sā dadarśa mahākūṭaṃ tejaso ambarasaṃvṛtam ।
bhūmau ca saṃsthitaṃ bhāsvaj- jvālābhir atidurdṛśam ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tato devī sādhvasaṃ paramaṃ gatā ।।
{aditir uvāca 
jagadādya prasīdeti na tvāṃ paśyāmi gopate ।
prasādaṃ kuru paśyeyaṃ yad rūpaṃ te divākara ।
bhaktānukampaka vibho tvadbhaktān pāhi me sutān ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ sa tejasas tasmād āvirbhūto vibhāvasuḥ ।
adṛśyata tadādityas taptatāmropamaḥ prabhuḥ ।।
tatas tāṃ praṇatāṃ devīṃ tasyāsaṃdarśane dvijāḥ ।
prāha bhāsvān vṛṇuṣvaikaṃ varaṃ matto yam icchasi ।।
praṇatā śirasā sā tu jānupīḍitamedinī ।
pratyuvāca vivasvantaṃ varadaṃ samupasthitam ।।
{aditir uvāca 
deva prasīda putrāṇāṃ hṛtaṃ tribhuvanaṃ mama ।
yajñabhāgāś ca daiteyair dānavaiś ca balādhikaiḥ ।।
tannimittaṃ prasādaṃ tvaṃ kuruṣva mama gopate ।
aṃśena teṣāṃ bhrātṛtvaṃ gatvā tān nāśaye ripūn ।।
yathā me tanayā bhūyo yajñabhāgabhujaḥ prabho ।
bhaveyur adhipāś caiva trailokyasya divākara ।।
tathānukalpaṃ putrāṇāṃ suprasanno rave mama ।
kuru prasannārtihara kāryaṃ kartā tvam ucyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas tām āha bhagavān bhāskaro vāritaskaraḥ ।
praṇatām aditiṃ viprāḥ prasādasumukho vibhuḥ ।।
{sūrya uvāca 
sahasrāṃśena te garbhaḥ saṃbhūyāham aśeṣataḥ ।
tvatputraśatrūn dakṣo ahaṃ nāśayāmy āśu nirvṛtaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā bhagavān bhāsvān antardhānam upāgataḥ ।
nivṛttā sāpi tapasaḥ saṃprāptākhilavāñchitā ।।
tato raśmisahasrāt tu suṣumnākhyo raveḥ karaḥ ।
tataḥ saṃvatsarasyānte tatkāmapūraṇāya saḥ ।।
nivāsaṃ savitā cakre devamātus tadodare ।
kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādīṃś ca sā cakre susamāhitā ।।
śucinā dhārayāmy enaṃ divyaṃ garbham iti dvijāḥ ।
tatas tāṃ kaśyapaḥ prāha kiṃcitkopaplutākṣaram ।।
{kaśyapa uvāca 
kiṃ mārayasi garbhāṇḍam iti nityopavāsinī ।
{brahmovāca 
sā ca taṃ prāha garbhāṇḍam etat paśyeti kopanā ।
na māritaṃ vipakṣāṇāṃ mṛtyur eva bhaviṣyati ।।
ity uktvā taṃ tadā garbham utsasarja surāraṇiḥ ।
jājvalyamānaṃ tejobhiḥ patyur vacanakopitā ।।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaśyapo garbham udyadbhāskaravarcasam ।
tuṣṭāva praṇato bhūtvā vāgbhir ādyābhir ādarāt ।।
saṃstūyamānaḥ sa tadā garbhāṇḍāt prakaṭo abhavat ।
padmapattrasavarṇābhas tejasā vyāptadiṅmukhaḥ ।।
athāntarikṣād ābhāṣya kaśyapaṃ munisattamam ।
satoyameghagambhīrā vāg uvācāśarīriṇī ।।
{vāg uvāca 
māritaṃtepataḥ proktam etad aṇḍaṃ tvayāditeḥ ।
tasmān mune sutas te ayaṃ mārtaṇḍākhyo bhaviṣyati ।।
haniṣyaty asurāṃś cāyaṃ yajñabhāgaharān arīn ।
devā niśamyeti vaco gaganāt samupāgatam ।।
praharṣam atulaṃ yātā dānavāś ca hataujasaḥ ।
tato yuddhāya daiteyān ājuhāva śatakratuḥ ।।
saha devair mudā yukto dānavāś ca tam abhyayuḥ ।
teṣāṃ yuddham abhūd ghoraṃ devānām asuraiḥ saha ।।
śastrāstravṛṣṭisaṃdīpta- samastabhuvanāntaram ।
tasmin yuddhe bhagavatā mārtaṇḍena nirīkṣitāḥ ।।
tejasā dahyamānās te bhasmībhūtā mahāsurāḥ ।
tataḥ praharṣam atulaṃ prāptāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ ।।
tuṣṭuvus tejasāṃ yoniṃ mārtaṇḍam aditiṃ tathā ।
svādhikārāṃs tataḥ prāptā yajñabhāgāṃś ca pūrvavat ।।
bhagavān api mārtaṇḍaḥ svādhikāram athākarot ।
kadambapuṣpavad bhāsvān adhaś cordhvaṃ ca raśmibhiḥ ।
vṛto agnipiṇḍasadṛśo dadhre nātisphuṭaṃ vapuḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathaṃ kāntataraṃ paścād rūpaṃ saṃlabdhavān raviḥ ।
kadambagolakākāraṃ tan me brūhi jagatpate ।।
{brahmovāca 
tvaṣṭā tasmai dadau kanyāṃ saṃjñāṃ nāma vivasvate ।
prasādya praṇato bhūtvā viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ ।।
trīṇy apatyāny asau tasyāṃ janayām āsa gopatiḥ ।
dvau putrau sumahābhāgau kanyāṃ ca yamunāṃ tathā ।।
yat tejo abhyadhikaṃ tasya mārtaṇḍasya vivasvataḥ ।
tenātitāpayām āsa trīṃl lokān sacarācarān ।।
tad rūpaṃ golakākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjñā vivasvataḥ ।
asahantī mahat tejaḥ svāṃ chāyāṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{saṃjñovāca 
ahaṃ yāsyāmi bhadraṃ te svam eva bhavanaṃ pituḥ ।
nirvikāraṃ tvayātraiva stheyaṃ macchāsanāc chubhe ।।
imau ca bālakau mahyaṃ kanyā ca varavarṇinī ।
saṃbhāvyā naiva cākhyeyam idaṃ bhagavate tvayā ।।
{chāyovāca 
ā kacagrahaṇād devi ā śāpān naiva karhicit ।
ākhyāsyāmi mataṃ tubhyaṃ gamyatāṃ yatra vāñchitam ।।
ity uktā vrīḍitā saṃjñā jagāma pitṛmandiram ।
vatsarāṇāṃ sahasraṃ tu vasamānā pitur gṛhe ।।
bhartuḥ samīpaṃ yāhīti pitroktā sā punaḥ punaḥ ।
āgacchad vaḍavā bhūtvā kurūn athottarāṃs tataḥ ।।
tatra tepe tapaḥ sādhvī nirāhārā dvijottamāḥ ।
pituḥ samīpaṃ yātāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ vākyatatparā ।।
tadrūpadhāriṇī chāyā bhāskaraṃ samupasthitā ।
tasyāṃ ca bhagavān sūryaḥ saṃjñeyam iti cintayan ।।
tathaiva janayām āsa dvau putrau kanyakāṃ tathā ।
saṃjñā tu pārthivī teṣām ātmajānāṃ tathākarot ।।
snehaṃ na pūrvajātānāṃ tathā kṛtavatī tu sā ।
manus tat kṣāntavāṃs tasyā yamas tasyā na cakṣame ।।
bahudhā pīḍyamānas tu pituḥ patyā suduḥkhitaḥ ।
sa vai kopāc ca bālyāc ca bhāvino arthasya vai balāt ।
padā saṃtarjayām āsa na tu dehe nyapātayat ।।
{chāyovāca 
padā tarjayase yasmāt pitur bhāryāṃ garīyasīm ।
tasmāt tavaiṣa caraṇaḥ patiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
yamas tu tena śāpena bhṛśaṃ pīḍitamānasaḥ ।
manunā saha dharmātmā pitre sarvaṃ nyavedayat ।।
{yama uvāca 
snehena tulyam asmāsu mātā deva na vartate ।
visṛjya jyāyasaṃ bhaktyā kanīyāṃsaṃ bubhūṣati ।।
tasyāṃ mayodyataḥ pādo na tu dehe nipātitaḥ ।
bālyād vā yadi vā mohāt tad bhavān kṣantum arhasi ।।
śapto ahaṃ tāta kopena jananyā tanayo yataḥ ।
tato manye na jananīm imāṃ vai tapatāṃ vara ।।
tava prasādāc caraṇo bhagavan na pated yathā ।
mātṛśāpād ayaṃ me adya tathā cintaya gopate ।।
{ravir uvāca 
asaṃśayaṃ mahat putra bhaviṣyaty atra kāraṇam ।
yena tvām āviśat krodho dharmajñaṃ dharmaśīlinam ।।
sarveṣām eva śāpānāṃ pratighāto hi vidyate ।
na tu mātrābhiśaptānāṃ kvacic chāpanivartanam ।।
na śakyam etan mithyā tu kartuṃ mātur vacas tava ।
kiṃcit te ahaṃ vidhāsyāmi putrasnehād anugraham ।।
kṛmayo māṃsam ādāya prayāsyanti mahītalam ।
kṛtaṃ tasyā vacaḥ satyaṃ tvaṃ ca trāto bhaviṣyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
ādityas tv abravīc chāyāṃ kimarthaṃ tanayeṣu vai ।
tulyeṣv apy adhikaḥ sneha ekaṃ prati kṛtas tvayā ।।
nūnaṃ naiṣāṃ tvaṃ jananī saṃjñā kāpi tvam āgatā ।
nirguṇeṣv apy apatyeṣu mātā śāpaṃ na dāsyati ।।
sā tatpariharantī ca śāpād bhītā tadā raveḥ ।
kathayām āsa vṛttāntaṃ sa śrutvā śvaśuraṃ yayau ।।
sa cāpi taṃ yathānyāyam arcayitvā tadā ravim ।
nirdagdhukāmaṃ roṣeṇa sāntvayānas tam abravīt ।।
{viśvakarmovāca 
tavātitejasā vyāptam idaṃ rūpaṃ suduḥsaham ।
asahantī tu tat saṃjñā vane carati vai tapaḥ ।।
drakṣyate tāṃ bhavān adya svāṃ bhāryāṃ śubhacāriṇīm ।
rūpārthaṃ bhavato araṇye carantīṃ sumahat tapaḥ ।।
śrutaṃ me brahmaṇo vākyaṃ tava tejovarodhane ।
rūpaṃ nirvartayāmy adya tava kāntaṃ divaspate ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas tatheti taṃ prāha tvaṣṭāraṃ bhagavān raviḥ ।
tato vivasvato rūpaṃ prāg āsīt parimaṇḍalam ।।
viśvakarmā tv anujñātaḥ śākadvīpe vivasvatā ।
bhramim āropya tattejaḥ- śātanāyopacakrame ।।
bhramatāśeṣajagatāṃ nābhibhūtena bhāsvatā ।
samudrādrivanopetā tv āruroha mahī nabhaḥ ।।
gaganaṃ cākhilaṃ viprāḥ sacandragrahatārakam ।
adhogataṃ mahābhāgā babhūvākṣiptam ākulam ।।
vikṣiptasalilāḥ sarve babhūvuś ca tathārṇavāḥ ।
vyabhidyanta mahāśailāḥ śīrṇasānunibandhanāḥ ।।
dhruvādhārāṇy aśeṣāṇi dhiṣṇyāni munisattamāḥ ।
truṭyadraśminibandhīni bandhanāni adho yayuḥ ।।
vegabhramaṇasaṃpāta- vāyukṣiptāḥ sahasraśaḥ ।
vyaśīryanta mahāmeghā ghorārāvavirāviṇaḥ ।।
bhāsvadbhramaṇavibhrānta- bhūmyākāśarasātalam ।
jagad ākulam atyarthaṃ tadāsīn munisattamāḥ ।।
trailokyam ākulaṃ vīkṣya bhramamāṇaṃ surarṣayaḥ ।
devāś ca brahmaṇā sārdhaṃ bhāsvantam abhituṣṭuvuḥ ।।
ādidevo asi devānāṃ jātas tvaṃ bhūtaye bhuvaḥ ।
sargasthityantakāleṣu tridhā bhedena tiṣṭhasi ।।
svasti te astu jagannātha gharmavarṣadivākara ।
indrādayas tadā devā likhyamānam athāstuvan ।।
jaya deva jagatsvāmiñ jayāśeṣajagatpate ।
ṛṣayaś ca tataḥ sapta vasiṣṭhātripurogamāḥ ।।
tuṣṭuvur vividhaiḥ stotraiḥ svasti svastītivādinaḥ ।
vedoktibhir athāgryābhir vālakhilyāś ca tuṣṭuvuḥ ।।
agnir ādyāś ca bhāsvantaṃ likhyamānaṃ mudā yutāḥ ।
tvaṃ nātha mokṣiṇāṃ mokṣo dhyeyas tvaṃ dhyānināṃ paraḥ ।।
tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ karmakāṇḍavivartinām ।
saṃpūjyas tvaṃ tu deveśa śaṃ no astu jagatāṃ pate ।।
śaṃ no astu dvipade nityaṃ śaṃ naś cāstu catuṣpade ।
tato vidyādharagaṇā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ ।।
kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve śirobhiḥ praṇatā ravim ।
ūcus te vividhā vāco manaḥśrotrasukhāvahāḥ ।।
sahyaṃ bhavatu tejas te bhūtānāṃ bhūtabhāvana ।
tato hāhāhūhūś caiva nāradas tumburus tathā ।।
upagāyitum ārabdhā gāndharvakuśalā ravim ।
ṣaḍjamadhyamagāndhāra- gānatrayaviśāradāḥ ।।
mūrchanābhiś ca tālaiś ca saṃprayogaiḥ sukhapradam ।
viśvācī ca ghṛtācī ca urvaśy atha tilottamāḥ ।।
menakā sahajanyā ca rambhā cāpsarasāṃ varā ।
nanṛtur jagatām īśe likhyamāne vibhāvasau ।।
bhāvahāvavilāsādyān kurvatyo abhinayān bahūn ।
prāvādyanta tatas tatra vīṇā veṇvādijharjharāḥ ।।
paṇavāḥ puṣkarāś caiva mṛdaṅgāḥ paṭahānakāḥ ।
devadundubhayaḥ śaṅkhāḥ śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।।
gāyadbhiś caiva nṛtyadbhir gandharvair apsarogaṇaiḥ ।
tūryavāditraghoṣaiś ca sarvaṃ kolāhalīkṛtam ।।
tataḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhaktinamrātmamūrtayaḥ ।
likhyamānaṃ sahasrāṃśuṃ praṇemuḥ sarvadevatāḥ ।।
tataḥ kolāhale tasmin sarvadevasamāgame ।
tejasaḥ śātanaṃ cakre viśvakarmā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।।
ājānulikhitaś cāsau nipuṇaṃ viśvakarmaṇā ।
nābhyanandat tu likhanaṃ tatas tenāvatāritaḥ ।।
na tu nirbhartsitaṃ rūpaṃ tejaso hananena tu ।
kāntāt kāntataraṃ rūpam adhikaṃ śuśubhe tataḥ ।।
iti himajalagharmakālahetor 
harakamalāsanaviṣṇusaṃstutasya 
tadupari likhanaṃ niśamya bhānor 
vrajati divākaralokam āyuṣo ante 
evaṃ janma raveḥ pūrvaṃ babhūva munisattamāḥ ।
rūpaṃ ca paramaṃ tasya mayā saṃparikīrtitam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
bhūyo api kathayāsmākaṃ kathāṃ sūryasamāśritām ।
na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ śṛṇvantas tāṃ kathāṃ śubhām ।।
yo ayaṃ dīpto mahātejā vahnirāśisamaprabhaḥ ।
etad veditum icchāmaḥ prabhāvo asya kutaḥ prabho ।।
{brahmovāca 
tamobhūteṣu lokeṣu naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame ।
prakṛter guṇahetus tu pūrvaṃ buddhir ajāyata ।।
ahaṃkāras tato jāto mahābhūtapravartakaḥ ।
vāyvagnir āpaḥ khaṃ bhūmis tatas tv aṇḍam ajāyata ।।
tasminn aṇḍe tv ime lokāḥ sapta caiva pratiṣṭhitāḥ ।
pṛthivī saptabhir dvīpaiḥ samudraiś caiva saptabhiḥ ।।
tatraivāvasthito hy āsīd ahaṃ viṣṇur maheśvaraḥ ।
vimūḍhās tāmasāḥ sarve pradhyāyanti tam īśvaram ।।
tato vai sumahātejāḥ prādurbhūtas tamonudaḥ ।
dhyānayogena cāsmābhir vijñātaḥ savitā tadā ।।
jñātvā ca paramātmānaṃ sarva eva pṛthak pṛthak ।
divyābhiḥ stutibhir devaḥ stuto asmābhis tadeśvaraḥ ।।
ādidevo asi devānām aiśvaryāc ca tvam īśvaraḥ ।
ādikartāsi bhūtānāṃ devadevo divākaraḥ ।।
jīvanaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ devagandharvarakṣasām ।
munikiṃnarasiddhānāṃ tathaivoragapakṣiṇām ।।
tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ mahādevas tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ ।
vāyur indraś ca somaś ca vivasvān varuṇas tathā ।।
tvaṃ kālaḥ sṛṣṭikartā ca hartā bhartā tathā prabhuḥ ।
saritaḥ sāgarāḥ śailā vidyudindradhanūṃṣi ca ।।
pralayaḥ prabhavaś caiva vyaktāvyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
īśvarāt parato vidyā vidyāyāḥ parataḥ śivaḥ ।।
śivāt parataro devas tvam eva parameśvaraḥ ।
sarvataḥpāṇipādāntaḥ sarvatokṣiśiromukhaḥ ।।
sahasrāṃśuḥ sahasrāsyaḥ sahasracaraṇekṣaṇaḥ ।
bhūtādir bhūr bhuvaḥ svaś ca mahaḥ satyaṃ tapo janaḥ ।।
pradīptaṃ dīpanaṃ divyaṃ sarvalokaprakāśakam ।
durnirīkṣaṃ surendrāṇāṃ yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ ।।
surasiddhagaṇair juṣṭaṃ bhṛgvatripulahādibhiḥ ।
stutaṃ paramam avyaktaṃ yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ ।।
vedyaṃ vedavidāṃ nityaṃ sarvajñānasamanvitam ।
sarvadevātidevasya yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ ।।
viśvakṛd viśvabhūtaṃ ca vaiśvānarasurārcitam ।
viśvasthitam acintyaṃ ca yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ ।।
paraṃ yajñāt paraṃ vedāt paraṃ lokāt paraṃ divaḥ ।
paramātmety abhikhyātaṃ yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ ।।
avijñeyam anālakṣyam adhyānagatam avyayam ।
anādinidhanaṃ caiva yad rūpaṃ tasya te namaḥ ।।
namo namaḥ kāraṇakāraṇāya 
namo namaḥ pāpavimocanāya 
namo namas te ditijārdanāya 
namo namo rogavimocanāya 
namo namaḥ sarvavarapradāya 
namo namaḥ sarvasukhapradāya 
namo namaḥ sarvadhanapradāya 
namo namaḥ sarvamatipradāya 
stutaḥ sa bhagavān evaṃ taijasaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ ।
uvāca vācā kalyāṇyā ko varo vaḥ pradīyatām ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
tavātitaijasaṃ rūpaṃ na kaścit soḍhum utsahet ।
sahanīyaṃ tad bhavatu hitāya jagataḥ prabho ।।
evam astv iti so apy uktvā bhagavān ādikṛt prabhuḥ ।
lokānāṃ kāryasiddhyarthaṃ gharmavarṣahimapradaḥ ।।
tataḥ sāṃkhyāś ca yogāś ca ye cānye mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ ।
dhyāyanti dhyāyino devaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ divākaram ।।
sarvalakṣaṇahīno api yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ ।
sarvaṃ ca tarate pāpaṃ devam arkaṃ samāśritaḥ ।।
agnihotraṃ ca vedāś ca yajñāś ca bahudakṣiṇāḥ ।
bhānor bhaktinamaskāra- kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm ।।
tīrthānāṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam ।
pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ prapadyante divākaram ।।
śakrādyaiḥ saṃstutaṃ devaṃ ye namasyanti bhāskaram ।
sarvakilbiṣanirmuktāḥ sūryalokaṃ vrajanti te ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
cirāt prabhṛti no brahmañ śrotum icchā pravartate ।
nāmnām aṣṭaśataṃ brūhi yat tvayoktaṃ purā raveḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
aṣṭottaraśataṃ nāmnāṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ gadato mama ।
bhāskarasya paraṃ guhyaṃ svargamokṣapradaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
oṃ sūryo aryamā bhagas tvaṣṭā pūṣārkaḥ savitā raviḥ ।
gabhastimān ajaḥ kālo mṛtyur dhātā prabhākaraḥ ।।
pṛthivy āpaś ca tejaś ca khaṃ vāyuś ca parāyaṇam ।
somo bṛhaspatiḥ śukro budho aṅgāraka eva ca ।।
indro vivasvān dīptāṃśuḥ śuciḥ śauriḥ śanaiścaraḥ ।
brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca skando vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ ।।
vaidyuto jāṭharaś cāgnir aindhanas tejasāṃ patiḥ ।
dharmadhvajo vedakartā vedāṅgo vedavāhanaḥ ।।
kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliḥ sarvāmarāśrayaḥ ।
kalākāṣṭhāmuhūrtāś ca kṣapā yāmās tathā kṣaṇāḥ ।।
saṃvatsarakaro aśvatthaḥ kālacakro vibhāvasuḥ ।
puruṣaḥ śāśvato yogī vyaktāvyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
kālādhyakṣaḥ prajādhyakṣo viśvakarmā tamonudaḥ ।
varuṇaḥ sāgaro aṃśaś ca jīmūto jivano arihā ।।
bhūtāśrayo bhūtapatiḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ ।
sraṣṭā saṃvartako vahniḥ sarvasyādir alolupaḥ ।।
anantaḥ kapilo bhānuḥ kāmadaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ ।
jayo viśālo varadaḥ sarvabhūtaniṣevitaḥ ।।
manaḥ suparṇo bhūtādiḥ śīghragaḥ prāṇadhāraṇaḥ ।
dhanvantarir dhūmaketur ādidevo aditeḥ sutaḥ ।।
dvādaśātmā ravir dakṣaḥ pitā mātā pitāmahaḥ ।
svargadvāraṃ prajādvāraṃ mokṣadvāraṃ triviṣṭapam ।।
dehakartā praśāntātmā viśvātmā viśvatomukhaḥ ।
carācarātmā sūkṣmātmā maitreyaḥ karuṇānvitaḥ ।।
etad vai kīrtanīyasya sūryasyāmitatejasaḥ ।
nāmnām aṣṭaśataṃ ramyaṃ mayā proktaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
suragaṇapitṛyakṣasevitaṃ hy 
asuraniśākarasiddhavanditam 
varakanakahutāśanaprabhaṃ 
praṇipatito asmi hitāya bhāskaram 
sūryodaye yaḥ susamāhitaḥ paṭhet 
sa putradārān dhanaratnasaṃcayān 
labheta jātismaratāṃ naraḥ sa tu 
smṛtiṃ ca medhāṃ ca sa vindate parām 
imaṃ stavaṃ devavarasya yo naraḥ 
prakīrtayec chuddhamanāḥ samāhitaḥ 
vimucyate śokadavāgnisāgarāl 
labheta kāmān manasā yathepsitān 
{brahmovāca 
yo asau sarvagato devas tripurāris trilocanaḥ ।
umāpriyakaro rudraś candrārdhakṛtaśekharaḥ ।।
vidrāvya vibudhān sarvān siddhavidyādharān ṛṣīn ।
gandharvayakṣanāgāṃś ca tathānyāṃś ca samāgatān ।।
jaghāna pūrvaṃ dakṣasya yajato dharaṇītale ।
yajñaṃ samṛddhaṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ sarvasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtam ।।
yasya pratāpasaṃtrastāḥ śakrādyās tridivaukasaḥ ।
śāntiṃ na lebhire viprāḥ kailāsaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ।।
sa āste tatra varadaḥ śūlapāṇir vṛṣadhvajaḥ ।
pinākapāṇir bhagavān dakṣayajñavināśanaḥ ।।
mahādevo akale deśe kṛttivāsā vṛṣadhvajaḥ ।
ekāmrake muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarvakāmaprado haraḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kimarthaṃ sa bhavo devaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ ।
jaghāna yajñaṃ dakṣasya devaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtam ।।
na hy alpaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra prabho manyāmahe vayam ।
śrotum icchāmahe brūhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
dakṣasyāsann aṣṭa kanyā yāś caivaṃ patisaṃgatāḥ ।
svebhyo gṛhebhyaś cānīya tāḥ pitābhyarcayad gṛhe ।।
tatas tv abhyarcitā viprā nyavasaṃs tāḥ pitur gṛhe ।
tāsāṃ jyeṣṭhā satī nāma patnī yā tryambakasya vai ।।
nājuhāvātmajāṃ tāṃ vai dakṣo rudram abhidviṣan ।
akarot saṃnatiṃ dakṣe na ca kāṃcin maheśvaraḥ ।।
jāmātā śvaśure tasmin svabhāvāt tejasi sthitaḥ ।
tato jñātvā satī sarvās tās tu prāptāḥ pitur gṛham ।।
jagāma sāpy anāhūtā satī tu svapitur gṛham ।
tābhyo hīnāṃ pitā cakre satyāḥ pūjām asaṃmatām ।
tato abravīt sā pitaraṃ devī krodhasamākulā ।।
{saty uvāca 
yavīyasībhyaḥ śreṣṭhāhaṃ kiṃ na pūjasi māṃ prabho ।
asatkṛtām avasthāṃ yaḥ kṛtavān asi garhitām ।
ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca māṃ tvaṃ satkartum arhasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam ukto abravīd enāṃ dakṣaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ ।।
{dakṣa uvāca 
tvattaḥ śreṣṭhā variṣṭhāś ca pūjyā bālāḥ sutā mama ।
tāsāṃ ye caiva bhartāras te me bahumatāḥ sati ।।
brahmiṣṭhāś ca vratasthāś ca mahāyogāḥ sudhārmikāḥ ।
guṇaiś caivādhikāḥ ślāghyāḥ sarve te tryambakāt sati ।।
vasiṣṭho atriḥ pulastyaś ca aṅgirāḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ ।
bhṛgur marīciś ca tathā śreṣṭhā jāmātaro mama ।।
taiś cāpi spardhate śarvaḥ sarve te caiva taṃ prati ।
tena tvāṃ na bubhūṣāmi pratikūlo hi me bhavaḥ ।।
ity uktavāṃs tadā dakṣaḥ saṃpramūḍhena cetasā ।
śāpārtham ātmanaś caiva yenoktā vai maharṣayaḥ ।
tathoktā pitaraṃ sā vai kruddhā devī tam abravīt ।।
{saty uvāca 
vāṅmanaḥkarmabhir yasmād aduṣṭāṃ māṃ vigarhasi ।
tasmāt tyajāmy ahaṃ deham imaṃ tāta tavātmajam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas tenāpamānena satī duḥkhād amarṣitā ।
abravīd vacanaṃ devī namaskṛtya svayaṃbhuve ।।
{saty uvāca 
yenāham apadehā vai punar dehena bhāsvatā ।
tatrāpy aham asaṃmūḍhā saṃbhūtā dhārmikī punaḥ ।
gaccheyaṃ dharmapatnītvaṃ tryambakasyaiva dhīmataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatraivātha samāsīnā ruṣṭātmānaṃ samādadhe ।
dhārayām āsa cāgneyīṃ dhāraṇām ātmanātmani ।।
tataḥ svātmānam utthāpya vāyunā samudīritaḥ ।
sarvāṅgebhyo viniḥsṛtya vahnir bhasma cakāra tām ।।
tad upaśrutya nidhanaṃ satyā devyāḥ sa śūladhṛk ।
saṃvādaṃ ca tayor buddhvā yāthātathyena śaṃkaraḥ ।
dakṣasya ca vināśāya cukopa bhagavān prabhuḥ ।।
{śrīśaṃkara uvāca 
yasmād avamatā dakṣa sahasaivāgatā satī ।
praśastāś cetarāḥ sarvās tvatsutā bhartṛbhiḥ saha ।।
tasmād vaivasvate prāpte punar ete maharṣayaḥ ।
utpatsyanti dvitīye vai tava yajñe hy ayonijāḥ ।।
hute vai brahmaṇaḥ sattre cākṣuṣasyāntare manoḥ ।
abhivyāhṛtya saptarṣīn dakṣaṃ so abhyaśapat punaḥ ।।
bhavitā mānuṣo rājā cākṣuṣasyāntare manoḥ ।
prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ putraś cāpi pracetasaḥ ।।
dakṣa ity eva nāmnā tvaṃ māriṣāyāṃ janiṣyasi ।
kanyāyāṃ śākhināṃ caiva prāpte vai cākṣuṣāntare ।।
ahaṃ tatrāpi te vighnam ācariṣyāmi durmate ।
dharmakāmārthayukteṣu karmasv iha punaḥ punaḥ ।।
tato vai vyāhṛto dakṣo rudraṃ so abhyaśapat punaḥ ।।
{dakṣa uvāca 
yasmāt tvaṃ matkṛte krūra ṛṣīn vyāhṛtavān asi ।
tasmāt sārdhaṃ surair yajñe na tvāṃ yakṣyanti vai dvijāḥ ।।
kṛtvāhutiṃ tava krūra apaḥ spṛśanti karmasu ।
ihaiva vatsyase loke divaṃ hitvāyugakṣayāt ।
tato devais tu te sārdhaṃ na tu pūjā bhaviṣyati ।।
{rudra uvāca 
cāturvarṇyaṃ tu devānāṃ te cāpy ekatra bhuñjate ।
na bhokṣye sahitas tais tu tato bhokṣyāmy ahaṃ pṛthak ।।
sarveṣāṃ caiva lokānām ādir bhūrloka ucyate ।
tam ahaṃ dhārayāmy ekaḥ svecchayā na tavājñayā ।।
tasmin dhṛte sarvalokāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti śāśvatāḥ ।
tasmād ahaṃ vasāmīha satataṃ na tavājñayā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato abhivyāhṛto dakṣo rudreṇāmitatejasā ।
svāyaṃbhuvīṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā utpanno mānuṣeṣv iha ।।
yadā gṛhapatir dakṣo yajñānām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ ।
samasteneha yajñena so ayajad daivataiḥ saha ।।
atha devī satī yat te prāpte vaivasvate antare ।
menāyāṃ tām umāṃ devīṃ janayām āsa śailarāṭ ।।
sā tu devī satī pūrvam āsīt paścād umābhavat ।
sahavratā bhavasyaiṣā naitayā mucyate bhavaḥ ।।
yāvad icchati saṃsthānaṃ prabhur manvantareṣv iha ।
mārīcaṃ kaśyapaṃ devī yathāditir anuvratā ।।
sārdhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ śrīs tu maghavantaṃ śacī yathā ।
viṣṇuṃ kīrtir uṣā sūryaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ cāpy arundhatī ।।
naitāṃs tu vijahaty etā bhartṝn devyaḥ kathaṃcana ।
evaṃ prācetaso dakṣo jajñe vai cākṣuṣe antare ।।
prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ putraś cāpi pracetasām ।
daśabhyas tu pracetobhyo māriṣāyāṃ punar nṛpa ।।
jajñe rudrābhiśāpena dvitīyam iti naḥ śrutam ।
bhṛgvādayas tu te sarve jajñire vai maharṣayaḥ ।।
ādye tretāyuge pūrvaṃ manor vaivasvatasya ha ।
devasya mahato yajñe vāruṇīṃ bibhratas tanum ।।
ity eṣo anuśayo hy āsīt tayor jātyantare gataḥ ।
prajāpateś ca dakṣasya tryambakasya ca dhīmataḥ ।।
tasmān nānuśayaḥ kāryo vareṣv iha kadācana ।
jātyantaragatasyāpi bhāvitasya śubhāśubhaiḥ ।
jantor na bhūtaye khyātis tan na kāryaṃ vijānatā ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathaṃ roṣeṇa sā pūrvaṃ dakṣasya duhitā satī ।
tyaktvā dehaṃ punar jātā girirājagṛhe prabho ।।
dehāntare kathaṃ tasyāḥ pūrvadeho babhūva ha ।
bhavena saha saṃyogaḥ saṃvādaś ca tayoḥ katham ।।
svayaṃvaraḥ kathaṃ vṛttas tasmin mahati janmani ।
vivāhaś ca jagannātha sarvāścaryasamanvitaḥ ।।
tat sarvaṃ vistarād brahman vaktum arhasi sāṃpratam ।
śrotum icchāmahe puṇyāṃ kathāṃ cātimanoharām ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ kathāṃ pāpapraṇāśinīm ।
umāśaṃkarayoḥ puṇyāṃ sarvakāmaphalapradām ।।
kadācit svagṛhāt prāptaṃ kaśyapaṃ dvipadāṃ varam ।
apṛcchad dhimavān vṛttaṃ loke khyātikaraṃ hitam ।।
kenākṣayāś ca lokāḥ syuḥ khyātiś ca paramā mune ।
tathaiva cārcanīyatvaṃ satsu tat kathayasva me ।।
{kaśyapa uvāca 
apatyena mahābāho sarvam etad avāpyate ।
mamākhyātir apatyena brahmaṇā ṛṣibhiḥ saha ।।
kiṃ na paśyasi śailendra yato māṃ paripṛcchasi ।
vartayiṣyāmi yac cāpi yathādṛṣṭaṃ purācala ।।
vārāṇasīm ahaṃ gacchann apaśyaṃ saṃsthitaṃ divi ।
vimānaṃ sunavaṃ divyam anaupamyaṃ mahardhimat ।।
tasyādhastād ārtanādaṃ gartasthāne śṛṇomy aham ।
tam ahaṃ tapasā jñātvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ sthitaḥ ।।
athāgāt tatra śailendra vipro niyamavāñ śuciḥ ।
tīrthābhiṣekapūtātmā pare tapasi saṃsthitaḥ ।।
atha sa vrajamānas tu vyāghreṇābhīṣito dvijaḥ ।
viveśa taṃ tadā deśaṃ sa garto yatra bhūdhara ।।
gartāyāṃ vīraṇastambe lambamānāṃs tadā munīn ।
apaśyad ārto duḥkhārtāṃs tān apṛcchac ca sa dvijaḥ ।।
{dvija uvāca 
ke yūyaṃ vīraṇastambe lambamānā hy adhomukhāḥ ।
duḥkhitāḥ kena mokṣaś ca yuṣmākaṃ bhavitānaghāḥ ।।
{pitara ūcuḥ 
vayaṃ te kṛtapuṇyasya pitaraḥ sapitāmahāḥ ।
prapitāmahāś ca kliśyāmas tava duṣṭena karmaṇā ।।
narako ayaṃ mahābhāga gartarūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ ।
tvaṃ cāpi vīraṇastambas tvayi lambāmahe vayam ।।
yāvat tvaṃ jīvase vipra tāvad eva vayaṃ sthitāḥ ।
mṛte tvayi gamiṣyāmo narakaṃ pāpacetasaḥ ।।
yadi tvaṃ dārasaṃyogaṃ kṛtvāpatyaṃ guṇottaram ।
utpādayasi tenāsmān mucyema vayam enasaḥ ।।
nānyena tapasā putra tīrthānāṃ ca phalena ca ।
etat kuru mahābuddhe tārayasva pitṝn bhayāt ।।
{kaśyapa uvāca 
sa tatheti pratijñāya ārādhya vṛṣabhadhvajam ।
pitṝn gartāt samuddhṛtya gaṇapān pracakāra ha ।।
svayaṃ rudrasya dayitaḥ suveśo nāma nāmataḥ ।
saṃmato balavāṃś caiva rudrasya gaṇapo abhavat ।।
tasmāt kṛtvā tapo ghoram apatyaṃ guṇavad bhṛśam ।
utpādayasva śailendra sutāṃ tvaṃ varavarṇinīm ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa evam uktvā ṛṣiṇā śailendro niyamasthitaḥ ।
tapaś cakārāpy atulaṃ yena tuṣṭir abhūn mama ।।
tadā tam utpapātāhaṃ varado asmīti cābravam ।
brūhi tuṣṭo asmi śailendra tapasānena suvrata ।।
{himavān uvāca 
bhagavan putram icchāmi guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtam ।
evaṃ varaṃ prayacchasva yadi tuṣṭo asi me prabho ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā girirājasya bho dvijāḥ ।
tadā tasmai varaṃ cāhaṃ dattavān manasepsitam ।।
kanyā bhavitrī śailendra tapasānena suvrata ।
yasyāḥ prabhāvāt sarvatra kīrtim āpsyasi śobhanām ।।
arcitaḥ sarvadevānāṃ tīrthakoṭisamāvṛtaḥ ।
pāvanaś caiva puṇyena devānām api sarvataḥ ।।
jyeṣṭhā ca sā bhavitrī te anye cātra tataḥ śubhe ।।
so api kālena śailendro menāyām udapādayat ।
aparṇām ekaparṇāṃ ca tathā caivaikapāṭalām ।।
nyagrodham ekaparṇaṃ tu pāṭalaṃ caikapāṭalām ।
aśitvā tv ekaparṇāṃ tu aniketas tapo acarat ।।
śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ duścaraṃ devadānavaiḥ ।
āhāram ekaparṇaṃ tu ekaparṇā samācarat ।।
pāṭalena tathaikena vidadhe caikapāṭalā ।
pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu āhāraṃ tāḥ pracakratuḥ ।।
aparṇā tu nirāhārā tāṃ mātā pratyabhāṣata ।
niṣedhayantī co meti mātṛsnehena duḥkhitā ।।
sā tathoktā tayā mātrā devī duścaracāriṇī ।
tenaiva nāmnā lokeṣu vikhyātā surapūjitā ।।
etat tu trikumārīkaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
etāsāṃ tapasāṃ vṛttaṃ yāvad bhūmir dhariṣyati ।।
tapaḥśarīrās tāḥ sarvās tisro yogaṃ samāśritāḥ ।
sarvāś caiva mahābhāgās tathā ca sthirayauvanāḥ ।।
tā lokamātaraś caiva brahmacāriṇya eva ca ।
anugṛhṇanti lokāṃś ca tapasā svena sarvadā ।।
umā tāsāṃ variṣṭhā ca jyeṣṭhā ca varavarṇinī ।
mahāyogabalopetā mahādevam upasthitā ।।
dattakaś cośanā tasya putraḥ sa bhṛgunandanaḥ ।
āsīt tasyaikaparṇā tu devalaṃ suṣuve sutam ।।
yā tu tāsāṃ kumārīṇāṃ tṛtīyā hy ekapāṭalā ।
putraṃ sā tam alarkasya jaigīṣavyam upasthitā ।।
tasyāś ca śaṅkhalikhitau smṛtau putrāv ayonijau ।
umā tu yā mayā tubhyaṃ kīrtitā varavarṇinī ।।
atha tasyās tapoyogāt trailokyam akhilaṃ tadā ।
pradhūpitam ihālakṣya vacas tām aham abravam ।।
devi kiṃ tapasā lokāṃs tāpayiṣyasi śobhane ।
tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ sarvaṃ mā kṛtvā tad vināśaya ।।
tvaṃ hi dhārayase lokān imān sarvān svatejasā ।
brūhi kiṃ te jaganmātaḥ prārthitaṃ saṃpratīha naḥ ।।
{devy uvāca 
yadarthaṃ tapaso hy asya caraṇaṃ me pitāmaha ।
tvam eva tad vijānīṣe tataḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ punaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas tām abravaṃ cāhaṃ yadarthaṃ tapyase śubhe ।
sa tvāṃ svayam upāgamya ihaiva varayiṣyati ।।
śarva eva patiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvalokeśvareśvaraḥ ।
vayaṃ sadaiva yasyeme vaśyā vai kiṃkarāḥ śubhe ।।
sa devadevaḥ parameśvaraḥ svayaṃ 
svayaṃbhur āyāsyati devi te antikam 
udārarūpo vikṛtādirūpaḥ 
samānarūpo api na yasya kasyacit 
maheśvaraḥ parvatalokavāsī 
carācareśaḥ prathamo aprameyaḥ 
vinendunā hīndrasamānavarcasā 
vibhīṣaṇaṃ rūpam ivāsthito yaḥ 
{brahmovāca 
tatas tām abruvan devās tadā gatvā tu sundarīm ।
devi śīghreṇa kālena dhūrjaṭir nīlalohitaḥ ।।
sa bhartā tava deveśo bhavitā mā tapaḥ kṛthāḥ ।
tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya devā viprā gireḥ sutām ।।
jagmuś cādarśanaṃ tasyāḥ sā cāpi virarāma ha ।
sā devī sūktam ity evam uktvā svasyāśrame śubhe ।।
dvāri jātam aśokaṃ ca samupāśritya cāsthitā ।
athāgāc candratilakas tridaśārtiharo haraḥ ।।
vikṛtaṃ rūpam āsthāya hrasvo bāhuka eva ca ।
vibhagnanāsiko bhūtvā kubjaḥ keśāntapiṅgalaḥ ।।
uvāca vikṛtāsyaś ca devi tvāṃ varayāmy aham ।
athomā yogasaṃsiddhā jñātvā śaṃkaram āgatam ।।
antarbhāvaviśuddhātmā kṛpānuṣṭhānalipsayā ।
tam uvācārghapādyābhyāṃ madhuparkeṇa caiva ha ।।
saṃpūjya sumanobhis taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brāhmaṇapriyā ।।
{devy uvāca 
bhagavan na svatantrāhaṃ pitā me tv agraṇīr gṛhe ।
sa prabhur mama dāne vai kanyāhaṃ dvijapuṃgava ।।
gatvā yācasva pitaraṃ mama śailendram avyayam ।
sa ced dadāti māṃ vipra tubhyaṃ tad ucitaṃ mama ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ sa bhagavān devas tathaiva vikṛtaḥ prabhuḥ ।
uvāca śailarājānaṃ sutāṃ me yaccha śailarāṭ ।।
sa taṃ vikṛtarūpeṇa jñātvā rudram athāvyayam ।
bhītaḥ śāpāc ca vimanā idaṃ vacanam abravīt ।।
{śailendra uvāca 
bhagavan nāvamanye ahaṃ brāhmaṇān bhuvi devatāḥ ।
manīṣitaṃ tu yat pūrvaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāmate ।।
svayaṃvaro me duhitur bhavitā viprapūjitaḥ ।
varayed yaṃ svayaṃ tatra sa bhartāsyā bhaviṣyati ।।
tac chrutvā śailavacanaṃ bhagavān vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ ।
devyāḥ samīpam āgatya idam āha mahāmanāḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
devi pitrā tv anujñātaḥ svayaṃvara iti śrutiḥ ।
tatra tvaṃ varayitrī yaṃ sa te bhartā bhaved iti ।।
tad āpṛcchya gamiṣyāmi durlabhāṃ tvāṃ varānane ।
rūpavantaṃ samutsṛjya vṛṇoṣy asadṛśaṃ katham ।।
{brahmovāca 
tenoktā sā tadā tatra bhāvayantī tadīritam ।
bhāvaṃ ca rudranihitaṃ prasādaṃ manasas tathā ।।
saṃprāpyovāca deveśaṃ mā te abhūd buddhir anyathā ।
ahaṃ tvāṃ varayiṣyāmi nādbhutaṃ tu kathaṃcana ।।
athavā te asti saṃdeho mayi vipra kathaṃcana ।
ihaiva tvāṃ mahābhāga varayāmi manogatam ।।
{brahmovāca 
gṛhītvā stabakaṃ sā tu hastābhyāṃ tatra saṃsthitā ।
skandhe śaṃbhoḥ samādhāya devī prāha vṛto asi me ।।
tataḥ sa bhagavān devas tayā devyā vṛtas tadā ।
uvāca tam aśokaṃ vai vācā saṃjīvayann iva ।।
{śiva uvāca 
yasmāt tava supuṇyena stabakena vṛto asmy aham ।
tasmāt tvaṃ jarayā tyaktas tv amaraḥ saṃbhaviṣyasi ।।
kāmarūpī kāmapuṣpaḥ kāmado dayito mama ।
sarvābharaṇapuṣpāḍhyaḥ sarvapuṣpaphalopagaḥ ।।
sarvānnabhakṣakaś caiva amṛtasvāda eva ca ।
sarvagandhaś ca devānāṃ bhaviṣyasi dṛḍhapriyaḥ ।।
nirbhayaḥ sarvalokeṣu bhaviṣyasi sunirvṛtaḥ ।
āśramaṃ vedam atyarthaṃ citrakūṭeti viśrutam ।।
yo hi yāsyati puṇyārthī so aśvamedham avāpsyati ।
yas tu tatra mṛtaś cāpi brahmalokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
yaś cātra niyamair yuktaḥ prāṇān samyak parityajet ।
sa devyās tapasā yukto mahāgaṇapatir bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tadā deva āpṛcchya himavatsutām ।
antardadhe jagatsraṣṭā sarvabhūtapa īśvaraḥ ।।
sāpi devī gate tasmin bhagavaty amitātmani ।
tata evonmukhī bhūtvā śilāyāṃ saṃbabhūva ha ।।
unmukhī sā bhave tasmin maheśe jagatāṃ prabhau ।
niśeva candrarahitā na babhau vimanās tadā ।।
atha śuśrāva śabdaṃ ca bālasyārtasya śailajā ।
sarasy udakasaṃpūrṇe samīpe cāśramasya ca ।।
sa kṛtvā bālarūpaṃ tu devadevaḥ svayaṃ śivaḥ ।
krīḍāhetoḥ saromadhye grāhagrasto abhavat tadā ।।
yogamāyāṃ samāsthāya prapañcodbhavakāraṇam ।
tad rūpaṃ saraso madhye kṛtvaivaṃ samabhāṣata ।।
{bāla uvāca 
trātu māṃ kaścid ity āha grāheṇa hṛtacetasam ।
dhik kaṣṭaṃ bāla evāham aprāptārthamanorathaḥ ।।
prayāmi nidhanaṃ vaktre grāhasyāsya durātmanaḥ ।
śocāmi na svakaṃ dehaṃ grāhagrastaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ ।।
yathā śocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca tapasvinīm ।
grāhagṛhītaṃ māṃ śrutvā prāptaṃ nidhanam utsukau ।।
priyaputrāv ekaputrau prāṇān nūnaṃ tyajiṣyataḥ ।
aho bata sukaṣṭaṃ vai yo ahaṃ bālo akṛtāśramaḥ ।
antargrāheṇa grastas tu yāsyāmi nidhanaṃ kila ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvā tu devī taṃ nādaṃ viprasyārtasya śobhanā ।
utthāya prasthitā tatra yatra tiṣṭhaty asau dvijaḥ ।।
sāpaśyad induvadanā bālakaṃ cārurūpiṇam ।
grāhasya mukham āpannaṃ vepamānam avasthitam ।।
so api grāhavaraḥ śrīmān dṛṣṭvā devīm upāgatām ।
taṃ gṛhītvā drutaṃ yāto madhyaṃ sarasa eva hi ।।
sa kṛṣyamāṇas tejasvī nādam ārtaṃ tadākarot ।
athāha devī duḥkhārtā bālaṃ dṛṣṭvā grahāvṛtam ।।
{pārvaty uvāca 
grāharāja mahāsattva bālakaṃ hy ekaputrakam ।
vimuñcemaṃ mahādaṃṣṭra kṣipraṃ bhīmaparākrama ।।
{grāha uvāca 
yo devi divase ṣaṣṭhe prathamaṃ samupaiti mām ।
sa āhāro mama purā vihito lokakartṛbhiḥ ।।
so ayaṃ mama mahābhāge ṣaṣṭhe ahani girīndraje ।
brahmaṇā prerito nūnaṃ nainaṃ mokṣye kathaṃcana ।।
{devy uvāca 
yan mayā himavacchṛṅge caritaṃ tapa uttamam ।
tena bālam imaṃ muñca grāharāja namo astu te ।।
{grāha uvāca 
mā vyayas tapaso devi bhṛśaṃ bāle śubhānane ।
yad bravīmi kuru śreṣṭhe tathā mokṣam avāpsyati ।।
{devy uvāca 
grāhādhipa vadasvāśu yat satām avigarhitam ।
tat kṛtaṃ nātra saṃdeho yato me brāhmaṇāḥ priyāḥ ।।
{grāha uvāca 
yat kṛtaṃ vai tapaḥ kiṃcid bhavatyā svalpam uttamam ।
tat sarvaṃ me prayacchāśu tato mokṣam avāpsyati ।।
{devy uvāca 
janmaprabhṛti yat puṇyaṃ mahāgrāha kṛtaṃ mayā ।
tat te sarvaṃ mayā dattaṃ bālaṃ muñca mahāgraha ।।
{brahmovāca 
prajajvāla tato grāhas tapasā tena bhūṣitaḥ ।
āditya iva madhyāhne durnirīkṣas tadābhavat ।
uvāca caivaṃ tuṣṭātmā devīṃ lokasya dhāriṇīm ।।
{grāha uvāca 
devi kiṃ kṛtyam etat te suniścitya mahāvrate ।
tapaso apy arjanaṃ duḥkhaṃ tasya tyāgo na śasyate ।।
gṛhāṇa tapa eva tvaṃ bālaṃ cemaṃ sumadhyame ।
tuṣṭo asmi te viprabhaktyā varaṃ tasmād dadāmi te ।
sā tv evam uktā grāheṇa uvācedaṃ mahāvratā ।।
{devy uvāca 
dehenāpi mayā grāha rakṣyo vipraḥ prayatnataḥ ।
tapaḥ punar mayā prāpyaṃ na prāpyo brāhmaṇaḥ punaḥ ।।
suniścitya mahāgrāha kṛtaṃ bālasya mokṣaṇam ।
na viprebhyas tapaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhā me brāhmaṇā matāḥ ।।
dattvā cāhaṃ na gṛhṇāmi grāhendra vihitaṃ hi te ।
nahi kaścin naro grāha pradattaṃ punar āharet ।।
dattam etan mayā tubhyaṃ nādadāni hi tat punaḥ ।
tvayy eva ramatām etad bālaś cāyaṃ vimucyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathoktas tāṃ praśasyātha muktvā bālaṃ namasya ca ।
devīm ādityāvabhāsas tatraivāntaradhīyata ।।
bālo api sarasas tīre mukto grāheṇa vai tadā ।
svapnalabdha ivārthaughas tatraivāntaradhīyata ।।
tapaso apacayaṃ matvā devī himagirīndrajā ।
bhūya eva tapaḥ kartum ārebhe niyamasthitā ।।
