kartukāmāṃ tapo bhūyo jñātvā tāṃ śaṃkaraḥ svayam ।
provāca vacanaṃ viprā mā kṛthās tapa ity uta ।।
mahyam etat tapo devi tvayā dattaṃ mahāvrate ।
tat tenaivākṣayaṃ tubhyaṃ bhaviṣyati sahasradhā ।।
iti labdhvā varaṃ devī tapaso akṣayam uttamam ।
svayaṃvaram udīkṣantī tasthau prītā mudā yutā ।।
idaṃ paṭhed yo hi naraḥ sadaiva 
bālānubhāvācaraṇaṃ hi śaṃbhoḥ 
sa dehabhedaṃ samavāpya pūto 
bhaved gaṇeśas tu kumāratulyaḥ 
{brahmovāca 
vistṛte himavatpṛṣṭhe vimānaśatasaṃkule ।
abhavat sa tu kālena śailaputryāḥ svayaṃvaraḥ ।।
atha parvatarājo asau himavān dhyānakovidaḥ ।
duhitur devadevena jñātvā tad abhimantritam ।।
jānann api mahāśailaḥ samayārakṣaṇepsayā ।
svayaṃvaraṃ tato devyāḥ sarvalokeṣv aghoṣayat ।।
devadānavasiddhānāṃ sarvalokanivāsinām ।
vṛṇuyāt parameśānaṃ samakṣaṃ yadi me sutā ।।
tad eva sukṛtaṃ ślāghyaṃ mamābhyudayasaṃmatam ।
iti saṃcintya śailendraḥ kṛtvā hṛdi maheśvaram ।।
ābrahmakeṣu deveṣu devyāḥ śailendrasattamaḥ ।
kṛtvā ratnākulaṃ deśaṃ svayaṃvaram acīkarat ।।
athaivam āghoṣitamātra eva 
svayaṃvare tatra nagendraputryāḥ 
devādayaḥ sarvajagannivāsāḥ 
samāyayus tatra gṛhītaveśāḥ 
praphullapadmāsanasaṃniviṣṭaḥ 
siddhair vṛto yogibhir aprameyaiḥ 
vijñāpitas tena mahīdhrarājñā 
āgatas tadāhaṃ tridivair upetaḥ 
akṣṇāṃ sahasraṃ surarāṭ sa bibhrad 
divyāṅgahārasragudārarūpaḥ 
airāvataṃ sarvagajendramukhyaṃ 
sravanmadāsārakṛtapravāham 
āruhya sarvāmararāṭ sa vajraṃ 
bibhrat samāgāt purataḥ surāṇām 
tejaḥprabhāvādhikatulyarūpī 
prodbhāsayan sarvadiśo vivasvān 
haimaṃ vimānaṃ savalatpatākam 
ārūḍha āgāt tvaritaṃ javena 
maṇipradīptojjvalakuṇḍalaś ca 
vahnyarkatejaḥpratime vimāne 
samabhyagāt kaśyapasūnur eka 
ādityamadhyād bhaganāmadhārī 
pīnāṅgayaṣṭiḥ sukṛtāṅgahāra 
tejobalājñāsadṛśaprabhāvaḥ 
daṇḍaṃ samāgṛhya kṛtānta āgād 
āruhya bhīmaṃ mahiṣaṃ javena 
mahāmahīdhrocchrayapīnagātraḥ 
svarṇādiratnāñcitacāruveśaḥ 
samīraṇaḥ sarvajagadvibhartā 
vimānam āruhya samabhyagād dhi 
saṃtāpayan sarvasurāsureśāṃs 
tejodhikas tejasi saṃniviṣṭaḥ 
vahniḥ samabhyetya surendramadhye 
jvalan pratasthau varaveśadhārī 
nānāmaṇiprajvalitāṅgayaṣṭir 
jagadvaraṃ divyavimānam agryam 
āruhya sarvadraviṇādhipeśaḥ 
sa rājarājas tvarito abhyagāc ca 
āpyāyayan sarvasurāsureśān 
kāntyā ca veśena ca cārurūpaḥ 
jvalan mahāratnavicitrarūpaṃ 
vimānam āruhya śaśī samāyāt 
śyāmāṅgayaṣṭiḥ suvicitraveśaḥ 
sarvāṅga ābaddhasugandhimālyaḥ 
tārkṣyaṃ samāruhya mahīdhrakalpaṃ 
gadādharo asau tvaritaḥ sametaḥ 
athāśvinau cāpi bhiṣagvarau dvāv 
ekaṃ vimānaṃ tvarayādhiruhya 
manoharau prajvalacāruveśau 
ājagmatur devavarau suvīrau 
sahasranāgaḥ sphuradagnivarṇaṃ 
bibhrat tadānīṃ jvalanārkatejāḥ 
sārdhaṃ sa nāgair aparair mahātmā 
vimānam āruhya samabhyagāc ca 
diteḥ sutānāṃ ca mahāsurāṇāṃ 
vahnyarkaśakrānilatulyabhāsām 
varānurūpaṃ pravidhāya veśaṃ 
vṛndaṃ samāgāt purataḥ surāṇām 
gandharvarājaḥ sa ca cārurūpī 
divyāṅgado divyavimānacārī 
gandharvasaṃghaiḥ sahito apsarobhiḥ 
śakrājñayā tatra samājagāma 
anye ca devās tridivāt tadānīṃ 
pṛthak pṛthak cārugṛhītaveśāḥ 
ājagmur āruhya vimānapṛṣṭhaṃ 
gandharvayakṣoragakiṃnarāś ca 
śacīpatis tatra surendramadhye 
rarāja rājādhikalakṣyamūrtiḥ 
ājñābalaiśvaryakṛtapramodaḥ 
svayaṃvaraṃ taṃ samalaṃcakāra 
hetus trilokasya jagatprasūter 
mātā ca teṣāṃ sasurāsurāṇām 
patnī ca śaṃbhoḥ puruṣasya dhīmato 
gītā purāṇe prakṛtiḥ parā yā 
dakṣasya kopād dhimavadgṛhaṃ sā 
kāryārthamāyāt tridivaukasāṃ hi 
vimānapṛṣṭhe maṇihemajuṣṭe 
sthitā valaccāmaravījitāṅgī 
sarvartupuṣpāṃ susugandhamālāṃ 
pragṛhya devī prasabhaṃ pratasthe 
{brahmovāca 
mālāṃ pragṛhya devyāṃ tu sthitāyāṃ devasaṃsadi ।
śakrādyair āgatair devaiḥ svayaṃvara upāgate ।।
devyā jijñāsayā śaṃbhur bhūtvā pañcaśikhaḥ śiśuḥ ।
utsaṅgatalasaṃsupto babhūva sahasā vibhuḥ ।।
tato dadarśa taṃ devī śiśuṃ pañcaśikhaṃ sthitam ।
jñātvā taṃ samavadhyānāj jagṛhe prītisaṃyutā ।।
atha sā śuddhasaṃkalpā kāṅkṣitaṃ prāpya satpatim ।
nivṛttā ca tadā tasthau kṛtvā sā hṛdi taṃ vibhum ।।
tato dṛṣṭvā śiśuṃ devā devyā utsaṅgavartinam ।
ko ayam atreti saṃmantrya cukruśur bhṛśamohitāḥ ।।
vajram āhārayat tasya bāhum utkṣipya vṛtrahā ।
sa bāhur utthitas tasya tathaiva samatiṣṭhata ।।
stambhitaḥ śiśurūpeṇa devadevena śaṃbhunā ।
vajraṃ kṣeptuṃ na śaśāka vṛtrahā calituṃ na ca ।।
bhago nāma tato deva ādityaḥ kāśyapo balī ।
utkṣipya āyudhaṃ dīptaṃ chettum icchan vimohitaḥ ।।
tasyāpi bhagavān bāhuṃ tathaivāstambhayat tadā ।
balaṃ tejaś ca yogaś ca tathaivāstambhayad vibhuḥ ।।
śiraḥ prakampayan viṣṇuḥ śaṃkaraṃ samavaikṣata ।
atha teṣu sthiteṣv evaṃ manyumatsu sureṣu ca ।।
ahaṃ paramasaṃvigno dhyānam āsthāya sādaram ।
buddhavān devadeveśam umotsaṅge samāsthitam ।।
jñātvāhaṃ parameśānaṃ śīghram utthāya sādaram ।
vavande caraṇaṃ śaṃbhoḥ stutavāṃs tam ahaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
purāṇaiḥ sāmasaṃgītaiḥ puṇyākhyair guhyanāmabhiḥ ।
ajas tvam ajaro devaḥ sraṣṭā vibhuḥ parāparam ।।
pradhānaṃ puruṣo yas tvaṃ brahma dhyeyaṃ tad akṣaram ।
amṛtaṃ paramātmā ca īśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ mahat ।।
brahmasṛk prakṛteḥ sraṣṭā sarvakṛt prakṛteḥ paraḥ ।
iyaṃ ca prakṛtir devī sadā te sṛṣṭikāraṇam ।।
patnīrūpaṃ samāsthāya jagatkāraṇam āgatā ।
namas tubhyaṃ mahādeva devyā vai sahitāya ca ।।
prasādāt tava deveśa niyogāc ca mayā prajāḥ ।
devādyās tu imāḥ sṛṣṭā mūḍhās tvadyogamāyayā ।।
kuru prasādam eteṣāṃ yathāpūrvaṃ bhavantv ime ।
tata evam ahaṃ viprā vijñāpya parameśvaram ।।
stambhitān sarvadevāṃs tān idaṃ cāhaṃ tadoktavān ।
mūḍhāś ca devatāḥ sarvā nainaṃ budhyata śaṃkaram ।।
gacchadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ śīghram enam eva maheśvaram ।
sārdhaṃ mayaiva deveśaṃ paramātmānam avyayam ।।
tatas te stambhitāḥ sarve tathaiva tridivaukasaḥ ।
praṇemur manasā śarvaṃ bhāvaśuddhena cetasā ।।
atha teṣāṃ prasanno abhūd devadevo maheśvaraḥ ।
yathāpūrvaṃ cakārāśu devatānāṃ tanūs tadā ।।
tata evaṃ pravṛtte tu sarvadevanivāraṇe ।
vapuś cakāra deveśas tryakṣaṃ paramam adbhutam ।।
tejasā tasya te dhvastāś cakṣuḥ sarve nyamīlayan ।
tebhyaḥ sa paramaṃ cakṣuḥ svavapurdṛṣṭiśaktimat ।।
prādāt paramadeveśam apaśyaṃs te tadā vibhum ।
te dṛṣṭvā parameśānaṃ tṛtīyekṣaṇadhāriṇam ।।
śakrādyā menire devāḥ sarva eva sureśvarāḥ ।
tasya devī tadā hṛṣṭā samakṣaṃ tridivaukasām ।।
pādayoḥ sthāpayām āsa sraṅmālām amitadyutiḥ ।
sādhu sādhv iti te hocuḥ sarve devāḥ punar vibhum ।।
saha devyā namaś cakruḥ śirobhir bhūtalāśritaiḥ ।
athāsminn antare viprās tam ahaṃ daivataiḥ saha ।।
himavantaṃ mahāśailam uktavāṃś ca mahādyutim ।
ślāghyaḥ pūjyaś ca vandyaś ca sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ mahān asi ।।
śarveṇa saha saṃbandho yasya te abhyudayo mahān ।
kriyatāṃ cārur udvāhaḥ kimarthaṃ sthīyate param ।
tataḥ praṇamya himavāṃs tadā māṃ pratyabhāṣata ।।
{himavān uvāca 
tvam eva kāraṇaṃ deva yasya sarvodaye mama ।
prasādaḥ sahasotpanno hetuś cāpi tvam eva hi ।
udvāhas tu yadā yādṛk tad vidhatsva pitāmaha ।।
{brahmovāca 
tata evaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā girirājasya bho dvijāḥ ।
udvāhaḥ kriyatāṃ deva ity ahaṃ coktavān vibhum ।।
mām āha śaṃkaro devo yatheṣṭam iti lokapaḥ ।
tatkṣaṇāc ca tato viprā asmābhir nirmitaṃ puram ।।
udvāhārthaṃ maheśasya nānāratnopaśobhitam ।
ratnāni maṇayaś citrā hemamauktikam eva ca ।।
mūrtimanta upāgamya alaṃcakruḥ purottamam ।
citrā mārakatī bhūmiḥ suvarṇastambhaśobhitā ।।
bhāsvatsphaṭikabhittiś ca muktāhārapralambitā ।
tasmin dvāri pure ramya udvāhārthaṃ vinirmitā ।।
śuśubhe devadevasya maheśasya mahātmanaḥ ।
somādityau samaṃ tatra tāpayantau mahāmaṇī ।।
saurabheyaṃ manoramyaṃ gandham ādāya mārutaḥ ।
pravavau sukhasaṃsparśo bhavabhaktiṃ pradarśayan ।।
samudrās tatra catvāraḥ śakrādyāś ca surottamāḥ ।
devanadyo mahānadyaḥ siddhā munaya eva ca ।।
gandharvāpsarasaḥ sarve nāgā yakṣāḥ sarākṣasāḥ ।
audakāḥ khecarāś cānye kiṃnarā devacāraṇāḥ ।।
tumburur nārado hāhā hūhūś caiva tu sāmagāḥ ।
ramyāṇy ādāya vādyāni tatrājagmus tadā puram ।।
ṛṣayas tu kathās tatra vedagītās tapodhanāḥ ।
puṇyān vaivāhikān mantrāñ jepuḥ saṃhṛṣṭamānasāḥ ।।
jagato mātaraḥ sarvā devakanyāś ca kṛtsnaśaḥ ।
gāyanti harṣitāḥ sarvā udvāhe parameṣṭhinaḥ ।।
ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ samaṃ tatra nānāgandhasukhāvahāḥ ।
udvāhaḥ śaṃkarasyeti mūrtimanta upasthitāḥ ।।
nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśair mantradhvanipraharṣibhiḥ ।
kekāyamānaiḥ śikhibhir nṛtyamānaiś ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
vilolapiṅgalaspaṣṭa- vidyullekhāvihāsitā ।
kumudāpīḍaśuklābhir balākābhiś ca śobhitā ।।
pratyagrasaṃjātaśilīndhrakandalī 
latādrumādyudgatapallavā śubhā 
śubhāmbudhārāpraṇayaprabodhitair 
mahālasair bhekagaṇaiś ca nāditā 
priyeṣu mānoddhatamānasānāṃ 
manasvinīnām api kāminīnām 
mayūrakekābhirutaiḥ kṣaṇena 
manoharair mānavibhaṅgahetubhiḥ 
tathā vivarṇojjvalacārumūrtinā 
śaśāṅkalekhākuṭilena sarvataḥ 
payodasaṃghātasamīpavartinā 
mahendracāpena bhṛśaṃ virājitā 
vicitrapuṣpāmbubhavaiḥ sugandhibhir 
ghanāmbusaṃparkatayā suśītalaiḥ 
vikampayantī pavanair manoharaiḥ 
surāṅganānām alakāvalīḥ śubhāḥ 
garjatpayodasthagitendubimbā 
navāmbusiktodakacārudūrvā 
nirīkṣitā sādaram utsukābhir 
niśvāsadhūmraṃ pathikāṅganābhiḥ 
haṃsanūpuraśabdāḍhyā samunnatapayodharā ।
caladvidyullatāhārā spaṣṭapadmavilocanā ।।
asitajaladadhīradhvānavitrastahaṃsā 
vimalasaliladhārotpātanamrotpalāgrā 
surabhikusumareṇukḹptasarvāṅgaśobhā 
giriduhitṛvivāhe prāvṛḍ āvirbabhūva 
meghakañcukanirmuktā padmakośodbhavastanī ।
haṃsanūpuranihrādā sarvasasyadigantarā ।।
vistīrṇapulinaśroṇī kūjatsārasamekhalā ।
praphullendīvaraśyāma- vilocanamanoharā ।।
pakvabimbādharapuṭā kundadantaprahāsinī ।
navaśyāmalatāśyāma- romarājipuraskṛtā ।।
candrāṃśuhāravargeṇa kaṇṭhorasthalagāminā ।
prahlādayantī cetāṃsi sarveṣāṃ tridivaukasām ।।
samadālikulodgīta- madhurasvarabhāṣiṇī ।
calatkumudasaṃghāta- cārukuṇḍalaśobhinī ।।
raktāśokapraśākhottha- pallavāṅgulidhāriṇī ।
tatpuṣpasaṃcayamayair vāsobhiḥ samalaṃkṛtā ।।
raktotpalāgracaraṇā jātīpuṣpanakhāvalī ।
kadalīstambhavāmorūḥ śaśāṅkavadanā tathā ।।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannā sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā ।
premṇā spṛśati kānteva sānurāgā manoramā ।।
nirmuktāsitameghakañcukapaṭā pūrṇendubimbānanā 
nīlāmbhojavilocanā ravikaraprodbhinnapadmastanī 
nānāpuṣparajaḥsugandhipavanaprahrādanī cetasāṃ 
tatrāsīt kalahaṃsanūpuraravā devyā vivāhe śarat 
atyarthaśītalāmbhobhiḥ plāvayantau diśaḥ sadā ।
ṛtū hemantaśiśirau ājagmatur atidyutī ।।
tābhyām ṛtubhyāṃ saṃprāpto himavān sa nagottamaḥ ।
prāleyacūrṇavarṣibhyāṃ kṣipraṃ raupyaharo babhau ।।
tena prāleyavarṣeṇa ghanenaiva himālayaḥ ।
agādhena tadā reje kṣīroda iva sāgaraḥ ।।
ṛtupāryayasaṃprāpto babhūva sa mahāgiriḥ ।
sādhūpacārāt sahasā kṛtārtha iva durjanaḥ ।।
prāleyapaṭalacchannaiḥ śṛṅgais tu śuśubhe nagaḥ ।
chattrair iva mahābhāgaiḥ pāṇḍaraiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ ।।
manobhavodrekakarāḥ surāṇāṃ 
surāṅganānāṃ ca muhuḥ samīrāḥ 
svacchāmbupūrṇāś ca tathā nalinyaḥ 
padmotpalānāṃ kusumair upetāḥ 
vivāhe gurukanyāyā vasantaḥ samagād ṛtuḥ ।।
īṣatsamudbhinnapayodharāgrā 
nāryo yathā ramyatarā babhūvuḥ 
nātyuṣṇaśītāni payaḥsarāṃsi 
kiñjalkacūrṇaiḥ kapilīkṛtāni 
cakrāhvayugmair upanāditāni 
yayuḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ suradantimukhyāḥ 
priyaṅgūś cūtataravaś cūtāṃś cāpi priyaṅgavaḥ ।
tarjayanta ivānyonyaṃ mañjarībhiś cakāśire ।।
himaśṛṅgeṣu śukleṣu tilakāḥ kusumotkarāḥ ।
śuśubhuḥ kāryam uddiśya vṛddhā iva samāgatāḥ ।।
phullāśokalatās tatra rejire śālasaṃśritāḥ ।
kāminya iva kāntānāṃ kaṇṭhālambitabāhavaḥ ।।
tasminn ṛtau śubhrakadambanīpās 
tālāḥ stamālāḥ saralāḥ kapitthāḥ 
aśokasarjārjunakovidārāḥ 
puṃnāganāgeśvarakarṇikārāḥ 
lavaṅgatālāgurusaptaparṇā 
nyagrodhaśobhāñjananārikelāḥ 
vṛkṣās tathānye phalapuṣpavanto 
dṛśyā babhūvuḥ sumanoharāṅgāḥ 
jalāśayāś caiva suvarṇatoyāś 
cakrāṅgakāraṇḍavahaṃsajuṣṭāḥ 
koyaṣṭidātyūhabalākayuktā 
dṛśyās tu padmotpalamīnapūrṇāḥ 
khagāś ca nānāvidhabhūṣitāṅgā 
dṛśyās tu vṛkṣeṣu sucitrapakṣāḥ 
krīḍāsu yuktān atha tarjayantaḥ 
kurvanti śabdaṃ madaneritāṅgāḥ 
tasmin girāv adrisutāvivāhe 
vavuś ca vātāḥ sukhaśītalāṅgāḥ 
puṣpāṇi śubhrāṇy api pātayantaḥ 
śanair nagebhyo malayādrijātāḥ 
tathaiva sarve ṛtavaś ca puṇyāś 
cakāśire anyonyavimiśritāṅgāḥ 
yeṣāṃ suliṅgāni ca kīrtitāni 
te tatra āsan sumanojñarūpāḥ 
samadālikulodgīta- śilākusumasaṃcayaiḥ ।
parasparaṃ hi mālatyo bhāvayantyo virejire ।।
nīlāni nīlāmburuhaiḥ payāṃsi 
gaurāṇi gauraiś ca mṛṇāladaṇḍaiḥ 
raktaiś ca raktāni bhṛśaṃ kṛtāni 
mattadvirephāvalijuṣṭapattraiḥ 
haimāni vistīrṇajaleṣu keṣucin 
nirantaraṃ cārutarāṇi keṣucit 
vaidūryanālāni saraḥsu keṣucit 
prajajñire padmavanāni sarvataḥ 
vāpyas tatrābhavan ramyāḥ kamalotpalapuṣpitāḥ ।
nānāvihaṃgasaṃjuṣṭā haimasopānapaṅktayaḥ ।।
śṛṅgāṇi tasya tu gireḥ karṇikāraiḥ supuṣpitaiḥ ।
samucchritāny aviralair hemānīva babhur dvijāḥ ।।
īṣadvibhinnakusumaiḥ pāṭalaiś cāpi pāṭalāḥ ।
saṃbabhūvur diśaḥ sarvāḥ pavanākampimūrtibhiḥ ।।
kṛṣṇārjunā daśaguṇā nīlāśokamahīruhāḥ ।
girau vavṛdhire phullāḥ spardhayantaḥ parasparam ।।
cārurāvavijuṣṭāni kiṃśukānāṃ vanāni ca ।
parvatasya nitambeṣu sarveṣu ca virejire ।।
tamālagulmais tasyāsīc chobhā himavatas tadā ।
nīlajīmūtasaṃghātair nilīnair iva saṃdhiṣu ।।
nikāmapuṣpaiḥ suviśālaśākhaiḥ 
samucchritaiś candanacampakaiś ca 
pramattapuṃskokilasaṃpralāpair 
himācalo atīva tadā rarāja 
śrutvā śabdaṃ mṛdumadakalaṃ sarvataḥ kokilānāṃ 
cañcatpakṣāḥ samadhurataraṃ nīlakaṇṭhā vineduḥ 
teṣāṃ śabdair upacitabalaḥ puṣpacāpeṣuhastaḥ 
sajjībhūtas tridaśavanitā veddhum aṅgeṣv anaṅgaḥ 
paṭuḥ sūryātapaś cāpi prāyaśo alpajalāśayaḥ ।
devīvivāhasamaye grīṣma āgād dhimācalam ।।
sa cāpi tarubhis tatra bahubhiḥ kusumotkaraiḥ ।
śobhayām āsa śṛṅgāṇi prāleyādreḥ samantataḥ ।।
tathāpi ca girau tatra vāyavaḥ sumanoharāḥ ।
vavuḥ pāṭalavistīrṇa- kadambārjunagandhinaḥ ।।
vāpyaḥ praphullapadmaugha- kesarāruṇamūrtayaḥ ।
abhavaṃs taṭasaṃghuṣṭa- phalahaṃsakadambakāḥ ।।
tathā kurabakāś cāpi kusumāpāṇḍumūrtayaḥ ।
sarveṣu nagaśṛṅgeṣu bhramarāvalisevitāḥ ।।
bakulāś ca nitambeṣu viśāleṣu mahībhṛtaḥ ।
utsasarja manojñāni kusumāni samantataḥ ।।
iti kusumavicitrasarvavṛkṣā 
vividhavihaṃgamanādaramyadeśāḥ 
himagiritanayāvivāhabhūtyai 
ṣaḍ upayayur ṛtavo munipravīrāḥ 
tata evaṃ pravṛtte tu sarvabhūtasamāgame ।
nānāvādyasamākīrṇe ahaṃ tatra dvijātayaḥ ।।
śailaputrīm alaṃkṛtya yogyābharaṇasaṃpadā ।
puraṃ praveśitavāṃs tāṃ svayam ādāya bho dvijāḥ ।।
tatas tu punar eveśam ahaṃ caivoktavān vibhum ।
havir juhomi vahnau te upādhyāyapade sthitaḥ ।।
dadāsi mahyaṃ yady ājñāṃ kartavyo ayaṃ kriyāvidhiḥ ।
mām āha śaṃkaraś caivaṃ devadevo jagatpatiḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
yad uddiṣṭaṃ sureśāna tat kuruṣva yathepsitam ।
kartāsmi vacanaṃ sarvaṃ brahmaṃs tava jagadvibho ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataś cāhaṃ prahṛṣṭātmā kuśān ādāya satvaram ।
hastaṃ devasya devyāś ca yogabandhena yuktavān ।।
jvalanaś ca svayaṃ tatra kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ ।
śrutigītair mahāmantrair mūrtimadbhir upasthitaiḥ ।।
yathoktavidhinā hutvā sarpis tad amṛtaṃ haviḥ ।
tatas taṃ jvalanaṃ sarvaṃ kārayitvā pradakṣiṇam ।।
muktvā hastasamāyogaṃ sahitaḥ sarvadaivataiḥ ।
putraiś ca mānasaiḥ siddhaiḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā ।।
vṛtta udvāhakāle tu praṇamya ca vṛṣadhvajam ।
yogenaiva tayor viprās tad umāparameśayoḥ ।।
udvāhaḥ sa paro vṛtto yaṃ devā na viduḥ kvacit ।
iti vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ svayaṃvaram idaṃ śubham ।
udvāhaś caiva devasya śṛṇudhvaṃ paramādbhutam ।।
{brahmovāca 
atha vṛtte vivāhe tu bhavasyāmitatejasaḥ ।
praharṣam atulaṃ gatvā devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ ।
tuṣṭuvur vāgbhir ādyābhiḥ praṇemus te maheśvaram ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
namaḥ parvataliṅgāya parvateśāya vai namaḥ ।
namaḥ pavanavegāya virūpāyājitāya ca ।
namaḥ kleśavināśāya dātre ca śubhasaṃpadām ।।
namo nīlaśikhaṇḍāya ambikāpataye namaḥ ।
namaḥ pavanarūpāya śatarūpāya vai namaḥ ।।
namo bhairavarūpāya virūpanayanāya ca ।
namaḥ sahasranetrāya sahasracaraṇāya ca ।।
namo devavayasyāya vedāṅgāya namo namaḥ ।
viṣṭambhanāya śakrasya bāhvor vedāṅkurāya ca ।।
carācarādhipataye śamanāya namo namaḥ ।
salilāśayaliṅgāya yugāntāya namo namaḥ ।।
namaḥ kapālamālāya kapālasūtradhāriṇe ।
namaḥ kapālahastāya daṇḍine gadine namaḥ ।।
namas trailokyanāthāya paśulokaratāya ca ।
namaḥ khaṭvāṅgahastāya pramathārtiharāya ca ।।
namo yajñaśirohantre kṛṣṇakeśāpahāriṇe ।
bhaganetranipātāya pūṣṇo dantaharāya ca ।।
namaḥ pinākaśūlāsi- khaḍgamudgaradhāriṇe ।
namo astu kālakālāya tṛtīyanayanāya ca ।।
antakāntakṛte caiva namaḥ parvatavāsine ।
suvarṇaretase caiva namaḥ kuṇḍaladhāriṇe ।।
daityānāṃ yoganāśāya yogināṃ gurave namaḥ ।
śaśāṅkādityanetrāya lalāṭanayanāya ca ।।
namaḥ śmaśānarataye śmaśānavaradāya ca ।
namo daivatanāthāya tryambakāya namo namaḥ ।।
gṛhasthasādhave nityaṃ jaṭile brahmacāriṇe ।
namo muṇḍārdhamuṇḍāya paśūnāṃ pataye namaḥ ।।
salile tapyamānāya yogaiśvaryapradāya ca ।
namaḥ śāntāya dāntāya pralayotpattikāriṇe ।।
namo anugrahakartre ca sthitikartre namo namaḥ ।
namo rudrāya vasava ādityāyāśvine namaḥ ।।
namaḥ pitre atha sāṃkhyāya viśvedevāya vai namaḥ ।
namaḥ śarvāya ugrāya śivāya varadāya ca ।।
namo bhīmāya senānye paśūnāṃ pataye namaḥ ।
śucaye vairihānāya sadyojātāya vai namaḥ ।।
mahādevāya citrāya vicitrāya ca vai namaḥ ।
pradhānāyāprameyāya kāryāya kāraṇāya ca ।।
puruṣāya namas te astu puruṣecchākarāya ca ।
namaḥ puruṣasaṃyoga- pradhānaguṇakāriṇe ।।
pravartakāya prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca sarvaśaḥ ।
kṛtākṛtasya satkartre phalasaṃyogadāya ca ।।
kālajñāya ca sarveṣāṃ namo niyamakāriṇe ।
namo vaiṣamyakartre ca guṇānāṃ vṛttidāya ca ।।
namas te devadeveśa namas te bhūtabhāvana ।
śiva saumyamukho draṣṭuṃ bhava saumyo hi naḥ prabho ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ sa bhagavān devo jagatpatir umāpatiḥ ।
stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ sarvair amarān idam abravīt ।।
{śrīśaṃkara uvāca 
draṣṭuṃ sukhaś ca saumyaś ca devānām asmi bhoḥ surāḥ ।
varaṃ varayata kṣipraṃ dātāsmi tam asaṃśayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas te praṇatāḥ sarve surā ūcus trilocanam ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
tavaiva bhagavan haste vara eṣo avatiṣṭhatām ।
yadā kāryaṃ tadā nas tvaṃ dāsyase varam īpsitam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam astv iti tān uktvā visṛjya ca surān haraḥ ।
lokāṃś ca pramathaiḥ sārdhaṃ viveśa bhavanaṃ svakam ।।
yas tu harotsavam adbhutam enaṃ 
gāyati daivataviprasamakṣam 
so apratirūpagaṇeśasamāno 
dehaviparyayam etya sukhī syāt 
{brahmovāca 
vipravaryāḥ stavaṃ hīmaṃ śṛṇuyād vā paṭhec ca yaḥ ।
sa sarvalokago devaiḥ pūjyate amararāḍ iva ।।
{brahmovāca 
praviṣṭe bhavanaṃ deve sūpaviṣṭe varāsane ।
sa vakro manmathaḥ krūro devaṃ veddhumanā bhavat ।।
tam anācārasaṃyuktaṃ durātmānaṃ kulādhamam ।
lokān sarvān pīḍayantaṃ sarvāṅgāvaraṇātmakam ।।
ṛṣīṇāṃ vighnakartāraṃ niyamānāṃ vrataiḥ saha ।
cakrāhvayasya rūpeṇa ratyā saha samāgatam ।।
athātatāyinaṃ viprā veddhukāmaṃ sureśvaraḥ ।
nayanena tṛtīyena sāvajñaṃ samavaikṣata ।।
tato asya netrajo vahnir jvālāmālāsahasravān ।
sahasā ratibhartāram adahat saparicchadam ।।
sa dahyamānaḥ karuṇam ārto akrośata visvaram ।
prasādayaṃś ca taṃ devaṃ papāta dharaṇītale ।।
atha so agniparītāṅgo manmatho lokatāpanaḥ ।
papāta sahasā mūrchāṃ kṣaṇena samapadyata ।।
patnī tu karuṇaṃ tasya vilalāpa suduḥkhitā ।
devīṃ devaṃ ca duḥkhārtā ayācat karuṇāvatī ।।
tasyāś ca karuṇāṃ jñātvā devau tau karuṇātmakau ।
ūcatus tāṃ samālokya samāśvāsya ca duḥkhitām ।।
{umāmaheśvarāv ūcatuḥ 
dagdha eva dhruvaṃ bhadre nāsyotpattir iheṣyate ।
aśarīro api te bhadre kāryaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati ।।
yadā tu viṣṇur bhagavān vasudevasutaḥ śubhe ।
tadā tasya suto yaś ca patis te saṃbhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ sā tu varaṃ labdhvā kāmapatnī śubhānanā ।
jagāmeṣṭaṃ tadā deśaṃ prītiyuktā gataklamā ।।
dagdhvā kāmaṃ tato viprāḥ sa tu devo vṛṣadhvajaḥ ।
reme tatromayā sārdhaṃ prahṛṣṭas tu himācale ।।
kandareṣu ca ramyeṣu padminīṣu guhāsu ca ।
nirjhareṣu ca ramyeṣu karṇikāravaneṣu ca ।।
nadītīreṣu kānteṣu kiṃnarācariteṣu ca ।
śṛṅgeṣu śailarājasya taḍāgeṣu saraḥsu ca ।।
vanarājiṣu ramyāsu nānāpakṣiruteṣu ca ।
tīrtheṣu puṇyatoyeṣu munīnām āśrameṣu ca ।।
eteṣu puṇyeṣu manohareṣu 
deśeṣu vidyādharabhūṣiteṣu 
gandharvayakṣāmaraseviteṣu 
reme sa devyā sahitas trinetraḥ 
devaiḥ sahendrair muniyakṣasiddhair 
gandharvavidyādharadaityamukhyaiḥ 
anyaiś ca sarvair vividhair vṛto asau 
tasmin nage harṣam avāpa śaṃbhuḥ 
nṛtyanti tatrāpsarasaḥ sureśā 
gāyanti gandharvagaṇāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ 
divyāni vādyāny atha vādayanti 
kecid drutaṃ devavaraṃ stuvanti 
evaṃ sa devaḥ svagaṇair upeto 
mahābalaiḥ śakrayamāgnitulyaiḥ 
devyāḥ priyārthaṃ bhaganetrahantā 
giriṃ na tatyāja tadā mahātmā 
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
devyāḥ samaṃ tu bhagavāṃs tiṣṭhaṃs tatra sa kāmahā ।
akarot kiṃ mahādeva etad icchāma veditum ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhagavān himavacchṛṅge sa hi devyāḥ priyecchayā ।
gaṇeśair vividhākārair hāsaṃ saṃjanayan muhuḥ ।।
devīṃ bālendutilako ramayaṃś ca rarāma ca ।
mahānubhāvaiḥ sarvajñaiḥ kāmarūpadharaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।।
atha devy āsasādaikā mātaraṃ parameśvarī ।
āsīnāṃ kāñcane śubhra āsane paramādbhute ।।
atha dṛṣṭvā satīṃ devīm āgatāṃ surarūpiṇīm ।
āsanena mahārheṇa śaṃpādayad aninditām ।
āsīnāṃ tām athovāca menā himavataḥ priyā ।।
{menovāca 
cirasyāgamanaṃ te adya vada putri śubhekṣaṇe ।
daridrā krīḍanais tvaṃ hi bhartrā krīḍasi saṃgatā ।।
ye daridrā bhavanti sma tathaiva ca nirāśrayāḥ ।
ume ta evaṃ krīḍanti yathā tava patiḥ śubhe ।।
{brahmovāca 
saivam uktātha mātrā tu nātihṛṣṭamanā bhavat ।
mahatyā kṣamayā yuktā na kiṃcit tām uvāca ha ।
visṛṣṭā ca tadā mātrā gatvā devam uvāca ha ।।
{pārvaty uvāca 
bhagavan devadeveśa neha vatsyāmi bhūdhare ।
anyaṃ kuru mamāvāsaṃ bhuvaneṣu mahādyute ।।
{deva uvāca 
sadā tvam ucyamānā vai mayā vāsārtham īśvari ।
anyaṃ na rocitavatī vāsaṃ vai devi karhicit ।।
idānīṃ svayam eva tvaṃ vāsam anyatra śobhane ।
kasmān mṛgayase devi brūhi tan me śucismite ।।
{devy uvāca 
gṛhaṃ gatāsmi deveśa pitur adya mahātmanaḥ ।
dṛṣṭvā ca tatra me mātā vijane lokabhāvane ।।
āsanādibhir abhyarcya sā mām evam abhāṣata ।
ume tava sadā bhartā daridraḥ krīḍanaiḥ śubhe ।।
krīḍate nahi devānāṃ krīḍā bhavati tādṛśī ।
yat kila tvaṃ mahādeva gaṇaiś ca vividhais tathā ।
ramase tad aniṣṭaṃ hi mama mātur vṛṣadhvaja ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato devaḥ prahasyāha devīṃ hāsayituṃ prabhuḥ ।।
{deva uvāca 
evam eva na saṃdehaḥ kasmān manyur abhūt tava ।
kṛttivāsā hy avāsāś ca śmaśānanilayaś ca ha ।।
aniketo hy araṇyeṣu parvatānāṃ guhāsu ca ।
vicarāmi gaṇair nagnair vṛto ambhojavilocane ।।
mā krudho devi mātre tvaṃ tathyaṃ mātāvadat tava ।
nahi mātṛsamo bandhur jantūnām asti bhūtale ।।
{devy uvāca 
na me asti bandhubhiḥ kiṃcit kṛtyaṃ suravareśvara ।
tathā kuru mahādeva yathāhaṃ sukham āpnuyām ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvā sa devyā vacanaṃ sureśas 
tasyāḥ priyārthe svagiriṃ vihāya 
jagāma meruṃ surasiddhasevitaṃ 
bhāryāsahāyaḥ svagaṇaiś ca yuktaḥ 
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
prācetasasya dakṣasya kathaṃ vaivasvate antare ।
vināśam agamad brahman hayamedhaḥ prajāpateḥ ।।
devyā manyukṛtaṃ buddhvā kruddhaḥ sarvātmakaḥ prabhuḥ ।
kathaṃ vināśito yajño dakṣasyāmitatejasaḥ ।
mahādevena roṣād vai tan naḥ prabrūhi vistarāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
varṇayiṣyāmi vo viprā mahādevena vai yathā ।
krodhād vidhvaṃsito yajño devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā ।।
purā meror dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ śṛṅgaṃ trailokyapūjitam ।
jyotiḥsthalaṃ nāma citraṃ sarvaratnavibhūṣitam ।।
aprameyam anādhṛṣyaṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtam ।
tatra devo giritaṭe sarvadhātuvicitrite ।।
paryaṅka iva vistīrṇa upaviṣṭo babhūva ha ।
śailarājasutā cāsya nityaṃ pārśvasthitābhavat ।।
ādityāś ca mahātmāno vasavaś ca mahaujasaḥ ।
tathaiva ca mahātmānāv aśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau ।।
tathā vaiśravaṇo rājā guhyakaiḥ parivāritaḥ ।
yakṣāṇām īśvaraḥ śrīmān kailāsanilayaḥ prabhuḥ ।।
upāsate mahātmānam uśanā ca mahāmuniḥ ।
sanatkumārapramukhās tathaiva paramarṣayaḥ ।।
aṅgiraḥpramukhāś caiva tathā devarṣayo api ca ।
viśvāvasuś ca gandharvas tathā nāradaparvatau ।।
apsarogaṇasaṃghāś ca samājagmur anekaśaḥ ।
vavau sukhaśivo vāyur nānāgandhavahaḥ śuciḥ ।।
sarvartukusumopetaḥ puṣpavanto abhavan drumāḥ ।
tathā vidyādharāḥ sādhyāḥ siddhāś caiva tapodhanāḥ ।।
mahādevaṃ paśupatiṃ paryupāsata tatra vai ।
bhūtāni ca tathānyāni nānārūpadharāṇy atha ।।
rākṣasāś ca mahāraudrāḥ piśācāś ca mahābalāḥ ।
bahurūpadharā dhṛṣṭā nānāpraharaṇāyudhāḥ ।।
devasyānucarās tatra tasthur vaiśvānaropamāḥ ।
nandīśvaraś ca bhagavān devasyānumate sthitaḥ ।।
pragṛhya jvalitaṃ śūlaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā ।
gaṅgā ca saritāṃ śreṣṭhā sarvatīrthajalodbhavā ।।
paryupāsata taṃ devaṃ rūpiṇī dvijasattamāḥ ।
evaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tatra pūjyamānaḥ surarṣibhiḥ ।।
devaiś ca sumahābhāgair mahādevo vyatiṣṭhata ।
kasyacit tv atha kālasya dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ ।।
pūrvoktena vidhānena yakṣyamāṇo abhyapadyata ।
tatas tasya makhe devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ ।।
svargasthānād athāgamya dakṣam āpedire tathā ।
te vimānair mahātmāno jvaladbhir jvalanaprabhāḥ ।।
devasyānumate agacchan gaṅgādvāram iti śrutiḥ ।
gandharvāpsarasākīrṇaṃ nānādrumalatāvṛtam ।।
ṛṣisiddhaiḥ parivṛtaṃ dakṣaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam ।
pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca ye ca svarlokavāsinaḥ ।।
sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā upatasthuḥ prajāpatim ।
ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyāḥ sarve marudgaṇāḥ ।।
viṣṇunā sahitāḥ sarva āgatā yajñabhāginaḥ ।
ūṣmapā dhūmapāś caiva ājyapāḥ somapās tathā ।।
aśvinau marutaś caiva nānādevagaṇaiḥ saha ।
ete cānye ca bahavo bhūtagrāmās tathaiva ca ।।
jarāyujāṇḍajāś caiva tathaiva svedajodbhidaḥ ।
āgatāḥ sattriṇaḥ sarve devāḥ strībhiḥ saharṣibhiḥ ।।
virājante vimānasthā dīpyamānā ivāgnayaḥ ।
tān dṛṣṭvā manyunāviṣṭo dadhīcir vākyam abravīt ।।
{dadhīcir uvāca

{brahmovāca

{ dakṣa uvāca

{brahmovāca

{umovāca

{maheśvara uvāca

{umovāca

{maheśvara uvāca

{bhagavān uvāca 
nātmānaṃ staumi deveśi yathā tvam anugacchasi ।

{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā bhagavān patnīm umāṃ prāṇair api priyām ।

{brahmovāca 
tato rudraprayuktena siṃhaveṣeṇa līlayā ।
devyā manyukṛtaṃ jñātvā hato dakṣasya sa kratuḥ ।।
manyunā ca mahābhīmā bhadrakālī maheśvarī ।

agnayo vai na dīpyante na cādīpyata bhāskaraḥ ।।
grahā naiva prakāśante nakṣatrāṇi na tārakāḥ ।
ṛṣayo na prabhāsante na devā na ca dānavāḥ ।।
evaṃ hi timirībhūte nirdahanti gaṇeśvarāḥ ।
prabhañjanty apare yūpān ghorān utpāṭayanti ca ।।

śīryamāṇāny adṛśyanta tārā iva nabhastalāt ।।
divyānnapānabhakṣyāṇāṃ rāśayaḥ parvatopamāḥ ।
kṣīranadyas tathā cānyā ghṛtapāyasakardamāḥ ।।
madhumaṇḍodakā divyāḥ khaṇḍaśarkaravālukāḥ ।
ṣaḍrasān nivahanty anyā guḍakulyā manoramāḥ ।।
uccāvacāni māṃsāni bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca ।
yāni kāni ca divyāni lehyacoṣyāṇi yāni ca ।।
bhuñjanti vividhair vaktrair vilumpanti kṣipanti ca ।

krīḍanti vividhākārāś cikṣipuḥ surayoṣitaḥ ।।
evaṃ gaṇāś ca tair yukto vīrabhadraḥ pratāpavān ।
rudrakopaprayuktaś ca sarvadevaiḥ surakṣitam ।।
taṃ yajñam adahac chīghraṃ bhadrakālyāḥ samīpataḥ ।
cakrur anye tathā nādān sarvabhūtabhayaṃkarān ।।
chittvā śiro anye yajñasya vyanadanta bhayaṃkaram ।
tataḥ śakrādayo devā dakṣaś caiva prajāpatiḥ ।
ūcuḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā kathyatāṃ ko bhavān iti ।।
{vīrabhadra uvāca 
nāhaṃ devo na daityo vā na ca bhoktum ihāgataḥ ।
naiva draṣṭuṃ ca devendrā na ca kautūhalānvitāḥ ।।

{brahmovāca 
nikhātotpāṭitair yūpair apaviddhais tatas tataḥ ।

{dakṣa uvāca

{dakṣa uvāca

namaś caṇḍāya muṇḍāya viśvacaṇḍadharāya ca ।

vilohitāya dhūmrāya nīlagrīvāya vai namaḥ ।।
namo astv apratirūpāya virūpāya śivāya ca ।
sūryāya sūryapataye sūryadhvajapatākine ।।
namaḥ pramathanāśāya vṛṣaskandhāya vai namaḥ ।
namo hiraṇyagarbhāya hiraṇyakavacāya ca ।।
hiraṇyakṛtacūḍāya hiraṇyapataye namaḥ ।
śatrughātāya caṇḍāya parṇasaṃghaśayāya ca ।।
namaḥ stutāya stutaye stūyamānāya vai namaḥ ।
sarvāya sarvabhakṣāya sarvabhūtāntarātmane ।।
namo homāya mantrāya śukladhvajapatākine ।
namo anamyāya namyāya namaḥ kilakilāya ca ।।
namas tvāṃ śayamānāya śayitāyotthitāya ca ।
sthitāya dhāvamānāya kubjāya kuṭilāya ca ।।
namo nartanaśīlāya mukhavāditrakāriṇe ।
bādhāpahāya lubdhāya gītavāditrakāriṇe ।।
namo jyeṣṭhāya śreṣṭhāya balapramathanāya ca ।
ugrāya ca namo nityaṃ namaś ca daśabāhave ।।
namaḥ kapālahastāya sitabhasmapriyāya ca ।
vibhīṣaṇāya bhīmāya bhīṣmavratadharāya ca ।।
nānāvikṛtavaktrāya khaḍgajihvogradaṃṣṭriṇe ।
pakṣamāsalavārdhāya tumbīvīṇāpriyāya ca ।।
aghoraghorarūpāya ghorāghoratarāya ca ।
namaḥ śivāya śāntāya namaḥ śāntatamāya ca ।।
namo buddhāya śuddhāya saṃvibhāgapriyāya ca ।
pavanāya pataṃgāya namaḥ sāṃkhyaparāya ca ।।
namaś caṇḍaikaghaṇṭāya ghaṇṭājalpāya ghaṇṭine ।
sahasraśataghaṇṭāya ghaṇṭāmālāpriyāya ca ।।
prāṇadaṇḍāya nityāya namas te lohitāya ca ।
hūṃhūṃkārāya rudrāya bhagākārapriyāya ca ।।
namo apāravate nityaṃ girivṛkṣapriyāya ca ।
namo yajñādhipataye bhūtāya prasutāya ca ।।
yajñavāhāya dāntāya tapyāya ca bhagāya ca ।
namas taṭāya taṭyāya taṭinīpataye namaḥ ।।
annadāyānnapataye namas tv annabhujāya ca ।
namaḥ sahasraśīrṣāya sahasracaraṇāya ca ।।
sahasroddhataśūlāya sahasranayanāya ca ।
namo bālārkavarṇāya bālarūpadharāya ca ।।
namo bālārkarūpāya bālakrīḍanakāya ca ।
namaḥ śuddhāya buddhāya kṣobhaṇāya kṣayāya ca ।।
taraṃgāṅkitakeśāya muktakeśāya vai namaḥ ।
namaḥ ṣaṭkarmaniṣṭhāya trikarmaniyatāya ca ।।
varṇāśramāṇāṃ vidhivat pṛthagdharmapravartine ।
namaḥ śreṣṭhāya jyeṣṭhāya namaḥ kalakalāya ca ।।
śvetapiṅgalanetrāya kṛṣṇaraktekṣaṇāya ca ।
dharmakāmārthamokṣāya krathāya krathanāya ca ।।
sāṃkhyāya sāṃkhyamukhyāya yogādhipataye namaḥ ।
namo rathyādhirathyāya catuṣpathapathāya ca ।।
kṛṣṇājinottarīyāya vyālayajñopavītine ।
īśāna rudrasaṃghāta harikeśa namo astu te ।।
tryambakāyāmbikānātha vyaktāvyakta namo astu te ।
kālakāmadakāmaghna duṣṭodvṛttaniṣūdana ।।
sarvagarhita sarvaghna sadyojāta namo astu te ।
unmādana śatāvarta- gaṅgātoyārdramūrdhaja ।।
candrārdhasaṃyugāvarta meghāvarta namo astu te ।
namo annadānakartre ca annadaprabhave namaḥ ।।
annabhoktre ca goptre ca tvam eva pralayānala ।
jarāyujāṇḍajāś caiva svedajodbhijja eva ca ।।
tvam eva devadeveśa bhūtagrāmaś caturvidhaḥ ।
carācarasya sraṣṭā tvaṃ pratihartā tvam eva ca ।।
tvam eva brahmā viśveśa apsu brahma vadanti te ।
sarvasya paramā yoniḥ sudhāṃśo jyotiṣāṃ nidhiḥ ।।
ṛksāmāni tathauṃkāram āhus tvāṃ brahmavādinaḥ ।
hāyi hāyi hare hāyi huvāhāveti vāsakṛt ।।
gāyanti tvāṃ suraśreṣṭhāḥ sāmagā brahmavādinaḥ ।
yajurmaya ṛṅmayaś ca sāmātharvayutas tathā ।।
paṭhyase brahmavidbhis tvaṃ kalpopaniṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ ।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā varṇāśramāś ca ye ।।
tvam evāśramasaṃghāś ca vidyut stanitam eva ca ।
saṃvatsaras tvam ṛtavo māsā māsārdham eva ca ।।
kalā kāṣṭhā nimeṣāś ca nakṣatrāṇi yugāni ca ।
vṛṣāṇāṃ kakudaṃ tvaṃ hi girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca ।।
siṃho mṛgāṇāṃ patayas takṣakānantabhoginām ।
kṣīrodo hy udadhīnāṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ praṇavas tathā ।।
vajraṃ praharaṇānāṃ ca vratānāṃ satyam eva ca ।
tvam evecchā ca dveṣaś ca rāgo mohaḥ śamaḥ kṣamā ।।
vyavasāyo dhṛtir lobhaḥ kāmakrodhau jayājayau ।
tvaṃ gadī tvaṃ śarī cāpī khaṭvāṅgī mudgarī tathā ।।
chettā bhettā prahartā ca netā mantāsi no mataḥ ।
daśalakṣaṇasaṃyukto dharmo arthaḥ kāma eva ca ।।
induḥ samudraḥ saritaḥ palvalāni sarāṃsi ca ।
latāvallyas tṛṇauṣadhyaḥ paśavo mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ।।
dravyakarmaguṇārambhaḥ kālapuṣpaphalapradaḥ ।
ādiś cāntaś ca madhyaś ca gāyatry oṃkāra eva ca ।।
harito lohitaḥ kṛṣṇo nīlaḥ pītas tathā kṣaṇaḥ ।
kadruś ca kapilo babhruḥ kapoto macchakas tathā ।।
suvarṇaretā vikhyātaḥ suvarṇaś cāpy atho mataḥ ।
suvarṇanāmā ca tathā suvarṇapriya eva ca ।।
tvam indraś ca yamaś caiva varuṇo dhanado analaḥ ।
utphullaś citrabhānuś ca svarbhānur bhānur eva ca ।।
hotraṃ hotā ca homyaṃ ca hutaṃ caiva tathā prabhuḥ ।
trisauparṇas tathā brahman yajuṣāṃ śatarudriyam ।।
pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam ।
prāṇaś ca tvaṃ rajaś ca tvaṃ tamaḥ sattvayutas tathā ।।
prāṇo apānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca ।
unmeṣaś ca nimeṣaś ca kṣuttṛṅjṛmbhā tathaiva ca ।।
lohitāṅgaś ca daṃṣṭrī ca mahāvaktro mahodaraḥ ।
śuciromā haricchmaśrur ūrdhvakeśaś calācalaḥ ।।
gītavāditranṛtyāṅgo gītavādanakapriyaḥ ।
matsyo jālo jalo ajayyo jalavyālaḥ kuṭīcaraḥ ।।
vikālaś ca sukālaś ca duṣkālaḥ kālanāśanaḥ ।
mṛtyuś caivākṣayo antaś ca kṣamāmāyākarotkaraḥ ।।
saṃvarto vartakaś caiva saṃvartakabalāhakau ।
ghaṇṭākī ghaṇṭakī ghaṇṭī cūḍālo lavaṇodadhiḥ ।।
brahmā kālāgnivaktraś ca daṇḍī muṇḍas tridaṇḍadhṛk ।
caturyugaś caturvedaś caturhotraś catuṣpathaḥ ।।
cāturāśramyanetā ca cāturvarṇyakaraś ca ha ।
kṣarākṣaraḥ priyo dhūrto gaṇair gaṇyo gaṇādhipaḥ ।।
raktamālyāmbaradharo girīśo girijāpriyaḥ ।
śilpīśaḥ śilpinaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvaśilpipravartakaḥ ।।
bhaganetrāntakaś caṇḍaḥ pūṣṇo dantavināśanaḥ ।
svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭkāro namaskāra namo astu te ।।
gūḍhavrataś ca gūḍhaś ca gūḍhavrataniṣevitaḥ ।
taraṇas tāraṇaś caiva sarvabhūteṣu tāraṇaḥ ।।
dhātā vidhātā saṃdhātā nidhātā dhāraṇo dharaḥ ।
tapo brahma ca satyaṃ ca brahmacaryaṃ tathārjavam ।।
bhūtātmā bhūtakṛd bhūto bhūtabhavyabhavodbhavaḥ ।
bhūr bhuvaḥ svaritaś caiva bhūto hy agnir maheśvaraḥ ।।
brahmāvartaḥ surāvartaḥ kāmāvarta namo astu te ।
kāmabimbavinirhantā karṇikārasrajapriyaḥ ।।
gonetā gopracāraś ca govṛṣeśvaravāhanaḥ ।
trailokyagoptā govindo goptā gogarga eva ca ।।
akhaṇḍacandrābhimukhaḥ sumukho durmukho amukhaḥ ।
caturmukho bahumukho raṇeṣv abhimukhaḥ sadā ।।
hiraṇyagarbhaḥ śakunir dhanado arthapatir virāṭ ।
adharmahā mahādakṣo daṇḍadhāro raṇapriyaḥ ।।
tiṣṭhan sthiraś ca sthāṇuś ca niṣkampaś ca suniścalaḥ ।
durvāraṇo durviṣaho duḥsaho duratikramaḥ ।।
durdharo durvaśo nityo durdarpo vijayo jayaḥ ।
śaśaḥ śaśāṅkanayana- śītoṣṇaḥ kṣut tṛṣā jarā ।।
ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva vyādhihā vyādhipaś ca yaḥ ।
sahyo yajñamṛgavyādho vyādhīnām ākaro akaraḥ ।।
śikhaṇḍī puṇḍarīkaś ca puṇḍarīkāvalokanaḥ ।
daṇḍadhṛk cakradaṇḍaś ca raudrabhāgavināśanaḥ ।।
viṣapo amṛtapaś caiva surāpaḥ kṣīrasomapaḥ ।
madhupaś cāpapaś caiva sarvapaś ca balābalaḥ ।।
vṛṣāṅgarāmbho vṛṣabhas tathā vṛṣabhalocanaḥ ।
vṛṣabhaś caiva vikhyāto lokānāṃ lokasaṃskṛtaḥ ।।
candrādityau cakṣuṣī te hṛdayaṃ ca pitāmahaḥ ।
agniṣṭomas tathā deho dharmakarmaprasādhitaḥ ।।
na brahmā na ca govindaḥ purāṇa-ṛṣayo na ca ।
māhātmyaṃ vedituṃ śaktā yāthātathyena te śiva ।।
śivā yā mūrtayaḥ sūkṣmās te mahyaṃ yāntu darśanam ।
tābhir māṃ sarvato rakṣa pitā putram ivaurasam ।।
rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo ahaṃ tavānagha namo astu te ।
bhaktānukampī bhagavān bhaktaś cāhaṃ sadā tvayi ।।
yaḥ sahasrāṇy anekāni puṃsām āvṛtya durdṛśām ।
tiṣṭhaty ekaḥ samudrānte sa me goptāstu nityaśaḥ ।।
yaṃ vinidrā jitaśvāsāḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥ ।
jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānās tasmai yogātmane namaḥ ।।
saṃbhakṣya sarvabhūtāni yugānte samupasthite ।
yaḥ śete jalamadhyasthas taṃ prapadye ambuśāyinam ।।
praviśya vadanaṃ rāhor yaḥ somaṃ pibate niśi ।
grasaty arkaṃ ca svarbhānur bhūtvā somāgnir eva ca ।।
aṅguṣṭhamātrāḥ puruṣā dehasthāḥ sarvadehinām ।
rakṣantu te ca māṃ nityaṃ nityaṃ cāpyāyayantu mām ।।
yenāpy utpāditā garbhā apo bhāgagatāś ca ye ।
teṣāṃ svāhā svadhā caiva āpnuvanti svadanti ca ।।
yena rohanti dehasthāḥ prāṇino rodayanti ca ।
harṣayanti na kṛṣyanti namas tebhyas tu nityaśaḥ ।।
ye samudre nadīdurge parvateṣu guhāsu ca ।
vṛkṣamūleṣu goṣṭheṣu kāntāragahaneṣu ca ।।
catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu catvareṣu sabhāsu ca ।
hastyaśvarathaśālāsu jīrṇodyānālayeṣu ca ।।
yeṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu diśāsu vidiśāsu ca ।
indrārkayor madhyagatā ye ca candrārkaraśmiṣu ।।
rasātalagatā ye ca ye ca tasmāt paraṃ gatāḥ ।
namas tebhyo namas tebhyo namas tebhyas tu sarvaśaḥ ।।
sarvas tvaṃ sarvago devaḥ sarvabhūtapatir bhavaḥ ।
sarvabhūtāntarātmā ca tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥ ।।
tvam eva cejyase deva yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ ।
tvam eva kartā sarvasya tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥ ।।
athavā māyayā deva mohitaḥ sūkṣmayā tava ।
tasmāt tu kāraṇād vāpi tvaṃ mayā na nimantritaḥ ।।
prasīda mama deveśa tvam eva śaraṇaṃ mama ।
tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ pratiṣṭhā ca na cānyo astīti me matiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
stutvaivaṃ sa mahādevaṃ virarāma mahāmatiḥ ।
bhagavān api suprītaḥ punar dakṣam abhāṣata ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
parituṣṭo asmi te dakṣa stavenānena suvrata ।
bahunā tu kim uktena matsamīpaṃ gamiṣyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathaivam abravīd vākyaṃ trailokyādhipatir bhavaḥ ।
kṛtvāśvāsakaraṃ vākyaṃ sarvajño vākyasaṃhitam ।।
{śrīśiva uvāca 
dakṣa duḥkhaṃ na kartavyaṃ yajñavidhvaṃsanaṃ prati ।
ahaṃ yajñahanas tubhyaṃ dṛṣṭam etat purānagha ।।
bhūyaś ca tvaṃ varam imaṃ matto gṛhṇīṣva suvrata ।
prasannasumukho bhūtvā mamaikāgramanāḥ śṛṇu ।।
aśvamedhasahasrasya vājapeyaśatasya vai ।
prajāpate matprasādāt phalabhāgī bhaviṣyasi ।।
vedān ṣaḍaṅgān budhyasva sāṃkhyayogāṃś ca kṛtsnaśaḥ ।
tapaś ca vipulaṃ taptvā duścaraṃ devadānavaiḥ ।।
abdair dvādaśabhir yuktaṃ gūḍham aprajñaninditam ।
varṇāśramakṛtair dharmair vinītaṃ na kvacit kvacit ।।
samāgataṃ vyavasitaṃ paśupāśavimokṣaṇam ।
sarveṣām āśramāṇāṃ ca mayā pāśupataṃ vratam ।।
utpāditaṃ dakṣa śubhaṃ sarvapāpavimocanam ।
asya cīrṇasya yat samyak phalaṃ bhavati puṣkalam ।
tac cāstu sumahābhāga mānasas tyajyatāṃ jvaraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tu deveśaḥ sapatnīkaḥ sahānugaḥ ।
adarśanam anuprāpto dakṣasyāmitatejasaḥ ।।
avāpya ca tathā bhāgaṃ yathoktaṃ comayā bhavaḥ ।
jvaraṃ ca sarvadharmajño bahudhā vyabhajat tadā ।।
śāntyarthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śṛṇudhvam atha vai dvijāḥ ।
śikhābhitāpo nāgānāṃ parvatānāṃ śilājatu ।।
apāṃ tu nīlikāṃ vidyān nirmoko bhujageṣu ca ।
khorakaḥ saurabheyāṇām ūkharaḥ pṛthivītale ।।
śunām api ca dharmajñā dṛṣṭipratyavarodhanam ।
randhrāgatam athāśvānāṃ śikhodbhedaś ca barhiṇām ।।
netrarāgaḥ kokilānāṃ dveṣaḥ prokto mahātmanām ।
janānām api bhedaś ca sarveṣām iti naḥ śrutam ।।
śukānām api sarveṣāṃ hikkikā procyate jvaraḥ ।
śārdūleṣv atha vai viprāḥ śramo jvara ihocyate ।।
mānuṣeṣu ca sarvajñā jvaro nāmaiṣa kīrtitaḥ ।
maraṇe janmani tathā madhye cāpi niveśitaḥ ।।
etan māheśvaraṃ tejo jvaro nāma sudāruṇaḥ ।
namasyaś caiva mānyaś ca sarvaprāṇibhir īśvaraḥ ।।
imāṃ jvarotpattim adīnamānasaḥ 
paṭhet sadā yaḥ susamāhito naraḥ 
vimuktarogaḥ sa naro mudāyuto 
labheta kāmāṃś ca yathāmanīṣitān 
dakṣaproktaṃ stavaṃ cāpi kīrtayed yaḥ śṛṇoti vā ।
nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃcid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt ।।
yathā sarveṣu deveṣu variṣṭho bhagavān bhavaḥ ।
tathā stavo variṣṭho ayaṃ stavānāṃ dakṣanirmitaḥ ।।
yaśaḥsvargasuraiśvarya- vittādijayakāṅkṣibhiḥ ।
stotavyo bhaktim āsthāya vidyākāmaiś ca yatnataḥ ।।
vyādhito duḥkhito dīno naro grasto bhayādibhiḥ ।
rājakāryaniyukto vā mucyate mahato bhayāt ।।
anenaiva ca dehena gaṇānāṃ ca maheśvarāt ।
iha loke sukhaṃ prāpya gaṇarāḍ upajāyate ।।
na yakṣā na piśācā vā na nāgā na vināyakāḥ ।
kuryur vighnaṃ gṛhe tasya yatra saṃstūyate bhavaḥ ।।
śṛṇuyād vā idaṃ nārī bhaktyātha bhavabhāvitā ।
pitṛpakṣe bhartṛpakṣe pūjyā bhavati caiva ha ।।
śṛṇuyād vā idaṃ sarvaṃ kīrtayed vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ ।
tasya sarvāṇi kāryāṇi siddhiṃ gacchanty avighnataḥ ।।
manasā cintitaṃ yac ca yac ca vācāpy udāhṛtam ।
sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tasya stavasyāsyānukīrtanāt ।।
devasya saguhasyātha devyā nandīśvarasya ca ।
baliṃ vibhajataḥ kṛtvā damena niyamena ca ।।
tataḥ prayukto gṛhṇīyān nāmāny āśu yathākramam ।
īpsitāṃl labhate apy arthān kāmān bhogāṃś ca mānavaḥ ।।
mṛtaś ca svargam āpnoti strīsahasrasamāvṛtaḥ ।
sarvakāmasuyukto vā yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ ।।
paṭhan dakṣakṛtaṃ stotraṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।
mṛtaś ca gaṇasāyujyaṃ pūjyamānaḥ surāsuraiḥ ।।
vṛṣeṇa viniyuktena vimānena virājate ।
ābhūtasaṃplavasthāyī rudrasyānucaro bhavet ।।
ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥ ।
naitad vedayate kaścin naitac chrāvyaṃ ca kasyacit ।।
śrutvemaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ ye api syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ ।
vaiśyāḥ striyaś ca śūdrāś ca rudralokam avāpnuyuḥ ।।
śrāvayed yaś ca viprebhyaḥ sadā parvasu parvasu ।
rudralokam avāpnoti dvijo vai nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
śrutvaivaṃ vai muniśreṣṭhāḥ kathāṃ pāpapraṇāśinīm ।
rudrakrodhodbhavāṃ puṇyāṃ vyāsasya vadato dvijāḥ ।।
pārvatyāś ca tathā roṣaṃ krodhaṃ śaṃbhoś ca duḥsaham ।
utpattiṃ vīrabhadrasya bhadrakālyāś ca saṃbhavam ।।
dakṣayajñavināśaṃ ca vīryaṃ śaṃbhos tathādbhutam ।
punaḥ prasādaṃ devasya dakṣasya sumahātmanaḥ ।।
yajñabhāgaṃ ca rudrasya dakṣasya ca phalaṃ kratoḥ ।
hṛṣṭā babhūvuḥ saṃprītā vismitāś ca punaḥ punaḥ ।।
papracchuś ca punar vyāsaṃ kathāśeṣaṃ tathā dvijāḥ ।
pṛṣṭaḥ provāca tān vyāsaḥ kṣetram ekāmrakaṃ punaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
brahmaproktāṃ kathāṃ puṇyāṃ śrutvā tu ṛṣipuṃgavāḥ ।
praśaśaṃsus tadā hṛṣṭā romāñcitatanūruhāḥ ।।
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
aho devasya māhātmyaṃ tvayā śaṃbhoḥ prakīrtitam ।
dakṣasya ca suraśreṣṭha yajñavidhvaṃsanaṃ tathā ।।
ekāmrakaṃ kṣetravaraṃ vaktum arhasi sāṃpratam ।
śrotum icchāmahe brahman paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā lokanāthaś caturmukhaḥ ।
provāca śaṃbhos tat kṣetraṃ bhūtale duṣkṛtacchadam ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ kṣetraṃ paramadurlabham ।।
liṅgakoṭisamāyuktaṃ vārāṇasīsamaṃ śubham ।
ekāmraketi vikhyātaṃ tīrthāṣṭakasamanvitam ।।
ekāmravṛkṣas tatrāsīt purā kalpe dvijottamāḥ ।
nāmnā tasyaiva tat kṣetram ekāmrakam iti śrutam ।।
hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ naranārīsamanvitam ।
vidvāṃsagaṇa bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dhanadhānyādisaṃyutam ।।
gṛhagopurasaṃbādhaṃ trikacādvārabhūṣitam ।
nānāvaṇiksamākīrṇaṃ nānāratnopaśobhitam ।।
purāṭṭālakasaṃyuktaṃ rathibhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam ।
rājahaṃsanibhaiḥ śubhraiḥ prāsādair upaśobhitam ।।
mārgagadvārasaṃyuktaṃ sitaprākāraśobhitam ।
rakṣitaṃ śastrasaṃghaiś ca parikhābhir alaṃkṛtam ।।
sitaraktais tathā pītaiḥ kṛṣṇaśyāmaiś ca varṇakaiḥ ।
samīraṇoddhatābhiś ca patākābhir alaṃkṛtam ।।
nityotsavapramuditaṃ nānāvāditranisvanaiḥ ।
vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgaiś ca kṣepaṇībhir alaṃkṛtam ।।
devatāyatanair divyaiḥ prākārodyānamaṇḍitaiḥ ।
pūjāvicitraracitaiḥ sarvatra samalaṃkṛtam ।।
striyaḥ pramuditās tatra dṛśyante tanumadhyamāḥ ।
hārair alaṃkṛtagrīvāḥ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇāḥ ।।
pīnonnatakucāḥ śyāmāḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ ।
sthirālakāḥ sukapolāḥ kāñcīnūpuranāditāḥ ।।
sukeśyaś cārujaghanāḥ karṇāntāyatalocanāḥ ।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ ।।
divyavastradharāḥ śubhrāḥ kāścit kāñcanasaṃnibhāḥ ।
haṃsavāraṇagāminyaḥ kucabhārāvanāmitāḥ ।।
divyagandhānuliptāṅgāḥ karṇābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ ।
madālasāś ca suśroṇyo nityaṃ prahasitānanāḥ ।।
īṣadvispaṣṭadaśanā bimbauṣṭhā madhurasvarāḥ ।
tāmbūlarañjitamukhā vidagdhāḥ priyadarśanāḥ ।।
subhagāḥ priyavādinyo nityaṃ yauvanagarvitāḥ ।
divyavastradharāḥ sarvāḥ sadā cāritramaṇḍitāḥ ।।
krīḍanti tāḥ sadā tatra striyaś cāpsarasopamāḥ ।
sve sve gṛhe pramuditā divā rātrau varānanāḥ ।।
puruṣās tatra dṛśyante rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ ।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ sumṛṣṭamaṇikuṇḍalāḥ ।।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca munisattamāḥ ।
svadharmaniratās tatra nivasanti sudhārmikāḥ ।।
anyāś ca tatra tiṣṭhanti vāramukhyāḥ sulocanāḥ ।
ghṛtācīmenakātulyās tathā samatilottamāḥ ।।
urvaśīsadṛśāś caiva vipracittinibhās tathā ।
viśvācīsahajanyābhāḥ pramlocāsadṛśās tathā ।।
sarvās tāḥ priyavādinyaḥ sarvā vihasitānanāḥ ।
kalākauśalasaṃyuktāḥ sarvās tā guṇasaṃyutāḥ ।।
evaṃ paṇyastriyas tatra nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ ।
nivasanti muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarvastrīguṇagarvitāḥ ।।
prekṣaṇālāpakuśalāḥ sundaryaḥ priyadarśanāḥ ।
na rūpahīnā durvṛttā na paradrohakārikāḥ ।।
yāsāṃ kaṭākṣapātena mohaṃ gacchanti mānavāḥ ।
na tatra nirdhanāḥ santi na mūrkhā na paradviṣaḥ ।।
na rogiṇo na malinā na kadaryā na māyinaḥ ।
na rūpahīnā durvṛttā na paradrohakāriṇaḥ ।।
tiṣṭhanti mānavās tatra kṣetre jagati viśrute ।
sarvatra sukhasaṃcāraṃ sarvasattvasukhāvaham ।।
nānājanasamākīrṇaṃ sarvasasyasamanvitam ।
karṇikāraiś ca panasaiś campakair nāgakesaraiḥ ।।
pāṭalāśokabakulaiḥ kapitthair bahulair dhavaiḥ ।
cūtanimbakadambaiś ca tathānyaiḥ puṣpajātibhiḥ ।।
nīpakair dhavakhadirair latābhiś ca virājitam ।
śālais tālais tamālaiś ca nārikelaiḥ śubhāñjanaiḥ ।।
arjunaiḥ samaparṇaiś ca kovidāraiḥ sapippalaiḥ ।
lakucaiḥ saralair lodhrair hintālair devadārubhiḥ ।।
palāśair mucukundaiś ca pārijātaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ ।
kadalīvanakhaṇḍaiś ca jambūpūgaphalais tathā ।।
ketakīkaravīraiś ca atimuktaiś ca kiṃśukaiḥ ।
mandārakundapuṣpaiś ca tathānyaiḥ puṣpajātibhiḥ ।।
nānāpakṣirutaiḥ sevyair udyānair nandanopamaiḥ ।
phalabhārānatair vṛkṣaiḥ sarvartukusumotkaraiḥ ।।
cakoraiḥ śatapattraiś ca bhṛṅgarājaiś ca kokilaiḥ ।
kalaviṅkair mayūraiś ca priyaputraiḥ śukais tathā ।।
jīvaṃjīvakahārītaiś cātakair vanaveṣṭitaiḥ ।
nānāpakṣigaṇaiś cānyaiḥ kūjadbhir madhurasvaraiḥ ।।
dīrghikābhis taḍāgaiś ca puṣkariṇībhiś ca vāpibhiḥ ।
nānājalāśayaiś cānyaiḥ padminīkhaṇḍamaṇḍitaiḥ ।।
kumudaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca tathā nīlotpalaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।
kādambaiś cakravākaiś ca tathaiva jalakukkuṭaiḥ ।।
kāraṇḍavaiḥ plavair haṃsais tathānyair jalacāribhiḥ ।
evaṃ nānāvidhair vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpair nānāvidhair varaiḥ ।।
nānājalāśayaiḥ puṇyaiḥ śobhitaṃ tat samantataḥ ।
āste tatra svayaṃ devaḥ kṛttivāsā vṛṣadhvajaḥ ।।
hitāya sarvalokasya bhuktimuktipradaḥ śivaḥ ।
pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca ।।
puṣkariṇyas taḍāgāni vāpyaḥ kūpāś ca sāgarāḥ ।
tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ samāhṛtya jalabindūn pṛthak pṛthak ।।
sarvalokahitārthāya rudraḥ sarvasuraiḥ saha ।
tīrthaṃ bindusaro nāma tasmin kṣetre dvijottamāḥ ।।
cakāra ṛṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ tena bindusaraḥ smṛtam ।
aṣṭamyāṃ bahule pakṣe mārgaśīrṣe dvijottamāḥ ।।
yas tatra yātrāṃ kurute viṣuve vijitendriyaḥ ।
vidhivad bindusarasi snātvā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ ।।
devān ṛṣīn manuṣyāṃś ca pitṝn saṃtarpya vāgyataḥ ।
tilodakena vidhinā nāmagotravidhānavit ।।
snātvaivaṃ vidhivat tatra so aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet ।
grahoparāge viṣuve saṃkrāntyām ayane tathā ।।
yugādiṣu ṣaḍaśītyāṃ tathānyatra śubhe tithau ।
ye tatra dānaṃ viprebhyaḥ prayacchanti dhanādikam ।।
anyatīrthāc chataguṇaṃ phalaṃ te prāpnuvanti vai ।
piṇḍaṃ ye saṃprayacchanti pitṛbhyaḥ sarasas taṭe ।।
pitṝṇām akṣayāṃ tṛptiṃ te kurvanti na saṃśayaḥ ।
tataḥ śaṃbhor gṛhaṃ gatvā vāgyataḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ ।।
praviśya pūjayec charvaṃ kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam ।
ghṛtakṣīrādibhiḥ snānaṃ kārayitvā bhavaṃ śuciḥ ।।
candanena sugandhena vilipya kuṅkumena ca ।
tataḥ saṃpūjayed devaṃ candramaulim umāpatim ।।
puṣpair nānāvidhair medhyair bilvārkakamalādibhiḥ ।
āgamoktena mantreṇa vedoktena ca śaṃkaram ।।
adīkṣitas tu nāmnaiva mūlamantreṇa cārcayet ।
evaṃ saṃpūjya taṃ devaṃ gandhapuṣpānurāgibhiḥ ।।
dhūpadīpaiś ca naivedyair upahārais tathā stavaiḥ ।
daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca gītair vādyair manoharaiḥ ।।
nṛtyajapyanamaskārair jayaśabdaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivad devadevam umāpatim ।।
sarvapāpavinirmukto rūpayauvanagarvitaḥ ।
kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ ।।
sauvarṇena vimānena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā ।
upagīyamāno gandharvair apsarobhir alaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
uddyotayan diśaḥ sarvāḥ śivalokaṃ sa gacchati ।
bhuktvā tatra sukhaṃ viprā manasaḥ prītidāyakam ।।
tallokavāsibhiḥ sārdhaṃ yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।
tatas tasmād ihāyātaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puṇyasaṃkṣaye ।।
jāyate yogināṃ gehe caturvedī dvijottamāḥ ।
yogaṃ pāśupataṃ prāpya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
śayanotthāpane caiva saṃkrāntyām ayane tathā ।
aśokākhyāṃ tathāṣṭamyāṃ pavitrāropaṇe tathā ।।
ye ca paśyanti taṃ devaṃ kṛttivāsasam uttamam ।
vimānenārkavarṇena śivalokaṃ vrajanti te ।।
sarvakāle api taṃ devaṃ ye paśyanti sumedhasaḥ ।
te api pāpavinirmuktāḥ śivalokaṃ vrajanti vai ।।
devasya paścime pūrve dakṣiṇe cottare tathā ।
yojanadvitayaṃ sārdhaṃ kṣetraṃ tad bhuktimuktidam ।।
tasmin kṣetravare liṅgaṃ bhāskareśvarasaṃjñitam ।
paśyanti ye tu taṃ devaṃ snātvā kuṇḍe maheśvaram ।।
ādityenārcitaṃ pūrvaṃ devadevaṃ trilocanam ।
sarvapāpavinirmuktā vimānavaram āsthitāḥ ।।
upagīyamānā gandharvaiḥ śivalokaṃ vrajanti te ।
tiṣṭhanti tatra muditāḥ kalpam ekaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
bhuktvā tu vipulān bhogāñ śivaloke manoramān ।
puṇyakṣayād ihāyātā jāyante pravare kule ।।
athavā yogināṃ gehe vedavedāṅgapāragāḥ ।
utpadyante dvijavarāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ ।।
mokṣaśāstrārthakuśalāḥ sarvatra samabuddhayaḥ ।
yogaṃ śaṃbhor varaṃ prāpya tato mokṣaṃ vrajanti te ।।
tasmin kṣetravare puṇye liṅgaṃ yad dṛśyate dvijāḥ ।
pūjyāpūjyaṃ ca sarvatra vane rathyāntare api vā ।।
catuṣpathe śmaśāne vā yatra kutra ca tiṣṭhati ।
dṛṣṭvā tal liṅgam avyagraḥ śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ ।।
snāpayitvā tu taṃ bhaktyā gandhaiḥ puṣpair manoharaiḥ ।
dhūpair dīpaiḥ sanaivedyair namaskārais tathā stavaiḥ ।।
daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca nṛtyagītādibhis tathā ।
saṃpūjyaivaṃ vidhānena śivalokaṃ vrajen naraḥ ।।
nārī vā dvijaśārdūlāḥ saṃpūjya śraddhayānvitā ।
pūrvoktaṃ phalam āpnoti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।।
kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ samagrān munisattamāḥ ।
tasya kṣetravarasyātha ṛte devān maheśvarāt ।।
tasmin kṣetrottame gatvā śraddhayāśraddhayāpi vā ।
mādhavādiṣu māseṣu naro vā yadi vāṅganā ।।
yasmin yasmiṃs tithau viprāḥ snātvā bindusarombhasi ।
paśyed devaṃ virūpākṣaṃ devīṃ ca varadāṃ śivām ।।
gaṇaṃ caṇḍaṃ kārttikeyaṃ gaṇeśaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tathā ।
kalpadrumaṃ ca sāvitrīṃ śivalokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
snātvā ca kāpile tīrthe vidhivat pāpanāśane ।
prāpnoty abhimatān kāmāñ śivalokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
yaḥ stambhyaṃ tatra vidhivat karoti niyatendriyaḥ ।
kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya śivalokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
ekāmrake śivakṣetre vārāṇasīsame śubhe ।
snānaṃ karoti yas tatra mokṣaṃ sa labhate dhruvam ।।
{brahmovāca 
viraje virajā mātā brahmāṇī saṃpratiṣṭhitā ।
yasyāḥ saṃdarśanān martyaḥ punāty āsaptamaṃ kulam ।।
sakṛd dṛṣṭvā tu tāṃ devīṃ bhaktyāpūjya praṇamya ca ।
naraḥ svavaṃśam uddhṛtya mama lokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
anyāś ca tatra tiṣṭhanti viraje lokamātaraḥ ।
sarvapāpaharā devyo varadā bhaktivatsalāḥ ।।
āste vaitaraṇī tatra sarvapāpaharā nadī ।
yasyāṃ snātvā naraśreṣṭhaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
āste svayaṃbhūs tatraiva kroḍarūpī hariḥ svayam ।
dṛṣṭvā praṇamya taṃ bhaktyā paraṃ viṣṇuṃ vrajanti te ।।
kāpile gograhe some tīrthe cālābusaṃjñite ।
mṛtyuṃjaye kroḍatīrthe vāsuke siddhakeśvare ।।
tīrtheṣv eteṣu matimān viraje saṃyatendriyaḥ ।
gatvāṣṭatīrthaṃ vidhivat snātvā devān praṇamya ca ।।
sarvapāpavinirmukto vimānavaram āsthitaḥ ।
upagīyamāno gandharvair mama loke mahīyate ।।
viraje yo mama kṣetre piṇḍadānaṃ karoti vai ।
sa karoty akṣayāṃ tṛptiṃ pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
mama kṣetre muniśreṣṭhā viraje ye kalevaram ।
parityajanti puruṣās te mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti vai ।।
snātvā yaḥ sāgare martyo dṛṣṭvā ca kapilaṃ harim ।
paśyed devīṃ ca vārāhīṃ sa yāti tridaśālayam ।।
santi cānyāni tīrthāni puṇyāny āyatanāni ca ।
tatkāle tu muniśreṣṭhā veditavyāni tāni vai ।।
samudrasyottare tīre tasmin deśe dvijottamāḥ ।
āste guhyaṃ paraṃ kṣetraṃ muktidaṃ pāpanāśanam ।।
sarvatra vālukākīrṇaṃ pavitraṃ sarvakāmadam ।
daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ kṣetraṃ paramadurlabham ।।
aśokārjunapuṃnāgair bakulaiḥ saraladrumaiḥ ।
panasair nārikelaiś ca śālais tālaiḥ kapitthakaiḥ ।।
campakaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca cūtabilvaiḥ sapāṭalaiḥ ।
kadambaiḥ kovidāraiś ca lakucair nāgakesaraiḥ ।।
prācīnāmalakair lodhrair nāraṅgair dhavakhādiraiḥ ।
sarjabhūrjāśvakarṇaiś ca tamālair devadārubhiḥ ।।
mandāraiḥ pārijātaiś ca nyagrodhāgurucandanaiḥ ।
kharjūrāmrātakaiḥ siddhair mucukundaiḥ sakiṃśukaiḥ ।।
aśvatthaiḥ saptaparṇaiś ca madhudhāraśubhāñjanaiḥ ।
śiṃśapāmalakair nīpair nimbatinduvibhītakaiḥ ।।
sarvartuphalagandhāḍhyaiḥ sarvartukusumojjvalaiḥ ।
manohlādakaraiḥ śubhrair nānāvihaganāditaiḥ ।।
śrotraramyaiḥ sumadhurair balanirmadaneritaiḥ ।
manasaḥ prītijanakaiḥ śabdaiḥ khagamukheritaiḥ ।।
cakoraiḥ śatapattraiś ca bhṛṅgarājais tathā śukaiḥ ।
kokilaiḥ kalaviṅkaiś ca hārītair jīvajīvakaiḥ ।।
priyaputraiś cātakaiś ca tathānyair madhurasvaraiḥ ।
śrotraramyaiḥ priyakaraiḥ kūjadbhiś cārvadhiṣṭhitaiḥ ।।
ketakīvanakhaṇḍaiś ca atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ ।
mālatīkundabāṇaiś ca karavīraiḥ sitetaraiḥ ।।
jambīrakaruṇāṅkolair dāḍimair bījapūrakaiḥ ।
mātuluṅgaiḥ pūgaphalair hintālaiḥ kadalīvanaiḥ ।।
anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyair manoharaiḥ ।
latāvitānagulmaiś ca vividhaiś ca jalāśayaiḥ ।।
dīrghikābhis taḍāgaiś ca puṣkariṇībhiś ca vāpibhiḥ ।
nānājalāśayaiḥ puṇyaiḥ padminīkhaṇḍamaṇḍitaiḥ ।।
sarāṃsi ca manojñāni prasannasalilāni ca ।
kumudaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca tathā nīlotpalaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।।
kahlāraiḥ kamalaiś cāpi ācitāni samantataḥ ।
kādambaiś cakravākaiś ca tathaiva jalakukkuṭaiḥ ।।
kāraṇḍavaiḥ plavair haṃsaiḥ kūrmair matsyaiś ca madgubhiḥ ।
dātyūhasārasākīrṇaiḥ koyaṣṭibakaśobhitaiḥ ।।
etaiś cānyaiś ca kūjadbhiḥ samantāj jalacāribhiḥ ।
khagair jalacaraiś cānyaiḥ kusumaiś ca jalodbhavaiḥ ।।
evaṃ nānāvidhair vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sthalajalodbhavaiḥ ।
brahmacārigṛhasthaiś ca vānaprasthaiś ca bhikṣubhiḥ ।।
svadharmaniratair varṇais tathānyaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam ।
hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ naranārīsamākulam ।।
aśeṣavidyānilayaṃ sarvadharmaguṇākaram ।
evaṃ sarvaguṇopetaṃ kṣetraṃ paramadurlabham ।।
āste tatra muniśreṣṭhā vikhyātaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।
yāvad utkalamaryādā dik krameṇa prakīrtitā ।।
tāvat kṛṣṇaprasādena deśaḥ puṇyatamo hi saḥ ।
yatra tiṣṭhati viśvātmā deśe sa puruṣottamaḥ ।।
jagadvyāpī jagannāthas tatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ।
ahaṃ rudraś ca śakraś ca devāś cāgnipurogamāḥ ।।
nivasāmo muniśreṣṭhās tasmin deśe sadā vayam ।
gandharvāpsarasaḥ sarvāḥ pitaro devamānuṣāḥ ।।
yakṣā vidyādharāḥ siddhā munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ ।
ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca kaśyapādyāḥ prajeśvarāḥ ।।
suparṇāḥ kiṃnarā nāgās tathānye svargavāsinaḥ ।
sāṅgāś ca caturo vedāḥ śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca ।।
itihāsapurāṇāni yajñāś ca varadakṣiṇāḥ ।
nadyaś ca vividhāḥ puṇyās tīrthāny āyatanāni ca ।।
sāgarāś ca tathā śailās tasmin deśe vyavasthitāḥ ।
evaṃ puṇyatame deśe devarṣipitṛsevite ।।
sarvopabhogasahite vāsaḥ kasya na rocate ।
śreṣṭhatvaṃ kasya deśasya kiṃ cānyad adhikaṃ tataḥ ।।
āste yatra svayaṃ devo muktidaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।
dhanyās te vibudhaprakhyā ye vasanty utkale narāḥ ।।
tīrtharājajale snātvā paśyanti puruṣottamam ।
svarge vasanti te martyā na te yānti yamālaye ।।
ye vasanty utkale kṣetre puṇye śrīpuruṣottame ।
saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ teṣām utkalānāṃ sumedhasām ।।
ye paśyanti suraśreṣṭhaṃ prasannāyatalocanam ।
cārubhrūkeśamukuṭaṃ cārukarṇāvataṃsakam ।।
cārusmitaṃ cārudantaṃ cārukuṇḍalamaṇḍitam ।
sunāsaṃ sukapolaṃ ca sulalāṭaṃ sulakṣaṇam ।।
trailokyānandajananaṃ kṛṣṇasya mukhapaṅkajam ।।
{brahmovāca 
purā kṛtayuge viprāḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥ ।
babhūva nṛpatiḥ śrīmān indradyumna iti śrutaḥ ।।
satyavādī śucir dakṣaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ ।
rūpavān subhagaḥ śūro dātā bhoktā priyaṃvadaḥ ।।
yaṣṭā samastayajñānāṃ brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ ।
dhanurvede ca vede ca śāstre ca nipuṇaḥ kṛtī ।।
vallabho naranārīṇāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ yathā śaśī ।
āditya iva duṣprekṣyaḥ śatrusaṃghabhayaṃkaraḥ ।।
vaiṣṇavaḥ sattvasaṃpanno jitakrodho jitendriyaḥ ।
adhyetā yogasāṃkhyānāṃ mumukṣur dharmatatparaḥ ।।
evaṃ sa pālayan pṛthvīṃ rājā sarvaguṇākaraḥ ।
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā harer ārādhanaṃ prati ।।
katham ārādhayiṣyāmi devadevaṃ janārdanam ।
kasmin kṣetre athavā tīrthe nadītīre tathāśrame ।।
evaṃ cintāparaḥ so atha nirīkṣya manasā mahīm ।
ālokya sarvatīrthāni kṣetrāṇy atha purāṇy api ।।
tāni sarvāṇi saṃtyajya jagāmāyatanaṃ punaḥ ।
vikhyātaṃ paramaṃ kṣetraṃ muktidaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
sa gatvā tat kṣetravaraṃ samṛddhabalavāhanaḥ ।
ayajac cāśvamedhena vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaḥ ।।
kārayitvā mahotsedhaṃ prāsādaṃ caiva viśrutam ।
tatra saṃkarṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ subhadrāṃ sthāpya vīryavān ।।
pañcatīrthaṃ ca vidhivat kṛtvā tatra mahīpatiḥ ।
snānaṃ dānaṃ tapo homaṃ devatāprekṣaṇaṃ tathā ।।
bhaktyā cārādhya vidhivat pratyahaṃ puruṣottamam ।
prasādād devadevasya tato mokṣam avāptavān ।।
mārkaṇḍeyaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।
sāgare cendradyumnākhye snātvā mokṣaṃ labhed dhruvam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kasmāt sa nṛpatiḥ pūrvam indradyumno jagatpatiḥ ।
jagāma paramaṃ kṣetraṃ muktidaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
gatvā tatra suraśreṣṭha kathaṃ sa nṛpasattamaḥ ।
vājimedhena vidhivad iṣṭavān puruṣottamam ।।
kathaṃ sa sarvaphalade kṣetre paramadurlabhe ।
prāsādaṃ kārayām āsa ceṣṭaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।।
kathaṃ sa kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca prajāpate ।
nirmame rājaśārdūlaḥ kṣetraṃ rakṣitavān katham ।।
kathaṃ tatra mahīpālaḥ prāsāde bhuvanottame ।
sthāpayām āsa matimān kṛṣṇādīṃs tridaśārcitān ।।
etat sarvaṃ suraśreṣṭha vistareṇa yathātatham ।
vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa caritaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ ।।
na tṛptim adhigacchāmas tava vākyāmṛtena vai ।
śrotum icchāmahe brahman paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
sādhu sādhu dvijaśreṣṭhā yat pṛcchadhvaṃ purātanam ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ śubham ।।
vakṣyāmi tasya caritaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ kṛte yuge ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ prayatāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ ।।
avantī nāma nagarī mālave bhuvi viśrutā ।
babhūva tasya nṛpateḥ pṛthivī kakudopamā ।।
hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā dṛḍhaprākāratoraṇā ।
dṛḍhayantrārgaladvārā parikhābhir alaṃkṛtā ।।
nānāvaṇiksamākīrṇā nānābhāṇḍasuvikriyā ।
rathyāpaṇavatī ramyā suvibhaktacatuṣpathā ।।
gṛhagopurasaṃbādhā vīthībhiḥ samalaṃkṛtā ।
rājahaṃsanibhaiḥ śubhraiś citragrīvair manoharaiḥ ।।
anekaśatasāhasraiḥ prāsādaiḥ samalaṃkṛtā ।
yajñotsavapramuditā gītavāditranisvanā ।।
nānāvarṇapatākābhir dhvajaiś ca samalaṃkṛtā ।
hastyaśvarathasaṃkīrṇā padātigaṇasaṃkulā ।।
nānāyodhasamākīrṇā nānājanapadair yutā ।
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ śūdraiś caiva dvijātibhiḥ ।।
samṛddhā sā muniśreṣṭhā vidvadbhiḥ samalaṃkṛtā ।
na tatra malināḥ santi na mūrkhā nāpi nirdhanāḥ ।।
na rogiṇo na hīnāṅgā na dyūtavyasanānvitāḥ ।
sadā hṛṣṭāḥ sumanaso dṛśyante puruṣāḥ striyaḥ ।।
krīḍanti sma divā rātrau hṛṣṭās tatra pṛthak pṛthak ।
suveṣāḥ puruṣās tatra dṛśyante mṛṣṭakuṇḍalāḥ ।।
surūpāḥ suguṇāś caiva divyālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ ।
kāmadevapratīkāśāḥ sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitāḥ ।।
sukeśāḥ sukapolāś ca sumukhāḥ śmaśrudhāriṇaḥ ।
jñātāraḥ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ bhettāraḥ śatruvāhinīm ।।
dātāraḥ sarvaratnānāṃ bhoktāraḥ sarvasaṃpadām ।
striyas tatra muniśreṣṭhā dṛśyante sumanoharāḥ ।।
haṃsavāraṇagāminyaḥ praphullāmbhojalocanāḥ ।
sumadhyamāḥ sujaghanāḥ pīnonnatapayodharāḥ ।।
sukeśāś cāruvadanāḥ sukapolāḥ sthirālakāḥ ।
hāvabhāvānatagrīvāḥ karṇābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ ।।
bimbauṣṭhyo rañjitamukhās tāmbūlena virājitāḥ ।
suvarṇābharaṇopetāḥ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ ।।
śyāmāvadātāḥ suśroṇyaḥ kāñcīnūpuranāditāḥ ।
divyamālyāmbaradharā divyagandhānulepanāḥ ।।
vidagdhāḥ subhagāḥ kāntāś cārvaṅgyaḥ priyadarśanāḥ ।
rūpalāvaṇyasaṃyuktāḥ sarvāḥ prahasitānanāḥ ।।
krīḍantyaś ca madonmattāḥ sabhāsu catvareṣu ca ।
gītavādyakathālāpai ramayantyaś ca tāḥ striyaḥ ।।
vāramukhyāś ca dṛśyante nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ ।
prekṣaṇālāpakuśalāḥ sarvayoṣidguṇānvitāḥ ।।
anyāś ca tatra dṛśyante guṇācāryāḥ kulastriyaḥ ।
pativratāś ca subhagā guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtāḥ ।।
vanaiś copavanaiḥ puṇyair udyānaiś ca manoramaiḥ ।
devatāyatanair divyair nānākusumaśobhitaiḥ ।।
śālais tālais tamālaiś ca bakulair nāgakesaraiḥ ।
pippalaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca candanāgurucampakaiḥ ।।
puṃnāgair nārikeraiś ca panasaiḥ saraladrumaiḥ ।
nāraṅgair lakucair lodhraiḥ saptaparṇaiḥ śubhāñjanaiḥ ।।
cūtabilvakadambaiś ca śiṃśapair dhavakhādiraiḥ ।
pāṭalāśokatagaraiḥ karavīraiḥ sitetaraiḥ ।।
pītārjunakabhallātaiḥ siddhair āmrātakais tathā ।
nyagrodhāśvatthakāśmaryaiḥ palāśair devadārubhiḥ ।।
mandāraiḥ pārijātaiś ca tintiḍīkavibhītakaiḥ ।
prācīnāmalakaiḥ plakṣair jambūśirīṣapādapaiḥ ।।
kāleyaiḥ kāñcanāraiś ca madhujambīratindukaiḥ ।
kharjūrāgastyabakulaiḥ śākhoṭakaharītakaiḥ ।।
kaṅkolair mucukundaiś ca hintālair bījapūrakaiḥ ।
ketakīvanakhaṇḍaiś ca atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ ।।
mallikākundabāṇaiś ca kadalīkhaṇḍamaṇḍitaiḥ ।
mātuluṅgaiḥ pūgaphalaiḥ karuṇaiḥ sindhuvārakaiḥ ।।
bahuvāraiḥ kovidārair badaraiḥ sakarañjakaiḥ ।
anyaiś ca vividhaiḥ puṣpa- vṛkṣaiś cānyair manoharaiḥ ।।
latāgulmair vitānaiś ca udyānair nandanopamaiḥ ।
sadā kusumagandhāḍhyaiḥ sadā phalabharānataiḥ ।।
nānāpakṣirutai ramyair nānāmṛgagaṇāvṛtaiḥ ।
cakoraiḥ śatapattraiś ca bhṛṅgāraiḥ priyaputrakaiḥ ।।
kalaviṅkair mayūraiś ca śukaiḥ kokilakais tathā ।
kapotaiḥ khañjarīṭaiś ca śyenaiḥ pārāvatais tathā ।।
khagaiś cānyair bahuvidhaiḥ śrotraramyair manoramaiḥ ।
saritaḥ puṣkariṇyaś ca sarāṃsi subahūni ca ।।
anyair jalāśayaiḥ puṇyaiḥ kumudotpalamaṇḍitaiḥ ।
padmaiḥ sitetaraiḥ śubhraiḥ kahlāraiś ca sugandhibhiḥ ।।
anyair bahuvidhaiḥ puṣpair jalajaiḥ sumanoharaiḥ ।
gandhāmodakarair divyaiḥ sarvartukusumojjvalaiḥ ।।
haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaiś cakravākopaśobhitaiḥ ।
sārasaiś ca balākaiś ca kūrmair matsyaiḥ sanakrakaiḥ ।।
jalapādaiḥ kadambaiś ca plavaiś ca jalakukkuṭaiḥ ।
khagair jalacaraiś cānyair nānāravavibhūṣitaiḥ ।।
nānāvarṇaiḥ sadā hṛṣṭair añcitāni samantataḥ ।
evaṃ nānāvidhaiḥ puṣpair vividhaiś ca jalāśayaiḥ ।।
vividhaiḥ pādapaiḥ puṇyair udyānair vividhais tathā ।
jalasthalacaraiś caiva vihagaiś cārvadhiṣṭhitaiḥ ।।
devatāyatanair divyaiḥ śobhitā sā mahāpurī ।
tatrāste bhagavān devas tripurāris trilocanaḥ ।।
mahākāleti vikhyātaḥ sarvakāmapradaḥ śivaḥ ।
śivakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā vidhivat pāpanāśane ।।
devān pitṝn ṛṣīṃś caiva saṃtarpya vidhivad budhaḥ ।
gatvā śivālayaṃ paścāt kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam ।।
praviśya saṃyato bhūtvā dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ ।
snānaiḥ puṣpais tathā gandhair dhūpair dīpaiś ca bhaktitaḥ ।।
naivedyair upahāraiś ca gītavādyaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca nṛtyaiḥ stotraiś ca śaṃkaram ।।
saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā mahākālaṃ sakṛc chivam ।
aśvamedhasahasrasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ ।।
pāpaiḥ sarvair vinirmukto vimānaiḥ sārvakāmikaiḥ ।
āruhya tridivaṃ yāti yatra śaṃbhor niketanam ।।
divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaḥ ।
bhuṅkte tatra varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।।
śivaloke muniśreṣṭhā jarāmaraṇavarjitaḥ ।
puṇyakṣayād ihāyātaḥ pravare brāhmaṇe kule ।।
caturvedī bhaved vipraḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ ।
yogaṃ pāśupataṃ prāpya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
āste tatra nadī puṇyā śiprā nāmeti viśrutā ।
tasyāṃ snātas tu vidhivat saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥ ।।
sarvapāpavinirmukto vimānavaram āsthitaḥ ।
bhuṅkte bahuvidhān bhogān svargaloke narottamaḥ ।।
āste tatraiva bhagavān devadevo janārdanaḥ ।
govindasvāmināmāsau bhuktimuktiprado hariḥ ।।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā muktim āpnoti trisaptakulasaṃyutaḥ ।
vimānenārkavarṇena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā ।।
sarvakāmasamṛddhena kāmagenāsthireṇa ca ।
upagīyamāno gandharvair viṣṇuloke mahīyate ।।
bhuṅkte ca vividhān kāmān nirātaṅko gatajvaraḥ ।
ābhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvat surūpaḥ subhagaḥ sukhī ।।
kālenāgatya matimān brāhmaṇaḥ syān mahītale ।
pravare yogināṃ gehe vedaśāstrārthatattvavit ।।
vaiṣṇavaṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।
vikramasvāmināmānaṃ viṣṇuṃ tatraiva bho dvijāḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā naro vā nārī vā phalaṃ pūrvoditaṃ labhet ।
anye api tatra tiṣṭhanti devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ ।।
mātaraś ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarvakāmaphalapradāḥ ।
dṛṣṭvā tān vidhivad bhaktyā saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca ।।
sarvapāpavinirmukto naro yāti triviṣṭapam ।
evaṃ sā nagarī ramyā rājasiṃhena pālitā ।।
nityotsavapramuditā yathendrasyāmarāvatī ।
purāṣṭādaśasaṃyuktā suvistīrṇacatuṣpathā ।।
dhanurjyāghoṣaninadā siddhasaṃgamabhūṣitā ।
vidyāvadgaṇabhūyiṣṭhā vedanirghoṣanāditā ।।
itihāsapurāṇāni śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca ।
kāvyālāpakathāś caiva śrūyante aharniśaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
evaṃ mayā guṇāḍhyā sā taduyinī?? samudāhṛtā ।
yasyāṃ rājābhavat pūrvam indradyumno mahāmatiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasyāṃ sa nṛpatiḥ pūrvaṃ kurvan rājyam anuttamam ।
pālayām āsa matimān prajāḥ putrān ivaurasān ।।
satyavādī mahāprājñaḥ śūraḥ sarvaguṇākaraḥ ।
matimān dharmasaṃpannaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ ।।
satyavāñ śīlavān dāntaḥ śrīmān parapuraṃjayaḥ ।
āditya iva tejobhī rūpair āśvinayor iva ।।
vardhamānasurāścaryaḥ śakratulyaparākramaḥ ।
śāradendur ivābhāti lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
āhartā sarvayajñānāṃ hayamedhādikṛt tathā ।
dānair yajñais tapobhiś ca tattulyo nāsti bhūpatiḥ ।।
suvarṇamaṇimuktānāṃ gajāśvānāṃ ca bhūpatiḥ ।
pradadau vipramukhyebhyo yāge yāge mahādhanam ।।
hastyaśvarathamukhyānāṃ kambalājinavāsasām ।
ratnānāṃ dhanadhānyānām antas tasya na vidyate ।।
evaṃ sarvadhanair yukto guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।
sarvakāmasamṛddhātmā kurvan rājyam akaṇṭakam ।।
tasyeyaṃ matir utpannā sarvayogeśvaraṃ harim ।
katham ārādhayiṣyāmi bhuktimuktipradaṃ prabhum ।।
vicārya sarvaśāstrāṇi tantrāṇy āgamavistaram ।
itihāsapurāṇāni vedāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
dharmaśāstrāṇi sarvāṇi niyamān ṛṣibhāṣitān ।
vedāṅgāni ca śāstrāṇi vidyāsthānāni yāni ca ।।
guruṃ saṃsevya yatnena brāhmaṇān vedapāragān ।
ādhāya paramāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ kṛtakṛtyo abhavat tadā ।।
saṃprāpya paramaṃ tattvaṃ vāsudevākhyam avyayam ।
bhrāntijñānād atītas tu mumukṣuḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ ।।
katham ārādhayiṣyāmi devadevaṃ sanātanam ।
pītavastraṃ caturbāhuṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।।
vanamālāvṛtoraskaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam ।
śrīvatsoraḥsamāyuktaṃ mukuṭāṅgadaśobhitam ।।
svapurāt sa tu niṣkrānta ujjayinyāḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
balena mahatā yuktaḥ sabhṛtyaḥ sapurohitaḥ ।।
anujagmus tu taṃ sarve rathinaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ ।
rathair vimānasaṃkāśaiḥ patākādhvajasevitaiḥ ।।
sādinaś ca tathā sarve prāsatomarapāṇayaḥ ।
aśvaiḥ pavanasaṃkāśair anujagmus tu taṃ nṛpam ।।
himavatsaṃbhavair mattair vāraṇaiḥ parvatopamaiḥ ।
īṣādantaiḥ sadā mattaiḥ pracaṇḍaiḥ ṣaṣṭihāyanaiḥ ।।
hemakakṣaiḥ sapatākair ghaṇṭāravavibhūṣitaiḥ ।
anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve gajayuddhaviśāradāḥ ।।
asaṃkhyeyāś ca pādātā dhanuṣprāsāsipāṇayaḥ ।
divyamālyāmbaradharā divyagandhānulepanāḥ ।।
anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve yuvāno mṛṣṭakuṇḍalāḥ ।
sarvāstrakuśalāḥ śūrāḥ sadā saṃgrāmalālasāḥ ।।
antaḥpuranivāsinyaḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ ।
bimbauṣṭhacārudaśanāḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ ।।
divyavastradharāḥ sarvā divyamālyavibhūṣitāḥ ।
divyagandhānuliptāṅgāḥ śaraccandranibhānanāḥ ।।
sumadhyamāś cāruveṣāś cārukarṇālakāñcitāḥ ।
tāmbūlarañjitamukhā rakṣibhiś ca surakṣitāḥ ।।
yānair uccāvacaiḥ śubhrair maṇikāñcanabhūṣitaiḥ ।
upagīyamānās tāḥ sarvā gāyanaiḥ stutipāṭhakaiḥ ।।
veṣṭitāḥ śastrahastaiś ca padmapattrāyatekṣaṇāḥ ।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā anujagmuś ca taṃ nṛpam ।।
vaṇiggrāmagaṇāḥ sarve nānāpuranivāsinaḥ ।
dhanai ratnaiḥ suvarṇaiś ca sadārāḥ saparicchadāḥ ।।
astravikrayakāś caiva tāmbūlapaṇyajīvinaḥ ।
tṛṇavikrayakāś caiva kāṣṭhavikrayakārakāḥ ।।
raṅgopajīvinaḥ sarve māṃsavikrayiṇas tathā ।
tailavikrayakāś caiva vastravikrayakās tathā ।।
phalavikrayiṇaś caiva pattravikrayiṇas tathā ।
tathā javasahārāś ca rajakāś ca sahasraśaḥ ।।
gopālā nāpitāś caiva tathānye vastrasūcakāḥ ।
meṣapālāś cājapālā mṛgapālāś ca haṃsakāḥ ।।
dhānyavikrayiṇaś caiva saktuvikrayiṇaś ca ye ।
guḍavikrayikāś caiva tathā lavaṇajīvinaḥ ।।
gāyanā nartakāś caiva tathā maṅgalapāṭhakāḥ ।
śailūṣāḥ kathakāś caiva purāṇārthaviśāradāḥ ।।
kavayaḥ kāvyakartāro nānākāvyaviśāradāḥ ।
viṣaghnā gāruḍāś caiva nānāratnaparīkṣakāḥ ।।
vyokārās tāmrakārāś ca kāṃsyakārāś ca rūṭhakāḥ ।
kauṣakārāś citrakārāḥ kundakārāś ca pāvakāḥ ।।
daṇḍakārāś cāsikārāḥ surādhūtopajīvinaḥ ।
mallā dūtāś ca kāyasthā ye cānye karmakāriṇaḥ ।।
tantuvāyā rūpakārā vārtikās tailapāṭhakāḥ ।
lāvajīvās taittirikā mṛgapakṣyupajīvinaḥ ।।
gajavaidyāś ca vaidyāś ca naravaidyāś ca ye narāḥ ।
vṛkṣavaidyāś ca govaidyā ye cānye chedadāhakāḥ ।।
ete nāgarakāḥ sarve ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ ।
anujagmus tu rājānaṃ samastapuravāsinaḥ ।।
yathā vrajantaṃ pitaraṃ grāmāntaraṃ samutsukāḥ ।
anuyānti yathā putrās tathā taṃ te api nāgarāḥ ।।
evaṃ sa nṛpatiḥ śrīmān vṛtaḥ sarvair mahājanaiḥ ।
hastyaśvarathapādātair jagāma ca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।।
evaṃ gatvā sa nṛpatir dakṣiṇasyodadhes taṭam ।
sarvais tair dīrghakālena balair anugataḥ prabhuḥ ।।
dadarśa sāgaraṃ ramyaṃ nṛtyantam iva ca sthitam ।
anekaśatasāhasrair ūrmibhiś ca samākulam ।।
nānāratnālayaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprāṇisamākulam ।
vīcītaraṅgabahulaṃ mahāścaryasamanvitam ।।
tīrtharājaṃ mahāśabdam apāraṃ subhayaṃkaram ।
meghavṛndapratīkāśam agādhaṃ makarālayam ।।
matsyaiḥ kūrmaiś ca śaṅkhaiś ca śuktikānakraśaṅkubhiḥ ।
śiṃśumāraiḥ karkaṭaiś ca vṛtaṃ sarpair mahāviṣaiḥ ।।
lavaṇodaṃ hareḥ sthānaṃ śayanasya nadīpatim ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvavāñchāphalapradam ।।
anekāvartagambhīraṃ dānavānāṃ samāśrayam ।
amṛtasyāraṇiṃ divyaṃ devayonim apāṃ patim ।।
viśiṣṭaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ jīvadhāraṇam ।
supavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam ।।
tīrthānām uttamaṃ tīrtham avyayaṃ yādasāṃ patim ।
candravṛddhikṣayasyeva yasya mānaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ।।
abhedyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ devānām amṛtālayam ।
utpattisthitisaṃhāra- hetubhūtaṃ sanātanam ।।
upajīvyaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ puṇyaṃ nadanadīpatim ।
dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpatiśreṣṭho vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ ।।
nivāsam akarot tatra velām asādya sāgarīm ।
puṇye manohare deśe sarvabhūmiguṇair yute ।।
vṛtaṃ śālaiḥ kadambaiś ca puṃnāgaiḥ saraladrumaiḥ ।
panasair nārikelaiś ca bakulair nāgakesaraiḥ ।।
tālaiḥ pippalaiḥ kharjūrair nāraṅgair bījapūrakaiḥ ।
śālair āmrātakair lodhrair bakulair bahuvārakaiḥ ।।
kapitthaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca pāṭalāśokacampakaiḥ ।
dāḍimaiś ca tamālaiś ca pārijātais tathārjunaiḥ ।।
prācīnāmalakair bilvaiḥ priyaṅguvaṭakhādiraiḥ ।
iṅgudīsaptaparṇaiś ca aśvatthāgastyajambukaiḥ ।।
madhukaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca bahuvāraiḥ satindukaiḥ ।
palāśabadarair nīpaiḥ siddhanimbaśubhāñjanaiḥ ।।
vārakaiḥ kovidāraiś ca bhallātāmalakais tathā ।
iti hintālakāṅkolaiḥ karañjaiḥ savibhītakaiḥ ।।
sasarjamadhukāśmaryaiḥ śālmalīdevadārubhiḥ ।
śākhoṭhakair nimbavaṭaiḥ kumbhīkauṣṭhaharītakaiḥ ।।
guggulaiś candanair vṛkṣais tathaivāgurupāṭalaiḥ ।
jambīrakaruṇair vṛkṣais tintiḍīraktacandanaiḥ ।।
evaṃ nānāvidhair vṛkṣais tathānyair bahupādapaiḥ ।
kalpadrumair nityaphalaiḥ sarvartukusumotkaraiḥ ।।
nānāpakṣirutair divyair mattakokilanāditaiḥ ।
mayūravarasaṃghuṣṭaiḥ śukasārikasaṃkulaiḥ ।।
hārītair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca cātakair bahuputrakaiḥ ।
jīvaṃjīvakakākolaiḥ kalaviṅkaiḥ kapotakaiḥ ।।
khagair nānāvidhaiś cānyaiḥ śrotraramyair manoharaiḥ ।
puṣpitāgreṣu vṛkṣeṣu kūjadbhiś cārvadhiṣṭhitaiḥ ।।
ketakīvanakhaṇḍaiś ca sadā puṣpadharaiḥ sitaiḥ ।
mallikākundakusumair yūthikātagarais tathā ।।
kuṭajair bāṇapuṣpaiś ca atimuktaiḥ sakubjakaiḥ ।
mālatīkaravīraiś ca tathā kadalakāñcanaiḥ ।।
anyair nānāvidhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiś cārudarśanaiḥ ।
vanodyānopavanajair nānāvarṇaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ ।।
vidyādharagaṇākīrṇaiḥ siddhacāraṇasevitaiḥ ।
gandharvoragarakṣobhir bhūtāpsarasakiṃnaraiḥ ।।
muniyakṣagaṇākīrṇair nānāsattvaniṣevitaiḥ ।
mṛgaiḥ śākhāmṛgaiḥ siṃhair varāhamahiṣākulaiḥ ।।
tathānyaiḥ kṛṣṇasārādyair mṛgaiḥ sarvatra śobhitaiḥ ।
śārdūlair dīptamātaṅgais tathānyair vanacāribhiḥ ।।
evaṃ nānāvidhair vṛkṣair udyānair nandanopamaiḥ ।
latāgulmavitānaiś ca vividhaiś ca jalāśayaiḥ ।।
haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaiḥ padminīkhaṇḍamaṇḍitaiḥ ।
kādambaiś ca plavair haṃsaiś cakravākopaśobhitaiḥ ।।
kamalaiḥ śatapattraiś ca kahlāraiḥ kumudotpalaiḥ ।
khagair jalacaraiś cānyaiḥ puṣpair jalasamudbhavaiḥ ।।
parvatair dīptaśikharaiś cārukandaramaṇḍitaiḥ ।
nānāvṛkṣasamākīrṇair nānādhātuvibhūṣitaiḥ ।।
sarvāścaryamayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ sarvabhūtālayaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।
sarvauṣadhisamāyuktair vipulaiś citrasānubhiḥ ।।
evaṃ sarvaiḥ samuditaiḥ śobhitaṃ sumanoharaiḥ ।
dadarśa sa mahīpālaḥ sthānaṃ trailokyapūjitam ।।
daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ pañcayojanam āyatam ।
nānāścaryasamāyuktaṃ kṣetraṃ paramadurlabham ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
tasmin kṣetravare puṇye vaiṣṇave puruṣottame ।
kiṃ tatra pratimā pūrvaṃ na sthitā vaiṣṇavī prabho ।।
yenāsau nṛpatis tatra gatvā sabalavāhanaḥ ।
sthāpayām āsa kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ bhadrāṃ śubhapradām ।।
saṃśayo no mahān atra vismayaś ca jagatpate ।
śrotum icchāmahe sarvaṃ brūhi tatkāraṇaṃ ca naḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ pūrvasaṃvṛttāṃ kathāṃ pāpapraṇāśinīm ।
pravakṣyāmi samāsena śriyā pṛṣṭaḥ purā hariḥ ।।
sumeroḥ kāñcane śṛṅge sarvāścaryasamanvite ।
siddhavidyādharair yakṣaiḥ kiṃnarair upaśobhite ।।
devadānavagandharvair nāgair apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ ।
munibhir guhyakaiḥ siddhaiḥ sauparṇaiḥ samarudgaṇaiḥ ।।
anyair devālayaiḥ sādhyaiḥ kaśyapādyaiḥ prajeśvaraiḥ ।
vālakhilyādibhiś caiva śobhite sumanohare ।।
karṇikāravanair divyaiḥ sarvartukusumotkaraiḥ ।
jātarūpapratīkāśair bhūṣite sūryasaṃnibhaiḥ ।।
anyaiś ca bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ śālatālādibhir vanaiḥ ।
puṃnāgāśokasarala- nyagrodhāmrātakārjunaiḥ ।।
pārijātāmrakhadira- nīpabilvakadambakaiḥ ।
dhavakhādirapālāśa- śīrṣāmalakatindukaiḥ ।।
nāriṅgakolabakula- lodhradāḍimadārukaiḥ ।
sarjaiś ca karṇais tagaraiḥ śiśibhūrjavanimbakaiḥ ।।
anyaiś ca kāñcanaiś caiva phalabhāraiś ca nāmitaiḥ ।
nānākusumagandhāḍhyair bhūṣite puṣpapādapaiḥ ।।
mālatīyūthikāmallī- kundabāṇakuruṇṭakaiḥ ।
pāṭalāgastyakuṭaja- mandārakusumādibhiḥ ।।
anyaiś ca vividhaiḥ puṣpair manasaḥ prītidāyakaiḥ ।
nānāvihagasaṃghaiś ca kūjadbhir madhurasvaraiḥ ।।
puṃskokilarutair divyair mattabarhiṇanāditaiḥ ।
evaṃ nānāvidhair vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpair nānāvidhais tathā ।।
khagair nānāvidhaiś caiva śobhite surasevite ।
tatra sthitaṃ jagannāthaṃ jagatsraṣṭāram avyayam ।।
sarvalokavidhātāraṃ vāsudevākhyam avyayam ।
praṇamya śirasā devī lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।
papracchemaṃ mahāpraśnaṃ padmajā tam anuttamam ।।
{śrīr uvāca 
brūhi tvaṃ sarvalokeśa saṃśayaṃ me hṛdi sthitam ।
martyaloke mahāścarye karmabhūmau sudurlabhe ।।
lobhamohagrahagraste kāmakrodhamahārṇave ।
yena mucyeta deveśa asmāt saṃsārasāgarāt ।।
ācakṣva sarvadeveśa praṇatāṃ yadi manyase ।
tvadṛte nāsti loke asmin vaktā saṃśayanirṇaye ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā devadevo janārdanaḥ ।
provāca parayā prītyā paraṃ sārāmṛtopamam ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
sukhopāsyaḥ susādhyaś ca abhirāmaś ca susatphalaḥ ।
āste tīrthavare devi vikhyātaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।।
na tena sadṛśaḥ kaścit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate ।
kīrtanād yasya deveśi mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ ।।
na vijñāto amaraiḥ sarvair na daityair na ca dānavaiḥ ।
marīcyādyair munivarair gopitaṃ me varānane ।।
tat te ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tīrtharājaṃ ca sāṃpratam ।
bhāvenaikena suśroṇi śṛṇuṣva varavarṇini ।।
āsīt kalpe samutpanne naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame ।
pralīnā devagandharva- daityavidyādharoragāḥ ।।
tamobhūtam idaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃcana ।
tasmiñ jāgarti bhūtātmā paramātmā jagadguruḥ ।।
śrīmāṃs trimūrtikṛd devo jagatkartā maheśvaraḥ ।
vāsudeveti vikhyāto yogātmā harir īśvaraḥ ।।
so asṛjad yoganidrānte nābhyambhoruhamadhyagam ।
padmakeśarasaṃkāśaṃ brahmāṇaṃ bhūtam avyayam ।।
tādṛgbhūtas tato brahmā sarvalokamaheśvaraḥ ।
pañcabhūtasamāyuktaṃ sṛjate ca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।।
mātrāyonīni bhūtāni sthūlasūkṣmāṇi yāni ca ।
caturvidhāni sarvāṇi sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca ।।
tataḥ prajāpatir brahmā cakre sarvaṃ carācaram ।
saṃcintya manasātmānaṃ sasarja vividhāḥ prajāḥ ।।
marīcyādīn munīn sarvān devāsurapitṝn api ।
yakṣavidyādharāṃś cānyān gaṅgādyāḥ saritas tathā ।।
naravānarasiṃhāṃś ca vividhāṃś ca vihaṃgamān ।
jarāyūn aṇḍajān devi svedajodbhedajāṃs tathā ।।
brahma kṣatraṃ tathā vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ caiva catuṣṭayam ।
antyajātāṃś ca mlecchāṃś ca sasarja vividhān pṛthak ।।
yat kiṃcij jīvasaṃjñaṃ tu tṛṇagulmapipīlikam ।
brahmā bhūtvā jagat sarvaṃ nirmame sa carācaram ।।
dakṣiṇāṅge tathātmānaṃ saṃcintya puruṣaṃ svayam ।
vāme caiva tu nārīṃ sa dvidhā bhūtam akalpayat ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti loke asmin prajā maithunasaṃbhavāḥ ।
adhamottamamadhyāś ca mama kṣetrāṇi yāni ca ।।
evaṃ saṃcintya devo asau purā salilayonijaḥ ।
jagāma dhyānam āsthāya vāsudevātmikāṃ tanum ।।
dhyānamātreṇa devena svayam eva janārdanaḥ ।
tasmin kṣaṇe samutpannaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt ।।
sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇaḥ ।
saliladhvāntameghābhaḥ śrīmāñ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ ।।
apaśyat sahasā taṃ tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ ।
āsanair arghyapādyaiś ca akṣatair abhinandya ca ।।
tuṣṭāva paramaiḥ stotrair viriñciḥ susamāhitaḥ ।
tato aham uktavān devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ kamalodbhavam ।
kāraṇaṃ vada māṃ tāta mama dhyānasya sāṃpratam ।।
{brahmovāca 
jagaddhitāya deveśa martyalokaiś ca durlabham ।
svargadvārasya mārgāṇi yajñadānavratāni ca ।।
yogaḥ satyaṃ tapaḥ śraddhā tīrthāni vividhāni ca ।
vihāya sarvam eteṣāṃ sukhaṃ tatsādhanaṃ vada ।।
sthānaṃ jagatpate mahyām utkṛṣṭaṃ ca yad ucyate ।
sarveṣām uttamaṃ sthānaṃ brūhi me puruṣottama ।।
vidhātur vacanaṃ śrutvā tato ahaṃ proktavān priye ।
śṛṇu brahman pravakṣyāmi nirmalaṃ bhuvi durlabham ।।
uttamaṃ sarvakṣetrāṇāṃ dhanyaṃ saṃsāratāraṇam ।
gobrāhmaṇahitaṃ puṇyaṃ cāturvarṇyasukhodayam ।।
bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ kṣetraṃ paramadurlabham ।
mahāpuṇyaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ siddhidaṃ vai pitāmahe ।।
tasmād āsīt samutpannaṃ tīrtharājaṃ sanātanam ।
vikhyātaṃ paramaṃ kṣetraṃ caturyuganiṣevitam ।।
sarveṣām eva devānām ṛṣīṇāṃ brahmacāriṇām ।
daityadānavasiddhānāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasām ।।
nāgavidyādharāṇāṃ ca sthāvarasya carasya ca ।
uttamaḥ puruṣo yasmāt tasmāt sa puruṣottamaḥ ।।
dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre nyagrodho yatra tiṣṭhati ।
daśayojanavistīrṇaṃ kṣetraṃ paramadurlabham ।।
yas tu kalpe samutpanne mahadulkānibarhaṇe ।
vināśaṃ naivam abhyeti svayaṃ tatraivam āsthitaḥ ।।
dṛṣṭamātre vaṭe tasmiṃś chāyām ākramya cāsakṛt ।
brahmahatyāt pramucyeta pāpeṣv anyeṣu kā kathā ।।
pradakṣiṇā kṛtā yais tu namaskāraś ca jantubhiḥ ।
sarve vidhūtapāpmānas te gatāḥ keśavālayam ।।
nyagrodhasyottare kiṃcid dakṣiṇe keśavasya tu ।
prāsādas tatra tiṣṭhet tu padaṃ dharmamayaṃ hi tat ।।
pratimāṃ tatra vai dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ devena nirmitām ।
anāyāsena vai yānti bhuvanaṃ me tato narāḥ ।।
gacchamānāṃs tu tān prekṣya ekadā dharmarāṭ priye ।
madantikam anuprāpya praṇamya śirasābravīt ।।
{yama uvāca 
namas te bhagavan deva lokanātha jagatpate ।
kṣīrodavāsinaṃ devaṃ śeṣabhogānuśāyinam ।।
varaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ kartāram akṛtaṃ prabhum ।
viśveśvaram ajaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvajñam aparājitam ।।
nīlotpaladalaśyāmaṃ puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇam ।
sarvajñaṃ nirguṇaṃ śāntaṃ jagaddhātāram avyayam ।।
sarvalokavidhātāraṃ sarvalokasukhāvaham ।
purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ vedyaṃ vyaktāvyaktaṃ sanātanam ।।
parāvarāṇāṃ sraṣṭāraṃ lokanāthaṃ jagadgurum ।
śrīvatsoraskasaṃyuktaṃ vanamālāvibhūṣitam ।।
pītavastraṃ caturbāhuṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।
hārakeyūrasaṃyuktaṃ mukuṭāṅgadadhāriṇam ।।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇaṃ sarvendriyavivarjitam ।
kūṭastham acalaṃ sūkṣmaṃ jyotīrūpaṃ sanātanam ।।
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaṃ vyāpinaṃ prakṛteḥ param ।
namasyāmi jagannātham īśvaraṃ sukhadaṃ prabhum ।।
ity evaṃ dharmarājas tu purā nyagrodhasaṃnidhau ।
stutvā nānāvidhaiḥ stotraiḥ praṇāmam akarot tadā ।।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu mahābhāge praṇataṃ prāñjalisthitam ।
stotrasya kāraṇaṃ devi pṛṣṭavān aham antakam ।।
vaivasvata mahābāho sarvadevottamo hy asi ।
kimarthaṃ stutavān māṃ tvaṃ saṃkṣepāt tad bravīhi me ।।
{dharmarāja uvāca 
asminn āyatane puṇye vikhyāte puruṣottame ।
indranīlamayī śreṣṭhā pratimā sārvakāmikī ।।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣa bhāvenaikena śraddhayā ।
śvetākhyaṃ bhavanaṃ yānti niṣkāmāś caiva mānavāḥ ।।
ataḥ kartuṃ na śaknomi vyāpāram arisūdana ।
prasīda sumahādeva saṃhara pratimāṃ vibho ।।
śrutvā vaivasvatasyaitad vākyam etad uvāca ha ।
yama tāṃ gopayiṣyāmi sikatābhiḥ samantataḥ ।।
tataḥ sā pratimā devi vallibhir gopitā mayā ।
yathā tatra na paśyanti manujāḥ svargakāṅkṣiṇaḥ ।।
pracchādya vallikair devi jātarūpaparicchadaiḥ ।
yamaṃ prasthāpayām āsa svāṃ purīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ।।
{brahmovāca 
luptāyāṃ pratimāyāṃ tu indranīlasya bho dvijāḥ ।
tasmin kṣetravare puṇye vikhyāte puruṣottame ।।
yo bhūtas tatra vṛttānto devadevo janārdanaḥ ।
taṃ sarvaṃ kathayām āsa sa tasyai bhagavān purā ।।
indradyumnasya gamanaṃ kṣetrasaṃdarśanaṃ tathā ।
kṣetrasya varṇanaṃ caiva prāsādakaraṇaṃ tathā ।।
hayamedhasya yajanaṃ svapnadarśanam eva ca ।
lavaṇasyodadhes tīre kāṣṭhasya darśanaṃ tathā ।।
darśanaṃ vāsudevasya śilpirājasya ca dvijāḥ ।
nirmāṇaṃ pratimāyās tu yathāvarṇaṃ viśeṣataḥ ।।
sthāpanaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ prāsāde bhuvanottame ।
yātrākāle ca viprendrāḥ kalpasaṃkīrtanaṃ tathā ।।
mārkaṇḍeyasya caritaṃ sthāpanaṃ śaṃkarasya ca ।
pañcatīrthasya māhātmyaṃ darśanaṃ śūlapāṇinaḥ ।।
vaṭasya darśanaṃ caiva vyuṣṭiṃ tasya ca bho dvijāḥ ।
darśanaṃ baladevasya kṛṣṇasya ca viśeṣataḥ ।।
subhadrāyāś ca tatraiva māhātmyaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ ।
darśanaṃ narasiṃhasya vyuṣṭisaṃkīrtanaṃ tathā ।।
anantavāsudevasya darśanaṃ guṇakīrtanam ।
śvetamādhavamāhātmyaṃ svargadvārasya darśanam ।।
udadher darśanaṃ caiva snānaṃ tarpaṇam eva ca ।
samudrasnānamāhātmyam indradyumnasya ca dvijāḥ ।।
pañcatīrthaphalaṃ caiva mahājyeṣṭhaṃ tathaiva ca ।
sthānaṃ kṛṣṇasya halinaḥ parvayātrāphalaṃ tathā ।।
varṇanaṃ viṣṇulokasya kṣetrasya ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
pūrvaṃ kathitavān sarvaṃ tasyai sa puruṣottamaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śrotum icchāmahe deva kathāśeṣaṃ mahīpateḥ ।
tasmin kṣetravare gatvā kiṃ cakāra narādhipaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ ।
kṣetrasaṃdarśanaṃ caiva kṛtyaṃ tasya ca bhūpateḥ ।।
gatvā tatra mahīpālaḥ kṣetre trailokyaviśrute ।
dadarśa ramaṇīyāni sthānāni saritas tathā ।।
nadī tatra mahāpuṇyā vindhyapādavinirgatā ।
svittropaleti vikhyātā sarvapāpaharā śivā ।।
gaṅgātulyā mahāsrotā dakṣiṇārṇavagāminī ।
mahānadīti nāmnā sā puṇyatoyā saridvarā ।।
dakṣiṇasyodadher garbhaṃ gatāvartātiśobhitā ।
ubhayos taṭayor yasyā grāmāś ca nagarāṇi ca ।।
dṛśyante muniśārdūlāḥ susasyāḥ sumanoharāḥ ।
hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā vastrālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ ।।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrās tatra pṛthak pṛthak ।
svadharmaniratāḥ śāntā dṛśyante śubhalakṣaṇāḥ ।।
tāmbūlapūrṇavadanā mālādāmavibhūṣitāḥ ।
vedapūrṇamukhā viprāḥ saṣaḍaṅgapadakramāḥ ।।
agnihotraratāḥ kecit kecid aupāsanakriyāḥ ।
sarvaśāstrārthakuśalā yajvāno bhūridakṣiṇāḥ ।।
catvāre rājamārgeṣu vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca ।
sabhāmaṇḍalaharmyeṣu devatāyataneṣu ca ।।
itihāsapurāṇāni vedāḥ sāṅgāḥ sulakṣaṇāḥ ।
kāvyaśāstrakathās tatra śrūyante ca mahājanaiḥ ।।
striyas taddeśavāsinyo rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ ।
saṃpūrṇalakṣaṇopetā vistīrṇaśroṇimaṇḍalāḥ ।।
saroruhamukhāḥ śyāmāḥ śaraccandranibhānanāḥ ।
pīnonnatastanāḥ sarvāḥ samṛddhyā cārudarśanāḥ ।।
sauvarṇavalayākrāntā divyair vastrair alaṃkṛtāḥ ।
kadalīgarbhasaṃkāśāḥ padmakiñjalkasaprabhāḥ ।।
bimbādharapuṭāḥ kāntāḥ karṇāntāyatalocanāḥ ।
sumukhāś cārukeśāś ca hāvabhāvāvanāmitāḥ ।।
kāścit padmapalāśākṣyaḥ kāścid indīvarekṣaṇāḥ ।
vidyudvispaṣṭadaśanās tanvaṅgyaś ca tathāparāḥ ।।
kuṭilālakasaṃyuktāḥ sīmantena virājitāḥ ।
grīvābharaṇasaṃyuktā mālyadāmavibhūṣitāḥ ।।
kuṇḍalai ratnasaṃyuktaiḥ karṇapūrair manoharaiḥ ।
devayoṣitpratīkāśā dṛśyante śubhalakṣaṇāḥ ।।
divyagītavarair dhanyaiḥ krīḍamānā varāṅganāḥ ।
vīṇāveṇumṛdaṅgaiś ca paṇavaiś caiva gomukhaiḥ ।।
śaṅkhadundubhinirghoṣair nānāvādyair manoharaiḥ ।
krīḍantyas tāḥ sadā hṛṣṭā vilāsinyaḥ parasparam ।।
evamādi tathāneka- gītavādyaviśāradāḥ ।
divā rātrau samāyuktāḥ kāmonmattā varāṅganāḥ ।।
bhikṣuvaikhānasaiḥ siddhaiḥ snātakair brahmacāribhiḥ ।
mantrasiddhais tapaḥsiddhair yajñasiddhair niṣevitam ।।
ity evaṃ dadṛśe rājā kṣetraṃ paramaśobhanam ।
atraivārādhayiṣyāmi bhagavantaṃ sanātanam ।।
jagadguruṃ paraṃ devaṃ paraṃ pāraṃ paraṃ padam ।
sarveśvareśvaraṃ viṣṇum anantam aparājitam ।।
idaṃ tanmānasaṃ tīrthaṃ jñātaṃ me puruṣottamam ।
kalpavṛkṣo mahākāyo nyagrodho yatra tiṣṭhati ।।
pratimā cendranīlākhyā svayaṃ devena gopitā ।
na cātra dṛśyate cānyā pratimā vaiṣṇavī śubhā ।।
tathā yatnaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā devo jagatpatiḥ ।
pratyakṣaṃ mama cābhyeti viṣṇuḥ satyaparākramaḥ ।।
yajñair dānais tapobhiś ca homair dhyānais tathārcanaiḥ ।
upavāsaiś ca vidhivac careyaṃ vratam uttamam ।।
ananyamanasā caiva tanmanā nānyamānasaḥ ।
viṣṇvāyatanavinyāse prārambhaṃ ca karomy aham ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ sa pṛthivīpālaś cintayitvā dvijottamāḥ ।
prāsādārthaṃ hares tatra prārambham akarot tadā ।।
ānāyya gaṇakān sarvān ācāryāñ śāstrapāragān ।
bhūmiṃ saṃśodhya yatnena rājā tu parayā mudā ।।
brāhmaṇair jñānasaṃpannair vedaśāstrārthapāragaiḥ ।
