amātyair mantribhiś caiva vāstuvidyāviśāradaiḥ ।।
taiḥ sārdhaṃ sa samālocya sumuhūrte śubhe dine ।
sucandratārāsaṃyoge grahānukūlyasaṃyute ।।
jayamaṅgalaśabdaiś ca nānāvādyair manoharaiḥ ।
vedādhyayananirghoṣair gītaiḥ sumadhurasvaraiḥ ।।
puṣpalājākṣatair gandhaiḥ pūrṇakumbhaiḥ sadīpakaiḥ ।
dadāv arghyaṃ tato rājā śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ ।।
dattvaivam arghyaṃ vidhivad ānāyya sa mahīpatiḥ ।
kaliṅgādhipatiṃ śūram utkalādhipatiṃ tathā ।
kośalādhipatiṃ caiva tān uvāca tadā nṛpaḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
gacchadhvaṃ sahitāḥ sarve śilārthe susamāhitāḥ ।
gṛhītvā śilpimukhyāṃś ca śilākarmaviśāradān ।।
vindhyācalaṃ suvistīrṇaṃ bahukandaraśobhitam ।
nirūpya sarvasānūni cchedayitvā śilāḥ śubhāḥ ।
saṃvāhyantāṃ ca śakaṭair naukābhir mā vilambatha ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ gantuṃ samādiśya tān nṛpān sa mahīpatiḥ ।
punar evābravīd vākyaṃ sāmātyān sapurohitān ।।
{rājovāca 
gacchantu dūtāḥ sarvatra mamājñāṃ pravadantu vai ।
yatra tiṣṭhanti rājānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tān suśīghragāḥ ।।
hastyaśvarathapādātaiḥ sāmātyaiḥ sapurohitaiḥ ।
gacchata sahitāḥ sarva indradyumnasya śāsanāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ dūtāḥ samājñātā rājñā tena mahātmanā ।
gatvā tadā nṛpān ūcur vacanaṃ tasya bhūpateḥ ।।
śrutvā tu te tathā sarve dūtānāṃ vacanaṃ nṛpāḥ ।
ājagmus tvaritāḥ sarve svasainyaiḥ parivāritāḥ ।।
ye nṛpāḥ sarvadigbhāge ye ca dakṣiṇataḥ sthitāḥ ।
paścimāyāṃ sthitā ye ca uttarāpathasaṃsthitāḥ ।।
pratyantavāsino ye api ye ca saṃnidhivāsinaḥ ।
pārvatīyāś ca ye kecit tathā dvīpanivāsinaḥ ।।
rathair nāgaiḥ padātaiś ca vājibhir dhanavistaraiḥ ।
saṃprāptā bahuśo viprāḥ śrutvendradyumnaśāsanam ।।
tān āgatān nṛpān dṛṣṭvā sāmātyān sapurohitān ।
provāca rājā hṛṣṭātmā kāryam uddiśya sādaram ।।
{rājovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ nṛpaśārdūlā yathā kiṃcid bravīmy aham ।
asmin kṣetravare puṇye bhuktimuktiprade śive ।।
hayamedhaṃ mahāyajñaṃ prāsādaṃ caiva vaiṣṇavam ।
kathaṃ śaknomy ahaṃ kartum iti cintākulaṃ manaḥ ।।
bhavadbhiḥ susahāyais tu sarvam etat karomy aham ।
yadi yūyaṃ sahāyā me bhavadhvaṃ nṛpasattamāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity evaṃ vadamānasya rājarājasya dhīmataḥ ।
sarve pramuditā hṛṣṭā bhūpās te tasya śāsanāt ।।
vavṛṣur dhanaratnaiś ca suvarṇamaṇimauktikaiḥ ।
kambalājinaratnaiś ca rāṅkavāstaraṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।।
vajravaidūryamāṇikyaiḥ padmarāgendranīlakaiḥ ।
gajair aśvair dhanaiś cānyai rathaiś caiva kareṇubhiḥ ।।
asaṃkhyeyair bahuvidhair dravyair uccāvacais tathā ।
śālivrīhiyavaiś caiva māṣamudgatilais tathā ।।
siddhārthacaṇakaiś caiva godhūmair masurādibhiḥ ।
śyāmākair madhukaiś caiva nīvāraiḥ sakulatthakaiḥ ।।
anyaiś ca vividhair dhānyair grāmyāraṇyaiḥ sahasraśaḥ ।
bahudhānyasahasrāṇāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ ca rāśibhiḥ ।।
gavyasya haviṣaḥ kumbhaiḥ śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।
tathānyair vividhair dravyair bhakṣyabhojyānulepanaiḥ ।।
rājānaḥ pūrayām āsur yat kiṃcid dravyasaṃbhavaiḥ ।
tān dṛṣṭvā yajñasaṃbhārān sarvasaṃpatsamanvitān ।।
yajñakarmavido viprān vedavedāṅgapāragān ।
śāstreṣu nipuṇān dakṣān kuśalān sarvakarmasu ।।
ṛṣīṃś caiva maharṣīṃś ca devarṣīṃś caiva tāpasān ।
brahmacārigṛhasthāṃś ca vānaprasthān yatīṃs tathā ।।
snātakān brāhmaṇāṃś cānyān agnihotre sadā sthitān ।
ācāryopādhyāyavarān svādhyāyatapasānvitān ।।
sadasyāñ śāstrakuśalāṃs tathānyān pāvakān bahūn ।
dṛṣṭvā tān nṛpatiḥ śrīmān uvāca svaṃ purohitam ।।
{rājovāca 
tataḥ prayāntu vidvāṃso brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ ।
vājimedhārthasiddhyarthaṃ deśaṃ paśyantu yajñiyam ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktaḥ sa tathā cakre vacanaṃ tasya bhūpateḥ ।
hṛṣṭaḥ sa mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ tadā rājapurohitaḥ ।।
tato yayau purodhāś ca prājñaḥ sthapatibhiḥ saha ।
brāhmaṇān agrataḥ kṛtvā kuśalān yajñakarmaṇi ।।
taṃ deśaṃ dhīvaragrāmaṃ sapratoliviṭaṅkinam ।
kārayām āsa vipro asau yajñavāṭaṃ yathāvidhi ।।
prāsādaśatasaṃbādhaṃ maṇipravaraśobhitam ।
indrasadmanibhaṃ ramyaṃ hemaratnavibhūṣitam ।।
stambhān kanakacitrāṃś ca toraṇāni bṛhanti ca ।
yajñāyatanadeśeṣu dattvā śuddhaṃ ca kāñcanam ।।
antaḥpurāṇi rājñāṃ ca nānādeśanivāsinām ।
kārayām āsa dharmātmā tatra tatra yathāvidhi ।।
brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vaiśyānāṃ nānādeśasamīyuṣām ।
kārayām āsa vidhivac chālās tatrāpy anekaśaḥ ।।
priyārthaṃ tasya nṛpater āyayur nṛpasattamāḥ ।
ratnāny anekāny ādāya striyaś cāyayur utsave ।।
teṣāṃ nirviśatāṃ sveṣu śibireṣu mahātmanām ।
nadataḥ sāgarasyeva divispṛg abhavad dhvaniḥ ।।
teṣām abhyāgatānāṃ ca sa rājā munisattamāḥ ।
vyādideśāyatanāni śayyāś cāpy upacārataḥ ।।
bhojanāni vicitrāṇi śālīkṣuyavagorasaiḥ ।
upetya nṛpatiśreṣṭho vyādideśa svayaṃ tadā ।।
tathā tasmin mahāyajñe bahavo brahmavādinaḥ ।
ye ca dvijātipravarās tatrāsan dvijasattamāḥ ।।
samājagmuḥ saśiṣyās tān pratijagrāha pārthivaḥ ।
sarvāṃś ca tān anuyayau yāvad āvasathān iti ।।
svayam eva mahātejā dambhaṃ tyaktvā nṛpottamaḥ ।
tataḥ kṛtvā svaśilpaṃ ca śilpino anye ca ye tadā ।।
kṛtsnaṃ yajñavidhiṃ rājñe tadā tasmai nyavedayan ।
tataḥ śrutvā nṛpaśreṣṭhaḥ kṛtaṃ sarvam atandritaḥ ।
hṛṣṭaromābhavad rājā saha mantribhir acyutaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasmin yajñe pravṛtte tu vāgmino hetuvādibhiḥ ।
hetuvādān bahūn āhuḥ parasparajigīṣavaḥ ।।
devendrasyeva vihitaṃ rājasiṃhena bho dvijāḥ ।
dadṛśus toraṇāny atra śātakumbhamayāni ca ।।
śayyāsanavikārāṃś ca subahūn ratnasaṃcayān ।
ghaṭapātrīkaṭāhāni kalaśān vardhamānakān ।।
nahi kaścid asauvarṇam apaśyad vasudhādhipaḥ ।
yūpāṃś ca śāstrapaṭhitān dāravān hemabhūṣitān ।।
upakṣiptān yathākālaṃ vidhivad bhūrivarcasaḥ ।
sthalajā jalajā ye ca paśavaḥ kecana dvijāḥ ।।
sarvān eva samānītān apaśyaṃs tatra te nṛpāḥ ।
gāś caiva mahiṣīś caiva tathā vṛddhastriyo api ca ।।
audakāni ca sattvāni śvāpadāni vayāṃsi ca ।
jarāyujāṇḍajātāni svedajāny udbhidāni ca ।।
parvatāny upadhānyāni bhūtāni dadṛśuś ca te ।
evaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ paśuto dhanadhānyataḥ ।।
yajñavāṭaṃ nṛpā dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ ।
brāhmaṇānāṃ viśāṃ caiva bahumiṣṭānnam ṛddhimat ।।
pūrṇe śatasahasre tu viprāṇāṃ tatra bhuñjatām ।
dundubhir meghanirghoṣān muhurmuhur athākarot ।।
vinanādāsakṛc cāpi divase divase gate ।
evaṃ sa vavṛdhe yajñas tasya rājñas tu dhīmataḥ ।।
annasya subahūn viprā utsargān nirgatopamān ।
dadhikulyāś ca dadṛśuḥ payasaś ca hradāṃs tathā ।।
jambūdvīpo hi sakalo nānājanapadair yutaḥ ।
dvijāś ca tatra dṛśyante rājñas tasya mahāmakhe ।।
tatra yāni sahasrāṇi puruṣāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ ।
gṛhītvā bhājanaṃ jagmur bahūni dvijasattamāḥ ।।
śrāviṇaś cāpi te sarve sumṛṣṭamaṇikuṇḍalāḥ ।
paryaveṣayan dvijātīñ śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।।
vividhāny anupānāni puruṣā ye anuyāyinaḥ ।
te vai nṛpopabhojyāni brāhmaṇebhyo daduḥ saha ।।
samāgatān vedavido rājñaś ca pṛthivīśvarān ।
pūjāṃ cakre tadā teṣāṃ vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaḥ ।।
digdeśād āgatān rājño mahāsaṃgrāmaśālinaḥ ।
naṭanartakakādīṃś ca gītastutiviśāradān ।।
patnyo manoramās tasya pīnonnatapayodharāḥ ।
indīvarapalāśākṣyaḥ śaraccandranibhānanāḥ ।।
kulaśīlaguṇopetāḥ sahasraikaṃ śatādhikam ।
evaṃ tadbhūpaparama- patnīgaṇasamanvitam ।।
ratnamālākulaṃ divyaṃ patākādhvajasevitam ।
ratnahārayutaṃ ramyaṃ candrakāntisamaprabham ।।
kariṇaḥ parvatākārān madasiktān mahābalān ।
śataśaḥ koṭisaṃghātair dantibhir dantabhūṣaṇaiḥ ।।
vātavegajavair aśvaiḥ sindhujātaiḥ suśobhanaiḥ ।
śvetāśvaiḥ śyāmakarṇaiś ca koṭyanekair javānvitaiḥ ।।
saṃnaddhabaddhakakṣaiś ca nānāpraharaṇodyataiḥ ।
asaṃkhyeyaiḥ padātaiś ca devaputropamais tathā ।।
ity evaṃ dadṛśe rājā yajñasaṃbhāravistaram ।
mudaṃ lebhe tadā rājā saṃhṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt ।।
{rājovāca 
ānayadhvaṃ hayaśreṣṭhaṃ sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitam ।
cārayadhvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ vai rājaputrāḥ susaṃyatāḥ ।।
vidvadbhir dharmavidbhiś ca atra homo vidhīyatām ।
kṛṣṇacchāgaṃ ca mahiṣaṃ kṛṣṇasāramṛgaṃ dvijān ।।
anaḍvāhaṃ ca gāś caiva sarvāṃś ca paśupālakān ।
iṣṭayaś ca pravartantāṃ prāsādaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tataḥ ।।
sarvam etac ca viprebhyo dīyatāṃ manasepsitam ।
striyaś ca ratnakoṭyaś ca grāmāś ca nagarāṇi ca ।।
samyak samṛddhabhūmyaś ca viṣayāś caivam arthinām ।
anyāni dravyajātāni manojñāni bahūni ca ।।
sarveṣāṃ yācamānānāṃ nāsti hy etan na bhāṣayet ।
tāvat pravartatāṃ yajño yāvad devaḥ purā tv iha ।
pratyakṣaṃ mama cābhyeti yajñasyāsya samīpataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tadā viprā rājasiṃho mahābhujaḥ ।
dadau suvarṇasaṃghātaṃ koṭīnāṃ caiva bhūṣaṇam ।।
kareṇuśatasāhasraṃ vājino niyutāni ca ।
arbudaṃ caiva vṛṣabhaṃ svarṇaśṛṅgīś ca dhenukāḥ ।।
surūpāḥ surabhīś caiva kāṃsyadohāḥ payasvinīḥ ।
prāyacchat sa tu viprebhyo vedavidbhyo mudā yutaḥ ।।
vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi rāṅkavāstaraṇāni ca ।
suśuklāni ca śubhrāṇi pravālamaṇim uttamam ।।
adadāt sa mahāyajñe ratnāni vividhāni ca ।।
vajravaidūryamāṇikya- muktikādyāni yāni ca ।
alaṃkāravatīḥ śubhrāḥ kanyā rājīvalocanāḥ ।।
śatāni pañca viprebhyo rājā hṛṣṭaḥ pradattavān ।
striyaḥ pīnapayobhārāḥ kañcukaiḥ svastanāvṛtāḥ ।।
madhyahīnāś ca suśroṇyaḥ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇāḥ ।
hāvabhāvānvitagrīvā bahvyo valayabhūṣitāḥ ।।
pādanūpurasaṃyuktāḥ paṭṭadukūlavāsasaḥ ।
ekaikaśo adadāt tasmin kāmyāś ca kāminīr bahūḥ ।।
arthibhyo brāhmaṇādibhyo hayamedhe dvijottamāḥ ।
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca saṃpūrṇaṃ nānāsaṃbhārasaṃyutam ।।
khaṇḍakādyāny anekāni svinnapakvāṃś ca piṣṭakān ।
annāny anyāni medhyāṃś ca ghṛtapūrāṃś ca khāṇḍavān ।।
madhurāṃs tarjitān pūpān annaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ supākikam ।
prītyarthaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ dīyate annaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।।
dattasya dīyamānasya dhanasyānto na vidyate ।
evaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāyajñaṃ devadaityāḥ savāraṇāḥ ।।
gandharvāpsarasaḥ siddhā ṛṣayaś ca prajeśvarāḥ ।
vismayaṃ paramaṃ yātā dṛṣṭvā kratuvaraṃ śubham ।।
purodhā mantriṇo rājā hṛṣṭās tatraiva sarvaśaḥ ।
na tatra malinaḥ kaścin na dīno na kṣudhānvitaḥ ।।
na vopasargo na glānir nādhayo vyādhayas tathā ।
nākālamaraṇaṃ tatra na daṃśo na grahā viṣam ।।
hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāḥ sarve tasmin rājño mahotsave ।
ye ca tatra tapaḥsiddhā munayaś cirajīvinaḥ ।।
na jātaṃ tādṛśaṃ yajñaṃ dhanadhānyasamanvitam ।
evaṃ sa rājā vidhivad vājimedhaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
kratuṃ samāpayām āsa prāsādaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
brūhi no devadeveśa yat pṛcchāmaḥ purātanam ।
yathā tāḥ pratimāḥ pūrvam indradyumnena nirmitāḥ ।।
kena caiva prakāreṇa tuṣṭas tasmai sa mādhavaḥ ।
tat sarvaṃ vada cāsmākaṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam ।
kathayāmi purā vṛttaṃ pratimānāṃ ca saṃbhavam ।।
pravṛtte ca mahāyajñe prāsāde caiva nirmite ।
cintā tasya babhūvātha pratimārtham aharniśam ।।
na vedmi kena deveśaṃ sarveśaṃ lokapāvanam ।
sargasthityantakartāraṃ paśyāmi puruṣottamam ।।
cintāviṣṭas tv abhūd rājā śete rātrau divāpi na ।
na bhuṅkte vividhān bhogān na ca snānaṃ prasādhanam ।।
naiva vādyena gandhena gāyanair varṇakair api ।
na gajair madayuktaiś ca na cānekair hayānvitaiḥ ।।
nendranīlair mahānīlaiḥ padmarāgamayair na ca ।
suvarṇarajatādyaiś ca vajrasphaṭikasaṃyutaiḥ ।।
bahurāgārthakāmair vā na vanyair antarikṣagaiḥ ।
babhūva tasya nṛpater manasas tuṣṭivardhanam ।।
śailamṛddārujāteṣu praśastaṃ kiṃ mahītale ।
viṣṇupratimāyogyaṃ ca sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitam ।।
etair eva trayāṇāṃ tu dayitaṃ syāt surārcitam ।
sthāpite prītim abhyeti iti cintāparo abhavat ।।
pañcarātravidhānena saṃpūjya puruṣottamam ।
cintāviṣṭo mahīpālaḥ saṃstotum upacakrame ।।
vāsudeva namas te astu namas te mokṣakāraṇa ।
trāhi māṃ sarvalokeśa janmasaṃsārasāgarāt ।।
nirmalāmbarasaṃkāśa namas te puruṣottama ।
saṃkarṣaṇa namas te astu trāhi māṃ dharaṇīdhara ।।
namas te hemagarbhābha namas te makaradhvaja ।
ratikānta namas te astu trāhi māṃ saṃvarāntaka ।।
namas te añjanasaṃkāśa namas te bhaktavatsala ।
aniruddha namas te astu trāhi māṃ varado bhava ।।
namas te vibudhāvāsa namas te vibudhapriya ।
nārāyaṇa namas te astu trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam ।।
namas te balināṃ śreṣṭha namas te lāṅgalāyudha ।
caturmukha jagaddhāma trāhi māṃ prapitāmaha ।।
namas te nīlameghābha namas te tridaśārcita ।
trāhi viṣṇo jagannātha magnaṃ māṃ bhavasāgare ।।
pralayānalasaṃkāśa namas te ditijāntaka ।
narasiṃha mahāvīrya trāhi māṃ dīptalocana ।।
yathā rasātalād urvī tvayā daṃṣṭroddhṛtā purā ।
tathā mahāvarāhas tvaṃ trāhi māṃ duḥkhasāgarāt ।।
tavaitā mūrtayaḥ kṛṣṇa varadāḥ saṃstutā mayā ।
taveme baladevādyāḥ pṛthagrūpeṇa saṃsthitāḥ ।।
aṅgāni tava deveśa garutmādyās tathā prabho ।
dikpālāḥ sāyudhāś caiva keśavādyās tathācyuta ।।
ye cānye tava deveśa bhedāḥ proktā manīṣibhiḥ ।
te api sarve jagannātha prasannāyatalocana ।।
mayārcitāḥ stutāḥ sarve tathā yūyaṃ namaskṛtāḥ ।
prayacchata varaṃ mahyaṃ dharmakāmārthamokṣadam ।।
bhedās te kīrtitā ye tu hare saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ ।
tava pūjārthasaṃbhūtās tatas tvayi samāśritāḥ ।।
na bhedas tava deveśa vidyate paramārthataḥ ।
vividhaṃ tava yad rūpam uktaṃ tad upacārataḥ ।।
advaitaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ dvaitaṃ vaktuṃ śaknoti mānavaḥ ।
ekas tvaṃ hi hare vyāpī citsvabhāvo nirañjanaḥ ।।
paramaṃ tava yad rūpaṃ bhāvābhāvavivarjitam ।
nirlepaṃ nirguṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam ।।
sarvopādhivinirmuktaṃ sattāmātravyavasthitam ।
tad devāś ca na jānanti kathaṃ jānāmy ahaṃ prabho ।।
aparaṃ tava yad rūpaṃ pītavastraṃ caturbhujam ।
śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇi- mukuṭāṅgadadhāriṇam ।।
śrīvatsoraskasaṃyuktaṃ vanamālāvibhūṣitam ।
tad arcayanti vibudhā ye cānye tava saṃśrayāḥ ।।
devadeva suraśreṣṭha bhaktānām abhayaprada ।
trāhi māṃ padmapattrākṣa magnaṃ viṣayasāgare ।।
nānyaṃ paśyāmi lokeśa yasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje ।
tvām ṛte kamalākānta prasīda madhusūdana ।।
jarāvyādhiśatair yukto nānāduḥkhair nipīḍitaḥ ।
harṣaśokānvito mūḍhaḥ karmapāśaiḥ suyantritaḥ ।।
patito ahaṃ mahāraudre ghore saṃsārasāgare ।
viṣamodakaduṣpāre rāgadveṣajhaṣākule ।।
indriyāvartagambhīre tṛṣṇāśokormisaṃkule ।
nirāśraye nirālambe niḥsāre atyantacañcale ।।
māyayā mohitas tatra bhramāmi suciraṃ prabho ।
nānājātisahasreṣu jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।।
mayā janmāny anekāni sahasrāṇy ayutāni ca ।
vividhāny anubhūtāni saṃsāre asmiñ janārdana ।।
vedāḥ sāṅgā mayādhītāḥ śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca ।
itihāsapurāṇāni tathā śilpāny anekaśaḥ ।।
asaṃtoṣāś ca saṃtoṣāḥ saṃcayāpacayā vyayāḥ ।
mayā prāptā jagannātha kṣayavṛddhyakṣayetarāḥ ।।
bhāryārimitrabandhūnāṃ viyogāḥ saṃgamās tathā ।
pitaro vividhā dṛṣṭā mātaraś ca tathā mayā ।।
duḥkhāni cānubhūtāni yāni saukhyāny anekaśaḥ ।
prāptāś ca bāndhavāḥ putrā bhrātaro jñātayas tathā ।।
mayoṣitaṃ tathā strīṇāṃ koṣṭhe viṇmūtrapicchale ।
garbhavāse mahāduḥkham anubhūtaṃ tathā prabho ।।
duḥkhāni yāny anekāni bālyayauvanagocare ।
vārdhake ca hṛṣīkeśa tāni prāptāni vai mayā ।।
maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni yamamārge yamālaye ।
mayā tāny anubhūtāni narake yātanās tathā ।।
kṛmikīṭadrumāṇāṃ ca hastyaśvamṛgapakṣiṇām ।
mahiṣoṣṭragavāṃ caiva tathānyeṣāṃ vanaukasām ।।
dvijātīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ caiva yoniṣu ।
dhanināṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca daridrāṇāṃ tapasvinām ।।
nṛpāṇāṃ nṛpabhṛtyānāṃ tathānyeṣāṃ ca dehinām ।
gṛheṣu teṣām utpanno deva cāhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।।
gato asmi dāsatāṃ nātha bhṛtyānāṃ bahuśo nṛṇām ।
daridratvaṃ ceśvaratvaṃ svāmitvaṃ ca tathā gataḥ ।।
hato mayā hatāś cānye ghātito ghātitās tathā ।
dattaṃ mamānyair anyebhyo mayā dattam anekaśaḥ ।।
pitṛmātṛsuhṛdbhrātṛ- kalatrāṇāṃ kṛtena ca ।
dhanināṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca daridrāṇāṃ tapasvinām ।।
uktaṃ dainyaṃ ca vividhaṃ tyaktvā lajjāṃ janārdana ।
devatiryaṅmanuṣyeṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu ca ।।
na vidyate tathā sthānaṃ yatrāhaṃ na gataḥ prabho ।
kadā me narake vāsaḥ kadā svarge jagatpate ।।
kadā manuṣyalokeṣu kadā tiryaggateṣu ca ।
jalayantre yathā cakre ghaṭī rajjunibandhanā ।।
yāti cordhvam adhaś caiva kadā madhye ca tiṣṭhati ।
tathā cāhaṃ suraśreṣṭha karmarajjusamāvṛtaḥ ।।
adhaś cordhvaṃ tathā madhye bhraman gacchāmi yogataḥ ।
evaṃ saṃsāracakre asmin bhairave romaharṣaṇe ।।
bhramāmi suciraṃ kālaṃ nāntaṃ paśyāmi karhicit ।
na jāne kiṃ karomy adya hare vyākulitendriyaḥ ।।
śokatṛṣṇābhibhūto ahaṃ kāṃdiśīko vicetanaḥ ।
idānīṃ tvām ahaṃ deva vihvalaḥ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ ।।
trāhi māṃ duḥkhitaṃ kṛṣṇa magnaṃ saṃsārasāgare ।
kṛpāṃ kuru jagannātha bhaktaṃ māṃ yadi manyase ।।
tvadṛte nāsti me bandhur yo asau cintāṃ kariṣyati ।
deva tvāṃ nātham āsādya na bhayaṃ me asti kutracit ।।
jīvite maraṇe caiva yogakṣeme athavā prabho ।
ye tu tvāṃ vidhivad deva nārcayanti narādhamāḥ ।।
sugatis tu kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhavet saṃsārabandhanāt ।
kiṃ teṣāṃ kulaśīlena vidyayā jīvitena ca ।।
yeṣāṃ na jāyate bhaktir jagaddhātari keśave ।
prakṛtiṃ tv āsurīṃ prāpya ye tvāṃ nindanti mohitāḥ ।।
patanti narake ghore jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
na teṣāṃ niṣkṛtis tasmād vidyate narakārṇavāt ।।
ye dūṣayanti durvṛttās tvāṃ deva puruṣādhamāḥ ।
yatra yatra bhavej janma mama karmanibandhanāt ।।
tatra tatra hare bhaktis tvayi cāstu dṛḍhā sadā ।
ārādhya tvāṃ surā daityā narāś cānye api saṃyatāḥ ।।
avāpuḥ paramāṃ siddhiṃ kas tvāṃ deva na pūjayet ।
na śaknuvanti brahmādyāḥ stotuṃ tvāṃ tridaśā hare ।।
kathaṃ mānuṣabuddhyāhaṃ staumi tvāṃ prakṛteḥ param ।
tathā cājñānabhāvena saṃstuto asi mayā prabho ।।
tat kṣamasvāparādhaṃ me yadi te asti dayā mayi ।
kṛtāparādhe api hare kṣamāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ ।।
tasmāt prasīda deveśa bhaktasnehaṃ samāśritaḥ ।
stuto asi yan mayā deva bhaktibhāvena cetasā ।
sāṅgaṃ bhavatu tat sarvaṃ vāsudeva namo astu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
itthaṃ stutas tadā tena prasanno garuḍadhvajaḥ ।
dadau tasmai muniśreṣṭhāḥ sakalaṃ manasepsitam ।।
yaḥ saṃpūjya jagannāthaṃ pratyahaṃ stauti mānavaḥ ।
stotreṇānena matimān sa mokṣaṃ labhate dhruvam ।।
trisaṃdhyaṃ yo japed vidvān idaṃ stotravaraṃ śuciḥ ।
dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca labhate naraḥ ।।
yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi śrāvayed vā samāhitaḥ ।
sa lokaṃ śāśvataṃ viṣṇor yāti nirdhūtakalmaṣaḥ ।।
dhanyaṃ pāpaharaṃ cedaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ śivam ।
guhyaṃ sudurlabhaṃ puṇyaṃ na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit ।।
na nāstikāya mūrkhāya na kṛtaghnāya mānine ।
na duṣṭamataye dadyān nābhaktāya kadācana ।।
dātavyaṃ bhaktiyuktāya guṇaśīlānvitāya ca ।
viṣṇubhaktāya śāntāya śraddhānuṣṭhānaśāline ।।
idaṃ samastāghavināśahetuḥ 
kāruṇyasaṃjñaṃ sukhamokṣadaṃ ca 
aśeṣavāñchāphaladaṃ variṣṭhaṃ 
stotraṃ mayoktaṃ puruṣottamasya 
ye taṃ susūkṣmaṃ vimalā murāriṃ 
dhyāyanti nityaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam 
te muktibhājaḥ praviśanti viṣṇuṃ 
mantrair yathājyaṃ hutam adhvarāgnau 
ekaḥ sa devo bhavaduḥkhahantā 
paraḥ pareṣāṃ na tato asti cānyat 
draṣṭā sa pātā sa tu nāśakartā 
viṣṇuḥ samastākhilasārabhūtaḥ 
kiṃ vidyayā kiṃ svaguṇaiś ca teṣāṃ 
yajñaiś ca dānaiś ca tapobhir ugraiḥ 
yeṣāṃ na bhaktir bhavatīha kṛṣṇe 
jagadgurau mokṣasukhaprade ca 
loke sa dhanyaḥ sa śuciḥ sa vidvān 
makhais tapobhiḥ sa guṇair variṣṭhaḥ 
jñātā sa dātā sa tu satyavaktā 
yasyāsti bhaktiḥ puruṣottamākhye 
{brahmovāca 
stutvaivaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ praṇamya ca sanātanam ।
vāsudevaṃ jagannāthaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
cintāviṣṭo mahīpālaḥ kuśān āstīrya bhūtale ।
vastraṃ ca tanmanā bhūtvā suṣvāpa dharaṇītale ।।
kathaṃ pratyakṣam abhyeti devadevo janārdanaḥ ।
mama cārtiharo devas tadāsāv iti cintayan ।।
suptasya tasya nṛpater vāsudevo jagadguruḥ ।
ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa śaṅkhacakragadābhṛtam ।।
sa dadarśa tu saprema devadevaṃ jagadgurum ।
śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ gadācakrograpāṇinam ।।
śārṅgabāṇadharaṃ devaṃ jvalattejotimaṇḍalam ।
yugāntādityavarṇābhaṃ nīlavaidūryasaṃnibham ।।
suparṇāṃse tam āsīnaṃ ṣoḍaśārdhabhujaṃ śubham ।
sa cāsmai prābravīd dhīrāḥ sādhu rājan mahāmate ।।
kratunānena divyena tathā bhaktyā ca śraddhayā ।
tuṣṭo asmi te mahīpāla vṛthā kim anuśocasi ।।
yad atra pratimā rājañ jagatpūjyā sanātanī ।
yathā sā prāpyate bhūpa tadupāyaṃ bravīmi te ।।
gatāyām adya śarvaryāṃ nirmale bhāskarodite ।
sāgarasya jalasyānte nānādrumavibhūṣite ।।
jalaṃ tathaiva velāyāṃ dṛśyate tatra vai mahat ।
lavaṇasyodadhe rājaṃs taraṅgaiḥ samabhiplutam ।।
kūlānte hi mahāvṛkṣaḥ sthitaḥ sthalajaleṣu ca ।
velābhir hanyamānaś ca na cāsau kampate drumaḥ ।।
paraśum ādāya hastena ūrmer antas tato vraja ।
ekākī viharan rājan sa tvaṃ paśyasi pādapam ।।
īdṛk cihnaṃ samālokya chedaya tvam aśaṅkitaḥ ।
chedyamānaṃ tu taṃ vṛkṣaṃ prātar adbhutadarśanam ।।
dṛṣṭvā tenaiva saṃcintya tato bhūpāla darśanāt ।
kuru tāṃ pratimāṃ divyāṃ jahi cintāṃ vimohinīm ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā mahābhāgo jagāmādarśanaṃ hariḥ ।
sa cāpi svapnam ālokya paraṃ vismayam āgataḥ ।।
tāṃ niśāṃ sa samudvīkṣya sthitas tadgatamānasaḥ ।
vyāharan vaiṣṇavān mantrān sūktaṃ caiva tadātmakam ।।
pragatāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu utthito nānyamānasaḥ ।
sa snātvā sāgare samyag yathāvad vidhinā tataḥ ।।
dattvā dānaṃ ca viprebhyo grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca ।
kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ karma jagāma sa nṛpottamaḥ ।।
na cāśvo na padātiś ca na gajo na ca sārathiḥ ।
ekākī sa mahāvelāṃ praviveśa mahīpatiḥ ।।
taṃ dadarśa mahāvṛkṣaṃ tejasvantaṃ mahādrumam ।
mahātigamahārohaṃ puṇyaṃ vipulam eva ca ।।
mahotsedhaṃ mahākāyaṃ prasuptaṃ ca jalāntike ।
sāndramāñjiṣṭhavarṇābhaṃ nāmajātivivarjitam ।।
naranāthas tadā viprā drumaṃ dṛṣṭvā mudānvitaḥ ।
paraśunā śātayām āsa niśitena dṛḍhena ca ।।
dvaidhīkartumanās tatra babhūvendrasakhaḥ sa ca ।
nirīkṣyamāṇe kāṣṭhe tu babhūvādbhutadarśanam ।।
viśvakarmā ca viṣṇuś ca viprarūpadharāv ubhau ।
ājagmatur mahābhāgau tadā tulyāgrajanmanau ।।
jvalamānau svatejobhir divyasraganulepanau ।
atha tau taṃ samāgamya nṛpam indrasakhaṃ tadā ।।
tāv ūcatur mahārāja kim atra tvaṃ kariṣyasi ।
kimarthaṃ ca mahābāho śātitaś ca vanaspatiḥ ।।
asahāyo mahādurge nirjane gahane vane ।
mahāsindhutaṭe caiva kathaṃ vai śātito drumaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tayoḥ śrutvā vaco viprāḥ sa tu rājā mudānvitaḥ ।
babhāṣe vacanaṃ tābhyāṃ mṛdulaṃ madhuraṃ tathā ।।
dṛṣṭvā tau brāhmaṇau tatra candrasūryāv ivāgatau ।
namaskṛtya jagannāthāv avāṅmukham avasthitaḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
devadevam anādyantam anantaṃ jagatāṃ patim ।
ārādhayituṃ pratimāṃ karomīti matir mama ।।
ahaṃ sa devadevena parameṇa mahātmanā ।
svapnānte ca samuddiṣṭo bhavadbhyāṃ śrāvitaṃ mayā ।।
{brahmovāca 
rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā devendrapratimasya ca ।
prahasya tasmai viśveśas tuṣṭo vacanam abravīt ।।
{viṣṇur uvāca 
sādhu sādhu mahīpāla yad etan matam uttamam ।
saṃsārasāgare ghore kadalīdalasaṃnibhe ।।
niḥsāre duḥkhabahule kāmakrodhasamākule ।
indriyāvartakalile dustare romaharṣaṇe ।।
nānāvyādhiśatāvarte jalabudbudasaṃnibhe ।
yatas te matir utpannā viṣṇor ārādhanāya vai ।।
dhanyas tvaṃ nṛpaśārdūla guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।
saprajā pṛthivī dhanyā saśailavanakānanā ।।
sapuragrāmanagarā caturvarṇair alaṃkṛtā ।
yatra tvaṃ nṛpaśārdūla prajāḥ pālayitā prabhuḥ ।।
ehy ehi sumahābhāga drume asmin sukhaśītale ।
āvābhyāṃ saha tiṣṭha tvaṃ kathābhir dharmasaṃśritaḥ ।।
ayaṃ mama sahāyas tu āgataḥ śilpināṃ varaḥ ।
viśvakarmasamaḥ sākṣān nipuṇaḥ sarvakarmasu ।
mayoddiṣṭāṃ tu pratimāṃ karoty eṣa taṭaṃ tyaja ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasya tadā rājā dvijanmanaḥ ।
sāgarasya taṭaṃ tyaktvā gatvā tasya samīpataḥ ।।
tasthau sa nṛpatiśreṣṭho vṛkṣacchāye suśītale ।
tatas tasmai sa viśvātmā dadāv ājñāṃ dvijākṛtiḥ ।।
śilpimukhyāya viprendrāḥ kuruṣva pratimā iti ।
kṛṣṇarūpaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam ।।
śrīvatsakaustubhadharaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।
gaurāṅgaṃ kṣīravarṇābhaṃ dvitīyaṃ svastikāṅkitam ।।
lāṅgalāstradharaṃ devam anantākhyaṃ mahābalam ।
devadānavagandharva- yakṣavidyādharoragaiḥ ।।
na vijñāto hi tasyāntas tenānanta iti smṛtaḥ ।
bhaginīṃ vāsudevasya rukmavarṇāṃ suśobhanām ।।
tṛtīyāṃ vai subhadrāṃ ca sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitām ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvaitad vacanaṃ tasya viśvakarmā sukarmakṛt ।
tatkṣaṇāt kārayām āsa pratimāḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ ।।
prathamaṃ śuklavarṇābhaṃ śāradendusamaprabham ।
āraktākṣaṃ mahākāyaṃ sphaṭāvikaṭamastakam ।।
nīlāmbaradharaṃ cograṃ balaṃ balamadoddhatam ।
kuṇḍalaikadharaṃ divyaṃ gadāmuśaladhāriṇam ।।
dvitīyaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ nīlajīmūtasaṃnibham ।
atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam ।।
pītavāsasam atyugraṃ śubhaṃ śrīvatsalakṣaṇam ।
cakrapūrṇakaraṃ divyaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ harim ।।
tṛtīyāṃ svarṇavarṇābhāṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇām ।
vicitravastrasaṃchannāṃ hārakeyūrabhūṣitām ।।
vicitrābharaṇopetāṃ ratnahārāvalambitām ।
pīnonnatakucāṃ ramyāṃ viśvakarmā vinirmame ।।
sa tu rājādbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaikena nirmitāḥ ।
divyavastrayugacchannā nānāratnair alaṃkṛtāḥ ।।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ pratimāḥ sumanoharāḥ ।
vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā idaṃ vacanam abravīt ।।
{indradyumna uvāca 
kiṃ devau samanuprāptau dvijarūpadharāv ubhau ।
ubhau cādbhutakarmāṇau devavṛttāv amānuṣau ।।
devau vā mānuṣau vāpi yakṣavidyādharau yuvām ।
kiṃ nu brahmahṛṣīkeśau kiṃ vasū kim utāśvinau ।।
na vedmi satyasadbhāvau māyārūpeṇa saṃsthitau ।
yuvāṃ gato asmi śaraṇam ātmā tu me prakāśyatām ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
nāhaṃ devo na yakṣo vā na daityo na ca devarāṭ ।
na brahmā na ca rudro ahaṃ viddhi māṃ puruṣottamam ।।
artihā sarvalokānām anantabalapauruṣaḥ ।
ārādhanīyo bhūtānām anto yasya na vidyate ।।
paṭhyate sarvaśāstreṣu vedānteṣu nigadyate ।
yam āhur jñānagamyeti vāsudeveti yoginaḥ ।।
aham eva svayaṃ brahmā ahaṃ viṣṇuḥ śivo apy aham ।
indro ahaṃ devarājaś ca jagatsaṃyamano yamaḥ ।।
pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni tretāgnir hutabhuṅ nṛpa ।
varuṇo apāṃ patiś cāhaṃ dharitrī ca mahīdharaḥ ।।
yat kiṃcid vāṅmayaṃ loke jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
carācaraṃ ca yad viśvaṃ madanyan nāsti kiṃcana ।।
prīto ahaṃ te nṛpaśreṣṭha varaṃ varaya suvrata ।
yad iṣṭaṃ tat prayacchāmi hṛdi yat te vyavasthitam ।।
maddarśanam apuṇyānāṃ svapnānte api na jāyate ।
tvaṃ punar dṛḍhabhaktitvāt pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvaivaṃ vāsudevasya vacanaṃ tasya bho dvijāḥ ।
romāñcitatanur bhūtvā idaṃ stotraṃ jagau nṛpaḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
śriyaḥ kānta namas te astu śrīpate pītavāsase ।
śrīda śrīśa śrīnivāsa namas te śrīniketana ।।
ādyaṃ puruṣam īśānaṃ sarveśaṃ sarvatomukham ।
niṣkalaṃ paramaṃ devaṃ praṇato asmi sanātanam ।।
śabdātītaṃ guṇātītaṃ bhāvābhāvavivarjitam ।
nirlepaṃ nirguṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvabhāvanam ।।
prāvṛṇmeghapratīkāśaṃ gobrāhmaṇahite ratam ।
sarveṣām eva goptāraṃ vyāpinaṃ sarvabhāvinam ।।
śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ gadāmuśaladhāriṇam ।
namasye varadaṃ devaṃ nīlotpaladalacchavim ।।
nāgaparyaṅkaśayanaṃ kṣīrodārṇavaśāyinam ।
namasye ahaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ harim ।।
punas tvāṃ devadeveśaṃ namasye varadaṃ vibhum ।
sarvalokeśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ mokṣakāraṇam avyayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ stutvā tu taṃ devaṃ praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ ।
uvāca praṇato bhūtvā nipatya dharaṇītale ।।
{rājovāca 
prīto asi yadi me nātha vṛṇomi varam uttamam ।
devāsurāḥ sagandharvā yakṣarakṣomahoragāḥ ।।
siddhavidyādharāḥ sādhyāḥ kiṃnarā guhyakās tathā ।
ṛṣayo ye mahābhāgā nānāśāstraviśāradāḥ ।।
parivrāḍyogayuktāś ca vedatattvārthacintakāḥ ।
mokṣamārgavido ye anye dhyāyanti paramaṃ padam ।।
nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ śāntaṃ yat paśyanti manīṣinaḥ ।
tat padaṃ gantum icchāmi tvatprasādāt sudurlabham ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
sarvaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ sarvam āpnuhi ।
bhaviṣyati yathākāmaṃ matprasādān na saṃśayaḥ ।।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tathā nava śatāni ca ।
avicchinnaṃ mahārājyaṃ kuru tvaṃ nṛpasattama ।।
prayāsyasi padaṃ divyaṃ durlabhaṃ yat surāsuraiḥ ।
pūrṇamanorathaṃ śāntaṃ guhyam avyaktam avyayam ।।
parāt parataraṃ sūkṣmaṃ nirlepaṃ niṣkalaṃ dhruvam ।
cintāśokavinirmuktaṃ kriyākāraṇavarjitam ।।
tad ahaṃ darśayiṣyāmi jñeyākhyaṃ paramaṃ padam ।
yaṃ prāpya paramānandaṃ prāpsyasi paramāṃ gatim ।।
kīrtiś ca tava rājendra bhavaty atra mahītale ।
yāvad ghanā nabho yāvad yāvac candrārkatārakam ।।
yāvat samudrāḥ saptaiva yāvan mervādiparvatāḥ ।
tiṣṭhanti divi devāś ca tāvat sarvatra cāvyayā ।।
indradyumnasaro nāma tīrthaṃ yajñāṅgasaṃbhavam ।
yatra snātvā sakṛl lokaḥ śakralokam avāpnuyāt ।।
dāpayiṣyati yaḥ piṇḍāṃs taṭe asmin sarasaḥ śubhe ।
kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya śakralokaṃ gamiṣyati ।।
pūjyamāno apsarobhiś ca gandharvair gītanisvanaiḥ ।
vimānena vaset tatra yāvad indrāś caturdaśa ।।
saraso dakṣiṇe bhāge nairṛtyāṃ tu samāśrite ।
nyagrodhas tiṣṭhate tatra tatsamīpe tu maṇḍapaḥ ।।
ketakīvanasaṃchanno nānāpādapasaṃkulaḥ ।
nārikelair asaṃkhyeyaiś campakair bakulāvṛtaiḥ ।।
aśokaiḥ karṇikāraiś ca puṃnāgair nāgakesaraiḥ ।
pāṭalāmrātasaralaiś candanair devadārubhiḥ ।।
nyagrodhāśvatthakhadiraiḥ pārijātaiḥ sahārjunaiḥ ।
hintālaiś caiva tālaiś ca śiṃśapair badarais tathā ।।
karañjair lakucaiḥ plakṣaiḥ panasair bilvadhātukaiḥ ।
anyair bahuvidhair vṛkṣaiḥ śobhitaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
āṣāḍhasya site pakṣe pañcamyāṃ pitṛdaivate ।
ṛkṣe neṣyanti nas tatra nītvā sapta dināni vai ।।
maṇḍape sthāpayiṣyanti suveśyābhiḥ suśobhanaiḥ ।
krīḍāviśeṣabahulair nṛtyagītamanoharaiḥ ।।
cāmaraiḥ svarṇadaṇḍaiś ca vyajanai ratnabhūṣaṇaiḥ ।
vījayantas tathāsmabhyaṃ sthāpayiṣyanti maṅgalāḥ ।।
brahmacārī yatiś caiva snātakāś ca dvijottamāḥ ।
vānaprasthā gṛhasthāś ca siddhāś cānye ca brāhmaṇāḥ ।।
nānāvarṇapadaiḥ stotrair ṛgyajuḥsāmanisvanaiḥ ।
kariṣyanti stutiṃ rājan rāmakeśavayoḥ punaḥ ।।
tataḥ stutvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca saṃpraṇamya ca bhaktitaḥ ।
naro varṣāyutaṃ divyaṃ śrīmaddharipure vaset ।।
pūjyamāno apsarobhiś ca gandharvair gītanisvanaiḥ ।
harer anucaras tatra krīḍate keśavena vai ।।
vimānenārkavarṇena ratnahāreṇa bhrājatā ।
sarvakāmair mahābhogais tiṣṭhate bhuvanottame ।।
tapaḥkṣayādihāgatya manuṣyo brāhmaṇo bhavet ।
koṭīdhanapatiḥ śrīmāṃś caturvedī bhaved dhruvam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ tasmai varaṃ dattvā kṛtvā ca samayaṃ hariḥ ।
jagāmādarśanaṃ viprāḥ sahito viśvakarmaṇā ।।
sa tu rājā tadā hṛṣṭo romāñcitatanūruhaḥ ।
kṛtakṛtyam ivātmānaṃ mene saṃdarśanād dhareḥ ।।
tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca varapradām ।
rathair vimānasaṃkāśair maṇikāñcanacitritaiḥ ।।
saṃvāhya tās tadā rājā mahāmaṅgalaniḥsvanaiḥ ।
ānayām āsa matimān sāmātyaḥ sapurohitaḥ ।।
nānāvāditranirghoṣair nānāvedasvanaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।
saṃsthāpya ca śubhe deśe pavitre sumanohare ।।
tataḥ śubhatithau kāle nakṣatre śubhalakṣaṇe ।
pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayām āsa sumuhūrte dvijaiḥ saha ।।
yathoktena vidhānena vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā ।
ācāryānumatenaiva sarvaṃ kṛtvā mahīpatiḥ ।।
ācāryāya tadā dattvā dakṣiṇāṃ vidhivat prabhuḥ ।
ṛtvigbhyaś ca vidhānena tathānyebhyo dhanaṃ dadau ।।
kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāṃ vidhivat prāsāde bhavanottame ।
sthāpayām āsa tān sarvān vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā ।।
tataḥ saṃpūjya vidhinā nānāpuṣpaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ ।
suvarṇamaṇimuktādyair nānāvastraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ ।।
ratnaiś ca vividhair divyair āsanair grāmapattanaiḥ ।
dadau cānyān sa viṣayān purāṇi nagarāṇi ca ।।
evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā rājyaṃ kṛtvā yathocitam ।
iṣṭvā ca vividhair yajñair dattvā dānāny anekaśaḥ ।।
kṛtakṛtyas tato rājā tyaktasarvaparigrahaḥ ।
jagāma paramaṃ sthānaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam ।।
evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhāḥ kathito vo nṛpottamaḥ ।
kṣetrasya caiva māhātmyaṃ kim anyac chrotum icchatha ।।
{viṣṇur uvāca 
śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasya brahmaṇo avyaktajanmanaḥ ।
āścaryaṃ menire viprāḥ papracchuś ca punar mudā ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kasmin kāle suraśreṣṭha gantavyaṃ puruṣottamam ।
vidhinā kena kartavyaṃ pañcatīrtham iti prabho ।।
ekaikasya ca tīrthasya snānadānasya yat phalam ।
devatāprekṣaṇe caiva brūhi sarvaṃ pṛthak pṛthak ।।
{brahmovāca 
nirāhāraḥ kurukṣetre pādenaikena yas tapet ।
jitendriyo jitakrodhaḥ saptasaṃvatsarāyutam ।।
dṛṣṭvā sadā jyeṣṭhaśukla- dvādaśyāṃ puruṣottamam ।
kṛtopavāsaḥ prāpnoti tato adhikataraṃ phalam ।।
tasmāj jyeṣṭhe muniśreṣṭhāḥ prayatnena susaṃyataiḥ ।
svargalokepsuviprādyair draṣṭavyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।।
pañcatīrthaṃ tu vidhivat kṛtvā jyeṣṭhe narottamaḥ ।
śuklapakṣasya dvādaśyāṃ paśyet taṃ puruṣottamam ।।
ye paśyanty avyayaṃ devaṃ dvādaśyāṃ puruṣottamam ।
te viṣṇulokam āsādya na cyavante kadācana ।।
tasmāj jyeṣṭhe prayatnena gantavyaṃ bho dvijottamāḥ ।
kṛtvā tasmin pañcatīrthaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।।
sudūrastho api yo bhaktyā kīrtayet puruṣottamam ।
ahany ahani śuddhātmā so api viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ।।
yātrāṃ karoti kṛṣṇasya śraddhayā yaḥ samāhitaḥ ।
sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ vrajen naraḥ ।।
cakraṃ dṛṣṭvā harer dūrāt prāsādopari saṃsthitam ।
sahasā mucyate pāpān naro bhaktyā praṇamya tat ।।
{brahmovāca 
āsīt kalpe muniśreṣṭhāḥ saṃpravṛtte mahākṣaye ।
naṣṭe arkacandre pavane naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame ।।
udite pralayāditye pracaṇḍe ghanagarjite ।
vidyudutpātasaṃghātaiḥ saṃbhagne taruparvate ।।
loke ca saṃhṛte sarve mahadulkānibarhaṇe ।
śuṣkeṣu sarvatoyeṣu saraḥsu ca saritsu ca ।।
tataḥ saṃvartako vahnir vāyunā saha bho dvijāḥ ।
lokaṃ tu prāviśat sarvam ādityair upaśobhitam ।।
paścāt sa pṛthivīṃ bhittvā praviśya ca rasātalam ।
devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ bhayaṃ janayate mahat ।।
nirdahan nāgalokaṃ ca yac ca kiṃcit kṣitāv iha ।
adhastān muniśārdūlāḥ sarvaṃ nāśayate kṣaṇāt ।।
tato yojanaviṃśānāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca ।
nirdahaty āśugo vāyuḥ sa ca saṃvartako analaḥ ।।
sadevāsuragandharvaṃ sayakṣoragarākṣasam ।
tato dahati saṃdīptaḥ sarvam eva jagat prabhuḥ ।।
pradīpto asau mahāraudraḥ kalpāgnir iti saṃśrutaḥ ।
mahājvālo mahārciṣmān saṃpradīptamahāsvanaḥ ।।
sūryakoṭipratīkāśo jvalann iva sa tejasā ।
trailokyaṃ cādahat tūrṇaṃ sasurāsuramānuṣam ।।
evaṃvidhe mahāghore mahāpralayadāruṇe ।
ṛṣiḥ paramadharmātmā dhyānayogaparo abhavat ।।
ekaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate viprā mārkaṇḍeyeti viśrutaḥ ।
mohapāśair nibaddho asau kṣuttṛṣṇākulitendriyāḥ ।।
sa dṛṣṭvā taṃ mahāvahniṃ śuṣkakaṇṭhauṣṭhatālukaḥ ।
tṛṣṇārtaḥ praskhalan viprās tadāsau bhayavihvalaḥ ।।
babhrāma pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ kāṃdiśīko vicetanaḥ ।
trātāraṃ nādhigacchan vai itaś cetaś ca dhāvati ।।
na lebhe ca tadā śarma yatra viśrāmyatā dvijāḥ ।
karomi kiṃ na jānāmi yasyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje ।।
kathaṃ paśyāmi taṃ devaṃ puruṣeśaṃ sanātanam ।
iti saṃcintayan devam ekāgreṇa sanātanam ।।
prāptavāṃs tat padaṃ divyaṃ mahāpralayakāraṇam ।
puruṣeśam iti khyātaṃ vaṭarājaṃ sanātanam ।।
tvarāyukto muniś cāsau nyagrodhasyāntikaṃ yayau ।
āsādya taṃ muniśreṣṭhās tasya mūle samāviśat ।।
na kālāgnibhayaṃ tatra na cāṅgārapravarṣaṇam ।
na saṃvartāgamas tatra na ca vajrāśanis tathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato gajakulaprakhyās taḍinmālāvibhūṣitāḥ ।
samuttasthur mahāmeghā nabhasy adbhutadarśanāḥ ।।
kecin nīlotpalaśyāmāḥ kecit kumudasaṃnibhāḥ ।
kecit kiñjalkasaṃkāśāḥ kecit pītāḥ payodharāḥ ।।
kecid dharitasaṃkāśāḥ kākāṇḍasaṃnibhās tathā ।
kecit kamalapattrābhāḥ kecid dhiṅgulasaṃnibhāḥ ।।
kecit puravarākārāḥ kecid girivaropamāḥ ।
kecid añjanasaṃkāśāḥ kecin marakataprabhāḥ ।।
vidyunmālāpinaddhāṅgāḥ samuttasthur mahāghanāḥ ।
ghorarūpā mahābhāgā ghorasvananināditāḥ ।।
tato jaladharāḥ sarve samāvṛṇvan nabhastalam ।
tair iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saparvatavanākarā ।।
āpūritā diśaḥ sarvāḥ salilaughapariplutāḥ ।
tatas te jaladā ghorā vāriṇā munisattamāḥ ।।
sarvataḥ plāvayām āsuś coditāḥ parameṣṭhinā ।
varṣamāṇā mahātoyaṃ pūrayanto vasuṃdharām ।।
sughoram aśivaṃ raudraṃ nāśayanti sma pāvakam ।
tato dvādaśa varṣāṇi payodāḥ samupaplave ।।
dhārābhiḥ pūrayanto vai codyamānā mahātmanā ।
tataḥ samudrāḥ svāṃ velām atikrāmanti bho dvijāḥ ।।
parvatāś ca vyaśīryanta mahī cāpsu nimajjati ।
sarvataḥ sumahābhrāntās te payodā nabhastalam ।।
saṃveṣṭayitvā naśyanti vāyuvegasamāhatāḥ ।
tatas taṃ mārutaṃ ghoraṃ sa viṣṇur munisattamāḥ ।।
ādipadmālayo devaḥ pītvā svapiti bho dvijāḥ ।
tasminn ekārṇave ghore naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame ।।
naṣṭe devāsuranare yakṣarākṣasavarjite ।
tato muniḥ sa viśrānto dhyātvā ca puruṣottamam ।।
dadarśa cakṣur unmīlya jalapūrṇāṃ vasuṃdharām ।
nāpaśyat taṃ vaṭaṃ norvīṃ na digādi na bhāskaram ।।
na candrārkāgnipavanaṃ na devāsurapannagam ।
tasminn ekārṇave ghore tamobhūte nirāśraye ।।
nimajjan sa tadā viprāḥ saṃtartum upacakrame ।
babhrāmāsau muniś cārta itaś cetaś ca saṃplavan ।।
nimamajja tadā viprās trātāraṃ nādhigacchati ।
evaṃ taṃ vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā puruṣottamaḥ ।
provāca muniśārdūlās tadā dhyānena toṣitaḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
vatsa śrānto asi bālas tvaṃ bhaktatra mama suvrata ।
āgacchāgaccha śīghraṃ tvaṃ mārkaṇḍeya mamāntikam ।।
mā tvayaiva ca bhetavyaṃ saṃprāpto asi mamāgrataḥ ।
mārkaṇḍeya mune dhīra bālas tvaṃ śramapīḍitaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā muniḥ paramakopitaḥ ।
uvāca sa tadā viprā vismitaś cābhavan muhuḥ ।।
{mārkaṇḍeya uvāca 
ko ayaṃ nāmnā kīrtayati tapaḥ paribhavann iva ।
bahuvarṣasahasrākhyaṃ dharṣayann iva me vapuḥ ।।
na hy eṣa samudācāro deveṣv api samāhitaḥ ।
māṃ brahmā sa ca deveśo dīrghāyur iti bhāṣate ।।
kas tapo ghoraśiraso mamādya tyaktajīvitaḥ ।
mārkaṇḍeyeti coktvā man- mṛtyuṃ gantum ihecchati ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tadā viprāś cintāviṣṭo abhavan muniḥ ।
kiṃ svapno ayaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ vā moho ayam āgataḥ ।।
itthaṃ cintayatas tasya utpannā duḥkhahā matiḥ ।
vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ devaṃ bhaktyāhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
sa gatvā śaraṇaṃ devaṃ munis tadgatamānasaḥ ।
dadarśa taṃ vaṭaṃ bhūyo viśālaṃ salilopari ।।
śākhāyāṃ tasya sauvarṇaṃ vistīrṇāyāṃ mahādbhutam ।
ruciraṃ divyaparyaṅkaṃ racitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā ।।
vajravaidūryaracitaṃ maṇividrumaśobhitam ।
padmarāgādibhir juṣṭaṃ ratnair anyair alaṃkṛtam ।।
nānāstaraṇasaṃvītaṃ nānāratnopaśobhitam ।
nānāścaryasamāyuktaṃ prabhāmaṇḍalamaṇḍitam ।।
tasyopari sthitaṃ devaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ bālavapurdharam ।
sūryakoṭipratīkāśaṃ dīpyamānaṃ suvarcasam ।।
caturbhujaṃ sundarāṅgaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam ।
śrīvatsavakṣasaṃ devaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।।
vanamālāvṛtoraskaṃ divyakuṇḍaladhāriṇam ।
hārabhārārpitagrīvaṃ divyaratnavibhūṣitam ।।
dṛṣṭvā tadā munir devaṃ vismayotphullalocanaḥ ।
romāñcitatanur devaṃ praṇipatyedam abravīt ।।
{mārkaṇḍeya uvāca 
aho caikārṇave ghore vinaṣṭe sacarācare ।
katham eko hy ayaṃ bālas tiṣṭhaty atra sunirbhayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca jānann api mahāmuniḥ ।
na bubodha tadā devaṃ māyayā tasya mohitaḥ ।
yadā na bubudhe cainaṃ tadā khedād uvāca ha ।।
{mārkaṇḍeya uvāca 
vṛthā me tapaso vīryaṃ vṛthā jñānaṃ vṛthā kriyā ।
vṛthā me jīvitaṃ dīrghaṃ vṛthā mānuṣyam eva ca ।।
yo ahaṃ suptaṃ na jānāmi paryaṅke divyabālakam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ saṃcintayan vipraḥ plavamāno vicetanaḥ ।
trāṇārthaṃ vihvalaś cāsau nirvedaṃ gatavāṃs tadā ।।
tato bālārkasaṃkāśaṃ svamahimnā vyavasthitam ।
sarvatejomayaṃ viprā na śaśākābhivīkṣitum ।।
dṛṣṭvā taṃ munim āyāntaṃ sa bālaḥ prahasann iva ।
provāca muniśārdūlās tadā meghaughanisvanaḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
vatsa jānāmi śrāntaṃ tvāṃ trāṇārthaṃ mām upasthitam ।
śarīraṃ viśa me kṣipraṃ viśrāmas te mayoditaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvā sa vacanaṃ tasya kiṃcin novāca mohitaḥ ।
viveśa vadanaṃ tasya vivṛtaṃ cāvaśo muniḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa praviśyodare tasya bālasya munisattamaḥ ।
dadarśa pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ nānājanapadair vṛtām ।।
lavaṇekṣusurāsarpir- dadhidugdhajalodadhīn ।
dadarśa tān samudrāṃś ca jambu plakṣaṃ ca śālmalam ।।
kuśaṃ krauñcaṃ ca śākaṃ ca puṣkaraṃ ca dadarśa saḥ ।
bhāratādīni varṣāṇi tathā sarvāṃś ca parvatān ।।
meruṃ ca sarvaratnāḍhyaṃ apaśyat kanakācalam ।
nānāratnānvitaiḥ śṛṅgair bhūṣitaṃ bahukandaram ।।
nānāmunijanākīrṇaṃ nānāvṛkṣavanākulam ।
nānāsattvasamāyuktaṃ nānāścaryasamanvitam ।।
vyāghraiḥ siṃhair varāhaiś ca cāmarair mahiṣair gajaiḥ ।
mṛgaiḥ śākhāmṛgaiś cānyair bhūṣitaṃ sumanoharam ।।
śakrādyair vividhair devaiḥ siddhacāraṇapannagaiḥ ।
muniyakṣāpsarobhiś ca vṛtaiś cānyaiḥ surālayaiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ sumeruṃ śrīmantam apaśyan munisattamaḥ ।
paryaṭan sa tadā vipras tasya bālasya codare ।।
himavantaṃ hemakūṭaṃ niṣadhaṃ gandhamādanam ।
śvetaṃ ca durdharaṃ nīlaṃ kailāsaṃ mandaraṃ girim ।।
mahendraṃ malayaṃ vindhyaṃ pāriyātraṃ tathārbudam ।
sahyaṃ ca śuktimantaṃ ca mainākaṃ vakraparvatam ।।
etāś cānyāś ca bahavo yāvantaḥ pṛthivīdharāḥ ।
tatas tāṃs tu muniśreṣṭhāḥ so apaśyad ratnabhūṣitān ।।
kurukṣetraṃ ca pāñcālān matsyān madrān sakekayān ।
bāhlīkān śūrasenāṃś ca kāśmīrāṃs taṅgaṇān khasān ।।
pārvatīyān kirātāṃś ca karṇaprāvaraṇān marūn ।
antyajān antyajātīṃś ca so apaśyat tasya codare ।।
mṛgāñ śākhāmṛgān siṃhān varāhān sṛmarāñ śaśān ।
gajāṃś cānyāṃs tathā sattvān so apaśyat tasya codare ।।
pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni grāmāś ca nagarāṇi ca ।
kṛṣigorakṣavāṇijyaṃ krayavikrayaṇaṃ tathā ।।
śakrādīn vibudhāñ śreṣṭhāṃs tathānyāṃś ca divaukasaḥ ।
gandharvāpsaraso yakṣān ṛṣīṃś caiva sanātanān ।।
daityadānavasaṃghāṃś ca nāgāṃś ca munisattamāḥ ।
siṃhikātanayāṃś caiva ye cānye suraśatravaḥ ।।
yat kiṃcit tena loke asmin dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ carācaram ।
apaśyat sa tadā sarvaṃ tasya kukṣau dvijottamāḥ ।।
athavā kiṃ bahūktena kīrtitena punaḥ punaḥ ।
brahmādistambaparyantaṃ yat kiṃcit sacarācaram ।।
bhūrlokaṃ ca bhuvarlokaṃ svarlokaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।
mahar janas tapaḥ satyam atalaṃ vitalaṃ tathā ।।
pātālaṃ sutalaṃ caiva vitalaṃ ca rasātalam ।
mahātalaṃ ca brahmāṇḍam apaśyat tasya codare ।।
avyāhatā gatis tasya tadābhūd dvijasattamāḥ ।
prasādāt tasya devasya smṛtilopaś ca nābhavat ।।
bhramamāṇas tadā kukṣau kṛtsnaṃ jagad idaṃ dvijāḥ ।
nāntaṃ jagāma dehasya tasya viṣṇoḥ kadācana ।।
yadāsau nāgataś cāntaṃ tasya dehasya bho dvijāḥ ।
tadā taṃ varadaṃ devaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatavān muniḥ ।।
tato asau sahasā viprā vāyuvegena niḥsṛtaḥ ।
mahātmano mukhāt tasya vivṛtāt puruṣasya saḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa niṣkramyodarāt tasya bālasya munisattamāḥ ।
punaś caikārṇavām urvīm apaśyaj janavarjitām ।।
pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ ca taṃ devaṃ dadarśa śiśurūpiṇam ।
śākhāyāṃ vaṭavṛkṣasya paryaṅkopari saṃsthitam ।।
śrīvatsavakṣasaṃ devaṃ pītavastraṃ caturbhujam ।
jagad ādāya tiṣṭhantaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam ।।
so api taṃ munim āyāntaṃ plavamānam acetanam ।
dṛṣṭvā mukhād viniṣkrāntaṃ provāca prahasann iva ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
kaccit tvayoṣitaṃ vatsa viśrāntaṃ ca mamodare ।
bhramamāṇaś ca kiṃ tatra āścaryaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi ।।
bhakto asi me muniśreṣṭha śrānto asi ca mamāśritaḥ ।
tena tvām upakārāya saṃbhāṣe paśya mām iha ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvā sa vacanaṃ tasya saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ ।
dadarśa taṃ suduṣprekṣaṃ ratnair divyair alaṃkṛtam ।।
prasannā nirmalā dṛṣṭir muhūrtāt tasya bho dvijāḥ ।
prasādāt tasya devasya prādurbhūtā punar navā ।।
raktāṅgulitalau pādau tatas tasya surārcitau ।
praṇamya śirasā viprā harṣagadgadayā girā ।।
kṛtāñjalis tadā hṛṣṭo vismitaś ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
dṛṣṭvā taṃ paramātmānaṃ saṃstotum upacakrame ।।
{mārkaṇḍeya uvāca 
devadeva jagannātha māyābālavapurdhara ।
trāhi māṃ cārupadmākṣa duḥkhitaṃ śaraṇāgatam ।।
saṃtapto asmi suraśreṣṭha saṃvartākhyena vahninā ।
aṅgāravarṣabhītaṃ ca trāhi māṃ puruṣottama ।।
śoṣitaś ca pracaṇḍena vāyunā jagadāyunā ।
vihvalo ahaṃ tathā śrāntas trāhi māṃ puruṣottama ।।
tāpitaś ca taśāmātyaiḥ pralayāvartakādibhiḥ ।
na śāntim adhigacchāmi trāhi māṃ puruṣottama ।।
tṛṣitaś ca kṣudhāviṣṭo duḥkhitaś ca jagatpate ।
trātāraṃ nātra paśyāmi trāhi māṃ puruṣottama ।।
asminn ekārṇave ghore vinaṣṭe sacarācare ।
na cāntam adhigacchāmi trāhi māṃ puruṣottama ।।
tavodare ca deveśa mayā dṛṣṭaṃ carācaram ।
vismito ahaṃ viṣaṇṇaś ca trāhi māṃ puruṣottama ।।
saṃsāre asmin nirālambe prasīda puruṣottama ।
prasīda vibudhaśreṣṭha prasīda vibudhapriya ।।
prasīda vibudhāṃ nātha prasīda vibudhālaya ।
prasīda sarvalokeśa jagatkāraṇakāraṇa ।।
prasīda sarvakṛd deva prasīda mama bhūdhara ।
prasīda salilāvāsa prasīda madhusūdana ।।
prasīda kamalākānta prasīda tridaśeśvara ।
prasīda kaṃsakeśīghna prasīdāriṣṭanāśana ।।
prasīda kṛṣṇa daityaghna prasīda danujāntaka ।
prasīda mathurāvāsa prasīda yadunandana ।।
prasīda śakrāvaraja prasīda varadāvyaya ।
tvaṃ mahī tvaṃ jalaṃ deva tvam agnis tvaṃ samīraṇaḥ ।।
tvaṃ nabhas tvaṃ manaś caiva tvam ahaṃkāra eva ca ।
tvaṃ buddhiḥ prakṛtiś caiva sattvādyās tvaṃ jagatpate ।।
puruṣas tvaṃ jagadvyāpī puruṣād api cottamaḥ ।
tvam indriyāṇi sarvāṇi śabdādyā viṣayāḥ prabho ।।
tvaṃ dikpālāś ca dharmāś ca vedā yajñāḥ sadakṣiṇāḥ ।
tvam indras tvaṃ śivo devas tvaṃ havis tvaṃ hutāśanaḥ ।।
tvaṃ yamaḥ pitṛrāṭ deva tvaṃ rakṣodhipatiḥ svayam ।
varuṇas tvam apāṃ nātha tvaṃ vāyus tvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ ।।
tvam īśānas tvam anantas tvaṃ gaṇeśaś ca ṣaṇmukhaḥ ।
vasavas tvaṃ tathā rudrās tvam ādityāś ca khecarāḥ ।।
dānavās tvaṃ tathā yakṣās tvaṃ daityāḥ samarudgaṇāḥ ।
siddhāś cāpsaraso nāgā gandharvās tvaṃ sacāraṇāḥ ।।
pitaro vālakhilyāś ca prajānāṃ patayo acyuta ।
munayas tvam ṛṣigaṇās tvam aśvinau niśācarāḥ ।।
anyāś ca jātayas tvaṃ hi yat kiṃcij jīvasaṃjñitam ।
kiṃ cātra bahunoktena brahmādistambagocaram ।।
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca tvaṃ jagat sacarācaram ।
yat te rūpaṃ paraṃ deva kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam ।।
brahmādyās tan na jānanti katham anye alpamedhasaḥ ।
deva śuddhasvabhāvo asi nityas tvaṃ prakṛteḥ paraḥ ।।
avyaktaḥ śāśvato anantaḥ sarvavyāpī maheśvaraḥ ।
tvam ākāśaḥ paraḥ śānto ajas tvaṃ vibhur avyayaḥ ।।
evaṃ tvāṃ nirguṇaṃ stotuṃ kaḥ śaknoti nirañjanam ।
stuto asi yan mayā deva vikalenālpacetasā ।
tat sarvaṃ devadeveśa kṣantum arhasi cāvyaya ।।
{brahmovāca 
itthaṃ stutas tadā tena mārkaṇḍeyena bho dvijāḥ ।
prītaḥ provāca bhagavān meghagambhīrayā girā ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
brūhi kāmaṃ muniśreṣṭha yat te manasi vartate ।
dadāmi sarvaṃ viprarṣe matto yad abhivāñchasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvā sa vacanaṃ viprāḥ śiśos tasya mahātmanaḥ ।
uvāca paramaprīto munis tadgatamānasaḥ ।।
{mārkaṇḍeya uvāca 
jñātum icchāmi deva tvāṃ māyāṃ vai tava cottamām ।
tvatprasādāc ca deveśa smṛtir na parihīyate ।।
drutam antaḥ śarīreṇa satataṃ paryavartitam ।
icchāmi puṇḍarīkākṣa jñātuṃ tvām aham avyayam ।।
iha bhūtvā śiśuḥ sākṣāt kiṃ bhavān avatiṣṭhate ।
pītvā jagad idaṃ sarvam etad ākhyātum arhasi ।।
kimarthaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ śarīrasthaṃ tavānagha ।
kiyantaṃ ca tvayā kālam iha stheyam ariṃdama ।।
jñātum icchāmi deveśa brūhi sarvam aśeṣataḥ ।
tvattaḥ kamalapattrākṣa vistareṇa yathātatham ।
mahad etad acintyaṃ ca yad ahaṃ dṛṣṭavān prabho ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktaḥ sa tadā tena devadevo mahādyutiḥ ।
sāntvayan sa tadā vākyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
kāmaṃ devāś ca māṃ vipra nahi jānanti tattvataḥ ।
tava prītyā pravakṣyāmi yathedaṃ visṛjāmy aham ।।
pitṛbhakto asi viprarṣe mām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ ।
tato dṛṣṭo asmi te sākṣād brahmacaryaṃ ca te mahat ।।
āpo nārā iti purā saṃjñākarma kṛtaṃ mayā ।
tena nārāyaṇo asmy ukto mama tās tv ayanaṃ sadā ।।
ahaṃ nārāyaṇo nāma prabhavaḥ śāśvato avyayaḥ ।
vidhātā sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃhartā ca dvijottama ।।
ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ brahmā śakraś cāpi surādhipaḥ ।
ahaṃ vaiśravaṇo rājā yamaḥ pretādhipas tathā ।।
ahaṃ śivaś ca somaś ca kaśyapaś ca prajāpatiḥ ।
ahaṃ dhātā vidhātā ca yajñaś cāhaṃ dvijottama ।।
agnir āsyaṃ kṣitiḥ pādau candrādityau ca locane ।
dyaur mūrdhā khaṃ diśaḥ śrotre tathāpaḥ svedasaṃbhavāḥ ।।
sadiśaṃ ca nabhaḥ kāyo vāyur manasi me sthitaḥ ।
mayā kratuśatair iṣṭaṃ bahubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ ।।
yajante vedaviduṣo māṃ devayajane sthitam ।
pṛthivyāṃ kṣatriyendrāś ca pārthivāḥ svargakāṅkṣiṇaḥ ।।
yajante māṃ tathā vaiśyāḥ svargalokajigīṣavaḥ ।
catuḥsamudraparyantāṃ merumandarabhūṣaṇām ।।
śeṣo bhūtvāham eko hi dhārayāmi vasuṃdharām ।
vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthāya mameyaṃ jagatī purā ।।
majjamānā jale vipra vīryeṇāsmi samuddhṛtā ।
agniś ca vāḍavo vipra bhūtvāhaṃ dvijasattama ।।
pibāmy apaḥ samāviṣṭas tāś caiva visṛjāmy aham ।
brahma vaktraṃ bhujau kṣatram ūrū me saṃśritā viśaḥ ।।
pādau śūdrā bhavantīme vikrameṇa krameṇa ca ।
ṛgvedaḥ sāmavedaś ca yajurvedas tv atharvaṇaḥ ।।
mattaḥ prādurbhavanty ete mām eva praviśanti ca ।
yatayaḥ śāntiparamā yatātmāno bubhutsavaḥ ।।
kāmakrodhadveṣamuktā niḥsaṅgā vītakalmaṣāḥ ।
sattvasthā nirahaṃkārā nityam adhyātmakovidāḥ ।।
mām eva satataṃ viprāś cintayanta upāsate ।
ahaṃ saṃvartako jyotir ahaṃ saṃvartako analaḥ ।।
ahaṃ saṃvartakaḥ sūryas tv ahaṃ saṃvartako anilaḥ ।
tārārūpāṇi dṛśyante yāny etāni nabhastale ।।
mama vai romakūpāṇi viddhi tvaṃ dvijasattama ।
ratnākarāḥ samudrāś ca sarva eva caturdiśaḥ ।।
vasanaṃ śayanaṃ caiva nilayaṃ caiva viddhi me ।
kāmaḥ krodhaś ca harṣaś ca bhayaṃ mohas tathaiva ca ।।
mamaiva viddhi rūpāṇi sarvāṇy etāni sattama ।
prāpnuvanti narā vipra yat kṛtvā karma śobhanam ।।
satyaṃ dānaṃ tapaś cogram ahiṃsāṃ sarvajantuṣu ।
madvidhānena vihitā mama dehavicāriṇaḥ ।।
mayābhibhūtavijñānāś ceṣṭayanti na kāmataḥ ।
samyag vedam adhīyānā yajanto vividhair makhaiḥ ।।
śāntātmāno jitakrodhāḥ prāpnuvanti dvijātayaḥ ।
prāptuṃ śakyo na caivāhaṃ narair duṣkṛtakarmabhiḥ ।।
lobhābhibhūtaiḥ kṛpaṇair anāryair akṛtātmabhiḥ ।
tan māṃ mahāphalaṃ viddhi narāṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām ।।
suduṣprāpaṃ vimūḍhānāṃ māṃ kuyoganiṣeviṇām ।
yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati sattama ।।
abhyutthānam adharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmy aham ।
daityā hiṃsānuraktāś ca avadhyāḥ surasattamaiḥ ।।
rākṣasāś cāpi loke asmin yadotpatsyanti dāruṇāḥ ।
tadāhaṃ saṃprasūyāmi gṛheṣu puṇyakarmaṇām ।।
praviṣṭo mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ sarvaṃ praśamayāmy aham ।
sṛṣṭvā devamanuṣyāṃś ca gandharvoragarākṣasān ।।
sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃharāmy ātmamāyayā ।
karmakāle punar deham anucintya sṛjāmy aham ।।
āviśya mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ maryādābandhakāraṇāt ।
śvetaḥ kṛtayuge dharmaḥ śyāmas tretāyuge mama ।।
rakto dvāparam āsādya kṛṣṇaḥ kaliyuge tathā ।
trayo bhāgā hy adharmasya tasmin kāle bhavanti ca ।।
antakāle ca saṃprāpte kālo bhūtvātidāruṇaḥ ।
trailokyaṃ nāśayāmy ekaḥ sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam ।।
ahaṃ tridharmā viśvātmā sarvalokasukhāvahaḥ ।
abhinnaḥ sarvago ananto hṛṣīkeśa urukramaḥ ।।
kālacakraṃ nayāmy eko brahmarūpaṃ mamaiva tat ।
śamanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvabhūtakṛtodyamam ।।
evaṃ praṇihitaḥ samyaṅ mamātmā munisattama ।
sarvabhūteṣu viprendra na ca māṃ vetti kaścana ।।
sarvaloke ca māṃ bhaktāḥ pūjayanti ca sarvaśaḥ ।
yac ca kiṃcit tvayā prāptaṃ mayi kleśātmakaṃ dvija ।।
sukhodayāya tat sarvaṃ śreyase ca tavānagha ।
yac ca kiṃcit tvayā loke dṛṣṭaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam ।।
vihitaḥ sarva evāsau mayātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ ।
ahaṃ nārāyaṇo nāma śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।।
yāvad yugānāṃ viprarṣe sahasraṃ parivartate ।
tāvat svapimi viśvātmā sarvaviśvāni mohayan ।।
evaṃ sarvam ahaṃ kālam ihāse munisattama ।
aśiśuḥ śiśurūpeṇa yāvad brahmā na budhyate ।।
mayā ca datto viprendra varas te brahmarūpiṇā ।
asakṛt parituṣṭena viprarṣigaṇapūjita ।।
sarvam ekārṇavaṃ kṛtvā naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame ।
nirgato asi mayājñātas tatas te darśitaṃ jagat ।।
abhyantaraṃ śarīrasya praviṣṭo asi yadā mama ।
dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ samastaṃ hi vismito nāvabudhyase ।।
tato asi vaktrād viprarṣe drutaṃ niḥsārito mayā ।
ākhyātas te mayā cātmā durjñeyo hi surāsuraiḥ ।।
yāvat sa bhagavān brahmā na budhyeta mahātapāḥ ।
tāvat tvam iha viprarṣe viśrabdhaś cara vai sukham ।।
tato vibuddhe tasmiṃs tu sarvalokapitāmahe ।
eko bhūtāni srakṣyāmi śarīrāṇi dvijottama ।।
ākāśaṃ pṛthivīṃ jyotir vāyuḥ salilam eva ca ।
loke yac ca bhavet kiṃcid iha sthāvarajaṅgamam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tadā viprāḥ punas taṃ prāha mādhavaḥ ।
pūrṇe yugasahasre tu meghagambhīranisvanaḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
mune brūhi yadarthaṃ māṃ stutavān paramārthataḥ ।
varaṃ vṛṇīṣva yac chreṣṭhaṃ dadāmi nacirād aham ।।
āyuṣmān asi devānāṃ madbhakto asi dṛḍhavrataḥ ।
tena tvam asi viprendra punar dīrghāyur āpnuhi ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvā vāṇīṃ śubhāṃ tasya vilokya sa tadā punaḥ ।
mūrdhnā nipatya sahasā praṇamya punar abravīt ।।
{mārkaṇḍeya uvāca 
dṛṣṭaṃ paraṃ hi deveśa tava rūpaṃ dvijottama ।
moho ayaṃ vigataḥ satyaṃ tvayi dṛṣṭe tu me hare ।।
evam evam ahaṃ nātha iccheyaṃ tvatprasādataḥ ।
lokānāṃ ca hitārthāya nānābhāvapraśāntaye ।।
śaivabhāgavatānāṃ ca vādārthapratiṣedhakam ।
asmin kṣetravare puṇye nirmale puruṣottame ।।
śivasyāyatanaṃ deva karomi paramaṃ mahat ।
pratiṣṭheya tathā tatra tava sthāne ca śaṃkaram ।।
tato jñāsyanti loke asminn ekamūrtī harīśvarau ।
pratyuvāca jagannāthaḥ sa punas taṃ mahāmunim ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
yad etat paramaṃ devaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhuvaneśvaram ।
liṅgam ārādhanārthāya nānābhāvapraśāntaye ।।
mamādiṣṭena viprendra kuru śīghraṃ śivālayam ।
tatprabhāvāc chivaloke tiṣṭha tvaṃ ca tathākṣayam ।।
śive saṃsthāpite vipra mama saṃsthāpanaṃ bhavet ।
nāvayor antaraṃ kiṃcid ekabhāvau dvidhā kṛtau ।।
yo rudraḥ sa svayaṃ viṣṇur yo viṣṇuḥ sa maheśvaraḥ ।
ubhayor antaraṃ nāsti pavanākāśayor iva ।।
mohito nābhijānāti ya eva garuḍadhvajaḥ ।
vṛṣadhvajaḥ sa eveti tripuraghnaṃ trilocanam ।।
tava nāmāṅkitaṃ tasmāt kuru vipra śivālayam ।
uttare devadevasya kuru tīrthaṃ suśobhanam ।।
mārkaṇḍeyahrado nāma naralokeṣu viśrutaḥ ।
bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha sarvapāpapraṇāśanaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā sa tadā devas tatraivāntaradhīyata ।
mārkaṇḍeyaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarvavyāpī janārdanaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi pañcatīrthavidhiṃ dvijāḥ ।
yat phalaṃ snānadānena devatāprekṣaṇena ca ।।
mārkaṇḍeyahradaṃ gatvā naraś codaṅmukhaḥ śuciḥ ।
nimajjet tatra vārāṃs trīn imaṃ mantram udīrayet ।।
saṃsārasāgare magnaṃ pāpagrastam acetanam ।
trāhi māṃ bhaganetraghna tripurāre namo astu te ।।
namaḥ śivāya śāntāya sarvapāpaharāya ca ।
snānaṃ karomi deveśa mama naśyatu pātakam ।।
nābhimātre jale snātvā vidhivad devatā ṛṣīn ।
tilodakena matimān pitṝṃś cānyāṃś ca tarpayet ।।
snātvā tathaiva cācamya tato gacchec chivālayam ।
praviśya devatāgāraṃ kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam ।।
mūlamantreṇa saṃpūjya mārkaṇḍeyasya ceśvaram ।
aghoreṇa ca bho viprāḥ praṇipatya prasādayet ।।
trilocana namas te astu namas te śaśibhūṣaṇa ।
trāhi māṃ tvaṃ virūpākṣa mahādeva namo astu te ।।
mārkaṇḍeyahrade tv evaṃ snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca śaṃkaram ।
daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ ।।
pāpaiḥ sarvair vinirmuktaḥ śivalokaṃ sa gacchati ।
tatra bhuktvā varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।।
ihalokaṃ samāsādya bhaved vipro bahuśrutaḥ ।
śāṃkaraṃ yogam āsādya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
kalpavṛkṣaṃ tato gatvā kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam ।
pūjayet parayā bhaktyā mantreṇānena taṃ vaṭam ।।
oṃ namo vyaktarūpāya mahāpralayakāriṇe ।
mahadrasopaviṣṭāya nyagrodhāya namo astu te ।।
amaras tvaṃ sadā kalpe hareś cāyatanaṃ vaṭa ।
nyagrodha hara me pāpaṃ kalpavṛkṣa namo astu te ।।
bhaktyā pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā natvā kalpavaṭaṃ naraḥ ।
sahasā mucyate pāpāj jīrṇatvaca ivoragaḥ ।।
chāyāṃ tasya samākramya kalpavṛkṣasya bho dvijāḥ ।
brahmahatyāṃ naro jahyāt pāpeṣv anyeṣu kā kathā ।।
dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇāṅgasaṃbhūtaṃ brahmatejomayaṃ param ।
nyagrodhākṛtikaṃ viṣṇuṃ praṇipatya ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam ।
tathā svavaṃśam uddhṛtya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
vainateyaṃ namaskṛtya kṛṣṇasya purataḥ sthitam ।
sarvapāpavinirmuktas tato viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ।।
dṛṣṭvā vaṭaṃ vainateyaṃ yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam ।
saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ।।
praviśyāyatanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kṛtvā taṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇam ।
saṃkarṣaṇaṃ svamantreṇa bhaktyāpūjya prasādayet ।।
namas te haladhṛg rāma namas te muśalāyudha ।
namas te revatīkānta namas te bhaktavatsala ।।
namas te balināṃ śreṣṭha namas te dharaṇīdhara ।
pralambāre namas te astu trāhi māṃ kṛṣṇapūrvaja ।।
evaṃ prasādya cānantam ajeyaṃ tridaśārcitam ।
kailāsaśikharākāraṃ candrāt kāntatarānanam ।।
nīlavastradharaṃ devaṃ phaṇāvikaṭamastakam ।
mahābalaṃ haladharaṃ kuṇḍalaikavibhūṣitam ।।
rauhiṇeyaṃ naro bhaktyā labhed abhimataṃ phalam ।
sarvapāpair vinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
ābhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvad bhuktvā tatra sukhaṃ naraḥ ।
puṇyakṣayād ihāgatya pravare yogināṃ kule ।।
brāhmaṇapravaro bhūtvā sarvaśāstrārthapāragaḥ ।
jñānaṃ tatra samāsādya muktiṃ prāpnoti durlabhām ।।
evam abhyarcya halinaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ ।
dvādaśākṣaramantreṇa pūjayet susamāhitaḥ ।।
dviṣaṭkavarṇamantreṇa bhaktyā ye puruṣottamam ।
pūjayanti sadā dhīrās te mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti vai ।।
na tāṃ gatiṃ surā yānti yogino naiva somapāḥ ।
yāṃ gatiṃ yānti bho viprā dvādaśākṣaratatparāḥ ।।
tasmāt tenaiva mantreṇa bhaktyā kṛṣṇaṃ jagadgurum ।
saṃpūjya gandhapuṣpādyaiḥ praṇipatya prasādayet ।।
jaya kṛṣṇa jagannātha jaya sarvāghanāśana ।
jaya cāṇūrakeśighna jaya kaṃsaniṣūdana ।।
jaya padmapalāśākṣa jaya cakragadādhara ।
jaya nīlāmbudaśyāma jaya sarvasukhaprada ।।
jaya deva jagatpūjya jaya saṃsāranāśana ।
jaya lokapate nātha jaya vāñchāphalaprada ।।
saṃsārasāgare ghore niḥsāre duḥkhaphenile ।
krodhagrāhākule raudre viṣayodakasaṃplave ।।
nānārogormikalile mohāvartasudustare ।
nimagno ahaṃ suraśreṣṭha trāhi māṃ puruṣottama ।।
evaṃ prasādya deveśaṃ varadaṃ bhaktavatsalam ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ devaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
pīnāṃsaṃ dvibhujaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam ।
mahoraskaṃ mahābāhuṃ pītavastraṃ śubhānanam ।।
śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiṃ mukuṭāṅgadabhūṣaṇam ।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ vanamālāvibhūṣitam ।।
dṛṣṭvā naro añjaliṃ kṛtvā daṇḍavat praṇipatya ca ।
aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti vai dvijāḥ ।।
yat phalaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu snāne dāne prakīrtitam ।
naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
yat phalaṃ sarvaratnādyair iṣṭe bahusuvarṇake ।
naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
yat phalaṃ sarvavedeṣu sarvayajñeṣu yat phalam ।
tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti naraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
yat phalaṃ sarvadānena vratena niyamena ca ।
naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
tapobhir vividhair ugrair yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
yat phalaṃ brahmacaryeṇa samyak cīrṇena tatkṛtam ।
naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
yat phalaṃ ca gṛhasthasya yathoktācāravartinaḥ ।
naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
yat phalaṃ vanavāsena vānaprasthasya kīrtitam ।
naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
saṃnyāsena yathoktena yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
naras tat phalam āpnoti dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
kiṃ cātra bahunoktena māhātmye tasya bho dvijāḥ ।
dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ naro bhaktyā mokṣaṃ prāpnoti durlabham ।।
pāpair vimuktaḥ śuddhātmā kalpakoṭisamudbhavaiḥ ।
śriyā paramayā yuktaḥ sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ ।।
sarvakāmasamṛddhena vimānena suvarcasā ।
trisaptakulam uddhṛtya naro viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ।।
tatra kalpaśataṃ yāvad bhuktvā bhogān manoramān ।
gandharvāpsarasaiḥ sārdhaṃ yathā viṣṇuś caturbhujaḥ ।।
cyutas tasmād ihāyāto viprāṇāṃ pravare kule ।
sarvajñaḥ sarvavedī ca jāyate gatamatsaraḥ ।।
svadharmanirataḥ śānto dātā bhūtahite rataḥ ।
āsādya vaiṣṇavaṃ jñānaṃ tato muktim avāpnuyāt ।।
tataḥ saṃpūjya mantreṇa subhadrāṃ bhaktavatsalām ।
prasādayet tato viprāḥ praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ ।।
namas te sarvage devi namas te śubhasaukhyade ।
trāhi māṃ padmapattrākṣi kātyāyani namo astu te ।।
evaṃ prasādya tāṃ devīṃ jagaddhātrīṃ jagaddhitām ।
baladevasya bhaginīṃ subhadrāṃ varadāṃ śivām ।।
kāmagena vimānena naro viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ।
ābhūtasaṃplavaṃ yāvat krīḍitvā tatra devavat ।।
iha mānuṣatāṃ prāpto brāhmaṇo vedavid bhavet ।
prāpya yogaṃ hares tatra mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ dṛṣṭvā balaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ subhadrāṃ praṇipatya ca ।
dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam ।।
niṣkramya devatāgārāt kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ ।
praṇamyāyatanaṃ paścād vrajet tatra samāhitaḥ ।।
indranīlamayo viṣṇur yatrāste vālukāvṛtaḥ ।
antardhānagataṃ natvā tato viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ।।
sarvadevamayo yo asau hatavān asurottamam ।
sa āste tatra bho viprāḥ siṃhārdhakṛtavigrahaḥ ।।
bhaktyā dṛṣṭvā tu taṃ devaṃ praṇamya narakesarīm ।
mucyate pātakair martyaḥ samastair nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
narasiṃhasya ye bhaktā bhavanti bhuvi mānavāḥ ।
na teṣāṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃcit phalaṃ syād yad yad īpsitam ।।
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena narasiṃhaṃ samāśrayet ।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ phalaṃ yasmāt prayacchati ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
māhātmyaṃ narasiṃhasya sukhadaṃ bhuvi durlabham ।
yathā kathayase deva tena no vismayo mahān ।।
prabhāvaṃ tasya devasya vistareṇa jagatpate ।
śrotum icchāmahe brūhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
yathā prasīded devo asau narasiṃho mahābalaḥ ।
bhaktānām upakārāya brūhi deva namo astu te ।।
prasādān narasiṃhasya yā bhavanty atra siddhayaḥ ।
brūhi tāḥ kuru cāsmākaṃ prasādaṃ prapitāmaha ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ tasya bho viprāḥ prabhāvaṃ gadato mama ।
ajitasyāprameyasya bhuktimuktipradasya ca ।।
kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ samastāṃs tasya bho dvijāḥ ।
siṃhārdhakṛtadehasya pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ ।।
yāḥ kāścit siddhayaś cātra śrūyante daivamānuṣāḥ ।
prasādāt tasya tāḥ sarvāḥ sidhyanti nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
svarge martye ca pātāle dikṣu toye pure nage ।
prasādāt tasya devasya bhavaty avyāhatā gatiḥ ।।
asādhyaṃ tasya devasya nāsty atra sacarācare ।
narasiṃhasya bho viprāḥ sadā bhaktānukampinaḥ ।।
vidhānaṃ tasya vakṣyāmi bhaktānām upakārakam ।
yena prasīdec caivāsau siṃhārdhakṛtavigrahaḥ ।।
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ kalparājaṃ sanātanam ।
narasiṃhasya tattvaṃ ca yan na jñātaṃ surāsuraiḥ ।।
śākayāvakamūlais tu phalapiṇyākasaktukaiḥ ।
payobhakṣeṇa viprendrā vartayet sādhakottamaḥ ।।
kośakaupīnavāsāś ca dhyānayukto jitendriyaḥ ।
araṇye vijane deśe parvate sindhusaṃgame ।।
ūṣare siddhakṣetre ca narasiṃhāśrame tathā ।
pratiṣṭhāpya svayaṃ vāpi pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ ।।
dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya upoṣya munipuṃgavāḥ ।
japel lakṣāṇi vai viṃśan manasā saṃyatendriyaḥ ।।
upapātakayuktaś ca mahāpātakasaṃyutaḥ ।
mukto bhavet tato viprāḥ sādhako nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ tatra narasiṃhaṃ prapūjayet ।
puṇyagandhādibhir dhūpaiḥ praṇamya śirasā prabhum ।।
karpūracandanāktāni jātīpuṣpāṇi mastake ।
pradadyān narasiṃhasya tataḥ siddhiḥ prajāyate ।।
bhagavān sarvakāryeṣu na kvacit pratihanyate ।
tejaḥ soḍhuṃ na śaktāḥ syur brahmarudrādayaḥ surāḥ ।।
kiṃ punar dānavā loke siddhagandharvamānuṣāḥ ।
vidyādharā yakṣagaṇāḥ sakiṃnaramahoragāḥ ।।
mantraṃ yān āsurān hantuṃ japanty eke anyasādhakāḥ ।
te sarve pralayaṃ yānti dṛṣṭvādityāgnivarcasaḥ ।।
sakṛjjaptaṃ tu kavacaṃ rakṣet sarvam upadravam ।
dvirjaptaṃ kavacaṃ divyaṃ rakṣate devadānavāt ।।
gandharvāḥ kiṃnarā yakṣā vidyādharamahoragāḥ ।
bhūtāḥ piśācā rakṣāṃsi ye cānye paripanthinaḥ ।।
trirjaptaṃ kavacaṃ divyam abhedyaṃ ca surāsuraiḥ ।
dvādaśābhyantare caiva yojanānāṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
rakṣate bhagavān devo narasiṃho mahābalaḥ ।
tato gatvā biladvāram upoṣya rajanītrayam ।।
palāśakāṣṭhaiḥ prajvālya bhagavantaṃ hutāśanam ।
palāśasamidhas tatra juhuyāt trimadhuplutāḥ ।।
dve śate dvijaśārdūlā vaṣaṭkāreṇa sādhakaḥ ।
tato vivaradvāraṃ tu prakaṭaṃ jāyate kṣaṇāt ।।
tato viśet tu niḥśaṅkaṃ kavacī vivaraṃ budhaḥ ।
gacchataḥ saṃkaṭaṃ tasya tamomohaś ca naśyati ।।
rājamārgaḥ suvistīrṇo dṛśyate bhramarājitaḥ ।
narasiṃhaṃ smaraṃs tatra pātālaṃ viśate dvijāḥ ।।
gatvā tatra japet tattvaṃ narasiṃhākhyam avyayam ।
tataḥ strīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi vīṇāvādanakarmaṇām ।।
nirgacchanti puro viprāḥ svāgataṃ tā vadanti ca ।
praveśayanti tā haste gṛhītvā sādhakeśvaram ।।
tato rasāyanaṃ divyaṃ pāyayanti dvijottamāḥ ।
pītamātre divyadeho jāyate sumahābalaḥ ।।
krīḍate saha kanyābhir yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।
bhinnadeho vāsudeve līyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
yadā na rocate vāsas tasmān nirgacchate punaḥ ।
paṭṭaṃ śūlaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca rocanāṃ ca maṇiṃ tathā ।।
rasaṃ rasāyanaṃ caiva pādukāñjanam eva ca ।
kṛṣṇājinaṃ muniśreṣṭhā guṭikāṃ ca manoharām ।।
kamaṇḍaluṃ cākṣasūtraṃ yaṣṭiṃ saṃjīvanīṃ tathā ।
siddhavidyāṃ ca śāstrāṇi gṛhītvā sādhakeśvaraḥ ।।
jvaladvahnisphuliṅgormi- veṣṭitaṃ triśikhaṃ hṛdi ।
sakṛn nyastaṃ dahet sarvaṃ vṛjinaṃ janmakoṭijam ।।
viṣe nyastaṃ viṣaṃ hanyāt kuṣṭhaṃ hanyāt tanau sthitam ।
svadehe bhrūṇahatyādi kṛtvā divyena śudhyati ।।
mahāgrahagṛhīteṣu jvalamānaṃ vicintayet ।
hṛdante vai tataḥ śīghraṃ naśyeyur dāruṇā grahāḥ ।।
bālānāṃ kaṇṭhake baddhaṃ rakṣā bhavati nityaśaḥ ।
gaṇḍapiṇḍakalūtānāṃ nāśanaṃ kurute dhruvam ।।
vyādhijāte samidbhiś ca ghṛtakṣīreṇa homayet ।
trisaṃdhyaṃ māsam ekaṃ tu sarvarogān vināśayet ।।
asādhyaṃ tu na paśyāmi trailokye sacarācare ।
yāṃ yāṃ kāmayate siddhiṃ tāṃ tāṃ prāpnoti sa dhruvam ।।
aṣṭottaraśataṃ tv eke pūjayitvā mṛgādhipam ।
mṛttikāḥ sapta valmīke śmaśāne ca catuṣpathe ।।
raktacandanasaṃmiśrā gavāṃ kṣīreṇa loḍayet ।
siṃhasya pratimāṃ kṛtvā pramāṇena ṣaḍaṅgulām ।।
limpet tathā bhūrjapattre rocanayā samālikhet ।
narasiṃhasya kaṇṭhe tu baddhvā caiva hi mantravit ।।
japet saṃkhyāvihīnaṃ tu pūjayitvā jalāśaye ।
yāvat saptāhamātraṃ tu japet saṃyamitendriyaḥ ।।
jalākīrṇā muhūrtena jāyate sarvamedinī ।
athavā śuṣkavṛkṣāgre narasiṃhaṃ tu pūjayet ।।
japtvā cāṣṭaśataṃ tattvaṃ varṣantaṃ vinivārayet ।
tam evaṃ piñjake baddhvā bhrāmayet sādhakottamaḥ ।।
mahāvāto muhūrtena āgacchen nātra saṃśayaḥ ।
punaś ca dhārayet kṣipraṃ saptasaptena vāriṇā ।।
atha tāṃ pratimāṃ dvāri nikhaned yasya sādhakaḥ ।
gotrotsādo bhavet tasya uddhṛte caiva śāntidaḥ ।।
tasmāt taṃ muniśārdūlā bhaktyā saṃpūjayet sadā ।
mṛgarājaṃ mahāvīryaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ śūdrāntyajātayaḥ ।।
saṃpūjya taṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ bhaktyā siṃhavapurdharam ।
mucyante cāśubhair duḥkhair janmakoṭisamudbhavaiḥ ।।
saṃpūjya taṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ prāpnuvanty abhivāñchitam ।
devatvam amareśatvaṃ gandharvatvaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
yakṣavidyādharatvaṃ ca tathānyac cābhivāñchitam ।
dṛṣṭvā stutvā namaskṛtvā saṃpūjya narakesarīm ।।
prāpnuvanti narā rājyaṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca durlabham ।
narasiṃhaṃ naro dṛṣṭvā labhed abhimataṃ phalam ।।
nirmuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।
sakṛd dṛṣṭvā tu taṃ devaṃ bhaktyā siṃhavapurdharam ।।
mucyate cāśubhair duḥkhair janmakoṭisamudbhavaiḥ ।
saṃgrāme saṃkaṭe durge coravyāghrādipīḍite ।।
kāntāre prāṇasaṃdehe viṣavahnijaleṣu ca ।
rājādibhyaḥ samudrebhyo graharogādipīḍite ।।
smṛtvā taṃ puruṣaḥ sarvai rājagrāmair vimucyate ।
sūryodaye yathā nāśaṃ tamo abhyeti mahattaram ।।
tathā saṃdarśane tasya vināśaṃ yānty upadravāḥ ।
guṭikāñjanapātāla- pāduke ca rasāyanam ।।
narasiṃhe prasanne tu prāpnoty anyāṃś ca vāñchitān ।
yān yān kāmān abhidhyāyan bhajate narakesarīm ।।
tāṃs tān kāmān avāpnoti naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।
dṛṣṭvā taṃ devadeveśaṃ bhaktyāpūjya praṇamya ca ।।
daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ daśaguṇaṃ labhet ।
pāpaiḥ sarvair vinirmukto guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
sarvakāmasamṛddhātmā jarāmaraṇavarjitaḥ ।
sauvarṇena vimānena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā ।।
sarvakāmasamṛddhena kāmagena suvarcasā ।
taruṇādityavarṇena muktāhārāvalambinā ।।
divyastrīśatayuktena divyagandharvanādinā ।
kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya devavan muditaḥ sukhī ।।
stūyamāno apsarobhiś ca viṣṇulokaṃ vrajen naraḥ ।
bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān viṣṇuloke dvijottamāḥ ।।
gandharvair apsarair yuktaḥ kṛtvā rūpaṃ caturbhujam ।
manohlādakaraṃ saukhyaṃ yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।।
puṇyakṣayād ihāyātaḥ pravare yogināṃ kule ।
caturvedī bhaved vipro vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ।
vaiṣṇavaṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
anantākhyaṃ vāsudevaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaktyā praṇamya ca ।
sarvapāpavinirmukto naro yāti paraṃ padam ।।
mayā cārādhitaś cāsau śakreṇa tadanantaram ।
vibhīṣaṇena rāmeṇa kas taṃ nārādhayet pumān ।।
śvetagaṅgāṃ naraḥ snātvā yaḥ paśyec chvetamādhavam ।
matsyākhyaṃ mādhavaṃ caiva śvetadvīpaṃ sa gacchati ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śvetamādhavamāhātmyaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ ।
vistareṇa jagannātha pratimāṃ tasya vai hareḥ ।।
tasmin kṣetravare puṇye vikhyāte jagatītale ।
śvetākhyaṃ mādhavaṃ devaṃ kas taṃ sthāpitavān purā ।।
{brahmovāca 
abhūt kṛtayuge viprāḥ śveto nāma nṛpo balī ।
matimān dharmavic chūraḥ satyasaṃdho dṛḍhavrataḥ ।।
yasya rājye tu varṣāṇāṃ sahasraṃ daśa mānavāḥ ।
bhavanty āyuṣmanto lokā bālas tasmin na sīdati ।।
vartamāne tadā rājye kiṃcit kāle gate dvijāḥ ।
kapālagautamo nāma ṛṣiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।।
suto asyājātadantaś ca mṛtaḥ kālavaśād dvijāḥ ।
tam ādāya ṛṣir dhīmān nṛpasyāntikam ānayat ।।
dṛṣṭvaivaṃ nṛpatiḥ suptaṃ kumāraṃ gatacetasam ।
pratijñām akarod viprā jīvanārthaṃ śiśos tadā ।।
{rājovāca 
yāvad bālam ahaṃ tv enaṃ yamasya sadane gatam ।
nānaye saptarātreṇa citāṃ dīptāṃ samāruhe ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvāsitaiḥ padmaiḥ śatair daśaśatādikaiḥ ।
saṃpūjya ca mahādevaṃ rājā vidyāṃ punar japet ।।
atibhaktiṃ tu saṃcintya nṛpasya jagadīśvaraḥ ।
sāṃnidhyam agamat tuṣṭo śmīty uvāca sahomayā ।।
śrutvaivaṃ giram īśasya vilokya sahasā haram ।
bhasmadigdhaṃ virūpākṣaṃ śaratkundenduvarcasam ।।
śārdūlacarmavasanaṃ śaśāṅkāṅkitamūrdhajam ।
mahīṃ nipatya sahasā praṇamya sa tadābravīt ।।
{śveta uvāca 
kāruṇyaṃ yadi me dṛṣṭvā prasanno asi prabho yadi ।
kālasya vaśam āpanno bālako dvijaputrakaḥ ।।
jīvatv eṣa punar bāla ity evaṃ vratam āhitam ।
akasmāc ca mṛtaṃ bālaṃ niyamya bhagavan svayam ।
yathoktāyuṣyasaṃyuktaṃ kṣemaṃ kuru maheśvara ।।
{brahmovāca 
śvetasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā mudaṃ prāpa haras tadā ।
kālam ājñāpayām āsa sarvabhūtabhayaṃkaram ।।
niyamya kālaṃ durdharṣaṃ yamasyājñākaraṃ dvijāḥ ।
bālaṃ saṃjīvayām āsa mṛtyor mukhagataṃ punaḥ ।।
kṛtvā kṣemaṃ jagat sarvaṃ muneḥ putraṃ sa taṃ dvijāḥ ।
devyā sahomayā devas tatraivāntaradhīyata ।।
evaṃ saṃjīvayām āsa muneḥ putraṃ nṛpottamaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
devadeva jagannātha trailokyaprabhavāvyaya ।
brūhi naḥ paramaṃ tathyaṃ śvetākhyasya ca sāṃpratam ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ sarvasattvahitāvaham ।
pravakṣyāmi yathātathyaṃ yat pṛcchatha mamānaghāḥ ।।
mādhavasya ca māhātmyaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।
yac chrutvābhimatān kāmān dhruvaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ ।।
śrutavān ṛṣibhiḥ pūrvaṃ mādhavākhyasya bho dvijāḥ ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ tāṃ kathāṃ divyāṃ bhayaśokārtināśinīm ।।
sa kṛtvā rājyam ekāgryaṃ varṣāṇāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ ।
vicārya laukikān dharmān vaidikān niyamāṃs tathā ।।
keśavārādhane viprā niścitaṃ vratam āsthitaḥ ।
sa gatvā paramaṃ kṣetraṃ sāgaraṃ dakṣiṇāśrayam ।।
taṭe tasmiñ śubhe ramye deśe kṛṣṇasya cāntike ।
śveto atha kārayām āsa prāsādaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam ।।
dhanvantaraśataṃ caikaṃ devadevasya dakṣiṇe ।
tataḥ śvetena viprendrāḥ śvetaśailamayena ca ।।
kṛtaḥ sa bhagavāñ śveto mādhavaś candrasaṃnibhaḥ ।
pratiṣṭhāṃ vidhivac cakre yathoddiṣṭāṃ svayaṃ tu saḥ ।।
dattvā dānaṃ dvijātibhyo dīnānāthatapasvinām ।
athānantarato rājā mādhavasya ca saṃnidhau ।।
mahīṃ nipatya sahasā oṃkāraṃ dvādaśākṣaram ।
japan sa maunam āsthāya māsam ekaṃ samādhinā ।।
nirāhāro mahābhāgaḥ samyag viṣṇupade sthitaḥ ।
japānte sa tu deveśaṃ saṃstotum upacakrame ।।
{śveta uvāca 
oṃ namo vāsudevāya namaḥ saṃkarṣaṇāya ca ।
pradyumnāyāniruddhāya namo nārāyaṇāya ca ।।
namo astu bahurūpāya viśvarūpāya vedhase ।
nirguṇāyāpratarkyāya śucaye śuklakarmaṇe ।।
oṃ namaḥ padmanābhāya padmagarbhodbhavāya ca ।
namo astu padmavarṇāya padmahastāya te namaḥ ।।
oṃ namaḥ puṣkarākṣāya sahasrākṣāya mīḍhuṣe ।
namaḥ sahasrapādāya sahasrabhujamanyave ।।
oṃ namo astu varāhāya varadāya sumedhase ।
variṣṭhāya vareṇyāya śaraṇyāyācyutāya ca ।।
oṃ namo bālarūpāya bālapadmaprabhāya ca ।
bālārkasomanetrāya muñjakeśāya dhīmate ।।
keśavāya namo nityaṃ namo nārāyaṇāya ca ।
mādhavāya variṣṭhāya govindāya namo namaḥ ।।
oṃ namo viṣṇave nityaṃ devāya vasuretase ।
madhusūdanāya namaḥ śuddhāyāṃśudharāya ca ।।
namo anantāya sūkṣmāya namaḥ śrīvatsadhāriṇe ।
trivikramāya ca namo divyapītāmbarāya ca ।।
sṛṣṭikartre namas tubhyaṃ goptre dhātre namo namaḥ ।
namo astu guṇabhūtāya nirguṇāya namo namaḥ ।।
namo vāmanarūpāya namo vāmanakarmaṇe ।
namo vāmananetrāya namo vāmanavāhine ।।
namo ramyāya pūjyāya namo astv avyaktarūpiṇe ।
apratarkyāya śuddhāya namo bhayaharāya ca ।।
saṃsārārṇavapotāya praśāntāya svarūpiṇe ।
śivāya saumyarūpāya rudrāyottāraṇāya ca ।।
bhavabhaṅgakṛte caiva bhavabhogapradāya ca ।
bhavasaṃghātarūpāya bhavasṛṣṭikṛte namaḥ ।।
oṃ namo divyarūpāya somāgniśvasitāya ca ।
somasūryāṃśukeśāya gobrāhmaṇahitāya ca ।।
oṃ nama ṛksvarūpāya padakramasvarūpiṇe ।
ṛkstutāya namas tubhyaṃ nama ṛksādhanāya ca ।।
oṃ namo yajuṣāṃ dhātre yajūrūpadharāya ca ।
yajuryājyāya juṣṭāya yajuṣāṃ pataye namaḥ ।।
oṃ namaḥ śrīpate deva śrīdharāya varāya ca ।
śriyaḥ kāntāya dāntāya yogicintyāya yogine ।।
oṃ namaḥ sāmarūpāya sāmadhvanivarāya ca ।
oṃ namaḥ sāmasaumyāya sāmayogavide namaḥ ।।
sāmne ca sāmagītāya oṃ namaḥ sāmadhāriṇe ।
sāmayajñavide caiva namaḥ sāmakarāya ca ।।
namas tv atharvaśirase namo atharvasvarūpiṇe ।
namo astv atharvapādāya namo atharvakarāya ca ।।
oṃ namo vajraśīrṣāya madhukaiṭabhaghātine ।
mahodadhijalasthāya vedāharaṇakāriṇe ।।
namo dīptasvarūpāya hṛṣīkeśāya vai namaḥ ।
namo bhagavate tubhyaṃ vāsudevāya te namaḥ ।।
nārāyaṇa namas tubhyaṃ namo lokahitāya ca ।
oṃ namo mohanāśāya bhavabhaṅgakarāya ca ।।
gatipradāya ca namo namo bandhaharāya ca ।
trailokyatejasāṃ kartre namas tejaḥsvarūpiṇe ।।
yogīśvarāya śuddhāya rāmāyottaraṇāya ca ।
sukhāya sukhanetrāya namaḥ sukṛtadhāriṇe ।।
vāsudevāya vandyāya vāmadevāya vai namaḥ ।
dehināṃ dehakartre ca bhedabhaṅgakarāya ca ।।
devair vanditadehāya namas te divyamauline ।
namo vāsanivāsāya vāsavyavaharāya ca ।।
oṃ namo vasukartre ca vasuvāsapradāya ca ।
namo yajñasvarūpāya yajñeśāya ca yogine ।।
yatiyogakareśāya namo yajñāṅgadhāriṇe ।
saṃkarṣaṇāya ca namaḥ pralambamathanāya ca ।।
meghaghoṣasvanottīrṇa- vegalāṅgaladhāriṇe ।
namo astu jñānināṃ jñāna nārāyaṇaparāyaṇa ।।
na me asti tvām ṛte bandhur narakottāraṇe prabho ।
atas tvāṃ sarvabhāvena praṇato natavatsala ।।
malaṃ yat kāyajaṃ vāpi mānasaṃ caiva keśava ।
na tasyānyo asti deveśa kṣālakas tvām ṛte acyuta ।।
saṃsargāṇi samastāni vihāya tvām upasthitaḥ ।
saṅgo me astu tvayā sārdham ātmalābhāya keśava ।।
kaṣṭam āpat suduṣpāraṃ saṃsāraṃ vedmi keśava ।
tāpatrayaparikliṣṭas tena tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ ।।
eṣaṇābhir jagat sarvaṃ mohitaṃ māyayā tava ।
ākarṣitaṃ ca lobhādyair atas tvām aham āśritaḥ ।।
nāsti kiṃcit sukhaṃ viṣṇo saṃsārasthasya dehinaḥ ।
yathā yathā hi yajñeśa tvayi cetaḥ pravartate ।।
tathā phalavihīnaṃ tu sukham ātyantikaṃ labhet ।
naṣṭo vivekaśūnyo asmi dṛśyate jagad āturam ।।
govinda trāhi saṃsārān mām uddhartuṃ tvam arhasi ।
magnasya mohasalile niruttāre bhavārṇave ।
uddhartā puṇḍarīkākṣa tvām ṛte anyo na vidyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
itthaṃ stutas tatas tena rājñā śvetena bho dvijāḥ ।
tasmin kṣetravare divye vikhyāte puruṣottame ।।
bhaktiṃ tasya tu saṃcintya devadevo jagadguruḥ ।
ājagāma nṛpasyāgre sarvair devair vṛto hariḥ ।।
nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśaḥ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇaḥ ।
dadhat sudarśanaṃ dhīmān karāgre dīptamaṇḍalam ।।
kṣīrodajalasaṃkāśo vimalaś candrasaṃnibhaḥ ।
rarāja vāmahaste asya pāñcajanyo mahādyutiḥ ।।
pakṣirājadhvajaḥ śrīmān gadāśārṅgāsidhṛk prabhuḥ ।
uvāca sādhu bho rājan yasya te matir uttamā ।
yad iṣṭaṃ vara bhadraṃ te prasanno asmi tavānagha ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvaivaṃ devadevasya vākyaṃ tat paramāmṛtam ।
praṇamya śirasovāca śvetas tadgatamānasaḥ ।।
{śveta uvāca 
yady ahaṃ bhagavan bhaktaḥ prayaccha varam uttamam ।
ābrahmabhavanād ūrdhvaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padam avyayam ।।
vimalaṃ virajaṃ śuddhaṃ saṃsārāsaṅgavarjitam ।
tat padaṃ gantum icchāmi tvatprasādāj jagatpate ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
yat padaṃ vibudhāḥ sarve munayaḥ siddhayoginaḥ ।
nābhigacchanti yad ramyaṃ paraṃ padam anāmayam ।।
yāsyasi paramaṃ sthānaṃ rājyāmṛtam upāsya ca ।
sarvāṃl lokān atikramya mama lokaṃ gamiṣyasi ।।
kīrtis tavātra rājendra trīṃl lokāṃś ca gamiṣyati ।
sāṃnidhyaṃ mama caivātra sarvadaiva bhaviṣyati ।।
śvetagaṅgeti gāsyanti sarve te devadānavāḥ ।
kuśāgreṇāpi rājendra śvetagāṅgeyam ambu ca ।।
spṛṣṭvā svargaṃ gamiṣyanti madbhaktā ye samāhitāḥ ।
yas tv imāṃ pratimāṃ gacchen mādhavākhyāṃ śaśiprabhām ।।
śaṅkhagokṣīrasaṃkāśām aśeṣāghavināśinīm ।
tāṃ praṇamya sakṛd bhaktyā puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇām ।।
vihāya sarvalokān vai mama loke mahīyate ।
manvantarāṇi tatraiva devakanyābhir āvṛtaḥ ।।
gīyamānaś ca madhuraṃ siddhagandharvasevitaḥ ।
bhunakti vipulān bhogān yatheṣṭaṃ māmakaiḥ saha ।।
cyutas tasmād ihāgatya manuṣyo brāhmaṇo bhavet ।
vedavedāṅgavic chrīmān bhogavāṃś cirajīvitaḥ ।।
gajāśvarathayānāḍhyo dhanadhānyāvṛtaḥ śuciḥ ।
rūpavān bahubhāgyaś ca putrapautrasamanvitaḥ ।।
puruṣottamaṃ punaḥ prāpya vaṭamūle atha sāgare ।
tyaktvā dehaṃ hariṃ smṛtvā tataḥ śāntapadaṃ vrajet ।।
{brahmovāca 
śvetamādhavam ālokya samīpe matsyamādhavam ।
ekārṇavajale pūrvaṃ rohitaṃ rūpam āsthitam ।।
vedānāṃ haraṇārthāya rasātalatale sthitam ।
cintayitvā kṣitiṃ samyak tasmin sthāne pratiṣṭhitam ।।
ādyāvataraṇaṃ rūpaṃ mādhavaṃ matsyarūpiṇam ।
praṇamya praṇato bhūtvā sarvaduḥkhād vimucyate ।।
prayāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo hariḥ svayam ।
kāle punar ihāyāto rājā syāt pṛthivītale ।।
vatsamādhavam āsādya durādharṣo bhaven naraḥ ।
dātā bhoktā bhaved yajvā vaiṣṇavaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ ।।
yogaṃ prāpya hareḥ paścāt tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।
matsyamādhavamāhātmyaṃ mayā saṃparikīrtitam ।
yaṃ dṛṣṭvā muniśārdūlāḥ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
bhagavañ śrotum icchāmo mārjanaṃ varuṇālaye ।
kriyate snānadānādi tasyāśeṣaphalaṃ vada ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlā mārjanasya yathāvidhi ।
bhaktyā tu tanmanā bhūtvā saṃprāpya puṇyam uttamam ।।
mārkaṇḍeyahrade snānaṃ pūrvakāle praśasyate ।
caturdaśyāṃ viśeṣeṇa sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।।
tadvat snānaṃ samudrasya sarvakālaṃ praśasyate ।
paurṇamāsyāṃ viśeṣeṇa hayamedhaphalaṃ labhet ।।
mārkaṇḍeyaṃ vaṭaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ rauhiṇeyaṃ mahodadhim ।
indradyumnasaraś caiva pañcatīrthīvidhiḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
pūrṇimā jyeṣṭhamāsasya jyeṣṭhā ṛkṣaṃ yadā bhavet ।
tadā gacched viśeṣeṇa tīrtharājaṃ paraṃ śubham ।।
kāyavāṅmānasaiḥ śuddhas tadbhāvo nānyamānasaḥ ।
sarvadvaṃdvavinirmukto vītarāgo vimatsaraḥ ।।
kalpavṛkṣavaṭaṃ ramyaṃ tatra snātvā janārdanam ।
pradakṣiṇaṃ prakurvīta trivāraṃ susamāhitaḥ ।।
yaṃ dṛṣṭvā mucyate pāpāt saptajanmasamudbhavāt ।
puṇyaṃ cāpnoti vipulaṃ gatim iṣṭāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
tasya nāmāni vakṣyāmi pramāṇaṃ ca yuge yuge ।
yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ca bho viprāḥ kṛtādiṣu yathākramam ।।
vaṭaṃ vaṭeśvaraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ purāṇapuruṣaṃ dvijāḥ ।
vaṭasyaitāni nāmāni kīrtitāni kṛtādiṣu ।।
yojanaṃ pādahīnaṃ ca yojanārdhaṃ tadardhakam ।
pramāṇaṃ kalpavṛkṣasya kṛtādau parikīrtitam ।।
yathoktena tu mantreṇa namaskṛtvā tu taṃ vaṭam ।
dakṣiṇābhimukho gacched dhanvantaraśatatrayam ।।
yatrāsau dṛśyate viṣṇuḥ svargadvāraṃ manoramam ।
sāgarāmbhaḥsamākṛṣṭaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ sarvaguṇānvitam ।।
praṇipatya tatas taṃ bhoḥ paripūjya tataḥ punaḥ ।
mucyate sarvarogādyais tathā pāpair grahādibhiḥ ।।
ugrasenaṃ purā dṛṣṭvā svargadvāreṇa sāgaram ।
gatvācamya śucis tatra dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ param ।।
nyased aṣṭākṣaraṃ mantraṃ paścād dhastaśarīrayoḥ ।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāyeti yaṃ vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
kiṃ kāryaṃ bahubhir mantrair manovibhramakārakaiḥ ।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāyeti mantraḥ sarvārthasādhakaḥ ।।
āpo narasya sūnutvān nārā itīha kīrtitāḥ ।
viṣṇos tās tv ayanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
nārāyaṇaparā vedā nārāyaṇaparā dvijāḥ ।
nārāyaṇaparā yajñā nārāyaṇaparāḥ kriyāḥ ।।
nārāyaṇaparā pṛthvī nārāyaṇaparaṃ jalam ।
nārāyaṇaparo vahnir nārāyaṇaparaṃ nabhaḥ ।।
nārāyaṇaparo vāyur nārāyaṇaparaṃ manaḥ ।
ahaṃkāraś ca buddhiś ca ubhe nārāyaṇātmake ।।
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca yat kiṃcij jīvasaṃjñitam ।
sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ caiva sarvaṃ nārāyaṇātmakam ।।
śabdādyā viṣayāḥ sarve śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi ca ।
prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś caiva sarve nārāyaṇātmakāḥ ।।
jale sthale ca pātāle svargaloke ambare nage ।
avaṣṭabhya idaṃ sarvam āste nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ ।।
kiṃ cātra bahunoktena jagad etac carācaram ।
brahmādistambaparyantaṃ sarvaṃ nārāyaṇātmakam ।।
nārāyaṇāt paraṃ kiṃcin neha paśyāmi bho dvijāḥ ।
tena vyāptam idaṃ sarvaṃ dṛśyādṛśyaṃ carācaram ।।
āpo hy āyatanaṃ viṣṇoḥ sa ca evāmbhasāṃ patiḥ ।
tasmād apsu smaren nityaṃ nārāyaṇam aghāpaham ।।
snānakāle viśeṣeṇa copasthāya jale śuciḥ ।
smaren nārāyaṇaṃ dhyāyed dhaste kāye ca vinyaset ।।
oṃkāraṃ ca nakāraṃ ca aṅguṣṭhe hastayor nyaset ।
śeṣair hastatalaṃ yāvat tarjanyādiṣu vinyaset ।।
oṃkāraṃ vāmapāde tu nakāraṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset ।
mokāraṃ vāmakaṭyāṃ tu nākāraṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset ।।
rākāraṃ nābhideśe tu yakāraṃ vāmabāhuke ।
ṇākāraṃ dakṣiṇe nyasya yakāraṃ mūrdhni vinyaset ।।
adhaś cordhvaṃ ca hṛdaye pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhato agrataḥ ।
dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ paścād ārabhet kavacaṃ budhaḥ ।।
pūrve māṃ pātu govindo dakṣiṇe madhusūdanaḥ ।
paścime śrīdharo devaḥ keśavas tu tathottare ।।
pātu viṣṇus tathāgneye nairṛte mādhavo avyayaḥ ।
vāyavye tu hṛṣīkeśas tatheśāne ca vāmanaḥ ।।
bhūtale pātu vārāhas tathordhvaṃ ca trivikramaḥ ।
kṛtvaivaṃ kavacaṃ paścād ātmānaṃ cintayet tataḥ ।।
ahaṃ nārāyaṇo devaḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।
evaṃ dhyātvā tadātmānam imaṃ mantram udīrayet ।।
tvam agnir dvipadāṃ nātha retodhāḥ kāmadīpanaḥ ।
pradhānaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jīvānāṃ prabhur avyayaḥ ।।
amṛtasyāraṇis tvaṃ hi devayonir apāṃ pate ।
vṛjinaṃ hara me sarvaṃ tīrtharāja namo astu te ।।
evam uccārya vidhivat tataḥ snānaṃ samācaret ।
anyathā bho dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ snānaṃ tatra na śasyate ।।
kṛtvā tu vaidikair mantrair abhiṣekaṃ ca mārjanam ।
antar jale japet paścāt trir āvṛttyāghamarṣaṇam ।।
hayamedho yathā viprāḥ sarvapāpaharaḥ kratuḥ ।
tathāghamarṣaṇaṃ cātra sūktaṃ sarvāghanāśanam ।।
uttīrya vāsasī dhaute nirmale paridhāya vai ।
prāṇān āyamya cācamya saṃdhyāṃ copāsya bhāskaram ।।
upatiṣṭhet tataś cordhvaṃ kṣiptvā puṣpajalāñjalim ।
upasthāyordhvabāhuś ca talliṅgair bhāskaraṃ tataḥ ।।
gāyatrīṃ pāvanīṃ devīṃ japed aṣṭottaraṃ śatam ।
anyāṃś ca sauramantrāṃś ca japtvā tiṣṭhan samāhitaḥ ।।
kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaṃ sūryaṃ namaskṛtyopaviśya ca ।
svādhyāyaṃ prāṅmukhaḥ kṛtvā tarpayed daivatāny ṛṣīn ।।
manuṣyāṃś ca pitṝṃś cānyān nāmagotreṇa mantravit ।
toyena tilamiśreṇa vidhivat susamāhitaḥ ।।
tarpaṇaṃ devatānāṃ ca pūrvaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ ।
adhikārī bhavet paścāt pitṝṇāṃ tarpaṇe dvijaḥ ।।
śrāddhe havanakāle ca pāṇinaikena nirvapet ।
tarpaṇe tūbhayaṃ kuryād eṣa eva vidhiḥ sadā ।।
anvārabdhena savyena pāṇinā dakṣiṇena tu ।
tṛpyatām iti siñcet tu nāmagotreṇa vāgyataḥ ।।
kāyasthair yas tilair mohāt karoti pitṛtarpaṇam ।
tarpitās tena pitaras tvaṅmāṃsarudhirāsthibhiḥ ।।
aṅgasthair na tilaiḥ kuryād devatāpitṛtarpaṇam ।
rudhiraṃ tad bhavet toyaṃ pradātā kilbiṣī bhavet ।।
bhūmyāṃ yad dīyate toyaṃ dātā caiva jale sthitaḥ ।
vṛthā tan muniśārdūlā nopatiṣṭhati kasyacit ।।
sthale sthitvā jale yas tu prayacched udakaṃ naraḥ ।
pitṝṇāṃ nopatiṣṭheta salilaṃ tan nirarthakam ।।
udake nodakaṃ kuryāt pitṛbhyaś ca kadācana ।
uttīrya tu śucau deśe kuryād udakatarpaṇam ।।
nodakeṣu na pātreṣu na kruddho naikapāṇinā ।
nopatiṣṭhati tat toyaṃ yad bhūmyāṃ na pradīyate ।।
pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ sthānaṃ mahī dattā mayā dvijāḥ ।
tasmāt tatraiva dātavyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ prītim icchatā ।।
bhūmipṛṣṭhe samutpannā bhūmyāṃ caiva ca saṃsthitāḥ ।
bhūmyāṃ caiva layaṃ yātā bhūmau dadyāt tato jalam ।।
āstīrya ca kuśān sāgrāṃs tān āvāhya svamantrataḥ ।
prācīnāgreṣu vai devān yāmyāgreṣu tathā pitṝn ।।
{brahmovāca 
devān pitṝṃs tathā cānyān saṃtarpyācamya vāgyataḥ ।
hastamātraṃ catuṣkoṇaṃ caturdvāraṃ suśobhanam ।।
puraṃ vilikhya bho viprās tīre tasya mahodadheḥ ।
madhye tatra likhet padmam aṣṭapattraṃ sakarṇikam ।।
evaṃ maṇḍalam ālikhya pūjayet tatra bho dvijāḥ ।
aṣṭākṣaravidhānena nārāyaṇam ajaṃ vibhum ।।
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kāyaśodhanam uttamam ।
akāraṃ hṛdaye dhyātvā cakrarekhāsamanvitam ।।
jvalantaṃ triśikhaṃ caiva dahantaṃ pāpanāśanam ।
candramaṇḍalamadhyasthaṃ rākāraṃ mūrdhni cintayet ।।
śuklavarṇaṃ pravarṣantam amṛtaṃ plāvayan mahīm ।
evaṃ nirdhūtapāpas tu divyadehas tato bhavet ।।
aṣṭākṣaraṃ tato mantraṃ nyased evātmano budhaḥ ।
vāmapādaṃ samārabhya kramaśaś caiva vinyaset ।।
pañcāṅgaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva caturvyūhaṃ tathaiva ca ।
karaśuddhiṃ prakurvīta mūlamantreṇa sādhakaḥ ।।
ekaikaṃ caiva varṇaṃ tu aṅgulīṣu pṛthak pṛthak ।
oṃkāraṃ pṛthivīṃ śuklāṃ vāmapāde tu vinyaset ।।
nakāraḥ śāṃbhavaḥ śyāmo dakṣiṇe tu vyavasthitaḥ ।
mokāraṃ kālam evāhur vāmakaṭyāṃ nidhāpayet ।।
nākāraḥ sarvabījaṃ tu dakṣiṇasyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ ।
rākāras teja ity āhur nābhideśe vyavasthitaḥ ।।
vāyavyo ayaṃ yakāras tu vāmaskandhe samāśritaḥ ।
ṇākāraḥ sarvago jñeyo dakṣiṇāṃse vyavasthitaḥ ।
yakāro ayaṃ śirasthaś ca yatra lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ ।।
oṃ viṣṇave namaḥ śiraḥ oṃ jvalanāya namaḥ śikhā ।
