oṃ viṣṇave namaḥ kavacam oṃ viṣṇave namaḥ sphuraṇaṃ diśobandhāya ।
oṃ huṃphaḍastram oṃ śirasi śuklo vāsudeva iti ।
oṃ āṃ lalāṭe raktaḥ saṃkarṣaṇo garutmān vahnis teja āditya iti ।
oṃ āṃ grīvāyāṃ pītaḥ pradyumno vāyumegha iti ।
oṃ āṃ hṛdaye kṛṣṇo aniruddhaḥ sarvaśaktisamanvita iti ।
evaṃ caturvyūham ātmānaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ karma samācaret ।।
mamāgre avasthito viṣṇuḥ pṛṣṭhataś cāpi keśavaḥ ।
govindo dakṣiṇe pārśve vāme tu madhusūdanaḥ ।।
upariṣṭāt tu vaikuṇṭho vārāhaḥ pṛthivītale ।
avāntaradiśo yās tu tāsu sarvāsu mādhavaḥ ।।
gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi jāgrataḥ svapato api vā ।
narasiṃhakṛtā guptir vāsudevamayo hy aham ।।
evaṃ viṣṇumayo bhūtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet ।
yathā dehe tathā deve sarvatattvāni yojayet ।।
tataś caiva prakurvīta prokṣaṇaṃ praṇavena tu ।
phaṭkārāntaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ sarvavighnaharaṃ śubham ।।
tatrārkacandravahnīnāṃ maṇḍalāni vicintayet ।
padmamadhye nyased viṣṇuṃ pavanasyāmbarasya ca ।।
tato vicintya hṛdaya oṃkāraṃ jyotīrūpiṇam ।
karṇikāyāṃ samāsīnaṃ jyotīrūpaṃ sanātanam ।।
aṣṭākṣaraṃ tato mantraṃ vinyasec ca yathākramam ।
tena vyastasamastena pūjanaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam ।।
dvādaśākṣaramantreṇa yajed devaṃ sanātanam ।
tato avadhārya hṛdaye karṇikāyāṃ bahir nyaset ।।
caturbhujaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sūryakoṭisamaprabham ।
cintayitvā mahāyogaṃ jyotīrūpaṃ sanātanam ।
tataś cāvāhayen mantraṃ krameṇācintya mānase ।।
āvāhanamantraḥ mīnarūpo varāhaś ca narasiṃho atha vāmanaḥ ।
āyātu devo varado mama nārāyaṇo agrataḥ ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
sthāpanamantraḥ
karṇikāyāṃ supīṭhe atra padmakalpitam āsanam ।
sarvasattvahitārthāya tiṣṭha tvaṃ madhusūdana ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
arghamantraḥ oṃ trailokyapatīnāṃ pataye devadevāya hṛṣīkeśāya viṣṇave namaḥ ।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
pādyamantraḥ
oṃ pādyaṃ pādayor deva padmanābha sanātana ।
viṣṇo kamalapattrākṣa gṛhāṇa madhusūdana ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
madhuparkamantraḥ
madhuparkaṃ mahādeva brahmādyaiḥ kalpitaṃ tava ।
mayā niveditaṃ bhaktyā gṛhāṇa puruṣottama ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
{ācamanīyamantraḥ 
mandākinyāḥ sitaṃ vāri sarvapāpaharaṃ śivam ।
gṛhāṇācamanīyaṃ tvaṃ mayā bhaktyā niveditam ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
{snānamantraḥ 
tvam āpaḥ pṛthivī caiva jyotis tvaṃ vāyur eva ca ।
lokeśa vṛttimātreṇa vāriṇā snāpayāmy aham ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
{vastramantraḥ 
devatattvasamāyukta yajñavarṇasamanvita ।
svarṇavarṇaprabhe deva vāsasī tava keśava ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
{vilepanamantraḥ 
śarīraṃ te na jānāmi ceṣṭāṃ caiva ca keśava ।
mayā nivedito gandhaḥ pratigṛhya vilipyatām ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
{upavītamantraḥ 
ṛgyajuḥsāmamantreṇa trivṛtaṃ padmayoninā ।
sāvitrīgranthisaṃyuktam upavītaṃ tavārpaye ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
{alaṃkāramantraḥ 
divyaratnasamāyukta vahnibhānusamaprabha ।
gātrāṇi tava śobhantu sālaṃkārāṇi mādhava ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
oṃ nama iti pratyakṣaraṃ samastena mūlamantreṇa vā pūjayet ।।
{dhūpamantraḥ 
vanaspatiraso divyo gandhāḍhyaḥ surabhiś ca te ।
mayā nivedito bhaktyā dhūpo ayaṃ pratigṛhyatām ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
{dīpamantraḥ 
sūryacandrasamo jyotir vidyudagnyos tathaiva ca ।
tvam eva jyotiṣāṃ deva dīpo ayaṃ pratigṛhyatām ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
{naivedyamantraḥ 
annaṃ caturvidhaṃ caiva rasaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samanvitam ।
mayā niveditaṃ bhaktyā naivedyaṃ tava keśava ।।
oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ ।।
pūrve dale vāsudevaṃ yāmye saṃkarṣaṇaṃ nyaset ।
pradyumnaṃ paścime kuryād aniruddhaṃ tathottare ।।
vārāhaṃ ca tathāgneye narasiṃhaṃ ca nairṛte ।
vāyavye mādhavaṃ caiva tathaiśāne trivikramam ।।
tathāṣṭākṣaradevasya garuḍaṃ purato nyaset ।
vāmapārśve tathā cakraṃ śaṅkhaṃ dakṣiṇato nyaset ।।
tathā mahāgadāṃ caiva nyased devasya dakṣiṇe ।
tataḥ śārṅgaṃ dhanur vidvān nyased devasya vāmataḥ ।।
dakṣiṇeneṣudhī divye khaḍgaṃ vāme ca vinyaset ।
śriyaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ sthāpya puṣṭim uttarato nyaset ।।
vanamālāṃ ca puratas tataḥ śrīvatsakaustubhau ।
vinyased dhṛdayādīni pūrvādiṣu caturdiśam ।।
tato astraṃ devadevasya koṇe caiva tu vinyaset ।
indram agniṃ yamaṃ caiva nairṛtaṃ varuṇaṃ tathā ।।
vāyuṃ dhanadam īśānam anantaṃ brahmaṇā saha ।
pūjayet tāntrikair mantrair adhaś cordhvaṃ tathaiva ca ।।
evaṃ saṃpūjya deveśaṃ maṇḍalasthaṃ janārdanam ।
labhed abhimatān kāmān naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।।
anenaiva vidhānena maṇḍalasthaṃ janārdanam ।
pūjitaṃ yaḥ saṃpaśyeta sa viśed viṣṇum avyayam ।।
sakṛd apy arcito yena vidhinānena keśavaḥ ।
janmamṛtyujarāṃ tīrtvā sa viṣṇoḥ padam āpnuyāt ।।
yaḥ smaret satataṃ bhaktyā nārāyaṇam atandritaḥ ।
anvahaṃ tasya vāsāya śvetadvīpaḥ prakalpitaḥ ।।
oṃkārādisamāyuktaṃ namaḥkārāntadīpitam ।
tannāma sarvatattvānāṃ mantra ity abhidhīyate ।।
anenaiva vidhānena gandhapuṣpaṃ nivedayet ।
ekaikasya prakurvīta yathoddiṣṭaṃ krameṇa tu ।।
mudrās tato nibadhnīyād yathoktakramacoditāḥ ।
japaṃ caiva prakurvīta mūlamantreṇa mantravit ।।
aṣṭāviṃśatim aṣṭau vā śatam aṣṭottaraṃ tathā ।
kāmeṣu ca yathāproktaṃ yathāśakti samāhitaḥ ।।
padmaṃ śaṅkhaś ca śrīvatso gadā garuḍa eva ca ।
cakraṃ khaḍgaś ca śārṅgaṃ ca aṣṭau mudrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।।
{visarjanamantraḥ 
gaccha gaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ purāṇapuruṣottama ।
yatra brahmādayo devā vindanti paramaṃ padam ।।
arcanaṃ ye na jānanti harer mantrair yathoditam ।
te tatra mūlamantreṇa pūjayantv acyutaṃ sadā ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā taṃ puruṣottamam ।
praṇamya śirasā paścāt sāgaraṃ ca prasādayet ।।
prāṇas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yoniś ca saritāṃ pate ।
tīrtharāja namas te astu trāhi mām acyutapriya ।।
snātvaivaṃ sāgare samyak tasmin kṣetravare dvijāḥ ।
tīre cābhyarcya vidhivan nārāyaṇam anāmayam ।।
rāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca praṇipatya ca sāgaram ।
śatānām aśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ ।।
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ sarvaduḥkhavivarjitaḥ ।
vṛndāraka iva śrīmān rūpayauvanagarvitaḥ ।।
vimānenārkavarṇena divyagandharvanādinā ।
kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān krīḍitvā cāpsaraiḥ saha ।
manvantaraśataṃ sāgraṃ jarāmṛtyuvivarjitaḥ ।।
puṇyakṣayād ihāyātaḥ kule sarvaguṇānvite ।
rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān satyavādī jitendriyaḥ ।।
vedaśāstrārthavid vipro bhaved yajvā tu vaiṣṇavaḥ ।
yogaṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ prāpya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
grahoparāge saṃkrāntyām ayane viṣuve tathā ।
yugādiṣu ṣaḍaśītyāṃ vyatīpāte dinakṣaye ।।
āṣāḍhyāṃ caiva kārttikyāṃ māghyāṃ vānye śubhe tithau ।
ye tatra dānaṃ viprebhyaḥ prayacchanti sumedhasaḥ ।।
phalaṃ sahasraguṇitam anyatīrthāl labhanti te ।
pitṝṇāṃ ye prayacchanti piṇḍaṃ tatra vidhānataḥ ।।
akṣayāṃ pitaras teṣāṃ tṛptiṃ saṃprāpnuvanti vai ।
evaṃ snānaphalaṃ samyak sāgarasya mayoditam ।।
dānasya ca phalaṃ viprāḥ piṇḍadānasya caiva hi ।
dharmārthamokṣaphaladam āyuṣkīrtiyaśaskaram ।।
bhuktimuktiphalaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanyaṃ duḥsvapnanāśanam ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
nāstikāya na vaktavyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।
tāvad garjanti tīrthāni māhātmyaiḥ svaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak ।।
yāvan na tīrtharājasya māhātmyaṃ varṇyate dvijāḥ ।
puṣkarādīni tīrthāni prayacchanti svakaṃ phalam ।।
tīrtharājas tu sa punaḥ sarvatīrthaphalapradaḥ ।
bhūtale yāni tīrthāni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca ।।
viśanti sāgare tāni tenāsau śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ ।
rājā samastatīrthānāṃ sāgaraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ ।।
tasmāt samastatīrthebhyaḥ śreṣṭho asau sarvakāmadaḥ ।
tamo nāśaṃ yathābhyeti bhāskare abhyudite dvijāḥ ।।
snānena tīrtharājasya tathā pāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ ।
tīrtharājasamaṃ tīrthaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ।।
adhiṣṭhānaṃ yadā yatra prabhor nārāyaṇasya vai ।
kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ tīrtharājasya bho dvijāḥ ।।
koṭyo navanavatyas tu yatra tīrthāni santi vai ।
tasmāt snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca homaṃ japyaṃ surārcanam ।
yat kiṃcit kriyate tatra cākṣayaṃ kriyate dvijāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato gacched dvijaśreṣṭhās tīrthaṃ yajñāṅgasaṃbhavam ।
indradyumnasaro nāma yatrāste pāvanaṃ śubham ।।
gatvā tatra śucir dhīmān ācamya manasā harim ।
dhyātvopasthāya ca jalam imaṃ mantram udīrayet ।।
aśvamedhāṅgasaṃbhūta tīrtha sarvāghanāśana ।
snānaṃ tvayi karomy adya pāpaṃ hara namo astu te ।।
evam uccārya vidhivat snātvā devān ṛṣīn pitṝn ।
tilodakena cānyāṃś ca saṃtarpyācamya vāgyataḥ ।।
dattvā pitṝṇāṃ piṇḍāṃś ca saṃpūjya puruṣottamam ।
daśāśvamedhikaṃ samyak phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ ।।
saptāvarān sapta parān vaṃśān uddhṛtya devavat ।
kāmagena vimānena viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
bhuktvā tatra sukhān bhogān yāvac candrārkatārakam ।
cyutas tasmād ihāyāto mokṣaṃ ca labhate dhruvam ।।
evaṃ kṛtvā pañcatīrthīm ekādaśyām upoṣitaḥ ।
jyeṣṭhaśuklapañcadaśyāṃ yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam ।।
sa pūrvoktaṃ phalaṃ prāpya krīḍitvā vācyutālaye ।
prayāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
māsān anyān parityajya māghādīn prapitāmaha ।
praśaṃsasi kathaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ brūhi tatkāraṇaṃ prabho ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ pravakṣyāmi samāsataḥ ।
jyeṣṭhaṃ māsaṃ yathā tebhyaḥ praśaṃsāmi punaḥ punaḥ ।।
pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca ।
puṣkariṇyas taḍāgāni vāpyaḥ kūpās tathā hradāḥ ।।
nānānadyaḥ samudrāś ca saptāhaṃ puruṣottame ।
jyeṣṭhaśukladaśamyādi pratyakṣaṃ yānti sarvadā ।।
snānadānādikaṃ tasmād devatāprekṣaṇaṃ dvijāḥ ।
yat kiṃcit kriyate tatra tasmin kāle akṣayaṃ bhavet ।।
śuklapakṣasya daśamī jyeṣṭhe māsi dvijottamāḥ ।
harate daśa pāpāni tasmād daśaharā smṛtā ।।
yas tasyāṃ halinaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paśyed bhadrāṃ susaṃyataḥ ।
sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇulokaṃ vrajen naraḥ ।।
uttare dakṣiṇe viprās tv ayane puruṣottamam ।
dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ subhadrāṃ ca viṣṇulokaṃ vrajen naraḥ ।।
naro dolāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā govindaṃ puruṣottamam ।
phālgunyāṃ prayato bhūtvā govindasya puraṃ vrajet ।।
viṣuvaddivase prāpte pañcatīrthīṃ vidhānataḥ ।
kṛtvā saṃkarṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadrāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
naraḥ samastayajñānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti durlabham ।
vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo viṣṇulokaṃ ca gacchati ।।
yaḥ paśyati tṛtīyāyāṃ kṛṣṇaṃ candanarūṣitam ।
vaiśākhasyāsite pakṣe sa yāty acyutamandiram ।।
jyaiṣṭhyāṃ jyeṣṭharkṣayuktāyāṃ yaḥ paśyet puruṣottamam ।
kulaikaviṃśam uddhṛtya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
{brahmovāca 
yadā bhaven mahājyaiṣṭhī rāśinakṣatrayogataḥ ।
prayatnena tadā martyair gantavyaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahājyaiṣṭhyāṃ rāmaṃ bhadrāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।
naro dvādaśayātrāyāḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam ।।
prayāge ca kurukṣetre naimiṣe puṣkare gaye ।
gaṅgādvāre kuśāvarte gaṅgāsāgarasaṃgame ।।
kokāmukhe śūkare ca mathurāyāṃ marusthale ।
śālagrāme vāyutīrthe mandare sindhusāgare ।।
piṇḍārake citrakūṭe prabhāse kanakhale dvijāḥ ।
śaṅkhoddhāre dvārakāyāṃ tathā badarikāśrame ।।
lohakuṇḍe cāśvatīrthe sarvapāpapramocane ।
kāmālaye koṭitīrthe tathā cāmarakaṇṭake ।।
lohārgale jambumārge somatīrthe pṛthūdake ।
utpalāvartake caiva pṛthutuṅge sukubjake ।।
ekāmrake ca kedāre kāśyāṃ ca viraje dvijāḥ ।
kālañjare ca gokarṇe śrīśaile gandhamādane ।।
mahendre malaye vindhye pāriyātre himālaye ।
sahye ca śuktimante ca gomante cārbude tathā ।।
gaṅgāyāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu yāmuneṣu ca bho dvijāḥ ।
sārasvateṣu gomatyāṃ brahmaputreṣu saptasu ।।
godāvarī bhīmarathī tuṅgabhadrā ca narmadā ।
tāpī payouṣṇī kāverī śiprā carmaṇvatī dvijāḥ ।।
vitastā candrabhāgā ca śatadrur bāhudā tathā ।
ṛṣikulyā kumārī ca vipāśā ca dṛṣadvatī ।।
śarayūr nākagaṅgā ca gaṇḍakī ca mahānadī ।
kauśikī karatoyā ca trisrotā madhuvāhinī ।।
mahānadī vaitaraṇī yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ ।
athavā kiṃ bahūktena bhāṣitena dvijottamāḥ ।।
pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu sarveṣv āyataneṣu ca ।
sāgareṣu ca śaileṣu nadīṣu ca saraḥsu ca ।।
yat phalaṃ snānadānena rāhugraste divākare ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mahājyaiṣṭhyāṃ labhen naraḥ ।।
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena gantavyaṃ puruṣottame ।
mahājyaiṣṭhyāṃ muniśreṣṭhā sarvakāmaphalepsubhiḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ mahājyeṣṭhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ subhadrayā saha ।
viṣṇulokaṃ naro yāti samuddhṛtya samaṃ kulam ।।
bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।
puṇyakṣayād ihāgatya caturvedī dvijo bhavet ।।
svadharmanirataḥ śāntaḥ kṛṣṇabhakto jitendriyaḥ ।
vaiṣṇavaṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kasmin kāle bhavet snānaṃ kṛṣṇasya kamalodbhava ।
vidhinā kena tad brūhi tato vidhividāṃ vara ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ snānaṃ kṛṣṇasya vadato mama ।
rāmasya ca subhadrāyāḥ puṇyaṃ sarvāghanāśanam ।।
māsi jyeṣṭhe ca saṃprāpte nakṣatre candradaivate ।
paurṇamāsyāṃ tadā snānaṃ sarvakālaṃ harer dvijāḥ ।।
sarvatīrthamayaḥ kūpas tatrāste nirmalaḥ śuciḥ ।
tadā bhogavatī tatra pratyakṣā bhavati dvijāḥ ।।
tasmāj jyaiṣṭhyāṃ samuddhṛtya haimāḍhyaiḥ kalaśair jalam ।
kṛṣṇarāmābhiṣekārthaṃ subhadrāyāś ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
kṛtvā suśobhanaṃ mañcaṃ patākābhir alaṃkṛtam ।
sudṛḍhaṃ sukhasaṃcāraṃ vastraiḥ puṣpair alaṃkṛtam ।।
vistīrṇaṃ dhūpitaṃ dhūpaiḥ snānārthaṃ rāmakṛṣṇayoḥ ।
sitavastraparicchannaṃ muktāhārāvalambitam ।।
tatra nānāvidhair vādyaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nīlāmbaraṃ dvijāḥ ।
madhye subhadrāṃ cāsthāpya jayamaṅgalanisvanaiḥ ।।
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ śūdraiś cānyaiś ca jātibhiḥ ।
anekaśatasāhasrair vṛtaṃ strīpuruṣair dvijāḥ ।।
gṛhasthāḥ snātakāś caiva yatayo brahmacāriṇaḥ ।
snāpayanti tadā kṛṣṇaṃ mañcasthaṃ sahalāyudham ।।
tathā samastatīrthāni pūrvoktāni dvijottamāḥ ।
svodakaiḥ puṣpamiśraiś ca snāpayanti pṛthak pṛthak ।।
paścāt paṭahaśaṅkhādyair bherīmurajanisvanaiḥ ।
kāhalais tālaśabdaiś ca mṛdaṅgair jharjharais tathā ।।
anyaiś ca vividhair vādyair ghaṇṭāsvanavibhūṣitaiḥ ।
strīṇāṃ maṅgalaśabdaiś ca stutiśabdair manoharaiḥ ।।
jayaśabdais tathā stotrair vīṇāveṇunināditaiḥ ।
śrūyate sumahāñ śabdaḥ sāgarasyeva garjataḥ ।।
munīnāṃ vedaśabdena mantraśabdais tathāparaiḥ ।
nānāstotraravaiḥ puṇyaiḥ sāmaśabdopabṛṃhitaiḥ ।।
yatibhiḥ snātakaiś caiva gṛhasthair brahmacāribhiḥ ।
snānakāle suraśreṣṭha stuvanti parayā mudā ।।
śyāmair veśyājanaiś caiva kucabhārāvanāmibhiḥ ।
pītaraktāmbarābhiś ca mālyadāmāvanāmibhiḥ ।।
saratnakuṇḍalair divyaiḥ suvarṇastabakānvitaiḥ ।
cāmarai ratnadaṇḍaiś ca vījyete rāmakeśavau ।।
yakṣavidyādharaiḥ siddhaiḥ kiṃnaraiś cāpsarogaṇaiḥ ।
parivāryāmbaragatair devagandharvacāraṇaiḥ ।।
ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve marudgaṇāḥ ।
lokapālās tathā cānye stuvanti puruṣottamam ।।
namas te devadeveśa purāṇa puruṣottama ।
sargasthityantakṛd deva lokanātha jagatpate ।।
trailokyadhāriṇaṃ devaṃ brahmaṇyaṃ mokṣakāraṇam ।
taṃ namasyāmahe bhaktyā sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
stutvaivaṃ vibudhāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ caiva mahābalam ।
subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhās tadākāśe vyavasthitāḥ ।।
gāyanti devagandharvā nṛtyanty apsarasas tathā ।
devatūryāṇy avādyanta vātā vānti suśītalāḥ ।।
puṣpamiśraṃ tadā meghā varṣanty ākāśagocarāḥ ।
jayaśabdaṃ ca kurvanti munayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ ।।
śakrādyā vibudhāḥ sarva ṛṣayaḥ pitaras tathā ।
prajānāṃ patayo nāgā ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ ।।
tato maṅgalasaṃbhārair vidhimantrapuraskṛtam ।
ābhiṣecanikaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhītvā devatāgaṇāḥ ।।
indro viṣṇur mahāvīryaḥ sūryācandramasau tathā ।
dhātā caiva vidhātā ca tathā caivānilānalau ।।
pūṣā bhago aryamā tvaṣṭā aṃśunaiva vivasvatā ।
patnībhyāṃ sahito dhīmān mitreṇa varuṇena ca ।।
rudrair vasubhir ādityair aśvibhyāṃ ca vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ ।
viśvair devair marudbhiś ca sādhyaiś ca pitṛbhiḥ saha ।।
gandharvair apsarobhiś ca yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ ।
devarṣibhir asaṃkhyeyais tathā brahmarṣibhir varaiḥ ।।
vaikhānasair vālakhilyair vāyvāhārair marīcipaiḥ ।
bhṛgubhiś cāṅgirobhiś ca sarvavidyāsuniṣṭhitaiḥ ।।
sarvavidyādharaiḥ puṇyair yogasiddhibhir āvṛtaḥ ।
pitāmahaḥ pulastyaś ca pulahaś ca mahātapāḥ ।।
aṅgirāḥ kaśyapo atriś ca marīcir bhṛgur eva ca ।
kratur haraḥ pracetāś ca manur dakṣas tathaiva ca ।।
ṛtavaś ca grahāś caiva jyotīṃṣi ca dvijottamāḥ ।
mūrtimatyaś ca sarito devāś caiva sanātanāḥ ।।
samudrāś ca hradāś caiva tīrthāni vividhāni ca ।
pṛthivī dyaur diśaś caiva pādapāś ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
aditir devamātā ca hrīḥ śrīḥ svāhā sarasvatī ।
umā śacī sinīvālī tathā cānumatiḥ kuhūḥ ।।
rākā ca dhiṣaṇā caiva patnyaś cānyā divaukasām ।
himavāṃś caiva vindhyaś ca meruś cānekaśṛṅgavān ।।
airāvataḥ sānucaraḥ kalākāṣṭhās tathaiva ca ।
māsārdhaṃ māsa-ṛtavas tathā rātryahanī samāḥ ।।
uccaiḥśravā hayaśreṣṭho nāgarājaś ca vāmanaḥ ।
aruṇo garuḍaś caiva vṛkṣāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha ।।
dharmaś ca bhagavān devaḥ samājagmur hi saṃgatāḥ ।
kālo yamaś ca mṛtyuś ca yamasyānucarāś ca ye ।।
bahulatvāc ca noktā ye vividhā devatāgaṇāḥ ।
te devasyābhiṣekārthaṃ samāyānti tatas tataḥ ।।
gṛhītvā te tadā viprāḥ sarve devā divaukasaḥ ।
ābhiṣecanikaṃ dravyaṃ maṅgalāni ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
divyasaṃbhārasaṃyuktaiḥ kalaśaiḥ kāñcanair dvijāḥ ।
sārasvatībhiḥ puṇyābhir divyatoyābhir eva ca ।।
toyenākāśagaṅgāyāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rāmeṇa saṃgatam ।
sapuṣpaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ kumbhaiḥ snāpayanty avanisthitāḥ ।।
saṃcaranti vimānāni devānām ambare tathā ।
uccāvacāni divyāni kāmagāni sthirāṇi ca ।।
divyaratnavicitrāṇi sevitāny apsarogaṇaiḥ ।
gītair vādyaiḥ patākābhiḥ śobhitāni samantataḥ ।।
evaṃ tadā muniśreṣṭhāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rāmeṇa saṃgatam ।
snāpayitvā subhadrāṃ ca saṃstuvanti mudānvitāḥ ।।
jaya jaya lokapāla bhaktarakṣaka jaya jaya praṇatavatsala jaya jaya bhūtacaraṇa jaya jayādideva bahukāraṇa jaya jaya vāsudeva jaya jayāsurasaṃharaṇa jaya jaya divyamīna jaya jaya tridaśavara jaya jaya jaladhiśayana ।
jaya jaya yogivara jaya jaya sūryanetra jaya jaya devarāja jaya jaya kaiṭabhāre jaya jaya vedavara jaya jaya kūrmarūpa jaya jaya yajñavara jaya jaya kamalanābha jaya jaya śailacara ।
jaya jaya yogaśāyiñ jaya jaya vegadhara jaya jaya viśvamūrte jaya jaya cakradhara jaya jaya bhūtanātha jaya jaya dharaṇīdhara jaya jaya śeṣaśāyiñ jaya jaya pītavāso jaya jaya somakānta ।
jaya jaya yogavāsa jaya jaya dahanavaktra jaya jaya dharmavāsa jaya jaya guṇanidhāna jaya jaya śrīnivāsa jaya jaya garuḍagamana jaya jaya sukhanivāsa jaya jaya dharmaketo jaya jaya mahīnivāsa ।
jaya jaya gahanacaritra jaya jaya yogigamya jaya jaya makhanivāsa jaya jaya vedavedya jaya śāntikara jaya jaya yogicintya jaya jaya puṣṭikara jaya jaya jñānamūrte jaya jaya kamalākara ।
jaya jaya bhāvavedya jaya jaya muktikara jaya jaya vimaladeha jaya jaya sattvanilaya jaya jaya guṇasamṛddha jaya jaya yajñakara jaya jaya guṇavihīna jaya jaya mokṣakara jaya jaya bhūśaraṇya ।
jaya jaya kāntiyuta jaya jaya lokaśaraṇa jaya jaya lakṣmīyuta jaya jaya paṅkajākṣa jaya jaya sṛṣṭikara jaya jaya yogayuta jaya jayātasīkusumaśyāmadeha jaya jaya samudrāviṣṭadeha jaya jaya lakṣmīpaṅkajaṣaṭcaraṇa ।
jaya jaya bhaktavaśa jaya jaya lokakānta jaya jaya paramaśānta jaya jaya paramasāra jaya jaya cakradhara jaya jaya bhogiyuta jaya jaya nīlāmbara jaya jaya śāntikara jaya jaya mokṣakara jaya jaya kaluṣahara ।
jaya kṛṣṇa jagannātha jaya saṃkarṣaṇānuja ।
jaya padmapalāśākṣa jaya vāñchāphalaprada ।।
jaya mālāvṛtoraska jaya cakragadādhara ।
jaya padmālayākānta jaya viṣṇo namo astu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ stutvā tadā devāḥ śakrādyā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ ।
siddhacāraṇasaṃghāś ca ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ ।।
munayo vālakhilyāś ca kṛṣṇaṃ rāmeṇa saṃgatam ।
subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ praṇipatyāmbare sthitāḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā stutvā namaskṛtvā tadā te tridivaukasaḥ ।
kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ subhadrāṃ ca yānti svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam ।।
saṃcaranti vimānāni devānām ambare tadā ।
uccāvacāni divyāni kāmagāni sthirāṇi ca ।।
divyaratnavicitrāṇi sevitāny apsarogaṇaiḥ ।
gītair vādyaiḥ patākābhiḥ śobhitāni samantataḥ ।।
tasmin kāle tu ye martyāḥ paśyanti puruṣottamam ।
balabhadraṃ subhadrāṃ ca te yānti padam avyayam ।।
subhadrārāmasahitaṃ mañcasthaṃ puruṣottamam ।
dṛṣṭvā nirāmayaṃ sthānaṃ yānti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।।
kapilāśatadānena yat phalaṃ puṣkare smṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ sahalāyudham ।
subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ prāpnoti śubhakṛn naraḥ ।।
kanyāśatapradānena yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
suvarṇaśataniṣkāṇāṃ dānena yat phalaṃ smṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
gosahasrapradānena yat phalaṃ parikīrtitam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
bhūmidānena vidhivad yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
yat phalaṃ cānnadānena arghātithyena kīrtitam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
vṛṣotsargeṇa vidhivad yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
yat phalaṃ toyadānena grīṣme vānyatra kīrtitam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
tiladhenupradānena yat phalaṃ saṃprakīrtitam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
gajāśvarathadānena yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
suvarṇaśṛṅgīdānena yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
jaladhenupradānena yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
dānena ghṛtadhenvāś ca phalaṃ yat samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
cāndrāyaṇena cīrṇena yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
māsopavāsair vidhivad yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
atha kiṃ bahunoktena bhāṣitena punaḥ punaḥ ।
tasya devasya māhātmyaṃ mañcasthasya dvijottamāḥ ।।
yat phalaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu vratair dānaiś ca kīrtitam ।
tat phalaṃ kṛṣṇam ālokya mañcasthaṃ sahalāyudham ।।
subhadrāṃ ca muniśreṣṭhāḥ prāpnoti śubhakṛn naraḥ ।
tasmān naro athavā nārī paśyet taṃ puruṣottamam ।।
tataḥ samastatīrthānāṃ labhet snānādikaṃ phalam ।
snānaśeṣeṇa kṛṣṇasya toyenātmābhiṣicyate ।।
vandhyā mṛtaprajā yā tu durbhagā grahapīḍitā ।
rākṣasādyair gṛhītā vā tathā rogaiś ca saṃhatāḥ ।।
sadyas tāḥ snānaśeṣeṇa udakenābhiṣecitāḥ ।
prāpnuvantīpsitān kāmān yān yān vāñchanti cepsitān ।।
putrārthinī labhet putrān saubhāgyaṃ ca sukhārthinī ।
rogārtā mucyate rogād dhanaṃ ca dhanakāṅkṣiṇī ।।
puṇyāni yāni toyāni tiṣṭhanti dharaṇītale ।
tāni snānāvaśeṣasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm ।।
tasmāt snānāvaśeṣaṃ yat kṛṣṇasya salilaṃ dvijāḥ ।
tenābhiṣiñced gātrāṇi sarvakāmapradaṃ hi tat ।।
snātaṃ paśyanti ye kṛṣṇaṃ vrajantaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।
brahmahatyādibhiḥ pāpair mucyante te na saṃśayaḥ ।।
śāstreṣu yat phalaṃ proktaṃ pṛthiv-yas tripradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ vrajantaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
tīrthayātrāphalaṃ yat tu pṛthivyāṃ samudāhṛtam ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
badaryāṃ yat phalaṃ proktaṃ dṛṣṭvā nārāyaṇaṃ naram ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
gaṅgādvāre kurukṣetre snānadānena yat phalam ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
prayāge ca mahāmāghyāṃ yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtam ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
śālagrāme mahācaitryāṃ snānadānena yat phalam ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
mahābhidhānakārttikyāṃ puṣkare yat phalaṃ smṛtam ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
yat phalaṃ snānadānena gaṅgāsāgarasaṃgame ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
graste sūrye kurukṣetre snānadānena yat phalam ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
gaṅgāyāṃ sarvatīrtheṣu yāmuneṣu ca bho dvijāḥ ।
sārasvateṣu tīrtheṣu tathānyeṣu saraḥsu ca ।।
yat phalaṃ snānadānena vidhivat samudāhṛtam ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
puṣkare cātha tīrtheṣu gaye cāmarakaṇṭake ।
naimiṣādiṣu tīrtheṣu kṣetreṣv āyataneṣu ca ।।
yat phalaṃ snānadānena rāhugraste divākare ।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
atha kiṃ punar uktena bhāṣitena punaḥ punaḥ ।
yat kiṃcit kathitaṃ cātra phalaṃ puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ ।।
vedaśāstre purāṇe ca bhārate ca dvijottamāḥ ।
dharmaśāstreṣu sarveṣu tathānyatra manīṣibhiḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā naro labhet kṛṣṇaṃ tat phalaṃ sahalāyudham ।
sakalaṃ bhadrayā sārdhaṃ vrajantaṃ dakṣiṇāmukham ।।
{brahmovāca 
guḍivāmaṇḍapaṃ yāntaṃ ye paśyanti rathe sthitam ।
kṛṣṇaṃ balaṃ subhadrāṃ ca te yānti bhavanaṃ hareḥ ।।
ye paśyanti tadā kṛṣṇaṃ saptāhaṃ maṇḍape sthitam ।
halinaṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca viṣṇulokaṃ vrajanti te ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kena sā nirmitā yātrā dakṣiṇasyāṃ jagatpate ।
yātrāphalaṃ ca kiṃ tatra prāpyate brūhi mānavaiḥ ।।
kimarthaṃ sarasas tīre rājñas tasya jagatpate ।
pavitre vijane deśe gatvā tatra ca maṇḍape ।।
kṛṣṇaḥ saṃkarṣaṇaś caiva subhadrā ca rathena te ।
svasthānaṃ saṃparityajya saptarātraṃ vasanti vai ।।
{brahmovāca 
indradyumnena bho viprāḥ purā vai prārthito hariḥ ।
saptāhaṃ sarasas tīre mama yātrā bhavatv iti ।।
guḍivā nāma deveśa bhuktimuktiphalapradā ।
tasmai kila varaṃ cāsau dadau sa puruṣottamaḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
saptāhaṃ sarasas tīre tava rājan bhaviṣyati ।
guḍivā nāma yātrā me sarvakāmaphalapradā ।।
ye māṃ tatrārcayiṣyanti śraddhayā maṇḍape sthitam ।
saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca vidhivat susamāhitāḥ ।।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ śūdrāś ca vai nṛpa ।
puṣpair gandhais tathā dhūpair dīpair naivedyakair varaiḥ ।।
upahārair bahuvidhaiḥ praṇipātaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
jayaśabdais tathā stotrair gītair vādyair manoharaiḥ ।।
na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcit phalaṃ yasya yad īpsitam ।
bhaviṣyati nṛpaśreṣṭha matprasādād asaṃśayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tu taṃ devas tatraivāntaradhīyata ।
sa tu rājavaraḥ śrīmān kṛtakṛtyo abhavat tadā ।।
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena guḍivāyāṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
sarvakāmapradaṃ devaṃ paśyet taṃ puruṣottamam ।।
aputro labhate putrān nirdhano labhate dhanam ।
rogāc ca mucyate rogī kanyā prāpnoti satpatim ।।
āyuḥ kīrtiṃ yaśo medhāṃ balaṃ vidyāṃ dhṛtiṃ paśūn ।
naraḥ saṃtatim āpnoti rūpayauvanasaṃpadam ।।
yān yān samīhate bhogān dṛṣṭvā taṃ puruṣottamam ।
naro vāpy athavā nārī tāṃs tān prāpnoty asaṃśayam ।।
yātrāṃ kṛtvā guḍivākhyāṃ vidhivat susamāhitaḥ ।
āṣāḍhasya site pakṣe naro yoṣid athāpi vā ।।
dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।
daśapañcāśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam ।।
saptāvarān sapta parān vaṃśān uddhṛtya cātmanaḥ ।
kāmagena vimānena sarvaratnair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
gandharvair apsarobhiś ca sevyamāno yathottaraiḥ ।
rūpavān subhagaḥ śūro naro viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ।।
tatra bhuktvā varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।
sarvakāmasamṛddhātmā jarāmaraṇavarjitaḥ ।।
puṇyakṣayād ihāgatya caturvedī dvijo bhavet ।
vaiṣṇavaṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
ekaikasyās tu yātrāyāḥ phalaṃ brūhi pṛthak pṛthak ।
yat prāpnoti naraḥ kṛtvā nārī vā tatra saṃyatā ।।
{brahmovāca 
pratiyātrāphalaṃ viprāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ gadato mama ।
yat prāpnoti naraḥ kṛtvā tasmin kṣetre susaṃyataḥ ।।
guḍivāyāṃ tathotthāne phālgunyāṃ viṣuve tathā ।
yātrāṃ kṛtvā vidhānena dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya ca ।।
saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca labhet sarvatra vai phalam ।
naro gacched viṣṇuloke yāvad indrāś caturdaśa ।।
yāvad yātrāṃ jyeṣṭhamāse karoti vidhivan naraḥ ।
tāvat kalpaṃ viṣṇuloke sukhaṃ bhuṅkte na saṃśayaḥ ।।
tasmin kṣetravare puṇye ramye śrīpuruṣottame ।
bhuktimuktiprade nṝṇāṃ sarvasattvasukhāvahe ।।
jyeṣṭhe yātrāṃ naraḥ kṛtvā nārī vā saṃyatendriyaḥ ।
yathoktena vidhānena daśa dve ca samāhitaḥ ।।
pratiṣṭhāṃ kurute yas tu śāṭhyadambhavivarjitaḥ ।
sa bhuktvā vividhān bhogān mokṣaṃ cānte labhed dhruvam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śrotum icchāmahe deva pratiṣṭhāṃ vadatas tava ।
vidhānaṃ cārcanaṃ dānaṃ phalaṃ tatra jagatpateḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ vidhicoditām ।
yāṃ kṛtvā tu naro bhaktyā nārī vā labhate phalam ।।
yātrā dvādaśa saṃpūrṇā yadā syāt tu dvijottamāḥ ।
tadā kurvīta vidhivat pratiṣṭhāṃ pāpanāśinīm ।।
jyeṣṭhe māsi site pakṣe tv ekādaśyāṃ samāhitaḥ ।
gatvā jalāśayaṃ puṇyam ācamya prayataḥ śuciḥ ।।
āvāhya sarvatīrthāni dhyātvā nārāyaṇaṃ tathā ।
tataḥ snānaṃ prakurvīta vidhivat susamāhitaḥ ।।
yasya yo vidhir uddiṣṭa ṛṣibhiḥ snānakarmaṇi ।
tenaiva tu vidhānena snānaṃ tasya vidhīyate ।।
snātvā samyag vidhānena tato devān ṛṣīn pitṝn ।
saṃtarpayet tathānyāṃś ca nāmagotravidhānavit ।।
uttīrya vāsasī dhaute nirmale paridhāya vai ।
upaspṛśya vidhānena bhāskarābhimukhas tataḥ ।।
gāyatrīṃ pāvanīṃ devīṃ manasā vedamātaram ।
sarvapāpaharāṃ puṇyāṃ japed aṣṭottaraṃ śatam ।।
puṇyāṃś ca sauramantrāṃś ca śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ ।
triḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya bhāskaraṃ praṇamet tataḥ ।।
vedoktaṃ triṣu varṇeṣu snānaṃ jāpyam udāhṛtam ।
strīśūdrayoḥ snānajāpyaṃ vedoktavidhivarjitam ।।
tato gacched gṛhaṃ maunī pūjayet puruṣottamam ।
prakṣālya hastau pādau ca upaspṛśya yathāvidhi ।।
ghṛtena snāpayed devaṃ kṣīreṇa tadanantaram ।
madhugandhodakenaiva tīrthacandanavāriṇā ।।
tato vastrayugaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhaktyā taṃ paridhāpayet ।
candanāgarukarpūraiḥ kuṅkumena vilepayet ।।
pūjayet parayā bhaktyā padmaiś ca puruṣottamam ।
anyaiś ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ puṣpair arcayen mallikādibhiḥ ।।
saṃpūjyaivaṃ jagannāthaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ harim ।
dhūpaṃ cāgurusaṃyuktaṃ dahed devasya cāgrataḥ ।।
guggulaṃ ca muniśreṣṭhā dahed gandhasamanvitam ।
dīpaṃ prajvālayed bhaktyā yathāśaktyā ghṛtena vai ।।
anyāṃś ca dīpakān dadyād dvādaśaiva samāhitaḥ ।
ghṛtena ca muniśreṣṭhās tilatailena vā punaḥ ।।
naivedye pāyasāpūpa- śaṣkulīvaṭakaṃ tathā ।
modakaṃ phāṇitaṃ vālpaṃ phalāni ca nivedayet ।।
evaṃ pañcopacāreṇa saṃpūjya puruṣottamam ।
namaḥ puruṣottamāyeti japed aṣṭottaraṃ śatam ।।
tataḥ prasādayed devaṃ bhaktyā taṃ puruṣottamam ।
namas te sarvalokeśa bhaktānām abhayaprada ।।
saṃsārasāgare magnaṃ trāhi māṃ puruṣottama ।
yās te mayā kṛtā yātrā dvādaśaiva jagatpate ।।
prasādāt tava govinda saṃpūrṇās tā bhavantu me ।
evaṃ prasādya taṃ devaṃ daṇḍavat praṇipatya ca ।।
tato arcayed guruṃ bhaktyā puṣpavastrānulepanaiḥ ।
nānayor antaraṃ yasmād vidyate munisattamāḥ ।।
devasyopari kurvīta śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ ।
nānāpuṣpair muniśreṣṭhā vicitraṃ puṣpamaṇḍapam ।।
kṛtvāvadhāraṇaṃ paścāj jāgaraṃ kārayen niśi ।
kathāṃ ca vāsudevasya gītikāṃ cāpi kārayet ।।
dhyāyan paṭhan stuvan devaṃ praṇayed rajanīṃ budhaḥ ।
tataḥ prabhāte vimale dvādaśyāṃ dvādaśaiva tu ।।
nimantrayed vratasnātān brāhmaṇān vedapāragān ।
itihāsapurāṇajñāñ śrotriyān saṃyatendriyān ।।
snātvā samyag vidhānena dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ ।
snāpayet pūrvavat tatra pūjayet puruṣottamam ।।
gandhaiḥ puṣpair upahārair naivedyair dīpakais tathā ।
upacārair bahuvidhaiḥ praṇipātaiḥ pradakṣiṇaiḥ ।।
jāpyaiḥ stutinamaskārair gītavādyair manoharaiḥ ।
saṃpūjyaivaṃ jagannāthaṃ brāhmaṇān pūjayet tataḥ ।।
dvādaśaiva tu gās tebhyo dattvā kanakam eva ca ।
chattropānadyugaṃ caiva śraddhābhaktisamanvitaḥ ।।
bhaktyā tu sadhanaṃ tebhyo dadyād vastrādikaṃ dvijāḥ ।
sadbhāvena tu govindas toṣyate pūjito yataḥ ।।
ācāryāya tato dadyād govastraṃ kanakaṃ tathā ।
chattropānadyugaṃ cānyat kāṃsyapātraṃ ca bhaktitaḥ ।।
tatas tān bhojayed viprān bhojyaṃ pāyasapūrvakam ।
pakvānnaṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ ca guḍasarpiḥsamanvitam ।।
tatas tān annatṛptāṃś ca brāhmaṇān svasthamānasān ।
dvādaśaivodakumbhāṃś ca dadyāt tebhyaḥ samodakān ।।
dakṣiṇāṃ ca yathāśaktyā dadyāt tebhyo vimatsaraḥ ।
kumbhaṃ ca dakṣiṇāṃ caiva ācāryāya nivedayet ।।
evaṃ saṃpūjya tān viprān guruṃ jñānapradāyakam ।
pūjayet parayā bhaktyā viṣṇutulyaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
suvarṇavastragodhānyair dravyaiś cānyair varair budhaḥ ।
saṃpūjya taṃ namaskṛtya imaṃ mantram udīrayet ।।
sarvavyāpī jagannāthaḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।
anādinidhano devaḥ prīyatāṃ puruṣottamaḥ ।।
ity uccārya tato viprāṃs triḥ kṛtvā ca pradakṣiṇām ।
praṇamya śirasā bhaktyā ācāryaṃ tu visarjayet ।।
tatas tān brāhmaṇān bhaktyā cāsīmāntam anuvrajet ।
anuvrajya tu tān sarvān namaskṛtya nivartayet ।।
bāndhavaiḥ svajanair yuktas tato bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ ।
anyaiś copāsakair dīnair bhikṣukaiś cānnakāṅkṣibhiḥ ।।
evaṃ kṛtvā naraḥ samyaṅ nārī vā labhate phalam ।
aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ rājasūyaśatasya ca ।।
atītaṃ śatam ādāya puruṣāṇāṃ narottamāḥ ।
bhaviṣyaṃ ca śataṃ viprāḥ svargatyā divyarūpadhṛk ।।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitaḥ ।
sarvakāmasamṛddhātmā devavad vigatajvaraḥ ।।
rūpayauvanasaṃpanno guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।
stūyamāno apsarobhiś ca gandharvaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
vimānenārkavarṇena kāmagena sthireṇa ca ।
patākādhvajayuktena sarvaratnair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
udyotayan diśaḥ sarvā ākāśe vigataklamaḥ ।
yuvā mahābalo dhīmān viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
tatra kalpaśataṃ yāvad bhuṅkte bhogān yathepsitān ।
siddhāpsarobhir gandharvaiḥ suravidyādharoragaiḥ ।।
stūyamāno munivarais tiṣṭhate vigatajvaraḥ ।
yathā devo jagannāthaḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।।
tathāsau mudito viprāḥ kṛtvā rūpaṃ caturbhujam ।
bhuktvā tatra varān bhogān krīḍāṃ kṛtvā suraiḥ saha ।।
tadante brahmasadanam āyāti sarvakāmadam ।
siddhavidyādharaiś cāpi śobhitaṃ surakiṃnaraiḥ ।।
kālaṃ navatikalpaṃ tu tatra bhuktvā sukhaṃ naraḥ ।
tasmād āyāti viprendrāḥ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
rudralokaṃ suragaṇaiḥ sevitaṃ sukhamokṣadam ।
anekaśatasāhasrair vimānaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam ।।
siddhavidyādharair yakṣair bhūṣitaṃ daityadānavaiḥ ।
aśītikalpakālaṃ tu tatra bhuktvā sukhaṃ naraḥ ।।
tadante yāti golokaṃ sarvabhogasamanvitam ।
surasiddhāpsarobhiś ca śobhitaṃ sumanoharam ।।
tatra saptatikalpāṃs tu bhuktvā bhogam anuttamam ।
durlabhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu svasthacitto yathāmaraḥ ।।
tasmād āgacchate lokaṃ prājāpatyam anuttamam ।
gandharvāpsarasaiḥ siddhair munividyādharair vṛtaḥ ।।
ṣaṣṭikalpān sukhaṃ tatra bhuktvā nānāvidhaṃ mudā ।
tadante śakrabhavanaṃ nānāścaryasamanvitam ।।
gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiḥ siddhaiḥ suravidyādharoragaiḥ ।
guhyakāpsarasaiḥ sādhyair vṛtaiś cānyaiḥ surottamaiḥ ।।
āgatya tatra pañcāśat kalpān bhuktvā sukhaṃ naraḥ ।
suralokaṃ tato gatvā vimānaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
catvāriṃśat tu kalpāṃs tu bhuktvā bhogān sudurlabhān ।
āgacchate tato lokaṃ nakṣatrākhyaṃ sudurlabham ।।
tato bhogān varān bhuṅkte triṃśat kalpān yathepsitān ।
tasmād āgacchate lokaṃ śaśāṅkasya dvijottamāḥ ।।
yatrāsau tiṣṭhate somaḥ sarvair devair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।
tatra viṃśatikalpāṃs tu bhuktvā bhogaṃ sudurlabham ।।
ādityasya tato lokam āyāti surapūjitam ।
nānāścaryamayaṃ puṇyaṃ gandharvāpsaraḥsevitam ।।
tatra bhuktvā śubhān bhogān daśa kalpān dvijottamāḥ ।
tasmād āyāti bhuvanaṃ gandharvāṇāṃ sudurlabham ।।
tatra bhogān samastāṃś ca kalpam ekaṃ yathāsukham ।
bhuktvā cāyāti medinyāṃ rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ ।।
cakravartī mahāvīryo guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।
kṛtvā rājyaṃ svadharmeṇa yajñair iṣṭvā sudakṣiṇaiḥ ।।
tadante yogināṃ lokaṃ gatvā mokṣapradaṃ śivam ।
tatra bhuktvā varān bhogān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।।
tasmād āgacchate cātra jāyate yogināṃ kule ।
pravare vaiṣṇave viprā durlabhe sādhusaṃmate ।।
caturvedī vipravaro yajñair iṣṭvāptadakṣiṇaiḥ ।
vaiṣṇavaṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
evaṃ yātrāphalaṃ viprā mayā samyag udāhṛtam ।
bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ kim anyac chrotum icchatha ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śrotum icchāmahe deva viṣṇulokam anāmayam ।
lokānandakaraṃ kāntaṃ sarvāścaryasamanvitam ।।
pramāṇaṃ tasya lokasya bhogaṃ kāntiṃ balaṃ prabho ।
karmaṇā kena gacchanti tatra dharmaparāyaṇāḥ ।।
darśanāt sparśanād vāpi tīrthasnānādināpi vā ।
vistarād brūhi tattvena paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ sarve yat paraṃ paramaṃ padam ।
bhaktānām īhitaṃ dhanyaṃ puṇyaṃ saṃsāranāśanam ।।
pravaraṃ sarvalokānāṃ viṣṇvākhyaṃ vadato mama ।
sarvāścaryamayaṃ puṇyaṃ sthānaṃ trailokyapūjitam ।।
aśokaiḥ pārijātaiś ca mandāraiś campakadrumaiḥ ।
mālatīmallikākundair bakulair nāgakesaraiḥ ।।
puṃnāgair atimuktaiś ca priyaṅgutagarārjunaiḥ ।
pāṭalācūtakhadiraiḥ karṇikāravanojjvalaiḥ ।।
nāraṅgaiḥ panasair lodhrair nimbadāḍimasarjakaiḥ ।
drākṣālakucakharjūrair madhukendraphalair drumaiḥ ।।
kapitthair nārikeraiś ca tālaiḥ śrīphalasaṃbhavaiḥ ।
kalpavṛkṣair asaṃkhyaiś ca vanyair anyaiḥ suśobhanaiḥ ।।
saralaiś candanair nīpair devadāruśubhāñjanaiḥ ।
jātīlavaṅgakaṅkolaiḥ karpūrāmodavāsibhiḥ ।।
tāmbūlapattranicayais tathā pūgīphaladrumaiḥ ।
anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ sarvartuphalaśobhitaiḥ ।।
puṣpair nānāvidhaiś caiva latāgucchasamudbhavaiḥ ।
nānājalāśayaiḥ puṇyair nānāpakṣirutair varaiḥ ।।
dīrghikāśatasaṃghātais toyapūrṇair manoharaiḥ ।
kumudaiḥ śatapattraiś ca puṣpaiḥ kokanadair varaiḥ ।।
raktanīlotpalaiḥ kāntaiḥ kahlāraiś ca sugandhibhiḥ ।
anyaiś ca jalajaiḥ puṣpair nānāvarṇaiḥ suśobhanaiḥ ।।
haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaiś cakravākopaśobhitaiḥ ।
koyaṣṭikaiś ca dātyūhaiḥ kāraṇḍavaravākulaiḥ ।।
cātakaiḥ priyaputraiś ca jīvaṃjīvakajātibhiḥ ।
anyair divyair jalacarair vihāramadhurasvanaiḥ ।।
evaṃ nānāvidhair divyair nānāścaryasamanvitaiḥ ।
vṛkṣair jalāśayaiḥ puṇyair bhūṣitaṃ sumanoharaiḥ ।।
tatra divyair vimānaiś ca nānāratnavibhūṣitaiḥ ।
kāmagaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ śubhrair divyagandharvanāditaiḥ ।।
taruṇādityasaṃkāśair apsarobhir alaṃkṛtaiḥ ।
hemaśayyāsanayutair nānābhogasamanvitaiḥ ।।
khecaraiḥ sapatākaiś ca muktāhārāvalambibhiḥ ।
nānāvarṇair asaṃkhyātair jātarūpaparicchadaiḥ ।।
nānākusumagandhāḍhyaiś candanāgurubhūṣitaiḥ ।
sukhapracārabahulair nānāvāditraniḥsvanaiḥ ।।
manomārutatulyaiś ca kiṅkiṇīstabakākulaiḥ ।
viharanti pure tasmin vaiṣṇave lokapūjite ।।
nānāṅganābhiḥ satataṃ gandharvāpsarasādibhiḥ ।
candrānanābhiḥ kāntābhir yoṣidbhiḥ sumanoharaiḥ ।।
pīnonnatakucāgrābhiḥ sumadhyābhiḥ samantataḥ ।
śyāmāvadātavarṇābhir mattamātaṅgagāmibhiḥ ।।
parivārya naraśreṣṭhaṃ vījayanti sma tāḥ striyaḥ ।
cāmarai rukmadaṇḍaiś ca nānāratnavibhūṣitaiḥ ।।
gītanṛtyais tathā vādyair modamānair madālasaiḥ ।
yakṣavidyādharaiḥ siddhair gandharvair apsarogaṇaiḥ ।।
surasaṃghaiś ca ṛṣibhiḥ śuśubhe bhuvanottamam ।
tatra prāpya mahābhogān prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
vaṭarājasamīpe tu dakṣiṇasyodadhes taṭe ।
dṛṣṭo yair bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ puṣkarākṣo jagatpatiḥ ।।
krīḍanty apsarasaiḥ sārdhaṃ yāvad dyauś candratārakam ।
prataptahemasaṃkāśā jarāmaraṇavarjitāḥ ।।
sarvaduḥkhavihīnāś ca tṛṣṇāglānivivarjitāḥ ।
caturbhujā mahāvīryā vanamālāvibhūṣitāḥ ।।
śrīvatsalāñchanair yuktāḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharāḥ ।
kecin nīlotpalaśyāmāḥ kecit kāñcanasaṃnibhāḥ ।।
kecin marakataprakhyāḥ kecid vaidūryasaṃnibhāḥ ।
śyāmavarṇāḥ kuṇḍalinas tathānye vajrasaṃnibhāḥ ।।
na tādṛk sarvadevānāṃ bhānti lokā dvijottamāḥ ।
yādṛg bhāti harer lokaḥ sarvāścaryasamanvitaḥ ।।
na tatra punarāvṛttir gamanāj jāyate dvijāḥ ।
prabhāvāt tasya devasya yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।।
vicaranti pure divye rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ ।
kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ subhadrāṃ ca paśyanti puruṣottame ।।
prataptahemasaṃkāśaṃ taruṇādityasaṃnibham ।
puramadhye harer bhāti mandiraṃ ratnabhūṣitam ।।
anekaśatasāhasraiḥ patākaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam ।
yojanāyutavistīrṇaṃ hemaprākāraveṣṭitam ।।
nānāvarṇair dhvajaiś citraiḥ kalpitaiḥ sumanoharaiḥ ।
vibhāti śārado yadvan nakṣatraiḥ saha candramāḥ ।।
caturdvāraṃ suvistīrṇaṃ kañcukibhiḥ surakṣitam ।
purasaptakasaṃyuktaṃ mahotsekaṃ manoharam ।।
prathamaṃ kāñcanaṃ tatra dvitīyaṃ marakatair yutam ।
indranīlaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu mahānīlaṃ tataḥ param ।।
puraṃ tu pañcamaṃ dīptaṃ padmarāgamayaṃ puram ।
ṣaṣṭhaṃ vajramayaṃ viprā vaidūryaṃ saptamaṃ puram ।।
nānāratnamayair hema- pravālāṅkurabhūṣitaiḥ ।
stambhair adbhutasaṃkāśair bhāti tad bhavanaṃ mahat ।।
dṛśyante tatra siddhāś ca bhāsayanti diśo daśa ।
paurṇamāsyāṃ sanakṣatro yathā bhāti niśākaraḥ ।।
ārūḍhas tatra bhagavān salakṣmīko janārdanaḥ ।
pītāmbaradharaḥ śyāmaḥ śrīvatsalakṣmasaṃyutaḥ ।।
jvalat sudarśanaṃ cakraṃ ghoraṃ sarvāstranāyakam ।
dadhāra dakṣiṇe haste sarvatejomayaṃ hariḥ ।।
kundendurajataprakhyaṃ hāragokṣīrasaṃnibham ।
ādāya taṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ savyahastena keśavaḥ ।।
yasya śabdena sakalaṃ saṃkṣobhaṃ jāyate jagat ।
viśrutaṃ pāñcajanyeti sahasrāvartabhūṣitam ।।
duṣkṛtāntakarīṃ raudrāṃ daityadānavanāśinīm ।
jvaladvahniśikhākārāṃ duḥsahāṃ tridaśair api ।।
kaumodakīṃ gadāṃ cāsau dhṛtavān dakṣiṇe kare ।
vāme visphurati hy asya śārṅgaṃ sūryasamaprabham ।।
śarair ādityasaṃkāśair jvālāmālākulair varaiḥ ।
yo asau saṃharate devas trailokyaṃ sacarācaram ।।
sarvānandakaraḥ śrīmān sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ ।
sarvalokagurur devaḥ sarvair devair namaskṛtaḥ ।।
sahasramūrdhā deveśaḥ sahasracaraṇekṣaṇaḥ ।
sahasrākhyaḥ sahasrāṅgaḥ sahasrabhujavān prabhuḥ ।।
siṃhāsanagato devaḥ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇaḥ ।
vidyudvispaṣṭasaṃkāśo jagannātho jagadguruḥ ।।
parītaḥ surasiddhaiś ca gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ ।
yakṣavidyādharair nāgair munisiddhaiḥ sacāraṇaiḥ ।।
suparṇair dānavair daityai rākṣasair guhyakiṃnaraiḥ ।
anyair devagaṇair divyaiḥ stūyamāno virājate ।।
tatrasthā satataṃ kīrtiḥ prajñā medhā sarasvatī ।
buddhir matis tathā kṣāntiḥ siddhimūrtis tathā dyutiḥ ।।
gāyatrī caiva sāvitrī maṅgalā sarvamaṅgalā ।
prabhā matis tathā kāntis tatra nārāyaṇī sthitā ।।
śraddhā ca kauśikī devī vidyut saudāminī tathā ।
nidrā rātris tathā māyā tathānyāmarayoṣitaḥ ।।
vāsudevasya sarvās tā bhavane saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ ।
atha kiṃ bahunoktena sarvaṃ tatra pratiṣṭhitam ।।
ghṛtācī menakā rambhā sahajanyā tilottamā ।
urvaśī caiva nimlocā tathānyā vāmanā parā ।।
mandodarī ca subhagā viśvācī vipulānanā ।
bhadrāṅgī citrasenā ca pramlocā sumanoharā ।।
munisaṃmohinī rāmā candramadhyā śubhānanā ।
sukeśī nīlakeśā ca tathā manmathadīpinī ।।
alambuṣā miśrakeśī tathānyā muñjikasthalā ।
kratusthalā varāṅgī ca pūrvacittis tathā parā ।।
parāvatī mahārūpā śaśilekhā śubhānanā ।
haṃsalīlānugāminyo mattavāraṇagāminī ।।
bimbauṣṭhī navagarbhā ca vikhyātāḥ surayoṣitaḥ ।
etāś cānyā apsaraso rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ ।।
sumadhyāś cāruvadanāḥ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ ।
gītamādhuryasaṃyuktāḥ sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyutāḥ ।।
gītavādye ca kuśalāḥ suragandharvayoṣitaḥ ।
nṛtyanty anudinaṃ tatra yatrāsau puruṣottamaḥ ।।
na tatra rogo no glānir na mṛtyur na himātapau ।
na kṣut pipāsā na jarā na vairūpyaṃ na cāsukham ।।
paramānandajananaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।
viṣṇulokāt paraṃ lokaṃ nātra paśyāmi bho dvijāḥ ।।
ye lokāḥ svargaloke tu śrūyante puṇyakarmaṇām ।
viṣṇulokasya te viprāḥ kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm ।।
evaṃ hareḥ purasthānaṃ sarvabhogaguṇānvitam ।
sarvasaukhyakaraṃ puṇyaṃ sarvāścaryamayaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
na tatra nāstikā yānti puruṣā viṣayātmakāḥ ।
na kṛtaghnā na piśunā no stenā nājitendriyāḥ ।।
ye arcayanti sadā bhaktyā vāsudevaṃ jagadgurum ।
te tatra vaiṣṇavā yānti viṣṇulokaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।।
dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre kṣetre paramadurlabhe ।
dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca subhadrāṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
kalpavṛkṣasamīpe tu ye tyajanti kalevaram ।
te tatra manujā yānti mṛtā ye puruṣottame ।।
vaṭasāgarayor madhye yaḥ smaret puruṣottamam ।
te api tatra narā yānti ye mṛtāḥ puruṣottame ।।
te api tatra paraṃ sthānaṃ yānti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।
evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhā viṣṇulokaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
sarvānandakaraḥ prokto bhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
bahvāścaryas tvayā prokto viṣṇuloko jagatpate ।
nityānandakaraḥ śrīmān bhuktimuktiphalapradaḥ ।।
kṣetraṃ ca durlabhaṃ loke kīrtitaṃ puruṣottamam ।
tyaktvā yatra naro dehaṃ yāti sālokyatāṃ hareḥ ।।
samyak kṣetrasya māhātmyaṃ tvayā samyak prakīrtitam ।
yatra svadehasaṃtyāgād viṣṇulokaṃ vrajen naraḥ ।।
aho mokṣasya mārgo ayaṃ dehatyāgas tvayoditaḥ ।
narāṇām upakārāya puruṣākhye na saṃśayaḥ ।।
anāyāsena deveśa dehaṃ tyaktvā narottamāḥ ।
tasmin kṣetre paraṃ viṣṇoḥ padaṃ yānti nirāmayam ।।
śrutvā kṣetrasya māhātmyaṃ vismayo no mahān abhūt ।
prayāgapuṣkarādīni kṣetrāṇy āyatanāni ca ।।
pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthāni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca ।
na tathā tāni sarvāṇi praśaṃsasi surottama ।।
yathā praśaṃsasi kṣetraṃ puruṣākhyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
jñāto asmābhir abhiprāyas tavedānīṃ pitāmaha ।।
yena praśaṃsasi kṣetraṃ muktidaṃ puruṣottamam ।
puruṣākhyasamaṃ nūnaṃ kṣetraṃ nāsti mahītale ।
tena tvaṃ vibudhaśreṣṭha praśaṃsasi punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
satyaṃ satyaṃ muniśreṣṭhā bhavadbhiḥ samudāhṛtam ।
puruṣākhyasamaṃ kṣetraṃ nāsty atra pṛthivītale ।।
santi yāni tu tīrthāni puṇyāny āyatanāni ca ।
tāni śrīpuruṣākhyasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm ।।
yathā sarveśvaro viṣṇuḥ sarvalokottamottamaḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
ādityānāṃ yathā viṣṇuḥ śreṣṭhatve samudāhṛtaḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
nakṣatrāṇāṃ yathā somaḥ sarasāṃ sāgaro yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
vasūnāṃ pāvako yadvad rudrāṇāṃ śaṃkaro yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇo yadvad vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
śikhariṇāṃ yathā meruḥ parvatānāṃ himālayaḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
pramadānāṃ yathā lakṣmīḥ saritāṃ jāhnavī yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
airāvato gajendrāṇāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
senānīnāṃ yathā skandaḥ siddhānāṃ kapilo yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
uccaiḥśravā yathāśvānāṃ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
munīnāṃ ca yathā vyāsaḥ kubero yakṣarakṣasām ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
indriyāṇāṃ mano yadvad bhūtānām avanī yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
aśvatthaḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ pavanaḥ plavatāṃ yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
bhūṣaṇānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ yathā cūḍāmaṇir dvijāḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
gandharvāṇāṃ citrarathaḥ śastrāṇāṃ kuliśo yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
akāraḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ gāyatrī chandasāṃ yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
sarvāṅgebhyo yathā śreṣṭham uttamāṅgaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
arundhatī yathā strīṇāṃ satīnāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ gatā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tat puruṣottamam ।।
yathā samastavidyānāṃ mokṣavidyā parā smṛtā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tat puruṣottamam ।।
manuṣyāṇāṃ yathā rājā dhenūnām api kāmadhuk ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
suvarṇaṃ sarvaratnānāṃ sarpāṇāṃ vāsukir yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
prahlādaḥ sarvadaityānāṃ rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
jhaṣāṇāṃ makaro yadvan mṛgāṇāṃ mṛgarāḍ yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
samudrāṇāṃ yathā śreṣṭhaḥ kṣīrodaḥ saritāṃ patiḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
varuṇo yādasāṃ yadvad yamaḥ saṃyamināṃ yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
devarṣīṇāṃ yathā śreṣṭho nārado munisattamāḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
dhātūnāṃ kāñcanaṃ yadvat pavitrāṇāṃ ca dakṣiṇā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
prajāpatir yathā dakṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ kaśyapo yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
grahāṇāṃ bhāskaro yadvan mantrāṇāṃ praṇavo yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ variṣṭhaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
aśvamedhas tu yajñānāṃ yathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ kṣetraṃ ca tad dvijottamāḥ ।।
oṣadhīnāṃ yathā dhānyaṃ tṛṇeṣu tṛṇarāḍ yathā ।
tathā samastatīrthānām uttamaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
yathā samastatīrthānāṃ dharmaḥ saṃsāratārakaḥ ।
tathā samastatīrthānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tat puruṣottamam ।।
{brahmovāca 
sarveṣāṃ caiva tīrthānāṃ kṣetrāṇāṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।
japahomavratānāṃ ca tapodānaphalāni ca ।।
na tat paśyāmi bho viprā yat tena sadṛśaṃ bhuvi ।
kiṃ cātra bahunoktena bhāṣitena punaḥ punaḥ ।।
satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ kṣetraṃ tat paramaṃ mahat ।
puruṣākhyaṃ sakṛd dṛṣṭvā sāgarāmbhaḥsamāplutam ।।
brahmavidyāṃ sakṛj jñātvā garbhavāso na vidyate ।
hareḥ saṃnihite sthāna uttame puruṣottame ।।
saṃvatsaram upāsīta māsamātram athāpi vā ।
tena japtaṃ hutaṃ tena tena taptaṃ tapo mahat ।।
sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yatra yogeśvaro hariḥ ।
bhuktvā bhogān vicitrāṃś ca devayoṣitsamanvitaḥ ।।
kalpānte punar āgatya martyaloke narottamaḥ ।
jāyate yogināṃ viprā jñānajñeyodyato gṛhe ।।
saṃprāpya vaiṣṇavaṃ yogaṃ hareḥ svacchandatāṃ vrajet ।
kalpavṛkṣasya rāmasya kṛṣṇasya bhadrayā saha ।।
mārkaṇḍeyendradyumnasya māhātmyaṃ mādhavasya ca ।
svargadvārasya māhātmyaṃ sāgarasya vidhiḥ kramāt ।।
mārjanasya yathākāle bhāgīrathyāḥ samāgamam ।
sarvam etan mayā khyātaṃ yat paraṃ śrotum icchatha ।।
indradyumnasya māhātmyam etac ca kathitaṃ mayā ।
sarvāścaryaṃ samākhyātaṃ rahasyaṃ puruṣottamam ।
purāṇaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ dhanyaṃ saṃsāramocanam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
nahi nas tṛptir astīha śṛṇvatāṃ tīrthavistaram ।
punar eva paraṃ guhyaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ ।
paraṃ tīrthasya māhātmyaṃ sarvatīrthottamottamam ।।
{brahmovāca 
imam eva purā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo asmi dvijasattamāḥ ।
nāradena prayatnena tadā taṃ proktavān aham ।।
{nārada uvāca 
tapaso yajñadānānāṃ tīrthānāṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam ।
sarvaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tvatto jagadyone jagatpate ।।
kiyanti santi tīrthāni svargamartyarasātale ।
sarveṣām eva tīrthānāṃ sarvadā kiṃ viśiṣyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
caturvidhāni tīrthāni svarge martye rasātale ।
daivāni muniśārdūla āsurāṇy āruṣāṇi ca ।।
mānuṣāṇi trilokeṣu vikhyātāni surādibhiḥ ।
mānuṣebhyaś ca tīrthebhya ārṣaṃ tīrtham anuttamam ।।
ārṣebhyaś caiva tīrthebhya āsuraṃ bahupuṇyadam ।
āsurebhyas tathā puṇyaṃ daivaṃ tat sārvakāmikam ।।
brahmaviṣṇuśivaiś caiva nirmitaṃ daivam ucyate ।
tribhyo yad ekaṃ jāyeta tasmān nātaḥ paraṃ viduḥ ।।
trayāṇām api lokānāṃ tīrthaṃ medhyam udāhṛtam ।
tatrāpi jāmbavaṃ dvīpaṃ tīrthaṃ bahuguṇodayam ।।
jāmbave bhārataṃ varṣaṃ tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।
karmabhūmir yataḥ putra tasmāt tīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
tatraiva yāni tīrthāni yāny uktāni mayā tava ।
himavadvindhyayor madhye ṣaṇnadyo devasaṃbhavāḥ ।।
tathaiva devajā brahman dakṣiṇārṇavavindhyayoḥ ।
etā dvādaśa nadyas tu prādhānyena prakīrtitāḥ ।।
abhisaṃpūjitaṃ yasmād bhārataṃ bahupuṇyadam ।
karmabhūmir ato devair varṣaṃ tasmāt prakīrtitam ।।
ārṣāṇi caiva tīrthāni devajāni kvacit kvacit ।
āsurair āvṛtāny āsaṃs tad evāsuram ucyate ।।
daiveṣv eva pradeśeṣu tapas taptvā maharṣayaḥ ।
daivaprabhāvāt tapasa ārṣāṇy api ca tāny api ।।
ātmanaḥ śreyase muktyai pūjāyai bhūtaye athavā ।
ātmanaḥ phalabhūtyarthaṃ yaśaso avāptaye punaḥ ।।
mānuṣaiḥ kāritāny āhur mānuṣāṇīti nārada ।
evaṃ caturvidho bhedas tīrthānāṃ munisattama ।।
bhedaṃ na kaścij jānāti śrotuṃ yukto asi nārada ।
bahavaḥ paṇḍitaṃmanyāḥ śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca ।
sukṛtī ko api jānāti vaktuṃ śrotuṃ nijair guṇaiḥ ।।
{nārada uvāca 
teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ bhedaṃ ca śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ ।
yac chrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
brahman kṛtayugādau tu upāyo anyo na vidyate ।
tīrthasevāṃ vinā svalpā- yāsenābhīṣṭadāyinīm ।।
na tvayā sadṛśo dhātar vaktā jñātāthavā kvacit ।
tvaṃ nābhikamale viṣṇoḥ saṃjāto akhilapūrvajaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
godāvarī bhīmarathī tuṅgabhadrā ca veṇikā ।
tāpī payouṣṇī vindhyasya dakṣiṇe tu prakīrtitāḥ ।।
bhāgīrathī narmadā tu yamunā ca sarasvatī ।
viśokā ca vitastā ca himavatparvatāśritāḥ ।।
etā nadyaḥ puṇyatamā devatīrthāny udāhṛtāḥ ।
gayaḥ kollāsuro vṛtras tripuro hy andhakas tathā ।।
hayamūrdhā ca lavaṇo namuciḥ śṛṅgakas tathā ।
yamaḥ pātālaketuś ca mayaḥ puṣkara eva ca ।।
etair āvṛtatīrthāni āsurāṇi śubhāni ca ।
prabhāso bhārgavo agastir naranārāyaṇau tathā ।।
vasiṣṭhaś ca bharadvājo gotamaḥ kaśyapo manuḥ ।
ityādimunijuṣṭāni ṛṣitīrthāni nārada ।।
ambarīṣo hariścandro māndhātā manur eva ca ।
kuruḥ kanakhalaś caiva bhadrāśvaḥ sagaras tathā ।।
aśvayūpo nāciketā vṛṣākapir ariṃdamaḥ ।
ityādimānuṣair vipra nirmitāni śubhāni ca ।।
yaśasaḥ phalabhūtyarthaṃ nirmitānīha nārada ।
svatoudbhūtāni daivāni yatra kvāpi jagattraye ।
puṇyatīrthāni tāny āhus tīrthabhedo mayoditaḥ ।।
{nārada uvāca 
tridaivatyaṃ tu yat tīrthaṃ sarvebhyo hy uktam uttamam ।
tasya svarūpabhedaṃ ca vistareṇa bravītu me ।।
{brahmovāca 
tāvad anyāni tīrthāni tāvat tāḥ puṇyabhūmayaḥ ।
tāvad yajñādayo yāvat tridaivatyaṃ na dṛśyate ।।
gaṅgeyaṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhā sarvakāmapradāyinī ।
tridaivatyā muniśreṣṭha tadutpattim ataḥ śṛṇu ।।
varṣāṇām ayutāt pūrvaṃ devakārya upasthite ।
tārako balavān āsīn madvarād atigarvitaḥ ।।
devānāṃ paramaiśvaryaṃ hṛtaṃ tena balīyasā ।
tatas te śaraṇaṃ jagmur devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ ।।
kṣīrodaśāyinaṃ devaṃ jagatāṃ prapitāmaham ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭā devā viṣṇum ūcur ananyagāḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
tvaṃ trātā jagatāṃ nātha devānāṃ kīrtivardhana ।
sarveśvara jagadyone trayīmūrte namo astu te ।।
lokasraṣṭāsurān hantā tvam eva jagatāṃ patiḥ ।
sthityutpattivināśānāṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ jaganmaya ।।
trātā na kopy asti jagattraye api 
śarīriṇāṃ sarvavipadgatānām 
tvayā vinā vārijapattranetra 
tāpatrayāṇāṃ śaraṇaṃ na cānyat 
pitā ca mātā jagato akhilasya 
tvam eva sevāsulabho asi viṣṇo 
prasīda pāhīśa mahābhayebhyo 
śmadārtihantā vada kas tvadanyaḥ 
ādikartā varāhas tvaṃ matsyaḥ kūrmas tathaiva ca ।
ityādirūpabhedair no rakṣase bhaya āgate ।।
hṛtasvāmyān suragaṇān hṛtadārān gatāpadaḥ ।
kasmān na rakṣase deva ananyaśaraṇān hare ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ provāca bhagavāñ śeṣaśāyī jagatpatiḥ ।
kasmāc ca bhayam āpannaṃ tad bruvantu gatajvarāḥ ।
tataḥ śriyaḥ patiṃ prāhus taṃ tārakavadhaṃ prati ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
tārakād bhayam āpannaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam ।
na yuddhais tapasā śāpair hantuṃ naiva kṣamā vayam ।।
arvāgdaśāhād yo bālas tasmān mṛtyum avāpsyati ।
tasmād deva na cānyebhyas tatra nītir vidhīyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
punar nārāyaṇaḥ prāha nāhaṃ balotkaṭaḥ surāḥ ।
na matto madapatyāc ca na devebhyo vadho bhavet ।।
īśvarād yadi jāyeta apatyaṃ bahuśaktikam ।
tasmād vadham avāpnoti tārako lokadāruṇaḥ ।।
tad gacchāmaḥ surāḥ sarve yatitum ṛṣibhiḥ saha ।
bhāryārthaṃ prathamo yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ prabhaviṣṇubhiḥ ।।
tathety uktvā suragaṇā jagmus te ca nagottamam ।
himavantaṃ ratnamayaṃ menāṃ ca himavatpriyām ।।
idam ūcuḥ sarva eva sabhāryaṃ tuhinaṃ girim ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
dākṣāyaṇī lokamātā yā śaktiḥ saṃsthitā girau ।
buddhiḥ prajñā dhṛtir medhā lajjā puṣṭiḥ sarasvatī ।।
evaṃ tv anekadhā loke yā sthitā lokapāvanī ।
devānāṃ kāryasiddhyarthaṃ yuvayor garbham āviśat ।।
samutpannā jaganmātā śaṃbhoḥ patnī bhaviṣyati ।
asmākaṃ bhavatāṃ cāpi pālanī ca bhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
himavān api tad vākyaṃ surāṇām abhinandya ca ।
menā cāpi mahotsāhā astv ity evaṃ vaco abravīt ।।
tadotpannā jagaddhātrī gaurī himavato gṛhe ।
śivadhyānaratā nityaṃ tanniṣṭhā tanmanogatā ।।
tāṃ vai procuḥ suragaṇā īśārthe tapa āviśa ।
tathā himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe gaurī tepe tapo mahat ।।
punaḥ saṃmantrayām āsur īśo dhyāyati tāṃ śivām ।
ātmānaṃ vā tathānyad vā na jānīmaḥ kathaṃ bhavaḥ ।।
menakāyāḥ sutāyāṃ tu cittaṃ dadhyāt sureśvaraḥ ।
tatra nītir vidhātavyā tataḥ śraiṣṭhyam avāpsyatha ।
tataḥ prāha mahābuddhir vācaspatir udāradhīḥ ।।
{bṛhaspatir uvāca 
yas tv ayaṃ madano dhīmān kandarpaḥ puṣpacāpadhṛk ।
sa vidhyatu śivaṃ śāntaṃ bāṇaiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।।
tena viddhas trinetro api īśāyāṃ buddhim ādadhet ।
pariṇeṣyaty asau nūnaṃ tadā tāṃ girijāṃ haraḥ ।।
jayinaḥ pañcabāṇasya na bāṇāḥ kvāpi kuṇṭhitāḥ ।
tathoḍhāyāṃ jagaddhātryāṃ śaṃbhoḥ putro bhaviṣyati ।।
jātaḥ putras trinetrasya tārakaṃ sa haniṣyati ।
vasantaṃ ca sahāyārthaṃ śobhiṣṭhaṃ kusumākaram ।।
āhlādanaṃ ca manasā kāmāyainaṃ prayacchatha ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā suragaṇā madanaṃ kusumākaram ।
preṣayām āsur avyagrāḥ śivāntikam ariṃdamāḥ ।।
sa jagāma tvarā kāmo dhṛtacāpo samādhavaḥ ।
ratyā ca sahitaḥ kāmaḥ kartuṃ karma suduṣkaram ।।
gṛhītvā saśaraṃ cāpam idaṃ tasya mano abhavat ।
mayā vedhyas tv avedhyo vai śaṃbhur lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ ।।
trailokyajayino bāṇāḥ śaṃbhau me kiṃ dṛḍhā na vā ।
tenāsau cāgninetreṇa bhasmaśeṣas tadā kṛtaḥ ।।
tad eva karma sudṛḍham īkṣituṃ surasattamāḥ ।
ājagmus tatra yad vṛttaṃ śṛṇu vismayakārakam ।।
śaṃbhuṃ dṛṣṭvā suragaṇā yāvat paśyanti manmatham ।
tāvac ca bhasmasādbhūtaṃ kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayāturāḥ ।
tuṣṭuvus tridaśeśānaṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ surāḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
tārakād bhayam āpannaṃ kuru patnīṃ gireḥ sutām ।।
{brahmovāca 
viddhacitto haro apy āśu mene vākyaṃ suroditam ।
arundhatīṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca māṃ tu cakradharaṃ tathā ।।
preṣayām āsur amarā vivāhāya parasparam ।
saṃbandho api tathāpy āsīd dhimavallokanāthayoḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
himavatparvate śreṣṭhe nānāratnavicitrite ।
nānāvṛkṣalatākīrṇe nānādvijaniṣevite ।।
nadīnadasaraḥkūpa- taḍāgādibhir āvṛte ।
devagandharvayakṣādi- siddhacāraṇasevite ।।
śubhamārutasaṃpanne harṣotkarṣaikakāraṇe ।
merumandarakailāsa- mainākādinagair vṛte ।।
vasiṣṭhāgastyapaulastya- lomaśādibhir āvṛte ।
mahotsave vartamāne vivāhaḥ samajāyata ।।
tatra vedī ratnamayī śobhitā svarṇabhūṣitā ।
vajramāṇikyavaidūrya- tanmayastambhaśobhitā ।।
jayālakṣmīśubhākṣānti- kīrtipuṣṭyādisaṃvṛtā ।
merumandarakailāsa- raivataiḥ pariśobhitaiḥ ।।
pūjito lokanāthena viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā ।
mainākaḥ parvataśreṣṭho reje atīva hiraṇmayaḥ ।।
ṛṣayo lokapālāś ca ādityāḥ samarudgaṇāḥ ।
vivāhe vedikāṃ cakrur devadevasya śūlinaḥ ।।
viśvakarmā svayaṃ tvaṣṭā vedīṃ cakre satoraṇām ।
surabhī nandinī nandā sunandā kāmadohinī ।।
ābhis tu śobhiteśānyā vivāhaḥ samajāyata ।
samudrāḥ sarito nāgā oṣadhyo lokamātaraḥ ।।
savanaspatibījāś ca sarve tatra samāyayuḥ ।
bhuvaḥ karma ilā cakre oṣadhyas tv annakarma ca ।।
varuṇaḥ pānakarmāṇi dānakarma dhanādhipaḥ ।
agniś cakāra tatrānnaṃ yac ceṣṭaṃ lokanāthayoḥ ।।
tatra tatra pṛthak pūjāṃ cakre viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ ।
vedāś ca sarahasyā vai gāyanti ca hasanti ca ।।
nṛtyanty apsarasaḥ sarvā jagur gandharvakiṃnarāḥ ।
lājādhṛk cāpi maināko babhūva munisattama ।।
puṇyāhavācanaṃ vṛttam antarveśmani nārada ।
vedikāyām upāviṣṭau daṃpatī surasattamau ।।
pratiṣṭhāpyāgniṃ vidhivad aśmānaṃ cāpi putraka ।
hutvā lājāṃś ca vidhivat pradakṣiṇam athākarot ।।
aśmanaḥ sparśahetoś ca devyaṅguṣṭhaṃ kare aspṛśat ।
viṣṇunā preritaḥ śaṃbhur dakṣiṇasya padasya ca ।।
tām adarśam ahaṃ tatra homaṃ kurvan harāntike ।
dṛṣṭe aṅguṣṭhe duṣṭabuddhyā vīryaṃ susrāva me tadā ।।
lajjayā kaluṣībhūtaḥ skannaṃ vīryam acūrṇayam ।
madvīryāc cūrṇitāt sūkṣmād vālakhilyās tu jajñire ।।
tato mahān abhūt tatra hāhākāraḥ suroditaḥ ।
lajjayā paribhūto ahaṃ nirgatas tu tadāsanāt ।।
paśyatsu devasaṃgheṣu tūṣṇīṃbhūteṣu nārada ।
gacchantaṃ māṃ mahādevo dṛṣṭvā nandinam abravīt ।।
{śiva uvāca 
brahmāṇam āhvayasveha gatapāpaṃ karomy aham ।
kṛtāparādhe api jane santaḥ sakṛpamānasāḥ ।
mohayanty api vidvāṃsaṃ viṣayāṇām iyaṃ sthitiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā sa bhagavān umayā sahitaḥ śivaḥ ।
mamānukampayā caiva lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
etac cakāra lokeśaḥ śṛṇu nārada yatnataḥ ।
pāpināṃ pāpamokṣāya bhūmir āpo bhaviṣyati ।।
tayoś ca sārasarvasvam āhariṣyāmi pāvanam ।
evaṃ niścitya bhagavāṃs tayoḥ sāraṃ samāharat ।।
bhūmiṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ kṛtvā tatrāpaḥ saṃniveśya ca ।
pāvamānyādibhiḥ sūktair abhimantrya ca yatnataḥ ।।
trijagatpāvanīṃ śaktiṃ tatra sasmāra pāpahā ।
mām uvāca sa lokeśo gṛhāṇemaṃ kamaṇḍalum ।।
āpo vai mātaro devyo bhūmir mātā tathāparā ।
sthityutpattivināśānāṃ hetutvam ubhayoḥ sthitam ।।
atra pratiṣṭhito dharmo hy atra yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
atra bhuktiś ca muktiś ca sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā ।।
smaraṇān mānasaṃ pāpaṃ vacanād vācikaṃ tathā ।
snānapānābhiṣekāc ca praṇaśyaty api kāyikam ।।
etad evāmṛtaṃ loke naitasmāt pāvanaṃ param ।
mayābhimantritaṃ brahman gṛhāṇemaṃ kamaṇḍalum ।।
atratyaṃ vāri yaḥ kaścit smared api paṭhed api ।
sa sarvakāmān āpnoti gṛhāṇemaṃ kamaṇḍalum ।।
bhūtebhyaś cāpi pañcabhya āpo bhūtaṃ mahoditam ।
tāsām utkṛṣṭam etasmād gṛhāṇemaṃ kamaṇḍalum ।।
atra yad vāri śobhiṣṭhaṃ puṇyaṃ pāvanam eva ca ।
spṛṣṭvā smṛtvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca brahman pāpād vimokṣyase ।।
evam uktvā mahādevaḥ prādān mama kamaṇḍalum ।
tataḥ suragaṇāḥ sarve bhaktyā procuḥ sureśvaram ।
āhlādaś ca mahāṃs tatra jayaśabdo vyavartata ।।
devotsave mātur ajaḥ padāgraṃ 
samīkṣya pāpāt patitatvam āpa 
prādāt kṛpāluḥ smaraṇāt pavitrāṃ 
gaṅgāṃ pitā puṇyakamaṇḍalusthām 
{nārada uvāca 
kamaṇḍalusthitā devī tava puṇyavivardhinī ।
yathā martyaṃ gatā nātha tan me vistarato vada ।।
{brahmovāca 
balir nāma mahādaityo devārir aparājitaḥ ।
dharmeṇa yaśasā caiva prajāsaṃrakṣaṇena ca ।।
gurubhaktyā ca satyena vīryeṇa ca balena ca ।
tyāgena kṣamayā caiva trailokye nopamīyate ।।
tasyarddhim unnatāṃ dṛṣṭvā devāś cintāparāyaṇāḥ ।
mithaḥ samūcur amarā jeṣyāmo vai kathaṃ balim ।।
tasmiñ śāsati rājyaṃ tu trailokyaṃ hatakaṇṭakam ।
nārayo vyādhayo vāpi nādhayo vā kathaṃcana ।।
anāvṛṣṭir adharmo vā nāstiśabdo na durjanaḥ ।
svapne api naiva dṛśyeta balau rājyaṃ praśāsati ।।
tasyonnatiśarair bhagnāḥ kīrtikhaḍgadvidhākṛtāḥ ।
tasyājñāśaktibhinnāṅgā devāḥ śarma na lebhire ।।
tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsuḥ kṛtvā mātsaryam agrataḥ ।
tadyaśognipradīptāṅgā viṣṇuṃ jagmuḥ suvihvalāḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
ārtāḥ sma gatasattvāḥ sma śaṅkhacakragadādhara ।
asmadarthe bhavān nityam āyudhāni bibharti ca ।।
tvayi nāthe jagannātha asmākaṃ duḥkham īdṛśam ।
tvāṃ tu praṇamatī vāṇī kathaṃ daityaṃ namasyati ।।
manasā karmaṇā vācā tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ।
tvadaṅghriśaraṇāḥ santaḥ kathaṃ daityaṃ namemahi ।।
yajāmas tvāṃ mahāyajñair vadāmo vāgbhir acyuta ।
tvadekaśaraṇāḥ santaḥ kathaṃ daityaṃ namemahi ।।
tvadvīryam āśritā nityaṃ devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ ।
tvayā dattaṃ padaṃ prāpya kathaṃ daityaṃ namemahi ।।
sraṣṭā tvaṃ brahmamūrtyā tu viṣṇur bhūtvā tu rakṣasi ।
saṃhartā rudraśaktyā tvaṃ kathaṃ daityaṃ namemahi ।।
aiśvaryaṃ kāraṇaṃ loke vinaiśvaryaṃ tu kiṃ phalam ।
hataiśvaryāḥ sureśāna kathaṃ daityaṃ namemahi ।।
anādis tvaṃ jagaddhātar anantas tvaṃ jagadguruḥ ।
antavantam amuṃ śatruṃ kathaṃ daityaṃ namemahi ।।
tavaiśvaryeṇa puṣṭāṅgā jitvā trailokyam ojasā ।
sthirāḥ syāmaḥ sureśāna kathaṃ daityaṃ namemahi ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity etad eva vacanaṃ śrutvā daiteyasūdanaḥ ।
uvāca sarvān amarān devānāṃ kāryasiddhaye ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
madbhakto asau balir daityo hy avadhyo asau surāsuraiḥ ।
yathā bhavanto matpoṣyās tathā poṣyo balir mama ।।
vinā tu saṃgaraṃ devā hatvā rājyaṃ triviṣṭape ।
baliṃ nibadhya mantroktyā rājyaṃ vaḥ pradadāmy aham ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā suragaṇāḥ saṃjagmur divam eva hi ।
bhagavān api deveśo hy adityā garbham āviśat ।।
tasminn utpadyamāne tu utsavāś ca babhūvire ।
jāto asau vāmano brahman yajñeśo yajñapūruṣaḥ ।।
etasminn antare brahman hayamedhāya dīkṣitaḥ ।
balir balavatāṃ śreṣṭha ṛṣimukhyaiḥ samāhitaḥ ।।
purodhasā ca śukreṇa vedavedāṅgavedinā ।
makhe tasmin vartamāne yajamāne balau tathā ।।
ārtvijya ṛṣimukhye tu śukre tatra purodhasi ।
havirbhāgārtham āsanna- devagandharvapannage ।।
dīyatāṃ bhujyatāṃ pūjā kriyatāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak ।
paripūrṇaṃ punaḥ pūrṇam evaṃ vākye pravartati ।।
śanais taddeśam abhyāgād vāmanaḥ sāmagāyanaḥ ।
yajñavāṭam anuprāpto vāmanaś citrakuṇḍalaḥ ।।
praśaṃsamānas taṃ yajñaṃ vāmanaṃ prekṣya bhārgavaḥ ।
brahmarūpadharaṃ devaṃ vāmanaṃ daityasūdanam ।।
dātāraṃ yajñatapasāṃ phalaṃ hantāraṃ rakṣasām ।
jñātvā tvarann athovāca rājānaṃ bhūritejasam ।।
jetāraṃ kṣatradharmeṇa dātāraṃ bhaktito dhanam ।
baliṃ balavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sabhāryaṃ dīkṣitaṃ makhe ।।
dhyāyantaṃ yajñapuruṣam utsṛjantaṃ haviḥ pṛthak ।
tam āha bhṛguśārdūlaḥ śukraḥ paramabuddhimān ।।
{śukra uvāca 
yo asau tava makhaṃ prāpto brāhmaṇo vāmanākṛtiḥ ।
nāsau vipro bale satyaṃ yajñeśo yajñavāhanaḥ ।।
śiśus tvāṃ yācituṃ prāpto nūnaṃ devahitāya hi ।
mayā ca saha saṃmantrya paścād deyaṃ tvayā prabho ।।
{brahmovāca 
balis tu bhārgavaṃ prāha purodhasam ariṃdamaḥ ।।
{balir uvāca 
dhanyo ahaṃ mama yajñeśo gṛham āyāti mūrtimān ।
āgatya yācate kiṃcit kiṃ mantryam avaśiṣyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā sabhāryo asau śukreṇa ca purodhasā ।
jagāma yatra viprendro vāmano aditinandanaḥ ।।
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā kenārthitvaṃ tad ucyatām ।
vāmano api tadā prāha padatrayamitāṃ bhuvam ।।
dehi rājendra nānyena kāryam asti dhanena kim ।
tathety uktvā tu kalaśān nānāratnavibhūṣitāt ।।
vāridhārāṃ puraskṛtya vāmanāya bhuvaṃ dadau ।
paśyatsu ṛṣimukhyeṣu śukre caiva purodhasi ।।
paśyatsu lokanātheṣu vāmanāya bhuvaṃ dadau ।
paśyatsu daityasaṃgheṣu jayaśabde pravartati ।।
śanais tu vāmanaḥ prāha svasti rājan sukhī bhava ।
dehi me saṃmitāṃ bhūmiṃ tripadām āśu gamyate ।।
tathety uvāca daityeśo yāvat paśyati vāmanam ।
yajñeśo yajñapuruṣaś candrādityau stanāntare ।।
yathā syātāṃ surā mūrdhni vavṛdhe vikramākṛtiḥ ।
anantaś cācyuto devo vikrānto vikramākṛtiḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā daityarāṭ prāha sabhāryo vinayānvitaḥ ।।
{balir uvāca 
kramasva viṣṇo lokeśa yāvacchaktyā jaganmaya ।
jitaṃ mayā sureśāna sarvabhāvena viśvakṛt ।।
{brahmovāca 
tadvākyasamakālaṃ tu viṣṇuḥ prāha mahākratuḥ ।।
{viṣṇur uvāca 
daityeśvara mahābāho kramiṣye paśya daityarāṭ ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ vadantaṃ sa prāha krama viṣṇo punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
kūrmapṛṣṭhe padaṃ nyasya baliyajñe padaṃ nyasat ।
dvitīyaṃ tu padaṃ prāpa brahmalokaṃ sanātanam ।।
tṛtīyasya padasyātra sthānaṃ nāsty asureśvara ।
kva kramiṣye bhuvaṃ dehi baliṃ taṃ harir abravīt ।
vihasya balir apy āha sabhāryaḥ sa kṛtāñjaliḥ ।।
{balir uvāca 
tvayā sṛṣṭaṃ jagat sarvaṃ na sraṣṭāhaṃ sureśvara ।
tvaddoṣād alpam abhavat kiṃ karomi jaganmaya ।।
tathāpi nānṛtapūrvaṃ kadācid vacmi keśava ।
satyavākyaṃ ca māṃ kurvan matpṛṣṭhe hi padaṃ nyasa ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prasanno bhagavāṃs trayīmūrtiḥ surārcitaḥ ।।
{bhagavān uvāca 
varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te bhaktyā prīto asmi daityarāṭ ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa tu prāha jagannāthaṃ na yāce tvāṃ trivikramam ।
sa tu prādāt svayaṃ viṣṇuḥ prītaḥ san manasepsitam ।।
rasātalapatitvaṃ ca bhāvi cendrapadaṃ punaḥ ।
ātmādhipatyaṃ ca harir avināśi yaśo vibhuḥ ।।
evaṃ dattvā baleḥ sarvaṃ sasutaṃ bhāryayānvitam ।
rasātale hariḥ sthāpya baliṃ tv amaravairiṇam ।।
śatakratos tathā prādāt surarājyaṃ yathābhavam ।
etasminn antare tatra padaṃ prāgāt surārcitam ।।
dvitīyaṃ tat padaṃ viṣṇoḥ pitur mama mahāmate ।
yat padaṃ samanuprāptaṃ gṛhaṃ dṛṣṭvāpy acintayam ।।
kiṃ kṛtyaṃ yac chubhaṃ me syāt pade viṣṇoḥ samāgate ।
sarvasvaṃ ca samālokya śreṣṭho me syāt kamaṇḍaluḥ ।।
tad vāri yat puṇyatamaṃ dattaṃ ca tripurāriṇā ।
varaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ varaṃ śāntikaraṃ param ।।
śubhaṃ ca śubhadaṃ nityaṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakam ।
mātṛsvarūpaṃ lokānām amṛtaṃ bheṣajaṃ śuci ।।
pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ pūjyaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ guṇānvitam ।
smaraṇād eva lokānāṃ pāvanaṃ kiṃ nu darśanāt ।।
tādṛg vāri śucir bhūtvā kalpaye arghāya me pituḥ ।
iti saṃcintya tad vāri gṛhītvārghāya kalpitam ।।
viṣṇoḥ pāde tu patitam arghavāri sumantritam ।
tad vāri patitaṃ merau caturdhā vyagamad bhuvam ।।
pūrve tu dakṣiṇe caiva paścime cottare tathā ।
dakṣiṇe yat tu patitaṃ jaṭābhiḥ śaṃkaro mune ।।
jagrāha paścime yat tu punaḥ prāyāt kamaṇḍalum ।
uttare patitaṃ yat tu viṣṇur jagrāha taj jalam ।।
pūrvasminn ṛṣayo devā pitaro lokapālakāḥ ।
jagṛhuḥ śubhadaṃ vāri tasmāc chreṣṭhaṃ tad ucyate ।।
yā dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ prāptā āpo vai lokamātaraḥ ।
viṣṇupādaprasūtās tā brahmaṇyā lokamātaraḥ ।।
maheśvarajaṭāsaṃsthāḥ parvajātaśubhodayāḥ ।
tāsāṃ prabhāvasmaraṇāt sarvakāmān avāpnuyāt ।।
{nārada uvāca 
kamaṇḍalusthitā devī maheśvarajaṭāgatā ।
śrutā deva yathā martyam āgatā tad bravītu me ।।
{brahmovāca 
maheśvarajaṭāsthā yā āpo devyo mahāmate ।
tāsāṃ ca dvividho bheda āhartur dvayakāraṇāt ।।
ekāṃśo brāhmaṇenātra vratadānasamādhinā ।
gotamena śivaṃ pūjya āhṛto lokaviśrutaḥ ।।
aparas tu mahāprājña kṣatriyeṇa balīyasā ।
ārādhya śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ tapobhir niyamais tathā ।।
bhagīrathena bhūpena āhṛto aṃśo aparas tathā ।
evaṃ dvairūpyam abhavad gaṅgāyā munisattama ।।
{nārada uvāca 
maheśvarajaṭāsthā yā hetunā kena gautamaḥ ।
āhartā kṣatriyeṇāpi āhṛtā kena tad vada ।।
{brahmovāca 
yathānītā purā vatsa brāhmaṇenetareṇa vā ।
tat sarvaṃ vistareṇāhaṃ vadiṣye prītaye tava ।।
yasmin kāle sureśasya umā patny abhavat priyā ।
tasminn evābhavad gaṅgā priyā śaṃbhor mahāmate ।।
mama doṣāpanodāya cintayānaḥ śivas tadā ।
umayā sahitaḥ śrīmān devīṃ prekṣya viśeṣataḥ ।।
rasavṛttau sthito yasmān nirmame rasam uttamam ।
rasikatvāt priyatvāc ca straiṇatvāt pāvanatvataḥ ।।
sarvābhyo hy adhikaprītir gaṅgābhūd dvijasattama ।
saivodbhūtā jaṭāmārgāt kasmiṃścit kāraṇāntare ।
sa tu saṃgopayām āsa gaṅgāṃ śaṃbhur jaṭāgatām ।।
śirasā ca dhṛtāṃ jñātvā na śaśāka umā tadā ।
soḍhuṃ brahmañ jaṭājūṭe sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā punaḥ punaḥ ।।
amarṣeṇa bhavaṃ gorī prerayasvety abhāṣata ।
naivāsau prairayac chaṃbhū rasiko rasam uttamam ।।
jaṭāsv eva tadā devīṃ gopāyantaṃ vimṛśya sā ।
vināyakaṃ jayāṃ skandaṃ raho vacanam abravīt ।।
naivāyaṃ tridaśeśāno gaṅgāṃ tyajati kāmukaḥ ।
sāpi priyā śivasyādya kathaṃ tyajati tāṃ priyām ।।
evaṃ vimṛśya bahuśo gaurī cāha vināyakam ।।
{pārvaty uvāca 
na devair nāsurair yakṣair na siddhair bhavatāpi ca ।
na rājabhir athānyair vā na gaṅgāṃ tyajati prabhuḥ ।।
punas tapsyāmi vā gatvā himavantaṃ nagottamam ।
athavā brāhmaṇaiḥ puṇyais tapobhir hatakalmaṣaiḥ ।।
tair vā jaṭāsthitā gaṅgā prārthitā bhuvam āpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā mātṛvākyaṃ mātaraṃ prāha vighnarāṭ ।
bhrātrā skandena jayayā saṃmantryeha ca yujyate ।।
tat kurmo mastakād gaṅgāṃ yathā tyajati me pitā ।
etasminn antare brahmann anāvṛṣṭir ajāyata ।।
dvir dvādaśa samā martye sarvaprāṇibhayāvahā ।
tato vinaṣṭam abhavaj jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।।
vinā tu gautamaṃ puṇyam āśramaṃ sarvakāmadam ।
sraṣṭukāmaḥ purā putra sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā ।।
kṛto yajño mayā pūrvaṃ sa devayajano giriḥ ।
mannāmā tatra vikhyātas tato brahmagiriḥ sadā ।।
tam āśritya nagaśreṣṭhaṃ sarvadāste sa gautamaḥ ।
tasyāśrame mahāpuṇye śreṣṭhe brahmagirau śubhe ।।
ādhayo vyādhayo vāpi durbhikṣaṃ vāpy avarṣaṇam ।
bhayaśokau ca dāridryaṃ na śrūyante kadācana ।।
tadāśramaṃ vinānyatra havyaṃ vā kavyam eva ca ।
nāsti putra tathā dātā hotā yaṣṭā tathaiva ca ।।
yadaiva gautamo vipro dadāti ca juhoti ca ।
tadaivāpy ayanaṃ svarge surāṇām api nānyataḥ ।।
devaloke api martye vā śrūyate gautamo muniḥ ।
hotā dātā ca bhoktā ca sa eveti janā viduḥ ।।
tac chrutvā munayaḥ sarve nānāśramanivāsinaḥ ।
gautamāśramam āpṛcchann āgacchantas tapodhanāḥ ।।
teṣāṃ munīnāṃ sarveṣām āgatānāṃ sa gautamaḥ ।
śiṣyavat putravad bhaktyā pitṛvat poṣako abhavat ।।
yasya yathepsitaṃ kāmaṃ yathāyogyaṃ yathākramam ।
yathānurūpaṃ sarveṣāṃ śuśrūṣām akaron muniḥ ।।
ājñayā gautamasyāsann oṣadhyo lokamātaraḥ ।
ārādhitāḥ punas tena brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ ।।
jāyante ca tadauṣadhyo lūyante ca tadaiva hi ।
saṃpatsyante tadopyante gautamasya tapobalāt ।।
sarvāḥ samṛddhayas tasya saṃsidhyante manogatāḥ ।
pratyahaṃ vakti vinayād gautamas tv āgatān munīn ।।
putravac chiṣyavac caiva preṣyavat karavāṇi kim ।
pitṛvat poṣayām āsa saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūn ।।
evaṃ vasatsu muniṣu trailokye khyātir āśrayāt ।
tato vināyakaḥ prāha mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ jayām ।।
{vināyaka uvāca 
devānāṃ sadane mātar gīyate gautamo dvijaḥ ।
yan na sādhyaṃ suragaṇair gautamaḥ kṛtavān iti ।।
evaṃ śrutaṃ mayā devi brāhmaṇasya tapobalam ।
sa vipraś cālayed enāṃ mātar gaṅgāṃ jaṭāgatām ।।
tapasā vānyato vāpi pūjayitvā trilocanam ।
sa eva cyāvayed enāṃ jaṭāsthāṃ me pitṛpriyām ।।
tatra nītir vidhātavyā tāṃ vipro yācayed yathā ।
tatprabhāvāt saricchreṣṭhā śiraso avataraty api ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā mātaraṃ bhrātrā jayayā saha vighnarāṭ ।
jagāma gautamo yatra brahmasūtradharaḥ kṛśaḥ ।।
vasan katipayāhaḥsu gautamāśramamaṇḍale ।
uvāca brāhmaṇān sarvāṃs tatra tatra ca vighnarāṭ ।।
gacchāmaḥ svam adhiṣṭhānam āśramāṇi śucīni ca ।
puṣṭāḥ sma gautamānnena pṛcchāmo gautamaṃ munim ।।
iti saṃmantrya pṛcchanti munayo munisattamāḥ ।
sa tān nivārayām āsa snehabuddhyā munīn pṛthak ।।
{gautama uvāca 
kṛtāñjaliḥ savinayam āsadhvam iha caiva hi ।
yuṣmaccaraṇaśuśrūṣāṃ karomi munipuṃgavāḥ ।।
śuśrūṣau putravan nityaṃ mayi tiṣṭhati nocitam ।
bhavatāṃ bhūmidevānām āśramāntarasevanam ।।
idam evāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ sarveṣām iti me matiḥ ।
alam anyena munaya āśrameṇa gatena vā ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā muner vākyaṃ vighnakṛtyam anusmaran ।
uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā brāhmaṇān sa gaṇādhipaḥ ।।
{gaṇādhipa uvāca 
annakrītā vayaṃ kiṃ no nivārayata gautamaḥ ।
sāmnā naiva vayaṃ śaktā gantuṃ svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam ।।
nāyam arhati daṇḍaṃ vā upakārī dvijottamaḥ ।
tasmād buddhyā vyavasyāmi tat sarvair anumanyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ sarve dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ kriyatām ity anubruvan ।
etasya tūpakārāya lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
brāhmaṇānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śreyo yat syāt tathā kuru ।
brāhmaṇānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā mene vākyaṃ gaṇādhipaḥ ।।
{vināyaka uvāca 
kriyate guṇarūpaṃ yad gautamasya viśeṣataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
anumānya dvijān sarvān punaḥ punar udāradhīḥ ।
svayaṃ ca brāhmaṇo bhūtvā praṇamya brāhmaṇān punaḥ ।
mātur mate sthito vidvāñ jayāṃ prāha gaṇeśvaraḥ ।।
{vināyaka uvāca 
yathā nānyo vijānīte tathā kuru śubhānane ।
gorūpadhāriṇī gaccha gautamo yatra tiṣṭhati ।।
śālīn khāda vināśyātha vikāraṃ kuru bhāmini ।
kṛte prahāre huṃkāre prekṣite cāpi kiṃcana ।
pata dīnaṃ svanaṃ kṛtvā na mriyasva na jīva ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathā cakāra vijayā vighneśvaramate sthitā ।
yatrāsīd gautamo vipro jayā gorūpadhāriṇī ।।
jagāma śālīn khādantī tāṃ dadarśa sa gautamaḥ ।
gāṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtāṃ vipras tāṃ tṛṇena nyavārayat ।।
nivāryamāṇā sā tena svanaṃ kṛtvā papāta gauḥ ।
tasyāṃ tu patitāyāṃ ca hāhākāro mahān abhūt ।।
svanaṃ śrutvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca gautamasya viceṣṭitam ।
vyathitā brāhmaṇāḥ prāhur vighnarājapuraskṛtāḥ ।।
{brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ 
ito gacchāmahe sarve na sthātavyaṃ tavāśrame ।
putravat poṣitāḥ sarve pṛṣṭo asi munipuṃgava ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā munir vākyaṃ viprāṇāṃ gacchatāṃ tadā ।
vajrāhata ivāsīt sa viprāṇāṃ purato apatat ।।
tam ūcur brāhmaṇāḥ sarve paśyemāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi ।
rudrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ devīṃ jagatāṃ pāvanīṃ priyām ।।
tīrthadevasvarūpiṇyām asyāṃ gavi vidher balāt ।
patitāyāṃ muniśreṣṭha gantavyam avaśiṣyate ।।
cīrṇaṃ vrataṃ kṣayaṃ yāti yathā vāsas tvadāśrame ।
vayaṃ nānyadhanā brahman kevalaṃ tu tapodhanāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
viprāṇāṃ purataḥ sthitvā vinītaḥ prāha gautamaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
bhavanta eva śaraṇaṃ pūtaṃ māṃ kartum arhatha ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ provāca bhagavān vighnarāḍ brāhmaṇair vṛtaḥ ।।
{vighnarāja uvāca 
naiveyaṃ mriyate tatra naiva jīvati tatra kim ।
vadāmo asmin susaṃdigdhe niṣkṛtiṃ gatim eva vā ।।
{gautama uvāca 
katham utthāsyatīyaṃ gaur atha cāsmiṃś ca niṣkṛtim ।
vaktum arhatha tat sarvaṃ kariṣye aham asaṃśayam ।।
{brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ 
sarveṣāṃ ca matenāyaṃ vadiṣyati ca buddhimān ।
etad vākyam athāsmākaṃ pramāṇaṃ tava gautama ।।
{brahmovāca 
brāhmaṇaiḥ preryamāṇo asau gautamena balīyasā ।
vighnakṛd brahmavapuṣā prāha sarvān idaṃ vacaḥ ।।
{vighnarāja uvāca 
sarveṣāṃ ca matenāhaṃ vadiṣyāmi yathārthavat ।
anumanyantu munayo madvākyaṃ gautamo api ca ।।
maheśvarajaṭājūṭe brahmaṇo avyaktajanmanaḥ ।
kamaṇḍalusthitaṃ vāri tiṣṭhatīti hi śuśruma ।।
tad ānayasva tarasā tapasā niyamena ca ।
tenābhiṣiñca gām etāṃ bhagavan bhuvam āśritām ।
tato vatsyāmahe sarve pūrvavat tava veśmani ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktavati viprendre brāhmaṇānāṃ ca saṃsadi ।
tatrāpatat puṣpavṛṣṭir jayaśabdo vyavardhata ।
tataḥ kṛtāñjalir namro gautamo vākyam abravīt ।।
{gautama uvāca 
tapasāgniprasādena devabrahmaprasādataḥ ।
bhavatāṃ ca prasādena matsaṃkalpo anusidhyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam astv iti taṃ viprā āpṛcchan munipuṃgavam ।
svāni sthānāni te jagmuḥ samṛddhāny annavāribhiḥ ।।
yāteṣu teṣu vipreṣu bhrātrā saha gaṇeśvaraḥ ।
jayayā saha suprītaḥ kṛtakṛtyo nyavartata ।।
gateṣu brahmavṛndeṣu gaṇeśe ca gate tathā ।
gautamo api muniśreṣṭhas tapasā hatakalmaṣaḥ ।।
dhyāyaṃs tadarthaṃ sa muniḥ kim idaṃ mama saṃsthitam ।
ity evaṃ bahuśo dhyāyañ jñānena jñātavān dvija ।।
niścitya devakāryārtham ātmanaḥ kilbiṣāṃ gatim ।
lokānām upakāraṃ ca śaṃbhoḥ prīṇanam eva ca ।।
umāyāḥ prīṇanaṃ cāpi gaṅgānayanam eva ca ।
sarvaṃ śreyaskaraṃ manye mayi naiva ca kilbiṣam ।।
ity evaṃ manasā dhyāyan suprīto abhūd dvijottamaḥ ।
ārādhya jagatām īśaṃ trinetraṃ vṛṣabhadhvajam ।।
ānayiṣye saricchreṣṭhāṃ prītā astu girijā mama ।
sapatnī jagadambāyā maheśvarajaṭāsthitā ।।
evaṃ hi saṃkalpya munipravīraḥ 
sa gautamo brahmagirer jagāma 
kailāsam ādhiṣṭhitam ugradhanvanā 
surārcitaṃ priyayā brahmavṛndaiḥ 
{nārada uvāca 
kailāsaśikharaṃ gatvā gautamo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ।
kiṃ cakāra tapo vāpi kāṃ cakre stutim uttamām ।।
{brahmovāca 
giriṃ gatvā tato vatsa vācaṃ saṃyamya gautamaḥ ।
āstīrya sa kuśān prājñaḥ kailāse parvatottame ।।
upaviśya śucir bhūtvā stotraṃ cedaṃ tato jagau ।
apatat puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca stūyamāne maheśvare ।।
{gautama uvāca 
bhogārthināṃ bhogam abhīpsitaṃ ca 
dātuṃ mahānty aṣṭavapūṃṣi dhatte 
somo janānāṃ guṇavanti nityaṃ 
devaṃ mahādevam iti stuvanti 
kartuṃ svakīyair viṣayaiḥ sukhāni 
bhartuṃ samastaṃ sacarācaraṃ ca 
saṃpattaye hy asya vivṛddhaye ca 
mahīmayaṃ rūpam itīśvarasya 
sṛṣṭeḥ sthiteḥ saṃharaṇāya bhūmer 
ādhāram ādhātum apāṃ svarūpam 
bheje śivaḥ śāntatanur janānāṃ 
sukhāya dharmāya jagat pratiṣṭhitam 
kālavyavasthām amṛtasravaṃ ca 
jīvasthitiṃ sṛṣṭim atho vināśanam 
mudaṃ prajānāṃ sukham unnatiṃ ca 
cakre arkacandrāgnimayaṃ śarīram 
vṛddhiṃ gatiṃ śaktim athākṣarāṇi 
jīvavyavasthāṃ mudam apy anekām 
sraṣṭuṃ kṛtaṃ vāyur itīśarūpaṃ 
tvaṃ vetsi nūnaṃ bhagavan bhavantam 
bhedair vinā naiva kṛtir na dharmo 
nātmīyam anyan na diśo antarikṣam 
dyāvāpṛthivyau na ca bhuktimuktī 
tasmād idaṃ vyomavapus taveśa 
dharmaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ vyavasya 
ṛksāmaśāstrāṇi yajuś ca śākhāḥ 
loke ca gāthāḥ smṛtayaḥ purāṇam 
ityādiśabdātmakatām upaiti 
yaṣṭā kratur yāny api sādhanāni 
ṛtvikpradeśaṃ phaladeśakālāḥ 
tvam eva śaṃbho paramārthatattvaṃ 
vadanti yajñāṅgamayaṃ vapus te 
kartā pradātā pratibhūḥ pradānaṃ 
sarvajñasākṣī puruṣaḥ paraś ca 
pratyātmabhūtaḥ paramārtharūpas 
tvam eva sarvaṃ kim u vāgvilāsaiḥ 
na vedaśāstrair gurubhiḥ pradiṣṭo 
na nāsi buddhyādibhir apradhṛṣyaḥ 
ajo aprameyaḥ śivaśabdavācyas 
tvam asti satyaṃ bhagavan namas te 
ātmaikatāṃ svaprakṛtiṃ kadācid 
aikṣac chivaḥ saṃpad iyaṃ mameti 
pṛthak tadaivābhavad apratarkya 
acintyaprabhāvo bahuviśvamūrtiḥ 
bhāve abhivṛddhā ca bhave bhave ca 
svakāraṇaṃ kāraṇam āsthitā ca 
nityā śivā sarvasulakṣaṇā vā 
vilakṣaṇā viśvakarasya śaktiḥ 
utpādanaṃ saṃsthitir annavṛddhi 
layāḥ satāṃ yatra sanātanās te 
ekaiva mūrtir na samasti kiṃcid 
asādhyam asyā dayitā harasya 
yadartham annāni dhanāni jīvā 
yacchanti kurvanti tapāṃsi dharmān 
sāpīyam ambā jagato janitrī 
priyā tu somasya mahāsukīrtiḥ 
yad īkṣitaṃ kāṅkṣati vāsavo api 
yannāmato maṅgalam āpnuyāc ca 
yā vyāpya viśvaṃ vimalīkaroti 
somā sadā somasamānarūpā 
brahmādijīvasya carācarasya 
buddhyakṣicaitanyamanaḥsukhāni 
yasyāḥ prasādāt phalavanti nityaṃ 
vāgīśvarī lokaguroḥ suramyā 
caturmukhasyāpi mano malīnaṃ 
kim anyajantor iti cintya mātā 
gaṅgāvatāraṃ vividhair upāyaiḥ 
sarvaṃ jagat pāvayituṃ cakāra 
śrutīḥ samālakṣya haraprabhutvaṃ 
viśvasya lokaḥ sakalaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ 
kṛtvā ca dharmān bubhuje ca bhogān 
vibhūtir eṣā tu sadāśivasya 
kāryakriyākārakasādhanānāṃ 
vedoditānām atha laukikānām 
yat sādhyam utkṛṣṭatamaṃ priyaṃ ca 
proktā ca sā siddhir anādikartuḥ 
dhyātvā varaṃ brahma paraṃ pradhānaṃ 
yat sārabhūtaṃ yad upāsitavyam 
yat prāpya muktā na punar bhavanti 
sadyogino muktir umāpatiḥ saḥ 
yathā yathā śaṃbhur ameyamāyā 
rūpāṇi dhatte jagato hitāya 
tadyogayogyāni tathaiva dhatse 
pativratātvaṃ tvayi mātar evam 
{brahmovāca 
ity evaṃ stuvatas tasya purastād vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ ।
umayā sahitaḥ śrīmān gaṇeśādigaṇair vṛtaḥ ।।
sākṣād āgatya taṃ śaṃbhuḥ prasanno vākyam abravīt ।।
{śiva uvāca 
kiṃ te gautama dāsyāmi bhaktistotravrataiḥ śubhaiḥ ।
parituṣṭo asmi yācasva devānām api duṣkaram ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā jaganmūrter vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ ।
harṣabāṣpaparītāṅgo gautamaḥ paryacintayat ।।
aho daivam aho dharmo hy aho vai viprapūjanam ।
aho lokagatiś citrā aho dhātar namo astu te ।।
{gautama uvāca 
jaṭāsthitāṃ śubhāṃ gaṅgāṃ dehi me tridaśārcita ।
yadi tuṣṭo asi deveśa trayīdhāma namo astu te ।।
{īśvara uvāca 
trayāṇām upakārārthaṃ lokānāṃ yācitaṃ tvayā ।
ātmanas tūpakārāya tad yācasvākutobhayaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
stotreṇānena ye bhaktās tvāṃ ca devīṃ stuvanti vai ।
sarvakāmasamṛddhāḥ syur etad dhi varayāmy aham ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam astv iti deveśaḥ parituṣṭo abravīd vacaḥ ।
anyān api varān matto yācasva vigatajvaraḥ ।।
evam uktas tu harṣeṇa gautamaḥ prāha śaṃkaram ।।
{gautama uvāca 
imāṃ devīṃ jaṭāsaṃsthāṃ pāvanīṃ lokapāvanīm ।
tava priyāṃ jagannātha utsṛja brahmaṇo girau ।।
sarvāsāṃ tīrthabhūtā tu yāvad gacchati sāgaram ।
brahmahatyādipāpāni manovākkāyikāni ca ।।
snānamātreṇa sarvāṇi vilayaṃ yāntu śaṃkara ।
candrasūryoparāge ca ayane viṣuve tathā ।।
saṃkrāntau vaidhṛtau puṇya- tīrtheṣv anyeṣu yat phalam ।
asyās tu smaraṇād eva tat puṇyaṃ jāyatāṃ hara ।।
ślāghyaṃ kṛte tapaḥ proktaṃ tretāyāṃ yajñakarma ca ।
dvāpare yajñadāne ca dānam eva kalau yuge ।।
yugadharmāś ca ye sarve deśadharmās tathaiva ca ।
deśakālādisaṃyoge yo dharmo yatra śasyate ।।
yad anyatra kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ snānadānādisaṃyamaiḥ ।
asyās tu smaraṇād eva tat puṇyaṃ jāyatāṃ hara ।।
yatra yatra tv iyaṃ yāti yāvat sāgaragāminī ।
tatra tatra tvayā bhāvyam eṣa cāstu varo varaḥ ।।
yojanānāṃ tūpari tu daśa yāvac ca saṃkhyayā ।
tadantarapraviṣṭānāṃ mahāpātakinām api ।।
tat pitṝṇāṃ ca teṣāṃ ca snānāyāgacchatāṃ śiva ।
snāne cāpy antare mṛtyor muktibhājo bhavantu vai ।।
ekataḥ sarvatīrthāni svargamartyarasātale ।
eṣā tebhyo viśiṣṭā tu alaṃ śaṃbho namo astu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad gautamavacaḥ śrutvā tathāstv ity abravīc chivaḥ ।
asyāḥ parataraṃ tīrthaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ।।
satyaṃ satyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ vede ca pariniṣṭhitam ।
sarveṣāṃ gautamī puṇyā ity uktvāntaradhīyata ।।
tato gate bhagavati lokapūjite 
tadājñayā pūrṇabalaḥ sa gautamaḥ 
jaṭāṃ samādāya saridvarāṃ tāṃ 
surair vṛto brahmagiriṃ viveśa 
tatas tu gautame prāpte jaṭām ādāya nārada ।
puṣpavṛṣṭir abhūt tatra samājagmuḥ sureśvarāḥ ।।
ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgā brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyās tathā ।
jayaśabdena taṃ vipraṃ pūjayanto mudānvitāḥ ।।
{nārada uvāca 
maheśvarajaṭājuṭād gaṅgām ādāya gautamaḥ ।
āgatya brahmaṇaḥ puṇye tataḥ kim akarod girau ।।
{brahmovāca 
ādāya gautamo gaṅgāṃ śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ ।
pūjito devagandharvais tathā girinivāsibhiḥ ।।
girer mūrdhni jaṭāṃ sthāpya smaran devaṃ trilocanam ।
uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā gaṅgāṃ sa dvijasattamaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
trilocanajaṭodbhūte sarvakāmapradāyini ।
kṣamasva mātaḥ śāntāsi sukhaṃ yāhi hitaṃ kuru ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktā gautamena gaṅgā provāca gautamam ।
divyarūpadharā devī divyasraganulepanā ।।
{gaṅgovāca 
gaccheyaṃ devasadanam athavāpi kamaṇḍalum ।
rasātalaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ jātas tvaṃ satyavāg asi ।।
{gautama uvāca 
trayāṇām upakārārthaṃ lokānāṃ yācitā mayā ।
śaṃbhunā ca tathā dattā devi tan nānyathā bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad gautamavacaḥ śrutvā gaṅgā mene dvijeritam ।
tredhātmānaṃ vibhajyātha svargamartyarasātale ।।
svarge caturdhā vyagamat saptadhā martyamaṇḍale ।
rasātale caturdhaiva saivaṃ pañcadaśākṛtiḥ ।।
sarvatra sarvabhūtaiva sarvapāpavināśinī ।
sarvakāmapradā nityaṃ saiva vede pragīyate ।।
martyā martyagatām eva paśyanti na talaṃ gatām ।
naiva svargagatāṃ martyāḥ paśyanty ajñānabuddhayaḥ ।।
yāvat sāgaragā devī tāvad devamayī smṛtā ।
utsṛṣṭā gautamenaiva prāyāt pūrvārṇavaṃ prati ।।
tato devarṣibhir juṣṭāṃ mātaraṃ jagataḥ śubhām ।
gautamo muniśārdūlaḥ pradakṣiṇam athākarot ।।
trilocanaṃ sureśānaṃ prathamaṃ pūjya gautamaḥ ।
ubhayos tīrayoḥ snānaṃ karomīti dadhe matim ।।
smṛtamātras tadā tatrā- virāsīt karuṇārṇavaḥ ।
tatra snānaṃ kathaṃ sidhyed ity evaṃ śarvam abravīt ।।
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā bhaktinamras trilocanam ।।
{gautama uvāca 
devadeva maheśāna tīrthasnānavidhiṃ mama ।
brūhi samyaṅ maheśāna lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
