{śiva uvāca 
maharṣe śṛṇu sarvaṃ ca vidhiṃ godāvarībhavam ।
pūrvaṃ nāndīmukhaṃ kṛtvā dehaśuddhiṃ vidhāya ca ।।
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā ca teṣām ājñāṃ pragṛhya ca ।
brahmacaryeṇa gacchanti patitālāpavarjitāḥ ।।
yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaś caiva susaṃyatam ।
vidyā tapaś ca kīrtiś ca sa tīrthaphalam aśnute ।।
bhāvaduṣṭiṃ parityajya svadharmapariniṣṭhitaḥ ।
śrāntasaṃvāhanaṃ kurvan dadyād annaṃ yathocitam ।।
akiṃcanebhyaḥ sādhubhyo dadyād vastrāṇi kambalān ।
śṛṇvan harikathāṃ divyāṃ tathā gaṅgāsamudbhavām ।
anena vidhinā gacchan samyak tīrthaphalaṃ labhet ।।
{brahmovāca 
tryambakaś ca iti prāha gautamaṃ munibhir vṛtam ।।
{śiva uvāca 
dvihastamātre tīrthāni saṃbhaviṣyanti gautama ।
sarvatrāhaṃ saṃnihitaḥ sarvakāmapradas tathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
gaṅgādvāre prayāge ca tathā sāgarasaṃgame ।
eteṣu puṇyadā puṃsāṃ muktidā sā bhagīrathī ।।
narmadā tu saricchreṣṭhā parvate amarakaṇṭake ।
yamunā saṃgatā tatra prabhāse tu sarasvatī ।।
kṛṣṇā bhīmarathī caiva tuṅgabhadrā tu nārada ।
tisṛṇāṃ saṃgamo yatra tat tīrthaṃ muktidaṃ nṛṇām ।।
payouṣṇī saṃgatā yatra tatratyā tac ca muktidam ।
iyaṃ tu gautamī vatsa yatra kvāpi mamājñayā ।।
sarveṣāṃ sarvadā nṝṇāṃ snānān muktiṃ pradāsyati ।
kiṃcitkāle puṇyatamaṃ kiṃcittīrthaṃ surāgame ।।
sarveṣāṃ sarvadā tīrthaṃ gautamī nātra saṃśayaḥ ।
tisraḥ koṭyo ardhakoṭī ca yojanānāṃ śatadvaye ।।
tīrthāni muniśārdūla saṃbhaviṣyanti gautama ।
iyaṃ māheśvarī gaṅgā gautamī vaiṣṇavīti ca ।।
brāhmī godāvarī nandā sunandā kāmadāyinī ।
brahmatejaḥsamānītā sarvapāpapraṇāśanī ।।
smaraṇād eva pāpaugha- hantrī mama sadā priyā ।
pañcānām api bhūtānām āpaḥ śreṣṭhatvam āgatāḥ ।।
tatrāpi tīrthabhūtās tu tasmād āpaḥ parāḥ smṛtāḥ ।
tāsāṃ bhāgīrathī śreṣṭhā tābhyo api gautamī tathā ।।
ānītā sajaṭā gaṅgā asyā nānyac chubhāvaham ।
svarge bhuvi tale vāpi tīrthaṃ sarvārthadaṃ mune ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity etat kathitaṃ putra gautamāya mahātmane ।
sākṣād dhareṇa tuṣṭena mayā tava niveditam ।।
evaṃ sā gautamī gaṅgā sarvebhyo apy adhikā matā ।
tatsvarūpaṃ ca kathitaṃ kuto anyā śravaṇaspṛhā ।।
{nārada uvāca 
dvividhā saiva gaditā ekāpi surasattama ।
eko bhedas tu kathito brāhmaṇenāhṛto yataḥ ।।
kṣatriyeṇāparo apy aṃśo jaṭāsv eva vyavasthitaḥ ।
bhavasya devadevasya āhṛtas tad vadasva me ।।
{brahmovāca 
vaivasvatānvaye jāta ikṣvākukulasaṃbhavaḥ ।
purā vai sagaro nāma rājāsīd atidhārmikaḥ ।।
yajvā dānaparo nityaṃ dharmācāravicāravān ।
tasya bhāryādvayaṃ cāsīt patibhaktiparāyaṇam ।।
tasya vai saṃtatir nābhūd iti cintāparo abhavat ।
vasiṣṭhaṃ gṛham āhūya saṃpūjya vidhivat tataḥ ।।
uvāca vacanaṃ rājā saṃtateḥ kāraṇaṃ prati ।
iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā dhyātvā rājānam abravīt ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
sapatnīkaḥ sadā rājann ṛṣipūjāparo bhava ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā sa munir vipra yathāsthānaṃ jagāma ha ।
ekadā tasya rājarṣer gṛham āgāt taponidhiḥ ।।
tasyarṣeḥ pūjanaṃ cakre sa saṃtuṣṭo abravīd vacam ।
varaṃ brūhi mahābhāgety ukte putrān sa cāvṛṇot ।।
sa muniḥ prāha rājānam ekasyāṃ vaṃśadhārakaḥ ।
putro bhūyāt tathānyasyāṃ ṣaṣṭisāhasrakaṃ sutāḥ ।।
varaṃ dattvā munau yāte putrā jātāḥ sahasraśaḥ ।
sa yajñān subahūṃś cakre hayamedhān sudakṣiṇān ।।
ekasmin hayamedhe vai dīkṣito vidhivan nṛpaḥ ।
putrān nyayojayad rājā sasainyān hayarakṣaṇe ।।
kvacid antaram āsādya hayaṃ jahre śatakratuḥ ।
mārgamāṇāś ca te putrā naivāpaśyan hayaṃ tadā ।।
sahasrāṇāṃ tathā ṣaṣṭir nānāyuddhaviśāradāḥ ।
teṣu paśyatsu rakṣāṃsi putreṣu sagarasya hi ।।
prokṣitaṃ tad dhayaṃ nītvā te rasātalam āgaman ।
rākṣasān māyayā yuktān naivāpaśyanta sāgarāḥ ।।
na dṛṣṭvā te hayaṃ putrāḥ sagarasya balīyasaḥ ।
itaś cetaś carantas te naivāpaśyan hayaṃ tadā ।।
devalokaṃ tadā jagmuḥ parvatāṃś ca sarāṃsi ca ।
vanāni ca vicinvanto naivāpaśyan hayaṃ tadā ।।
kṛtasvastyayano rājā ṛtvigbhiḥ kṛtamaṅgalaḥ ।
adṛṣṭvā tu paśuṃ ramyaṃ rājā cintām upeyivān ।।
aṭantaḥ sāgarāḥ sarve devalokam upāgaman ।
hayaṃ tam anucinvantas tatrāpi na hayo abhavat ।।
tato mahīṃ samājagmuḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca ।
tatrāpi ca hayaṃ naiva dṛṣṭavanto nṛpātmajāḥ ।।
etasminn antare tatra daivī vāg abhavat tadā ।
rasātale hayo baddha āste nānyatra sāgarāḥ ।।
iti śrutvā tato vākyaṃ gantukāmā rasātalam ।
akhanan pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ paritaḥ sāgarās tataḥ ।।
te kṣudhārtā mṛdaṃ śuṣkāṃ bhakṣayantas tv aharniśam ।
nyakhanaṃś cāpi jagmuś ca satvarās te rasātalam ।।
tān āgatān bhūpasutān sāgarān balinaḥ kṛtīn ।
śrutvā rakṣāṃsi saṃtrastā vyagaman kapilāntikam ।।
kapilo api mahāprājñas tatra śete rasātale ।
purā ca sādhitaṃ tena devānāṃ kāryam uttamam ।।
vinidreṇa tataḥ śrāntaḥ siddhe kārye surān prati ।
abravīt kapilaḥ śrīmān nidrāsthānaṃ prayacchatha ।।
rasātalaṃ dadus tasmai punar āha surān muniḥ ।
yo mām utthāpayen mando bhasmī bhūyāc ca satvaram ।।
tataḥ śaye talagato no cen na svapna eva hi ।
tathety uktaḥ suragaṇais tatra śete rasātale ।।
tasya prabhāvaṃ te jñātvā rākṣasā māyayā yutāḥ ।
sāgarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ vadhopāyaṃ pracakrire ।।
vinā yuddhena te bhītā rākṣasāḥ satvarās tadā ।
āgatya yatra sa muniḥ kapilaḥ kopano mahān ।।
śirodeśe hayaṃ te vai baddhvātha tvarayānvitāḥ ।
dūre sthitvā mauninaś ca prekṣantaḥ kiṃ bhaved iti ।।
tatas tu sāgarāḥ sarve nirviśanto rasātalam ।
dadṛśus te hayaṃ baddhaṃ śayānaṃ puruṣaṃ tathā ।।
taṃ menire ca hartāraṃ kratuhantāram eva ca ।
enaṃ hatvā mahāpāpaṃ nayāmo aśvaṃ nṛpāntikam ।।
kecid ūcuḥ paśuṃ baddhaṃ nayāmo anena kiṃ phalam ।
tadāhur apare śūrā rājānaḥ śāsakā vayam ।।
utthāpyainaṃ mahāpāpaṃ hanmaḥ kṣātreṇa varcasā ।
te taṃ jaghnur muniṃ pādair bruvanto niṣṭhurāṇi ca ।।
tataḥ kopena mahatā kapilo munisattamaḥ ।
sāgarān īkṣayām āsa tān kopād bhasmasāt karot ।।
jajvalus te tatas tatra sāgarāḥ sarva eva hi ।
tat tu sarvaṃ na jānāti dīkṣitaḥ sagaro nṛpaḥ ।।
nāradaḥ kathayām āsa sagarāya mahātmane ।
kapilasya tu saṃsthānaṃ hayasyāpi tu saṃsthitim ।।
rākṣasānāṃ tu vikṛtiṃ sāgarāṇāṃ ca nāśanam ।
tataś cintāparo rājā kartavyaṃ nāvabudhyata ।।
aparo api sutaś cāsīd asamañjā iti śrutaḥ ।
sa tu bālāṃs tathā paurān maurkhyāt kṣipati cāmbhasi ।।
sagaro apy atha vijñaptaḥ pauraiḥ saṃmilitais tadā ।
durnayaṃ tasya taṃ jñātvā tataḥ kruddho abravīn nṛpaḥ ।।
svān amātyāṃs tadā rājā deśatyāgaṃ karotv ayam ।
asamañjāḥ kṣatradharma- tyāgī vai bālaghātakaḥ ।।
sagarasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmātyās tvarānvitāḥ ।
tatyajur nṛpateḥ putram asamañjā gato vanam ।।
sāgarā brahmaśāpena naṣṭāḥ sarve rasātale ।
eko api ca vanaṃ prāpta idānīṃ kā gatir mama ।।
aṃśumān iti vikhyātaḥ putras tasyāsamañjasaḥ ।
ānāyya bālakaṃ rājā kāryaṃ tasmai nyavedayat ।।
kapilaṃ ca samārādhya aṃśumān api bālakaḥ ।
sagarāya hayaṃ prādāt tataḥ pūrṇo abhavat kratuḥ ।।
tasyāpi putras tejasvī dilīpa iti dhārmikaḥ ।
tasyāpi putro matimān bhagīratha iti śrutaḥ ।।
pitāmahānāṃ sarveṣāṃ gatiṃ śrutvā suduḥkhitaḥ ।
sagaraṃ nṛpaśārdūlaṃ papraccha vinayānvitaḥ ।।
sāgarāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ niṣkṛtis tu kathaṃ bhavet ।
bhagīrathaṃ nṛpaḥ prāha kapilo vetti putraka ।।
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bālaḥ prāyād rasātalam ।
kapilaṃ ca namaskṛtvā sarvaṃ tasmai nyavedayat ।।
sa munis tu ciraṃ dhyātvā tapasārādhya śaṃkaram ।
jaṭājalena svapitṝn āplāvya nṛpasattama ।।
tataḥ kṛtārtho bhavitā tvaṃ ca te pitaras tathā ।
tathā karomīti muniṃ praṇamya punar abravīt ।।
kva gacche ahaṃ muniśreṣṭha kartavyaṃ cāpi tad vada ।।
{kapila uvāca 
kailāsaṃ taṃ naraśreṣṭha gatvā stuhi maheśvaram ।
tapaḥ kuru yathāśakti tataś cepsitam āpsyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chrutvā sa muner vākyaṃ muniṃ natvā tv agān nagam ।
kailāsaṃ sa śucir bhūtvā bālo bālakriyānvitaḥ ।
tapase niścayaṃ kṛtvā uvāca sa bhagīrathaḥ ।।
{bhagīratha uvāca 
bālo ahaṃ bālabuddhiś ca bālacandradhara prabho ।
nāhaṃ kimapi jānāmi tataḥ prīto bhava prabho ।।
vāgbhir manobhiḥ kṛtibhiḥ kadācin 
mamopakurvanti hite ratā ye 
tebhyo hitārthaṃ tv iha cāmareśa 
somaṃ namasyāmi surādipūjyam 
utpādito yair abhivardhitaś ca 
samānagotraś ca samānadharmā 
teṣām abhīṣṭāni śivaḥ karotu 
bālendumauliṃ praṇato asmi nityam 
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ tu bruvatas tasya purastād abhavac chivaḥ ।
vareṇa cchandayāno vai bhagīratham uvāca ha ।।
{śiva uvāca 
yan na sādhyaṃ suragaṇair deyaṃ tat te mayā dhruvam ।
vadasva nirbhayo bhūtvā bhagīratha mahāmate ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhagīrathaḥ praṇamyeśaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ provāca śaṃkaram ।।
{bhagīratha uvāca 
jaṭāsthitāṃ pitṝṇāṃ me pāvanāya saridvarām ।
tām eva dehi deveśa sarvam āptaṃ tato bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
maheśo api vihasyātha bhagīratham uvāca ha ।।
{śiva uvāca 
dattā mayeyaṃ te putra punas tāṃ stuhi suvrata ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad devavacanaṃ śrutvā tadarthaṃ tu tapo mahat ।
stutiṃ cakāra gaṅgāyā bhaktyā prayatamānasaḥ ।।
tasyā api prasādaṃ ca prāpya bālo apy abālavat ।
gaṅgāṃ maheśvarāt prāptām ādāyāgād rasātalam ।।
nyavedayat sa munaye kapilāya mahātmane ।
yathoditaprakāreṇa gaṅgāṃ saṃsthāpya yatnataḥ ।।
pradakṣiṇam athāvartya kṛtāñjalipuṭo abravīt ।।
{bhagīratha uvāca 
devi me pitaraḥ śāpāt kapilasya mahāmuneḥ ।
prāptās te vigatiṃ mātas tasmāt tān pātum arhasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā suranadī sarveṣām upakārikā ।
lokānām upakārārthaṃ pitṝṇāṃ pāvanāya ca ।।
agastyapītasyāmbhodheḥ pūraṇāya viśeṣataḥ ।
smaraṇād eva pāpānāṃ nāśāya suranimnagā ।।
bhagīrathoditaṃ cakre rasātalatale sthitān ।
bhasmībhūtān nṛpasutān sāgarāṃś ca viśeṣataḥ ।।
vinirdagdhān athāplāvya khātapūram athākarot ।
tato meruṃ samāplāvya sthitāṃ bālo abravīn nṛpaḥ ।।
karmabhūmau tvayā bhāvyaṃ tathety āgād dhimālayam ।
himavatparvatāt puṇyād bhārataṃ varṣam abhyagāt ।।
tanmadhyataḥ puṇyanadī prāyāt pūrvārṇavaṃ prati ।
evam eṣāpi te proktā gaṅgā kṣātrā mahāmune ।।
māheśvarī vaiṣṇavī ca saiva brāhmī ca pāvanī ।
bhāgīrathī devanadī himavacchikharāśrayā ।।
maheśvarajaṭāvāri evaṃ dvaividhyam āgatam ।
vindhyasya dakṣiṇe gaṅgā gautamī sā nigadyate ।
uttare sāpi vindhyasya bhāgīrathy abhidhīyate ।।
{nārada uvāca 
na manas tṛptim ādhatte kathāḥ śṛṇvat tvayeritāḥ ।
pṛthak tīrthaphalaṃ śrotuṃ pravṛttaṃ mama mānasam ।।
kramaśo brāhmaṇānītāṃ gaṅgāṃ me prathamaṃ vada ।
pṛthak tīrthaphalaṃ puṇyaṃ setihāsaṃ yathākramam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tīrthānāṃ ca pṛthag bhāvaṃ phalaṃ māhātmyam eva ca ।
sarvaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknomi na ca tvaṃ śravaṇe kṣamaḥ ।।
tathāpi kiṃcid vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada yatnataḥ ।
yāny uktāni ca tīrthāni śrutivākyāni yāni ca ।।
tāni vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepān namaskṛtvā trilocanam ।
yatrāsau bhagavān āsīt pratyakṣas tryambako mune ।।
tryambakaṃ nāma tat tīrthaṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakam ।
vārāham aparaṃ tīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam ।।
tasya rūpaṃ pravakṣyāmi nāma viṣṇor yathābhavat ।
purā devān parābhūya yajñam ādāya rākṣasaḥ ।।
rasātalam anuprāptaḥ sindhusena iti śrutaḥ ।
yajñe talam anuprāpte niryajñā hy abhavan mahī ।।
nāyaṃ loko asti na paro yajñe naṣṭa itītvarāḥ ।
surās tam eva viviśū rasātalam anudviṣam ।।
nāśaknuvaṃs tu taṃ jetuṃ devā indrapurogamāḥ ।
viṣṇuṃ purāṇapuruṣaṃ gatvā tasmai nyavedayan ।।
rākṣasasya tu tat karma yajñabhraṃśam aśeṣataḥ ।
tataḥ provāca bhagavān vārāhaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ ।।
śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇir gatvā caiva rasātalam ।
ānayiṣye makhaṃ puṇyaṃ hatvā rākṣasapuṃgavān ।।
svaḥ prayāntu surāḥ sarve vyetu vo mānaso jvaraḥ ।
yena gaṅgā talaṃ prāptā pathā tenaiva cakradhṛk ।।
jagāma tarasā putra bhuvaṃ bhittvā rasātalam ।
sa varāhavapuḥ śrīmān rasātalanivāsinaḥ ।।
rākṣasān dānavān hatvā mukhe dhṛtvā mahādhvaram ।
vārāharūpī bhagavān makham ādāya yajñabhuk ।।
yena prāpa talaṃ viṣṇuḥ pathā tenaiva śatrujit ।
mukhe nyasya mahāyajñaṃ niścakrāma rasātalāt ।।
tatra brahmagirau devāḥ pratīkṣāṃ cakrire hareḥ ।
pathas tasmād viniḥsṛtya gaṅgāsravaṇam abhyagāt ।।
prākṣālayac ca svāṅgāni asṛgliptāni nārada ।
gaṅgāmbhasā tatra kuṇḍaṃ vārāham abhavat tataḥ ।।
mukhe nyastaṃ mahāyajñaṃ devānāṃ purato hariḥ ।
dattavāṃs tridaśaśreṣṭho mukhād yajño abhyajāyata ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti yajñāṅgaṃ pradhānaṃ sruva ucyate ।
vārāharūpam abhavad evaṃ vai kāraṇāntarāt ।।
tasmāt puṇyatamaṃ tīrthaṃ vārāhaṃ sarvakāmadam ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakratuphalapradam ।।
tatra sthito api yaḥ kaścit pitṝn smarati puṇyakṛt ।
vimuktāḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ pitaraḥ svargam āpnuyuḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
kuśāvartasya māhātmyam ahaṃ vaktuṃ na te kṣamaḥ ।
tasya smaraṇamātreṇa kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ ।।
kuśāvartam iti khyātaṃ narāṇāṃ sarvakāmadam ।
kuśenāvartitaṃ yatra gautamena mahātmanā ।।
kuśenāvartayitvā tu ānayām āsa tāṃ muniḥ ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ tṛptidāyakam ।।
nīlagaṅgā saricchreṣṭhā niḥsṛtā nīlaparvatāt ।
tatra snānādi yat kiṃcit karoti prayato naraḥ ।।
sarvaṃ tad akṣayaṃ vidyāt pitṝṇāṃ tṛptidāyakam ।
viśrutaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kapotaṃ tīrtham uttamam ।।
tasya rūpaṃ ca vakṣyāmi mune śṛṇu mahāphalam ।
tatra brahmagirau kaścid vyādhaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ ।।
hinasti brāhmaṇān sādhūn yatīn gopakṣiṇo mṛgān ।
evaṃbhūtaḥ sa pāpātmā krodhano anṛtabhāṣaṇaḥ ।।
bhīṣaṇākṛtir atyugro nīlākṣo hrasvabāhukaḥ ।
danturo naṣṭanāsākṣo hrasvapāt pṛthukukṣikaḥ ।।
hrasvodaro hrasvabhujo vikṛto gardabhasvanaḥ ।
pāśahastaḥ pāpacittaḥ pāpiṣṭhaḥ sadhanuḥ sadā ।।
tasya bhāryā tathābhūtā apatyāny api nārada ।
tayā tu preryamāṇo asau viveśa gahanaṃ vanam ।।
sa jaghāna mṛgān pāpaḥ pakṣiṇo bahurūpiṇaḥ ।
pañjare prākṣipat kāṃścij jīvamānāṃs tathetarān ।।
kṣudhayā paritaptāṅgo vihvalas tṛṣayā tathā ।
bhrāntadeśo bahutaraṃ nyavartata gṛhaṃ prati ।।
tato aparāhṇe saṃprāpte nivṛtte madhumādhave ।
kṣaṇāt taḍid garjitaṃ ca sābhraṃ caivābhavat tadā ।।
vavau vāyuḥ sāśmavarṣo vāridhārātibhīṣaṇaḥ ।
sa gacchaṃl lubdhakaḥ śrāntaḥ panthānaṃ nāvabudhyata ।।
jalaṃ sthalaṃ gartam atho panthānam athavā diśaḥ ।
na bubodha tadā pāpaḥ śrāntaḥ śaraṇam apy atha ।।
kva gacchāmi kva tiṣṭheyaṃ kiṃ karomīty acintayat ।
sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇān āhartāhaṃ yathāntakaḥ ।।
mamāpy antakaraṃ bhūtaṃ saṃprāptaṃ cāśmavarṣaṇam ।
trātāraṃ naiva paśyāmi śilāṃ vā vṛkṣam antike ।।
evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vyādho vicintyāpaśyad antike ।
vane vanaspatim iva nakṣatrāṇāṃ yathātrijam ।।
mṛgāṇāṃ ca yathā siṃham āśramāṇāṃ gṛhādhipam ।
indriyāṇāṃ mana iva trātāraṃ prāṇināṃ nagam ।।
śreṣṭhaṃ viṭapinaṃ śubhraṃ śākhāpallavamaṇḍitam ।
tam āśrityopaviṣṭo abhūt klinnavāsā sa lubdhakaḥ ।।
smaran bhāryām apatyāni jīveyur athavā na vā ।
etasminn antare tatra cāstaṃ prāpto divākaraḥ ।।
tam eva nagam āśritya kapoto bhāryayā saha ।
putrapautraiḥ parivṛto hy āste tatra nagottame ।।
sukhena nirbhayo bhūtvā sutṛptaḥ prīta eva ca ।
bahavo vatsarā yātā vasatas tasya pakṣiṇaḥ ।।
pativratā tasya bhāryā suprītā tena caiva hi ।
koṭare tannage śreṣṭhe jalavāyvagnivarjite ।।
bhāryāputraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvadāste kapotakaḥ ।
tasmin dine daivavaśāt kapotaś ca kapotakī ।।
bhakṣyārthaṃ tu ubhau yātau kapoto nagam abhyagāt ।
sāpi daivavaśāt putra pañjarasthaiva vartate ।।
gṛhītā lubdhakenātha jīvamāneva vartate ।
kapotako apy apatyāni mātṛhīnāny udīkṣya ca ।।
varṣaṃ ca bhīṣaṇaṃ prāptam astaṃ yāto divākaraḥ ।
svakoṭaraṃ tayā hīnam ālokya vilalāpa saḥ ।।
tāṃ baddhāṃ pañjarasthāṃ vā na bubodha kapotarāṭ ।
anvārebhe kapoto vai priyāyā guṇakīrtanam ।।
nādyāpy āyāti kalyāṇī mama harṣavivardhinī ।
mama dharmasya jananī mama dehasya ceśvarī ।।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ saiva nityaṃ sahāyinī ।
tuṣṭe hasantī ruṣṭe ca mama duḥkhapramārjanī ।।
sakhī mantreṣu sā nityaṃ mama vākyaratā sadā ।
nādyāpy āyāti kalyāṇī saṃprayāte api bhāskare ।।
na jānāti vrataṃ mantraṃ daivaṃ dharmārtham eva ca ।
pativratā patiprāṇā patimantrā patipriyā ।।
nādyāpy āyāti kalyāṇī kiṃ karomi kva yāmi vā ।
kiṃ me gṛhaṃ kānanaṃ ca tayā hīnaṃ hi dṛśyate ।।
tayā yuktaṃ śriyā yuktaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ vāpi śobhanam ।
nādyāpy āyāti me kāntā yayā gṛham udīritam ।।
vinānayā na jīviṣye tyaje vāpi priyāṃ tanum ।
kiṃ kurvantu tv apatyāni luptadharmas tv ahaṃ punaḥ ।।
evaṃ vilapatas tasya bhartur vākyaṃ niśamya sā ।
pañjarasthaiva sā vākyaṃ bhartāram idam abravīt ।।
{kapotaky uvāca 
atrāham asmi baddhaiva vivaśāsmi khagottama ।
ānītāhaṃ lubdhakena baddhā pāśair mahāmate ।।
dhanyāsmy anugṛhītāsmi patir vakti guṇān mama ।
sato vāpy asato vāpi kṛtārthāhaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।।
tuṣṭe bhartari nārīṇāṃ tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ ।
viparyaye tu nārīṇām avaśyaṃ nāśam āpnuyāt ।।
tvaṃ daivaṃ tvaṃ prabhur mahyaṃ tvaṃ suhṛt tvaṃ parāyaṇam ।
tvaṃ vrataṃ tvaṃ paraṃ brahma svargo mokṣas tvam eva ca ।।
mā cintāṃ kuru kalyāṇa dharme buddhiṃ sthirāṃ kuru ।
tvatprasādāc ca bhuktā hi bhogāś ca vividhā mayā ।
alaṃ khedena majjena dharme buddhiṃ kuru sthirām ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā priyāvākyam uttatāra nagottamāt ।
yatra sā pañjarasthā tu kapotī vartate tvaram ।।
tām āgatya priyāṃ dṛṣṭvā mṛtavac cāpi lubdhakam ।
mocayāmīti tām āha niśceṣṭo lubdhako adhunā ।।
mā muñcasva mahābhāga jñātvā saṃbandham asthiram ।
lubdhānāṃ khecarā hy annaṃ jīvo jīvasya cāśanam ।।
nāparādhaṃ smarāmy asya dharmabuddhiṃ sthirāṃ kuru ।
gurur agnir dvijātīnāṃ varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇo guruḥ ।।
patir eva guruḥ strīṇāṃ sarvasyābhyāgato guruḥ ।
abhyāgatam anuprāptaṃ vacanais toṣayanti ye ।।
teṣāṃ vāgīśvarī devī tṛptā bhavati niścitam ।
tasyānnasya pradānena śakras tṛptim avāpnuyāt ।।
pitaraḥ pādaśaucena annādyena prajāpatiḥ ।
tasyopacārād vai lakṣmīr viṣṇunā prītim āpnuyāt ।।
śayane sarvadevās tu tasmāt pūjyatamo atithiḥ ।
abhyāgatam anuśrāntaṃ sūryoḍhaṃ gṛham āgatam ।
taṃ vidyād devarūpeṇa sarvakratuphalo hy asau ।।
abhyāgataṃ śrāntam anuvrajanti 
devāś ca sarve pitaro agnayaś ca 
tasmin hi tṛpte mudam āpnuvanti 
gate nirāśe api ca te nirāśāḥ 
tasmāt sarvātmanā kānta duḥkhaṃ tyaktvā śamaṃ vraja ।
kṛtvā tiṣṭha śubhāṃ buddhiṃ dharmakṛtyaṃ samācara ।।
upakāro apakāraś ca pravarāv iti saṃmatau ।
upakāriṣu sarvo api karoty upakṛtiṃ punaḥ ।।
apakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ puṇyabhāk sa udāhṛtaḥ ।।
{kapota uvāca 
āvayor anurūpaṃ ca tvayoktaṃ sādhu manyase ।
kiṃtu vaktavyam apy asti tac chṛṇuṣva varānane ।।
sahasraṃ bharate kaścic chatam anyo daśāparaḥ ।
ātmānaṃ ca sukhenānyo vayaṃ kaṣṭodaraṃbharāḥ ।।
gartadhānyadhanāḥ kecit kuśūladhanino apare ।
ghaṭakṣiptadhanāḥ kecic cañcukṣiptadhanā vayam ।।
pūjayāmi kathaṃ śrāntam abhyāgatam imaṃ śubhe ।।
{kapoty uvāca 
agnir āpaḥ śubhā vāṇī tṛṇakāṣṭhādikaṃ ca yat ।
etad apy arthine deyaṃ śītārto lubdhakas tv ayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā priyāvākyaṃ vṛkṣam āruhya pakṣirāṭ ।
ālokayām āsa tadā vahniṃ dūraṃ dadarśa ha ।।
sa tu gatvā vahnideśaṃ cañcunolmukam āharat ।
puro agniṃ jvālayām āsa lubdhakasya kapotakaḥ ।।
śuṣkakāṣṭhāni parṇāni tṛṇāni ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
agnau nikṣepayām āsa niśīthe sa kapotarāṭ ।।
tam agniṃ jvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhakaḥ śītaduḥkhitaḥ ।
avaśāni svakāṅgāni pratāpya sukham āptavān ।।
kṣudhāgninā dahyamānaṃ vyādhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kapotakī ।
mā muñcasva mahābhāga iti bhartāram abravīt ।।
svaśarīreṇa duḥkhārtaṃ lubdhakaṃ prīṇayāmi tam ।
iṣṭātithīnāṃ ye lokās tāṃs tvaṃ prāpnuhi suvrata ।।
{kapota uvāca 
mayi tiṣṭhati naivāyaṃ tava dharmo vidhīyate ।
iṣṭātithir bhavāmīha anujānīhi māṃ śubhe ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvāgniṃ trir āvartya smaran devaṃ caturbhujam ।
viśvātmakaṃ mahāviṣṇuṃ śaraṇyaṃ bhaktavatsalam ।।
yathāsukhaṃ juṣasveti vadann agniṃ tathāviśat ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvāgnau kṣiptajīvaṃ lubdhako vākyam abravīt ।।
{lubdhaka uvāca 
aho mānuṣadehasya dhig jīvitam idaṃ mama ।
yad idaṃ pakṣirājena madarthe sāhasaṃ kṛtam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ bruvantaṃ taṃ lubdhaṃ pakṣiṇī vākyam abravīt ।।
{kapotaky uvāca 
māṃ tvaṃ muñca mahābhāga dūraṃ yāty eṣa me patiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pañjarasthāṃ kapotakīm ।
lubdhako mocayām āsa tarasā bhītavat tadā ।।
sāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā patim agniṃ tadā jagau ।।
{kapoty uvāca 
strīṇām ayaṃ paro dharmo yad bhartur anuveśanam ।
vede ca vihito mārgaḥ sarvalokeṣu pūjitaḥ ।।
vyālagrāhī yathā vyālaṃ bilād uddharate balāt ।
evaṃ tv anugatā nārī saha bhartrā divaṃ vrajet ।।
tisraḥ koṭyo ardhakoṭī ca yāni romāṇi mānuṣe ।
tāvatkālaṃ vaset svarge bhartāraṃ yānugacchati ।।
namaskṛtvā bhuvaṃ devān gaṅgāṃ cāpi vanaspatīn ।
āśvāsya tāny apatyāni lubdhakaṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{kapoty uvāca 
tvatprasādān mahābhāga upapannaṃ mamedṛśam ।
apatyānāṃ kṣamasveha bhartrā yāmi triviṣṭapam ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā pakṣiṇī sādhvī praviveśa hutāśanam ।
praviṣṭāyāṃ hutavahe jayaśabdo nyavartata ।।
gagane sūryasaṃkāśaṃ vimānam atiśobhanam ।
tadārūḍhau suranibhau daṃpatī dadṛśe tataḥ ।।
harṣeṇa procatur ubhau lubdhakaṃ vismayānvitam ।।
{daṃpatī ūcatuḥ 
gacchāvas tridaśasthānam āpṛṣṭo asi mahāmate ।
āvayoḥ svargasopānam atithis tvaṃ namo astu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
vimānavaram ārūḍhau tau dṛṣṭvā lubdhako api saḥ ।
sadhanuḥ pañjaraṃ tyaktvā kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata ।।
{lubdhaka uvāca 
na tyaktavyo mahābhāgau deyaṃ kiṃcid ajānate ।
aham atrātithir mānyo niṣkṛtiṃ vaktum arhathaḥ ।।
{daṃpatī ūcatuḥ 
gautamīṃ gaccha bhadraṃ te tasyāḥ pāpaṃ nivedaya ।
tatraivāplavanāt pakṣaṃ sarvapāpair vimokṣyase ।।
muktapāpaḥ punas tatra gaṅgāyām avagāhane ।
aśvamedhaphalaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpya puṇyo bhaviṣyasi ।।
saridvarāyāṃ gautamyāṃ brahmaviṣṇvīśasaṃbhuvi ।
punar āplavanād eva tyaktvā dehaṃ malīmasam ।।
vimānavaram ārūḍhaḥ svargaṃ gantāsy asaṃśayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tābhyāṃ tathā cakre sa lubdhakaḥ ।
vimānavaram ārūḍho divyarūpadharo abhavat ।।
divyamālyāmbaradharaḥ pūjyamāno apsarogaṇaiḥ ।
kapotaś ca kapotī ca tṛtīyo lubdhakas tathā ।
gaṅgāyāś ca prabhāveṇa sarve vai divam ākraman ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ kāpotam iti viśrutam ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca pitṛpūjanam eva ca ।।
japayajñādikaṃ karma tad ānantyāya kalpate ।।
{brahmovāca 
kārttikeyaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ kaumāram iti viśrutam ।
yannāmaśravaṇād eva kulavān rūpavān bhavet ।।
nihate tārake daitye svasthe jāte triviṣṭape ।
kārttikeyaṃ sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ prītyā provāca pārvatī ।।
yathāsukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs trailokye manasaḥ priyān ।
mamājñayā prītamanāḥ pituś caiva prasādataḥ ।।
evam uktaḥ sa vai mātrā viśākho devatāstriyaḥ ।
yathāsukhaṃ balād reme devapatnyo api remire ।।
tataḥ saṃbhujyamānāsu devapatnīṣu nārada ।
nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ kārttikeyaṃ divaukasaḥ ।।
tato nivedayām āsuḥ pārvatyai putrakarma tat ।
asakṛd vāryamāṇo api mātrā devaiḥ sa śaktidhṛk ।।
naivāsāv akarod vākyaṃ strīṣv āsaktas tu ṣaṇmukhaḥ ।
abhiśāpabhayād bhītā pārvatī paryacintayat ।।
putrasnehāt tathaiveśā devānāṃ kāryasiddhaye ।
devapatnyaś ciraṃ rakṣyā iti matvā punaḥ punaḥ ।।
yasyāṃ tu ramate skandaḥ pārvatī tv api tādṛśī ।
tadrūpam ātmanaḥ kṛtvā vartayām āsa pārvatī ।।
indrasya varuṇasyāpi bhāryām āhūya ṣaṇmukhaḥ ।
yāvat paśyati tasyāṃ tu mātṛrūpam apaśyata ।।
tām apāsya namasyātha punar anyām athāhvayat ।
tasyāṃ tu mātṛrūpaṃ sa prekṣya lajjām upeyivān ।।
evaṃ bahvīṣu tad rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā mātṛmayaṃ jagat ।
iti saṃcintya gāṅgeyo vairāgyam agamat tadā ।।
sa tu mātṛkṛtaṃ jñātvā pravṛttasya nivartanam ।
nivāryaś ced ahaṃ bhogāt kiṃtu pūrvaṃ pravartitaḥ ।।
tasmān mātṛkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mama hāsyāspadaṃ tv iti ।
lajjayā parayā yukto gautamīm agamat tadā ।।
iyaṃ ca mātṛrūpā me śṛṇotu mama bhāṣitam ।
itaḥ strīnāmadheyaṃ yan mama mātṛsamaṃ matam ।।
evaṃ jñātvā lokanāthaḥ pārvatyā saha śaṃkaraḥ ।
putraṃ nivārayām āsa vṛttam ity abravīd guruḥ ।।
tataḥ surapatiḥ prītaḥ kiṃ dadāmīti cintayan ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ skandaḥ pitaraṃ punar abravīt ।।
{skanda uvāca 
senāpatiḥ surapatis tava putro aham ity api ।
alam etena deveśa kiṃ varaiḥ surapūjita ।।
athavā dātukāmo asi lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।
yāce ahaṃ nātmanā deva tad anujñātum arhasi ।।
mahāpātakinaḥ kecid gurudārābhigāminaḥ ।
atrāplavanamātreṇa dhautapāpā bhavantu te ।।
āpnuvantūttamāṃ jātiṃ tiryañco api sureśvara ।
kurūpo rūpasaṃpattim atra snānād avāpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam astv iti taṃ śaṃbhuḥ pratyanandat suteritam ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ kārttikeyam iti śrutam ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakratuphalapradam ।।
{brahmovāca 
yat khyātaṃ kṛttikātīrthaṃ kārttikeyād anantaram ।
tasya śravaṇamātreṇa somapānaphalaṃ labhet ।।
purā tārakanāśāya bhavareto apibat kaviḥ ।
retogarbhaṃ kaviṃ dṛṣṭvā ṛṣipatnyo aspṛhan mune ।।
saptarṣīṇām ṛtusnātāṃ varjayitvā tv arundhatīm ।
tāsu garbhaḥ samabhavat ṣaṭsu strīṣu tadāgnitaḥ ।।
tapyamānās tu śobhiṣṭhā ṛtusnātās tu tā mune ।
kiṃ kurmaḥ kva nu gacchāmaḥ kiṃ kṛtvā sukṛtaṃ bhavet ।।
ity uktvā tā mitho gaṅgāṃ vyagrā gatvā vyapīḍayan ।
tābhyas te niḥsṛtā garbhāḥ phenarūpās tadāmbhasi ।।
ambhasā tv ekatāṃ prāptā vāyunā sarva eva hi ।
ekarūpas tadā tābhyaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ samajāyata ।।
srāvayitvā tu tān garbhān ṛṣipatnyo gṛhān yayuḥ ।
tāsāṃ vikṛtarūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā te ṛṣayo abruvan ।।
gamyatāṃ gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ svairī vṛttir na yujyate ।
strīṇām iti tato vatsa nirastāḥ patibhis tu tāḥ ।।
tato duḥkhaṃ samāviṣṭās tyaktāḥ svapatibhiś ca ṣaṭ ।
tā dṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ prāha kārttikeyo harodbhavaḥ ।।
gāṅgeyo agnibhavaś ceti vikhyātas tārakāntakaḥ ।
taṃ yāntu na cirād eva prīto bhogaṃ pradāsyati ।।
devarṣer vacanād eva samabhyetya ca ṣaṇmukham ।
kṛttikāḥ svayam evaitad yathāvṛttaṃ nyavedayat ।।
tābhyo vākyaṃ kṛttikābhyaḥ kārttikeyo anumanya ca ।
gautamīṃ yāntu sarvāś ca snātvāpūjya maheśvaram ।।
eṣyāmi cāhaṃ tatraiva yāsyāmi suramandiram ।
tathety uktvā kṛttikāś ca snātvā gaṅgāṃ ca gautamīm ।।
deveśvaraṃ ca saṃpūjya kārttikeyānuśāsanāt ।
deveśvaraprasādena prayayuḥ suramandiram ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ kṛttikātīrtham ucyate ।
kārttikyāṃ kṛttikāyoge tatra yaḥ snānam ācaret ।।
sarvakratuphalaṃ prāpya rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ ।
tattīrthasmaraṇaṃ vāpi yaḥ karoti śṛṇoti ca ।
sarvapāpavinirmukto dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
daśāśvamedhikaṃ tīrthaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāmune ।
yasya śravaṇamātreṇa hayamedhaphalaṃ labhet ।।
viśvakarmasutaḥ śrīmān viśvarūpo mahābalaḥ ।
tasyāpi prathamaḥ putras tatputro bhauvano vibhuḥ ।।
purodhāḥ kaśyapas tasya sarvajñānaviśāradaḥ ।
tam apṛcchan mahābāhur bhauvanaḥ sārvabhauvanaḥ ।।
yakṣye ahaṃ hayamedhaiś ca yugapad daśabhir mune ।
ity apṛcchad guruṃ vipraṃ kva yakṣyāmi surān iti ।।
so avadad devayajanaṃ tatra tatra nṛpottama ।
yatra yatra dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ prāvartanta mahākratūn ।।
tatrābhavann ṛṣigaṇā ārtvijye makhamaṇḍale ।
yugapad daśamedhāni pravṛttāni purodhasā ।।
pūrṇatāṃ nāyayus tāni dṛṣṭvā cintāparo nṛpaḥ ।
vihāya devayajanaṃ punar anyatra tān kratūn ।।
upākrāmat tathā tatra vighnadoṣās tam āyayuḥ ।
dṛṣṭvāpūrṇāṃs tato yajñān rājā gurum abhāṣata ।।
{rājovāca 
deśadoṣāt kāladoṣān mama doṣāt tavāpi vā ।
pūrṇatāṃ nāpnuvanti sma daśamedhāni vājinaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataś ca duḥkhito rājā kaśyapena purodhasā ।
gīṣpater bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ gatvā saṃvartam ūcatuḥ ।।
{kaśyapabhauvanāv ūcatuḥ 
bhagavan yugapat kāryāṇy aśvamedhāni mānada ।
daśa saṃpūrṇatāṃ yānti taṃ deśaṃ taṃ guruṃ vada ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato dhyātvā ṛṣiśreṣṭhaḥ saṃvarto bhauvanaṃ tadā ।
abravīd gaccha brahmāṇaṃ guruṃ deśaṃ vadiṣyati ।।
bhauvano api mahāprājñaḥ kaśyapena mahātmanā ।
āgatya mām abravīc ca guruṃ deśādikaṃ ca yat ।।
tato aham abravaṃ putra bhauvanaṃ kaśyapaṃ tathā ।
gautamīṃ gaccha rājendra sa deśaḥ kratupuṇyavān ।।
ayam eva guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo vedapāragaḥ ।
guror asya prasādena gautamyāś ca prasādataḥ ।।
ekena hayamedhena tatra snānena vā punaḥ ।
setsyanti tatra yajñāś ca daśamedhāni vājinaḥ ।।
tac chrutvā bhauvano rājā gautamītīram abhyagāt ।
kaśyapena sahāyena hayamedhāya dīkṣitaḥ ।।
tataḥ pravṛtte yajñeśe hayamedhe mahākratau ।
saṃpūrṇe tu tadā rājā pṛthivīṃ dātum udyataḥ ।।
tato antarikṣe vāg uccair uvāca nṛpasattamam ।
pūjayitvā sthitaṃ viprān ṛtvijo atha sadaspatīn ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
purodhase kaśyapāya saśailavanakānanām ।
pṛthivīṃ dātukāmena dattaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā nṛpa ।।
bhūmidānaspṛhāṃ tyaktvā annaṃ dehi mahāphalam ।
nānnadānasamaṃ puṇyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate ।।
viśeṣatas tu gaṅgāyāḥ śraddhayā puline mune ।
tvayā tu hayamedho ayaṃ kṛtaḥ sabahudakṣiṇaḥ ।
kṛtakṛtyo asi bhadraṃ te nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathāpi dātukāmaṃ taṃ mahī provāca bhauvanam ।।
{pṛthivy uvāca 
viśvakarmaja sārvabhauma mā māṃ dehi punaḥ punaḥ ।
nimajje ahaṃ salilasya madhye tasmān na dīyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataś ca bhauvano bhītaḥ kiṃ deyam iti cābravīt ।
punaś covāca sā pṛthvī bhauvanaṃ brāhmaṇair vṛtam ।।
{bhūmy uvāca 
tilā gāvo dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ yat kiṃcid gautamītaṭe ।
sarvaṃ tad akṣayaṃ dānaṃ kiṃ māṃ bhauvana dāsyasi ।।
gaṅgātīraṃ samāśritya grāsam ekaṃ dadāti yaḥ ।
tenāhaṃ sakalā dattā kiṃ māṃ bhauvana dāsyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad bhuvo vacanaṃ śrutvā bhauvanaḥ sārvabhauvanaḥ ।
tatheti matvā viprebhyo hy annaṃ prādāt suvistaram ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ daśāśvamedhikaṃ viduḥ ।
daśānām aśvamedhānāṃ phalaṃ snānād avāpyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
paiśācaṃ tīrtham aparaṃ pūjitaṃ brahmavādibhiḥ ।
tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi gautamyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
girir brahmagireḥ pārśve añjano nāma nārada ।
tasmiñ śaile munivara śāpabhraṣṭā varāpsarā ।।
añjanā nāma tatrāsīd uttamāṅgena vānarī ।
kesarī nāma tadbhartā adriketi tathāparā ।।
sāpi kesariṇo bhāryā śāpabhraṣṭā varāpsarā ।
uttamāṅgena mārjārī sāpy āste añjanaparvate ।।
dakṣiṇārṇavam abhyāgāt kesarī lokaviśrutaḥ ।
etasminn antare agastyo añjanaṃ parvatam abhyagāt ।।
añjanā cādrikā caiva agastyam ṛṣisattamam ।
pūjayām āsatur ubhe yathānyāyaṃ yathāsukham ।।
tataḥ prasanno bhagavān āhobhe vriyatāṃ varaḥ ।
te āhatur ubhe agastyaṃ putrau dehi munīśvara ।।
sarvebhyo balinau śreṣṭhau sarvalokopakārakau ।
tathety uktvā muniśreṣṭho jagāmāśāṃ sa dakṣiṇām ।।
tataḥ kadācit te kāle añjanā cādrikā tathā ।
gītaṃ nṛtyaṃ ca hāsyaṃ ca kurvatyau girimūrdhani ।।
vāyuś ca nirṛtiś cāpi te dṛṣṭvā sasmitau surau ।
kāmākrāntadhiyau cobhau tadā satvaram īyatuḥ ।।
bhārye bhavetām ubhayor āvāṃ devau varapradau ।
te apy ūcatur astv etad remāte girimūrdhani ।।
añjanāyāṃ tathā vāyor hanumān samajāyata ।
adrikāyāṃ ca nirṛter adrir nāma piśācarāṭ ।।
punas te āhatur ubhe putrau jātau muner varāt ।
āvayor vikṛtaṃ rūpam uttamāṅgena dūṣitam ।।
śāpāc chacīpates tatra yuvām ājñātum arhathaḥ ।
tataḥ provāca bhagavān vāyuś ca nirṛtis tathā ।।
gautamyāṃ snānadānābhyāṃ śāpamokṣo bhaviṣyati ।
ity uktvā tāv ubhau prītau tatraivāntaradhīyatām ।।
tato añjanāṃ samādāya adriḥ paiśācamūrtimān ।
bhrātur hanumataḥ prītyai snāpayām āsa mātaram ।।
tathaiva hanumān gaṅgām ādāyādrim atitvaran ।
mārjārarūpiṇīṃ nītvā gautamyās tīram āptavān ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ paiśācaṃ cāñjanaṃ tathā ।
brahmaṇo girim āsādya sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।।
yojanānāṃ tripañcāśan mārjāraṃ pūrvato bhavet ।
mārjārasaṃjñitāt tasmād dhanūmantaṃ vṛṣākapim ।।
phenāsaṃgamam ākhyātaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।
tasya svarūpaṃ vyuṣṭiś ca tatraiva procyate śubhā ।।
{brahmovāca 
kṣudhātīrtham iti khyātaṃ śṛṇu nārada tanmanāḥ ।
kathyamānaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām ।।
ṛṣir āsīt purā kaṇvas tapasvī vedavittamaḥ ।
paribhramann āśramāṇi kṣudhayā paripīḍitaḥ ।।
gautamasyāśramaṃ puṇyaṃ samṛddhaṃ cānnavāriṇā ।
ātmānaṃ ca kṣudhāyuktaṃ samṛddhaṃ cāpi gautamam ।।
vīkṣya kaṇvo atha vaiṣamyaṃ vairāgyam agamat tadā ।
gautamo api dvijaśreṣṭho hy ahaṃ tapasi niṣṭhitaḥ ।।
samena yācñāyuktā syāt tasmād gautamaveśmani ।
na bhokṣye ahaṃ kṣudhārto api pīḍite api kalevare ।।
gaccheyaṃ gautamīṃ gaṅgām arjayeyaṃ ca saṃpadam ।
iti niścitya medhāvī gatvā gaṅgāṃ ca pāvanīm ।।
snātvā śucir yatamanā upaviśya kuśāsane ।
tuṣṭāva gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ kṣudhāṃ ca paramāpadam ।।
{kaṇva uvāca 
namo astu gaṅge paramārtihāriṇi 
namaḥ kṣudhe sarvajanārtikāriṇi 
namo maheśānajaṭodbhave śubhe 
namo mahāmṛtyumukhād vinisṛte 
puṇyātmanāṃ śāntarūpe krodharūpe durātmanām ।
saridrūpeṇa sarveṣāṃ tāpapāpāpahāriṇi ।।
kṣudhārūpeṇa sarveṣāṃ tāpapāpaprade namaḥ ।
namaḥ śreyaskari devi namaḥ pāpapratardini ।
namaḥ śāntikari devi namo dāridryanāśini ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity evaṃ stuvatas tasya purastād abhavad dvayam ।
ekaṃ gāṅgaṃ manohāri hy aparaṃ bhīṣaṇākṛti ।
punaḥ kṛtāñjalir bhūtvā namaskṛtvā dvijottamaḥ ।।
{kaṇva uvāca 
sarvamaṅgalamāṅgalye brāhmi māheśvari śubhe ।
vaiṣṇavi tryambake devi godāvari namo astu te ।।
tryambakasya jaṭodbhūte gautamasyāghanāśini ।
saptadhā sāgaraṃ yānti godāvari namo astu te ।।
sarvapāpakṛtāṃ pāpe dharmakāmārthanāśini ।
duḥkhalobhamayi devi kṣudhe tubhyaṃ namo namaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tat kaṇvavacanaṃ śrutvā suprīte āhatur dvijam ।।
{gaṅgākṣudhe ūcatuḥ 
abhīṣṭaṃ vada kalyāṇa varān varaya suvrata ।।
{brahmovāca 
provāca praṇato gaṅgāṃ kaṇvaḥ kṣudhāṃ yathākramam ।।
{kaṇva uvāca 
dehi devi manojñāni kāmāni vibhavaṃ mama ।
āyur vittaṃ ca bhuktiṃ ca muktiṃ gaṅge prayaccha me ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ kṣudhāṃ cāha dvijottamaḥ ।।
{kaṇva uvāca 
mayi madvaṃśaje cāpi kṣudhe tṛṣṇe daridriṇi ।
yāhi pāpatare rūkṣe na bhūyās tvaṃ kadācana ।।
anena stavena ye vai tvāṃ stuvanti kṣudhāturāḥ ।
teṣāṃ dāridryaduḥkhāni na bhaveyur varo aparaḥ ।।
asmiṃs tīrthe mahāpuṇye snānadānajapādikam ।
ye kurvanti narā bhaktyā lakṣmībhājo bhavantu te ।।
yas tv idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ tīrthe vā yadi vā gṛhe ।
tasya dāridryaduḥkhebhyo na bhayaṃ syād varo aparaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam astv iti coktvā te kaṇvaṃ yāte svam ālayam ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ kāṇvaṃ gāṅgaṃ kṣudhābhidham ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ vatsa pitṝṇāṃ prītivardhanam ।।
{brahmovāca 
asti brahman mahātīrthaṃ cakratīrtham iti śrutam ।
tatra snānān naro bhaktyā harer lokam avāpnuyāt ।।
ekādaśyāṃ tu śuklāyām upoṣya pṛthivīpate ।
gaṇikāsaṃgame snātvā prāpnuyād akṣayaṃ padam ।।
purā tatra yathā vṛttaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu ।
āsīd viśvadharo nāma vaiśyo bahudhanānvitaḥ ।।
uttare vayasi śreṣṭhas tasya putro abhavad ṛṣe ।
guṇavān rūpasaṃpanno vilāsī śubhadarśanaḥ ।।
prāṇebhyo api priyaḥ putraḥ kāle pañcatvam āgataḥ ।
tathā dṛṣṭvā tu taṃ putraṃ daṃpatī duḥkhapīḍitau ।।
kurvāte sma tadā tena sahaiva maraṇe matim ।
hā putra hanta kālena pāpena sudurātmanā ।।
yauvane vartamāno api nīto asi guṇasāgara ।
āvayoś ca tathaiva tvaṃ prāṇebhyo api sudurlabhaḥ ।।
itthaṃ tu ruditaṃ śrutvā daṃpatyoḥ karuṇaṃ yamaḥ ।
tyaktvā nijapuraṃ tūrṇaṃ kṛpayāviṣṭamānasaḥ ।।
godāvaryāḥ śubhe tīre sthito dhyāyañ janārdanam ।
api svalpena kālena prajā vṛddhāḥ samantataḥ ।।
iyata iti me pṛthvī kathyatāṃ kena pūritā ।
na kaścin mriyate jantur bhārākrāntā vasuṃdharā ।।
tato devī gatā tūrṇaṃ vasudhā munisattama ।
yatrāsti surasaṃyuktaḥ śakraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ ।
dṛṣṭvā vasuṃdharām indraḥ praṇipatyedam abravīt ।।
{indra uvāca 
kim āgamanakāryaṃ ta iti me pṛthvi kathyatām ।।
{dharovāca 
bhāreṇa guruṇā śakra pīḍitāhaṃ vinā vadham ।
kāraṇaṃ praṣṭum āyātā kim idaṃ kathyatāṃ mama ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā mahīvākyam indro vacanam abravīt ।।
{indra uvāca 
kāraṇaṃ yadi nāma syāt tadānīṃ jñāyate mayā ।
surāṇāṃ hi patir yasmād ahaṃ sarvāsu medini ।।
{brahmovāca 
atha pṛthvī tadā vākyaṃ śrutvā cāha śacīpatim ।
yama ādiśyatāṃ tarhi yathā saṃharate prajāḥ ।।
iti śrutvā vaco mahyā ādiṣṭāḥ siddhakiṃnarāḥ ।
yamasyānayane śīghraṃ mahendreṇa mahāmune ।।
tatas te satvaraṃ yātāḥ sarve vaivasvataṃ puram ।
naivāpaśyan yamaṃ tatra te siddhāḥ saha kiṃnaraiḥ ।
tathāgatya punar vegād vārttā śakre niveditā ।।
{siddhakiṃnarā ūcuḥ 
yamo yamapure nātha asmābhir nāvalokitaḥ ।
mahatāpi suyatnena vīkṣyamāṇaḥ samantataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā vacas teṣāṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śakreṇa vai tadā ।
savitā sa pitā tasya yamaḥ kutrāsta ity atha ।।
{sūrya uvāca 
śakra godāvarītīre kṛtānto vartate adhunā ।
caraṃs tatra tapas tīvraṃ na jāne kiṃ nu kāraṇam ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā vaco bhānoḥ śakraḥ śaṅkām upāviśat ।।
{śakra uvāca 
aho kaṣṭaṃ mahākaṣṭaṃ naṣṭā me suranāthatā ।
godāvaryāṃ tapaḥ kuryād yamo vai duṣṭaceṣṭitaḥ ।
jighṛkṣur matpadaṃ nūnaṃ devā iti matir mama ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā sahasendreṇa āhūtaś cāpsarogaṇaḥ ।।
{indra uvāca 
kā bhavatīṣu kālasya sthitasya tapasi dviṣaḥ ।
tapaḥpraṇāśane śaktā iti me śīghram ucyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śakravacaḥ śrutvā noce kāpi mahāmune ।
atha śakraḥ prakopeṇa pratyuvācāpsarogaṇam ।।
{indra uvāca 
uttaraṃ nābravīt kiṃcid yāmas tarhi vayaṃ svayam ।
sajjā bhavantu vibudhāḥ sainyair āyāntu mā ciram ।
ghātayāmo vayaṃ śatruṃ tapasā svargakāmukam ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity ukte sati devānāṃ senā prādurbabhūva ha ।
itīndrahṛdayaṃ jñātvā hariṇā lokadhāriṇā ।।
preṣitaṃ cakriṇā cakraṃ rakṣaṇāya yamasya hi ।
cakraṃ yatrābhavat tatra cakratīrtham anuttamam ।।
athendraṃ menakā prāha śaṅkiteti vacas tadā ।।
{menakovāca 
kālāvalokane nālaṃ kācid asti sureśvara ।
maraṇaṃ ca varaṃ deva bhavato na yamāt punaḥ ।।
rūpayauvanamatteyaṃ gaṇikāyācanaṃ prabho ।
preṣaṇaṃ tat prayacchaiṣā svāmitvaṃ manyate tvayā ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā vacas tasyāḥ śakraḥ suravareśvaraḥ ।
ādideśābalāṃ kṣāmāṃ satkṛtya gaṇikāṃ tathā ।।
{śakra uvāca 
gaṇike gaccha me kāryaṃ kuru sundari mā ciram ।
kṛtakṛtyāgatā bhūyo vallabhā me yathā śacī ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity ākarṇya vacaḥ śakrād utpatya gaṇikā diśaḥ ।
kṣaṇena yamasāṃnidhyam āyātā cārurūpiṇī ।।
yamāntikam anuprāptā dyotayantī diśo daśa ।
salīlaṃ lalitaṃ bālā jagau hindolakaṅkalam ।।
tataś cacāla kālasya mano lolaṃ calācalam ।
athonmīlya yamo netre kāmapāvakapūrite ।।
tasyāṃ vyāpārayām āsa śreyaḥśatrau mahāmune ।
tato vilīya sā sadyaḥ sarittvam agamat tadā ।।
gautamyāṃ tu samāgamya gaṇikāgaṇakiṃkaraiḥ ।
gīyamānā gatā svarge tasya tīrthaprabhāvataḥ ।।
gacchantīṃ gaṇikāṃ dṛṣṭvā vimānasthāṃ divaṃ prati ।
vismayaṃ paramaṃ prāptaḥ kālas taralalocanaḥ ।
athādityena cāgatya evam ukto yamas tadā ।।
{sūrya uvāca 
kuru putra nijaṃ karma prajānāṃ tvaṃ parikṣayam ।
paśya vātaṃ sadā vāntaṃ sṛjantaṃ vedhasaṃ prajāḥ ।
paryaṭantaṃ trilokīṃ māṃ vahantīṃ vasudhāṃ prajāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā yamo vākyaṃ pitur vacanam abravīt ।।
{yama uvāca 
etan na garhitaṃ karma kuryām aham idaṃ dhruvam ।
karmaṇy asmin mahākrūre samādeṣṭuṃ na vārhasi ।।
iti śrutvā ca tad vākyaṃ bhānur vacanam abravīt ।
kiṃ nāma garhitaṃ karma tava kartum alaṃ yama ।।
kiṃ na dṛṣṭā tvayā yāntī gaṇikā gaṇakiṃkaraiḥ ।
gīyamānā divaṃ sadyo gautamītoyam āplutā ।।
tvayā cātra tapas tīvraṃ kṛtaṃ putra suduṣkaram ।
naivāntaṃ tasya paśyāmi tasmād gaccha nijaṃ puram ।।
ity uktvā bhagavān bhānus tatra snātvā gato divam ।
yamo api saṃgame snātvā tato nijapuraṃ yayau ।।
bhūtahāpi tataḥ śaṅkāṃ tatyāja ca mahāmune ।
tathā dṛṣṭvā yamaṃ yāntaṃ cakre cakraṃ prayāṇakam ।।
bhagavān yatra govindo vanamālāvibhūṣitaḥ ।
iti yaḥ śṛṇuyān martyaḥ paṭhed vāpi samāhitaḥ ।।
āpadas tasya naśyanti dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
ahalyāsaṃgamaṃ ceha tīrthaṃ trailokyapāvanam ।
śṛṇu samyaṅ muniśreṣṭha tatra vṛttam idaṃ yathā ।।
kautukenātimahatā mayā pūrvaṃ munīśvara ।
sṛṣṭā kanyā bahuvidhā rūpavatyo guṇānvitāḥ ।।
tāsām ekāṃ śreṣṭhatamāṃ nirmame śubhalakṣaṇām ।
tāṃ bālāṃ cārusarvāṅgīṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpaguṇānvitām ।।
ko vāsyāḥ poṣaṇe śakta iti me buddhir āviśat ।
na daityānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca na munīnāṃ tathaiva ca ।।
nāsty asyāḥ poṣaṇe śaktir iti me buddhir anvabhūt ।
guṇajyeṣṭhāya viprāya tapoyuktāya dhīmate ।।
sarvalakṣaṇayuktāya vedavedāṅgavedine ।
gautamāya mahāprājñām adadāṃ poṣaṇāya tām ।।
pālayasva muniśreṣṭha yāvad āpsyati yauvanam ।
yauvanasthāṃ punaḥ sādhvīm ānayethā mamāntikam ।।
evam uktvā gautamāya prādāṃ kanyāṃ sumadhyamām ।
tām ādāya muniśreṣṭha tapasā hatakalmaṣaḥ ।।
tāṃ poṣayitvā vidhivad alaṃkṛtya mamāntikam ।
nirvikāro muniśreṣṭho hy ahalyām ānayat tadā ।।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vibudhāḥ sarve śakrāgnivaruṇādayaḥ ।
mama deyā sureśāna ity ūcus te pṛthak pṛthak ।।
tathaiva munayaḥ sādhyā dānavā yakṣarākṣasāḥ ।
tān sarvān āgatān dṛṣṭvā kanyārtham atha saṃgatān ।।
indrasya tu viśeṣeṇa mahāṃś cābhūt tadā grahaḥ ।
gautamasya tu māhātmyaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ dhairyam eva ca ।।
smṛtvā suvismito bhūtvā mamaivam abhavat sudhīḥ ।
deyeyaṃ gautamāyaiva nānyayogyā śubhānanā ।।
tasmāai eva tu tāṃ dāsye tathāpy evam acintayam ।
sarveṣāṃ ca matir dhairyaṃ mathitaṃ bālayānayā ।।
ahalyeti suraiḥ proktaṃ mayā ca ṛṣibhis tadā ।
devān ṛṣīṃs tadā vīkṣya mayā tatroktam uccakaiḥ ।।
tasmai sā dīyate subhrūr yaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pradakṣiṇām ।
kṛtvopatiṣṭhate pūrvaṃ na cānyasmai punaḥ punaḥ ।।
tataḥ sarve suragaṇāḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mayeritam ।
ahalyārthaṃ surā jagmuḥ pṛthivyāś ca pradakṣiṇe ।।
gateṣu surasaṃgheṣu gautamo api munīśvara ।
prayatnam akarot kiṃcid ahalyārtham imaṃ tathā ।।
etasminn antare brahman surabhiḥ sarvakāmadhuk ।
ardhaprasūtā hy abhavat tāṃ dadarśa sa gautamaḥ ।।
tasyāḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ cakre iyam urvīti saṃsmaran ।
liṅgasya ca sureśasya pradakṣiṇam athākarot ।।
tayoḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā gautamo munisattamaḥ ।
sarveṣāṃ caiva devānām ekaṃ cāpi pradakṣiṇam ।।
naivābhavad bhuvo gantuḥ saṃjātaṃ dvitayaṃ mama ।
evaṃ niścitya sa munir mamāntikam athābhyagāt ।।
namaskṛtvābravīd vākyaṃ gautamo māṃ mahāmatiḥ ।
kamalāsana viśvātman namas te astu punaḥ punaḥ ।।
pradakṣiṇīkṛtā brahman mayeyaṃ vasudhākhilā ।
yad atra yuktaṃ deveśa jānīte tad bhavān svayam ।।
mayā tu dhyānayogena jñātvā gautamam abravam ।
tavaiva dīyate subhrūḥ pradakṣiṇam idaṃ kṛtam ।।
dharmaṃ jānīhi viprarṣe durjñeyaṃ nigamair api ।
ardhaprasūtā surabhiḥ saptadvīpavatī mahī ।।
kṛtā pradakṣiṇā tasyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ sā kṛtā bhavet ।
liṅgaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tad eva phalam āpnuyāt ।।
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena mune gautama suvrata ।
tuṣṭo ahaṃ tava dhairyeṇa jñānena tapasā tathā ।।
datteyam ṛṣiśārdūla kanyā lokavarā mayā ।
ity uktvāhaṃ gautamāya ahalyām adadāṃ mune ।।
jāte vivāhe te devāḥ kṛtvelāyāḥ pradakṣiṇam ।
śanaiḥ śanair athāgatya dadṛśuḥ sarva eva te ।।
taṃ gautamam ahalyāṃ ca dāṃpatyaṃ prītivardhanam ।
te cāgatyātha paśyanto vismitāś cābhavan surāḥ ।।
atikrānte vivāhe tu surāḥ sarve divaṃ yayuḥ ।
samatsaraḥ śacībhartā tām īkṣya ca divaṃ yayau ।।
tataḥ prītamanās tasmai gautamāya mahātmane ।
prādāṃ brahmagiriṃ puṇyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।।
ahalyāyāṃ muniśreṣṭho reme tatra sa gautamaḥ ।
gautamasya kathāṃ puṇyāṃ śrutvā śakras triviṣṭape ।।
tam āśramaṃ taṃ ca muniṃ tasya bhāryām aninditām ।
bhūtvā brāhmaṇaveṣeṇa draṣṭum āgāc chatakratuḥ ।।
sa dṛṣṭvā bhavanaṃ tasya bhāryāṃ ca vibhavaṃ tathā ।
pāpīyasīṃ matiṃ kṛtvā ahalyāṃ samudaikṣata ।।
nātmānaṃ na paraṃ deśaṃ kālaṃ śāpād ṛṣer bhayam ।
na bubodha tadā vatsa kāmākṛṣṭaḥ śatakratuḥ ।।
taddhyānaparamo nityaṃ surarājyena garvitaḥ ।
saṃtaptāṅgaḥ kathaṃ kuryāṃ praveśo me kathaṃ bhavet ।।
evaṃ vasan viprarūpo nāntaraṃ tv adhyagacchata ।
sa kadācin mahāprājñaḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikīṃ kriyām ।।
sahito gautamaḥ śiṣyair nirgataś cāśramād bahiḥ ।
āśramaṃ gautamīṃ viprān dhānyāni vividhāni ca ।।
draṣṭuṃ gato munivara indras taṃ samudaikṣata ।
idam antaram ity uktvā cakre kāryaṃ manaḥpriyam ।।
rūpaṃ kṛtvā gautamasya priyepsuḥ sa śatakratuḥ ।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cārusarvāṅgīm ahalyāṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{indra uvāca 
ākṛṣṭo ahaṃ tava guṇai rūpaṃ smṛtvā skhalatpadaḥ ।
iti bruvan hasan hastam ādāyāntaḥ samāviśat ।।
na bubodha tv ahalyā taṃ jāraṃ mene tu gautamam ।
ramamāṇā yathāsaukhyaṃ prāgāc chiṣyaiḥ sa gautamaḥ ।।
āgacchantaṃ nityam eva ahalyā priyavādinī ।
pratiyāti priyaṃ vakti toṣayantī ca taṃ guṇaiḥ ।।
tām adṛṣṭvā mahāprājño mene tan mahad adbhutam ।
dvārasthitaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ sarve paśyanti nārada ।।
agnihotrasya śālāyā rakṣiṇo gṛhakarmiṇaḥ ।
ūcur munivaraṃ bhītā gautamaṃ vismayānvitāḥ ।।
{rakṣiṇa ūcuḥ 
bhagavan kim idaṃ citraṃ bahir antaś ca dṛśyase ।
priyayāntaḥ praviṣṭo asi tathaiva ca bahir bhavān ।
aho tapaḥprabhāvo ayaṃ nānārūpadharo bhavān ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chrutvā vismitas tv antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ ko nu tiṣṭhati ।
priye ahalye bhavati kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase ।
ity ṛṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā ahalyā jāram abravīt ।।
{ahalyovāca 
ko bhavān munirūpeṇa pāpaṃ tvaṃ kṛtavān asi ।
iti bruvatī śayanād utthitā satvaraṃ bhayāt ।।
sa cāpi pāpakṛc chakro biḍālo abhūn muner bhayāt ।
trastāṃ ca vikṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā svapriyāṃ dūṣitāṃ tadā ।।
uvāca sa muniḥ kopāt kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ kṛtam ।
iti bruvantaṃ bhartāraṃ sāpi novāca lajjitā ।।
anveṣayaṃs tu taṃ jāraṃ biḍālaṃ dadṛśe muniḥ ।
ko bhavān iti taṃ prāha bhasmīkuryāṃ mṛṣāvadan ।।
{indra uvāca 
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā caivam āha śacīpatiḥ ।
śacībhartā purāṃ bhettā tapodhana puruṣṭutaḥ ।।
mamedaṃ pāpam āpannaṃ satyam uktaṃ mayānagha ।
mahadvigarhitaṃ karma kṛtavān asmy ahaṃ mune ।।
smarasāyakanirbhinna- hṛdayāḥ kiṃ na kurvate ।
brahman mayi mahāpāpe kṣamasva karuṇānidhe ।।
santaḥ kṛtāparādhe api na raukṣyaṃ jātu kurvate ।
niśamya tad vaco vipro harim āha ruṣānvitaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
bhagabhaktyā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ sahasrabhagavān bhava ।
tām apy āha muniḥ kopāt tvaṃ ca śuṣkanadī bhava ।।
tataḥ prasādayām āsa kathayantī tadākṛtim ।।
{ahalyovāca 
manasāpy anyapuruṣaṃ pāpiṣṭhāḥ kāmayanti yāḥ ।
akṣayān yānti narakāṃs tāsāṃ sarve api pūrvajāḥ ।।
bhūtvā prasanno bhagavann avadhāraya madvacaḥ ।
tava rūpeṇa cāgatya mām agāt sākṣiṇas tv ime ।।
tatheti rakṣiṇaḥ procur ahalyā satyavādinī ।
dhyānenāpi munir jñātvā śāntaḥ prāha pativratām ।।
{gautama uvāca 
yadā tu saṃgatā bhadre gautamyā saridīśayā ।
nadī bhūtvā punā rūpaṃ prāpsyase priyakṛn mama ।।
ity ṛṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre pativratā ।
tayā tu saṃgatā devyā ahalyā gautamapriyā ।।
punas tad rūpam abhavad yan mayā nirmitaṃ purā ।
tataḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ surarāṭ prāha gautamam ।।
{indra uvāca 
māṃ pāhi muniśārdūla pāpiṣṭhaṃ gṛham āgatam ।
pādayoḥ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā prāha gautamaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
gautamīṃ gaccha bhadraṃ te snānaṃ kuru puraṃdara ।
kṣaṇān nirdhūtapāpas tvaṃ sahasrākṣo bhaviṣyasi ।।
ubhayaṃ vismayakaraṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi nārada ।
ahalyāyāḥ punarbhāvaṃ śacībhartā sahasradṛk ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrtham ahalyāsaṃgamaṃ śubham ।
indratīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasmād apy aparaṃ tīrthaṃ janasthānam iti śrutam ।
caturyojanavistīrṇaṃ smaraṇān muktidaṃ nṛṇām ।।
vaivasvatānvaye jāto rājābhūj janakaḥ purā ।
so apāṃpates tu tanujām upayeme guṇārṇavām ।।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ janakāṃ janako nṛpaḥ ।
anurūpaguṇatvāc ca tasya bhāryā guṇārṇavā ।।
yājñavalkyaś ca viprendras tasya rājñaḥ purohitaḥ ।
tam apṛcchan nṛpaśreṣṭho yājñavalkyaṃ purohitam ।।
{janaka uvāca 
bhuktimuktī ubhe śreṣṭhe nirṇīte munisattamaiḥ ।
dāsīdāsebhaturaga- rathādyair bhuktir uttamā ।।
kiṃtv antavirasā bhuktir muktir ekā niratyayā ।
bhukter muktiḥ śreṣṭhatamā bhuktyā muktiṃ kathaṃ vrajet ।।
sarvasaṅgaparityāgān muktiprāptiḥ suduḥkhataḥ ।
tad brūhi dvijaśārdūla sukhān muktiḥ kathaṃ bhavet ।।
{yājñavalkya uvāca 
apāṃpatis tava guruḥ śvaśuraḥ priyakṛt tathā ।
taṃ gatvā pṛccha nṛpate upadekṣyati te hitam ।।
yājñavalkyaś ca janako rājānaṃ varuṇaṃ tadā ।
gatvā cocatur avyagrau muktimārgaṃ yathākramam ।।
{varuṇa uvāca 
dvidhā tu saṃsthitā muktiḥ karmadvāre apy akarmaṇi ।
vede ca niścito mārgaḥ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ ।।
sarvaṃ ca karmaṇā baddhaṃ puruṣārthacatuṣṭayam ।
akarmaṇaivāpyata iti muktimārgo mṛṣocyate ।।
karmaṇā sarvadhānyāni setsyanti nṛpasattama ।
tasmāt sarvātmanā karma kartavyaṃ vaidikaṃ nṛbhiḥ ।।
tena bhuktiṃ ca muktiṃ ca prāpnuvantīha mānavāḥ ।
akarmaṇaḥ karma puṇyaṃ karma cāpy āśrameṣu ca ।।
jātyāśritaṃ ca rājendra tatrāpi śṛṇu dharmavit ।
āśramāṇi ca catvāri karmadvārāṇi mānada ।।
caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca gārhasthyaṃ puṇyadaṃ smṛtam ।
tasmād bhuktiś ca muktiś ca bhavatīti matir mama ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā tu janako yājñavalkyaś ca buddhimān ।
varuṇaṃ pūjayitvā tu punar vacanam ūcatuḥ ।।
ko deśaḥ kiṃ ca tīrthaṃ syād bhuktimuktipradāyakam ।
tad vadasva suraśreṣṭha sarvajño asi namo astu te ।।
{varuṇa uvāca 
pṛthivyāṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ daṇḍakaṃ tatra puṇyadam ।
tasmin kṣetre kṛtaṃ karma bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṛṇām ।।
tīrthānāṃ gautamī gaṅgā śreṣṭhā muktipradā nṛṇām ।
tatra yajñena dānena bhogān muktim avāpsyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
yājñavalkyaś ca janako vācaṃ śrutvā hy apāṃpateḥ ।
varuṇena hy anujñātau svapurīṃ jagmatus tadā ।।
aśvamedhādikaṃ karma cakāra janako nṛpaḥ ।
yājayām āsa viprendro yājñavalkyaś ca taṃ nṛpam ।।
gaṅgātīraṃ samāśritya yajñān muktim avāpa rāṭ ।
tathā janakarājāno bahavas tatra karmaṇā ।।
muktiṃ prāpur mahābhāgā gautamyāś ca prasādataḥ ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ janasthāneti viśrutam ।।
janakānāṃ yajñasado janasthānaṃ prakīrtitam ।
caturyojanavistīrṇaṃ smaraṇāt sarvapāpanut ।।
tatra snānena dānena pitṝṇāṃ tarpaṇena tu ।
tīrthasya smaraṇād vāpi gamanād bhaktisevanāt ।।
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti muktiṃ ca samavāpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
aruṇā varuṇā caiva nadyau puṇyatare śubhe ।
tayoś ca saṃgamaḥ puṇyo gaṅgāyāṃ munisattama ।।
tadutpattiṃ śṛṇuṣveha sarvapāpavināśinīm ।
kaśyapasya suto jyeṣṭha ādityo lokaviśrutaḥ ।।
trailokyacakṣus tīkṣṇāṃśuḥ saptāśvo lokapūjitaḥ ।
tasya patnī uṣā khyātā tvāṣṭrī trailokyasundarī ।।
bhartuḥ pratāpatīvratvam asahantī sumadhyamā ।
cintayām āsa kiṃ kṛtyaṃ mama syād iti bhāminī ।।
tasyāḥ putrau mahārājñau manur vaivasvato yamaḥ ।
yamunā ca nadī puṇyā śṛṇu vismayakāraṇam ।।
sākarod ātmanaś chāyām ātmarūpeṇa yatnataḥ ।
tām abravīt tataś coṣā tvaṃ ca matsadṛśī bhava ।।
bhartāraṃ tvam apatyāni pālayasva mamājñayā ।
yāvad āgamanaṃ me syāt patyus tāvat priyā bhava ।।
nākhyātavyaṃ tvayā kvāpi apatyānāṃ tathā priye ।
tathety āha ca sā chāyā nirjagāma gṛhād uṣā ।।
ity uktvā sā jagāmāśu śāntaṃ rūpam abhīpsatī ।
sā gatvoṣā gṛhaṃ tvaṣṭuḥ pitre sarvaṃ nyavedayat ।
tvaṣṭāpi cakitaḥ prāha tāṃ sutāṃ sutavatsalaḥ ।।
{tvaṣṭovāca 
naitad yuktaṃ bhartṛmatyā yat svaireṇa pravartanam ।
apatyānāṃ kathaṃ vṛttir bhartur vā savitus tava ।
bibhemi bhadre śiṣṭo ahaṃ bhartur gehaṃ punar vraja ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktā tu pitrā sā nety uktvā vai punaḥ punaḥ ।
uttaraṃ ca kuror deśaṃ jagāma tapase tvarā ।।
tatra tepe tapas tīvraṃ vaḍavārūpadhāriṇī ।
duṣprekṣaṃ taṃ svakaṃ kāntaṃ dhyāyantī niścalā uṣā ।।
etasminn antare tāta chāyā coṣāsvarūpiṇī ।
patyau sā vartayām āsa apatyāny atha jajñire ।।
sāvarṇiś ca śaniś caiva viṣṭir yā duṣṭakanyakā ।
sā chāyā vartayām āsa vaiṣamyeṇaiva nityaśaḥ ।।
sveṣv apatyeṣu coṣāyā yamas tatra cukopa ha ।
vaiṣamyeṇātha vartantīṃ chāyāṃ tāṃ mātaraṃ tadā ।।
tāḍayām āsa pādena dakṣiṇāśāpatir yamaḥ ।
putradaurjanyasaṃkṣobhāc chāyā vaivasvataṃ yamam ।।
śaśāpa pāpa te pādo viśīryatu mamājñayā ।
viśīrṇacaraṇo duḥkhād rudan pitaram abhyagāt ।
savitre taṃ tu vṛttāntaṃ nyavedayad aśeṣataḥ ।।
{yama uvāca 
neyaṃ mātā suraśreṣṭha yayā śapto aham īdṛśaḥ ।
apatyeṣu viruddheṣu jananī naiva kupyate ।।
yad bālyād abravaṃ kiṃcid athavā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam ।
naiva kupyati sā mātā tasmān neyaṃ mamāmbikā ।।
yad apatyakṛtaṃ kiṃcit sādhv asādhu yathā tathā ।
māty asyāṃ sarvam apy etat tasmān māteti gīyate ।।
pradhakṣyantīva māṃ tāta nityaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣā ।
vakty agnikālasadṛśā vācā neyaṃ madambikā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tat putravacanaṃ śrutvā savitācintayat tataḥ ।
iyaṃ chāyā nāsya mātā uṣā mātā tu sānyataḥ ।।
mama śāntim abhīpsantī deśe anyasmiṃs taporatā ।
uttare ca kurau tvāṣṭrī vaḍavārūpadhāriṇī ।।
tatrāste sā iti jñātvā jagāmeśo divākaraḥ ।
yatra sā vartate kāntā aśvarūpaḥ svayaṃ tadā ।।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vaḍavārūpāṃ paryadhāvad dhayākṛtiḥ ।
kāmāturaṃ hayaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vai heṣitasvanam ।।
uṣā pativratopetā patidhyānaparāyaṇā ।
hayadharṣaṇasaṃbhītā ko nv ayaṃ cety ajānatī ।।
apalāyat patau prāpte dakṣiṇābhimukhī tvarā ।
ko nu me rakṣako atra syād ṛṣayo vāthavā surāḥ ।।
dhāvantīṃ tāṃ priyām aśvām aśvarūpadharaḥ svayam ।
paryadhāvad yato yāti uṣā bhānus tatas tataḥ ।।
smaragrahavaśe jātaḥ ko duśceṣṭaṃ na ceṣṭate ।
bhāgīrathīṃ nadīś cānyā vanāny upavanāni ca ।।
narmadāṃ cātha vindhyaṃ ca dakṣiṇābhimukhāv ubhau ।
atikramya bhayodvignā tvāṣṭry abhyagāc ca gautamīm ।।
trātāraḥ santi munayo janasthāna iti śrutam ।
ṛṣīṇām āśramaṃ sāśvā praviṣṭā gautamīṃ tathā ।।
anuprāptas tathā cāśvo bhānus tadrūpavāṃs tataḥ ।
aśvaṃ nivārayām āsur janasthā munidārakāḥ ।
tataḥ kopād ṛṣīṃs tāṃś ca śaśāpoṣāpatiḥ prabhuḥ ।।
{bhānur uvāca 
nivārayatha māṃ yasmād vaṭā yūyaṃ bhaviṣyatha ।।
{brahmovāca 
jñānadṛṣṭyā tu munayo menire aśvam uṣāpatim ।
stuvanto devadeveśaṃ bhānuṃ taṃ munayo mudā ।।
stūyamāno munigaṇair aśvāṃ bhānur athāgamat ।
vaḍavāyā mukhe lagnaṃ mukhaṃ cāśvasvarūpiṇam ।।
jñātvā tvāṣṭrī ca bhartāraṃ mukhād vīryaṃ prasusruve ।
tayor vīryeṇa gaṅgāyām aśvinau samajāyatām ।।
tatrāgacchan suragaṇāḥ siddhāś ca munayas tathā ।
nadyo gāvas tathauṣadhyo devā jyotirgaṇās tathā ।।
saptāśvaś ca rathaḥ puṇyo hy aruṇo bhānusārathiḥ ।
yamo manuś ca varuṇaḥ śanir vaivasvatas tathā ।।
yamunā ca nadī puṇyā tāpī caiva mahānadī ।
tattadrūpaṃ samāsthāya nadyas tā vismayān mune ।।
draṣṭuṃ te vismayāviṣṭā ājagmuḥ śvaśuras tathā ।
abhiprāyaṃ viditvā tu śvaśuraṃ bhānur abravīt ।।
{bhānur uvāca 
uṣāyāḥ prītaye tvaṣṭaḥ kurvatyās tapa uttamam ।
yantrārūḍhaṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā chindhi tejāṃsy anekaśaḥ ।
yāvat saukhyaṃ bhaved asyās tāvac chindhi prajāpate ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā tatas tvaṣṭā somanāthasya saṃnidhau ।
tejasāṃ chedanaṃ cakre prabhāsaṃ tu tato viduḥ ।।
bhartrā ca saṃgatā yatra gautamyām aśvarūpiṇī ।
aśvinor yatra cotpattir aśvatīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
bhānutīrthaṃ tad ākhyātaṃ tathā pañcavaṭāśramaḥ ।
tāpī ca yamunā caiva pitaraṃ draṣṭum āgate ।।
aruṇāvaruṇānadyor gaṅgāyāṃ saṃgamaḥ śubhaḥ ।
devānāṃ tatra tīrthānām āgatānāṃ pṛthak pṛthak ।।
nava trīṇi sahasrāṇi tīrthāni guṇavanti ca ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvam akṣayapuṇyadam ।।
smaraṇāt paṭhanād vāpi śravaṇād api nārada ।
sarvapāpavinirmukto dharmavān sa sukhī bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
gāruḍaṃ nāma yat tīrthaṃ sarvavighnapraśāntidam ।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada yatnataḥ ।।
maṇināga iti tv āsīc cheṣaputro mahābalaḥ ।
garuḍasya bhayād bhaktyā toṣayām āsa śaṃkaram ।।
tataḥ prasanno bhagavān parameṣṭhī maheśvaraḥ ।
tam uvāca mahānāgaṃ varaṃ varaya pannaga ।।
nāgaḥ prāha prabho mahyaṃ dehi me garuḍābhayam ।
tathety āha ca taṃ śaṃbhur garuḍād abhayaṃ bhavet ।।
nirgato nirbhayo nāgo garuḍād aruṇānujāt ।
kṣīrodaśāyī yatrāste kṣīrārṇavasamīpataḥ ।।
itaś cetaś ca carati nāgo asau sukhaśītale ।
garuḍo api ca yatrāste taṃ deśam api yāty asau ।।
garuḍaḥ pannagaṃ dṛṣṭvā carantaṃ nirbhayena tu ।
taṃ gṛhītvā mahānāgaṃ prākṣipat svasya veśmani ।।
taṃ baddhvā gāruḍaiḥ pāśair garuḍo nāgasattamam ।
etasminn antare nandī provāceśaṃ jagatprabhum ।।
{nandikeśvara uvāca 
nūnaṃ nāgo na cāyāti bhakṣito baddha eva vā ।
garuḍena sureśāna jīvan nāgo na saṃvrajet ।।
{brahmovāca 
nandino vacanaṃ śrutvā jñātvā śaṃbhur athābravīt ।।
{śiva uvāca 
garuḍasya gṛhe nāgo baddhas tiṣṭhati satvaram ।
gatvā taṃ jagatām īśaṃ viṣṇuṃ stuhi janārdanam ।।
baddhaṃ nāgaṃ kāśyapena madvākyād ānaya svayam ।
tat prabhor vacanaṃ śrutvā nandī gatvā śriyaḥ patim ।।
vyajñāpayat svayaṃ vākyaṃ viṣṇuṃ lokaparāyaṇam ।
nārāyaṇaḥ prītamanā garuḍaṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{viṣṇur uvāca 
vinatātmaja me vākyān nandine dehi pannagam ।
kampamānas tad ākarṇya nety uvāca vihaṃgamaḥ ।
viṣṇum apy abravīt kopāt suparṇo nandino antike ।।
{garuḍa uvāca 
yad yat priyatamaṃ kiṃcid bhṛtyebhyaḥ prabhaviṣṇavaḥ ।
dāsyanty anye bhavān naiva mayānītaṃ hariṣyati ।।
paśya devaṃ trinayanaṃ nāgaṃ mokṣyati nandinā ।
mayopapāditaṃ nāgaṃ tvaṃ tu dāsyasi nandine ।।
tvāṃ vahāmi sadā svāmin mama deyaṃ sadā tvayā ।
mayopapāditaṃ nāgaṃ vaktuṃ dehīti nocitam ।।
satāṃ prabhūṇāṃ neyaṃ syād vṛttiḥ sadvṛttikāriṇām ।
santo dāsyanti bhṛtyebhyo madupāttaharo bhavān ।।
daityāñ jayasi saṃgrāme madbalenaiva keśava ।
ahaṃ mahābalīty evaṃ mudhaiva ślāghate bhavān ।।
{brahmovāca 
garuḍasyeti tad vākyaṃ śrutvā cakragadādharaḥ ।
vihasya nandinaḥ pārśve paśyadbhir lokapālakaiḥ ।।
idam āha mahābuddhir māṃ samuhya kṛśo bhavān ।
tvadbalād asurān sarvāñ jeṣye ahaṃ khagasattama ।।
ity uktvā śrīpatir brahmañ śāntakopo abravīd idam ।
vahāṅguliṃ karasyāśu kaniṣṭhāṃ nandino antike ।।
garuḍasya tato mūrdhni nyasyedaṃ punar abravīt ।
satyaṃ māṃ vahase nityaṃ paśya dharmaṃ vihaṃgama ।।
nyastāyāṃ ca tato aṅgulyāṃ śiraḥ kukṣau samāviśat ।
kukṣiś ca caraṇasyāntaḥ prāviśac cūrṇito abhavat ।
tataḥ kṛtāñjalir dīno vyathito lajjayānvitaḥ ।।
{garuḍa uvāca 
trāhi trāhi jagannātha bhṛtyaṃ mām aparādhinam ।
tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvalokānāṃ dhartā dhāryas tvam eva ca ।।
aparādhasahasrāṇi kṣamante prabhaviṣṇavaḥ ।
kṛtāparādhe api jane mahatī yasya vai kṛpā ।।
vadanti munayaḥ sarve tvām eva karuṇākaram ।
rakṣasvārtaṃ jaganmātar mām ambujanivāsini ।
kamale bālakaṃ dīnam ārtaṃ tanayavatsale ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ kṛpānvitā devī śrīr apy āha janārdanam ।।
{kamalovāca 
rakṣa nātha svakaṃ bhṛtyaṃ garuḍaṃ vipadaṃ gatam ।
janārdana uvācedaṃ nandinaṃ śaṃbhuvāhanam ।।
{viṣṇur uvāca 
naya nāgaṃ sagaruḍaṃ śaṃbhor antikam eva ca ।
tatprasādāc ca garuḍo maheśvaranirīkṣitaḥ ।
ātmīyaṃ ca punā rūpaṃ garuḍaḥ samavāpsyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā ca vṛṣabho nāgena garuḍena ca ।
śanaiḥ sa śaṃkaraṃ gatvā sarvaṃ tasmai nyavedayat ।
śaṃkaro api garutmantaṃ provāca śaśiśekharaḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
yāhi gaṅgāṃ mahābāho gautamīṃ lokapāvanīm ।
sarvakāmapradāṃ śāntāṃ tām āplutya punar vapuḥ ।।
prāpsyase sarvakāmāṃś ca śatadhātha sahasradhā ।
sarvapāpopataptā ye durdaivonmūlitodyamāḥ ।
prāṇino abhīṣṭadā teṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ khaga gautamī ।।
{brahmovāca 
tadvākyaṃ praṇato bhūtvā śrutvā tu garuḍo abhyagāt ।
gaṅgām āplutya garuḍaḥ śivaṃ viṣṇuṃ nanāma saḥ ।।
tataḥ svarṇamayaḥ pakṣī vajradeho mahābalaḥ ।
vegī bhavan muniśreṣṭha punar viṣṇum iyāt sudhīḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ gāruḍaṃ sarvakāmadam ।
tatra snānādi yat kiṃcit karoti prayato naraḥ ।
sarvaṃ tad akṣayaṃ vatsa śivaviṣṇupriyāvaham ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato govardhanaṃ tīrthaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।
pitṝṇāṃ puṇyajananaṃ smaraṇād api pāpanut ।।
tasya prabhāva eṣa syān mayā dṛṣṭas tu nārada ।
brāhmaṇaḥ karṣakaḥ kaścij jābālir iti viśrutaḥ ।।
na vimuñcaty anaḍvāhau madhyaṃ yāte api bhāskare ।
pratodena pratudati pṛṣṭhato api ca pārśvayoḥ ।।
tau gāvāv aśrupūrṇākṣau dṛṣṭvā gauḥ kāmadohinī ।
surabhir jagatāṃ mātā nandine sarvam abravīt ।।
sa cāpi vyathito bhūtvā śaṃbhave tan nyavedayat ।
śaṃbhuś ca vṛṣabhaṃ prāha sarvaṃ sidhyatu te vacaḥ ।।
śivājñāsahito nandī gojātaṃ sarvam āharat ।
naṣṭeṣu goṣu sarveṣu svarge martye tatas tvarā ।।
mām avocan suragaṇā vinā gobhir na jīvyate ।
tān avocaṃ surān sarvāñ śaṃkaraṃ yāta yācata ।।
tathaiveśaṃ tu te sarve stutvā kāryaṃ nyavedayan ।
īśo api vibudhān āha jānāti vṛṣabho mama ।।
te vṛṣaṃ procur amarā dehi gā upakāriṇaḥ ।
vṛṣo api vibudhān āha gosavaḥ kriyatāṃ kratuḥ ।।
tataḥ prāpsyatha gāḥ sarvā yā divyā yāś ca mānuṣāḥ ।
tataḥ pravartate yajño gosavo devanirmitaḥ ।।
gautamyāś ca śubhe pārśve gāvo vavṛdhire tataḥ ।
govardhanaṃ tu tat tīrthaṃ devānāṃ prītivardhanam ।।
tatra snānaṃ muniśreṣṭha gosahasraphalapradam ।
kiṃcid dānādinā yat syāt phalaṃ tat tu na vidmahe ।।
{brahmovāca 
pāpapraṇāśanaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ pāpabhayāpaham ।
nāmadheyaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada yatnataḥ ।।
dhṛtavrata iti khyāto brāhmaṇo lokaviśrutaḥ ।
tasya bhāryā mahī nāma taruṇī lokasundarī ।।
tasya putraḥ sūryanibhaḥ sanājjāta iti śrutaḥ ।
dhṛtavrataṃ tathākarṣan mṛtyuḥ kālerito mune ।।
tataḥ sā bālavidhavā bālaputrā surūpiṇī ।
trātāraṃ naiva paśyantī gālavāśramam abhyagāt ।।
tasmai putraṃ nivedyātha svairiṇī pāpamohitā ।
sā babhrāma bahūn deśān puṃskāmā kāmacāriṇī ।।
tatputro gālavagṛhe vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ।
jāto api mātṛdoṣeṇa veśyeritamatis tv abhūt ।।
janasthānam iti khyātaṃ nānājātisamāvṛtam ।
tatrāsau paṇyaveṣeṇa adhyāste ca mahī tathā ।।
tatsuto api bahūn deśān paribabhrāma kāmukaḥ ।
so api kālavaśāt tatra janasthāne avasat tadā ।।
striyam ākāṅkṣate veśyāṃ dhṛtavratasuto dvijaḥ ।
mahī cāpi dhanaṃ dātṝn puruṣān samapekṣate ।।
mene na putram ātmīyaṃ sa cāpi na tu mātaram ।
tayoḥ samāgamaś cāsīd vidhinā mātṛputrayoḥ ।।
evaṃ bahutithe kāle putre mātari gacchati ।
tayoḥ parasparaṃ jñānaṃ naivāsīn mātṛputrayoḥ ।।
evaṃ pravartamānasya pitṛdharmeṇa sanmatiḥ ।
āsīt tasyāpy asadvṛtteḥ śṛṇu nārada citravat ।।
svairasthityā vartamāno nedaṃ sa parihātavān ।
brāhmīṃ saṃdhyām anuṣṭhāya tad ūrdhvaṃ tu dhanārjanam ।।
vidyābalena vittāni bahūny ārjya dadāty asau ।
tathā sa prātar utthāya gaṅgāṃ gatvā yathāvidhi ।।
śaucādi snānasaṃdhyādi sarvaṃ kāryaṃ yathākramam ।
kṛtvā tu brāhmaṇān natvā tato abhyeti svakarmasu ।।
prātaḥkāle gautamīṃ tu yadā yāti virūpavān ।
kuṣṭhasarvāṅgaśithilaḥ pūyaśoṇitaniḥsravaḥ ।।
snātvā tu gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ yadā yāti surūpadhṛk ।
śāntaḥ sūryāgnisadṛśo mūrtimān iva bhāskaraḥ ।।
etad rūpadvayaṃ svasya naiva paśyati sa dvijaḥ ।
gālavo yatra bhagavāṃs tapojñānaparāyaṇaḥ ।।
āśritya gautamīṃ devīṃ āste ca munibhir vṛtaḥ ।
brāhmaṇo api ca tatraiva nityaṃ tīrthaṃ sametya ca ।।
gālavaṃ ca namasyātha tato yāti svamandiram ।
gaṅgāyāḥ sevanāt pūrvaṃ sanājjātasya yad vapuḥ ।।
snānasaṃdhyottare kāle punar yad api tad dvije ।
ubhayaṃ tasya tad rūpaṃ gālavo nityam eva ca ।।
dṛṣṭvā savismayo mene kiṃcid asty atra kāraṇam ।
evaṃ savismayo bhūtvā gālavaḥ prāha taṃ dvijam ।।
gacchantaṃ tu namasyātha sanājjātaṃ gurur gṛham ।
āhūya yatnato dhīmān kṛpayā vismayena ca ।।
{gālava uvāca 
ko bhavān kva ca gantāsi kiṃ karoṣi kva bhokṣyasi ।
kiṃnāmā tvaṃ kva śayyā te kā te bhāryā vadasva me ।।
{brahmovāca 
gālavasya vacaḥ śrutvā brāhmaṇo apy āha taṃ munim ।।
{brāhmaṇa uvāca 
śvaḥ kathyate mayā sarvaṃ jñātvā kāryavinirṇayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā gālavaṃ taṃ sanājjāto gṛhaṃ yayau ।
bhuktvā rātrau tayā samyak śayyām āsādya bandhakīm ।
uvāca cakitaḥ smṛtvā gālavasya tu yad vacaḥ ।।
{brāhmaṇa uvāca 
tvaṃ tu sarvaguṇopetā bandhaky api pativratā ।
āvayoḥ sadṛśī prītir yāvajjīvaṃ pravartatām ।।
tathāpi kiṃcit pṛcchāmi kiṃnāmnī tvaṃ kva vā kulam ।
kiṃ nu sthānaṃ kva vā bandhur mama sarvaṃ nivedyatām ।।
{bandhaky uvāca 
dhṛtavrata iti khyāto brāhmaṇo dīkṣitaḥ śuciḥ ।
tasya bhāryā mahī cāhaṃ matputro gālavāśrame ।।
utsṛṣṭo matimān bālaḥ sanājjāta iti śrutaḥ ।
ahaṃ tu pūrvadoṣeṇa tyaktvā dharmaṃ kulāgatam ।
svairiṇī tv iha varte ahaṃ viddhi māṃ brāhmaṇīṃ dvija ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā marmaviddha ivābhavat ।
papāta sahasā bhūmau veśyā taṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{veśyovāca 
kiṃ tu jātaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha kva ca prītir gatā tava ।
kiṃ tu vākyaṃ mayā coktaṃ tava cittavirodhakṛt ।।
ātmānam ātmanāśvāsya brāhmaṇo vākyam abravīt ।।
{brāhmaṇa uvāca 
dhṛtavrataḥ pitā vipras tatputro ahaṃ sanādyataḥ ।
mātā mahī mama iyaṃ mama daivād upāgatā ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā tasya vākyaṃ sāpy abhūd atiduḥkhitā ।
tayos tu śocatoḥ paścāt prabhāte vimale ravau ।
gālavaṃ muniśārdūlaṃ gatvā vipro nyavedayat ।।
{brāhmaṇa uvāca 
dhṛtavratasuto brahmaṃs tvayā pūrvaṃ tu pālitaḥ ।
upanītas tvayā caiva mahī mātā mama prabho ।।
kiṃ karomi ca kiṃ kṛtvā niṣkṛtir mama vai bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad vipravacanaṃ śrutvā gālavaḥ prāha mā śucaḥ ।
tavedaṃ dvividhaṃ rūpaṃ nityaṃ paśyāmy apūrvavat ।।
tataḥ pṛṣṭo asi vṛttāntaṃ śrutaṃ jñātaṃ mayā yathā ।
yat kṛtyaṃ tava tat sarvaṃ gaṅgāyāṃ pratyagāt kṣayam ।।
asya tīrthasya māhātmyād asyā devyāḥ prasādataḥ ।
pūto asi pratyahaṃ vatsa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।।
prabhāte tava rūpāṇi sapāpāni tv aharniśam ।
paśye ahaṃ punar apy eva rūpaṃ tava guṇottamam ।।
āgacchantaṃ tv āgoyuktaṃ gacchantaṃ tvām anāgasam ।
paśyāmi nityaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ pūto devyā kṛto adhunā ।।
tasmān na kāryaṃ te kiṃcid avaśiṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati ।
iyaṃ ca mātā te vipra jñātā yā caiva bandhakī ।।
paścāttāpaṃ gatātyantaṃ nivṛttā tv atha pātakāt ।
bhūtānāṃ viṣaye prītir vatsa svābhāvikī yataḥ ।।
satsaṅgato mahāpuṇyān nivṛttir daivato bhavet ।
atyartham anutapteyaṃ prāgācaritapuṇyataḥ ।।
snānaṃ kṛtvā cātra tīrthe tataḥ pūtā bhaviṣyati ।
tathā tau cakratur ubhau mātāputrau ca nārada ।।
snānād babhūvatur ubhau gatapāpāv asaṃśayam ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ dhautapāpaṃ pracakṣate ।।
pāpapraṇāśanaṃ nāma gālavaṃ ceti viśrutam ।
mahāpātakam alpaṃ vā tathā yac copapātakam ।
tat sarvaṃ nāśayed etad dhautapāpaṃ supuṇyadam ।।
{brahmovāca 
yatra dāśarathī rāmaḥ sītayā sahito dvija ।
pitṝn saṃtarpayām āsa pitṛtīrthaṃ tato viduḥ ।।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ tarpaṇaṃ tathā ।
sarvam akṣayatām eti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।।
yatra dāśarathī rāmo viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim ।
pūjayām āsa rājendro munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ ।।
viśvāmitraṃ tu tat tīrtham ṛṣijuṣṭaṃ supuṇyadam ।
tatsvarūpaṃ ca vakṣyāmi paṭhitaṃ vedavādibhiḥ ।।
anāvṛṣṭir abhūt pūrvaṃ prajānām atibhīṣaṇā ।
viśvāmitro mahāprājñaḥ saśiṣyo gautamīm agāt ।।
śiṣyān putrāṃś ca jāyāṃ ca kṛśān dṛṣṭvā kṣudhāturān ।
vyathitaḥ kauśikaḥ śrīmāñ śiṣyān idam uvāca ha ।।
{viśvāmitra uvāca 
yathā kathaṃcid yat kiṃcid yatra kvāpi yathā tathā ।
ānīyatāṃ kiṃtu bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ vā mā vilambyatām ।
idānīm eva gantavyam ānetavyaṃ kṣaṇena tu ।।
{brahmovāca 
ṛṣes tad vacanāc chiṣyāḥ kṣudhitās tvarayā yayuḥ ।
aṭamānā itaś ceto mṛtaṃ dadṛśire śunam ।।
tam ādāya tvarāyuktā ācāryāya nyavedayan ।
so api taṃ bhadram ity uktvā pratijagrāha pāṇinā ।।
viśasadhvaṃ śvamāṃsaṃ ca kṣālayadhvaṃ ca vāriṇā ।
pacadhvaṃ mantravac cāpi hutvāgnau tu yathāvidhi ।।
devān ṛṣīn pitṝn anyāṃs tarpayitvātithīn gurūn ।
sarve bhokṣyāmahe śeṣam ity uvāca sa kauśikaḥ ।।
viśvāmitravacaḥ śrutvā śiṣyāś cakrus tathaiva tat ।
pacyamāne śvamāṃse tu devadūto agnir abhyagāt ।
devānāṃ sadane sarvaṃ devebhyas tan nyavedayat ।।
{agnir uvāca 
devaiḥ śvamāṃsaṃ bhoktavyam āpannam ṛṣikalpitam ।।
{brahmovāca 
agnes tadvacanād indraḥ śyeno bhūtvā vihāyasi ।
sthālīm athāharat pūrṇāṃ māṃsena pihitāṃ tadā ।।
tat karma dṛṣṭvā śiṣyās te ṛṣeḥ śyenaṃ nyavedayan ।
hṛtā sthālī muniśreṣṭha śyenenākṛtabuddhinā ।।
tataś cukopa bhagavāñ śaptukāmas tadā harim ।
tato jñātvā surapatiḥ sthālīṃ cakre madhuplutām ।।
punar niveśayām āsa ulkāsv eva khago hariḥ ।
madhunā tu samāyuktāṃ viśvāmitraś cukopa ha ।
sthālīṃ vīkṣya tataḥ kopād idam āha sa kauśikaḥ ।।
{viśvāmitra uvāca 
śvamāṃsam eva no dehi tvaṃ harāmṛtam uttamam ।
no cet tvāṃ bhasmasāt kuryām indro bhītas tadābravīt ।।
{indra uvāca 
madhu hutvā yathānyāyaṃ piba putraiḥ samanvitaḥ ।
kim anena śvamāṃsena amedhyena mahāmune ।।
{brahmovāca 
viśvāmitro api nety āha bhuktenaikena kiṃ phalam ।
prajāḥ sarvāś ca sīdanti kiṃ tena madhunā hare ।।
sarveṣām amṛtaṃ cet syād bhokṣye aham amṛtaṃ śuci ।
athavā devapitaro bhokṣyantīdaṃ śvamāṃsakam ।।
paścād ahaṃ tac ca māṃsaṃ bhokṣye nānṛtam asti me ।
tato bhītaḥ sahasrākṣo meghān āhūya tatkṣaṇāt ।।
vavarṣa cāmṛtaṃ vāri hy amṛtenārpitāḥ prajāḥ ।
paścāt tad amṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ haridattaṃ yathāvidhi ।।
tarpayitvā surān ādau tarpayitvā jagattrayam ।
vipraḥ saṃbhuktavāñ śiṣyair viśvāmitraḥ svabhāryayā ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrtham ākhyātaṃ cātipuṇyadam ।
yatrāgataḥ surapatir lokānām amṛtārpaṇam ।।
saṃjātaṃ māṃsavarjaṃ tu tat tīrthaṃ puṇyadaṃ nṛṇām ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakratuphalapradam ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ viśvāmitram iti smṛtam ।
madhutīrtham athaindraṃ ca śyenaṃ parjanyam eva ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
śvetatīrtham iti khyātaṃ trailokye viśrutaṃ śubham ।
tasya śravaṇamātreṇa sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
śveto nāma purā vipro gautamasya priyaḥ sakhā ।
ātithyapūjānirato gautamītīram āśritaḥ ।।
manasā karmaṇā vācā śivabhaktiparāyaṇaḥ ।
dhyāyantaṃ taṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ pūjayantaṃ sadā śivam ।।
pūrṇāyuṣaṃ dvijavaraṃ śivabhaktiparāyaṇam ।
netuṃ dūtāḥ samājagmur dakṣiṇāśāpates tadā ।।
nāśaknuvan gṛhaṃ tasya praveṣṭum api nārada ।
tadā kāle vyatikrānte citrako mṛtyum abravīt ।।
{citraka uvāca 
kiṃ nāyāti kṣīṇajīvo mṛtyo śvetaḥ kathaṃ tv iti ।
nādyāpy āyānti dūtās te mṛtyor naivocitaṃ tu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataś ca kupito mṛtyuḥ prāyāc chvetagṛhaṃ svayam ।
bahiḥsthitāṃs tadā paśyan mṛtyur dūtān bhayārditān ।
provāca kim idaṃ dūtā mṛtyum ūcuś ca dūtakāḥ ।।
{dūtā ūcuḥ 
śivena rakṣitaṃ śvetaṃ vayaṃ no vīkṣituṃ kṣamāḥ ।
yeṣāṃ prasanno giriśas teṣāṃ kā nāma bhītayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
pāśapāṇis tadā mṛtyuḥ prāviśad yatra sa dvijaḥ ।
nāsau vipro vijānāti mṛtyuṃ vā yamakiṃkarān ।।
śivaṃ pūjayate bhaktyā śvetasya tu samīpataḥ ।
mṛtyuṃ pāśadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā daṇḍī provāca vismitaḥ ।।
{daṇḍy uvāca 
kim atra vīkṣase mṛtyo daṇḍinaṃ mṛtyur abravīt ।।
{mṛtyur uvāca 
śvetaṃ netum ihāyātas tasmād vīkṣe dvijottamam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tvaṃ gacchety abravīd daṇḍī mṛtyuḥ pāśān athākṣipat ।
śvetāya muniśārdūla tato daṇḍī cukopa ha ।।
śivadattena daṇḍena daṇḍī mṛtyum atāḍayat ।
tataḥ pāśadharo mṛtyuḥ papāta dharaṇītale ।।
tatas te satvaraṃ dūtā hataṃ mṛtyum avekṣya ca ।
yamāya sarvam avadan vadhaṃ mṛtyos tu daṇḍinā ।।
tataś ca kupito dharmo yamo mahiṣavāhanaḥ ।
citraguptaṃ bahubalaṃ yamadaṇḍaṃ ca rakṣakam ।।
mahiṣaṃ bhūtavetālān ādhivyādhīṃs tathaiva ca ।
akṣirogān kukṣirogān karṇaśūlaṃ tathaiva ca ।।
jvaraṃ ca trividhaṃ pāpaṃ narakāṇi pṛthak pṛthak ।
tvarantām iti tān uktvā jagāma tvarito yamaḥ ।।
etair anyaiḥ parivṛto yatra śveto dvijottamaḥ ।
tam āyāntaṃ yamaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandī provāca sāyudhaḥ ।।
vināyakaṃ tathā skandaṃ bhūtanāthaṃ tu daṇḍinam ।
tatra tad yuddham abhavat sarvalokabhayāvaham ।।
kārttikeyaḥ svayaṃ śaktyā bibheda yamakiṃkarān ।
dakṣiṇāśāpatiṃ cāpi nijaghāna balānvitam ।।
hatāvaśiṣṭā yāmyās te ādityāya nyavedayan ।
ādityo api suraiḥ sārdhaṃ śrutvā tan mahad adbhutam ।।
lokapālair anuvṛto mamāntikam upāgamat ।
ahaṃ viṣṇuś ca bhagavān indro agnir varuṇas tathā ।।
candrādityāv aśvinau ca lokapālā marudgaṇāḥ ।
ete cānye ca bahavo vayaṃ yātā yamāntikam ।।
mṛta āste dakṣiṇeśo gaṅgātīre balānvitaḥ ।
samudrāś ca nadā nāgā nānābhūtāny anekaśaḥ ।।
tatrājagmuḥ sureśānaṃ draṣṭuṃ vaivasvataṃ yamam ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā hatasainyaṃ ca yamaṃ devā bhayārditāḥ ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ śaṃbhum ūcuḥ sarve punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
bhaktipriyatvaṃ te nityaṃ duṣṭahantṛtvam eva ca ।
ādikartar namas tubhyaṃ nīlakaṇṭha namo astu te ।
brahmapriya namas te astu devapriya namo astu te ।।
śvetaṃ dvijaṃ bhaktam anāyuṣaṃ te 
netuṃ yamādiḥ sakalo asamarthaḥ 
saṃtoṣam āptāḥ paramaṃ samīkṣya 
bhaktapriyatvaṃ tvayi nātha satyam 
ye tvāṃ prapannāḥ śaraṇaṃ kṛpāluṃ 
nālaṃ kṛtānto apy anuvīkṣituṃ tān 
evaṃ viditvā śiva eva sarve 
tvām eva bhaktyā parayā bhajante 
tvam eva jagatāṃ nātha kiṃ na smarasi śaṃkara ।
tvāṃ vinā kaḥ samartho atra vyavasthāṃ kartum īśvaraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ tu stuvatāṃ teṣāṃ purastād abhavac chivaḥ ।
kiṃ dadāmīti tān āha idam ūcuḥ surā api ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
ayaṃ vaivasvato dharmo niyantā sarvadehinām ।
dharmādharmavyavasthāyāṃ sthāpito lokapālakaḥ ।।
nāyaṃ vadham avāpnoti nāparādhī na pāpakṛt ।
vinā tena jagaddhātur naiva kiṃcid bhaviṣyati ।।
tasmāj jīvaya deveśa yamaṃ sabalavāhanam ।
prārthanā saphalā nātha mahatsu na vṛthā bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ provāca bhagavāñ jīvayeyam asaṃśayam ।
yamaṃ yadi vaco me adya anumanyanti devatāḥ ।।
tataḥ procuḥ surāḥ sarve kurmo vākyaṃ tvayoditam ।
haribrahmādisahitaṃ vaśe yasyākhilaṃ jagat ।।
tataḥ provāca bhagavān amarān samupāgatān ।
madbhakto na mṛtiṃ yātu nety ūcur amarāḥ punaḥ ।।
amarāḥ syus tato deva sarvalokāś carācarāḥ ।
amartyamartyabhedo ayaṃ na syād deva jaganmaya ।।
punar apy āha tāñ śaṃbhuḥ śṛṇvantu mama bhāṣitam ।
madbhaktānāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ gautamīm anusevatām ।।
vayaṃ tu svāmino nityaṃ na mṛtyuḥ svāmyam arhati ।
vārttāpy eṣāṃ na kartavyā yamena tu kadācana ।।
ādhivyādhyādibhir jātu kāryo nābhibhavaḥ kvacit ।
ye śivaṃ śaraṇaṃ yātās te muktās tatkṣaṇād api ।।
sānugasya yamasyāto namasyāḥ sarva eva te ।
tathety ūcuḥ suragaṇā devadevaṃ śivaṃ prati ।।
tataś ca bhagavān nātho nandinaṃ prāha vāhanam ।।
{śiva uvāca 
gautamyā udakena tvam abhiṣiñca mṛtaṃ yamam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato yamādayaḥ sarve abhiṣiktās tu nandinā ।
utthitāś ca sajīvās te dakṣiṇāśāṃ tato gatāḥ ।।
uttare gautamītīre viṣṇvādyāḥ sarvadaivatāḥ ।
sthitā āsan pūjayanto devadevaṃ maheśvaram ।।
tatrāsann ayutāny aṣṭa sahasrāṇi caturdaśa ।
tathā ṣaṭ ca sahasrāṇi punaḥ ṣaṭ ca tathaiva ca ।।
ṣaḍ dakṣiṇe tathā tīre tīrthānām ayutatrayam ।
puṇyam ākhyānam etad dhi śvetatīrthasya nārada ।।
yatrāsau patito mṛtyur mṛtyutīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।
tasya śravaṇamātreṇa sahasraṃ jīvate samāḥ ।।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।
śravaṇaṃ paṭhanaṃ cāpi smaraṇaṃ ca malakṣayam ।
karoti sarvalokānāṃ bhuktimuktipradāyakam ।।
{brahmovāca 
śukratīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvasiddhikaraṃ nṛṇām ।
sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ sarvavyādhivināśanam ।।
aṅgirāś ca bhṛguś caiva ṛṣī paramadhārmikau ।
tayoḥ putrau mahāprājñau rūpabuddhivilāsinau ।।
jīvaḥ kavir iti khyātau mātāpitror vaśe ratau ।
upanītau sutau dṛṣṭvā pitarāv ūcatur mithaḥ ।।
{ṛṣī ūcatuḥ 
āvayor eka evāstu śāstā nityaṃ ca putrayoḥ ।
tasmād ekaḥ śāsitā syāt tiṣṭhatv eko yathāsukham ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā tataḥ śīghram aṅgirāḥ prāha bhārgavam ।
adhyāpayiṣye sadṛśaṃ sukhaṃ tiṣṭhatu bhārgavaḥ ।।
etac chrutvā cāṅgiraso vākyaṃ bhṛgukulodvahaḥ ।
tatheti matvāṅgirase śukraṃ tasmai nyavedayat ।।
ubhāv api sutau nityam adhyāpayati vai pṛthak ।
vaiṣamyabuddhyā tau bālau cirāc chukro abravīd idam ।।
{śukra uvāca 
vaiṣamyeṇa guro māṃ tvam adhyāpayasi nityaśaḥ ।
gurūṇāṃ nedam ucitaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ putraśiṣyayoḥ ।।
vaiṣamyeṇa ca vartante mūḍhāḥ śiṣyeṣu deśikāḥ ।
naiṣā viṣamabuddhīnāṃ saṃkhyā pāpasya vidyate ।।
ācārya samyag jñāto asi namasye ahaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
gaccheyaṃ gurum anyaṃ vai mām anujñātum arhasi ।।
gaccheyaṃ pitaraṃ brahman yady asau viṣamo bhavet ।
tato vānyatra gacchāmi svāmin pṛṣṭo asi gamyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
guruṃ bṛhaspatiṃ dṛṣṭvā anujñātas tv agāt tataḥ ।
avāptavidyaḥ pitaraṃ gaccheyaṃ cety acintayat ।।
tasmāt kam anupṛccheyam utkṛṣṭaḥ ko gurur bhavet ।
iti smaran mahāprājñam apṛcchad vṛddhagautamam ।।
{śukra uvāca 
ko guruḥ syān muniśreṣṭha mama brūhi gurur bhavet ।
trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yo gurus taṃ vrajāmy aham ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa prāha jagatām īśaṃ śaṃbhuṃ devaṃ jagadgurum ।
kvārādhayāmi giriśam ity uktaḥ prāha gautamaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
gautamyāṃ tu śucir bhūtvā stotrais toṣaya śaṃkaram ।
tatas tuṣṭo jagannāthaḥ sa te vidyāṃ pradāsyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
gautamasya tu tadvākyāt prāgād gaṅgāṃ sa bhārgavaḥ ।
snātvā bhūtvā śuciḥ samyak stutiṃ cakre sa bālakaḥ ।।
{śukra uvāca 
bālo ahaṃ bālabuddhiś ca bālacandradhara prabho ।
nāhaṃ jānāmi te kiṃcit stutiṃ kartuṃ namo astu te ।।
parityaktasya guruṇā na mamāsti suhṛt sakhā ।
tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvabhāvena jagannātha namo astu te ।।
gurur gurumatāṃ deva mahatāṃ ca mahān asi ।
aham alpataro bālo jaganmaya namo astu te ।।
vidyārthaṃ hi sureśāna nāhaṃ vedmi bhavadgatim ।
māṃ tvaṃ ca kṛpayā paśya lokasākṣin namo astu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ tu stuvatas tasya prasanno abhūt sureśvaraḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
kāmaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yac cāpi suradurlabham ।।
{brahmovāca 
kavir apy āha deveśaṃ kṛtāñjalir udāradhīḥ ।।
{śukra uvāca 
brahmādibhiś ca ṛṣibhir yā vidyā naiva gocarā ।
tāṃ vidyāṃ nātha yāciṣye tvaṃ gurur mama daivatam ।।
{brahmovāca 
mṛtasaṃjīvinīṃ vidyām ajñātāṃ tridaśair api ।
tāṃ dattavān suraśreṣṭhas tasmai śukrāya yācate ।।
itarā laukikī vidyā vaidikī cānyagocarā ।
kiṃ punaḥ śaṃkare tuṣṭe vicāryam avaśiṣyate ।।
sa tu labdhvā mahāvidyāṃ prāyāt svapitaraṃ gurum ।
daityānāṃ ca guruś cāsīd vidyayā pūjitaḥ kaviḥ ।।
tataḥ kadācit tāṃ vidyāṃ kasmiṃścit kāraṇāntare ।
kaco bṛhaspatisuto vidyāṃ prāptaḥ kaves tu tām ।।
kacād bṛhaspatiś cāpi tato devāḥ pṛthak pṛthak ।
avāpur mahatīṃ vidyāṃ yām āhur mṛtajīvinīm ।।
yatra sā kavinā prāptā vidyāpūjya maheśvaram ।
gautamyā uttare pāre śukratīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
mṛtasaṃjīvinītīrtham āyurārogyavardhanam ।
snānaṃ dānaṃ ca yat kiṃcit sarvam akṣayapuṇyadam ।।
{brahmovāca 
indratīrtham iti khyātaṃ brahmahatyāvināśanam ।
smaraṇād api pāpaugha- kleśasaṃghavināśanam ।।
purā vṛtravadhe vṛtte brahmahatyā tu nārada ।
śacīpatiṃ cānugatā tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītavad dhariḥ ।।
indras tato vṛtrahantā itaś cetaś ca dhāvati ।
yatra yatra tv asau yāti hatyā sāpīndragāminī ।।
sa mahat sara āviśya padmanālam upāgamat ।
tatrāsau tantuvad bhūtvā vāsaṃ cakre śacīpatiḥ ।।
sarastīre api hatyāsīd divyaṃ varṣasahasrakam ।
etasminn antare devā nirindrā hy abhavan mune ।।
mantrayām āsur avyagrāḥ katham indro bhaved iti ।
tatrāham avadaṃ devān hatyāsthānaṃ prakalpya ca ।।
indrasya pāvanārthāya gautamyām abhiṣicyatām ।
yatrābhiṣiktaḥ pūtātmā punar indro bhaviṣyati ।।
tathā te niścayaṃ kṛtvā gautamīṃ śīghram āgaman ।
tatra snātaṃ surapatiṃ devāś ca ṛṣayas tathā ।।
abhiṣektukāmās te sarve śacīkāntaṃ ca tasthire ।
abhiṣicyamānam indraṃ taṃ prakopād gautamo abravīt ।।
{gautama uvāca 
abhiṣekṣyanti pāpiṣṭhaṃ mahendraṃ gurutalpagam ।
tān sarvān bhasmasāt kuryāṃ śīghraṃ yāntv asurārayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad ṛṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā parihṛtya ca gautamīm ।
narmadām agaman sarva indram ādāya satvarāḥ ।।
uttare narmadātīre abhiṣekāya tasthire ।
abhiṣekṣyamāṇam indraṃ taṃ māṇḍavyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ।।
abravīd bhasmasāt kuryāṃ yadi syād abhiṣecanam ।
pūjayām āsur amarā māṇḍavyaṃ yuktibhiḥ stavaiḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
ayam indraḥ sahasrākṣo yasmin deśe abhiṣicyate ।
tatrātidāruṇaṃ vighnaṃ mune samupajāyate ।।
tacchāntiṃ kuru kalyāṇa prasīda varado bhava ।
malaniryātanaṃ yasmin kurmas tasmin varān bahūn ।।
deśe dāsyāmahe sarve tad anujñātum arhasi ।
yasmin deśe surendrasya abhiṣeko bhaviṣyati ।।
sa sarvakāmadaḥ puṃsāṃ dhānyavṛkṣaphalair yutaḥ ।
nānāvṛṣṭir na durbhikṣaṃ bhaved atra kadācana ।।
{brahmovāca 
mene tato muniśreṣṭho māṇḍavyo lokapūjitaḥ ।
abhiṣekaḥ kṛtas tatra malaniryātanaṃ tathā ।।
devais tadokto munibhiḥ sa deśo mālavas tataḥ ।
abhiṣikte surapatau jāte ca vimale tadā ।।
ānīya gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ taṃ puṇyāyābhiṣecire ।
surāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva ahaṃ viṣṇus tathaiva ca ।।
vasiṣṭho gautamaś cāpi agastyo atriś ca kaśyapaḥ ।
ete cānye ca ṛṣayo devā yakṣāḥ sapannagāḥ ।।
snānaṃ tatpuṇyatoyena akurvann abhiṣecanam ।
mayā punaḥ śacībhartā kamaṇḍalubhavena ca ।।
vāriṇāpy abhiṣiktaś ca tatra puṇyābhavan nadī ।
siktā ceti ca tatrāsīt te gaṅgāyāṃ ca saṃgate ।।
saṃgamau tatra vikhyātau sarvadā munisevitau ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ puṇyāsaṃgamam ucyate ।।
siktāyāḥ saṃgame puṇyam aindraṃ tad abhidhīyate ।
tatra sapta sahasrāṇi tīrthāny āsañ śubhāni ca ।।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca viśeṣeṇa tu saṃgame ।
sarvaṃ tad akṣayaṃ vidyān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā ।।
yad etat puṇyam ākhyānaṃ yaḥ paṭhec ca śṛṇoti vā ।
sarvapāpaiḥ sa mucyeta manovākkāyakarmajaiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
paulastyaṃ tīrtham ākhyātaṃ sarvasiddhipradaṃ nṛṇām ।
prabhāvaṃ tasya vakṣyāmi bhraṣṭarājyapradāyakam ।।
uttarāśāpatiḥ pūrvam ṛddhisiddhisamanvitaḥ ।
purā laṅkāpatiś cāsīj jyeṣṭho viśravasaḥ sutaḥ ।।
tasyaite bhrātaraś cāsan balavanto amitaprabhāḥ ।
sāpatnā rāvaṇaś caiva kumbhakarṇo vibhīṣaṇaḥ ।।
te api viśravasaḥ putrā rākṣasyāṃ rākṣasās tu te ।
maddattena vimānena dhanado bhrātṛbhiḥ saha ।।
mamāntikaṃ bhaktiyukto nityam eti tu yāti ca ।
rāvaṇasya tu yā mātā kupitā sābravīt sutān ।।
{rāvaṇamātovāca 
mariṣye na ca jīviṣye putrā vairūpyakāraṇāt ।
devāś ca dānavāś cāsan sāpatnā bhrātaro mithaḥ ।।
anyonyavadham īpsante jayaiśvaryavaśānugāḥ ।
tadbhavanto na puruṣā na śaktā na jayaiṣiṇaḥ ।
sāpatnyaṃ yo anumanyate tasya jīvo nirarthakaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tan mātṛvacanaṃ śrutvā bhrātaras te trayo mune ।
jagmus te tapase araṇyaṃ kṛtavantas tapo mahat ।।
matto varān avāpuś ca traya ete ca rākṣasāḥ ।
mātulena marīcena tathā mātāmahena tu ।।
tanmātṛvacanāc cāpi tato laṅkām ayācata ।
rakṣobhāvān mātṛdoṣād bhrātror vairam abhūn mahat ।।
tatas tad abhavad yuddhaṃ devadānavayor iva ।
yuddhe jitvāgrajaṃ śāntaṃ dhanadaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā ।।
puṣpakaṃ ca purīṃ laṅkāṃ sarvaṃ caiva vyapāharat ।
rāvaṇo ghoṣayām āsa trailokye sacarācare ।।
yo dadyād āśrayaṃ bhrātuḥ sa ca vadhyo bhaven mama ।
bhrātrā nirasto vaiśravaṇo naiva prāpāśrayaṃ kvacit ।
pitāmahaṃ pulastyaṃ taṃ gatvā natvābravīd vacaḥ ।।
{dhanada uvāca 
bhrātrā nirasto duṣṭena kiṃ karomi vadasva me ।
āśrayaḥ śaraṇaṃ yat syād daivaṃ vā tīrtham eva ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
tat pautravacanaṃ śrutvā pulastyo vākyam abravīt ।।
{pulastya uvāca 
gautamīṃ gaccha putra tvaṃ stuhi devaṃ maheśvaram ।
tatra nāsya praveśaḥ syād gaṅgāyā jalamadhyataḥ ।।
siddhiṃ prāpsyasi kalyāṇīṃ tathā kuru mayā saha ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā jagāmāsau sabhāryo dhanadas tathā ।
pitrā mātrā ca vṛddhena pulastyena dhaneśvaraḥ ।।
gatvā tu gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ śuciḥ snātvā yatavrataḥ ।
tuṣṭāva devadeveśaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ śivam ।।
{dhanada uvāca 
svāmī tvam evāsya carācarasya 
viśvasya śaṃbho na paro asti kaścit 
tvām apy avajñāya yadīha mohāt 
pragalbhate kopi sa śocya eva 
tvam aṣṭamūrtyā sakalaṃ bibharṣi 
tvadājñayā vartata eva sarvam 
tathāpi vedeti budho bhavantaṃ 
na jātv avidvān mahimā purātanam 
malaprasūtaṃ yad avocad ambā 
hāsyāt suto ayaṃ tava deva śūraḥ 
tvatprekṣitād yaḥ sa ca vighnarājo 
jajñe tv aho ceṣṭitam īśadṛṣṭeḥ 
aśruplutāṅgī girijā samīkṣya 
viyuktadāṃpatyam itīśam ūce 
manobhavo abhūn madano ratiś ca 
saubhāgyapūrvatvam avāpa somāt 
{brahmovāca 
ityādi stuvatas tasya purato abhūt trilocanaḥ ।
vareṇa cchandayām āsa harṣān novāca kiṃcana ।।
tūṣṇīṃbhūte tu dhanade pulastye ca maheśvare ।
punaḥ punar varasveti śive vādini harṣite ।।
etasminn antare tatra vāg uvācāśarīriṇī ।
prāptavyaṃ dhanapālatvaṃ vadantīdaṃ maheśvaram ।।
pulastyasya tu yac cittaṃ pitur vaiśravaṇasya tu ।
viditveva tadā vāṇī śubham artham udīrayat ।।
bhūtavad bhavitavyaṃ syād dāsyamānaṃ tu dattavat ।
prāptavyaṃ prāptavat tatra daivī vāg abhavac chubhā ।।
prabhūtaśatruḥ paribhūtaduḥkhaḥ 
saṃpūjya someśvaram āpa liṅgam 
digīśvaratvaṃ draviṇaprabhutvam 
apāradātṛtvakalatraputrān 
tāṃ vācaṃ dhanadaḥ śrutvā devadevaṃ triśūlinam ।
evaṃ bhavatu nāmeti dhanado vākyam abravīt ।।
tathaivāstv iti deveśo daivīṃ vācam amanyata ।
pulastyaṃ ca varaiḥ puṇyais tathā viśravasaṃ munim ।।
dhanapālaṃ ca deveśo hy abhinandya yayau śivaḥ ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ paulastyaṃ dhanadaṃ viduḥ ।।
tathā vaiśravasaṃ puṇyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।
teṣu snānādi yat kiṃcit tat sarvaṃ bahupuṇyadam ।।
{brahmovāca 
agnitīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvakratuphalapradam ।
sarvavighnopaśamanaṃ tattīrthasya phalaṃ śṛṇu ।।
jātavedā iti khyāto agner bhrātā sa havyavāṭ ।
havyaṃ vahantaṃ devānāṃ gautamyās tīra eva tu ।।
ṛṣīṇāṃ sattrasadane agner bhrātaram uttamam ।
bhrātuḥ priyaṃ tathā dakṣaṃ madhur ditisuto balī ।।
jaghāna ṛṣimukhyeṣu paśyatsu ca sureṣv api ।
havyaṃ devā naiva cāpur mṛte vai jātavedasi ।।
mṛte bhrātari sa tv agniḥ priye vai jātavedasi ।
kopena mahatāviṣṭo gāṅgam ambhaḥ samāviśat ।।
gaṅgāmbhasi samāviṣṭe hy agnau devāś ca mānuṣāḥ ।
jīvam utsarjayām āsur agnijīvā yato matāḥ ।।
yatrāgnir jalam āviṣṭas taṃ deśaṃ sarva eva te ।
ājagmur vibudhāḥ sarva ṛṣayaḥ pitaras tathā ।।
vināgninā na jīvāmaḥ stuvanto agniṃ viśeṣataḥ ।
agniṃ jalagataṃ dṛṣṭvā priyaṃ cocur divaukasaḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
devāñ jīvaya havyena kavyena ca pitṝṃs tathā ।
mānuṣān annapākena bījānāṃ kledanena ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
agnir apy āha tān devāñ śakto yo me gato anujaḥ ।
kriyamāṇe bhavatkārye yā gatir jātavedasaḥ ।।
sā vāpi syān mama surā notsahe kāryasādhane ।
kāryaṃ tu sarvatas tasya bhavatāṃ jātavedasaḥ ।।
imāṃ sthitim anuprāpto na jāne me kathaṃ bhavet ।
iha cāmutra ca vyāptau śaktir apy atra no bhavet ।।
athāpi kriyamāṇe vai kārye saiva gatir mama ।
devās tam ūcur bhāvena sarveṇa ṛṣayas tathā ।।
āyuḥ karmaṇi ca prītir vyāptau śaktiś ca dīyate ।
prayājān anuyājāṃś ca dāsyāmo havyavāhana ।।
