devānāṃ tvaṃ mukhaṃ śreṣṭham āhutyaḥ prathamās tava ।
tvayā dattaṃ tu yad dravyaṃ bhokṣyāmaḥ surasattama ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas tuṣṭo abhavad vahnir devavākyād yathākramam ।
iha cāmutra ca vyāptau havye vā laukike tathā ।।
sarvatra vahnir abhayaḥ samartho abhūt surājñayā ।
jātavedā bṛhadbhānuḥ saptārcir nīlalohitaḥ ।।
jalagarbhaḥ śamīgarbho yajñagarbhaḥ sa ucyate ।
jalād ākṛṣya vibudhā abhiṣicya vibhāvasum ।।
ubhayatra pade vāsaḥ sarvago agnis tato abhavat ।
yathāgataṃ surā jagmur vahnitīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
tatra sapta śatāny āsaṃs tīrthāni guṇavanti ca ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca yaḥ karoti jitātmavān ।।
aśvamedhaphalaṃ sāgraṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ śubham ।
devatīrthaṃ ca tatraiva āgneyaṃ jātavedasam ।।
agnipratiṣṭhitaṃ liṅgaṃ tatrāste anekavarṇavat ।
taddevadarśanād eva sarvakratuphalaṃ labhet ।।
{brahmovāca 
ṛṇapramocanaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ vedavido viduḥ ।
tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada tanmanāḥ ।।
āsīt pṛthuśravā nāma priyaḥ kakṣīvataḥ sutaḥ ।
na dārasaṃgrahaṃ lebhe vairāgyān nāgnipūjanam ।।
kanīyāṃs tu samartho api parivittibhayān mune ।
nākarod dārakarmādi naivāgnīnām upāsanam ।।
tataḥ procuḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ putraṃ kakṣīvataḥ śubham ।
jyeṣṭhaṃ caiva kaniṣṭhaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthag idaṃ vacaḥ ।।
{pitara ūcuḥ 
ṛṇatrayāpanodāya kriyatāṃ dārasaṃgrahaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
nety uvāca tato jyeṣṭhaḥ kim ṛṇaṃ kena yujyate ।
kanīyāṃs tu pitṝn prāha na yogyo dārasaṃgrahaḥ ।।
jyeṣṭhe sati mahāprājñaḥ parivittibhayād iti ।
tāv ubhau punar apy evam ūcus te vai pitāmahāḥ ।।
{pitara ūcuḥ 
yātām ubhau gautamīṃ tu puṇyāṃ kakṣīvataḥ sutau ।
kurutāṃ gautamīsnānaṃ sarvābhīṣṭapradāyakam ।।
gacchatāṃ gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ lokatritayapāvanīm ।
snānaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ tasyāṃ kurutāṃ śraddhayānvitau ।।
dṛṣṭāvanāmitā dhyātā gautamī sarvakāmadā ।
na deśakālajātyādi- niyamo atrāvagāhane ।
jyeṣṭho anṛṇas tato bhūyāt parivittir na cetaraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ pṛthuśravā jyeṣṭhaḥ kṛtvā snānaṃ satarpaṇam ।
trayāṇām api lokānāṃ kākṣīvato anṛṇo abhavat ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrtham ṛṇamocanam ucyate ।
śrautasmārta-ṛṇebhyaś ca itarebhyaś ca nārada ।
tatra snānena dānena ṛṇī muktaḥ sukhī bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
suparṇāsaṃgamaṃ nāma kādravāsaṃgamaṃ tathā ।
maheśvaro yatra devo gaṅgāpulinam āśritaḥ ।।
agnikuṇḍaṃ ca tatraiva raudraṃ vaiṣṇavam eva ca ।
sauraṃ saumyaṃ tathā brāhmaṃ kaumāraṃ vāruṇaṃ tathā ।।
apsarā ca nadī yatra saṃgatā gaṅgayā tathā ।
tattīrthasmaraṇād eva kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ ।।
sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ śṛṇu yatnena nārada ।
indreṇa hiṃsitāḥ pūrvaṃ vālakhilyā maharṣayaḥ ।
dattārdhatapasaḥ sarve procus te kāśyapaṃ munim ।।
{vālakhilyā ūcuḥ 
putram utpādayānena indradarpaharaṃ śubham ।
tapaso ardhaṃ tu dāsyāmas tathety āha munis tu tān ।।
suparṇāyāṃ tato garbham ādadhe sa prajāpatiḥ ।
kadrvāṃ caiva śanair brahman sarpāṇāṃ sarpamātari ।।
te garbhiṇyāv ubhe āha gantukāmaḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
aparādho na ca kvāpi kāryo gamanam eva ca ।।
anyatra gamanāc chāpo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā sa yayau patnyau gate bhartari te ubhe ।
tadaiva jagmatuḥ sattram ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām ।।
brahmavṛndasamākīrṇaṃ gaṅgātīrasamāśritam ।
unmatte te ubhe nityaṃ vayaḥsaṃpattigarvite ।।
nivāryamāṇe bahuśo munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ ।
vikurvatyau tatra sattre samāni ca havīṃṣi ca ।।
yoṣitāṃ durvilasitaṃ kaḥ saṃvaritum īśvaraḥ ।
te dṛṣṭvā cukṣubhur viprā apamārgarate ubhe ।।
apamārgasthite yasmād āpage hi bhaviṣyathaḥ ।
suparṇā caiva kadrūś ca nadyau te saṃbabhūvatuḥ ।।
sa kadācid gṛhaṃ prāyāt kaśyapo atha prajāpatiḥ ।
ṛṣibhyas tatra vṛttāntaṃ śāpaṃ tābhyāṃ savistaram ।।
śrutvā tu vismayāviṣṭaḥ kiṃ karomīty acintayat ।
ṛṣibhyaḥ kathayām āsa vālakhilyā iti śrutāḥ ।।
ta ūcuḥ kaśyapaṃ vipraṃ gatvā gaṅgāṃ tu gautamīm ।
tatra stuhi maheśānaṃ punar bhārye bhaviṣyataḥ ।।
brahmahatyābhayād eva yatra devo maheśvaraḥ ।
gaṅgāmadhye sadā hy āste madhyameśvarasaṃjñayā ।।
tathety uktvā kaśyapo api snātvā gaṅgāṃ jitavrataḥ ।
tuṣṭāva stavanaiḥ puṇyair devadevaṃ maheśvaram ।।
{kaśyapa uvāca 
lokatrayaikādhipater na yasya 
kutrāpi vastuny abhimānaleśaḥ 
sa siddhanātho akhilaviśvakartā 
bhartā śivāyā bhavatu prasannaḥ 
tāpatrayoṣṇadyutitāpitānām 
itas tato vai paridhāvatāṃ ca 
śarīriṇāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ 
tvam eva duḥkhavyapanodadakṣaḥ 
sattvādiyogas trividho api yasya 
śakrādibhir vaktum aśakya eva 
vicitravṛttiṃ paricintya somaṃ 
sukhī sadā dānaparo vareṇyaḥ 
{brahmovāca 
ityādistutibhir devaḥ stuto gaurīpatiḥ śivaḥ ।
prasanno hy adadāc chaṃbhuḥ kaśyapāya varān bahūn ।।
bhāryārthinaṃ tu taṃ prāha syātāṃ bhārye ubhe tu te ।
nadīsvarūpe patnyau ye gaṅgāṃ prāpya saridvarām ।।
tatsaṃgamanamātreṇa tābhyāṃ bhūyāt svakaṃ vapuḥ ।
te garbhiṇyau punar jāte gaṅgāyāś ca prasādataḥ ।।
tataḥ prajāpatiḥ prīto bhārye prāpya mahāmanāḥ ।
āhvayām āsa tān viprān gautamītīram āśritān ।।
sīmantonnayanaṃ cakre tābhyāṃ prītaḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
brāhmaṇān pūjayām āsa vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā ।।
bhuktavatsv atha vipreṣu kaśyapasyātha mandire ।
bhartṛsamīpopaviṣṭā kadrūr viprān nirīkṣya ca ।।
tataḥ kadrūr ṛṣīn akṣṇā prāhasat te ca cukṣubhuḥ ।
yenākṣṇā hasitā pāpe bhajyatāṃ te akṣi pāpavat ।।
kāṇābhavat tataḥ kadrūḥ sarpamāteti yocyate ।
tataḥ prasādayām āsa kaśyapo bhagavān ṛṣīn ।।
tataḥ prasannās te procur gautamī saritāṃ varā ।
aparādhasahasrebhyo rakṣiṣyati ca sevanāt ।।
bhāryānvitas tathā cakre kaśyapo munisattamaḥ ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrtham ubhayoḥ saṃgamaṃ viduḥ ।
sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ sarvakratuphalapradam ।।
{brahmovāca 
purūravasam ākhyātaṃ tīrthaṃ vedavido viduḥ ।
smaraṇād eva pāpānāṃ nāśanaṃ kiṃ tu darśanāt ।।
purūravā brahmasadaḥ prāpya tatra sarasvatīm ।
yadṛcchayā devanadīṃ hasantīṃ brahmaṇo antike ।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpasaṃpannām urvaśīṃ prāha bhūpatiḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
keyaṃ rūpavatī sādhvī sthiteyaṃ brahmaṇo antike ।
sarvāsām uttamā yoṣid dīpayantī sabhām imām ।।
{brahmovāca 
urvaśī prāha rājānam iyaṃ devanadī śubhā ।
sarasvatī brahmasutā nityam eti ca yāti ca ।
tac chrutvā vismito rājā ānayemāṃ mamāntikam ।।
{brahmovāca 
urvaśī punar apy āha rājānaṃ bhūridakṣiṇam ।।
{urvaśy uvāca 
ānīyate mahārāja tasyāḥ sarvaṃ nivedya ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas tāṃ prāhiṇot tatra rājā prītyā tadorvaśīm ।
sā gatvā rājavacanaṃ nyavedayad athorvaśī ।।
sarasvaty api tan mene urvaśyā yan niveditam ।
sā tatheti pratijñāya prāyād yatra purūravāḥ ।।
sarasvatyās tatas tīre sa reme bahulāḥ samāḥ ।
sarasvān abhavat putro yasya putro bṛhadrathaḥ ।।
tāṃ gacchantīṃ nṛpagṛhaṃ nityam eva sarasvatīm ।
sarasvantaṃ tato lakṣma jñātvānyeṣu tathā kṛtam ।।
tasyai dadāv ahaṃ śāpaṃ bhūyā iti mahānadī ।
macchāpabhītā vāgīśā prāgād devīṃ ca gautamīm ।।
kamaṇḍalubhavāṃ pūtāṃ mātaraṃ lokapāvanīm ।
tāpatrayopaśamanīm aihikāmuṣmikapradām ।।
sā gatvā gautamīṃ devīṃ prāha macchāpam āditaḥ ।
gaṅgāpi mām uvācedaṃ viśāpāṃ kartum arhasi ।।
na yuktaṃ yat sarasvatyāḥ śāpaṃ tvaṃ dattavān asi ।
strīṇām eṣa svabhāvo vai puṃskāmā yoṣito yataḥ ।।
svabhāvacapalā brahman yoṣitaḥ sakalā api ।
tvaṃ kathaṃ tu na jānīṣe jagatsraṣṭāmbujāsana ।।
viḍambayati kaṃ vā na kāmo vāpi svabhāvataḥ ।
tato viśāpam avadaṃ dṛśyāpi syāt sarasvatī ।।
tasmāc chāpān nadī martye dṛśyādṛśyā sarasvatī ।
yatraiṣā saṃgatā devī gaṅgāyāṃ śāpavihvalā ।।
tatra prāyān nṛpavaro dhārmikaḥ sa purūravāḥ ।
tapas taptvā samārādhya devaṃ siddheśvaraṃ haram ।।
sarvān kāmān athāvāpa gaṅgāyāś ca prasādataḥ ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ purūravasam ucyate ।।
sarasvatīsaṃgamaṃ ca brahmatīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।
siddheśvaro yatra devaḥ sarvakāmapradaṃ tu tat ।।
{brahmovāca 
sāvitrī caiva gāyatrī śraddhā medhā sarasvatī ।
etāni pañca tīrthāni puṇyāni munayo viduḥ ।।
tatra snātvā tu pītvā tu mucyate sarvakalmaṣāt ।
sāvitrī caiva gāyatrī śraddhā medhā sarasvatī ।।
etā mama sutā jyeṣṭhā dharmasaṃsthānahetavaḥ ।
sarvāsām uttamāṃ kāṃcin nirmame lokasundarīm ।।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtā buddhir mamāsīn munisattama ।
gṛhyamāṇā mayā bālā sā māṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyitā ।।
mṛgībhūtā tu sā bālā mṛgo aham abhavaṃ tadā ।
mṛgavyādho abhavac chaṃbhur dharmasaṃrakṣaṇāya ca ।।
tā madbhītāḥ pañca sutā gaṅgām īyur mahānadīm ।
tato maheśvaraḥ prāyād dharmasaṃrakṣaṇāya saḥ ।।
dhanur gṛhītvā saśaram īśo api mṛgarūpiṇam ।
mām uvāca vadhiṣye tvāṃ mṛgavyādhas tadā haraḥ ।।
tatkarmaṇo nivṛtto ahaṃ prādāṃ kanyāṃ vivasvate ।
sāvitryādyāḥ pañca sutā nadīrūpeṇa saṃgatāḥ ।।
tā āgatāḥ punaś cāpi svargaṃ lokaṃ mamāntikam ।
yatra tāḥ saṃgatā devyā pañca tīrthāni nārada ।।
saṃgatāni ca puṇyāni pañca nadyaḥ sarasvatī ।
teṣu snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ yat kiṃcit kurute naraḥ ।।
sarvakāmapradaṃ tat syān naiṣkarmyān muktidaṃ smṛtam ।
tatrābhavan mṛgavyādhaṃ tīrthaṃ sarvārthadaṃ nṛṇām ।
svargamokṣaphalaṃ cānyad brahmatīrthaphalaṃ smṛtam ।।
{brahmovāca 
śamītīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvapāpopaśāntidam ।
tasyākhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu yatnena nārada ।।
āsīt priyavrato nāma kṣatriyo jayatāṃ varaḥ ।
gautamyā dakṣiṇe tīre dīkṣāṃ cakre purodhasā ।।
hayamedha upakrānte ṛtvigbhir ṛṣibhir vṛte ।
tasya rājño mahābāhor vasiṣṭhas tu purohitaḥ ।।
tadyajñavāṭam agamad dānavo atha hiraṇyakaḥ ।
taṃ dānavam abhiprekṣya devās tv indrapurogamāḥ ।।
bhītāḥ kecid divaṃ jagmur havyavāṭ śamim āviśat ।
aśvatthaṃ viṣṇur agamad bhānur arkaṃ vaṭaṃ śivaḥ ।।
somaḥ palāśam agamad gaṅgāmbho havyavāhanaḥ ।
aśvinau tu hayaṃ gṛhya vāyaso abhūd yamaḥ svayam ।।
etasminn antare tatra vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ।
yaṣṭim ādāya daiteyān nyavārayad athājñayā ।।
tataḥ pravṛttaḥ punar eva yajño 
daityo gataḥ svena balena yuktaḥ 
imāni tīrthāni tataḥ śubhāni 
daśāśvamedhasya phalāni dadyuḥ 
prathamaṃ tu śamītīrthaṃ dvitīyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ viduḥ ।
ārkaṃ śaivaṃ ca saumyaṃ ca vāsiṣṭhaṃ sarvakāmadam ।।
devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sarve nivṛtte makhavistare ।
tuṣṭāḥ procur vasiṣṭhaṃ taṃ yajamānaṃ priyavratam ।।
tāṃś ca vṛkṣāṃs tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ mudā yuktāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
hayamedhasya niṣpattyai ete yātā itas tataḥ ।।
hayamedhaphalaṃ dadyus tīrthānīty avadan surāḥ ।
tasmāt snānena dānena teṣu tīrtheṣu nārada ।
hayamedhaphalaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnoti na mṛṣā vacaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
viśvāmitraṃ hariścandraṃ śunaḥśepaṃ ca rohitam ।
vāruṇaṃ brāhmam āgneyam aindram aindavam aiśvaram ।।
maitraṃ ca vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva yāmyam āśvinam auśanam ।
eteṣāṃ puṇyatīrthānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuṣva me ।।
hariścandra iti tv āsīd ikṣvākuprabhavo nṛpaḥ ।
tasya gṛhe munī prāptau nāradaḥ parvatas tathā ।
kṛtvātithyaṃ tayoḥ samyag ghariścandro abravīd ṛṣī ।।
{hariścandra uvāca 
putrārthaṃ kliśyate lokaḥ kiṃ putreṇa bhaviṣyati ।
jñānī vāpy athavājñānī uttamo madhyamo athavā ।
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ nityaṃ brūtām ṛṣivarāv ubhau ।।
{brahmovāca 
tāv ūcatur hariścandraṃ parvato nāradas tathā ।।
{nāradaparvatāv ūcatuḥ 
ekadhā daśadhā rājañ śatadhā ca sahasradhā ।
uttaraṃ vidyate samyak tathāpy etad udīryate ।।
nāputrasya paro loko vidyate nṛpasattama ।
jāte putre pitā snānaṃ yaḥ karoti janādhipa ।।
daśānām aśvamedhānām abhiṣekaphalaṃ labhet ।
ātmapratiṣṭhā putrāt syāj jāyate cāmarottamaḥ ।।
amṛtenāmarā devāḥ putreṇa brāhmaṇādayaḥ ।
triṛṇān mocayet putraḥ pitaraṃ ca pitāmahān ।।
kiṃ tu mūlaṃ kim u jalaṃ kiṃ tu śmaśrūṇi kiṃ tapaḥ ।
vinā putreṇa rājendra svargo muktiḥ sutāt smṛtāḥ ।।
putra eva paro loko dharmaḥ kāmo artha eva ca ।
putro muktiḥ paraṃ jyotis tārakaḥ sarvadehinām ।।
vinā putreṇa rājendra svargamokṣau sudurlabhau ।
putra eva paro loke dharmakāmārthasiddhaye ।।
vinā putreṇa yad dattaṃ vinā putreṇa yad dhutam ।
vinā putreṇa yaj janma vyarthaṃ tad avabhāti me ।।
tasmāt putrasamaṃ kiṃcit kāmyaṃ nāsti jagattraye ।
tac chrutvā vismayavāṃs tāv uvāca nṛpaḥ punaḥ ।।
{hariścandra uvāca 
kathaṃ me syāt suto brūtāṃ yatra kvāpi yathātatham ।
yena kenāpy upāyena kṛtvā kiṃcit tu pauruṣam ।
mantreṇa yāgadānābhyām utpādyo asau suto mayā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tāv ūcatur nṛpaśreṣṭhaṃ hariścandraṃ sutārthinam ।
dhyātvā kṣaṇaṃ tathā samyag gautamīṃ yāhi mānada ।।
tatrāpāṃpatir utkṛṣṭaṃ dadāti manasīpsitam ।
varuṇaḥ sarvadātā vai munibhiḥ parikīrtitaḥ ।।
sa tu prītaḥ śanaiḥ kāle tava putraṃ pradāsyati ।
etac chrutvā nṛpaśreṣṭho munivākyaṃ tathākarot ।।
toṣayām āsa varuṇaṃ gautamītīram āśritaḥ ।
tataś ca tuṣṭo varuṇo hariścandram uvāca ha ।।
{varuṇa uvāca 
putraṃ dāsyāmi te rājaṃl lokatrayavibhūṣaṇam ।
yadi yakṣyasi tenaiva tava putro bhaved dhruvam ।।
{brahmovāca 
hariścandro api varuṇaṃ yakṣye tenety avocata ।
tato gatvā hariścandraś caruṃ kṛtvā tu vāruṇam ।।
bhāryāyai nṛpatiḥ prādāt tato jātaḥ suto nṛpāt ।
jāte putre apām īśaḥ provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ ।।
{varuṇa uvāca 
adyaiva putro yaṣṭavyaḥ smarase vacanaṃ purā ।।
{brahmovāca 
hariścandro api varuṇaṃ provācedaṃ kramāgatam ।।
{hariścandra uvāca 
nirdaśo medhyatāṃ yāti paśur yakṣye tato hy aham ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ rājño varuṇo agāt svam ālayam ।
nirdaśe punar abhyetya yajasvety āha taṃ nṛpam ।।
rājāpi varuṇaṃ prāha nirdanto niṣphalaḥ paśuḥ ।
paśor danteṣu jāteṣu ehi gacchādhunāppate ।।
tac chrutvā rājavacanaṃ punaḥ prāyād apāṃpatiḥ ।
jāteṣu caiva danteṣu saptavarṣeṣu nārada ।।
punar apy āha rājānaṃ yajasveti tato abravīt ।
rājāpi varuṇaṃ prāha patsyantīme apāṃpate ।।
saṃpatsyanti tathā cānye tato yakṣye vrajādhunā ।
punaḥ prāyāt sa varuṇaḥ punardanteṣu nārada ।
yajasveti nṛpaṃ prāha rājā prāha tv apāṃpatim ।।
{rājovāca 
yadā tu kṣatriyo yajñe paśur bhavati vāripa ।
dhanurvedaṃ yadā vetti tadā syāt paśur uttamaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chrutvā rājavacanaṃ varuṇo agāt svam ālayam ।
yadāstreṣu ca śastreṣu samartho abhūt sa rohitaḥ ।।
sarvavedeṣu śāstreṣu vettābhūt sa tv ariṃdamaḥ ।
yuvarājyam anuprāpte rohite ṣoḍaśābdike ।।
prītimān agamat tatra yatra rājā sarohitaḥ ।
āgatya varuṇaḥ prāha yajasvādya sutaṃ svakam ।।
om ity uktvā nṛpavara ṛtvijaḥ prāha bhūpatiḥ ।
rohitaṃ ca sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ śṛṇvato varuṇasya ca ।।
{hariścandra uvāca 
ehi putra mahāvīra yakṣye tvāṃ varuṇāya hi ।।
{brahmovāca 
kim etad ity athovāca rohitaḥ pitaraṃ prati ।
pitāpi tad yathāvṛttam ācacakṣe savistaram ।
rohitaḥ pitaraṃ prāha śṛṇvato varuṇasya ca ।।
{rohita uvāca 
ahaṃ pūrvaṃ mahārāja ṛtvigbhiḥ sapurohitaḥ ।
viṣṇave lokanāthāya yakṣye ahaṃ tvaritaṃ śuciḥ ।
paśunā varuṇenātha tad anujñātum arhasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
rohitasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vārīśvaras tadā ।
kopena mahatāviṣṭo jalodaram athākarot ।।
hariścandrasya nṛpate rohitaḥ sa vanaṃ yayau ।
gṛhītvā sa dhanur divyaṃ rathārūḍho gatavyathaḥ ।।
yatra cārādhya varuṇaṃ hariścandro janeśvaraḥ ।
gaṅgāyāṃ prāptavān putraṃ tatrāgāt so api rohitaḥ ।।
vyatītāny atha varṣāṇi pañca ṣaṣṭhe pravartati ।
tatra sthitvā nṛpasutaḥ śuśrāva nṛpate rujam ।।
mayā putreṇa jātena pitur vai kleśakāriṇā ।
kiṃ phalaṃ kiṃ nu kṛtyaṃ syād ity evaṃ paryacintayat ।।
tasyās tīre ṛṣīn puṇyān apaśyan nṛpateḥ sutaḥ ।
gaṅgātīre vartamānam apaśyad ṛṣisattamam ।।
ajīgartam iti khyātam ṛṣes tu vayasaḥ sutam ।
tribhiḥ putrair anuvṛtaṃ bhāryayā kṣīṇavṛttikam ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpateḥ putro namasyedaṃ vaco abravīt ।।
{rohita uvāca 
kṣīṇavṛttiḥ kṛśaḥ kasmād durmanā iva lakṣyase ।।
{brahmovāca 
ajīgarto api covāca rohitaṃ nṛpateḥ sutam ।।
{ajīgarta uvāca 
vartanaṃ nāsti dehasya bhoktāro bahavaś ca me ।
vinānnena mariṣyāmo brūhi kiṃ karavāmahe ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chrutvā punar apy āha nṛpaputra ṛṣiṃ tadā ।।
{rohita uvāca 
tava kiṃ vartate citte tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara ।।
{ajīgarta uvāca 
hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ gāvo dhānyaṃ vastrādikaṃ na me ।
vidyate nṛpaśārdūla vartanaṃ nāsti me tataḥ ।।
sutā me santi bhāryā ca ahaṃ vai pañcamas tathā ।
naiteṣāṃ katamasyāpi kretānnena nṛpottama ।।
{rohita uvāca 
kiṃ krīṇāsi mahābuddhe ajīgarta satyam eva me ।
vada nānyac ca vaktavyaṃ viprā vai satyavādinaḥ ।।
{ajīgarta uvāca 
trayāṇām api putrāṇām ekaṃ vā māṃ tathaiva ca ।
bhāryāṃ vāpi gṛhāṇemāṃ krītvā jīvāmahe vayam ।।
{rohita uvāca 
kiṃ bhāryayā mahābuddhe kiṃ tvayā vṛddharūpiṇā ।
yuvānaṃ dehi putraṃ me putrāṇāṃ yaṃ tvam icchasi ।।
{ajīgarta uvāca 
jyeṣṭhaputraṃ śunaḥpucchaṃ nāhaṃ krīṇāmi rohita ।
mātā kanīyasaṃ cāpi na krīṇāti tato anayoḥ ।
madhyamaṃ tu śunaḥśepaṃ krīṇāmi vada taddhanam ।।
{rohita uvāca 
varuṇāya paśuḥ kalpyaḥ puruṣo guṇavattaraḥ ।
yadi krīṇāsi mūlyaṃ tvaṃ vada satyaṃ mahāmune ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā tv ajīgartaḥ putramūlyam akalpayat ।
gavāṃ sahasraṃ dhānyānāṃ niṣkānāṃ cāpi vāsasām ।
rājaputra varaṃ dehi dāsyāmi svasutaṃ tava ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā rohito api prādāt savasanaṃ dhanam ।
dattvā jagāma pitaram ṛṣiputreṇa rohitaḥ ।
pitre nivedayām āsa krayakrītam ṛṣeḥ sutam ।।
{rohita uvāca 
varuṇāya yajasva tvaṃ paśunā tvam arug bhava ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathovāca hariścandraḥ putravākyād anantaram ।।
{hariścandra uvāca 
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā rājñā pālyā iti śrutiḥ ।
viśeṣatas tu varṇānāṃ guravo hi dvijottamāḥ ।।
viṣṇor api hi ye pūjyā mādṛśāḥ kuta eva hi ।
avajñayāpi yeṣāṃ syān nṛpāṇāṃ svakulakṣayaḥ ।।
tān paśūn kṛtvā kṛpaṇaṃ kathaṃ rakṣitum utsahe ।
ahaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ kuryāṃ paśuṃ naitad dhi yujyate ।।
varaṃ hi jātu maraṇaṃ na kathaṃcid dvijaṃ paśum ।
karomi tasmāt putra tvaṃ brāhmaṇena sukhaṃ vraja ।।
{brahmovāca 
etasminn antare tatra vāg uvācāśarīriṇī ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
gautamīṃ gaccha rājendra ṛtvigbhiḥ sapurohitaḥ ।
paśunā vipraputreṇa rohitena sutena ca ।।
tvayā kāryaḥ kratuś caiva śunaḥśepavadhaṃ vinā ।
kratuḥ pūrṇo bhavet tatra tasmād yāhi mahāmate ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ śīghraṃ gaṅgām agān nṛpottamaḥ ।
viśvāmitreṇa ṛṣiṇā vasiṣṭhena purodhasā ।।
vāmadevena ṛṣiṇā tathānyair munibhiḥ saha ।
prāpya gaṅgāṃ gautamīṃ tāṃ naramedhāya dīkṣitaḥ ।।
vedimaṇḍapakuṇḍādi yūpapaśvādi cākarot ।
kṛtvā sarvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ tasmin yajñe pravartite ।।
śunaḥśepaṃ paśuṃ yūpe nibadhyātha samantrakam ।
vāribhiḥ prokṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśvāmitro abravīd idam ।।
{viśvāmitra uvāca 
devān ṛṣīn hariścandraṃ rohitaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ ।
anujānantv imaṃ sarve śunaḥśepaṃ dvijottamam ।।
yebhyas tv ayaṃ havir deyo devebhyo ayaṃ pṛthak pṛthak ।
anujānantu te sarve śunaḥśepaṃ viśeṣataḥ ।।
vasābhir lomabhis tvagbhir māṃsaiḥ sanmantritair makhe ।
agnau hoṣyaḥ paśuś cāyaṃ śunaḥśepo dvijottamaḥ ।।
upāsitāḥ syur viprendrās te sarve tv anumanya mām ।
gautamīṃ yāntu viprendrāḥ snātvā devān pṛthak pṛthak ।।
mantraiḥ stotraiḥ stuvantas te mudaṃ yāntu śive ratāḥ ।
enaṃ rakṣantu munayo devāś ca haviṣo bhujaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety ūcuś ca munayo mene ca nṛpasattamaḥ ।
tato gatvā śunaḥśepo gaṅgāṃ trailokyapāvanīm ।।
snātvā tuṣṭāva tān devān ye tatra haviṣo bhujaḥ ।
tatas tuṣṭāḥ suragaṇāḥ śunaḥśepaṃ ca te mune ।
avadanta surāḥ sarve viśvāmitrasya śṛṇvataḥ ।।
{surā ūcuḥ 
kratuḥ pūrṇo bhavatv eṣa śunaḥśepavadhaṃ vinā ।।
{brahmovāca 
viśeṣeṇātha varuṇaś cāvadan nṛpasattamam ।
tataḥ pūrṇo abhavad rājño nṛmedho lokaviśrutaḥ ।।
devānāṃ ca prasādena munīnāṃ ca prasādataḥ ।
tīrthasya tu prasādena rājñaḥ pūrṇo abhavat kratuḥ ।।
viśvāmitraḥ śunaḥśepaṃ pūjayām āsa saṃsadi ।
akarod ātmanaḥ putraṃ pūjayitvā surāntike ।।
jyeṣṭhaṃ cakāra putrāṇām ātmanaḥ sa tu kauśikaḥ ।
na menire ye ca putrā viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ ।।
śunaḥśepasya ca jyaiṣṭhyaṃ tāñ śaśāpa sa kauśikaḥ ।
jyaiṣṭhyaṃ ye menire putrāḥ pūjayām āsa tān sutān ।।
vareṇa muniśārdūlas tad etat kathitaṃ mayā ।
etat sarvaṃ yatra jātaṃ gautamyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
tatra tīrthāni puṇyāni vikhyātāni surādibhiḥ ।
bahūni teṣāṃ nāmāni mattaḥ śṛṇu mahāmate ।।
hariścandraṃ śunaḥśepaṃ viśvāmitraṃ sarohitam ।
ityādy aṣṭa sahasrāṇi tīrthāny atha caturdaśa ।।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca naramedhaphalapradam ।
ākhyātaṃ cāsya māhātmyaṃ tīrthasya munisattama ।।
yaḥ paṭhet pāṭhayed vāpi śṛṇuyād vāpi bhaktitaḥ ।
aputraḥ putram āpnoti yac cānyan manasaḥ priyam ।।
{brahmovāca 
somatīrtham iti khyātaṃ pitṝṇāṃ prītivardhanam ।
tatra vṛttaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ śṛṇu yatnena nārada ।।
somo rājāmṛtamayo gandharvāṇāṃ purābhavat ।
na devānāṃ tadā devā mām abhyetyedam abruvan ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
gandharvair āhṛtaḥ somo devānāṃ prāṇadaḥ purā ।
tam adhyāyan suragaṇā ṛṣayas tv atiduḥkhitāḥ ।
yathā syāt somo hy asmākaṃ tathā nītir vidhīyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatra vāg vibudhān āha gandharvāḥ strīṣu kāmukāḥ ।
tebhyo dattvātha māṃ devāḥ somam āhartum arhatha ।।
vācaṃ pratyūcur amarās tvāṃ dātuṃ na kṣamā vayam ।
vinā tenāpi na sthātuṃ śakyaṃ naiva tvayā vinā ।।
punar vāg abravīd devān punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ tv iha ।
atra buddhir vidhātavyā kriyatāṃ kratur uttamaḥ ।।
gautamyā dakṣiṇe tīre bhaved devāgamo yadi ।
makhaṃ tu viṣayaṃ kṛtvā āyāntu surasattamāḥ ।।
gandharvāḥ strīpriyā nityaṃ paṇadhvaṃ taṃ mayā saha ।
tathety uktvā suragaṇāḥ sarasvatyā vacaḥsthitāḥ ।।
devadūtaiḥ pṛthag devān yakṣān gandharvapannagān ।
āhvānaṃ cakrire tatra puṇye devagirau tadā ।।
tato devagirir nāma parvatasyābhavan mune ।
tatrāgaman suragaṇā gandharvā yakṣakiṃnarāḥ ।।
devāḥ siddhāś ca ṛṣayas tathāṣṭau devayonayaḥ ।
ṛṣibhir gautamītīre kriyamāṇe mahādhvare ।।
tatra devaiḥ parivṛtaḥ sahasrākṣo abhyabhāṣata ।।
{indra uvāca 
gandharvān atha saṃpūjya sarasvatyāḥ samīpataḥ ।
sarasvatyā paṇadhvaṃ no yuṣmākam amṛtātmanā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chakravacanāt te vai gandharvāḥ strīṣu kāmukāḥ ।
somaṃ dattvā surebhyas tu jagṛhus tāṃ sarasvatīm ।।
somo abhavac cāmarāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ sarasvatī ।
avasat tatra vāgīśā tathāpi ca surāntike ।।
āyāti ca raho nityam upāṃśu kriyatām iti ।
ata eva hi somasya krayo bhavati nārada ।।
upāṃśunā vartitavyaṃ somakrayaṇa eva hi ।
tato abhavad devatānāṃ somaś cāpi sarasvatī ।।
gandharvāṇāṃ naiva somo naivāsīc ca sarasvatī ।
tatrāgaman sarva eva somārthaṃ gautamītaṭam ।।
gāvo devāḥ parvatā yakṣarakṣāḥ 
siddhāḥ sādhyā munayo guhyakāś 
gandharvās te marutaḥ pannagāś 
sarvauṣadhyo mātaro lokapālāḥ 
rudrādityā vasavaś cāśvinau ca 
ye anye devā yajñabhāgasya yogyāḥ 
pañcaviṃśatinadyas tu gaṅgāyāṃ saṃgatā mune ।
pūrṇāhutir yatra dattā pūrṇākhyānaṃ tad ucyate ।।
gautamyāṃ saṃgatā yās tu sarvāś cāpi yathoditāḥ ।
tannāmadheyatīrthāni saṃkṣepāc chṛṇu nārada ।।
somatīrthaṃ ca gāndharvaṃ devatīrtham ataḥ param ।
pūrṇātīrthaṃ tataḥ śālaṃ śrīparṇāsaṃgamaṃ tathā ।।
svāgatāsaṃgamaṃ puṇyaṃ kusumāyāś ca saṃgamam ।
puṣṭisaṃgamam ākhyātaṃ karṇikāsaṃgamaṃ śubham ।।
vaiṇavīsaṃgamaś caiva kṛśarāsaṃgamas tathā ।
vāsavīsaṃgamaś caiva śivaśaryā tathā śikhī ।।
kusumbhikā upārathyā śāntijā devajā tadā ।
ajo vṛddhaḥ suro bhadro gautamyā saha saṃgatāḥ ।।
ete cānye ca bahavo nadīnadasahāyagāḥ ।
pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni hy agaman devaparvate ।।
somārthaṃ vai tathā cānye apy āgaman makhamaṇḍapam ।
tāni tīrthāni gaṅgāyāṃ saṃgatāni yathākramam ।।
nadīrūpeṇa kāny eva nadarūpeṇa kānicit ।
sarorūpeṇa kāny atra stavarūpeṇa kānicit ।।
tāny eva sarvatīrthāni vikhyātāni pṛthak pṛthak ।
teṣu snānaṃ japo homaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam eva ca ।।
sarvakāmapradaṃ puṃsāṃ bhuktidaṃ muktibhājanam ।
eteṣāṃ paṭhanaṃ cāpi smaraṇaṃ vā karoti yaḥ ।
sarvapāpavinirmukto yāti viṣṇupuraṃ janaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
pravarāsaṃgamo nāma śreṣṭhā caiva mahānadī ।
yatra siddheśvaro devaḥ sarvalokopakārakṛt ।।
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca saṃgamo abhūt sudāruṇaḥ ।
teṣāṃ parasparaṃ vāpi prītiś cābhūn mahāmune ।।
te apy evaṃ mantrayām āsur devā vai dānavā mithaḥ ।
meruparvatam āsādya parasparahitaiṣiṇaḥ ।।
{devadaityā ūcuḥ 
amṛtenāmaratvaṃ syād utpādyāmṛtam uttamam ।
pibāmaḥ sarva evaite bhavāmaś cāmarā vayam ।।
ekībhūtvā vayaṃ lokān pālayāmaḥ sukhāni ca ।
prāpsyāmaḥ saṃgaraṃ hitvā saṃgaro duḥkhakāraṇam ।।
prītyā caivārjitān arthān bhokṣyāmo gatamatsarāḥ ।
yataḥ snehena vṛttir yā sāsmākaṃ sukhadā sadā ।।
vaiparītyaṃ tu yad vṛttaṃ na smartavyaṃ kadācana ।
na ca trailokyarājye api kaivalye vā sukhaṃ manāk ।
tad ūrdhvam api vā yat tu nirvairatvād avāpyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ parasparaṃ prītāḥ santo devāś ca dānavāḥ ।
ekībhūtāś ca suprītā vimathya varuṇālayam ।।
manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā rajjuṃ kṛtvā tu vāsukim ।
devāś ca dānavāḥ sarve mamanthur varuṇālayam ।।
utpannaṃ ca tataḥ puṇyam amṛtaṃ suravallabham ।
niṣpanne cāmṛte puṇye te ca procuḥ parasparam ।।
yāmaḥ svaṃ svam adhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtakāryāḥ śramaṃ gatāḥ ।
sarve samaṃ ca sarvebhyo yathāyogyaṃ vibhajyatām ।।
yadā sarvāgamo yatra yasmiṃl lagne śubhāvahe ।
vibhajyatām idaṃ puṇyam amṛtaṃ surasattamāḥ ।।
ity uktvā te yayuḥ sarve daityadānavarākṣasāḥ ।
gateṣu daityasaṃgheṣu devāḥ sarve anvamantrayan ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
gatās te ripavo asmākaṃ daivayogād ariṃdamāḥ ।
ripūṇām amṛtaṃ naiva deyaṃ bhavati sarvathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
bṛhaspatis tathety āha punar āha surān idam ।।
{bṛhaspatir uvāca 
na jānanti yathā pāpā pibadhvaṃ ca tathāmṛtam ।
ayam evocito mantro yac chatrūṇāṃ parābhavaḥ ।।
dveṣyāḥ sarvātmanā dveṣyā iti nītivido viduḥ ।
na viśvāsyā na cākhyeyā naiva mantryāś ca śatravaḥ ।।
tebhyo na deyam amṛtaṃ bhaveyur amarās tataḥ ।
amareṣu ca jāteṣu teṣu daityeṣu śatruṣu ।
tāñ jetuṃ naiva śakṣyāmo na deyam amṛtaṃ tataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti saṃmantrya te devā vācaspatim athābruvan ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
kva yāmaḥ kutra mantraḥ syāt kva pibāmaḥ kva saṃsthitiḥ ।
kurmas tad eva prathamaṃ vada vācaspate tathā ।।
{bṛhaspatir uvāca 
yāntu brahmāṇam amarāḥ pṛcchantv atra gatiṃ parām ।
sa tu jñātā ca vaktā ca dātā caiva pitāmahaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
bṛhaspater vacaḥ śrutvā madantikam athāgaman ।
namasya māṃ surāḥ sarve yad vṛttaṃ tan nyavedayan ।।
tad devavacanāt putra taiḥ surair agamaṃ harim ।
viṣṇave kathitaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃbhave viṣahāriṇe ।।
ahaṃ viṣṇuś ca śaṃbhuś ca devagandharvakiṃnaraiḥ ।
merukandaram āgatya na jānanti yathāsurāḥ ।।
rakṣakaṃ ca hariṃ kṛtvā somapānāya tasthire ।
ādityas tatra vijñātā somabhojyān athetarān ।।
somo dātāmṛtaṃ bhāgaṃ cakradhṛg rakṣakas tathā ।
naiva jānanti tad daityā danujā rākṣasās tathā ।।
vinā rāhuṃ mahāprājñaṃ saiṃhikeyaṃ ca somapam ।
kāmarūpadharo rāhur marutāṃ madhyam āviśat ।।
marudrūpaṃ samāsthāya pānapātradharas tathā ।
jñātvā divākaro daityaṃ taṃ somāya nyavedayat ।।
tadā tad amṛtaṃ tasmai daityāyādaityarūpiṇe ।
dattvā somaṃ tadā somo viṣṇave tan nyavedayat ।।
viṣṇuḥ pītāmṛtaṃ daityaṃ cakreṇodyamya tacchiraḥ ।
ciccheda tarasā vatsa tacchiras tv amaraṃ tv abhūt ।।
śiromātravihīnaṃ yad dehaṃ tad apatad bhuvi ।
dehaṃ tad amṛtaspṛṣṭaṃ patitaṃ dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
gautamyā muniśārdūla kampayad vasudhātalam ।
dehaṃ cāpy amaraṃ putra tad adbhutam ivābhavat ।।
dehaṃ ca śiraso apekṣi śiro deham apekṣate ।
ubhayaṃ cāmaraṃ jātaṃ daityaś cāyaṃ mahābalaḥ ।।
śiraḥ kāye samāviṣṭaṃ sarvān bhakṣayate surān ।
tasmād deham idaṃ pūrvaṃ nāśayāmo mahīgatam ।
tatas te śaṃkaraṃ prāhur devāḥ sarve sasaṃbhramāḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
mahīgataṃ daityadehaṃ nāśayasva surottama ।
tvaṃ deva karuṇāsindhuḥ śaraṇāgatarakṣakaḥ ।।
śirasā naiva yujyeta daityadehaṃ tathā kuru ।।
{brahmovāca 
preṣayām āsa ceśo api śreṣṭhāṃ śaktiṃ tadātmanaḥ ।
mātṛbhiḥ sahitāṃ devīṃ mātaraṃ lokapālinīm ।।
īśāyudhadharā devī īśaśaktisamanvitā ।
mahīgataṃ yatra dehaṃ tatrāgād bhakṣyakāṅkṣiṇī ।।
śiromātraṃ surāḥ sarve merau tatraiva sāntvayan ।
deho devyā punas tatra yuyudhe bahavaḥ samāḥ ।।
rāhus tatra surān āha bhittvā dehaṃ purā mama ।
atrāste rasam utkṛṣṭaṃ tad ākṛṣya śarīrataḥ ।।
pṛthakbhūte rase dehaṃ pravare amṛtam uttamam ।
bhasmībhūyāt kṣaṇenaiva tasmāt kurvantu tat purā ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad rāhuvacaḥ śrutvā prītāḥ sarve asurārayaḥ ।
abhyaṣiñcan grahāṇāṃ tvaṃ graho bhūyā mudānvitaḥ ।।
taddevavacanāc chaktir īśvarī yā nigadyate ।
dehaṃ bhittvā daityapateḥ suraśaktisamanvitā ।।
ākṛṣya śīghram utkṛṣṭaṃ pravaraṃ cāmṛtaṃ bahiḥ ।
sthāpayitvā tu tad dehaṃ bhakṣayām āsa cāmbikā ।।
kālarātrir bhadrakālī procyate yā mahābalā ।
sthāpitaṃ rasam utkṛṣṭaṃ rasānāṃ pravaraṃ rasam ।।
vyasravat sthāpitaṃ tat tu pravarā sābhavan nadī ।
ākṛṣṭam amṛtaṃ caiva sthāpitaṃ sāpy abhakṣayat ।।
tataḥ śreṣṭhā nadī jātā pravarā cāmṛtā śubhā ।
rāhudehasamudbhūtā rudraśaktisamanvitā ।।
nadīnāṃ pravarā ramyā cāmṛtā preritā tahā ।
tatra pañca sahasrāṇi tīrthāni guṇavanti ca ।।
tatra śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃ tasthau sarvadā surapūjitaḥ ।
tasyai tuṣṭāḥ surāḥ sarve devyai nadyai pṛthak pṛthak ।।
varān dadur mudā yuktā yathā pūjām avāpsyati ।
śaṃbhuḥ surapatir loke tathā pūjām avāpsyasi ।।
nivāsaṃ kuru devi tvaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।
sadā tiṣṭha raseśāni sarveṣāṃ sarvasiddhidā ।।
stavanāt kīrtanād dhyānāt sarvakāmapradāyinī ।
tvāṃ namasyanti ye bhaktyā kiṃcid āpekṣya sarvadā ।।
teṣāṃ sarvāṇi kāryāṇi bhaveyur devatājñayā ।
śivaśaktyor yatas tasmin nivāso abhūt sanātanaḥ ।।
ato vadanti munayo nivāsapuram ity adaḥ ।
pravarāyāḥ purā devāḥ suprītās te varān daduḥ ।।
gaṅgāyāḥ saṃgamo yas te vikhyātaḥ suravallabhaḥ ।
tatrāplutānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhuktir vā muktir eva ca ।।
yad vāpi manasaḥ kāmyaṃ devānām api durlabham ।
syāt teṣāṃ sarvam eveha evaṃ dattvā surā yayuḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ pravarāsaṃgamaṃ viduḥ ।
preritā devadevena śaktir yā preritā tu sā ।।
amṛtā saiva vikhyātā pravaraivaṃ mahānadī ।।
{brahmovāca 
vṛddhāsaṃgamam ākhyātaṃ yatra vṛddheśvaraḥ śivaḥ ।
tasyākhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu pāpapraṇāśanam ।।
gautamo vṛddha ity ukto munir āsīn mahātapāḥ ।
yadā purābhavad bālo gautamasya suto dvijaḥ ।।
anāsaḥ sa purotpannas tasmād vikṛtarūpadhṛk ।
sa vairāgyāj jagāmātha deśaṃ tīrtham itas tataḥ ।।
upādhyāyena naivāsīl lajjitasya samāgamaḥ ।
śiṣyair anyaiḥ sahādhyāyo lajjitasya ca nābhavat ।।
upanītaḥ kathaṃcic ca pitrā vai gautamena saḥ ।
etāvatā gautamo api vyagamac carituṃ bahiḥ ।।
evaṃ bahutithe kāle brahmamātrā dhṛte dvije ।
naiva cādhyayanaṃ tasya saṃjātaṃ gautamasya hi ।।
naiva śāstrasya cābhyāso gautamasyābhavat tadā ।
agnikāryaṃ tataś cakre nityam eva yatavrataḥ ।।
gāyatryabhyāsamātreṇa brāhmaṇo nāmadhārakaḥ ।
agnyupāsanamātraṃ ca gāyatryabhyasanaṃ tathā ।।
etāvatā brāhmaṇatvaṃ gautamasyābhavan mune ।
upāsato agniṃ vidhivad gāyatrīṃ ca mahātmanaḥ ।।
tasyāyur vavṛdhe putra gautamasya cirāyuṣaḥ ।
na dārasaṃgrahaṃ lebhe naiva dātāsti kanyakām ।।
tathā caraṃs tīrthadeśe vaneṣu vividheṣu ca ।
āśrameṣu ca puṇyeṣu aṭann āste sa gautamaḥ ।।
evaṃ bhramañ śītagirim āśrityāste sa gautamaḥ ।
tatrāpaśyad guhāṃ ramyāṃ vallīviṭapamālinīm ।।
tatropaviśya viprendro vastuṃ samakaron matim ।
cintayaṃs tu praviṣṭo asāv apaśyat striyam uttamām ।।
śithilāṅgīm atha kṛśāṃ vṛddhāṃ ca tapasi sthitām ।
brahmacaryeṇa vartantīṃ virāgāṃ rahasi sthitām ।।
sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā muniśreṣṭho namaskārāya tasthivān ।
namasyantaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ taṃ gautamam avārayat ।।
{vṛddhovāca 
gurus tvaṃ bhavitā mahyaṃ na māṃ vanditum arhasi ।
āyur vidyā dhanaṃ kīrtir dharmaḥ svargādikaṃ ca yat ।
tasya naśyati vai sarvaṃ yaṃ namasyati vai guruḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
kṛtāñjalipuṭas tāṃ vai gautamaḥ prāha vismitaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
tapasvinī tvaṃ vṛddhā ca guṇajyeṣṭhā ca bhāminī ।
alpavidyas tv alpavayā ahaṃ tava guruḥ katham ।।
{vṛddhovāca 
ārṣṭiṣeṇapriyaputra ṛtadhvaja iti śrutaḥ ।
guṇavān matimāñ śūraḥ kṣatradharmaparāyaṇaḥ ।।
sa kadācid vanaṃ prāyān mṛgayākṛṣṭacetanaḥ ।
viśrāmam akarod asyāṃ guhāyāṃ sa ṛtadhvajaḥ ।।
yuvā sa matimān dakṣo balena mahatā vṛtaḥ ।
taṃ viśrāntaṃ nṛpavaram apsarā dadṛśe tataḥ ।।
gandharvarājasya sutā suśyāmā iti viśrutā ।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cakame rājā rājānaṃ cakame ca sā ।।
iti krīḍā samabhavat tayā rājño mahāmate ।
nivṛttakāmo rājendras tām āpṛcchyāgamad gṛham ।।
utpannāhaṃ tatas tasyāṃ suśyāmāyāṃ mahāmate ।
gacchantī māṃ tadā mātā idam āha tapodhana ।।
{suśyāmovāca 
yas tv asyāṃ praviśed bhadre sa te bhartā bhaviṣyati ।।
{vṛddhovāca 
ity uktvā sā jagamātha mātā mama mahāmate ।
tasmād atra praviṣṭas tvaṃ pumān nānyaḥ kadācana ।।
sahasrāṇi tathāśītiṃ kṛtvā rājyaṃ pitā mama ।
atraiva ca tapas taptvā tataḥ svargam upeyivān ।।
svargaṃ yāte api pitari sahasrāṇi tathā daśa ।
varṣāṇi muniśārdūla rājyaṃ kṛtvā tathā paraḥ ।।
svarge yāto mama bhrātā aham atraiva saṃsthitā ।
ahaṃ brahman nānyavṛttā na mātā na pitā mama ।।
aham ātmeśvarī brahman niviṣṭā kṣatrakanyakā ।
tasmād bhajasva māṃ brahman vratasthāṃ puruṣārthinīm ।।
{gautama uvāca 
sahasrāyur ahaṃ bhadre mattas tvaṃ vayasādhikā ।
ahaṃ bālas tvaṃ tu vṛddhā naivāyaṃ ghaṭate mithaḥ ।।
{vṛddhovāca 
tvaṃ bhartā me purā diṣṭo nānyo bhartā mato mama ।
dhātrā dattas tatas tvaṃ māṃ na nirākartum arhasi ।।
athavā necchasi māṃ tvam apraduṣṭām anuvratām ।
tatas tyakṣyāmi jīvaṃ me idānīṃ tava paśyataḥ ।।
apekṣitāprāptito hi dehināṃ maraṇaṃ varam ।
anuraktajanatyāge pātakānto na vidyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
vṛddhāyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā gautamo vākyam abravīt ।।
{gautama uvāca 
ahaṃ tapovirahito vidyāhīno hy akiṃcanaḥ ।
nāhaṃ varo hi yogyas te kurūpo bhogavarjitaḥ ।।
anāso ahaṃ kiṃ karomi atapovidya eva ca ।
tasmāt surūpaṃ suvidyām āpādya prathamaṃ śubhe ।
paścāt te vacanaṃ kāryaṃ tato vṛddhābravīd dvijam ।।
{vṛddhovāca 
mayā sarasvatī devī toṣitā tapasā dvija ।
tathaivāpo rūpavatyo rūpadātāgnir eva ca ।।
tasmād vāgīśvarī devī sā te vidyāṃ pradāsyati ।
agniś ca rūpavān devas tava rūpaṃ pradāsyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā gautamaṃ taṃ vṛddhovāca vibhāvasum ।
prārthayitvā suvidyaṃ taṃ surūpaṃ cākaron munim ।।
tataḥ suvidyaḥ subhagaḥ sukānto 
vṛddhāṃ sa patnīm akarot prītiyuktaḥ 
tayā sa reme bahulā manojñayā 
samāḥ sukhaṃ prītamanā guhāyām 
kadācit tatra vasator daṃpatyor mudator girau ।
guhāyāṃ muniśārdūla ājagmur munayo amalāḥ ।।
vasiṣṭhavāmadevādyā ye cānye ca maharṣayaḥ ।
bhramantaḥ puṇyatīrthāni prāpnuvaṃs tasya tāṃ guhām ।।
āgatāṃs tān ṛṣīñ jñātvā gautamaḥ saha bhāryayā ।
satkāram akarot teṣāṃ jahasus taṃ ca kecana ।।
ye bālā yauvanonmattā vayasā ye ca madhyamāḥ ।
vṛddhāṃ ca gautamaṃ prekṣya jahasus tatra kecana ।।
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
putro ayaṃ tava pautro vā vṛddhe ko gautamo abhavat ।
satyaṃ vadasva kalyāṇi ity evaṃ jahasur dvijāḥ ।।
viṣaṃ vṛddhasya yuvatī vṛddhāyā amṛtaṃ yuvā ।
iṣṭāniṣṭasamāyogo dṛṣṭo asmābhir aho cirāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity evam ūcire kecid daṃpatyoḥ śṛṇvatos tadā ।
evam uktvā kṛtātithyā yayuḥ sarve maharṣayaḥ ।।
ṛṣīṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā ubhāv api suduḥkhitau ।
lajjitau ca mahāprājñau gautamo bhāryayā saha ।
papraccha muniśārdūlam agastyam ṛṣisattamam ।।
{gautama uvāca 
ko deśaḥ kim u tīrthaṃ vā yatra śreyaḥ samāpyate ।
śīghram eva mahāprājña bhuktimuktipradāyakam ।।
{agastya uvāca 
vadadbhir munibhir brahman mayā śrutam idaṃ vacaḥ ।
sarve kāmās tatra pūrṇā gautamyāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
tasmād gaccha mahābuddhe gautamīṃ pāpanāśinīm ।
ahaṃ tvām anuyāsyāmi yathecchasi tathā kuru ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvāgastyavākyaṃ vṛddhayā gautamo abhyagāt ।
tatra tepe tapas tīvraṃ patnyā sa bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ।।
stutiṃ cakāra devasya śaṃbhor viṣṇos tathaiva ca ।
gaṅgāṃ ca toṣayām āsa bhāryārthaṃ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
khinnātmanām atra bhave tvam eva śaraṇaṃ śivaḥ ।
marubhūmāv adhvagānāṃ viṭapīva priyāyutaḥ ।।
uccāvacānāṃ bhūtānāṃ sarvathā pāpanodanaḥ ।
sasyānāṃ ghanavat kṛṣṇa tvam avagrahaśoṣiṇām ।।
vaikuṇṭhadurganiḥśreṇis tvaṃ pīyūṣataraṃgiṇī ।
adhogatānāṃ taptānāṃ śaraṇaṃ bhava gautami ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas tuṣṭāvadad vākyaṃ gautamaṃ vṛddhayā yutam ।
śaraṇāgatadīnārtaṃ śaraṇyā gautamī mudā ।।
{gautamy uvāca 
abhiṣiñcasva bhāryāṃ tvaṃ majjalair mantrasaṃyutaiḥ ।
kalaśair upacāraiś ca tataḥ patnī tava priyā ।।
surūpā cārusarvāṅgī subhagā cārulocanā ।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇā ramyarūpam avāpsyati ।।
rūpavatyā punas tvaṃ vai bhāryayā cābhiṣecitaḥ ।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇaḥ kāntaṃ rūpam avāpsyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatheti gāṅgavacanād yathoktaṃ tau ca cakratuḥ ।
surūpatām ubhau prāptau gautamyāś ca prasādataḥ ।।
abhiṣekodakaṃ yac ca sā nadī samajāyata ।
tasyā nāmnā tu vikhyātā vṛddhāyā munisattama ।।
vṛddhā nadīti vikhyātā gautamo api tathocyate ।
vṛddhagautama ity ukta ṛṣibhiḥ samavāsibhiḥ ।
vṛddhā tu gautamīṃ prāha gaṅgāṃ pratyakṣarūpiṇīm ।।
{vṛddhovāca 
mannāmnīyaṃ nadī devi vṛddhā cety abhidhīyatām ।
tvayā ca saṃgamas tasyās tasyās tīrtham anuttamam ।।
rūpasaubhāgyasaṃpatti- putrapautrapravardhanam ।
āyurārogyakalyāṇaṃ jayaprītivivardhanam ।
snānadānādihomaiś ca pitṝṇāṃ pāvanaṃ param ।।
{brahmovāca 
astv ity āha ca tāṃ gaṅgā suvṛddhāṃ gautamapriyām ।
gautamasthāpitaṃ liṅgaṃ vṛddhānāmnaiva kīrtitam ।।
tatraiva ca mudaṃ prāpto vṛddhayā munisattamaḥ ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvābhīṣṭapradāyakam ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ vṛddhāsaṃgamam ucyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
ilātīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvasiddhikaraṃ nṛṇām ।
brahmahatyādipāpānāṃ pāvanaṃ sarvakāmadam ।।
vaivasvatānvaye jāta ilo nāma janeśvaraḥ ।
mahatyā senayā sārdhaṃ jagāma mṛgayāvanam ।।
paribabhrāma gahanaṃ bahuvyālasamākulam ।
nānākāradvijayutaṃ viṭapaiḥ pariśobhitam ।।
vanecaraṃ nṛpaśreṣṭho mṛgayāgatamānasaḥ ।
tatraiva matim ādhatta ilo amātyān athābravīt ।।
{ila uvāca 
gacchantu nagaraṃ sarve mama putreṇa pālitam ।
deśaṃ kośaṃ balaṃ rājyaṃ pālayantu punaś ca tam ।।
vasiṣṭho api tathā yātu ādāyāgnīn piteva naḥ ।
patnībhiḥ sahito dhīmān araṇye ahaṃ vasāmy atha ।।
araṇyabhogabhugbhiś ca vājivāraṇamānuṣaiḥ ।
mṛgayāśīlibhiḥ kaiścid yāntu sarva itaḥ purīm ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā yayus te api svayaṃ prāyāc chanair girim ।
himavantaṃ ratnamayaṃ vasaṃs tatra ilo nṛpaḥ ।।
dadarśa kandaraṃ tatra nānāratnavicitritam ।
tatra yakṣeśvaraḥ kaścit samanyur iti viśrutaḥ ।।
tasya bhāryā samānāmnī bhartṛvrataparāyaṇā ।
tasmin vasaty asau yakṣo ramaṇīye nagottame ।।
mṛgarūpeṇa vyacarad bhāryayā sa mahāmatiḥ ।
svecchayā svavane yakṣaḥ krīḍate nṛtyagītakaiḥ ।।
itthaṃ sa yakṣo jānāti mṛgarūpadharo api ca ।
ilas tu taṃ na jānāti kandaraṃ yakṣapālitam ।।
yakṣasya gehaṃ vipulaṃ nānāratnavicitritam ।
tatropaviṣṭo nṛpatir mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ ।।
vāsaṃ cakre sa tatraiva gehe yakṣasya dhīmataḥ ।
sa yakṣo adharmakopena bhāryayā mṛgarūpadhṛk ।।
ilaṃ jetuṃ na śaknomi yācito na dadāti ca ।
hṛtaṃ gehaṃ mamānena kiṃ karomīty acintayat ।।
yudhi mattaṃ kathaṃ hanyāṃ ceti sthitvā sa yakṣarāṭ ।
ātmīyān preṣayām āsa yakṣāñ śūrān dhanurdharān ।।
{yakṣa uvāca 
yuddhe jitvā ca rājānam ilam uddhatadantinam ।
gṛhād yathānyato yāti mama tat kartum arhatha ।।
{brahmovāca 
yakṣeśvarasya tad vākyād yakṣās te yuddhadurmadāḥ ।
ilaṃ gatvābruvan sarve nirgacchāsmād guhālayāt ।।
na ced yuddhāt paribhraṣṭaḥ palāyya kva gamiṣyasi ।
tad yakṣavacanāt kopād yuddhaṃ cakre sa rājarāṭ ।।
jitvā yakṣān bahuvidhān uvāsa daśa śarvarīḥ ।
yakṣeśvaro mṛgo bhūtvā bhāryayāpi vane vasan ।।
hṛtageho vanaṃ prāpto hṛtabhṛtyaḥ sa yakṣiṇīm ।
prāha cintāparo bhūtvā mṛgīrūpadharāṃ priyām ।।
{yakṣa uvāca 
rājā ayaṃ durmanāḥ kānte vyasanāsaktamānasaḥ ।
katham āyāti vipadaṃ tatropāyo vicintyatām ।।
pāparddhivyasanāntāni rājyāny akhilabhūbhujām ।
prāpayomāvanaṃ subhrūr mṛgī bhūtvā manoharā ।।
praviśet tatra rājāyaṃ strī bhaviṣyaty asaṃśayam ।
karaṇīyaṃ tvayā bhadre na caitad yujyate mama ।
ahaṃ tu puruṣo yena tvaṃ punaḥ strī ca yakṣiṇī ।।
{yakṣiṇy uvāca 
kathaṃ tvayā na gantavyam umāvanam anuttamam ।
gate api tvayi ko doṣas tan me kathaya tattvataḥ ।।
{yakṣa uvāca 
himavatparvataśreṣṭha umayā sahitaḥ śivaḥ ।
devair gaṇair anuvṛto vicacāra yathāsukham ।
pārvatī śaṃkaraṃ prāha kadācid rahasi sthitam ।।
{pārvaty uvāca 
strīṇām eṣa svabhāvo asti rataṃ gopāyitaṃ bhavet ।
tasmān me niyataṃ deśam ājñayā rakṣitaṃ tava ।।
dehi me tridaśeśāna umāvanam iti śrutam ।
vinā tvayā gaṇeśena kārttikeyena nandinā ।।
yas tv atra praviśen nātha strītvaṃ tasya bhaved iti ।।
{yakṣa uvāca 
ity ājñomāvane dattā prasannenendumaulinā ।
kiṃ karomi pumān kānte tvayā praṇayanārditaḥ ।
tasmān mayā na gantavyam umāyā vanam uttamam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad bhartṛvacanaṃ śrutvā yakṣiṇī kāmarūpiṇī ।
mṛgī bhūtvā viśālākṣī ilasya purato abhavat ।।
yakṣas tu saṃsthitas tatra dadarśelo mṛgīṃ tadā ।
mṛgayāsaktacitto vai mṛgīṃ dṛṣṭvā viśeṣataḥ ।।
eka eva hayārūḍho niryayau tāṃ mṛgīm anu ।
sākarṣata śanais taṃ tu rājānaṃ mṛgayākulam ।।
śanair jagāma sā tatra yad umāvanam ucyate ।
adṛśyā tu mṛgī tasmai darśayantī kvacit kvacit ।।
tiṣṭhantī caiva gacchantī dhāvantī ca vibhītavat ।
hariṇī capalākṣī sā tam ākarṣad umāvanam ।।
anuprāpto hayārūḍhas tat prāpa sa umāvanam ।
umāvanaṃ praviṣṭaṃ taṃ jñātvā sā yakṣiṇī tadā ।।
mṛgīrūpaṃ parityajya yakṣiṇī kāmarūpiṇī ।
divyarūpaṃ samāsthāya cāśokatarusaṃnidhau ।।
tacchākhālambitakarā divyagandhānulepanā ।
divyarūpadharā tanvī kṛtakāryā samā tadā ।।
hasantī nṛpatiṃ prekṣya śrāntaṃ hayagataṃ tadā ।
mṛgīm ālokayantaṃ taṃ capalākṣam ilaṃ tadā ।।
bhartṛvākyam aśeṣeṇa smarantī prāha bhūmipam ।।
{samovāca 
hayārūḍhābalā tanvi kva ekaiva tu gacchasi ।
puruṣasya ca veṣeṇa ile kam anuyāsyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
ileti vacanaṃ śrutvā rājāsau krodhamūrchitaḥ ।
yakṣiṇīṃ bhartsayitvāsau tām apṛcchan mṛgīṃ punaḥ ।।
tathāpi yakṣiṇī prāha ile kim anuvīkṣase ।
ileti vacanaṃ śrutvā dhṛtacāpo hayasthitaḥ ।।
kupito darśayām āsa trailokyavijayī dhanuḥ ।
punaḥ sā prāha nṛpatiṃ mahātmānam ile svayam ।।
prekṣasva paścān māṃ brūhi asatyāṃ satyavādinīm ।
tadā cālokayad rājā stanau tuṅgau bhujāntare ।।
kim idaṃ mama saṃjātam ity evaṃ cakito abhavat ।।
{ilovāca 
kim idaṃ mama saṃjātaṃ jānīte bhavatī sphuṭam ।
vada sarvaṃ yathātathyaṃ tvaṃ kā vā vada suvrate ।।
{yakṣiṇy uvāca 
himavatkandaraśreṣṭhe samanyur vasate patiḥ ।
yakṣāṇām adhipaḥ śrīmāṃs tadbhāryāhaṃ tu yakṣiṇī ।।
yatkandare bhavān rājā tūpaviṣṭaḥ suśītale ।
yasya yakṣā hatā mohāt tvayā hi saṃgaraṃ vinā ।।
tato ahaṃ nirgamārthaṃ te mṛgī bhūtvā umāvanam ।
praviṣṭā tvaṃ praviṣṭo asi purā prāha maheśvaraḥ ।।
yas tv atra praviśen mandaḥ pumān strītvam avāpsyati ।
tasmāt strītvam avāpto asi na tvaṃ duḥkhitum arhasi ।
prauḍho api ko atra jānāti vicitrabhavitavyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
yakṣiṇīvacanaṃ śrutvā hayārūḍhas tadāpatat ।
tam āśvāsya punaḥ saiva yakṣiṇī vākyam abravīt ।।
{yakṣiṇy uvāca 
strītvaṃ jātaṃ jātam eva na puṃstvaṃ kartum arhasi ।
gṛhāṇa vidyāṃ strīyogyāṃ nṛtyaṃ gītam alaṃkṛtim ।
strīlālityaṃ strīvilāsaṃ strīkṛtyaṃ sarvam eva tat ।।
{brahmovāca 
ilā sarvam athāvāpya yakṣiṇīṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{ilovāca 
ko vā bhartā kiṃ tu kṛtyaṃ punaḥ puṃstvaṃ kathaṃ bhavet ।
etad vadasva kalyāṇī duḥkhārtāyā viśeṣataḥ ।
ārtānām ārtiśamanāc chreyo nābhyadhikaṃ kvacit ।।
{yakṣiṇy uvāca 
budhaḥ somasuto nāma vanād asmāc ca pūrvataḥ ।
āśramas tasya subhage pitaraṃ nityam eṣyati ।।
anenaiva pathā somaṃ pitaraṃ sa budho grahaḥ ।
draṣṭuṃ yāti tato nityaṃ namaskartuṃ tathaiva ca ।।
yadā yāti budhaḥ śāntas tadātmānaṃ ca darśaya ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaṃ tu subhage sarvakāmān avāpsyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tām āśvāsya tataḥ subhrūr yakṣiṇy antaradhīyata ।
yakṣiṇī sā tam ācaṣṭa yakṣo api sukham āptavān ।।
ilasainyaṃ ca tatrāsīt tad gataṃ ca yathāsukham ।
umāvanasthitā celā gāyantī nṛtyatī punaḥ ।।
strībhāvam anuceṣṭantī smarantī karmaṇo gatim ।
kadācit kriyamāṇe tu ilayā nṛtyakarmaṇi ।।
tām apaśyad budho dhīmān pitaraṃ gantum udyataḥ ।
ilāṃ dṛṣṭvā gatiṃ tyaktvā tām āgatyābravīd budhaḥ ।।
{budha uvāca 
bhāryā bhava mama svasthā sarvābhyas tvaṃ priyā bhava ।।
{brahmovāca 
budhavākyam ilā bhaktyā tv abhinandya tathākarot ।
smṛtvā ca yakṣiṇīvākyaṃ tatas tuṣṭābhavan mune ।।
budho reme tayā prītyā nītvā svasthānam uttamam ।
sā cāpi sarvabhāvena toṣayām āsa taṃ patim ।
tato bahutithe kāle budhas tuṣṭo avadat priyām ।।
{budha uvāca 
kiṃ te deyaṃ mayā bhadre priyaṃ yan manasi sthitam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tadvākyasamakālaṃ tu putraṃ dehīty abhāṣata ।
ilā budhaṃ somasutaṃ prītimantaṃ priyaṃ tathā ।।
{budha uvāca 
amogham etan madvīryaṃ tathā prītisamudbhavam ।
putras te bhavitā tasmāt kṣatriyo lokaviśrutaḥ ।।
somavaṃśakaraḥ śrīmān āditya iva tejasā ।
buddhyā bṛhaspatisamaḥ kṣamayā pṛthivīsamaḥ ।।
vīryeṇājau harir iva kopena hutabhug yathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasminn utpadyamāne tu budhaputre mahātmani ।
jayaśabdaś ca sarvatra tv āsīc ca suraveśmani ।।
budhaputre samutpanne tatrājagmuḥ sureśvarāḥ ।
aham apy āgamaṃ tatra mudā yukto mahāmate ।।
jātamātraḥ suto rāvam akarot sa pṛthusvaram ।
tena sarve apy avocan vai saṃgatā ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ ।।
yasmāt purū ravo asyeti tasmād eṣa purūravāḥ ।
syād ity evaṃ nāma cakruḥ sarve saṃtuṣṭamānasāḥ ।।
budho apy adhyāpayām āsa kṣātravidyāṃ sutaṃ śubhām ।
dhanurvedaṃ saprayogaṃ budhaḥ prādāt tadātmaje ।।
sa śīghraṃ vṛddhim agamac chuklapakṣe yathā śaśī ।
sa mātaraṃ duḥkhayutāṃ samīkṣyelāṃ mahāmatiḥ ।
namasyātha vinītātmā ilām ailo abravīd idam ।।
{aila uvāca 
budho mātar mama pitā tava bhartā priyas tathā ।
ahaṃ ca putraḥ karmaṇyaḥ kasmāt te mānaso jvaraḥ ।।
{ilovāca 
satyaṃ putra budho bhartā tvaṃ ca putro guṇākaraḥ ।
bhartṛputrakṛtā cintā na mamāsti kadācana ।।
tathāpi pūrvajaṃ kiṃcid duḥkhaṃ smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ ।
cintayeyaṃ mahābuddhe tato mātaram abravīt ।।
{aila uvāca 
nivedayasva me mātas tad eva prathamaṃ mama ।।
{brahmovāca 
ilā cainam uvācedaṃ rahovācaṃ kathaṃ vade ।
tathāpi putra te vacmi pitroḥ putro yato gatiḥ ।
magnānāṃ duḥkhapāthobdhau putraḥ pravahaṇaṃ param ।।
{brahmovāca 
tan mātṛvacanaṃ śrutvā vinītaḥ prāha mātaram ।
pādayoḥ patitaś cāpi vada mātar yathā tathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
sā purūravasaṃ prāha ikṣvākūṇāṃ tathā kulam ।
tatrotpattiṃ svasya nāma rājyaprāptiṃ priyān sutān ।।
purodhasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca priyāṃ bhāryāṃ svakaṃ padam ।
vananiryāṇam evātha amātyānāṃ purodhasaḥ ।।
preṣaṇaṃ ca nagaryāṃ tāṃ mṛgayāsaktim eva ca ।
himavatkandaragatiṃ yakṣeśvaragṛhe gatim ।।
umāvanapraveśaṃ ca strītvaprāptim aśeṣataḥ ।
maheśvarājñayā tatra cāpraveśaṃ narasya tu ।।
yakṣiṇīvākyam apy asya varadānaṃ tathaiva ca ।
budhaprāptiṃ tathā prītiṃ putrotpattyādy aśeṣataḥ ।।
kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ śrutvā mātaram abravīt ।
purūravāḥ kiṃ karomi kiṃ kṛtvā sukṛtaṃ bhavet ।।
etāvatā te tṛptiś ced alam etena cāmbike ।
yad apy anyan manovarti tad apy ājñāpayasva me ।।
{ilovāca 
iccheyaṃ puṃstvam utkṛṣṭam iccheyaṃ rājyam uttamam ।
abhiṣekaṃ ca putrāṇāṃ tava cāpi viśeṣataḥ ।।
dānaṃ dātuṃ ca yaṣṭuṃ ca muktimārgasya vīkṣaṇam ।
sarvaṃ ca kartum icchāmi tava putra prasādataḥ ।।
{putra uvāca 
upāyaṃ tvā tu pṛcchāmi yena puṃstvam avāpsyasi ।
tapaso vānyato vāpi vadasva mama tattvataḥ ।।
{ilovāca 
budhaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ pṛccha gatvā putra yathārthavat ।
sa tu sarvaṃ tu jānāti upadekṣyati te hitam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tanmātṛvacanād ailo gatvā pitaram añjasā ।
uvāca praṇato bhūtvā mātuḥ kṛtyaṃ tathātmanaḥ ।।
{budha uvāca 
ilaṃ jāne mahāprājña ilāṃ jātāṃ punas tathā ।
umāvanapraveśaṃ ca śaṃbhor ājñāṃ tathaiva ca ।।
tasmāc chaṃbhuprasādena umāyāś ca prasādataḥ ।
viśāpo bhavitā putra tāv ārādhya na cānyathā ।।
{purūravā uvāca 
paśyeyaṃ taṃ kathaṃ devaṃ kathaṃ vā mātaraṃ śivām ।
tīrthād vā tapaso vāpi tat pitaḥ prathamaṃ vada ।।
{budha uvāca 
gautamīṃ gaccha putra tvaṃ tatrāste sarvadā śivaḥ ।
umayā sahitaḥ śrīmāñ śāpahantā varapradaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
purūravāḥ pitur vākyaṃ śrutvā tu mudito abhavat ।
gautamīṃ tapase dhīmān gaṅgāṃ trailokyapāvanīm ।।
puṃstvam icchaṃs tathā mātur jagāma tapase tvaran ।
himavantaṃ giriṃ natvā mātaraṃ pitaraṃ gurum ।।
gacchantam anvagāt putram ilā somasutas tathā ।
te sarve gautamīṃ prāptā himavatparvatottamāt ।।
tatra snātvā tapaḥ kiṃcit kṛtvā cakruḥ stutiṃ parām ।
bhavasya devadevasya stutikramam imaṃ śṛṇu ।।
budhas tuṣṭāva prathamam ilā ca tadanantaram ।
tataḥ purūravāḥ putro gaurīṃ devīṃ ca śaṃkaram ।।
{budha uvāca 
yau kuṅkumena svaśarīrajena 
svabhāvahemapratimau sarūpau 
yāv arcitau skandagaṇeśvarābhyāṃ 
tau me śaraṇyau śaraṇaṃ bhavetām 
{ilovāca 
saṃsāratāpatrayadāvadagdhāḥ 
śarīriṇo yau paricintayantaḥ 
sadyaḥ parāṃ nirvṛtim āpnuvanti 
tau śaṃkarau me śaraṇaṃ bhavetām 
ārtā hy ahaṃ pīḍitamānasā te 
kleśādigoptā na paro asti kaścit 
deva tvadīyau caraṇau supuṇyau 
tau me śaraṇyau śaraṇaṃ bhavetām 
{purūravā uvāca 
yayoḥ sakāśād idam abhyudaiti 
prayāti cānte layam eva sarvam 
jagaccharaṇyau jagadātmakau tu 
gaurīharau me śaraṇaṃ bhavetām 
yau devavṛndeṣu mahotsave tu 
pādau gṛhāṇeśa girīśaputryāḥ 
proktaṃ dhṛtau prītivaśāc chivena 
tau me śaraṇyau śaraṇaṃ bhavetām 
{śrīdevy uvāca 
kim abhīṣṭaṃ pradāsyāmi yuṣmabhyaṃ tad vadantu me ।
kṛtakṛtyāḥ stha bhadraṃ vo devānām api duṣkaram ।।
{purūravā uvāca 
ilo rājā tavājñātvā vanaṃ prāviśad ambike ।
tat kṣamasva sureśāni puṃstvaṃ dātuṃ tvam arhasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uvāca tān sarvān bhavasya tu mate sthitā ।
tataḥ sa bhagavān āha devīvākyarataḥ sadā ।।
{śiva uvāca 
atrābhiṣekamātreṇa puṃstvaṃ prāpnotv ayaṃ nṛpaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
snātāyā budhabhāryāyāḥ śarīrād vāri susruve ।
nṛtyaṃ gītaṃ ca lāvaṇyaṃ yakṣiṇyā yad upārjitam ।।
tat sarvaṃ vāridhārābhir gaṅgāmbhasi samāviśat ।
nṛtyā gītā ca saubhāgyā imā nadyo babhūvire ।।
tāś cāpi saṃgatā gaṅgāṃ te puṇyāḥ saṃgamās trayaḥ ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca surarājyaphalapradam ।।
ilā puṃstvam avāpyātha gaurīśaṃbhoḥ prasādataḥ ।
mahābhyudayasiddhyarthaṃ vājimedham athākarot ।।
purodhasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca bhāryāṃ putrāṃs tathaiva ca ।
amātyāṃś ca balaṃ kośam ānīya sa nṛpottamaḥ ।।
caturaṅgaṃ balaṃ rājyaṃ daṇḍake asthāpayat tadā ।
ilasya nāmnā vikhyātaṃ tatra tat puram ucyate ।।
pūrvajātān atho putrān sūryavaṃśakramāgate ।
rājye abhiṣicya paścāt tam ailaṃ snehād asiñcayat ।।
somavaṃśakaraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ rājā bhaved iti ।
sarvebhyo matimānebhyo jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭho abhavan mune ।।
yatra ca kratavo vṛttā ilasya nṛpateḥ śubhāḥ ।
yatra puṃstvam avāpyātha yatra putrāḥ samāgatāḥ ।।
yakṣiṇīdattanṛtyādi- gītasaubhāgyamaṅgalāḥ ।
nadyo bhūtvā yatra gaṅgāṃ saṃgatās tāni nārada ।।
tīrthāni śubhadāny āsan sahasrāṇy atha ṣoḍaśa ।
ubhayos tīrayos tāta tatra śaṃbhur ileśvaraḥ ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakratuphalapradam ।।
{brahmovāca 
cakratīrtham iti khyātaṃ brahmahatyādināśanam ।
yatra cakreśvaro devaś cakram āpa yato hariḥ ।।
yatra viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ sthitvā cakrārthaṃ śaṃkaraṃ prabhuḥ ।
pūjayām āsa tat tīrthaṃ cakratīrtham udāhṛtam ।।
yasya śravaṇamātreṇa sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।
dakṣakratau pravṛtte tu devānāṃ ca samāgame ।।
dakṣeṇa dūṣite deve śive śarve maheśvare ।
anāhvāne sureśasya dakṣacitte malīmase ।।
dākṣāyaṇyā śrute vākye anāhvānasya kāraṇe ।
ahalyāyāṃ coktavatyāṃ kupitābhūt sureśvarī ।।
pitaraṃ nāśaye pāpaṃ kṣameyaṃ na kathaṃcana ।
śṛṇvatī doṣavākyāni pitrā coktāni bhartari ।।
patyuḥ śṛṇvanti yā nindāṃ tāsāṃ pāpāvadhiḥ kutaḥ ।
yādṛśas tādṛśo vāpi patiḥ strīṇāṃ parā gatiḥ ।।
kiṃ punaḥ sakalādhīśo mahādevo jagadguruḥ ।
śrutaṃ tannindanaṃ tarhi dhārayāmi na dehakam ।।
tasmāt tyakṣya imaṃ deham ity uktvā sā mahāsatī ।
kopena mahatāviṣṭā prajajvāla sureśvarī ।।
śivaikacetanā dehaṃ balād yogāc ca tatyaje ।
maheśvaro api sakalaṃ vṛttam ākarṇya nāradāt ।।
dṛṣṭvā cukopa papraccha jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ tathā ।
te ūcatur ubhe devaṃ dakṣakratuvināśanam ।।
dākṣāyaṇyā iti śrutvā makhaṃ prāyān maheśvaraḥ ।
bhīmair gaṇaiḥ parivṛto bhūtanāthaiḥ samaṃ yayau ।।
makhas tair veṣṭitaḥ sarvo devabrahmapuraskṛtaḥ ।
dakṣeṇa yajamānena śuddhabhāvena rakṣitaḥ ।।
vasiṣṭhādibhir atyugrair munibhiḥ parivāritaḥ ।
indrādityādyair vasubhiḥ sarvataḥparipālitaḥ ।।
ṛgyajuḥsāmavedaiś ca svāhāśabdair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।
śraddhā puṣṭis tathā tuṣṭiḥ śāntir lajjā sarasvatī ।।
bhūmir dyauḥ śarvarī kṣāntir uṣā āśā jayā matiḥ ।
etābhiś ca tathānyābhiḥ sarvataḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
tvaṣṭrā mahātmanā cāpi kārito viśvakarmaṇā ।
surabhir nandinī dhenuḥ kāmadhuk kāmadohinī ।।
etābhiḥ kāmavarṣābhiḥ sarvakāmasamṛddhimān ।
kalpavṛkṣaḥ pārijāto latāḥ kalpalatādikāḥ ।।
yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ kiṃcit tatra tasmin makhe sthitam ।
svayaṃ maghavatā pūṣṇā hariṇā parirakṣitaḥ ।।
dīyatāṃ bhujyatāṃ vāpi kriyatāṃ sthīyatāṃ sukham ।
etaiś ca sarvato vākyair dakṣasya pūjitaṃ makham ।।
ādau tu vīrabhadro asau bhadrakālyā yuto yayau ।
śokakopaparītātmā paścāc chūlapinākadhṛk ।।
abhyāyayau mahādevo mahābhūtair alaṃkṛtaḥ ।
tāni bhūtāni parito makhe veṣṭya maheśvaram ।।
kratuṃ vidhvaṃsayām āsus tatra kṣobho mahān abhūt ।
palāyanta tataḥ kecit kecid gatvā tataḥ śivam ।।
kecit stuvanti deveśaṃ kecit kupyanti śaṃkaram ।
evaṃ vidhvaṃsitaṃ yajñaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūṣā samabhyagāt ।।
pūṣṇo dantān athotpāṭya indraṃ vyadrāvayat kṣaṇāt ।
bhagasya cakṣuṣī vipra vīrabhadro vyapāṭayat ।।
divākaraṃ punar dorbhyāṃ paribhrāmya samākṣipat ।
tataḥ suragaṇāḥ sarve viṣṇuṃ te śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
trāhi trāhi gadāpāṇe bhūtanāthakṛtād bhayāt ।

tena dagdho makhaḥ sarvo vaiṣṇavaḥ paśyato hareḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
hariṇā cakram utsṛṣṭaṃ bhūtanāthavadhaṃ prati ।

{dakṣa uvāca 
jaya śaṃkara someśa jaya sarvajña śaṃbhave ।

trāhi trāhi jagannātha śaraṇāgatavatsala ।

{brahmovāca 
evaṃ tu stuvatas tasya prasanno abhūn maheśvaraḥ ।

babhūva tatra daityebhyo bhītā devāḥ śriyaḥ patim ।
tuṣṭuvuḥ sarvabhāvena vacobhis taṃ janārdanam ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
śakrādayo api tridaśāḥ kaṭākṣam

sā cāpi yatpādaratā ca lakṣmīs 
taṃ brahmabhūtaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye

{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prasanno bhagavāñ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।

{devā ūcuḥ 
bhayaṃ ca tīvraṃ daityebhyo devānāṃ madhusūdana ।
tatas trāṇāya devānāṃ matiṃ kuru janārdana ।।
{brahmovāca 
tān āgatān hariḥ prāha grastaṃ cakraṃ hareṇa me ।

yāntu sarve devagaṇā rakṣā vaḥ kriyate mayā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato gateṣu deveṣu viṣṇuś cakrārtham udyataḥ ।

{viṣṇur uvāca 
tvam eva deva jānīṣe bhāvam antargataṃ nṛṇām ।

{brahmovāca 
vadann udaśrunayano nililye asāv itīśvare ।

gaṅgāṃ cāpi saricchreṣṭhāṃ devaṃ ca vṛṣabhadhvajam ।।

yasyānuśravaṇenaiva mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ ।।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca yaḥ kuryāt pitṛtarpaṇam ।
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ pitṛbhiḥ svargabhāg bhavet ।
tat tu cakrāṅkitaṃ tīrtham adyāpi paridṛśyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
pippalaṃ tīrtham ākhyātaṃ cakratīrthād anantaram ।
yatra cakreśvaro devaś cakram āpa yato hariḥ ।।
yatra viṣṇuḥ svayaṃ sthitvā cakrārthaṃ śaṃkaraṃ vibhum ।
pūjayām āsa tat tīrthaṃ cakratīrtham udāhṛtam ।।
yatra prīto abhavad viṣṇoḥ śaṃbhus tat pippalaṃ viduḥ ।
mahimānaṃ yasya vaktuṃ na kṣamo apy ahināyakaḥ ।।
cakreśvaro pippaleśo nāmadheyasya kāraṇam ।
śṛṇu nārada tad bhaktyā sākṣād vedoditaṃ mayā ।।
dadhīcir iti vikhyāto munir āsīd guṇānvitaḥ ।
tasya bhāryā mahāprājñā kulīnā ca pativratā ।।
lopāmudreti yā khyātā svasā tasyā gabhastinī ।
iti nāmnā ca vikhyātā vaḍaveti prakīrtitā ।।
dadhīceḥ sā priyā nityaṃ tapas tepe tayā mahat ।
dadhīcir agnimān nityaṃ gṛhadharmaparāyaṇaḥ ।।
bhāgīrathīṃ samāśritya devātithiparāyaṇaḥ ।
svakalatrarataḥ śāntaḥ kumbhayonir ivāparaḥ ।।
tasya prabhāvāt taṃ deśaṃ nārayo daityadānavāḥ ।

tatra devāḥ samājagmū rudrādityās tathāśvinau ।
indro viṣṇur yamo agniś ca jitvā daityān upāgatān ।।
jayena jātasaṃharṣāḥ stutāś caiva marudgaṇaiḥ ।
dadhīciṃ muniśārdūlaṃ dṛṣṭvā nemuḥ sureśvarāḥ ।।
dadhīcir jātasaṃharṣaḥ surān pūjya pṛthak pṛthak ।
gṛhakṛtyaṃ tataś cakre surebhyo bhāryayā saha ।।
pṛṣṭāś ca kuśalaṃ tena kathāś cakruḥ surā api ।
dadhīcim abruvan devā bhāryayā sukhitaṃ punaḥ ।।
āsīnaṃ hṛṣṭamanasa ṛṣiṃ natvā punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
kim adya durlabhaṃ loke ṛṣe asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati ।
tvādṛśaḥ sakṛpo yeṣu munir bhūkalpapādapaḥ ।।
etad eva phalaṃ puṃsāṃ jīvatāṃ munisattama ।
tīrthāplutir bhūtadayā darśanaṃ ca bhavādṛśām ।।
yat snehād ucyate asmābhir avadhāraya tan mune ।
jitvā daityān iha prāptā hatvā rākṣasapuṃgavān ।।
vayaṃ ca sukhino brahmaṃs tvayi dṛṣṭe viśeṣataḥ ।
nāyudhaiḥ phalam asmākaṃ voḍhuṃ naiva kṣamā vayam ।।
sthāpyadeśaṃ na paśyāma āyudhānāṃ munīśvara ।
svarge suradviṣo jñātvā sthāpitāni haranti ca ।।
nayeyur āyudhānīti tathaiva ca rasātale ।
tasmāt tavāśrame puṇye sthāpyante astrāṇi mānada ।।
naivātra kiṃcid bhayam asti vipra 
na dānavebhyo rākṣasebhyaś ca ghoram 
tvadājñayā rakṣitapuṇyadeśo 
na vidyate tapasā te samānaḥ 
jitārayo brahmavidāṃ variṣṭhaṃ 
vayaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nihatā daityasaṃghāḥ 
astrair alaṃ bhārabhūtaiḥ kṛtārthaiḥ 
sthāpyaṃ sthānaṃ te samīpe munīśa 
divyān bhogān kāminībhiḥ sametān 
devodyāne nandane saṃbhajāmaḥ 
tato yāmaḥ kṛtakāryāḥ sahendrāḥ 
svaṃ svaṃ sthānaṃ cāyudhānāṃ ca rakṣā 
tvayā kṛtā jāyatāṃ tat praśādhi 
samarthas tvaṃ rakṣaṇe dhāraṇe ca 
{brahmovāca 
tadvākyam ākarṇya dadhīcir evaṃ 
vākyaṃ jagau vibudhān evam astu 
nivāryamāṇaḥ priyaśīlayā striyā 
kiṃ devakāryeṇa viruddhakāriṇā 
ye jñātaśāstrāḥ paramārthaniṣṭhāḥ 
saṃsāraceṣṭāsu gatānurāgāḥ 
teṣāṃ parārthavyasanena kiṃ mune 
yenātra vāmutra sukhaṃ na kiṃcit 
devadviṣo dveṣam anuprayānti 
datte sthāne vipravarya śṛṇuṣva 
naṣṭe hṛte cāyudhānāṃ munīśa 
kupyanti devā ripavas te bhavanti 
tasmān nedaṃ vedavidāṃ variṣṭha 
yuktaṃ dravye parakīye mamatvam 
tāvac ca maitrī dravyabhāvaś ca tāvan 
naṣṭe hṛte ripavas te bhavanti 
ced asti śaktir dravyadāne tatas te 
dātavyam evārthine kiṃ vicāryam 
no cet santaḥ parakāryāṇi kuryur 
vāgbhir manobhiḥ kṛtibhis tathaiva 
parasvasaṃdhāraṇam etad eva 
sadbhir nirastaṃ tyaja kānta sadyaḥ 
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ priyāyā vacanaṃ sa vipro 
niśamya bhāryām idam āha subhrūm 
{dadhīcir uvāca 
purā surāṇām anumānya bhadre 
netīti vāṇī na sukhaṃ mamaiti 
{brahmovāca 
śrutveritaṃ patyur iti priyāyāṃ 
daivaṃ vinānyan na nṛṇāṃ samartham 
tūṣṇīṃ sthitāyāṃ surasattamās te 
saṃsthāpya cāstrāṇy atidīptimanti 
natvā munīndraṃ yayur eva lokān

hṛṣṭo avasad bhāryayā dharmayuktaḥ 
gate ca kāle hy ativiprayukte 
daive varṣe saṃkhyayā vai sahasre 
na te surā āyudhānāṃ munīśa 
vācaṃ manaś cāpi tathaiva cakruḥ 
dadhīcir apy āha gabhastim ojasā 
devārayo māṃ dviṣatīha bhadre 
na te surā netukāmā bhavanti 
saṃsthāpitāny atra vadasva yuktam 
sā cāha kāntaṃ vinayād uktam eva 
tvaṃ jānīṣe nātha yad atra yuktam 
daityā hariṣyanti mahāpravṛddhās 
tapoyuktā balinaḥ svāyudhāni 
tadastrarakṣārtham idaṃ sa cakre 
mantrais tu saṃkṣālya jalaiś ca puṇyaiḥ 
tad vāri sarvāstramayaṃ supuṇyaṃ 
tejoyuktaṃ tac ca papau dadhīciḥ 
nirvīryarūpāṇi tadāyudhāni 
kṣayaṃ jagmuḥ kramaśaḥ kālayogāt 
surāḥ samāgatya dadhīcim ūcur 
mahābhayaṃ hy āgataṃ śātravaṃ naḥ 
dadasva cāstrāṇi munipravīra 
yāni tvadante nihitāni devaiḥ 
dadhīcir apy āha surāribhītyā 
anāgatyā bhavatāṃ cācireṇa 
astrāṇi pītāni śarīrasaṃsthāny 
uktāni yuktaṃ mama tad vadantu 
śrutvā taduktaṃ vacanaṃ tu devāḥ 
procus tam itthaṃ vinayāvanamrāḥ 
astrāṇi dehīti ca vaktum etac 
chakyaṃ na vānyat prativaktuṃ munīndra 
vinā ca taiḥ paribhūyema nityaṃ 
puṣṭārayaḥ kva prayāmo munīśa 
na martyaloke na tale na nāke 
vāsaḥ surāṇāṃ bhavitādya tāta 
tvaṃ vipravaryas tapasā caiva yukto 
nānyad vaktuṃ yujyate te purastāt 
vipras tadovāca madasthisaṃsthāny 
astrāṇi gṛhṇantu na saṃśayo atra 
devās tam apy āhur anena kiṃ no hy 
astrair hīnāḥ strītvam āptāḥ surendrāḥ 
punas tadā cāha munipravīras 
tyakṣye jīvān daihikān yogayuktaḥ 
astrāṇi kurvantu madasthibhūtāny 
anuttamāny uttamarūpavanti 
kuruṣva cety āhur adīnasattvaṃ 
dadhīcim ity uttaram agnikalpam 
tadā tu tasya priyam īrayantī 
na sāṃnidhye prātitheyī munīśa 
te cāpi devās tām adṛṣṭvaiva śīghraṃ 
tasyā bhītā vipram ūcuḥ kuruṣva 
tatyāja jīvān dustyajān prītiyukto 
yathāsukhaṃ deham imaṃ juṣadhvam 
madasthibhiḥ prītimanto bhavantu 
surāḥ sarve kiṃ tu dehena kāryam 
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvāsau baddhapadmāsanastho 
nāsāgradattākṣiprakāśaprasannaḥ 
vāyuṃ savahniṃ madhyamodghāṭayogān 
nītvā śanair daharākāśagarbham 
yad aprameyaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ yad 
yad brahmarūpaṃ yad upāsitavyam 
tatraiva vinyasya dhiyaṃ mahātmā 
sāyujyatāṃ brahmaṇo asau jagāma 
nirjīvatāṃ prāptam abhīkṣya devāḥ 
kalevaraṃ tasya surāś ca samyak 
tvaṣṭāram apy ūcur atitvarantaḥ 
kuruṣva cāstrāṇi bahūni sadyaḥ 
sa cāpi tān āha kathaṃ nu kāryaṃ 
kalevaraṃ brāhmaṇasyeha devāḥ 
bibhemi kartuṃ dāruṇaṃ cākṣamo ahaṃ 
vidāritāny āyudhāny uttamāni 
tadasthibhūtāni karomi sadyas 
tato devā gāḥ samūcus tvarantaḥ 
{devā ūcuḥ 
vajraṃ mukhaṃ vaḥ kriyate hitārthaṃ 
gāvo devair āyudhārthaṃ kṣaṇena 
dadhīcidehaṃ tu vidārya yūyam 
asthīni śuddhāni prayacchatādya 
{brahmovāca 
tā devavākyāc ca tathaiva cakruḥ 
saṃlihya cāsthīni daduḥ surāṇām 
surās tvarā jagmur adīnasattvāḥ 
svam ālayaṃ cāpi tathaiva gāvaḥ 
kṛtvā tathāstrāṇi ca devatānāṃ 
tvaṣṭā jagāmātha surājñayā tadā 
tataś cirāc chīlavatī subhadrā 
bhartuḥ priyā bālagarbhā tvarantī 
kare gṛhītvā kalaśaṃ vāripūrṇam 
umāṃ natvā phalapuṣpaiḥ sametya 
agniṃ ca bhartāram athāśramaṃ ca 
saṃdraṣṭukāmā hy ājagāmātha śīghram 
āgacchantīṃ tāṃ prātitheyīṃ tadānīṃ 
nivārayām āsa tadolkapātaḥ 
sā saṃbhramād āgatā cāśramaṃ svaṃ 
naivāpaśyat tatra bhartāram agre 
kva vā gataś ceti savismayā sā 
papraccha cāgniṃ prātitheyī tadānīm 
agnis tadovāca savistaraṃ tāṃ 
devāgamaṃ yācanaṃ vai śarīre 
asthnām upādānam atha prayāṇaṃ 
śrutvā sarvaṃ duḥkhitā sā babhūva 
duḥkhodvegāt sā papātātha pṛthvyāṃ 
mandaṃ mandaṃ vahnināśvāsitā ca 
{prātitheyy uvāca 
śāpe amarāṇāṃ tu nāhaṃ samarthā 
agniṃ prāpsye kiṃ nu kāryaṃ bhaven me 
{brahmovāca 
kopaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca niyamya sādhvī 
tadāvādīd dharmayuktaṃ ca bhartuḥ 
{prātitheyy uvāca 
utpadyate yat tu vināśi sarvaṃ 
na śocyam astīti manuṣyaloke 
govipradevārtham iha tyajanti 
prāṇān priyān puṇyabhājo manuṣyāḥ 
saṃsāracakre parivartamāne 
dehaṃ samarthaṃ dharmayuktaṃ tv avāpya 
priyān prāṇān devaviprārthahetos 
te vai dhanyāḥ prāṇino ye tyajanti 
prāṇāḥ sarve asyāpi dehānvitasya 
yātāro vai nātra saṃdehaleśaḥ 
evaṃ jñātvā vipragodevadīnādy 
arthaṃ cainān utsṛjantīśvarās te 
nivāryamāṇo api mayā prapannayā 
cakāra devāstraparigrahaṃ saḥ 
manogataṃ vetty athavā vidhātuḥ 
ko martyalokātigaceṣṭitasya 
{brahmovāca 
ity evam uktvāpūjya cāgnīn yathāvad 
bhartus tvacā lomabhiḥ sā viveśa 
garbhasthitaṃ bālakaṃ prātitheyī 
kukṣiṃ vidāryātha kare gṛhītvā 
natvā ca gaṅgāṃ bhuvam āśramaṃ ca 
vanaspatīn oṣadhīr āśramasthān 
{prātitheyy uvāca 
pitrā hīno bandhubhir gotrajaiś ca 
mātrā hīno bālakaḥ sarva eva 
rakṣantu sarve api ca bhūtasaṃghās 
tathauṣadhyo bālakaṃ lokapālāḥ 
ye bālakaṃ mātṛpitṛprahīṇaṃ 
sanirviśeṣaṃ svatanuprarūḍhaiḥ 
paśyanti rakṣanti ta eva nūnaṃ 
brahmādikānām api vandanīyāḥ 
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā cātyajad bālaṃ bhartṛcittaparāyaṇā ।
pippalānāṃ samīpe tu nyasya bālaṃ namasya ca ।।
agniṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yajñapātrasamanvitā ।
viveśāgniṃ prātitheyī bhartrā saha divaṃ yayau ।।
ruruduś cāśramasthā ye vṛkṣāś ca vanavāsinaḥ ।
putravat poṣitā yena ṛṣiṇā ca dadhīcinā ।।
vinā tena na jīvāmas tayā mātrā vinā tathā ।
mṛgāś ca pakṣiṇaḥ sarve vṛkṣāḥ procuḥ parasparam ।।
{vṛkṣā ūcuḥ 
svargam āseduṣoḥ pitros tadapatyeṣv akṛtrimam ।
ye kurvanty aniśaṃ snehaṃ ta eva kṛtino narāḥ ।।
dadhīciḥ prātitheyī vā vīkṣate asmān yathā purā ।
tathā pitā na mātā vā dhig asmān pāpino vayam ।।
asmākam api sarveṣām ataḥ prabhṛti niścitam ।
bālo dadhīciḥ prātitheyī bālo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tadauṣadhyo vanaspatisamanvitāḥ ।
somaṃ rājānam abhyetya yācire amṛtam uttamam ।।
sa cāpi dattavāṃs tebhyaḥ somo amṛtam anuttamam ।
dadur bālāya te cāpi amṛtaṃ suravallabham ।।
sa tena tṛpto vavṛdhe śuklapakṣe yathā śaśī ।
pippalaiḥ pālito yasmāt pippalādaḥ sa bālakaḥ ।
pravṛddhaḥ pippalān evam uvāca tv ativismitaḥ ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
mānuṣebhyo mānuṣās tu jāyante pakṣibhiḥ khagāḥ ।
bījebhyo vīrudho loke vaiṣamyaṃ naiva dṛśyate ।
vārkṣas tv ahaṃ kathaṃ jāto hastapādādijīvavān ।।
{brahmovāca 
vṛkṣās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sarvam ūcur yathākramam ।
dadhīcer maraṇaṃ sādhvyās tathā cāgnipraveśanam ।।
asthnāṃ saṃharaṇaṃ devair etat sarvaṃ savistaram ।
śrutvā duḥkhasamāviṣṭo nipapāta tadā bhuvi ।।
āśvāsitaḥ punar vṛkṣair vākyair dharmārthasaṃhitaiḥ ।
āśvastaḥ sa punaḥ prāha tadauṣadhivanaspatīn ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
pitṛhantṝn haniṣye ahaṃ nānyathā jīvituṃ kṣamaḥ ।
pitur mitrāṇi śatrūṃś ca tathā putro anuvartate ।।
sa eva putro yo anyas tu putrarūpo ripuḥ smṛtaḥ ।
vadanti pitṛmitrāṇi tārayanty ahitān api ।।
{brahmovāca 
vṛkṣās taṃ bālam ādāya somāntikam athāyayuḥ ।
bālavākyaṃ tu te vṛkṣāḥ somāyātha nyavedayan ।
śrutvā somo api taṃ bālaṃ pippalādam abhāṣata ।।
{soma uvāca 
gṛhāṇa vidyāṃ vidhivat samagrāṃ 
tapaḥsamṛddhiṃ ca śubhāṃ ca vācam 
śauryaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca balaṃ ca buddhiṃ 
saṃprāpsyase putra madājñayā tvam 
{brahmovāca 
pippalādas tam apy āha oṣadhīśaṃ vinītavat ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
sarvam etad vṛthā manye pitṛhantṛviniṣkṛtim ।
na karomy atra yāvac ca tasmāt tat prathamaṃ vada ।।
yasmin deśe yatra kāle yasmin deve ca mantrake ।
yatra tīrthe ca sidhyeta matsaṃkalpaḥ surottama ।।
{brahmovāca 
candraḥ prāha ciraṃ dhyātvā bhuktir vā muktir eva vā ।
sarvaṃ maheśvarād devāj jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
sa somaṃ punar apy āha kathaṃ drakṣye maheśvaram ।
bālo ahaṃ bālabuddhiś ca na sāmarthyaṃ tapas tathā ।।
{candra uvāca 
gautamīṃ gaccha bhadra tvaṃ stuhi cakreśvaraṃ haram ।
prasannas tu taveśāno hy alpāyāsena vatsaka ।।
prīto bhaven mahādevaḥ sākṣāt kāruṇikaḥ śivaḥ ।
āste sākṣātkṛtaḥ śaṃbhur viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā ।।
varaṃ ca dattavān viṣṇoś cakraṃ ca tridaśārcitam ।
gaccha tatra mahābuddhe daṇḍake gautamīṃ nadīm ।।
cakreśvaraṃ nāma tīrthaṃ jānanty oṣadhayas tu tat ।
taṃ gatvā stuhi deveśaṃ sarvabhāvena śaṃkaram ।
sa te prītamanās tāta sarvān kāmān pradāsyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad rājavacanād brahman pippalādo mahāmuniḥ ।
ājagāma jagannātho yatra rudraḥ sa cakradaḥ ।।
taṃ bālaṃ kṛpayāviṣṭāḥ pippalāḥ svāśramān yayuḥ ।
godāvaryāṃ tataḥ snātvā natvā tribhuvaneśvaram ।
tuṣṭāva sarvabhāvena pippalādaḥ śivaṃ śuciḥ ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
sarvāṇi karmāṇi vihāya dhīrās 
tyaktaiṣaṇā nirjitacittavātāḥ 
yaṃ yānti muktyai śaraṇaṃ prayatnāt 
tam ādidevaṃ praṇamāmi śaṃbhum 
yaḥ sarvasākṣī sakalāntarātmā 
sarveśvaraḥ sarvakalānidhānam 
vijñāya maccittagataṃ samastaṃ 
sa me smarāriḥ karuṇāṃ karotu 
digīśvarāñ jitya surārcitasya 
kailāsam āndolayataḥ purāreḥ 
aṅguṣṭhakṛtyaiva rasātalād adho 
gatasya tasyaiva daśānanasya 
ālūnakāyasya giraṃ niśamya 
vihasya devyā saha dattam iṣṭam 
tasmai prasannaḥ kupito api tadvad 
ayuktadātāsi maheśvara tvam 
sautrāmaṇīm ṛddhim adhaḥ sa cakre 
yo arcāṃ harau nityam atīva kṛtvā 
bāṇaḥ praśasyaḥ kṛtavān uccapūjāṃ 
ramyāṃ manojñāṃ śaśikhaṇḍamauleḥ 
jitvā ripūn devagaṇān prapūjya 
guruṃ namaskartum agād viśākhaḥ 
cukopa dṛṣṭvā gaṇanātham ūḍham 
aṅke tam āropya jahāsa somaḥ 
īśāṅkarūḍho api śiśusvabhāvān 
na mātur aṅkaṃ pramumoca bālaḥ 
kruddhaṃ sutaṃ bodhitum apy aśaktas 
tato ardhanāritvam avāpa somaḥ 
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ svayaṃbhūḥ suprītaḥ pippalādam abhāṣata ।।
{śiva uvāca 
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te pippalāda yathepsitam ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
hato devair mahādeva pitā mama mahāyaśāḥ ।
adāmbhikaḥ satyavādī tathā mātā pativratā ।।
devebhyaś ca tayor nāśaṃ śrutvā nātha savistaram ।
duḥkhakopasamāviṣṭo nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe ।।
tasmān me dehi sāmarthyaṃ nāśayeyaṃ surān yathā ।
avadhyasevyas trailokye tvam eva śaśiśekhara ।।
{īśvara uvāca 
tṛtīyaṃ nayanaṃ draṣṭuṃ yadi śaknoṣi me anagha ।
tataḥ samartho bhavitā devāṃś chedayituṃ bhavān ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato draṣṭuṃ manaś cakre tṛtīyaṃ locanaṃ vibhoḥ ।
na śaśāka tadovāca na śakto asmīti śaṃkaram ।।
{īśvara uvāca 
kiṃcit kuru tapo bāla yadā drakṣyasi locanam ।
tṛtīyaṃ tvaṃ tadābhīṣṭaṃ prāpsyase nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutveśānavākyaṃ tapase kṛtaniścayaḥ ।
dadhīcisūnur dharmātmā tatraiva bahulāḥ samāḥ ।।
śivadhyānaikanirato bālo api balavān iva ।
pratyahaṃ prātar utthāya snātvā natvā gurūn kramāt ।।
sukhāsīno manaḥ kṛtvā suṣumnāyām ananyadhīḥ ।
hastasvastikam āropya nābhau vismṛtasaṃsṛtiḥ ।।
sthānāt sthānāntarotkarṣān vidadhyau śāṃbhavaṃ mahaḥ ।
dadarśa cakṣur devasya tṛtīyaṃ pippalāśanaḥ ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā vinīta idam abravīt ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
śaṃbhunā devadevena varo dattaḥ purā mama ।
tārtīyacakṣuṣo jyotir yadā paśyasi tatkṣaṇāt ।।
sarvaṃ te prārthitaṃ sidhyed ity āha tridaśeśvaraḥ ।
tasmād ripuvināśāya hetubhūtāṃ prayaccha me ।।
tadaiva pippalāḥ procur vaḍavāpi mahādyute ।
mātā tava prātitheyī vadanty evaṃ divaṃ gatā ।।
parābhidrohaniratā vismṛtātmahitā narāḥ ।
itas tato bhrāntacittāḥ patanti narakāvaṭe ।।
tan mātṛvacanaṃ śrutvā kupitaḥ pippalāśanaḥ ।
abhimāne jvalaty antaḥ sādhuvādo nirarthakaḥ ।।
dehi dehīti taṃ prāha kṛtyā netravinirgatā ।
vaḍaveti smaran vipraḥ kṛtyāpi vaḍavākṛtiḥ ।।
sarvasattvavināśāya prabhūtānalagarbhiṇī ।
gabhastinī bālagarbhā yā mātā pippalāśinaḥ ।।
taddhyānayogāt tu jātā kṛtyā sānalagarbhiṇī ।
utpannā sā mahāraudrā mṛtyujihveva bhīṣaṇā ।।
avocat pippalādaṃ taṃ kiṃ kṛtyaṃ me vadasva tat ।
pippalādo api tāṃ prāha devān khāda ripūn mama ।।
jagrāha sā tathety uktvā pippalādaṃ purasthitam ।
sa prāha kim idaṃ kṛtye sā cāpy āha tvayoditam ।।
devaiś ca nirmitaṃ dehaṃ tato bhītaḥ śivaṃ yayau ।
tuṣṭāva devaṃ sa muniḥ kṛtyāṃ prāha tadā śivaḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
yojanāntaḥsthitāñ jīvān na gṛhāṇa madājñayā ।
tasmād yāhi tato dūraṃ kṛtye kṛtyaṃ tataḥ kuru ।।
{brahmovāca 
tīrthāt tu pippalāt pūrvaṃ yāvad yojanasaṃkhyayā ।
prātiṣṭhad vaḍavārūpā kṛtyā sā ṛṣinirmitā ।।
tasyāṃ jāto mahān agnir lokasaṃharaṇakṣamaḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā vibudhāḥ sarve trastāḥ śaṃbhum upāgaman ।।
cakreśvaraṃ pippaleśaṃ pippalādena toṣitam ।
stuvanto bhītamanasaḥ śaṃbhum ūcur divaukasaḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
rakṣasva śaṃbho kṛtyāsmān bādhate tadbhavānalaḥ ।
śaraṇaṃ bhava sarveśa bhītānām abhayaprada ।।
sarvataḥ paribhūtānām ārtānāṃ śrāntacetasām ।
sarveṣām eva jantūnāṃ tvam eva śaraṇaṃ śiva ।।
ṛṣiṇābhyarthitā kṛtyā tvaccakṣurvahninirgatā ।
sā jighāṃsati lokāṃs trīṃs tvaṃ nas trātā na cetaraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tān abravīj jagannātho yojanāntarnivāsinaḥ ।
na bādhate tv asau kṛtyā tasmād yūyam aharniśam ।
ihaivāsadhvam amarās tasyā vo na bhayaṃ bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
punar ūcuḥ sureśānaṃ tvayā dattaṃ triviṣṭapam ।
tat tyaktvātra kathaṃ nātha vatsyāmas tridaśārcita ।।
{brahmovāca 
devānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā śivo vākyam athābravīt ।।
{śiva uvāca 
devo asau viśvataścakṣur yo devo viśvatomukhaḥ ।
yo raśmibhis tu dhamate nityaṃ yo janako mataḥ ।।
sa sūrya eka evātra sākṣād rūpeṇa sarvadā ।
sthitiṃ karotu tanmūrtau bhaviṣyanty akhilāḥ sthitāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatheti śaṃbhuvacanāt pārijātataros tadā ।
devā divākaraṃ cakrus tvaṣṭā bhāskaram abravīt ।।
{tvaṣṭovāca 
ihaivāssva jagatsvāmin rakṣemān vibudhān svayam ।
svāṃśaiś ca vayam apy atra tiṣṭhāmaḥ śaṃbhusaṃnidhau ।।
cakreśvarasya parito yāvad yojanasaṃkhyayā ।
gaṅgāyā ubhayaṃ tīram āsādyāsan surottamāḥ ।।
aṅgulyardhārdhamātraṃ tu gaṅgātīraṃ samāśritāḥ ।
tisraḥ koṭyas tathā pañca śatāni munisattama ।
tīrthānāṃ tatra vyuṣṭiṃ ca kaḥ śṛṇoti bravīti vā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ suragaṇāḥ sarve vinītāḥ śivam abruvan ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
pippalādaṃ sureśāna śamaṃ naya jaganmaya ।।
{brahmovāca 
om ity uktvā jagannāthaḥ pippalādam avocata ।।
{śiva uvāca 
nāśiteṣv api deveṣu pitā te nāgamiṣyati ।
dattāḥ pitrā tava prāṇā devānāṃ kāryasiddhaye ।।
dīnārtakaruṇābandhuḥ ko hi tādṛgbhave bhavet ।
tathā yātā divaṃ tāta tava mātā pativratā ।।
samā kāpy atra matayā lopāmudrāpy arundhatī ।
yad asthibhiḥ surāḥ sarve jayinaḥ sukhinaḥ sadā ।।
tenāvāptaṃ yaśaḥ sphītaṃ tava mātrākṣayaṃ kṛtam ।
tvayā putreṇa sarvatra nātaḥ parataraṃ kṛtam ।।
tvatpratāpabhayāt svargāc cyutāṃs tvaṃ pātum arhasi ।
kāṃdiśīkāṃs tava bhayād amarāṃs trātum arhasi ।
nārtatrāṇād abhyadhikaṃ sukṛtaṃ kvāpi vidyate ।।
yāvad yaśaḥ sphurati cāru manuṣyaloke 
ahāni tāvanti divaṃ gatasya 
dine dine varṣasaṃkhyā parasmiṃl 
loke vāso jāyate nirvikāraḥ 
mṛtās ta evātra yaśo na yeṣām 
andhās ta eva śrutavarjitā ye 
ye dānaśīlā na napuṃsakās te 
ye dharmaśīlā na ta eva śocyāḥ 
{brahmovāca 
bhāṣitaṃ devadevasya śrutvā śānto abhavan muniḥ ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā natvā nātham athābravīt ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
vāgbhir manobhiḥ kṛtibhiḥ kadācin 
mamopakurvanti hite ratā ye 
tebhyo hitārthaṃ tv iha cāpareṣāṃ 
somaṃ namasyāmi surādipūjyam 
saṃrakṣito yair abhivardhitaś ca 
samānagotraś ca samānadharmā 
teṣām abhīṣṭāni śivaḥ karotu 
bālendumauliṃ praṇato asmi nityam 
yair ahaṃ vardhito nityaṃ mātṛvat pitṛvat prabho ।
tannāmnā jāyatāṃ tīrthaṃ devadeva jagattraye ।।
yaśas tu teṣāṃ bhavitā tebhyo aham anṛṇas tataḥ ।
yāni kṣetrāṇi devānāṃ yāni tīrthāni bhūtale ।।
tebhyo yad idam adhikam anumanyantu devatāḥ ।
tataḥ kṣame ahaṃ devānām aparādhaṃ nirañjanaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ samakṣaṃ surasākṣarāṃ giraṃ 
sahasracakṣuḥpramukhāṃs tathāgrataḥ 
uvāca devā api menire vaco 
dadhīciputroditam ādareṇa 
bālasya buddhiṃ vinayaṃ ca vidyāṃ 
śauryaṃ balaṃ sāhasaṃ satyavācam 
pitror bhaktiṃ bhāvaśuddhiṃ viditvā 
tadāvādīc chaṃkaraḥ pippalādam 
{śaṃkara uvāca 
vatsa yad vai priyaṃ kāmaṃ yac cāpi suravallabham ।
prāpsyase vada kalyāṇaṃ nānyathā tvaṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
ye gaṅgāyām āplutā dharmaniṣṭhāḥ 
saṃpaśyanti tvatpadābjaṃ maheśa 
sarvān kāmān āpnuvantu prasahya 
dehānte te padam āyāntu śaivam 
tātaḥ prāptas tvatpadaṃ cāmbikā me 
nātha prāptā pippalaś cāmarāś ca 
sukhaṃ prāptā nāthanāthaṃ vilokya 
tvāṃ paśyeyus tvatpadaṃ te prayāntu 
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā pippalādaṃ devadevo maheśvaraḥ ।
abhinandya ca taṃ devaiḥ sārdhaṃ vākyam athābravīt ।।
devā api mudā yuktā nirbhayās tatkṛtād bhayāt ।
idam ūcuḥ sarva eva dādhīcaṃ śivasaṃnidhau ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
surāṇāṃ yad abhīṣṭaṃ ca tvayā kṛtam asaṃśayam ।
pālitā devadevasya ājñā trailokyamaṇḍanī ।।
yācitaṃ ca tvayā pūrvaṃ parārthaṃ nātmane dvija ।
tasmād anyatamaṃ brūhi kiṃcid dāsyāmahe vayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
punaḥ punas tad evocuḥ surasaṃghā dvijottamam ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ pūrvaṃ natvā śaṃbhusurān idam ।
uvāca pippalādaś ca umāṃ natvā ca pippalān ।।
{pippalāda uvāca 
pitarau draṣṭukāmo asmi sadā me śabdagocarau ।
te dhanyāḥ prāṇino loke mātāpitror vaśe sthitāḥ ।।
śuśrūṣaṇaparā nityaṃ tatpādājñāpratīkṣakāḥ ।
indriyāṇi śarīraṃ ca kulaṃ śaktiṃ dhiyaṃ vapuḥ ।।
parilabhya tayoḥ kṛtye kṛtakṛtyo bhavet svayam ।
paśūnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ cāpi sulabhaṃ mātṛdarśanam ।।
durlabhaṃ mama tac cāpi pṛcche pāpaphalaṃ nu kim ।
durlabhaṃ ca tathā cet syāt sarveṣāṃ yasya kasyacit ।।
nopapadyeta sulabhaṃ matto nānyo asti pāpakṛt ।
tayor darśanamātraṃ ca yadi prāpsye surottamāḥ ।।
manovākkāyakarmabhyaḥ phalaṃ prāptaṃ bhaviṣyati ।
pitarau ye na paśyanti samutpannā na saṃsṛtau ।
teṣāṃ mahāpātakānāṃ kaḥ saṃkhyāṃ kartum īśvaraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad ṛṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā mithaḥ saṃmantrya te surāḥ ।
vimānavaram ārūḍhau pitarau daṃpatī śubhau ।।
tava saṃdarśanākāṅkṣau drakṣyase vādya niścitam ।
viṣādaṃ lobhamohau ca tyaktvā cittaṃ śamaṃ naya ।।
paśya paśyeti taṃ prāhur dādhīcaṃ surasattamāḥ ।
vimānavaram ārūḍhau svargiṇau svarṇabhūṣaṇau ।।
tava saṃdarśanākāṅkṣau pitarau daṃpatī śubhau ।
vījyamānau surastrībhiḥ stūyamānau ca kiṃnaraiḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā sa mātāpitarau nanāma śivasaṃnidhau ।
harṣabāṣpāśrunayanau sa kathaṃcid uvāca tau ।।
{putra uvāca 
tārayanty eva pitarāv anye putrāḥ kulodvahāḥ ।
ahaṃ tu mātur udare kevalaṃ bhedakāraṇam ।
evaṃbhūto api tau mohāt paśyeyam atidurmatiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tāv ālokya tato duḥkhād vaktuṃ naiva śaśāka saḥ ।
devāś ca mātāpitarau pippalādam athābruvan ।।
dhanyas tvaṃ putra lokeṣu yasya kīrtir gatā divam ।
sākṣātkṛtas tvayā tryakṣo devāś cāśvāsitās tvayā ।
tvayā putreṇa sallokā na kṣīyante kadācana ।।
{brahmovāca 
puṣpavṛṣṭis tadā svargāt papāta tasya mūrdhani ।
jayaśabdaḥ surair uktaḥ prādurbhūto mahāmune ।।
āśiṣaṃ tu sute dattvā dadhīciḥ saha bhāryayā ।
śaṃbhuṃ gaṅgāṃ surān natvā putraṃ vākyam athābravīt ।।
{dadhīcir uvāca 
prāpya bhāryāṃ śive bhaktiṃ kuru gaṅgāṃ ca sevaya ।
putrān utpādya vidhivad yajñān iṣṭvā sadakṣiṇān ।
kṛtakṛtyas tato vatsa ākramasva ciraṃ divam ।।
{brahmovāca 
karomy evam iti prāha dadhīciṃ pippalāśanaḥ ।
dadhīciḥ putram āśvāsya bhāryayā ca punaḥ punaḥ ।।
anujñātaḥ suragaṇaiḥ punaḥ sa divam ākramat ।
devā apy ūcire sarve pippalādaṃ sasaṃbhramāḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
kṛtyāṃ śamaya bhadraṃ te tad utpannaṃ mahānalam ।।
{brahmovāca 
pippalādas tu tān āha na śakto ahaṃ nivāraṇe ।
asatyaṃ naiva vaktāhaṃ yūyaṃ kṛtyāṃ tu brūta tām ।।
māṃ dṛṣṭvā sā mahāraudrā viparītaṃ kariṣyati ।
tām eva gatvā vibudhāḥ procus te śāntikāraṇam ।।
analaṃ ca yathāprīti te ubhe nety avocatām ।
sarveṣāṃ bhakṣaṇāyaiva sṛṣṭā cāhaṃ dvijanmanā ।।
tathā ca matprasūto agnir anyathā tat kathaṃ bhavet ।
mahābhūtāni pañcāpi sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā ।।
sarvam asmanmukhe vidyād vaktavyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate ।
mayā saṃmantrya te devāḥ punar ūcur ubhāv api ।।
bhakṣayetām ubhau sarvaṃ yathānukramatas tathā ।
vaḍavāpi surān evam uvāca śṛṇu nārada ।।
{vaḍavovāca 
bhavatām icchayā sarvaṃ bhakṣyaṃ me surasattamāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
vaḍavā sā nadī jātā gaṅgayā saṃgatā mune ।
tadbhavas tu mahān agnir ya āsīd atibhīṣaṇaḥ ।
tam āhur amarā vahniṃ bhūtānām ādito viduḥ ।।
{surā ūcuḥ 
āpo jyeṣṭhatamā jñeyās tathaiva prathamaṃ bhavān ।
tatrāpy apāṃpatiṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ samudram aśanaṃ kuru ।
yathaiva tu vayaṃ brūmo gaccha bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham ।।
{brahmovāca 
analas tv amarān āha āpas tatra kathaṃ tv aham ।
vrajeyaṃ yadi māṃ tatra prāpayanty udakaṃ mahat ।।
bhavanta eva te apy āhuḥ kathaṃ te agne gatir bhavet ।
agnir apy āha tān devān kanyā māṃ guṇaśālinī ।।
hiraṇyakalaśe sthāpya nayed yatra gatir mama ।
tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kanyām ūcuḥ sarasvatīm ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
nayainam analaṃ śīghraṃ śirasā varuṇālayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
sarasvatī surān āha naikā śaktā ca dhāraṇe ।
yuktā catasṛbhiḥ śīghraṃ vaheyaṃ varuṇālayam ।।
sarasvatyā vacaḥ śrutvā gaṅgāṃ ca yamunāṃ tathā ।
narmadāṃ tapatīṃ caiva surāḥ procuḥ pṛthak pṛthak ।।
tābhiḥ samanvitovāha hiraṇyakalaśe analam ।
saṃsthāpya śirasādhārya tā jagmur varuṇālayam ।।
saṃsthāpya yatra deveśaḥ somanātho jagatpatiḥ ।
adhyāste vibudhaiḥ sārdhaṃ prabhāse śaśibhūṣaṇaḥ ।।
prāpayām āsur analaṃ pañcanadyaḥ sarasvatī ।
adhyāste ca mahān agniḥ piban vāri śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।।
tataḥ suragaṇāḥ sarve śivam ūcuḥ surottamam ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
asthnāṃ ca pāvanaṃ brūhi asmākaṃ ca gavāṃ tathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
śivaḥ prāha tadā sarvān gaṅgām āplutya yatnataḥ ।
devāś ca gāvas tatpāpān mucyante nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
prakṣālitāni cāsthīni ṛṣidehabhavāny atha ।
tāni prakṣālanād eva tatra prāptāni pūtatām ।।
yatra devā muktapāpās tat tīrthaṃ pāpanāśanam ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca brahmahatyāvināśanam ।।
gavāṃ ca pāvanaṃ yatra gotīrthaṃ tad udāhṛtam ।
tatra snānān mahābuddhir gomedhaphalam āpnuyāt ।।
yatra tadbrāhmaṇāsthīni āsan puṇyāni nārada ।
pitṛtīrthaṃ tu vai jñeyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ prītivardhanam ।।
bhasmāsthinakharomāṇi prāṇino yasya kasyacit ।
tatra tīrthe saṃkrameran yāvac candrārkatārakam ।।
svarge vāso bhavet tasya api duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ ।
tathā cakreśvarāt tīrthāt trīṇi tīrthāni nārada ।
tataḥ pūtāḥ suragaṇā gāvaḥ śaṃbhum athābruvan ।।
{gosurā ūcuḥ 
yāmaḥ svaṃ svam adhiṣṭhānam atra sūryaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ ।
asmin sthite dinakare surāḥ sarve pratiṣṭhitāḥ ।।
bhaveyur jagatām īśa tad anujñātum arhasi ।
sūryo hy ātmāsya jagatas tasthuṣaś ca sanātanaḥ ।।
divākaro devamayas tatrāsmābhiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ ।
yatra gaṅgā jagaddhātrī yatra vai tryambakaḥ svayam ।
suravāsaṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ bhaved yatra ca tryambakam ।।
{brahmovāca 
āpṛcchya pippalādaṃ taṃ surāḥ svaṃ sadanaṃ yayuḥ ।
pippalāḥ kālaparyāye svargaṃ jagmur athākṣayam ।।
pādapānāṃ padaṃ vipraḥ pippalādaḥ pratāpavān ।
kṣetrādhipatye saṃsthāpya pūjayām āsa śaṃkaram ।।
dadhīcisūnur munir ugratejā 
avāpya bhāryāṃ gautamasyātmajāṃ ca 
putrān athāvāpya śriyaṃ yaśaś ca 
suhṛjjanaiḥ svargam avāpa dhīraḥ 
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ pippaleśvaram ucyate ।
sarvakratuphalaṃ puṇyaṃ smaraṇād aghanāśanam ।।
kiṃ punaḥ snānadānābhyām ādityasya tu darśanāt ।
cakreśvaraḥ pippaleśo devadevasya nāmanī ।।
sarahasyaṃ viditvā tu sarvakāmān avāpnuyāt ।
sūryasya ca pratiṣṭhānāt suravāse pratiṣṭhite ।
pratiṣṭhānaṃ tu tat kṣetraṃ surāṇām api vallabham ।।
itīdam ākhyānam atīva puṇyaṃ 
paṭheta vā yaḥ śṛṇuyāt smared vā 
sa dīrghajīvī dhanavān dharmayuktaś 
cānte smarañ śaṃbhum upaiti nityam 
{brahmovāca 
nāgatīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।
yatra nāgeśvaro devaḥ śṛṇu tasyāpi vistaram ।।
pratiṣṭhānapure rājā śūrasena iti śrutaḥ ।
somavaṃśabhavaḥ śrīmān matimān guṇasāgaraḥ ।।
putrārthaṃ sa mahāyatnam akarot priyayā saha ।
tasya putraś cirād āsīt sarpo vai bhīṣaṇākṛtiḥ ।।
putraṃ taṃ gopayām āsa śūraseno mahīpatiḥ ।
rājñaḥ putraḥ sarpa iti na kaścid vindate janaḥ ।।
antarvartī paro vāpi mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vinā ।
dhātreyy api na jānāti nāmātyo na purohitaḥ ।।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣaṇaṃ sarpaṃ sabhāryo nṛpasattamaḥ ।
saṃtāpaṃ nityam āpnoti sarpād varam aputratā ।।
etad asti mahāsarpo vakti nityaṃ manuṣyavat ।
sa sarpaḥ pitaraṃ prāha kuru cūḍām api kriyām ।।
tathopanayanaṃ cāpi vedādhyayanam eva ca ।
yāvad vedaṃ na cādhīte tāvac chūdrasamo dvijaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā putravacaḥ śūraseno atiduḥkhitaḥ ।
brāhmaṇaṃ kaṃcanānīya saṃskārādi tadākarot ।
adhītavedaḥ sarpo api pitaraṃ cābravīd idam ।।
{sarpa uvāca 
vivāhaṃ kuru me rājan strīkāmo ahaṃ nṛpottama ।
anyathāpi ca kṛtyaṃ te na sidhyed iti me matiḥ ।।
janayitvātmajān veda- vidhinākhilasaṃskṛtīḥ ।
na kuryād yaḥ pitā tasya narakān nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
vismitaḥ sa pitā prāha sutaṃ tam uragākṛtim ।।
{śūrasena uvāca 
yasya śabdād api trāsaṃ yānti śūrāś ca pūruṣāḥ ।
tasmai kanyāṃ tu ko dadyād vada putra karomi kim ।।
{brahmovāca 
tat pitur vacanaṃ śrutvā sarpaḥ prāha vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
{sarpa uvāca 
vivāhā bahavo rājan rājñāṃ santi janeśvara ।
prasahyāharaṇaṃ cāpi śastrair vaivāha eva ca ।।
jāte vivāhe putrasya pitāsau kṛtakṛd bhavet ।
no ced atraiva gaṅgāyāṃ mariṣye nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tat putraniścayaṃ jñātvā aputro nṛpasattamaḥ ।
vivāhārtham amātyāṃs tān āhūyedaṃ vaco abravīt ।।
{śūrasena uvāca 
nāgeśvaro mama suto yuvarājo guṇākaraḥ ।
guṇavān matimāñ śūro durjayaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ ।।
rathe nāge sa dhanuṣi pṛthivyāṃ nopamīyate ।
vivāhas tasya kartavyo hy ahaṃ vṛddhas tathaiva ca ।।
rājyabhāraṃ sute nyasya niścinto ahaṃ bhavāmy ataḥ ।
na dārasaṃgraho yāvat tāvat putro mama priyaḥ ।।
bālabhāvaṃ no jahāti tasmāt sarve anumanya ca ।
vivāhāyātha kurvantu yatnaṃ mama hite ratāḥ ।।
na me kācit tadā cintā kṛtodvāho yadātmajaḥ ।
sute nyastabharā yānti kṛtinas tapase vanam ।।
{brahmovāca 
amātyā rājavacanaṃ śrutvā sarve vinītavat ।
ūcuḥ prāñjalayo harṣād rājānaṃ bhūritejasam ।।
{amātyā ūcuḥ 
tava putro guṇajyeṣṭhas tvaṃ ca sarvatra viśrutaḥ ।
vivāhe tava putrasya kiṃ mantryaṃ kiṃ tu cintyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
amātyeṣu tathokteṣu gambhīro nṛpasattamaḥ ।
putraṃ sarpaṃ tv amātyānāṃ na cākhyāti na te viduḥ ।।
rājā punas tān uvāca kā syāt kanyā guṇādhikā ।
mahāvaṃśabhavaḥ śrīmān ko rājā syād guṇāśrayaḥ ।।
saṃbandhayogyaḥ śūraś ca yatsaṃbandhaḥ praśasyate ।
tad rājavacanaṃ śrutvā amātyānāṃ mahāmatiḥ ।।
kulīnaḥ sādhur atyantaṃ rājakāryahite rataḥ ।
rājño matiṃ viditvā tu iṅgitajño abravīd idam ।।
{amātya uvāca 
pūrvadeśe mahārāja vijayo nāma bhūpatiḥ ।
vājivāraṇaratnānāṃ yasya saṃkhyā na vidyate ।।
aṣṭau putrā maheṣvāsā mahārājasya dhīmataḥ ।
teṣāṃ svasā bhogavatī sākṣāl lakṣmīr ivāparā ।
tava putrasya yogyā sā bhāryā rājan mayoditā ।।
{brahmovāca 
vṛddhāmātyavacaḥ śrutvā rājā taṃ pratyabhāṣata ।।
{rājovāca 
sutā tasya kathaṃ me asya sutasya syād vadasva tat ।।
{vṛddhāmātya uvāca 
lakṣito asi mahārāja yat te manasi vartate ।
yac chūrasena kṛtyaṃ syād anujānīhi māṃ tataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
vṛddhāmātyavacaḥ śrutvā bhūṣaṇācchādanoktibhiḥ ।
saṃpūjya preṣayām āsa mahatyā senayā saha ।।
sa pūrvadeśam āgatya mahārājaṃ sametya ca ।
