tadvākyāt kṛpayā yukto yamaḥ prāha punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{yama uvāca 
pāśānāṃ cāpi daṇḍasya sthānaṃ vada śubhānane ।।
{brahmovāca 
sā provāca yamaṃ devaṃ mayi pāśās tvayeritāḥ ।
āviśantu jagannātha daṇḍo mayy eva saṃviśet ।
tataḥ provāca bhagavān yamas tāṃ kṛpayā punaḥ ।।
{yama uvāca 
tava bhartā ca putrāś ca sarve jīvantu vijvarāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
nyavārayad yamaḥ pāśān āgneyāstraṃ tu havyavāṭ ।
kapotolūkayoś cāpi prītiṃ vai cakratuḥ surau ।
āhatuś ca dvijanmānau vriyatāṃ vara īpsitaḥ ।।
{pakṣiṇāv ūcatuḥ 
bhavator darśanaṃ labdhaṃ vairavyājena duṣkaram ।
vayaṃ ca pakṣiṇaḥ pāpāḥ kiṃ vareṇa surottamau ।।
atha deyo varo asmākaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ prītipūrvakam ।
nātmārtham anuyācāvo dīyamānaṃ varaṃ śubham ।।
ātmārthaṃ yas tu yāceta sa śocyo hi sureśvarau ।
jīvitaṃ saphalaṃ tasya yaḥ parārthodyataḥ sadā ।।
agnir āpo raviḥ pṛthvī dhānyāni vividhāni ca ।
parārthaṃ vartanaṃ teṣāṃ satāṃ cāpi viśeṣataḥ ।।
brahmādayo api hi yato yujyante mṛtyunā saha ।
evaṃ jñātvā tu deveśau vṛthā svārthapariśramaḥ ।।
janmanā saha yat puṃsāṃ vihitaṃ parameṣṭhinā ।
kadācin nānyathā tad vai vṛthā kliśyanti jantavaḥ ।।
tasmād yācāvahe kiṃcid dhitāya jagatāṃ śubham ।
guṇadāyi tu sarveṣāṃ tad yuvām anumanyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tāv āhatur ubhau devau pakṣiṇau lokaviśrutau ।
dharmasya yaśaso avāptye lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
{pakṣiṇāv ūcatuḥ 
āvābhyām āśramau tīrthe gaṅgāyā ubhaye taṭe ।
bhavetāṃ jagatāṃ nāthāv eṣa eva paro varaḥ ।।
snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ pitṝṇāṃ cāpi pūjanam ।
sukṛtī duṣkṛtī vāpi yaḥ karoti yathā tathā ।
sarvaṃ tad akṣayaṃ puṇyaṃ syād ity eṣa paro varaḥ ।।
{devāv ūcatuḥ 
evam astu tathā cānyat suprītau tu bravāvahai ।।
{yama uvāca 
uttare gautamītīre yamastotraṃ paṭhanti ye ।
teṣāṃ saptasu vaṃśeṣu nākāle mṛtyum āpnuyāt ।।
puruṣo bhājanaṃ ca syāt sarvadā sarvasaṃpadām ।
yas tv idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ mṛtyustotraṃ jitātmavān ।।
aṣṭāśītisahasraiś ca vyādhibhir na sa bādhyate ।
asmiṃs tīrthe dvijaśreṣṭhau trimāsād gurviṇī satī ।।
arvāgvandhyā ca ṣaṇmāsāt saptāhaṃ snānam ācaret ।
vīrasūḥ sā bhaven nārī śatāyuḥ sa suto bhavet ।।
lakṣmīvān matimāñ śūraḥ putrapautravivardhanaḥ ।
tatra piṇḍādidānena pitaro muktim āpnuyuḥ ।
manovākkāyajāt pāpāt snānān mukto bhaven naraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
yamavākyād anu tathā havyavāḍ āha pakṣiṇau ।।
{agnir uvāca 
matstotraṃ dakṣiṇe tīre ye paṭhanti yatavratāḥ ।
teṣām ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ lakṣmīṃ rūpaṃ dadāmy aham ।।
idaṃ stotraṃ tu yaḥ kaścid yatra kvāpi paṭhen naraḥ ।
naivāgnito bhayaṃ tasya likhite api gṛhe sthite ।।
snānaṃ dānaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād agnitīrthe śucir naraḥ ।
agniṣṭomaphalaṃ tasya bhaved eva na saṃśayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ yāmyam āgneyam eva ca ।
kapotaṃ ca tatholūkaṃ hetyulūkaṃ vidur budhāḥ ।।
tatra trīṇi sahasrāṇi tāvanty eva śatāni ca ।
punar navatitīrthāni pratyekaṃ muktibhājanam ।।
teṣu snānena dānena pretībhūtāś ca ye narāḥ ।
pūtās te putravittāḍhyā ākrameyur divaṃ śubhāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tapastīrtham iti khyātaṃ tapovṛddhikaraṃ mahat ।
sarvakāmapradaṃ puṇyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ prītivardhanam ।।
tasmiṃs tīrthe tu yad vṛttaṃ śṛṇu pāpapraṇāśanam ।
apām agneś ca saṃvādam ṛṣīṇāṃ ca parasparam ।।
apo jyeṣṭhatamāḥ kecin menire agniṃ tathāpare ।
evaṃ bruvanto munayaḥ saṃvādaṃ cāgnivāriṇoḥ ।।
vināgniṃ jīvanaṃ kva syāj jīvabhūto yato analaḥ ।
ātmabhūto havyabhūtaś cāgninā jāyate akhilam ।।
agninā dhriyate loko hy agnir jyotirmayaṃ jagat ।
tasmād agneḥ paraṃ nāsti pāvanaṃ daivataṃ mahat ।।
antarjyotiḥ sa evoktaḥ paraṃ jyotiḥ sa eva hi ।
vināgninā kiṃcid asti yasya dhāma jagattrayam ।।
tasmād agneḥ paraṃ nāsti bhūtānāṃ jyaiṣṭhyabhājanam ।
yoṣitkṣetre arpitaṃ bījaṃ puruṣeṇa yathā tathā ।।
tasya dehādikā śaktiḥ kṛśānor eva nānyathā ।
devānāṃ hi mukhaṃ vahnis tasmān nātaḥ paraṃ viduḥ ।।
apare tu hy apāṃ jyaiṣṭhyaṃ menire vedavādinaḥ ।
adbhiḥ saṃpatsyate hy annaṃ śucir adbhiḥ prajāyate ।।
adbhir eva dhṛtaṃ sarvam āpo vai mātaraḥ smṛtāḥ ।
trailokyajīvanaṃ vāri vadantīti purāvidaḥ ।।
utpannam amṛtaṃ hy adbhyas tābhyaś cauṣadhisaṃbhavaḥ ।
agnir jyeṣṭha iti prāhur āpo jyeṣṭhatamāḥ pare ।।
evaṃ mīmāṃsamānās te ṛṣayo vedavādinaḥ ।
viruddhavādino māṃ ca samabhyetyedam abruvan ।।
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
agner apāṃ vada jyaiṣṭhyaṃ trailokyasya bhavān prabhuḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
aham apy abravaṃ prāptān ṛṣīn sarvān yatavratān ।
ubhau pūjyatamau loka ubhābhyāṃ jāyate jagat ।।
ubhābhyāṃ jāyate havyaṃ kavyaṃ cāmṛtam eva ca ।
ubhābhyāṃ jīvanaṃ loke śarīrasya ca dhāraṇam ।।
nānayoś ca viśeṣo asti tato jyaiṣṭhyaṃ samaṃ matam ।
tato madvacanāj jyaiṣṭhyam ubhayor naiva kasyacit ।।
jyaiṣṭhyam anyatarasyeti menire ṛṣisattamāḥ ।
na tṛptā mama vākyena jagmur vāyuṃ tapasvinaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kasya jyaiṣṭhyaṃ bhavān prāṇo vāyo satyaṃ tvayi sthitam ।।
{brahmovāca 
vāyur āhānalo jyeṣṭhaḥ sarvam agnau pratiṣṭhitam ।
nety uktvānyonyam ṛṣayo jagmus te api vasuṃdharām ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
satyaṃ bhūme vada jyaiṣṭhyam ādhārāsi carācare ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhūmir apy āha vinayād āgatāṃs tān ṛṣīn idam ।।
{bhūmir uvāca 
mamāpy ādhārabhūtāḥ syur āpo devyaḥ sanātanāḥ ।
adbhyas tu jāyate sarvaṃ jyaiṣṭhyam apsu pratiṣṭhitam ।।
{brahmovāca 
nety uktvānyonyam ṛṣayo jagmuḥ kṣīrodaśāyinam ।
tuṣṭuvur vividhaiḥ stotraiḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।।
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
yo veda sarvaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhaviṣyad 
yaj jāyamānaṃ ca guhāniviṣṭam 
lokatrayaṃ citravicitrarūpam 
ante samastaṃ ca yam āviveśa 
yad akṣaraṃ śāśvatam aprameyaṃ 
yaṃ vedavedyam ṛṣayo vadanti 
yam āśritāḥ svepsitam āpnuvanti 
tad vastu satyaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmaḥ 
bhūtaṃ mahābhūtajagatpradhānaṃ 
na vindate yogino viṣṇurūpam 
tad vaktum ete ṛṣayo atra yātāḥ 
satyaṃ vadasveha jagannivāsa 
tvam antarātmākhiladehabhājāṃ 
tvam eva sarvaṃ tvayi sarvam īśa 
tathāpi jānanti na keapi kutrāpi 
aho bhavantaṃ prakṛtiprabhāvāt 
antar bahiḥ sarvata eva santaṃ 
viśvātmanā saṃparivartamānam 
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prāha jagaddhātrī daivī vāg aśarīriṇī ।।
{daivī vāg uvāca 
ubhāv ārādhya tapasā bhaktyā ca niyamena ca ।
yasya syāt prathamaṃ siddhis tad bhūtaṃ jyeṣṭham ucyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety tathā yayuḥ sarve ṛṣayo lokapūjitāḥ ।
śrāntāḥ khinnāntarātmānaḥ paraṃ vairāgyam āśritāḥ ।।
sarvalokaikajananīṃ bhuvanatrayapāvanīm ।
gautamīm agaman sarve tapas taptuṃ yatavratāḥ ।।
abdaivataṃ tathāgniṃ ca pūjanāyodyatās tadā ।
agneś ca pūjakā ye ca apāṃ vai pūjane sthitāḥ ।
tatra vāg abravīd daivī vedamātā sarasvatī ।।
{daivī vāg uvāca 
agner āpas tathā yonir adbhiḥ śaucam avāpyate ।
agneś ca pūjakā ye ca vinādbhiḥ pūjanaṃ katham ।।
apsu jātāsu sarvatra karmaṇy adhikṛto bhavet ।
tāvat karmaṇy anarho ayam aśucir malino naraḥ ।।
na magnaḥ śraddhayā yāvad apsu śītāsu vedavit ।
tasmād āpo variṣṭhāḥ syur mātṛbhūtā yataḥ smṛtāḥ ।
tasmāj jyaiṣṭhyam apām eva jananyo agner viśeṣataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad vacaḥ śuśruvus te ṛṣayo vedavādinaḥ ।
niścayaṃ ca tataś cakrur bhavej jyaiṣṭhyam apām iti ।।
yatra tīrthe vṛttam idam ṛṣisattre ca nārada ।
tapastīrthaṃ tu tat proktaṃ sattratīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
agnitīrthaṃ ca tat proktaṃ tathā sārasvataṃ viduḥ ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।।
caturdaśa śatāny atra tīrthānāṃ puṇyadāyinām ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca svargamokṣapradāyakam ।।
kṛtaṃ saṃdehaharaṇam ṛṣīṇāṃ yatra bhāṣayā ।
sarasvaty abhavat tatra gaṅgayā saṃgatā nadī ।
māhātmyaṃ tasya ko vaktuṃ saṃgamasya kṣamo naraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
devatīrtham iti khyātaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare taṭe ।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।।
ārṣṭiṣeṇa iti khyāto rājā sarvaguṇānvitaḥ ।
tasya bhāryā jayā nāma sākṣāl lakṣmīr ivāparā ।।
tasya putro bharo nāma matimān pitṛvatsalaḥ ।
dhanurvede ca vede ca niṣṇāto dakṣa eva ca ।।
tasya bhāryā rūpavatī suprabhety abhiviśrutā ।
ārṣṭiṣeṇas tato rājā putre rājyaṃ niveśya saḥ ।।
purodhasā ca mukhyena dīkṣāṃ cakre nareśvaraḥ ।
sarasvatyās tatas tīre hayamedhāya yatnavān ।।
ṛtvigbhir ṛṣimukhyaiś ca vedaśāstraparāyaṇaiḥ ।
dīkṣitaṃ taṃ nṛpaśreṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇāgnisamīpataḥ ।।
mithur dānavarāṭ śūraḥ pāpabuddhiḥ pratāpavān ।
makhaṃ vidhvasya nṛpatiṃ sabhāryaṃ sapurohitam ।।
ādāya vegāt sa prāgād rasātalatalaṃ mune ।
nīte tasmin nṛpavare yajñe naṣṭe tato amarāḥ ।।
ṛtvijaś ca yayuḥ sarve svaṃ svaṃ sthānaṃ makhāt tataḥ ।
purohitasuto rājño devāpir iti viśrutaḥ ।।
bālas tāṃ mātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ātmanaḥ pitaraṃ na ca ।
dṛṣṭvā savismayo bhūtvā duḥkhito atīva cābhavat ।।
sa mātaraṃ tu papraccha pitā me kva gato ambike ।
pitṛhīno na jīveyaṃ mātaḥ satyaṃ vadasva me ।।
dhig dhik pitṛvihīnānāṃ jīvitaṃ pāpakarmaṇām ।
na vakṣi yadi me mātar jalam agnim athāviśe ।।
putraṃ provāca sā mātā rājño bhāryā purodhasaḥ ।
dānavena talaṃ nīto rājñā saha pitā tava ।।
{devāpir uvāca 
kva nītaḥ kena vā nītaḥ kathaṃ nītaḥ kva karmaṇi ।
keṣu paśyatsu kiṃ sthānaṃ dānavasya vadasva me ।।
{mātovāca 
dīkṣitaṃ yajñasadasi sabhāryaṃ sapurodhasam ।
rājānaṃ taṃ mithur daityo nītavān sa rasātalam ।
paśyatsu devasaṃgheṣu vahnibrāhmaṇasaṃnidhau ।।
{brahmovāca 
tan mātṛvacanaṃ śrutvā devāpiḥ kṛtyam asmarat ।
devān paśye athavāgniṃ vā ṛtvijo vāsurāṃs tathā ।।
eteṣv eva pitānveṣyo nānyatreti matir mama ।
iti niścitya devāpir bharaṃ prāha nṛpātmajam ।।
{devāpir uvāca 
tapasā brahmacaryeṇa vratena niyamena ca ।
ānetavyā mayā sarve nītā ye ca rasātalam ।।
jāte parābhave ghore yo na kuryāt pratikriyām ।
narādhamena kiṃ tena jīvatā vā mṛtena vā ।।
tvaṃ praśādhi mahīṃ kṛtsnām ārṣṭiṣeṇaḥ pitā yathā ।
mātā mama tvayā pālyā rājan yāvan mamāgatiḥ ।
bhavec ca kṛtakāryasya anujānīhi māṃ bhara ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhareṇoktaḥ sa devāpiḥ sarvaṃ niścitya yatnataḥ ।।
{bhara uvāca 
siddhiṃ kuru sukhaṃ yāhi mā cintām alpikāṃ bhaja ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato devāpir amara- rājāṅghridhyānatatparaḥ ।
ṛtvijo anveṣya yatnena natvā tān ṛtvijaḥ pṛthak ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭo bālo devāpir vākyam abravīt ।।
{devāpir uvāca 
bhavadbhiś ca makho rakṣyo yajamānaś ca dīkṣitaḥ ।
purodhāś ca tathā rakṣyaḥ patnī yā dīkṣitasya tu ।।
bhavatsu tatra paśyatsu yajñaṃ vidhvasya daityarāṭ ।
rājādayas tena nītās tan na yuktatamaṃ bhavet ।।
athāpy etad ahaṃ manye bhavantas tān arogiṇaḥ ।
dātum arhanti tān sarvān anyathā śāpam arhatha ।।
{ṛtvija ūcuḥ 
makhe agniḥ prathamaṃ pūjyo hy agnir evātra daivatam ।
tasmād vayaṃ na jānīmo hy agnīnāṃ paricārakāḥ ।।
sa eva dātā bhoktā ca hartā kartā ca havyavāṭ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ṛtvijaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā devāpir jātavedasam ।
pūjayitvā yathānyāyam agnaye tan nyavedayat ।।
{agnir uvāca 
yathartvijas tathā cāhaṃ devānāṃ paricārakaḥ ।
havyaṃ vahāmi devānāṃ bhoktāro rakṣakāś ca te ।।
{devāpir uvāca 
devān āhūya yatnena havirbhāgān pṛthak pṛthak ।
dāsye aham eṣa doṣo me tasmād yāhi surān prati ।।
{brahmovāca 
devāpiḥ sa surān prāpya natvā tebhyaḥ pṛthak pṛthak ।
ṛtvigvākyaṃ cāgnivākyaṃ śāpaṃ cāpi nyavedayat ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
āhūtā vaidikair mantrair ṛtvigbhiś ca yathākramam ।
bhokṣyāmahe havirbhāgān na svatantrā dvijottama ।।
tasmād vedānugā nityaṃ vayaṃ vedena coditāḥ ।
paratantrās tato vipra vedebhyas tan nivedaya ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa devāpiḥ śucir bhūtvā vedān āhūya yatnataḥ ।
dhyānena tapasā yukto vedāś cāpi puro abhavan ।।
vedān uvāca devāpir namasya tu punaḥ punaḥ ।
ṛtvigvākyaṃ cāgnivākyaṃ devavākyaṃ nyavedayat ।।
{vedā ūcuḥ 
paratantrā vayaṃ tāta īśvarasya vaśānugāḥ ।
aśeṣajagadādhāro nirādhāro nirañjanaḥ ।।
sarvaśaktyaikasadanaṃ nidhānaṃ sarvasaṃpadām ।
sa tu kartā mahādevaḥ saṃhartā sa maheśvaraḥ ।।
vayaṃ śabdamayā brahman vadāmo vidma eva ca ।
asmākam etat kṛtyaṃ syād vadāmo yat tu pṛcchasi ।।
kena nītās tasya nāma tatpuraṃ tadbalaṃ tathā ।
bhakṣitāḥ kiṃ tu no naṣṭā etaj jānīmahe vayam ।।
yathā ca tava sāmarthyaṃ yam ārādhya ca yatra ca ।
syād ity etac ca jānīmo yathā prāpsyasi tān puraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvāvadad vedān vicārya suciraṃ hṛdi ।।
{devāpir uvāca 
vedā vadantv etad eva sarvam eva yathārthataḥ ।
sarvān prāpsye talaṃ nītān alaṃ tebhyo namo astu vaḥ ।।
{vedā ūcuḥ 
gautamīṃ gaccha devāpe tatra stuhi maheśvaram ।
suprasannas tavābhīṣṭaṃ dāsyaty eva kṛpākaraḥ ।।
bhaved devaḥ śivaḥ prītaḥ stutaḥ satyaṃ mahāmate ।
ārṣṭiṣeṇaś ca nṛpatis tasya jāyā jayā satī ।।
pitā tavāpy upamanyus tale tiṣṭhanty arogiṇaḥ ।
varadānān maheśasya mithuṃ hatvā ca rākṣasam ।
yaśaḥ prāpsyasi dharmaṃ ca etac chakyaṃ na cetarat ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad vedavacanād bālo devāpir gautamīṃ gataḥ ।
snātvā kṛtakṣaṇo vipras tuṣṭāva ca maheśvaram ।।
{devāpir uvāca 
bālo ahaṃ devadeveśa gurūṇāṃ tvaṃ gurur mama ।
na me śaktis tvatstavane tubhyaṃ śaṃbho namo astu te ।।
na tvāṃ jānanti nigamā na devā munayo na ca ।
na brahmā nāpi vaikuṇṭho yo asi so asi namo astu te ।।
ye anāthā ye ca kṛpaṇā ye daridrāś ca rogiṇaḥ ।
pāpātmāno ye ca loke tāṃs tvaṃ pāsi maheśvara ।।
tapasā niyamair mantraiḥ pūjitās tridivaukasaḥ ।
tvayā dattaṃ phalaṃ tebhyo dāsyanti jagatāṃ pate ।।
yācitāraś ca dātāras tebhyo yad yan manīṣitam ।
bhavatīti na citraṃ syāt tvaṃ viparyayakārakaḥ ।।
ye ajñānino ye ca pāpā ye magnā narakārṇave ।
śiveti vacanān nātha tān pāsi tvaṃ jagadguro ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ tu stuvatas tasya puraḥ prāha trilocanaḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
varaṃ brūhy atha devāpe alaṃ dainyena bālaka ।।
{devāpir uvāca 
rājānaṃ rājapatnīṃ ca pitaraṃ ca guruṃ mama ।
prāptum icche jagannātha nidhanaṃ ca ripor mama ।।
{brahmovāca 
devāpivacanaṃ śrutvā tathety āhākhileśvaraḥ ।
devāpeḥ sarvam abhavad ājñayā śaṃkarasya tat ।।
punar apy āha taṃ śaṃbhur devāpikaruṇākaraḥ ।
nandinaṃ preṣayām āsa śaṃbhuḥ śūlena nārada ।।
rasātalaṃ mithuṃ nandī hatvā cāsurapuṃgavān ।
tatpitrādīn samānīya tasmai tān sa nyavedayat ।।
hayamedhaś ca tatrāsīd ārṣṭiṣeṇasya dhīmataḥ ।
agniś ca ṛtvijo devā vedāś ca ṛṣayo abruvan ।।
{agnyādaya ūcuḥ 
yatra sākṣād abhūc chaṃbhur devāpe bhaktavatsalaḥ ।
devadevo jagannātho devatīrtham abhūc ca tat ।।
sarvapāpakṣayakaraṃ sarvasiddhipradaṃ nṛṇām ।
puṇyadaṃ tīrtham etat syāt tava kīrtiś ca śāśvatī ।।
{brahmovāca 
aśvamedhe nivṛtte tu surās tebhyo varān daduḥ ।
snātvā kṛtārthā gaṅgāyāṃ tatas te divam ākraman ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tatrāsaṃs tīrthāni daśa pañca ca ।
sahasrāṇi śatāny aṣṭāv ubhayor api tīrayoḥ ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca hy atīva phaladaṃ viduḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tapovanam iti khyātaṃ nandinīsaṃgamaṃ tathā ।
siddheśvaraṃ tatra tīrthaṃ gautamyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
śārdūlaṃ ceti vikhyātaṃ teṣāṃ vṛttam idaṃ śṛṇu ।
yasyākarṇanamātreṇa sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
agnir hotā purā tv āsīd devānāṃ havyavāhanaḥ ।
bhāryāṃ prāpto dakṣasutāṃ svāhānāmnīṃ surūpiṇīm ।।
sānapatyā purā cāsīt putrārthaṃ tapa āviśat ।
tapaś carantīṃ vipulaṃ toṣayantīṃ hutāśanam ।
sa bhartā hutabhuk prāha bhāryāṃ svāhām aninditām ।।
{agnir uvāca 
apatyāni bhaviṣyanti mā tapaḥ kuru śobhane ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā bhartṛvākyaṃ nivṛttā tapaso abhavat ।
strīṇām abhīṣṭadaṃ nānyad bhartṛvākyaṃ vinā kvacit ।।
tataḥ katipaye kāle tārakād bhaya āgate ।
anutpanne kārttikeye cirakālarahogate ।।
maheśvare bhavānyā ca trastā devāḥ samāgatāḥ ।
devānāṃ kāryasiddhyartham agniṃ procur divaukasaḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
deva gaccha mahābhāga śaṃbhuṃ trailokyapūjitam ।
tārakād bhayam utpannaṃ śaṃbhave tvaṃ nivedaya ।।
{agnir uvāca 
na gantavyaṃ tatra deśe daṃpatyoḥ sthitayo rahaḥ ।
sāmānyamātrato nyāyaḥ kiṃ punaḥ śūlapāṇini ।।
ekāntasthitayoḥ svairaṃ jalpator yaḥ sarāgayoḥ ।
daṃpatyoḥ śṛṇuyād vākyaṃ nirayāt tasya noddhṛtiḥ ।।
sa svāmy akhilalokānāṃ mahākālas triśūlavān ।
nirīkṣaṇīyaḥ kena syād bhavānyā rahasi sthitaḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
mahābhaye cānugate nyāyaḥ ko anv atra varṇyate ।
tārakād bhaya utpanne gaccha tvaṃ tārako bhavān ।।
mahābhayābdhau sādhūnāṃ yat parārthāya jīvitam ।
rūpeṇānyena vā gaccha vācaṃ vada yathā tathā ।।
viśrāvya devavacanaṃ śaṃbhum āgaccha satvaraḥ ।
tato dāsyāmahe pūjām ubhayor lokayoḥ kave ।।
{brahmovāca 
śuko bhūtvā jagāmāśu devavākyād dhutāśanaḥ ।
yatrāsīj jagatāṃ nātho ramamāṇas tadomayā ।।
sa bhītavad atha prāyāc chuko bhūtvā tadānalaḥ ।
nāśakad dvāradeśe tu praveṣṭuṃ havyavāhanaḥ ।।
tato gavākṣadeśe tu tasthau dhunvann adhomukhaḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā prahasañ śaṃbhur umāṃ prāha rahogataḥ ।।
{śaṃbhur uvāca 
paśya devi śukaṃ prāptaṃ devavākyād dhutāśanam ।।
{brahmovāca 
lajjitā cāvadad devam alaṃ deveti pārvatī ।
puraścarantaṃ deveśo hy agniṃ taṃ dvijarūpiṇam ।।
āhūya bahuśaś cāpi jñāto asy agne atra mā vada ।
vidārayasva svamukhaṃ gṛhāṇedaṃ nayasva tat ।।
ity uktvā tasya cāsye agne retaḥ sa prākṣipad bahu ।
retogarbhas tadā cāgnir gantuṃ naiva ca śaktavān ।।
suranadyās tatas tīraṃ śrānto agnir upatasthivān ।
kṛttikāsu ca tad retaḥ prakṣepāt kārttiko abhavat ।।
avaśiṣṭaṃ ca yat kiṃcid agner dehe ca śāṃbhavam ।
tad eva reto vahnis tu svabhāryāyāṃ dvidhākṣipat ।।
svāhāyāṃ priyabhūtāyāṃ putrārthinyāṃ viśeṣataḥ ।
purā sāśvāsitā tena saṃtatis te bhaviṣyati ।।
tad vahninātha saṃsmṛtya tat kṣiptaṃ śāṃbhavaṃ mahaḥ ।
tad agne retasas tasyāṃ jajñe mithunam uttamam ।।
suvarṇaś ca suvarṇā ca rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi ।
agneḥ prītikaraṃ nityaṃ lokānāṃ prītivardhanam ।।
agniḥ prītyā suvarṇāṃ tāṃ prādād dharmāya dhīmate ।
suvarṇasyātha putrasya saṃkalpām akarot priyām ।
evaṃ putrasya putryāś ca vivāham akarot kaviḥ ।।
anyonyaretovyatiṣaṅgadoṣād 
agner apatyam ubhayaṃ tathaiva 
putraḥ suvarṇo bahurūparūpī 
rūpāṇi kṛtvā surasattamānām 
indrasya vāyor dhanadasya bhāryāṃ 
jaleśvarasyāpi munīśvarāṇām 
bhāryās tu gacchaty aniśaṃ suvarṇo 
yasyāḥ priyaṃ yac ca vapuḥ sa kṛtvā 
yāti kvacic cāpi kaves tanūjas 
tadbhartṛrūpaṃ ca pativratāsu 
kṛtvāniśaṃ tābhir udārabhāvaḥ 
kurvan kṛtārthaṃ madanaṃ sa reme 
kṛtvā gatā kvāpi caivaṃ suvarṇā 
dharmasya bhāryāpi suvarṇanāmnī 
svāhāsutā svairiṇī sā babhūva 
yasyāpi yasyāpi manogatā yā 
bhāryāsvarūpā saiva bhūtvā suvarṇā 
reme patīn mānuṣān āsurāṃś ca 
devān ṛṣīn pitṛrūpāṃs tathānyān 
rūpaudāryasthairyagāmbhīryayuktān 
yābhipretā yasya devasya bhāryā 
tadrūpā sā ramate tena sārdham 
nānābhedaiḥ karaṇaiś cāpy anekair 
ākarṣantī tanmanaḥ kāmasiddhim 
evaṃ suvarṇasya nirīkṣya ceṣṭām 
agneḥ sūnoḥ putrikāyās tathāgneḥ 
sarve ca śepuḥ kupitās tadāgneḥ 
putraṃ ca putrīṃ ca surāsurās te 
{surāsurā ūcuḥ 
kṛtaṃ yad etad vyabhicārarūpaṃ 
yac chadmanā vartanaṃ pāparūpam 
tasmāt sutas te vyabhicāravāṃś ca 
sarvatra gāmī jāyatāṃ havyavāha 
tathā suvarṇāpi na caikaniṣṭhā 
bhūyād agne naikatṛptā bahūṃś ca 
nānājātīn ninditān dehabhājo 
bhajitrī syād eṣa doṣaś ca putryāḥ 
{brahmovāca 
ity etac chāpavacanaṃ śrutvāgnir atibhītavat ।
mām abhyetya tadovāca niṣkṛtiṃ vada putrayoḥ ।।
tadāham abravaṃ vahne gautamīṃ gaccha śaṃkaram ।
stutvā tatra mahābāho nivedaya jagatpateḥ ।।
māheśvareṇa vīryeṇa tava dehasthitena ca ।
evaṃvidhaṃ tv apatyaṃ te jātaṃ vahne tato bhavān ।।
nivedayasva devāya devānāṃ śāpam īdṛśam ।
svāpatyarakṣaṇāyāsau śaṃbhuḥ śreyaḥ kariṣyati ।।
stuhi devaṃ ca devīṃ ca bhaktyā prīto bhavec chivaḥ ।
tatas tv apatyaviṣaye priyān kāmān avāpsyasi ।।
tato madvacanād agnir gaṅgāṃ gatvā maheśvaram ।
tuṣṭāva niyato vākyaiḥ stutibhir vedasaṃmitaiḥ ।।
{agnir uvāca 
viśvasya jagato dhātā viśvamūrtir nirañjanaḥ ।
ādikartā svayaṃbhūś ca taṃ namāmi jagatpatim ।।
yo agnir bhūtvā saṃharati sraṣṭā vai jalarūpataḥ ।
sūryarūpeṇa yaḥ pāti taṃ namāmi ca tryambakam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prasanno bhagavān anantaḥ śaṃbhur avyayaḥ ।
vareṇa cchandayām āsa pāvakaṃ surapūjitam ।।
sa vinītaḥ śivaṃ prāha tava vīryaṃ mayi sthitam ।
tena jātaḥ suto ramyaḥ suvarṇo lokaviśrutaḥ ।।
tathā suvarṇā putrī ca tasmād eva jagatprabho ।
anyonyavīryasaṅgāc ca taddoṣād ubhayaṃ tv idam ।।
vyabhicārāt sadoṣaṃ ca apatyam abhavac chiva ।
śāpaṃ daduḥ surāḥ sarve tayoḥ śāntiṃ kuru prabho ।।
tadagnivacanāc chaṃbhuḥ provācedaṃ śubhodayam ।।
{śaṃbhur uvāca 
madvīryād abhavat tvattaḥ suvarṇo bhūrivikramaḥ ।
samagrā ṛddhayaḥ sarvāḥ suvarṇe asmin samāhitāḥ ।।
bhaviṣyanti na saṃdeho vahne śṛṇu vaco mama ।
trayāṇām api lokānāṃ pāvanaḥ sa bhaviṣyati ।।
sa eva cāmṛtaṃ loke sa eva suravallabhaḥ ।
sa eva bhuktimuktī ca sa eva makhadakṣiṇā ।।
sa eva rūpaṃ sarvasya gurūṇām apy asau guruḥ ।
vīryaṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ vidyād vīryaṃ matto yad uttamam ।।
viśeṣatas tvayi kṣiptaṃ tasya kā syād vicāraṇā ।
hīnaṃ tena vinā sarvaṃ saṃpūrṇās tena saṃpadaḥ ।।
jīvanto api mṛtāḥ sarve suvarṇena vinā narāḥ ।
nirguṇo api dhanī mānyaḥ saguṇo apy adhano nahi ।।
tasmān nātaḥ paraṃ kiṃcit suvarṇād dhi bhaviṣyati ।
tathā caiṣā suvarṇāpi syād utkṛṣṭāpi cañcalā ।।
anayā vīkṣitaṃ sarvaṃ nyūnaṃ pūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ।
tapasā japahomaiś ca yeyaṃ prāpyā jagattraye ।।
tasyāḥ prabhāvaṃ prāśastyam agne kiṃcic ca kīrtyate ।
sarvatra yā tu saṃtiṣṭhed āyātu vicariṣyati ।।
suvarṇā kamalā sākṣāt pavitrā ca bhaviṣyati ।
adya prabhṛty ātmajayos tathā svairaṃ viceṣṭatoḥ ।।
tathāpi caitayoḥ puṇyaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tataḥ śaṃbhuḥ sākṣāt tatrābhavac chivaḥ ।
liṅgarūpeṇa sarveṣāṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
varān prāpya sutābhyāṃ sa agnis tuṣṭo abhavat tataḥ ।
svabhartrā ca suvarṇā sā dharmeṇāgnisutā mudā ।।
vartayām āsa putro api vahneḥ saṃkalpayā mudā ।
etasminn antare svarṇām agner duhitaraṃ mune ।।
paribhūya ca dharmaṃ taṃ śārdūlo dānaveśvaraḥ ।
aharad bhāgyasaubhāgya- vilāsavasatiṃ chalāt ।।
nītā rasātalaṃ tena suvarṇā lokaviśrutā ।
jāmātāgneḥ sa dharmaś ca agniś caiva sa havyavāṭ ।।
viṣṇave lokanāthāya stutvā caiva punaḥ punaḥ ।
kāryavijñāpanaṃ cobhau cakratuḥ prabhaviṣṇave ।।
tataś cakreṇa ciccheda śārdūlasya śiro hariḥ ।
sānītā viṣṇunā devī suvarṇā lokasundarī ।।
maheśvarasutā caiva agneś caiva tathā priyā ।
maheśvarāya tāṃ viṣṇur darśayām āsa nārada ।।
prīto abhavan maheśo api sasvaje tāṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।
cakraṃ prakṣālitaṃ yatra śārdūlacchedi dīptimat ।।
cakratīrthaṃ tu vikhyātaṃ śārdūlaṃ ceti tad viduḥ ।
yatra nītā suvarṇā sā viṣṇunā śaṃkarāntikam ।।
tat tīrthaṃ śāṃkaraṃ jñeyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ siddham eva tu ।
yatrānandam anuprāpto hy agnir dharmaś ca śāśvataḥ ।।
ānandāśrūṇi nyapatan yatrāgner munisattama ।
ānandeti nadī jātā tathā vai nandinīti ca ।।
tasyāś ca saṃgamaḥ puṇyo gaṅgāyāṃ tatra vai śivaḥ ।
tatraiva saṃgame sākṣāt suvarṇādyāpi saṃsthitā ।।
dākṣāyaṇī saiva śivā āgneyī ceti viśrutā ।
ambikā jagadādhārā śivā kātyāyanīśvarī ।।
bhaktābhīṣṭapradā nityam alaṃkṛtyobhayaṃ taṭam ।
tapas tepe yatra cāgnis tat tīrthaṃ tu tapovanam ।।
evamādīni tīrthāni tīrayor ubhayor mune ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।।
uttare caiva pāre ca sahasrāṇi caturdaśa ।
dakṣiṇe ca tathā pāre sahasrāṇy atha ṣoḍaśa ।।
tatra tatra ca tīrthāni sābhijñānāni santi vai ।
nāmāni ca pṛthak santi saṃkṣepāt tan mayocyate ।।
etāni yaś ca śṛṇuyād yaś ca vā paṭhati smaret ।
sarveṣu tatra kāmyeṣu paripūrṇo bhaven naraḥ ।।
etad vṛttaṃ tu yo jñātvā tatra snānādikaṃ caret ।
lakṣmīvāñ jāyate nityaṃ dharmavāṃś ca viśeṣataḥ ।।
abjakāt paścime tīrthaṃ tac chārdūlam udāhṛtam ।
vārāṇasyāditīrthebhyaḥ sarvebhyo hy adhikaṃ bhavet ।।
tatra snātvā pitṝn devān vandate tarpayaty api ।
sarvapāpavinirmukto viṣṇuloke mahīyate ।।
tapovanāc ca śārdūlān madhye tīrthāny aśeṣataḥ ।
tasyaikaikasya māhātmyaṃ na kenāpy atra varṇyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
indratīrtham iti khyātaṃ tatraiva ca vṛṣākapam ।
phenāyāḥ saṃgamo yatra hanūmataṃ tathaiva ca ।।
abjakaṃ cāpi yat proktaṃ yatra devas trivikramaḥ ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca punarāvṛttidurlabham ।।
tatra vṛttāny athākhyāsye gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।
indreśvaraṃ cottare ca śṛṇu bhaktyā yatavrataḥ ।।
namucir balavān āsīd indraśatrur madotkaṭaḥ ।
tasyendreṇābhavad yuddhaṃ phenenendro aharac chiraḥ ।।
apāṃ ca namuceḥ śatros tatphenavajrarūpadhṛk ।
śiraś chittvā tac ca phenaṃ gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
nyapatad bhūmiṃ bhittvā tu rasātalam athāviśat ।
rasātalabhavaṃ gāṅgaṃ vāri yad viśvapāvanam ।।
vajrādiṣṭena mārgeṇa vyagamad bhūmimaṇḍalam ।
taj jalaṃ phenanāmnā tu nadī pheneti gadyate ।।
tasyās tu saṃgamaḥ puṇyo gaṅgayā lokaviśrutaḥ ।
sarvapāpakṣayakaro gaṅgāyamunayor iva ।।
hanūmadupamātā vai yatrāplavanamātrataḥ ।
mārjāratvād abhūn muktā viṣṇugaṅgāprasādataḥ ।।
mārjāraṃ ceti tat tīrthaṃ purā proktaṃ mayā tava ।
hanūmataṃ ca tat proktaṃ tatrākhyānaṃ puroditam ।।
vṛṣākapaṃ cābjakaṃ ca tatredaṃ prayataḥ śṛṇu ।
hiraṇya iti vikhyāto daityānāṃ pūrvajo balī ।।
tapas taptvā suraiḥ sarvair ajeyo abhūt sudāruṇaḥ ।
tasyāpi balavān putro devānāṃ durjayaḥ sadā ।।
mahāśanir iti khyātas tasya bhāryā parājitā ।
tenendrasyābhavad yuddhaṃ bahukālaṃ nirantaram ।।
mahāśanir mahāvīryaḥ satataṃ raṇamūrdhani ।
jitvā nāgena sahitaṃ śakraṃ pitre nyavedayat ।।
baddhvā hastisamāyuktaṃ svasāraṃ vīkṣya tāṃ tadā ।
vihāya krūratāṃ daityo hiraṇyāya nyavedayat ।।
mahāśanipitā daityaḥ pūrveṣāṃ pūrvavattaraḥ ।
śacīkāntaṃ tale sthāpya tasya rakṣām athākarot ।।
mahāśanir hariṃ jitvā jetuṃ varuṇam abhyagāt ।
varuṇo api mahābuddhiḥ prādāt kanyāṃ mahāśaneḥ ।।
udadhiṃ svālayaṃ prādād varuṇas tu mahāśaneḥ ।
tayoś ca sakhyam abhavad varuṇasya mahāśaneḥ ।।
vāruṇī cāpi yā kanyā sā priyābhūn mahāśaneḥ ।
vīryeṇa yaśasā cāpi śauryeṇa ca balena ca ।।
mahāśanir mahādaityas trailokye nopamīyate ।
nirindratvaṃ gate loke devāḥ sarve nyamantrayan ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
viṣṇur evendradātā syād daityahantā sa eva ca ।
mantradṛg vā sa eva syād indraṃ cānyaṃ kariṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ saṃmantrya te devā viṣṇor mantraṃ nyavedayan ।
mamāvadhyo mahādaityo mahāśanir iti bruvan ।।
prāyād vārīśvaraṃ viṣṇuḥ śvaśuraṃ varuṇaṃ tadā ।
keśavo varuṇaṃ gatvā prāhendrasya parābhavam ।।
tathā tvayaitat kartavyaṃ yathāyāti puraṃdaraḥ ।
tadviṣṇuvacanāc chīghraṃ yayau jalapatir mune ।।
sutāpatiṃ hiraṇyasutaṃ vikrāntaṃ taṃ mahāśanim ।
atisaṃmānitas tena jāmātrā varuṇaḥ prabhuḥ ।।
papracchāgamanaṃ daityo vinayāc chvaśuraṃ tadā ।
varuṇaḥ prāha taṃ daityaṃ yad āgamanakāraṇam ।।
{varuṇa uvāca 
indraṃ dehi mahābāho yas tvayā nirjitaḥ purā ।
baddhaṃ rasātalasthaṃ taṃ devānām adhipaṃ sakhe ।।
asmākaṃ sarvadā mānyaṃ dehi tvaṃ mama śatruhan ।
baddhvā vimokṣaṇaṃ śatror mahate yaśase satām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā kathaṃcit sa daityeśo varuṇāya tam ।
prādād indraṃ śacīkāntaṃ vāraṇena samanvitam ।।
sa daityamadhye ativirājamāno 
hariṃ tadovāca jaleśasaṃnidhau 
saṃpūjya caivātha mahopacārair 
mahāśanir maghavantaṃ babhāṣe 
{mahāśanir uvāca 
kena tvam indro adya kṛto asi kena 
vīryaṃ tavedṛg bahu bhāṣase ca 
tvaṃ saṃgare śatrubhir bādhyase ca 
tathāpi cendro bhavasīti citram 
athāpi baddhā puruṣeṇa kācit 
tasyāḥ patis tāṃ mocayatīti yuktam 
striyo asvatantrāḥ puruṣapradhānās 
tvaṃ vai pumān bhavitā śakra sādho 
baddho mayā saṃgare vāhanena 
kvāpy astraṃ te vajram uddāmaśakti 
cintāratnaṃ nandanaṃ yoṣitas tā 
yaśo balaṃ devarājopabhogyam 
sarvaṃ hi tvā kiṃ tu mukto jaleśād 
ākāṅkṣase jīvitaṃ dhik tavedam 
taj jīvanaṃ yat tu yaśonidhānaṃ 
sa eva mṛtyur yaśaso yad virodhi 
evaṃ jānañ śakra kathaṃ jaleśān 
muktiṃ prāpto naiva lajjāṃ bhajethāḥ 
triviṣṭapasthaḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ san 
sarvaiḥ suraiḥ kāntayā vījyamānaḥ 
saṃstūyamānaś ca tathāpsarobhir 
nūnaṃ lajjā te bibhetīti manye 
tvaṃ vṛtrahā namuceś cāpi hantā 
purāṃ bhettā gotrabhid vajrabāhuḥ 
evaṃ surās tvāṃ paripūjayantīty 
ato jiṣṇo sarvam etat tyajasva 
vikāram āpyāpy ahitodbhavaṃ ye 
jīvanti lokān anusaṃviśanti 
bhavādṛśāṃ duścyavanābjajanmā 
kathaṃ na hṛdbhedam avāpa kartā 
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tu daityeśo varuṇāya mahātmane ।
prādād indraṃ punaś cedaṃ vacanaṃ tad abhāṣata ।।
{mahāśanir uvāca 
adya prabhṛty asau śiṣya indraḥ syād varuṇo guruḥ ।
śvaśuro mama yena tvaṃ muktim āpto asi vāsava ।।
tathā tvaṃ bhṛtyabhāvena vartethā varuṇaṃ prati ।
no ced baddhvā punas tvāṃ vai kṣepsye caiva rasātalam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ nirbhartsya taṃ śakraṃ hasaṃś cāpi punaḥ punaḥ ।
abravīd gaccha gaccheti varuṇaṃ cānumanya tu ।।
sa tu prāptaḥ svanilayaṃ lajjayā kaluṣīkṛtaḥ ।
paulomyāṃ prāha tat sarvaṃ yat tac chatruparābhavam ।।
{indra uvāca 
evam uktaḥ kṛtaś caiva śatruṇāhaṃ varānane ।
nirvāpayāmi yena svam ātmānaṃ subhage vada ।।
{indrāṇy uvāca 
dānavānām athodbhūtiṃ śakra māyāṃ parābhavam ।
varadānaṃ tathā mṛtyuṃ jāne ahaṃ balasūdana ।।
tasmād yasmāt tasya mṛtyur athavāpi parābhavaḥ ।
jāyeta śṛṇu tat sarvaṃ vakṣye ahaṃ prītaye tava ।।
hiraṇyasya suto vīraḥ pitṛvyasya suto balī ।
tasmān mama syāt sa bhrātā varadānāc ca darpitaḥ ।।
brahmāṇaṃ toṣayām āsa tapasā niyamena ca ।
īdṛśaṃ balam āpannaṃ tapasā kiṃ na sidhyati ।।
tasmāt tvayā cittarāgo vismayo vā kathaṃcana ।
na kāryaḥ śṛṇu tatredaṃ kāryaṃ yat tu kramāgatam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tu paulomī prāhendraṃ vinayānvitā ।।
{indrāṇy uvāca 
nāsādhyam asti tapaso nāsādhyaṃ yajñakarmaṇaḥ ।
nāsādhyaṃ lokanāthasya viṣṇor bhaktyā harasya ca ।।
punaś cedaṃ mayā kānta śrutam asty atiśobhanam ।
strīṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ jānanti striya eva surādhipa ।।
tasmād bhūmes tathā cāpāṃ nāsādhyaṃ vidyate prabho ।
tapo vā yajñakarmādi tābhyām eva yato bhavet ।।
tatrāpi tīrthabhūtā tu yā bhūmis tāṃ vrajed bhavān ।
tatra viṣṇuṃ śivaṃ pūjya sarvān kāmān avāpsyasi ।।
śrutam asti punaś cedaṃ striyo yāś ca pativratāḥ ।
tā eva sarvaṃ jānanti dhṛtaṃ tābhiś carācaram ।।
pṛthivyāṃ sārabhūtaṃ syāt tanmadhye daṇḍakaṃ vanam ।
tatra gaṅgā jagaddhātrī tatreśaṃ pūjaya prabho ।।
viṣṇuṃ vā jagatām īśaṃ dīnārtārtiharaṃ vibhum ।
anāthānām iha nṛṇāṃ majjatāṃ duḥkhasāgare ।।
haro harir vā gaṅgā vā kvāpy anyac charaṇaṃ nahi ।
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena toṣayaitān samāhitaḥ ।।
bhaktyā stotraiś ca tapasā kuru caiva mayā saha ।
tataḥ prāpsyasi kalyāṇam īśaviṣṇuprasādajam ।।
ajñātvaikaguṇaṃ karma phalaṃ dāsyati karmiṇaḥ ।
jñātvā śataguṇaṃ tat syād bhāryayā ca tad akṣayam ।।
puṃsaḥ sarveṣu kāryeṣu bhāryaiveha sahāyinī ।
svalpānām api kāryāṇāṃ nahi siddhis tayā vinā ।।
ekena yat kṛtaṃ karma tasmād ardhaphalaṃ bhavet ।
jāyayā tu kṛtaṃ nātha puṣkalaṃ puruṣo labhet ।।
tasmād etat suviditam ardho jāyā iti śruteḥ ।
śrūyate daṇḍakāraṇye saricchreṣṭhāsti gautamī ।।
aśeṣāghapraśamanī sarvābhīṣṭapradāyinī ।
tasmād gaccha mayā tatra kuru puṇyaṃ mahāphalam ।।
tataḥ śatrūn nihatyājau mahat sukham avāpsyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā sa guruṇā bhāryayā ca śatakratuḥ ।
yayau gaṅgāṃ jagaddhātrīṃ gautamīṃ ceti viśrutām ।।
daṇḍakāraṇyamadhyasthāṃ yayau sa prītimān hariḥ ।
tapaḥ kartuṃ manaś cakre devadevāya śaṃbhave ।।
gaṅgāṃ natvā tu prathamaṃ snātvā ca sa kṛtāñjaliḥ ।
śivaikaśaraṇo bhūtvā stotraṃ cedaṃ tato abravīt ।।
{indra uvāca 
svamāyayā yo hy akhilaṃ carācaraṃ 
sṛjaty avaty atti na sajjate asmin 
ekaḥ svatantro advayacit sukhātmakaḥ 
sa naḥ prasanno astu pinākapāṇiḥ 
na yasya tattvaṃ sanakādayo api 
jānanti vedāntarahasyavijñāḥ 
sa pārvatīśaḥ sakalābhilāṣa 
dātā prasanno astu mamāndhakāriḥ 
sṛṣṭvā svayaṃbhūr bhagavān viriñciṃ 
bhayaṃkaraṃ cāsya śiro anvapaśyat 
chittvā nakhāgrair nakhasaktam etac 
cikṣepa tasmād abhavat trivargaḥ 
pāpaṃ daridraṃ tv atha lobhayācñe 
moho vipac ceti tato apy anantam 
jātaprabhāvaṃ bhavaduḥkharūpaṃ 
babhūva tair vyāptam idaṃ samastam 
avekṣya sarvaṃ cakitaḥ sureśo 
devīm avocaj jagad astam eti 
tvaṃ pāhi lokeśvari lokamātar 
ume śaraṇye subhage subhadre 
jagatpratiṣṭhe varade jaya tvaṃ 
bhuktiḥ samādhiḥ paramā ca muktiḥ 
svāhā svadhā svastir anādisiddhir 
gīr buddhir āsīr ajarāmare tvam 
vidyādirūpeṇa jagattraye tvaṃ 
rakṣāṃ karoṣy eva madājñayā ca 
tvayaiva sṛṣṭaṃ bhuvanatrayaṃ syād 
yataḥ prakṛtyaiva tathaiva citram 
ity evam uktā dayitā hareṇa 
saṃśleṣasaṃlāpaparā babhūva 
śrāntā bhavasyārdhatanau sulagnā 
cikṣepa ca svedajalaṃ karāgraiḥ 
tasmād babhūva prathamaṃ sa dharmo 
lakṣmīr atho dānam atho suvṛṣṭiḥ 
sattvaṃ susaṃpannadharaṃ sarāṃsi 
dhānyāni puṣpāṇi phalāni caiva 
saubhāgyavastūni vapuḥ suveṣaḥ 
śṛṅgārabhājīni mahauṣadhāni 
nṛtyāni gītāny amṛtaṃ purāṇaṃ 
śrutismṛtī nītir athānnapāne 
śastrāṇi śāstrāṇi gṛhopayogyāny 
astrāṇi tīrthāni ca kānanāni 
iṣṭāni pūrtāni ca maṅgalāni 
yānāni śubhrābharaṇāsanāni 
bhavāṅgasaṃsargasusaṃprahāsa 
susvedasaṃlāparahaḥprakāraiḥ 
tathaiva jātaṃ sacarācaraṃ ca 
apāpakaṃ devi tataś ca jātam 
sukhaṃ prabhūtaṃ ca śubhaṃ ca nityaṃ 
virāji caitat tava devi bhāvāt 
tasmāt tu māṃ rakṣa jagajjanitri 
bhītaṃ bhayebhyo jagatāṃ pradhāne 
eke tarkair vimuhyanti līyante tatra cāpare ।
śivaśaktyos tadādvaitaṃ sundaraṃ naumi vigraham ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ tu stuvatas tasya purastād abhavac chivaḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
kim abhīṣṭaṃ varayase hare vada parāyaṇam ।।
{indra uvāca 
balavān me ripuś cāsīd darśanaiś ca śanir yathā ।
tena baddhas talaṃ nītaḥ paribhūtas tv anekadhā ।।
vāksāyakais tathā viddhas tadvadhāya tv iyaṃ kṛtiḥ ।
tadarthaṃ jagatām īśa yena jeṣye ripuṃ prabho ।।
tad eva dehi vīryaṃ me yac cānyad ripunāśanam ।
jātaḥ parābhavo yasmāt tadvināśe kṛte sati ।
punarjātam ahaṃ manye varaṃ kīrtir jayaśriyoḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa śivaḥ śakram āhedaṃ na mayaikena te ripuḥ ।
vadham āpnoti tasmāt tvaṃ viṣṇum apy avyayaṃ harim ।।
ārādhayasva paulomyā saha devaṃ janārdanam ।
lokatrayaikaśaraṇaṃ nārāyaṇam ananyadhīḥ ।।
tataḥ prāpsyasi tasmāc ca mattaś cāpi priyaṃ hare ।
punaś covāca bhagavān ādikartā maheśvaraḥ ।।
mantrābhyāsas tapo vāpi yogābhyasanam eva ca ।
saṃgame yatra kutrāpi siddhidaṃ munayo viduḥ ।।
kiṃ punaḥ saṃgame vipra gautamīsindhuphenayoḥ ।
girīṇāṃ gahvare yad vā saritām atha saṃgame ।।
vipro dhiyaiva bhavati mukundāṅghriniviṣṭayā ।
gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe tīra āpastambo munīśvaraḥ ।।
āste tasyāpy ahaṃ toṣam agamaṃ balasūdana ।
tena tvaṃ bhāryayā caiva toṣayasva gadādharam ।।
{brahmovāca 
āpastambena sahito gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।
tuṣṭāva devaṃ prayataḥ snātvā puṇye atha saṃgame ।।
phenāyāś caiva gaṅgāyās tatra devaṃ janārdanam ।
vaidikair vividhair mantrais tapasātoṣayat tadā ।।
tatas tuṣṭo abhavad viṣṇuḥ kiṃ deyaṃ cety abhāṣata ।
dehi me śatruhantāram ity āha bhagavān hariḥ ।।
dattam ity eva jānīhi tam uvāca janārdanaḥ ।
tatrābhavac chivasyaiva gaṅgāviṣṇvoḥ prasādataḥ ।।
ambhasā puruṣo jātaḥ śivaviṣṇusvarūpadhṛk ।
cakrapāṇiḥ śūladharaḥ sa gatvā tu rasātalam ।।
nijaghāna tadā daityam indraśatruṃ mahāśanim ।
sakhābhavat sa cendrasya abjakaḥ sa vṛṣākapiḥ ।।
divistho api sadā cendras tam anveti vṛṣākapim ।
kupitā praṇayenābhūd anyāsaktaṃ vilokya tam ।
śacīṃ tāṃ sāntvayann āha śatamanyur hasann idam ।।
{indra uvāca 
nāham indrāṇi śaraṇam ṛte sakhyur vṛṣākapeḥ ।
vāri vāpi havir yasya agneḥ priyakaraṃ sadā ।।
nāham anyatra gantāsmi priye cāṅgena te śape ।
tasmān nārhasi māṃ vaktuṃ śaṅkayānyatra bhāmini ।।
pativratā priyā me tvaṃ dharme mantre sahāyinī ।
sāpatyā ca kulīnā ca tvatto anyā kā priyā mama ।।
tasmāt tavopadeśena gaṅgāṃ prāpya mahānadīm ।
prasādād devadevasya viṣṇor vai cakrapāṇinaḥ ।।
tathā śivasya devasya prasādāc ca vṛṣākapeḥ ।
jalodbhavāc ca me mitrād abjakāl lokaviśrutāt ।।
uttīrṇaduḥkhaḥ subhage ita indro aham acyutaḥ ।
kiṃ na sādhyaṃ yatra bhāryā bhartṛcittānugāminī ।।
duṣkarā tatra no muktiḥ kiṃtv arthāditrayaṃ śubhe ।
jāyaiva paramaṃ mitraṃ lokadvayahitaiṣiṇī ।।
sā cet kulīnā priyabhāṣiṇī ca 
pativratā rūpavatī guṇāḍhyā 
saṃpatsu cāpatsu samānarūpā 
tayā hy asādhyaṃ kim iha trilokyām 
tasmāt tava dhiyā kānte mamedaṃ śubham āgatam ।
itas tavoditaṃ caiva kartavyaṃ nānyad asti me ।।
paraloke ca dharme ca satputrasadṛśaṃ na ca ।
ārtasya puruṣasyeha bhāryāvad bheṣajaṃ nahi ।।
niḥśreyasapadaprāptyai tathā pāpasya muktaye ।
gaṅgayā sadṛśaṃ nāsti śṛṇu cānyad varānane ।।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ prāptaye pāpamuktaye ।
śivaviṣṇvor ananyatva- jñānān nāsty atra muktaye ।।
tasmāt tava dhiyā sādhvi sarvam etan manogatam ।
avāptaṃ ca śivād viṣṇor gaṅgāyāś ca prasādataḥ ।।
indratvaṃ me sthiraṃ ceto manye mitrabalāt punaḥ ।
vṛṣākapir mama sakhā yo jātas tv apsu bhāmini ।।
tvaṃ ca priyasakhī nityaṃ nānyat priyataraṃ mama ।
tīrthānāṃ gautamī gaṅgā devānāṃ hariśaṃkarau ।।
tasmād ebhyaḥ prasādena sarvaṃ cepsitam āptavān ।
mama prītikaraṃ cedaṃ tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।।
tasmād etad dhi yāciṣye devān sarvān anukramāt ।
anumanyantu ṛṣayo gaṅgā ca hariśaṃkarau ।।
indreśvare cābjake ca ubhayos tīrayoḥ surāḥ ।
ekatra śaṃkaro devo hy aparatra janārdanaḥ ।।
pāvayan daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ sākṣād viṣṇus trivikramaḥ ।
antare yāni tīrthāni sarvapuṇyapradāni ca ।।
atra tu snānamātreṇa sarve te muktim āpnuyuḥ ।
pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāpato muktim āpnuyur ye ca dharmiṇaḥ ।।
teṣāṃ tu paramā muktiḥ pitṛbhiḥ pañcapañcabhiḥ ।
atra kiṃcic ca ye dadyur arthibhyas tilamātrakam ।।
dātṛbhyo hy akṣayaṃ tat syāt kāmadaṃ mokṣadaṃ tathā ।
dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ puṇyavardhanam ।।
ākhyānaṃ viṣṇuśaṃbhvoś ca jñātvā snānāc ca muktidam ।
asya tīrthasya māhātmyaṃ ye śṛṇvanti paṭhanti ca ।।
puṇyabhājo bhaveyus te tebhyo atraiva smṛtir bhavet ।
śivaviṣṇvor aśeṣāgha- saṃghavicchedakāriṇī ।
yāṃ prārthayanti munayo vijitendriyamānasāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhaviṣyaty evam eveti taṃ devā ṛṣayo abruvan ।
gautamyā uttare pāre tīrthānāṃ mokṣadāyinām ।।
devarṣisiddhasevyānāṃ sahasrāṇy atha sapta vai ।
tathaiva dakṣiṇe tīre tīrthāny ekādaśaiva tu ।।
abjakaṃ hṛdayaṃ proktaṃ godāvaryā munīśvaraiḥ ।
viśrāmasthānam īśasya viṣṇor brahmaṇa eva ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
āpastambam iti khyātaṃ tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।
smaraṇād apy aśeṣāgha- saṃghavidhvaṃsanakṣamam ।।
āpastambo mahāprājño munir āsīn mahāyaśāḥ ।
tasya bhāryākṣasūtreti patidharmaparāyaṇā ।।
tasya putro mahāprājñaḥ karkināmātha tattvavit ।
tasyāśramam anuprāpto hy agastyo munisattamaḥ ।।
tam agastyaṃ pūjayitvā āpastambo munīśvaraḥ ।
śiṣyair anugato dhīmāṃs taṃ praṣṭum upacakrame ।।
{āpastamba uvāca 
trayāṇāṃ ko nu pūjyaḥ syād devānāṃ munisattama ।
bhuktir muktiś ca kasmād vā syād anādiś ca ko bhavet ।।
anantaś cāpi ko vipra devānām api daivatam ।
yajñaiḥ ka ijyate devaḥ ko vedeṣv anugīyate ।
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ chettuṃ vadāgastya mahāmune ।।
{agastya uvāca 
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ pramāṇaṃ śabda ucyate ।
tatrāpi vaidikaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇaṃ paramaṃ mataḥ ।।
vedena gīyate yas tu puruṣaḥ sa parāt paraḥ ।
mṛto aparaḥ sa vijñeyo hy amṛtaḥ para ucyate ।।
yo amūrtaḥ sa paro jñeyo hy aparo mūrta ucyate ।
guṇābhivyāptibhedena mūrto asau trividho bhavet ।।
brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivaś ceti eka eva tridhocyate ।
trayāṇām api devānāṃ vedyam ekaṃ paraṃ hi tat ।।
ekasya bahudhā vyāptir guṇakarmavibhedataḥ ।
lokānām upakārārtham ākṛtitritayaṃ bhavet ।।
yas tattvaṃ vetti paramaṃ sa ca vidvān na cetaraḥ ।
tatra yo bhedam ācaṣṭe liṅgabhedī sa ucyate ।।
prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāsti yaś caiṣāṃ vyāhared bhidam ।
trayāṇām api devānāṃ mūrtibhedaḥ pṛthak pṛthak ।।
vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ sarvatra sākāreṣu pṛthak pṛthak ।
nirākāraṃ ca yat tv ekaṃ tat tebhyaḥ paramaṃ matam ।।
{āpastamba uvāca 
nānena nirṇayaḥ kaścin mayātra vidito bhavet ।
tatrāpy atra rahasyaṃ yat tad vimṛśyāśu kīrtyatām ।
niḥsaṃśayaṃ nirvikalpaṃ bhājanaṃ sarvasaṃpadām ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad ākarṇya bhagavān agastyo vākyam abravīt ।।
{agastya uvāca 
yadyapy eṣāṃ na bhedo asti devānāṃ tu parasparam ।
tathāpi sarvasiddhiḥ syāc chivād eva sukhātmanaḥ ।।
prapañcasya nimittaṃ yat taj jyotiś ca paraṃ śivaḥ ।
tam eva sādhaya haraṃ bhaktyā paramayā mune ।
gautamyāṃ sakalāghaugha- saṃhartā daṇḍake vane ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā muner vākyaṃ parāṃ prītim upāgataḥ ।
bhuktido muktidaḥ puṃsāṃ sākāro atha nirākṛtiḥ ।।
sṛṣṭyākāras tataḥ śaktaḥ pālanākāra eva ca ।
dātā ca hanti sarvaṃ yo yasmād etat samāpyate ।।
{agastya uvāca 
brahmākṛtiḥ kartṛrūpā vaiṣṇavī pālanī tathā ।
rudrākṛtir nihantrī sā sarvavedeṣu paṭhyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
āpastambas tadā gaṅgāṃ gatvā snātvā yatavrataḥ ।
tuṣṭāva śaṃkaraṃ devaṃ stotreṇānena nārada ।।
{āpastamba uvāca 
kāṣṭheṣu vahniḥ kusumeṣu gandho 
bījeṣu vṛkṣādi dṛṣatsu hema 
bhūteṣu sarveṣu tathāsti yo vai 
taṃ somanāthaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
yo līlayā viśvam idaṃ cakāra 
dhātā vidhātā bhuvanatrayasya 
yo viśvarūpaḥ sadasatparo yaḥ 
someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
yaṃ smṛtya dāridryamahābhiśāpa 
rogādibhir na spṛśyate śarīrī 
yam āśritāś cepsitam āpnuvanti 
someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
yena trayīdharmam avekṣya pūrvaṃ 
brahmādayas tatra samīhitāś ca 
evaṃ dvidhā yena kṛtaṃ śarīraṃ 
someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
yasmai namo gacchati mantrapūtaṃ 
hutaṃ havir yā ca kṛtā ca pūjā 
dattaṃ havir yena surā bhajante 
someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
yasmāt paraṃ nānyad asti praśastaṃ 
yasmāt paraṃ naiva susūkṣmam anyat 
yasmāt paraṃ no mahatāṃ mahac ca 
someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
yasyājñayā viśvam idaṃ vicitram 
acintyarūpaṃ vividhaṃ mahac ca 
ekakriyaṃ yadvad anuprayāti 
someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
yasmin vibhūtiḥ sakalādhipatyaṃ 
kartṛtvadātṛtvamahattvam eva 
prītir yaśaḥ saukhyam anādidharmaḥ 
someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
nityaṃ śaraṇyaḥ sakalasya pūjyo 
nityaṃ priyo yaḥ śaraṇāgatasya 
nityaṃ śivo yaḥ sakalasya rūpaṃ 
someśvaraṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi 
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prasanno bhagavān āha nārada taṃ munim ।
ātmārthaṃ ca parārthaṃ ca āpastambo abravīc chivam ।।
sarvān kāmān āpnuyus te ye snātvā devam īśvaram ।
paśyeyur jagatām īśam astv ity āha śivo munim ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrtham āpastambam udāhṛtam ।
anādy avidyātimira- vrātanirmūlanakṣamam ।।
{brahmovāca 
yamatīrtham iti khyātaṃ pitṝṇāṃ prītivardhanam ।
aśeṣapāpaśamanaṃ tatra vṛttam idaṃ śṛṇu ।।
tatrākhyānam idaṃ tv āsīd itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
sarameti prasiddhāsti nāmnā devaśunī mune ।।
tasyāḥ putrau mahāśreṣṭhau śvānau nityaṃ janān anu ।
gāminau pavanāhārau caturakṣau yamapriyau ।।
gā rakṣati sma devānāṃ yajñārthaṃ kalpitān paśūn ।
rakṣantīm anujagmus te rākṣasā daityadānavāḥ ।।
rakṣantīṃ tāṃ mahāprājñāḥ śvānayor mātaraṃ śunīm ।
pralobhayitvā vividhair vākyair dānaiś ca yatnataḥ ।।
hṛtā gā rākṣasaiḥ pāpaiḥ paśvarthe kalpitāḥ śubhāḥ ।
tata āgatya sā devān idam āha kramāc chunī ।।
{saramovāca 
māṃ baddhvā rākṣasaiḥ pāśais tāḍayitvā prahārakaiḥ ।
nītā gā yajñasiddhyarthaṃ kalpitāḥ paśavaḥ surāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasyā vācaṃ niśamyāśu surān prāha bṛhaspatiḥ ।।
{bṛhaspatir uvāca 
iyaṃ vikṛtarūpāste asyāḥ pāpaṃ ca lakṣaye ।
asyā matena tā gāvo nītā nānyena hetunā ।
pāpeyaṃ sukṛtīveti lakṣyate dehaceṣṭitaiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad guror vacanāc chakraḥ padā tāṃ prāharac chunīm ।
padāghātāt tadā tasyā mukhāt kṣīraṃ prasusruve ।।
punaḥ prāha śacībhartā kṣīraṃ pītaṃ tvayā śuni ।
rākṣasaiś ca tadā dattaṃ tasmān nītās tu gā mama ।।
{saramovāca 
nāparādho asti me nātha na cānyasyāpi kasyacit ।
nāparādho na copekṣā mamāsti tridaśeśvara ।
tasmād ruṣṭo asi kiṃ nātha ripavo balinas tu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato dhyātvā devagurur jñātvā tasyā viceṣṭitam ।
satyaṃ śakra tv iyaṃ duṣṭā ripūṇāṃ pakṣakāriṇī ।।
tataḥ śaśāpa tāṃ śakraḥ pāpiṣṭhe tvaṃ śunī bhava ।
martyaloke pāpabhūtā ajñānāt pāpakāriṇī ।।
tadendrasya tu śāpena mānuṣe sā vyajāyata ।
yathā śaptā maghavatā pāpāt sā hy atibhīṣaṇā ।।
gāvo yā rākṣasair nītās tāsām ānayanāya ca ।
yatnaṃ kurvan surapatir viṣṇave tan nyavedayat ।।
viṣṇur daityāṃś ca danujān gohartṝṃś caiva rākṣasān ।
hantuṃ prayatnam akaroj jagṛhe ca mahad dhanuḥ ।।
śārṅgaṃ yal lokavikhyātaṃ daityanāśanam eva ca ।
jitāriḥ pūjito devaiḥ svayaṃ sthitvā janārdanaḥ ।।
yatra vai daṇḍakāraṇye śārṅgapāṇir jagatprabhuḥ ।
tatrasthān daityadanujān rākṣasāṃś ca balīyasaḥ ।।
punar jaghne sa vai viṣṇur gā yair nītāś ca rākṣasaiḥ ।
tatra vai daṇḍakāraṇye śārṅgapāṇir iti śrutaḥ ।।
yudhyamānas tato viṣṇur ditijai rākṣasaiḥ saha ।
te jagmur dakṣiṇām āśāṃ viṣṇos trāsān mahāmune ।।
anvagacchat tato viṣṇus tān eva parameśvaraḥ ।
garutmatā tān avāpya śārṅgamuktair manojavaiḥ ।।
bāṇais tān vyāhanad viṣṇur gaṅgāyā uttare taṭe ।
devārayaḥ kṣayaṃ nītā viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā ।।
śārṅgamuktair mahāvegaiḥ susvanaiś ca sumantritaiḥ ।
kṣayaṃ prāptā viṣṇubāṇais tatas te devaśatravaḥ ।।
gāvo labdhā yatra devair bāṇatīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।
vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaviditaṃ gotīrthaṃ ceti viśrutam ।।
paśvarthe kalpitā gāvo gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।
pradrutās te surāḥ sarve gaṅgāyāṃ saṃnyaveśayan ।।
tanmadhye kārayām āsur dvīpaṃ caivāśrayaṃ gavām ।
tair gobhis tatra gaṅgāyāṃ surayajño vyajāyata ।।
yajñatīrthaṃ tu tat proktaṃ godvīpaṃ gāṅgamadhyataḥ ।
devānāṃ yajanaṃ tac ca sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।।
svayaṃ mūrtimatī bhūtvā gaṅgāśaktir mahādyute ।
asārāpārasaṃsāra- sāgarottaraṇe tariḥ ।।
viśveśvarī yogamāyā sadbhaktābhayadāyinī ।
gorakṣaṃ tu tatas tīrthaṃ gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
tau śvānau saramāputrau caturakṣau yamapriyau ।
mātuḥ śāpaṃ cāparādhaṃ sarvaṃ cāpi savistaram ।।
nivedya tu yathānyāyaṃ kāryaṃ cāpi sukhapradam ।
viśāpakaraṇaṃ cāpi papracchatur ubhau yamam ।।
sa tābhyāṃ sahitaḥ sauriḥ pitre sūryāya cābravīt ।
śrutvā sūryaḥ sutaṃ prāha gaṅgāyāṃ surasattama ।।
lokatrayaikapāvanyāṃ gautamyāṃ daṇḍake vane ।
śraddhayā parayā vatsa susnātaḥ susamāhitaḥ ।।
brahmāṇaṃ caiva viṣṇuṃ ca mām īśaṃ ca yathākramam ।
stuhi tvaṃ sarvabhāvena bhṛtyau prītim avāpsyataḥ ।।
tat pitur vacanaṃ śrutvā yamaḥ prītamanās tadā ।
tayoś ca prītaye prāyād devatarpaṇayor yamaḥ ।।
gautamyām aghahāriṇyāṃ susamāhitamānasaḥ ।
tathaiva toṣayām āsa gaṅgāyāṃ surasattamān ।।
śvabhyāṃ ca sahitaḥ śrīmān dakṣiṇāśāpatiḥ prabhuḥ ।
brahmāṇaṃ toṣayām āsa bhānuṃ vai dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
īśānam uttare viṣṇuṃ svayaṃ dharmaḥ pratāpavān ।
dattavanto varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saramāyā viśāpakam ।
varān ayācata bahūṃl lokānām upakārakān ।।
{yama uvāca 
eṣu snānaṃ tu ye kuryur brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ ।
ātmārthaṃ ca parārthaṃ ca te kāmān āpnuyuḥ śubhān ।।
bāṇatīrthe tu ye snātvā śārṅgapāṇiṃ smaranti vai ।
tebhyo dāridryaduḥkhāni na bhaveyur yuge yuge ।।
gotīrthe brahmatīrthe vā yas tu snātvā yatavrataḥ ।
brahmāṇaṃ taṃ namasyātha dvīpasyāpi pradakṣiṇam ।।
yaḥ kuryāt tena pṛthivī saptadvīpā vasuṃdharā ।
pradakṣiṇīkṛtā tatra kiṃcid dattvā vasu dvijam ।।
tad devayajanaṃ prāpya kiṃcid dhutvā hutāśane ।
aśvamedhādiyajñānāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti puṣkalam ।।
yaḥ sakṛt tatra paṭhati gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram ।
adhītās tena vedā vai niṣkāmo muktibhājanam ।।
snātvā tu dakṣiṇe kūle śaktiṃ devīṃ tu bhaktitaḥ ।
pūjayitvā yathānyāyaṃ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt ।।
brahmaviṣṇumaheśānāṃ śaktir mātā trayīmayī ।
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti putravān dhanavān bhavet ।।
ādityaṃ bhaktito yas tu dakṣiṇe niyato naraḥ ।
snātvā paśyeta teneṣṭā yajñā vividhadakṣiṇāḥ ।।
kūle yaś cottare caiva gaṅgāyā daityasūdanam ।
snātvā paśyeta taṃ natvā tasya viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam ।।
yameśvaraṃ tato yas tu yamatīrthe tu pūjitam ।
snātaḥ paśyati yuktātmā sa karoty acireṇa hi ।।
pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ puṇyaṃ phaladaṃ kīrtivardhanam ।
tatra snānena dānena japena stavanena ca ।
api duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ pitaro mokṣam āpnuyuḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ityādy aṣṭa sahasrāṇi tīrthāni trīṇi nārada ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvam akṣayapuṇyadam ।।
eteṣāṃ smaraṇaṃ puṇyaṃ nānājanmāghanāśanam ।
śravaṇāt pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ paṭhanāt svakulaiḥ saha ।।
teṣām apy atipāpāni nāśaṃ yānti mamājñayā ।
tatra snānādi yaḥ kṛtvā kiṃcid dattvā yatātmavān ।।
pitṝṇāṃ piṇḍadānādi kṛtvā natvā surān imān ।
dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ yaśo vīryam āyur ārogyasaṃpadaḥ ।।
putrān pautrān priyāṃ bhāryāṃ labdhvā cānyan manīṣitam ।
aviyuktaḥ prītamanā bandhubhiś cātimānitaḥ ।।
narakasthān api pitṝṃs tārayitvā kulāni ca ।
pāvayitvā priyair yukto hy ante viṣṇuṃ śivaṃ smaret ।
tato muktipadaṃ gacched devānāṃ vacanaṃ yathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
yakṣiṇīsaṃgamaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ sarvaphalapradam ।
tatra snānena dānena sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt ।।
yatra yakṣeśvaro devo darśanād bhuktimuktidaḥ ।
tatra ca snānamātreṇa sattrayāgaphalaṃ labhet ।।
viśvāvasoḥ svasā nāmnā pippalā guruhāsinī ।
ṛṣīṇāṃ sattram agamad gautamītīravartinām ।।
dṛṣṭvā tatra ṛṣīn kṣāmān sā jahāsātigarvitā ।
yā gatvāśrāvaya vauṣaḍ astu śrauṣaḍ iti sthiram ।।
visvareṇa bruvatī tāṃ te śepuḥ srāviṇī bhava ।
tato nady abhavat tatra yakṣiṇīti suviśrutā ।।
tato viśvāvasuḥ pūjya ṛṣīn devaṃ trilocanam ।
saṃgamya caiva gautamyā tāṃ viśāpām athākarot ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ yakṣiṇīsaṃgamaṃ smṛtam ।
tatra snānādidānena sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt ।।
viśvāvasoḥ prasanno abhūd yatra śaṃbhuḥ śivānvitaḥ ।
śaivaṃ tat paramaṃ tīrthaṃ durgātīrthaṃ ca viśrutam ।।
sarvapāpaughaharaṇaṃ sarvadurgatināśanam ।
sarveṣāṃ tīrthamukhyānāṃ tad dhi sāraṃ mahāmune ।
tīrthaṃ munivaraiḥ khyātaṃ sarvasiddhipradaṃ nṛṇām ।।
{brahmovāca 
śuklatīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvasiddhikaraṃ nṛṇām ।
yasya smaraṇamātreṇa sarvakāmān avāpnuyāt ।।
bharadvāja iti khyāto muniḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।
tasya paiṭhīnasī nāma bhāryā sukalabhūṣaṇā ।।
gautamītīram adhyāste pativrataparāyaṇā ।
agnīṣomīyam aindrāgnaṃ puroḍāśam akalpayat ।।
puroḍāśe śrapyamāṇe dhūmāt kaścid ajāyata ।
puroḍāśaṃ bhakṣayitvā lokatritayabhīṣaṇaḥ ।।
yajñaṃ me hy atra ko haṃsi kopāt tvam iti taṃ muniḥ ।
provāca satvaraṃ kruddho bharadvājo dvijottamaḥ ।
tad ṛṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasaḥ pratyuvāca tam ।।
{rākṣasa uvāca 
havyaghna iti vikhyātaṃ bharadvāja nibodha mām ।
saṃdhyāsuto ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaś ca sutaḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ ।।
brahmaṇā me varo datto yajñān khāda yathāsukham ।
mamānujaḥ kaliś cāpi balavān atibhīṣaṇaḥ ।।
ahaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pitā kṛṣṇo mātā kṛṣṇā tathānujaḥ ।
ahaṃ makhaṃ haniṣyāmi yūpaṃ chedmi kṛtāntakaḥ ।।
{bharadvāja uvāca 
rakṣyatāṃ me tvayā yajñaḥ priyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
jāne tvāṃ yajñahantāraṃ saddvijaṃ rakṣa me kratum ।।
{yajñaghna uvāca 
bharadvāja nibodhedaṃ vākyaṃ mama samāsataḥ ।
brahmaṇāhaṃ purā śapto devadānavasaṃnidhau ।।
tataḥ prasādito devo mayā lokapitāmahaḥ ।
amṛtaiḥ prokṣayiṣyanti yadā tvāṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
tadā viśāpo bhavitā havyaghna tvaṃ na cānyathā ।
evaṃ kariṣyasi yadā tataḥ sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
bharadvājaḥ punaḥ prāha sakhā me asi mahāmate ।
makhasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ yena syān me vada karomi tat ।।
saṃbhūya devā daiteyā mamanthuḥ kṣīrasāgaram ।
alabhantāmṛtaṃ kaṣṭāt tad asmatsulabhaṃ katham ।।
prītyā yadi prasanno asi sulabhaṃ yad vadasva tat ।
tad ṛṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā rakṣaḥ prāha tadā mudā ।।
{rakṣa uvāca 
amṛtaṃ gautamīvāri amṛtaṃ svarṇam ucyate ।
amṛtaṃ gobhavaṃ cājyam amṛtaṃ soma eva ca ।।
etair mām abhiṣiñcasva athavaitais tathā tribhiḥ ।
gaṅgāyā vāriṇājyena hiraṇyena tathaiva ca ।
sarvebhyo apy adhikaṃ divyam amṛtaṃ gautamījalam ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad ākarṇya sa ṛṣiḥ paraṃ saṃtoṣam āgataḥ ।
pāṇāv ādāya gaṅgāyāḥ salilāmṛtam ādarāt ।।
tenākarod ṛṣī rakṣo hy abhiṣiktaṃ tadā makhe ।
punaś ca yūpe ca paśāv ṛtvikṣu makhamaṇḍale ।।
sarvam evābhavac chuklam abhiṣekān mahātmanaḥ ।
tad rakṣo api tadā śuklo bhūtvotpanno mahābalaḥ ।।
yaḥ purā kṛṣṇarūpo abhūt sa tu śuklo abhavat kṣaṇāt ।
yajñaṃ sarvaṃ samāpyātha bharadvājaḥ pratāpavān ।।
ṛtvijo api visṛjyātha yūpaṃ gaṅgodake akṣipat ।
gaṅgāmadhye tad dhi yūpam adyāpy āste mahāmate ।।
abhiṣiktaṃ cāmṛtena abhijñānaṃ tu tan mahat ।
tatra tīrthe punā rakṣo bharadvājam uvāca ha ।।
{rakṣa uvāca 
ahaṃ yāmi bharadvāja kṛtaḥ śuklas tvayā punaḥ ।
tasmāt tavātra tīrthe ye snānadānādipūjanam ।।
kuryus teṣām abhīṣṭāni bhaveyur yat phalaṃ makhe ।
smaraṇād api pāpāni nāśaṃ yāntu sadā mune ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ śuklatīrtham iti smṛtam ।
gautamyāṃ daṇḍakāraṇye svargadvāram apāvṛtam ।।
ubhayos tīrayoḥ sapta sahasrāṇy aparāṇi ca ।
tīrthānāṃ muniśārdūla sarvasiddhipradāyinām ।।
{brahmovāca 
cakratīrtham iti khyātaṃ smaraṇāt pāpanāśanam ।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu yatnena nārada ।।
ṛṣayaḥ sapta vikhyātā vasiṣṭhapramukhā mune ।
gautamyās tīram āśritya sattrayajñam upāsate ।।
tatra vighna upakrānte rakṣobhir atibhīṣaṇe ।
mām abhyetyātha munayo rakṣaḥkṛtyaṃ nyavedayan ।।
tadāhaṃ pramadārūpaṃ māyayāsṛjya nārada ।
yasyāś ca darśanād eva nāśaṃ yānty atha rākṣasāḥ ।।
evam uktvā tu tāṃ prādām ṛṣibhyaḥ pramadāṃ mune ।
madvākyād ṛṣayo māyām ādāya punar āgaman ।।
ajaikā yā samākhyātā kṛṣṇalohitarūpiṇī ।
muktakeśīty abhidhayā sāste adyāpi svarūpiṇī ।।
lokatritayasaṃmoha- dāyinī kāmarūpiṇī ।
tadbalāt svasthamanasaḥ sarve ca munipuṃgavaḥ ।।
gautamīṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ punar yajñāya dīkṣitāḥ ।
punas tanmakhanāśāya rākṣasāḥ samupāgaman ।।
yakṣavāṭāntike māyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasapuṃgavāḥ ।
tato nṛtyanti gāyanti hasanti ca rudanti ca ।।
māheśvarī mahāmāyā prabhāveṇātidarpitā ।
teṣāṃ madhye daityapatiḥ śambaro nāma vīryavān ।।
māyārūpāṃ tu pramadāṃ bhakṣayām āsa nārada ।
tad adbhutam atīvāsīt tanmāyābaladarśinām ।।
makhe vidhvaṃsyamāne tu te viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ ।
prādād viṣṇuś cakram atho munīnāṃ rakṣaṇāya tu ।।
cakraṃ tad rākṣasān ājau daityāṃś ca danujāṃs tathā ।
ciccheda tadbhayād eva mṛtā rākṣasapuṃgavāḥ ।।
ṛṣibhis tan mahāsattraṃ saṃpūrṇam abhavat tadā ।
viṣṇoḥ prakṣālitaṃ cakraṃ gaṅgāmbhobhiḥ sudarśanam ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ cakratīrtham udāhṛtam ।
tatra snānena dānena sattrayāgaphalaṃ labhet ।।
tatra pañca śatāny āsaṃs tīrthānāṃ pāpahāriṇām ।
teṣu snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ pratyekaṃ muktidāyakam ।।
{brahmovāca 
vāṇīsaṃgamam ākhyātaṃ yatra vāgīśvaro haraḥ ।
tat tīrthaṃ sarvapāpānāṃ mocanaṃ sarvakāmadam ।।
tatra snānena dānena brahmahatyādināśanam ।
brahmaviṣṇvoś ca saṃvāde mahattve ca parasparam ।।
tayor madhye mahādevo jyotirmūrtir abhūt kila ।
tatraiva vāg uvācedaṃ daivī putra tayoḥ śubhā ।।
aham asmi mahāṃs tatra aham asmīti vai mithaḥ ।
daivī vāk tāv ubhau prāha yas tv asyāntaṃ tu paśyati ।।
sa tu jyeṣṭho bhavet tasmān mā vādaṃ kartum arhathaḥ ।
tadvākyād viṣṇur agamad adho ahaṃ cordhvam eva ca ।।
tato viṣṇuḥ śīghram etya jyotiḥpārśva upāviśat ।
aprāpyāntam ahaṃ prāyāṃ dūrād dūrataraṃ mune ।।
tataḥ śrānto nivṛtto ahaṃ draṣṭum īśaṃ tu taṃ prabhum ।
tadaivaṃ mama dhīr āsīd dṛṣṭaś cānto mayā bhṛśam ।।
asya devasya tad viṣṇor mama jyaiṣṭhyaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavet ।
punaś cāpi mama tv evaṃ matir āsīn mahāmate ।।
satyair vaktraiḥ kathaṃ vakṣye pīḍito apy anṛtaṃ vacaḥ ।
nānāvidheṣu pāpeṣu nānṛtāt pātakaṃ param ।।
satyair vaktrair asatyāṃ vā vācaṃ vakṣye kathaṃ tv iti ।
tato ahaṃ pañcamaṃ vaktraṃ gardabhākṛtibhīṣaṇam ।।
kṛtvā tenānṛtaṃ vakṣya iti dhyātvā ciraṃ tadā ।
abravaṃ taṃ hariṃ tatra āsīnaṃ jagatāṃ prabhum ।।
asya cānto mayā dṛṣṭas tena jyaiṣṭhyaṃ janārdana ।
mameti vadataḥ pārśve ubhau tau hariśaṃkarau ।।
ekarūpatvam āpannau sūryācandramasāv iva ।
tau dṛṣṭvā vismito bhītaś cāstavaṃ tāv ubhāv api ।
tataḥ kruddhau jagannāthau vācaṃ tām idam ūcatuḥ ।।
{hariharāv ūcatuḥ 
duṣṭe tvaṃ nimnagā bhūyā nānṛtād asti pātakam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ sā vihvalā bhūtvā nadībhāvam upāgatā ।
tad dṛṣṭvā vismito bhītas tām abravam ahaṃ tadā ।।
yasmād asatyam uktāsi brahmavāci sthitā satī ।
tasmād adṛśyā tvaṃ bhūyāḥ pāparūpāsy asaṃśayam ।।
etac chāpaṃ viditvā tu tau devau praṇatā tadā ।
viśāpatvaṃ prārthayantī tuṣṭāva ca punaḥ punaḥ ।।
tatas tuṣṭau devadevau prārthitau tridaśārcitau ।
prītyā hariharāv evaṃ vācaṃ vācam athocatuḥ ।।
{hariharāv ūcatuḥ 
gaṅgayā saṃgatā bhadre yadā tvaṃ lokapāvanī ।
tadā punar vapus te syāt pavitraṃ hi suśobhane ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā sāpi devī gaṅgayā saṃgatābhavat ।
bhāgīrathī gautamī ca tataś cāpi svakaṃ vapuḥ ।।
devī sā vyagamad brahman devānām api durlabham ।
gautamyāṃ saiva vikhyātā nāmnā vāṇīti puṇyadā ।।
bhāgīrathyāṃ saiva devī sarasvaty abhidhīyate ।
ubhayatrāpi vikhyātaḥ saṃgamo lokapūjitaḥ ।।
sarasvatīsaṃgamaś ca vāṇīsaṃgama eva ca ।
gautamyā saṃgatā devī vāṇī vācā sarasvatī ।।
sarvatra pūjitaṃ tīrthaṃ tatra vācā śivaṃ prabhum ।
deveśvaraṃ pūjayitvā viśāpam agamad yataḥ ।।
brahmā vidhūya vāgdauṣṭyaṃ svaṃ ca dhāmāgamat punaḥ ।
tasmāt tatra śucir bhūtvā snātvā tatra ca saṃgame ।।
vāgīśvaraṃ tato dṛṣṭvā tāvatā muktim āpnuyāt ।
dānahomādikaṃ kiṃcid upavāsādikāṃ kriyām ।।
yaḥ kuryāt saṃgame puṇye saṃsāre na bhavet punaḥ ।
ekonaviṃśatiśataṃ tīrthānāṃ tīrayor dvayoḥ ।
nānājanmārjitāśeṣa- pāpakṣayavidhāyinām ।।
{brahmovāca 
viṣṇutīrtham iti khyātaṃ tatra vṛttam idaṃ śṛṇu ।
maudgalya iti vikhyāto mudgalasya suto ṛṣiḥ ।।
tasya bhāryā tu jābālā nāmnā khyātā suputriṇī ।
pitā ṛṣis tathā vṛddho mudgalo lokaviśrutaḥ ।।
tasya bhāryā tathā khyātā nāmnā bhāgīrathī śubhā ।
sa maudgalyaḥ prātar eva gaṅgāṃ snāti yatavrataḥ ।।
nityam eva tv idaṃ karma tasyāsīn munisattama ।
gaṅgātīre kuśair mṛdbhiḥ śamīpuṣpair aharniśam ।।
gurūditena mārgeṇa svamānasasaroruhe ।
āvāhanaṃ nityam eva viṣṇoś cakre sa maudgaliḥ ।।
tenāhūtas tvarann eti lakṣmībhartā jagatpatiḥ ।
vainateyam athāruhya śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।।
pūjitas tena ṛṣiṇā sa maudgalyena yatnataḥ ।
prabrūte ca kathāś citrā maudgalyāya jagatprabhuḥ ।।
tato aparāhṇasamaye viṣṇuḥ prāha sa maudgalim ।
yāhi vatsa svabhavanaṃ śrānto asīti punaḥ punaḥ ।।
evam uktaḥ sa devena viṣṇunā yāti sa dvijaḥ ।
jagatprabhus tato yāti devair yuktaḥ svamandiram ।।
maudgalyo api tathābhyetya kiṃcid ādāya nityaśaḥ ।
svam eva bhavanaṃ vidvān bhāryāyai svārjitaṃ dhanam ।।
dadāti sa mahāviṣṇu- caraṇābjaparāyaṇaḥ ।
maudgalyasya priyā sāpi pativrataparāyaṇā ।।
śākaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ vāpi bhartrānītaṃ tu yatnataḥ ।
susaṃskṛtyāpy atithīnāṃ bālānāṃ bhartur eva ca ।।
dattvā tu bhojanaṃ tebhyaḥ paścād bhuṅkte yatavratā ।
bhuktavatsv atha sarveṣu rātrau nityaṃ sa maudgaliḥ ।।
viṣṇoḥ śrutāḥ kathāś citrās tebhyo vakty atha harṣitaḥ ।
evaṃ bahutithe kāle vyatīte cātivismitā ।
maudgalyasya raho bhāryā bhartāraṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{jābālovāca 
yadi te viṣṇur abhyeti samīpaṃ tridaśārcitaḥ ।
tathāpi kaṣṭam asmākaṃ kasmād iti jagatprabhum ।।
tat pṛccha tvaṃ mahāprājña yadāsau viṣṇur eti ca ।
yasmiṃś ca smṛtamātre tu jarājanmarujo mṛtiḥ ।
nāśaṃ yānti kuto dṛṣṭe tasmāt pṛccha jagatpatim ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā priyāvākyān maudgalyo nityavad dharim ।
pūjayitvā vinītaś ca papraccha sa kṛtāñjaliḥ ।।
{maudgalya uvāca 
tvayi smṛte jagannātha śokadāridryaduṣkṛtam ।
nāśaṃ yāti vipattir me tvayi dṛṣṭe kathaṃ sthitā ।।
{śrīviṣṇur uvāca 
svakṛtaṃ bhujyate bhūtaiḥ sarvaiḥ sarvatra sarvadā ।
na kopi kasyacit kiṃcit karoty atra hitāhite ।।
yādṛśaṃ copyate bījaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tādṛśam ।
rasālaḥ syān na nimbasya bījāj jātv api kutracit ।।
na kṛtā gautamīsevā nārcitau hariśaṃkarau ।
na dattaṃ yaiś ca viprebhyas te kathaṃ bhājanaṃ śriyaḥ ।।
tvayā na dattaṃ kiṃcic ca brāhmaṇebhyo mamāpi ca ।
yad dīyate tad eveha parasmiṃś copatiṣṭhati ।।
mṛdbhir vārbhiḥ kuśair mantraiḥ śucikarma sadaiva yat ।
karoti tasmāt pūtātmā śarīrasya ca śoṣaṇāt ।।
vinā dānena na kvāpi bhogāvāptir nṛṇāṃ bhavet ।
satkarmācaraṇāc chuddho viraktaḥ syāt tato naraḥ ।।
tato apratihatajñāno jīvanmuktas tato bhavet ।
sarveṣāṃ sulabhā muktir madbhaktyā ceha pūrtataḥ ।।
bhuktir dānādinā sarva- bhūtaduḥkhanibarhaṇāt ।
athavā lapsyase muktiṃ bhaktyā bhuktiṃ na lapsyase ।।
{maudgalya uvāca 
bhaktyā muktiḥ kathaṃ bhūyād bhukter muktiḥ sudurlabhā ।
jātā ced dehināṃ muktiḥ kim anyena prayojanam ।।
bhaktyā muktiḥ sarvapūjyā tām iccheyaṃ jaganmaya ।।
{viṣṇur uvāca 
etad evāntaraṃ brahman dīyate mām anusmaran ।
brāhmaṇāyāthavārthibhyas tad evākṣayatāṃ vrajet ।।
mām adhyātvātha yad dadyāt tat tanmātraphalapradam ।
tat punar dattam eveha na bhogāyātra kalpate ।।
tasmād dehi mahābuddhe bhojyaṃ kiṃcin mama dhruvam ।
athavā vipramukhyāya gautamītīram āśritaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
maudgalyaḥ prāha taṃ viṣṇuṃ deyaṃ mama na vidyate ।
nānyat kiṃcana dehādi yat tat tvayi samarpitam ।।
tato viṣṇur garutmantaṃ prāha śīghraṃ jagatpatiḥ ।
ihānayasva kaṇiśaṃ mamāyaṃ cārpayiṣyati ।।
tato yogyān ayaṃ bhogān prāpsyate manasaḥ priyān ।
ākarṇya svāminādiṣṭaṃ tathā cakre sa pakṣirāṭ ।।
viṣṇuhaste kaṇān prādāt sa maudgalyo yatavrataḥ ।
etasminn antare viṣṇur viśvakarmāṇam abravīt ।।
{viṣṇur uvāca 
yāvac cāsya kule sapta puruṣās tāvad eva tu ।
bhavitāro mahābuddhe tāvat kāmā manīṣitāḥ ।
gāvo hiraṇyaṃ dhānyāni vastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
yac ca kiṃcin manaḥprītyai loke bhavati bhūṣaṇam ।
tat sarvam āpa maudgalyo viṣṇugaṅgāprabhāvataḥ ।।
gṛhaṃ gaccheti maudgalyo viṣṇunoktas tato yayau ।
āśrame svasya sarvarddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā ṛṣir abhāṣata ।।
{ṛṣir uvāca 
aho dānaprabhāvo ayam aho viṣṇor anusmṛtiḥ ।
aho gaṅgāprabhāvaś ca kair vicāryo mahān ayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
maudgalyo bhāryayā sārdhaṃ putraiḥ pautraiś ca bandhubhiḥ ।
pitṛbhyāṃ bubhuje bhogān bhuktiṃ muktim avāpa ca ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ maudgalyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca bhuktimuktiphalapradam ।।
tatra śrutiḥ smṛtir vāpi tīrthasya syāt kathaṃcana ।
tasya viṣṇur bhavet prītaḥ pāpair muktaḥ sukhī bhavet ।।
ekādaśa sahasrāṇi tīrthānāṃ tīrayor dvayoḥ ।
sarvārthadāyināṃ tatra snānadānajapādibhiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
lakṣmītīrtham iti khyātaṃ sākṣāl lakṣmīvivardhanam ।
alakṣmīnāśanaṃ puṇyam ākhyānaṃ śṛṇu nārada ।।
saṃvādaś ca purā tv āsīl lakṣmyāḥ putra daridrayā ।
parasparavirodhinyāv ubhe viśvaṃ samīyatuḥ ।।
tābhyām avyāpṛtaṃ vastu tan nāsti bhuvanatraye ।
mama jyaiṣṭhyaṃ mama jyaiṣṭhyam ity ūcatur ubhe mithaḥ ।
ahaṃ pūrvaṃ samudbhūtā ity āha śriyam ojasā ।।
{śrīlakṣmīr uvāca 
kulaṃ śīlaṃ jīvitaṃ vā dehinām aham eva tu ।
mayā vinā dehabhājo jīvanto api mṛtā iva ।।
{brahmovāca 
daridrayā ca sā proktā sarvebhyo hy adhikā hy aham ।
muktir madāśritā nityaṃ daridraivaṃ vaco abravīt ।।
kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca mado mātsaryam eva ca ।
yatrāham asmi tatraite na tiṣṭhanti kadācana ।।
na bhayodbhūtir unmāda īrṣyā uddhatavṛttitā ।
yatrāham asmi tatraite na tiṣṭhanti kadācana ।।
daridrāyā vacaḥ śrutvā lakṣmīs tāṃ pratyabhāṣata ।।
{lakṣmīr uvāca 
alaṃkṛto mayā jantuḥ sarvo bhavati pūjitaḥ ।
nirdhanaḥ śivatulyo api sarvair apy abhibhūyate ।।
dehīti vacanadvārā dehasthāḥ pañca devatāḥ ।
sadyo nirgatya gacchanti dhīśrīhrīśāntikīrtayaḥ ।।
tāvad guṇā gurutvaṃ ca yāvan nārthayate param ।
arthī cet puruṣo jātaḥ kva guṇāḥ kva ca gauravam ।।
tāvat sarvottamo jantus tāvat sarvaguṇālayaḥ ।
namasyaḥ sarvalokānāṃ yāvan nārthayate param ।।
kaṣṭam etan mahāpāpaṃ nirdhanatvaṃ śarīriṇām ।
na mānayati no vakti na spṛśaty adhanaṃ janaḥ ।।
aham eva tataḥ śreṣṭhā daridre śṛṇu me vacaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tal lakṣmīvacanaṃ śrutvā daridrā vākyam abravīt ।।
{daridrovāca 
vaktuṃ na lakṣmīr jyeṣṭhāham iti vai lajjase muhuḥ ।
pāpeṣu ramase nityaṃ vihāya puruṣottamam ।।
viśvastavañcakā nityaṃ bhavatī ślāghase katham ।
sukhaṃ na tādṛk tvatprāptau paścāttāpo yathā guruḥ ।।
na tathā jāyate puṃsāṃ surayā dāruṇo madaḥ ।
tvatsaṃnidhānamātreṇa yathā vai viduṣām api ।।
sadaiva ramase lakṣmīḥ prāyas tvaṃ pāpakāriṣu ।
ahaṃ vasāmi yogyeṣu dharmaśīleṣu sarvadā ।।
śivaviṣṇvanurakteṣu kṛtajñeṣu mahatsu ca ।
sadācāreṣu śānteṣu gurusevodyateṣu ca ।।
satsu vidvatsu śūreṣu kṛtabuddhiṣu sādhuṣu ।
nivasāmi sadā lakṣmīs tasmāj jyaiṣṭhyaṃ mayi sthitam ।।
brāhmaṇeṣu śuciṣmatsu vratacāriṣu bhikṣuṣu ।
nirbhayeṣu vasiṣyāmi lakṣmīs tvaṃ śṛṇu te sthitim ।।
rājavartiṣu pāpeṣu niṣṭhureṣu khaleṣu ca ।
piśuneṣu ca lubdheṣu vikṛteṣu śaṭheṣu ca ।।
anāryeṣu kṛtaghneṣu dharmaghātiṣu sarvadā ।
mitradrohiṣv aniṣṭeṣu bhagnacitteṣu vartase ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ vivadamāne te jagmatur mām ubhe api ।
tayor vākyam upaśrutya mayokte te ubhe api ।।
mattaḥ pūrvatarā pṛthvī āpaḥ pūrvatarās tataḥ ।
strīṇāṃ vivādaṃ tā eva striyo jānanti netare ।।
viśeṣataḥ punas tābhyaḥ kamaṇḍalubhavāś ca yāḥ ।
tatrāpi gautamī devī niścayaṃ kathayiṣyati ।।
saiva sarvārtisaṃhartrī saiva saṃdehakartarī ।
te madvākyād bhuvaṃ gatvā bhūmyā ca sahite api ।।
adbhiś ca sahitāḥ sarvā gautamīṃ yayur āpagām ।
bhūmir āpas tayor vākyaṃ gautamyai kramaśaḥ sphuṭam ।।
sarvaṃ nivedayām āsur yathāvṛttaṃ praṇamya tām ।
daridrāyāś ca lakṣmyāś ca vākyaṃ madhyasthavat tadā ।।
śṛṇvatsu lokapāleṣu śṛṇvatyāṃ bhuvi nārada ।
śṛṇvatīṣv apsu sā gaṅgā daridrāṃ vākyam abravīt ।
saṃpraśasya tathā lakṣmīṃ gautamī vākyam abravīt ।।
{gautamy uvāca 
brahmaśrīś ca tapaḥśrīś ca yajñaśrīḥ kīrtisaṃjñitā ।
dhanaśrīś ca yaśaśrīś ca vidyā prajñā sarasvatī ।।
bhuktiśrīś cātha muktiś ca smṛtir lajjā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā ।
siddhis tuṣṭis tathā puṣṭiḥ śāntir āpas tathā mahī ।।
ahaṃśaktir athauṣadhyaḥ śrutiḥ śuddhir vibhāvarī ।
dyaur jyotsnā āśiṣaḥ svastir vyāptir māyā uṣā śivā ।।
yat kiṃcid vidyate loke lakṣmyā vyāptaṃ carācaram ।
brāhmaṇeṣv atha dhīreṣu kṣamāvatsv atha sādhuṣu ।।
vidyāyukteṣu cānyeṣu bhuktimuktyanusāriṣu ।
yad yad ramyaṃ sundaraṃ vā tat tal lakṣmīvijṛmbhitam ।।
kim atra bahunoktena sarvaṃ lakṣmīmayaṃ jagat ।
yasmin kasmiṃś ca yat kiṃcid utkṛṣṭaṃ paridṛśyate ।।
lakṣmīmayaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ tayā hīnaṃ na kiṃcana ।
atremāṃ sundarīṃ devīṃ spardhayantī na lajjase ।।
gaccha gaccheti tāṃ gaṅgā daridrāṃ vākyam abravīt ।
tataḥ prabhṛti gaṅgāmbho daridrāvairakāry abhūt ।।
tāvad daridrābhibhavo gaṅgā yāvan na sevyate ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrtham alakṣmīnāśanaṃ śubham ।।
tatra snānena dānena lakṣmīvān puṇyavān bhavet ।
tīrthānāṃ ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi tasmiṃs tīrthe mahāmate ।
devarṣimunijuṣṭānāṃ sarvasiddhipradāyinām ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhānutīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvasiddhikaraṃ nṛṇām ।
tatredaṃ vṛttam ākhyāsye mahāpātakanāśanam ।।
śaryātir iti vikhyāto rājā paramadhārmikaḥ ।
tasya bhāryā sthaviṣṭheti rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi ।।
madhucchandā iti khyāto vaiśvāmitro dvijottamaḥ ।
purodhās tasya nṛpater brahmarṣiḥ śamināṃ prabhuḥ ।।
diśo vijetuṃ sa jagāma rājā 
purodhasā tena nṛpapravīraḥ 
purodhasaṃ prāha mahānubhāvaṃ 
jitvā diśaś cādhvani saṃniviṣṭaḥ 
papracchedaṃ kena khedaṃ gato asi 
hetuṃ vadasveti mahānubhāva 
tvam eva rājye mama sarvamānyaḥ 
samastavidyāniravadyabodhaḥ 
vidhūtapāpaḥ paritāpaśūnyaḥ 
kim anyacetā iva lakṣyase tvam 
jiteyam urvī vijitā narendrā 
harṣasya hetau mahatīha jāte 
kiṃ tvaṃ kṛśo me vada satyam eva 
dvijātivaryātimahānubhāva 
saṃbodhya śaryātim uvāca vipraś 
chandomadhuḥ premamayīṃ priyoktim 
{madhucchandā uvāca 
śṛṇu bhūpāla madvākyaṃ bhāryayā yad udīritam ।
sthite yāme vayaṃ yāmo yāminī cārdhagāminī ।।
svāminī cāsya dehasya kāminī māṃ pratīkṣate ।
smṛtvā tat kāminīvākyaṃ śoṣaṃ yāti kalevaram ।
vikāre smarasaṃjāte jīvātur nalinānanā ।।
{brahmovāca 
vihasya cābravīd rājā purodhasam ariṃdamaḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
tvaṃ gurur mama mitraṃ ca kim ātmānaṃ viḍambase ।
kim anena mahāprājña mama vākyena mānada ।
kṣaṇavidhvaṃsini sukhe kā nāmāsthā mahātmanām ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad ākarṇya matimān madhucchandā vaco abravīt ।।
{madhucchandā uvāca 
yatrānukūlyaṃ daṃpatyos trivargas tatra vardhate ।
na cedaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ rājan bhūṣaṇaṃ cātimanyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
ājagāma svakaṃ deśaṃ mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ ।
parīkṣārthaṃ ca tatprema puryāṃ vārttām adīdiśat ।।
diśo vijetuṃ śaryātau yāte rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ ।
hatvā rasātalaṃ yāto rājānaṃ sapurodhasam ।।
rājño bhāryā niścayāya pravṛttā munisattama ।
vārttāṃ śrutvā dūtamukhān madhucchandaḥpriyā punaḥ ।।
tadaivābhūd gataprāṇā tad vicitram ivābhavat ।
tasyā vṛttaṃ tu te dṛṣṭvā dūtā rājñe nyavedayan ।।
yat kṛtaṃ rājapatnībhiḥ priyayā ca purodhasaḥ ।
vismito duḥkhito rājā punar dūtān abhāṣata ।।
{rājovāca 
śīghraṃ gacchantu he dūtā brāhmaṇyā yat kalevaram ।
rakṣantu vārttāṃ kuruta rājāgantā purodhasā ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti cintāture rājñi vāg uvācāśarīriṇī ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
vidhāsyaty akhilaṃ gaṅgā rājaṃs tava samīhitam ।
sarvābhiṣaṅgaśamanī pāvanī bhuvi gautamī ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā sa śaryātir gautamītaṭam āśritaḥ ।
brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā tarpayitvā pitṝn dvijān ।।
purohitaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ preṣayitvā dhanānvitam ।
anyatra tīrthe sārtheṣu dānaṃ dehi prayatnataḥ ।।
etat sarvaṃ na jānāti rājñaḥ kṛtyaṃ purohitaḥ ।
gate tasmin gurau rājā vaiśvāmitre mahātmani ।।
sarvaṃ balaṃ preṣayitvā gaṅgātīre agnim āviśat ।
ity uktvā sa tu rājendro gaṅgāṃ bhānuṃ surān api ।।
yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ yadi trātā prajā mayā ।
tena satyena sā sādhvī mamāyuṣyeṇa jīvatu ।।
ity uktvāgnau praviṣṭe tu śaryātau nṛpasattame ।
tadaiva jīvitā bhāryā rājñas tasya purodhasaḥ ।।
agnipraviṣṭaṃ rājānaṃ śrutvā vismayakāraṇam ।
pativratāṃ tathā bhāryāṃ mṛtāṃ jīvānvitāṃ punaḥ ।।
tadarthaṃ cāpi rājānaṃ tyaktātmānaṃ viśeṣataḥ ।
ātmanaś ca punaḥ kṛtyam asmaran nṛpater guruḥ ।।
aham apy agnim āvekṣya uta yāsye priyāntikam ।
athaveha tapas tapsye tato niścayavān dvijaḥ ।।
etad evātmanaḥ kṛtyaṃ manye sukṛtam eva ca ।
jīvayāmi ca rājānaṃ tato yāmi priyāṃ punaḥ ।।
etad eva śubhaṃ me syāt tatas tuṣṭāva bhāskaram ।
na hy anyaḥ kopi devo asti sarvābhīṣṭaprado raveḥ ।।
{madhucchandā uvāca 
namo astu tasmai sūryāya muktaye amitatejase ।
chandomayāya devāya oṃkārārthāya te namaḥ ।।
virūpāya surūpāya triguṇāya trimūrtaye ।
sthityutpattivināśānāṃ hetave prabhaviṣṇave ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prasannaḥ sūryo abhūd varayasvety abhāṣata ।।
{madhucchandā uvāca 
rājānaṃ dehi deveśa bhāryāṃ ca priyavādinīm ।
ātmanaś ca śubhān putrān rājñaś caiva śubhān varān ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prādāj jagannāthaḥ śaryātiṃ ratnabhūṣitam ।
tāṃ ca bhāryāṃ varān anyān sarvaṃ kṣemamayaṃ tathā ।।
tato yātaḥ priyāviṣṭaḥ prītena ca purodhasā ।
yayau sukhī svakaṃ deśaṃ tat tu tīrthaṃ śubhaṃ smṛtam ।।
tatra trīṇi sahasrāṇi tīrthāni guṇavanti ca ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ bhānutīrtham udāhṛtam ।।
mṛtasaṃjīvanaṃ caiva śāryātaṃ ceti viśrutam ।
mādhucchandasamākhyātaṃ smaraṇāt pāpanun mune ।।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakratuphalapradam ।
mṛtasaṃjīvanaṃ tat syād āyurārogyavardhanam ।।
{brahmovāca 
khaḍgatīrtham iti khyātaṃ gautamyā uttare taṭe ।
tatra snānena dānena muktibhāgī bhaven naraḥ ।।
tatra vṛttaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada yatnataḥ ।
pailūṣa iti vikhyātaḥ kavaṣasya suto dvijaḥ ।।
kuṭumbabhārāt parito hy arthārthī paridhāvati ।
na kimapy āsasādāsau tato vairāgyam āsthitaḥ ।।
atyantavimukhe daive vyarthībhūte tu pauruṣe ।
na vairāgyād anyad asti paṇḍitasyāvalambanam ।।
iti saṃcintayām āsa tadāsau niḥśvasan muhuḥ ।
kramāgataṃ dhanaṃ nāsti poṣyāś ca bahavo mama ।।
mānī cātmā na kaṣṭārho hā dhig durdaivaceṣṭitam ।
sa kadācid vṛttiyuto vṛttibhiḥ parivartayan ।।
na lebhe tad dhanaṃ vṛtter virāgam agamat tadā ।
sevā niṣiddhā yā kācid gahanā duṣkaraṃ tapaḥ ।।
balād ākarṣatīyaṃ māṃ tṛṣṇā sarvatra duṣkṛte ।
tvayāpakṛtam ajñānāt tasmāt tṛṣṇe namo astu te ।।
evaṃ vicintya medhāvī tṛṣṇāchedāya kiṃ bhavet ।
ity ālocya sa pailūṣaḥ pitaraṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{pailūṣa uvāca 
jñānāsinā krodhalobhau saṃsṛtiṃ cātidustarām ।
chedmīmāṃ kena he tāta tam upāyaṃ vada prabho ।।
{kavaṣa uvāca 
īśvarāj jñānam anvicched ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ ।
tasmād ārādhayeśānaṃ tato jñānam avāpsyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā sa pailūṣo jñānāyeśvaram ārcayat ।
tatas tuṣṭo maheśāno jñānaṃ prādād dvijātaye ।
prāptajñāno mahābuddhir gāthāḥ provāca muktidāḥ ।।
{pailūṣa uvāca 
krodhas tu prathamaṃ śatrur niṣphalo dehanāśanaḥ ।
jñānakhaḍgena taṃ chittvā paramaṃ sukham āpnuyāt ।।
tṛṣṇā bahuvidhā māyā bandhanī pāpakāriṇī ।
chittvaitāṃ jñānakhaḍgena sukhaṃ tiṣṭhati mānavaḥ ।।
saṅgas tu paramo adharmo devādīnām iti śrutiḥ ।
asaṅgasyātmano hy asya saṅgo ayaṃ paramo ripuḥ ।।
chittvainaṃ jñānakhaḍgena śivaikatvam avāpnuyāt ।
saṃśayaḥ paramo nāśo dharmārthānāṃ vināśakṛt ।।
chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ jantuḥ paramepsitam āpnuyāt ।
piśācīva viśaty āśā nirdahaty akhilaṃ sukham ।
pūrṇāhantāsinā chittvā jīvan muktim avāpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato jñānam avāpyāsau gaṅgātīraṃ samāśritaḥ ।
jñānakhaḍgena nirmohas tato muktim avāpa saḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ khaḍgatīrtham iti smṛtam ।
jñānatīrthaṃ ca kavaṣaṃ pailūṣaṃ sarvakāmadam ।।
ityādiṣaṭsahasrāṇi tīrthāny āhur maharṣayaḥ ।
aśeṣapāpatāpaugha- harāṇīṣṭapradāni ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
ātreyam iti vikhyātam anvindraṃ tīrtham uttamam ।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi bhraṣṭarājyapradāyakam ।।
gautamyā uttare tīra ātreyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ।
anvārebhe atha sattrāṇi ṛtvigbhir munibhir vṛtaḥ ।।
tasya hotābhavat tv agnir havyavāhana eva ca ।
evaṃ sattre tu saṃpūrṇa iṣṭiṃ māheśvarīṃ punaḥ ।।
kṛtvaiśvaryam agād vipraḥ sarvatra gatim eva ca ।
indrasya bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ svargalokaṃ rasātalam ।।
svecchayā yāti viprendraḥ prabhāvāt tapasaḥ śubhāt ।
sa kadācid divaṃ gatvā indralokam agāt punaḥ ।।
tatrāpaśyat sahasrākṣaṃ suraiḥ parivṛtaṃ śubhaiḥ ।
stūyamānaṃ siddhasādhyaiḥ prekṣantaṃ nṛtyam uttamam ।
śṛṇvānaṃ madhuraṃ gītam apsarobhiś ca vījitam ।।
upopaviṣṭaiḥ suranāyakais taiḥ 
saṃpūjyamānaṃ mahadāsanastham 
jayantam aṅke vinidhāya sūnuṃ 
śacyā yutaṃ prāptaratiṃ mahiṣṭham 
satāṃ śaraṇyaṃ varadaṃ mahendraṃ 
samīkṣya viprādhipatir mahātmā 
vimohito asau munir indralakṣmyā 
samīhayām āsa tad indrarājyam 
saṃpūjito devagaṇair yathāvat 
svam āśramaṃ vai punar ājagāma 
samīkṣya tāṃ śakrapurīṃ suramyāṃ 
ratnair yutāṃ puṇyaguṇaiḥ supūrṇām 
svam āśramaṃ niṣprabhahemavarjyaṃ 
samīkṣya vipro viramaṃ jagāma 
samīhamānaḥ surarājyam āśu 
priyāṃ tadovāca mahātriputraḥ 
{ātreya uvāca 
bhoktuṃ na śakto asmi phalāni mūlāny 
anuttamāny apy atisaṃskṛtāni 
smṛtvāmṛtaṃ puṇyatamaṃ ca tatra 
bhakṣyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca varāsanāni 
stutiṃ ca dānaṃ ca sabhāṃ śubhāṃ ca 
astraṃ ca vāsāṃsi purīṃ vanāni 
{brahmovāca 
tato mahātmā tapasaḥ prabhāvāt 
tvaṣṭāram āhūya vaco babhāṣe 
{ātreya uvāca 
iccheyam indratvam ahaṃ mahātman 
kuruṣva śīghraṃ padam aindram atra 
brūṣe anyathā cen madudīritaṃ tvaṃ 
bhasmīkaromy eva na saṃśayo atra 
{brahmovāca 
tadatrivākyāt tvaritaḥ prajānāṃ 
sraṣṭā vibhur viśvakarmā tadaiva 
cakāra meruṃ ca purīṃ surāṇāṃ 
kalpadrumān kalpalatāṃ ca dhenum 
cakāra vajrādivibhūṣitāni 
gṛhāṇi śubhrāṇy aticitritāni 
cakāra sarvāvayavānavadyāṃ 
śacīṃ smarasyeva vihāraśālām 
sabhāṃ sudharmāṇam aho kṣaṇena 
tathā cakārāpsaraso manojñāḥ 
cakāra coccaiḥśravasaṃ gajaṃ ca 
vajrādi cāstrāṇi surān aśeṣān 
nivāryamāṇaḥ priyayātriputraḥ 
śacīsamām ātmavadhūṃ cakāra 
tadātriputro atrimukhaiḥ sameto 
vajrādirūpaṃ ca cakāra cāstram 
nṛtyādi gītādi ca sarvam eva 
cakāra śakrasya pure ca dṛṣṭam 
tat sarvam āsādya tadā munīndraḥ 
prahṛṣṭacetāḥ sutarāṃ babhūva 
āpātaramyeṣv api kasya nāma 
bhavaty apekṣā nahi gocareṣu 
śrutvā ca daityā danujāḥ sametā 
rakṣāṃsi kopena yutāni sadyaḥ 
svargaṃ parityajya kuto harir bhuvaṃ 
samāgato nv eṣa mithaḥ sukhāya 
tasmād vayaṃ yāma ito nu yoddhuṃ 
vṛtrasya hantāram adīrghasattram 
tataḥ samāgatya tadātriputraṃ 
saṃveṣṭayām āsur athāsurās te 
saṃveṣṭayitvā puram atriputra 
kṛtaṃ tathā cendrapurābhidhānam 
tair vadhyamānaḥ śastrapātair mahadbhis 
tato bhīto vākyam idaṃ jagāda 
{ātreya uvāca 
yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān 
devo devān kratunā paryabhūṣat 
yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ 
nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsa indraḥ 
{brahmovāca 
ityādisūktena ripūn uvāca 
hariṃ ca tuṣṭāva tadātriputraḥ 
{ātreya uvāca 
nāhaṃ harir naiva śacī madīyā 
neyaṃ purī naiva vanaṃ tad aindram 
sa eva cendro vṛtrahantā sa vajrī 
sahasrākṣo gotrabhid vajrabāhuḥ 
ahaṃ tu vipro vedavid brahmavṛndaiḥ 
samāviṣṭo gautamītīrasaṃsthaḥ 
yatrāyatyāṃ nādya vā saukhyahetus 
tac cākārṣaṃ karma durdaivayogāt 
{asurā ūcuḥ 
saṃharasvedam ātreya yad indrasya viḍambanam ।
kṣemas te bhavitā satyaṃ nānyathā munisattama ।।
{brahmovāca 
tadātreyo abravīd vākyaṃ yathā vakṣyanti mām iha ।
karomy eva mahābhāgāḥ satyenāgniṃ samālabhe ।।
evam uktvā sa daiteyāṃs tvaṣṭāraṃ punar abravīt ।।
{ātreya uvāca 
yat kṛtaṃ tv atra matprītyāai aindraṃ tvaṣṭaḥ padaṃ tvayā ।
saṃharasva punaḥ śīghraṃ rakṣa māṃ brāhmaṇaṃ munim ।।
punar dehi padaṃ mahyam āśramaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ ।
vṛkṣāṃś ca vāri yatrāsīn na me divyaiḥ prayojanam ।
sarvam akramam āyātaṃ na sukhāya manīṣiṇām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā prajānāthas tvaṣṭā saṃhṛtavāṃs tadā ।
daityāś ca jagmuḥ svasthānaṃ kṛtvā deśam akaṇṭakam ।।
tvaṣṭā cāpi yayau sthānaṃ svakaṃ saṃprahasann iva ।
ātreyo api tadā śiṣyaiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ saha bhāryayā ।।
gautamītīram āśritya taponiṣṭho akhilair vṛtaḥ ।
vartamāne mahāyajñe lajjito vākyam abravīt ।।
{ātreya uvāca 
aho mohasya mahimā mamāpi bhrāntacittatā ।
kiṃ mahendrapadaṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ mayātra purā kṛtam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ vadantam ātreyaṃ lajjitaṃ prābruvan surāḥ ।।
{surā ūcuḥ 
lajjāṃ jahi mahābāho bhavitā khyātir uttamā ।
ātreyatīrthe ye snānaṃ prāṇinaḥ kuryur añjasā ।।
indrās te bhavitāro vai smaraṇāt sukhabhāginaḥ ।
tatra pañca sahasrāṇi tīrthāny āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
anvindrātreyadaiteya- nāmabhiḥ kīrtitāni ca ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvam akṣayapuṇyadam ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā vibudhā yātāḥ saṃtuṣṭaś cābhavan muniḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
kapilāsaṃgamaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।
tatra nārada vakṣyāmi kathāṃ puṇyām anuttamām ।।
kapilo nāma tattvajño munir āsīn mahāyaśāḥ ।
krūraś cāpi prasannaś ca tapovrataparāyaṇaḥ ।।
tapasyantaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ gautamītīram āśritam ।
tam āgatya mahātmānaṃ vāmadevādayo abruvan ।।
hatvā venaṃ brahmaśāpair naṣṭadharme tv arājake ।
kapilaṃ siddham ācāryam ūcur munigaṇās tadā ।।
{munigaṇā ūcuḥ 
gate vede gate dharme kiṃ kartavyaṃ munīśvara ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato abravīn munir dhyātvā kapilas tv āgatān munīn ।।
{kapila uvāca 
venasyorur vimathyo abhūt tataḥ kaścid bhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathaiva cakrur munayo venasyoruṃ vimathya vai ।
tatrotpanno mahāpāpaḥ kṛṣṇo raudraparākramaḥ ।।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayo bhītā niṣīdasveti cābruvan ।
niṣādaḥ so abhavat tasmān niṣādāś cābhavaṃs tataḥ ।।
venabāhuṃ mamanthus te dakṣiṇaṃ dharmasaṃhitam ।
tataḥ pṛthusvaraś caiva sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitaḥ ।।
rājābhavat pṛthuḥ śrīmān brahmasāmarthyasaṃyutaḥ ।
tam āgatya surāḥ sarve abhinandya varāñ śubhān ।।
tasmai dadus tathāstrāṇi mantrāṇi guṇavanti ca ।
tato abruvan munigaṇās taṃ pṛthuṃ kapilena ca ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
āhāraṃ dehi jīvebhyo bhuvā grastauṣadhīr api ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ sa dhanur ādāya bhuvam āha nṛpottamaḥ ।।
{pṛthur uvāca 
oṣadhīr dehi yā grastāḥ prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tam uvāca mahī bhītā pṛthuṃ taṃ pṛthulocanam ।।
{mahy uvāca 
mayi jīrṇā mahauṣadhyaḥ kathaṃ dātum ahaṃ kṣamā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ sakopo nṛpatis tām āha pṛthivīṃ punaḥ ।।
{pṛthur uvāca 
no ced dadāsy adya tvāṃ vai hatvā dāsye mahauṣadhīḥ ।।
{bhūmir uvāca 
kathaṃ haṃsi striyaṃ rājañ jñānī bhūtvā nṛpottama ।
vinā mayā kathaṃ cemāḥ prajāḥ saṃdhārayiṣyasi ।।
{pṛthur uvāca 
yatropakāro anekānām ekanāśe bhaviṣyati ।
na doṣas tatra pṛthivi tapasā dhāraye prajāḥ ।।
na doṣam atra paśyāmi nācakṣe anarthakaṃ vacaḥ ।
yasmin nipātite saukhyaṃ bahūnām upajāyate ।
munayas tadvadhaṃ prāhur aśvamedhaśatādhikam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sāntvayitvā nṛpottamam ।
mahīṃ ca mātaraṃ devīm ūcuḥ suragaṇās tadā ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
bhūme gorūpiṇī bhūtvā payorūpā mahauṣadhīḥ ।
dehi tvaṃ pṛthave rājñe tataḥ prīto bhaven nṛpaḥ ।
prajāsaṃrakṣaṇaṃ ca syāt tataḥ kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato gorūpam āsthāya bhūmy āsīt kapilāntike ।
dudoha ca mahauṣadhyo rājā venakarodbhavaḥ ।।
yatra devāḥ sagandharvā ṛṣayaḥ kapilo muniḥ ।
mahīṃ gorūpam āpannāṃ narmadāyāṃ mahāmune ।।
sarasvatyāṃ bhāgīrathyāṃ godāvaryāṃ viśeṣataḥ ।
mahānadīṣu sarvāsu duduhe asau payo mahat ।।
sā duhyamānā pṛthunā puṇyatoyābhavan nadī ।
gautamyā saṃgatā cābhūt tad adbhutam ivābhavat ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ kapilāsaṃgamaṃ viduḥ ।
tatrāṣṭāśītiḥ pūjyāni sahasrāṇi mahāmate ।।
tīrthāny āhur munigaṇāḥ smaraṇād api nārada ।
pāvanāni jagaty asmiṃs tāni sarvāṇy anukramāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
devasthānam iti khyātaṃ tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu yatnena nārada ।।
purā kṛtayugasyādau devadānavasaṃgare ।
pravṛtte vā siṃhiketi vikhyātā daityasundarī ।।
tasyāḥ putro mahādaityo rāhur nāma mahābalaḥ ।
amṛte tu samutpanne saiṃhikeye ca bhedite ।।
tasya putro mahādaityo meghahāsa iti śrutaḥ ।
pitaraṃ ghātitaṃ śrutvā tapas tepe atiduḥkhitaḥ ।।
tapasyantaṃ rāhusutaṃ gautamītīram āśritam ।
devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sarve tam ūcur atibhītavat ।।
{devarṣaya ūcuḥ 
tapo jahi mahābāho yat te manasi saṃsthitam ।
sarvaṃ bhavatu nāmedaṃ śivagaṅgāprasādataḥ ।
śivagaṅgāprasādena kiṃ nāmāsty atra durlabham ।।
{meghahāsa uvāca 
paribhūtaḥ pitā pūjyo yuṣmābhir mama daivatam ।
tasyāpi mama cātyantaṃ prītiś ca kriyate yadi ।।
bhavadbhis tapaso asmāc ca ahaṃ vairān nivartaye ।
vairaniryātanaṃ kāryaṃ putreṇa pitur ādarāt ।
prārthayante bhavantaś cet pūrṇās tan me manorathāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ suragaṇāḥ sarve rāhuṃ cakrur grahānugam ।
taṃ cāpi meghahāsaṃ te cakrū rākṣasapuṃgavam ।।
tato abhavad rāhusuto nairṛtādhipatiḥ prabhuḥ ।
punaś cāha surān daityo mama khyātir yathā bhavet ।।
tīrthasyāsya prabhāvaś ca dātavya iti me matiḥ ।
tathety uktvā dadur devāḥ sarvam eva manogatam ।।
daityeśvarasya devarṣe tannāmnā tīrtham ucyate ।
devā yato abhavan sarve tatra sthāne mahāmate ।।
devasthānaṃ tu tat tīrthaṃ devānām api durlabham ।
yatra deveśvaro devo devatīrthaṃ tataḥ smṛtam ।।
tatrāṣṭādaśa tīrthāni daityapūjyāni nārada ।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca mahāpātakanāśanam ।।
{brahmovāca 
siddhatīrtham iti khyātaṃ yatra siddheśvaro haraḥ ।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi sarvasiddhikaraṃ nṛṇām ।।
pulastyavaṃśasaṃbhūto rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ ।
diśo vijitya sarvāś ca somalokam ajīgamat ।।
somena saha yotsyantaṃ daśāsyam aham abravam ।
mantraṃ dāsye nivartasva somayuddhād daśānana ।।
ity uktvāṣṭottaraṃ mantraṃ śatanāmabhir anvitam ।
śivasya rākṣasendrāya prādāṃ nārada śāntaye ।।
niḥśrīkāṇāṃ vipannānāṃ nānākleśajuṣāṃ nṛṇām ।
śaraṇaṃ śiva evātra saṃsāre anyo na kaścana ।।
tato nivṛttaḥ sa ha mantriyuktas 
tat somalokāj jayam āpya rakṣaḥ 
sa puṣpakārūḍhagatiḥ sagarvo 
lokān punaḥ prāpa javād daśāsyaḥ 
sa prekṣamāṇo devam antarikṣaṃ 
bhuvaṃ ca nāgāṃś ca gajāṃś ca viprān 
ālokayām āsa nagaṃ mahāntaṃ 
kailāsam āvāsa umāpater yaḥ 
dṛṣṭvā smayotphulladṛg adrirājaṃ 
sa mantriṇau rāvaṇa ity uvāca 
{rāvaṇa uvāca 
ko vā girāv atra vasen mahātmā 
giriṃ nayāmy enam athādhi bhūmeḥ 
laṅkāgato ayaṃ girir āśu śobhāṃ 
laṅkāpi satyaṃ śriyam ātanoti 
{brahmovāca 
itthaṃ vaco rākṣasamantriṇau tau 
niśamya rakṣodhipateś ca bhāvam 
na yuktam ity ūcatur iṣṭabuddhyā 
niśācaras tadvacanaṃ na mene 
saṃsthāpya tat puṣpakam āśu rakṣaḥ 
puplāva kailāsagireś ca mūle 
hindolayām āsa giriṃ daśāsyo 
jñātvā bhavaḥ kṛtyam idaṃ cakāra 
jitvā digīśāṃś ca sagarvitasya 
kailāsam āndolayataḥ surāreḥ 
aṅguṣṭhakṛtyaiva rasātalādi 
lokāṃś ca yātasya daśānanasya 
ālūnakāyasya giraṃ niśamya 
vihasya devyā saha dattam iṣṭam 
tasmai prasannaḥ kupito api śaṃbhur 
ayuktadāteti na saṃśayo atra 
tato ayam āvāpya varān suvīro 
bhavaprasādāt kusumaṃ jagāma 
gacchan sa laṅkāṃ bhavapūjanāya 
gaṅgām agāc chaṃbhujaṭāprasūtām 
saṃpūjayitvā vividhaiś ca mantrair 
gaṅgājalaiḥ śaṃbhum adīnasattvaḥ 
asiṃ sa lebhe śaśikhaṇḍabhūṣāt 
siddhiṃ ca sarvarddhim abhīpsitāṃ ca 
maddattamantraṃ śaśirakṣaṇāya 
sa sādhayām āsa bhavaṃ prapūjya 
siddhe tu mantre punar eva laṅkām 
ayāt sa rakṣodhipatiḥ sa tuṣṭaḥ 
tataḥ prabhṛty etad atiprabhāvaṃ 
tīrthaṃ mahāsiddhidam iṣṭadaṃ ca 
samastapāpaughavināśanaṃ ca 
siddhair aśeṣaiḥ parisevitaṃ ca 
{brahmovāca 
paruṣṇīsaṃgamaṃ ceti tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।
tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu pāpavināśanam ।।
atrir ārādhayām āsa brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarān ।
teṣu tuṣṭeṣu sa prāha putrā yūyaṃ bhaviṣyatha ।।
tathā caikā rūpavatī kanyā mama bhavet surāḥ ।
tathā putratvam āpus te brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ ।।
kanyāṃ ca janayām āsa śubhātreyīti nāmataḥ ।
dattaḥ somo atha durvāsāḥ putrās tasya mahātmanaḥ ।।
agner aṅgiraso jāto hy aṅgārair aṅgirā yataḥ ।
tasmād aṅgirase prādād ātreyīm atirociṣam ।।
agneḥ prabhāvāt paruṣam ātreyīṃ sarvadāvadat ।
ātreyy api ca śuśrūṣāṃ kurvatī sarvadābhavat ।।
tasyām āṅgirasā jātā mahābalaparākramāḥ ।
aṅgirāḥ paruṣaṃ vādīd ātreyīṃ nityam eva ca ।।
