putrās tv āṅgirasā nityaṃ pitaraṃ śamayanti te ।
sā kadācid bhartṛvākyād udvignā paruṣākṣarāt ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭā dīnā prābravīc chvaśuraṃ gurum ।।
{ātreyy uvāca 
atrijāhaṃ havyavāha bhāryā tava sutasya vai ।
śuśrūṣaṇaparā nityaṃ putrāṇāṃ bhartur eva ca ।।
patir māṃ paruṣaṃ vakti vṛthaivodvīkṣate ruṣā ।
praśādhi māṃ surajyeṣṭha bhartāraṃ mama daivatam ।।
{jvalana uvāca 
aṅgārebhyaḥ samudbhūto bhartā te hy aṅgirā ṛṣiḥ ।
yathā śānto bhaved bhadre tathā nītir vidhīyatām ।।
āgneyo agniṃ samāyāto tava bhartā varānane ।
tadā tvaṃ jalarūpeṇa plāvayethā madājñayā ।।
{ātreyy uvāca 
saheyaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ mā bhartāgniṃ samāviśet ।
bhartari pratikūlānāṃ yoṣitāṃ jīvanena kim ।।
iccheyaṃ śāntivākyāni bhartāraṃ labhate tathā ।।
{jvalana uvāca 
agnis tv apsu śarīreṣu sthāvare jaṅgame tathā ।
tava bhartur ahaṃ dhāma nityaṃ ca janako mataḥ ।।
yo ahaṃ so aham iti jñātvā na cintāṃ kartum arhasi ।
kiṃ cāpo mātaro devyo hy agniḥ śvaśura ity api ।
iti buddhyā viniścitya mā viṣaṇṇā bhava snuṣe ।।
{snuṣovāca 
āpo jananya iti yad babhāṣe 
agner ahaṃ tava putrasya bhāryā 
kathaṃ bhūtvā jananī cāpi bhāryā 
viruddham etaj jalarūpeṇa nātha 
{jvalana uvāca 
ādau tu patnī bharaṇāt tu bhāryā 
janes tu jāyā svaguṇaiḥ kalatram 
ityādirūpāṇi bibharṣi bhadre 
kuruṣva vākyaṃ madudīritaṃ yat 
yo asyāṃ prajātaḥ sa tu putra eva 
sā tasya mātaiva na saṃśayo atra 
tasmād vadanti śrutitattvavijñāḥ 
sā naiva yoṣit tanaye abhijāte 
{brahmovāca 
śvaśurasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvātreyī tadaiva tat ।
āgneyaṃ rūpam āpannam ambhasāplāvayat patim ।।
ubhau tau daṃpatī brahman saṃgatau gāṅgavāriṇā ।
śāntarūpadharau cobhau daṃpatī saṃbabhūvatuḥ ।।
lakṣmyā yukto yathā viṣṇur umayā śaṃkaro yathā ।
rohiṇyā ca yathā candras tathābhūn mithunaṃ tadā ।।
bhartāraṃ plāvayantī sā dadhārāmbumayaṃ vapuḥ ।
paruṣṇī ceti vikhyātā gaṅgayā saṃgatā nadī ।।
gośatārpaṇajaṃ puṇyaṃ paruṣṇīsnānato bhavet ।
tatra cāṅgirasāś cakrur yajñāṃś ca bahudakṣiṇān ।।
tatra trīṇi sahasrāṇi tīrthāny āhuḥ purāṇagāḥ ।
ubhayos tīrayos tāta pṛthag yāgaphalaṃ viduḥ ।।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca vājapeyādhikaṃ matam ।
viśeṣatas tu gaṅgāyāḥ paruṣṇyā saha saṃgame ।।
snānadānādibhiḥ puṇyaṃ yat tad vaktuṃ na śakyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
mārkaṇḍeyaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ sarvapāpavimocanam ।
sarvakratuphalaṃ puṇyam aghaughavinivāraṇam ।।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada yatnataḥ ।
mārkaṇḍeyo bharadvājo vasiṣṭho atriś ca gautamaḥ ।।
yājñavalkyaś ca jābālir munayo anye api nārada ।
ete śāstrapraṇetāro vedavedāṅgapāragāḥ ।।
purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsā- kathāsu pariniṣṭhitāḥ ।
mithaḥ samūcur vidvāṃso muktiṃ prati yathāmati ।।
kecij jñānaṃ praśaṃsanti kecit karma tathobhayam ।
evaṃ vivadamānās te mām ūcur ubhayaṃ matam ।।
madīyaṃ tu mataṃ jñātvā yayuś cakragadādharam ।
tasya cāpi mataṃ jñātvā ṛṣayas te mahaujasaḥ ।।
punar vivadamānās te śaṃkaraṃ praṣṭum udyatāḥ ।
gaṅgāyāṃ ca bhavaṃ pūjya tam evārthaṃ śaśaṃsire ।।
karmaṇas tu pradhānatvam uvāca tripurāntakaḥ ।
kriyārūpaṃ ca taj jñānaṃ kriyā saiva tad ucyate ।।
tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni karmaṇā siddhim āpnuyuḥ ।
karmaiva viśvatovyāpi tadṛte nāsti kiṃcana ।।
vidyābhyāso yajñakṛtir yogābhyāsaḥ śivārcanam ।
sarvaṃ karmaiva nākarmī prāṇī kvāpy atra vidyate ।।
karmaiva kāraṇaṃ tasmād anyad unmattaceṣṭitam ।
ṛṣīṇāṃ yatra saṃvādo yatra devo maheśvaraḥ ।।
cakāra nirṇayaṃ sarvaṃ karmaṇāvāpyate nṛbhiḥ ।
mārkaṇḍaṃ mukhyataḥ kṛtvā tato mārkaṇḍam ucyate ।।
tīrtham ṛṣigaṇākīrṇaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare taṭe ।
pitṝṇāṃ pāvanaṃ puṇyaṃ smaraṇād api sarvadā ।।
tatrāṣṭau navatis tāta tīrthāny āha jaganmayaḥ ।
vedena cāpi tat proktam ṛṣayo menire ca tat ।।
{brahmovāca 
yāyātam aparaṃ tīrthaṃ yatra kālañjaraḥ śivaḥ ।
sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ tadvṛttam ucyate mayā ।।
yayātir nāhuṣo rājā sākṣād indra ivāparaḥ ।
tasya bhāryādvayaṃ cāsīt kulalakṣaṇabhūṣitam ।।
jyeṣṭhā tu devayānīti nāmnā śukrasutā śubhā ।
śarmiṣṭheti dvitīyā sā sutā syād vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ ।।
brāhmaṇy api mahāprājñā devayānī sumadhyamā ।
yayāter abhavad bhāryā sā tu śukraprasādataḥ ।।
śarmiṣṭhā cāpi tasyaiva bhāryā yā vṛṣaparvajā ।
devayānī śukrasutā dvau putrau samajījanat ।।
yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devaputrasamāv ubhau ।
śarmiṣṭhā ca nṛpāl lebhe trīn putrān devasaṃnibhān ।।
druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca yayāter nṛpasattamāt ।
devayānyāḥ sutau brahman sadṛśau śukrarūpataḥ ।।
śarmiṣṭhāyās tu tanayāḥ śakrāgnivaruṇaprabhāḥ ।
devayānī kadācit tu pitaraṃ prāha duḥkhitā ।।
{devayāny uvāca 
mama tv apatyadvitayam abhāgyāyā bhṛgūdvaha ।
mama dāsyāḥ sabhāgyāyā apatyatritayaṃ pitaḥ ।।
tad etad anumṛśyāyaṃ duḥkham atyantam āgatā ।
mariṣye dānavaguro yayātikṛtavipriyāt ।
mānabhaṅgād varaṃ tāta maraṇaṃ hi manasvinām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad etat putrikāvākyaṃ śrutvā śukraḥ pratāpavān ।
kupito abhyāyayau śīghraṃ yayātim idam abravīt ।।
{śukra uvāca 
yad idaṃ vipriyaṃ me tvaṃ sutāyāḥ kṛtavān asi ।
rūponmattena rājendra tasmād vṛddho bhaviṣyasi ।।
na ca bhoktuṃ na ca tyaktuṃ śaknoti viṣayāturaḥ ।
spṛhayan manasaivāste niḥśvāsocchvāsanaṣṭadhīḥ ।।
vṛddhatvam eva maraṇaṃ jīvatām api dehinām ।
tasmāc chīghraṃ prayāhi tvaṃ jarāṃ bhūpātidurdharām ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā yayātis tu śāpaṃ śukrasya dhīmataḥ ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭo rājā yayātiḥ śukram abravīt ।।
{yayātir uvāca 
nāparādhye na saṃkupye naivādharmaṃ pravartaye ।
adharmakāriṇaḥ pāpāḥ śāsyā eva mahātmanām ।।
dharmam eva carantaṃ vai kathaṃ māṃ śaptavān asi ।
devayānī dvijaśreṣṭha vṛthā māṃ vakti kiṃcana ।।
tasmān na mama viprendra śāpaṃ dātuṃ tvam arhasi ।
vidvāṃso api hi nirdoṣe yadi kupyanti mohitāḥ ।
tadā na doṣo mūrkhāṇāṃ dveṣāgnipluṣṭacetasām ।।
{brahmovāca 
yayātivākyāc chukro api sasmāra sutayā kṛtam ।
asakṛd vipriyaṃ tasya divā rātrau pracaṇḍayā ।।
gatakopo aham ity uktvā kāvyo rājānam abravīt ।।
{śukra uvāca 
jñātaṃ mayānayākāri vipriyaṃ na vade anṛtam ।
śāpasyemaṃ kariṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvānugrahaṃ nṛpa ।।
yasmai putrāya saṃdātuṃ jarām icchasi mānada ।
tasya sā yātv iyaṃ rājañ jarā putrāya madvarāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
punar yayātiḥ śvaśuraṃ śukraṃ prāha vinītavat ।।
{yayātir uvāca 
yo gṛhṇāti mayā dattāṃ jarāṃ bhaktisamanvitaḥ ।
sa rājā syād daityaguro tad etad anumanyatām ।।
yo madvākyaṃ nābhinandet suto daityaguro dṛḍham ।
taṃ śapeyam anujñātra dātavyaiva tvayā guro ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam astv iti rājānam uvāca bhṛgunandanaḥ ।
tato yayātiḥ svaṃ putram āhūyedaṃ vaco abravīt ।।
{yayātir uvāca 
yado gṛhāṇa me śāpāj jarāṃ jātāṃ suto bhavān ।
jyeṣṭhaḥ sarvārthavit prauḍhaḥ putrāṇāṃ dhuri saṃsthitaḥ ।
putrī tenaiva janako yas tadājñāvaśe sthitaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
nety uvāca yadus tātaṃ yayātiṃ bhūridakṣiṇam ।
yayātiś ca yaduṃ śaptvā turvasuṃ kāmam abravīt ।।
nāgṛhṇāt turvasuś cāpi pitrā dattāṃ jarāṃ tadā ।
taṃ śaptvā cābravīd druhyuṃ gṛhāṇemāṃ jarāṃ mama ।।
druhyuś ca naicchat tāṃ dattāṃ jarāṃ rūpavināśinīm ।
anum apy abravīd rājā gṛhāṇemāṃ jarāṃ mama ।।
anur neti tadovāca śaptvā taṃ pūrum abravīt ।
abhinandya tadā pūrur jarāṃ tāṃ jagṛhe pituḥ ।।
sahasram ekaṃ varṣāṇāṃ yāvat prīto abhavat pitā ।
yauvane yāni bhogyāni vastūni vividhāni ca ।।
putrayauvanasaṃtuṣṭo yayātir bubhuje sukham ।
tatas tṛpto abhavad rājā sarvabhogeṣu nāhuṣaḥ ।
tato harṣāt samāhūya pūruṃ putram athābravīt ।।
{yayātir uvāca 
tṛpto asmi sarvabhogeṣu yauvanena tavānagha ।
gṛhāṇa yauvanaṃ putra jarāṃ me dehi kaśmalām ।।
{brahmovāca 
nety uvāca tadā pūrur jarayā kṣīyate mayā ।
vikārās tāta bhāvānāṃ durnivārāḥ śarīriṇām ।।
balāt kālāgatā sahyā jarāpy akhiladehibhiḥ ।
sā ced gurūpakārāya gṛhītā tyajyate katham ।।
svīkṛtatyāgapāpād dhi dehināṃ maraṇaṃ varam ।
athavā tu jarāṃ rājaṃs tapasā nāśayāmy aham ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tu pitaraṃ yayau gaṅgām anuttamām ।
gautamyā dakṣiṇe pāre tatas tepe tapo mahat ।।
tataḥ prīto abhavad devaḥ kālena mahatā śivaḥ ।
lokātītamahodāra- guṇasanmaṇibhūṣitam ।
kiṃ dadāmīti taṃ prāha pūruṃ sa surasattamaḥ ।।
{pūrur uvāca 
śāpaprāptāṃ jarāṃ nātha pitur mama surādhipa ।
tāṃ nāśayasva deveśa pitṛśaptāṃś ca kopataḥ ।
madbhrātṝñ śāpato muktān kuruṣva surapūjita ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā jagannāthaḥ śāpāj jātāṃ jarāṃ tathā ।
anāśayaj jagannātho bhrātṝṃś cakre viśāpinaḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ jarārogavināśanam ।
akālajajarādīnāṃ smaraṇād api nāśanam ।।
tannāmnā cāpi vikhyātaṃ kālañjaram udāhṛtam ।
yāyātaṃ nāhuṣaṃ pauraṃ śaukraṃ śārmiṣṭham eva ca ।।
evamādīni tīrthāni tatrāṣṭottaram eva ca ।
śataṃ vidyān mahābuddhe sarvasiddhikaraṃ tathā ।।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca śravaṇaṃ paṭhanaṃ tathā ।
sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
apsaroyugam ākhyātam apsarāsaṃgamaṃ tataḥ ।
tīre ca dakṣiṇe puṇyaṃ smaraṇāt subhago bhavet ।।
mukto bhavaty asaṃdehaṃ tatra snānādinā naraḥ ।
strī satī saṃgame tasminn ṛtusnātā ca nārada ।।
vandhyāpi janayet putraṃ trimāsāt patinā saha ।
snānadānena vartantī nānyathā madvaco bhavet ।।
apsaroyugam ākhyātaṃ tīrthaṃ yena ca hetunā ।
tatredaṃ kāraṇaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu nārada yatnataḥ ।।
spardhāsīn mahatī brahman viśvāmitravasiṣṭhayoḥ ।
tapasyantaṃ gādhisutaṃ brāhmaṇyārthe yatavratam ।।
gaṅgādvāre samāsīnaṃ preritendreṇa menakā ।
taṃ gatvā tapaso bhraṣṭaṃ kuru bhadre mamājñayā ।।
tadoktendreṇa sā menā viśvāmitraṃ tapaścyutam ।
kṛtvā kanyāṃ tathā dattvā jagāmendrapuraṃ punaḥ ।।
tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ sasmāra gādhiputro akhilaṃ kṛtam ।
taṃ tu deśaṃ parityajya tīrthaṃ tu suravallabham ।।
jagāma dakṣiṇāṃ gaṅgāṃ yatra kālañjaro haraḥ ।
tapasyantaṃ tadovāca punar indraḥ sahasradṛk ।।
urvaśīṃ ca tato menāṃ rambhāṃ cāpi tilottamām ।
naivety ūcur bhayatrastāḥ punar āha śacīpatiḥ ।।
gambhīrāṃ cātigambhīrām ubhe ye garvite tadā ।
te ūcatur ubhe devaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ puraṃdaram ।।
{gambhīrātigambhīre ūcatuḥ 
āvāṃ gatvā tapasyantaṃ gādhiputraṃ mahādyutim ।
cyāvayāvo nṛtyagītai rūpayauvanasaṃpadā ।।
yāsām apāṅge hasite vāci vibhramasaṃpadi ।
nityaṃ vasati pañceṣus tābhiḥ ko atra na jīyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety ukte sahasrākṣe te āgatya mahānadīm ।
dadṛśāte tapasyantaṃ viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim ।।
mṛtyor api durādharṣaṃ bhūmistham iva dhūrjaṭim ।
sahasram ekaṃ varṣāṇām īkṣituṃ na ca śaknutaḥ ।।
dūre sthite nṛtyagīta- cāṭukārarate tadā ।
vilokya muniśārdūlas tataḥ kopākulo abhavat ।।
pratīpācaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhaḥ kasya na jāyate ।
nispṛho api mahābāhus tam indraṃ prahasann iva ।।
ābhyāṃ muktaḥ sahasrākṣo hy apsarobhyāṃ bruvann iva ।
śaśāpa te sa gādheyo dravarūpe bhaviṣyathaḥ ।।
dravituṃ māṃ samāyāte yatas tv iha tato laghu ।
tataḥ prasāditas tābhyāṃ śāpamokṣaṃ cakāra saḥ ।।
bhavetāṃ divyarūpe vāṃ gaṅgayā saṃgate yadā ।
tacchāpāt te nadīrūpe tatkṣaṇāt saṃbabhūvatuḥ ।।
apsaroyugam ākhyātaṃ nadīdvayam ato abhavat ।
tābhyāṃ parasparaṃ cāpi tābhyāṃ gaṅgāsusaṃgamaḥ ।।
sarvalokeṣu vikhyāto bhuktimuktipradaḥ śivaḥ ।
tatrāste dṛṣṭa evāsau sarvasiddhipradāyakaḥ ।।
tatra snātvā tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā mucyate sarvabandhanāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
koṭitīrtham iti khyātaṃ gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।
yasyānusmaraṇād eva sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
yatra koṭīśvaro devaḥ sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet ।
koṭidvayaṃ tatra pūrṇaṃ tīrthānāṃ śubhadāyinām ।।
tatra vyuṣṭiṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada tanmanāḥ ।
kaṇvasya tu suto jyeṣṭho bāhlīka iti viśrutaḥ ।।
kāṇvaś ceti janaiḥ khyāto vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ।
iṣṭīḥ pārvāyaṇānīr yāḥ sabhāryo vedapāragaḥ ।।
kurvann āste sa gautamyās tīrastho lokapūjitaḥ ।
prātaḥkāle sabhāryo asau juhvad agnau samāhitaḥ ।।
sarvadāste kadācit tu havanāya samudyataḥ ।
ekāhutiṃ sa hutvā tu samiddhe havyavāhane ।।
āhutyantaradānāya havir dravyaṃ kare agrahīt ।
etasminn antare vahnir upaśānto abhavat tadā ।।
tataś cintāparaḥ kāṇvaḥ kartavyaṃ kiṃ bhaved iti ।
antar vicārayām āsa viṣādaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ ।।
āhutyoś ca dvayor madhya upaśānto hutāśanaḥ ।
agnyantaram upādeyaṃ vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ tathā ।।
kva hoṣyaṃ syād dvitīyaṃ tu āhutyantaram eva ca ।
evaṃ mīmāṃsamāne tu daivī vāg abravīt tadā ।।
agnyantaraṃ naiva te atra upādeyaṃ bhaviṣyati ।
yāni tatra bhaviṣyanti śakalāni samīpataḥ ।।
ardhadagdheṣu kāṣṭheṣu viprarāja prahūyatām ।
nety uvāca tadā kāṇvaḥ saiva vāg abravīt punaḥ ।।
agneḥ putro hiraṇyas tu pitā putraḥ sa eva tu ।
putre dattaṃ priyāyaiva pituḥ prītyai bhaviṣyati ।।
pitre deyaṃ sute dadyāt koṭiprītiguṇaṃ bhavet ।
daivī vāg abravīd evaṃ tataḥ sarve maharṣayaḥ ।।
niścitya dharmasarvasvaṃ tathā cakrur yathoditam ।
etaj jñātvā jagaty atra putre dattaṃ pitur bhavet ।।
apatyādyupakāreṇa pitroḥ prītir yathā bhavet ।
tathā nānyena kenāpi jagaty etad dhi viśrutam ।।
suprasiddhaṃ jagaty etat sarvalokeṣu pūjitam ।
tasmin datte bhavet puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ suta ।।
manoglāninivṛttiś ca jāyate ca mahat sukham ।
punar apy āha sā vāṇī kāṇve asmiṃs tīrtha uttame ।।
abhavat tan mahat tīrthaṃ kāṇva puṇyaprabhāvataḥ ।
lokatrayāśrayāśeṣa- tīrthebhyo api mahāphalam ।।
snānadānādikaṃ kiṃcid bhaktyā kurvan samāhitaḥ ।
phalaṃ prāpsyasy aśeṣeṇa sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ mune ।।
yat kiṃcit kriyate cātra snānadānādikaṃ naraiḥ ।
sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ vidyāt koṭitīrthaṃ tato viduḥ ।।
yatraitad vṛttam āgneyaṃ kāṇvaṃ pautraṃ hiraṇyakam ।
vāṇīsaṃjñaṃ koṭitīrthaṃ koṭitīrthaphalaṃ yataḥ ।।
koṭitīrthasya māhātmyam atra vaktuṃ na śakyate ।
vācaspatiprabhṛtibhir athavānyaiḥ surair api ।।
yatrānuṣṭhīyamānaṃ hi sarvaṃ karma yathā tathā ।
godāvaryāḥ prasādena sarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet ।।
koṭitīrthe dvijāgryāya gām ekāṃ yaḥ prayacchati ।
tasya tīrthasya māhātmyād gokoṭiphalam aśnute ।।
tasmiṃs tīrthe śucir bhūtvā bhūmidānaṃ karoti yaḥ ।
śraddhāyuktena manasā syāt tatkoṭiguṇottaram ।।
sarvatra gautamītīre pitṝṇāṃ dānam uttamam ।
viśeṣataḥ koṭitīrthe tad anantaphalapradam ।
atraikanyūnapañcāśat tīrthāni munayo viduḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
nārasiṃham iti khyātaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare taṭe ।
tasyānubhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi sarvarakṣāvidhāyakam ।।
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ pūrvam abhavad balināṃ varaḥ ।
tapasā vikrameṇāpi devānām aparājitaḥ ।।
haribhaktātmajadveṣa- kaluṣīkṛtamānasaḥ ।
āvirbhūya sabhāstambhād viśvātmatvaṃ pradarśayan ।।
taṃ hatvā narasiṃhas tat- sainyam adrāvayat tadā ।
sarvān hatvā mahādaityān krameṇājau mahāmṛgaḥ ।।
rasātalasthāñ śatrūṃś ca jitvā svarlokam īyivān ।
tatra jitvā bhuvaṃ gatvā daityān hatvā nagasthitān ।।
samudrasthān nadīsaṃsthān grāmasthān vanavāsinaḥ ।
nānārūpadharān daityān nijaghāna mṛgākṛtiḥ ।।
ākāśagān vāyusaṃsthāñ jyotirlokam upāgatān ।
vajrapātādhikanakhaḥ samuddhūtamahāsaṭaḥ ।।
daityagarbhasrāvigarjī nirjitāśeṣarākṣasaḥ ।
mahānādair vīkṣitaiś ca pralayānalasaṃnibhaiḥ ।।
capeṭair aṅgavikṣepair asurān paryacūrṇayat ।
evaṃ hatvā bahuvidhān gautamīm agamad dhariḥ ।।
svapadāmbujasaṃbhūtāṃ manonayananandinīm ।
tatrāmbarya iti khyāto daṇḍakādhipate ripuḥ ।।
devānāṃ durjayo yoddhā balena mahatāvṛtaḥ ।
tenābhavan mahāraudraṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam ।।
śastrāstravarṣaṇaṃ yuddhaṃ hariṇā daityasūnunā ।
nijaghāna hariḥ śrīmāṃs taṃ ripuṃ hy uttare taṭe ।।
gaṅgāyāṃ nārasiṃhaṃ tu tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।
snānadānādikaṃ tatra sarvapāpagrahārdanam ।।
sarvarakṣākaraṃ nityaṃ jarāmaraṇavāraṇam ।
yathā surāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ na kopi hariṇā samaḥ ।।
tīrthānām apy aśeṣāṇāṃ tathā tat tīrtham uttamam ।
tatra tīrthe naraḥ snātvā kuryān nṛharipūjanam ।।
svarge martye tale vāpi tasya kiṃcin na durlabham ।
ityādy aṣṭau mune tatra mahātīrthāni nārada ।।
pṛthak pṛthak tīrthakoṭi- phalam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
aśraddhayāpi yannāmni smṛte sarvāghasaṃkṣayaḥ ।।
bhavet sākṣān nṛsiṃho asau sarvadā yatra saṃsthitaḥ ।
tat tīrthasevāsaṃjātaṃ phalaṃ kair iha varṇyate ।।
yathā na devo nṛharer adhikaḥ kvāpi vartate ।
tathā nṛsiṃhatīrthena samaṃ tīrthaṃ na kutracit ।।
{brahmovāca 
paiśācaṃ tīrtham ākhyātaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare taṭe ।
piśācatvāt purā vipro muktim āpa mahāmate ।।
suyavasyātmajo loke jīgartir iti viśrutaḥ ।
kuṭumbabhāraduḥkhārto durbhikṣeṇa tu pīḍitaḥ ।।
madhyamaṃ tu śunaḥśepaṃ putraṃ brahmavidāṃ varam ।
vikrītavān kṣatriyāya vadhāya bahulair dhanaiḥ ।।
kiṃ nāmāpadgataḥ pāpaṃ nācaraty api paṇḍitaḥ ।
śamitṛtve dhanaṃ cāpi jagṛhe bahulaṃ muniḥ ।।
vidāraṇārthaṃ ca dhanaṃ jagṛhe brāhmaṇādhamaḥ ।
tato apratisamādheya- mahāroganipīḍitaḥ ।।
sa mṛtaḥ kālaparyāye narakeṣv atha pātitaḥ ।
bhogād ṛte na kṣayo asti prāktanānām ihāṃhasām ।।
kiṃkarair yamavākyena bahuyonyantaraṃ gataḥ ।
tataḥ piśāco hy abhavad dāruṇo dāruṇākṛtiḥ ।।
śuṣkakāṣṭheṣv athāraṇye nirjale nirjane tathā ।
grīṣme grīṣmadavavyāpte kṣipyate yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
kanyāputramahīvāji- gavāṃ vikrayakāriṇaḥ ।
narakān na nivartante yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।।
svakṛtāghavipākena dāruṇair yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
saṃghāte pacyamāno asau rurodoccaiḥ kṛtaṃ smaran ।।
pathi gacchan kadācit sa jīgarter madhyamaḥ sutaḥ ।
śuśrāva rudato vāṇīṃ piśācasya muhur muhuḥ ।।
putrakretur brahmahantur jīgartes tu pitus tadā ।
pāpinaḥ putravikretur brahmahantuḥ pituś ca tām ।।
śunaḥśepas tadovāca ko bhavān atiduḥkhitaḥ ।
jīgartir abravīd duḥkhāc chunaḥśepapitā hy aham ।।
pāpīyasīṃ kriyāṃ kṛtvā yoniṃ prāpto asmi dāruṇām ।
narakeṣv atha pakvaś ca punaḥ prāpto antarālakam ।
ye ye duṣkṛtakarmāṇas teṣāṃ teṣām iyaṃ gatiḥ ।।
jīgartiputras tam uvāca duḥkhāt 
so ahaṃ sutas te mama doṣeṇa tāta 
vikrītvā māṃ narakān evam āptas 
tataḥ kariṣye svargataṃ tvām idānīm 
evaṃ pratijñāya sa gādhiputra 
putratvam āpto atha munipravīraḥ 
gaṅgām abhidhyāya pituś ca lokān 
anuttamān īhamāno jagāma 
aśeṣaduḥkhānaladhūpitānāṃ 
nimajjatāṃ mohamahāsamudre 
śarīriṇāṃ nānyad aho trilokyām 
ālambanaṃ viṣṇupadīṃ vihāya 
evaṃ viniścitya munir mahātmā 
samuddidhīrṣuḥ pitaraṃ sa durgateḥ 
śucis tato gautamīm āśu gatvā 
tatra snātvā saṃsmarañ chaṃbhuviṣṇū 
dadau jalaṃ pretarūpāya pitre 
piśācarūpāya suduḥkhitāya 
taddānamātreṇa tadaiva pūto 
jīgartir āvāpa vapuḥ supuṇyam 
vimānayuktaḥ surasaṃghajuṣṭaṃ 
viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prāpa sutaprabhāvāt 
gaṅgāprabhāvāc ca hareś ca śaṃbhor 
vidhātur arkāyutatulyatejāḥ 
tataḥ prabhṛty etad atiprasiddhaṃ 
paiśācanāśaṃ ca mahāgadaṃ ca 
mahānti pāpāni ca nāśam āśu 
prayānti yasya smaraṇena puṃsām 
tīrthasya cedaṃ gaditaṃ tavādya 
māhātmyam etat triśatāni yatra 
tīrthāny athānyāni bhavanti bhukti 
muktipradāyīni kim anyad atra 
sarvasiddhidam ākhyātam ityādy atra śatatrayam ।
tīrthānāṃ munijuṣṭānāṃ smaraṇād apy abhīṣṭadam ।।
{brahmovāca 
nimnabhedam iti khyātaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।
gaṅgāyā uttare pāre tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।।
yasya saṃsmaraṇenāpi sarvapāpakṣayo bhavet ।
vedadvīpaś ca tatraiva darśanād vedavid bhavet ।।
urvaśīṃ cakame rājā ailaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।
ko na moham upāyāti vilokya madirekṣaṇām ।।
sā prāyād yatra rājāsau ghṛtaṃ stokaṃ samaśnute ।
ānagnadarśanāt kṛtvā tasyāḥ kālāvadhiṃ nṛpaḥ ।।
tāṃ svīcakāra lalanāṃ yūnāṃ ramyāṃ navāṃ navām ।
suptāyāṃ śayane tasyāṃ samuttasthau purūravāḥ ।।
vilokya taṃ vivasanaṃ tadaivāsau vinirgatā ।
vidyuccañcalacittānāṃ kva sthairyaṃ nanu yoṣitām ।।
īkṣāṃ cakre sa śarvaryāṃ vivastro vismito mahān ।
etasminn antare rājā yuddhāyāgād ripūn prati ।।
tāñ jitvā punar apy āgād devalokaṃ supūjitam ।
sa cāgatya mahārājo vasiṣṭhāc ca purodhasaḥ ।।
urvaśyā gamanaṃ śrutvā tato duḥkhasamanvitaḥ ।
na juhoti na cāśnāti na śṛṇoti na paśyati ।।
etasminn antare tatra mṛtāvasthaṃ nṛpottamam ।
bodhayām āsa vākyaiś ca hetubhūtaiḥ purohitaḥ ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
sā mṛtādya mahārāja mā vyathasva mahāmate ।
evaṃ sthitaṃ tu mā tvāṃ vai aśivāḥ spṛśyur āśugāḥ ।।
na vai straiṇāni jānīṣe hṛdayāni mahāmate ।
śālāvṛkāṇāṃ yādṝṃśi tasmāt tvaṃ bhūpa mā śucaḥ ।।
ko nāma loke rājendra kāminībhir na vañcitaḥ ।
vañcakatvaṃ nṛśaṃsatvaṃ cañcalatvaṃ kuśīlatā ।।
iti svābhāvikaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ kathaṃ sukhahetavaḥ ।
kālena ko na nihataḥ ko arthī gauravam āgataḥ ।।
śriyā na bhrāmitaḥ ko vā yoṣidbhiḥ ko na khaṇḍitaḥ ।
svapnamāyopamā rājan madaviplutacetasaḥ ।।
sukhāya yoṣitaḥ kasya jñātvaitad vijvaro bhava ।
vihāya śaṃkaraṃ viṣṇuṃ gautamīṃ vā mahāmate ।
duḥkhināṃ śaraṇaṃ nānyad vidyate bhuvanatraye ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā tato rājā duḥkhaṃ saṃhṛtya yatnataḥ ।
gautamyā madhyasaṃstho asāv ailaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।।
tatra cārādhayām āsa śivaṃ devaṃ janārdanam ।
brahmāṇaṃ bhāskaraṃ gaṅgāṃ devān anyāṃś ca yatnataḥ ।।
yo vipanno na tīrthāni devatāś ca na sevate ।
sa kālavaśago jantuḥ kāṃ daśām anuyāsyati ।।
tadīśvaraikaśaraṇo gautamīsevanotsukaḥ ।
parāṃ śraddhām upagataḥ saṃsārāsthāparāṅmukhaḥ ।।
īje yajñāṃś ca bahulān ṛtvigbhir bahudakṣiṇān ।
vedadvīpo abhavat tena yajñadvīpaḥ sa ucyate ।।
paurṇamāsyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ tatrāyāti sadorvaśī ।
tasya dīpasya yaḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam atho naraḥ ।।
pradakṣiṇīkṛtā tena pṛthivī sāgarāmbarā ।
vedānāṃ smaraṇaṃ tatra yajñānāṃ smaraṇaṃ tathā ।।
sukṛtī tatra yaḥ kuryād vedayajñaphalaṃ labhet ।
ailatīrthaṃ tu taj jñeyaṃ tad eva ca purūravam ।।
vāsiṣṭhaṃ cāpi tat tu syān nimnabhedaṃ tad ucyate ।
aile rājñi na kiṃcit syān nimnaṃ sarveṣu karmasu ।।
yad etan nimnam urvaśyāṃ sarvabhāvena vartanam ।
tac cāpi bheditaṃ nimnaṃ vasiṣṭhena ca gaṅgayā ।।
nimnabhedam abhūt tena dṛṣṭādṛṣṭeṣṭasiddhidam ।
tatra sapta śatāny āhus tīrthāni guṇavanti ca ।।
teṣu snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakratuphalapradam ।
snānaṃ kṛtvā nimnabhede yaḥ paśyati surān imān ।।
iha cāmutra vā nimnaṃ na kiṃcit tasya vidyate ।
sarvonnatim avāpyāsau modate divi śakravat ।।
{brahmovāca 
nandītaṭam iti khyātaṃ tīrthaṃ vedavido viduḥ ।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu yatnena nārada ।।
atriputro mahātejāś candramā iti viśrutaḥ ।
sarvān vedāṃś ca vidhivad dhanurvedaṃ yathāvidhi ।।
adhītya jīvāt sarvāś ca vidyāś cānyā mahāmate ।
gurupūjāṃ karomīti jīvam āha sa candramāḥ ।
bṛhaspatis tadā prāha candraṃ śiṣyaṃ mudānvitaḥ ।।
{bṛhaspatir uvāca 
mama priyā tu jānīte tārā ratisamaprabhā ।।
{brahmovāca 
praṣṭuṃ tāṃ ca tadā prāyād antar veśma sa candramāḥ ।
tārāṃ tārāmukhīṃ dṛṣṭvā jagṛhe tāṃ kareṇa saḥ ।।
svaveśma prati tāṃ lobhād balād ākarṣayat tadā ।
tāvad dhairyanidhir jñānī matimān vijitendriyaḥ ।।
yāvan na kāminīnetra- vāgurābhir nibadhyate ।
viśeṣato rahaḥsaṃsthāṃ kāminīm āyatekṣaṇām ।।
vilokya na mano yāti kasya kāmeṣu vaśyatām ।
ata evānyapuruṣa- darśanaṃ na kadācana ।।
kulavadhvā rahaḥ kāryaṃ bhītayā śīlavipluteḥ ।
vijñāya tat parijanāt sahasotthāya nirgataḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā tad duṣkṛtaṃ karma bṛhaspatir udāradhīḥ ।
śaśāpa kopāc cākṣipya vāgbhir vipriyakāribhiḥ ।।
parābhibhūtām ālokya kāntāṃ kaḥ soḍhum īśvaraḥ ।
yuyudhe tena jīvo api devaś candramasā ruṣā ।।
na śāpair hanyate candro nāyudhaiḥ suramantritaiḥ ।
bṛhaspatipraṇītaiś ca na mantrair hanyate śaśī ।।
tadā candras tu tāṃ tārāṃ nītvā saṃsthāpya mandire ।
bubhuje bahuvarṣāṇi rohiṇīṃ cākutobhayaḥ ।।
na jīyeta tadā devair na kopaiḥ śāpamantrakaiḥ ।
na rājabhir na ṛṣibhir na sāmnā bhedadaṇḍanaiḥ ।।
yadā bhāryāṃ na lebhe asau guruḥ sarvaprayatnataḥ ।
sarvopāyakṣaye jīvas tadā nītim athāsmarat ।।
apamānaṃ puraskṛtya mānaṃ kṛtvā tu pṛṣṭhataḥ ।
svārtham uddharate prājñaḥ svārthabhraṃśo hi mūrkhatā ।।
sādhyaṃ kenāpy upāyena jānadbhiḥ puruṣaiḥ phalam ।
vṛthābhimāninaḥ śīghraṃ vipadyante vimohitāḥ ।।
evaṃ niścitya medhāvī śukraṃ gatvā nyavedayat ।
tam āgataṃ kavir jñātvā saṃmānenābhyanandayat ।।
upaviṣṭaṃ suviśrāntaṃ pūjitaṃ ca yathāvidhi ।
paryapṛcchad daityagurus tadāgamanakāraṇam ।।
gṛhāgatasya vimukhāḥ śatravo apy uttamā nahi ।
tasmai sa vistareṇāha bhāryāharaṇam āditaḥ ।।
bṛhaspates tadā vākyaṃ śrutvā kopānvitaḥ kaviḥ ।
aparādhaṃ tu candrasya mene śiṣyasya nārada ।
atikramam imaṃ śrutvā kopāt kavir athābravīt ।।
{śukra uvāca 
tadā bhokṣye tadā pāsye tadā svapsye tadā vade ।
yadānaye priyāṃ bhrātas tava bhāryāṃ parārditām ।।
tām ānīya bhavaṃ pūjya candraṃ śaptvā gurudruham ।
paścād bhokṣye mahābāho śṛṇu vācaṃ graheśvara ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā sa jīvena daityācāryo jagāma ha ।
śivam ārādhya yatnena paraṃ sāmarthyam āptavān ।।
varān avāpya vividhāñ śaṃkarād bhāvapūjitāt ।
śivaprasādāt kiṃ nāma dehinām iha durlabham ।।
jagāma śukro jīvena tārayā yatra candramāḥ ।
vartate taṃ śaśāpoccaiḥ śṛṇu tvaṃ candra me vacaḥ ।।
yasmāt pāpataraṃ karma tvayā pāpa madāt kṛtam ।
kuṣṭhī bhūyās tataś candraṃ śaśāpaivaṃ ruṣā kaviḥ ।।
kaviśāpapradagdho abhūt tadaiva mṛgalāñchanaḥ ।
prāpuḥ kṣayaṃ na ke nāma gurusvāmisakhidruhaḥ ।।
tatyāja tāṃ sa candro api tāṃ tārāṃ jagṛhe kaviḥ ।
śukro api devān āhūya ṛṣīn pitṛgaṇāṃs tathā ।।
nadīr nadāṃś ca vividhān oṣadhīś ca pativratāḥ ।
tataḥ saṃpraṣṭum ārebhe tārāvṛttaviniṣkrayam ।।
tataḥ śrutiḥ surān āha gautamyāṃ bhaktitas tv iyam ।
snānaṃ karotu jīvena tārā pūtā bhaviṣyati ।।
rahasyam etat paramaṃ na kathyaṃ yasya kasyacit ।
sarvāsv api daśāsv eha śaraṇaṃ gautamī nṛṇām ।।
tathākaroc caiva tārā bhartrā snānaṃ yathāvidhi ।
puṣpavṛṣṭir abhūt tatra jayaśabdo vyavartata ।।
punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā uta ।
rājānaḥ satyaṃ kṛṇvānā brahmajāyāṃ punar daduḥ ।।
punar dattvā brahmajāyāṃ kṛtāṃ devair akalmaṣām ।
sarvaṃ kṣemam abhūt tatra tasmāt tīrthaṃ mahāmune ।।
punar dattvā brahmajāyāṃ kṛtāṃ devair akalmaṣām 
sarvaṃ kṣemam abhūt tatra tasmāt tīrthaṃ mahāmune 
tad abhūt sakalāghaughadhvaṃsanaṃ sarvakāmadam 
ānandaṃ kṣemam abhavat surāṇām asurāriṇām 
bṛhaspateś ca śukrasya tārāyāś ca viśeṣataḥ ।
paramānandam āpanno gurur gaṅgām abhāṣata ।।
{gurur uvāca 
tvaṃ gautami sadā pūjyā sarveṣām api muktidā ।
viśeṣatas tu siṃhasthe mayi trailokyapāvanī ।।
bhaviṣyasi saricchreṣṭhe sarvatīrthaiḥ samanvitā ।
yāni kāni ca tīrthāni svargamṛtyurasātale ।
tvāṃ snātuṃ tāni yāsyanti mayi siṃhasthite ambike ।।
{brahmovāca 
dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam ārogyaśrīvivardhanam ।
saubhāgyaiśvaryajananaṃ tīrtham ānandanāmakam ।।
tatra pañca sahasrāṇi tīrthāny āha sa gautamaḥ ।
smaraṇāt paṭhanād vāpi iṣṭaiḥ saṃyujyate sadā ।।
śivasyātra niviṣṭasya nandī gaṅgātaṭe aniśam ।
sākṣāc caraty asau dharmas tasmān nandītaṭaṃ smṛtam ।
ānandam api tat tīrthaṃ sarvānandavivardhanāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhāvatīrtham iti proktaṃ yatra sākṣād bhavaḥ sthitaḥ ।
aśeṣajagadantastho bhūtātmā saccidākṛtiḥ ।।
tatremāṃ śṛṇu vakṣyāmi kathāṃ puṇyatamāṃ śubhām ।
sūryavaṃśakaraḥ śrīmān kṣatriyāṇāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ ।।
prācīnabarhir ākhyātaḥ sarvadharmeṣu pāragaḥ ।
tisraḥ koṭyo ardhakoṭiś ca varṣāṇāṃ rājya āsthitaḥ ।।
tasyedṛśaṃ vrataṃ cāsīd yad ahaṃ yauvanacyutaḥ ।
bhaveyaṃ priyayā vāpi putrair vā priyavastubhiḥ ।।
viyujyeyaṃ tato rājyaṃ tyakṣye ahaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ।
vivekināṃ kulīnānām idam evocitaṃ nṛṇām ।।
sthīyate vijane kvāpi viraktair vibhavakṣaye ।
tasmin praśāsati mahīṃ na viyogaḥ priyaiḥ kvacit ।।
nādhivyādhī na durbhikṣaṃ na bandhukalaho nṛṇām ।
tasmiñ śāsati rājyaṃ tu na ca kaścid viyujyate ।।
tataḥ putrārtham akarod yajñaṃ rājā mahāmatiḥ ।
tataḥ prasanno bhagavān varaṃ prādād yathepsitam ।।
gautamītīrasaṃsthāya rājñe devo maheśvaraḥ ।
putraṃ dehīti rājā vai bhavaṃ prāha sa bhāryayā ।।
bhavaḥ prāha nṛpaṃ prītyā paśya netraṃ tṛtīyakam ।
tataḥ paśyati rājendre bhavasyākṣi tu mānada ।।
cakṣurdīptyābhavat putro mahimā nāma viśrutaḥ ।
yenākāri stutiḥ puṇyā mahimna iti viśrutā ।।
kim alabhyaṃ bhagavati prasanne tripurāntake ।
yaṃ nityam anuvartante haribrahmādayaḥ surāḥ ।।
prāptaputraś ca nṛpatis tīrthaśraiṣṭhyam ayācata ।
mahāpāpamahāroga- mahāvyasanināṃ nṛṇām ।।
nānāvipadgaṇārtānāṃ sarvābhimatalabdhaye ।
prādāj jyaiṣṭhyaṃ bhavaś cāpi bhāvatīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
tatra snānena dānena sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt ।
bhavaprasādād abhavat sutaḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ ।।
mahimā gautamītīre bhāvatīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।
tatra saptati tīrthāni puṇyāny akhiladāni ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
sahasrakuṇḍam ākhyātaṃ tīrthaṃ vedavido viduḥ ।
yasya smaraṇamātreṇa sukhī saṃpadyate naraḥ ।।
purā dāśarathī rāmaḥ setuṃ baddhvā mahārṇave ।
laṅkāṃ dagdhvā ripūn hatvā rāvaṇādīn raṇe śaraiḥ ।।
vaidehīṃ ca samāsādya rāmo vacanam abravīt ।
paśyatsu lokapāleṣu tasyācārye puraḥ sthite ।।
agnau śuddhigatāṃ sītāṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇasaṃnidhau ।
ehi vaidehi śuddhāsi aṅkam āroḍhum arhasi ।।
nety uvāca tadā śrīmān aṅgado hanumāṃs tathā ।
ayodhyāyāṃ tu vaidehi sārdhaṃ yāmaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ ।।
tatra śuddhim avāpyātha punar bhrātṛṣu mātṛṣu ।
laukikeṣv api paśyatsu tataḥ śuddhā nṛpātmajā ।।
ayodhyāyāṃ supuṇye ahni aṅkam āroḍhum arhasi ।
asyāś caritraviṣaye saṃdehaḥ kasya jāyate ।।
lokāpavādas tad api nirasyaḥ svajaneṣu hi ।
tayor vākyam anādṛtya lakṣmaṇaḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ ।।
rāmaś ca jāmbavāṃś caiva tām āhvayan nṛpātmajām ।
svastīty uktā devatābhī rājño aṅkaṃ cāruroha sā ।।
muditās te yayuḥ śīghraṃ puṣpakeṇa virājatā ।
ayodhyāṃ nagarīṃ prāpya tathā rājyaṃ svakaṃ tu yat ।।
muditās te abhavan sarve sadā rāmānuvartinaḥ ।
tataḥ katipayāheṣu anāryebhyo virūpikām ।।
vācaṃ śrutvā sa tatyāja gurviṇīṃ tām ayonijām ।
mithyāpavādam api hi na sahante kulonnatāḥ ।।
vālmīker munimukhyasya āśramasya samīpataḥ ।
tatyāja lakṣmaṇaḥ sītām aduṣṭāṃ rudatīṃ rudan ।।
nollaṅghyājñā gurūṇām ity asau tad akarod bhiyā ।
tataḥ katipayāheṣu vyatīteṣu nṛpātmajaḥ ।।
rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ hayamedhāya dīkṣitaḥ ।
tatraivājagmatur ubhau rāmaputrau yaśasvinau ।।
lavaḥ kuśaś ca vikhyātau nāradāv iva gāyakau ।
rāmāyaṇaṃ samagraṃ tad gandharvāv iva susvarau ।।
rāmasya caritaṃ sarvaṃ gāyamānau samīyatuḥ ।
yajñavāṭaṃ rājasutau hetubhir lakṣitau tadā ।।
rāmaputrāv ubhau śūrau vaidehyās tanayāv iti ।
tāv ānīya tataḥ putrāv abhiṣicya yathākramam ।।
aṅkārūḍhau tataḥ kṛtvā sasvaje tau punaḥ punaḥ ।
saṃsāraduḥkhakhinnānām agatīnāṃ śarīriṇām ।।
putrāliṅganam evātra paraṃ viśrāntikāraṇam ।
muhur āliṅgya tau putrau muhuḥ svajati cumbati ।।
kim apy antar dhyāyati ca niḥśvasaty api vai muhuḥ ।
etasminn antare prāptā rākṣasā laṅkavāsinaḥ ।।
sugrīvo hanumāṃś caiva aṅgado jāmbavāṃs tathā ।
anye ca vānarāḥ sarve vibhīṣaṇapuraḥsarāḥ ।।
te cāgatya nṛpaṃ prāptāḥ siṃhāsanam upasthitam ।
sītām adṛṣṭvā hanumān aṅgadaḥ kanakāṅgadaḥ ।।
kva gatāyonijā mātā eko rāmo atra dṛśyate ।
rāmeṇa sā parityaktā ity ūcur dvārapālakāḥ ।।
paśyatsu lokapāleṣu ārye tatra pravādini ।
agnau śuddhigatāṃ sītāṃ kiṃ tu rājā niraṅkuśaḥ ।।
utpannair laukikair vākyai rāmas tyajati tāṃ priyām ।
mariṣyāva iti hy uktvā gautamīṃ punar īyatuḥ ।।
rāmas tau pṛṣṭhato abhyetya ayodhyāvāsibhiḥ saha ।
āgatya gautamīṃ tatra akurvaṃs te paramaṃ tapaḥ ।।
smāraṃ smāraṃ niśvasantas tāṃ sītāṃ lokamātaram ।
saṃsārāsthāvirahitā gautamīsevanotsukāḥ ।।
lokatrayapatiḥ sākṣād rāmo anujasamanvitaḥ ।
prāptaḥ snātvā ca gautamyāṃ śivārādhanatatparaḥ ।।
paritāpaṃ jahau sarvaṃ sahasraparivāritaḥ ।
yatra cāsīt sa vṛttāntaḥ sahasrakuṇḍam ucyate ।।
daśāparāṇi tīrthāni tatra sarvārthadāni ca ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sahasraphaladāyakam ।।
yatra śrīgautamītīre vasiṣṭhādimunīśvaraiḥ ।
sarvāpattārakaṃ homam akārayad aghāntakam ।।
sahasrasaṃkhyāyukteṣu kuṇḍeṣu vasudhārayā ।
sarvān apekṣitān kāmān avāpāsau mahātapāḥ ।।
gautamyāḥ saridambāyāḥ prasādād rākṣasāntakaḥ ।
sahasrakuṇḍābhidhaṃ tad abhūt tīrthaṃ mahāphalam ।।
{brahmovāca 
kapilatīrtham ākhyātaṃ tad evāṅgirasaṃ smṛtam ।
tad evādityam ākhyātaṃ saiṃhikeyaṃ tad ucyate ।।
gautamyā dakṣiṇe pāre ādityān munisattama ।
ayājayann aṅgiraso dakṣiṇāṃ te bhuvaṃ daduḥ ।।
aṅgirobhyas tadādityās tapase aṅgiraso yayuḥ ।
sā bhūmiḥ saiṃhikī bhūtvā janān sarvān abhakṣayat ।।
tatrasus te janāḥ sarve aṅgirobhyo nyavedayan ।
vibhītā jñānato jñātvā bhuvaṃ tāṃ saiṃhikīm iti ।।
ādityān anugatvātha vācam aṅgiraso abruvan ।
bhuvaṃ gṛhṇantu yā dattā nety ādityās tadābruvan ।।
nivṛttāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ naiva pratigṛhṇanti sūrayaḥ ।
svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo hareta vasuṃdharām ।।
ṣaṣṭir varṣasahasrāṇi viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate kṛmiḥ ।
bhūmeḥ svaparadattāyā haraṇān nādhikaṃ kvacit ।।
pāpam asti mahāraudraṃ na svīkurmaḥ punas tu tām ।
evaṃ yadā svadattāyā haraṇe kiṃ tadā bhavet ।।
tathāpi krayarūpeṇa gṛhṇīmo dakṣiṇāṃ bhuvam ।
tathety ukte tu te devāḥ kapilāṃ śubhalakṣaṇām ।।
gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe pāre bhuvaḥ sthāne tu tāṃ daduḥ ।
bhuktimuktipradaḥ sākṣād viṣṇus tiṣṭhati mūrtimān ।।
kapilāsaṃgamaṃ tac ca sarvāghaughavināśanam ।
tatrābhavad dānatoyād āpagā kapilābhidhā ।।
sasyavatyā api bhuvo dānād godānam uttamam ।
lokarakṣāṃ cakārāsau kṛtvā vinimayaṃ muniḥ ।।
yatra tīrthe ca tad vṛttaṃ gotīrthaṃ tad udāhṛtam ।
puṇyadaṃ tatra tīrthānāṃ śatam uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ ।।
tatra snānena dānena bhūmidānaphalaṃ labhet ।
saṃgatā gaṅgayā tac ca kapilāsaṃgamaṃ viduḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śaṅkhahradaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ yatra śaṅkhagadādharaḥ ।
tatra snātvā ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā mucyate bhavabandhanāt ।।
tatredaṃ vṛttam ākhyāsye bhuktimuktipradāyakam ।
purā kṛtayugasyādau brahmaṇaḥ sāmagāyinaḥ ।।
brahmāṇḍāgārasaṃbhūtā rākṣasā bahurūpiṇaḥ ।
brahmāṇaṃ khādituṃ prāptā balonmattā dhṛtāyudhāḥ ।।
tadāham abravaṃ viṣṇuṃ rakṣaṇāya jagadgurum ।
sa viṣṇus tāni rakṣāṃsi hantuṃ cakreṇa codyataḥ ।।
chittvā cakreṇa rakṣāṃsi śaṅkham āpūrayat tadā ।
niṣkaṇṭakaṃ talaṃ kṛtvā svargaṃ nirvairam eva ca ।।
tato harṣaprakarṣeṇa śaṅkham āpūrayad dhariḥ ।
tato rakṣāṃsi sarvāṇi hy anīnaśur aśeṣataḥ ।।
yatraitad vṛttam akhilaṃ viṣṇuśaṅkhaprabhāvataḥ ।
śaṅkhatīrthaṃ tu tat proktaṃ sarvakṣemakaraṃ nṛṇām ।।
sarvābhīṣṭapradaṃ puṇyaṃ smaraṇān maṅgalapradam ।
āyurārogyajananaṃ lakṣmīputrapravardhanam ।।
smaraṇāt paṭhanād vāpi sarvakāmān avāpnuyāt ।
tīrthānām ayutaṃ tatra sarvapāpanudaṃ mune ।।
tīrthāny ayutasaṃkhyāni sarvapāpaharāṇi ca ।
yeṣāṃ prabhāvaṃ jānāti vaktuṃ devo maheśvaraḥ ।।
pāpakṣayapratinidhir naitebhyo asty aparaḥ kvacit ।।
{brahmovāca 
kiṣkindhātīrtham ākhyātaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām ।
sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ yatra saṃnihito bhavaḥ ।।
tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi yatnena śṛṇu nārada ।
purā dāśarathī rāmo rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam ।।
kiṣkindhāvāsibhiḥ sārdhaṃ jaghāna raṇamūrdhani ।
saputraṃ sabalaṃ hatvā sītām ādāya śatruhā ।।
bhrātrā saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ vānaraiś ca mahābalaiḥ ।
vibhīṣaṇena balinā devaiḥ pratyāgato nṛpaḥ ।।
kṛtasvastyayanaḥ śrīmān puṣpakeṇa virājitaḥ ।
yad āsīd dhanarājasya kāmagenāśugāminā ।।
ayodhyām agaman sarve gacchan gaṅgām apaśyata ।
rāmo virāmaḥ śatrūṇāṃ śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇārthinām ।।
gautamīṃ tu jagatpuṇyāṃ sarvakāmapradāyinīm ।
manonayanasaṃtāpa- nivāraṇaparāyaṇām ।।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpatiḥ śrīmān gaṅgātīram athāviśat ।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā prāha nṛpatir harṣagadgadayā girā ।
harīn sarvān athāmantrya hanumatpramukhān mune ।।
{rāma uvāca 
asyāḥ prabhāvād dharayo yo asau mama pitā prabhuḥ ।
sarvapāpavinirmuktas tato yātas triviṣṭapam ।।
iyaṃ janitrī sakalasya jantor 
bhuktipradā muktim athāpi dadyāt 
pāpāni hanyād api dāruṇāni 
kānyānayāsty atra nadī samānā 
hatāni śaśvad duritāni caiva 
asyāḥ prabhāvād arayaḥ sakhāyaḥ 
vibhīṣaṇo maitram upaiti nityaṃ 
sītā ca labdhā hanumāṃś ca bandhuḥ 
laṅkā ca bhagnā sagaṇaṃ hi rakṣo 
hataṃ hi yasyāḥ parisevanena 
yāṃ gautamo devavaraṃ prapūjya 
śivaṃ śaraṇyaṃ sajaṭām avāpa 
seyaṃ janitrī sakalepsitānām 
amaṅgalānām api saṃnihantrī 
jagatpavitrīkaraṇaikadakṣā 
dṛṣṭādya sākṣāt saritāṃ savitrī 
kāyena vācā manasā sadaināṃ 
vrajāmi gaṅgāṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyām 
{brahmovāca 
etat samākarṇya vaco nṛpasya 
tatrāplavan harayaḥ sarva eva 
pūjāṃ cakrur vidhivat te pṛthak ca 
puṣpair anekaiḥ sarvalokopahāraiḥ 
saṃpūjya śarvaṃ nṛpatir yathāvat 
stutvā vākyaiḥ sarvabhāvopayuktaiḥ 
te vānarā muditāḥ sarva eva 
nṛtyaṃ ca gītaṃ ca tathaiva cakruḥ 
sukhoṣitas tāṃ rajanīṃ mahātmā 
priyānuyuktaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ premavadbhiḥ 
duḥkhaṃ jahau sarvam amitrasaṃbhavaṃ 
kiṃ nāpyate gautamīsevanena 
savismayaḥ paśyati bhṛtyavargaṃ 
godāvarīṃ stauti ca saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ 
saṃmānayan bhṛtyagaṇaṃ samagram 
avāpa rāmaḥ kamapi pramodam 
punaḥ prabhāte vimale tu sūrye 
vibhīṣaṇo dāśarathiṃ babhāṣe 
{vibhīṣaṇa uvāca 
nādyāpi tṛptās tu bhavāma tīrthe 
kaṃcic ca kālaṃ nivasāma cātra 
vatsyāma cātraiva parāś catasro 
rātrīr atho yāma vṛtās tv ayodhyām 
{brahmovāca 
tasyātha vākyaṃ harayo anumenire 
tathaiva rātrīr aparāś catasraḥ 
saṃpūjya devaṃ sakaleśvaraṃ taṃ 
bhrātṛpriyaṃ tīrtham atho jagāma 
siddheśvaraṃ nāma jagatprasiddhaṃ 
yasya prabhāvāt prabalo daśāsyaḥ 
evaṃ tu pañcāham athoṣire te 
svaṃ svaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitaliṅgam arcya 
śuśrūṣaṇaṃ tatra karoti vāyoḥ 
suto anugāmī hanumān nṛpasya 
gacchan nṛpendro hanumantam āha 
liṅgāni sarvāṇi visarjayasva 
matsthāpitāny uttamamantravidbhis 
tathetaraiḥ śaṃkarakiṃkaraiś ca 
nodvāsya pūjāṃ paraśaṃkareṇa 
bāhyaṃ samāyojyam aho bhavasya 
tiṣṭhanti susthās tadanādareṇa 
te khaḍgapattrādiṣu saṃbhavanti 
ye aśraddadhānāḥ śivaliṅgapūjāṃ 
vidhāya kṛtyaṃ na samācaranti 
yathocitaṃ te yamakiṃkarair hi 
pacyanta evākhiladurgatīṣu 
rāmājñayā vāyusuto jagāma 
dorbhyāṃ na cotpāṭayituṃ śaśāka 
tataḥ svapucchena grahītukāmaḥ 
saṃveṣṭya liṅgaṃ tu visṛṣṭakāmaḥ 
naivāśakat tan mahad adbhutaṃ syāt 
kapīśvarāṇāṃ nṛpates tathaiva 
kaś cālayel labdhamahānubhāvaṃ 
maheśaliṅgaṃ puruṣo manasvī 
tan niścalaṃ prekṣya mahānubhāvo 
nṛpapravīraḥ sahasā jagāma 
viprān athāmantrya vidhāya pūjāṃ 
pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca rāmacandraḥ 
śuddhātiśuddhena hṛdākhilais tair 
liṅgāni sarvāṇi nanāma rāmaḥ 
kiṣkindhavāsipravarair aśeṣaiḥ 
saṃsevitaṃ tīrtham ato babhūva 
atrāplavād eva mahānti pāpāny 
api kṣayaṃ yānti na saṃśayo atra 
punaś ca gaṅgāṃ praṇanāma bhaktyā 
prasīda mātar mama gautamīti 
jalpan muhur vismitacittavṛttir 
vilokayan praṇaman gautamīṃ tām 
tataḥ prabhṛty etad atīva puṇyaṃ 
kiṣkindhatīrthaṃ vibudhā vadanti 
paṭhet smared vāpi śṛṇoti bhaktyā 
pāpāpahaṃ kiṃ punaḥ snānadānaiḥ 
{brahmovāca 
vyāsatīrtham iti khyātaṃ prācetasam ataḥ param ।
nātaḥ parataraṃ kiṃcit pāvanaṃ sarvasiddhidam ।।
daśa me mānasāḥ putrāḥ sraṣṭāro jagatām api ।
antaṃ jijñāsavas te vai pṛthivyā jagmur ojasā ।।
punaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ punas te api yātās tān samavekṣitum ।
naiva te api samāyātā ye gatās te gatā gatāḥ ।।
tadotpannā mahāprājñā divyā āṅgiraso mune ।
vedavedāṅgatattvajñāḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradāḥ ।।
te anujñātā aṅgirasā guruṃ natvā tapodhanāḥ ।
tapase niścitāḥ sarve naiva pṛṣṭvā tu mātaram ।।
sarvebhyo hy adhikā mātā gurubhyo gauraveṇa hi ।
tadā nārada kopena sā śaśāpa tadātmajān ।।
{mātovāca 
mām anādṛtya ye putrāḥ pravṛttāś carituṃ tapaḥ ।
sarvair api prakārais tan na teṣāṃ siddhim eṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
nānādeśāṃś ca cinvānās tapaḥsiddhiṃ na yānti ca ।
vighnam anveti tān sarvān itaś cetaś ca dhāvataḥ ।।
kvāpi tad rākṣasair vighnaṃ kvāpi tan mānuṣair abhūt ।
pramadābhiḥ kvacic cāpi kvāpi taddehadoṣataḥ ।।
evaṃ tu bhramamāṇās te yayuḥ sarve taponidhim ।
agastyaṃ tapatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kumbhayoniṃ jagadgurum ।।
namaskṛtvā hy āṅgirasā hy agnivaṃśasamudbhavāḥ ।
dakṣiṇāśāpatiṃ śāntaṃ vinītāḥ praṣṭum udyatāḥ ।।
{āṅgirasā ūcuḥ 
bhagavan kena doṣeṇa tapo asmākaṃ na sidhyati ।
nānāvidhair apy upāyaiḥ kurvatāṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ ।।
kiṃ kurmaḥ kaḥ prakāro atra tapasy eva bhavāma kim ।
upāyaṃ brūhi viprendra jyeṣṭho asi tapasā dhruvam ।।
jñātāsi jñānināṃ brahman vaktāsi vadatāṃ varaḥ ।
śānto asi yamināṃ nityaṃ dayāvān priyakṛt tathā ।।
akrodhanaś ca na dveṣṭā tasmād brūhi vivakṣitam ।
sāhaṃkārā dayāhīnā gurusevāvivarjitāḥ ।
asatyavādinaḥ krūrā na te tattvaṃ vijānate ।।
{brahmovāca 
agastyaḥ prāha tān sarvān kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।।
{agastya uvāca 
śāntātmāno bhavanto vai sraṣṭāro brahmaṇā kṛtāḥ ।
na paryāptaṃ tapaś cābhūt smaradhvaṃ smayakāraṇam ।।
brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ pūrvaṃ ye gatāḥ sukham edhate ।
ye gatāḥ punar anveṣṭuṃ te ca tv āṅgiraso abhavan ।।
te yūyaṃ ca punaḥ kāle yātā yātāḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।
prajāpater apy adhikā bhavitāro na saṃśayaḥ ।।
ito yāntu tapas taptuṃ gaṅgāṃ trailokyapāvanīm ।
nopāyo anyo asti saṃsāre vinā gaṅgāṃ śivapriyām ।।
tatrāśrame puṇyadeśe jñānadaṃ pūjayiṣyatha ।
sa cchedayiṣyaty akhilaṃ saṃśayaṃ vo mahāmatiḥ ।
na siddhiḥ kvāpi keṣāṃcid vinā sadguruṇā yataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
te tam ūcur munivaraṃ jñānadaḥ ko abhidhīyate ।
brahmā viṣṇur maheśo vā ādityo vāpi candramāḥ ।।
agniś ca varuṇaḥ kaḥ syāj jñānado munisattama ।
agastyaḥ punar apy āha jñānadaḥ śrūyatām ayam ।।
yā āpaḥ so agnir ity ukto yo agniḥ sūryaḥ sa ucyate ।
yaś ca sūryaḥ sa vai viṣṇur yaś ca viṣṇuḥ sa bhāskaraḥ ।।
yaś ca brahmā sa vai rudro yo rudraḥ sarvam eva tat ।
yasya sarvaṃ tu taj jñānaṃ jñānadaḥ so atra kīrtyate ।।
deśikaprerakavyākhyā- kṛdupādhyāyadehadāḥ ।
guravaḥ santi bahavas teṣāṃ jñānaprado mahān ।।
tad eva jñānam atroktaṃ yena bhedo vihanyate ।
eka evādvayaḥ śaṃbhur indramitrāgnināmabhiḥ ।
vadanti bahudhā viprā bhrāntopakṛtihetave ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā muner vākyaṃ gāthā gāyanta eva te ।
jagmuḥ pañcottarāṃ gaṅgāṃ pañca jagmuś ca dakṣiṇām ।।
agastyenoditān devān pūjayanto yathāvidhi ।
āsaneṣu viśeṣeṇa hy āsīnās tattvacintakāḥ ।।
teṣāṃ sarve suragaṇāḥ prītimanto abhavan mune ।
sraṣṭṛtvaṃ tu yugādau yat kalpitaṃ viśvayoninā ।।
adharmāṇāṃ nivṛttyarthaṃ vedānāṃ sthāpanāya ca ।
lokānām upakārārthaṃ dharmakāmārthasiddhaye ।।
purāṇasmṛtivedārtha- dharmaśāstrārthaniścaye ।
sraṣṭṛtvaṃ jagatām iṣṭaṃ tādṛgrūpā bhaviṣyatha ।।
prajāpatitvaṃ teṣāṃ vai bhaviṣyati śanaiḥ kramāt ।
yadā hy adharmo bhavitā vedānāṃ ca parābhavaḥ ।।
vedānāṃ vyasanaṃ tebhyo bhāvivyāsās tatas tu te ।
yadā yadā tu dharmasya glānir vedasya dṛśyate ।।
tadā tadā tu te vyāsā bhaviṣyanty upakāriṇaḥ ।
teṣāṃ yat tapasaḥ sthānaṃ gaṅgāyās tīram uttamam ।।
tatra tatra śivo viṣṇur aham āditya eva ca ।
agnir āpaḥ sarvam iti tatra saṃnihitaṃ sadā ।।
naitebhyaḥ pāvanaṃ kiṃcin naitebhyas tv adhikaṃ kvacit ।
tattadākāratāṃ prāptaṃ paraṃ brahmaiva kevalam ।।
sarvātmakaḥ śivo vyāpī sarvabhāvasvarūpadhṛk ।
viśeṣatas tatra tīrthe sarvaprāṇyanukampayā ।।
sarvair devair anuvṛtas tadanugrahakārakaḥ ।
dharmavyāsās tu te jñeyā vedavyāsās tathaiva ca ।।
teṣāṃ tīrthaṃ tena nāmnā vyapadiṣṭaṃ jagattraye ।
pāpapaṅkakṣālanāmbho mohadhvāntamadāpaham ।
sarvasiddhipradaṃ puṃsāṃ vyāsatīrtham anuttamam ।।
{brahmovāca 
vañjarāsaṃgamaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam ।
ṛṣibhiḥ sevitaṃ nityaṃ siddhai rājarṣibhis tathā ।।
dāsatvam agamat pūrvaṃ nāgānāṃ garuḍaḥ khagaḥ ।
mātṛdāsyāt tadā duḥkha- parisaṃtaptamānasaḥ ।
kadācic cintayām āsa rahaḥ sthitvā viniśvasan ।।
{garuḍa uvāca 
ta eva dhanyā loke asmin kṛtapuṇyās ta eva hi ।
nānyasevā kṛtā yais tu na yeṣāṃ vyasanāgamaḥ ।।
sukhaṃ tiṣṭhanti gāyanti svapanti ca hasanti ca ।
svadehaprabhavo dhanyā dhig dhig anyavaśe sthitān ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti cintāsamāviṣṭo jananīm etya duḥkhitaḥ ।
paryapṛcchad ameyātmā vainateyo atha mātaram ।।
{garuḍa uvāca 
kasyāparādhān mātas tvaṃ pitur vā mama vānyataḥ ।
dāsītvam āptā vada tat- kāraṇaṃ mama pṛcchataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
sābravīt putram ātmīyam aruṇasyānujaṃ priyam ।।
{vinatovāca 
naiva kasyāparādho asti svāparādho mayoditaḥ ।
yasyā vākyaṃ viparyeti sā dāsī syān mayoditam ।।
kadrūś cāpi tathaivāhaṃ sā mayā saṃyutā yayau ।
kadrvā mamābhavad vādaś chadmanāhaṃ tayā jitā ।।
vidhir hi balavāṃs tāta kāṃ kāṃ ceṣṭāṃ na ceṣṭate ।
evaṃ dāsītvam agamaṃ kadrvāḥ kaśyapanandana ।
yadā dāsī tu jātāhaṃ dāso abhūs tvaṃ dvijanmaja ।।
{brahmovāca 
tūṣṇīṃ tadā babhūvāsau garuḍo atīva duḥkhitaḥ ।
na kiṃcid ūce jananīṃ cintayan bhavitavyatām ।।
kadrūḥ kadācit sā prāha putrāṇāṃ hitam icchatī ।
ātmano bhūtim icchantī vinatāṃ khagamātaram ।।
{kadrūr uvāca 
putraḥ sūryaṃ namaskartuṃ tava yāty anivāritaḥ ।
aho lokatraye apy asmin dhanyāsi bata dāsy api ।।
{brahmovāca 
svaduḥkhaṃ gūhamānā sā kadrūṃ prāha suvismitā ।।
{vinatovāca 
tava putrās tu kim iti raviṃ draṣṭuṃ na yānti ca ।।
{kadrūr uvāca 
putrān madīyān subhage naya nāgālayaṃ prati ।
samudrasya samīpe tu tad āste śītalaṃ saraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
suparṇas tv avahan nāgān kadrūṃ ca vinatā tathā ।
tataḥ provāca muditā vainateyasya mātaram ।।
surāṇāṃ netu nilayaṃ garuḍo matsutān iti ।
punaḥ prāha sarpamātā garuḍaṃ vinayānvitam ।।
{sarpamātovāca 
putrā me draṣṭum icchanti haṃsaṃ trijagatāṃ gurum ।
namaskṛtvā tataḥ sūryam eṣyanti nilayaṃ mama ।
haṇḍe tvaṃ naya putrān me sūryamaṇḍalam anvaham ।।
{brahmovāca 
sā vepamānā vinatā dīnā kadrūm abhāṣata ।।
{vinatovāca 
nāhaṃ kṣamā sarpamātaḥ putro me neṣyate sutān ।
dṛṣṭvā dinakaraṃ devaṃ punar eva prayāntu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
vinatā svasutaṃ prāha vihagānām adhīśvaram ।
namaskartum athecchanti nāgāḥ svāmitvam āgatāḥ ।।
bhāsvantam ity uvāceyaṃ māṃ sarpajananī haṭhāt ।
tathety uktvā sa garuḍo mām ārohantu pannagāḥ ।।
tadārūḍhaṃ sarpasainyaṃ garuḍaṃ vihagādhipam ।
śanaiḥ śanair upagamad yatra devo divākaraḥ ।
te dahyamānās tīkṣṇena bhānutāpena vivyathuḥ ।।
{sarpā ūcuḥ 
nivartasva mahāprājña pataṃgāya namo namaḥ ।
alaṃ sūryasya sadanaṃ dagdhāḥ sūryasya tejasā ।
yāmas tvayā vā garuḍa vihāya tvām athāpi vā ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ nāgair ucyamāna ādityaṃ darśayāmi vaḥ ।
ity uktvā gaganaṃ śīghraṃ jagāmādityasaṃmukhaḥ ।।
dagdhabhogā nipetus te dvīpaṃ taṃ vīraṇaṃ prati ।
bahavaḥ śatasāhasrāḥ pīḍitā dagdhavigrahāḥ ।।
putrāṇām ārtasaṃnādaṃ patitānāṃ mahītale ।
āśvāsituṃ samāyātā tān sā kadrūḥ suvihvalā ।।
uvāca vinatāṃ kadrūs tava putro atiduṣkṛtam ।
kṛtavān atidurmedhā yeṣāṃ śāntir na vidyate ।।
nānyathā kartum āyāti svāmivākyaṃ phaṇīśvaraḥ ।
sa kāśyapo bṛhattejā yady atra syād anāmayam ।।
bhavec caivaṃ kathaṃ śāntiḥ putrāṇāṃ mama bhāmini ।
kadrvās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vinatā hy atibhītavat ।।
putram āha mahātmānaṃ garuḍaṃ vihagādhipam ।।
{vinatovāca 
nedaṃ yuktataraṃ putra bhūṣaṇaṃ vinayena hi ।
vartituṃ yuktam ity uktaṃ vaiparītyaṃ na yujyate ।।
nāmitreṣv api kartavyaṃ sadbhir jihmaṃ kadācana ।
śrotriye cāntyaje vāpi samaṃ candraḥ prakāśate ।।
kurvanty aniṣṭaṃ kapaṭais ta eva mama putraka ।
prasahya kartuṃ ye sākṣād aśaktāḥ puruṣādhamāḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
vinatā ca tataḥ prāha kadrūṃ tāṃ sarpamātaram ।।
{vinatovāca 
kiṃ kṛtvā śāntir abhyeti putrāṇāṃ te karomi tat ।
jarayā tu gṛhītās te vada śāntiṃ karomi tat ।।
{brahmovāca 
kadrūr apy āha vinatāṃ rasātalagataṃ payaḥ ।
tenābhiṣecitānāṃ me putrāṇāṃ śāntir eṣyati ।।
kadrvās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rasātalagataṃ payaḥ ।
kṣaṇenaiva samānīya nāgāṃs tān abhyaṣecayat ।
tataḥ provāca garuḍo maghavānaṃ śatakratum ।।
{garuḍa uvāca 
meghāś cāpy atra varṣantu trailokyasyopakāriṇaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathā vavarṣa parjanyo nāgānām abhavac chivam ।
rasātalabhavaṃ gāṅgaṃ nāgasaṃjīvanaṃ payaḥ ।।
jarāśokavināśārtham ānītaṃ garuḍena yat ।
yatrābhiṣecitā nāgās tan nāgālayam ucyate ।।
garuḍena yato vāri ānītaṃ tad rasātalāt ।
tad gāṅgaṃ vāri sarveṣāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।।
jarāyā vāraṇaṃ yasmān nāgānām abhavac chivam ।
rasātalabhavaṃ gāṅgaṃ nāgasaṃjīvanaṃ yataḥ ।।
jarāśokavināśārthaṃ gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।
sākṣād amṛtasaṃvāhā vañjarā sābhavan nadī ।।
jarādāridryasaṃtāpa- hāriṇī kleśavāriṇī ।
rasātalabhavā gaṅgā martyalokabhavā tu yā ।।
tayoś ca saṃgamo yaḥ syāt kiṃ punas tatra varṇyate ।
yasyānusmaraṇād eva nāśaṃ yānty aghasaṃcayāḥ ।।
tatra ca snānadānānāṃ phalaṃ ko vaktum īśvaraḥ ।
sapādaṃ tatra tīrthānāṃ lakṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
sarvasaṃpattidātṝṇāṃ sarvapāpaughahāriṇām ।
vañjarāsaṃgamasamaṃ tīrthaṃ kvāpi na vidyate ।
yadanusmaraṇenāpi vipadyante vipattayaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
devāgamaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ śivam ।
bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ tṛptikārakam ।।
tatra vṛttaṃ samākhyāsye tava yatnena nārada ।
devānām asurāṇāṃ ca spardhābhūd dhanahetave ।।
svargaḥ surāṇām abhavad asurāṇām ilābhavat ।
karmabhūmim avaṣṭabhya asurāḥ sarvato abhavan ।।
devānāṃ yajñabhāgāṃś ca dātṝn ghnanty asurās tataḥ ।
tataḥ suragaṇāḥ sarve yajñabhāgair vinā kṛtāḥ ।।
vyathitā mām upājagmuḥ kiṃ kṛtyam iti cābruvan ।
mayā coktāḥ suragaṇā yuddhe jitvāsurān balāt ।।
bhuvaṃ prāpsyatha karmāṇi havīṃṣi ca yaśāṃsi ca ।
tathety uktvā gatā devā bhūmiṃ te samarārthinaḥ ।।
daityāś ca dānavāś caiva rākṣasā baladarpitāḥ ।
ekībhūtvā yayus te api jayino yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ ।।
ahir vṛtro balis tvāṣṭrir namuciḥ śambaro mayaḥ ।
ete cānye ca bahavo yoddhāro baladarpitāḥ ।।
agnir indro atha varuṇas tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathāśvinau ।
maruto lokapālāś ca nānāyuddhaviśāradāḥ ।।
te dānavāḥ sarva eva yāmyāṃ vai diśi saṃgare ।
akurvanta mahāyatnaṃ dakṣiṇārṇavasaṃsthitāḥ ।।
trikūṭaḥ parvataśreṣṭho rākṣasānāṃ purābhavat ।
tadvanena yayuḥ sarve taiḥ sārdhaṃ dakṣiṇārṇavam ।।
sarveṣāṃ melanaṃ yatra parvato malayas tu saḥ ।
malayasyāpi deśo asau devārīṇām abhūt tadā ।।
devānāṃ gautamītīre tatra saṃnihitaḥ śivaḥ ।
iti teṣāṃ samāyogo devānām abhavat kila ।।
devāḥ svaratham ārūḍhās tatra tatra samāgaman ।
gautamyāḥ saridambāyāḥ puline vimalāśayāḥ ।।
prasannābhīṣṭadā yā syāt pitṝṇām akhilasya tu ।
tato devagaṇāḥ sarve stutvā devaṃ maheśvaram ।
abhayaṃ cintayām āsus te sarve atha parasparam ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
atrāpy upāyaḥ ko asmākaṃ nirjitānāṃ parair haṭhāt ।
ekam evātra naḥ śreyo vijayo vāthavā mṛtiḥ ।
sapatnair abhibhūtānāṃ jīvitaṃ dhiṅ manasvinām ।।
{brahmovāca 
etasminn antare putra vāg uvācāśarīriṇī ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
kleśenālaṃ suragaṇā gautamīm āśu gacchata ।
bhaktyā hariharau tatra samārādhayateśvarau ।।
godāvaryās tayoś caiva prasādāt kiṃ tu duṣkaram ।।
{brahmovāca 
prasannābhyāṃ harīśābhyāṃ devā jayam abhīpsitam ।
avāpya sarvato jagmuḥ pālayanto divaukasaḥ ।।
yatra devāgamo jātas tat tīrthaṃ tena viśrutam ।
devāgamaṃ praśaṃsanti munayas tattvadarśinaḥ ।।
tatrāśītisahasrāṇi śivaliṅgāni nārada ।
devāgamaḥ parvato asau priya ity api kathyate ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ devapriyam ato viduḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
kuśatarpaṇam ākhyātaṃ praṇītāsaṃgamaṃ tathā ।
tīrthaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu bhuktimuktipradāyakam ।।
tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu pāpaharaṃ śubham ।
vindhyasya dakṣiṇe pārśve sahyo nāma mahāgiriḥ ।।
yadaṅghribhyo abhavan nadyo godābhīmarathīmukhāḥ ।
yatrābhavat tad virajam ekavīrā ca yatra sā ।।
na tasya mahimā kaiścid api śakyo anuvarṇitum ।
tasmin girau puṇyadeśe śṛṇu nārada yatnataḥ ।।
guhyād guhyataraṃ vakṣye sākṣād vedoditaṃ śubham ।
yan na jānanti munayo devāś ca pitaro asurāḥ ।।
tad ahaṃ prītaye vakṣye śravaṇāt sarvakāmadam ।
paraḥ sa puruṣo jñeyo hy avyakto akṣara eva tu ।।
aparaś ca kṣaras tasmāt prakṛtyanvita eva ca ।
nirākārāt sāvayavaḥ puruṣaḥ samajāyata ।।
tasmād āpaḥ samudbhūtā adbhyaś ca puruṣas tathā ।
tābhyām abjaṃ samudbhūtaṃ tatrāham abhavaṃ mune ।।
pṛthivī vāyur ākāśa āpo jyotis tathaiva ca ।
ete mattaḥ pūrvatarā ekadaivābhavan mune ।।
etān eva prapaśyāmi nānyat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
naiva vedās tadā cāsan nāhaṃ draṣṭāsmi kiṃcana ।।
yasmād ahaṃ samudbhūto na paśyeyaṃ tam apy atha ।
tūṣṇīṃ sthite mayi tadā aśrauṣaṃ vācam uttamām ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
brahman kuru jagatsṛṣṭiṃ sthāvarasya carasya ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
tato aham abravaṃ vācaṃ paruṣāṃ tatra nārada ।
kathaṃ srakṣye kva vā srakṣye kena srakṣya idaṃ jagat ।।
saiva vāg abravīd daivī prakṛtir yābhidhīyate ।
viṣṇunā preritā mātā jagadīśā jaganmayī ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
yajñaṃ kuru tataḥ śaktis te bhavitrī na saṃśayaḥ ।
yajño vai viṣṇur ity eṣā śrutir brahman sanātanī ।।
kiṃ yajvanām asādhyaṃ syād iha loke paratra ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
punas tām abravaṃ devīṃ kva vā keneti tad vada ।
yajñaḥ kāryo mahābhāge tataḥ sovāca māṃ prati ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
oṃkārabhūtā yā devī mātṛkalpā jaganmayī ।
karmabhūmau yajasveha yajñeśaṃ yajñapūruṣam ।।
sa eva sādhanaṃ te syāt tena taṃ yaja suvrata ।
yajñaḥ svāhā svadhā mantrā brāhmaṇā havirādikam ।।
harir evākhilaṃ tena sarvaṃ viṣṇor avāpyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
punas tām abravaṃ devīṃ karmabhūḥ kva vidhīyate ।
tadā nārada naivāsīd bhāgīrathy atha narmadā ।।
yamunā naiva tāpī sā sarasvaty atha gautamī ।
samudro vā nadaḥ kaścin na saraḥ sarito amalāḥ ।
sā śaktiḥ punar apy evaṃ mām uvāca punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{daivī vāg uvāca 
sumeror dakṣiṇe pārśve tathā himavato gireḥ ।
dakṣiṇe cāpi vindhyasya sahyāc caivātha dakṣiṇe ।
sarvasya sarvakāle tu karmabhūmiḥ śubhodayā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tat tu vākyam atho śrutvā tyaktvā meruṃ mahāgirim ।
taṃ pradeśam athāgatya sthātavyaṃ kvety acintayam ।
tato mām abravīt saiva viṣṇor vāṇy aśarīriṇī ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
ito gaccha itas tiṣṭha tathopaviśa cātra hi ।
saṃkalpaṃ kuru yajñasya sa te yajñaḥ samāpyate ।।
kṛte caivātha saṃkalpe yajñārthe surasattama ।
yad vadanty akhilā vedā vidhe tat tat samācara ।।
{brahmovāca 
itihāsapurāṇāni yad anyac chabdagocaram ।
svato mukhe mama prāyād abhūc ca smṛtigocaram ।।
vedārthaś ca mayā sarvo jñāto asau tatkṣaṇena ca ।
tataḥ puruṣasūktaṃ tad asmaraṃ lokaviśrutam ।।
yajñopakaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ tad uktaṃ ca tv akalpayam ।
taduktena prakāreṇa yajñapātrāṇy akalpayam ।।
ahaṃ sthitvā yatra deśe śucir bhūtvā yatātmavān ।
dīkṣito vipradeśo asau mannāmnā tu prakīrtitaḥ ।।
maddevayajanaṃ puṇyaṃ nāmnā brahmagiriḥ smṛtaḥ ।
caturaśītiparyantaṃ yojanāni mahāmune ।।
maddevayajanaṃ puṇyaṃ pūrvato brahmaṇo gireḥ ।
tatra madhye vedikā syād gārhapatyo asya dakṣiṇe ।।
tatra cāhavanīyasya evam agnīṃs tv akalpayam ।
vinā patnyā na sidhyeta yajñaḥ śrutinidarśanāt ।।
śarīram ātmano ahaṃ vai dvedhā cākaravaṃ mune ।
pūrvārdhena tataḥ patnī mamābhūd yajñasiddhaye ।।
uttareṇa tv ahaṃ tadvad ardho jāyā iti śruteḥ ।
kālaṃ vasantam utkṛṣṭam ājyarūpeṇa nārada ।।
akalpayaṃ tathā cedhmaṃ grīṣmaṃ cāpi śarad dhaviḥ ।
ṛtuṃ ca prāvṛṣaṃ putra tadā barhir akalpayam ।।
chandāṃsi sapta vai tatra tadā paridhayo abhavan ।
kalākāṣṭhānimeṣā hi samitpātrakuśāḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
yo anādiś ca tv anantaś ca svayaṃ kālo abhavat tadā ।
yūparūpeṇa devarṣe yoktraṃ ca paśubandhanam ।।
sattvāditriguṇāḥ pāśā naiva tatrābhavat paśuḥ ।
tato aham abravaṃ vācaṃ vaiṣṇavīm aśarīriṇīm ।।
vinaiva paśunā nāyaṃ yajñaḥ parisamāpyate ।
tato mām avadad devī saiva nityāśarīriṇī ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
pauruṣeṇātha sūktena stuhi taṃ puruṣaṃ param ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā stūyamāne devadeve janārdane ।
mama cotpādake bhaktyā sūktena puruṣasya hi ।।
sā ca mām abravīd devī brahman māṃ tvaṃ paśuṃ kuru ।
tadā vijñāya puruṣaṃ janakaṃ mama cāvyayam ।।
kālayūpasya pārśve taṃ guṇapāśair niveśitam ।
barhisthitam ahaṃ praukṣaṃ puruṣaṃ jātam agrataḥ ।।
etasminn antare tatra tasmāt sarvam abhūd idam ।
brāhmaṇās tu mukhāt tasya abhavan bāhvoś ca kṣatriyāḥ ।।
mukhād indras tathāgniś ca śvasanaḥ prāṇato abhavat ।
diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā śīrṣṇaḥ sarvaḥ svargo abhavat tadā ।।
manasaś candramā jātaḥ sūryo abhūc cakṣuṣas tathā ।
antarikṣaṃ tathā nābher ūrubhyāṃ viśa eva ca ।।
padbhyāṃ śūdraś ca saṃjātas tathā bhūmir ajāyata ।
ṛṣayo romakūpebhya oṣadhyaḥ keśato abhavan ।।
grāmyāraṇyāś ca paśavo nakhebhyaḥ sarvato abhavan ।
kṛmikīṭapataṃgādi pāyūpasthād ajāyata ।।
sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ kiṃcid dṛśyādṛśyaṃ ca kiṃcana ।
tasmāt sarvam abhūd devā mattaś cāpy abhavan punaḥ ।
etasminn antare saiva viṣṇor vāg abravīc ca mām ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
sarvaṃ saṃpūrṇam abhavat sṛṣṭir jātā tathepsitā ।
idānīṃ juhudhi hy agnau pātrāṇi ca samāni ca ।।
visarjaya tathā yūpaṃ praṇītāṃ ca kuśāṃs tathā ।
ṛtvigrūpaṃ yajñarūpam uddeśyaṃ dhyeyam eva ca ।।
sruvaṃ ca puruṣaṃ pāśān sarvaṃ brahman visarjaya ।।
{brahmovāca 
tadvākyasamakālaṃ tu kramaśo yajñayoniṣu ।
gārhapatye dakṣiṇāgnau tathā caiva mahāmune ।।
pūrvasminn api caivāgnau kramaśo juhvatas tadā ।
tatra tatra jagadyonim anusaṃdhāya pūruṣam ।।
mantrapūtaṃ śuciḥ samyag yajñadevo jaganmayaḥ ।
lokanātho viśvakartā kuṇḍānāṃ tatra saṃnidhau ।।
śuklarūpadharo viṣṇur bhaved āhavanīyake ।
śyāmo viṣṇur dakṣiṇāgneḥ pīto gṛhapateḥ kaveḥ ।।
sarvakālaṃ teṣu viṣṇur ato deśeṣu saṃsthitaḥ ।
na tena rahitaṃ kiṃcid viṣṇunā viśvayoninā ।।
praṇītāyāḥ praṇayanaṃ mantraiś cākaravaṃ tataḥ ।
praṇītodakam apy etat praṇīteti nadī śubhā ।।
vyasarjayaṃ praṇītāṃ tāṃ mārjayitvā kuśair atha ।
mārjane kriyamāṇe tu praṇītodakabindavaḥ ।।
patitās tatra tīrthāni jātāni guṇavanti ca ।
saṃjātā muniśārdūla snānāt kratuphalapradā ।।
yālaṃkṛtā sarvakālaṃ devadevena śārṅgiṇā ।
sopānapaṅktiḥ sarveṣāṃ vaikuṇṭhārohaṇāya sā ।।
saṃmārjitāḥ kuśā yatra patitā bhūtale śubhe ।
kuśatarpaṇam ākhyātaṃ bahupuṇyaphalapradam ।।
kuśaiś ca tarpitāḥ sarve kuśatarpaṇam ucyate ।
paścāc ca saṃgatā tatra gautamī kāraṇāntarāt ।।
praṇītāyāṃ mahābuddhe praṇītāsaṃgamo abhavat ।
kuśatarpaṇadeśe tu tat tīrthaṃ kuśatarpaṇam ।।
tatraiva kalpito yūpo mayā vindhyasya cottare ।
visṛṣṭo lokapūjyo asau viṣṇor āsīt samāśrayaḥ ।।
akṣayaś cābhavac chrīmān akṣayo asau vaṭo abhavat ।
nityaś ca kālarūpo asau smaraṇāt kratupuṇyadaḥ ।।
maddevayajanaṃ cedaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam ucyate ।
saṃpūrṇe tu kratau viṣṇur mayā bhaktyā prasāditaḥ ।।
yo virāḍ ucyate vede yasmān mūrtam ajāyata ।
yasmāc ca mama cotpattir yasyedaṃ vikṛtaṃ jagat ।।
tam ahaṃ devadeveśam abhivandya vyasarjayam ।
yojanāni caturviṃśan maddevayajanaṃ śubham ।।
tasmād adyāpi kuṇḍāni santi ca trīṇi nārada ।
yajñeśvarasvarūpāṇi viṣṇor vai cakrapāṇinaḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti cākhyātaṃ maddevayajanaṃ ca tat ।
tatrasthaḥ kṛmikīṭādiḥ so apy ante muktibhājanam ।।
dharmabījaṃ muktibījaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam ucyate ।
viśeṣād gautamīśliṣṭo deśaḥ puṇyatamo abhavat ।।
praṇītāsaṃgame cāpi kuśatarpaṇa eva vā ।
snānadānādi yaḥ kuryāt sa gacchet paramaṃ padam ।।
smaraṇaṃ paṭhanaṃ vāpi śravaṇaṃ cāpi bhaktitaḥ ।
sarvakāmapradaṃ puṃsāṃ bhuktimuktipradaṃ viduḥ ।।
ubhayos tīrayos tatra tīrthāny āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
ṣaḍaśītisahasrāṇi teṣu puṇyaṃ puroditam ।।
vārāṇasyā api mune kuśatarpaṇam uttamam ।
nānena sadṛśaṃ tīrthaṃ vidyate sacarācare ।।
brahmahatyādipāpānāṃ smaraṇād api nāśanam ।
tīrtham etan mune proktaṃ svargadvāraṃ mahītale ।।
{brahmovāca 
manyutīrtham iti khyātaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।
sarvakāmapradaṃ nṝṇāṃ smaraṇād aghanāśanam ।।
tasya prabhāvaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvāvahito mune ।
devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca saṃgaro abhūn mithaḥ purā ।।
tatrājayan naiva surā dānavā jayino abhavan ।
parāṅmukhāḥ suragaṇāḥ saṃgarād gatacetasaḥ ।।
mām abhyetya samūcus te dehi no abhayakāraṇam ।
tān ahaṃ pratyavocaṃ vai gaṅgāṃ gacchata sarvaśaḥ ।।
tatra vai gautamītīre stutvā devaṃ maheśvaram ।
anapāyanirāyāsa- sahajānandasundaram ।।
lapsyate sarvavibudhā jayahetur maheśvarāt ।
tathety uktvā suragaṇāḥ stuvanti sma maheśvaram ।।
tapo atapyanta kecid vai nanṛtuś ca tathāpare ।
asnāpayaṃś ca kecic ca apūjayaṃś ca tathāpare ।।
tataḥ prasanno bhagavāñ śūlapāṇir maheśvaraḥ ।
devān athābravīt tuṣṭo vriyatāṃ yad abhīpsitam ।।
devā ūcuḥ surapatiṃ vijayāya dadasva naḥ ।
puruṣaṃ paramaślāghyaṃ raṇeṣu purataḥ sthitam ।।
yadbāhubalam āśritya bhavāmaḥ sukhino vayam ।
tathety uvāca bhagavān devān prati maheśvaraḥ ।।
ātmanas tejasā kaścin nirmitaḥ parameṣṭhinā ।
manyunāmānam atyugraṃ devasainyapurogamam ।।
taṃ natvā tridaśāḥ sarve śivaṃ natvā svam ālayam ।
manyunā saha cābhyetya punar yuddhāya tasthire ।।
yuddhe sthitvā tu danujair daiteyaiś ca mahābalaiḥ ।
vibudhā jātasaṃnaddhā manyum ūcuḥ puraḥ sthitāḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
sāmarthyaṃ tava paśyāmaḥ paścād yotsyāmahe paraiḥ ।
tasmād darśaya cātmānaṃ manyo asmākaṃ yuyutsatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad devavacanaṃ śrutvā manyur āha smayann iva ।।
{manyur uvāca 
janitā mama deveśaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvadṛk prabhuḥ ।
yaḥ sarvaṃ vetti sarveṣāṃ dhāmanāma manaḥsthitam ।।
naiva kaścic ca taṃ vetti yaḥ sarvaṃ vetti sarvadā ।
amūrtaṃ mūrtam apy etad vetti kartā jaganmayaḥ ।।
paro asau bhagavān sākṣāt tathā divy antarikṣagaḥ ।
kas tasya rūpaṃ yo veda kasya kartā jaganmayaḥ ।।
evaṃvidhād ahaṃ jāto māṃ kathaṃ vettum arhatha ।
athavā draṣṭukāmā vai bhavanto mānupaśyata ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktvā darśayām āsa manyū rūpaṃ svakaṃ mahat ।
tārtīyacakṣuṣodbhūtaṃ bhavasya parameṣṭhinaḥ ।।
tejasā saṃbhṛtaṃ rūpaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ tad ucyate ।
pauruṣaṃ puruṣeṣv eva ahaṃkāraś ca jantuṣu ।।
krodhaḥ sarvasya yo bhīma upasaṃhārakṛd bhavet ।
taṃ śaṃkarapratinidhiṃ jvalantaṃ nijatejasā ।।
sarvāyudhadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇemuḥ sarvadevatāḥ ।
vitresur daityadanujāḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ surāḥ ।।
bhūtvā manyum athocus te tvaṃ senānīḥ prabho bhava ।
tvayā dattam idaṃ rājyaṃ manyo bhokṣyāmahe vayam ।।
tasmāt sarveṣu kāryeṣu jetā tvaṃ jayavardhanaḥ ।
tvam indras tvaṃ ca varuṇo lokapālās tvam eva ca ।।
asmāsu sarvadeveṣu praviśa tvaṃ jayāya vai ।
manyuḥ provāca tān sarvān vinā matto na kiṃcana ।।
sarveṣv antaḥ praviṣṭo ahaṃ na māṃ jānāti kaścana ।
sa eva bhagavān manyus tato jātaḥ pṛthak pṛthak ।।
sa eva rudrarūpī syād rudro manyuḥ śivo abhavat ।
sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sarvaṃ vyāptaṃ hi manyunā ।।
tam avāpya surāḥ sarve jayam āpuś ca saṃgare ।
jayo manyuś ca śauryaṃ ca īśatejaḥsamudbhavam ।।
manyunā jayam āpyātha kṛtvā daityaiś ca saṃgamam ।
yathāgataṃ yayuḥ sarve manyunā parirakṣitāḥ ।।
yatra vai gautamītīre śivam ārādhya te surāḥ ।
manyum āpur jayaṃ caiva manyutīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
utpattiṃ ca tathā manyor yo naraḥ prayataḥ smaret ।
vijayo jāyate tasya na kaiścit paribhūyate ।।
na manyutīrthasadṛśaṃ pāvanaṃ hi mahāmune ।
yatra sākṣān manyurūpī sarvadā śaṃkaraḥ sthitaḥ ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca smaraṇaṃ sarvakāmadam ।।
{brahmovāca 
sārasvataṃ nāma tīrthaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।
bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।।
sarvarogapraśamanaṃ sarvasiddhipradāyakam ।
tatremaṃ śṛṇu vṛttāntaṃ vistareṇātha nārada ।।
puṣpotkaṭāt pūrvabhāge parvato lokaviśrutaḥ ।
śubhro nāma giriśreṣṭho gautamyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
śākalya iti vikhyāto muniḥ paramanaiṣṭhikaḥ ।
tasmiñ śubhre puṇyagirau tapas tepe hy anuttamam ।।
tapasyantaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ gautamītīram āśritam ।
sarve bhūtagaṇā nityaṃ praṇamanti stuvanti tam ।।
agniśuśrūṣaṇaparaṃ vedādhyayanatatparam ।
ṛṣigandharvasumanaḥ- sevite tatra parvate ।।
tasmin girau mahāpuṇye devadvijabhayaṃkaraḥ ।
yajñadveṣī brahmahantā paraśur nāma rākṣasaḥ ।।
kāmarūpī vicarati nānārūpadharo vane ।
kṣaṇaṃ ca brahmarūpeṇa kadācid vyāghrarūpadhṛk ।।
kadācid devarūpeṇa kadācit paśurūpadhṛk ।
kadācit pramadārūpaḥ kadācin mṛgarūpataḥ ।।
kadācid bālarūpeṇa evaṃ carati pāpakṛt ।
yatrāste brāhmaṇo vidvāñ śākalyo munisattamaḥ ।।
tam āyāti mahāpāpī paraśū rākṣasādhamaḥ ।
śuciṣmantaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ paraśur nityam eva ca ।।
netuṃ hantuṃ pravṛtto api na śaśāka sa pāpakṛt ।
sa kadācid dvijaśreṣṭho devān abhyarcya yatnataḥ ।।
bhoktukāmaḥ kilāyātas tatrāyāt paraśur mune ।
brahmarūpadharo bhūtvā śithilaḥ palito abalī ।
kanyām ādāya kāṃcic ca śākalyaṃ vākyam abravīt ।।
{paraśur uvāca 
bhojanasyārthinaṃ viddhi māṃ ca kanyām imāṃ dvija ।
ātithyakāle saṃprāptaṃ kṛtakṛtyo asi mānada ।।
ta eva dhanyā loke asmin yeṣām atithayo gṛhāt ।
pūrṇābhilāṣā niryānti jīvanto api mṛtāḥ pare ।।
bhojane tūpaviṣṭe tu ātmārthaṃ kalpitaṃ tu yat ।
atithibhyas tu yo dadyād dattā tena vasuṃdharā ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā tu śākalyo dadāmīty evam abravīt ।
āsane copaveśyāthā- jñānāt taṃ paraśuṃ dvijam ।।
yathānyāyaṃ pūjayitvā śākalyo bhojanaṃ dadau ।
āpośanaṃ kare kṛtvā paraśur vākyam abravīt ।।
{paraśur uvāca 
dūrād abhyāgataṃ śrāntam anugacchanti devatāḥ ।
tasmiṃs tṛpte tu tṛptāḥ syur atṛpte tu viparyayaḥ ।।
atithiś cāpavādī ca dvāv etau viśvabāndhavau ।
apavādī haret pāpam atithiḥ svargasaṃkramaḥ ।।
abhyāgataṃ pathi śrāntaṃ sāvajñaṃ yo abhivīkṣate ।
tatkṣaṇād eva naśyanti tasya dharmayaśaḥśriyaḥ ।।
tasmād abhyāgataḥ śrānto yāce ahaṃ tvāṃ dvijottama ।
dāsyase yadi me kāmaṃ tad bhokṣye ahaṃ na cānyathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
dattam ity eva śākalyo bhuṅkṣvety evāha rākṣasam ।
tataḥ provāca paraśur ahaṃ rākṣasasattamaḥ ।।
nāhaṃ dvijas tava ripur na vṛddhaḥ palitaḥ kṛśaḥ ।
bahūni me vyatītāni varṣāṇi tvāṃ prapaśyataḥ ।।
śuṣyanti mama gātrāṇi grīṣme svalpodakaṃ yathā ।
tasmān neṣye sānugaṃ tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣye dvijottama ।।
{brahmovāca 
śrutvā paraśuvākyaṃ tac chākalyo vākyam abravīt ।।
{śākalya uvāca 
ye mahākulasaṃbhūtā vijñātasakalāgamāḥ ।
tat pratiśrutam abhyeti na jātv atra viparyayam ।।
yathocitaṃ kuru sakhe tathāpi śṛṇu me vacaḥ ।
nihantum apy udyateṣu vaktavyaṃ hitam uttamaiḥ ।।
brāhmaṇo ahaṃ vajratanuḥ sarvato rakṣako hariḥ ।
pādau rakṣatu me viṣṇuḥ śiro devo janārdanaḥ ।।
bāhū rakṣatu vārāhaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ rakṣatu kūrmarāṭ ।
hṛdayaṃ rakṣatāt kṛṣṇo hy aṅgulī rakṣatān mṛgaḥ ।।
mukhaṃ rakṣatu vāgīśo netre rakṣatu pakṣigaḥ ।
śrotraṃ rakṣatu vitteśaḥ sarvato rakṣatād bhavaḥ ।
nānāpatsv ekaśaraṇaṃ devo nārāyaṇaḥ svayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tu śākalyo naya vā bhakṣa vā sukham ।
māṃ rākṣasendra paraśo tvam idānīm atandritaḥ ।।
rākṣasas tasya vacanād bhakṣaṇāya samudyataḥ ।
nāsty eva hṛdaye nūnaṃ pāpināṃ karuṇākaṇaḥ ।।
daṃṣṭrākarālavadano gatvā tasyāntikaṃ tadā ।
brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ nirīkṣyaivaṃ paraśur vākyam abravīt ।।
{paraśur uvāca 
śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiṃ tvāṃ paśye ahaṃ dvijottama ।
sahasrapādaśirasaṃ sahasrākṣakaraṃ vibhum ।।
sarvabhūtaikanilayaṃ chandorūpaṃ jaganmayam ।
tvām adya vipra paśyāmi nāsti te pūrvakaṃ vapuḥ ।।
tasmāt prasādaye vipra tvam eva śaraṇaṃ bhava ।
jñānaṃ dehi mahābuddhe tīrthaṃ brūhy aghaniṣkṛtim ।।
mahatāṃ darśanaṃ brahmañ jāyate nahi niṣphalam ।
dveṣād ajñānato vāpi prasaṅgād vā pramādataḥ ।।
ayasaḥ sparśasaṃsparśo rukmatvāyaiva jāyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad vākyaṃ samākarṇya rākṣasena samīritam ।
śākalyaḥ kṛpayā prāha varadā sā sarasvatī ।।
tavācirād daityapate tataḥ stuhi janārdanam ।
manorathaphalaprāptau nānyan nārāyaṇastuteḥ ।।
kiṃcid apy asti loke asmin kāraṇaṃ śṛṇu rākṣasa ।
prasannā tava sā devī madvākyāc ca bhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā sa paraśur gaṅgāṃ trailokyapāvanīm ।
snātvā śucir yatamanā gaṅgām abhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ ।।
tatrāpaśyad divyarūpāṃ divyagandhānulepanām ।
sarasvatīṃ jagaddhātrīṃ śākalyavacane sthitām ।।
jagajjāḍyaharāṃ viśva- jananīṃ bhuvaneśvarīm ।
tām uvāca vinītātmā paraśur gatakalmaṣaḥ ।।
{paraśur uvāca 
guruḥ śākalya ity āha mākāntaṃ stuhi vidhvajam ।
tava prasādāt sā śaktir yathā me syāt tathā kuru ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathāstv iti ca sā prāha paraśuṃ śrīsarasvatī ।
sarasvatyāḥ prasādena paraśus taṃ janārdanam ।।
tuṣṭāva vividhair vākyais tatas tuṣṭo abhavad dhariḥ ।
varaṃ prādād rākṣasāya kṛpāsindhur janārdanaḥ ।।
{janārdana uvāca 
yad yan manogataṃ rakṣas tat tat sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
śākalyasya prasādena gautamyāś ca prasādataḥ ।
sarasvatyāḥ prasādena narasiṃhaprasādataḥ ।।
pāpiṣṭho api tadā rakṣaḥ paraśur divam eyivān ।
sarvatīrthāṅghripadmasya prasādāc chārṅgadhanvanaḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ sārasvatam iti śrutam ।
tatra snānena dānena viṣṇuloke mahīyate ।।
vāgjavaiṣṇavaśākalya- paraśuprabhavāṇi hi ।
bahūny abhūvaṃs tīrthāni tasmin vai śvetaparvate ।।
{brahmovāca 
ciccikātīrtham ity uktaṃ sarvarogavināśanam ।
sarvacintāpraharaṇaṃ sarvaśāntikaraṃ nṛṇām ।।
tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi śubhre tasmin nagottame ।
gaṅgāyā uttare pāre yatra devo gadādharaḥ ।।
ciccikaḥ pakṣirāṭ tatra bheruṇḍo yo abhidhīyate ।
sadā vasati tatraiva māṃsāśī śvetaparvate ।।
nānāpuṣpaphalākīrṇaiḥ sarvartukusumair nagaiḥ ।
sevite dvijamukhyaiś ca gautamyā copaśobhite ।।
siddhacāraṇagandharva- kiṃnarāmarasaṃkule ।
tatsamīpe nagaḥ kaścid dvipadāṃ ca catuṣpadām ।।
rogārtikṣuttṛṣācintā- maraṇānāṃ na bhājanam ।
evaṃ guṇānvite śaile nānāmunigaṇāvṛte ।।
pūrvadeśādhipaḥ kaścit pavamāna iti śrutaḥ ।
kṣatradharmarataḥ śrīmān devabrāhmaṇapālakaḥ ।।
balena mahatā yuktaḥ sapurodhā vanaṃ yayau ।
reme strībhir manojñābhir nṛtyavāditrajaiḥ sukhaiḥ ।।
sa ca evaṃ dhanuṣpāṇir mṛgayāśīlibhir vṛtaḥ ।
evaṃ bhraman kadācit sa śrānto drumam upāgataḥ ।।
gautamītīrasaṃbhūtaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇair vṛtam ।
āśramāṇāṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmajñam iva sevitam ।।
tam āśritya nagaśreṣṭhaṃ pavamāno nṛpottamaḥ ।
sa viśrānto janavṛta īkṣāṃ cakre nagottamam ।।
tatrāpaśyad dvijaṃ sthūlaṃ dvimukhaṃ śobhanākṛtim ।
cintāviṣṭaṃ tathā śrāntaṃ tam apṛcchan nṛpottamaḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
ko bhavān dvimukhaḥ pakṣī cintāvān iva lakṣyase ।
naivātra kaścid duḥkhārtaḥ kasmāt tvaṃ duḥkham āgataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ provāca nṛpatiṃ pavamānaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।
samāśvastamanāḥ pakṣī cicciko niḥśvasan muhuḥ ।।
{ciccika uvāca 
matto bhayaṃ na cānyeṣāṃ mama vānyopapāditam ।
nānāpuṣpaphalākīrṇaṃ munibhiḥ parisevitam ।।
paśyeyaṃ śūnyam evādriṃ tataḥ śocāmi mām aham ।
na labhāmi sukhaṃ kiṃcin na tṛpyāmi kadācana ।
nidrāṃ prāpnomi na kvāpi na viśrāntiṃ na nirvṛtim ।।
{brahmovāca 
dvimukhasya dvijasyoktaṃ śrutvā rājātivismitaḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
ko bhavān kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kasmāc chūnyaś ca parvataḥ ।
ekenāsyena tṛpyanti prāṇino atra nagottame ।।
kim utāsyadvayena tvaṃ na tṛptim upayāsyasi ।
kiṃ vā te duṣkṛtaṃ prāptam iha janmany atho purā ।।
tat sarvaṃ śaṃsa me satyaṃ trāsye tvāṃ mahato bhayāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
rājānaṃ taṃ dvijaḥ prāha niḥśvasann atha ciccikaḥ ।।
{ciccika uvāca 
vakṣye ahaṃ tvāṃ pūrvavṛttaṃ pavamāna śṛṇuṣva tat ।
ahaṃ dvijātipravaro vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ।।
kulīno viditaprājñaḥ kāryahantā kalipriyaḥ ।
vade puras tathā pṛṣṭhe anyad anyac ca jantuṣu ।।
paravṛddhyā sadā duḥkhī māyayā viśvavañcakaḥ ।
kṛtaghnaḥ satyarahitaḥ paranindāvicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
mitrasvāmigurudrohī dambhācāro atinirghṛṇaḥ ।
manasā karmaṇā vācā tāpayāmi janān bahūn ।।
ayam eva vinodo me sadā yat parahiṃsanam ।
yugmabhedaṃ gaṇocchedaṃ maryādābhedanaṃ sadā ।।
karomi nirvicāro ahaṃ vidvatsevāparāṅmukhaḥ ।
na mayā sadṛśaḥ kaścit pātakī bhavanatraye ।।
tenāhaṃ dvimukho jātas tāpanād duḥkhabhāgy aham ।
tasmād duḥkhena saṃtaptaḥ śūnyo ayaṃ parvato mama ।।
anyac ca śṛṇu bhūpāla vākyaṃ dharmārthasaṃhitam ।
brahmahatyāsamaṃ pāpaṃ tad vinā tad avāpyate ।।
kṣatriyaḥ saṃgaraṃ gatvā athavānyatra saṃgarāt ।
palāyantaṃ nyastaśastraṃ viśvastaṃ ca parāṅmukham ।।
avijñātaṃ copaviṣṭaṃ bibhemīti ca vādinam ।
taṃ yadi kṣatriyo hanyāt sa tu syād brahmaghātakaḥ ।।
adhītaṃ vismarati yas tvaṃ karoti tathottamam ।
anādaraṃ ca guruṣu tam āhur brahmaghātakam ।।
pratyakṣe ca priyaṃ vakti parokṣe paruṣāṇi ca ।
anyad dhṛdi vacasy anyat karoty anyat sadaiva yaḥ ।।
gurūṇāṃ śapathaṃ kartā dveṣṭā brāhmaṇanindakaḥ ।
mithyā vinītaḥ pāpātmā sa tu syād brahmaghātakaḥ ।।
devaṃ vedam athādhyātmaṃ dharmabrāhmaṇasaṃgatim ।
etān nindati yo dveṣāt sa tu syād brahmaghātakaḥ ।।
evaṃ bhūto apy ahaṃ rājan dambhārthaṃ lajjayā tathā ।
sadvṛtta iva varte ahaṃ tasmād rājan dvijo abhavam ।।
evaṃ bhūto api satkarma kiṃcit kartāsmi kutracit ।
tenāhaṃ karmaṇā rājan svataḥ smartā purā kṛtam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac ciccikavacaḥ śrutvā pavamānaḥ suvismitaḥ ।
karmaṇā kena te muktir ity āha nṛpatir dvijam ।।
iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā nṛpatiṃ prāha pakṣirāṭ ।।
{ciccika uvāca 
asminn eva nagaśreṣṭhe gautamyā uttare taṭe ।
gadādharaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ tatra māṃ naya suvrata ।।
tad dhi tīrthaṃ puṇyatamaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।
sarvakāmapradaṃ ceti mahadbhir munibhiḥ śrutam ।।
na gautamyās tathā viṣṇor aparaṃ kleśanāśanam ।
sarvabhāvena tat tīrthaṃ paśyeyam iti me matiḥ ।।
matkṛtena prayatnena naitac chakyaṃ kadācana ।
katham ākāṅkṣitaprāptir bhaved duṣkṛtakarmaṇām ।।
saprayatno apy ahaṃ vīra na paśye tat suduṣkaram ।
tasmāt tava prasādāc ca paśyeyaṃ hi gadādharam ।।
avijñāpitaduḥkhajñaṃ karuṇāvaruṇālayam ।
yasmin dṛṣṭe bhavakleśā na dṛśyante punar naraiḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ divaṃ yāsye prasādāt tava suvrata ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktaḥ sa nṛpatiś ciccikena dvijanmanā ।
darśayām āsa taṃ devaṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ dvijanmane ।।
tataḥ sa ciccikaḥ snātvā gaṅgāṃ trailokyapāvanīm ।।
{ciccika uvāca 
gaṅge gautami yāvat tvāṃ trijagatpāvanīṃ naraḥ ।
na paśyaty ucyate tāvad ihāmutrāpi pātakī ।।
tasmāt sarvāgasam api mām uddhara saridvare ।
saṃsāre dehinām anyā na gatiḥ kāpi kutracit ।
tvāṃ vinā viṣṇucaraṇa- saroruhasamudbhave ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śraddhāviśuddhātmā gaṅgaikaśaraṇo dvijaḥ ।
snānaṃ cakre smarann antar gaṅge trāyasva mām iti ।।
gadādharaṃ tato natvā paśyatsu nagavāsiṣu ।
pavamānābhyanujñātas tadaiva divam ākramat ।।
pavamānaḥ svanagaraṃ prayayau sānugas tataḥ ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ pāvamānaṃ saciccikam ।।
gadādharaṃ koṭitīrtham iti vedavido viduḥ ।
koṭikoṭiguṇaṃ karma kṛtaṃ tatra bhaven nṛṇām ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhadratīrtham iti proktaṃ sarvāniṣṭanivāraṇam ।
sarvapāpapraśamanaṃ mahāśāntipradāyakam ।।
ādityasya priyā bhāryā uṣā tvāṣṭrī pativratā ।
chāyāpi bhāryā savitus tasyāḥ putraḥ śanaiścaraḥ ।।
tasya svasā viṣṭir iti bhīṣaṇā pāparūpiṇī ।
tāṃ kanyāṃ savitā kasmai dadāmīti matiṃ dadhe ।।
yasmai yasmai dātukāmaḥ sūryo lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ ।
tac chrutvā bhīṣaṇā ceti kiṃ kurmo bhāryayānayā ।
evaṃ tu vartamāne sā pitaraṃ prāha duḥkhitā ।।
{viṣṭir uvāca 
bālām eva pitā yas tu dadyāt kanyāṃ surūpiṇe ।
sa kṛtārtho bhavel loke na ced duṣkṛtavān pitā ।।
caturthād vatsarād ūrdhvaṃ yāvan na daśamātyayaḥ ।
tāvad vivāhaḥ kanyāyāḥ pitrā kāryaḥ prayatnataḥ ।।
śrīmate viduṣe yūne kulīnāya yaśasvine ।
udārāya sanāthāya kanyā deyā varāya vai ।।
etac ced anyathā kuryāt pitā sa nirayī sadā ।
dharmasya sādhanaṃ kanyā viduṣām api bhāskara ।।
narakasyeva mūrkhāṇāṃ kāmopahatacetasām ।
ekataḥ pṛthivī kṛtsnā saśailavanakānanā ।।
svalaṃkṛtopādhihīnā sukanyā caikataḥ smṛtā ।
vikrīṇīte yaś ca kanyām aśvaṃ vā gāṃ tilān api ।।
na tasya rauravādibhyaḥ kadācin niṣkṛtir bhavet ।
vivāhātikramaḥ kāryo na kanyāyāḥ kadācana ।।
tasmin kṛte yat pituḥ syāt pāpaṃ tat kena kathyate ।
yāval lajjāṃ na jānāti yāvat krīḍati pāṃśubhiḥ ।।
tāvat kanyā pradātavyā no cet pitror adhogatiḥ ।
pituḥ svarūpaṃ putraḥ syād yaḥ pitā putra eva saḥ ।।
ātmanaḥ sukhitāṃ loke ko na kuryāt karoti ca ।
yat kanyāyāṃ pitā kuryād dānaṃ pūjanam īkṣaṇam ।।
yat kṛtaṃ tat kṛtaṃ vidyāt tāsu dattaṃ tad akṣayam ।
yad dattaṃ tāsu kanyāsu tad ānantyāya kalpate ।।
putreṣu caiva pautreṣu ko na kuryāt sukhaṃ rave ।
karoti yaḥ kanyakānāṃ sa saṃpadbhājanaṃ bhavet ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ tāṃ vādinīṃ kanyāṃ viṣṭiṃ provāca bhāskaraḥ ।।
{sūrya uvāca 
kiṃ karomi na gṛhṇāti tvāṃ kaścid bhīṣaṇākṛtim ।
kulaṃ rūpaṃ vayo vittaṃ vidyāṃ vṛttaṃ suśīlatām ।।
mithaḥ paśyanti saṃbandhe vivāhe strīṣu puṃsu ca ।
asmāsu sarvam apy asti vinā tava guṇaiḥ śubhe ।
kiṃ karomi kva dāsyāmi vṛthā māṃ dhik karoṣi kim ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā punas tāṃ ca viṣṭiṃ provāca bhāskaraḥ ।।
{sūrya uvāca 
yasmai kasmai ca dātavyā tvaṃ vai yady anumanyase ।
dīyase adya mayā viṣṭe anujānīhi māṃ tataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
pitaraṃ prāha sā viṣṭir bhartā putrā dhanaṃ sukham ।
āyū rūpaṃ ca saṃprītir jāyate prāktanānugam ।।
yat purā vihitaṃ karma prāṇinā sādhv asādhu vā ।
phalaṃ tadanurodhena prāpyate api bhavāntare ।।
svadoṣa eva tat pitrā parihartavya ādarāt ।
tādṛg eva phalaṃ tu syād yādṛg ācaritaṃ purā ।।
tasmāt taddānasaṃbandhaṃ svavaṃśānugataṃ pitā ।
karoti śeṣaṃ daivena yad bhāvyaṃ tad bhaviṣyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
tac chrutvā duhitur vākyaṃ tvaṣṭuḥ putrāya bhīṣaṇām ।
viśvarūpāya tāṃ prādād viṣṭiṃ lokabhayaṃkarīm ।।
viśvarūpo api tadvac ca bhīṣaṇo bhīṣaṇākṛtiḥ ।
evaṃ mithaḥ saṃcaratoḥ śīlarūpasamānayoḥ ।।
prītiḥ kadācid vaiṣamyaṃ daṃpatyor abhavan mithaḥ ।
gaṇḍo nāmābhavat putro hy atigaṇḍas tathaiva ca ।।
raktākṣaḥ krodhanaś caiva vyayo durmukha eva ca ।
tebhyaḥ kanīyān abhavad dharṣaṇo nāma puṇyabhāk ।।
sutaḥ suśīlaḥ subhagaḥ śāntaḥ śuddhamatiḥ śuciḥ ।
sa kadācid yamagṛhaṃ draṣṭuṃ mātulam abhyagāt ।।
sa dadarśa bahūñ jantūn svargasthān iva duḥkhinaḥ ।
sa mātulaṃ tu papraccha natvā dharmaṃ sanātanam ।।
{harṣaṇa uvāca 
ka ime sukhinas tāta pacyante narake ca ke ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ pṛṣṭo dharmarājaḥ sarvaṃ prāha yathārthavat ।
tatkarmaṇāṃ gatiṃ sarvām aśeṣeṇa nyavedayat ।।
{yama uvāca 
vihitasya na kurvanti ye kadācid atikramam ।
na te paśyanti nirayaṃ kadācid api mānavāḥ ।।
na mānayanti ye śāstraṃ nācāraṃ na bahuśrutān ।
vihitātikramaṃ kuryur ye te narakagāminaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa tu śrutvā dharmavākyaṃ harṣaṇaḥ punar abravīt ।।
{harṣaṇa uvāca 
pitā tvāṣṭro bhīṣaṇaś ca mātā viṣṭiś ca bhīṣaṇā ।
bhrātaraś ca mahātmāno yena te śāntabuddhayaḥ ।।
surūpāś ca bhaviṣyanti nirdoṣā maṅgalapradāḥ ।
tan me karma vadasvādya tatkartāsmi surottama ।।
anyathā tān na gaccheyam ity uktaḥ prāha dharmarāṭ ।
harṣaṇaṃ śuddhabuddhiṃ taṃ harṣaṇo asi na saṃśayaḥ ।।
bahavaḥ syuḥ sutāḥ kecin naiva te kulatantavaḥ ।
eka eva sutaḥ kaścid yena tad dhriyate kulam ।।
kulasyādhārabhūto yo yaḥ pitroḥ priyakārakaḥ ।
yaḥ pūrvajān uddharati sa putras tv itaro gadaḥ ।।
yasmāt tvayānurūpaṃ me proktaṃ mātāmaha priyam ।
tasmāt tvaṃ gautamīṃ gaccha snātvā niyatamānasaḥ ।।
stuhi viṣṇuṃ jagadyoniṃ śāntaṃ prītena cetasā ।
sa tu prīto yadi bhavet sarvam iṣṭaṃ pradāsyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti śrutvā dharmavākyaṃ harṣaṇo gautamīṃ yayau ।
śucis tuṣṭāva deveśaṃ hariṃ prīto abhavad dhariḥ ।।
harṣaṇāya tataḥ prādāt kulabhadraṃ tatas tu saḥ ।
sarvābhadrapraśamana- pūrvakaṃ bhadram astu te ।।
tad bhadrā procyate viṣṭiḥ pitā bhadras tathā sutāḥ ।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ bhadratīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
sarvamaṅgaladaṃ puṃsāṃ tatra bhadrapatir hariḥ ।
tattīrthasevināṃ puṃsāṃ sarvasiddhipradāyakam ।
maṅgalaikanidhiḥ sākṣād devadevo janārdanaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
patatritīrtham ākhyātaṃ rogaghnaṃ pāpanāśanam ।
tasya śravaṇamātreṇa kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ ।।
babhūvatuḥ kaśyapasya sutāv aruṇāv īśvarau ।
saṃpātiś ca jaṭāyuś ca saṃbhavetāṃ tadanvaye ।।
tārkṣyaprajāpateḥ putrāv aruṇo garuḍas tathā ।
tadanvaye saṃbhūtaḥ ca saṃpātiḥ patagottamaḥ ।।
jaṭāyur iti vikhyāto hy aparaḥ sodaro anujaḥ ।
anyonyaspardhayā yuktāv unmattau svabalena tau ।।
saṃjagmatur dinakaraṃ namaskartuṃ vihāyasi ।
yāvat sūryasya sāmīpyaṃ prāptau tau vihagottamau ।।
dagdhapakṣāv ubhau śrāntau patitau girimūrdhani ।
bāndhavau patitau dṛṣṭvā niśceṣṭau gatacetasau ।।
tāvad duḥkhābhibhūto asāv aruṇaḥ prāha bhāskaram ।
tau dṛṣṭvā tv aruṇaḥ sūryam prāhedaṃ patitau bhuvi ।
āśvāsayaitau tigmāṃśo yāvan naitau mariṣyataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā dinakaro jīvayām āsa tau khagau ।
garuḍo api tayoḥ śrutvā avasthāṃ saha viṣṇunā ।।
āgatyāśvāsayām āsa sukhaṃ cakre ca nārada ।
sarva eva tadā jagmur gaṅgāṃ tāpāpanuttaye ।।
jaṭāyuś cāruṇaś caiva saṃpātir garuḍas tathā ।
sūryo viṣṇus tat prayayau tat tīrthaṃ bahupuṇyadam ।।
patatritīrtham ākhyātaṃ viṣaghnaṃ sarvakāmadam ।
svayaṃ sūryas tathā viṣṇuḥ suparṇenāruṇena ca ।।
āsate gautamītīre tathaiva vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ ।
trayāṇām api devānāṃ sthites tat tīrtham uttamam ।।
tatra snātvā śucir bhūtvā namaskuryāt surān imān ।
ādhivyādhivinirmuktaḥ sa paraṃ saukhyam āpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
vipratīrtham iti khyātaṃ tathā nārāyaṇaṃ viduḥ ।
tasyākhyānaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu vismayakārakam ।।
antarvedyāṃ dvijaḥ kaścid brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ ।
tasya putrā mahāprājñā guṇarūpadayānvitāḥ ।।
teṣāṃ kanīyān yo bhrātā śānto guṇagaṇair vṛtaḥ ।
āsandiva iti khyātaḥ sarvajñāno mahāmatiḥ ।।
vivāhāya pitā tasmāai āsandivāya yatnavān ।
etasminn antare rātrau suptaṃ taṃ dvijaputrakam ।।
aviṣṇusmaraṇaṃ saumya- śiraskam asamāhitam ।
āsandivaṃ krūrarūpā rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī ।।
tam ādāyāgamac chīghraṃ gautamyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।
śrīgirer uttare pāre bahubrāhmaṇasevitam ।।
nagaraṃ dharmanilayaṃ lakṣmyā nilayam eva ca ।
tatra rājā bṛhatkīrtiḥ sarvakṣatraguṇānvitaḥ ।।
tasyāmitakṣemasubhikṣayuktaṃ 
niśāvasāne dvijaputrayuktā 
sā rākṣasī tat puram āsasāda 
manojñarūpāṇi bibharti nityam 
sā kāmarūpeṇa caraty aśeṣāṃ 
mahīm imāṃ tena samaṃ dvijena 
godāvarīdakṣiṇatīrabhāge 
vṛddhākṛtis taṃ dvijam āha bhīmā 
{rākṣasy uvāca 
eṣā tu gaṅgā dvijamukhya saṃdhyā 
upāsyatāṃ vipravaraiḥ sametya 
yathocitaṃ vipravarās tu kāle 
nopāsate yatnata eva saṃdhyām 
nīcās ta evābhihitāḥ sureśair 
antyāvasāyipravarās ta ete 
ahaṃ janitrī tava ceti vācyaṃ 
no ced idānīṃ tvam upaiṣi nāśam 
madvākyakartāsi yadi dvijendra 
sukhaṃ kariṣye tava yat priyaṃ ca 
punaś ca deśaṃ nilayaṃ gurūṃś ca 
saṃprāpayiṣye nanu satyam etat 
{brahmovāca 
sa prāha kā tvaṃ dvijapuṃgavo api 
sovāca taṃ rākṣasī kāmarūpā 
viśvāsayantī śapathair anekais 
taṃ bhrāntacittaṃ munirājaputram 
kaṅkālinī nāma jagatprasiddhā 
vipro api tām āha niveditaṃ yat 
tad eva kartāsmi na saṃśayo atra 
yat tat priyaṃ vacmi karomi caiva 
{brahmovāca 
tad vipravacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī ।
vṛddhā tathāpi cārvaṅgī divyālaṃkārabhūṣaṇā ।।
dvijam ādāya sarvatra matsuto ayaṃ guṇākaraḥ ।
evaṃ vadantī sarvatra yāti vakti karoti ca ।।
taṃ vipraṃ rūpasaubhāgya- vayovidyāvibhūṣitam ।
tāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ guṇopetām asya māteti menire ।।
tatra dvijavaraḥ kaścit svāṃ kanyāṃ bhūṣaṇānvitām ।
rākṣasīṃ tāṃ puraskṛtya prādāt tasmai dvijātaye ।।
sā kanyā taṃ patiṃ prāpya kṛtārthāsmīty acintayat ।
sa dvijo api guṇair yuktāṃ patnīṃ dṛṣṭvā suduḥkhitaḥ ।।
{dvija uvāca 
mām iyaṃ bhakṣayed eva rākṣasī pāparūpiṇī ।
kiṃ karomi kva gacchāmi kasyaitat kathayāmi vā ।।
mahat saṃkaṭam āpannaṃ rakṣayiṣyati ko atra mām ।
bhāryā mameyaṃ kalyāṇī guṇarūpavayoyutā ।
enām apy aśubhākasmād bhakṣayiṣyati rākṣasī ।।
{brahmovāca 
etasminn antare tatra bhāryā sā guṇaśālinī ।
vṛddhāpy atidurādharṣā sā gatā kutracit tadā ।।
praśrayāvanatā bhūtvā bālā cāpi pativratā ।
bhartāraṃ duḥkhitaṃ jñātvā patiṃ prāha rahaḥ śanaiḥ ।।
{bhāryovāca 
kasmāt te duḥkham āpannaṃ svāmiṃs tattvaṃ vadasva me ।।
{brahmovāca 
śanaiḥ provāca tāṃ bhāryāṃ yathāvat pūrvavistaram ।
kim akathyaṃ priye mitre kulīnāyāṃ ca yoṣiti ।।
bhartṛvākyaṃ niśamyedaṃ provāca vadatāṃ varā ।।
{bhāryovāca 
anātmanaḥ sarvato api bhayam asti gṛheṣv api ।
kuto bhayaṃ hy ātmavatāṃ kiṃ punar gautamītaṭe ।।
vasatāṃ viṣṇubhaktānāṃ viraktānāṃ vivekinām ।
atra snātvā śucir bhūtvā stuhi devam anāmayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad ākarṇya gaṅgāyāṃ snātvā vigatakalmaṣaḥ ।
tuṣṭāva gautamītīre dvijo nārāyaṇaṃ tathā ।।
{dvija uvāca 
tvam antarātmā jagato asya nātha 
tvam eva kartāsya mukunda hartā 
tvaṃ pālakaḥ pālayase na dīnam 
anāthabandho narasiṃha kasmāt 
śrutvaitat prārthanaṃ tasya jagacchokanivāraṇaḥ ।
nārāyaṇo api tāṃ pāpāṃ nijaghāna sa rākṣasīm ।।
sudarśanena cakreṇa sahasrāreṇa bhāsvatā ।
tasmai prādād varān iṣṭān prāpayac ca guruṃ prabhuḥ ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ vipraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ viduḥ ।
snānadānena pūjādyair yatra sidhyati vāñchitam ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhānutīrtham iti khyātaṃ tvāṣṭraṃ māheśvaraṃ tathā ।
aindraṃ yāmyaṃ tathāgneyaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।।
abhiṣṭuta iti khyāto rājāsīt priyadarśanaḥ ।
hayamedhena puṇyena yaṣṭum ārabdhavān surān ।।
tatrartvijaḥ ṣoḍaśa syur vasiṣṭhātripurogamāḥ ।
kṣatriye yajamāne tu yajñabhūmiḥ kathaṃ bhavet ।।
brāhmaṇe dīkṣite rājā bhuvaṃ dāsyati yajñiyām ।
bhūpatau dīkṣite dātā ko bhavet ko nu yācate ।।
yācñeyam akhilāśarma- jananī pāparūpiṇī ।
kenāpy ato na kāryaiva kṣatriyeṇa viśeṣataḥ ।।
evaṃ mīmāṃsamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu parasparam ।
tatra prāha mahāprājño vasiṣṭho dharmavittamaḥ ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
rājñi dīkṣāyamāṇe tu sūryo yācyo bhuvaṃ prati ।
dehi me deva savitar yajanaṃ devatocitam ।।
daivaṃ kṣatram asi brahman bhūtanātha namo astu te ।
yācitaḥ savitā rājñā devānāṃ yajanaṃ śubham ।।
dadāty eva tato rājan prārthayeśaṃ divākaram ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvābhiṣṭuto api devadevaṃ divākaram ।
śraddhayā prārthayām āsa harīśājātmakaṃ ravim ।।
{rājovāca 
devānāṃ yajanaṃ dehi savitas te namo astu te ।।
{brahmovāca 
kṣatraṃ daivaṃ yataḥ sūryo dattā bhūr bhūpates tataḥ ।
savitā devadeveśo dadāmīty abhyabhāṣata ।।
evaṃ karoti yo yajñaṃ tasya riṣṭir na kācana ।
tathā vājimakhe sattre brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ ।।
prārabdhe abhiṣṭutā rājñā yatrāgād bhūpatiṃ raviḥ ।
devānāṃ yajanaṃ dātuṃ bhānutīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
taṃ devakratum utkṛṣṭaṃ hayamedhaṃ surair yutam ।
daityāś ca danujāś caiva tathānye yajñaghātakāḥ ।।
brahmaveṣadharāḥ sarve gāyantaḥ sāmagā iva ।
te api tatra mahāprājñāḥ prāviśann anivāritāḥ ।।
camasāni ca pātrāṇi somaṃ caṣālam eva ca ।
somapānaṃ havis tyāgam ṛtvijo bhūpatiṃ tathā ।।
nindanti nikṣipanty anye hasanty anye tathāsurāḥ ।
teṣāṃ ceṣṭāṃ na jānanti viśvarūpaṃ vinā mune ।।
