viśvarūpo api pitaraṃ prāha daityā ime iti ।
tat putravacanaṃ śrutvā tvaṣṭā prāha surān idam ।।
{tvaṣṭovāca 
gṛhītvā vāridarbhāṃś ca prokṣayadhvaṃ samantataḥ ।
ye nindanti makhaṃ puṇyaṃ camasaṃ somam eva ca ।।
mayā tv apahatāḥ sarva ity uktvā pariṣiñcata ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathā cakruḥ suragaṇās tvaṣṭā cāpi tathākarot ।
bhasmībhūtās tataḥ sarve kāṃdiśīkās tato abhavan ।।
hatā mayā mahāpāpā ity uktvā vāry avākṣipat ।
tataḥ kṣīṇāyuṣo daityāḥ prātiṣṭhan kupitās tataḥ ।।
yatraitat prākṣipad vāri tvaṣṭā lokaprajāpatiḥ ।
tvāṣṭraṃ tīrthaṃ tad ākhyātaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।।
tvaṣṭur vākyāc cyutān daityān nijaghāna yamas tadā ।
kāladaṇḍena cakreṇa kālapāśena manyunā ।।
yatra te nihatā daityās tat tīrthaṃ yāmyam ucyate ।
yatrābhavat kratuḥ pūrṇo hutvāgnau cāmṛtaṃ bahu ।।
dhārābhiḥ śaramānābhir akhaṇḍābhir mahādhvare ।
yatrābhavad dhavyavāhas tṛptas tasya hy abhiṣṭutaḥ ।।
agnitīrthaṃ tad ākhyātam aśvamedhaphalapradam ।
indro marudbhir nṛpatiṃ prāhedaṃ vacanaṃ śubham ।।
tvaṃ saṃrāḍ bhavitā rājann ubhayor api lokayoḥ ।
sakhā mama priyo nityaṃ bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
sa kṛtārtho martyaloka indratīrthe ca tarpaṇam ।
kuryāt pitṝṇāṃ prītyarthaṃ yamatīrthe viśeṣataḥ ।।
māheśvaraṃ tu tat tīrthaṃ pūjito abhiṣṭutaḥ śivaḥ ।
bhaktiyuktena vipraiś ca sarvakarmaviśāradaiḥ ।।
vaidikair laukikaiś caiva mantraiḥ pūjyaṃ maheśvaram ।
nṛtyair gītais tathā vādyair amṛtaiḥ pañcasaṃbhavaiḥ ।।
upacāraiś ca bahubhir daṇḍapātapradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
dhūpair dīpaiś ca naivedyaiḥ puṣpair gandhaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ ।।
pūjayām āsa deveśaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaṃbhuṃ dhiyaikayā ।
tataḥ prasannau deveśau varān dadatur ojasā ।।
abhiṣṭute narendrāya bhuktimuktī ubhe api ।
māhātmyam asya tīrthasya tathā dadatur uttamam ।।
tataḥprabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ śaivaṃ vaiṣṇavam ucyate ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakāmapradaṃ viduḥ ।।
imāni sarvatīrthāni smared api paṭheta vā ।
vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ śivaviṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ।।
bhānutīrthe viśeṣeṇa snānaṃ sarvārthasiddhidam ।
tatra tīrthe mahāpuṇyaṃ tīrthānāṃ śatam atra hi ।।
{brahmovāca 
bhillatīrtham iti khyātaṃ rogaghnaṃ pāpanāśanam ।
mahādevapadāmbhoja- yugabhaktipradāyakam ।।
tatrāpy evaṃvidhāṃ puṇyāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu mahāmate ।
gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe tīre śrīgirer uttare taṭe ।।
ādikeśa iti khyāta ṛṣibhiḥ paripūjitaḥ ।
mahādevo liṅgarūpī sadāste sarvakāmadaḥ ।।
sindhudvīpa iti khyāto muniḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।
tasya bhrātā veda iti sa cāpi paramo ṛṣiḥ ।।
tam ādikeśaṃ vai devaṃ tripurāriṃ trilocanam ।
nityaṃ pūjayate bhaktyā prāpte madhyaṃdine ravau ।।
bhikṣāṭanāya vedo api yāti grāmaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ ।
yāte tasmin dvijavare vyādhaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।।
tasmin girivare puṇye mṛgayāṃ yāti nityaśaḥ ।
aṭitvā vividhān deśān mṛgān hatvā yathāsukham ।।
mukhe gṛhītvā pānīyam abhiṣekāya śūlinaḥ ।
nyasya māṃsaṃ dhanuṣkoṭyāṃ śrānto vyādhaḥ śivaṃ prabhum ।।
ādikeśaṃ samāgatya nyasya māṃsaṃ tato bahiḥ ।
gaṅgāṃ gatvā mukhe vāri gṛhītvāgatya taṃ śivam ।।
yasya kasyāpi pattrāṇi kareṇādāya bhaktitaḥ ।
apareṇa ca māṃsāni naivedyārthaṃ ca tanmanāḥ ।।
ādikeśaṃ samāgatya vedenārcitam ojasā ।
pādenāhatya tāṃ pūjāṃ mukhānītena vāriṇā ।।
snāpayitvā śivaṃ devam arcayitvā tu pattrakaiḥ ।
kalpayitvā tu tan māṃsaṃ śivo me prīyatām iti ।।
naiva kiṃcit sa jānāti śivabhaktiṃ vinā śubhām ।
tato yāti svakaṃ sthānaṃ māṃsena tu yathāgatam ।।
karoty etādṛg āgatyā- gatya pratyaham eva saḥ ।
tathāpīśas tutoṣāsya vicitrā hīśvarasthitiḥ ।।
yāvan nāyāty asau bhillaḥ śivas tāvan na saukhyabhāk ।
bhaktānukampitāṃ śaṃbhor mānātītāṃ tu vetti kaḥ ।।
saṃpūjayaty ādikeśam umayā pratyahaṃ śivam ।
evaṃ bahutithe kāle yāte vedaś cukopa ha ।।
pūjāṃ mantravatīṃ citrāṃ śivabhaktisamanvitām ।
ko nu vidhvaṃsate pāpo mattaḥ sa vadham āpnuyāt ।।
gurudevadvijasvāmi- drohī vadhyo muner api ।
sarvasyāpi vadhārho asau śivasya drohakṛn naraḥ ।।
evaṃ niścitya medhāvī vedaḥ sindhos tathānujaḥ ।
kasyeyaṃ pāpaceṣṭā syāt pāpiṣṭhasya durātmanaḥ ।।
puṣpair vanyabhavair divyaiḥ kandair mūlaphalaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।
kṛtāṃ pūjāṃ sa vidhvasya hy anyāṃ pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ ।।
māṃsena tarupattraiś ca sa ca vadhyo bhaven mama ।
evaṃ saṃcintya medhāvī gopayitvā tanuṃ tadā ।।
taṃ paśyeyam ahaṃ pāpaṃ pūjākartāram īśvare ।
etasminn antare prāyād vyādho devaṃ yathā purā ।।
nityavat pūjayantaṃ tam ādikeśas tadābravīt ।।
{ādikeśa uvāca 
bho bho vyādha mahābuddhe śrānto asīti punaḥ punaḥ ।
cirāya katham āyātas tvāṃ vinā tāta duḥkhitaḥ ।
na vindāmi sukhaṃ kiṃcit samāśvasihi putraka ।।
{brahmovāca 
tam evaṃvādinaṃ devaṃ vedaḥ śrutvā vilokya tu ।
cukopa vismayāviṣṭo na ca kiṃcid uvāca ha ।।
vyādhaś ca nityavat pūjāṃ kṛtvā svabhavanaṃ yayau ।
vedaś ca kupito bhūtvā āgatyeśam uvāca ha ।।
{veda uvāca 
ayaṃ vyādhaḥ pāparataḥ kriyājñānavivarjitaḥ ।
prāṇihiṃsārataḥ krūro nirdayaḥ sarvajantuṣu ।।
hīnajātir akiṃcijjño gurukramavivarjitaḥ ।
sadānucitakārī cā- nirjitākhilagogaṇaḥ ।।
tasyātmānaṃ darśitavān na māṃ kiṃcana vakṣyasi ।
pūjāṃ mantravidhānena karomīśa yatavrataḥ ।।
tvadekaśaraṇo nityaṃ bhāryāputravivarjitaḥ ।
vyādho māṃsena duṣṭena pūjāṃ tava karoty asau ।।
tasya prasanno bhagavān na mameti mahādbhutam ।
śāstim asya kariṣyāmi bhillasya hy apakāriṇaḥ ।।
mṛdoḥ kopi bhavet prītaḥ kopi tadvad durātmanaḥ ।
tasmād ahaṃ mūrdhni śilāṃ pātayeyam asaṃśayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
ity uktavati vai vede vihasyeśo abravīd idam ।।
{ādikeśa uvāca 
śvaḥ pratīkṣasva paścān me śilāṃ pātaya mūrdhani ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā sa vedo api śilāṃ saṃtyajya bāhunā ।
upasaṃhṛtya taṃ kopaṃ śvaḥ karomīty uvāca ha ।।
tataḥ prātaḥ samāgatya kṛtvā snānādikarma ca ।
vedo api nityavat pūjāṃ kurvan paśyati mastake ।।
liṅgasya savraṇāṃ bhīmāṃ dhārāṃ ca rudhiraplutām ।
vedaḥ sa vismito bhūtvā kim idaṃ liṅgamūrdhani ।।
mahotpāto bhavet kasya sūcayed ity acintayat ।
mṛdbhiś ca gomayenāpi kuśais taṃ gāṅgavāribhiḥ ।।
prakṣālayitvā tāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtavān nityavat tadā ।
etasminn antare prāyād vyādho vigatakalmaṣaḥ ।।
mūrdhānaṃ vraṇasaṃyuktaṃ saraktaṃ liṅgamastake ।
śaṃkarasyādikeśasya dadṛśe antargatas tadā ।।
dṛṣṭvaiva kim idaṃ citram ity uktvā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ ।
ātmānaṃ bhedayām āsa śatadhā ca sahasradhā ।।
svāmino vaikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaḥ kṣametottamāśayaḥ ।
muhur nininda cātmānaṃ mayi jīvaty abhūd idam ।।
kaṣṭam āpatitaṃ kīdṛg aho durvidhivaiśasāt ।
tat karma tasya saṃvīkṣya mahādevo ativismitaḥ ।
tataḥ provāca bhagavān vedaṃ vedavidāṃ varam ।।
{ādikeśa uvāca 
paśya vyādhaṃ mahābuddhe bhaktaṃ bhāvena saṃyutam ।
tvaṃ tu mṛdbhiḥ kuśair vārbhir mūrdhānaṃ spṛṣṭavān asi ।।
anena sahasā brahman mamātmāpi niveditaḥ ।
bhaktiḥ premāthavā śaktir vicāro yatra vidyate ।
tasmād asmai varān dāsye paścāt tubhyaṃ dvijottama ।।
{brahmovāca 
vareṇa cchandayām āsa vyādhaṃ devo maheśvaraḥ ।
vyādhaḥ provāca deveśaṃ nirmālyaṃ tava yad bhavet ।।
tad asmākaṃ bhaven nātha mannāmnā tīrtham ucyatām ।
sarvakratuphalaṃ tīrthaṃ smaraṇād eva jāyatām ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uvāca deveśas tatas tat tīrtham uttamam ।
bhillatīrthaṃ samastāgha- saṃghavicchedakāraṇam ।।
śrīmahādevacaraṇa- mahābhaktividhāyakam ।
abhavat snānadānādyair bhuktimuktipradāyakam ।
vedasyāpi varān prādāc chivo nānāvidhān bahūn ।।
{brahmovāca 
cakṣustīrtham iti khyātaṃ rūpasaubhāgyadāyakam ।
yatra yogeśvaro devo gautamyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।।
puraṃ bhauvanam ākhyātaṃ girimūrdhny abhidhīyate ।
yatrāsau bhauvano rājā kṣatradharmaparāyaṇaḥ ।।
tasmin puravare kaścid brāhmaṇo vṛddhakauśikaḥ ।
tatputro gautama iti khyāto vedaviduttamaḥ ।।
tasya mātur manodoṣād viparīto abhavad dvijaḥ ।
sakhā tasya vaṇik kaścin maṇikuṇḍala ucyate ।।
tena sakhyaṃ dvijasyāsīd viṣamaṃ dvijavaiśyayoḥ ।
śrīmaddaridrayor nityaṃ parasparahitaiṣiṇoḥ ।।
kadācid gautamo vaiśyaṃ vitteśaṃ maṇikuṇḍalam ।
prāhedaṃ vacanaṃ prītyā rahaḥ sthitvā punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
gacchāmo dhanam ādātuṃ parvatān udadhīn api ।
yauvanaṃ tad vṛthā jñeyaṃ vinā saukhyānukūlyataḥ ।
dhanaṃ vinā tat kathaṃ syād aho dhiṅ nirdhanaṃ naram ।।
{brahmovāca 
kuṇḍalo dvijam āhedaṃ matpitropārjitaṃ dhanam ।
bahv asti kiṃ dhanenādya kariṣye dvijasattama ।
dvijaḥ punar uvācedaṃ maṇikuṇḍalam ojasā ।।
{gautama uvāca 
dharmārthajñānakāmānāṃ ko nu tṛptaḥ praśasyate ।
utkarṣaprāptir evaiṣāṃ sakhe ślāghyā śarīriṇām ।।
svenaiva vyavasāyena dhanyā jīvanti jantavaḥ ।
paradattārthasaṃtuṣṭāḥ kaṣṭajīvina eva te ।।
sa putraḥ śasyate loke pitṛbhiś cābhinandyate ।
yaḥ paitryam abhilipseta na vācāpi tu kuṇḍala ।।
svabāhubalam āśritya yo arthān arjayate sutaḥ ।
sa kṛtārtho bhavel loke paitryaṃ vittaṃ na tu spṛśet ।।
svayam ārjya suto vittaṃ pitre dāsyati bandhave ।
taṃ tu putraṃ vijānīyād itaro yonikīṭakaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā tu tad vākyaṃ brāhmaṇasyābhilāṣiṇaḥ ।
tatheti matvā tadvākyaṃ ratnāny ādāya satvaraḥ ।।
ātmakīyāni vittāni gautamāya nyavedayat ।
dhanenaitena deśāṃś ca paribhramya yathāsukham ।।
dhanāny ādāya vittāni punar eṣyāmahe gṛham ।
satyam eva vaṇig vakti sa tu vipraḥ pratārakaḥ ।।
pāpātmā pāpacittaṃ ca na bubodha vaṇig dvijam ।
tau parasparam āmantrya mātāpitror ajānatoḥ ।।
deśād deśāntaraṃ yātau dhanārthaṃ tau vaṇigdvijau ।
vaṇigghastasthitaṃ vittaṃ brāhmaṇo hartum icchati ।।
{brāhmaṇa uvāca 
yena kenāpy upāyena tad dhanaṃ hi samāhare ।
aho pṛthivyāṃ ramyāṇi nagarāṇi sahasraśaḥ ।।
iṣṭapradātryaḥ kāmasya devatā iva yoṣitaḥ ।
manoharās tatra tatra santi kiṃ kriyate mayā ।।
dhanam āhṛtya yatnena yoṣidbhyo yadi dīyate ।
bhujyante tās tato nityaṃ saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ hi tat ।।
nṛtyagītarato nityaṃ paṇyastrībhir alaṃkṛtaḥ ।
bhokṣye kathaṃ tu tad vittaṃ vaiśyān maddhastam āgatam ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ cintayamāno asau gautamaḥ prahasann iva ।
maṇikuṇḍalam āhedam adharmād eva jantavaḥ ।।
vṛddhiṃ sukham abhīṣṭāni prāpnuvanti na saṃśayaḥ ।
dharmiṣṭhāḥ prāṇino loke dṛśyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ ।।
tasmād dharmeṇa kiṃ tena duḥkhaikaphalahetunā ।।
{brahmovāca 
nety uvāca tato vaiśyaḥ sukhaṃ dharme pratiṣṭhitam ।
pāpe duḥkhaṃ bhayaṃ śoko dāridryaṃ kleśa eva ca ।
yato dharmas tato muktiḥ svadharmaḥ kiṃ vinaśyati ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ vivadatos tatra saṃparāyas tayor abhūt ।
yasya pakṣo bhavej jyāyān sa parārtham avāpnuyāt ।।
pṛcchāvaḥ kasya prābalyaṃ dharmiṇo vāpy adharmiṇaḥ ।
vedāt tu laukikaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ loke dharmāt sukhaṃ bhavet ।।
evaṃ vivadamānau tāv ūcatuḥ sakalāñ janān ।
dharmasya vāpy adharmasya prābalyam anayor bhuvi ।।
tad vadantu yathāvṛttam evam ūcatur ojasā ।
evaṃ tatrocire kecid ye dharmeṇānuvartinaḥ ।।
tair duḥkham anubhūyate pāpiṣṭhāḥ sukhino janāḥ ।
saṃparāye dhanaṃ sarvaṃ jitaṃ vipre nyavedayat ।।
maṇimān dharmavicchreṣṭhaḥ punar dharmaṃ praśaṃsati ।
maṇimantaṃ dvijaḥ prāha kiṃ dharmam anuśaṃsasi ।
{brahmovāca 
tatheti cety āha vaiśyo brāhmaṇaḥ punar abravīt ।।
{brāhmaṇa uvāca 
jitaṃ mayā dhanaṃ vaiśya nirlajjaḥ kiṃ nu bhāṣase ।
mayaiva vijito dharmo yatheṣṭacaraṇātmanā ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad brāhmaṇavacaḥ śrutvā vaiśyaḥ sasmita ūcivān ।।
{vaiśya uvāca 
pulākā iva dhānyeṣu puttikā iva pakṣiṣu ।
tathaiva tān sakhe manye yeṣāṃ dharmo na vidyate ।।
caturṇāṃ puruṣārthānāṃ dharmaḥ prathama ucyate ।
paścād arthaś ca kāmaś ca sa dharmo mayi tiṣṭhati ।
kathaṃ brūṣe dvijaśreṣṭha mayā vijitam ity adaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
dvijo vaiśyaṃ punaḥ prāha hastābhyāṃ jāyatāṃ paṇaḥ ।
tatheti manyate vaiśyas tau gatvā punar ūcatuḥ ।।
pūrvaval laukikān gatvā jitam ity abravīd dvijaḥ ।
karau chittvā tataḥ prāha kathaṃ dharmaṃ tu manyase ।
ākṣipto brāhmaṇenaivaṃ vaiśyo vacanam abravīt ।।
{vaiśya uvāca 
dharmam eva paraṃ manye prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatair api ।
mātā pitā suhṛd bandhur dharma eva śarīriṇām ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ vivadamānau tāv arthavān brāhmaṇo abhavat ।
vimukto vaiśyakas tatra bāhubhyāṃ ca dhanena ca ।।
evaṃ bhramantau saṃprāptau gaṅgāṃ yogeśvaraṃ harim ।
yadṛcchayā muniśreṣṭha mithas tāv ūcatuḥ punaḥ ।।
vaiśyo gaṅgāṃ tu yogeśaṃ dharmam eva praśaṃsati ।
atikopād dvijo vaiśyam ākṣipan punar abravīt ।।
{brāhmaṇa uvāca 
gataṃ dhanaṃ karau chinnāv avaśiṣṭo śubhir bhavān ।
tvam anyathā yadi brūṣa āhariṣye asinā śiraḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
vihasya punar āhedaṃ vaiśyo gautamam añjasā ।।
{vaiśya uvāca 
dharmam eva paraṃ manye yathecchasi tathā kuru ।
brāhmaṇāṃś ca gurūn devān vedān dharmaṃ janārdanam ।।
yas tu nindayate pāpo nāsau spṛśyo atha pāpakṛt ।
upekṣaṇīyo durvṛttaḥ pāpātmā dharmadūṣakaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prāha sa kopena dharmaṃ yady anuśaṃsasi ।
āvayoḥ prāṇayor atra paṇaḥ syād iti vai mune ।।
evam ukte gautamena tathety āha vaṇik tadā ।
punar apy ūcatur ubhau lokāṃl lokās tathocire ।।
yogeśvarasya purato gautamyā dakṣiṇe taṭe ।
taṃ nipātya viśaṃ vipraś cakṣur utpāṭya cābravīt ।।
{vipra uvāca 
gato asīmāṃ daśāṃ vaiśya nityaṃ dharmapraśaṃsayā ।
gataṃ dhanaṃ gataṃ cakṣuś cheditau karapallavau ।
pṛṣṭo asi mitra gacchāmi maivaṃ brūyāḥ kathāntare ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasmin prayāte vaiśyo asau cintayām āsa cetasi ।
hā kaṣṭaṃ me kim abhavad dharmaikamanaso hare ।।
sa kuṇḍalo vaṇikśreṣṭho nirdhano gatabāhukaḥ ।
gatanetraḥ śucaṃ prāpto dharmam evānusaṃsmaran ।।
evaṃ bahuvidhāṃ cintāṃ kurvann āste mahītale ।
niśceṣṭo atha nirutsāhaḥ patitaḥ śokasāgare ।।
dināvasāne śarvaryām udite candramaṇḍale ।
ekādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tatrāyāti vibhīṣaṇaḥ ।।
sa tu yogeśvaraṃ devaṃ pūjayitvā yathāvidhi ।
snātvā tu gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ saputro rākṣasair vṛtaḥ ।।
vibhīṣaṇasya hi suto vibhīṣaṇa ivāparaḥ ।
vaibhīṣaṇir iti khyātas tam apaśyad uvāca ha ।।
vaiśyasya vacanaṃ śrutvā yathāvṛttaṃ sa dharmavit ।
pitre nivedayām āsa laṅkeśāya mahātmane ।
sa tu laṅkeśvaraḥ prāha putraṃ prītyā guṇākaram ।।
{vibhīṣaṇa uvāca 
śrīmān rāmo mama gurus tasya mānyaḥ sakhā mama ।
hanumān iti vikhyātas tenānīto girir mahān ।।
purā kāryāntare prāpte sarvauṣadhyāśrayo acalaḥ ।
jāte kārye tam ādāya himavantam athāgamat ।।
viśalyakaraṇī ceti mṛtasaṃjīvanīti ca ।
tadānīya mahābuddhī rāmāyākliṣṭakarmaṇe ।।
nivedayitvā tat sādhyaṃ tasmin vṛtte samāgataḥ ।
punar giriṃ samādāya āgacchad devaparvatam ।।
tām ānīyāsya hṛdaye niveśaya hariṃ smaran ।
tataḥ prāpsyaty ayaṃ sarvam apekṣitam udāradhīḥ ।।
gacchatas tasya vegena viśalyakaraṇī punaḥ ।
apatad gautamītīre yatra yogeśvaro hariḥ ।।
{vaibhīṣaṇir uvāca 
tām oṣadhīṃ mama pitar darśayāśu vilamba mā ।
parārtiśamanād anyac chreyo na bhuvanatraye ।।
{brahmovāca 
vibhīṣaṇas tathety uktvā tāṃ putrasyāpy adarśayat ।
iṣe tvety asya vṛkṣasya śākhāṃ ciccheda tatsutaḥ ।
vaiśyasya cāpi vai prītyā santaḥ parahite ratāḥ ।।
{vibhīṣaṇa uvāca 
yatrāpatan nage cāsmin sa vṛkṣas tu pratāpavān ।
tasya śākhāṃ samādāya hṛdaye asya niveśaya ।
tatspṛṣṭamātra evāsau svakaṃ rūpam avāpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ vaibhīṣaṇir udāradhīḥ ।
tathā cakāra vai samyak kāṣṭhakhaṇḍaṃ nyaveśayat ।।
hṛdaye sa tu vaiśyo api sacakṣuḥ sakaro abhavat ।
maṇimantrauṣadhīnāṃ hi vīryaṃ ko api na budhyate ।।
tad eva kāṣṭham ādāya dharmam evānusaṃsmaran ।
snātvā tu gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ tathā yogeśvaraṃ harim ।।
namaskṛtvā punar agāt kāṣṭhakhaṇḍena vaiśyakaḥ ।
paribhraman nṛpapuraṃ mahāpuram iti śrutam ।।
mahārāja iti khyātas tatra rājā mahābalaḥ ।
tasya nāsti sutaḥ kaścit putrikā naṣṭalocanā ।।
saiva tasya sutā putras tasyāpi vratam īdṛśam ।
devo vā dānavo vāpi brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo bhavet ।।
vaiśyo vā śūdrayonir vā saguṇo nirguṇo api vā ।
tasmai deyā iyaṃ putrī yo netre āhariṣyati ।।
rājyena saha deyeyam iti rājā hy aghoṣayat ।
aharniśam asau vaiśyaḥ śrutvā ghoṣam athābravīt ।।
{vaiśya uvāca 
ahaṃ netre āhariṣye rājaputryā asaṃśayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
taṃ vaiśyaṃ tarasādāya mahārājñe nyavedayat ।
tatkāṣṭhasparśamātreṇa sanetrābhūn nṛpātmajā ।।
tataḥ savismayo rājā ko bhavān iti cābravīt ।
vaiśyo rājñe yathāvṛttaṃ nyavedayad aśeṣataḥ ।।
{vaiśya uvāca 
brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādena dharmasya tapasas tathā ।
dānaprabhāvād yajñaiś ca vividhair bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ ।
divyauṣadhiprabhāvena mama sāmarthyam īdṛśam ।।
{brahmovāca 
etad vaiśyavacaḥ śrutvā vismito abhūn mahīpatiḥ ।।
{rājovāca 
aho mahānubhāvo ayaṃ prāyo vṛndārako bhavet ।
anyathaitādṛg anyasya sāmarthyaṃ dṛśyate katham ।
tasmād asmai tu tāṃ kanyāṃ pradāsye rājyapūrvikām ।।
{brahmovāca 
iti saṃkalpya manasi kanyāṃ rājyaṃ ca dattavān ।
vihārārthaṃ gataḥ svairaṃ paraṃ khedam upāgataḥ ।।
na mitreṇa vinā rājyaṃ na mitreṇa vinā sukham ।
tam eva satataṃ vipraṃ cintayan vaiśyanandanaḥ ।।
etad eva sujātānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhuvi dehinām ।
kṛpārdraṃ yan mano nityaṃ teṣām apy ahiteṣu hi ।।
mahānṛpo vanaṃ prāyāt sa rājā maṇikuṇḍalaḥ ।
tasmiñ śāsati rājyaṃ tu kadācid gautamaṃ dvijam ।।
hṛtasvaṃ dyūtakaiḥ pāpair apaśyan maṇikuṇḍalaḥ ।
tam ādāya dvijaṃ mitraṃ pūjayām āsa dharmavit ।।
dharmāṇāṃ tu prabhāvaṃ taṃ tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayat ।
snāpayām āsa gaṅgāyāṃ taṃ sarvāghanivṛttaye ।।
tena vipreṇa sarvais taiḥ svakīyair gotrajair vṛtaḥ ।
vaiśyaiḥ svadeśasaṃbhūtair brāhmaṇasya tu bāndhavaiḥ ।।
vṛddhakauśikamukhyaiś ca tasmin yogeśvarāntike ।
yajñān iṣṭvā surān pūjya tataḥ svargam upeyivān ।।
tataḥ prabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ mṛtasaṃjīvanaṃ viduḥ ।
cakṣustīrthaṃ sayogeśaṃ smaraṇād api puṇyadam ।
manaḥprasādajananaṃ sarvadurbhāvanāśanam ।।
{brahmovāca 
urvaśītīrtham ākhyātam aśvamedhaphalapradam ।
snānadānamahādeva- vāsudevārcanādibhiḥ ।।
maheśvaro yatra devo yatra śārṅgadharo hariḥ ।
pramatir nāma rājāsīt sārvabhaumaḥ pratāpavān ।।
ripūñ jitvā jagāmāśu indralokaṃ surair vṛtam ।
tatrāpaśyat surapatiṃ marudbhiḥ saha nārada ।।
jahāsendraṃ pāśahastaṃ pramatiḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ ।
taṃ hasantam athālakṣya hariḥ pramatim abravīt ।।
{indra uvāca 
devālaye mahābuddhe marudbhiḥ krīḍitair alam ।
diśo jitvā divaṃ prāptaḥ kuru krīḍāṃ mayā saha ।।
{brahmovāca 
sakaṣāyaṃ harivaco niśamya pramatir nṛpaḥ ।
tathety uvāca devendraṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kāṃ tu manyase ।
tac chrutvā pramater vākyaṃ surarāṇ nṛpam abravīt ।।
{indra uvāca 
urvaśy eva paṇo asmākaṃ prāpyā yā nikhilair makhaiḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvendravacanaṃ pramatiḥ prāha garvitaḥ ।
urvaśīṃ niṣkṛtiṃ manye tvaṃ rājan kiṃ nu manyase ।।
yad bravīṣi sureśāna tan manye ahaṃ śatakrato ।
prāhendraṃ pramatis tadvan niṣkṛtyai dakṣiṇaṃ karam ।
savarma saśaraṃ dharmyaṃ dehi dīvyāmahe vayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
tāv evaṃ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā devanāyopatasthatuḥ ।
pramatir jitavāṃs tatra urvaśīṃ daivatastriyam ।
tāṃ jitvā pramatiḥ prāha saṃrambhāt taṃ śatakratum ।।
{pramatir uvāca 
niṣkṛtyai punar anyan me paścād dīvye tvayā vibho ।।
{indra uvāca 
devayogyam atho vajraṃ jaitraṃ saratham uttamam ।
dīvye ahaṃ tena nṛpate kareṇāpy avicārayan ।।
{brahmovāca 
sa gṛhītvā tadā pāśān anyāṃś ca maṇibhūṣitān ।
jitam ity abravīc chakraṃ pramatiḥ prahasaṃs tadā ।।
etasminn antare prāyād akṣajñas tatra nārada ।
viśvāvasur iti khyāto gandharvāṇāṃ maheśvaraḥ ।।
{viśvāvasur uvāca 
gandharvavidyayā rājaṃs tayā dīvyāmahe tvayā ।
tathety uktvā sa nṛpatir jitam ity abravīt tadā ।।
tau jitvā nṛpatir maurkhyād devendraṃ prāha kaśmalam ।।
{pramatir uvāca 
raṇe vā devane vāpi na tvaṃ jetā kathaṃcana ।
mahendra satataṃ tasmād asmadārādhako bhava ।
vada kena prakāreṇa jātā devendratā tava ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathā prāhorvaśīṃ garvād gaccha karmakarī bhava ।
urvaśī prāha deveṣu yathā varte tathā tvayi ।
varteya sarvabhāvena na māṃ dhikkartum arhasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatas tāṃ pramatiḥ prāha tvādṛśyaḥ santi cārikāḥ ।
tvaṃ kiṃ vilajjase bhadre gaccha karmakarī bhava ।।
etac chrutvā nṛpeṇoktaṃ gandharvādhipatis tadā ।
citrasena iti khyātaḥ suto viśvāvasor balī ।।
{citrasena uvāca 
dīvye ahaṃ vai tvayā rājan sarveṇānena bhūpate ।
rājyena jīvitenāpi madīyena tavāpi ca ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā punar ubhau citrasenanṛpottamau ।
dīvyetām abhisaṃrabdhau citraseno ajayat tadā ।।
gāndharvais taṃ mahāpāśair babandha nṛpatiṃ tadā ।
citraseno ajayat sarvam urvaśīmukhyataḥ paṇaiḥ ।।
rājyaṃ kośaṃ balaṃ caiva yad anyad vasu kiṃcana ।
citrasenasya taj jātaṃ yad āsīt pramater dhanam ।।
tasya putro bāla eva purodhasam uvāca ha ।
vaiśvāmitraṃ mahāprājñaṃ madhucchandasam ojasā ।।
{pramatiputra uvāca 
kiṃ me pitrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kva vā baddho mahāmatiḥ ।
katham eṣyati svaṃ sthānaṃ kathaṃ pāśair vimokṣyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
sumater vacanaṃ śrutvā dhyātvā sa munisattamaḥ ।
madhucchandā jagādedaṃ pramater vartanaṃ tadā ।।
{madhucchandā uvāca 
devaloke tava pitā baddha āste mahāmate ।
kaitavair bahudoṣaiś ca bhraṣṭarājyo babhūva ha ।।
yo yāti kaitavasabhāṃ sa cāpi kleśabhāg bhavet ।
dyūtamadyāmiṣādīni vyasanāni nṛpātmaja ।।
pāpinām eva jāyante sadā pāpātmakāni hi ।
ekaikam apy anarthāya pāpāya narakāya ca ।।
yānāsanābhilāpādyaiḥ kṛtaiḥ kaitavavartibhiḥ ।
kulīnāḥ kaluṣībhūtāḥ kiṃ punaḥ kitavo janaḥ ।।
kitavasya tu yā jāyā tapyate nityam eva sā ।
sa cāpi kitavaḥ pāpo yoṣitaṃ vīkṣya tapyate ।।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vigatānando nityaṃ vadati pāpakṛt ।
aho saṃsāracakre asmin mayā tulyo na pātakī ।।
na kiṃcid api yasyāste loke viṣayajaṃ sukham ।
lokadvaye api na sukhī kitavaḥ kopi dṛśyate ।।
vibhāti ca tathā nityaṃ lajjayā dagdhamānasaḥ ।
gatadharmo nirānando grastagarvas tathāṭati ।।
akaitavī ca yā vṛttiḥ sā praśastā dvijanmanām ।
kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyam api kuryān na kaitavam ।।
yas tu kaitavavṛttyā hi dhanam āhartum icchati ।
dharmārthakāmābhijanaiḥ sa vimucyeta pauruṣāt ।।
vede api dūṣitaṃ karma tava pitrā tadādṛtam ।
tasmāt kiṃ kurmahe vatsa yad uktaṃ te vidhīyate ।।
vidhātṛvihitaṃ mārgaṃ ko nu vātyeti paṇḍitaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
etat purodhaso vākyaṃ śrutvā sumatir abravīt ।।
{sumatir uvāca 
kiṃ kṛtvā pramatis tātaḥ punā rājyam avāpnuyāt ।।
{brahmovāca 
punar dhyātvā madhucchandāḥ sumatiṃ cedam abravīt ।।
{madhucchandā uvāca 
gautamīṃ yāhi vatsa tvaṃ tatra pūjaya śaṃkaram ।
aditiṃ varuṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ tataḥ pāśād vimokṣyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
tathety uktvā jagāmāśu gaṅgāṃ natvā janārdanam ।
pūjayām āsa śaṃbhuṃ ca tapas tepe yatavrataḥ ।।
sahasram ekaṃ varṣāṇāṃ baddhaṃ pitaram ātmanaḥ ।
mocayām āsa devebhyaḥ punā rājyam avāpa saḥ ।।
śiveśābhyāṃ muktapāśo rājyaṃ prāpa sutāt svakāt ।
avāpya vidyāṃ gāndharvīṃ priyaś cāsīc chatakratoḥ ।।
śāṃbhavaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva urvaśītīrtham eva ca ।
tataḥprabhṛti tat tīrthaṃ kaitavaṃ ceti viśrutam ।।
śivaviṣṇusarinmātu- prasādād āpyate na kim ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca bahupuṇyaphalapradam ।
pāpapāśavimokṣaṃ tu sarvadurgatināśanam ।।
{brahmovāca 
sāmudraṃ tīrtham ākhyātaṃ sarvatīrthaphalapradam ।
tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada tanmanāḥ ।।
visṛṣṭā gautamenāsau gaṅgā pāpapraṇāśanī ।
lokānām upakārārthaṃ prāyāt pūrvārṇavaṃ prati ।।
āgacchantī devanadī kamaṇḍaludhṛtā mayā ।
śirasā ca dhṛtā devī śaṃbhunā paramātmanā ।।
viṣṇupādāt prasūtāṃ tāṃ brāhmaṇena mahātmanā ।
ānītāṃ martyabhavanaṃ smaraṇād aghanāśanīm ।।
guror gurutamāṃ sindhur dṛṣṭvā kṛtyam acintayat ।
yā vandyā jagatām īśā brahmeśādyair namaskṛtā ।।
tām ahaṃ pratigaccheyaṃ no cet syād dharmadūṣaṇam ।
āgacchantaṃ mahātmānaṃ yo mohān nopatiṣṭhate ।।
na tasya kopi trātāsti pāpino lokayor dvayoḥ ।
evaṃ vimṛśya ratneśo mūrtimān vinayānvitaḥ ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭo gaṅgām āhedaṃ saritāṃpatiḥ ।।
{sindhur uvāca 
rasātalagataṃ vāri pṛthivyāṃ yan nabhastale ।
tan mām evātra viśatu nāhaṃ vakṣyāmi kiṃcana ।।
mayi ratnāni pīyūṣaṃ parvatā rākṣasāsurāḥ ।
etān apy akhilān anyān bhīmān saṃdhārayāmy aham ।।
mamāntaḥ kamalāyukto viṣṇuḥ svapiti nityadā ।
mamāśakyaṃ na kimapi vidyate sacarācare ।।
mahaty abhyāgate kuryāt pratyutthānaṃ na yo madāt ।
sa dharmādiparibhraṣṭo nirayaṃ tu samāpnuyāt ।।
na tān me bibhrataḥ khedo vināgastyaparābhavāt ।
kiṃ tu tvaṃ gauraveṇaiṣām atiriktā tatas tv aham ।।
bravīmi devi gaṅge māṃ tvaṃ sāmyāt saṃgatā bhava ।
naikarūpām ahaṃ śaktaḥ saṃgantuṃ bahudhā yadi ।।
saṅgam eṣyasi devi tvaṃ saṃgacche ahaṃ na cānyathā ।
gaṅge sameṣyasi yadi bahudhā tad vicāraye ।।
{brahmovāca 
tam evaṃvādinaṃ sindhum apām īśaṃ tadābravīt ।
gaṅgā sā gautamī devī kuru caitad vaco mama ।।
saptarṣīṇāṃ ca yā bhāryā arundhatipurogamāḥ ।
bhartṛbhiḥ sahitāḥ sarvā ānaya tvaṃ tadā tv aham ।।
alpabhūtā bhaviṣyāmi tataḥ syāṃ tava saṃgatā ।
tathety uktvā saptarṣīṇāṃ bhāryābhir ṛṣibhir vṛtaḥ ।।
ānayām āsa tāṃ devī saptadhā sā vyabhajyata ।
sā ceyaṃ gautamī gaṅgā saptadhā sāgaraṃ gatā ।।
saptarṣīṇāṃ tu nāmnā tu sapta gaṅgās tato abhavan ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca śravaṇaṃ paṭhanaṃ tathā ।।
smaraṇaṃ cāpi yad bhaktyā sarvakāmapradaṃ bhavet ।
nāsmād anyat paraṃ tīrthaṃ samudrād bhuvanatraye ।
pāpahānau bhuktimukti- prāptau ca manaso mude ।।
{brahmovāca 
ṛṣisattram iti khyātam ṛṣayaḥ sapta nārada ।
niṣedus tapase yatra yatra bhīmeśvaraḥ śivaḥ ।।
tatredaṃ vṛttam ākhyāsye devarṣipitṛbṛṃhitam ।
śṛṇu yatnena vakṣyāmi sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।।
saptadhā vyabhajan gaṅgām ṛṣayaḥ sapta nārada ।
vāsiṣṭhī dākṣiṇeyī syād vaiśvāmitrī taduttarā ।।
vāmadevy aparā jñeyā gautamī madhyataḥ śubhā ।
bhāradvājī smṛtā cānyā ātreyī cety athāparā ।।
jāmadagnī tathā cānyā vyapadiṣṭā tu saptadhā ।
taiḥ sarvair ṛṣibhis tatra yaṣṭum iṣṭair mahātmabhiḥ ।।
niṣpāditaṃ mahāsattram ṛṣibhiḥ pāradarśibhiḥ ।
etasminn antare tatra devānāṃ prabalo ripuḥ ।।
viśvarūpa iti khyāto munīnāṃ sattram abhyagāt ।
brahmacaryeṇa tapasā tān ārādhya yathāvidhi ।
vinayenātha papraccha ṛṣīn sarvān anukramāt ।।
{viśvarūpa uvāca 
dhruvaṃ sarve yathākāmaṃ mama svāsthyena hetunā ।
yathā syād balavān putro devānām api durdharaḥ ।
yajñair vā tapasā vāpi munayo vaktum arhatha ।।
{brahmovāca 
tatra prāha mahābuddhir viśvāmitro mahāmanāḥ ।।
{viśvāmitra uvāca 
karmaṇā tāta labhyante phalāni vividhāni ca ।
trayāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ ca karma prathamakāraṇam ।।
tataś ca kāraṇaṃ kartā tataś cānyat prakīrtitam ।
upādānaṃ tathā bījaṃ na ca karma vidur budhāḥ ।।
karmaṇāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ ca kāraṇe puṣkale sati ।
bhāvābhāvau phale dṛṣṭau tasmāt karmāśritaṃ phalam ।।
karmāpi dvividhaṃ jñeyaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ tathā kṛtam ।
kartavyaṃ kriyamāṇasya sādhanaṃ yad yad ucyate ।।
tadbhāvāḥ karmasiddhau ca ubhayatrāpi kāraṇam ।
yad yad bhāvayate jantuḥ karma kurvan vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
tadbhāvanānurūpeṇa phalaniṣpattir ucyate ।
karoti karma vidhivad vinā bhāvanayā yadi ।।
anyathā syāt phalaṃ sarvaṃ tasya bhāvānurūpataḥ ।
tasmāt tapo vrataṃ dānaṃ japayajñādikāḥ kriyāḥ ।।
karmaṇas tv anurūpeṇa phalaṃ dāsyanti bhāvataḥ ।
tasmād bhāvānurūpeṇa karma vai dāsyate phalam ।।
bhāvas tu trividho jñeyaḥ sāttviko rājasas tathā ।
tāmasas tu tathā jñeyaḥ phalaṃ karmānusārataḥ ।।
bhāvanānuguṇaṃ ceti vicitrā karmaṇāṃ sthitiḥ ।
tasmād icchānusāreṇa bhāvaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
paścāt karmāpi kartavyaṃ phaladātāpi tadvidham ।
phalaṃ dadāti phalināṃ phale yadi pravartate ।।
karmakāro na tatrāsti kuryāt karma svabhāvataḥ ।
tad eva copadānādi sattvādiguṇabhedataḥ ।।
bhāvāt prārabhate tadvad bhāvaiḥ phalam avāpyate ।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ karma caiva hi kāraṇam ।।
bhāvasthitaṃ bhavet karma muktidaṃ bandhakāraṇam ।
svabhāvānuguṇaṃ karma svasyaiveha paratra ca ।।
phalāni vividhāny āśu karoti samatānugam ।
eka eva padārtho asau bhāvair bhedaḥ pradṛśyate ।।
kriyate bhujyate vāpi tasmād bhāvo viśiṣyate ।
yathābhāvaṃ karma kuru yathepsitam avāpsyasi ।।
{brahmovāca 
etac chrutvā ṛṣer vākyaṃ viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ ।
tapas taptvā bahukālaṃ tāmasaṃ bhāvam āśritaḥ ।।
viśvarūpaḥ karma bhīmaṃ cakāra surabhīṣaṇam ।
paśyatsu ṛṣimukhyeṣu vāryamāṇo api nityaśaḥ ।।
ātmakopānusāreṇa bhīmaṃ karma tathākarot ।
bhīṣaṇe kuṇḍakhāte tu bhīṣaṇe jātavedasi ।।
bhīṣaṇaṃ raudrapuruṣaṃ dhyātvātmānaṃ guhāśayam ।
evaṃ tapantam ālakṣya vāg uvācāśarīriṇī ।।
jaṭājūṭaṃ vinātmānaṃ na ca vṛtro vyajīyata ।
vṛthātmānaṃ viśvarūpo juhuyāj jātavedasi ।।
sa evendraḥ sa varuṇaḥ sa ca syāt sarvam eva ca ।
tyaktvātmānaṃ jaṭāmātraṃ hutavān vṛjinodbhavaḥ ।।
vṛtra ity ucyate vede sa cāpi vṛjino abhavat ।
bhīmasya mahimānaṃ ko jānāti jagadīśituḥ ।।
sṛjaty aśeṣam api yo na ca saṅgena lipyate ।
virarāmeti saṃkīrtya sā vāṇy enaṃ munīśvarāḥ ।।
bhīmeśvaraṃ namaskṛtya jagmuḥ svaṃ svam athāśramam ।
viśvarūpo mahābhīmo bhīmakarmā tathākṛtiḥ ।।
bhīmabhāvo bhīmatanuṃ dhyātvātmānaṃ juhāva ha ।
tasmād bhīmeśvaro devaḥ purāṇe paripaṭhyate ।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca muktidaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
iti paṭhati śṛṇoti yaś ca bhaktyā 
vibudhapatiṃ śivam atra bhīmarūpam 
jagati viditam aśeṣapāpahāri 
smṛtipadaśaraṇena muktidaś ca 
godāvarī tāvad aśeṣapāpa 
samūhahantrī paramārthadātrī 
sadaiva sarvatra viśeṣatas tu 
yatrāmburāśiṃ samanupraviṣṭā 
snātvā tu tasmin sukṛtī śarīrī 
godāvarīvāridhisaṃgame yaḥ 
uddhṛtya tīvrān nirayād aśeṣāt 
sa pūrvajān yāti puraṃ purāreḥ 
vedāntavedyaṃ yad upāsitavyaṃ 
tad brahma sākṣāt khalu bhīmanāthaḥ 
dṛṣṭe hi tasmin na punar viśanti 
śarīriṇaḥ saṃsmṛtim ugraduḥkhām 
{brahmovāca 
sā saṃgatā pūrvam apāṃpatiṃ taṃ 
gaṅgā surāṇām api vandanīyā 
devaiś ca sarvair anugamyamānā 
saṃstūyamānā munibhir marudbhiḥ 
vasiṣṭhajābālisayājñavalkya 
kratvaṅgirodakṣamarīcivaiṣṇavāḥ 
śātātapaḥ śaunakadevarāta 
bhṛgvagniveśyātrimarīcimukhyāḥ 
sudhūtapāpā manugautamādayaḥ 
sakauśikās tumbaruparvatādyāḥ 
agastyamārkaṇḍasapippalādyāḥ 
sagālavā yogaparāyaṇāś ca 
savāmadevāṅgiraso atha bhārgavāḥ 
smṛtipravīṇāḥ śrutibhir manojñāḥ 
sarve purāṇārthavido bahujñās 
te gautamīṃ devanadīṃ tu gatvā 
stoṣyanti mantraiḥ śrutibhiḥ prabhūtair 
hṛdyaiś ca tuṣṭair muditair manobhiḥ 
tāṃ saṃgatāṃ vīkṣya śivo hariś ca 
ātmānam ādarśayatāṃ munibhyaḥ 
tathāmarās tau pitṛbhiś ca dṛṣṭau 
stuvanti devau sakalārtihāriṇau 
ādityā vasavo rudrā maruto lokapālakāḥ ।
kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve stuvanti hariśaṃkarau ।।
saṃgameṣu prasiddheṣu nityaṃ saptasu nārada ।
samudrasya ca gaṅgāyā nityaṃ devau pratiṣṭhitau ।।
gautameśvara ākhyāto yatra devo maheśvaraḥ ।
nityaṃ saṃnihitas tatra mādhavo ramayā saha ।।
brahmeśvara iti khyāto mayaiva sthāpitaḥ śivaḥ ।
lokānām upakārārtham ātmanaḥ kāraṇāntare ।।
cakrapāṇir iti khyātaḥ stuto devair mayā saha ।
tatra saṃnihito viṣṇur devaiḥ saha marudgaṇaiḥ ।।
aindratīrtham iti khyātaṃ tad eva hayamūrdhakam ।
hayamūrdhā tatra viṣṇus tanmūrdhani surā api ।
somatīrtham iti khyātaṃ yatra someśvaraḥ śivaḥ ।।
indrasya somaśravaso devaiś ca ṛṣibhis tathā ।
prārthitaḥ soma evādāv indrāyendo parisrava ।।
sapta diśo nānāsūryāḥ sapta hotāra ṛtvijaḥ ।
devā ādityā ye sapta tebhiḥ somābhirakṣa na ।।
indrāyendo parisrava 
yat te rājañ chṛtaṃ havis tena somābhirakṣa naḥ ।
arātīvā mā nas tārīn mo ca naḥ kiṃcanāmamad ।।
indrāyendo parisrava 
ṛṣe mantrakṛtāṃ stomaiḥ kaśyapodvardhayan giraḥ ।
somaṃ namasya rājānaṃ yo jajñe vīrudhāṃ patir ।।
indrāyendo parisrava 
kārur ahaṃ tato bhiṣag upalaprakṣiṇī nanā ।
nānādhiyo vasūyavo anu gā iva tasthima ।।
indrāyendo parisrava 
evam uktvā ca ṛṣibhiḥ somaṃ prāpya ca vajriṇe ।
tebhyo dattvā tato yajñaḥ pūrṇo jātaḥ śatakratoḥ ।।
tat somatīrtham ākhyātam āgneyaṃ puratas tu tat ।
agnir iṣṭvā mahāyajñair mām ārādhya manīṣitam ।।
saṃprāptavān matprasādād ahaṃ tatraiva nityaśaḥ ।
sthito lokopakārārthaṃ tatra viṣṇuḥ śivas tathā ।।
tasmād āgneyam ākhyātam ādityaṃ tadanantaram ।
yatrādityo vedamayo nityam eti upāsitum ।।
rūpāntareṇa madhyāhne draṣṭuṃ māṃ śaṃkaraṃ harim ।
namaskāryas tatra sadā madhyāhne sakalo janaḥ ।।
rūpeṇa kena savitā samāyātīty aniścayāt ।
tasmād ādityam ākhyātaṃ bārhaspatyam anantaram ।।
bṛhaspatiḥ suraiḥ pūjāṃ tasmāt tīrthād avāpa ha ।
īje ca yajñān vividhān bārhaspatyaṃ tato viduḥ ।।
tattīrthasmaraṇād eva grahaśāntir bhaviṣyati ।
tasmād apy aparaṃ tīrtham indragope nagottame ।।
pratiṣṭhitaṃ mahāliṅgaṃ kasmiṃścit kāraṇāntare ।
himālayena tat tīrtham adritīrthaṃ tad ucyate ।।
tatra snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sarvakāmapradaṃ śubham ।
evaṃ sā gautamī gaṅgā brahmādreś ca viniḥsṛtā ।।
yāvat sāgaragā devī tatra tīrthāni kānicit ।
saṃkṣepeṇa mayoktāni rahasyāni śubhāni ca ।।
vede purāṇe ṛṣibhiḥ prasiddhā 
yā gautamī lokanamaskṛtā ca 
vaktuṃ kathaṃ tām atisuprabhāvām 
aśeṣato nārada kasya śaktiḥ 
bhaktyā pravṛttasya yathākathaṃcin 
naivāparādho asti na saṃśayo atra 
tasmāc ca diṅmātramatiprayāsāt 
saṃsūcitaṃ lokahitāya tasyāḥ 
kas tasyāḥ pratitīrthaṃ tu prabhāvaṃ vaktum īśvaraḥ ।
api lakṣmīpatir viṣṇur alaṃ someśvaraḥ śivaḥ ।।
kvacit kasmiṃś ca tīrthāni kālayoge bhavanti hi ।
guṇavanti mahāprājña gautamī tu sadā nṛṇām ।।
sarvatra sarvadā puṇyā ko nv asyā guṇakīrtanam ।
vaktuṃ śaktas tatas tasyai nama ity eva yujyate ।।
{nārada uvāca 
tridaivatyāṃ sureśāna gaṅgāṃ brūṣe sureśvara ।
brāhmaṇenāhṛtāṃ puṇyāṃ jagataḥ pāvanīṃ śubhām ।।
ādimadhyāvasāne ca ubhayos tīrayor api ।
yā vyāptā viṣṇuneśena tvayā ca surasattama ।
punaḥ saṃkṣepato brūhi na me tṛptiḥ prajāyate ।।
{brahmovāca 
kamaṇḍalusthitā pūrvaṃ tato viṣṇupadānugā ।
maheśvarajaṭājūṭe sthitā saiva namaskṛtā ।।
brahmatejaḥprabhāveṇa śivam ārādhya yatnataḥ ।
tataḥ prāptā giriṃ puṇyaṃ tataḥ pūrvārṇavaṃ prati ।।
āgatya saṃgatā devī sarvatīrthamayī nṛṇām ।
īpsitānāṃ tathā dātrī prabhāvo asyā viśiṣyate ।।
etasyā nādhikaṃ manye kiṃcit tīrthaṃ jagattraye ।
asyāś caiva prabhāveṇa bhāvyaṃ yac ca manaḥsthitam ।।
adyāpy asyā hi māhātmyaṃ vaktuṃ kaiścin na śakyate ।
bhaktito vakṣyate nityaṃ yā brahma paramārthataḥ ।।
tasyāḥ parataraṃ tīrthaṃ na syād iti matir mama ।
anyatīrthena sādharmyaṃ na yujyeta kathaṃcana ।।
śrutvā madvākyapīyūṣair gaṅgāyā guṇakīrtanam ।
sarveṣāṃ na matiḥ kasmāt tatraivoparatiṃ gatā ।
iti bhāti vicitraṃ me mune khalu jagattraye ।।
{nārada uvāca 
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ tvaṃ vettā copadeśakaḥ ।
chandāṃsi sarahasyāni purāṇasmṛtayo api ca ।।
dharmaśāstrāṇi yac cānyat tava vākye pratiṣṭhitam ।
tīrthānām atha dānānāṃ yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ tathā ।।
devatāmantrasevānām adhikaṃ kiṃ vada prabho ।
yad brūṣe bhagavan bhaktyā tathā bhāvyaṃ na cānyathā ।।
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ brahman vākyāt tvaṃ chettum arhasi ।
iṣṭaṃ manogataṃ śrutvā tasmād vismayam āgataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
śṛṇu nārada vakṣyāmi rahasyaṃ dharmam uttamam ।
caturvidhāni tīrthāni tāvanty eva yugāni ca ।।
guṇās trayaś ca puruṣās trayo devāḥ sanātanāḥ ।
vedāś ca smṛtibhir yuktāś catvāras te prakīrtitāḥ ।।
puruṣārthāś ca catvāro vāṇī cāpi caturvidhā ।
guṇā hy api tu catvāraḥ samatveneti nārada ।।
sarvatra dharmaḥ sāmānyo yato dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
sādhyasādhanabhāvena sa eva bahudhā mataḥ ।।
tasyāśrayaś ca dvividho deśaḥ kālaś ca sarvadā ।
kālāśrayaś ca yo dharmo hīyate vardhate sadā ।।
yugānām anurūpeṇa pādaḥ pādo asya hīyate ।
dharmasyeti mahāprājña deśāpekṣā tathobhayam ।।
kālena cāśrito dharmo deśe nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ ।
yugeṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu na deśeṣu sa hīyate ।।
ubhayatra vihīne ca dharmasya syād abhāvatā ।
tasmād deśāśrito dharmaś catuṣpāt supratiṣṭhitaḥ ।।
sa cāpi dharmo deśeṣu tīrtharūpeṇa tiṣṭhati ।
kṛte deśaṃ ca kālaṃ ca dharmo avaṣṭabhya tiṣṭhati ।।
tretāyāṃ pādahīnena sa tu pādaḥ pradeśataḥ ।
dvāpare cārdhataḥ kāle dharmo deśe samāsthitaḥ ।।
kalau pādena caikena dharmaś calati saṃkaṭam ।
evaṃvidhaṃ tu yo dharmaṃ vetti tasya na hīyate ।।
yugānām anubhāvena jātibhedāś ca saṃsthitāḥ ।
guṇebhyo guṇakartṛbhyo vicitrā dharmasaṃsthitiḥ ।।
guṇānām anubhāvena udbhavābhibhavau tathā ।
tīrthānām api varṇānāṃ vedānāṃ svargamokṣayoḥ ।।
tādṛgrūpapravṛttyā tu tad eva ca viśiṣyate ।
kālo abhivyañjakaḥ prokto deśo abhivyaṅgya ucyate ।।
yadā yadā abhivyaktiṃ kālo dhatte tadā tadā ।
tad eva vyañjanaṃ brahmaṃs tasmān nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।।
yugānurūpā mūrtiḥ syād devānāṃ vaidikī tathā ।
karmaṇām api tīrthānāṃ jātīnām āśramasya tu ।।
tridaivatyaṃ satyayuge tīrthaṃ lokeṣu pūjyate ।
dvidaivatyaṃ yuge anyasmin dvāpare caikadaivikam ।।
kalau na kiṃcid vijñeyam athānyad api tac chṛṇu ।
daivaṃ kṛtayuge tīrthaṃ tretāyām āsuraṃ viduḥ ।।
ārṣaṃ ca dvāpare proktaṃ kalau mānuṣam ucyate ।
athānyad api vakṣyāmi śṛṇu nārada kāraṇam ।।
gautamyāṃ yat tvayā pṛṣṭaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi vistarāt ।
yadā ceyaṃ haraśiraḥ prāptā gaṅgā mahāmune ।।
tadā prabhṛti sā gaṅgā śaṃbhoḥ priyatarābhavat ।
tad devasya mataṃ jñātvā gajavaktram uvāca sā ।।
umā lokatrayeśānā mātā ca jagato hitā ।
śāntā śrutir iti khyātā bhuktimuktipradāyinī ।।
{brahmovāca 
tan mātur vacanaṃ śrutvā gajavaktro abhyabhāṣata ।।
{gajavaktra uvāca 
kiṃ kṛtyaṃ śādhi māṃ mātas tatkartāham asaṃśayam ।।
{brahmovāca 
umā sutam uvācedaṃ maheśvarajaṭāsthitā ।
tvayāvatāryatāṃ gaṅgā satyam īśapriyā satī ।।
punaś ceśas tatra citram adhyāste sarvadā suta ।
śivo yatra surās tatra tatra vedāḥ sanātanāḥ ।।
tatraiva ṛṣayaḥ sarve manuṣyāḥ pitaras tathā ।
tasmān nivartayeśānaṃ devadevaṃ maheśvaram ।।
tasyā nivartite deve gaṅgāyāḥ sarva eva hi ।
nivṛttās te bhaviṣyanti śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama ।
nivartaya tatas tasyāḥ sarvabhāvena śaṃkaram ।।
{brahmovāca 
mātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā punar āha gaṇeśvaraḥ ।।
{gaṇeśvara uvāca 
naiva śakyaḥ śivo devo mayā tasyā nivartitum ।
anivṛtte śive tasyā devā api nivartitum ।।
na śakyā jagatāṃ mātar athānyac cāpi kāraṇam ।
gaṅgāvatāritā pūrvaṃ gautamena mahātmanā ।।
ṛṣiṇā lokapūjyena trailokyahitakāriṇā ।
sāmopāyena tadvākyāt pūjyena brahmatejasā ।।
ārādhayitvā deveśaṃ tapobhiḥ stutibhir bhavam ।
tuṣṭena śaṃkareṇedam ukto asau gautamas tadā ।।
{śaṃkara uvāca 
varān varaya puṇyāṃś ca priyāṃś ca manasepsitān ।
yad yad icchasi tat sarvaṃ dātā te adya mahāmate ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktaḥ śivenāsau gautamo mayi śṛṇvati ।
idam eva tadovāca sajaṭāṃ dehi śaṃkara ।
gaṅgāṃ me yācate puṇyāṃ kim anyena vareṇa me ।।
{brahmovāca 
punaḥ provāca taṃ śaṃbhuḥ sarvalokopakārakaḥ ।।
{śaṃbhur uvāca 
uktaṃ na cātmanaḥ kiṃcit tasmād yācasva duṣkaram ।।
{brahmovāca 
gautamo adīnasattvas taṃ bhavam āha kṛtāñjaliḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
etad eva ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkaraṃ tava darśanam ।
mayā tad adya saṃprāptaṃ kṛpayā tava śaṃkara ।।
smaraṇād eva te padbhyāṃ kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ ।
bhavanti kiṃ punaḥ sākṣāt tvayi dṛṣṭe maheśvare ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam ukte gautamena bhavo harṣasamanvitaḥ ।
trayāṇām upakārārthaṃ lokānāṃ yācitaṃ tvayā ।।
na cātmano mahābuddhe yācety āha śivo dvijam ।
evaṃ proktaḥ punar vipro dhyātvā prāha śivaṃ tathā ।।
vinītavad adīnātmā śivabhaktisamanvitaḥ ।
sarvalokopakārāya punar yācitavān idam ।
śṛṇvatsu lokapāleṣu jagādedaṃ sa gautamaḥ ।।
{gautama uvāca 
yāvat sāgaragā devī nisṛṣṭā brahmaṇo gireḥ ।
sarvatra sarvadā tasyāṃ sthātavyaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja ।।
phalepsūnāṃ phalaṃ dātā tvam eva jagataḥ prabho ।
tīrthāny anyāni deveśa kvāpi kvāpi śubhāni ca ।।
yatra te saṃnidhir nityaṃ tad eva śubhadaṃ viduḥ ।
yatra gaṅgā tvayā dattā jaṭāmukuṭasaṃsthitā ।
sarvatra tava sāṃnidhyāt sarvatīrthāni śaṃkara ।।
{brahmovāca 
tad gautamavacaḥ śrutvā punar harṣāc chivo abravīt ।।
{śiva uvāca 
yatra kvāpi ca yat kiṃcid yo vā bhavati bhaktitaḥ ।
yātrāṃ snānam atho dānaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vāpi tarpaṇam ।।
śravaṇaṃ paṭhanaṃ vāpi smaraṇaṃ vāpi gautama ।
yaḥ karoti naro bhaktyā godāvaryā yatavrataḥ ।।
saptadvīpavatī pṛthvī saśailavanakānanā ।
saratnā sauṣadhī ramyā sārṇavā dharmabhūṣitā ।।
dattvā bhavati yo dharmaḥ sa bhaved gautamīsmṛteḥ ।
evaṃvidhā ilā vipra godānād yābhidhīyate ।।
candrasūryagrahe kāle matsāṃnidhye yatavrataḥ ।
bhūbhṛte viṣṇave bhaktyā sarvakālaṃ kṛtā sudhīḥ ।।
gāḥ sundarāḥ savatsāś ca saṃgame lokaviśrute ।
yo dadāti dvijaśreṣṭha tatra yat puṇyam āpnuyāt ।।
tasmād varaṃ puṇyam eti snānadānādinā naraḥ ।
gautamyāṃ viśvavandyāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ tu bhaktitaḥ ।।
tasmād godāvarī gaṅgā tvayā nītā bhaviṣyati ।
sarvapāpakṣayakarī sarvābhīṣṭapradāyinī ।।
{gaṇeśvara uvāca 
etac chrutaṃ mayā mātar vadato gautamaṃ śivāt ।
etasmāt kāraṇāc chaṃbhur gaṅgāyāṃ niyataḥ sthitaḥ ।।
ko nivartayituṃ śaktas tam amba karuṇodadhim ।
athāpi mātar etat syān mānuṣā vighnapāśakaiḥ ।।
vinibaddhā na gacchanti godām apy antikasthitām ।
na namanti śivaṃ devaṃ na smaranti stuvanti na ।।
tathā mātaḥ kariṣyāmi tava saṃtoṣahetave ।
saṃniroddhum atho kleśas tava vākyaṃ kṣamasva me ।।
{brahmovāca 
tataḥ prabhṛti vighneśo mānuṣān prati kiṃcana ।
vighnam ācarate yas tu tam upāsya pravartate ।।
atho vighnam anādṛtya gautamīṃ yāti bhaktitaḥ ।
sa kṛtārtho bhavel loke na kṛtyam avaśiṣyate ।।
vighnāny anekāni bhavanti gehān 
nirgantukāmasya narādhamasya 
nidhāya tanmūrdhni padaṃ prayāti 
gaṅgāṃ na kiṃ tena phalaṃ pralabdham 
asyāḥ prabhāvaṃ ko brūyād api sākṣāt sadāśivaḥ ।
saṃkṣepeṇa mayā proktam itihāsapadānugam ।।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ yac carācare ।
tad atra vidyate sarvam itihāse savistare ।।
vedoditaṃ śrutisakalarahasyam uktaṃ 
satkāraṇaṃ samabhidhānam idaṃ sadaiva 
samyak ca dṛṣṭaṃ jagatāṃ hitāya 
proktaṃ purāṇaṃ bahudharmayuktam 
asya ślokaṃ padaṃ vāpi bhaktitaḥ śṛṇuyāt paṭhet ।
gaṅgā gaṅgeti vā vākyaṃ sa tu puṇyam avāpnuyāt ।।
kalikalaṅkavināśanadakṣam idaṃ 
sakalasiddhikaraṃ śubhadaṃ śivam 
jagati pūjyam abhīṣṭaphalapradaṃ 
gāṅgam etad udīritam uttamam 
sādhu gautama bhadraṃ te ko anyo asti sadṛśas tvayā ।
ya enāṃ gautamīṃ gaṅgāṃ daṇḍakāraṇyam āpnuyāt ।।
gaṅgā gaṅgeti yo brūyād yojanānāṃ śatair api ।
mucyate sarvapāpebhyo viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
tisraḥ koṭyo ardhakoṭī ca tīrthāni bhuvanatraye ।
tāni snātuṃ samāyānti gaṅgāyāṃ siṃhage gurau ।।
ṣaṣṭir varṣasahasrāṇi bhāgīrathyavagāhanam ।
sakṛd godāvarīsnānaṃ siṃhayukte bṛhaspatau ।।
iyaṃ tu gautamī putra yatra kvāpi mamājñayā ।
sarveṣāṃ sarvadā nṝṇāṃ snānān muktiṃ pradāsyati ।।
aśvamedhasahasrāṇi vājapeyaśatāni ca ।
kṛtvā yat phalam āpnoti tad asya śravaṇād bhavet ।।
yasyaitat tiṣṭhati gṛhe purāṇaṃ brahmaṇoditam ।
na bhayaṃ vidyate tasya kalikālasya nārada ।।
yasya kasyāpi nākhyeyaṃ purāṇam idam uttamam ।
śraddadhānāya śāntāya vaiṣṇavāya mahātmane ।।
idaṃ kīrtyaṃ bhuktimukti- dāyakaṃ pāpanāśakam ।
etacchravaṇamātreṇa kṛtakṛtyo bhaven naraḥ ।।
likhitvā pustakam idaṃ brāhmaṇāya prayacchati ।
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ punar garbhaṃ na saṃviśet ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
nahi nas tṛptir astīha śṛṇvatāṃ bhagavatkathām ।
punar eva paraṃ guhyaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ ।।
anantavāsudevasya na samyag varṇitaṃ tvayā ।
śrotum icchāmahe deva vistareṇa vadasva naḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
pravakṣyāmi muniśreṣṭhāḥ sārāt sārataraṃ param ।
anantavāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ bhuvi durlabham ।।
ādikalpe purā viprās tv aham avyaktajanmavān ।
viśvakarmāṇam āhūya vacanaṃ proktavān idam ।।
variṣṭhaṃ devaśilpīndraṃ viśvakarmāgrakarmiṇam ।
pratimāṃ vāsudevasya kuru śailamayīṃ bhuvi ।।
yāṃ prekṣya vidhivad bhaktāḥ sendrā vai mānuṣādayaḥ ।
yena dānavarakṣobhyo vijñāya sumahad bhayam ।।
tridivaṃ samanuprāpya sumeruśikharaṃ ciram ।
vāsudevaṃ samārādhya nirātaṅkā vasanti te ।।
mama tad vacanaṃ śrutvā viśvakarmā tu tatkṣaṇāt ।
cakāra pratimāṃ śuddhāṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharām ।।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktāṃ puṇḍarīkāyatekṣaṇām ।
śrīvatsalakṣmasaṃyuktām atyugrāṃ pratimottamām ।।
vanamālāvṛtoraskāṃ mukuṭāṅgadadhāriṇīm ।
pītavastrāṃ supīnāṃsāṃ kuṇḍalābhyām alaṃkṛtām ।।
evaṃ sā pratimā divyā guhyamantrais tadā svayam ।
pratiṣṭhākālam āsādya mayāsau nirmitā purā ।।
tasmin kāle tadā śakro devarāṭ khecaraiḥ saha ।
jagāma brahmasadanam āruhya gajam uttamam ।।
prasādya pratimāṃ śakraḥ snānadānaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
pratimāṃ tāṃ samārādhya svapuraṃ punar āgamat ।।
tāṃ samārādhya suciraṃ yatavākkāyamānasaḥ ।
vṛtrādyān asurān krūrān namucipramukhān sa ca ।।
nihatya dānavān bhīmān bhuktavān bhuvanatrayam ।
dvitīye ca yuge prāpte tretāyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ ।।
babhūva sumahāvīryo daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān ।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi nirāhāro jitendriyaḥ ।।
cacāra vratam atyugraṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram ।
tapasā tena tuṣṭo ahaṃ varaṃ tasmai pradattavān ।।
avadhyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ sa daityoragarakṣasām ।
śāpapraharaṇair ugrair avadhyo yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
varaṃ prāpya tadā rakṣo yakṣān sarvagaṇān imān ।
dhanādhyakṣaṃ vinirjitya śakraṃ jetuṃ samudyataḥ ।।
saṃgrāmaṃ sumahāghoraṃ kṛtvā devaiḥ sa rākṣasaḥ ।
devarājaṃ vinirjitya tadā indrajiteti vai ।।
rākṣasas tatsuto nāma meghanādaḥ pralabdhavān ।
amarāvatīṃ tataḥ prāpya devarājagṛhe śubhe ।।
dadarśāñjanasaṃkāśāṃ rāvaṇas tu balānvitaḥ ।
pratimāṃ vāsudevasya sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyutām ।।
śrīvatsalakṣmasaṃyuktāṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇām ।
vanamālāvṛtoraskāṃ mukuṭāṅgadabhūṣitām ।।
śaṅkhacakragadāhastāṃ pītavastrāṃ caturbhujām ।
sarvābharaṇasaṃyuktāṃ sarvakāmaphalapradām ।।
vihāya ratnasaṃghāṃś ca pratimāṃ śubhalakṣaṇām ।
puṣpakeṇa vimānena laṅkāṃ prāsthāpayad drutam ।।
purādhyakṣaḥ sthitaḥ śrīmān dharmātmā sa vibhīṣaṇaḥ ।
rāvaṇasyānujo mantrī nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā tāṃ pratimāṃ divyāṃ devendrabhavanacyutām ।
romāñcitatanur bhūtvā vismayaṃ samapadyata ।।
praṇamya śirasā devaṃ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā ।
adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ tapaḥ ।।
ity uktvā sa tu dharmātmā praṇipatya muhur muhuḥ ।
jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram āsādya kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata ।।
rājan pratimayā tvaṃ me prasādaṃ kartum arhasi ।
yām ārādhya jagannātha nistareyaṃ bhavārṇavam ।।
bhrātur vacanam ākarṇya rāvaṇas taṃ tadābravīt ।
gṛhāṇa pratimāṃ vīra tv anayā kiṃ karomy aham ।।
svayaṃbhuvaṃ samārādhya trailokyaṃ vijaye tv aham ।
nānāścaryamayaṃ devaṃ sarvabhūtabhavodbhavam ।।
vibhīṣaṇo mahābuddhis tadā tāṃ pratimāṃ śubhām ।
śatam aṣṭottaraṃ cābdaṃ samārādhya janārdanam ।।
ajarāmaraṇaṃ prāptam aṇimādiguṇair yutam ।
rājyaṃ laṅkādhipatyaṃ ca bhogān bhuṅkte yathepsitān ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
aho no vismayo jātaḥ śrutvedaṃ paramāmṛtam ।
anantavāsudevasya saṃbhavaṃ bhuvi durlabham ।।
śrotum icchāmahe deva vistareṇa yathātatham ।
tasya devasya māhātmyaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
tadā sa rākṣasaḥ krūro devagandharvakiṃnarān ।
lokapālān samanujān munisiddhāṃś ca pāpakṛt ।।
vijitya samare sarvān ājahāra tadaṅganāḥ ।
saṃsthāpya nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ punaḥ sītārthamohitaḥ ।।
śaṅkito mṛgarūpeṇa sauvarṇena ca rāvaṇaḥ ।
tataḥ kruddhena rāmeṇa raṇe saumitriṇā saha ।।
rāvaṇasya vadhārthāya hatvā vāliṃ manojavam ।
abhiṣiktaś ca sugrīvo yuvarājo aṅgadas tathā ।।
hanumān nalanīlaś ca jāmbavān panasas tathā ।
gavayaś ca gavākṣaś ca pāṭhīnaḥ paramaujasaḥ ।।
etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir vānaraiḥ samahābalaiḥ ।
samāvṛto mahāghorai rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ ।।
girīṇāṃ sarvasaṃghātaiḥ setuṃ baddhvā mahodadhau ।
balena mahatā rāmaḥ samuttīrya mahodadhim ।।
saṃgrāmam atulaṃ cakre rakṣogaṇasamanvitaḥ ।
yamahastaṃ prahastaṃ ca nikumbhaṃ kumbham eva ca ।।
narāntakaṃ mahāvīryaṃ tathā caiva yamāntakam ।
mālāḍhyaṃ mālikāḍhyaṃ ca hatvā rāmas tu vīryavān ।।
punar indrajitaṃ hatvā kumbhakarṇaṃ sarāvaṇam ।
vaidehīṃ cāgnināśodhya dattvā rājyaṃ vibhīṣaṇe ।।
vāsudevaṃ samādāya yānaṃ puṣpakam āruhat ।
līlayā samanuprāpad ayodhyāṃ pūrvapālitām ।।
kaniṣṭhaṃ bharataṃ snehāc chatrughnaṃ bhaktavatsalaḥ ।
abhiṣicya tadā rāmaḥ sarvarājye adhirājavat ।।
purātanīṃ svamūrtiṃ ca samārādhya tato hariḥ ।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣaśatāni ca ।।
bhuktvā sāgaraparyantāṃ medinīṃ sa tu rāghavaḥ ।
rājyam āsādya sugatiṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āviśat ।।
tāṃ cāpi pratimāṃ rāmaḥ samudreśāya dattavān ।
dhanyo rakṣayitāsi tvaṃ toyaratnasamanvitaḥ ।।
dvāparaṃ yugam āsādya yadā devo jagatpatiḥ ।
dharaṇyāś cānurodhena bhāvaśaithilyakāraṇāt ।।
avatīrṇaḥ sa bhagavān vasudevakule prabhuḥ ।
kaṃsādīnāṃ vadhārthāya saṃkarṣaṇasahāyavān ।।
tadā tāṃ pratimāṃ viprāḥ sarvavāñchāphalapradām ।
sarvalokahitārthāya kasyacit kāraṇāntare ।।
tasmin kṣetravare puṇye durlabhe puruṣottame ।
ujjahāra svayaṃ toyāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ ।।
tadā prabhṛti tatraiva kṣetre muktiprade dvijāḥ ।
āste sa devo devānāṃ sarvakāmaphalapradaḥ ।।
ye saṃśrayanti cānantaṃ bhaktyā sarveśvaraṃ prabhum ।
vāṅmanaḥkarmabhir nityaṃ te yānti paramaṃ padam ।।
dṛṣṭvānantaṃ sakṛd bhaktyā saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca ।
rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ daśaguṇaṃ labhet ।।
sarvakāmasamṛddhena kāmagena suvarcasā ।
vimānenārkavarṇena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā ।।
triḥsaptakulam uddhṛtya divyastrīgaṇasevitaḥ ।
upagīyamāno gandharvair naro viṣṇupuraṃ vrajet ।।
tatra bhuktvā varān bhogāñ jarāmaraṇavarjitaḥ ।
divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।।
puṇyakṣayād ihāyātaś caturvedī dvijottamaḥ ।
vaiṣṇavaṃ yogam āsthāya tato mokṣam avāpnuyāt ।।
evaṃ mayā tv ananto asau kīrtito munisattamāḥ ।
kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ tasya varṣaśatair api ।।
{brahmovāca 
evaṃ vo anantamāhātmyaṃ kṣetraṃ ca puruṣottamam ।
bhuktimuktipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ mayā proktaṃ sudurlabham ।।
yatrāste puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।
pītāmbaradharaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃsakeśiniṣūdanaḥ ।।
ye tatra kṛṣṇaṃ paśyanti surāsuranamaskṛtam ।
saṃkarṣaṇaṃ subhadrāṃ ca dhanyās te nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
trailokyādhipatiṃ devaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।
ye dhyāyanti sadā kṛṣṇaṃ muktās te nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
kṛṣṇe ratāḥ kṛṣṇam anusmaranti 
rātrau ca kṛṣṇaṃ punar utthitā ye 
te bhinnadehāḥ praviśanti kṛṣṇaṃ 
havir yathā mantrahutaṃ hutāśam 
tasmāt sadā muniśreṣṭhāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kamalalocanaḥ ।
tasmin kṣetre prayatnena draṣṭavyo mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ ।।
śayanotthāpane kṛṣṇaṃ ye paśyanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।
halāyudhaṃ subhadrāṃ ca hareḥ sthānaṃ vrajanti te ।।
sarvakāle api ye bhaktyā paśyanti puruṣottamam ।
rauhiṇeyaṃ subhadrāṃ ca viṣṇulokaṃ vrajanti te ।।
āste yaś caturo māsān vārṣikān puruṣottame ।
pṛthivyās tīrthayātrāyāḥ phalaṃ prāpnoti cādhikam ।।
ye sarvakālaṃ tatraiva nivasanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।
jitendriyā jitakrodhā labhante tapasaḥ phalam ।।
tapas taptvānyatīrtheṣu varṣāṇām ayutaṃ naraḥ ।
yad āpnoti tad āpnoti māsena puruṣottame ।।
tapasā brahmacaryeṇa saṅgatyāgena yat phalam ।
tat phalaṃ satataṃ tatra prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
sarvatīrtheṣu yat puṇyaṃ snānadānena kīrtitam ।
tat phalaṃ satataṃ tatra prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
samyak tīrthena yat proktaṃ vratena niyamena ca ।
tat phalaṃ labhate tatra pratyahaṃ prayataḥ śuciḥ ।।
yas tu nānāvidhair yajñair yat phalaṃ labhate naraḥ ।
tat phalaṃ labhate tatra pratyahaṃ saṃyatendriyaḥ ।।
dehaṃ tyajanti puruṣās tatra ye puruṣottame ।
kalpavṛkṣaṃ samāsādya muktās te nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
vaṭasāgarayor madhye ye tyajanti kalevaram ।
te durlabhaṃ paraṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti na saṃśayaḥ ।।
anicchann api yas tatra prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ ।
so api duḥkhavinirmukto muktiṃ prāpnoti durlabhām ।।
kṛmikīṭapataṃgādyās tiryagyonigatāś ca ye ।
tatra dehaṃ parityajya te yānti paramāṃ gatim ।।
bhrāntiṃ lokasya paśyadhvam anyatīrthaṃ prati dvijāḥ ।
puruṣākhyena yat prāptam anyatīrthaphalādikam ।।
sakṛt paśyati yo martyaḥ śraddhayā puruṣottamam ।
puruṣāṇāṃ sahasreṣu sa bhaved uttamaḥ pumān ।।
prakṛteḥ sa paro yasmāt puruṣād api cottamaḥ ।
tasmād vede purāṇe ca loke asmin puruṣottamaḥ ।।
yo asau purāṇe vedānte paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ ।
āste viśvopakārāya tenāsau puruṣottamaḥ ।।
pāthe śmaśāne gṛhamaṇḍape vā 
rathyāpradeśeṣv api yatra kutra 
icchann anicchann api tatra dehaṃ 
saṃtyajya mokṣaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ 
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tasmin kṣetre dvijottamāḥ ।
dehatyāgo naraiḥ kāryaḥ samyaṅ mokṣābhikāṅkṣibhiḥ ।।
puruṣākhyasya māhātmyaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati ।
tyaktvā yatra naro dehaṃ muktiṃ prāpnoti durlabhām ।।
guṇānām ekadeśo ayaṃ mayā kṣetrasya kīrtitaḥ ।
kaḥ samastān guṇān vaktuṃ śakto varṣaśatair api ।।
yadi yūyaṃ muniśreṣṭhā mokṣam icchatha śāśvatam ।
tasmin kṣetravare puṇye nivasadhvam atandritāḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
te tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā brahmaṇo avyaktajanmanaḥ ।
nivāsaṃ cakrire tatra avāpuḥ paramaṃ padam ।।
tasmād yūyaṃ prayatnena nivasadhvaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
puruṣākhye vare kṣetre yadi muktim abhīpsatha ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tasmin kṣetre muniśreṣṭhāḥ sarvasattvasukhāvahe ।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ phalade puruṣottame ।।
kaṇḍur nāma mahātejā ṛṣiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ ।
satyavādī śucir dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ ।।
jitendriyo jitakrodho vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ।
avāpa paramāṃ siddhim ārādhya puruṣottamam ।।
anye api tatra saṃsiddhā munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ ।
sarvabhūtahitā dāntā jitakrodhā vimatsarāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
ko asau kaṇḍuḥ kathaṃ tatra jagāma paramāṃ gatim ।
śrotum icchāmahe tasya caritaṃ brūhi sattama ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ kathāṃ tasya manoharām ।
pravakṣyāmi samāsena munes tasya viceṣṭitam ।।
pavitre gomatītīre vijane sumanohare ।
kandamūlaphalaiḥ pūrṇe samitpuṣpakuśānvitaiḥ ।।
nānādrumalatākīrṇe nānāpuṣpopaśobhite ।
nānāpakṣirute ramye nānāmṛgagaṇānvite ।।
tatrāśramapadaṃ kaṇḍor babhūva munisattamāḥ ।
sarvartuphalapuṣpāḍhyaṃ kadalīkhaṇḍamaṇḍitam ।।
tapas tepe munis tatra sumahat paramādbhutam ।
vratopavāsair niyamaiḥ snānamaunasusaṃyamaiḥ ।।
grīṣme pañcatapā bhūtvā varṣāsu sthaṇḍileśayaḥ ।
ārdravāsās tu hemante sa tepe sumahat tapaḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā tu tapaso vīryaṃ munes tasya suvismitāḥ ।
babhūvur devagandharvāḥ siddhavidyādharās tathā ।।
bhūmiṃ tathāntarikṣaṃ ca divaṃ ca munisattamāḥ ।
kaṇḍuḥ saṃtāpayām āsa trailokyaṃ tapaso balāt ।।
aho asya paramaṃ dhairyam aho asya paramaṃ tapaḥ ।
ity abruvaṃs tadā dṛṣṭvā devās taṃ tapasi sthitam ।।
mantrayām āsur avyagrāḥ śakreṇa sahitās tadā ।
bhayāt tasya samudvignās tapovighnam abhīpsavaḥ ।।
jñātvā teṣām abhiprāyaṃ śakras tribhuvaneśvaraḥ ।
pramlocākhyāṃ varārohāṃ rūpayauvanagarvitām ।।
sumadhyāṃ cārujaṅghāṃ tāṃ pīnaśroṇipayodharām ।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannāṃ provāca phalasūdanaḥ ।।
{śakra uvāca 
pramloce gaccha śīghraṃ tvaṃ yadāsau tapyate muniḥ ।
vighnārthaṃ tasya tapasaḥ kṣobhayasvāṃśu suprabhe ।।
{pramlocovāca 
tava vākyaṃ suraśreṣṭha karomi satataṃ prabho ।
kiṃtu śaṅkā mamaivātra jīvitasya ca saṃśayaḥ ।।
bibhemi taṃ munivaraṃ brahmacaryavrate sthitam ।
atyugraṃ dīptatapasaṃ jvalanārkasamaprabham ।।
jñātvā māṃ sa muniḥ krodhād vighnārthaṃ samupāgatām ।
kaṇḍuḥ paramatejasvī śāpaṃ dāsyati duḥsaham ।।
urvaśī menakā rambhā ghṛtācī puñjikasthalā ।
viśvācī sahajanyā ca pūrvacittis tilottamā ।।
alambuṣā miśrakeśī śaśilekhā ca vāmanā ।
anyāś cāpsarasaḥ santi rūpayauvanagarvitāḥ ।।
sumadhyāś cāruvadanāḥ pīnonnatapayodharāḥ ।
kāmapradhānakuśalās tās tatra saṃniyojaya ।।
{brahmovāca 
tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā punaḥ prāha śacīpatiḥ ।
tiṣṭhantu nāma cānyās tās tvaṃ cātra kuśalā śubhe ।।
kāmaṃ vasantaṃ vāyuṃ ca sahāyārthe dadāmi te ।
taiḥ sārdhaṃ gaccha suśroṇi yatrāste sa mahāmuniḥ ।।
śakrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tadā sā cārulocanā ।
jagāmākāśamārgeṇa taiḥ sārdhaṃ cāśramaṃ muneḥ ।।
gatvā sā tatra ruciraṃ dadarśa vanam uttamam ।
muniṃ ca dīptatapasam āśramastham akalmaṣam ।।
apaśyat sā vanaṃ ramyaṃ taiḥ sārdhaṃ nandanopamam ।
sarvartuvarapuṣpāḍhyaṃ śākhāmṛgagaṇākulam ।।
puṇyaṃ padmabalopetaṃ sapallavamahābalam ।
śrotraramyān sumadhurāñ śabdān khagamukheritān ।।
sarvartuphalabhārāḍhyān sarvartukusumojjvalān ।
apaśyat pādapāṃś caiva vihaṃgair anunāditān ।।
āmrān āmrātakān bhavyān nārikerān satindukān ।
atha bilvāṃs tathā jīvān dāḍimān bījapūrakān ।।
panasāṃl lakucān nīpāñ śirīṣān sumanoharān ।
pārāvatāṃs tathā kolān arimedāmlavetasān ।।
bhallātakān āmalakāñ śataparṇāṃś ca kiṃśukān ।
iṅgudān karavīrāṃś ca harītakīvibhītakān ।।
etān anyāṃś ca sā vṛkṣān dadarśa pṛthulocanā ।
tathaivāśokapuṃnāga- ketakībakulān atha ।।
pārijātān kovidārān mandārendīvarāṃs tathā ।
pāṭalāḥ puṣpitā ramyā devadārudrumāṃs tathā ।।
śālāṃs tālāṃs tamālāṃś ca niculāṃl lomakāṃs tathā ।
anyāṃś ca pādapaśreṣṭhān apaśyat phalapuṣpitān ।।
cakoraiḥ śatapattraiś ca bhṛṅgarājais tathā śukaiḥ ।
kokilaiḥ kalaviṅkaiś ca hārītair jīvajīvakaiḥ ।।
priyaputraiś cātakaiś ca tathānyair vividhaiḥ khagaiḥ ।
śrotraramyaṃ sumadhuraṃ kūjadbhiś cāpy adhiṣṭhitam ।।
sarāṃsi ca manojñāni prasannasalilāni ca ।
kumudaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca tathā nīlotpalaiḥ śubhaiḥ ।।
kahlāraiḥ kamalaiś caiva ācitāni samantataḥ ।
kādambaiś cakravākaiś ca tathaiva jalakukkuṭaiḥ ।।
kāraṇḍavair bakair haṃsaiḥ kūrmair madgubhir eva ca ।
etaiś cānyaiś ca kīrṇāni samantāj jalacāribhiḥ ।।
krameṇaiva tathā sā tu vanaṃ babhrāma taiḥ saha ।
evaṃ dṛṣṭvā vanaṃ ramyaṃ taiḥ sārdhaṃ paramādbhutam ।।
vismayotphullanayanā sā babhūva varāṅganā ।
provāca vāyuṃ kāmaṃ ca vasantaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
{pramlocovāca 
kurudhvaṃ mama sāhāyyaṃ yūyaṃ sarve pṛthak pṛthak ।।
{brahmovāca 
evam uktvā tadā sā tu tathety uktā surair dvijāḥ ।
pratyuvācādya yāsyāmi yatrāsau saṃsthito muniḥ ।।
adya taṃ dehayantāraṃ prayuktendriyavājinam ।
smaraśastragaladraśmiṃ kariṣyāmi kusārathim ।।
brahmā janārdano vāpi yadi vā nīlalohitaḥ ।
tathāpy adya kariṣyāmi kāmabāṇakṣatāntaram ।।
ity uktvā prayayau sātha yatrāsau tiṣṭhate muniḥ ।
munes tapaḥprabhāveṇa praśāntaśvāpadāśramam ।।
sā puṃskokilamādhurye nadītīre vyavasthitā ।
stokamātraṃ sthitā tasmād agāyata varāpsarāḥ ।।
tato vasantaḥ sahasā balaṃ samakarot tadā ।
kokilārāvamadhuram akālikamanoharam ।।
vavau gandhavahaś caiva malayādriniketanaḥ ।
puṣpān uccāvacān medhyān pātayaṃś ca śanaiḥ śanaiḥ ।।
puṣpabāṇadharaś caiva gatvā tasya samīpataḥ ।
muneś ca kṣobhayām āsa kāmas tasyāpi mānasam ।।
tato gītadhvaniṃ śrutvā munir vismitamānasaḥ ।
jagāma yatra sā subhrūḥ kāmabāṇaprapīḍitaḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā tām āha saṃdṛṣṭo vismayotphullalocanaḥ ।
bhraṣṭottarīyo vikalaḥ pulakāñcitavigrahaḥ ।।
{ṛṣir uvāca 
kāsi kasyāsi suśroṇi subhage cāruhāsini ।
mano harasi me subhru brūhi satyaṃ sumadhyame ।।
{pramlocovāca 
tava karmakarā cāhaṃ puṣpārtham aham āgatā ।
ādeśaṃ dehi me kṣipraṃ kiṃ karomi tavājñayā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyās tyaktvā dhairyaṃ vimohitaḥ ।
ādāya haste tāṃ bālāṃ praviveśa svam āśramam ।।
tataḥ kāmaś ca vāyuś ca vasantaś ca dvijottamāḥ ।
jagmur yathāgataṃ sarve kṛtakṛtyās triviṣṭapam ।।
śaśaṃsuś ca hariṃ gatvā tasyās tasya ca ceṣṭitam ।
śrutvā śakras tadā devāḥ prītāḥ sumanaso abhavan ।।
sa ca kaṇḍus tayā sārdhaṃ praviśann eva cāśramam ।
ātmanaḥ paramaṃ rūpaṃ cakāra madanākṛti ।।
rūpayauvanasaṃpannam atīva sumanoharam ।
divyālaṃkārasaṃyuktaṃ ṣoḍaśavatsarākṛti ।।
divyavastradharaṃ kāntaṃ divyasraggandhabhūṣitam ।
sarvopabhogasaṃpannaṃ sahasā tapaso balāt ।।
dṛṣṭvā sā tasya tad vīryaṃ paraṃ vismayam āgatā ।
aho asya tapaso vīryam ity uktvā muditābhavat ।।
snānaṃ saṃdhyāṃ japaṃ homaṃ svādhyāyaṃ devatārcanam ।
vratopavāsaniyamaṃ dhyānaṃ ca munisattamāḥ ।।
tyaktvā sa reme muditas tayā sārdham aharniśam ।
manmathāviṣṭahṛdayo na bubodha tapaḥkṣayam ।।
saṃdhyārātridivāpakṣa- māsartvayanahāyanam ।
na bubodha gataṃ kālaṃ viṣayāsaktamānasaḥ ।।
sā ca taṃ kāmajair bhāvair vidagdhā rahasi dvijāḥ ।
varayām āsa suśroṇiḥ pralāpakuśalā tadā ।।
evaṃ kaṇḍus tayā sārdhaṃ varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam ।
atiṣṭhan mandaradroṇyāṃ grāmyadharmarato muniḥ ।।
sā taṃ prāha mahābhāgaṃ gantum icchāmy ahaṃ divam ।
prasādasumukho brahmann anujñātuṃ tvam arhasi ।।
tayaivam uktaḥ sa munis tasyām āsaktamānasaḥ ।
dināni katicid bhadre sthīyatām ity abhāṣata ।।
evam uktā tatas tena sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ punaḥ ।
bubhuje viṣayāṃs tanvī tena sārdhaṃ mahātmanā ।।
anujñāṃ dehi bhagavan vrajāmi tridaśālayam ।
uktas tayeti sa punaḥ sthīyatām ity abhāṣata ।।
punar gate varṣaśate sādhike sā śubhānanā ।
yāmy ahaṃ tridivaṃ brahman praṇayasmitaśobhanam ।।
uktas tayaivaṃ sa muniḥ punar āhāyatekṣaṇām ।
ihāsyatāṃ mayā subhru ciraṃ kālaṃ gamiṣyasi ।।
tacchāpabhītā suśroṇī saha tenarṣiṇā punaḥ ।
śatadvayaṃ kiṃcid ūnaṃ varṣāṇāṃ samatiṣṭhata ।।
gamanāya mahābhāgo devarājaniveśanam ।
proktaḥ proktas tayā tanvyā sthīyatām ity abhāṣata ।।
tasya śāpabhayād bhīrur dākṣiṇyena ca dakṣiṇā ।
proktā praṇayabhaṅgārti- vedinī na jahau munim ।।
tayā ca ramatas tasya paramarṣer aharniśam ।
navaṃ navam abhūt prema manmathāsaktacetasaḥ ।।
ekadā tu tvarāyukto niścakrāmoṭajān muniḥ ।
niṣkrāmantaṃ ca kutreti gamyate prāha sā śubhā ।।
ity uktaḥ sa tayā prāha parivṛttam ahaḥ śubhe ।
saṃdhyopāstiṃ kariṣyāmi kriyālopo anyathā bhavet ।।
tataḥ prahasya muditā sā taṃ prāha mahāmunim ।
kim adya sarvadharmajña parivṛttam ahas tava ।
gatam etan na kurute vismayaṃ kasya kathyate ।।
{munir uvāca 
prātas tvam āgatā bhadre nadītīram idaṃ śubham ।
mayā dṛṣṭāsi suśroṇi praviṣṭā ca mamāśramam ।।
iyaṃ ca vartate saṃdhyā pariṇāmam aho gatam ।
avahāsaḥ kimartho ayaṃ sadbhāvaḥ kathyatāṃ mama ।।
{pramlocovāca 
pratyūṣasy āgatā brahman satyam etan na me mṛṣā ।
kiṃtv adya tasya kālasya gatāny abdaśatāni te ।।
tataḥ sasādhvaso vipras tāṃ papracchāyatekṣaṇām ।
kathyatāṃ bhīru kaḥ kālas tvayā me ramataḥ sadā ।।
{pramlocovāca 
saptottarāṇy atītāni navavarṣaśatāni ca ।
māsāś ca ṣaṭ tathaivānyat samatītaṃ dinatrayam ।।
{ṛṣir uvāca 
satyaṃ bhīru vadasy etat parihāso athavā śubhe ।
dinam ekam ahaṃ manye tvayā sārdham ihoṣitam ।।
{pramlocovāca 
vadiṣyāmy anṛtaṃ brahman katham atra tavāntike ।
viśeṣād adya bhavatā pṛṣṭā mārgānugāminā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
niśamya tad vacas tasyāḥ sa munir dvijasattamāḥ ।
dhig dhiṅ mām ity anācāraṃ vinindyātmānam ātmanā ।।
{munir uvāca 
tapāṃsi mama naṣṭāni hataṃ brahmavidāṃ dhanam ।
hṛto vivekaḥ kenāpi yoṣin mohāya nirmitā ।।
ūrmiṣaṭkātigaṃ brahma jñeyam ātmajayena me ।
gatir eṣā kṛtā yena dhik taṃ kāmamahāgraham ।।
vratāni sarvavedāś ca kāraṇāny akhilāni ca ।
narakagrāmamārgeṇa kāmenādya hatāni me ।।
vinindyetthaṃ sa dharmajñaḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā 
tām apsarasam āsīnām idaṃ vacanam abravīt 
{ṛṣir uvāca 
gaccha pāpe yathākāmaṃ yat kāryaṃ tat tvayā kṛtam 
devarājasya yat kṣobhaṃ kurvantyā bhāvaceṣṭitaiḥ 
na tvāṃ karomy ahaṃ bhasma krodhatīvreṇa vahninā ।
satāṃ sāptapadaṃ maitryam uṣito ahaṃ tvayā saha ।।
athavā tava doṣaḥ kaḥ kiṃ vā kuryām ahaṃ tava ।
mamaiva doṣo nitarāṃ yenāham ajitendriyaḥ ।।
yathā śakrapriyārthinyā kṛto mattapaso vyayaḥ ।
tvayā dṛṣṭimahāmoha- manunāhaṃ jugupsitaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
yāvad itthaṃ sa viprarṣis tāṃ bravīti sumadhyamām ।
tāvat skhalatsvedajalā sā babhūvātivepathuḥ ।।
pravepamānāṃ sa ca tāṃ svinnagātralatāṃ satīm ।
gaccha gaccheti sakrodham uvāca munisattamaḥ ।।
sā tu nirbhartsitā tena viniṣkramya tadāśramāt ।
ākāśagāminī svedaṃ mamārja tarupallavaiḥ ।।
vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ yayau bālā udagrāruṇapallavaiḥ ।
nirmamārja ca gātrāṇi galatsvedajalāni vai ।।
ṛṣiṇā yas tadā garbhas tasyā dehe samāhitaḥ ।
nirjagāma saromāñca- svedarūpī tadaṅgataḥ ।।
taṃ vṛkṣā jagṛhur garbham ekaṃ cakre ca mārutaḥ ।
somenāpyāyito gobhiḥ sa tadā vavṛddhe śanaiḥ ।।
māriṣā nāma kanyābhūd vṛkṣāṇāṃ cārulocanā ।
prācetasānāṃ sā bhāryā dakṣasya jananī dvijāḥ ।।
sa cāpi bhagavān kaṇḍuḥ kṣīṇe tapasi sattamaḥ ।
puruṣottamākhyaṃ bho viprā viṣṇor āyatanaṃ yayau ।।
dadarśa paramaṃ kṣetraṃ muktidaṃ bhuvi durlabham ।
dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
suramyaṃ vālukākīrṇaṃ ketakīvanaśobhitam ।
nānādrumalatākīrṇaṃ nānāpakṣirutaṃ śivam ।।
sarvatra sukhasaṃcāraṃ sarvartukusumānvitam ।
sarvasaukhyapradaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanyaṃ sarvaguṇākaram ।।
bhṛgvādyaiḥ sevitaṃ pūrvaṃ munisiddhavarais tathā ।
gandharvaiḥ kiṃnarair yakṣais tathānyair mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ ।।
dadarśa ca hariṃ tatra devaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtam ।
brāhmaṇādyais tathā varṇair āśramasthair niṣevitam ।।
dṛṣṭvaiva sa tadā kṣetraṃ devaṃ ca puruṣottamam ।
kṛtakṛtyam ivātmānaṃ mene sa munisattamaḥ ।।
tatraikāgramanā bhūtvā cakārārādhanaṃ hareḥ ।
brahmapāramayaṃ kurvañ japam ekāgramānasaḥ ।
ūrdhvabāhur mahāyogī sthitvāsau munisattamaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
brahmapāraṃ mune śrotum icchāmaḥ paramaṃ śubham ।
japatā kaṇḍunā devo yenārādhyata keśavaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
pāraṃ paraṃ viṣṇur apārapāraḥ 
paraḥ parebhyaḥ paramātmarūpaḥ 
sa brahmapāraḥ parapārabhūtaḥ 
paraḥ parāṇām api pārapāraḥ 
sa kāraṇaṃ kāraṇasaṃśrito api 
tasyāpi hetuḥ parahetuhetuḥ 
kāryo api caiṣa saha karmakartṛ 
rūpair anekair avatīha sarvam 
brahma prabhur brahma sa sarvabhūto 
brahma prajānāṃ patir acyuto asau 
brahmāvyayaṃ nityam ajaṃ sa viṣṇur 
apakṣayādyair akhilair asaṅgaḥ 
brahmākṣaram ajaṃ nityaṃ yathāsau puruṣottamaḥ ।
tathā rāgādayo doṣāḥ prayāntu praśamaṃ mama ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śrutvā tasya muner jāpyaṃ brahmapāraṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
bhaktiṃ ca paramāṃ jñātvā sudṛḍhāṃ puruṣottamaḥ ।।
prītyā sa parayā devas tadāsau bhaktavatsalaḥ ।
gatvā tasya samīpaṃ tu provāca madhusūdanaḥ ।।
meghagambhīrayā vācā diśaḥ saṃnādayann iva ।
āruhya garuḍaṃ viprā vinatākulanandanam ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
mune brūhi paraṃ kāryaṃ yat te manasi vartate ।
varado aham anuprāpto varaṃ varaya suvrata ।।
śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasya devadevasya cakriṇaḥ ।
cakṣur unmīlya sahasā dadarśa purato harim ।।
atasīpuṣpasaṃkāśaṃ padmapattrāyatekṣaṇam ।
śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇiṃ mukuṭāṅgadadhāriṇam ।।
caturbāhum udārāṅgaṃ pītavastradharaṃ śubham ।
śrīvatsalakṣmasaṃyuktaṃ vanamālāvibhūṣitam ।।
sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ sarvaratnavibhūṣitam ।
divyacandanaliptāṅgaṃ divyamālyavibhūṣitam ।।
tataḥ sa vismayāviṣṭo romāñcitatanūruhaḥ ।
daṇḍavat praṇipatyorvyāṃ praṇāmam akarot tadā ।।
adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ tapaḥ ।
ity uktvā muniśārdūlās taṃ stotum upacakrame ।।
{kaṇḍur uvāca 
nārāyaṇa hare kṛṣṇa śrīvatsāṅka jagatpate ।
jagadbīja jagaddhāma jagatsākṣin namo astu te ।।
avyakta jiṣṇo prabhava pradhānapuruṣottama ।
puṇḍarīkākṣa govinda lokanātha namo astu te ।।
hiraṇyagarbha śrīnātha padmanātha sanātana ।
bhūgarbha dhruva īśāna hṛṣīkeśa namo astu te ।।
anādyantāmṛtājeya jaya tvaṃ jayatāṃ vara ।
ajitākhaṇḍa śrīkṛṣṇa śrīnivāsa namo astu te ।।
parjanyadharmakartā ca duṣpāra duradhiṣṭhita ।
duḥkhārtināśana hare jalaśāyin namo astu te ।।
bhūtapāvyakta bhūteśa bhūtatattvair anākula ।
bhūtādhivāsa bhūtātman bhūtagarbha namo astu te ।।
yajñayajvan yajñadhara yajñadhātābhayaprada ।
yajñagarbha hiraṇyāṅga pṛśnigarbha namo astu te ।।
kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrabhṛt kṣetrī kṣetrahā kṣetrakṛd vaśī ।
kṣetrātman kṣetrarahita kṣetrasraṣṭre namo astu te ।।
guṇālaya guṇāvāsa guṇāśraya guṇāvaha ।
guṇabhoktṛ guṇārāma guṇatyāgin namo astu te ।।
tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ hariś cakrī tvaṃ jiṣṇus tvaṃ janārdanaḥ ।
tvaṃ bhūtas tvaṃ vaṣaṭkāras tvaṃ bhavyas tvaṃ bhavatprabhuḥ ।।
tvaṃ bhūtakṛt tvam avyaktas tvaṃ bhavo bhūtabhṛd bhavān ।
tvaṃ bhūtabhāvano devas tvām āhur ajam īśvaram ।।
tvam anantaḥ kṛtajñas tvaṃ prakṛtis tvaṃ vṛṣākapiḥ ।
tvaṃ rudras tvaṃ durādharṣas tvam amoghas tvam īśvaraḥ ।।
tvaṃ viśvakarmā jiṣṇus tvaṃ tvaṃ śaṃbhus tvaṃ vṛṣākṛtiḥ ।
tvaṃ śaṃkaras tvam uśanā tvaṃ satyaṃ tvaṃ tapo janaḥ ।।
tvaṃ viśvajetā tvaṃ śarma tvaṃ śaraṇyas tvam akṣaram ।
tvaṃ śaṃbhus tvaṃ svayaṃbhūś ca tvaṃ jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ parāyaṇaḥ ।।
tvam ādityas tvam oṃkāras tvaṃ prāṇas tvaṃ tamisrahā ।
tvaṃ parjanyas tvaṃ prathitas tvaṃ vedhās tvaṃ sureśvaraḥ ।।
tvam ṛg yajuḥ sāma caiva tvam ātmā saṃmato bhavān ।
tvam agnis tvaṃ ca pavanas tvam āpo vasudhā bhavān ।।
tvaṃ sraṣṭā tvaṃ tathā bhoktā hotā tvaṃ ca haviḥ kratuḥ ।
tvaṃ prabhus tvaṃ vibhuḥ śreṣṭhas tvaṃ lokapatir acyutaḥ ।।
tvaṃ sarvadarśanaḥ śrīmāṃs tvaṃ sarvadamano arihā ।
tvam ahas tvaṃ tathā rātris tvām āhur vatsaraṃ budhāḥ ।।
tvaṃ kālas tvaṃ kalā kāṣṭhā tvaṃ muhūrtaḥ kṣaṇā lavāḥ ।
tvaṃ bālas tvaṃ tathā vṛddhas tvaṃ pumān strī napuṃsakaḥ ।।
tvaṃ viśvayonis tvaṃ cakṣus tvaṃ sthāṇus tvaṃ śuciśravāḥ ।
tvaṃ śāśvatas tvam ajitas tvam upendras tvam uttamaḥ ।।
tvaṃ sarvaviśvasukhadas tvaṃ vedāṅgaṃ tvam avyayaḥ ।
tvaṃ vedavedas tvaṃ dhātā vidhātā tvaṃ samāhitaḥ ।।
tvaṃ jalanidhir āmūlaṃ tvaṃ dhātā tvaṃ punar vasuḥ ।
tvaṃ vaidyas tvaṃ dhṛtātmā ca tvam atīndriyagocaraḥ ।।
tvam agraṇīr grāmaṇīs tvaṃ tvaṃ suparṇas tvam ādimān ।
tvaṃ saṃgrahas tvaṃ sumahat tvaṃ dhṛtātmā tvam acyutaḥ ।।
tvaṃ yamas tvaṃ ca niyamas tvaṃ prāṃśus tvaṃ caturbhujaḥ ।
tvam evānnāntarātmā tvaṃ paramātmā tvam ucyate ।।
tvaṃ gurus tvaṃ gurutamas tvaṃ vāmas tvaṃ pradakṣiṇaḥ ।
tvaṃ pippalas tvam agamas tvaṃ vyaktas tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ ।।
hiraṇyanābhas tvaṃ devas tvaṃ śaśī tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ ।
anirdeśyavapus tvaṃ vai tvaṃ yamas tvaṃ surārihā ।।
tvaṃ ca saṃkarṣaṇo devas tvaṃ kartā tvaṃ sanātanaḥ ।
tvaṃ vāsudevo ameyātmā tvam eva guṇavarjitaḥ ।।
tvaṃ jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ variṣṭhas tvaṃ tvaṃ sahiṣṇuś ca mādhavaḥ ।
sahasraśīrṣā tvaṃ devas tvam avyaktaḥ sahasradṛk ।।
sahasrapādas tvaṃ devas tvaṃ virāṭ tvaṃ suraprabhuḥ ।
tvam eva tiṣṭhase bhūyo devadeva daśāṅgulaḥ ।।
yad bhūtaṃ tat tvam evoktaḥ puruṣaḥ śakra uttamaḥ ।
yad bhāvyaṃ tat tvam īśānas tvam ṛtas tvaṃ tathāmṛtaḥ ।।
tvatto rohaty ayaṃ loko mahīyāṃs tvam anuttamaḥ ।
tvaṃ jyāyān puruṣas tvaṃ ca tvaṃ deva daśadhā sthitaḥ ।।
viśvabhūtaś caturbhāgo navabhāgo amṛto divi ।
navabhāgo antarikṣasthaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
bhāgadvayaṃ ca bhūsaṃsthaṃ caturbhāgo apy abhūd iha ।
tvatto yajñāḥ saṃbhavanti jagato vṛṣṭikāraṇam ।।
tvatto virāṭ samutpanno jagato hṛdi yaḥ pumān ।
so atiricyata bhūtebhyas tejasā yaśasā śriyā ।।
tvattaḥ surāṇām āhāraḥ pṛṣadājyam ajāyata ।
grāmyāraṇyāś cauṣadhayas tvattaḥ paśumṛgādayaḥ ।।
dhyeyadhyānaparas tvaṃ ca kṛtavān asi cauṣadhīḥ ।
tvaṃ devadeva saptāsya kālākhyo dīptavigrahaḥ ।।
jaṅgamājaṅgamaṃ sarvaṃ jagad etac carācaram ।
tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ jātaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ।।
aniruddhas tvaṃ mādhavas tvaṃ pradyumnaḥ surārihā ।
deva sarvasuraśreṣṭha sarvalokaparāyaṇa ।।
trāhi mām aravindākṣa nārāyaṇa namo astu te ।
namas te bhagavan viṣṇo namas te puruṣottama ।।
namas te sarvalokeśa namas te kamalālaya ।
guṇālaya namas te astu namas te astu guṇākara ।।
vāsudeva namas te astu namas te astu surottama ।
janārdana namas te astu namas te astu sanātana ।।
namas te yogināṃ gamya yogāvāsa namo astu te ।
gopate śrīpate viṣṇo namas te astu marutpate ।।
jagatpate jagatsūte namas te jñānināṃ pate ।
divaspate namas te astu namas te astu mahīpate ।।
namas te madhuhantre ca namas te puṣkarekṣaṇa ।
kaiṭabhaghna namas te astu subrahmaṇya namo astu te ।।
namo astu te mahāmīna śrutipṛṣṭhadharācyuta ।
samudrasalilakṣobha padmajāhlādakāriṇe ।।
aśvaśīrṣa mahāghoṇa mahāpuruṣavigraha ।
madhukaiṭabhahantre ca namas te turagānana ।।
mahākamaṭhabhogāya pṛthivyuddharaṇāya ca ।
vidhṛtādrisvarūpāya mahākūrmāya te namaḥ ।।
namo mahāvarāhāya pṛthivyuddhārakāriṇe ।
namaś cādivarāhāya viśvarūpāya vedhase ।।
namo anantāya sūkṣmāya mukhyāya ca varāya ca ।
paramāṇusvarūpāya yogigamyāya te namaḥ ।।
tasmai namaḥ kāraṇakāraṇāya 
yogīndravṛttanilayāya sudurvidāya 
kṣīrārṇavāśritamahāhisutalpagāya 
tubhyaṃ namaḥ kanakaratnasukuṇḍalāya 
{vyāsa uvāca 
itthaṃ stutas tadā tena prītaḥ provāca mādhavaḥ ।
kṣipraṃ brūhi muniśreṣṭha matto yad abhivāñchasi ।।
{kaṇḍur uvāca 
saṃsāre asmiñ jagannātha dustare lomaharṣaṇe ।
anitye duḥkhabahule kadalīdalasaṃnibhe ।।
nirāśraye nirālambe jalabudbudacañcale ।
sarvopadravasaṃyukte dustare cātibhairave ।।
bhramāmi suciraṃ kālaṃ māyayā mohitas tava ।
na cāntam abhigacchāmi viṣayāsaktamānasaḥ ।।
tvām ahaṃ cādya deveśa saṃsārabhayapīḍitaḥ ।
gato asmi śaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇa mām uddhara bhavārṇavāt ।।
gantum icchāmi paramaṃ padaṃ yat te sanātanam ।
prasādāt tava deveśa punarāvṛttidurlabham ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
bhakto asi me muniśreṣṭha mām ārādhaya nityaśaḥ ।
matprasādād dhruvaṃ mokṣaṃ prāpyasi tvaṃ samīhitam ।।
madbhaktāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ śūdrāntyajātijāḥ ।
prāpnuvanti parāṃ siddhiṃ kiṃ punas tvaṃ dvijottama ।।
śvapāko api ca madbhaktaḥ samyak śraddhāsamanvitaḥ ।
prāpnoty abhimatāṃ siddhim anyeṣāṃ tatra kā kathā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evam uktvā tu taṃ viprāḥ sa devo bhaktavatsalaḥ ।
durvijñeyagatir viṣṇus tatraivāntaradhīyata ।।
gate tasmin muniśreṣṭhāḥ kaṇḍuḥ saṃhṛṣṭamānasaḥ ।
sarvān kāmān parityajya svasthacitto bhavat punaḥ ।।
sarvendriyāṇi saṃyamya nirmamo nirahaṃkṛtiḥ ।
ekāgramānasaḥ samyag dhyātvā taṃ puruṣottamam ।।
nirlepaṃ nirguṇaṃ śāntaṃ sattāmātravyavasthitam ।
avāpa paramaṃ mokṣaṃ surāṇām api durlabham ।।
yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi kathāṃ kaṇḍor mahātmanaḥ ।
vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhāḥ karmabhūmir udāhṛtā ।
mokṣakṣetraṃ ca paramaṃ devaṃ ca puruṣottamam ।।
ye paśyanti vibhuṃ stuvanti varadaṃ dhyāyanti muktipradaṃ ।
bhaktyā śrīpuruṣottamākhyam ajaraṃ saṃsāraduḥkhāpaham ।।
te bhuktvā manujendrabhogam amalāḥ svarge ca divyaṃ sukhaṃ ।
paścād yānti samastadoṣarahitāḥ sthānaṃ harer avyayam ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
vyāsasya vacanaṃ śrutvā munayaḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ ।
prītā babhūvuḥ saṃhṛṣṭā vismitāś ca punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
aho bhāratavarṣasya tvayā saṃkīrtitā guṇāḥ ।
tadvac chrīpuruṣākhyasya kṣetrasya puruṣottama ।।
vismayo hi na caikasya śrutvā māhātmyam uttamam ।
puruṣākhyasya kṣetrasya prītiś ca vadatāṃ vara ।।
cirāt prabhṛti cāsmākaṃ saṃśayo hṛdi vartate ।
tvadṛte saṃśayasyāsya cchettā nānyo asti bhūtale ।।
utpattiṃ baladevasya kṛṣṇasya ca mahītale ।
bhadrāyāś caiva kārtsnyena pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahāmune ।।
kimarthaṃ tau samutpannau kṛṣṇasaṃkarṣaṇāv ubhau ।
vasudevasutau vīrau sthitau nandagṛhe mune ।।
niḥsāre mṛtyuloke asmin duḥkhaprāye aticañcale ।
jalabudbudasaṃkāśe bhairave lomaharṣaṇe ।।
viṇmūtrapicchalaṃ kaṣṭaṃ saṃkaṭaṃ duḥkhadāyakam ।
kathaṃ ghorataraṃ teṣāṃ garbhavāsam arocata ।।
yāni karmāṇi cakrus te samutpannā mahītale ।
vistareṇa mune tāni brūhi no vadatāṃ vara ।।
samagraṃ caritaṃ teṣām adbhutaṃ cātimānuṣam ।
kathaṃ sa bhagavān devaḥ sureśaḥ surasattamaḥ ।।
vasudevakule dhīmān vāsudevatvam āgataḥ ।
amaraiś cāvṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyakṛdbhir alaṃkṛtam ।।
devalokaṃ kim utsṛjya martyaloka ihāgataḥ ।
devamānuṣayor netā dyor bhuvaḥ prabhavo avyayaḥ ।।
kimarthaṃ divyam ātmānaṃ mānuṣeṣu nyayojayat ।
yaś cakraṃ vartayaty eko mānuṣāṇām anāmayam ।।
sa mānuṣye kathaṃ buddhiṃ cakre cakragadādharaḥ ।
gopāyanaṃ yaḥ kurute jagataḥ sārvabhautikam ।।
sa kathaṃ gāṃ gato viṣṇur gopatvam akarot prabhuḥ ।
mahābhūtāni bhūtātmā yo dadhāra cakāra ca ।।
śrīgarbhaḥ sa kathaṃ garbhe striyā bhūcarayā dhṛtaḥ ।
yena lokān kramair jitvā tribhir vai tridaśepsayā ।।
sthāpitā jagato mārgās trivargāś cābhavaṃs trayaḥ ।
yo antakāle jagat pītvā kṛtvā toyamayaṃ vapuḥ ।।
lokam ekārṇavaṃ cakre dṛśyādṛśyena cātmanā ।
yaḥ purāṇaḥ purāṇātmā vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ ।।
viṣāṇāgreṇa vasudhām ujjahārārisūdanaḥ ।
yaḥ purā puruhūtārthe trailokyam idam avyayam ।।
dadau jitvā vasumatīṃ surāṇāṃ surasattamaḥ ।
yena saiṃhavapuḥ kṛtvā dvidhā kṛtvā ca tat punaḥ ।।
pūrvadaityo mahāvīryo hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ ।
yaḥ purā hy analo bhūtvā aurvaḥ saṃvartako vibhuḥ ।।
pātālastho arṇavarasaṃ papau toyamayaṃ hariḥ ।
sahasracaraṇaṃ brahma sahasrāṃśusahasradam ।।
sahasraśirasaṃ devaṃ yam āhur vai yuge yuge ।
nābhyāṃ padmaṃ samudbhūtaṃ yasya paitāmahaṃ gṛham ।।
ekārṇave nāgaloke saddhiraṇmayapaṅkajam ।
yena te nihatā daityāḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye ।।
yena devamayaṃ kṛtvā sarvāyudhadharaṃ vapuḥ ।
guhāsaṃsthena cotsiktaḥ kālanemir nipātitaḥ ।।
uttarānte samudrasya kṣīrodasyāmṛtodadhau ।
yaḥ śete śāśvataṃ yogam āsthāya timiraṃ mahat ।।
surāraṇī garbham adhatta divyaṃ 
tapaḥprakarṣād aditiḥ purāṇam 
śakraṃ ca yo daityagaṇāvaruddhaṃ 
garbhāvadhānena kṛtaṃ cakāra 
padāni yo yogamayāni kṛtvā 
cakāra daityān salileśayasthān 
kṛtvā ca devāṃs tridaśeśvarāṃs tu 
cakre sureśaṃ puruhūtam eva 
gārhapatyena vidhinā anvāhāryeṇa karmaṇā ।
agnim āhavanīyaṃ ca vedaṃ dīkṣāṃ samid dhruvam ।।
prokṣaṇīyaṃ sruvaṃ caiva āvabhṛthyaṃ tathaiva ca ।
avākpāṇis tu yaś cakre havyabhāgabhujas tathā ।।
havyādāṃś ca surāṃś cakre kavyādāṃś ca pitṝn atha ।
bhogārthe yajñavidhinā ayojayad yajñakarmaṇi ।।
pātrāṇi dakṣiṇāṃ dīkṣāṃ carūṃś colūkhalāni ca ।
yūpaṃ samit sruvaṃ somaṃ pavitrān paridhīn api ।।
yajñiyāni ca dravyāṇi camasāṃś ca tathāparān ।
sadasyān yajamānāṃś ca medhādīṃś ca kratūttamān ।।
vibabhāja purā yas tu pārameṣṭhyena karmaṇā ।
yugānurūpaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā lokān anuparākramāt ।।
kṣaṇā nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāś ca kalās traikālyam eva ca ।
muhūrtās tithayo māsā dinaṃ saṃvatsaras tathā ।।
ṛtavaḥ kālayogāś ca pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ triṣu ।
āyuḥkṣetrāṇy upacayo lakṣaṇaṃ rūpasauṣṭhavam ।।
trayo lokās trayo devās traividyaṃ pāvakās trayaḥ ।
traikālyaṃ trīṇi karmāṇi trayo varṇās trayo guṇāḥ ।।
sṛṣṭā lokāḥ purā sarve yenānantena karmaṇā ।
sarvabhūtagataḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtaguṇātmakaḥ ।।
nṛṇām indriyapūrveṇa yogena ramate ca yaḥ ।
gatāgatābhyāṃ yogena ya eva vidhir īśvaraḥ ।।
yo gatir dharmayuktānām agatiḥ pāpakarmaṇām ।
cāturvarṇyasya prabhavaś cāturvarṇyasya rakṣitā ।।
cāturvidyasya yo vettā cāturāśramyasaṃśrayaḥ ।
digantaraṃ nabho bhūmir vāyur vāpi vibhāvasuḥ ।।
candrasūryamayaṃ jyotir yugeśaḥ kṣaṇadācaraḥ ।
yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate jyotir yaḥ paraṃ śrūyate tapaḥ ।।
yaṃ paraṃ prāhur aparaṃ yaḥ paraḥ paramātmavān ।
ādityānāṃ tu yo devo yaś ca daityāntako vibhuḥ ।।
yugānteṣv antako yaś ca yaś ca lokāntakāntakaḥ ।
setur yo lokasetūnāṃ medhyo yo medhyakarmaṇām ।।
vedyo yo vedaviduṣāṃ prabhur yaḥ prabhavātmanām ।
somabhūtaś ca saumyānām agnibhūto agnivarcasām ।।
yaḥ śakrāṇām īśabhūtas tapobhūtas tapasvinām ।
vinayo nayavṛttīnāṃ tejas tejasvinām api ।।
vigraho vigrahārhāṇāṃ gatir gatimatām api ।
ākāśaprabhavo vāyur vāyoḥ prāṇād dhutāśanaḥ ।।
divo hutāśanaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇo agnir madhusūdanaḥ ।
rasāc choṇitasaṃbhūtiḥ śoṇitān māṃsam ucyate ।।
māṃsāt tu medaso janma medaso asthi nirucyate ।
asthno majjā samabhavan majjātaḥ śukrasaṃbhavaḥ ।।
śukrād garbhaḥ samabhavad rasamūlena karmaṇā ।
tatrāpāṃ prathamo bhāgaḥ sa saumyo rāśir ucyate ।।
garbhoṣmasaṃbhavo jñeyo dvitīyo rāśir ucyate ।
śukraṃ somātmakaṃ vidyād ārtavaṃ pāvakātmakam ।।
bhāvā rasānugāś caiṣāṃ bīje ca śaśipāvakau ।
kaphavarge bhavec chukraṃ pittavarge ca śoṇitam ।।
kaphasya hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ nābhyāṃ pittaṃ pratiṣṭhitam ।
dehasya madhye hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ tan manasaḥ smṛtam ।।
nābhikoṣṭhāntaraṃ yat tu tatra devo hutāśanaḥ ।
manaḥ prajāpatir jñeyaḥ kaphaḥ somo vibhāvyate ।।
pittam agniḥ smṛtaṃ tv evam agnisomātmakaṃ jagat ।
evaṃ pravartite garbhe vardhite arbudasaṃnibhe ।।
vāyuḥ praveśaṃ saṃcakre saṃgataḥ paramātmanaḥ ।
sa pañcadhā śarīrastho bhidyate vartate punaḥ ।।
prāṇāpānau samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca ।
prāṇo asya paramātmānaṃ vardhayan parivartate ।।
apānaḥ paścimaṃ kāyam udāno ardhaṃ śarīriṇaḥ ।
vyānas tu vyāpyate yena samānaḥ saṃnivartate ।।
bhūtāvāptis tatas tasya jāyetendriyagocarā ।
pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam ।।
tasyendriyaniviṣṭāni svaṃ svaṃ bhāgaṃ pracakrire ।
pārthivaṃ deham āhus tu prāṇātmānaṃ ca mārutam ।।
chidrāṇy ākāśayonīni jalāt srāvaḥ pravartate ।
jyotiś cakṣūṃṣi tejaś ca ātmā teṣāṃ manaḥ smṛtam ।।
grāmāś ca viṣayāś caiva yasya vīryāt pravartitāḥ ।
ity etān puruṣaḥ sarvān sṛjaṃl lokān sanātanaḥ ।।
naidhane asmin kathaṃ loke naratvaṃ viṣṇur āgataḥ ।
eṣa naḥ saṃśayo brahmann eṣa no vismayo mahān ।।
kathaṃ gatir gatimatām āpanno mānuṣīṃ tanum ।
āścaryaṃ paramaṃ viṣṇur devair daityaiś ca kathyate ।।
viṣṇor utpattim āścaryaṃ kathayasva mahāmune ।
prakhyātabalavīryasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ ।।
karmaṇāścaryabhūtasya viṣṇos tattvam ihocyatām ।
kathaṃ sa devo devānām ārtihā puruṣottamaḥ ।।
sarvavyāpī jagannāthaḥ sarvalokamaheśvaraḥ ।
sargasthityantakṛd devaḥ sarvalokasukhāvahaḥ ।।
akṣayaḥ śāśvato anantaḥ kṣayavṛddhivivarjitaḥ ।
nirlepo nirguṇaḥ sūkṣmo nirvikāro nirañjanaḥ ।।
sarvopādhivinirmuktaḥ sattāmātravyavasthitaḥ ।
avikārī vibhur nityaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ ।।
acalo nirmalo vyāpī nityatṛpto nirāśrayaḥ ।
viśuddhaṃ śrūyate yasya haritvaṃ ca kṛte yuge ।।
vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ ca deveṣu kṛṣṇatvaṃ mānuṣeṣu ca ।
īśvarasya hi tasyemāṃ gahanāṃ karmaṇo gatim ।।
samatītāṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca śrotum icchā pravartate ।
avyakto vyaktaliṅgastho ya eṣa bhagavān prabhuḥ ।।
nārāyaṇo hy anantātmā prabhavo avyaya eva ca ।
eṣa nārāyaṇo bhūtvā harir āsīt sanātanaḥ ।।
brahmā śakraś ca rudraś ca dharmaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ ।
pradhānātmā purā hy eṣa brahmāṇam asṛjat prabhuḥ ।।
so asṛjat pūrvapuruṣaḥ purā kalpe prajāpatīn ।
evaṃ sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvalokamaheśvaraḥ ।
kimarthaṃ martyaloke asmin yāto yadukule hariḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
namaskṛtvā sureśāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave ।
puruṣāya purāṇāya śāśvatāyāvyayāya ca ।।
caturvyūhātmane tasmai nirguṇāya guṇāya ca ।
variṣṭhāya gariṣṭhāya vareṇyāyāmitāya ca ।।
yajñāṅgāyākhilāṅgāya devādyair īpsitāya ca ।
yasmād aṇutaraṃ nāsti yasmān nāsti bṛhattaram ।।
yena viśvam idaṃ vyāptam ajena sacarācaram ।
āvirbhāvatirobhāva- dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavilakṣaṇam ।।
vadanti yat sṛṣṭam iti tathaivāpy upasaṃhṛtam ।
brahmaṇe cādidevāya namaskṛtya samādhinā ।।
avikārāya śuddhāya nityāya paramātmane ।
sadaikarūparūpāya jiṣṇave viṣṇave namaḥ ।।
namo hiraṇyagarbhāya haraye śaṃkarāya ca ।
vāsudevāya tārāya sargasthityantakāriṇe ।।
ekānekasvarūpāya sthūlasūkṣmātmane namaḥ ।
avyaktavyaktabhūtāya viṣṇave muktihetave ।।
sargasthitivināśānāṃ jagato yo jaganmayaḥ ।
mūlabhūto namas tasmai viṣṇave paramātmane ।।
ādhārabhūtaṃ viśvasyāpy aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām ।
praṇamya sarvabhūtastham acyutaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
jñānasvarūpam atyantaṃ nirmalaṃ paramārthataḥ ।
tam evārthasvarūpeṇa bhrāntidarśanataḥ sthitam ।।
viṣṇuṃ grasiṣṇuṃ viśvasya sthitisarge tathā prabhum ।
anādiṃ jagatām īśam ajam akṣayam avyayam ।।
kathayāmi yathā pūrvaṃ yakṣādyair munisattamaiḥ ।
pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān abjayoniḥ pitāmahaḥ ।।
ṛksāmāny udgiran vaktrair yaḥ punāti jagattrayam ।
praṇipatya tatheśānam ekārṇavavinirgatam ।।
yasyāsuragaṇā yajñān vilumpanti na yājinām ।
pravakṣyāmi mataṃ kṛtsnaṃ brahmaṇo avyaktajanmanaḥ ।।
yena sṛṣṭiṃ samuddiśya dharmādyāḥ prakaṭīkṛtāḥ ।
āpo nārā iti proktā munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ ।।
ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
sa devo bhagavān sarvaṃ vyāpya nārāyaṇo vibhuḥ ।।
caturdhā saṃsthito brahmā saguṇo nirguṇas tathā ।
ekā mūrtir anuddeśyā śuklāṃ paśyanti tāṃ budhāḥ ।।
jvālāmālāvanaddhāṅgī niṣṭhā sā yogināṃ parā ।
dūrasthā cāntikasthā ca vijñeyā sā guṇātigā ।।
vāsudevābhidhānāsau nirmamatvena dṛśyate ।
rūpavarṇādayas tasyā na bhāvāḥ kalpanāmayāḥ ।।
āste ca sā sadā śuddhā supratiṣṭhaikarūpiṇī ।
dvitīyā pṛthivīṃ mūrdhnā śeṣākhyā dhārayaty adhaḥ ।।
tāmasī sā samākhyātā tiryaktvaṃ samupāgatā ।
tṛtīyā karma kurute prajāpālanatatparā ।।
sattvodriktā tu sā jñeyā dharmasaṃsthānakāriṇī ।
caturthī jalamadhyasthā śete pannagatalpagā ।।
rajas tasyā guṇaḥ sargaṃ sā karoti sadaiva hi ।
yā tṛtīyā harer mūrtiḥ prajāpālanatatparā ।।
sā tu dharmavyavasthānaṃ karoti niyataṃ bhuvi ।
proddhatān asurān hanti dharmavyucchittikāriṇaḥ ।।
pāti devān sagandharvān dharmarakṣāparāyaṇān ।
yadā yadā ca dharmasya glāniḥ samupajāyate ।।
abhyutthānam adharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjaty asau ।
bhūtvā purā varāheṇa tuṇḍenāpo nirasya ca ।।
ekayā daṃṣṭrayotkhātā nalinīva vasuṃdharā ।
kṛtvā nṛsiṃharūpaṃ ca hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ ।।
vipracittimukhāś cānye dānavā vinipātitāḥ ।
vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya baliṃ saṃyamya māyayā ।।
trailokyaṃ krāntavān eva vinirjitya diteḥ sutān ।
bhṛgor vaṃśe samutpanno jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān ।।
jaghāna kṣatriyān rāmaḥ pitur vadham anusmaran ।
tathātritanayo bhūtvā dattātreyaḥ pratāpavān ।।
yogam aṣṭāṅgam ācakhyāv alarkāya mahātmane ।
rāmo dāśarathir bhūtvā sa tu devaḥ pratāpavān ।।
jaghāna rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye trailokyasya bhayaṃkaram ।
yadā caikārṇave supto devadevo jagatpatiḥ ।।
sahasrayugaparyantaṃ nāgaparyaṅkago vibhuḥ ।
yoganidrāṃ samāsthāya sve mahimni vyavasthitaḥ ।।
trailokyam udare kṛtvā jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
janalokagataiḥ siddhaiḥ stūyamāno maharṣibhiḥ ।।
tasya nābhau samutpannaṃ padmaṃ dikpattramaṇḍitam ।
marutkiñjalkasaṃyuktaṃ gṛhaṃ paitāmahaṃ varam ।।
yatra brahmā samutpanno devadevaś caturmukhaḥ ।
tadā karṇamalodbhūtau dānavau madhukaiṭabhau ।।
mahābalau mahāvīryau brahmāṇaṃ hantum udyatau ।
jaghāna tau durādharṣau utthāya śayanodadheḥ ।।
evamādīṃs tathaivānyān asaṃkhyātum ihotsahe ।
avatāro hy ajasyeha māthuraḥ sāṃpratas tv ayam ।।
iti sā sāttvikī mūrtir avatāraṃ karoti ca ।
pradyumneti samākhyātā rakṣākarmaṇy avasthitā ।।
devatve atha manuṣyatve tiryagyonau ca saṃsthitā ।
gṛhṇāti tatsvabhāvaś ca vāsudevecchayā sadā ।।
