mātṛbhāvaṃ vihāyaiva kimarthaṃ vartase anyathā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sā cāsmai kathayām āsa na putras tvaṃ mameti vai ।
tanayaṃ tvām ayaṃ viṣṇor hṛtavān kālaśambaraḥ ।।
kṣiptaḥ samudre matsyasya saṃprāpto jaṭharān mayā ।
sā tu roditi te mātā kāntādyāpy ativatsalā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktaḥ śambaraṃ yuddhe pradyumnaḥ sa samāhvayat ।
krodhākulīkṛtamanā yuyudhe ca mahābalaḥ ।।
hatvā sainyam aśeṣaṃ tu tasya daityasya mādhaviḥ ।
sapta māyā vyatikramya māyāṃ saṃyuyuje aṣṭamīm ।।
tayā jaghāna taṃ daityaṃ māyayā kālaśambaram ।
utpatya ca tayā sārdham ājagāma pituḥ puram ।।
antaḥpure ca patitaṃ māyāvatyā samanvitam ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭasaṃkalpā babhūvuḥ kṛṣṇayoṣitaḥ ।
rukmiṇī cābravīt premṇā āsaktadṛṣṭir aninditā ।।
{rukmiṇy uvāca 
dhanyāyāḥ khalv ayaṃ putro vartate navayauvane ।
asmin vayasi putro me pradyumno yadi jīvati ।।
sabhāgyā jananī vatsa tvayā kāpi vibhūṣitā ।
athavā yādṛśaḥ sneho mama yādṛg vapuś ca te ।
harer apatyaṃ suvyaktaṃ bhavān vatsa bhaviṣyati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
etasminn antare prāptaḥ saha kṛṣṇena nāradaḥ ।
antaḥpuravarāṃ devīṃ rukmiṇīṃ prāha harṣitaḥ ।।
{śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca 
eṣa te tanayaḥ subhru hatvā śambaram āgataḥ ।
hṛto yenābhavat pūrvaṃ putras te sūtikāgṛhāt ।।
iyaṃ māyāvatī bhāryā tanayasyāsya te satī ।
śambarasya na bhāryeyaṃ śrūyatām atra kāraṇam ।।
manmathe tu gate nāśaṃ tadudbhavaparāyaṇā ।
śambaraṃ mohayām āsa māyārūpeṇa rukmiṇi ।।
vivāhādyupabhogeṣu rūpaṃ māyāmayaṃ śubham ।
darśayām āsa daityasya tasyeyaṃ madirekṣaṇā ।।
kāmo avatīrṇaḥ putras te tasyeyaṃ dayitā ratiḥ ।
viśaṅkā nātra kartavyā snuṣeyaṃ tava śobhanā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tato harṣasamāviṣṭau rukmiṇīkeśavau tadā ।
nagarī ca samastā sā sādhu sādhv ity abhāṣata ।।
ciraṃ naṣṭena putreṇa saṃgatāṃ prekṣya rukmiṇīm ।
avāpa vismayaṃ sarvo dvāravatyāṃ janas tadā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
cārudeṣṇaṃ sudeṣṇaṃ ca cārudehaṃ ca śobhanam ।
suṣeṇaṃ cāruguptaṃ ca bhadracāruṃ tathāparam ।।
cāruvindaṃ sucāruṃ ca cāruṃ ca balināṃ varam ।
rukmiṇy ajanayat putrān kanyāṃ cārumatīṃ tathā ।।
anyāś ca bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasya babhūvuḥ sapta śobhanāḥ ।
kālindī mitravindā ca satyā nāgnajitī tathā ।।
devī jāmbavatī cāpi sadā tuṣṭā tu rohiṇī ।
madrarājasutā cānyā suśīlā śīlamaṇḍalā ।।
sātrājitī satyabhāmā lakṣmaṇā cāruhāsinī ।
ṣoḍaśātra sahasrāṇi strīṇām anyāni cakriṇaḥ ।।
pradyumno api mahāvīryo rukmiṇas tanayāṃ śubhām ।
svayaṃvarasthāṃ jagrāha sāpi taṃ tanayaṃ hareḥ ।।
tasyām asyābhavat putro mahābalaparākramaḥ ।
aniruddho raṇe ruddho vīryodadhir ariṃdamaḥ ।।
tasyāpi rukmiṇaḥ pautrīṃ varayām āsa keśavaḥ ।
dauhitrāya dadau rukmī spardhayann api śauriṇā ।।
tasyā vivāhe rāmādyā yādavā hariṇā saha ।
rukmiṇo nagaraṃ jagmur nāmnā bhojakaṭaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
vivāhe tatra nirvṛtte prādyumneḥ sumahātmanaḥ ।
kaliṅgarājapramukhā rukmiṇaṃ vākyam abruvan ।।
{kaliṅgādaya ūcuḥ 
anakṣajño halī dyūte tathāsya vyasanaṃ mahat ।
tan nayāmo balaṃ tasmād dyūtenaiva mahādyute ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tatheti tān āha nṛpān rukmī balasamanvitaḥ ।
sabhāyāṃ saha rāmeṇa cakre dyūtaṃ ca vai tadā ।।
sahasram ekaṃ niṣkāṇāṃ rukmiṇā vijito balaḥ ।
dvitīye divase cānyat sahasraṃ rukmiṇā jitaḥ ।।
tato daśa sahasrāṇi niṣkāṇāṃ paṇam ādade ।
balabhadraprapannāni rukmī dyūtavidāṃ varaḥ ।।
tato jahāsātha balaṃ kaliṅgādhipatir dvijāḥ ।
dantān vidarśayan mūḍho rukmī cāha madoddhataḥ ।।
{rukmy uvāca 
avidyo ayaṃ mahādyūte balabhadraḥ parājitaḥ ।
mṛṣaivākṣāvalepatvād yo ayaṃ mene akṣakovidam ।।
dṛṣṭvā kaliṅgarājaṃ tu prakāśadaśanānanam ।
rukmiṇaṃ cāpi durvākyaṃ kopaṃ cakre halāyudhaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tataḥ kopaparītātmā niṣkakoṭiṃ halāyudhaḥ ।
glahaṃ jagrāha rukmī ca tatas tv akṣān apātayat ।।
ajayad baladevo atha prāhoccais taṃ jitaṃ mayā ।
mameti rukmī prāhoccair alīkoktair alaṃ balam ।।
tvayokto ayaṃ glahaḥ satyaṃ na mamaiṣo anumoditaḥ ।
evaṃ tvayā ced vijitaṃ na mayā vijitaṃ katham ।।
tato antarikṣe vāg uccaiḥ prāha gambhīranādinī ।
baladevasya taṃ kopaṃ vardhayantī mahātmanaḥ ।।
{ākāśavāg uvāca 
jitaṃ tu baladevena rukmiṇā bhāṣitaṃ mṛṣā ।
anuktvā vacanaṃ kiṃcit kṛtaṃ bhavati karmaṇā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tato balaḥ samutthāya krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ ।
jaghānāṣṭāpadenaiva rukmiṇaṃ sa mahābalaḥ ।।
kaliṅgarājaṃ cādāya visphurantaṃ balād balaḥ ।
babhañja dantān kupito yaiḥ prakāśaṃ jahāsa saḥ ।।
ākṛṣya ca mahāstambhaṃ jātarūpamayaṃ balaḥ ।
jaghāna ye tatpakṣās tān bhūbhṛtaḥ kupito balaḥ ।।
tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ palāyanaparaṃ dvijāḥ ।
tad rājamaṇḍalaṃ sarvaṃ babhūva kupite bale ।।
balena nihataṃ śrutvā rukmiṇaṃ madhusūdanaḥ ।
novāca vacanaṃ kiṃcid rukmiṇībalayor bhayāt ।।
tato aniruddham ādāya kṛtodvāhaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
dvārakām ājagāmātha yaducakraṃ sakeśavam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
dvāravatyāṃ tataḥ śauriṃ śakras tribhuvaneśvaraḥ ।
ājagāmātha munayo mattairāvatapṛṣṭhagaḥ ।।
praviśya dvārakāṃ so atha samīpe ca hares tadā ।
kathayām āsa daityasya narakasya viceṣṭitam ।।
{indra uvāca 
tvayā nāthena devānāṃ manuṣyatve api tiṣṭhatā ।
praśamaṃ sarvaduḥkhāni nītāni madhusūdana ।।
tapasvijanarakṣāyai so ariṣṭo dhenukas tathā ।
pralambādyās tathā keśī te sarve nihatās tvayā ।।
kaṃsaḥ kuvalayāpīḍaḥ pūtanā bālaghātinī ।
nāśaṃ nītās tvayā sarve ye anye jagadupadravāḥ ।।
yuṣmaddordaṇḍasaṃbuddhi- paritrāte jagattraye ।
yajñe yajñahaviḥ prāśya tṛptiṃ yānti divaukasaḥ ।।
so ahaṃ sāṃpratam āyāto yannimittaṃ janārdana ।
tac chrutvā tatpratīkāra- prayatnaṃ kartum arhasi ।।
bhaumo ayaṃ narako nāma prāgjyotiṣapureśvaraḥ ।
karoti sarvabhūtānām apaghātam ariṃdama ।।
devasiddhasurādīnāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca janārdana ।
hatvā tu so asuraḥ kanyā rurodha nijamandire ।।
chattraṃ yat salilasrāvi taj jahāra pracetasaḥ ।
mandarasya tathā śṛṅgaṃ hṛtavān maṇiparvatam ।।
amṛtasrāviṇī divye mātur me amṛtakuṇḍale ।
jahāra so asuro adityā vāñchaty airāvataṃ dvipam ।।
durnītam etad govinda mayā tasya tavoditam ।
yad atra pratikartavyaṃ tat svayaṃ parimṛśyatām ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
iti śrutvā smitaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān devakīsutaḥ ।
gṛhītvā vāsavaṃ haste samuttasthau varāsanāt ।।
saṃcintitam upāruhya garuḍaṃ gaganecaram ।
satyabhāmāṃ samāropya yayau prāgjyotiṣaṃ puram ।।
āruhyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ śakro api tridaśālayam ।
tato jagāma sumanāḥ paśyatāṃ dvārakaukasām ।।
prāgjyotiṣapurasyāsya samantāc chatayojanam ।
ācitaṃ bhairavaiḥ pāśaiḥ parasainyanivāraṇe ।।
tāṃś ciccheda hariḥ pāśān kṣiptvā cakraṃ sudarśanam ।
tato muraḥ samuttasthau taṃ jaghāna ca keśavaḥ ।।
muros tu tanayān sapta sahasrās tāṃs tato hariḥ ।
cakradhārāgninirdagdhāṃś cakāra śalabhān iva ।।
hatvā muraṃ hayagrīvaṃ tathā pañcajanaṃ dvijāḥ ।
prāgjyotiṣapuraṃ dhīmāṃs tvarāvān samupādravat ।।
narakenāsya tatrābhūn mahāsainyena saṃyugaḥ ।
kṛṣṇasya yatra govindo jaghne daityān sahasraśaḥ ।।
śastrāstravarṣaṃ muñcantaṃ sa bhaumaṃ narakaṃ balī ।
kṣiptvā cakraṃ dvidhā cakre cakrī daiteyacakrahā ।।
hate tu narake bhūmir gṛhītvāditikuṇḍale ।
upatasthe jagannāthaṃ vākyaṃ cedam athābravīt ।।
{dharaṇy uvāca 
yadāham uddhṛtā nātha tvayā śūkaramūrtinā ।
tvatsaṃsparśabhavaḥ putras tadāyaṃ mayy ajāyata ।।
so ayaṃ tvayaiva datto me tvayaiva vinipātitaḥ ।
gṛhāṇa kuṇḍale ceme pālayāsya ca saṃtatim ।।
bhārāvataraṇārthāya mamaiva bhagavān imam ।
aṃśena lokam āyātaḥ prasādasumukha prabho ।।
tvaṃ kartā ca vikartā ca saṃhartā prabhavo avyayaḥ ।
jagatsvarūpo yaś ca tvaṃ stūyase acyuta kiṃ mayā ।।
vyāpī vyāpyaḥ kriyā kartā kāryaṃ ca bhagavān sadā ।
sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā stūyase acyuta kiṃ mayā ।।
paramātmā tvam ātmā ca bhūtātmā cāvyayo bhavān ।
yadā tadā stutir nāsti kimarthaṃ te pravartatām ।।
prasīda sarvabhūtātman narakena kṛtaṃ ca yat ।
tat kṣamyatām adoṣāya matsutaḥ sa nipātitaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tatheti coktvā dharaṇīṃ bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ ।
ratnāni narakāvāsāj jagrāha munisattamāḥ ।।
kanyāpure sa kanyānāṃ ṣoḍaśātulavikramaḥ ।
śatādhikāni dadṛśe sahasrāṇi dvijottamāḥ ।।
caturdaṃṣṭrān gajāṃś cogrān ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi dṛṣṭavān ।
kāmbojānāṃ tathāśvānāṃ niyutāny ekaviṃśatim ।।
kanyās tāś ca tathā nāgāṃs tān aśvān dvārakāṃ purīm ।
prāpayām āsa govindaḥ sadyo narakakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
dadṛśe vāruṇaṃ chattraṃ tathaiva maṇiparvatam ।
āropayām āsa harir garuḍe patageśvare ।।
āruhya ca svayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmāsahāyavān ।
adityāḥ kuṇḍale dātuṃ jagāma tridaśālayam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
garuḍo vāruṇaṃ chattraṃ tathaiva maṇiparvatam ।
sabhāryaṃ ca hṛṣīkeśaṃ līlayaiva vahan yayau ।।
tataḥ śaṅkham upādhmāya svargadvāraṃ gato hariḥ ।
upatasthus tato devāḥ sārghapātrā janārdanam ।।
sa devair arcitaḥ kṛṣṇo devamātur niveśanam ।
sitābhraśikharākāraṃ praviśya dadṛśe aditim ।।
sa tāṃ praṇamya śakreṇa sahitaḥ kuṇḍalottame ।
dadau narakanāśaṃ ca śaśaṃsāsyai janārdanaḥ ।।
tataḥ prītā jaganmātā dhātāraṃ jagatāṃ harim ।
tuṣṭāvāditir avyagraṃ kṛtvā tatpravaṇaṃ manaḥ ।।
{aditir uvāca 
namas te puṇḍarīkākṣa bhaktānām abhayaṃkara ।
sanātanātman bhūtātman sarvātman bhūtabhāvana ।।
praṇetar manaso buddher indriyāṇāṃ guṇātmaka ।
sitadīrghādiniḥśeṣa- kalpanāparivarjita ।।
janmādibhir asaṃspṛṣṭa- svapnādivārivarjitaḥ ।
saṃdhyā rātrir ahar bhūmir gaganaṃ vāyur ambu ca ।।
hutāśano mano buddhir bhūtādis tvaṃ tathācyuta ।
sṛṣṭisthitivināśānāṃ kartā kartṛpatir bhavān ।।
brahmaviṣṇuśivākhyābhir ātmamūrtibhir īśvaraḥ ।
māyābhir etad vyāptaṃ te jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam ।।
anātmany ātmavijñānaṃ sā te māyā janārdana ।
ahaṃ mameti bhāvo atra yayā samupajāyate ।।
saṃsāramadhye māyāyās tavaitan nātha ceṣṭitam ।
yaiḥ svadharmaparair nātha narair ārādhito bhavān ।।
te taranty akhilām etāṃ māyām ātmavimuktaye ।
brahmādyāḥ sakalā devā manuṣyāḥ paśavas tathā ।।
viṣṇumāyāmahāvarte mohāndhatamasāvṛtāḥ ।
ārādhya tvām abhīpsante kāmān ātmabhavakṣaye ।।
pade te puruṣā baddhā māyayā bhagavaṃs tava ।
mayā tvaṃ putrakāminyā vairipakṣakṣayāya ca ।।
ārādhito na mokṣāya māyāvilasitaṃ hi tat ।
kaupīnācchādanaprāyā vāñchā kalpadrumād api ।।
jāyate yad apuṇyānāṃ so aparādhaḥ svadoṣajaḥ ।
tat prasīdākhilajagan- māyāmohakarāvyaya ।।
ajñānaṃ jñānasadbhāva bhūtabhūteśa nāśaya ।
namas te cakrahastāya śārṅgahastāya te namaḥ ।।
gadāhastāya te viṣṇo śaṅkhahastāya te namaḥ ।
etat paśyāmi te rūpaṃ sthūlacihnopaśobhitam ।
na jānāmi paraṃ yat te prasīda parameśvara ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
adityaivaṃ stuto viṣṇuḥ prahasyāha surāraṇim ।।
{śrīkṛṣṇa uvāca 
mātā devi tvam asmākaṃ prasīda varadā bhava ।।
{aditir uvāca 
evam astu yathecchā te tvam aśeṣasurāsuraiḥ ।
ajeyaḥ puruṣavyāghra martyaloke bhaviṣyasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tato anantaram evāsya śakrāṇīsahitāṃ ditim ।
satyabhāmā praṇamyāha prasīdeti punaḥ punaḥ ।।
{aditir uvāca 
matprasādān na te subhru jarā vairūpyam eva ca ।
bhaviṣyaty anavadyāṅgi sarvakāmā bhaviṣyasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
adityā tu kṛtānujño devarājo janārdanam ।
yathāvat pūjayām āsa bahumānapuraḥsaram ।।
tato dadarśa kṛṣṇo api satyabhāmāsahāyavān ।
devodyānāni sarvāṇi nandanādīni sattamāḥ ।।
dadarśa ca sugandhāḍhyaṃ mañjarīpuñjadhāriṇam ।
śaityāhlādakaraṃ divyaṃ tāmrapallavaśobhitam ।।
mathyamāne amṛte jātaṃ jātarūpasamaprabham ।
pārijātaṃ jagannāthaḥ keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā prāha govindaṃ satyabhāmā dvijottamāḥ ।।
{satyabhāmovāca 
kasmān na dvārakām eṣa nīyate kṛṣṇa pādapaḥ ।
yadi te tad vacaḥ satyaṃ satyātyarthaṃ priyeti me ।।
madgṛhe niṣkuṭārthāya tad ayaṃ nīyatāṃ taruḥ ।
na me jāmbavatī tādṛg abhīṣṭā na ca rukmiṇī ।।
satye yathā tvam ity uktaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇāsakṛt priyam ।
satyaṃ tad yadi govinda nopacārakṛtaṃ vacaḥ ।।
tad astu pārijāto ayaṃ mama gehavibhūṣaṇam ।
bibhratī pārijātasya keśapāśena mañjarīm ।
sapatnīnām ahaṃ madhye śobheyam iti kāmaye ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktaḥ sa prahasyainaṃ pārijātaṃ garutmati ।
āropayām āsa haris tam ūcur vanarakṣiṇaḥ ।।
{vanapālā ūcuḥ 
bhoḥ śacī devarājasya mahiṣī tatparigraham ।
pārijātaṃ na govinda hartum arhasi pādapam ।।
śacīvibhūṣaṇārthāya devair amṛtamanthane ।
utpādito ayaṃ na kṣemī gṛhītvainaṃ gamiṣyasi ।।
mauḍhyāt prārthayase kṣemī gṛhītvainaṃ ca ko vrajet ।
avaśyam asya devendro vikṛtiṃ kṛṣṇa yāsyati ।।
vajrodyatakaraṃ śakram anuyāsyanti cāmarāḥ ।
tad alaṃ sakalair devair vigraheṇa tavācyuta ।
vipākakaṭu yat karma na tac chaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity ukte tair uvācaitān satyabhāmātikopinī ।।
{satyabhāmovāca 
kā śacī pārijātasya ko vā śakraḥ surādhipaḥ ।
sāmānyaḥ sarvalokānāṃ yady eṣo amṛtamanthane ।।
samutpannaḥ purā kasmād eko gṛhṇāti vāsavaḥ ।
yathā surā yathā cendur yathā śrīr vanarakṣiṇaḥ ।।
sāmānyaḥ sarvalokasya pārijātas tathā drumaḥ ।
bhartṛbāhumahāgarvād ruṇaddhy enam atho śacī ।।
tat kathyatāṃ drutaṃ gatvā paulomyā vacanaṃ mama ।
satyabhāmā vadaty evaṃ bhartṛgarvoddhatākṣaram ।।
yadi tvaṃ dayitā bhartur yadi tasya priyā hy asi ।
madbhartur harato vṛkṣaṃ tat kāraya nivāraṇam ।।
jānāmi te patiṃ śakraṃ jānāmi tridaśeśvaram ।
pārijātaṃ tathāpy enaṃ mānuṣī hārayāmi te ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktā rakṣiṇo gatvā proccaiḥ procur yathoditam ।
śacī cotsāhayām āsa tridaśādhipatiṃ patim ।।
tataḥ samastadevānāṃ sainyaiḥ parivṛto harim ।
pravṛktaḥ pārijātārtham indro yodhayituṃ dvijāḥ ।।
tataḥ parighanistriṃśa- gadāśūladharāyudhāḥ ।
babhūvus tridaśāḥ sajjāḥ śakre vajrakare sthite ।।
tato nirīkṣya govindo nāgarājopari sthitam ।
śakraṃ devaparīvāraṃ yuddhāya samupasthitam ।।
cakāra śaṅkhanirghoṣaṃ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan ।
mumoca ca śaravrātaṃ sahasrāyutasaṃmitam ।।
tato diśo nabhaś caiva dṛṣṭvā śaraśatācitam ।
mumucus tridaśāḥ sarve śastrāṇy astrāṇy anekaśaḥ ।।
ekaikam astraṃ śastraṃ ca devair muktaṃ sahasradhā ।
ciccheda līlayaiveśo jagatāṃ madhusūdanaḥ ।।
pāśaṃ salilarājasya samākṛṣyoragāśanaḥ ।
cacāla khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛttvā bālapannagadehavat ।।
yamena prahitaṃ daṇḍaṃ gadāprakṣepakhaṇḍitam ।
pṛthivyāṃ pātayām āsa bhagavān devakīsutaḥ ।।
śibikāṃ ca dhaneśasya cakreṇa tilaśo vibhuḥ ।
cakāra śaurir arkendū dṛṣṭipātahataujasau ।।
nīto agniḥ śataśo bāṇair drāvitā vasavo diśaḥ ।
cakravicchinnaśūlāgrā rudrā bhuvi nipātitāḥ ।।
sādhyā viśve ca maruto gandharvāś caiva sāyakaiḥ ।
śārṅgiṇā preritāḥ sarve vyomni śālmalitūlavat ।।
garuḍaś cāpi vaktreṇa pakṣābhyāṃ ca nakhāṅkuraiḥ ।
bhakṣayann ahanad devān dānavāṃś ca sadā khagaḥ ।।
tataḥ śarasahasreṇa devendramadhusūdanau ।
parasparaṃ vavarṣāte dhārābhir iva toyadau ।।
airāvatena garuḍo yuyudhe tatra saṃkule ।
devaiḥ sametair yuyudhe śakreṇa ca janārdanaḥ ।।
chinneṣu śīryamāṇeṣu śastreṣv astreṣu satvaram ।
jagrāha vāsavo vajraṃ kṛṣṇaś cakraṃ sudarśanam ।।
tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram ।
vajracakradharau dṛṣṭvā devarājajanārdanau ।।
kṣiptaṃ vajram athendreṇa jagrāha bhagavān hariḥ ।
na mumoca tadā cakraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt ।।
pranaṣṭavajraṃ devendraṃ garuḍakṣatavāhanam ।
satyabhāmābravīd vākyaṃ palāyanaparāyaṇam ।।
{satyabhāmovāca 
trailokyeśvara no yuktaṃ śacībhartuḥ palāyanam ।
pārijātasragābhogāt tvām upasthāsyate śacī ।।
kīdṛśaṃ deva rājyaṃ te pārijātasragujjvalām ।
apaśyato yathāpūrvaṃ praṇayābhyāgatāṃ śacīm ।।
alaṃ śakra prayāsena na vrīḍāṃ yātum arhasi ।
nīyatāṃ pārijāto ayaṃ devāḥ santu gatavyathāḥ ।।
patigarvāvalepena bahumānapuraḥsaram ।
na dadarśa gṛhāyātām upacāreṇa māṃ śacī ।।
strītvād agurucittāhaṃ svabhartuḥ ślāghanāparā ।
tataḥ kṛtavatī śakra bhavatā saha vigraham ।।
tad alaṃ pārijātena parasvena hṛtena vā ।
rūpeṇa yaśasā caiva bhavet strī kā na garvitā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity ukte vai nivavṛte devarājas tayā dvijāḥ ।
prāha cainām alaṃ caṇḍi sakhi khedātivistaraiḥ ।।
na cāpi sargasaṃhāra- sthitikartākhilasya yaḥ ।
jitasya tena me vrīḍā jāyate viśvarūpiṇā ।।
yasmiñ jagat sakalam etad anādimadhye 
yasmād yataś ca na bhaviṣyati sarvabhūtāt 
tenodbhavapralayapālanakāraṇena 
vrīḍā kathaṃ bhavati devi nirākṛtasya 
sakalabhuvanamūrtir alpā susūkṣmā 
viditasakalavedair jñāyate yasya nānyaiḥ 
tam ajam akṛtam īśaṃ śāśvataṃ svecchayainaṃ 
jagadupakṛtim ādyaṃ ko vijetuṃ samarthaḥ 
{vyāsa uvāca 
saṃstuto bhagavān itthaṃ devarājena keśavaḥ ।
prahasya bhāvagambhīram uvācedaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
devarājo bhavān indro vayaṃ martyā jagatpate ।
kṣantavyaṃ bhavataivaitad aparādhakṛtaṃ mama ।।
pārijātataruś cāyaṃ nīyatām ucitāspadam ।
gṛhīto ayaṃ mayā śakra satyāvacanakāraṇāt ।।
vajraṃ cedaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ yaṣṭavyaṃ prahitaṃ tvayā ।
tavaivaitat praharaṇaṃ śakra vairividāraṇam ।।
{śakra uvāca 
vimohayasi mām īśa martyo aham iti kiṃ vadan ।
jānīmas tvāṃ bhagavato anantasaukhyavido vayam ।।
yo asi so asi jagannātha pravṛttau nātha saṃsthitaḥ ।
jagataḥ śalyaniṣkarṣaṃ karoṣy asurasūdana ।।
nīyatāṃ pārijāto ayaṃ kṛṣṇa dvāravatīṃ purīm ।
martyaloke tvayā mukte nāyaṃ saṃsthāsyate bhuvi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tathety uktvā tu devendram ājagāma bhuvaṃ hariḥ ।
prayuktaiḥ siddhagandharvaiḥ stūyamānas tv atharṣibhiḥ ।।
jagāma kṛṣṇaḥ sahasā gṛhītvā pādapottamam ।
tataḥ śaṅkham upādhmāya dvārakopari saṃsthitaḥ ।।
harṣam utpādayām āsa dvārakāvāsināṃ dvijāḥ ।
avatīryātha garuḍāt satyabhāmāsahāyavān ।।
niṣkuṭe sthāpayām āsa pārijātaṃ mahātarum ।
yam abhyetya janaḥ sarvo jātiṃ smarati paurvikīm ।।
vāsyate yasya puṣpāṇāṃ gandhenorvī triyojanam ।
tatas te yādavāḥ sarve devagandhān amānuṣān ।।
dadṛśuḥ pādape tasmin kurvato mukhadarśanam ।
kiṃkaraiḥ samupānītaṃ hastyaśvādi tato dhanam ।।
striyaś ca kṛṣṇo jagrāha narakasya parigrahāt ।
tataḥ kāle śubhe prāpta upayeme janārdanaḥ ।।
tāḥ kanyā narakāvāsāt sarvato yāḥ samāhṛtāḥ ।
ekasminn eva govindaḥ kālenāsāṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
jagrāha vidhivat pāṇīn pṛthagdehe svadharmataḥ ।
ṣoḍaśa strīsahasrāṇi śatam ekaṃ tathādhikam ।।
tāvanti cakre rūpāṇi bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ ।
ekaikaśaś ca tāḥ kanyā menire madhusūdanam ।।
mamaiva pāṇigrahaṇaṃ govindaḥ kṛtavān iti ।
niśāsu jagataḥ sraṣṭā tāsāṃ geheṣu keśavaḥ ।
uvāsa viprāḥ sarvāsāṃ viśvarūpadharo hariḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
pradyumnādyā hareḥ putrā rukmiṇyāṃ kathitā dvijāḥ ।
bhānvādikāṃś ca vai putrān satyabhāmā vyajāyata ।।
dīptimantaḥ prapakṣādyā rohiṇyās tanayā hareḥ ।
babhūvur jāmbavatyāś ca sāmbādyā bāhuśālinaḥ ।।
tanayā bhadravindādyā nāgnajityāṃ mahābalāḥ ।
saṃgrāmajitpradhānās tu śaibyāyāṃ cābhavan sutāḥ ।।
vṛkādyās tu sutā mādrī gātravatpramukhān sutān ।
avāpa lakṣmaṇā putrān kālindyāś ca śrutādayaḥ ।।
anyāsāṃ caiva bhāryāṇāṃ samutpannāni cakriṇaḥ ।
aṣṭāyutāni putrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śataṃ tathā ।।
pradyumnaḥ pramukhas teṣāṃ rukmiṇyās tu sutas tataḥ ।
pradyumnād aniruddho abhūd vajras tasmād ajāyata ।।
aniruddho raṇe ruddho baleḥ pautrīṃ mahābalaḥ ।
bāṇasya tanayām ūṣām upayeme dvijottamāḥ ।।
yatra yuddham abhūd ghoraṃ hariśaṃkarayor mahat ।
chinnaṃ sahasraṃ bāhūnāṃ yatra bāṇasya cakriṇā ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathaṃ yuddham abhūd brahmann uṣārthe harakṛṣṇayoḥ ।
kathaṃ kṣayaṃ ca bāṇasya bāhūnāṃ kṛtavān hariḥ ।।
etat sarvaṃ mahābhāga vaktum arhasi no akhilam ।
mahat kautūhalaṃ jātaṃ śrotum etāṃ kathāṃ śubhām ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
uṣā bāṇasutā viprāḥ pārvatīṃ śaṃbhunā saha ।
krīḍantīm upalakṣyoccaiḥ spṛhāṃ cakre tadā svayam ।
tataḥ sakalacittajñā gaurī tām āha bhāminīm ।।
{gaury uvāca 
alam ity anutāpena bhartrā tvam api raṃsyase ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktā sā tadā cakre kadeti matim ātmanaḥ ।
ko vā bhartā mamety enāṃ punar apy āha pārvatī ।।
{pārvaty uvāca 
vaiśākhe śukladvādaśyāṃ svapne yo abhibhavaṃ tava ।
kariṣyati sa te bhartā rājaputri bhaviṣyati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tasyāṃ tithau pumān svapne yathā devyā udīritaḥ ।
tathaivābhibhavaṃ cakre rāgaṃ cakre ca tatra sā ।
tataḥ prabuddhā puruṣam apaśyantī tam utsukā ।।
{uṣovāca 
kva gato asīti nirlajjā dvijāś coktavatī sakhīm ।
bāṇasya mantrī kumbhāṇḍaś citralekhā tu tatsutā ।।
tasyāḥ sakhy abhavat sā ca prāha ko ayaṃ tvayocyate ।
yadā lajjākulā nāsya kathayām āsa sā sakhī ।।
tadā viśvāsam ānīya sarvam evānvavedayat ।
viditāyāṃ tu tām āha punar ūṣā yathoditam ।
devyā tathaiva tatprāptau yo abhyupāyaḥ kuruṣva tam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tataḥ paṭe surān daityān gandharvāṃś ca pradhānataḥ ।
manuṣyāṃś cābhilikhyāsau citralekhāpy adarśayat ।।
apāsya sā tu gandharvāṃs tathoragasurāsurān ।
manuṣyeṣu dadau dṛṣṭiṃ teṣv apy andhakavṛṣṇiṣu ।।
kṛṣṇarāmau vilokyāsīt subhrūr lajjāyatekṣaṇā ।
pradyumnadarśane vrīḍā- dṛṣṭiṃ ninye tato dvijāḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvāniruddhaṃ ca tato lajjā kvāpi nirākṛtā ।
so ayaṃ so ayaṃ mamety ukte tayā sā yogagāminī ।
yayau dvāravatīm ūṣāṃ samāśvāsya tataḥ sakhī ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
bāṇo api praṇipatyāgre tataś cāha trilocanam ।।
{bāṇa uvāca 
deva bāhusahasreṇa nirviṇṇo ahaṃ vināhavam ।
kaccin mamaiṣāṃ bāhūnāṃ sāphalyakaraṇo raṇaḥ ।
bhaviṣyati vinā yuddhaṃ bhārāya mama kiṃ bhujaiḥ ।।
{śaṃkara uvāca 
mayūradhvajabhaṅgas te yadā bāṇa bhaviṣyati ।
piśitāśijanānandaṃ prāpsyasi tvaṃ tadā raṇam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tataḥ praṇamya muditaḥ śaṃbhum abhyāgato gṛhāt ।
bhagnaṃ dhvajam athālokya hṛṣṭo harṣaṃ paraṃ yayau ।।
etasminn eva kāle tu yogavidyābalena tam ।
aniruddham athāninye citralekhā varā sakhī ।।
kanyāntaḥpuramadhye taṃ ramamāṇaṃ sahoṣayā ।
vijñāya rakṣiṇo gatvā śaśaṃsur daityabhūpateḥ ।।
vyādiṣṭaṃ kiṃkarāṇāṃ tu sainyaṃ tena mahātmanā ।
jaghāna parighaṃ lauham ādāya paravīrahā ।।
hateṣu teṣu bāṇo api rathasthas tadvadhodyataḥ ।
yudhyamāno yathāśakti yadā vīreṇa nirjitaḥ ।।
māyayā yuyudhe tena sa tadā mantracoditaḥ ।
tataś ca pannagāstreṇa babandha yadunandanam ।।
dvāravatyāṃ kva yāto asāv aniruddheti jalpatām ।
yadūnām ācacakṣe taṃ baddhaṃ bāṇena nāradaḥ ।।
taṃ śoṇitapure śrutvā nītaṃ vidyāvidagdhayā ।
yoṣitā pratyayaṃ jagmur yādavā nāma vairiti ।।
tato garuḍam āruhya smṛtamātrāgataṃ hariḥ ।
balapradyumnasahito bāṇasya prayayau puram ।।
purīpraveśe pramathair yuddham āsīn mahābalaiḥ ।
yayau bāṇapurābhyāśaṃ nītvā tān saṃkṣayaṃ hariḥ ।।
tatas tripādas triśirā jvaro māheśvaro mahān ।
bāṇarakṣārtham atyarthaṃ yuyudhe śārṅgadhanvanā ।।
tadbhasmasparśasaṃbhūta- tāpaṃ kṛṣṇāṅgasaṃgamāt ।
avāpa baladevo api samaṃ saṃmīlitekṣaṇaḥ ।।
tataḥ saṃyudhyamānas tu saha devena śārṅgiṇā ।
vaiṣṇavena jvareṇāśu kṛṣṇadehān nirākṛtaḥ ।।
nārāyaṇabhujāghāta- paripīḍanavihvalam ।
taṃ vīkṣya kṣamyatām asyety āha devaḥ pitāmahaḥ ।।
tataś ca kṣāntam eveti procya taṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jvaram ।
ātmany eva layaṃ ninye bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ ।।
mama tvayā samaṃ yuddhaṃ ye smariṣyanti mānavāḥ ।
vijvarās te bhaviṣyantīty uktvā cainaṃ yayau hariḥ ।।
tato agnīn bhagavān pañca jitvā nītvā kṣayaṃ tathā ।
dānavānāṃ balaṃ viṣṇuś cūrṇayām āsa līlayā ।।
tataḥ samastasainyena daiteyānāṃ baleḥ sutaḥ ।
yuyudhe śaṃkaraś caiva kārttikeyaś ca śauriṇā ।।
hariśaṃkarayor yuddham atīvāsīt sudāruṇam ।
cukṣubhuḥ sakalā lokāḥ śastrāstrair bahudhārditāḥ ।।
pralayo ayam aśeṣasya jagato nūnam āgataḥ ।
menire tridaśā yatra vartamāne mahāhave ।।
jṛmbhaṇāstreṇa govindo jṛmbhayām āsa śaṃkaram ।
tataḥ praṇeśur daiteyāḥ pramathāś ca samantataḥ ।।
jṛmbhābhibhūtaś ca haro rathopastham upāviśat ।
na śaśāka tadā yoddhuṃ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā ।।
garuḍakṣatabāhuś ca pradyumnāstreṇa pīḍitaḥ ।
kṛṣṇahuṃkāranirdhūta- śaktiś cāpayayau guhaḥ ।।
jṛmbhite śaṃkare naṣṭe daityasainye guhe jite ।
nīte pramathasainye ca saṃkṣayaṃ śārṅgadhanvanā ।।
nandīśasaṃgṛhītāśvam adhirūḍho mahāratham ।
bāṇas tatrāyayau yoddhuṃ kṛṣṇakārṣṇibalaiḥ saha ।।
balabhadro mahāvīryo bāṇasainyam anekadhā ।
vivyādha bāṇaiḥ pradyumno dharmataś cāpalāyataḥ ।।
ākṛṣya lāṅgalāgreṇa muśalena ca pothitam ।
balaṃ balena dadṛśe bāṇo bāṇaiś ca cakriṇaḥ ।।
tataḥ kṛṣṇasya bāṇena yuddham āsīt samāsataḥ ।
parasparaṃ tu saṃdīptān kāyatrāṇavibhedinaḥ ।।
kṛṣṇaś ciccheda bāṇāṃs tān bāṇena prahitāñ śaraiḥ ।
bibheda keśavaṃ bāṇo bāṇaṃ vivyādha cakradhṛk ।।
mumucāte tathāstrāṇi bāṇakṛṣṇau jigīṣayā ।
parasparakṣatiparau parighāṃś ca tato dvijāḥ ।।
chidyamāneṣv aśeṣeṣu śastreṣv astre ca sīdati ।
prācuryeṇa harir bāṇaṃ hantuṃ cakre tato manaḥ ।।
tato arkaśatasaṃbhūta- tejasā sadṛśadyuti ।
jagrāha daityacakrārir hariś cakraṃ sudarśanam ।।
muñcato bāṇanāśāya tac cakraṃ madhuvidviṣaḥ ।
nagnā daiteyavidyābhūt koṭarī purato hareḥ ।।
tām agrato harir dṛṣṭvā mīlitākṣaḥ sudarśanam ।
mumoca bāṇam uddiśya chettuṃ bāhuvanaṃ ripoḥ ।।
krameṇāsya tu bāhūnāṃ bāṇasyācyutacoditam ।
chedaṃ cakre asurasyāśu śastrāstrakṣepaṇād drutam ।।
chinne bāhuvane tat tu karasthaṃ madhusūdanaḥ ।
mumukṣur bāṇanāśāya vijñātas tripuradviṣā ।।
sa utpatyāha govindaṃ sāmapūrvam umāpatiḥ ।
vilokya bāṇaṃ dordaṇḍa- cchedāsṛksrāvavarṣiṇam ।।
{rudra uvāca 
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa jagannātha jāne tvāṃ puruṣottamam ।
pareśaṃ paramātmānam anādinidhanaṃ param ।।
devatiryaṅmanuṣyeṣu śarīragrahaṇātmikā ।
līleyaṃ tava ceṣṭā hi daityānāṃ vadhalakṣaṇā ।।
tat prasīdābhayaṃ dattaṃ bāṇasyāsya mayā prabho ।
tat tvayā nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yan mayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ ।।
asmatsaṃśrayavṛddho ayaṃ nāparādhas tavāvyaya ।
mayā dattavaro daityas tatas tvāṃ kṣamayāmy aham ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktaḥ prāha govindaḥ śūlapāṇim umāpatim ।
prasannavadano bhūtvā gatāmarṣo asuraṃ prati ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
yuṣmaddattavaro bāṇo jīvatād eṣa śaṃkara ।
tvadvākyagauravād etan mayā cakraṃ nivartitam ।।
tvayā yad abhayaṃ dattaṃ tad dattam abhayaṃ mayā ।
matto avibhinnam ātmānaṃ draṣṭum arhasi śaṃkara ।।
yo ahaṃ sa tvaṃ jagac cedaṃ sadevāsuramānuṣam ।
avidyāmohitātmānaḥ puruṣā bhinnadarśinaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktvā prayayau kṛṣṇaḥ prādyumnir yatra tiṣṭhati ।
tadbandhaphaṇino neśur garuḍānilaśoṣitāḥ ।।
tato aniruddham āropya sapatnīkaṃ garutmati ।
ājagmur dvārakāṃ rāma- kārṣṇidāmodarāḥ purīm ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
cakre karma mahac chaurir bibhrad yo mānuṣīṃ tanum ।
jigāya śakraṃ śarvaṃ ca sarvadevāṃś ca līlayā ।।
yac cānyad akarot karma divyaceṣṭāvighātakṛt ।
kathyatāṃ tan muniśreṣṭha paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
gadato me muniśreṣṭhāḥ śrūyatām idam ādarāt ।
narāvatāre kṛṣṇena dagdhā vārāṇasī yathā ।।
pauṇḍrako vāsudevaś ca vāsudevo abhavad bhuvi ।
avatīrṇas tvam ity ukto janair ajñānamohitaiḥ ।।
sa mene vāsudevo aham avatīrṇo mahītale ।
naṣṭasmṛtis tataḥ sarvaṃ viṣṇucihnam acīkarat ।
dūtaṃ ca preṣayām āsa sa kṛṣṇāya dvijottamāḥ ।।
{dūta uvāca 
tyaktvā cakrādikaṃ cihnaṃ madīyaṃ nāma mātmanaḥ ।
vāsudevātmakaṃ mūḍha muktvā sarvam aśeṣataḥ ।।
ātmano jīvitārthaṃ ca tathā me praṇatiṃ vraja ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktaḥ sa prahasyaiva dūtaṃ prāha janārdanaḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
nijacihnam ahaṃ cakraṃ samutsrakṣye tvayīti vai ।
vācyaś ca pauṇḍrako gatvā tvayā dūta vaco mama ।।
jñātas tvadvākyasadbhāvo yat kāryaṃ tad vidhīyatām ।
gṛhītacihna evāham āgamiṣyāmi te puram ।।
utsrakṣyāmi ca te cakraṃ nijacihnam asaṃśayam ।
ājñāpūrvaṃ ca yad idam āgaccheti tvayoditam ।।
saṃpādayiṣye śvas tubhyaṃ tad apy eṣo avilambitam ।
śaraṇaṃ te samabhyetya kartāsmi nṛpate tathā ।
yathā tvatto bhayaṃ bhūyo naiva kiṃcid bhaviṣyati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity ukte apagate dūte saṃsmṛtyābhyāgataṃ hariḥ ।
garutmantaṃ samāruhya tvaritaṃ tatpuraṃ yayau ।।
tasyāpi keśavodyogaṃ śrutvā kāśipatis tadā ।
sarvasainyaparīvāra- pārṣṇigrāham upāyayau ।।
tato balena mahatā kāśirājabalena ca ।
pauṇḍrako vāsudevo asau keśavābhimukhaṃ yayau ।।
taṃ dadarśa harir dūrād udārasyandane sthitam ।
cakraśaṅkhagadāpāṇiṃ pāṇinā vidhṛtāmbujam ।।
sragdharaṃ dhṛtaśārṅgaṃ ca suparṇaracanādhvajam ।
vakṣasthalakṛtaṃ cāsya śrīvatsaṃ dadṛśe hariḥ ।।
kirīṭakuṇḍaladharaṃ pītavāsaḥsamanvitam ।
dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhāvagambhīraṃ jahāsa madhusūdanaḥ ।।
yuyudhe ca balenāsya hastyaśvabalinā dvijāḥ ।
nistriṃśarṣṭigadāśūla- śaktikārmukaśālinā ।।
kṣaṇena śārṅganirmuktaiḥ śarair agnividāraṇaiḥ ।
gadācakrātipātaiś ca sūdayām āsa tadbalam ।।
kāśirājabalaṃ caiva kṣayaṃ nītvā janārdanaḥ ।
uvāca pauṇḍrakaṃ mūḍham ātmacihnopalakṣaṇam ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
pauṇḍrakoktaṃ tvayā yat tad dūtavaktreṇa māṃ prati ।
samutsṛjeti cihnāni tat te saṃpādayāmy aham ।।
cakram etat samutsṛṣṭaṃ gadeyaṃ te visarjitā ।
garutmān eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ samārohatu te dhvajam ।।
ity uccārya vimuktena cakreṇāsau vidāritaḥ ।
pothito gadayā bhagno garutmāṃś ca garutmatā ।।
tato hāhākṛte loke kāśīnām adhipas tadā ।
yuyudhe vāsudevena mitrasyāpacitau sthitaḥ ।।
tataḥ śārṅgavinirmuktaiś chittvā tasya śaraiḥ śiraḥ ।
kāśipuryāṃ sa cikṣepa kurvaṃl lokasya vismayam ।।
hatvā tu pauṇḍrakaṃ śauriḥ kāśirājaṃ ca sānugam ।
reme dvāravatīṃ prāpto amaraḥ svargagato yathā ।।
tacchiraḥ patitaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā kāśipateḥ pure ।
janaḥ kim etad ity āha kenety atyantavismitaḥ ।।
jñātvā taṃ vāsudevena hataṃ tasya sutas tataḥ ।
purohitena sahitas toṣayām āsa śaṃkaram ।।
avimukte mahākṣetre toṣitas tena śaṃkaraḥ ।
varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti tadā taṃ provāca nṛpātmajam ।।
sa vavre bhagavan kṛtyā pitur hantur vadhāya me ।
samuttiṣṭhatu kṛṣṇasya tvatprasādān maheśvara ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ukte dakṣiṇāgner anantaram ।
mahākṛtyā samuttasthau tasyaivāgniniveśanāt ।।
tato jvālākarālāsyā jvalatkeśakalāpikā ।
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti kupitā kṛtvā dvāravatīṃ yayau ।।
tām avekṣya janaḥ sarvo raudrāṃ vikṛtalocanām ।
yayau śaraṇyaṃ jagatāṃ śaraṇaṃ madhusūdanam ।।
{janā ūcuḥ 
kāśirājasuteneyam ārādhya vṛṣabhadhvajam ।
utpāditā mahākṛtyā vadhāya tava cakriṇaḥ ।
jahi kṛtyām imām ugrāṃ vahnijvālājaṭākulām ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
cakram utsṛṣṭam akṣeṣu krīḍāsaktena līlayā ।
tad agnimālājaṭilaṃ jvālodgārātibhīṣaṇam ।।
kṛtyām anujagāmāśu viṣṇucakraṃ sudarśanam ।
tataḥ sā cakravidhvastā kṛtyā māheśvarī tadā ।।
jagāma veginī vegāt tad apy anujagāma tām ।
kṛtyā vārāṇasīm eva praviveśa tvarānvitā ।।
viṣṇucakrapratihata- prabhāvā munisattamāḥ ।
tataḥ kāśibalaṃ bhūri pramathānāṃ tathā balam ।।
samastaśastrāstrayutaṃ cakrasyābhimukhaṃ yayau ।
śastrāstramokṣabahulaṃ dagdhvā tad balam ojasā ।।
kṛtvākṣemām aśeṣāṃ tāṃ purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ yayau ।
prabhūtabhṛtyapaurāṃ tāṃ sāśvamātaṅgamānavām ।।
aśeṣadurgakoṣṭhāṃ tāṃ durnirīkṣyāṃ surair api ।
jvālāparivṛtāśeṣa- gṛhaprākāratoraṇām ।।
dadāha tāṃ purīṃ cakraṃ sakalām eva satvaram ।
akṣīṇāmarṣam atyalpa- sādhyasādhananispṛham ।
tac cakraṃ prasphuraddīpti viṣṇor abhyāyayau karam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śrotum icchāmahe bhūyo balabhadrasya dhīmataḥ ।
mune parākramaṃ śauryaṃ tan no vyākhyātum arhasi ।।
yamunākarṣaṇādīni śrutāny asmābhir atra vai ।
tat kathyatāṃ mahābhāga yad anyat kṛtavān balaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ karma yad rāmeṇābhavat kṛtam ।
anantenāprameyena śeṣeṇa dharaṇībhṛtā ।।
duryodhanasya tanayāṃ svayaṃvarakṛtekṣaṇām ।
balād ādattavān vīraḥ sāmbo jāmbavatīsutaḥ ।।
tataḥ kruddhā mahāvīryāḥ karṇaduryodhanādayaḥ ।
bhīṣmadroṇādayaś caiva babandhur yudhi nirjitam ।।
tac chrutvā yādavāḥ sarve krodhaṃ duryodhanādiṣu ।
munayaḥ praticakruś ca tān vihantuṃ mahodyamam ।।
tān nivārya balaḥ prāha madalolākulākṣaram ।
mokṣyanti te madvacanād yāsyāmy eko hi kauravān ।।
baladevas tato gatvā nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam ।
bāhyopavanamadhye abhūn na viveśa ca tat puram ।।
balam āgatam ājñāya tadā duryodhanādayaḥ ।
gām argham udakaṃ caiva rāmāya pratyavedayan ।
gṛhītvā vidhivat sarvaṃ tatas tān āha kauravān ।।
{baladeva uvāca 
ājñāpayaty ugrasenaḥ sāmbam āśu vimuñcata ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tatas tadvacanaṃ śrutvā bhīṣmadroṇādayo dvijāḥ ।
karṇaduryodhanādyāś ca cukrudhur dvijasattamāḥ ।।
ūcuś ca kupitāḥ sarve bāhlikādyāś ca bhūmipāḥ ।
arājārhaṃ yador vaṃśam avekṣya muśalāyudham ।।
{kauravā ūcuḥ 
bho bhoḥ kim etad bhavatā balabhadreritaṃ vacaḥ ।
ājñāṃ kurukulotthānāṃ yādavaḥ kaḥ pradāsyati ।।
ugraseno api yady ājñāṃ kauravāṇāṃ pradāsyati ।
tad alaṃ pāṇḍuraiś chattrair nṛpayogyair alaṃkṛtaiḥ ।।
tad gaccha balabhadra tvaṃ sāmbam anyāyaceṣṭitam ।
vimokṣyāmo na bhavato nograsenasya śāsanāt ।।
praṇatir yā kṛtāsmākaṃ mānyānāṃ kukurāndhakaiḥ ।
na nāma sā kṛtā keyam ājñā svāmini bhṛtyataḥ ।।
garvam āropitā yūyaṃ samānāsanabhojanaiḥ ।
ko doṣo bhavatāṃ nītir yat prīṇāty anapekṣitā ।।
asmābhir arcyo bhavatā yo ayaṃ bala niveditaḥ ।
premṇaiva na tad asmākaṃ kulād yuṣmatkulocitam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktvā kuravaḥ sarve nāmuñcanta hareḥ sutam ।
kṛtaikaniścayāḥ sarve viviśur gajasāhvayam ।।
mattaḥ kopena cāghūrṇaṃ tato adhikṣepajanmanā ।
utthāya pārṣṇyā vasudhāṃ jaghāna sa halāyudhaḥ ।।
tato vidāritā pṛthvī pārṣṇighātān mahātmanaḥ ।
āsphoṭayām āsa tadā diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan ।
uvāca cātitāmrākṣo bhrukuṭīkuṭilānanaḥ ।।
{baladeva uvāca 
aho mahāvalepo ayam asārāṇāṃ durātmanām ।
kauravāṇām ādhipatyam asmākaṃ kila kālajam ।।
ugrasenasya ye nājñāṃ manyante cāpy alaṅghanām ।
ājñāṃ pratīcched dharmeṇa saha devaiḥ śacīpatiḥ ।।
sadādhyāste sudharmāṃ tām ugrasenaḥ śacīpateḥ ।
dhiṅ manuṣyaśatocchiṣṭe tuṣṭir eṣāṃ nṛpāsane ।।
pārijātataroḥ puṣpa- mañjarīr vanitājanaḥ ।
bibharti yasya bhṛtyānāṃ so apy eṣāṃ na mahīpatiḥ ।।
samastabhūbhujāṃ nātha ugrasenaḥ sa tiṣṭhatu ।
adya niṣkauravām urvīṃ kṛtvā yāsyāmi tāṃ purīm ।।
karṇaṃ duryodhanaṃ droṇam adya bhīṣmaṃ sabāhlikam ।
duḥśāsanādīn bhūriṃ ca bhūriśravasam eva ca ।।
somadattaṃ śalaṃ bhīmam arjunaṃ sayudhiṣṭhiram ।
yamajau kauravāṃś cānyān hanyāṃ sāśvarathadvipān ।।
vīram ādāya taṃ sāmbaṃ sapatnīkaṃ tataḥ purīm ।
dvārakām ugrasenādīn gatvā drakṣyāmi bāndhavān ।।
athavā kauravādīnāṃ samastaiḥ kurubhiḥ saha ।
bhārāvataraṇe śīghraṃ devarājena coditaḥ ।।
bhāgīrathyāṃ kṣipāmy āśu nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktvā krodharaktākṣas tālāṅko adhomukhaṃ halam ।
prākāravapre vinyasya cakarṣa muśalāyudhaḥ ।।
āghūrṇitaṃ tat sahasā tato vai hastināpuram ।
dṛṣṭvā saṃkṣubdhahṛdayāś cukruśuḥ sarvakauravāḥ ।।
{kauravā ūcuḥ 
rāma rāma mahābāho kṣamyatāṃ kṣamyatāṃ tvayā ।
upasaṃhriyatāṃ kopaḥ prasīda muśalāyudha ।।
eṣa sāmbaḥ sapatnīkas tava niryātito bala ।
avijñātaprabhāvāṇāṃ kṣamyatām aparādhinām ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tato niryātayām āsuḥ sāmbaṃ patnyā samanvitam ।
niṣkramya svapurīṃ tūrṇaṃ kauravā munisattamāḥ ।।
bhīṣmadroṇakṛpādīnāṃ praṇamya vadatāṃ priyam ।
kṣāntam eva mayety āha balo balavatāṃ varaḥ ।।
adyāpy āghūrṇitākāraṃ lakṣyate tat puraṃ dvijāḥ ।
eṣa prabhāvo rāmasya balaśauryavato dvijāḥ ।।
tatas tu kauravāḥ sāmbaṃ saṃpūjya halinā saha ।
preṣayām āsur udvāha- dhanabhāryāsamanvitam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ sarve balasya balaśālinaḥ ।
kṛtaṃ yad anyad evābhūt tad api śrūyatāṃ dvijāḥ ।।
narakasyāsurendrasya devapakṣavirodhinaḥ ।
sakhābhavan mahāvīryo dvivido nāma vānaraḥ ।।
vairānubandhaṃ balavān sa cakāra surān prati ।।
{dvivida uvāca 
narakaṃ hatavān kṛṣṇo baladarpasamanvitam ।
kariṣye sarvadevānāṃ tasmād eṣa pratikriyām ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
yajñavidhvaṃsanaṃ kurvan martyalokakṣayaṃ tathā ।
tato vidhvaṃsayām āsa yajñān ajñānamohitaḥ ।।
bibheda sādhumaryādāṃ kṣayaṃ cakre ca dehinām ।
dadāha capalo deśaṃ puragrāmāntarāṇi ca ।।
kvacic ca parvatakṣepād grāmādīn samacūrṇayat ।
śailān utpāṭya toyeṣu mumocāmbunidhau tathā ।।
punaś cārṇavamadhyasthaḥ kṣobhayām āsa sāgaram ।
tenātikṣobhitaś cābdhir udvelo jāyate dvijāḥ ।।
plāvayaṃs tīrajān grāmān purādīn ativegavān ।
kāmarūpaṃ mahārūpaṃ kṛtvā sasyāny anekaśaḥ ।।
luṭhan bhramaṇasaṃmardaiḥ saṃcūrṇayati vānaraḥ ।
tena viprakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad etad durātmanā ।।
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāraṃ dvijāś cāsīt suduḥkhitam ।
kadācid raivatodyāne papau pānaṃ halāyudhaḥ ।।
revatī ca mahābhāgā tathaivānyā varastriyaḥ ।
udgīyamāno vilasal- lalanāmaulimadhyagaḥ ।।
reme yaduvaraśreṣṭhaḥ kubera iva mandare ।
tataḥ sa vānaro abhyetya gṛhītvā sīriṇo halam ।।
muśalaṃ ca cakārāsya saṃmukhaḥ sa viḍambanām ।
tathaiva yoṣitāṃ tāsāṃ jahāsābhimukhaṃ kapiḥ ।।
pānapūrṇāṃś ca karakāṃś cikṣepāhatya vai tadā ।
tataḥ kopaparītātmā bhartsayām āsa taṃ balam ।।
tathāpi tam avajñāya cakre kilakilādhvanim ।
tataḥ samutthāya balo jagṛhe muśalaṃ ruṣā ।।
so api śailaśilāṃ bhīmāṃ jagrāha plavagottamaḥ ।
cikṣepa ca sa tāṃ kṣiptāṃ muśalena sahasradhā ।।
bibheda yādavaśreṣṭhaḥ sā papāta mahītale ।
apatan muśalaṃ cāsau samullaṅghya plavaṃgamaḥ ।।
vegenāyamya roṣeṇa balenorasy atāḍayat ।
tato balena kopena muṣṭinā mūrdhni tāḍitaḥ ।।
papāta rudhirodgārī dvividaḥ kṣīṇajīvitaḥ ।
patatā taccharīreṇa gireḥ śṛṅgam aśīryata ।।
munayaḥ śatadhā vajri- vajreṇeva hi tāḍitam ।
puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ tato devā rāmasyopari cikṣipuḥ ।।
praśaśaṃsus tadābhyetya sādhv etat te mahat kṛtam ।
anena duṣṭakapinā daityapakṣopakāriṇā ।
jagan nirākṛtaṃ vīra diṣṭyā sa kṣayam āgataḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evaṃvidhāny anekāni baladevasya dhīmataḥ ।
karmāṇy aparimeyāni śeṣasya dharaṇībhṛtaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evaṃ daityavadhaṃ kṛṣṇo baladevasahāyavān ।
cakre duṣṭakṣitīśānāṃ tathaiva jagataḥ kṛte ।।
kṣiteś ca bhāraṃ bhagavān phālgunena samaṃ vibhuḥ ।
avatārayām āsa hariḥ samastākṣauhiṇīvadhāt ।।
kṛtvā bhārāvataraṇaṃ bhuvo hatvākhilān nṛpān ।
śāpavyājena viprāṇām upasaṃhṛtavān kulam ।।
utsṛjya dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇas tyaktvā mānuṣyam ātmabhūḥ ।
svāṃśo viṣṇumayaṃ sthānaṃ praviveśa punar nijam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
sa vipraśāpavyājena saṃjahre svakulaṃ katham ।
kathaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ deham utsasarja janārdanaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
viśvāmitras tathā kaṇvo nāradaś ca mahāmuniḥ ।
piṇḍārake mahātīrthe dṛṣṭā yadukumārakaiḥ ।।
tatas te yauvanonmattā bhāvikāryapracoditāḥ ।
sāmbaṃ jāmbavatīputraṃ bhūṣayitvā striyaṃ yathā ।
prasṛtās tān munīn ūcuḥ praṇipātapuraḥsaram ।।
{kumārā ūcuḥ 
iyaṃ strī putrakāmā tu prabho kiṃ janayiṣyati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
divyajñānopapannās te vipralabdhā kumārakaiḥ ।
śāpaṃ dadus tadā viprās teṣāṃ nāśāya suvratāḥ ।।
munayaḥ kupitāḥ procur muśalaṃ janayiṣyati ।
yenākhilakulotsādo yādavānāṃ bhaviṣyati ।।
ity uktās taiḥ kumārās ta ācacakṣur yathātatham ।
ugrasenāya muśalaṃ jajñe sāmbasya codarāt ।।
tad ugraseno muśalam ayaścūrṇam akārayat ।
jajñe tac cairakā cūrṇaṃ prakṣiptaṃ vai mahodadhau ।।
musalasyātha lauhasya cūrṇitasyāndhakair dvijāḥ ।
khaṇḍaṃ cūrṇayituṃ śekur naiva te tomarākṛti ।।
tad apy ambunidhau kṣiptaṃ matsyo jagrāha jālibhiḥ ।
ghātitasyodarāt tasya lubdho jagrāha taj jarā ।।
vijñātaparamārtho api bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ ।
naicchat tad anyathā kartuṃ vidhinā yat samāhṛtam ।।
devaiś ca prahito dūtaḥ praṇipatyāha keśavam ।
rahasy evam ahaṃ dūtaḥ prahito bhagavan suraiḥ ।।
vasvaśvimarudāditya- rudrasādhyādibhiḥ saha ।
vijñāpayati vaḥ śakras tad idaṃ śrūyatāṃ prabho ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
bhārāvataraṇārthāya varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam ।
bhagavān avatīrṇo atra tridaśaiḥ saṃprasāditaḥ ।।
durvṛttā nihatā daityā bhuvo bhāro avatāritaḥ ।
tvayā sanāthās tridaśā vrajantu tridiveśatām ।।
tad atītaṃ jagannātha varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam ।
idānīṃ gamyatāṃ svargo bhavatā yadi rocate ।।
devair vijñāpito devo apy athātraiva ratis tava ।
tat sthīyatāṃ yathākālam ākhyeyam anujīvibhiḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
yat tvam ātthākhilaṃ dūta vedmi caitad ahaṃ punaḥ ।
prārabdha eva hi mayā yādavānām api kṣayaḥ ।।
bhuvo nāmātibhāro ayaṃ yādavair anibarhitaiḥ ।
avatāraṃ karomy asya saptarātreṇa satvaraḥ ।।
yathāgṛhītaṃ cāmbhodhau hṛtvāhaṃ dvārakāṃ punaḥ ।
yādavān upasaṃhṛtya yāsyāmi tridaśālayam ।।
manuṣyadeham utsṛjya saṃkarṣaṇasahāyavān ।
prāpta evāsmi mantavyo devendreṇa tathā suraiḥ ।।
jarāsaṃdhādayo ye anye nihatā bhārahetavaḥ ।
kṣites tebhyaḥ sa bhāro hi yadūnāṃ samadhīyata ।।
tad etat sumahābhāram avatārya kṣiter aham ।
yāsyāmy amaralokasya pālanāya bravīhi tān ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity ukto vāsudevena devadūtaḥ praṇamya tam ।
dvijāḥ sa divyayā gatyā devarājāntikaṃ yayau ।।
bhagavān apy athotpātān divyān bhaumāntarikṣagān ।
dadarśa dvārakāpuryāṃ vināśāya divāniśam ।।
tān dṛṣṭvā yādavān āha paśyadhvam atidāruṇān ।
mahotpātāñ śamāyaiṣāṃ prabhāsaṃ yāma mā ciram ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
mahābhāgavataḥ prāha praṇipatyoddhavo harim ।।
{uddhava uvāca 
bhagavan yan mayā kāryaṃ tad ājñāpaya sāṃpratam ।
manye kulam idaṃ sarvaṃ bhagavān saṃhariṣyati ।
nāśāyāsya nimittāni kulasyācyuta lakṣaye ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
gaccha tvaṃ divyayā gatyā matprasādasamutthayā ।
badarīm āśramaṃ puṇyaṃ gandhamādanaparvate ।।
naranārāyaṇasthāne pavitritamahītale ।
manmanā matprasādena tatra siddhim avāpsyasi ।।
ahaṃ svargaṃ gamiṣyāmi upasaṃhṛtya vai kulam ।
dvārakāṃ ca mayā tyaktāṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktaḥ praṇipatyainaṃ jagāma sa tadoddhavaḥ ।
naranārāyaṇasthānaṃ keśavenānumoditaḥ ।।
tatas te yādavāḥ sarve rathān āruhya śīghragān ।
prabhāsaṃ prayayuḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣṇarāmādibhir dvijāḥ ।।
prāpya prabhāsaṃ prayatā prītās te kukkurāndhakāḥ ।
cakrus tatra surāpānaṃ vāsudevānumoditāḥ ।।
pibatāṃ tatra vai teṣāṃ saṃgharṣeṇa parasparam ।
yādavānāṃ tato jajñe kalahāgniḥ kṣayāvahaḥ ।।
jaghnuḥ parasparaṃ te tu śastrair daivabalāt kṛtāḥ ।
kṣīṇaśastrās tu jagṛhuḥ pratyāsannām athairakām ।।
erakā tu gṛhītā tair vajrabhūteva lakṣyate ।
tayā parasparaṃ jaghnuḥ saṃprahāraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ ।।
pradyumnasāmbapramukhāḥ kṛtavarmātha sātyakiḥ ।
aniruddhādayaś cānye pṛthur vipṛthur eva ca ।।
cāruvarmā sucāruś ca tathākrūrādayo dvijāḥ ।
erakārūpibhir vajrais te nijaghnuḥ parasparam ।।
nivārayām āsa harir yādavās te ca keśavam ।
sahāyaṃ menire prāptaṃ te nijaghnuḥ parasparam ।।
kṛṣṇo api kupitas teṣām erakāmuṣṭim ādade ।
vadhāya teṣāṃ muśalaṃ muṣṭiloham abhūt tadā ।।
jaghāna tena niḥśeṣān ātatāyī sa yādavān ।
jaghnuś ca sahasābhyetya tathānye tu parasparam ।।
tataś cārṇavamadhyena jaitro asau cakriṇo rathaḥ ।
paśyato dārukasyāśu hṛto aśvair dvijasattamāḥ ।।
cakraṃ gadā tathā śārṅgaṃ tūṇau śaṅkho asir eva ca ।
pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā jagmur ādityavartmanā ।।
kṣaṇamātreṇa vai tatra yādavānām abhūt kṣayaḥ ।
ṛte kṛṣṇaṃ mahābāhuṃ dārukaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
caṅkramyamāṇau tau rāmaṃ vṛkṣamūlakṛtāsanam ।
dadṛśāte mukhāc cāsya niṣkrāmantaṃ mahoragam ।।
niṣkramya sa mukhāt tasya mahābhogo bhujaṃgamaḥ ।
prayātaś cārṇavaṃ siddhaiḥ pūjyamānas tathoragaiḥ ।।
tam arghyam ādāya tadā jaladhiḥ saṃmukhaṃ yayau ।
praviveśa ca tattoyaṃ pūjitaḥ pannagottamaiḥ ।
dṛṣṭvā balasya niryāṇaṃ dārukaṃ prāha keśavaḥ ।।
{śrībhagavān uvāca 
idaṃ sarvaṃ tvam ācakṣva vasudevograsenayoḥ ।
niryāṇaṃ baladevasya yādavānāṃ tathā kṣayam ।।
yoge sthitvāham apy etat parityajya kalevaram ।
vācyaś ca dvārakāvāsī janaḥ sarvas tathāhukaḥ ।।
yathemāṃ nagarīṃ sarvāṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati ।
tasmād rathaiḥ susajjais tu pratīkṣyo hy arjunāgamaḥ ।।
na stheyaṃ dvārakāmadhye niṣkrānte tatra pāṇḍave ।
tenaiva saha gantavyaṃ yatra yāti sa kauravaḥ ।।
gatvā ca brūhi kaunteyam arjunaṃ vacanaṃ mama ।
pālanīyas tvayā śaktyā jano ayaṃ matparigrahaḥ ।।
ity arjunena sahito dvāravatyāṃ bhavāñ janam ।
gṛhītvā yātu vajraś ca yadurājo bhaviṣyati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity ukto dārukaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ ।
pradakṣiṇaṃ ca bahuśaḥ kṛtvā prāyād yathoditam ।।
sa ca gatvā tathā cakre dvārakāyāṃ tathārjunam ।
ānināya mahābuddhiṃ vajraṃ cakre tathā nṛpam ।।
bhagavān api govindo vāsudevātmakaṃ param ।
brahmātmani samāropya sarvabhūteṣv adhārayat ।।
sa mānayan dvijavaco durvāsā yad uvāca ha ।
yogayukto abhavat pādaṃ kṛtvā jānuni sattamāḥ ।।
saṃprāpto vai jarā nāma tadā tatra sa lubdhakaḥ ।
muśalaśeṣalohasya sāyakaṃ dhārayan param ।।
sa tatpādaṃ mṛgākāraṃ samavekṣya vyavasthitaḥ ।
tato vivyādha tenaiva tomareṇa dvijottamāḥ ।।
gataś ca dadṛśe tatra caturbāhudharaṃ naram ।
praṇipatyāha caivainaṃ prasīdeti punaḥ punaḥ ।।
ajānatā kṛtam idaṃ mayā hariṇaśaṅkayā ।
kṣamyatām ātmapāpena dagdhaṃ mā dagdhum arhasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tatas taṃ bhagavān āha nāsti te bhayam aṇv api ।
gaccha tvaṃ matprasādena lubdha svargeśvarāspadam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
vimānam āgataṃ sadyas tadvākyasamanantaram ।
āruhya prayayau svargaṃ lubdhakas tatprasādataḥ ।।
gate tasmin sa bhagavān saṃyojyātmānam ātmani ।
brahmabhūte avyaye acintye vāsudevamaye amale ।।
ajanmany ajare anāśiny aprameye akhilātmani ।
tyaktvā sa mānuṣaṃ deham avāpa trividhāṃ gatim ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
arjuno api tadānviṣya kṛṣṇarāmakalevare ।
saṃskāraṃ lambhayām āsa tathānyeṣām anukramāt ।।
aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ kathitā rukmiṇīpramukhās tu yāḥ ।
upagṛhya harer dehaṃ viviśus tā hutāśanam ।।
revatī caiva rāmasya deham āśliṣya sattamāḥ ।
viveśa jvalitaṃ vahniṃ tatsaṅgāhlādaśītalam ।।
ugrasenas tu tac chrutvā tathaivānakadundubhiḥ ।
devakī rohiṇī caiva viviśur jātavedasam ।।
tato arjunaḥ pretakāryaṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ yathāvidhi ।
niścakrāma janaṃ sarvaṃ gṛhītvā vajram eva ca ।।
dvāravatyā viniṣkrāntāḥ kṛṣṇapatnyaḥ sahasraśaḥ ।
vajraṃ janaṃ ca kaunteyaḥ pālayañ śanakair yayau ।।
sabhā sudharmā kṛṣṇena martyaloke samāhṛtā ।
svargaṃ jagāma bho viprāḥ pārijātaś ca pādapaḥ ।।
yasmin dine harir yāto divaṃ saṃtyajya medinīm ।
tasmin dine avatīrṇo ayaṃ kālakāyaḥ kaliḥ kila ।।
plāvayām āsa tāṃ śūnyāṃ dvārakāṃ ca mahodadhiḥ ।
yaduśreṣṭhagṛhaṃ tv ekaṃ nāplāvayata sāgaraḥ ।।
nātikrāmati bho viprās tad adyāpi mahodadhiḥ ।
nityaṃ saṃnihitas tatra bhagavān keśavo yataḥ ।।
tad atīva mahāpuṇyaṃ sarvapātakanāśanam ।
viṣṇukrīḍānvitaṃ sthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā pāpāt pramucyate ।।
pārthaḥ pañcanade deśe bahudhānyadhanānvite ।
cakāra vāsaṃ sarvasya janasya munisattamāḥ ।।
tato lobhaḥ samabhavat pārthenaikena dhanvinā ।
dṛṣṭvā striyo nīyamānā dasyūnāṃ nihateśvarāḥ ।।
tatas te pāpakarmāṇo lobhopahatacetasaḥ ।
ābhīrā mantrayām āsuḥ sametyātyantadurmadāḥ ।।
{ābhīrā ūcuḥ 
ayam eko arjuno dhanvī strījanaṃ nihateśvaram ।
nayaty asmān atikramya dhig etat kriyatāṃ balam ।।
hatvā garvasamārūḍho bhīṣmadroṇajayadrathān ।
karṇādīṃś ca na jānāti balaṃ grāmanivāsinām ।।
balajyeṣṭhān narān anyān grāmyāṃś caiva viśeṣataḥ ।
sarvān evāvajānāti kiṃ vo bahubhir uttaraiḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tato yaṣṭipraharaṇā dasyavo loṣṭahāriṇaḥ ।
sahasraśo abhyadhāvanta taṃ janaṃ nihateśvaram ।
tato nivṛttaḥ kaunteyaḥ prāhābhīrān hasann iva ।।
{arjuna uvāca 
nivartadhvam adharmajñā yadīto na mumūrṣavaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
avajñāya vacas tasya jagṛhus te tadā dhanam ।
strījanaṃ cāpi kaunteyād viṣvaksenaparigraham ।।
tato arjuno dhanur divyaṃ gāṇḍīvam ajaraṃ yudhi ।
āropayitum ārebhe na śaśāka sa vīryavān ।।
cakāra sajjaṃ kṛcchrāt tu tad abhūc chithilaṃ punaḥ ।
na sasmāra tathāstrāṇi cintayann api pāṇḍavaḥ ।।
śarān mumoca caiteṣu pārthaḥ śeṣān sa harṣitaḥ ।
na bhedaṃ te paraṃ cakrur astā gāṇḍīvadhanvanā ।।
vahninā cākṣayā dattāḥ śarās te api kṣayaṃ yayuḥ ।
yudhyataḥ saha gopālair arjunasyābhavat kṣayaḥ ।।
acintayat tu kaunteyaḥ kṛṣṇasyaiva hi tad balam ।
yan mayā śarasaṃghātaiḥ sabalā bhūbhṛto jitāḥ ।।
miṣataḥ pāṇḍuputrasya tatas tāḥ pramadottamāḥ ।
apākṛṣyanta cābhīraiḥ kāmāc cānyāḥ pravavrajuḥ ।।
tataḥ śareṣu kṣīṇeṣu dhanuṣkoṭyā dhanaṃjayaḥ ।
jaghāna dasyūṃs te cāsya prahārāñ jahasur dvijāḥ ।।
paśyatas tv eva pārthasya vṛṣṇyandhakavarastriyaḥ ।
jagmur ādāya te mlecchāḥ samantān munisattamāḥ ।।
tataḥ sa duḥkhito jiṣṇuḥ kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭam iti bruvan ।
aho bhagavatā tena mukto asmīti ruroda vai ।।
{arjuna uvāca 
tad dhanus tāni cāstrāṇi sa rathas te ca vājinaḥ ।
sarvam ekapade naṣṭaṃ dānam aśrotriye yathā ।।
aho cāti balaṃ daivaṃ vinā tena mahātmanā ।
yad asāmarthyayukto ahaṃ nīcair nītaḥ parābhavam ।।
tau bāhū sa ca me muṣṭiḥ sthānaṃ tat so asmi cārjunaḥ ।
puṇyeneva vinā tena gataṃ sarvam asāratām ।।
mamārjunatvaṃ bhīmasya bhīmatvaṃ tatkṛtaṃ dhruvam ।
vinā tena yad ābhīrair jito ahaṃ katham anyathā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
itthaṃ vadan yayau jiṣṇur indraprasthaṃ purottamam ।
cakāra tatra rājānaṃ vajraṃ yādavanandanam ।।
sa dadarśa tato vyāsaṃ phālgunaḥ kānanāśrayam ।
tam upetya mahābhāgaṃ vinayenābhyavādayat ।।
taṃ vandamānaṃ caraṇāv avalokya suniścitam ।
uvāca pārthaṃ vicchāyaḥ katham atyantam īdṛśaḥ ।।
ajārajonugamanaṃ brahmahatyāthavā kṛtā ।
jayāśābhaṅgaduḥkhī vā bhraṣṭacchāyo asi sāṃpratam ।।
sāṃtānikādayo vā te yācamānā nirākṛtāḥ ।
agamyastrīratir vāpi tenāsi vigataprabhaḥ ।।
bhuṅkte pradāya viprebhyo miṣṭam ekam atho bhavān ।
kiṃ vā kṛpaṇavittāni hṛtāni bhavatārjuna ।।
kaccin na sūryavātasya gocaratvaṃ gato arjuna ।
duṣṭacakṣur hato vāpi niḥśrīkaḥ katham anyathā ।।
spṛṣṭo nakhāmbhasā vāpi ghaṭāmbhaḥprokṣito api vā ।
tenātīvāsi vicchāyo nyūnair vā yudhi nirjitaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tataḥ pārtho viniḥśvasya śrūyatāṃ bhagavann iti ।
prokto yathāvad ācaṣṭa viprā ātmaparābhavam ।।
{arjuna uvāca 
yad balaṃ yac ca nas tejo yad vīryaṃ yat parākramaḥ ।
yā śrīś chāyā ca naḥ so asmān parityajya harir gataḥ ।।
itareṇeva mahatā smitapūrvābhibhāṣiṇā ।
hīnā vayaṃ mune tena jātās tṛṇamayā iva ।।
astrāṇāṃ sāyakānāṃ ca gāṇḍīvasya tathā mama ।
sāratā yābhavan mūrtā sa gataḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।।
yasyāvalokanād asmāñ śrīr jayaḥ saṃpad unnatiḥ ।
na tatyāja sa govindas tyaktvāsmān bhagavān gataḥ ।।
bhīṣmadroṇāṅgarājādyās tathā duryodhanādayaḥ ।
yatprabhāvena nirdagdhāḥ sa kṛṣṇas tyaktavān bhuvam ।।
niryauvanā hataśrīkā bhraṣṭacchāyeva me mahī ।
vibhāti tāta naiko ahaṃ virahe tasya cakriṇaḥ ।।
yasyānubhāvād bhīṣmādyair mayy agnau śalabhāyitam ।
vinā tenādya kṛṣṇena gopālair asmi nirjitaḥ ।।
gāṇḍīvaṃ triṣu lokeṣu khyātaṃ yad anubhāvataḥ ।
mama tena vinābhīrair laguḍais tu tiraskṛtam ।।
strīsahasrāṇy anekāni hy anāthāni mahāmune ।
yatato mama nītāni dasyubhir laguḍāyudhaiḥ ।।
ānīyamānam ābhīraiḥ sarvaṃ kṛṣṇāvarodhanam ।
hṛtaṃ yaṣṭipraharaṇaiḥ paribhūya balaṃ mama ।।
niḥśrīkatā na me citraṃ yaj jīvāmi tad adbhutam ।
nīcāvamānapaṅkāṅkī nirlajjo asmi pitāmaha ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śrutvāhaṃ tasya tad vākyam abravaṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
duḥkhitasya ca dīnasya pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ ।।
alaṃ te vrīḍayā pārtha na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi ।
avehi sarvabhūteṣu kālasya gatir īdṛśī ।।
kālo bhavāya bhūtānām abhavāya ca pāṇḍava ।
kālamūlam idaṃ jñātvā kuru sthairyam ato arjuna ।।
nadyaḥ samudrā girayaḥ sakalā ca vasuṃdharā ।
devā manuṣyāḥ paśavas taravaś ca sarīsṛpāḥ ।।
sṛṣṭāḥ kālena kālena punar yāsyanti saṃkṣayam ।
kālātmakam idaṃ sarvaṃ jñātvā śamam avāpnuhi ।।
yathāttha kṛṣṇamāhātmyaṃ tat tathaiva dhanaṃjaya ।
bhārāvatārakāryārtham avatīrṇaḥ sa medinīm ।।
bhārākrāntā dharā yātā devānāṃ saṃnidhau purā ।
tadartham avatīrṇo asau kāmarūpī janārdanaḥ ।।
tac ca niṣpāditaṃ kāryam aśeṣā bhūbhṛto hatāḥ ।
vṛṣṇyandhakakulaṃ sarvaṃ tathā pārthopasaṃhṛtam ।।
na kiṃcid anyat kartavyam asya bhūmitale arjuna ।
tato gataḥ sa bhagavān kṛtakṛtyo yathecchayā ।।
sṛṣṭiṃ sarge karoty eṣa devadevaḥ sthitiṃ sthitau ।
ante tāpasamartho ayaṃ sāṃprataṃ vai yathā kṛtam ।।
tasmāt pārtha na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ parābhavāt ।
bhavanti bhavakāleṣu puruṣāṇāṃ parākramāḥ ।।
yatas tvayaikena hatā bhīṣmadroṇādayo nṛpāḥ ।
teṣām arjuna kālotthaḥ kiṃ nyūnābhibhavo na saḥ ।।
viṣṇos tasyānubhāvena yathā teṣāṃ parābhavaḥ ।
tvattas tathaiva bhavato dasyubhyo ante tadudbhavaḥ ।।
sa devo anyaśarīrāṇi samāviśya jagatsthitim ।
karoti sarvabhūtānāṃ nāśaṃ cānte jagatpatiḥ ।।
bhavodbhave ca kaunteya sahāyas te janārdanaḥ ।
bhavānte tvadvipakṣās te keśavenāvalokitāḥ ।।
kaḥ śraddadhyāt sagāṅgeyān hanyās tvaṃ sarvakauravān ।
ābhīrebhyaś ca bhavataḥ kaḥ śraddadhyāt parābhavam ।।
pārthaitat sarvabhūteṣu harer līlāviceṣṭitam ।
tvayā yat kauravā dhvastā yad ābhīrair bhavāñ jitaḥ ।।
gṛhītā dasyubhir yac ca rakṣitā bhavatā striyaḥ ।
tad apy ahaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ kathayāmi tavārjuna ।।
aṣṭāvakraḥ purā vipra udavāsarato abhavat ।
bahūn varṣagaṇān pārtha gṛṇan brahma sanātanam ।।
jiteṣv asurasaṃgheṣu merupṛṣṭhe mahotsavaḥ ।
babhūva tatra gacchantyo dadṛśus taṃ surastriyaḥ ।।
rambhātilottamādyāś ca śataśo atha sahasraśaḥ ।
tuṣṭuvus taṃ mahātmānaṃ praśaśaṃsuś ca pāṇḍava ।।
ākaṇṭhamagnaṃ salile jaṭābhāradharaṃ munim ।
vinayāvanatāś caiva praṇemuḥ stotratatparāḥ ।।
yathā yathā prasanno abhūt tuṣṭuvus taṃ tathā tathā ।
sarvās tāḥ kauravaśreṣṭha variṣṭhaṃ taṃ dvijanmanām ।।
{aṣṭāvakra uvāca 
prasanno ahaṃ mahābhāgā bhavatīnāṃ yad iṣyate ।
mattas tad vriyatāṃ sarvaṃ pradāsyāmy api durlabham ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
rambhātilottamādyāś ca divyāś cāpsaraso abruvan ।।
{apsarasa ūcuḥ 
prasanne tvayy asaṃprāptaṃ kim asmākam iti dvijāḥ ।।
itarās tv abruvan vipra prasanno bhagavan yadi ।
tad icchāmaḥ patiṃ prāptuṃ viprendra puruṣottamam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evaṃ bhaviṣyatīty uktvā uttatāra jalān muniḥ ।
tam uttīrṇaṃ ca dadṛśur virūpaṃ vakram aṣṭadhā ।।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā gūhamānānāṃ yāsāṃ hāsaḥ sphuṭo abhavat ।
tāḥ śaśāpa muniḥ kopam avāpya kurunandana ।।
{aṣṭāvakra uvāca 
yasmād virūparūpaṃ māṃ matvā hāsāvamānanā ।
bhavatībhiḥ kṛtā tasmād eṣa śāpaṃ dadāmi vaḥ ।।
matprasādena bhartāraṃ labdhvā tu puruṣottamam ।
macchāpopahatāḥ sarvā dasyuhastaṃ gamiṣyatha ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity udīritam ākarṇya munis tābhiḥ prasāditaḥ ।
punaḥ surendralokaṃ vai prāha bhūyo gamiṣyatha ।।
evaṃ tasya muneḥ śāpād aṣṭāvakrasya keśavam ।
bhartāraṃ prāpya tāḥ prāptā dasyuhastaṃ varāṅganāḥ ।।
tat tvayā nātra kartavyaḥ śoko alpo api hi pāṇḍava ।
tenaivākhilanāthena sarvaṃ tad upasaṃhṛtam ।।
bhavatāṃ copasaṃhāram āsannaṃ tena kurvatā ।
balaṃ tejas tathā vīryaṃ māhātmyaṃ copasaṃhṛtam ।।
jātasya niyato mṛtyuḥ patanaṃ ca tathonnateḥ ।
viprayogāvasānaṃ tu saṃyogaḥ saṃcayaḥ kṣayaḥ ।।
vijñāya na budhāḥ śokaṃ na harṣam upayānti ye ।
teṣām evetare ceṣṭāṃ śikṣantaḥ santi tādṛśāḥ ।।
tasmāt tvayā naraśreṣṭha jñātvaitad bhrātṛbhiḥ saha ।
parityajyākhilaṃ rājyaṃ gantavyaṃ tapase vanam ।।
tad gaccha dharmarājāya nivedyaitad vaco mama ।
paraśvo bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ gatiṃ vīra yathā kuru ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity ukto dharmarājaṃ tu samabhyetya tathoktavān ।
dṛṣṭaṃ caivānubhūtaṃ vā kathitaṃ tad aśeṣataḥ ।।
vyāsavākyaṃ ca te sarve śrutvārjunasamīritam ।
rājye parīkṣitaṃ kṛtvā yayuḥ pāṇḍusutā vanam ।।
ity evaṃ vo muniśreṣṭhā vistareṇa mayoditam ।
jātasya ca yador vaṃśe vāsudevasya ceṣṭitam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
aho kṛṣṇasya māhātmyam adbhutaṃ cātimānuṣam ।
rāmasya ca muniśreṣṭha tvayoktaṃ bhuvi durlabham ।।
na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ śṛṇvanto bhagavatkathām ।
tasmād brūhi mahābhāga bhūyo devasya ceṣṭitam ।।
prādurbhāvaḥ purāṇeṣu viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ ।
satāṃ kathayatām eva varāha iti naḥ śrutam ।।
na jānīmo asya caritaṃ na vidhiṃ na ca vistaram ।
na karmaguṇasadbhāvaṃ na hetutvamanīṣitam ।।
kimātmako varāho asau kā mūrtiḥ kā ca devatā ।
kimācāraprabhāvo vā kiṃ vā tena tadā kṛtam ।।
yajñārthe samavetānāṃ miṣatāṃ ca dvijanmanām ।
mahāvarāhacaritaṃ sarvalokasukhāvaham ।।
yathā nārāyaṇo brahman vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ ।
daṃṣṭrayā gāṃ samudrasthām ujjahārārimardanaḥ ।।
vistareṇaiva karmāṇi sarvāṇi ripughātinaḥ ।
śrotuṃ no vartate buddhir hareḥ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ ।।
karmaṇām ānupūrvyā ca prādurbhāvāś ca ye vibho ।
yā vāsya prakṛtir brahmaṃs tāś cākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
praśnabhāro mahān eṣa bhavadbhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ ।
yathāśaktyā tu vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ ।।
viṣṇoḥ prabhāvaśravaṇe diṣṭyā vo matir utthitā ।
tasmād viṣṇoḥ samastā vai śṛṇudhvaṃ yāḥ pravṛttayaḥ ।।
sahasrāsyaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ sahasracaraṇaṃ ca yam ।
sahasraśirasaṃ devaṃ sahasrakaram avyayam ।।
sahasrajihvaṃ bhāsvantaṃ sahasramukuṭaṃ prabhum ।
sahasradaṃ sahasrādiṃ sahasrabhujam avyayam ।।
havanaṃ savanaṃ caiva hotāraṃ havyam eva ca ।
pātrāṇi ca pavitrāṇi vediṃ dīkṣāṃ samit sruvam ।।
sruksomasūryamuśalaṃ prokṣaṇīṃ dakṣiṇāyanam ।
adhvaryuṃ sāmagaṃ vipraṃ sadasyaṃ sadanaṃ sadaḥ ।।
yūpaṃ cakraṃ dhruvāṃ darvīṃ carūṃś colūkhalāni ca ।
prāgvaṃśaṃ yajñabhūmiṃ ca hotāraṃ ca paraṃ ca yat ।।
hrasvāṇy atipramāṇāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca ।
prāyaścittāni vārghyaṃ ca sthaṇḍilāni kuśās tathā ।।
mantrayajñavahaṃ vahniṃ bhāgaṃ bhāgavahaṃ ca yat ।
agrāsinaṃ somabhujaṃ hutārciṣam udāyudham ।।
āhur vedavido viprā yaṃ yajñe śāśvataṃ prabhum ।
tasya viṣṇoḥ sureśasya śrīvatsāṅkasya dhīmataḥ ।।
prādurbhāvasahasrāṇi samatītāny anekaśaḥ ।
bhūyaś caiva bhaviṣyanti hy evam āha pitāmahaḥ ।।
yat pṛcchadhvaṃ mahābhāgā divyāṃ puṇyām imāṃ kathām ।
prādurbhāvāśritāṃ viṣṇoḥ sarvapāpaharāṃ śivām ।।
śṛṇudhvaṃ tāṃ mahābhāgās tadgatenāntarātmanā ।
pravakṣyāmy ānupūrvyeṇa yat pṛcchadhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ ।।
vāsudevasya māhātmyaṃ caritaṃ ca mahāmateḥ ।
hitārthaṃ suramartyānāṃ lokānāṃ prabhavāya ca ।।
bahuśaḥ sarvabhūtātmā prādurbhavati vīryavān ।
prādurbhāvāṃś ca vakṣyāmi puṇyān divyān guṇānvitān ।।
supto yugasahasraṃ yaḥ prādurbhavati kāryataḥ ।
pūrṇe yugasahasre atha devadevo jagatpatiḥ ।।
brahmā ca kapilaś caiva tryambakas tridaśās tathā ।
devāḥ saptarṣayaś caiva nāgāś cāpsarasas tathā ।।
sanatkumāraś ca mahānubhāvo 
manur mahātmā bhagavān prajākaraḥ 
purāṇadevo atha purāṇi cakre 
pradīptavaiśvānaratulyatejāḥ 
yo asau cārṇavamadhyastho naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame ।
naṣṭe devāsuranare pranaṣṭoragarākṣase ।।
yoddhukāmau durādharṣau tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau ।
hatau bhagavatā tena tayor dattvāmitaṃ varam ।।
purā kamalanābhasya svapataḥ sāgarāmbhasi ।
puṣkare tatra saṃbhūtā devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā ।।
eṣa pauṣkarako nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ ।
purāṇaṃ kathyate yatra devaśrutisamāhitam ।।
vārāhas tu śrutimukhaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ ।
yatra viṣṇuḥ suraśreṣṭho vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ ।।
vedapādo yūpadaṃṣṭraḥ kratudantaś citīmukhaḥ ।
agnijihvo darbharomā brahmaśīrṣo mahātapāḥ ।।
ahorātrekṣaṇo divyo vedāṅgaḥ śrutibhūṣaṇaḥ ।
ājyanāsaḥ sruvatuṇḍaḥ sāmaghoṣasvaro mahān ।।
satyadharmamayaḥ śrīmān kramavikramasatkṛtaḥ ।
prāyaścittanakho ghoraḥ paśujānur mukhākṛtiḥ ।।
udgatāntro homaliṅgo bījauṣadhimahāphalaḥ ।
vādyantarātmā mantrasphig vikṛtaḥ somaśoṇitaḥ ।।
vediskandho havirgandho havyakavyātivegavān ।
prāgvaṃśakāyo dyutimān nānādīkṣābhir anvitaḥ ।।
dakṣiṇāhṛdayo yogī mahāsattramayo mahān ।
upākarmāṣṭarucakaḥ pravargāvartabhūṣaṇaḥ ।।
nānācchandogatipatho guhyopaniṣadāsanaḥ ।
chāyāpatnīsahāyo asau maṇiśṛṅga ivotthitaḥ ।।
mahīṃ sāgaraparyantāṃ saśailavanakānanām ।
ekārṇavajalabhraṣṭām ekārṇavagataḥ prabhuḥ ।।
daṃṣṭrayā yaḥ samuddhṛtya lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।
sahasraśīrṣo lokādiś cakāra jagatīṃ punaḥ ।।
evaṃ yajñavarāheṇa bhūtvā bhūtahitārthinā ।
uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī sāgarāmbudharā purā ।।
vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃhas tato dvijāḥ ।
yatra bhūtvā mṛgendreṇa hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ ।।
purā kṛtayuge nāma surārir baladarpitaḥ ।
daityānām ādipuruṣaś cakāra sumahat tapaḥ ।।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca ।
japopavāsaniratas tasthau maunavratasthitaḥ ।।
tataḥ śamadamābhyāṃ ca brahmacaryeṇa caiva hi ।
prīto abhavat tatas tasya tapasā niyamena ca ।।
taṃ vai svayaṃbhūr bhagavān svayam āgamya bho dvijāḥ ।
vimānenārkavarṇena haṃsayuktena bhāsvatā ।।
ādityair vasubhiḥ sārdhaṃ marudbhir daivatais tathā ।
rudrair viśvasahāyaiś ca yakṣarākṣasakiṃnaraiḥ ।।
diśābhiḥ pradiśābhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgarais tathā ।
nakṣatraiś ca muhūrtaiś ca khecaraiś ca mahāgrahaiḥ ।।
devarṣibhis tapovṛddhaiḥ siddhair vidvadbhir eva ca ।
rājarṣibhiḥ puṇyatamair gandharvair apsarogaṇaiḥ ।।
carācaraguruḥ śrīmān vṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ surais tathā ।
brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityaṃ vacanam abravīt ।।
{brahmovāca 
prīto asmi tava bhaktasya tapasānena suvrata ।
varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi ।।
{hiraṇyakaśipur uvāca 
na devāsuragandharvā na yakṣoragarākṣasāḥ ।
ṛṣayo vātha māṃ śāpaiḥ kruddhā lokapitāmaha ।।
śapeyus tapasā yuktā vara eṣa vṛto mayā ।
na śastreṇa na vāstreṇa giriṇā pādapena vā ।।
na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa na caivordhvaṃ na cāpy adhaḥ ।
pāṇiprahāreṇaikena sabhṛtyabalavāhanam ।।
yo māṃ nāśayituṃ śaktaḥ sa me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati ।
bhaveyam aham evārkaḥ somo vāyur hutāśanaḥ ।।
salilaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca ākāśaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ ।
ahaṃ krodhaś ca kāmaś ca varuṇo vāsavo yamaḥ ।
dhanadaś ca dhanādhyakṣo yakṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣādhipaḥ ।।
{brahmovāca 
ete divyā varās tāta mayā dattās tavādbhutāḥ ।
sarvān kāmān imāṃs tāta prāpsyasi tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evam uktvā tu bhagavāñ jagāmāśu pitāmahaḥ ।
vairājaṃ brahmasadanaṃ brahmarṣigaṇasevitam ।।
tato devāś ca nāgāś ca gandharvā munayas tathā ।
varapradānaṃ śrutvaiva pitāmaham upasthitāḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
vareṇānena bhagavan bādhiṣyati sa no asuraḥ ।
tat prasīdāśu bhagavan vadho apy asya vicintyatām ।।
bhagavan sarvabhūtānāṃ svayaṃbhūr ādikṛt prabhuḥ ।
sraṣṭā ca havyakavyānām avyaktaṃ prakṛtir dhruvam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tato lokahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ prajāpatiḥ ।
provāca bhagavān vākyaṃ sarvadevagaṇāṃs tathā ।।
{brahmovāca 
avaśyaṃ tridaśās tena prāptavyaṃ tapasaḥ phalam ।
tapaso ante ca bhagavān vadhaṃ viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
etac chrutvā surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ paṅkajajanmanaḥ ।
svāni sthānāni divyāni jagmus te vai mudānvitāḥ ।।
labdhamātre vare cāpi sarvāḥ so abādhata prajāḥ ।
hiraṇyakaśipur daityo varadānena darpitaḥ ।।
āśrameṣu mahābhāgān munīn vai saṃśitavratān ।
satyadharmaratān dāntāṃs tadā dharṣitavāṃs tathā ।।
tridivasthāṃs tathā devān parājitya mahābalaḥ ।
trailokyaṃ vaśam ānīya svarge vasati so asuraḥ ।।
yadā varamadonmatto vicaran dānavo bhuvi ।
yajñīyān akarod daityān ayajñīyāś ca devatāḥ ।।
ādityā vasavaḥ sādhyā viśve ca marutas tathā ।
śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ viṣṇum upatasthur mahābalam ।।
devabrahmamayaṃ yajñaṃ brahmadevaṃ sanātanam ।
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca prabhuṃ lokanamaskṛtam ।
nārāyaṇaṃ vibhuṃ devaṃ śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ।।
{devā ūcuḥ 
trāyasva no adya deveśa hiraṇyakaśipor bhayāt ।
tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo devas tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo guruḥ ।।
tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo dhātā brahmādīnāṃ surottama ।
utphullāmalapattrākṣa śatrupakṣakṣayaṃkara ।
kṣayāya ditivaṃśasya śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ bhavasva naḥ ।।
{vāsudeva uvāca 
bhayaṃ tyajadhvam amarā abhayaṃ vo dadāmy aham ।
tathaiva tridivaṃ devāḥ pratilapsyatha mā ciram ।।
eṣo ahaṃ sagaṇaṃ daityaṃ varadānena darpitam ।
avadhyam amarendrāṇāṃ dānavendraṃ nihanmi tam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evam uktvā tu bhagavān visṛjya tridaśeśvarān ।
hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sthānam ājagāma mahābalaḥ ।।
narasyārdhatanuṃ kṛtvā siṃhasyārdhatanuṃ prabhuḥ ।
nārasiṃhena vapuṣā pāṇiṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā ।।
ghanajīmūtasaṃkāśo ghanajīmūtanisvanaḥ ।
ghanajīmūtadīptaujā jīmūta iva vegavān ।।
daityaṃ so atibalaṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛptaśārdūlavikramaḥ ।
dṛptair daityagaṇair guptaṃ hatavān ekapāṇinā ।।
nṛsiṃha eṣa kathito bhūyo ayaṃ vāmanaḥ paraḥ ।
yatra vāmanam āsthāya rūpaṃ daityavināśanam ।।
baler balavato yajñe balinā viṣṇunā purā ।
vikramais tribhir akṣobhyāḥ kṣobhitās te mahāsurāḥ ।।
vipracittiḥ śivaḥ śaṅkur ayaḥśaṅkus tathaiva ca ।
ayaḥśirā aśvaśirā hayagrīvaś ca vīryavān ।।
vegavān ketumān ugraḥ sogravyagro mahāsuraḥ ।
puṣkaraḥ puṣkalaś caiva śāśvo aśvapatir eva ca ।।
prahlādo aśvapatiḥ kumbhaḥ saṃhrādo gamanapriyaḥ ।
anuhrādo harihayo vārāhaḥ saṃharo anujaḥ ।।
śarabhaḥ śalabhaś caiva kupathaḥ krodhanaḥ krathaḥ ।
bṛhatkīrtir mahājihvaḥ śaṅkukarṇo mahāsvanaḥ ।।
dīptajihvo arkanayano mṛgapādo mṛgapriyaḥ ।
vāyur gariṣṭho namuciḥ sambaro viskaro mahān ।।
candrahantā krodhahantā krodhavardhana eva ca ।
kālakaḥ kālakopaś ca vṛtraḥ krodho virocanaḥ ।।
gariṣṭhaś ca variṣṭhaś ca pralambanarakāv ubhau ।
indratāpanavātāpī ketumān baladarpitaḥ ।।
asilomā pulomā ca bāṣkalaḥ pramado madaḥ ।
svamiśraḥ kālavadanaḥ karālaḥ keśir eva ca ।।
ekākṣaś candramā rāhuḥ saṃhrādaḥ sambaraḥ svanaḥ ।
śataghnīcakrahastāś ca tathā muśalapāṇayaḥ ।।
aśvayantrāyudhopetā bhindipālāyudhās tathā ।
śūlolūkhalahastāś ca paraśvadhadharās tathā ।।
pāśamudgarahastāś ca tathā parighapāṇayaḥ ।
mahāśilāpraharaṇāḥ śūlahastāś ca dānavāḥ ।।
nānāpraharaṇā ghorā nānāveśā mahābalāḥ ।
kūrmakukkuṭavaktrāś ca śaśolūkamukhās tathā ।।
kharoṣṭravadanāś caiva varāhavadanās tathā ।
mārjāraśikhivaktrāś ca mahāvaktrās tathā pare ।।
nakrameṣānanāḥ śūrā gojāvimahiṣānanāḥ ।
godhāśallakivaktrāś ca kroṣṭuvaktrāś ca dānavāḥ ।।
ākhudarduravaktrāś ca ghorā vṛkamukhās tathā ।
bhīmā makaravaktrāś ca krauñcavaktrāś ca dānavāḥ ।।
aśvānanāḥ kharamukhā mayūravadanās tathā ।
gajendracarmavasanās tathā kṛṣṇājināmbarāḥ ।।
cīrasaṃvṛtagātrāś ca tathā nīlakavāsasaḥ ।
uṣṇīṣiṇo mukuṭinas tathā kuṇḍalino asurāḥ ।।
kirīṭino lambaśikhāḥ kambugrīvāḥ suvarcasaḥ ।
nānāveśadharā daityā nānāmālyānulepanāḥ ।।
svāny āyudhāni saṃgṛhya pradīptāni ca tejasā ।
kramamāṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśam upāvartanta sarvaśaḥ ।।
pramathya sarvān daiteyān pādahastatalair vibhuḥ ।
rūpaṃ kṛtvā mahābhīmaṃ jahārāśu sa medinīm ।।
tasya vikramato bhūmiṃ candrādityau stanāntare ।
nabhaḥ prakramamāṇasya nābhyāṃ kila tathā sthitau ।।
param ākramamāṇasya jānudeśe vyavasthitau ।
viṣṇor amitavīryasya vadanty evaṃ dvijātayaḥ ।।
hṛtvā sa medinīṃ kṛtsnāṃ hatvā cāsurapuṃgavān ।
dadau śakrāya vasudhāṃ viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ ।।
eṣa vo vāmano nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ ।
vedavidbhir dvijair etat kathyate vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ ।।
bhūyo bhūtātmano viṣṇoḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ ।
dattātreya iti khyātaḥ kṣamayā parayā yutaḥ ।।
tena naṣṭeṣu vedeṣu prakriyāsu makheṣu ca ।
cāturvarṇye ca saṃkīrṇe dharme śithilatāṃ gate ।।
ativardhati cādharme satye naṣṭe anṛte sthite ।
prajāsu śīryamāṇāsu dharme cākulatāṃ gate ।।
sayajñāḥ sakriyā vedāḥ pratyānītā hi tena vai ।
cāturvarṇyam asaṃkīrṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tena mahātmanā ।।
tena haihayarājasya kārtavīryasya dhīmataḥ ।
varadena varo datto dattātreyeṇa dhīmatā ।।
etad bāhudvayaṃ yat te tat te mama kṛte nṛpa ।
śatāni daśa bāhūnāṃ bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ ।।
pālayiṣyasi kṛtsnāṃ ca vasudhāṃ vasudheśvara ।
durnirīkṣyo arivṛndānāṃ yuddhasthaś ca bhaviṣyasi ।।
eṣa vo vaiṣṇavaḥ śrīmān prādurbhāvo adbhutaḥ śubhaḥ ।
bhūyaś ca jāmadagnyo ayaṃ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ ।।
yatra bāhusahasreṇa dviṣatāṃ durjayaṃ raṇe ।
rāmo arjunam anīkasthaṃ jaghāna nṛpatiṃ prabhuḥ ।।
rathasthaṃ pārthivaṃ rāmaḥ pātayitvārjunaṃ bhuvi ।
dharṣayitvārjunaṃ rāmaḥ krośamānaṃ ca meghavat ।।
kṛtsnaṃ bāhusahasraṃ ca ciccheda bhṛgunandanaḥ ।
paraśvadhena dīptena jñātibhiḥ sahitasya vai ।।
kīrṇā kṣatriyakoṭībhir merumandarabhūṣaṇā ।
triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī tena niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā ।।
kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyāṃ caināṃ bhārgavaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ ।
sarvapāpavināśāya vājimedhena ceṣṭavān ।।
yasmin yajñe mahādāne dakṣiṇāṃ bhṛgunandanaḥ ।
mārīcāya dadau prītaḥ kaśyapāya vasuṃdharām ।।
vāraṇāṃs turagāñ śubhrān rathāṃś ca rathināṃ varaḥ ।
hiraṇyam akṣayaṃ dhenur gajendrāṃś ca mahīpatiḥ ।।
dadau tasmin mahāyajñe vājimedhe mahāyaśāḥ ।
adyāpi ca hitārthāya lokānāṃ bhṛgunandanaḥ ।।
caramāṇas tapo ghoraṃ jāmadagnyaḥ punaḥ prabhuḥ ।
āste vai devavac chrīmān mahendre parvatottame ।।
eṣa viṣṇoḥ sureśasya śāśvatasyāvyayasya ca ।
jāmadagnya iti khyātaḥ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ ।।
caturviṃśe yuge vāpi viśvāmitrapuraḥsaraḥ ।
jajñe daśarathasyātha putraḥ padmāyatekṣaṇaḥ ।।
kṛtvātmānaṃ mahābāhuś caturdhā prabhur īśvaraḥ ।
loke rāma iti khyātas tejasā bhāskaropamaḥ ।।
prasādanārthaṃ lokasya rakṣasāṃ nigrahāya ca ।
dharmasya ca vivṛddhyarthaṃ jajñe tatra mahāyaśāḥ ।।
tam apy āhur manuṣyendraṃ sarvabhūtahite ratam ।
yaḥ samāḥ sarvadharmajñaś caturdaśa vane avasat ।।
lakṣmaṇānucaro rāmaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ ।
caturdaśa vane taptvā tapo varṣāṇi rāghavaḥ ।।
rūpiṇī tasya pārśvasthā sīteti prathitā jane ।
pūrvoditā tu yā lakṣmīr bhartāram anugacchati ।।
janasthāne vasan kāryaṃ tridaśānāṃ cakāra saḥ ।
tasyāpakāriṇaṃ krūraṃ paulastyaṃ manujarṣabhaḥ ।।
sītāyāḥ padam anvicchan nijaghāna mahāyaśāḥ ।
devāsuragaṇānāṃ ca yakṣarākṣasabhoginām ।।
yatrāvadhyaṃ rākṣasendraṃ rāvaṇaṃ yudhi durjayam ।
yuktaṃ rākṣasakoṭībhir nīlāñjanacayopamam ।।
trailokyadrāvaṇaṃ krūraṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram ।
durjayaṃ durdharaṃ dṛptaṃ śārdūlasamavikramam ।।
durnirīkṣyaṃ suragaṇair varadānena darpitam ।
jaghāna sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ sasainyaṃ rāvaṇaṃ yudhi ।।
mahābhragaṇasaṃkāśaṃ mahākāyaṃ mahābalam ।
rāvaṇaṃ nijaghānāśu rāmo bhūtapatiḥ purā ।।
sugrīvasya kṛte yena vānarendro mahābalaḥ ।
vālī vinihataḥ saṃkhye sugrīvaś cābhiṣecitaḥ ।।
madhoś ca tanayo dṛpto lavaṇo nāma dānavaḥ ।
hato madhuvane vīro varamatto mahāsuraḥ ।।
yajñavighnakarau yena munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām ।
mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca balena balināṃ varau ।।
nihatau ca nirāśau ca kṛtau tena mahātmanā ।
samare yuddhaśauṇḍena tathānye cāpi rākṣasāḥ ।।
virādhaś ca kabandhaś ca rākṣasau bhīmavikramau ।
jaghāna puruṣavyāghro gandharvau śāpamohitau ।।
hutāśanārkāṃśutaḍidguṇābhaiḥ 
prataptajāmbūnadacitrapuṅkhaiḥ 
mahendravajrāśanitulyasārai 
ripūn sa rāmaḥ samare nijaghne 
tasmai dattāni śastrāṇi viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā ।
vadhārthaṃ devaśatrūṇāṃ durdharṣāṇāṃ surair api ।।
vartamāne makhe yena janakasya mahātmanaḥ ।
bhagnaṃ māheśvaraṃ cāpaṃ krīḍatā līlayā purā ।।
etāni kṛtvā karmāṇi rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ ।
daśāśvamedhāñ jārūthyān ājahāra nirargalān ।।
nāśrūyantāśubhā vāco nākulaṃ māruto vavau ।
na vittaharaṇaṃ cāsīd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati ।।
paridevanti vidhavā nānarthāś ca kadācana ।
sarvam āsīc chubhaṃ tatra rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati ।।
na prāṇināṃ bhayaṃ cāsīj jalāgnyanilaghātajam ।
na cāpi vṛddhā bālānāṃ pretakāryāṇi cakrire ।।
brahmacaryaparaṃ kṣatraṃ viśas tu kṣatriye ratāḥ ।
śūdrāś caiva hi varṇāṃs trīñ śuśrūṣanty anahaṃkṛtāḥ ।।
nāryo nātyacaran bhartṝn bhāryāṃ nātyacarat patiḥ ।
sarvam āsīj jagad dāntaṃ nirdasyur abhavan mahī ।।
rāma eko abhavad bhartā rāmaḥ pālayitābhavat ।
āsan varṣasahasrāṇi tathā putrasahasriṇaḥ ।।
arogāḥ prāṇinaś cāsan rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati ।
devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
pṛthivyāṃ samavāyo abhūd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati ।
gāthām apy atra gāyanti ye purāṇavido janāḥ ।।
rāme nibaddhatattvārthā māhātmyaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ ।
śyāmo yuvā lohitākṣo dīptāsyo mitabhāṣitaḥ ।।
ājānubāhuḥ sumukhaḥ siṃhaskandho mahābhujaḥ ।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi rāmo rājyam akārayat ।।
ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ ghoṣo jyāghoṣaś ca mahātmanaḥ ।
avyucchinno abhavad rāṣṭre dīyatāṃ bhujyatām iti ।।
sattvavān guṇasaṃpanno dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā ।
ati candraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca rāmo dāśarathir babhau ।।
īje kratuśataiḥ puṇyaiḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
hitvāyodhyāṃ divaṃ yāto rāghavo hi mahābalaḥ ।।
evam eva mahābāhur ikṣvākukulanandanaḥ ।
rāvaṇaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā divam ācakrame vibhuḥ ।।
aparaḥ keśavasyāyaṃ prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ ।
vikhyāto māthure kalpe sarvalokahitāya vai ।।
yatra śālvaṃ ca caidyaṃ ca kaṃsaṃ dvividam eva ca ।
ariṣṭaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ keśiṃ pūtanāṃ daityadārikām ।।
nāgaṃ kuvalayāpīḍaṃ cāṇūraṃ muṣṭikaṃ tathā ।
daityān mānuṣadehena sūdayām āsa vīryavān ।।
chinnaṃ bāhusahasraṃ ca bāṇasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ ।
narakaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye yavanaś ca mahābalaḥ ।।
hṛtāni ca mahīpānāṃ sarvaratnāni tejasā ।
durācārāś ca nihitāḥ pārthivā ye mahītale ।।
eṣa lokahitārthāya prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ ।
kalkī viṣṇuyaśā nāma śambhalagrāmasaṃbhavaḥ ।।
sarvalokahitārthāya bhūyo devo mahāyaśāḥ ।
ete cānye ca bahavo divyā devagaṇair vṛtāḥ ।।
prādurbhāvāḥ purāṇeṣu gīyante brahmavādibhiḥ ।
yatra devā vimuhyanti prādurbhāvānukīrtane ।।
purāṇaṃ vartate yatra vedaśrutisamāhitam ।
etad uddeśamātreṇa prādurbhāvānukīrtanam ।।
kīrtitaṃ kīrtanīyasya sarvalokaguror vibhoḥ ।
prīyante pitaras tasya prādurbhāvānukīrtanāt ।।
viṣṇor amitavīryasya yaḥ śṛṇoti kṛtāñjaliḥ ।।
etāś ca yogeśvarayogamāyāḥ 
śrutvā naro mucyati sarvapāpaiḥ 
ṛddhiṃ samṛddhiṃ vipulāṃś ca bhogān 
prāpnoti śīghraṃ bhagavatprasādāt 
evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhā viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ ।
sarvapāpaharāḥ puṇyāḥ prādurbhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ puṇyadharmāmṛtasya ca ।
mune tvanmukhagītasya tathā kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ karmaṇo gatim ।
vetsi sarvaṃ mune tena pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahāmatim ।।
śrūyate yamalokasya mārgaḥ paramadurgamaḥ ।
duḥkhakleśakaraḥ śaśvat sarvabhūtabhayāvahaḥ ।।
kathaṃ tena narā yānti mārgeṇa yamasādanam ।
pramāṇaṃ caiva mārgasya brūhi no vadatāṃ vara ।।
mune pṛcchāma sarvajña brūhi sarvam aśeṣataḥ ।
kathaṃ narakaduḥkhāni nāpnuvanti narān mune ।।
kenopāyena dānena dharmeṇa niyamena ca ।
mānuṣasya ca yāmyasya lokasya kiyad antaram ।।
kathaṃ ca svargatiṃ yānti narakaṃ kena karmaṇā ।
svargasthānāni kiyanti kiyanti narakāṇi ca ।।
kathaṃ sukṛtino yānti kathaṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ ।
kiṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ vā ko varṇas tūbhayor api ।
jīvasya nīyamānasya yamalokaṃ bravīhi naḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlā vadato mama suvratāḥ ।
saṃsāracakram ajaraṃ sthitir yasya na vidyate ।।
so ahaṃ vadāmi vaḥ sarvaṃ yamamārgasya nirṇayam ।
utkrāntikālād ārabhya yathā nānyo vadiṣyati ।।
svarūpaṃ caiva mārgasya yan māṃ pṛcchatha sattamāḥ ।
yamalokasya cādhvānam antaraṃ mānuṣasya ca ।।
yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaḍaśītis tad antaram ।
taptatāmram ivātaptaṃ tad adhvānam udāhṛtam ।।
tad avaśyaṃ hi gantavyaṃ prāṇibhir jīvasaṃjñakaiḥ ।
puṇyān puṇyakṛto yānti pāpān pāpakṛto adhamāḥ ।।
dvāviṃśatiś ca narakā yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ ।
yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo vipacyante pṛthak pṛthak ।।
narako rauravo raudraḥ śūkaras tāla eva ca ।
kumbhīpāko mahāghoraḥ śālmalo atha vimohanaḥ ।।
kīṭādaḥ kṛmibhakṣaś ca nālābhakṣo bhramas tathā ।
nadyaḥ pūyavahāś cānyā rudhirāmbhas tathaiva ca ।।
agnijvālo mahāghoraḥ saṃdaṃśaḥ śunabhojanaḥ ।
ghorā vaitaraṇī caiva asipattravanaṃ tathā ।।
na tatra vṛkṣacchāyā vā na taḍāgāḥ sarāṃsi ca ।
na vāpyo dīrghikā vāpi na kūpo na prapā sabhā ।।
na maṇḍapo nāyatanaṃ na nadyo na ca parvatāḥ ।
na kiṃcid āśramasthānaṃ vidyate tatra vartmani ।।
yatra viśramate śrāntaḥ puruṣo atīvakarṣitaḥ ।
avaśyam eva gantavyaḥ sa sarvais tu mahāpathaḥ ।।
prāpte kāle tu saṃtyajya suhṛdbandhudhanādikam ।
jarāyujāṇḍajāś caiva svedajāś codbhijās tathā ।।
jaṅgamājaṅgamāś caiva gamiṣyanti mahāpatham ।
devāsuramanuṣyaiś ca vaivasvatavaśānugaiḥ ।।
strīpuṃnapuṃsakaiś caiva pṛthivyāṃ jīvasaṃjñitaiḥ ।
pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇe vā madhyāhne vā tathā punaḥ ।।
saṃdhyākāle ardharātre vā pratyūṣe vāpy upasthite ।
vṛddhair vā madhyamair vāpi yauvanasthais tathaiva ca ।।
garbhavāse atha bālye vā gantavyaḥ sa mahāpathaḥ ।
pravāsasthair gṛhasthair vā parvatasthaiḥ sthale api vā ।।
kṣetrasthair vā jalasthair vā gṛhamadhyagatais tathā ।
āsīnaiś cāsthitair vāpi śayanīyagatais tathā ।।
jāgradbhir vā prasuptair vā gantavyaḥ sa mahāpathaḥ ।
ihānubhūya nirdiṣṭam āyur jantuḥ svayaṃ tadā ।।
tasyānte ca svayaṃ prāṇair anicchann api mucyate ।
jalam agnir viṣaṃ śastraṃ kṣud vyādhiḥ patanaṃ gireḥ ।।
nimittaṃ kiṃcid āsādya dehī prāṇair vimucyate ।
vihāya sumahat kṛtsnaṃ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam ।।
anyac charīram ādatte yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam ।
dṛḍhaṃ śarīram āpnoti sukhaduḥkhopabhuktaye ।।
tena bhuṅkte sa kṛcchrāṇi pāpakartā naro bhṛśam ।
sukhāni dhārmiko hṛṣṭa iha nīto yamakṣaye ।।
ūṣmā prakupitaḥ kāye tīvravāyusamīritaḥ ।
bhinatti marmasthānāni dīpyamāno nirandhanaḥ ।।
udāno nāma pavanas tataś cordhvaṃ pravartate ।
bhujyatām ambubhakṣyāṇām adhogatinirodhakṛt ।।
tato yenāmbudānāni kṛtāny annarasās tathā ।
dattāḥ sa tasyām āhlādam āpadi pratipadyate ।।
annāni yena dattāni śraddhāpūtena cetasā ।
so api tṛptim avāpnoti vināpy annena vai tadā ।।
yenānṛtāni noktāni prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca ।
āstikaḥ śraddadhānaś ca sukhamṛtyuṃ sa gacchati ।।
devabrāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ niratāś cānasūyakāḥ ।
śuklā vadānyā hrīmantas te narāḥ sukhamṛtyavaḥ ।।
yaḥ kāmān nāpi saṃrambhān na dveṣād dharmam utsṛjet ।
yathoktakārī saumyaś ca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyum ṛcchati ।।
vāridās tṛṣitānāṃ ye kṣudhitānnapradāyinaḥ ।
prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāle mṛtyuṃ sukhasamanvitam ।।
śītaṃ jayanti dhanadās tāpaṃ candanadāyinaḥ ।
prāṇaghnīṃ vedanāṃ kaṣṭāṃ ye cānyodvegadhāriṇaḥ ।।
mohaṃ jñānapradātāras tathā dīpapradās tamaḥ ।
kūṭasākṣī mṛṣāvādī yo gurur nānuśāsti vai ।।
te mohamṛtyavaḥ sarve tathā ye vedanindakāḥ ।
vibhīṣaṇāḥ pūtigandhāḥ kūṭamudgarapāṇayaḥ ।।
āgacchanti durātmāno yamasya puruṣās tathā ।
prāpteṣu dṛkpathaṃ teṣu jāyate tasya vepathuḥ ।।
krandaty avirataḥ so atha bhrātṛmātṛpitṛṃs tathā ।
sā tu vāg asphuṭā viprā ekavarṇā vibhāvyate ।।
dṛṣṭir vibhrāmyate trāsāt kāsāvṛṣṭy aty athānanam ।
tataḥ sa vedanāviṣṭaṃ tac charīraṃ vimuñcati ।।
vāyvagrasārī tadrūpa- deham anyat prapadyate ।
tatkarmayātanārthe ca na mātṛpitṛsaṃbhavam ।।
tatpramāṇavayovasthā- saṃsthānaiḥ prāpyate vyathā ।
tato dūto yamasyātha pāśair badhnāti dāruṇaiḥ ।।
jantoḥ saṃprāptakālasya vedanārtasya vai bhṛśam ।
bhūtaiḥ saṃtyaktadehasya kaṇṭhaprāptānilasya ca ।।
śarīrāc cyāvito jīvo roravīti tatholbaṇam ।
nirgato vāyubhūtas tu ṣāṭkauśikakalevare ।।
mātṛbhiḥ pitṛbhiś caiva bhrātṛbhir mātulais tathā ।
dāraiḥ putrair vayasyaiś ca gurubhis tyajyate bhuvi ।।
dṛśyamānaś ca tair dīnair aśrupūrṇekṣaṇair bhṛśam ।
svaśarīraṃ samutsṛjya vāyubhūtas tu gacchati ।।
andhakāram apāraṃ ca mahāghoraṃ tamovṛtam ।
sukhaduḥkhapradātāraṃ durgamaṃ pāpakarmaṇām ।।
duḥsahaṃ ca durantaṃ ca durnirīkṣaṃ durāsadam ।
durāpam atidurgaṃ ca pāpiṣṭhānāṃ sadāhitam ।।
kṛṣyamāṇāś ca tair bhūtair yāmyaiḥ pāśais tu saṃyatāḥ ।
mudgarais tāḍyamānāś ca nīyante taṃ mahāpatham ।।
kṣīṇāyuṣaṃ samālokya prāṇinaṃ cāyuṣakṣaye ।
ninīṣavaḥ samāyānti yamadūtā bhayaṃkarāḥ ।।
ārūḍhā yānakāle tu ṛkṣavyāghrakhareṣu ca ।
uṣṭreṣu vānareṣv anye vṛścikeṣu vṛkeṣu ca ।।
ulūkasarpamārjāraṃ tathānye gṛdhravāhanāḥ ।
śyenaśṛgālam ārūḍhāḥ saraghākaṅkavāhanāḥ ।।
varāhapaśuvetāla- mahiṣāsyās tathā pare ।
nānārūpadharā ghorāḥ sarvaprāṇibhayaṃkarāḥ ।।
dīrghamuṣkāḥ karālāsyā vakranāsās trilocanāḥ ।
mahāhanukapolāsyāḥ pralambadaśanacchadāḥ ।।
nirgatair vikṛtākārair daśanair aṅkuropamaiḥ ।
māṃsaśoṇitadigdhāṅgā daṃṣṭrābhir bhṛśam ulbaṇaiḥ ।।
mukhaiḥ pātālasadṛśair jvalajjihvair bhayaṃkaraiḥ ।
netraiḥ suvikṛtākārair jvalatpiṅgalacañcalaiḥ ।।
mārjārolūkakhadyota- śakragopavad uddhataiḥ ।
kekaraiḥ saṃkulais stabdhair locanaiḥ pāvakopamaiḥ ।।
bhṛśam ābharaṇair bhīmair ābaddhair bhujagopamaiḥ ।
śoṇāsaralagātraiś ca muṇḍamālāvibhūṣitaiḥ ।।
kaṇṭhasthakṛṣṇasarpaiś ca phūtkāraravabhīṣaṇaiḥ ।
vahnijvālopamaiḥ keśaiḥ stabdharukṣair bhayaṃkaraiḥ ।।
babhrupiṅgalalolaiś ca kadruśmaśrubhir āvṛtāḥ ।
bhujadaṇḍair mahāghoraiḥ pralambaiḥ parighopamaiḥ ।।
kecid dvibāhavas tatra tathānye ca caturbhujāḥ ।
dviraṣṭabāhavaś cānye daśaviṃśabhujās tathā ।।
asaṃkhyātabhujāś cānye kecid bāhusahasriṇaḥ ।
āyudhair vikṛtākāraiḥ prajvaladbhir bhayānakaiḥ ।।
śaktitomaracakrādyaiḥ sudīptair vividhāyudhaiḥ ।
pāśaśṛṅkhaladaṇḍaiś ca bhīṣayanto mahābalāḥ ।।
āgacchanti mahāraudrā martyānām āyuṣaḥ kṣaye ।
grahītuṃ prāṇinaḥ sarve yamasyājñākarās tathā ।।
yat tac charīram ādatte yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam ।
tad asya nīyate jantor yamasya sadanaṃ prati ।।
baddhvā tat kālapāśaiś ca nigaḍair vajraśṛṅkhalaiḥ ।
tāḍayitvā bhṛśaṃ kruddhair nīyate yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
praskhalantaṃ rudantaṃ ca ākrośantaṃ muhur muhuḥ ।
hā tāta mātaḥ putreti vadantaṃ karmadūṣitam ।।
āhatya niśitaiḥ śūlair mudgarair niśitair ghanaiḥ ।
khaḍgaśaktiprahāraiś ca vajradaṇḍaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ ।।
bhartsyamāno mahārāvair vajraśaktisamanvitaiḥ ।
ekaikaśo bhṛśaṃ kruddhais tāḍayadbhiḥ samantataḥ ।।
sa muhyamāno duḥkhārtaḥ pratapaṃś ca itas tataḥ ।
ākṛṣya nīyate jantur adhvānaṃ subhayaṃkaraiḥ ।।
kuśakaṇṭakavalmīka- śaṅkupāṣāṇaśarkare ।
tathā pradīptajvalane kṣāravajraśatotkaṭe ।।
pradīptādityataptena dahyamānas tadaṃśubhiḥ ।
kṛṣyate yamadūtaiś ca śivāsaṃnādabhīṣaṇaiḥ ।।
vikṛṣyamāṇas tair ghorair bhakṣyamāṇaḥ śivāśataiḥ ।
prayāti dāruṇe mārge pāpakarmā yamālayam ।।
kvacid bhītaiḥ kvacit trastaiḥ praskhaladbhiḥ kvacit kvacit ।
duḥkhenākrandamānaiś ca gantavyaḥ sa mahāpathaḥ ।।
nirbhartsyamānair udvignair vidrutair bhayavihvalaiḥ ।
kampamānaśarīrais tu gantavyaṃ jīvasaṃjñakaiḥ ।।
kaṇṭakākīrṇamārgeṇa saṃtaptasikatena ca ।
dahyamānais tu gantavyaṃ narair dānavivarjitaiḥ ।।
medaḥśoṇitadurgandhair bastagātraiś ca pūgaśaḥ ।
dagdhasphuṭatvacākīrṇair gantavyaṃ jīvaghātakaiḥ ।।
kūjadbhiḥ krandamānaiś ca vikrośadbhiś ca visvaram ।
vedanārtaiś ca sadbhiś ca gantavyaṃ jīvaghātakaiḥ ।।
śaktibhir bhindipālaiś ca khaḍgatomarasāyakaiḥ ।
bhidyadbhis tīkṣṇaśūlāgrair gantavyaṃ jīvaghātakaiḥ ।।
śvānair vyāghrair vṛkaiḥ kaṅkair bhakṣyamāṇaiś ca pāpibhiḥ ।।
kṛntadbhiḥ krakacāghātair gantavyaṃ māṃsakhādibhiḥ ।
mahiṣarṣabhaśṛṅgāgrair bhidyamānaiḥ samantataḥ ।।
ullikhadbhiḥ śūkaraiś ca gantavyaṃ māṃsakhādakaiḥ ।
sūcībhramarakākola- makṣikābhiś ca saṃghaśaḥ ।।
bhujyamānaiś ca gantavyaṃ pāpiṣṭhair madhughātakaiḥ ।
viśvastaṃ svāminaṃ mitraṃ striyaṃ vā yas tu ghātayet ।।
śastrair nikṛtyamānaiś ca gantavyaṃ cāturair naraiḥ ।
ghātayanti ca ye jantūṃs tāḍayanti nirāgasaḥ ।।
rākṣasair bhakṣyamāṇās te yānti yāmyapathaṃ narāḥ ।
ye haranti parastrīṇāṃ varaprāvaraṇāni ca ।।
te yānti vidrutā nagnāḥ pretībhūtā yamālayam ।
vāso dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā gṛhakṣetram athāpi vā ।।
ye haranti durātmānaḥ pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ ।
pāṣāṇair laguḍair daṇḍais tāḍyamānais tu jarjaraiḥ ।।
vahadbhiḥ śoṇitaṃ bhūri gantavyaṃ tu yamālayam ।
brahmasvaṃ ye harantīha narā narakanirbhayāḥ ।।
tāḍayanti tathā viprān ākrośanti narādhamāḥ ।
śuṣkakāṣṭhanibaddhās te chinnakarṇākṣināsikāḥ ।।
pūyaśoṇitadigdhās te kālagṛdhraiś ca jambukaiḥ ।
kiṃkarair bhīṣaṇaiś caṇḍais tāḍyamānāś ca dāruṇaiḥ ।।
vikrośamānā gacchanti pāpinas te yamālayam ।
evaṃ paramadurdharṣam adhvānaṃ jvalanaprabham ।।
rauravaṃ durgaviṣamaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ mānuṣasya ca ।
prataptatāmravarṇābhaṃ vahnijvālāsphuliṅgavat ।।
kuraṇṭakaṇṭakākīrṇaṃ pṛthuvikaṭatāḍanaiḥ ।
śaktivajraiś ca saṃkīrṇam ujjvalaṃ tīvrakaṇṭakam ।।
aṅgāravālukāmiśraṃ vahnikīṭakadurgamam ।
jvālāmālākulaṃ raudraṃ sūryaraśmipratāpitam ।।
adhvānaṃ nīyate dehī kṛṣyamāṇaḥ suniṣṭhuraiḥ ।
yadaiva krandate jantur duḥkhārtaḥ patitaḥ kvacit ।।
tadaivāhanyate sarvair āyudhair yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
evaṃ saṃtāḍyamānaś ca lubdhaḥ pāpeṣu yo anayaḥ ।।
avaśo nīyate jantur durdharair yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
sarvair eva hi gantavyam adhvānaṃ tat sudurgamam ।।
nīyate vividhair ghorair yamadūtair avajñayā ।
nītvā sudāruṇaṃ mārgaṃ prāṇinaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
praveśyate purīṃ ghorāṃ tāmrāyasamayīṃ dvijāḥ ।
sā purī vipulākārā lakṣayojanam āyatā ।।
caturasrā vinirdiṣṭā caturdvāravatī śubhā ।
prākārāḥ kāñcanās tasyā yojanāyutam ucchritāḥ ।।
indranīlamahānīla- padmarāgopaśobhitā ।
sā purī vividhaiḥ saṃghair ghorā ghoraiḥ samākulā ।।
devadānavagandharvair yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ ।
pūrvadvāraṃ śubhaṃ tasyāḥ patākāśataśobhitam ।।
vajrendranīlavaidūrya- muktāphalavibhūṣitam ।
gītanṛtyaiḥ samākīrṇaṃ gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ ।।
praveśas tena devānām ṛṣīṇāṃ yogināṃ tathā ।
gandharvasiddhayakṣāṇāṃ vidyādharavisarpiṇām ।।
uttaraṃ nagaradvāraṃ ghaṇṭācāmarabhūṣitam ।
chattracāmaravinyāsaṃ nānāratnair alaṃkṛtam ।।
vīṇāreṇuravai ramyair gītamaṅgalanāditaiḥ ।
ṛgyajuḥsāmanirghoṣair munivṛndasamākulam ।।
viśanti yena dharmajñāḥ satyavrataparāyaṇāḥ ।
grīṣme vāripradā ye ca śīte cāgnipradā narāḥ ।।
śrāntasaṃvāhakā ye ca priyavādaratāś ca ye ।
ye ca dānaratāḥ śūrā mātāpitṛparāś ca ye ।।
dvijaśuśrūṣaṇe yuktā nityaṃ ye atithipūjakāḥ ।
paścimaṃ tu mahādvāraṃ puryā ratnair vibhūṣitam ।।
vicitramaṇisopānaṃ tomaraiḥ samalaṃkṛtam ।
bherīmṛdaṅgasaṃnādaiḥ śaṅkhakāhalanāditam ।।
siddhavṛndaiḥ sadā hṛṣṭair maṅgalaiḥ praṇināditam ।
praveśas tena hṛṣṭānāṃ śivabhaktimatāṃ nṛṇām ।।
sarvatīrthaplutā ye ca pañcāgner ye ca sevakāḥ ।
prasthāne ye mṛtā vīrā mṛtāḥ kālañjare girau ।।
agnau vipannā ye vīrāḥ sādhitaṃ yair anāśakam ।
ye svāmimitralokārthe gograhe saṃkule hatāḥ ।।
te viśanti narāḥ śūrāḥ paścimena tapodhanāḥ ।
puryāṃ tasyā mahāghoraṃ sarvasattvabhayaṃkaram ।।
hāhākārasamākruṣṭaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ dvāram īdṛśam ।
andhakārasamāyuktaṃ tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaiḥ samanvitam ।।
kaṇṭakair vṛścikaiḥ sarpair vajrakīṭaiḥ sudurgamaiḥ ।
vilumpadbhir vṛkair vyāghrair ṛkṣaiḥ siṃhaiḥ sajambukaiḥ ।।
śvānamārjāragṛdhraiś ca sajvālakavalair mukhaiḥ ।
praveśas tena vai nityaṃ sarveṣām apakāriṇām ।।
ye ghātayanti viprān gā bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ tathāturam ।
śaraṇāgataṃ viśvastaṃ striyaṃ mitraṃ nirāyudham ।।
ye agamyāgāmino mūḍhāḥ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥ ।
nikṣepasyāpahartāro viṣavahnipradāś ca ye ।।
parabhūmiṃ gṛhaṃ śayyāṃ vastrālaṃkārahāriṇaḥ ।
pararandhreṣu ye krūrā ye sadānṛtavādinaḥ ।।
grāmarāṣṭrapurasthāne mahāduḥkhapradā hi ye ।
kūṭasākṣipradātāraḥ kanyāvikrayakārakāḥ ।।
