abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaratā ye gacchanti sutāṃ snuṣām ।
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva ye vadanti ca pauruṣam ।।
anye ye caiva nirdiṣṭā mahāpātakakāriṇaḥ ।
dakṣiṇena tu te sarve dvāreṇa praviśanti vai ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ puṇyadharmāmṛtasya ca ।
mune tvanmukhagītasya tathā kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ karmaṇo gatim ।
vetsi sarvaṃ mune tena pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahāmatim ।।
śrūyate yamalokasya mārgaḥ paramadurgamaḥ ।
duḥkhakleśakaraḥ śaśvat sarvabhūtabhayāvahaḥ ।।
kathaṃ tena narā yānti mārgeṇa yamasādanam ।
pramāṇaṃ caiva mārgasya brūhi no vadatāṃ vara ।।
mune pṛcchāma sarvajña brūhi sarvam aśeṣataḥ ।
kathaṃ narakaduḥkhāni nāpnuvanti narān mune ।।
kenopāyena dānena dharmeṇa niyamena ca ।
mānuṣasya ca yāmyasya lokasya kiyad antaram ।।
kathaṃ ca svargatiṃ yānti narakaṃ kena karmaṇā ।
svargasthānāni kiyanti kiyanti narakāṇi ca ।।
kathaṃ sukṛtino yānti kathaṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ ।
kiṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ vā ko varṇas tūbhayor api ।
jīvasya nīyamānasya yamalokaṃ bravīhi naḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlā vadato mama suvratāḥ ।
saṃsāracakram ajaraṃ sthitir yasya na vidyate ।।
so ahaṃ vadāmi vaḥ sarvaṃ yamamārgasya nirṇayam ।
utkrāntikālād ārabhya yathā nānyo vadiṣyati ।।
svarūpaṃ caiva mārgasya yan māṃ pṛcchatha sattamāḥ ।
yamalokasya cādhvānam antaraṃ mānuṣasya ca ।।
yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaḍaśītis tad antaram ।
taptatāmram ivātaptaṃ tad adhvānam udāhṛtam ।।
tad avaśyaṃ hi gantavyaṃ prāṇibhir jīvasaṃjñakaiḥ ।
puṇyān puṇyakṛto yānti pāpān pāpakṛto adhamāḥ ।।
dvāviṃśatiś ca narakā yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ ।
yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo vipacyante pṛthak pṛthak ।।
narako rauravo raudraḥ śūkaras tāla eva ca ।
kumbhīpāko mahāghoraḥ śālmalo atha vimohanaḥ ।।
kīṭādaḥ kṛmibhakṣaś ca nālābhakṣo bhramas tathā ।
nadyaḥ pūyavahāś cānyā rudhirāmbhas tathaiva ca ।।
agnijvālo mahāghoraḥ saṃdaṃśaḥ śunabhojanaḥ ।
ghorā vaitaraṇī caiva asipattravanaṃ tathā ।।
na tatra vṛkṣacchāyā vā na taḍāgāḥ sarāṃsi ca ।
na vāpyo dīrghikā vāpi na kūpo na prapā sabhā ।।
na maṇḍapo nāyatanaṃ na nadyo na ca parvatāḥ ।
na kiṃcid āśramasthānaṃ vidyate tatra vartmani ।।
yatra viśramate śrāntaḥ puruṣo atīvakarṣitaḥ ।
avaśyam eva gantavyaḥ sa sarvais tu mahāpathaḥ ।।
prāpte kāle tu saṃtyajya suhṛdbandhudhanādikam ।
jarāyujāṇḍajāś caiva svedajāś codbhijās tathā ।।
jaṅgamājaṅgamāś caiva gamiṣyanti mahāpatham ।
devāsuramanuṣyaiś ca vaivasvatavaśānugaiḥ ।।
strīpuṃnapuṃsakaiś caiva pṛthivyāṃ jīvasaṃjñitaiḥ ।
pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇe vā madhyāhne vā tathā punaḥ ।।
saṃdhyākāle ardharātre vā pratyūṣe vāpy upasthite ।
vṛddhair vā madhyamair vāpi yauvanasthais tathaiva ca ।।
garbhavāse atha bālye vā gantavyaḥ sa mahāpathaḥ ।
pravāsasthair gṛhasthair vā parvatasthaiḥ sthale api vā ।।
kṣetrasthair vā jalasthair vā gṛhamadhyagatais tathā ।
āsīnaiś cāsthitair vāpi śayanīyagatais tathā ।।
jāgradbhir vā prasuptair vā gantavyaḥ sa mahāpathaḥ ।
ihānubhūya nirdiṣṭam āyur jantuḥ svayaṃ tadā ।।
tasyānte ca svayaṃ prāṇair anicchann api mucyate ।
jalam agnir viṣaṃ śastraṃ kṣud vyādhiḥ patanaṃ gireḥ ।।
nimittaṃ kiṃcid āsādya dehī prāṇair vimucyate ।
vihāya sumahat kṛtsnaṃ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam ।।
anyac charīram ādatte yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam ।
dṛḍhaṃ śarīram āpnoti sukhaduḥkhopabhuktaye ।।
tena bhuṅkte sa kṛcchrāṇi pāpakartā naro bhṛśam ।
sukhāni dhārmiko hṛṣṭa iha nīto yamakṣaye ।।
ūṣmā prakupitaḥ kāye tīvravāyusamīritaḥ ।
bhinatti marmasthānāni dīpyamāno nirandhanaḥ ।।
udāno nāma pavanas tataś cordhvaṃ pravartate ।
bhujyatām ambubhakṣyāṇām adhogatinirodhakṛt ।।
tato yenāmbudānāni kṛtāny annarasās tathā ।
dattāḥ sa tasyām āhlādam āpadi pratipadyate ।।
annāni yena dattāni śraddhāpūtena cetasā ।
so api tṛptim avāpnoti vināpy annena vai tadā ।।
yenānṛtāni noktāni prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca ।
āstikaḥ śraddadhānaś ca sukhamṛtyuṃ sa gacchati ।।
devabrāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ niratāś cānasūyakāḥ ।
śuklā vadānyā hrīmantas te narāḥ sukhamṛtyavaḥ ।।
yaḥ kāmān nāpi saṃrambhān na dveṣād dharmam utsṛjet ।
yathoktakārī saumyaś ca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyum ṛcchati ।।
vāridās tṛṣitānāṃ ye kṣudhitānnapradāyinaḥ ।
prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāle mṛtyuṃ sukhasamanvitam ।।
śītaṃ jayanti dhanadās tāpaṃ candanadāyinaḥ ।
prāṇaghnīṃ vedanāṃ kaṣṭāṃ ye cānyodvegadhāriṇaḥ ।।
mohaṃ jñānapradātāras tathā dīpapradās tamaḥ ।
kūṭasākṣī mṛṣāvādī yo gurur nānuśāsti vai ।।
te mohamṛtyavaḥ sarve tathā ye vedanindakāḥ ।
vibhīṣaṇāḥ pūtigandhāḥ kūṭamudgarapāṇayaḥ ।।
āgacchanti durātmāno yamasya puruṣās tathā ।
prāpteṣu dṛkpathaṃ teṣu jāyate tasya vepathuḥ ।।
krandaty avirataḥ so atha bhrātṛmātṛpitṛṃs tathā ।
sā tu vāg asphuṭā viprā ekavarṇā vibhāvyate ।।
dṛṣṭir vibhrāmyate trāsāt kāsāvṛṣṭy aty athānanam ।
tataḥ sa vedanāviṣṭaṃ tac charīraṃ vimuñcati ।।
vāyvagrasārī tadrūpa- deham anyat prapadyate ।
tatkarmayātanārthe ca na mātṛpitṛsaṃbhavam ।।
tatpramāṇavayovasthā- saṃsthānaiḥ prāpyate vyathā ।
tato dūto yamasyātha pāśair badhnāti dāruṇaiḥ ।।
jantoḥ saṃprāptakālasya vedanārtasya vai bhṛśam ।
bhūtaiḥ saṃtyaktadehasya kaṇṭhaprāptānilasya ca ।।
śarīrāc cyāvito jīvo roravīti tatholbaṇam ।
nirgato vāyubhūtas tu ṣāṭkauśikakalevare ।।
mātṛbhiḥ pitṛbhiś caiva bhrātṛbhir mātulais tathā ।
dāraiḥ putrair vayasyaiś ca gurubhis tyajyate bhuvi ।।
dṛśyamānaś ca tair dīnair aśrupūrṇekṣaṇair bhṛśam ।
svaśarīraṃ samutsṛjya vāyubhūtas tu gacchati ।।
andhakāram apāraṃ ca mahāghoraṃ tamovṛtam ।
sukhaduḥkhapradātāraṃ durgamaṃ pāpakarmaṇām ।।
duḥsahaṃ ca durantaṃ ca durnirīkṣaṃ durāsadam ।
durāpam atidurgaṃ ca pāpiṣṭhānāṃ sadāhitam ।।
kṛṣyamāṇāś ca tair bhūtair yāmyaiḥ pāśais tu saṃyatāḥ ।
mudgarais tāḍyamānāś ca nīyante taṃ mahāpatham ।।
kṣīṇāyuṣaṃ samālokya prāṇinaṃ cāyuṣakṣaye ।
ninīṣavaḥ samāyānti yamadūtā bhayaṃkarāḥ ।।
ārūḍhā yānakāle tu ṛkṣavyāghrakhareṣu ca ।
uṣṭreṣu vānareṣv anye vṛścikeṣu vṛkeṣu ca ।।
ulūkasarpamārjāraṃ tathānye gṛdhravāhanāḥ ।
śyenaśṛgālam ārūḍhāḥ saraghākaṅkavāhanāḥ ।।
varāhapaśuvetāla- mahiṣāsyās tathā pare ।
nānārūpadharā ghorāḥ sarvaprāṇibhayaṃkarāḥ ।।
dīrghamuṣkāḥ karālāsyā vakranāsās trilocanāḥ ।
mahāhanukapolāsyāḥ pralambadaśanacchadāḥ ।।
nirgatair vikṛtākārair daśanair aṅkuropamaiḥ ।
māṃsaśoṇitadigdhāṅgā daṃṣṭrābhir bhṛśam ulbaṇaiḥ ।।
mukhaiḥ pātālasadṛśair jvalajjihvair bhayaṃkaraiḥ ।
netraiḥ suvikṛtākārair jvalatpiṅgalacañcalaiḥ ।।
mārjārolūkakhadyota- śakragopavad uddhataiḥ ।
kekaraiḥ saṃkulais stabdhair locanaiḥ pāvakopamaiḥ ।।
bhṛśam ābharaṇair bhīmair ābaddhair bhujagopamaiḥ ।
śoṇāsaralagātraiś ca muṇḍamālāvibhūṣitaiḥ ।।
kaṇṭhasthakṛṣṇasarpaiś ca phūtkāraravabhīṣaṇaiḥ ।
vahnijvālopamaiḥ keśaiḥ stabdharukṣair bhayaṃkaraiḥ ।।
babhrupiṅgalalolaiś ca kadruśmaśrubhir āvṛtāḥ ।
bhujadaṇḍair mahāghoraiḥ pralambaiḥ parighopamaiḥ ।।
kecid dvibāhavas tatra tathānye ca caturbhujāḥ ।
dviraṣṭabāhavaś cānye daśaviṃśabhujās tathā ।।
asaṃkhyātabhujāś cānye kecid bāhusahasriṇaḥ ।
āyudhair vikṛtākāraiḥ prajvaladbhir bhayānakaiḥ ।।
śaktitomaracakrādyaiḥ sudīptair vividhāyudhaiḥ ।
pāśaśṛṅkhaladaṇḍaiś ca bhīṣayanto mahābalāḥ ।।
āgacchanti mahāraudrā martyānām āyuṣaḥ kṣaye ।
grahītuṃ prāṇinaḥ sarve yamasyājñākarās tathā ।।
yat tac charīram ādatte yātanīyaṃ svakarmajam ।
tad asya nīyate jantor yamasya sadanaṃ prati ।।
baddhvā tat kālapāśaiś ca nigaḍair vajraśṛṅkhalaiḥ ।
tāḍayitvā bhṛśaṃ kruddhair nīyate yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
praskhalantaṃ rudantaṃ ca ākrośantaṃ muhur muhuḥ ।
hā tāta mātaḥ putreti vadantaṃ karmadūṣitam ।।
āhatya niśitaiḥ śūlair mudgarair niśitair ghanaiḥ ।
khaḍgaśaktiprahāraiś ca vajradaṇḍaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ ।।
bhartsyamāno mahārāvair vajraśaktisamanvitaiḥ ।
ekaikaśo bhṛśaṃ kruddhais tāḍayadbhiḥ samantataḥ ।।
sa muhyamāno duḥkhārtaḥ pratapaṃś ca itas tataḥ ।
ākṛṣya nīyate jantur adhvānaṃ subhayaṃkaraiḥ ।।
kuśakaṇṭakavalmīka- śaṅkupāṣāṇaśarkare ।
tathā pradīptajvalane kṣāravajraśatotkaṭe ।।
pradīptādityataptena dahyamānas tadaṃśubhiḥ ।
kṛṣyate yamadūtaiś ca śivāsaṃnādabhīṣaṇaiḥ ।।
vikṛṣyamāṇas tair ghorair bhakṣyamāṇaḥ śivāśataiḥ ।
prayāti dāruṇe mārge pāpakarmā yamālayam ।।
kvacid bhītaiḥ kvacit trastaiḥ praskhaladbhiḥ kvacit kvacit ।
duḥkhenākrandamānaiś ca gantavyaḥ sa mahāpathaḥ ।।
nirbhartsyamānair udvignair vidrutair bhayavihvalaiḥ ।
kampamānaśarīrais tu gantavyaṃ jīvasaṃjñakaiḥ ।।
kaṇṭakākīrṇamārgeṇa saṃtaptasikatena ca ।
dahyamānais tu gantavyaṃ narair dānavivarjitaiḥ ।।
medaḥśoṇitadurgandhair bastagātraiś ca pūgaśaḥ ।
dagdhasphuṭatvacākīrṇair gantavyaṃ jīvaghātakaiḥ ।।
kūjadbhiḥ krandamānaiś ca vikrośadbhiś ca visvaram ।
vedanārtaiś ca sadbhiś ca gantavyaṃ jīvaghātakaiḥ ।।
śaktibhir bhindipālaiś ca khaḍgatomarasāyakaiḥ ।
bhidyadbhis tīkṣṇaśūlāgrair gantavyaṃ jīvaghātakaiḥ ।।
śvānair vyāghrair vṛkaiḥ kaṅkair bhakṣyamāṇaiś ca pāpibhiḥ ।।
kṛntadbhiḥ krakacāghātair gantavyaṃ māṃsakhādibhiḥ ।
mahiṣarṣabhaśṛṅgāgrair bhidyamānaiḥ samantataḥ ।।
ullikhadbhiḥ śūkaraiś ca gantavyaṃ māṃsakhādakaiḥ ।
sūcībhramarakākola- makṣikābhiś ca saṃghaśaḥ ।।
bhujyamānaiś ca gantavyaṃ pāpiṣṭhair madhughātakaiḥ ।
viśvastaṃ svāminaṃ mitraṃ striyaṃ vā yas tu ghātayet ।।
śastrair nikṛtyamānaiś ca gantavyaṃ cāturair naraiḥ ।
ghātayanti ca ye jantūṃs tāḍayanti nirāgasaḥ ।।
rākṣasair bhakṣyamāṇās te yānti yāmyapathaṃ narāḥ ।
ye haranti parastrīṇāṃ varaprāvaraṇāni ca ।।
te yānti vidrutā nagnāḥ pretībhūtā yamālayam ।
vāso dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā gṛhakṣetram athāpi vā ।।
ye haranti durātmānaḥ pāpiṣṭhāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ ।
pāṣāṇair laguḍair daṇḍais tāḍyamānais tu jarjaraiḥ ।।
vahadbhiḥ śoṇitaṃ bhūri gantavyaṃ tu yamālayam ।
brahmasvaṃ ye harantīha narā narakanirbhayāḥ ।।
tāḍayanti tathā viprān ākrośanti narādhamāḥ ।
śuṣkakāṣṭhanibaddhās te chinnakarṇākṣināsikāḥ ।।
pūyaśoṇitadigdhās te kālagṛdhraiś ca jambukaiḥ ।
kiṃkarair bhīṣaṇaiś caṇḍais tāḍyamānāś ca dāruṇaiḥ ।।
vikrośamānā gacchanti pāpinas te yamālayam ।
evaṃ paramadurdharṣam adhvānaṃ jvalanaprabham ।।
rauravaṃ durgaviṣamaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ mānuṣasya ca ।
prataptatāmravarṇābhaṃ vahnijvālāsphuliṅgavat ।।
kuraṇṭakaṇṭakākīrṇaṃ pṛthuvikaṭatāḍanaiḥ ।
śaktivajraiś ca saṃkīrṇam ujjvalaṃ tīvrakaṇṭakam ।।
aṅgāravālukāmiśraṃ vahnikīṭakadurgamam ।
jvālāmālākulaṃ raudraṃ sūryaraśmipratāpitam ।।
adhvānaṃ nīyate dehī kṛṣyamāṇaḥ suniṣṭhuraiḥ ।
yadaiva krandate jantur duḥkhārtaḥ patitaḥ kvacit ।।
tadaivāhanyate sarvair āyudhair yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
evaṃ saṃtāḍyamānaś ca lubdhaḥ pāpeṣu yo anayaḥ ।।
avaśo nīyate jantur durdharair yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
sarvair eva hi gantavyam adhvānaṃ tat sudurgamam ।।
nīyate vividhair ghorair yamadūtair avajñayā ।
nītvā sudāruṇaṃ mārgaṃ prāṇinaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
praveśyate purīṃ ghorāṃ tāmrāyasamayīṃ dvijāḥ ।
sā purī vipulākārā lakṣayojanam āyatā ।।
caturasrā vinirdiṣṭā caturdvāravatī śubhā ।
prākārāḥ kāñcanās tasyā yojanāyutam ucchritāḥ ।।
indranīlamahānīla- padmarāgopaśobhitā ।
sā purī vividhaiḥ saṃghair ghorā ghoraiḥ samākulā ।।
devadānavagandharvair yakṣarākṣasapannagaiḥ ।
pūrvadvāraṃ śubhaṃ tasyāḥ patākāśataśobhitam ।।
vajrendranīlavaidūrya- muktāphalavibhūṣitam ।
gītanṛtyaiḥ samākīrṇaṃ gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ ।।
praveśas tena devānām ṛṣīṇāṃ yogināṃ tathā ।
gandharvasiddhayakṣāṇāṃ vidyādharavisarpiṇām ।।
uttaraṃ nagaradvāraṃ ghaṇṭācāmarabhūṣitam ।
chattracāmaravinyāsaṃ nānāratnair alaṃkṛtam ।।
vīṇāreṇuravai ramyair gītamaṅgalanāditaiḥ ।
ṛgyajuḥsāmanirghoṣair munivṛndasamākulam ।।
viśanti yena dharmajñāḥ satyavrataparāyaṇāḥ ।
grīṣme vāripradā ye ca śīte cāgnipradā narāḥ ।।
śrāntasaṃvāhakā ye ca priyavādaratāś ca ye ।
ye ca dānaratāḥ śūrā mātāpitṛparāś ca ye ।।
dvijaśuśrūṣaṇe yuktā nityaṃ ye atithipūjakāḥ ।
paścimaṃ tu mahādvāraṃ puryā ratnair vibhūṣitam ।।
vicitramaṇisopānaṃ tomaraiḥ samalaṃkṛtam ।
bherīmṛdaṅgasaṃnādaiḥ śaṅkhakāhalanāditam ।।
siddhavṛndaiḥ sadā hṛṣṭair maṅgalaiḥ praṇināditam ।
praveśas tena hṛṣṭānāṃ śivabhaktimatāṃ nṛṇām ।।
sarvatīrthaplutā ye ca pañcāgner ye ca sevakāḥ ।
prasthāne ye mṛtā vīrā mṛtāḥ kālañjare girau ।।
agnau vipannā ye vīrāḥ sādhitaṃ yair anāśakam ।
ye svāmimitralokārthe gograhe saṃkule hatāḥ ।।
te viśanti narāḥ śūrāḥ paścimena tapodhanāḥ ।
puryāṃ tasyā mahāghoraṃ sarvasattvabhayaṃkaram ।।
hāhākārasamākruṣṭaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ dvāram īdṛśam ।
andhakārasamāyuktaṃ tīkṣṇaśṛṅgaiḥ samanvitam ।।
kaṇṭakair vṛścikaiḥ sarpair vajrakīṭaiḥ sudurgamaiḥ ।
vilumpadbhir vṛkair vyāghrair ṛkṣaiḥ siṃhaiḥ sajambukaiḥ ।।
śvānamārjāragṛdhraiś ca sajvālakavalair mukhaiḥ ।
praveśas tena vai nityaṃ sarveṣām apakāriṇām ।।
ye ghātayanti viprān gā bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ tathāturam ।
śaraṇāgataṃ viśvastaṃ striyaṃ mitraṃ nirāyudham ।।
ye agamyāgāmino mūḍhāḥ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥ ।
nikṣepasyāpahartāro viṣavahnipradāś ca ye ।।
parabhūmiṃ gṛhaṃ śayyāṃ vastrālaṃkārahāriṇaḥ ।
pararandhreṣu ye krūrā ye sadānṛtavādinaḥ ।।
grāmarāṣṭrapurasthāne mahāduḥkhapradā hi ye ।
kūṭasākṣipradātāraḥ kanyāvikrayakārakāḥ ।।
abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaratā ye gacchanti sutāṃ snuṣām ।
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva ye vadanti ca pauruṣam ।।
anye ye caiva nirdiṣṭā mahāpātakakāriṇaḥ ।
dakṣiṇena tu te sarve dvāreṇa praviśanti vai ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathaṃ dakṣiṇamārgeṇa viśanti pāpinaḥ puram ।
śrotum icchāma tad brūhi vistareṇa tapodhana ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sughoraṃ tan mahāghoraṃ dvāraṃ vakṣyāmi bhīṣaṇam ।
nānāśvāpadasaṃkīrṇaṃ śivāśatanināditam ।।
phetkāraravasaṃyuktam agamyaṃ lomaharṣaṇam ।
bhūtapretapiśācaiś ca vṛtaṃ cānyaiś ca rākṣasaiḥ ।।
evaṃ dṛṣṭvā sudūrānte dvāraṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ ।
mohaṃ gacchanti sahasā trāsād vipralapanti ca ।।
tatas tāñ śṛṅkhalaiḥ pāśair baddhvā karṣanti nirbhayāḥ ।
tāḍayanti ca daṇḍaiś ca bhartsayanti punaḥ punaḥ ।।
labdhasaṃjñās tatas te vai rudhireṇa pariplutāḥ ।
vrajanti dakṣiṇaṃ dvāraṃ praskhalantaḥ pade pade ।।
tīvrakaṇṭakayuktena śarkarānicitena ca ।
kṣuradhārānibhais tīkṣṇaiḥ pāṣāṇair nicitena ca ।।
kvacit paṅkena nicitā niruttāraiś ca khātakaiḥ ।
lohasūcīnibhair dantaiḥ saṃchannena kvacit kvacit ।।
taṭaprapātaviṣamaiḥ parvatair vṛkṣasaṃkulaiḥ ।
prataptāṅgārayuktena yānti mārgeṇa duḥkhitāḥ ।।
kvacid viṣamagartābhiḥ kvacil loṣṭaiḥ supicchalaiḥ ।
sutaptavālukābhiś ca tathā tīkṣṇaiś ca śaṅkubhiḥ ।।
ayaḥśṛṅgāṭakais taptaiḥ kvacid dāvāgninā yutam ।
kvacit taptaśilābhiś ca kvacid vyāptaṃ himena ca ।।
kvacid vālukayā vyāptam ākaṇṭhāntaḥpraveśayā ।
kvacid duṣṭāmbunā vyāptaṃ kvacit karṣāgninā punaḥ ।।
kvacit siṃhair vṛkair vyāghrair daśakīṭaiś ca dāruṇaiḥ ।
kvacin mahājalaukābhiḥ kvacid ajagaraiḥ punaḥ ।।
makṣikābhiś ca raudrābhiḥ kvacit sarpaviṣolbaṇaiḥ ।
kvacid duṣṭagajaiś caiva balonmattaiḥ pramāthibhiḥ ।।
panthānam ullikhadbhiś ca tīkṣṇaśṛṅgair mahāvṛṣaiḥ ।
mahāśṛṅgaiś ca mahiṣair uṣṭrair mattaiś ca khādanaiḥ ।।
ḍākinībhiś ca raudrābhir vikarālaiś ca rākṣasaiḥ ।
vyādhibhiś ca mahāraudraiḥ pīḍyamānā vrajanti te ।।
mahādhūlivimiśreṇa mahācaṇḍena vāyunā ।
mahāpāṣāṇavarṣeṇa hanyamānā nirāśrayāḥ ।।
kvacid vidyunnipātena dīryamāṇā vrajanti te ।
mahatā bāṇavarṣeṇa bhidyamānāś ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
patadbhir vajranirghātair ulkāpātaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ ।
pradīptāṅgāravarṣeṇa dahyamānā viśanti ca ।।
mahatā pāṃśuvarṣeṇa pūryamāṇā rudanti ca ।
meghāravaiḥ sughoraiś ca vitrāsyante muhur muhuḥ ।।
niḥśeṣāḥ śaravarṣeṇa cūrṇyamāṇāś ca sarvataḥ ।
mahākṣārāmbudhārābhiḥ sicyamānā vrajanti ca ।।
mahāśītena marutā rūkṣeṇa paruṣeṇa ca ।
samantād dīryamāṇāś ca śuṣyante saṃkucanti ca ।।
itthaṃ mārgeṇa puruṣāḥ pātheyarahitena ca ।
nirālambena durgeṇa nirjalena samantataḥ ।।
atiśrameṇa mahatā nirgatenāśramāya vai ।
nīyante dehinaḥ sarve ye mūḍhāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ ।।
yamadūtair mahāghorais tadājñākāribhir balāt ।
ekākinaḥ parādhīnā mitrabandhuvivarjitāḥ ।।
śocantaḥ svāni karmāṇi rudanti ca muhur muhuḥ ।
pretībhūtā niṣiddhās te śuṣkakaṇṭhauṣṭhatālukāḥ ।।
kṛśāṅgā bhītabhītāś ca dahyamānāḥ kṣudhāgninā ।
baddhāḥ śṛṅkhalayā kecit kecid uttānapādayoḥ ।।
ākṛṣyante śuṣyamāṇā yamadūtair balotkaṭaiḥ ।
narā adhomukhāś cānye kṛṣyamāṇāḥ suduḥkhitāḥ ।।
annapānīyarahitā yācamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
dehi dehīti bhāṣantaḥ sāśrugadgadayā girā ।।
kṛtāñjalipuṭā dīnāḥ kṣuttṛṣṇāparipīḍitāḥ ।
bhakṣyān uccāvacān dṛṣṭvā bhojyān peyāṃś ca puṣkalān ।।
sugandhadravyasaṃyuktān yācamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
dadhikṣīraghṛtonmiśraṃ dṛṣṭvā śālyodanaṃ tathā ।।
pānāni ca sugandhīni śītalāny udakāni ca ।
tān yācamānāṃs te yāmyā bhartsayantas tadābruvan ।
vacobhiḥ paruṣair bhīmāḥ krodharaktāntalocanāḥ ।।
{yāmyā ūcuḥ 
na bhavadbhir hutaṃ kāle na dattaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu ca ।
prasabhaṃ dīyamānaṃ ca vāritaṃ ca dvijātiṣu ।।
tasya pāpasya ca phalaṃ bhavatāṃ samupāgatam ।
nāgnau dagdhaṃ jale naṣṭaṃ na hṛtaṃ nṛpataskaraiḥ ।।
kuto vā sāṃprataṃ vipre yan na dattaṃ purādhamāḥ ।
yair dattāni tu dānāni sādhubhiḥ sāttvikāni tu ।।
teṣām ete pradṛśyante kalpitā hy annaparvatāḥ ।
bhakṣyabhojyāś ca peyāś ca lehyāś coṣyāś ca saṃvṛtāḥ ।।
na yūyam abhilapsyadhve na dattaṃ ca kathaṃcana ।
yais tu dattaṃ hutaṃ ceṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇāś caiva pūjitāḥ ।।
teṣām annaṃ samānīya iha nikṣipyate sadā ।
parasvaṃ katham asmābhir dātuṃ śakyeta nārakāḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
kiṃkarāṇāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā niḥspṛhāḥ kṣuttṛṣārditāḥ ।
tatas te dāruṇaiś cāstraiḥ pīḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
mudgarair lohadaṇḍaiś ca śaktitomarapaṭṭiśaiḥ ।
parighair bhindipālaiś ca gadāparaśubhiḥ śaraiḥ ।।
pṛṣṭhato hanyamānyāś ca yamadūtaiḥ sunirdayaiḥ ।
agrataḥ siṃhavyāghrādyair bhakṣyante pāpakāriṇaḥ ।।
na praveṣṭuṃ na nirgantuṃ labhante duḥkhitā bhṛśam ।
svakarmopahatāḥ pāpāḥ krandamānāḥ sudāruṇāḥ ।।
tatra saṃpīḍya subhṛśaṃ praveśaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
nīyante pāpinas tatra yatra tiṣṭhet svayaṃ yamaḥ ।।
dharmātmā dharmakṛd devaḥ sarvasaṃyamano yamaḥ ।
evaṃ pathātikaṣṭena prāptāḥ pretapuraṃ narāḥ ।।
prajñāpitās tadā dūtair niveśyante yamāgrataḥ ।
tatas te pāpakarmāṇas taṃ paśyanti bhayānakam ।।
pāpāpaviddhanayanā viparītātmabuddhayaḥ ।
daṃṣṭrākarālavadanaṃ bhrukūṭīkuṭilekṣaṇam ।।
ūrdhvakeśaṃ mahāśmaśruṃ prasphuradadharottaram ।
aṣṭādaśabhujaṃ kruddhaṃ nīlāñjanacayopamam ।।
sarvāyudhodyatakaraṃ tīvradaṇḍena saṃyutam ।
mahāmahiṣam ārūḍhaṃ dīptāgnisamalocanam ।।
raktamālyāmbaradharaṃ mahāmegham ivocchritam ।
pralayāmbudanirghoṣaṃ pibann iva mahodadhim ।।
grasantam iva trailokyam udgirantam ivānalam ।
mṛtyuṃ ca tatsamīpasthaṃ kālānalasamaprabham ।।
pralayānalasaṃkāśaṃ kṛtāntaṃ ca bhayānakam ।
mārīcogrā mahāmārī kālarātrī ca dāruṇā ।।
vividhā vyādhayaḥ kaṣṭā nānārūpā bhayāvahāḥ ।
śaktiśūlāṅkuśadharāḥ pāśacakrāsidhāriṇaḥ ।।
vajradaṇḍadharā raudrāḥ kṣuratūṇadhanurdharāḥ ।
asaṃkhyātā mahāvīryāḥ krūrāś cāñjanasaprabhāḥ ।।
sarvāyudhodyatakarā yamadūtā bhayānakāḥ ।
anena parivāreṇa mahāghoreṇa saṃvṛtam ।।
yamaṃ paśyanti pāpiṣṭhāś citraguptaṃ vibhīṣaṇam ।
nirbhartsayati cātyarthaṃ yamas tān pāpakāriṇaḥ ।।
citraguptas tu bhagavān dharmavākyaiḥ prabodhayan ।।
{citragupta uvāca 
bho bho duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥ ।
garvitā rūpavīryeṇa paradāravimardakāḥ ।।
yat svayaṃ kriyate karma tat svayaṃ bhujyate punaḥ ।
tat kim ātmopaghātārthaṃ bhavadbhir duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam ।।
idānīṃ kiṃ nu śocadhvaṃ pīḍyamānāḥ svakarmabhiḥ ।
bhuñjadhvaṃ svāni duḥkhāni nahi doṣo asti kasyacit ।।
ya ete pṛthivīpālāḥ saṃprāptā matsamīpataḥ ।
svakīyaiḥ karmabhir ghorair duṣprajñā balagarvitāḥ ।।
bho bho nṛpā durācārāḥ prajāvidhvaṃsakāriṇaḥ ।
alpakālasya rājyasya kṛte kiṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam ।।
rājyalobhena mohena balād anyāyataḥ prajāḥ ।
yad daṇḍitāḥ phalaṃ tasya bhuñjadhvam adhunā nṛpāḥ ।।
kuto rājyaṃ kalatraṃ ca yadartham aśubhaṃ kṛtam ।
tat sarvaṃ saṃparityajya yūyam ekākinaḥ sthitāḥ ।।
paśyāmo na balaṃ sarvaṃ yena vidhvaṃsitāḥ prajāḥ ।
yamadūtaiḥ pāṭyamānā adhunā kīdṛśaṃ phalam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evaṃ bahuvidhair vākyair upālabdhā yamena te ।
śocantaḥ svāni karmāṇi tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhanti pārthivāḥ ।।
iti karma samādiśya nṛpāṇāṃ dharmarāṭ svayam ।
tatpātakaviśuddhyartham idaṃ vacanam abravīt ।।
{yama uvāca 
bho bhoś caṇḍa mahācaṇḍa gṛhītvā nṛpatīn imān ।
viśodhayadhvaṃ pāpebhyaḥ krameṇa narakāgniṣu ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tataḥ śīghraṃ samutthāya nṛpān saṃgṛhya pādayoḥ ।
bhrāmayitvā tu vegena kṣiptvā cordhvaṃ pragṛhya ca ।।
tattatpāpapramāṇena yamadūtāḥ śilātale ।
āsphoṭayanti tarasā vajreṇeva mahādrumam ।।
tatas tu raktaṃ srotobhiḥ sravate jarjarīkṛtaḥ ।
niḥsaṃjñaḥ sa tadā dehī niśceṣṭaś ca prajāyate ।।
tataḥ sa vāyunā spṛṣṭaḥ śanair ujjīvate punaḥ ।
tataḥ pāpaviśuddhyarthaṃ kṣipanti narakārṇave ।।
anyāṃś ca te tadā dūtāḥ pāpakarmaratān narān ।
nivedayanti viprendrā yamāya bhṛśaduḥkhitān ।।
{yamadūtā ūcuḥ 
eṣa deva tavādeśād asmābhir mohito bhṛśam ।
ānīto dharmavimukhaḥ sadā pāparataḥ paraḥ ।।
eṣa lubdho durācāro mahāpātakasaṃyutaḥ ।
upapātakakartā ca sadā hiṃsārato śuciḥ ।।
agamyāgāmī duṣṭātmā paradravyāpahārakaḥ ।
kanyākrayī kūṭasākṣī kṛtaghno mitravañcakaḥ ।।
anena madamattena sadā dharmo vininditaḥ ।
pāpam ācaritaṃ karma martyaloke durātmanā ।।
idānīm asya deveśa nigrahānugrahau vada ।
prabhur asya kriyāyoge vayaṃ vā paripanthinaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
iti vijñāpya deveśaṃ nyasyāgre pāpakāriṇam ।
narakāṇāṃ sahasreṣu lakṣakoṭiśateṣu ca ।।
kiṃkarās te tato yānti grahītum aparān narān ।
pratipanne kṛte doṣe yamo vai pāpakāriṇām ।।
samādiśati tān ghorān nigrahāya svakiṃkarān ।
yathā yasya vinirdiṣṭo vasiṣṭhādyair vinigrahaḥ ।।
pāpasya tad bhṛśaṃ kruddhāḥ kurvanti yamakiṃkarāḥ ।
aṅkuśair mudgarair daṇḍaiḥ krakacaiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ ।।
khaḍgaśūlanipātaiś ca bhidyante pāpakāriṇaḥ ।
narakāṇāṃ sahasreṣu lakṣakoṭiśateṣu ca ।।
svakarmopārjitair doṣaiḥ pīḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ narakāṇāṃ ca svarūpaṃ ca bhayaṃkaram ।।
nāmāni ca pramāṇaṃ ca yena yānti narāś ca tān ।
mahāvācīti vikhyātaṃ narakaṃ śoṇitaplutam ।।
vajrakaṇṭakasaṃmiśraṃ yojanāyutavistṛtam ।
tatra saṃpīḍyate magno bhidyate vajrakaṇṭake ।।
varṣalakṣaṃ mahāghoraṃ goghātī narake naraḥ ।
yojanānāṃ śataṃ lakṣaṃ kumbhīpākaṃ sudāruṇam ।।
tāmrakumbhavatī dīptā vālukāṅgārasaṃvṛtā ।
brahmahā bhūmihartā ca nikṣepasyāpahārakaḥ ।।
dahyante tatra saṃkṣiptā yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।
rauravo vajranārācaiḥ prajvaladbhiḥ samāvṛtaḥ ।।
yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭir āyāmavistaraiḥ ।
bhidyante tatra nārācaiḥ sajvālair narake narāḥ ।।
ikṣuvat tatra pīḍyante ye narāḥ kūṭasākṣiṇaḥ ।
ayomayaṃ prajvalitaṃ mañjūṣaṃ narakaṃ smṛtam ।।
nikṣiptās tatra dahyante bandigrāhakṛtāś ca ye ।
apratiṣṭheti narakaṃ pūyamūtrapurīṣakam ।।
adhomukhaḥ patet tatra brāhmaṇasyopapīḍakaḥ ।
lākṣāprajvalitaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ tu vilepakam ।।
nimagnās tatra dahyante madyapāne dvijottamāḥ ।
mahāprabheti narakaṃ dīptaśūlamahocchrayam ।।
tatra śūlena bhidyante patibhāryopabhedinaḥ ।
narakaṃ ca mahāghoraṃ jayantī cāyasī śilā ।।
tayā cākramyate pāpaḥ paradāropasevakaḥ ।
narakaṃ śālmalākhyaṃ tu pradīptadṛḍhakaṇṭakam ।।
tayā liṅgati duḥkhārtā nārī bahunaraṃgamā ।
ye vadanti sadāsatyaṃ paramarmāvakartanam ।।
jihvā cocchriyate teṣāṃ sadasyair yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
ye tu rāgaiḥ kaṭākṣaiś ca vīkṣante parayoṣitam ।।
teṣāṃ cakṣūṃṣi nārācair vidhyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
mātaraṃ ye api gacchanti bhaginīṃ duhitaraṃ snuṣām ।
strībālavṛddhahantāro yāvad indrāś caturdaśa ।
jvālāmālākulaṃ raudraṃ mahārauravasaṃjñitam ।।
narakaṃ yojanānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi caturdaśa ।
puraṃ kṣetraṃ gṛhaṃ grāmaṃ yo dīpayati vahninā ।।
sa tatra dahyate mūḍho yāvat kalpasthitir naraḥ ।
tāmisram iti vikhyātaṃ lakṣayojanavistṛtam ।।
nipatadbhiḥ sadā raudraḥ khaḍgapaṭṭiśamudgaraiḥ ।
tatra caurā narāḥ kṣiptās tāḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।।
śūlaśaktigadākhaḍgair yāvat kalpaśatatrayam ।
tāmisrād dviguṇaṃ proktaṃ mahātāmisrasaṃjñitam ।।
jalaukāsarpasaṃpūrṇāṃ nirālokaṃ suduḥkhadam ।
mātṛhā pitṛhā caiva mitravisrambhaghātakaḥ ।।
tiṣṭhanti takṣyamāṇāś ca yāvat tiṣṭhati medinī ।
asipattravanaṃ nāma narakaṃ bhūriduḥkhadam ।।
yojanāyutavistāraṃ jvalatkhaḍgaiḥ samākulam ।
pātitas tatra taiḥ khaḍgaiḥ śatadhā tu samāhataḥ ।।
mitraghnaḥ kṛtyate tāvad yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavam ।
karambhavālukā nāma narakaṃ yojanāyutam ।।
kūpākāraṃ vṛtaṃ dīptair vālukāṅgārakaṇṭakaiḥ ।
dahyate bhidyate varṣa- lakṣāyutaśatatrayam ।।
yena dagdho jano nityaṃ mithyopāyaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ ।
kākolaṃ nāma narakaṃ kṛmipūyapariplutam ।।
kṣipyate tatra duṣṭātmā ekākī miṣṭabhuṅ naraḥ ।
kuḍmalaṃ nāma narakaṃ pūrṇaṃ viṇmūtraśoṇitaiḥ ।।
pañcayajñakriyāhīnāḥ kṣipyante tatra vai narāḥ ।
sudurgandhaṃ mahābhīmaṃ māṃsaśoṇitasaṃkulam ।।
abhakṣyānne ratās te atra nipatanti narādhamāḥ ।
krimikīṭasamākīrṇaṃ śavapūrṇaṃ mahāvaṭam ।।
adhomukhaḥ patet tatra kanyāvikrayakṛn naraḥ ।
nāmnā vai tilapāketi narakaṃ dāruṇaṃ smṛtam ।।
tilavat tatra pīḍyante parapīḍāratāś ca ye ।
narakaṃ tailapāketi jvalattailamahīplavam ।।
pacyate tatra mitraghno hantā ca śaraṇāgatam ।
nāmnā vajrakapāṭeti vajraśṛṅkhalayānvitam ।।
pīḍyante nirdayaṃ tatra yaiḥ kṛtaḥ kṣīravikrayaḥ ।
nirucchvāsa iti proktaṃ tamondhaṃ vātavarjitam ।।
niśceṣṭaṃ kṣipyate tatra vipradānanirodhakṛt ।
aṅgāropacayaṃ nāma dīptāṅgārasamujjvalam ।।
dahyate tatra yenoktaṃ dānaṃ viprāya nārpitam ।
mahāpāyīti narakaṃ lakṣayojanam āyatam ।।
pātyante adhomukhās tatra ye jalpanti sadānṛtam ।
mahājvāleti narakaṃ jvālābhāsvarabhīṣaṇam ।।
dahyate tatra suciraṃ yaḥ pāpe buddhikṛn naraḥ ।
narakaṃ krakacākhyātaṃ pīḍyante tatra vai narāḥ ।।
krakacair vajradhārograir agamyāgamane ratāḥ ।
narakaṃ guḍapāketi jvaladguḍahradair vṛtam ।।
nikṣipto dahyate tasmin varṇasaṃkarakṛn naraḥ ।
kṣuradhāreti narakaṃ tīkṣṇakṣurasamāvṛtam ।।
chidyante tatra kalpāntaṃ viprabhūmiharā narāḥ ।
narakaṃ cāmbarīṣākhyaṃ pralayānaladīpitam ।।
kalpakoṭiśataṃ tatra dahyate svarṇahārakaḥ ।
nāmnā vajrakuṭhāreti narakaṃ vajrasaṃkulam ।।
chidyante tatra chettāro drumāṇāṃ pāpakāriṇaḥ ।
narakaṃ paritāpākhyaṃ pralayānaladīpitam ।।
garado madhuhartā ca pacyate tatra pāpakṛt ।
narakaṃ kālasūtraṃ ca vajrasūtravinirmitam ।।
bhramantas tatra cchidyante parasasyopaluṇṭhakāḥ ।
narakaṃ kaśmalaṃ nāma śleṣmaśiṅghāṇakāvṛtam ।।
tatra saṃkṣipyate kalpaṃ sadā māṃsarucir naraḥ ।
narakaṃ cogragandheti lālāmūtrapurīṣavat ।।
kṣipyante tatra narake pitṛpiṇḍāprayacchakāḥ ।
narakaṃ durdharaṃ nāma jalaukāvṛścikākulam ।।
utkocabhakṣakas tatra tiṣṭhate varṣakāyutam ।
yac ca vajramahāpīḍā narakaṃ vajranirmitam ।।
tatra prakṣipya dahyante pīḍyante yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ vā parakīyaṃ haranti ye ।।
yamadūtaiś ca caurās te chidyante lavaśaḥ kṣuraiḥ ।
ye hatvā prāṇinaṃ mūḍhāḥ khādante kākagṛdhravat ।।
bhojyante ca svamāṃsaṃ te kalpāntaṃ yamakiṃkaraiḥ ।
āsanaṃ śayanaṃ vastraṃ parakīyaṃ haranti ye ।।
yamadūtaiś ca te mūḍhā bhidyante śaktitomaraiḥ ।
phalaṃ pattraṃ nṛṇāṃ vāpi hṛtaṃ yais tu kubuddhibhiḥ ।।
yamadūtaiś ca te kruddhair dahyante tṛṇavahnibhiḥ ।
paradravye kalatre ca yaḥ sadā duṣṭadhīr naraḥ ।।
yamadūtair jvalat tasya hṛdi śūlaṃ nikhanyate ।
karmaṇā manasā vācā ye dharmavimukhā narāḥ ।।
yamaloke tu te ghorā labhante pariyātanāḥ ।
evaṃ śatasahasrāṇi lakṣakoṭiśatāni ca ।।
narakāṇi narais tatra bhujyante pāpakāribhiḥ ।
iha kṛtvā svalpam api naraḥ karmāśubhātmakam ।।
prāpnoti narake ghore yamalokeṣu yātanām ।
na śṛṇvanti narā mūḍhā dharmoktaṃ sādhu bhāṣitam ।।
dṛṣṭaṃ keneti pratyakṣaṃ pratyuktyaivaṃ vadanti te ।
divā rātrau prayatnena pāpaṃ kurvanti ye narāḥ ।।
nācaranti hi te dharmaṃ pramādenāpi mohitāḥ ।
ihaiva phalabhoktāraḥ paratra vimukhāś ca ye ।।
te patanti sughoreṣu narakeṣu narādhamāḥ ।
dāruṇo narake vāsaḥ svargavāsaḥ sukhapradaḥ ।
naraiḥ saṃprāpyate tatra karma kṛtvā śubhāśubham ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
aho atiduḥkhaṃ ghoraṃ ca yamamārge tvayoditam ।
narakāṇi ca ghorāṇi dvāraṃ yāmyaṃ ca sattama ।।
asty upāyo na vā brahman yamamārge atibhīṣaṇe ।
brūhi yena narā yānti sukhena yamasādanam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
iha ye dharmasaṃyuktās tv ahiṃsāniratā narāḥ ।
guruśuśrūṣaṇe yuktā devabrāhmaṇapūjakāḥ ।।
yasmin manuṣyalokās te sabhāryāḥ sasutās tathā ।
tam adhvānaṃ ca gacchanti yathā tat kathayāmi vaḥ ।।
vimānair vividhair divyaiḥ kāñcanadhvajaśobhitaiḥ ।
dharmarājapuraṃ yānti sevamānāpsarogaṇaiḥ ।।
brāhmaṇebhyas tu dānāni nānārūpāṇi bhaktitaḥ ।
ye prayacchanti te yānti sukhenaiva mahāpathe ।।
annaṃ ye tu prayacchanti brāhmaṇebhyaḥ susaṃkṛtam ।
śrotriyebhyo viśeṣeṇa bhaktyā paramayā yutāḥ ।।
taruṇībhir varastrībhiḥ sevyamānāḥ prayatnataḥ ।
dharmarājapuraṃ yānti vimānair abhyalaṃkṛtaiḥ ।।
ye ca satyaṃ prabhāṣante bahir antaś ca nirmalāḥ ।
te api yānty amaraprakhyā vimānair yamamandiram ।।
godānāni pavitrāṇi viṣṇum uddiśya sādhuṣu ।
ye prayacchanti dharmajñāḥ kṛśeṣu kṛśavṛttiṣu ।।
te yānti divyavarṇābhair vimānair maṇicitritaiḥ ।
dharmarājapuraṃ śrīmān sevyamānāpsarogaṇaiḥ ।।
upānadyugalaṃ chattraṃ śayyāsanam athāpi vā ।
ye prayacchanti vastrāṇi tathaivābharaṇāni ca ।।
te yānty aśvai rathaiś caiva kuñjaraiś cāpy alaṃkṛtāḥ ।
dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ chattraiḥ sauvarṇarājataiḥ ।।
ye ca bhaktyā prayacchanti guḍapānakam arcitam ।
odanaṃ ca dvijāgryebhyo viśuddhenāntarātmanā ।।
te yānti kāñcanair yānair vividhais tu yamālayam ।
varastrībhir yathākāmaṃ sevyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।।
ye ca kṣīraṃ prayacchanti ghṛtaṃ dadhi guḍaṃ madhu ।
brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayatnena śuddhyopetaṃ susaṃskṛtam ।।
cakravākaprayuktaiś ca vimānais tu hiraṇmayaiḥ ।
yānti gandharvavāditraiḥ sevyamānā yamālayam ।।
ye phalāni prayacchanti puṣpāṇi surabhīṇi ca ।
haṃsayuktair vimānais tu yānti dharmapuraṃ narāḥ ।।
ye tilāṃs tiladhenuṃ ca ghṛtadhenum athāpi vā ।
śrotriyebhyaḥ prayacchanti viprebhyaḥ śraddhayānvitāḥ ।।
somamaṇḍalasaṃkāśair yānais te yānti nirmalaiḥ ।
gandharvair upagīyante pure vaivasvatasya te ।।
yeṣāṃ vāpyaś ca kūpāś ca taḍāgāni sarāṃsi ca ।
dīrghikāḥ puṣkariṇyaś ca śītalāś ca jalāśayāḥ ।।
yānais te hemacandrābhair divyaghaṇṭānināditaiḥ ।
vyajanais tālavṛntaiś ca vījyamānā mahāprabhāḥ ।।
yeṣāṃ devakulāny atra citrāṇy āyatanāni ca ।
ratnaiḥ prasphuramāṇāni manojñāni śubhāni ca ।।
te yānti lokapālais tu vimānair vātaraṃhasaiḥ ।
dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ nānājanasamākulam ।।
pānīyaṃ ye prayacchanti sarvaprāṇyupajīvitam ।
te vitṛṣṇāḥ sukhaṃ yānti vimānais taṃ mahāpatham ।।
kāṣṭhapādukayānāni pīṭhakāny āsanāni ca ।
yair dattāni dvijātibhyas te adhvānaṃ yānti vai sukham ।।
sauvarṇamaṇipīṭheṣu pādau kṛtvottameṣu ca ।
te prayānti vimānais tu apsarogaṇamaṇḍitaiḥ ।।
ārāmāṇi vicitrāṇi puṣpāḍhyānīha mānavāḥ ।
ropayanti phalāḍhyāni narāṇām upakāriṇaḥ ।।
vṛkṣacchāyāsu ramyāsu śītalāsu svalaṃkṛtāḥ ।
varastrīgītavādyaiś ca sevyamānā vrajanti te ।।
suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vāpi vidrumaṃ mauktikaṃ tathā ।
ye prayacchanti te yānti vimānaiḥ kanakojjvalaiḥ ।।
bhūmidā dīpyamānāś ca sarvakāmais tu tarpitāḥ ।
uditādityasaṃkāśair vimānair bhṛśanāditaiḥ ।।
kanyāṃ tu ye prayacchanti brahmadeyām alaṃkṛtām ।
divyakanyāvṛtā yānti vimānais te yamālayam ।।
sugandhāgurukarpūrān puṣpadhūpān dvijottamāḥ ।
prayacchanti dvijātibhyo bhaktyā paramayānvitāḥ ।।
te sugandhāḥ suveśāś ca suprabhāḥ suvibhūṣitāḥ ।
yānti dharmapuraṃ yānair vicitrair abhyalaṃkṛtāḥ ।।
dīpadā yānti yānaiś ca dīpayanto diśo daśa ।
ādityasadṛśair yānair dīpyamānā yathāgnayaḥ ।।
gṛhāvasathadātāro gṛhaiḥ kāñcanamaṇḍitaiḥ ।
vrajanti bālārkanibhair dharmarājagṛhaṃ narāḥ ।।
jalabhājanadātāraḥ kuṇḍikākarakapradāḥ ।
pūjamānāpsarobhiś ca yānti dṛptā mahāgajaiḥ ।।
pādābhyaṅgaṃ śirobhyaṅgaṃ snānapānodakaṃ tathā ।
ye prayacchanti viprebhyas te yānty aśvair yamālayam ।।
viśrāmayanti ye viprāñ śrāntān adhvani karśitān ।
cakravākaprayuktena yānti yānena te sukham ।।
svāgatena ca yo vipraṃ pūjayed āsanena ca ।
sa gacchati tam adhvānaṃ sukhaṃ paramanirvṛtaḥ ।।
namo brahmaṇyadeveti yo hariṃ cābhivādayet ।
gāṃ ca pāpaharety uktvā sukhaṃ yānti ca tat patham ।।
anantarāśino ye ca dambhānṛtavivarjitāḥ ।
te api sārasayuktais tu yānti yānaiś ca tat patham ।।
vartante hy ekabhaktena śāṭhyadambhavivarjitāḥ ।
haṃsayuktair vimānais tu sukhaṃ yānti yamālayam ।।
caturthenaikabhaktena vartante ye jitendriyāḥ ।
te yānti dharmanagaraṃ yānair barhiṇayojitaiḥ ।।
tṛtīye divase ye tu bhuñjate niyatavratāḥ ।
te api hastirathair divyair yānti yānaiś ca tat padam ।।
ṣaṣṭhe annabhakṣako yas tu śaucanityo jitendriyaḥ ।
sa yāti kuñjarasthas tu śacīpatir iva svayam ।।
dharmarājapuraṃ divyaṃ nānāmaṇivibhūṣitam ।
nānāsvarasamāyuktaṃ jayaśabdaravair yutam ।।
pakṣopavāsino yānti yānaiḥ śārdūlayojitaiḥ ।
puraṃ tad dharmarājasya sevyamānāḥ surāsuraiḥ ।।
ye ca māsopavāsaṃ tu kurvate saṃyatendriyāḥ ।
te api sūryapradīptais tu yānti yānair yamālayam ।।
mahāprasthānam ekāgro yaḥ prayāti dṛḍhavrataḥ ।
sevyamānas tu gandharvair yāti yānair yamālayam ।।
śarīraṃ sādhayed yas tu vaiṣṇavenāntarātmanā ।
sa rathenāgnivarṇena yātīha tridaśālayam ।।
agnipraveśaṃ yaḥ kuryān nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ ।
sa yāty agniprakāśena vimānena yamālayam ।।
prāṇāṃs tyajati yo martyaḥ smaran viṣṇuṃ sanātanam ।
yānenārkaprakāśena yāti dharmapuraṃ naraḥ ।।
praviṣṭo antar jalaṃ yas tu prāṇāṃs tyajati mānavaḥ ।
somamaṇḍalakalpena yāti yānena vai sukham ।।
svaśarīraṃ hi gṛdhrebhyo vaiṣṇavo yaḥ prayacchati ।
sa yāti rathamukhyena kāñcanena yamālayam ।।
strīgrahe gograhe vāpi yuddhe mṛtyum upaiti yaḥ ।
sa yāty amarakanyābhiḥ sevyamāno raviprabhaḥ ।।
vaiṣṇavā ye ca kurvanti tīrthayātrāṃ jitendriyāḥ ।
tat pathaṃ yānti te ghoraṃ sukhayānair alaṃkṛtāḥ ।।
ye yajanti dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ ।
taptahāṭakasaṃkāśair vimānair yānti te sukham ।।
parapīḍām akurvanto bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇādikam ।
kurvanti te sukhaṃ yānti vimānaiḥ kanakojjvalaiḥ ।।
ye kṣāntāḥ sarvabhūteṣu prāṇinām abhayapradāḥ ।
krodhamohavinirmuktā nirmadāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ ।।
pūrṇacandraprakāśena vimānena mahāprabhāḥ ।
yānti vaivasvatapuraṃ devagandharvasevitāḥ ।।
ekabhāvena ye viṣṇuṃ brahmāṇaṃ tryambakaṃ ravim ।
pūjayanti hi te yānti vimānair bhāskaraprabhaiḥ ।।
ye ca māṃsaṃ na khādanti satyaśaucasamanvitāḥ ।
te api yānti sukhenaiva dharmarājapuraṃ narāḥ ।।
māṃsān miṣṭataraṃ nāsti bhakṣyabhojyādikeṣu ca ।
tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhuñjīta nāsti miṣṭaiḥ sukhodayaḥ ।।
gosahasraṃ tu yo dadyād yas tu māṃsaṃ na bhakṣayet ।
samāv etau purā prāha brahmā vedavidāṃ varaḥ ।।
sarvatīrtheṣu yat puṇyaṃ sarvayajñeṣu yat phalam ।
amāṃsabhakṣaṇe viprās tac ca tac ca ca tatsamam ।।
evaṃ sukhena te yānti yamalokaṃ ca dhārmikāḥ ।
dānavrataparā yānair yatra devo raveḥ sutaḥ ।।
dṛṣṭvā tān dhārmikān devaḥ svayaṃ saṃmānayed yamaḥ ।
svāgatāsanadānena pādyārghyeṇa priyeṇa tu ।।
dhanyā yūyaṃ mahātmāna ātmano hitakāriṇaḥ ।
yena divyasukhārthāya bhavadbhiḥ sukṛtaṃ kṛtam ।।
idaṃ vimānam āruhya divyastrībhogabhūṣitāḥ ।
svargaṃ gacchadhvam atulaṃ sarvakāmasamanvitam ।।
tatra bhuktvā mahābhogān ante puṇyaparikṣayāt ।
yat kiṃcid alpam aśubhaṃ phalaṃ tad iha bhokṣyatha ।।
ye tu taṃ dharmarājānaṃ narāḥ puṇyānubhāvataḥ ।
paśyanti saumyamanasaṃ pitṛbhūtam ivātmanaḥ ।।
tasmād dharmaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā muktiphalapradaḥ ।
dharmād arthas tathā kāmo mokṣaś ca parikīrtyate ।।
dharmo mātā pitā bhrātā dharmo nāthaḥ suhṛt tathā ।
dharmaḥ svāmī sakhā goptā tathā dhātā ca poṣakaḥ ।।
dharmād artho arthataḥ kāmaḥ kāmād bhogaḥ sukhāni ca ।
dharmād aiśvaryam ekāgryaṃ dharmāt svargagatiḥ parā ।।
dharmas tu sevito viprās trāyate mahato bhayāt ।
devatvaṃ ca dvijatvaṃ ca dharmāt prāpnoty asaṃśayam ।।
yadā ca kṣīyate pāpaṃ narāṇāṃ pūrvasaṃcitam ।
tadaiṣāṃ bhajate buddhir dharmaṃ cātra dvijottamāḥ ।।
janmāntarasahasreṣu mānuṣyaṃ prāpya durlabham ।
yo hi nācarate dharmaṃ bhavet sa khalu vañcitaḥ ।।
kutsitā ye daridrāś ca virūpā vyādhitās tathā ।
parapreṣyāś ca mūrkhāś ca jñeyā dharmavivarjitāḥ ।।
ye hi dīrghāyuṣaḥ śūrāḥ paṇḍitā bhogino arthinaḥ ।
arogā rūpavantaś ca tais tu dharmaḥ purā kṛtaḥ ।।
evaṃ dharmaratā viprā gacchanti gatim uttamām ।
adharmaṃ sevamānās tu tiryagyoniṃ vrajanti te ।।
ye narā narakadhvaṃsi- vāsudevam anuvratāḥ ।
te svapne api na paśyanti yamaṃ vā narakāṇi vā ।।
anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ daityadānavadāraṇam ।
ye namanti narā nityaṃ nahi paśyanti te yamam ।।
karmaṇā manasā vācā ye acyutaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ।
na samartho yamas teṣāṃ te muktiphalabhāginaḥ ।।
ye janā jagatāṃ nāthaṃ nityaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ dvijāḥ ।
namanti nahi te viṣṇoḥ sthānād anyatra gāminaḥ ।।
na te dūtān na tan mārgaṃ na yamaṃ na ca tāṃ purīm ।
praṇamya viṣṇuṃ paśyanti narakāṇi kathaṃcana ।।
kṛtvāpi bahuśaḥ pāpaṃ narā mohasamanvitāḥ ।
na yānti narakaṃ natvā sarvapāpaharaṃ harim ।।
śāṭhyenāpi narā nityaṃ ye smaranti janārdanam ।
te api yānti tanuṃ tyaktvā viṣṇulokam anāmayam ।।
atyantakrodhasakto api kadācit kīrtayed dharim ।
so api doṣakṣayān muktiṃ labhec cedipatir yathā ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
śrutvaivaṃ yamamārgaṃ te narakeṣu ca yātanām ।
papracchuś ca punar vyāsaṃ saṃśayaṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
bhagavan sarvadharmajña sarvaśāstraviśārada ।
martyasya kaḥ sahāyo vai pitā mātā suto guruḥ ।।
jñātisaṃbandhivargaś ca mitravargas tathaiva ca ।
gṛhaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥ ।
gacchanty amutra loke vai kaś ca tān anugacchati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ekaḥ prasūyate viprā eka eva hi naśyati ।
ekas tarati durgāṇi gacchaty ekas tu durgatim ।।
asahāyaḥ pitā mātā tathā bhrātā suto guruḥ ।
jñātisaṃbandhivargaś ca mitravargas tathaiva ca ।।
mṛtaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥ ।
muhūrtam iva roditvā tato yānti parāṅmukhāḥ ।।
tais tac charīram utsṛṣṭaṃ dharma eko anugacchati ।
tasmād dharmaḥ sahāyaś ca sevitavyaḥ sadā nṛbhiḥ ।।
prāṇī dharmasamāyukto gacchet svargagatiṃ parām ।
tathaivādharmasaṃyukto narakaṃ copapadyate ।।
tasmāt pāpāgatair arthair nānurajyeta paṇḍitaḥ ।
dharma eko manuṣyāṇāṃ sahāyaḥ parikīrtitaḥ ।।
lobhān mohād anukrośād bhayād vātha bahuśrutaḥ ।
naraḥ karoty akāryāṇi parārthe lobhamohitaḥ ।।
dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca tritayaṃ jīvataḥ phalam ।
etat trayam avāptavyam adharmaparivarjitam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śrutaṃ bhagavato vākyaṃ dharmayuktaṃ paraṃ hitam ।
śarīranicayaṃ jñātuṃ buddhir no atra prajāyate ।।
mṛtaṃ śarīraṃ hi nṛṇāṃ sūkṣmam avyaktatāṃ gatam ।
acakṣurviṣayaṃ prāptaṃ kathaṃ dharmo anugacchati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotir manontaram ।
buddhir ātmā ca sahitā dharmaṃ paśyanti nityadā ।।
prāṇinām iha sarveṣāṃ sākṣibhūtā divāniśam ।
etaiś ca saha dharmo hi taṃ jīvam anugacchati ।।
tvag asthi māṃsaṃ śukraṃ ca śoṇitaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।
śarīraṃ varjayanty ete jīvitena vivarjitam ।।
tato dharmasamāyuktaḥ sa jīvaḥ sukham edhate ।
ihaloke pare caiva kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi vaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
tad darśitaṃ bhagavatā yathā dharmo anugacchati ।
etat tu jñātum icchāmaḥ kathaṃ retaḥ pravartate ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
annam aśnanti ye devāḥ śarīrasthā dvijottamāḥ ।
pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotir manas tathā ।।
tatas tṛpteṣu bho viprās teṣu bhūteṣu pañcasu ।
manaḥṣaṣṭheṣu śuddhātmā retaḥ saṃpadyate mahat ।।
tato garbhaḥ saṃbhavati śleṣmā strīpuṃsayor dvijāḥ ।
etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchatha ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
ākhyātaṃ no bhagavatā garbhaḥ saṃjāyate yathā ।
yathā jātas tu puruṣaḥ prapadyate tad ucyatām ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
āsannamātrapuruṣas tair bhūtair abhibhūyate ।
viprayuktas tu tair bhūtaiḥ punar yāty aparāṃ gatim ।।
sa ca bhūtasamāyuktaḥ prāpnoti jīvam eva hi ।
tato asya karma paśyanti śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham ।
devatāḥ pañcabhūtasthāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchatha ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
tvag asthi māṃsam utsṛjya tais tu bhūtair vivarjitaḥ ।
jīvaḥ sa bhagavan kvasthaḥ sukhaduḥkhe samaśnute ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
jīvaḥ karmasamāyuktaḥ śīghraṃ retaḥsamāgataḥ ।
strīṇāṃ puṣpaṃ samāsādya tataḥ kālena bho dvijāḥ ।।
yamasya puruṣaiḥ kleśo yamasya puruṣair vadhaḥ ।
duḥkhaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ ca naraḥ kleśaṃ ca vindati ।।
iha loke sa tu prāṇī janmaprabhṛti bho dvijāḥ ।
sukṛtaṃ karma vai bhuṅkte dharmasya phalam āśritaḥ ।।
yadi dharmaṃ samāyujya janmaprabhṛti sevate ।
tataḥ sa puruṣo bhūtvā sevate nityadā sukham ।।
athāntarāntaraṃ dharmam adharmam upasevate ।
sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ sa jīvo apy adhigacchati ।।
adharmeṇa samāyukto yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ ।
mahāduḥkhaṃ samāsādya tiryagyonau prajāyate ।।
karmaṇā yena yeneha yasyāṃ yonau prajāyate ।
jīvo mohasamāyuktas tan me śṛṇuta sāṃpratam ।।
yad etad ucyate śāstraiḥ setihāsaiś ca chandasi ।
yamasya viṣayaṃ ghoraṃ martyalokaṃ pravartate ।।
iha sthānāni puṇyāni devatulyāni bho dvijāḥ ।
tiryagyonyatiriktāni gatimanti ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
yamasya bhavane divye brahmalokasame guṇaiḥ ।
karmabhir niyatair baddho jantur duḥkhāny upāśnute ।।
yena yena hi bhāvena yena vai karmaṇā gatim ।
prayāti puruṣo ghorāṃ tathā vakṣyāmy ataḥ param ।।
adhītya caturo vedān dvijo mohasamanvitaḥ ।
patitāt pratigṛhyātha kharayonau prajāyate ।।
kharo jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ ।
kharo mṛto balīvardaḥ sapta varṣāṇi jīvati ।।
balīvardo mṛtaś cāpi jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ ।
brahmarakṣas tu māsāṃs trīṃs tato jāyeta brāhmaṇaḥ ।।
patitaṃ yājayitvā tu kṛmiyonau prajāyate ।
tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
krimibhāvād vinirmuktas tato jāyeta gardabhaḥ ।
gardabhaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi śūkaraḥ ।।
kukkuṭaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi jambukaḥ ।
śvā varṣam ekaṃ bhavati tato jāyeta mānavaḥ ।।
upādhyāyasya yaḥ pāpaṃ śiṣyaḥ kuryād abuddhimān ।
sa janmānīha saṃsāre trīn āpnoti na saṃśayaḥ ।।
prāk śvā bhavati bho viprās tataḥ kravyāt tataḥ kharaḥ ।
pretya ca parikliṣṭeṣu paścāj jāyeta brāhmaṇaḥ ।।
manasāpi guror bhāryāṃ yaḥ śiṣyo yāti pāpakṛt ।
udagrān praiti saṃsārān adharmeṇeha cetasā ।।
śvayonau tu sa saṃbhūtas trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvati ।
tatrāpi nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ krimiyonau prajāyate ।।
kṛmibhāvam anuprāpto varṣam ekaṃ tu jīvati ।
tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya brahmayonau prajāyate ।।
yadi putrasamaṃ śiṣyaṃ gurur hanyād akāraṇam ।
ātmanaḥ kāmakāreṇa so api hiṃsraḥ prajāyate ।।
pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva yas tu putro avamanyate ।
so api viprā mṛto jantuḥ pūrvaṃ jāyeta gardabhaḥ ।।
gardabhatvaṃ tu saṃprāpya daśa varṣāṇi jīvati ।
saṃvatsaraṃ tu kumbhīras tato jāyeta mānavaḥ ।।
putrasya mātāpitarau yasya ruṣṭāv ubhāv api ।
gurvapadhyānataḥ so api mṛto jāyeta gardabhaḥ ।।
kharo jīvati māsāṃś ca daśa cāpi caturdaśa ।
biḍālaḥ sapta māsāṃs tu tato jāyeta mānavaḥ ।।
mātāpitarāv ākruśya sārīkaḥ saṃprajāyate ।
tāḍayitvā tu tāv eva jāyate kacchapo dvijāḥ ।।
kacchapo daśa varṣāṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi śalyakaḥ ।
vyālo bhūtvā tu ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ ।।
bhartṛpiṇḍam upāśnīno rājadviṣṭāni sevate ।
so api mohasamāpanno mṛto jāyeta vānaraḥ ।।
vānaro daśa varṣāṇi sapta varṣāṇi mūṣakaḥ ।
śvā ca bhūtvā tu ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyeta mānavaḥ ।।
nyāsāpahartā tu naro yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ ।
saṃsārāṇāṃ śataṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyate ।।
tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ ।
duṣkṛtasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ ।।
asūyako naraś cāpi mṛto jāyeta śārṅgakaḥ ।
viśvāsahartā ca naro mīno jāyeta durmatiḥ ।।
bhūtvā mīno aṣṭa varṣāṇi mṛgo jāyeta bho dvijāḥ ।
mṛgas tu caturo māsāṃs tataś chāgaḥ prajāyate ।।
chāgas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya pūrṇe saṃvatsare tataḥ ।
kīṭaḥ saṃjāyate jantus tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ ।।
dhānyān yavāṃs tilān māṣān kulitthān sarṣapāṃś caṇān ।
kalāyān atha mudgāṃś ca godhūmān atasīs tathā ।।
sasyāny anyāni hartā ca martyo mohād acetanaḥ ।
saṃjāyate muniśreṣṭhā mūṣiko nirapatrapaḥ ।।
tataḥ pretya muniśreṣṭhā mṛto jāyeta śūkaraḥ ।
śūkaro jātamātras tu rogeṇa mriyate punaḥ ।।
śvā tato jāyate mūkaḥ karmaṇā tena mānavaḥ ।
bhūtvā śvā pañca varṣāṇi tato jāyeta mānavaḥ ।।
paradārābhimarśaṃ tu kṛtvā jāyeta vai vṛkaḥ ।
śvā śṛgālas tato gṛdhro vyālaḥ kaṅko bakas tathā ।।
bhrātur bhāryāṃ tu pāpātmā yo dharṣayati mohitaḥ ।
puṃskokilatvam āpnoti so api saṃvatsaraṃ dvijāḥ ।।
sakhibhāryāṃ guror bhāryāṃ rājabhāryāṃ tathaiva ca ।
pradharṣayitvā kāmātmā mṛto jāyeta śūkaraḥ ।।
śūkaraḥ pañca varṣāṇi daśa varṣāṇi vai bakaḥ ।
pipīlikas tu māsāṃs trīn kīṭaḥ syān māsam eva ca ।।
etān āsādya saṃsārān kṛmiyonau prajāyate ।
tatra jīvati māsāṃs tu kṛmiyonau caturdaśa ।।
naro adharmakṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ ।
pūrvaṃ dattvā tu yaḥ kanyāṃ dvitīye dātum icchati ।।
so api viprā mṛto jantuḥ krimiyonau prajāyate ।
tatra jīvati varṣāṇi trayodaśa dvijottamāḥ ।।
adharmasaṃkṣaye muktas tato jāyeta mānuṣaḥ ।
devakāryam akṛtvā tu pitṛkāryam athāpi vā ।।
anirvāpya pitṝn devān mṛto jāyeta vāyasaḥ ।
vāyasaḥ śatavarṣāṇi tato jāyeta kukkuṭaḥ ।।
jāyate vyālakaś cāpi māsaṃ tasmāt tu mānuṣaḥ ।
jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṛsamaṃ cāpi bhrātaraṃ yo avamanyate ।।
so api mṛtyum upāgamya krauñcayonau prajāyate ।
krauñco jīvati varṣāṇi daśa jāyeta jīvakaḥ ।।
tato nidhanam āpnoti mānuṣatvam avāpnuyāt ।
vṛṣalo brāhmaṇīṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyate ।।
tataḥ saṃprāpya nidhanaṃ jāyate śūkaraḥ punaḥ ।
śūkaro jātamātras tu rogeṇa mriyate dvijāḥ ।।
śvā ca vai jāyate mūḍhaḥ karmaṇā tena bho dvijāḥ ।
śvā bhūtvā kṛtakarmāsau jāyate mānuṣas tataḥ ।।
tatrāpatyaṃ samutpādya mṛto jāyeta mūṣikaḥ ।
kṛtaghnas tu mṛto viprā yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥ ।।
yamasya viṣaye krūrair baddhaḥ prāpnoti vedanām ।
daṇḍakaṃ mudgaraṃ śūlam agnidaṇḍaṃ ca dāruṇam ।।
asipattravanaṃ ghoraṃ vālukāṃ kūṭaśālmalīm ।
etāś cānyāś ca bahavo yamasya viṣayaṃ gatāḥ ।।
yātanāḥ prāpya ghorās tu tato yāti ca bho dvijāḥ ।
saṃsāracakram āsādya krimiyonau prajāyate ।।
krimir bhavati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bho dvijāḥ ।
tato garbhaṃ samāsādya tatraiva mriyate naraḥ ।।
tato garbhaśatair jantur bahuśaḥ saṃprapadyate ।
saṃsārān subahūn gatvā tatas tiryak prajāyate ।।
tato duḥkham anuprāpya bahuvarṣagaṇāni vai ।
sa punarbhavasaṃyuktas tataḥ kūrmaḥ prajāyate ।।
dadhi hṛtvā bakaś cāpi plavo matsyān asaṃskṛtān ।
corayitvā tu durbuddhir madhudaṃśaḥ prajāyate ।।
phalaṃ vā mūlakaṃ hṛtvā pūpaṃ vāpi pipīlikaḥ ।
corayitvā tu niṣpāvaṃ jāyate phalamūṣakaḥ ।।
pāyasaṃ corayitvā tu tittiratvam avāpnuyāt ।
hṛtvā piṣṭamayaṃ pūpaṃ kumbholūkaḥ prajāyate ।।
apo hṛtvā tu durbuddhir vāyaso jāyate naraḥ ।
kāṃsyaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhir hārīto jāyate naraḥ ।।
rājataṃ bhājanaṃ hṛtvā kapotaḥ saṃprajāyate ।
hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate ।।
pattrorṇaṃ corayitvā tu kuraratvaṃ niyacchati ।
kośakāraṃ tato hṛtvā naro jāyeta nartakaḥ ।।
aṃśukaṃ corayitvā tu śuko jāyeta mānavaḥ ।
corayitvā dukūlaṃ tu mṛto haṃsaḥ prajāyate ।।
krauñcaḥ kārpāsikaṃ hṛtvā mṛto jāyeta mānavaḥ ।
corayitvā naraḥ paṭṭaṃ tv āvikaṃ caiva bho dvijāḥ ।।
kṣaumaṃ ca vastram āhṛtya śaśo jantuḥ prajāyate ।
cūrṇaṃ tu hṛtvā puruṣo mṛto jāyeta barhiṇaḥ ।।
hṛtvā raktāni vastrāṇi jāyate jīvajīvakaḥ ।
varṇakādīṃs tathā gandhāṃś corayitveha mānavaḥ ।।
cucchundaritvam āpnoti vipro lobhaparāyaṇaḥ ।
tatra jīvati varṣāṇi tato daśa ca pañca ca ।।
adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyeta mānavaḥ ।
corayitvā payaś cāpi balākā saṃprajāyate ।।
yas tu corayate tailaṃ naro mohasamanvitaḥ ।
so api viprā mṛto jantus tailapāyī prajāyate ।।
aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hatvā saśastraḥ puruṣādhamaḥ ।
arthārthaṃ yadi vā vairī mṛto jāyeta vai kharaḥ ।।
kharo jīvati varṣe dve tataḥ śastreṇa vadhyate ।
sa mṛto mṛgayonau tu nityodvigno abhijāyate ।।
mṛgo vidhyeta śastreṇa gate saṃvatsare tataḥ ।
hato mṛgas tato mīnaḥ so api jālena badhyate ।।
māse caturthe saṃprāpte śvāpadaḥ saṃprajāyate ।
śvāpado daśa varṣāṇi dvīpī varṣāṇi pañca ca ।।
tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ kālaparyāyacoditaḥ ।
adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā mānuṣatvam avāpnuyāt ।।
vādyaṃ hṛtvā tu puruṣo lomaśaḥ saṃprajāyate ।
tathā piṇyākasaṃmiśram annaṃ yaś corayen naraḥ ।।
sa jāyate babhrusaṭo dāruṇo mūṣiko naraḥ ।
daśan vai mānuṣān nityaṃ pāpātmā sa dvijottamāḥ ।।
ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhiḥ kāko madguḥ prajāyate ।
matsyamāṃsam atho hṛtvā kāko jāyeta mānavaḥ ।।
lavaṇaṃ corayitvā tu cirikākaḥ prajāyate ।
viśvāsena tu nikṣiptaṃ yo apanihnoti mānavaḥ ।।
sa gatāyur naras tena matsyayonau prajāyate ।
matsyayonim anuprāpya mṛto jāyeta mānuṣaḥ ।।
mānuṣatvam anuprāpya kṣīṇāyur upajāyate ।
pāpāni tu naraḥ kṛtvā tiryag jāyeta bho dvijāḥ ।।
na cātmanaḥ pramāṇaṃ tu dharmaṃ jānāti kiṃcana ।
ye pāpāni narāḥ kṛtvā nirasyanti vrataiḥ sadā ।।
sukhaduḥkhasamāyuktā vyādhimanto bhavanty uta ।
asaṃvītāḥ prajāyante mlecchāś cāpi na saṃśayaḥ ।।
narāḥ pāpasamācārā lobhamohasamanvitāḥ ।
varjayanti hi pāpāni janmaprabhṛti ye narāḥ ।।
arogā rūpavantaś ca dhaninas te bhavanty uta ।
striyo apy etena kalpena kṛtvā pāpam avāpnuyuḥ ।।
eteṣām eva pāpānāṃ bhāryātvam upayānti tāḥ ।
prāyeṇa haraṇe doṣāḥ sarva eva prakīrtitāḥ ।।
etad vai leśamātreṇa kathitaṃ vo dvijarṣabhāḥ ।
aparasmin kathāyoge bhūyaḥ śroṣyatha bho dvijāḥ ।।
etan mayā mahābhāgā brahmaṇo vadataḥ purā ।
surarṣīṇāṃ śrutaṃ madhye pṛṣṭaṃ cāpi yathā tathā ।।
mayāpi tubhyaṃ kārtsnyena yathāvad anuvarṇitam ।
etac chrutvā muniśreṣṭhā dharme kuruta mānasam ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
adharmasya gatir brahman kathitā nas tvayānagha ।
dharmasya ca gatiṃ śrotum icchāmo vadatāṃ vara ।।
kṛtvā pāpāni karmāṇi kathaṃ yānty aśubhāṃ gatim ।
karmaṇā ca kṛteneha kena yānti śubhāṃ gatim ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
kṛtvā pāpāni karmāṇi tv adharmavaśam āgataḥ ।
manasā viparītena nirayaṃ pratipadyate ।।
mohād adharmaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā punaḥ samanutapyate ।
manaḥsamādhisaṃyukto na sa seveta duṣkṛtam ।।
yadi viprāḥ kathayate viprāṇāṃ dharmavādinām ।
tato adharmakṛtāt kṣipram aparādhāt pramucyate ।।
yathā yathā naraḥ samyag adharmam anubhāṣate ।
samāhitena manasā vimuñcati tathā tathā ।।
yathā yathā manas tasya duṣkṛtaṃ karma garhate ।
tathā tathā śarīraṃ tu tenādharmeṇa mucyate ।।
bhujaṃga iva nirmokān pūrvabhuktāñ jahāti tān ।
dattvā viprasya dānāni vividhāni samāhitaḥ ।।
manaḥsamādhisaṃyuktaḥ svargatiṃ pratipadyate ।
dānāni tu pravakṣyāmi yāni dattvā dvijottamāḥ ।।
naraḥ kṛtvāpy akāryāṇi tato dharmeṇa yujyate ।
sarveṣām eva dānānām annaṃ śreṣṭham udāhṛtam ।।
sarvam annaṃ pradātavyam ṛjunā dharmam icchatā ।
prāṇā hy annaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmāj jantuḥ prajāyate ।।
anne pratiṣṭhitā lokās tasmād annaṃ praśasyate ।
annam eva praśaṃsanti devarṣipitṛmānavāḥ ।।
annasya hi pradānena svargam āpnoti mānavaḥ ।
nyāyalabdhaṃ pradātavyaṃ dvijātibhyo annam uttamam ।।
svādhyāyasamupetebhyaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā ।
yasya tv annam upāśnanti brāhmaṇāś ca sakṛd daśa ।।
hṛṣṭena manasā dattaṃ na sa tiryaggatir bhavet ।
brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśābhojya dvijottamāḥ ।।
naro adharmāt pramucyeta pāpeṣv abhirataḥ sadā ।
bhaikṣeṇānnaṃ samāhṛtya vipro vedapuraskṛtaḥ ।।
svādhyāyanirate vipre dattveha sukham edhate ।
ahiṃsan brāhmaṇasvāni nyāyena paripālya ca ।।
kṣatriyas tarasā prāptam annaṃ yo vai prayacchati ।
dvijebhyo vedamukhyebhyaḥ prayataḥ susamāhitaḥ ।।
tenāpohati dharmātmā duṣkṛtaṃ karma bho dvijāḥ ।
ṣaḍbhāgapariśuddhaṃ ca kṛṣer bhāgam upārjitam ।।
vaiśyo dadad dvijātibhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ parimucyate ।
avāpya prāṇasaṃdehaṃ kārkaśyena samārjitam ।।
annaṃ dattvā dvijātibhyaḥ śūdraḥ pāpāt pramucyate ।
aurasena balenānnam arjayitvā vihiṃsakaḥ ।।
yaḥ prayacchati viprebhyo na sa durgāṇi sevate ।
nyāyenāvāptam annaṃ tu naro harṣasamanvitaḥ ।।
dvijebhyo vedavṛddhebhyo dattvā pāpāt pramucyate ।
annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke dattvorjasvī bhaven naraḥ ।।
satāṃ panthānam āvṛtya sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate ।
dānavidbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthā yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
teṣv apy annasya dātāras tebhyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ।
sarvāvasthaṃ manuṣyeṇa nyāyenānnam upārjitam ।।
kāryān nyāyāgataṃ nityam annaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ ।
annasya hi pradānena naro yāti parāṃ gatim ।।
sarvakāmasamāyuktaḥ pretya cāpy aśnute sukham ।
evaṃ puṇyasamāyukto naraḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate ।।
tasmād annaṃ pradātavyam anyāyaparivarjitam ।
yas tu prāṇāhutīpūrvam annaṃ bhuṅkte gṛhī sadā ।।
avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād annadānena mānavaḥ ।
bhojayitvā śataṃ nityaṃ naro vedavidāṃ varam ।।
nyāyaviddharmaviduṣām itihāsavidāṃ tathā ।
na yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ saṃsāraṃ na ca sevate ।।
sarvakāmasamāyuktaḥ pretya cāpy aśnute sukham ।
evaṃ karmasamāyukto ramate vigatajvaraḥ ।।
rūpavān kīrtimāṃś caiva dhanavāṃś copajāyate ।
etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātam annadānaphalaṃ mahat ।
mūlam etat tu dharmāṇāṃ pradānānāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
paralokagatānāṃ tu svakarmasthānavāsinām ।
teṣāṃ śrāddhaṃ kathaṃ jñeyaṃ putraiś cānyaiś ca bandhubhiḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
namaskṛtya jagannāthaṃ vārāhaṃ lokabhāvanam ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śrāddhakalpaṃ yathoditam ।।
purā kokājale magnān pitṝn uddhṛtavān vibhuḥ ।
śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā tadā devo yathā tatra dvijottamāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kimarthaṃ te tu kokāyāṃ nimagnāḥ pitaro ambhasi ।
kathaṃ tenoddhṛtās te vai vārāheṇa dvijottama ।।
tasmin kokāmukhe tīrthe bhuktimuktiphalaprade ।
śrotum icchāmahe brūhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tretādvāparayoḥ saṃdhau pitaro divyamānuṣāḥ ।
purā merugireḥ pṛṣṭhe viśvair devaiḥ saha sthitāḥ ।।
teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ somasaṃbhavā ।
kanyā kāntimatī divyā purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitā ।
tām ūcuḥ pitaro divyā ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ ।।
{pitara ūcuḥ 
kāsi bhadre prabhuḥ ko vā bhavatyā vaktum arhasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sā provāca pitṝn devān kalā cāndramasīti ha ।
prabhutve bhavatām eva varayāmi yadīcchatha ।।
ūrjā nāmāsti prathamaṃ svadhā ca tadanantaram ।
bhavadbhiś cādyaiva kṛtaṃ nāma koketi bhāvitam ।।
te hi tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā pitaro divyamānuṣāḥ ।
tasyā mukhaṃ nirīkṣanto na tṛptim adhijagmire ।।
viśvedevāś ca tāñ jñātvā kanyāmukhanirīkṣakān ।
yogacyutān nirīkṣyaiva vihāya tridivaṃ gatāḥ ।।
bhagavān api śītāṃśur ūrjāṃ nāpaśyad ātmajām ।
samākulamanā dadhyau kva gateti mahāyaśāḥ ।।
sa viveda tadā somaḥ prāptāṃ pitṝṃś ca kāmataḥ ।
taiś cāvalokitāṃ hārdāt svīkṛtāṃ ca tapobalāt ।।
tataḥ krodhaparītātmā pitṝñ śaśadharo dvijāḥ ।
śaśāpa nipatiṣyadhvaṃ yogabhraṣṭā vicetasaḥ ।।
yasmād adattāṃ matkanyāṃ kāmayadhvaṃ subāliśāḥ ।
yasmād dhṛtavatī ceyaṃ patīn pitṛmatī satī ।।
svatantrā dharmam utsṛjya tasmād bhavatu nimnagā ।
koketi prathitā loke śiśirādrisamāśritā ।।
itthaṃ śaptāś candramasā pitaro divyamānuṣāḥ ।
yogabhraṣṭā nipatitā himavatpādabhūtale ।।
ūrjā tatraiva patitā girirājasya vistṛte ।
prasthe tīrthaṃ samāsādya saptasāmudram uttamam ।।
kokā nāma tato vegān nadī tīrthaśatākulā ।
plāvayantī gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ sarpaṇāt tu sarit smṛtā ।।
atha te pitaro viprā yogahīnā mahānadīm ।
dadṛśuḥ śītasalilāṃ na vidus tāṃ sulocanām ।।
tatas tu girirāḍ dṛṣṭvā pitṝṃs tāṃs tu kṣudhārditān ।
badarīm ādideśātha dhenuṃ caikāṃ madhusravām ।।
kṣīraṃ madhu ca tad divyaṃ kokāmbho badarīphalam ।
idaṃ girivareṇaiṣāṃ poṣaṇāya nirūpitam ।।
tayā vṛttyā tu vasatāṃ pitṝṇāṃ munisattamāḥ ।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi yayur ekam aho yathā ।।
evaṃ loke vipitari tathaiva vigatasvadhe ।
daityā babhūvur balino yātudhānāś ca rākṣasāḥ ।।
te tān pitṛgaṇān daityā yātudhānāś ca vegitāḥ ।
viśvair devair virahitān sarvataḥ samupādravan ।।
daiteyān yātudhānāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaivāpatato dvijāḥ ।
kokātaṭasthām uttuṅgāṃ śilāṃ te jagṛhū ruṣā ।।
gṛhītāyāṃ śilāyāṃ tu kokā vegavatī pitṝn ।
chādayām āsa toyena plāvayantī himācalam ।।
pitṝn antarhitān dṛṣṭvā daiteyā rākṣasās tathā ।
vibhītakaṃ samāruhya nirāhārās tirohitāḥ ।।
salilena viṣīdantaḥ pitaraḥ kṣudbhramāturāḥ ।
viṣīdamānam ātmānaṃ samīkṣya salilāśayāḥ ।
jagur janārdanaṃ devaṃ pitaraḥ śaraṇaṃ harim ।।
{pitara ūcuḥ 
jayasva govinda jagannivāsa 
jayo astu naḥ keśava te prasādāt 
janārdanāsmān salilāntarasthān 
uddhartum arhasy anaghapratāpa 
niśācarair dāruṇadarśanaiḥ prabho 
vareṇya vaikuṇṭha varāha viṣṇo 
nārāyaṇāśeṣamaheśvareśa 
prayāhi bhītāñ jaya padmanābha 
upendra yogin madhukaiṭabhaghna 
viṣṇo anantācyuta vāsudeva 
śrīśārṅgacakrāmbujaśaṅkhapāṇe 
rakṣasva deveśvara rākṣasebhyaḥ 
tvaṃ pitā jagataḥ śaṃbho nānyaḥ śaktaḥ prabādhitum ।
niśācaragaṇaṃ bhīmam atas tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ।।
tvannāmasaṃkīrtanato niśācarā 
dravanti bhūtāny apayānti cārayaḥ 
nāśaṃ tathā saṃprati yānti viṣṇo 
dharmādi satyaṃ bhavatīha mukhyam 
{vyāsa uvāca 
itthaṃ stutaḥ sa pitṛbhir dharaṇīdharas tu 
tuṣṭas tadāviṣkṛtadivyamūrtiḥ 
kokāmukhe pitṛgaṇaṃ salile nimagnaṃ 
devo dadarśa śirasātha śilāṃ vahantam 
taṃ dṛṣṭvā salile magnaṃ kroḍarūpī janārdanaḥ ।
bhītaṃ pitṛgaṇaṃ viṣṇur uddhartuṃ matir ādadhe ।।
daṃṣṭrāgreṇa samāhatya śilāṃ cikṣepa śūkaraḥ ।
pitṝn ādāya ca vibhur ujjahāra śilātalāt ।।
varāhadaṃṣṭrāsaṃlagnāḥ pitaraḥ kanakojjvalāḥ ।
kokāmukhe gatabhayāḥ kṛtā devena viṣṇunā ।।
uddhṛtya ca pitṝn devo viṣṇutīrthe tu śūkaraḥ ।
dadau samāhitas tebhyo viṣṇur lohārgale jalam ।।
tataḥ svaromasaṃbhūtān kuśān ādāya keśavaḥ ।
svedodbhavāṃs tilāṃś caiva cakre colmukam uttamam ।।
jyotiḥ sūryaprabhaṃ kṛtvā pātraṃ tīrthaṃ ca kāmikam ।
sthitaḥ koṭivaṭasyādho vāri gaṅgādharaṃ śuci ।।
tuṅgakūṭāt samādāya yajñīyān oṣadhīrasān ।
madhukṣīrarasān gandhān puṣpadhūpānulepanān ।।
ādāya dhenuṃ saraso ratnāny ādāya cārṇavāt ।
daṃṣṭrayollikhya dharaṇīm abhyukṣya salilena ca ।।
gharmodbhavenopalipya kuśair ullikhya tāṃ punaḥ ।
pariṇīyolmukenainām abhyukṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ ।।
kuśān ādāya prāgagrāṃl lomakūpāntarasthitān ।
ṛṣīn āhūya papraccha kariṣye pitṛtarpaṇam ।।
tair apy ukte kuruṣveti viśvān devāṃs tato vibhuḥ ।
āhūya mantratas teṣāṃ viṣṭarāṇi dadau prabhuḥ ।।
āhūya mantratas teṣāṃ vedoktavidhinā hariḥ ।
akṣatair daivatārakṣāṃ cakre cakragadādharaḥ ।।
akṣatās tu yavauṣadhyaḥ sarvadevāṃśasaṃbhavāḥ ।
rakṣanti sarvatra diśo rakṣārthaṃ nirmitā hi te ।।
devadānavadaityeṣu yakṣarakṣaḥsu caiva hi ।
nahi kaścit kṣayaṃ teṣāṃ kartuṃ śaktaś carācare ।।
na kenacit kṛtaṃ yasmāt tasmāt te hy akṣatāḥ kṛtāḥ ।
devānāṃ te hi rakṣārthaṃ niyuktā viṣṇunā purā ।।
kuśagandhayavaiḥ puṣpair arghyaṃ kṛtvā ca śūkaraḥ ।
viśvebhyo devebhya iti tatas tān paryapṛcchata ।।
pitṝn āvāhayiṣyāmi ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ ।
āvāhayasveti ca tair uktas tv āvāhayec chuciḥ ।।
śliṣṭamūlāgradarbhāṃs tu satilān veda vedavit ।
jānāv āropya hastaṃ tu dadau savyena cāsanam ।।
tathaiva jānusaṃsthena kareṇaikena tān pitṝn ।
vārāhaḥ pitṛviprāṇām āyāntu na itīrayan ।।
apahatety uvācaiva rakṣaṇaṃ cāpasavyataḥ ।
kṛtvā cāvāhanaṃ cakre pitṝṇāṃ nāmagotrataḥ ।।
tat pitaro manojarān āgacchata itīrayan ।
saṃvatsarair ity udīrya tato arghyaṃ teṣu vinyaset ।।
yās tiṣṭhanty amṛtā vāco yan maiti ca pituḥ pituḥ ।
yan me pitāmahāity evaṃ dadāv arghyaṃ pitāmaha ।।
yan me prapitāmahāiti dadau ca prapitāmahe ।
kuśagandhatilonmiśraṃ sapuṣpam apasavyataḥ ।।
tadvan mātāmahebhyas tu vidhiṃ cakre janārdanaḥ ।
tān arcya bhūyo gandhādyair dhūpaṃ dattvā tu bhaktitaḥ ।।
ādityā vasavo rudrā ity uccārya jagatprabhuḥ ।
tataś cānnaṃ samādāya sarpistilakuśākulam ।।
vidhāya pātre tac caiva paryapṛcchat tato munīn ।
agnau kariṣya iti taiḥ kuruṣveti ca coditaḥ ।।
āhutitritayaṃ dadyāt somāyāgner yamāya ca ।
ye māmakāiti ca japed yajuḥsaptakam acyutam ।।
hutāvaśiṣṭaṃ ca dadau nāmagotrasamanvitam ।
trir āhutikam ekaikaṃ pitaraṃ tu prati dvijāḥ ।।
ato avaśiṣṭam annādyaṃ piṇḍapātre tu nikṣipet ।
tato annaṃ sarasaṃ svādu dadau pāyasapūrvakam ।।
pratyagram ekadā svinnam aparyuṣitam uttamam ।
alpaśākaṃ bahuphalaṃ ṣaḍrasam amṛtopamam ।।
yad brāhmaṇeṣu pradadau piṇḍapātre pitṝṃs tathā ।
vedapūrvaṃ pitṛsvannam ājyaplutaṃ madhūkṣitam ।।
mantritaṃ pṛthivīty evaṃ madhuvātātṛcaṃ jagau ।
bhuñjāneṣu tu vipreṣu japan vai mantrapañcakam ।।
yat te prakāram ārabhya nādhikaṃ te tato jagau ।
trimadhu trisuparṇaṃ ca bṛhadāraṇyakaṃ tathā ।।
jajāpa vaiṣāṃ jāpyaṃ tu sūktaṃ sauraṃ sapauruṣam ।
bhuktavatsu ca vipreṣu pṛṣṭvā tṛptā stha ity uta ।।
tṛptāḥ smeti sakṛt toyaṃ dadau maunavimocanam ।
piṇḍapātraṃ samādāya cchāyāyai pradadau tataḥ ।।
sā tad annaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā tridhaikaikam athākarot ।
vārāho bhūm athollikhya samācchādya kuśair api ।।
dakṣiṇāgrān kuśān kṛtvā teṣām upari cāsanam ।
satileṣu samūleṣu kuśeṣv eva tu saṃśrayaḥ ।।
gandhapuṣpādikaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ piṇḍaṃ tu bhaktitaḥ ।
pṛthivī dadhīr ity uktvā tataḥ piṇḍaṃ pradattavān ।।
pitāmahāḥ prapitāmahās tatheti cāntarikṣataḥ ।
mātāmahānām apy evaṃ dadau piṇḍān sa śūkaraḥ ।।
piṇḍanirvāpaṇocchiṣṭam annaṃ lepabhujeṣv adāt ।
etad vaḥ pitar ity uktvā dadau vāsāṃsi bhaktitaḥ ।।
dvyaṅgulajāni śuklāni dhautāny abhinavāni ca ।
gandhapuṣpādikaṃ dattvā kṛtvā caiṣāṃ pradakṣiṇām ।।
ācamyācāmayed viprān paitrān ādau tataḥ surān ।
tatas tv abhyukṣya tāṃ bhūmiṃ dattvāpaḥ sumanokṣatān ।।
satilāmbu pitṛṣv ādau dattvā deveṣu sākṣatam ।
akṣayyaṃ nas tv iti pitṝn prīyatām iti devatāḥ ।।
prīṇayitvā parāvṛtya trir japec cāghamarṣaṇam ।
tato nivṛtya tu japed yan me nāma itīrayan ।।
gṛhān naḥ pitaro datta dhanadhānyaprapūritān ।
arghyapātrāṇi piṇḍānām antare sa pavitrakān ।।
nikṣipyorjaṃ vahantīti kokātoyam atho ajapat ।
himakṣīraṃ madhutilān pitṝṇāṃ tarpaṇaṃ dadau ।।
svastīty ukte paitṛkais tu sorāhne pnāvatarpayan ।
rajataṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā viprān devo gadādharaḥ ।।
saṃvibhāgaṃ manuṣyebhyo dadau svad iti cābruvan ।
kaścit saṃpannam ity uktvā pratyuktas tair dvijottamāḥ ।।
abhiramyatām ity uvāca procus te abhiratāḥ sma vai ।
śiṣṭam annaṃ ca papraccha tair iṣṭaiḥ saha coditaḥ ।।
pāṇāv ādāya tān viprān kuryād anugatas tadā ।
vāje vāje iti paṭhan bahir vedi vinirgataḥ ।।
koṭitīrthajalenāsāv apasavyaṃ samutkṣipan ।
alagnān vipulān vālān prārthayām āsa cāśiṣam ।।
dātāro no abhivardhantāṃ tais tatheti samīritaḥ ।
pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya kṛtvā pādābhivādanam ।।
āsanāni dadau caiṣāṃ chādayām āsa śūkaraḥ ।
viśrāmyatāṃ praviśyātha piṇḍaṃ jagrāha madhyamam ।।
chāyāmayī mahī patnī tasyai piṇḍam adāt prabhuḥ ।
ādhatta pitaro garbham ity uktvā sāpi rūpiṇī ।।
piṇḍaṃ gṛhītvā viprāṇāṃ cakre pādābhivandanam ।
visarjanaṃ pitṝṇāṃ sa kartukāmaś ca śūkaraḥ ।।
kokā ca pitaraś caiva procuḥ svārthakaraṃ vacaḥ ।
śaptāś ca bhagavan pūrvaṃ divasthā himabhānunā ।।
yogabhraṣṭā bhaviṣyadhvaṃ sarva eva divaś cyutāḥ ।
tad evaṃ bhavatā trātāḥ praviśanto rasātalam ।।
yogabhraṣṭāṃś ca viśveśās tatyajur yogarakṣiṇaḥ ।
tat te bhūyo abhirakṣantu viśve devā hi naḥ sadā ।।
svargaṃ yāsyāmaś ca vibho prasādāt tava śūkara ।
somo adhidevo asmākaṃ ca bhavatv acyuta yogadhṛk ।।
yogādhāras tathā somas trāyate na kadācana ।
divi bhūmau sadā vāso bhavatv asmāsu yogataḥ ।।
antarikṣe ca keṣāṃcin māsaṃ puṣṭis tathāstu naḥ ।
ūrjā ceyaṃ hi naḥ patnī svadhānāmnā tu viśrutā ।।
bhavatv eṣaiva yogāḍhyā yogamātā ca khecarī ।
ity evam uktaḥ pitṛbhir vārāho bhūtabhāvanaḥ ।।
provācātha pitṝn viṣṇus tāṃ ca kokāṃ mahānadīm ।
yad uktaṃ tu bhavadbhir me sarvam etad bhaviṣyati ।।
yamo adhidevo bhavatāṃ somaḥ svādhyāya īritaḥ ।
adhiyajñas tathaivāgnir bhavatāṃ kalpanā tv iyam ।।
agnir vāyuś ca sūryaś ca sthānaṃ hi bhavatām iti ।
brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca bhavatām adhipūruṣāḥ ।।
ādityā vasavo rudrā bhavatāṃ mūrtayas tv imāḥ ।
yogino yogadehāś ca yogadhārāś ca suvratāḥ ।।
kāmato vicariṣyadhvaṃ phaladāḥ sarvajantuṣu ।
svargasthān narakasthāṃś ca bhūmisthāṃś ca carācarān ।।
nijayogabalenaivā- pyāyayiṣyadhvam uttamāḥ ।
iyam ūrjā śaśisutā kīlālamadhuvigrahā ।।
bhaviṣyati mahābhāgā dakṣasya duhitā svadhā ।
tatreyaṃ bhavatāṃ patnī bhaviṣyati varānanā ।।
kokānadīti vikhyātā girirājasamāśritā ।
tīrthakoṭimahāpuṇyā madrūpaparipālitā ।।
asyām adya prabhṛti vai nivatsyāmy aghanāśakṛt ।
varāhadarśanaṃ puṇyaṃ pūjanaṃ bhuktimuktidam ।।
kokāsalilapānaṃ ca mahāpātakanāśanam ।
tīrtheṣv āplavanaṃ puṇyam upavāsaś ca svargadaḥ ।।
dānam akṣayyam uditaṃ janmamṛtyujarāpaham ।
māghe māsy asite pakṣe bhavadbhir uḍupakṣaye ।।
kokāmukham upāgamya sthātavyaṃ dinapañcakam ।
tasmin kāle tu yaḥ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ nirvapiṣyati ।।
prāguktaphalabhāgī sa bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ ।
ekādaśīṃ dvādaśīṃ ca stheyam atra mayā sadā ।।
yas tatropavased dhīmān sa prāguktaphalaṃ labhet ।
tad vrajadhvaṃ mahābhāgāḥ sthānam iṣṭaṃ yatheṣṭataḥ ।।
aham apy atra vatsyāmīty uktvā so antaradhīyata ।
gate varāhe pitaraḥ kokām āmantrya te yayuḥ ।।
kokāpi tīrthasahitā saṃsthitā girirājani ।
chāyā mahīmayī kroḍī piṇḍaprāśanabṛṃhitā ।।
garbham ādāya saśraddhā vārāhasyaiva sundarī ।
tato asyāḥ prābhavat putro bhaumas tu narakāsuraḥ ।
prāgjyotiṣaṃ ca nagaram asya dattaṃ ca viṣṇunā ।।
evaṃ mayoktaṃ varadasya viṣṇoḥ 
kokāmukhe divyavarāharūpam 
śrutvā naras tyaktamalo vipāpmā 
daśāśvamedheṣṭiphalaṃ labheta 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
bhūyaḥ prabrūhi bhagavañ śrāddhakalpaṃ suvistarāt ।
kathaṃ kva ca kadā keṣu kais tad brūhi tapodhana ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ śrāddhakalpaṃ suvistarāt ।
yathā yatra yadā yeṣu yair dravyais tad vadāmy aham ।।
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ śrāddhaṃ svavaraṇoditam ।
kuladharmam anutiṣṭhadbhir dātavyaṃ mantrapūrvakam ।।
strībhir varṇāvaraiḥ śūdrair viprāṇām anuśāsanāt ।
amantrakaṃ vidhipūrvaṃ vahniyāgavivarjitam ।।
puṣkarādiṣu tīrtheṣu puṇyeṣv āyataneṣu ca ।
śikhareṣu girīndrāṇāṃ puṇyadeśeṣu bho dvijāḥ ।।
saritsu puṇyatoyāsu nadeṣu ca saraḥsu ca ।
saṃgameṣu nadīnāṃ ca samudreṣu ca saptasu ।।
svanulipteṣu geheṣu sveṣv anujñāpiteṣu ca ।
divyapādapamūleṣu yajñiyeṣu hradeṣu ca ।।
śrāddham eteṣu dātavyaṃ varjyam eteṣu cocyate ।
kirāteṣu kaliṅgeṣu koṅkaṇeṣu kṛmiṣv api ।।
daśārṇeṣu kumāryeṣu taṅgaṇeṣu kratheṣv api ।
sindhor uttarakūleṣu narmadāyāś ca dakṣiṇe ।।
pūrveṣu karatoyāyā na deyaṃ śrāddham ucyate ।
śrāddhaṃ deyam uśantīha māsi māsy uḍupakṣaye ।।
paurṇamāseṣu śrāddhaṃ ca kartavyam ṛkṣagocare ।
nityaśrāddham adaivaṃ ca manuṣyaiḥ saha gīyate ।।
naimittikaṃ suraiḥ sārdhaṃ nityaṃ naimittikaṃ tathā ।
kāmyāny anyāni śrāddhāni pratisaṃvatsaraṃ dvijaiḥ ।।
vṛddhiśrāddhaṃ ca kartavyaṃ jātakarmādikeṣu ca ।
tatra yugmān dvijān āhur mantrapūrvaṃ tu vai dvijāḥ ।।
kanyāṃ gate savitari dināni daśa pañca ca ।
pūrveṇaiveha vidhinā śrāddhaṃ tatra vidhīyate ।।
pratipaddhanalābhāya dvitīyā dvipadapradā ।
putrārthinī tṛtīyā tu caturthī śatrunāśinī ।।
śriyaṃ prāpnoti pañcamyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ pūjyo bhaven naraḥ ।
gaṇādhipatyaṃ saptamyām aṣṭamyāṃ buddhim uttamām ।।
striyo navamyāṃ prāpnoti daśamyāṃ pūrṇakāmatām ।
vedāṃs tathāpnuyāt sarvān ekādaśyāṃ kriyāparaḥ ।।
dvādaśyāṃ jayalābhaṃ ca prāpnoti pitṛpūjakaḥ ।
prajāvṛddhiṃ paśuṃ medhāṃ svātantryaṃ puṣṭim uttamām ।।
dīrghāyur athavaiśvaryaṃ kurvāṇas tu trayodaśīm ।
avāpnoti na saṃdehaḥ śrāddhaṃ śraddhāsamanvitaḥ ।।
yathāsaṃbhavinānnena śrāddhaṃ śraddhāsamanvitaḥ ।
yuvānaḥ pitaro yasya mṛtāḥ śastreṇa vā hatāḥ ।।
tena kāryaṃ caturdaśyāṃ teṣāṃ tṛptim abhīpsatā ।
śrāddhaṃ kurvann amāvāsyāṃ yatnena puruṣaḥ śuciḥ ।।
sarvān kāmān avāpnoti svargaṃ cānantam aśnute ।
ataḥparaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ vadato mama ।।
pitṝṇāṃ prītaye yatra yad deyaṃ prītikāriṇā ।
māsaṃ tṛptiḥ pitṝṇāṃ tu haviṣyānnena jāyate ।।
māsadvayaṃ matsyamāṃsais tṛptiṃ yānti pitāmahāḥ ।
trīn māsān hāriṇaṃ māṃsaṃ vijñeyaṃ pitṛtṛptaye ।।
puṣṇāti caturo māsāñ śaśasya piśitaṃ pitṝn ।
śākunaṃ pañca vai māsān ṣaṇ māsāñ śūkarāmiṣam ।।
chāgalaṃ sapta vai māsān aiṇeyaṃ cāṣṭamāsakān ।
karoti tṛptiṃ nava vai rurumāṃsaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ।।
gavyaṃ māṃsaṃ pitṛtṛptiṃ karoti daśamāsikīm ।
tathaikādaśa māsāṃs tu aurabhraṃ pitṛtṛptidam ।।
saṃvatsaraṃ tathā gavyaṃ payaḥ pāyasam eva ca ।
vādhrīnam āmiṣaṃ lohaṃ kālaśākaṃ tathā madhu ।।
rohitāmiṣam annaṃ ca dattāny ātmakulodbhavaiḥ ।
anantaṃ vai prayacchanti tṛptiyogaṃ sutāṃs tathā ।।
pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃdeho gayāśrāddhaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।
yo dadāti guḍonmiśrāṃs tilān vā śrāddhakarmaṇi ।।
madhu vā madhumiśraṃ vā akṣayaṃ sarvam eva tat ।
api naḥ sa kule bhūyād yo no dadyāj jalāñjalim ।।
pāyasaṃ madhusaṃyuktaṃ varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca ।
eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yady eko api gayāṃ vrajet ।।
gaurīṃ vāpy udvahet kanyāṃ nīlaṃ vā vṛṣam utsṛjet ।
kṛttikāsu pitṝn arcya svargam āpnoti mānavaḥ ।।
apatyakāmo rohiṇyāṃ saumye tejasvitāṃ labhet ।
śauryam ārdrāsu cāpnoti kṣetrāṇi ca punarvasau ।।
puṣye tu dhanam akṣayyam āśleṣe cāyur uttamam ।
maghāsu ca prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ saubhāgyaṃ phālgunīṣu ca ।।
pradhānaśīlo bhavati sāpatyaś cottarāsu ca ।
prayāti śreṣṭhatāṃ śāstre haste śrāddhaprado naraḥ ।।
rūpaṃ tejaś ca citrāsu tathāpatyam avāpnuyāt ।
vāṇijyalābhadā svātī viśākhā putrakāmadā ।।
kurvantāṃ cānurādhāsu tā dadyuś cakravartitām ।
ādhipatyaṃ ca jyeṣṭhāsu mūle cārogyam uttamam ।।
āṣāḍhāsu yaśaḥprāptir uttarāsu viśokatā ।
śravaṇena śubhāṃl lokān dhaniṣṭhāsu dhanaṃ mahat ।।
vedavittvam abhijiti bhiṣaksiddhiṃ ca vāruṇe ।
ajāvikaṃ prauṣṭhapadyāṃ vinded gāvas tathottare ।।
revatīṣu tathā kupyam aśvinīṣu turaṃgamān ।
śrāddhaṃ kurvaṃs tathāpnoti bharaṇīṣv āyur uttamam ।।
evaṃ phalam avāpnoti ṛkṣeṣv eteṣu tattvavit ।
tasmāt kāmyāni śrāddhāni deyāni vidhivad dvijāḥ ।।
kanyārāśigate sūrye phalam atyantam icchatā ।
yān yān kāmān abhidhyāyan kanyārāśigate ravau ।।
śrāddhaṃ kurvanti manujās tāṃs tān kāmāṃl labhanti te ।
nāndīmukhānāṃ kartavyaṃ kanyārāśigate ravau ।।
paurṇamāsyāṃ tu kartavyaṃ vārāhavacanaṃ yathā ।
divyabhaumāntarikṣāṇi sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca ।।
piṇḍam icchanti pitaraḥ kanyārāśigate ravau ।
kanyāṃ gate savitari yāny ahāni tu ṣoḍaśa ।।
kratubhis tāni tulyāni devo nārāyaṇo abravīt ।
rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ ya icched durlabhaṃ phalam ।।
apy ambuśākamūlādyaiḥ pitṝn kanyāgate arcayet ।
uttarāhastanakṣatra- gate tīkṣṇāṃśumālini ।।
yo arcayet svapitṝn bhaktyā tasya vāsas triviṣṭape ।
hastarkṣage dinakare pitṛrājānuśāsanāt ।।
tāvat pitṛpurī śūnyā yāvad vṛścikadarśanam ।
vṛścike samatikrānte pitaro daivataiḥ saha ।।
niḥśvasya pratigacchanti śāpaṃ dattvā suduḥsaham ।
aṣṭakāsu ca kartavyaṃ śrāddhaṃ manvantarāsu vai ।।
anvaṣṭakāsu kramaśo mātṛpūrvaṃ tad iṣyate ।
grahaṇe ca vyatīpāte ravicandrasamāgame ।।
janmarkṣe grahapīḍāyāṃ śrāddhaṃ pārvaṇam ucyate ।
ayanadvitaye śrāddhaṃ viṣuvadvitaye tathā ।।
saṃkrāntiṣu ca kartavyaṃ śrāddhaṃ vidhivad uttamam ।
eṣu kāryaṃ dvijāḥ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍanirvāpaṇād ṛte ।।
vaiśākhasya tṛtīyāyāṃ navamyāṃ kārttikasya ca ।
śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ tu śuklāyāṃ saṃkrāntividhinā naraiḥ ।।
trayodaśyāṃ bhādrapade māghe candrakṣaye ahani ।
śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ pāyasena dakṣiṇāyanavac ca tat ।।
yadā ca śrotriyo abhyeti gehaṃ vedavid agnimān ।
tenaikena ca kartavyaṃ śrāddhaṃ vidhivad uttamam ।।
śrāddhīyadravyasaṃprāptir yadā syāt sādhusaṃmatā ।
pārvaṇena vidhānena śrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ tathā dvijaiḥ ।।
pratisaṃvatsaraṃ kāryaṃ mātāpitror mṛte ahani ।
pitṛvyasyāpy aputrasya bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya caiva hi ।।
pārvaṇaṃ devapūrvaṃ syād ekoddiṣṭaṃ surair vinā ।
dvau daive pitṛkārye trīn ekaikam ubhayatra vā ।।
mātāmahānām apy evaṃ sarvam ūhena kīrtitam ।
pretībhūtasya satataṃ bhuvi piṇḍaṃ jalaṃ tathā ।।
satilaṃ sakuśaṃ dadyād bahir jalasamīpataḥ ।
tṛtīye ahni ca kartavyaṃ pretāsthicayanaṃ dvijaiḥ ।।
daśāhe brāhmaṇaḥ śuddho dvādaśāhena kṣatriyaḥ ।
vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhena śūdro māsena śudhyati ।।
sūtakānte gṛhe śrāddham ekoddiṣṭaṃ pracakṣate ।
dvādaśe ahani māse ca tripakṣe ca tataḥ param ।।
māsi māsi ca kartavyaṃ yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ dvijāḥ ।
tata parataraṃ kāryaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kramāt ।।
kṛte sapiṇḍīkaraṇe pārvaṇaṃ procyate punaḥ ।
tataḥ prabhṛti nirmuktāḥ pretatvāt pitṛtāṃ gatāḥ ।।
amūrtā mūrtimantaś ca pitaro dvividhāḥ smṛtāḥ ।
nāndīmukhās tv amūrtāḥ syur mūrtimanto atha pārvaṇāḥ ।
ekoddiṣṭāśinaḥ pretāḥ pitṝṇāṃ nirṇayas tridhā ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kartavyaṃ dvijasattama ।
pretībhūtasya vidhivad brūhi no vadatāṃ vara ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ viprāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ vadato mama ।
tac cāpi devarahitam ekārghaikapavitrakam ।।
naivāgnau karaṇaṃ tatra tac cāvāhanavarjitam ।
apasavyaṃ ca tatrāpi bhojayed ayujo dvijān ।।
viśeṣas tatra cānyo asti pratimāsakriyādikaḥ ।
taṃ kathyamānam ekāgrāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ me dvijottamāḥ ।।
tilagandhodakair yuktaṃ tatra pātracatuṣṭayam ।
kuryāt pitṝṇāṃ tritayam ekaṃ pretasya ca dvijāḥ ।।
pātratraye pretapātrād arghaṃ caiva prasecayet ।
ye samānā iti japan pūrvavac cheṣam ācaret ।।
strīṇām apy evam eva syād ekoddiṣṭam udāhṛtam ।
sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ tāsāṃ putrābhāve na vidyate ।।
pratisaṃvatsaraṃ kāryam ekoddiṣṭaṃ naraiḥ striyāḥ ।
mṛtāhani ca tat kāryaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vidhicoditam ।।
putrābhāve sapiṇḍās tu tadabhāve sahodarāḥ ।
kuryur etaṃ vidhiṃ samyak putrasya ca sutāḥ sutāḥ ।।
kuryān mātāmahānāṃ tu putrikātanayas tathā ।
dvyāmuṣyāyaṇasaṃjñās tu mātāmahapitāmahān ।।
pūjayeyur yathānyāyaṃ śrāddhair naimittikair api ।
sarvābhāve striyaḥ kuryuḥ svabhartṝṇām amantrakam ।।
tadabhāve ca nṛpatiḥ kārayet tv akuṭumbinām ।
tajjātīyair naraiḥ samyag vāhādyāḥ sakalāḥ kriyāḥ ।।
sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ bāndhavo nṛpatir yataḥ ।
etā vaḥ kathitā viprā nityā naimittikās tathā ।।
vakṣye śrāddhāśrayām anyāṃ nityanaimittikāṃ kriyām ।
darśas tatra nimittaṃ tu vidyād indukṣayānvitaḥ ।।
nityas tu niyataḥ kālas tasmin kuryād yathoditam ।
sapiṇḍīkaraṇād ūrdhvaṃ pitur yaḥ prapitāmahaḥ ।।
sa tu lepabhujaṃ yāti praluptaḥ pitṛpiṇḍataḥ ।
teṣāṃ hi yaś caturtho anyaḥ sa tu lepabhujo bhavet ।।
so api saṃbandhato hīnam upabhogaṃ prapadyate ।
pitā pitāmahaś caiva tathaiva prapitāmahaḥ ।।
piṇḍasaṃbandhino hy ete vijñeyāḥ puruṣās trayaḥ ।
lepasaṃbandhinaś cānye pitāmahapitāmahāt ।।
prabhṛtyuktās trayas teṣāṃ yajamānaś ca saptamaḥ ।
ity eṣa munibhiḥ proktaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sāptapauruṣaḥ ।।
yajamānāt prabhṛty ūrdhvam anulepabhujas tathā ।
tato anye pūrvajāḥ sarve ye cānye narakaukasaḥ ।।
ye api tiryaktvam āpannā ye ca bhūtādisaṃsthitāḥ ।
tān sarvān yajamāno vai śrāddhaṃ kurvan yathāvidhi ।।
sa samāpyāyate viprā yena yena vadāmi tat ।
annaprakiraṇaṃ yat tu manuṣyaiḥ kriyate bhuvi ।।
tena tṛptim upāyānti ye piśācatvam āgatāḥ ।
yad ambu snānavastrotthaṃ bhūmau patati bho dvijāḥ ।।
tena ye tarutāṃ prāptās teṣāṃ tṛptiḥ prajāyate ।
yās tu gandhāmbukaṇikāḥ patanti dharaṇītale ।।
tābhir āpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ devatvaṃ ye kule gatāḥ ।
uddhṛteṣv atha piṇḍeṣu yāś cāmbukaṇikā bhuvi ।।
tābhir āpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ ye tiryaktvaṃ kule gatāḥ ।
ye cādantāḥ kule bālāḥ kriyāyogād bahiṣkṛtāḥ ।।
vipannās tv anadhikārāḥ saṃmārjitajalāśinaḥ ।
bhuktvā cācāmatāṃ yac ca yaj jalaṃ cāṅghriśaucajam ।।
brāhmaṇānāṃ tathaivānyat tena tṛptiṃ prayānti vai ।
evaṃ yo yajamānasya yaś ca teṣāṃ dvijanmanām ।।
kaścij jalānnavikṣepaḥ śucir ucchiṣṭa eva vā ।
tenānnena kule tatra ye ca yonyantaraṃ gatāḥ ।।
prayānty āpyāyanaṃ viprāḥ samyak śrāddhakriyāvatām ।
anyāyopārjitair arthair yac chrāddhaṃ kriyate naraiḥ ।।
tṛpyante te na cāṇḍāla- pulkasādyāsu yoniṣu ।
evam āpyāyanaṃ viprā bahūnām eva bāndhavaiḥ ।।
śrāddhaṃ kurvadbhir atrāmbu- vikṣepaiḥ saṃprajāyate ।
tasmāc chrāddhaṃ naro bhaktyā śākenāpi yathāvidhi ।।
kurvīta kurvataḥ śrāddhaṃ kule kaścin na sīdati ।
śrāddhaṃ deyaṃ tu vipreṣu saṃyateṣv agnihotriṣu ।।
avadāteṣu vidvatsu śrotriyeṣu viśeṣataḥ ।
triṇāciketas trimadhus trisuparṇaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit ।।
mātāpitṛparaś caiva svasrīyaḥ sāmavedavit ।
ṛtvikpurohitācāryam upādhyāyaṃ ca bhojayet ।।
mātulaḥ śvaśuraḥ śyālaḥ saṃbandhī droṇapāṭhakaḥ ।
maṇḍalabrāhmaṇo yas tu purāṇārthaviśāradaḥ ।।
akalpaḥ kalpasaṃtuṣṭaḥ pratigrahavivarjitaḥ ।
ete śrāddhe niyoktavyā brāhmaṇāḥ paṅktipāvanāḥ ।।
nimantrayeta pūrvedyuḥ pūrvoktān dvijasattamān ।
daive niyoge pitrye ca tāṃs tathaivopakalpayet ।।
taiś ca saṃyamibhir bhāvyaṃ yas tu śrāddhaṃ kariṣyati ।
śrāddhaṃ dattvā ca bhuktvā ca maithunaṃ yo adhigacchati ।।
pitaras tasya vai māsaṃ tasmin retasi śerate ।
gatvā ca yoṣitaṃ śrāddhe yo bhuṅkte yas tu gacchati ।।
retomūtrakṛtāhārās taṃ māsaṃ pitaras tayoḥ ।
tasmāt tv aprathamaṃ kāryaṃ prājñenopanimantraṇam ।।
aprāptau taddine vāpi varjyā yoṣitprasaṅginaḥ ।
bhikṣārtham āgatāṃś cāpi kālena saṃyatān yatīn ।।
bhojayet praṇipātādyaiḥ prasādya yatamānasaḥ ।
yoginaś ca tadā śrāddhe bhojanīyā vipaścitā ।।
yogādhārā hi pitaras tasmāt tān pūjayet sadā ।
brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi eko yogī bhaved yadi ।।
yajamānaṃ ca bhoktṝṃś ca naur ivāmbhasi tārayet ।
pitṛgāthā tathaivātra gīyate brahmavādibhiḥ ।।
yā gītā pitṛbhiḥ pūrvam ailasyāsīn mahīpateḥ ।
kadā naḥ saṃtatāv agryaḥ kasyacid bhavitā sutaḥ ।।
yo yogibhuktaśeṣān no bhuvi piṇḍān pradāsyati ।
gayāyām athavā piṇḍaṃ khaḍgamāṃsaṃ tathā haviḥ ।।
kālaśākaṃ tilājyaṃ ca tṛptaye kṛsaraṃ ca naḥ ।
vaiśvadevaṃ ca saumyaṃ ca khaḍgamāṃsaṃ paraṃ haviḥ ।।
viṣāṇavarjaṃ śirasa ā pādād āśiṣāmahe ।
dadyāc chrāddhaṃ trayodaśyāṃ maghāsu ca yathāvidhi ।।
madhusarpiḥsamāyuktaṃ pāyasaṃ dakṣiṇāyane ।
tasmāt saṃpūjayed bhaktyā svapitṝn vidhivan naraḥ ।।
kāmān abhīpsan sakalān pāpād ātmavimocanam ।
vasūn rudrāṃs tathādityān nakṣatragrahatārakāḥ ।।
prīṇayanti manuṣyāṇāṃ pitaraḥ śrāddhatarpitāḥ ।
āyuḥ prajāṃ dhanaṃ vidyāṃ svargaṃ mokṣaṃ sukhāni ca ।।
prayacchanti tathā rājyaṃ pitaraḥ śrāddhatarpitāḥ ।
tathāparāhṇaḥ pūrvāhṇāt pitṝṇām atiricyate ।।
saṃpūjya svāgatenaitān sadane abhyāgatān dvijān ।
pavitrapāṇir ācāntān āsaneṣūpaveśayet ।।
śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānena saṃbhojya ca dvijottamān ।
visarjayet priyāṇy uktvā praṇipatya ca bhaktitaḥ ।।
ādvāram anugacchec ca āgacched anumoditaḥ ।
tato nityakriyāṃ kuryād bhojayec ca tathātithīn ।।
nityakriyāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca kecid icchanti sattamāḥ ।
na pitṝṇāṃ tathaivānye śeṣaṃ pūrvavad ācaret ।।
pṛthaktvena vadanty anye kecit pūrvaṃ ca pūrvavat ।
tatas tad annaṃ bhuñjīta saha bhṛtyādibhir naraḥ ।।
evaṃ kurvīta dharmajñaḥ śrāddhaṃ pitryaṃ samāhitaḥ ।
yathā ca vipramukhyānāṃ paritoṣo abhijāyate ।।
idānīṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi varjanīyān dvijādhamān ।
mitradhruk kunakhī klībaḥ kṣayī śuklī vaṇikpathaḥ ।।
śyāvadanto atha khalvāṭaḥ kāṇo andho badhiro jaḍaḥ ।
mūkaḥ paṅguḥ kuṇiḥ ṣaṇḍho duścarmā vyaṅgakekarau ।।
kuṣṭhī raktekṣaṇaḥ kubjo vāmano vikaṭo alasaḥ ।
mitraśatrur duṣkulīnaḥ paśupālo nirākṛtiḥ ।।
parivittiḥ parivettā parivedanikāsutaḥ ।
vṛṣalīpatis tatsutaś ca na bhavec chrāddhabhug dvijaḥ ।।
vṛṣalīputrasaṃskartā anūḍho didhiṣūpatiḥ ।
bhṛtakādhyāpako yas tu bhṛtakādhyāpitaś ca yaḥ ।।
sūtakānnopajīvī ca mṛgayuḥ somavikrayī ।
abhiśastas tathā stenaḥ patito vārddhuṣiḥ śaṭhaḥ ।।
piśuno vedasaṃtyāgī dānāgnityāganiṣṭhuraḥ ।
rājñaḥ purohito bhṛtyo vidyāhīno atha matsarī ।।
vṛddhadviḍ durdharaḥ krūro mūḍho devalakas tathā ।
nakṣatrasūcakaś caiva parvakāraś ca garhitaḥ ।।
ayājyayājakaḥ ṣaṇḍho garhitā ye ca ye adhamāḥ ।
na te śrāddhe niyoktavyā dṛṣṭvāmī paṅktidūṣakāḥ ।।
asatāṃ pragraho yatra satāṃ caivāvamānanā ।
daṇḍo devakṛtas tatra sadyaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ ।।
hitvāgamaṃ suvihitaṃ bāliśaṃ yas tu bhojayet ।
ādidharmaṃ samutsṛjya dātā tatra vinaśyati ।।
yas tv āśritaṃ dvijaṃ tyaktvā anyam ānīya bhojayet ।
tanniḥśvāsāgninirdagdhas tatra dātā vinaśyati ।।
vastrābhāve kriyā nāsti yajñā vedās tapāṃsi ca ।
tasmād vāsāṃsi deyāni śrāddhakāle viśeṣataḥ ।।
kauśeyaṃ kṣaumakārpāsaṃ dukūlam ahataṃ tathā ।
śrāddhe tv etāni yo dadyāt kāmān āpnoti cottamān ।।
yathā goṣu prabhūtāsu vatso vindati mātaram ।
tathānnaṃ tatra viprāṇāṃ jantur yatrāvatiṣṭhate ।।
nāmagotraṃ ca mantrāṃś ca dattam annaṃ na yanti te ।
api ye nidhanaṃ prāptās tṛptis tān upatiṣṭhate ।।
devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca mahāyogibhya eva ca ।
namaḥ svāhāyai svadhāyai nityam eva bhavantv iti ।।
ādyāvasāne śrāddhasya trir āvṛttyā japet tadā ।
piṇḍanirvapaṇe vāpi japed evaṃ samāhitaḥ ।।
kṣipram āyānti pitaro rākṣasāḥ pradravanti ca ।
prīyante triṣu lokeṣu mantro ayaṃ tārayaty uta ।।
kṣaumasūtraṃ navaṃ dadyāc chāṇaṃ kārpāsikaṃ tathā ।
pattrorṇaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ ca kauśeyaṃ ca vivarjayet ।।
varjayec cādaśaṃ prājño yadyapy avyāhataṃ bhavet ।
na prīṇayanty athaitāni dātuś cāpy anayo bhavet ।।
na nivedyo bhavet piṇḍaḥ pitṝṇāṃ yas tu jīvati ।
iṣṭenānnena bhakṣyeṇa bhojayet taṃ yathāvidhi ।।
piṇḍam agnau sadā dadyād bhogārthī satataṃ naraḥ ।
patnyai dadyāt prajārthī ca madhyamaṃ mantrapūrvakam ।।
uttamāṃ dyutim anvicchan piṇḍaṃ goṣu prayacchati ।
prajñāṃ caiva yaśaḥ kīrtim apsu caiva nivedayet ।।
prārthayan dīrgham āyuś ca vāyasebhyaḥ prayacchati ।
kumāraśālām anvicchan kukkuṭebhyaḥ prayacchati ।।
eke viprāḥ punaḥ prāhuḥ piṇḍoddharaṇam agrataḥ ।
anujñātas tu viprais taiḥ kāmam uddhriyatām iti ।।
tasmāc chrāddhaṃ tathā kāryaṃ yathoktam ṛṣibhiḥ purā ।
anyathā tu bhaved doṣaḥ pitṝṇāṃ nopatiṣṭhati ।।
yavair vrīhitilair māṣair godhūmaiś caṇakais tathā ।
saṃtarpayet pitṝn mudgaiḥ śyāmākaiḥ sarṣapadravaiḥ ।।
nīvārair hastiśyāmākaiḥ priyaṅgubhis tathārghayet ।
prasātikāṃ satūlikāṃ dadyāc chrāddhe vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
āmram āmrātakaṃ bilvaṃ dāḍimaṃ bījapūrakam ।
prācīnāmalakaṃ kṣīraṃ nārikelaṃ parūṣakam ।।
nāraṅgaṃ ca sakharjūraṃ drākṣānīlakapitthakam ।
paṭolaṃ ca priyālaṃ ca karkandhūbadarāṇi ca ।।
vikaṅkataṃ vatsakaṃ ca kastvārur vārakān api ।
etāni phalajātāni śrāddhe deyāni yatnataḥ ।।
guḍaśarkaramatsyaṇḍī deyaṃ phāṇitamūrmuram ।
gavyaṃ payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ ca tilasaṃbhavam ।।
saindhavaṃ sāgarotthaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ sārasaṃ tathā ।
nivedayec chucīn gandhāṃś candanāgurukuṅkumān ।।
kālaśākaṃ tandulīyaṃ vāstukaṃ mūlakaṃ tathā ।
śākam āraṇyakaṃ cāpi dadyāt puṣpāṇy amūni ca ।।
jāticampakalodhrāś ca mallikābāṇabarbarī ।
vṛntāśokāṭarūṣaṃ ca tulasī tilakaṃ tathā ।।
pāvantīṃ śatapattrāṃ ca gandhaśephālikām api ।
kubjakaṃ tagaraṃ caiva mṛgam āraṇyaketakīm ।।
yūthikām atimuktaṃ ca śrāddhayogyāni bho dvijāḥ ।
kamalaṃ kumudaṃ padmaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ ca yatnataḥ ।।
indīvaraṃ kokanadaṃ kahlāraṃ ca niyojayet ।
kuṣṭhaṃ māṃsī vālakaṃ ca kukkuṭī jātipattrakam ।।
nalikośīramustaṃ ca granthiparṇī ca sundarī ।
punar apy evamādīni gandhayogyāni cakṣate ।।
gugguluṃ candanaṃ caiva śrīvāsam aguruṃ tathā ।
dhūpāni pitṛyogyāni ṛṣiguggulam eva ca ।।
rājamāṣāṃś ca caṇakān masūrān koradūṣakān ।
vipruṣān markaṭāṃś caiva kodravāṃś caiva varjayet ।।
māhiṣaṃ cāmaraṃ mārgam āvikaikaśaphodbhavam ।
straiṇam auṣṭram āvikaṃ ca dadhi kṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ tyajet ।।
tālaṃ varuṇakākolau bahupattrārjunīphalam ।
jambīraṃ raktabilvaṃ ca śālasyāpi phalaṃ tyajet ।।
matsyasūkarakūrmāś ca gāvo varjyā viśeṣataḥ ।
pūtikaṃ mṛganābhiṃ ca rocanāṃ padmacandanam ।।
kāleyakaṃ tūgragandhaṃ turuṣkaṃ cāpi varjayet ।
pālaṅkaṃ ca kumārīṃ ca kirātaṃ piṇḍamūlakam ।।
gṛñjanaṃ cukrikāṃ cukraṃ varumāṃ canapattrikām ।
jīvaṃ ca śatapuṣpāṃ ca nālikāṃ gandhaśūkaram ।।
halabhṛtyaṃ sarṣapaṃ ca palāṇḍuṃ laśunaṃ tyajet ।
mānakandaṃ viṣakandaṃ vajrakandaṃ gadāsthikam ।।
puruṣālvaṃ sapiṇḍāluṃ śrāddhakarmaṇi varjayet ।
alābuṃ tiktaparṇāṃ ca kūṣmāṇḍaṃ kaṭukatrayam ।।
vārtākaṃ śivajātaṃ ca lomaśāni vaṭāni ca ।
kālīyaṃ raktavāṇāṃ ca balākā lakucaṃ tathā ।।
śrāddhakarmaṇi varjyāni vibhītakaphalaṃ tathā ।
āranālaṃ ca śuktaṃ ca śīrṇaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tathā ।।
nogragandhaṃ ca dātavyaṃ kovidārakaśigrukau ।
atyamlaṃ picchilaṃ sūkṣmaṃ yātayāmaṃ ca sattamāḥ ।।
na ca deyaṃ gatarasaṃ madyagandhaṃ ca yad bhavet ।
hiṅgūgragandhaṃ phaṇiśaṃ bhūnimbaṃ nimbarājike ।।
kustumburuṃ kaliṅgotthaṃ varjayed amlavetasam ।
dāḍimaṃ māgadhīṃ caiva nāgarārdrakatittiḍīḥ ।।
āmrātakaṃ jīvakaṃ ca tumburuṃ ca niyojayet ।
pāyasaṃ śālmalīmudgān modakādīṃś ca bhaktitaḥ ।।
pānakaṃ ca rasālaṃ ca gokṣīraṃ ca nivedayet ।
yāni cābhyavahāryāṇi svādusnigdhāni bho dvijāḥ ।।
īṣadamlakaṭūny eva deyāni śrāddhakarmaṇi ।
atyamlaṃ cātilavaṇam atiriktakaṭūni ca ।।
āsurāṇīha bhojyāni tāny ato dūratas tyajet ।
mṛṣṭasnigdhāni yāni syur īṣatkaṭvamlakāni ca ।।
svādūni devabhojyāni tāni śrāddhe niyojayet ।
chāgamāṃsaṃ vārtikaṃ ca taittiraṃ śaśakāmiṣam ।।
śivālāvakarājīva- māṃsaṃ śrāddhe niyojayet ।
vāghrīṇasaṃ raktaśivaṃ lohaṃ śalkasamanvitam ।।
siṃhatuṇḍaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca śrāddhe yojyaṃ tathocyate ।
yad apy uktaṃ hi manunā rohitaṃ pratiyojayet ।।
yoktavyaṃ havyakavyeṣu tathā na viprayojayet ।
evam uktaṃ mayā viprā vārāheṇāvalokitam ।।
mayā niṣiddhaṃ bhuñjāno rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet ।
etāni ca niṣiddhāni vārāheṇa tapodhanāḥ ।।
abhakṣyāṇi dvijātīnāṃ na deyāni pitṛṣv api ।
