rohitaṃ śūkaraṃ kūrmaṃ godhāhaṃsaṃ ca varjayet ।।
cakravākaṃ ca madguṃ ca śalkahīnāṃś ca matsyakān ।
kuraraṃ ca nirasthiṃ ca vāsahātaṃ ca kukkuṭān ।।
kalaviṅkamayūrāṃś ca bhāradvājāṃś ca śārṅgakān ।
nakulolūkamārjārāṃl lopān anyān sudurgrahān ।।
ṭiṭṭibhān sārdhajambūkān vyāghra-ṛkṣatarakṣukān ।
etān anyāṃś ca saṃduṣṭān yo bhakṣayati durmatiḥ ।।
sa mahāpāpakārī tu rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet ।
pitṛṣv etāṃs tu yo dadyāt pāpātmā garhitāmiṣān ।।
sa svargasthān api pitṝn narake pātayiṣyati ।
kusumbhaśākaṃ jambīraṃ sigrukaṃ kovidārakam ।।
piṇyākaṃ vipruṣaṃ caiva masūraṃ gṛñjanaṃ śaṇam ।
kodravaṃ kokilākṣaṃ ca cukraṃ kambukapadmakam ।।
cakoraśyenamāṃsaṃ ca vartulālābutālinīm ।
phalaṃ tālatarūṇāṃ ca bhuktyā narakam ṛcchati ।।
dattvā pitṛṣu taiḥ sārdhaṃ vrajet pūyavahaṃ naraḥ ।
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena nāharet tu vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
niṣiddhāni varāheṇa svayaṃ pitrartham ādarāt ।
varam evātmamāṃsasya bhakṣaṇaṃ munayaḥ kṛtam ।।
na tv eva hi niṣiddhānām ādānaṃ puṃbhir ādarāt ।
ajñānād vā pramādād vā sakṛd etāni ca dvijāḥ ।।
bhakṣitāni niṣiddhāni prāyaścittaṃ tataś caret ।
phalamūladadhikṣīra- takragomūtrayāvakaiḥ ।।
bhojyānnabhojyasaṃbhukte pratyekaṃ dinasaptakam ।
evaṃ niṣiddhācaraṇe kṛte sakṛd api dvijaiḥ ।।
śuddhiṃ neyaṃ śarīraṃ tu viṣṇubhaktair viśeṣataḥ ।
niṣiddhaṃ varjayed dravyaṃ yathoktaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
samāhṛtya tataḥ śrāddhaṃ kartavyaṃ nijaśaktitaḥ ।
evaṃ vidhānataḥ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā svavibhavocitam ।
ābrahmastambaparyantaṃ jagat prīṇāti mānavaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
pitā jīvati yasyātha mṛtau dvau pitarau pituḥ ।
kathaṃ śrāddhaṃ hi kartavyam etad vistaraśo vada ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
yasmai dadyāt pitā śrāddhaṃ tasmai dadyāt sutaḥ svayam ।
evaṃ na hīyate dharmo laukiko vaidikas tathā ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
mṛtaḥ pitā jīvati ca yasya brahman pitāmahaḥ ।
sa hi śrāddhaṃ kathaṃ kuryād etat tvaṃ vaktum arhasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
pituḥ piṇḍaṃ pradadyāc ca bhojayec ca pitāmaham ।
prapitāmahasya piṇḍaṃ vai hy ayaṃ śāstreṣu nirṇayaḥ ।।
mṛteṣu piṇḍaṃ dātavyaṃ jīvantaṃ cāpi bhojayet ।
sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ nāsti na ca pārvaṇam iṣyate ।।
ācāram ācared yas tu pitṛmedhāśritaṃ naraḥ ।
āyuṣā dhanaputraiś ca vardhaty āśu na saṃśayaḥ ।।
pitṛmedhādhyāyam imaṃ śrāddhakāleṣu yaḥ paṭhet ।
tad annam asya pitaro aśnanti ca triyugaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
evaṃ mayoktaḥ pitṛmedhakalpaḥ 
pāpāpahaḥ puṇyavivardhanaś ca 
śrotavya eṣa prayatair naraiś ca 
śrāddheṣu caivāpy anukīrtayeta 
{vyāsa uvāca 
evaṃ samyag gṛhasthena devatāḥ pitaras tathā ।
saṃpūjyā havyakavyābhyām annenātithibāndhavāḥ ।।
bhūtāni bhṛtyāḥ sakalāḥ paśupakṣipipīlikāḥ ।
bhikṣavo yācamānāś ca ye cānye pānthakā gṛhe ।।
sadācāraratā viprāḥ sādhunā gṛhamedhinā ।
pāpaṃ bhuṅkte samullaṅghya nityanaimittikīḥ kriyāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kathitaṃ bhavatā vipra nityanaimittikaṃ ca yat ।
nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ trividhaṃ karma pauruṣam ।।
sadācāraṃ mune śrotum icchāmo vadatas tava ।
yaṃ kurvan sukham āpnoti paratreha ca mānavaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
gṛhasthena sadā kāryam ācāraparirakṣaṇam ।
na hy ācāravihīnasya bhadram atra paratra vā ।।
yajñadānatapāṃsīha puruṣasya na bhūtaye ।
bhavanti yaḥ sadācāraṃ samullaṅghya pravartate ।।
durācāro hi puruṣo nehāyur vindate mahat ।
kāryo dharmaḥ sadācāra ācārasyaiva lakṣaṇam ।।
tasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi sadācārasya bho dvijāḥ ।
ātmanaikamanā bhūtvā tathaiva paripālayet ।।
trivargasādhane yatnaḥ kartavyo gṛhamedhinā ।
tatsaṃsiddhau gṛhasthasya siddhir atra paratra ca ।।
pādenāpy asya pāratryaṃ kuryāc chreyaḥ svam ātmavān ।
ardhena cātmabharaṇaṃ nityanaimittikāni ca ।।
pādenaiva tathāpy asya mūlabhūtaṃ vivardhayet ।
evam ācarato viprā arthaḥ sāphalyam ṛcchati ।।
tadvat pāpaniṣedhārthaṃ dharmaḥ kāryo vipaścitā ।
paratrārthas tathaivānyaḥ kāryo atraiva phalapradaḥ ।।
pratyavāyabhayāt kāmas tathānyaś cāvirodhavān ।
dvidhā kāmo api racitas trivargāyāvirodhakṛt ।।
parasparānubandhāṃś ca sarvān etān vicintayet ।
viparītānubandhāṃś ca budhyadhvaṃ tān dvijottamāḥ ।।
dharmo dharmānubandhārtho dharmo nātmārthapīḍakaḥ ।
ubhābhyāṃ ca dvidhā kāmaṃ tena tau ca dvidhā punaḥ ।।
brāhme muhūrte budhyeta dharmārthāv anucintayet ।
samutthāya tathācamya prasnāto niyataḥ śuciḥ ।।
pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ sanakṣatrāṃ paścimāṃ sadivākarām ।
upāsīta yathānyāyaṃ naināṃ jahyād anāpadi ।।
asatpralāpam anṛtaṃ vākpāruṣyaṃ ca varjayet ।
asacchāstram asadvādam asatsevāṃ ca vai dvijāḥ ।।
sāyaṃprātas tathā homaṃ kurvīta niyatātmavān ।
nodayāstamane caivam udīkṣeta vivasvataḥ ।।
keśaprasādhanādarśa- dantadhāvanam añjanam ।
pūrvāhṇa eva kāryāṇi devatānāṃ ca tarpaṇam ।।
grāmāvasathatīrthānāṃ kṣetrāṇāṃ caiva vartmani ।
na viṇmūtram anuṣṭheyaṃ na ca kṛṣṭe na govraje ।।
nagnāṃ parastriyaṃ nekṣen na paśyed ātmanaḥ śakṛt ।
udakyādarśanasparśam evaṃ saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ tathā ।।
nāpsu mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā maithunaṃ vā samācaret ।
nādhitiṣṭhec chakṛnmūtre keśabhasmasapālikāḥ ।।
tuṣāṅgāraviśīrṇāni rajjuvastrādikāni ca ।
nādhitiṣṭhet tathā prājñaḥ pathi vastrāṇi vā bhuvi ।।
pitṛdevamanuṣyāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ ca tathārcanam ।
kṛtvā vibhavataḥ paścād gṛhastho bhoktum arhati ।।
prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi svācānto vāgyataḥ śuciḥ ।
bhuñjīta cānnaṃ taccitto hy antarjānuḥ sadā naraḥ ।।
upaghātam ṛte doṣān nānnasyodīrayed budhaḥ ।
pratyakṣalavaṇaṃ varjyam annam ucchiṣṭam eva ca ।।
na gacchan na ca tiṣṭhan vai viṇmūtrotsargam ātmavān ।
kurvīta caivam ucchiṣṭaṃ na kiṃcid api bhakṣayet ।।
ucchiṣṭo nālapet kiṃcit svādhyāyaṃ ca vivarjayet ।
na paśyec ca raviṃ cenduṃ nakṣatrāṇi ca kāmataḥ ।।
bhinnāsanaṃ ca śayyāṃ ca bhājanaṃ ca vivarjayet ।
gurūṇām āsanaṃ deyam abhyutthānādisatkṛtam ।।
anukūlaṃ tathālāpam abhikurvīta buddhimān ।
tatrānugamanaṃ kuryāt pratikūlaṃ na saṃcaret ।।
naikavastraś ca bhuñjīta na kuryād devatārcanam ।
nāvāhayed dvijān agnau homaṃ kurvīta buddhimān ।।
na snāyīta naro nagno na śayīta kadācana ।
na pāṇibhyām ubhābhyāṃ tu kaṇḍūyeta śiras tathā ।।
na cābhīkṣṇaṃ śiraḥsnānaṃ kāryaṃ niṣkāraṇaṃ budhaiḥ ।
śiraḥsnātaś ca tailena nāṅgaṃ kiṃcid upaspṛśet ।।
anadhyāyeṣu sarveṣu svādhyāyaṃ ca vivarjayet ।
brāhmaṇānalagosūryān nāvamanyet kadācana ।।
udaṅmukho divā rātrāv utsargaṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ ।
ābādhāsu yathākāmaṃ kuryān mūtrapurīṣayoḥ ।।
duṣkṛtaṃ na guror brūyāt kruddhaṃ cainaṃ prasādayet ।
parivādaṃ na śṛṇuyād anyeṣām api kurvatām ।।
panthā deyo brāhmaṇānāṃ rājño duḥkhāturasya ca ।
vidyādhikasya garbhiṇyā rogārtasya mahīyataḥ ।।
mūkāndhabadhirāṇāṃ ca mattasyonmattakasya ca ।
devālayaṃ caidyataruṃ tathaiva ca catuṣpatham ।।
vidyādhikaṃ guruṃ caiva budhaḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam ।
upānadvastramālyādi dhṛtam anyair na dhārayet ।।
caturdaśyāṃ tathāṣṭamyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ ca parvasu ।
tailābhyaṅgaṃ tathā bhogaṃ yoṣitaś ca vivarjayet ।।
notkṣiptabāhujaṅghaś ca prājñas tiṣṭhet kadācana ।
na cāpi vikṣipet pādau pādaṃ pādena nākramet ।।
puṃścalyāḥ kṛtakāryasya bālasya patitasya ca ।
marmābhighātam ākrośaṃ paiśunyaṃ ca vivarjayet ।।
dambhābhimānaṃ taikṣṇyaṃ ca na kurvīta vicakṣaṇaḥ ।
mūrkhonmattavyasanino virūpān api vā tathā ।।
nyūnāṅgāṃś cādhanāṃś caiva nopahāsena dūṣayet ।
parasya daṇḍaṃ nodyacchec chikṣārthaṃ śiṣyaputrayoḥ ।।
tadvan nopaviśet prājñaḥ pādenākṛṣya cāsanam ।
saṃyāvaṃ kṛśaraṃ māṃsaṃ nātmārtham upasādhayet ।।
sāyaṃ prātaś ca bhoktavyaṃ kṛtvā cātithipūjanam ।
prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi vāgyato dantadhāvanam ।।
kurvīta satataṃ viprā varjayed varjyavīrudham ।
nodakśirāḥ svapej jātu na ca pratyakśirā naraḥ ।।
śiras tv āgastyām ādhāya śayītātha puraṃdarīm ।
na tu gandhavatīṣv apsu śayīta na tathoṣasi ।।
uparāge paraṃ snānam ṛte dinam udāhṛtam ।
apamṛjyān na vastrāntair gātrāṇy ambarapāṇibhiḥ ।।
na cāvadhūnayet keśān vāsasī na ca nirdhunet ।
anulepanam ādadyān nāsnātaḥ karhicid budhaḥ ।।
na cāpi raktavāsāḥ syāc citrāsitadharo api vā ।
na ca kuryād viparyāsaṃ vāsasor nāpi bhūṣayoḥ ।।
varjyaṃ ca vidaśaṃ vastram atyantopahataṃ ca yat ।
kīṭakeśāvapannaṃ ca tathā śvabhir avekṣitam ।।
avalīḍhaṃ śunā caiva sāroddharaṇadūṣitam ।
pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ vṛthāmāṃsaṃ varjyamāṃsaṃ ca varjayet ।।
na bhakṣayec ca satataṃ pratyakṣaṃ lavaṇaṃ naraḥ ।
varjyaṃ ciroṣitaṃ viprāḥ śuṣkaṃ paryuṣitaṃ ca yat ।।
piṣṭaśākekṣupayasāṃ vikārā dvijasattamāḥ ।
tathā māṃsavikārāś ca naiva varjyāś ciroṣitāḥ ।।
udayāstamane bhānoḥ śayanaṃ ca vivarjayet ।
nāsnāto naiva saṃviṣṭo na caivānyamanā naraḥ ।।
na caiva śayane norvyām upaviṣṭo na śabdakṛt ।
preṣyāṇām apradāyātha na bhuñjīta kadācana ।।
bhuñjīta puruṣaḥ snātaḥ sāyaṃprātar yathāvidhi ।
paradārā na gantavyāḥ puruṣeṇa vipaścitā ।।
iṣṭāpūrtāyuṣāṃ hantrī paradāragatir nṛṇām ।
nahīdṛśam anāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃcana vidyate ।।
yādṛśaṃ puruṣasyeha paradārābhimarśanam ।
devāgnipitṛkāryāṇi tathā gurvabhivādanam ।।
kurvīta samyag ācamya tadvad annabhujikriyām ।
aphenaśabdagandhābhir adbhir acchābhir ādarāt ।।
ācāmec caiva tadvac ca prāṅmukhodaṅmukho api vā ।
antarjalād āvasathād valmīkān mūṣikāsthalāt ।।
kṛtaśaucāvaśiṣṭāś ca varjayet pañca vai mṛdaḥ ।
prakṣālya hastau pādau ca samabhyukṣya samāhitaḥ ।।
antarjānus tathācāmet triś catur vāpi vai naraḥ ।
parimṛjya dvir āvartya khāni mūrdhānam eva ca ।।
samyag ācamya toyena kriyāṃ kurvīta vai śuciḥ ।
kṣute avalīḍhe vāte ca tathā niṣṭhīvanādiṣu ।।
kuryād ācamanaṃ sparśe vāspṛṣṭasyārkadarśanam ।
kurvītālambhanaṃ cāpi dakṣiṇaśravaṇasya ca ।।
yathāvibhavato hy etat pūrvābhāve tataḥ param ।
na vidyamāne pūrvokta uttaraprāptir iṣyate ।।
na kuryād dantasaṃgharṣaṃ nātmano dehatāḍanam ।
svāpe adhvani tathā bhuñjan svādhyāyaṃ ca vivarjayet ।।
saṃdhyāyāṃ maithunaṃ cāpi tathā prasthānam eva ca ।
tathāparāhṇe kurvīta śraddhayā pitṛtarpaṇam ।।
śiraḥsnānaṃ ca kurvīta daivaṃ pitryam athāpi ca ।
prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi śmaśrukarma ca kārayet ।।
vyaṅginīṃ varjayet kanyāṃ kulajāṃ vāpy arogiṇīm ।
udvahet pitṛmātroś ca saptamīṃ pañcamīṃ tathā ।।
rakṣed dārāṃs tyajed īrṣyāṃ tathāhni svapnamaithune ।
paropatāpakaṃ karma jantupīḍāṃ ca sarvadā ।।
udakyā sarvavarṇānāṃ varjyā rātricatuṣṭayam ।
strījanmaparihārārthaṃ pañcamīṃ cāpi varjayet ।।
tataḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ vrajed rātryāṃ jyeṣṭhayugmāsu rātriṣu ।
yugmāsu putrā jāyante striyo ayugmāsu rātriṣu ।।
vidharmiṇo vai parvādau saṃdhyākāleṣu ṣaṇḍhakāḥ ।
kṣurakarmaṇi riktāṃ vai varjayīta vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
bruvatām avinītānāṃ na śrotavyaṃ kadācana ।
na cotkṛṣṭāsanaṃ deyam anutkṛṣṭasya cādarāt ।।
kṣurakarmaṇi cānte ca strīsaṃbhoge ca bho dvijāḥ ।
snāyīta cailavān prājñaḥ kaṭabhūmim upetya ca ।।
devavedadvijātīnāṃ sādhusatyamahātmanām ।
guroḥ pativratānāṃ ca brahmayajñatapasvinām ।।
parivādaṃ na kurvīta parihāsaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।
dhavalāmbarasaṃvītaḥ sitapuṣpavibhūṣitaḥ ।।
sadā māṅgalyaveṣaḥ syān na vāmāṅgalyavān bhavet ।
noddhatonmattamūḍhaiś ca nāvinītaiś ca paṇḍitaḥ ।।
gacchen maitrīm aśīlena na vayojātidūṣitaiḥ ।
na cātivyayaśīlaiś ca puruṣair naiva vairibhiḥ ।।
kāryākṣamair ninditair na na caiva viṭasaṅgibhiḥ ।
nisvair na vādaikaparair naraiś cānyais tathādhamaiḥ ।।
suhṛddīkṣitabhūpāla- snātakaśvaśuraiḥ saha ।
uttiṣṭhed vibhavāc cainān arcayed gṛham āgatān ।।
yathāvibhavato viprāḥ pratisaṃvatsaroṣitān ।
samyag gṛhe arcanaṃ kṛtvā yathāsthānam anukramāt ।।
saṃpūjayet tathā vahnau pradadyāc cāhutīḥ kramāt ।
prathamāṃ brahmaṇe dadyāt prajānāṃ pataye tataḥ ।।
tṛtīyāṃ caiva gṛhyebhyaḥ kaśyapāya tathāparām ।
tato anumataye dadyād dadyād bahubaliṃ tataḥ ।।
pūrvaṃ khyātā mayā yā tu nityakramavidhau kriyā ।
vaiśvadevaṃ tataḥ kuryād vadata śṛṇuta dvijāḥ ।।
yathāsthānavibhāgaṃ tu devān uddiśya vai pṛthak ।
parjanyāpodharitrīṇāṃ dadyāt tu maṇike trayam ।।
vāyave ca pratidiśaṃ digbhyaḥ prācyādiṣu kramāt ।
brahmaṇe cāntarikṣāya sūryāya ca yathākramāt ।।
viśvebhyaś caiva devebhyo viśvabhūtebhya eva ca ।
uṣase bhūtapataye dadyād vottarataḥ śuciḥ ।।
svadhā ca nama ity uktvā pitṛbhyaś caiva dakṣiṇe ।
kṛtvāpasavyaṃ vāyavyāṃ yakṣmaitat taiti saṃvadan ।।
annāvaśeṣamiśraṃ vai toyaṃ dadyād yathāvidhi ।
devānāṃ ca tataḥ kuryād brāhmaṇānāṃ namaskriyām ।।
aṅguṣṭhottarato rekhā pāṇer yā dakṣiṇasya ca ।
etad brāhmam iti khyātaṃ tīrtham ācamanāya vai ।।
tarjanyaṅguṣṭhayor antaḥ pitryaṃ tīrtham udāhṛtam ।
pitṝṇāṃ tena toyāni dadyān nāndīmukhād ṛte ।।
aṅgulyagre tathā daivaṃ tena divyakriyāvidhiḥ ।
tīrthaṃ kaniṣṭhikāmūle kāyaṃ tatra prajāpateḥ ।।
evam ebhiḥ sadā tīrthair vidhānaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha ।
sadā kāryāṇi kurvīta nānyatīrthaḥ kadācana ।।
brāhmeṇācamanaṃ śastaṃ paitryaṃ pitryeṇa sarvadā ।
devatīrthena devānāṃ prājāpatyaṃ jitena ca ।।
nāndīmukhānāṃ kurvīta prājñaḥ piṇḍodakakriyām ।
prājāpatyena tīrthena yac ca kiṃcit prajāpateḥ ।।
yugapaj jalam agniṃ ca bibhṛyān na vicakṣaṇaḥ ।
gurudevapitṝn viprān na ca pādau prasārayet ।।
nācakṣīta dhayantīṃ gāṃ jalaṃ nāñjalinā pibet ।
śaucakāleṣu sarveṣu guruṣv alpeṣu vā punaḥ ।
na vilambeta medhāvī na mukhenānalaṃ dhamet ।।
tatra viprā na vastavyaṃ yatra nāsti catuṣṭayam ।
ṛṇapradātā vaidyaś ca śrotriyaḥ sajalā nadī ।।
jitabhṛtyo nṛpo yatra balavān dharmatatparaḥ ।
tatra nityaṃ vaset prājñaḥ kutaḥ kunṛpatau sukham ।।
paurāḥ susaṃhatā yatra satataṃ nyāyavartinaḥ ।
śāntāmatsariṇo lokās tatra vāsaḥ sukhodayaḥ ।।
yasmin kṛṣīvalā rāṣṭre prāyaśo nātimāninaḥ ।
yatrauṣadhāny aśeṣāṇi vaset tatra vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
tatra viprā na vastavyaṃ yatraitat tritayaṃ sadā ।
jigīṣuḥ pūrvavairaś ca janaś ca satatotsavaḥ ।।
vasen nityaṃ suśīleṣu sahacāriṣu paṇḍitaḥ ।
yatrāpradhṛṣyo nṛpatir yatra sasyapradā mahī ।।
ity etat kathitaṃ viprā mayā vo hitakāmyayā ।
ataḥparaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhakṣyabhojyavidhikriyām ।।
bhojyam annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ snehāktaṃ cirasaṃbhṛtam ।
asnehā api godhūma- yavagorasavikriyāḥ ।।
śaśakaḥ kacchapo godhā śvāvin matsyo atha śalyakaḥ ।
bhakṣyāś caite tathā varjyau grāmaśūkarakukkuṭau ।।
pitṛdevādiśeṣaṃ ca śrāddhe brāhmaṇakāmyayā ।
prokṣitaṃ cauṣadhārthaṃ ca khādan māṃsaṃ na duṣyati ।।
śaṅkhāśmasvarṇarūpyāṇāṃ rajjūnām atha vāsasām ।
śākamūlaphalānāṃ ca tathā vidalacarmaṇām ।।
maṇivastrapravālānāṃ tathā muktāphalasya ca ।
pātrāṇāṃ camasānāṃ ca ambunā śaucam iṣyate ।।
tathāśmakānāṃ toyena aśmasaṃgharṣaṇena ca ।
sasnehānāṃ ca pātrāṇāṃ śuddhir uṣṇena vāriṇā ।।
śūrpāṇām ajinānāṃ ca muśalolūkhalasya ca ।
saṃhatānāṃ ca vastrāṇāṃ prokṣaṇāt saṃcayasya ca ।।
valkalānām aśeṣāṇām ambumṛcchaucam iṣyate ।
āvikānāṃ samastānāṃ keśānāṃ caivam iṣyate ।।
siddhārthakānāṃ kalkena tilakalkena vā punaḥ ।
śodhanaṃ caiva bhavati upaghātavatāṃ sadā ।।
tathā kārpāsikānāṃ ca śuddhiḥ syāj jalabhasmanā ।
dārudantāsthiśṛṅgāṇāṃ takṣaṇāc chuddhir iṣyate ।।
punaḥ pākena bhāṇḍānāṃ pārthivānām amedhyatā ।
śuddhaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ kāruhastaḥ paṇyaṃ yoṣinmukhaṃ tathā ।।
rathyāgamanavijñānaṃ dāsavargeṇa saṃskṛtam ।
prākpraśastaṃ cirātītam anekāntaritaṃ laghu ।।
antaḥ prabhūtaṃ bālaṃ ca vṛddhāntaraviceṣṭitam ।
karmāntāgāraśālāś ca stanadvayaṃ śuci striyāḥ ।।
śucayaś ca tathaivāpaḥ sravantyo gandhavarjitāḥ ।
bhūmir viśudhyate kālād dāhamārjanagokulaiḥ ।।
lepād ullekhanāt sekād veśma saṃmārjanādinā ।
keśakīṭāvapanne ca goghrāte makṣikānvite ।।
mṛdambu bhasma cāpy anne prakṣeptavyaṃ viśuddhaye ।
audumbarāṇām amlena vāriṇā trapusīsayoḥ ।।
bhasmāmbubhiś ca kāṃsyānāṃ śuddhiḥ plāvo dravasya ca ।
amedhyāktasya mṛttoyair gandhāpaharaṇena ca ।।
anyeṣāṃ caiva dravyāṇāṃ varṇagandhāṃś ca hārayet ।
śuci māṃsaṃ tu cāṇḍāla- kravyādair vinipātitam ।।
rathyāgataṃ ca tailādi śuci gotṛptidaṃ payaḥ ।
rajo agnir aśvagochāyā raśmayaḥ pavano mahī ।।
vipluṣo makṣikādyāś ca duṣṭasaṅgād adoṣiṇaḥ ।
ajāśvaṃ mukhato medhyaṃ na gor vatsasya cānanam ।।
mātuḥ prasravaṇe medhyaṃ śakuniḥ phalapātane ।
āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ taṭau nadyās tṛṇāni ca ।।
somasūryāṃśupavanaiḥ śudhyante tāni paṇyavat ।
rathyāpasarpaṇe snāne kṣutpānānāṃ ca karmasu ।।
ācāmeta yathānyāyaṃ vāsasaḥ paridhāpane ।
spṛṣṭānām atha saṃsparśair dvirathyākardamāmbhasi ।।
pakveṣṭakacitānāṃ ca medhyatā vāyusaṃśrayāt ।
prabhūtopahatād annād agram uddhṛtya saṃtyajet ।।
śeṣasya prokṣaṇaṃ kuryād ācamyādbhis tathā mṛdā ।
upavāsas trirātraṃ tu duṣṭabhaktāśino bhavet ।।
ajñāne jñānapūrve tu taddoṣopaśame na tu ।
udakyāṃ vāvalagnāṃ ca sūtikāntyāvasāyinaḥ ।।
spṛṣṭvā snāyīta śaucārthaṃ tathaiva mṛtahāriṇaḥ ।
nāraṃ spṛṣṭvāsthi sasnehaṃ snātvā vipro viśudhyati ।।
ācamyaiva tu niḥsnehaṃ gām ālabhyārkam īkṣya vā ।
na laṅghayet tathaivātha ṣṭhīvanodvartanāni ca ।।
gṛhād ucchiṣṭaviṇmūtraṃ pādāmbhas tat kṣiped bahiḥ ।
pañcapiṇḍān anuddhṛtya na snāyāt paravāriṇi ।।
snāyīta devakhāteṣu gaṅgāhradasaritsu ca ।
nodyānādau vikāleṣu prājñas tiṣṭhet kadācana ।।
nālapej janavidviṣṭān vīrahīnās tathā striyaḥ ।
devatāpitṛsacchāstra- yajvisaṃnyāsinindakaiḥ ।।
kṛtvā tu sparśanālāpaṃ śudhyaty arkāvalokanāt ।
avalokya tathodakyāṃ saṃnyastaṃ patitaṃ śavam ।।
vidharmisūtikāṣaṇḍha- vivastrāntyāvasāyinaḥ ।
mṛtaniryātakāṃś caiva paradāraratāś ca ye ।।
etad eva hi kartavyaṃ prājñaiḥ śodhanam ātmanaḥ ।
abhojyabhikṣupākhaṇḍa- mārjārakharakukkuṭān ।।
patitāpaviddhacāṇḍāla- mṛtāhārāṃś ca dharmavit ।
saṃspṛśya śudhyate snānād udakyāgrāmaśūkarau ।।
tadvac ca sūtikāśauca- dūṣitau puruṣāv api ।
yasya cānudinaṃ hānir gṛhe nityasya karmaṇaḥ ।।
yaś ca brāhmaṇasaṃtyaktaḥ kilbiṣāśī narādhamaḥ ।
nityasya karmaṇo hāniṃ na kurvīta kadācana ।।
tasya tv akaraṇaṃ vakṣye kevalaṃ mṛtajanmasu ।
daśāhaṃ brāhmaṇas tiṣṭhed dānahomavivarjitaḥ ।।
kṣatriyo dvādaśāhaṃ ca vaiśyo māsārdham eva ca ।
śūdraś ca māsam āsīta nijakarmavivarjitaḥ ।।
tataḥ paraṃ nijaṃ karma kuryuḥ sarve yathocitam ।
pretāya salilaṃ deyaṃ bahir gatvā tu gotrakaiḥ ।।
prathame ahni caturthe ca saptame navame tathā ।
tasyāsthisaṃcayaḥ kāryaś caturthe ahani gotrakaiḥ ।।
ūrdhvaṃ saṃcayanāt teṣām aṅgasparśo vidhīyate ।
gotrakais tu kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kāryāḥ saṃcayanāt param ।।
sparśa eva sapiṇḍānāṃ mṛtāhani tathobhayoḥ ।
anvartham icchayā śastra- rajjubandhanavahniṣu ।।
viṣapratāpādimṛte prāyānāśakayor api ।
bāle deśāntarasthe ca tathā pravrajite mṛte ।।
sadyaḥ śaucaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tryaham uktam aśaucakam ।
sapiṇḍānāṃ sapiṇḍas tu mṛte anyasmin mṛto yadi ।।
pūrvaśaucaṃ samākhyātaṃ kāryās tatra dinakriyāḥ ।
eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭo janmany api hi sūtake ।।
sapiṇḍānāṃ sapiṇḍeṣu yathāvat sodakeṣu ca ।
putre jāte pituḥ snānaṃ sacailasya vidhīyate ।।
tatrāpi yadi vānyasminn anuyātas tataḥ param ।
tatrāpi śuddhir uditā pūrvajanmavato dinaiḥ ।।
daśadvādaśamāsārdha- māsasaṃkhyair dinair gataiḥ ।
svāḥ svāḥ karmakriyāḥ kuryuḥ sarve varṇā yathāvidhi ।।
pretam uddiśya kartavyam ekoddiṣṭam ataḥ param ।
dānāni caiva deyāni brāhmaṇebhyo manīṣibhiḥ ।।
yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe ।
tat tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatā ।।
pūrṇais tu divasaiḥ spṛṣṭvā salilaṃ vāhanāyudhaiḥ ।
dattapretodapiṇḍāś ca sarve varṇāḥ kṛtakriyāḥ ।।
kuryuḥ samagrāḥ śucinaḥ paratreha ca bhūtaye ।
adhyetavyā trayī nityaṃ bhavitavyaṃ vipaścitā ।।
dharmato dhanam āhāryaṃ yaṣṭavyaṃ cāpi yatnataḥ ।
yena prakupito nātmā jugupsām eti bho dvijāḥ ।।
tat kartavyam aśaṅkena yan na gopyaṃ mahājanaiḥ ।
evam ācarato viprāḥ puruṣasya gṛhe sataḥ ।।
dharmārthakāmaṃ saṃprāpya paratreha ca śobhanam ।
idaṃ rahasyam āyuṣyaṃ dhanyaṃ buddhivivardhanam ।।
sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ śrīpuṣṭyārogyadaṃ śivam ।
yaśaḥkīrtipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ tejobalavivardhanam ।।
anuṣṭheyaṃ sadā puṃbhiḥ svargasādhanam uttamam ।
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ śūdraiś ca munisattamāḥ ।।
jñātavyaṃ suprayatnena samyak śreyobhikāṅkṣibhiḥ ।
jñātvaiva yaḥ sadā kālam anuṣṭhānaṃ karoti vai ।।
sarvapāpavinirmuktaḥ svargaloke mahīyate ।
sārāt sārataraṃ cedam ākhyātaṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।।
śrutismṛtyuditaṃ dharmaṃ na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit ।
na nāstikāya dātavyaṃ na duṣṭamataye dvijāḥ ।
na dāmbhikāya mūrkhāya na kutarkapralāpine ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śrotum icchāmahe brahman varṇadharmān viśeṣataḥ ।
caturāśramadharmāṃś ca dvijavarya bravīhi tān ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca yathākramam ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ saṃyatā bhūtvā varṇadharmān mayoditān ।।
dānadayātapodeva- yajñasvādhyāyatatparaḥ ।
nityodakī bhaved vipraḥ kuryāc cāgniparigraham ।।
vṛttyarthaṃ yājayet tv anyān dvijān adhyāpayet tathā ।
kuryāt pratigrahādānaṃ yajñārthaṃ jñānato dvijāḥ ।।
sarvalokahitaṃ kuryān nāhitaṃ kasyacid dvijāḥ ।
maitrī samastasattveṣu brāhmaṇasyottamaṃ dhanam ।।
gavi ratne ca pārakye samabuddhir bhaved dvijāḥ ।
ṛtāv abhigamaḥ patnyāṃ śasyate vāsya bho dvijāḥ ।।
dānāni dadyād icchāto dvijebhyaḥ kṣatriyo api hi ।
yajec ca vividhair yajñair adhīyīta ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
śastrājīvo mahīrakṣā pravarā tasya jīvikā ।
tasyāpi prathame kalpe pṛthivīparipālanam ।।
dharitrīpālanenaiva kṛtakṛtyā narādhipāḥ ।
bhavanti nṛpate rakṣā yato yajñādikarmaṇām ।।
duṣṭānāṃ śāsanād rājā śiṣṭānāṃ paripālanāt ।
prāpnoty abhimatāṃl lokān varṇasaṃsthāpako nṛpaḥ ।।
pāśupālyaṃ vaṇijyāṃ ca kṛṣiṃ ca munisattamāḥ ।
vaiśyāya jīvikāṃ brahmā dadau lokapitāmahaḥ ।।
tasyāpy adhyayanaṃ yajño dānaṃ dharmaś ca śasyate ।
nityanaimittikādīnām anuṣṭhānaṃ ca karmaṇām ।।
dvijātisaṃśrayaṃ karma tadarthaṃ tena poṣaṇam ।
krayavikrayajair vāpi dhanaiḥ kārubhavais tu vā ।।
dānaṃ dadyāc ca śūdro api pākayajñair yajeta ca ।
pitryādikaṃ ca vai sarvaṃ śūdraḥ kurvīta tena vai ।।
bhṛtyādibharaṇārthāya sarveṣāṃ ca parigrahāḥ ।
ṛtukālābhigamanaṃ svadāreṣu dvijottamāḥ ।।
dayā samastabhūteṣu titikṣā nābhimānitā ।
satyaṃ śaucam anāyāso maṅgalaṃ priyavāditā ।।
maitrī caivāspṛhā tadvad akārpaṇyaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
anasūyā ca sāmānyā varṇānāṃ kathitā guṇāḥ ।।
āśramāṇāṃ ca sarveṣām ete sāmānyalakṣaṇāḥ ।
guṇās tathopadharmāś ca viprādīnām ime dvijāḥ ।।
kṣātraṃ karma dvijasyoktaṃ vaiśyakarma tathāpadi ।
rājanyasya ca vaiśyoktaṃ śūdrakarmāṇi caitayoḥ ।।
sasāmarthye sati tyājyam ubhābhyām api ca dvijāḥ ।
tad evāpadi kartavyaṃ na kuryāt karmasaṃkaram ।।
ity ete kathitā viprā varṇadharmā mayādya vai ।
dharmam āśramiṇāṃ samyag bruvato api nibodhata ।।
bālaḥ kṛtopanayano vedāharaṇatatparaḥ ।
guror gehe vasan viprā brahmacārī samāhitaḥ ।।
śaucācāraratas tatra kāryaṃ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ guroḥ ।
vratāni caratā grāhyo vedaś ca kṛtabuddhinā ।।
ubhe saṃdhye raviṃ viprās tathaivāgniṃ samāhitaḥ ।
upatiṣṭhet tathā kuryād guror apy abhivādanam ।।
sthite tiṣṭhed vrajed yāti nīcair āsīta cāsite ।
śiṣyo gurau dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pratikūlaṃ ca saṃtyajet ।।
tenaivoktaṃ paṭhed vedaṃ nānyacittaḥ purasthitaḥ ।
anujñātaṃ ca bhikṣānnam aśnīyād guruṇā tataḥ ।।
avagāhed apaḥ pūrvam ācāryeṇāvagāhitāḥ ।
samijjalādikaṃ cāsya kalyakalyam upānayet ।।
gṛhītagrāhyavedaś ca tato anujñām avāpya vai ।
gārhasthyam āvaset prājño niṣpannaguruniṣkṛtiḥ ।।
vidhināvāptadāras tu dhanaṃ prāpya svakarmaṇā ।
gṛhasthakāryam akhilaṃ kuryād viprāḥ svaśaktitaḥ ।।
nirvāpeṇa pitṝn arcya yajñair devāṃs tathātithīn ।
annair munīṃś ca svādhyāyair apatyena prajāpatim ।।
balikarmaṇā bhūtāni vāksatyenākhilaṃ jagat ।
prāpnoti lokān puruṣo nijakarmasamārjitān ।।
bhikṣābhujaś ca ye kecit parivrāḍ brahmacāriṇaḥ ।
te apy atra pratitiṣṭhanti gārhasthyaṃ tena vai param ।।
vedāharaṇakāryeṇa tīrthasnānāya ca dvijāḥ ।
aṭanti vasudhāṃ viprāḥ pṛthivīdarśanāya ca ।।
aniketā hy anāhārā ye tu sāyaṃgṛhās tu te ।
teṣāṃ gṛhasthaḥ satataṃ pratiṣṭhā yonir ucyate ।।
teṣāṃ svāgatadānāni vaktavyaṃ madhuraṃ sadā ।
gṛhāgatānāṃ dadyāc ca śayanāsanabhojanam ।।
atithir yasya bhagnāśo gṛhāt pratinivartate ।
sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyam ādāya gacchati ।।
avajñānam ahaṃkāro dambhaś cāpi gṛhe sataḥ ।
parivādopaghātau ca pāruṣyaṃ ca na śasyate ।।
yaś ca samyak karoty evaṃ gṛhasthaḥ paramaṃ vidhim ।
sarvabandhavinirmukto lokān āpnoti cottamān ।।
vayaḥpariṇatau viprāḥ kṛtakṛtyo gṛhāśramī ।
putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya vanaṃ gacchet sahaiva vā ।।
parṇamūlaphalāhāraḥ keśaśmaśrujaṭādharaḥ ।
bhūmiśāyī bhavet tatra muniḥ sarvātithir dvijāḥ ।।
carmakāśakuśaiḥ kuryāt paridhānottarīyake ।
tadvat triṣavaṇaṃ snānaṃ śastam asya dvijottamāḥ ।।
devatābhyarcanaṃ homaḥ sarvābhyāgatapūjanam ।
bhikṣā balipradānaṃ tu śastam asya praśasyate ।।
vanyasnehena gātrāṇām abhyaṅgaś cāpi śasyate ।
tapasyā tasya viprendrāḥ śītoṣṇādisahiṣṇutā ।।
yas tv etā niyataś caryā vānaprasthaś caren muniḥ ।
sa dahaty agnivad doṣāñ jayel lokāṃś ca śāśvatān ।।
caturthaś cāśramo bhikṣoḥ procyate yo manīṣibhiḥ ।
tasya svarūpaṃ gadato budhyadhvaṃ mama sattamāḥ ।।
putradravyakalatreṣu tyajet snehaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
caturtham āśramasthānaṃ gacchen nirdhūtamatsaraḥ ।।
traivarṇikāṃs tyajet sarvān ārambhān dvijasattamāḥ ।
mitrādiṣu samo maitraḥ samasteṣv eva jantuṣu ।।
jarāyujāṇḍajādīnāṃ vāṅmanaḥkarmabhiḥ kvacit ।
yuktaḥ kurvīta na drohaṃ sarvasaṅgāṃś ca varjayet ।।
ekarātrasthitir grāme pañcarātrasthitiḥ pure ।
tathā prītir na tiryakṣu dveṣo vā nāsya jāyate ।।
prāṇayātrānimittaṃ ca vyaṅgāre abhuktavajjane ।
kāle praśastavarṇānāṃ bhikṣārthī paryaṭed gṛhān ।।
alābhe na viṣādī syāl lābhe naiva ca harṣayet ।
prāṇayātrikamātraḥ syān mātrāsaṅgād vinirgataḥ ।।
atipūjitalābhāṃs tu jugupsaṃ caiva sarvataḥ ।
atipūjitalābhais tu yatir mukto api badhyate ।।
kāmaḥ krodhas tathā darpo lobhamohādayaś ca ye ।
tāṃs tu doṣān parityajya parivrāṇ nirmamo bhavet ।।
abhayaṃ sarvasattvebhyo dattvā yaś carate mahīm ।
tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ notpadyate kvacit ।।
kṛtvāgnihotraṃ svaśarīrasaṃsthaṃ 
śārīram agniṃ svamukhe juhoti 
vipras tu bhikṣopagatair havirbhiś 
citāgninā sa vrajati sma lokān 
mokṣāśramaṃ yaś carate yathoktaṃ 
śuciś ca saṃkalpitabuddhiyuktaḥ 
anindhanaṃ jyotir iva praśāntaṃ 
sa brahmalokaṃ vrajati dvijātiḥ 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
sarvajñas tvaṃ mahābhāga sarvabhūtahite rataḥ ।
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca na te asty aviditaṃ mune ।।
karmaṇā kena varṇānām adhamā jāyate gatiḥ ।
uttamā ca bhavet kena brūhi teṣāṃ mahāmate ।।
śūdras tu karmaṇā kena brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca gacchati ।
śrotum icchāmahe kena brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām iyāt ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
himavacchikhare ramye nānādhātuvibhūṣite ।
nānādrumalatākīrṇe nānāścaryasamanvite ।।
tatra sthitaṃ mahādevaṃ tripuraghnaṃ trilocanam ।
śailarājasutā devī praṇipatya sureśvaram ।।
imaṃ praśnaṃ purā viprā apṛcchac cārulocanā ।
tad ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇudhvaṃ mama sattamāḥ ।।
{umovāca 
bhagavan bhaganetraghna pūṣṇo dantavināśana ।
dakṣakratuhara tryakṣa saṃśayo me mahān ayam ।।
cāturvarṇyaṃ bhagavatā pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā ।
kena karmavipākena vaiśyo gacchati śūdratām ।।
vaiśyo vā kṣatriyaḥ kena dvijo vā kṣatriyo bhavet ।
pratilome kathaṃ deva śakyo dharmo nivartitum ।।
kena vā karmaṇā vipraḥ śūdrayonau prajāyate ।
kṣatriyaḥ śūdratām eti kena vā karmaṇā vibho ।।
etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva vada bhūtapate anagha ।
trayo varṇāḥ prakṛtyeha kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyuḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
brāhmaṇyaṃ devi duṣprāpaṃ nisargād brāhmaṇaḥ śubhe ।
kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau vā nisargād iti me matiḥ ।।
karmaṇā duṣkṛteneha sthānād bhraśyati sa dvijaḥ ।
śreṣṭhaṃ varṇam anuprāpya tasmād ākṣipyate punaḥ ।।
sthito brāhmaṇadharmeṇa brāhmaṇyam upajīvati ।
kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā brahmabhūyaṃ sa gacchati ।।
yaś ca vipratvam utsṛjya kṣatradharmān niṣevate ।
brāhmaṇyāt sa paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣatrayonau prajāyate ।।
vaiśyakarma ca yo vipro lobhamohavyapāśrayaḥ ।
brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya karoty alpamatiḥ sadā ।।
sa dvijo vaiśyatām eti vaiśyo vā śūdratām iyāt ।
svadharmāt pracyuto vipras tataḥ śūdratvam āpnuyāt ।।
tatrāsau nirayaṃ prāpto varṇabhraṣṭo bahiṣkṛtaḥ ।
brahmalokāt paribhraṣṭaḥ śūdrayonau prajāyate ।।
kṣatriyo vā mahābhāge vaiśyo vā dharmacāriṇi ।
svāni karmāṇy apākṛtya śūdrakarma niṣevate ।।
svasthānāt sa paribhraṣṭo varṇasaṃkaratāṃ gataḥ ।
brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdratvaṃ yāti tādṛśaḥ ।।
yas tu śūdraḥ svadharmeṇa jñānavijñānavāñ śuciḥ ।
dharmajño dharmanirataḥ sa dharmaphalam aśnute ।।
idaṃ caivāparaṃ devi brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam ।
adhyātmaṃ naiṣṭhikī siddhir dharmakāmair niṣevyate ।।
ugrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi gaṇānnaṃ śrāddhasūtakam ।
ghuṣṭānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ śūdrānnaṃ naiva vā kvacit ।।
śūdrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi sadā devair mahātmabhiḥ ।
pitāmahamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇam iti me matiḥ ।।
śūdrānnenāvaśeṣeṇa jaṭhare mriyate dvijaḥ ।
āhitāgnis tathā yajvā sa śūdragatibhāg bhavet ।।
tena śūdrānnaśeṣeṇa brahmasthānād apākṛtaḥ ।
brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām eti nāsti tatra vicāraṇā ।।
yasyānnenāvaśeṣeṇa jaṭhare mriyate dvijaḥ ।
tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ vrajed vipro yasyānnam upajīvati ।।
brāhmaṇatvaṃ sukhaṃ prāpya durlabhaṃ yo avamanyate ।
abhojyānnāni vāśnāti sa dvijatvāt pateta vai ।।
surāpo brahmahā steyī cauro bhagnavrato aśuciḥ ।
svādhyāyavarjitaḥ pāpo lubdho naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥ ।।
avratī vṛṣalībhartā kuṇḍāśī somavikrayī ।
vihīnasevī vipro hi patate brahmayonitaḥ ।।
gurutalpī gurudveṣī gurukutsāratiś ca yaḥ ।
brahmadviḍ vāpi patati brāhmaṇo brahmayonitaḥ ।।
ebhis tu karmabhir devi śubhair ācaritais tathā ।
śūdro brāhmaṇatāṃ gacched vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ vrajet ।।
śūdraḥ karmāṇi sarvāṇi yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhi ।
sarvātithyam upātiṣṭhañ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ ।।
śuśrūṣāṃ paricaryāṃ yo jyeṣṭhavarṇe prayatnataḥ ।
kuryād avimanāḥ śreṣṭhaḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ ।।
devadvijātisatkartā sarvātithyakṛtavrataḥ ।
ṛtukālābhigāmī ca niyato niyatāśanaḥ ।।
dakṣaḥ śiṣṭajanānveṣī śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ ।
vṛthā māṃsaṃ na bhuñjīta śūdro vaiśyatvam ṛcchati ।।
ṛtavāg anahaṃvādī nirdvaṃdvaḥ sāmakovidaḥ ।
yajate nityayajñaiś ca svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥ ।।
dānto brāhmaṇasatkartā sarvavarṇānasūyakaḥ ।
gṛhasthavratam ātiṣṭhan dvikālakṛtabhojanaḥ ।।
śeṣāśī vijitāhāro niṣkāmo nirahaṃvadaḥ ।
agnihotram upāsīno juhvānaś ca yathāvidhi ।।
sarvātithyam upātiṣṭhañ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥ ।
tretāgnimātravihitaṃ vaiśyo bhavati ca dvijaḥ ।।
sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule śucir mahati jāyate ।
sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo jāto janmaprabhṛti saṃskṛtaḥ ।।
upanīto vrataparo dvijo bhavati saṃskṛtaḥ ।
dadāti yajate yajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ ।।
adhītya svargam anvicchaṃs tretāgniśaraṇaḥ sadā ।
ārdrahastaprado nityaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan ।।
satyaḥ satyāni kurute nityaṃ yaḥ śuddhidarśanaḥ ।
dharmadaṇḍena nirdagdho dharmakāmārthasādhakaḥ ।।
yantritaḥ kāryakaraṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhāgakṛtalakṣaṇaḥ ।
grāmyadharmān na seveta svacchandenārthakovidaḥ ।।
ṛtukāle tu dharmātmā patnīm upāśrayet sadā ।
sadopavāsī niyataḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ ।।
vahiskāntarite nityaṃ śayāno asti sadā gṛhe ।
sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya kurvāṇaḥ sumanāḥ sadā ।।
śūdrāṇāṃ cānnakāmānāṃ nityaṃ siddham iti bruvan ।
svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān na kiṃcid upalakṣayet ।।
pitṛdevātithikṛte sādhanaṃ kurute ca yat ।
svaveśmani yathānyāyam upāste bhaikṣyam eva ca ।।
dvikālam agnihotraṃ ca juhvāno vai yathāvidhi ।
gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya raṇe cābhimukho hataḥ ।।
tretāgnimantrapūtena samāviśya dvijo bhavet ।
jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ saṃskṛto vedapāragaḥ ।।
vaiśyo bhavati dharmātmā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇā ।
etaiḥ karmaphalair devi nyūnajātikulodbhavaḥ ।।
śūdro apy āgamasaṃpanno dvijo bhavati saṃskṛtaḥ ।
brāhmaṇo vāpy asadvṛttaḥ sarvasaṃkarabhojanaḥ ।।
sa brāhmaṇyaṃ samutsṛjya śūdro bhavati tādṛśaḥ ।
karmabhiḥ śucibhir devī śuddhātmā vijitendriyaḥ ।।
śūdro api dvijavat sevya iti brahmābravīt svayam ।
svabhāvakarmaṇā caiva yatra śūdro adhitiṣṭhati ।।
viśuddhaḥ sa dvijātibhyo vijñeya iti me matiḥ ।
na yonir nāpi saṃskāro na śrutir na ca saṃtatiḥ ।।
kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam ।
sarvo ayaṃ brāhmaṇo loke vṛttena tu vidhīyate ।।
vṛtte sthitaś ca śūdro api brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca gacchati ।
brahmasvabhāvaḥ suśroṇi samaḥ sarvatra me mataḥ ।।
nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma yatra tiṣṭhati sa dvijaḥ ।
ete ye vimalā devi sthānabhāvanidarśakāḥ ।।
svayaṃ ca varadenoktā brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥ ।
brahmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ loke carati pādavat ।।
yat tatra bījaṃ patati sā kṛṣiḥ pretya bhāvinī ।
saṃtuṣṭena sadā bhāvyaṃ satpathālambinā sadā ।।
brāhmaṃ hi mārgam ākramya vartitavyaṃ bubhūṣatā ।
saṃhitādhyāyinā bhāvyaṃ gṛhe vai gṛhamedhinā ।।
nityaṃ svādhyāyayuktena na cādhyayanajīvinā ।
evaṃbhūto hi yo vipraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ ।।
āhitāgnir adhīyāno brahmabhūyāya kalpate ।
brāhmaṇyaṃ devi saṃprāpya rakṣitavyaṃ yatātmanā ।।
yonipratigrahādānaiḥ karmabhiś ca śucismite ।
etat te guhyam ākhyātaṃ yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥ ।
brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād yathā śūdratvam āpnuyāt ।।
{umovāca 
bhagavan sarvabhūteśa surāsuranamaskṛta ।
dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva brūhi me saṃśayaṃ vibho ।।
karmaṇā manasā vācā trividhair dehinaḥ sadā ।
badhyante bandhanaiḥ kair vā mucyante vā kathaṃ vada ।।
kena śīlena vai deva karmaṇā kīdṛśena vā ।
samācārair guṇaiḥ kair vā svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ ।।
{śiva uvāca 
devi dharmārthatattvajñe dharmanitye ume sadā ।
sarvaprāṇihitaḥ praśnaḥ śrūyatāṃ buddhivardhanaḥ ।।
satyadharmaratāḥ śāntāḥ sarvaliṅgavivarjitāḥ ।
nādharmeṇa na dharmeṇa badhyante chinnasaṃśayāḥ ।।
pralayotpattitattvajñāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvadarśinaḥ ।
vītarāgā vimucyante puruṣāḥ karmabandhanaiḥ ।।
karmaṇā manasā vācā ye na hiṃsanti kiṃcana ।
ye na majjanti kasmiṃścit te na badhnanti karmabhiḥ ।।
prāṇātipātād viratāḥ śīlavanto dayānvitāḥ ।
tulyadveṣyapriyā dāntā mucyante karmabandhanaiḥ ।।
sarvabhūtadayāvanto viśvāsyāḥ sarvajantuṣu ।
tyaktahiṃsrasamācārās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
parasvanirmamā nityaṃ paradāravivarjikāḥ ।
dharmalabdhārthabhoktāras te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva nityaṃ duhitṛvac ca ye ।
paradāreṣu vartante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
svadāraniratā ye ca ṛtukālābhigāminaḥ ।
agrāmyasukhabhogāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena ca ।
svabhāgyāny upajīvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
paradāreṣu ye nityaṃ cāritrāvṛtalocanāḥ ।
jitendriyāḥ śīlaparās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
eṣa daivakṛto mārgaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ ।
akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ ।।
avṛthāpakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥ ।
dānakarmatapoyuktaḥ śīlaśaucadayātmakaḥ ।
svargamārgam abhīpsadbhir na sevyas tv ata uttaraḥ ।।
{umovāca 
vācā tu badhyate yena mucyate hy athavā punaḥ ।
tāni karmāṇi me deva vada bhūtapate anagha ।।
{śiva uvāca 
ātmahetoḥ parārthe vā adharmāśritam eva ca ।
ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā kāmakārāt tathaiva ca ।
anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
ślakṣṇāṃ vāṇīṃ svacchavarṇāṃ madhurāṃ pāpavarjitām ।
svagatenābhibhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
paruṣaṃ ye na bhāṣante kaṭukaṃ niṣṭhuraṃ tathā ।
na paiśunyaratāḥ santas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
piśunaṃ na prabhāṣante mitrabhedakaraṃ tathā ।
parapīḍākaraṃ caiva te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
ye varjayanti paruṣaṃ paradrohaṃ ca mānavāḥ ।
sarvabhūtasamā dāntās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
śaṭhapralāpād viratā viruddhaparivarjakāḥ ।
saumyapralāpino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
na kopād vyāharante ye vācaṃ hṛdayadāriṇīm ।
śāntiṃ vindanti ye kruddhās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
eṣa vāṇīkṛto devi dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥ ।
śubhasatyaguṇair nityaṃ varjanīyā mṛṣā budhaiḥ ।।
{umovāca 
manasā badhyate yena karmaṇā puruṣaḥ sadā ।
tan me brūhi mahābhāga devadeva pinākadhṛk ।।
{maheśvara uvāca 
mānaseneha dharmeṇa saṃyuktāḥ puruṣāḥ sadā ।
svargaṃ gacchanti kalyāṇi tan me kīrtayataḥ śṛṇu ।।
duṣpraṇītena manasā duṣpraṇītāntarākṛtiḥ ।
naro badhyeta yeneha śṛṇu vā taṃ śubhānane ।।
araṇye vijane nyastaṃ parasvaṃ dṛśyate yadā ।
manasāpi na gṛhṇanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
tathaiva paradārān ye kāmavṛttā rahogatāḥ ।
manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
śatruṃ mitraṃ ca ye nityaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥ ।
bhajanti maitryaṃ saṃgamya te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
śrutavanto dayāvantaḥ śucayaḥ satyasaṃgarāḥ ।
svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
avairā ye tv anāyāsā maitracittaratāḥ sadā ।
sarvabhūtadayāvantas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
jñātavantaḥ kriyāvantaḥ kṣamāvantaḥ suhṛtpriyāḥ ।
dharmādharmavido nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃcaye ।
nirākāṅkṣāś ca ye devi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
pāpopetān varjayanti devadvijaparāḥ sadā ।
samutthānam anuprāptās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥ ।।
śubhaiḥ karmaphalair devi mayaite parikīrtitāḥ ।
svargamārgaparā bhūyaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ śrotum ihecchasi ।।
{umovāca 
mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaścin martyān prati maheśvara ।
tasmāt tvaṃ nipuṇenādya mama vyākhyātum arhasi ।।
kenāyur labhate dīrghaṃ karmaṇā puruṣaḥ prabho ।
tapasā vāpi deveśa kenāyur labhate mahat ।।
kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati karmaṇā bhuvi mānavaḥ ।
vipākaṃ karmaṇāṃ deva vaktum arhasy anindita ।।
apare ca mahābhāgyā mandabhāgyās tathā pare ।
akulīnāḥ kulīnāś ca saṃbhavanti tathā pare ।।
durdarśāḥ kecid ābhānti narāḥ kāṣṭhamayā iva ।
priyadarśās tathā cānye darśanād eva mānavāḥ ।।
duṣprajñāḥ kecid ābhānti kecid ābhānti paṇḍitāḥ ।
mahāprajñās tathā cānye jñānavijñānabhāvinaḥ ।।
alpavācās tathā kecin mahāvācās tathā pare ।
dṛśyante puruṣā deva tato vyākhyātum arhasi ।।
{śiva uvāca 
hanta te ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi devi karmaphalodayam ।
martyaloke naraḥ sarvo yena svaṃ phalam aśnute ।।
prāṇātipātī yogīndro daṇḍahasto naraḥ sadā ।
nityam udyataśastraś ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥ ।।
nirdayaḥ sarvabhūtebhyo nityam udvegakārakaḥ ।
api kīṭapataṃgānām aśaraṇyaḥ sunirghṛṇaḥ ।।
evaṃbhūto naro devi nirayaṃ pratipadyate ।
viparītas tu dharmātmā svarūpeṇābhijāyate ।।
nirayaṃ yāti hiṃsātmā yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥ ।
yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ sakṛcchrāṃ labhate naraḥ ।।
yaḥ kaścin nirayāt tasmāt samuttarati karhicit ।
mānuṣyaṃ labhate vāpi hīnāyus tatra jāyate ।।
pāpena karmaṇā devi yukto hiṃsādibhir yataḥ ।
ahitaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hīnāyur upajāyate ।।
śubhena karmaṇā devi prāṇighātavivarjitaḥ ।
śubhena karmaṇā devi prāṇighātavivarjitaḥ ।
nikṣiptaśastro nirdaṇḍo na hiṃsati kadācana ।।
na ghātayati no hanti ghnantaṃ naivānumodate ।
sarvabhūteṣu sasneho yathātmani tathā pare ।।
īdṛśaḥ puruṣo nityaṃ devi devatvam aśnute ।
upapannān sukhān bhogān sadāśnāti mudā yutaḥ ।।
atha cen mānuṣe loke kadācid upapadyate ।
eṣa dīrghāyuṣāṃ mārgaḥ suvṛttānāṃ sukarmaṇām ।
prāṇihiṃsāvimokṣeṇa brahmaṇā samudīritaḥ ।।
{umovāca 
kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ puruṣaḥ kaiś ca karmabhiḥ ।
svargaṃ samabhipadyeta saṃpradānena kena vā ।।
{maheśvara uvāca 
dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā dīnārtakṛpaṇādiṣu ।
bhakṣabhojyānnapānānāṃ vāsasāṃ ca mahāmatiḥ ।।
pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kuryāt prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathā ।
nityakādīni karmāṇi karoti prayataḥ śuciḥ ।।
āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ gṛhaṃ ratnaṃ dhanaṃ tathā ।
sasyajātāni sarvāṇi sakṣetrāṇy atha yoṣitaḥ ।।
supraśāntamanā nityaṃ yaḥ prayacchati mānavaḥ ।
evaṃbhūto naro devi devaloke abhijāyate ।।
tatroṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān ।
sahāpsarobhir mudito ramitvā nandanādiṣu ।।
tasmāc cyuto maheśāni mānuṣeṣūpajāyate ।
mahābhāgakule devi dhanadhānyasamācite ।।
tatra kāmaguṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samupeto mudānvitaḥ ।
mahākāryo mahābhogo dhanī bhavati mānavaḥ ।।
ete devi mahābhāgāḥ prāṇino dānaśālinaḥ ।
brahmaṇā vai purā proktāḥ sarvasya priyadarśanāḥ ।।
apare mānavā devi pradānakṛpaṇā dvijāḥ ।
ye annāni na prayacchanti vidyamāne apy abuddhayaḥ ।।
dīnāndhakṛpaṇān dṛṣṭvā bhikṣukān atithīn api ।
yācyamānā nivartante jihvālobhasamanvitāḥ ।।
na dhanāni na vāsāṃsi na bhogān na ca kāñcanam ।
na gāś ca nānnavikṛtiṃ prayacchanti kadācana ।।
apralubdhāś ca ye lubdhā nāstikā dānavarjitaḥ ।
evaṃbhūtā narā devi nirayaṃ yānty abuddhayaḥ ।।
te vai manuṣyatāṃ yānti yadā kālasya paryayāt ।
dhanarikte kule janma labhante svalpabuddhayaḥ ।।
kṣutpipāsāparītāś ca sarvalokabahiṣkṛtāḥ ।
nirāśāḥ sarvabhogebhyo jīvanty adharmajīvikāḥ ।।
alpabhogakule jātā alpabhogaratā narāḥ ।
anena karmaṇā devi bhavanty adhanino narāḥ ।।
apare dambhino nityaṃ māninaḥ parato ratāḥ ।
āsanārhasya ye pīṭhaṃ na yacchanty alpacetasaḥ ।।
mārgārhasya ca ye mārgaṃ na prayacchanty abuddhayaḥ ।
arghārhān na ca saṃskārair arcayanti yathāvidhi ।।
pādyam ācamanīyaṃ vā prayacchanty abhibuddhayaḥ ।
śubhaṃ cābhimataṃ premṇā guruṃ nābhivadanti ye ।।
abhimānapravṛddhena lobhena samam āsthitāḥ ।
saṃmānyāṃś cāvamanyante vṛddhān paribhavanti ca ।।
evaṃvidhā narā devi sarve nirayagāminaḥ ।
te ced yadi narās tasmān nirayād uttaranti ca ।।
varṣapūgais tato janma labhante kutsite kule ।
śvapākapulkasādīnāṃ kutsitānām acetasām ।।
kuleṣu te abhijāyante guruvṛddhopatāpinaḥ ।
na dambhī na ca mānī yo devatātithipūjakaḥ ।।
lokapūjyo namaskartā prasūto madhuraṃ vacaḥ ।
sarvakarmapriyakaraḥ sarvabhūtapriyaḥ sadā ।।
adveṣī sumukhaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ snigdhavāṇīpradaḥ sadā ।
svāgatenaiva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥ ।।
yathārthaṃ satkriyāpūrvam arcayann avatiṣṭhate ।
mārgārhāya dadan mārgaṃ gurum abhyarcayan sadā ।।
atithipragraharatas tathābhyāgatapūjakaḥ ।
evaṃbhūto naro devi svargatiṃ pratipadyate ।।
tato mānuṣyam āsādya viśiṣṭakulajo bhavet ।
tatrāsau vipulair bhogaiḥ sarvaratnasamāyutaḥ ।।
yathārhadātā cārheṣu dharmacaryāparo bhavet ।
saṃmataḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ ।।
svakarmaphalam āpnoti svayam eva naraḥ sadā ।
eṣa dharmo mayā prokto vidhātrā svayam īritaḥ ।।
yas tu raudrasamācāraḥ sarvasattvabhayaṃkaraḥ ।
hastābhyāṃ yadi vā padbhyāṃ rajjvā daṇḍena vā punaḥ ।।
loṣṭaiḥ stambhair upāyair vā jantūn bādheta śobhane ।
hiṃsārthaṃ niṣkṛtiprajñaḥ prodvejayati caiva hi ।।
upakrāmati jantūṃś ca udvegajananaḥ sadā ।
evaṃ śīlasamācāro nirayaṃ pratipadyate ।।
sa cen manuṣyatāṃ gacched yadi kālasya paryayāt ।
bahvābādhāparikliṣṭe kule jayati so adhame ।।
lokadviṣṭo adhamaḥ puṃsāṃ svayaṃ karmakṛtaiḥ phalaiḥ ।
eṣa devi manuṣyeṣu boddhavyo jñātibandhuṣu ।।
aparaḥ sarvabhūtāni dayāvān anupaśyati ।
maitrī dṛṣṭiḥ pitṛsamo nirvairo niyatendriyaḥ ।।
nodvejayati bhūtāni na ca hanti dayāparaḥ ।
hastapādaiś ca niyatair viśvāsyaḥ sarvajantuṣu ।।
na rajjvā na ca daṇḍena na loṣṭair nāyudhena ca ।
udvejayati bhūtāni śubhakarmā dayāparaḥ ।।
evaṃ śīlasamācāraḥ svarge samupajāyate ।
tatrāsau bhavane divye mudā vasati devavat ।।
sa cet svargakṣayān martyo manuṣyeṣūpajāyate ।
alpāyāso nirātaṅkaḥ sa jātaḥ sukham edhate ।।
sukhabhāgī nirāyāso nirudvegaḥ sadā naraḥ ।
eṣa devi satāṃ mārgo bādhā yatra na vidyate ।।
{umovāca 
ime manuṣyā dṛśyante ūhāpohaviśāradāḥ ।
jñānavijñānasaṃpannāḥ prajñāvanto arthakovidāḥ ।।
duṣprajñāś cāpare deva jñānavijñānavarjitāḥ ।
kena karmavipākena prajñāvān puruṣo bhavet ।।
alpaprajño virūpākṣa kathaṃ bhavati mānavaḥ ।
evaṃ tvaṃ saṃśayaṃ chindhi sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara ।।
jātyandhāś cāpare deva rogārtāś cāpare tathā ।
narāḥ klībāś ca dṛśyante kāraṇaṃ brūhi tatra vai ।।
{maheśvara uvāca 
brāhmaṇān vedaviduṣaḥ siddhān dharmavidas tathā ।
paripṛcchanty aharahaḥ kuśalākuśalaṃ sadā ।।
varjayanto aśubhaṃ karma sevamānāḥ śubhaṃ tathā ।
labhante svargatiṃ nityam iha loke yathāsukham ।।
sa cen manuṣyatāṃ yāti medhāvī tatra jāyate ।
śrutaṃ yajñānugaṃ yasya kalyāṇam upajāyate ।।
paradāreṣu ye cāpi cakṣur duṣṭaṃ prayuñjate ।
tena duṣṭasvabhāvena jātyandhās te bhavanti hi ।।
manasāpi praduṣṭena nagnāṃ paśyanti ye striyam ।
rogārtās te bhavantīha narā duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ ।।
ye tu mūḍhā durācārā viyonau maithune ratāḥ ।
puruṣeṣu suduṣprajñāḥ klībatvam upayānti te ।।
paśūṃś ca ye vai badhnanti ye caiva gurutalpagāḥ ।
prakīrṇamaithunā ye ca klībā jāyanti vai narāḥ ।।
{umovāca 
avadyaṃ kiṃ tu vai karma niravadyaṃ tathaiva ca ।
śreyaḥ kurvann avāpnoti mānavo devasattama ।।
{maheśvara uvāca 
śreyāṃsaṃ mārgam anvicchan sadā yaḥ pṛcchati dvijān ।
dharmānveṣī guṇākāṅkṣī sa svargaṃ samupāśnute ।।
yadi mānuṣyatāṃ devi kadācit saṃniyacchati ।
medhāvī dhāraṇāyuktaḥ prājñas tatrāpi jāyate ।।
eṣa devi satāṃ dharmo gantavyo bhūtikārakaḥ ।
nṛṇāṃ hitārthāya sadā mayā caivam udāhṛtaḥ ।।
{umovāca 
apare svalpavijñānā dharmavidveṣiṇo narāḥ ।
brāhmaṇān vedaviduṣo necchanti parisarpitum ।।
vratavanto narāḥ kecic chraddhādamaparāyaṇāḥ ।
avratā bhraṣṭaniyamās tathānye rākṣasopamāḥ ।।
yajvānaś ca tathaivānye nirmohāś ca tathā pare ।
kena karmavipākena bhavantīha vadasva me ।।
{maheśvara uvāca 
āgamālokadharmāṇāṃ maryādāḥ pūrvanirmitāḥ ।
pramāṇenānuvartante dṛśyante ha dṛḍhavratāḥ ।।
adharmaṃ dharmam ity āhur ye ca mohavaśaṃ gatāḥ ।
avratā naṣṭamaryādās te narā brahmarākṣasāḥ ।।
ye vai kālakṛtodyogāt saṃbhavantīha mānavāḥ ।
nirhomā nirvaṣaṭkārās te bhavanti narādhamāḥ ।।
eṣa devi mayā sarva- saṃśayacchedanāya te ।
kuśalākuśalo nṝṇāṃ vyākhyāto dharmasāgaraḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śrutvaivaṃ sā jaganmātā bhartur vacanam āditaḥ ।
hṛṣṭā babhūva suprītā vismitā ca tadā dvijāḥ ।।
ye tatrāsan munivarās tripurāreḥ samīpataḥ ।
tīrthayātrāprasaṅgena gatās tasmin girau dvijāḥ ।।
te api saṃpūjya taṃ devaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ praṇamya ca ।
papracchuḥ saṃśayaṃ caiva lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
trilocana namas te astu dakṣakratuvināśana ।
pṛcchāmas tvāṃ jagannātha saṃśayaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam ।।
saṃsāre asmin mahāghore bhairave lomaharṣaṇe ।
bhramanti suciraṃ kālaṃ puruṣāś cālpamedhasaḥ ।।
yenopāyena mucyante janmasaṃsārabandhanāt ।
brūhi tac chrotum icchāmaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{maheśvara uvāca 
karmapāśanibaddhānāṃ narāṇāṃ duḥkhabhāginām ।
nānyopāyaṃ prapaśyāmi vāsudevāt paraṃ dvijāḥ ।।
ye pūjayanti taṃ devaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam ।
vāṅmanaḥkarmabhiḥ samyak te yānti paramāṃ gatim ।।
kiṃ teṣāṃ jīviteneha paśuvac ceṣṭitena ca ।
yeṣāṃ na pravaṇaṃ cittaṃ vāsudeve jaganmaye ।।
{ṛṣaya ūcuḥ 
pinākin bhaganetraghna sarvalokanamaskṛta ।
māhātmyaṃ vāsudevasya śrotum icchāma śaṃkara ।।
{maheśvara uvāca 
pitāmahād api varaḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣo hariḥ ।
kṛṣṇo jāmbūnadābhāso vyabhre sūrya ivoditaḥ ।।
daśabāhur mahātejā devatāriniṣūdanaḥ ।
śrīvatsāṅko hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvadaivatayūthapaḥ ।।
brahmā tasyodarabhavas tasyāhaṃ ca śirobhavaḥ ।
śiroruhebhyo jyotīṃṣi romabhyaś ca surāsurāḥ ।।
ṛṣayo dehasaṃbhūtās tasya lokāś ca śāśvatāḥ ।
pitāmahagṛhaṃ sākṣāt sarvadevagṛhaṃ ca saḥ ।।
so asyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ sraṣṭā tribhuvaneśvaraḥ ।
saṃhartā caiva bhūtānāṃ sthāvarasya carasya ca ।।
sa hi devadevaḥ sākṣād devanāthaḥ paraṃtapaḥ ।
sarvajñaḥ sarvasaṃsraṣṭā sarvagaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ ।।
na tasmāt paramaṃ bhūtaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃcana ।
sanātano mahābhāgo govinda iti viśrutaḥ ।।
sa sarvān pārthivān saṃkhye ghātayiṣyati mānadaḥ ।
surakāryārtham utpanno mānuṣyaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ ।।
nahi devagaṇāḥ śaktās trivikramavinākṛtāḥ ।
bhuvane devakāryāṇi kartuṃ nāyakavarjitaḥ ।।
nāyakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ ।
etasya devanāthasya kāryasya ca parasya ca ।।
brahmabhūtasya satataṃ brahmarṣiśaraṇasya ca ।
brahmā vasati nābhisthaḥ śarīre ahaṃ ca saṃsthitaḥ ।।
sarvāḥ sukhaṃ saṃsthitāś ca śarīre tasya devatāḥ ।
sa devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ śrīgarbhaḥ śrīsahoṣitaḥ ।।
śārṅgacakrāyudhaḥ khaḍgī sarvanāgaripudhvajaḥ ।
uttamena suśīlena śaucena ca damena ca ।।
parākrameṇa vīryeṇa vapuṣā darśanena ca ।
ārohaṇapramāṇena vīryeṇārjavasaṃpadā ।।
ānṛśaṃsyena rūpeṇa balena ca samanvitaḥ ।
astraiḥ samuditaḥ sarvair divyair adbhutadarśanaiḥ ।।
yogamāyāsahasrākṣo virūpākṣo mahāmanāḥ ।
vācā mitrajanaślāghī jñātibandhujanapriyaḥ ।।
kṣamāvāṃś cānahaṃvādī sa devo brahmadāyakaḥ ।
bhayahartā bhayārtānāṃ mitrānandavivardhanaḥ ।।
śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dīnānāṃ pālane rataḥ ।
śrutavān atha saṃpannaḥ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥ ।।
samāśritānām upakṛc chatrūṇāṃ bhayakṛt tathā ।
nītijño nītisaṃpanno brahmavādī jitendriyaḥ ।।
bhavārtham eva devānāṃ buddhyā paramayā yutaḥ ।
prājāpatye śubhe mārge mānave dharmasaṃskṛte ।।
samutpatsyati govindo manor vaṃśe mahātmanaḥ ।
aṃśo nāma manoḥ putro hy antardhāmā tataḥ param ।।
antardhāmno havirdhāmā prajāpatir aninditaḥ ।
prācīnabarhir bhavitā havirdhāmnaḥ suto dvijāḥ ।।
tasya pracetaḥpramukhā bhaviṣyanti daśātmajāḥ ।
prācetasas tathā dakṣo bhaviteha prajāpatiḥ ।।
dākṣāyaṇyas tathādityo manur ādityatas tataḥ ।
manoś ca vaṃśaja ilā sudyumnaś ca bhaviṣyati ।।
budhāt purūravāś cāpi tasmād āyur bhaviṣyati ।
nahuṣo bhavitā tasmād yayātis tasya cātmajaḥ ।।
yadus tasmān mahāsattvaḥ kroṣṭā tasmād bhaviṣyati ।
kroṣṭuś caiva mahān putro vṛjinīvān bhaviṣyati ।।
vṛjinīvataś ca bhavitā uṣaṅgur aparājitaḥ ।
uṣaṅgor bhavitā putraḥ śūraś citrarathas tathā ।।
tasya tv avarajaḥ putraḥ śūro nāma bhaviṣyati ।
teṣāṃ vikhyātavīryāṇāṃ cāritraguṇaśālinām ।।
yajvināṃ ca viśuddhānāṃ vaṃśe brāhmaṇasattamāḥ ।
sa śūraḥ kṣatriyaśreṣṭho mahāvīryo mahāyaśāḥ ।।
svavaṃśavistārakaraṃ janayiṣyati mānadam ।
vasudevam iti khyātaṃ putram ānakadundubhim ।।
tasya putraś caturbāhur vāsudevo bhaviṣyati ।
dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā brahmabhūto dvijapriyaḥ ।।
rājño baddhān sa sarvān vai mokṣayiṣyati yādavaḥ ।
jarāsaṃdhaṃ tu rājānaṃ nirjitya girigahvare ।।
sarvapārthivaratnāḍhyo bhaviṣyati sa vīryavān ।
pṛthivyām apratihato vīryeṇāpi bhaviṣyati ।।
vikrameṇa ca saṃpannaḥ sarvapārthivapārthivaḥ ।
śūraḥ saṃhanano bhūto dvārakāyāṃ vasan prabhuḥ ।।
pālayiṣyati gāṃ devīṃ vinirjitya durāśayān ।
taṃ bhavantaḥ samāsādya brāhmaṇair arhaṇair varaiḥ ।।
arcayantu yathānyāyaṃ brahmāṇam iva śāśvatam ।
yo hi māṃ draṣṭum iccheta brahmāṇaṃ ca pitāmaham ।।
draṣṭavyas tena bhagavān vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān ।
dṛṣṭe tasminn ahaṃ dṛṣṭo na me atrāsti vicāraṇā ।।
pitāmaho vāsudeva iti vitta tapodhanāḥ ।
sa yasya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ prītiyukto bhaviṣyati ।।
tasya devagaṇaḥ prīto brahmapūrvo bhaviṣyati ।
yas tu taṃ mānavo loke saṃśrayiṣyati keśavam ।।
tasya kīrtir yaśaś caiva svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati ।
dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣād bhaviṣyati sa dharmavān ।।
dharmavidbhiḥ sa deveśo namaskāryaḥ sadācyutaḥ ।
dharma eva sadā hi syād asminn abhyarcite vibhau ।।
sa hi devo mahātejāḥ prajāhitacikīrṣayā ।
dharmārthaṃ puruṣavyāghra ṛṣikoṭīḥ sasarja ca ।।
tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vidhinā parvate gandhamādane ।
sanatkumārapramukhās tiṣṭhanti tapasānvitāḥ ।।
tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño namasyo dvijapuṃgavāḥ ।
vandito hi sa vandeta mānito mānayīta ca ।।
dṛṣṭaḥ paśyed aharahaḥ saṃśritaḥ pratisaṃśrayet ।
arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ sa devo dvijasattamāḥ ।।
evaṃ tasyānavadyasya viṣṇor vai paramaṃ tapaḥ ।
ādidevasya mahataḥ sajjanācaritaṃ sadā ।।
bhuvane abhyarcito nityaṃ devair api sanātanaḥ ।
abhayenānurūpeṇa prapadya tam anuvratāḥ ।।
karmaṇā manasā vācā sa namasyo dvijaiḥ sadā ।
yatnavadbhir upasthāya draṣṭavyo devakīsutaḥ ।।
eṣa vai vihito mārgo mayā vai munisattamāḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadeveśaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ syuḥ surasattamāḥ ।।
mahāvarāhaṃ taṃ devaṃ sarvalokapitāmaham ।
ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi nityam eva jagatpatim ।।
tatra ca tritayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ ।
samastā hi vayaṃ devās tasya dehe vasāmahe ।।
tasyaiva cāgrajo bhrātā sitādrinicayaprabhaḥ ।
halī bala iti khyāto bhaviṣyati dharādharaḥ ।।
triśirās tasya devasya dṛṣṭo ananta iti prabhoḥ ।
suparṇo yasya vīryeṇa kaśyapasyātmajo balī ।।
antaṃ naivāśakad draṣṭuṃ devasya paramātmanaḥ ।
sa ca śeṣo vicarate parayā vai mudā yutaḥ ।।
antarvasati bhogena parirabhya vasuṃdharām ।
ya eṣa viṣṇuḥ so ananto bhagavān vasudhādharaḥ ।।
yo rāmaḥ sa hṛṣīkeśo acyutaḥ sarvadharādharaḥ ।
tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau divyau divyaparākramau ।।
draṣṭavyau mānanīyau ca cakralāṅgaladhāriṇau ।
eṣa vo anugrahaḥ prokto mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥ ।
tad bhavanto yaduśreṣṭhaṃ pūjayeyuḥ prayatnataḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
aho kṛṣṇasya māhātmyaṃ śrutam asmābhir adbhutam ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ puṇyaṃ dhanyaṃ saṃsāranāśanam ।।
saṃpūjya vidhivad bhaktyā vāsudevaṃ mahāmune ।
kāṃ gatiṃ yānti manujā vāsudevārcane ratāḥ ।।
kiṃ prāpnuvanti te mokṣaṃ kiṃ vā svargaṃ mahāmune ।
athavā kiṃ muniśreṣṭha prāpnuvanty ubhayaṃ phalam ।।
chettum arhasi sarvajña saṃśayaṃ no hṛdi sthitam ।
chettā nānyo asti loke asmiṃs tvadṛte munisattama ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sādhu sādhu muniśreṣṭhā bhavadbhir yad udāhṛtam ।
śṛṇudhvam ānupūrvyeṇa vaiṣṇavānāṃ sukhāvaham ।।
dīkṣāmātreṇa kṛṣṇasya narā mokṣaṃ vrajanti vai ।
kiṃ punar ye sadā bhaktyā pūjayanty acyutaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
na teṣāṃ durlabhaḥ svargo mokṣaś ca munisattamāḥ ।
labhante vaiṣṇavāḥ kāmān yān yān vāñchanti durlabhān ।।
ratnaparvatam āruhya naro ratnaṃ yathādadet ।
svecchayā muniśārdūlās tathā kṛṣṇān manorathān ।।
kalpavṛkṣaṃ samāsādya phalāni svecchayā yathā ।
gṛhṇāti puruṣo viprās tathā kṛṣṇān manorathān ।।
śraddhayā vidhivat pūjya vāsudevaṃ jagadgurum ।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ prāpnuvanti narāḥ phalam ।।
ārādhya taṃ jagannāthaṃ viśuddhenāntarātmanā ।
prāpnuvanti narāḥ kāmān surāṇām api durlabhān ।।
ye arcayanti sadā bhaktyā vāsudevākhyam avyayam ।
na teṣāṃ durlabhaṃ kiṃcid vidyate bhuvanatraye ।।
dhanyās te puruṣā loke ye arcayanti sadā harim ।
sarvapāpaharaṃ devaṃ sarvakāmaphalapradam ।।
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ śūdrāntyajātayaḥ ।
saṃpūjya taṃ suravaraṃ prāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim ।।
tasmāc chṛṇudhvaṃ munayo yat pṛcchata mamānaghāḥ ।
pravakṣyāmi samāsena gatiṃ teṣāṃ mahātmanām ।।
tyaktvā mānuṣyakaṃ dehaṃ rogāyatanam adhruvam ।
jarāmaraṇasaṃyuktaṃ jalabudbudasaṃnibham ।।
māṃsaśoṇitadurgandhaṃ viṣṭhāmūtrādibhir yutam ।
asthisthūṇam amedhyaṃ ca snāyucarmaśirānvitam ।।
kāmagena vimānena divyagandharvanādinā ।
taruṇādityavarṇena kiṅkiṇījālamālinā ।।
upagīyamānā gandharvair apsarobhir alaṃkṛtāḥ ।
vrajanti lokapālānāṃ bhavanaṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak ।।
manvantarapramāṇaṃ tu bhuktvā kālaṃ pṛthak pṛthak ।
bhuvanāni pṛthak teṣāṃ sarvabhogair alaṃkṛtāḥ ।।
tato antarikṣaṃ lokaṃ te yānti sarvasukhapradam ।
tatra bhuktvā varān bhogān daśamanvantaraṃ dvijāḥ ।।
tasmād gandharvalokaṃ tu yānti vai vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ ।
viṃśanmanvantaraṃ kālaṃ tatra bhuktvā manoramān ।।
bhogān ādityalokaṃ tu tasmād yānti supūjitāḥ ।
triṃśanmanvantaraṃ tatra bhogān bhuktvātidaivatān ।।
tasmād vrajanti te viprāś candralokaṃ sukhapradam ।
manvantarāṇāṃ te tatra catvāriṃśad guṇānvitam ।।
kālaṃ bhuktvā śubhān bhogāñ jarāmaraṇavarjitāḥ ।
tasmān nakṣatralokaṃ tu vimānaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam ।।
vrajanti te muniśreṣṭhā guṇaiḥ sarvair alaṃkṛtāḥ ।
manvantarāṇāṃ pañcāśad bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān ।।
tasmād vrajanti te viprā devalokaṃ sudurlabham ।
ṣaṣṭimanvantaraṃ yāvat tatra bhuktvā sudurlabhān ।।
bhogān nānāvidhān viprā ṛgdvyaṣṭakasamanvitān ।
śakralokaṃ punas tasmād gacchanti surapūjitāḥ ।।
manvantarāṇāṃ tatraiva bhuktvā kālaṃ ca saptatim ।
bhogān uccāvacān divyān manasaḥ prītivardhanān ।।
tasmād vrajanti te lokaṃ prājāpatyam anuttamam ।
bhuktvā tatrepsitān bhogān sarvakāmaguṇānvitān ।।
manvantaram aśītiṃ ca kālaṃ sarvasukhapradam ।
tasmāt paitāmahaṃ lokaṃ yānti te vaiṣṇavā dvijāḥ ।।
manvantarāṇāṃ navati krīḍitvā tatra vai sukham ।
ihāgatya punas tasmād viprāṇāṃ pravare kule ।।
jāyante yogino viprā vedaśāstrārthapāragāḥ ।
evaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu bhuktvā bhogān yathepsitān ।।
ihāgatya punar yānti upary upari ca kramāt ।
saṃbhave saṃbhave te tu śatavarṣaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
bhuktvā yathepsitān bhogān yānti lokāntaraṃ tataḥ ।
daśajanma yadā teṣāṃ krameṇaivaṃ prapūryate ।।
tadā lokaṃ harer divyaṃ brahmalokād vrajanti te ।
gatvā tatrākṣayān bhogān bhuktvā sarvaguṇānvitān ।।
manvantaraśataṃ yāvaj janmamṛtyuvivarjitāḥ ।
gacchanti bhuvanaṃ paścād vārāhasya dvijottamāḥ ।।
divyadehāḥ kuṇḍalino mahākāyā mahābalāḥ ।
krīḍanti tatra viprendrāḥ kṛtvā rūpaṃ caturbhujam ।।
daśa koṭisahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
tiṣṭhanti śāśvate bhāve sarvair devair namaskṛtāḥ ।।
tato yānti tu te dhīrā narasiṃhagṛhaṃ dvijāḥ ।
krīḍante tatra muditā varṣakoṭyayutāni ca ।।
tadante vaiṣṇavaṃ yānti puraṃ siddhaniṣevitam ।
krīḍante tatra saukhyena varṣāṇām ayutāni ca ।।
brahmaloke punar viprā gacchanti sādhakottamāḥ ।
tatra sthitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ varṣakoṭiśatān bahūn ।।
nārāyaṇapuraṃ yānti tatas te sādhakeśvarāḥ ।
bhuktvā bhogāṃś ca vividhān varṣakoṭyarbudāni ca ।।
aniruddhapuraṃ paścād divyarūpā mahābalāḥ ।
gacchanti sādhakavarāḥ stūyamānāḥ surāsuraiḥ ।।
tatra koṭisahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ ca caturdaśa ।
tiṣṭhanti vaiṣṇavās tatra jarāmaraṇavarjitāḥ ।।
pradyumnasya puraṃ paścād gacchanti vigatajvarāḥ ।
tatra tiṣṭhanti te viprā lakṣakoṭiśatatrayam ।।
svacchandagāmino hṛṣṭā balaśaktisamanvitāḥ ।
gacchanti yoginaḥ paścād yatra saṃkarṣaṇaḥ prabhuḥ ।।
tatroṣitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogān sahasraśaḥ ।
viśanti vāsudevaiti virūpākhye nirañjane ।।
vinirmuktāḥ pare tattve jarāmaraṇavarjite ।
tatra gatvā vimuktās te bhaveyur nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
evaṃ krameṇa bhuktiṃ te prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।
muktiṃ ca muniśārdūlā vāsudevārcane ratāḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ekādaśyām ubhe pakṣe nirāhāraḥ samāhitaḥ ।
snātvā samyag vidhānena dhautavāsā jitendriyaḥ ।।
saṃpūjya vidhivad viṣṇuṃ śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ ।
puṣpair gandhais tathā dīpair dhūpair naivedyakais tathā ।।
upahārair bahuvidhair japyair homapradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
stotrair nānāvidhair divyair gītavādyair manoharaiḥ ।।
daṇḍavatpraṇipātaiś ca jayaśabdais tathottamaiḥ ।
evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivad rātrau kṛtvā prajāgaram ।।
kathāṃ vā gītikāṃ viṣṇor gāyan viṣṇuparāyaṇaḥ ।
yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
prajāgare gītikāyāḥ phalaṃ viṣṇor mahāmune ।
brūhi tac chrotum icchāmaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ ।
gītikāyāḥ phalaṃ viṣṇor jāgare yad udāhṛtam ।।
avantī nāma nagarī babhūva bhuvi viśrutā ।
tatrāste bhagavān viṣṇuḥ śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ ।।
tasyā nagaryāḥ paryante cāṇḍālo gītikovidaḥ ।
sadvṛttyotpāditadhano bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇe rataḥ ।।
viṣṇubhaktaḥ sa cāṇḍālo māsi māsi dṛḍhavrataḥ ।
ekādaśyāṃ samāgamya sopavāso atha gāyati ।।
gītikā viṣṇunāmāṅkāḥ prādurbhāvasamāśritāḥ ।
gāndhāraṣaḍjanaiṣāda- svarapañcamadhaivataiḥ ।।
rātrijāgaraṇe viṣṇuṃ gāthābhir upagāyati ।
prabhāte ca praṇamyeśaṃ dvādaśyāṃ gṛham etya ca ।।
jāmātṛbhāgineyāṃś ca bhojayitvā sakanyakāḥ ।
tataḥ saparivāras tu paścād bhuṅkte dvijottamāḥ ।।
evaṃ tasyāsatas tatra kurvato viṣṇuprīṇanam ।
gītikābhir vicitrābhir vayaḥ pratigataṃ bahu ।।
ekadā caitramāse tu kṛṣṇaikādaśigocare ।
viṣṇuśuśrūṣaṇārthāya yayau vanam anuttamam ।।
vanajātāni puṣpāṇi grahītuṃ bhaktitatparaḥ ।
kṣiprātaṭe mahāraṇye vibhītakataror adhaḥ ।।
dṛṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasenātha gṛhītaś cāpi bhakṣitum ।
cāṇḍālas tam athovāca nādya bhakṣyas tvayā hy aham ।।
prātar bhokṣyasi kalyāṇa satyam eṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ ।
adya kāryaṃ mama mahat tasmān muñcasva rākṣasa ।।
śvaḥ satyena sameṣyāmi tataḥ khādasi mām iti ।
viṣṇuśuśrūṣaṇārthāya rātrijāgaraṇaṃ mayā ।
kāryaṃ na vratavighnaṃ me kartum arhasi rākṣasa ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
taṃ rākṣasaḥ pratyuvāca daśarātram abhojanam ।
mamābhūd adya ca bhavān mayā labdho mataṅgaja ।।
na mokṣye bhakṣayiṣyāmi kṣudhayā pīḍito bhṛśam ।
niśācaravacaḥ śrutvā mātaṅgas tam uvāca ha ।
sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā sa satyavacanair dṛḍhaiḥ ।।
{mātaṅga uvāca 
satyamūlaṃ jagat sarvaṃ brahmarākṣasa tac chṛṇu ।
satyenāhaṃ śapiṣyāmi punarāgamanāya ca ।।
ādityaś candramā vahnir vāyur bhūr dyaur jalaṃ manaḥ ।
ahorātraṃ yamaḥ saṃdhye dve vidur naraceṣṭitam ।।
paradāreṣu yat pāpaṃ yat paradravyahāriṣu ।
yac ca brahmahanaḥ pāpaṃ surāpe gurutalpage ।।
vandhyāpateś ca yat pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ vṛṣalīpateḥ ।
yac ca devalake pāpaṃ matsyamāṃsāśinaś ca yat ।।
kroḍamāṃsāśino yac ca kūrmamāṃsāśinaś ca yat ।
vṛthā māṃsāśino yac ca pṛṣṭhamāṃsāśinaś ca yat ।।
kṛtaghne mitraghātake yat pāpaṃ didhiṣūpatau ।
sūtakasya ca yat pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ krūrakarmaṇaḥ ।।
kṛpaṇasya ca yat pāpaṃ yac ca vandhyātither api ।
amāvāsyāṣṭamī ṣaṣṭhī kṛṣṇaśuklacaturdaśī ।।
tāsu yad gamanāt pāpaṃ yad vipro vrajati striyam ।
rajasvalāṃ tathā paścāc chrāddhaṃ kṛtvā striyaṃ vrajet ।।
sarvasvasnātabhojyānāṃ yat pāpaṃ malabhojane ।
mitrabhāryāṃ gacchatāṃ ca yat pāpaṃ piśunasya ca ।।
dambhamāyānurakte ca yat pāpaṃ madhughātinaḥ ।
brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya yat pāpaṃ tadayacchataḥ ।।
yac ca kanyānṛte pāpaṃ yac ca gośvatarānṛte ।
strībālahantur yat pāpaṃ yac ca mithyābhibhāṣiṇaḥ ।।
devavedadvijanṛpa- putramitrasatīstriyaḥ ।
yac ca nindayatāṃ pāpaṃ gurumithyāpacārataḥ ।।
agnityāgiṣu yat pāpam agnidāyiṣu yad vane ।
gṛheṣṭyā pātake yac ca yad goghne yad dvijādhame ।।
yat pāpaṃ parivitte ca yat pāpaṃ parivedinaḥ ।
tayor dātṛgrahītroś ca yat pāpaṃ bhrūṇaghātinaḥ ।।
kiṃ cātra bahubhiḥ proktaiḥ śapathais tava rākṣasa ।
śrūyatāṃ śapathaṃ bhīmaṃ durvācyam api kathyate ।।
svakanyājīvinaḥ pāpaṃ gūḍhasatyena sākṣiṇaḥ ।
ayājyayājake ṣaṇḍhe yat pāpaṃ śravaṇe adhame ।।
pravrajyāvasite yac ca brahmacāriṇi kāmuke ।
etais tu pāpair lipye ahaṃ yadi naiṣyāmi te antikam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
mātaṅgavacanaṃ śrutvā vismito brahmarākṣasaḥ ।
prāha gacchasva satyena samayaṃ caiva pālaya ।।
ity uktaḥ kuṇapāśena śvapākaḥ kusumāni tu ।
samādāyāgamac caiva viṣṇoḥ sa nilayaṃ gataḥ ।।
tāni prādād brāhmaṇāya so api prakṣālya cāmbhasā ।
viṣṇum abhyarcya nilayaṃ jagāma sa tapodhanāḥ ।।
so api mātaṅgadāyādaḥ sopavāsas tu tāṃ niśām ।
gāyan hi bāhyabhūmiṣṭhaḥ prajāgaram upākarot ।।
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ snātvā devaṃ namasya ca ।
satyaṃ sa samayaṃ kartuṃ pratasthe yatra rākṣasaḥ ।।
taṃ vrajantaṃ pathi naraḥ prāha bhadra kva gacchasi ।
sa tathākathayat sarvaṃ so apy enaṃ punar abravīt ।।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ śarīraṃ sādhanaṃ yataḥ ।
mahatā tu prayatnena śarīraṃ pālayed budhaḥ ।।
jīvadharmārthasukhaṃ 
naras tathāpnoti mokṣagatim agryām 
jīvan kīrtim upaiti ca 
bhavati mṛtasya kā kathā loke 
mātaṅgas tad vacaḥ śrutvā pratyuvācātha hetumat ।।
{mātaṅga uvāca 
bhadra satyaṃ puraskṛtya gacchāmi śapathāḥ kṛtāḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
taṃ bhūyaḥ pratyuvācātha kim evaṃ mūḍhadhīr bhavān ।
kiṃ na śrutaṃ tvayā sādho manunā yad udīritam ।।
gostrīdvijānāṃ parirakṣaṇārthaṃ 
vivāhakāle surataprasaṅge 
prāṇātyaye sarvadhanāpahāre 
pañcānṛtāny āhur apātakāni 
dharmavākyaṃ na ca strīṣu na vivāhe tathā ripau ।
vañcane cārthahānau ca svanāśe anṛtake tathā ।
evaṃ tad vākyam ākarṇya mātaṅgaḥ pratyuvāca ha ।।
{mātaṅga uvāca 
maivaṃ vadasva bhadraṃ te satyaṃ lokeṣu pūjyate ।
satyenāvāpyate saukhyaṃ yat kiṃcij jagatīgatam ।।
satyenārkaḥ pratapati satyenāpo rasātmikāḥ ।
jvalaty agniś ca satyena vāti satyena mārutaḥ ।।
dharmārthakāmasaṃprāptir mokṣaprāptiś ca durlabhā ।
satyena jāyate puṃsāṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na saṃtyajet ।।
satyaṃ brahma paraṃ loke satyaṃ yajñeṣu cottamam ।
satyaṃ svargasamāyātaṃ tasmāt satyaṃ na saṃtyajet ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktvā so atha mātaṅgas taṃ prakṣipya narottamam ।
jagāma tatra yatrāste prāṇihā brahmarākṣasaḥ ।।
tam āgataṃ samīkṣyāsau cāṇḍālaṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ ।
vismayotphullanayanaḥ śiraḥkampaṃ tam abravīt ।।
{brahmarākṣasa uvāca 
sādhu sādhu mahābhāga satyavākyānupālaka ।
na mātaṅgam ahaṃ manye bhavantaṃ satyalakṣaṇam ।।
karmaṇānena manye tvāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śucim avyayam ।
yat kiṃcit tvāṃ bhadramukhaṃ pravakṣye dharmasaṃśrayam ।
kiṃ tatra bhavatā rātrau kṛtaṃ viṣṇugṛhe vada ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tam abhyuvāca mātaṅgaḥ śṛṇu viṣṇugṛhe mayā ।
yat kṛtaṃ rajanībhāge yathātathyaṃ vadāmi te ।।
viṣṇor devakulasyādhaḥ sthitenānamramūrtinā ।
prajāgaraḥ kṛto rātrau gāyatā viṣṇugītikām ।।
taṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ prāha kiyantaṃ kālam ucyatām ।
prajāgaro viṣṇugṛhe kṛtaṃ bhaktimatā vada ।।
tam abhyuvāca prahasan viṃśaty abdāni rākṣasa ।
ekādaśyāṃ māsi māsi kṛtas tatra prajāgaraḥ ।
mātaṅgavacanaṃ śrutvā provāca brahmarākṣasaḥ ।।
{brahmarākṣasa uvāca 
yad adya tvāṃ pravakṣyāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati ।
ekarātrikṛtaṃ sādho mama dehi prajāgaram ।।
evaṃ tvāṃ mokṣayiṣyāmi mokṣayiṣyāmi nānyathā ।
triḥ satyena mahābhāga ity uktvā virarāma ha ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
mātaṅgas tam uvācātha mayātmā te niśācara ।
niveditaḥ kim uktena khādasva svecchayāpi mām ।।
tam āha rākṣaso bhūyo yāmadvayaprajāgaram ।
sagītaṃ me prayacchasva kṛpāṃ kartuṃ tvam arhasi ।।
mātaṅgo rākṣasaṃ prāha kim asaṃbaddham ucyate ।
khādasva svecchayā māṃ tvaṃ na pradāsye prajāgaram ।
mātaṅgavacanaṃ śrutvā prāha taṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ ।।
{brahmarākṣasa uvāca 
ko hi duṣṭamatir mando bhavantaṃ draṣṭum utsahet ।
dharṣayituṃ pīḍayituṃ rakṣitaṃ dharmakarmaṇā ।।
dīnasya pāpagrastasya viṣayair mohitasya ca ।
narakārtasya mūḍhasya sādhavaḥ syur dayānvitāḥ ।।
tan mama tvaṃ mahābhāga kṛpāṃ kṛtvā prajāgaram ।
yāmasyaikasya me dehi gaccha vā nilayaṃ svakam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
taṃ punaḥ prāha cāṇḍālo na yāsyāmi nijaṃ gṛham ।
na cāpi tava dāsyāmi kathaṃcid yāmajāgaram ।
taṃ prahasyātha cāṇḍālaṃ provāca brahmarākṣasaḥ ।।
{brahmarākṣasa uvāca 
rātryavasāne yā gītā gītikā kautukāśrayā ।
tasyāḥ phalaṃ prayacchasva trāhi pāpāt samuddhara ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evam uccārite tena mātaṅgas tam uvāca ha ।।
{mātaṅga uvāca 
kiṃ pūrvaṃ bhavatā karma vikṛtaṃ kṛtam añjasā ।
yena tvaṃ doṣajātena saṃbhūto brahmarākṣasaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tasya tad vākyam ākarṇya mātaṅgaṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ ।
provāca duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ saṃsmṛtya svakṛtaṃ kṛtam ।।
{brahmarākṣasa uvāca 
śrūyatāṃ yo aham āsaṃ vai pūrvaṃ yac ca mayā kṛtam ।
yasmin kṛte pāpayoniṃ gatavān asmi rākṣasīm ।।
somaśarma iti khyātaḥ pūrvam āsam ahaṃ dvijaḥ ।
putro adhyayanaśīlasya devaśarmasya yajvanaḥ ।।
kasyacid yajamānasya sūtramantrabahiṣkṛtaḥ ।
nṛpasya karmasaktena yūpakarmasuniṣṭhitaḥ ।।
āgnīdhraṃ cākarod yajñe lobhamohaprapīḍitaḥ ।
tasmin parisamāpte tu maurkhyād dambham anuṣṭhitaḥ ।।
yaṣṭum ārabdhavān asmi dvādaśāhaṃ mahākratum ।
pravartamāne tasmiṃs tu kukṣiśūlo abhavan mama ।।
saṃpūrṇe daśarātre tu na samāpte tathā kratau ।
virūpākṣasya dīyantyām āhutyāṃ rākṣase kṣaṇe ।।
mṛto ahaṃ tena doṣeṇa saṃbhūto brahmarākṣasaḥ ।
mūrkheṇa mantrahīnena sūtrasvaravivarjitam ।।
ajānatā yajñavidyāṃ yad iṣṭaṃ yājitaṃ ca yat ।
tena karmavipākena saṃbhūto brahmarākṣasaḥ ।।
tan māṃ pāpamahāmbhodhau nimagnaṃ tvaṃ samuddhara ।
prajāgare gītikaikāṃ paścimāṃ dātum arhasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
tam uvācātha cāṇḍālo yadi prāṇivadhād bhavān ।
nivṛttiṃ kurute dadyāṃ tataḥ paścimagītikām ।।
bāḍham ity avadat so api mātaṅgo api dadau tadā ।
gītikāphalam āmantrya muhūrtārdhaprajāgaram ।।
tasmin gītiphale datte mātaṅgaṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ ।
praṇamya prayayau hṛṣṭas tīrthavaryaṃ pṛthūdakam ।।
tatrānaśanasaṃkalpaṃ kṛtvā prāṇāñ jahau dvijāḥ ।
rākṣasatvād vinirmukto gītikāphalabṛṃhitaḥ ।।
pṛthūdakaprabhāvāc ca brahmalokaṃ ca durlabham ।
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi nirātaṅko avasat tataḥ ।।
tasyānte brāhmaṇo jāto babhūva smṛtimān vaśī ।
tasyāhaṃ caritaṃ bhūyaḥ kathayiṣyāmi bho dvijāḥ ।।
mātaṅgasya kathāśeṣaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ gadato mama ।
rākṣase tu gate dhīmān gṛham etya yatātmavān ।।
tadvipracaritaṃ smṛtvā nirviṇṇaḥ śucir apy asau ।
putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya dadau bhūmyāḥ pradakṣiṇām ।।
kokāmukhāt samārabhya yāvad vai skandadarśanam ।
dṛṣṭvā skandaṃ yayau dhārā- cakre cāpi pradakṣiṇam ।।
tato adrivaram āgamya vindhyam uccaśiloccayam ।
pāpapramocanaṃ tīrtham āsasāda sa tu dvijāḥ ।।
snānaṃ pāpaharaṃ cakre sa tu cāṇḍālavaṃśajaḥ ।
vimuktapāpaḥ sasmāra pūrvajātīr anekaśaḥ ।।
sa pūrvajanmany abhavad bhikṣuḥ saṃyatavāṅmanāḥ ।
yatakāyaś ca matimān vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ ।।
ekadā goṣu nagarād dhriyamāṇāsu taskaraiḥ ।
bhikṣāvadhūtā rajasā muktā tenātha bhikṣuṇā ।।
sa tenādharmadoṣeṇa cāṇḍālīṃ yonim āgataḥ ।
pāpapramocane snātaḥ sa mṛto narmadātaṭe ।।
mūrkho abhūd brāhmaṇavaro vārāṇasyāṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।
tatrāsya vasato abdais tu triṃśadbhiḥ siddhapūruṣaḥ ।।
virūparūpī babhrāma yogamālābalānvitaḥ ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā sopahāsārtham abhivādyābhyuvāca ha ।।
kuśalaṃ siddhapuruṣaṃ kutas tv āgamyate tvayā ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
evaṃ saṃbhāṣitas tena jñāto aham iti cintya tu ।
pratyuvācātha vandyas taṃ svargalokād upāgataḥ ।।
taṃ siddhaṃ prāha mūrkho asau kiṃ tvaṃ vetsi triviṣṭape ।
nārāyaṇoruprabhavām urvaśīm apsarovarām ।।
siddhas tam āha tāṃ vedmi śakracāmaradhāriṇīm ।
svargasyābharaṇaṃ mukhyam urvaśīṃ sādhusaṃbhavām ।।
vipraḥ siddham uvācātha ṛjumārgavivarjitaḥ ।
tan mitra matkṛte vārttām urvaśyā bhavatādarāt ।।
kathanīyā yac ca sā te brūyād ākhyāsyate bhavān ।
bāḍham ity abravīt siddhaḥ so api vipro mudānvitaḥ ।।
babhūva siddho api yayau merupṛṣṭhaṃ surālayam ।
sametya corvaśīṃ prāha yad ukto asau dvijena tu ।।
sā prāha taṃ siddhavaraṃ nāhaṃ kāśipatiṃ dvijam ।
jānāmi satyam uktaṃ te na cetasi mama sthitam ।।
ity uktaḥ prayayau so api kālena bahunā punaḥ ।
vārāṇasīṃ yayau siddho dṛṣṭo mūrkheṇa vai punaḥ ।।
dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kila bhūyaḥ kim āhorubhavā tava ।
siddho abravīn na jānāmi mām uvācorvaśī svayam ।।
siddhavākyaṃ tataḥ śrutvā smitabhinnauṣṭhasaṃpuṭaḥ ।
punaḥ prāha kathaṃ vetsīty evaṃ vācyā tvayorvaśī ।।
bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmīty uktvā siddho divaṃ gataḥ ।
dadarśa śakrabhavanān niṣkrāmantīm athorvaśīm ।।
provāca tāṃ siddhavaraḥ sā ca taṃ siddham abravīt ।
niyamaṃ kaṃcid api hi karotu dvijasattamaḥ ।।
yenāhaṃ karmaṇā siddha taṃ jānāmi na cānyathā ।
tad urvaśīvaco abhyetya tasmai mūrkhadvijāya tu ।।
kathayām āsa siddhas tu so apīmaṃ niyamaṃ jagau ।
tavāgre siddhapuruṣa niyamo ayaṃ kṛto mayā ।।
na bhokṣye adyaprabhṛti vai śakaṭaṃ satyam īritam ।
ity uktaḥ prayayau siddhaḥ svarge dṛṣṭvorvaśīm atha ।।
prāhāsau śakaṭaṃ bhokṣye nādyaprabhṛti karhicit ।
taṃ siddham urvaśī prāha jñāto asau sāṃprataṃ mayā ।।
niyamagrahaṇād eva mūrkho mām upahāsakaḥ ।
ity uktvā prayayau śīghraṃ vāsaṃ nārāyaṇātmajā ।।
siddho api vicacārāsau kāmacārī mahītalam ।
urvaśy api varārohā gatvā vārāṇasīṃ purīm ।।
matsyodarījale snānaṃ cakre divyavapurdharā ।
athāsāv api mūrkhas tu nadīṃ matsyodarīṃ mune ।।
jagāmātha dadarśāsau snāyamānām athorvaśīm ।
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛdhe athāsya manmathaḥ kṣobhakṛd dṛḍham ।।
cakāra mūrkhaś ceṣṭāś ca taṃ vivedorvaśī svayam ।
taṃ mūrkhaṃ siddhagaditaṃ jñātvā sasmitam āha tam ।।
{urvaśy uvāca 
kim icchasi mahābhāga mattaḥ śīghram ihocyatām ।
kariṣyāmi vacas tubhyaṃ tvaṃ viśrabdhaṃ kariṣyasi ।।
{mūrkhabrāhmaṇa uvāca 
ātmapradānena mama prāṇān rakṣa śucismite ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
taṃ prāhāthorvaśī vipraṃ niyamasthāsmi sāṃpratam ।
tvaṃ tiṣṭhasva kṣaṇam atha pratīkṣasvāgataṃ mama ।।
sthito asmīty abravīd vipraḥ sāpi svargaṃ jagāma ha ।
māsamātreṇa sāyātā dadarśa taṃ kṛśaṃ dvijam ।।
sthitaṃ māsaṃ nadītīre nirāhāraṃ surāṅganā ।
taṃ dṛṣṭvā niścayayutaṃ bhūtvā vṛddhavapus tataḥ ।।
sā cakāra nadītīre śakaṭaṃ śarkarāvṛtam ।
ghṛtena madhunā caiva nadīṃ matsyodarīṃ gatā ।।
snātvātha bhūmau vasantī śakaṭaṃ ca yathārthataḥ ।
taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ samāhūya vākyam āha sulocanā ।।
{urvaśy uvāca 
mayā tīvraṃ vrataṃ vipra cīrṇaṃ saubhāgyakāraṇāt ।
vratānte niṣkṛtiṃ dadyāṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bho dvija ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sa prāha kim idaṃ loke dīyate śarkarāvṛtam ।
kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhaḥ pṛcchāmi sādhu bhadre samīraya ।।
sā prāha śakaṭo vipra śarkarāpiṣṭasaṃyutaḥ ।
imaṃ tvaṃ samupādāya prāṇaṃ tarpaya mā ciram ।।
sa tac chrutvātha saṃsmṛtya kṣudhayā pīḍito api san ।
prāha bhadre na gṛhṇāmi niyamo hi kṛto mayā ।।
purataḥ siddhavargasya na bhokṣye śakaṭaṃ tv iti ।
parijñānārtham urvaśyā dadasvānyasya kasyacit ।।
sābravīn niyamo bhadra kṛtaḥ kāṣṭhamaye tvayā ।
nāsau kāṣṭhamayo bhuṅkṣva kṣudhayā cātipīḍitaḥ ।।
tāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuvāca na mayā tad viśeṣaṇam ।
kṛtaṃ bhadre atha niyamaḥ sāmānyenaiva me kṛtaḥ ।।
taṃ bhūyaḥ prāha sā tanvī na ced bhokṣyasi brāhmaṇa ।
gṛhaṃ gṛhītvā gacchasva kuṭumbaṃ tava bhokṣyati ।।
sa tām uvāca sudati na tāvad yāmi mandiram ।
ihāyātā varārohā trailokye apy adhikā guṇaiḥ ।।
sā mayā madanārtena prārthitāśvāsitas tayā ।
sthīyatāṃ kṣaṇam ity evaṃ sthāsyāmīti mayoditam ।।
māsamātraṃ gatāyās tu tasyā bhadre sthitasya ca ।
mama satyānuraktasya saṃgamāya dhṛtavrate ।।
tasya sā vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛtvā svaṃ rūpam uttamam ।
vihasya bhāvagambhīram urvaśī prāha taṃ dvijam ।।
{urvaśy uvāca 
sādhu satyaṃ tvayā vipra vrataṃ niṣṭhitacetasā ।
niṣpāditaṃ haṭhād eva mama darśanam icchatā ।।
aham evorvaśī vipra tvāṃ jijñāsārtham āgatā ।
parīkṣito niścitavān bhavān satyatapā ṛṣiḥ ।।
gaccha śūkaravoddeśaṃ rūpatīrtheti viśrutam ।
siddhiṃ yāsyasi viprendra tatas tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ity uktvā divam utpatya sā jagāmorvaśī dvijāḥ ।
sa ca satyatapā vipro rūpatīrthaṃ jagāma ha ।।
tatra śāntiparo bhūtvā niyamavratadhṛk śuciḥ ।
dehotsarge jagāmāsau gāndharvaṃ lokam uttamam ।।
tatra manvantaraśataṃ bhogān bhuktvā yathārthataḥ ।
babhūva sukule rājā prajārañjanatatparaḥ ।।
sa yajvā vividhair yajñaiḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ ।
putreṣu rājyaṃ nikṣipya yayau śaukaravaṃ punaḥ ।।
rūpatīrthe mṛto bhūyaḥ śakralokam upāgataḥ ।
tatra manvantaraśataṃ bhogān bhuktvā tataś cyutaḥ ।।
pratiṣṭhāne puravare budhaputraḥ purūravāḥ ।
babhūva tatra corvaśyāḥ saṃgamāya tapodhanāḥ ।।
evaṃ purā satyatapā dvijātis 
tīrthe prasiddhe sa hi rūpasaṃjñe 
ārādhya janmany atha cārcya viṣṇum 
avāpya bhogān atha muktim eti 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
śrutaṃ phalaṃ gītikāyā asmābhiḥ suprajāgare ।
kṛṣṇasya yena cāṇḍālo gato asau paramāṃ gatim ।।
yathā viṣṇau bhaved bhaktis tan no brūhi mahāmate ।
tapasā karmaṇā yena śrotum icchāma sāṃpratam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlāḥ pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ ।
yathā kṛṣṇe bhaved bhaktiḥ puruṣasya mahāphalā ।।
saṃsāre asmin mahāghore sarvabhūtabhayāvahe ।
mahāmohakare nṝṇāṃ nānāduḥkhaśatākule ।।
tiryagyonisahasreṣu jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
kathaṃcil labhate janma dehī mānuṣyakaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
mānuṣatve api vipratvaṃ vipratve api vivekitā ।
vivekād dharmabuddhis tu buddhyā tu śreyasāṃ grahaḥ ।।
yāvat pāpakṣayaṃ puṃsāṃ na bhavej janma saṃcitam ।
tāvan na jāyate bhaktir vāsudeve jaganmaye ।।
tasmād vakṣyāmi bho viprā bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe yathā bhavet ।
anyadeveṣu yā bhaktiḥ puruṣasyeha jāyate ।।
karmaṇā manasā vācā tadgatenāntarātmanā ।
tena tasya bhaved bhaktir yajane munisattamāḥ ।।
sa karoti tato viprā bhaktiṃ cāgneḥ samāhitaḥ ।
tuṣṭe hutāśane tasya bhaktir bhavati bhāskare ।।
pūjāṃ karoti satatam ādityasya tato dvijāḥ ।
prasanne bhāskare tasya bhaktir bhavati śaṃkare ।।
pūjāṃ karoti vidhivat sa tu śaṃbhoḥ prayatnataḥ ।
tuṣṭe trilocane tasya bhaktir bhavati keśave ।।
saṃpūjya taṃ jagannāthaṃ vāsudevākhyam avyayam ।
tato bhuktiṃ ca muktiṃ ca sa prāpnoti dvijottamāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
avaiṣṇavā narā ye tu dṛśyante ca mahāmune ।
kiṃ te viṣṇuṃ nārcayanti brūhi tatkāraṇaṃ dvija ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
dvau bhūtasargau vikhyātau loke asmin munisattamāḥ ।
āsuraś ca tathā daivaḥ purā sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā ।।
daivīṃ prakṛtim āsādya pūjayanti tato acyutam ।
āsurīṃ yonim āpannā dūṣayanti narā harim ।।
māyayā hatavijñānā viṣṇos te tu narādhamāḥ ।
aprāpya taṃ hariṃ viprās tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim ।।
tasya yā gahvarī māyā durvijñeyā surāsuraiḥ ।
mahāmohakarī nṝṇāṃ dustarā cākṛtātmabhiḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
icchāmas tāṃ mahāmāyāṃ jñātuṃ viṣṇoḥ sudustarām ।
vaktum arhasi dharmajña paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
svapnendrajālasaṃkāśā māyā sā lokakarṣaṇī ।
kaḥ śaknoti harer māyāṃ jñātuṃ tāṃ keśavād ṛte ।।
yā vṛttā brāhmaṇasyāsīn māyārthe nāradasya ca ।
viḍambanāṃ tu tāṃ viprāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ gadato mama ।।
prāg āsīn nṛpatiḥ śrīmān āgnīdhra iti viśrutaḥ ।
nagare kāmadamanas tasyātha tanayaḥ śuciḥ ।।
dharmārāmaḥ kṣamāśīlaḥ pitṛśuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ ।
prajānurañjako dakṣaḥ śrutiśāstrakṛtaśramaḥ ।।
pitāsya tv akarod yatnaṃ vivāhāya na caicchata ।
taṃ pitā prāha kim iti necchase dārasaṃgraham ।।
sarvam etat sukhārthaṃ hi vāñchanti manujāḥ kila ।
sukhamūlā hi dārāś ca tasmāt taṃ tvaṃ samācara ।।
sa pitur vacanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīm āste ca gauravāt ।
muhur muhus taṃ ca pitā codayām āsa bho dvijāḥ ।।
athāsau pitaraṃ prāha tāta nāmānurūpatā ।
mayā samāśritā vyaktā vaiṣṇavī paripālinī ।।
taṃ pitā prāha saṃgamya naiṣa dharmo asti putraka ।
na vidhārayitavyā syāt puruṣeṇa vipaścitā ।।
kuru madvacanaṃ putra prabhur asmi pitā tava ।
mā nimajja kulaṃ mahyaṃ narake saṃtatikṣayāt ।।
sa hi taṃ pitur ādeśaṃ śrutvā prāha suto vaśī ।
prītaḥ saṃsmṛtya paurāṇīṃ saṃsārasya vicitratām ।।
{putra uvāca 
śṛṇu tāta vaco mahyaṃ tattvavākyaṃ sahetukam ।
nāmānurūpaṃ kartavyaṃ satyaṃ bhavati pārthiva ।।
mayā janmasahasrāṇi jarāmṛtyuśatāni ca ।
prāptāni dārasaṃyoga- viyogāni ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
tṛṇagulmalatāvallī- sarīsṛpamṛgadvijāḥ ।
paśustrīpuruṣādyāni prāptāni śataśo mayā ।।
gaṇakiṃnaragandharva- vidyādharamahoragāḥ ।
yakṣaguhyakarakṣāṃsi dānavāpsarasaḥ surāḥ ।।
nadīśvarasahasraṃ ca prāptaṃ tāta punaḥ punaḥ ।
sṛṣṭas tu bahuśaḥ sṛṣṭau saṃhāre cāpi saṃhṛtaḥ ।।
dārasaṃyogayuktasya tātedṛṅ me viḍambanā ।
itas tṛtīye yad vṛttaṃ mama janmani tac chṛṇu ।
kathayāmi samāsena tīrthamāhātmyasaṃbhavam ।।
atītya janmāni bahūni tāta 
nṛdevagandharvamahoragāṇām 
vidyādharāṇāṃ khagakiṃnarāṇāṃ 
jāto hi vaṃśe sutapā maharṣiḥ 
tato mahābhūd acalā hi bhaktir 
janārdane lokapatau madhughne 
vratopavāsair vividhaiś ca bhaktyā 
saṃtoṣitaś cakragadāstradhārī 
tuṣṭo abhyagāt pakṣipatiṃ mahātmā 
viṣṇuḥ samāruhya varaprado me 
prāhoccaśabdaṃ vriyatāṃ dvijāte 
varo hi yaṃ vāñchasi taṃ pradāsye 
tato aham ūce harim īśitāraṃ 
tuṣṭo asi cet keśava tad vṛṇomi 
yā sā tvadīyā paramā hi māyā 
tāṃ vettum icchāmi janārdano aham 
athābravīn me madhukaiṭabhāriḥ 
kiṃ te tayā brahman māyayā vai 
dharmārthakāmāni dadāni tubhyaṃ 
putrāṇi mukhyāni nirāmayatvam 
tato murāriṃ punar uktavān ahaṃ 
bhūyo arthadharmārthajigīṣitaiva yat 
māyā tavemām iha vettum icche 
mamādya tāṃ darśaya puṣkarākṣa 
tato abhyuvācātha nṛsiṃhamukhyaḥ 
śrīśaḥ prabhur viṣṇur idaṃ vaco me 
{viṣṇur uvāca 
māyāṃ madīyāṃ nahi vetti kaścin 
na cāpi vā vetsyati kaścid eva 
pūrvaṃ surarṣir dvija nāradākhyo 
brahmātmajo abhūn mama bhaktiyuktaḥ 
tenāpi pūrvaṃ bhavatā yathaiva 
saṃtoṣito bhaktimatā hi tadvat 
varaṃ ca dattaṃ gatavān ahaṃ ca 
sa cāpi vavre varam etad eva 
nivārito mām atimūḍhabhāvād 
bhavān yathaivaṃ vṛtavān varaṃ ca 
tato mayokto ambhasi nārada tvaṃ 
māyāṃ hi me vetsyasi saṃnimagnaḥ 
tato nimagno ambhasi nārado asau 
kanyā babhau kāśipateḥ suśīlā 
tāṃ yauvanāḍhyām atha cārudharmiṇe 
vidarbharājñas tanayāya vai dadau 
svadharmaṇe so api tayā sametaḥ 
siṣeva kāmān atulān maharṣiḥ 
svarge gate asau pitari pratāpavān 
rājyaṃ kramāyātam avāpya hṛṣṭaḥ 
vidarbharāṣṭraṃ paripālayānaḥ 
putraiḥ sapautrair bahubhir vṛto abhūt 
athābhavad bhūmipateḥ sudharmaṇaḥ 
kāśīśvareṇātha samaṃ suyuddham 
tatra kṣayaṃ prāpya saputrapautraṃ 
vidarbharāṭ kāśipatiś ca yuddhe 
tataḥ suśīlā pitaraṃ saputraṃ 
jñātvā patiṃ cāpi saputrapautram 
purād viniḥsṛtya raṇāvaniṃ gatā 
dṛṣṭvā suśīlā kadanaṃ mahāntam 
bhartur bale tatra pitur bale ca 
duḥkhānvitā sā suciraṃ vilapya 
jagāma sā mātaram ārtarūpā 
bhrātṝn sutān bhrātṛsutān sapautrān 
bhartāram eṣā pitaraṃ ca gṛhya 
mahāśmaśāne ca mahācitiṃ sā 
kṛtvā hutāśaṃ pradadau svayaṃ ca 
yadā samiddho hutabhug babhūva 
tadā suśīlā praviveśa vegād 
dhā putra hā putra iti bruvāṇā 
tadā punaḥ sā munir nārado abhūt 
sa cāpi vahniḥ sphaṭikāmalābhaḥ 
pūrṇaṃ saro abhūd atha cottatāra 
tasyāgrato devavaras tu keśavaḥ 
prahasya devarṣim uvāca nāradam 
kas te tu putro vada me maharṣe 
mṛtaṃ ca kaṃ śocasi naṣṭabuddhiḥ 
vrīḍānvito abhūd atha nārado asau 
tato aham enaṃ punar eva cāha 
itīdṛśā nārada kaṣṭarūpā 
māyā madīyā kamalāsanādyaiḥ 
śakyā na vettuṃ samahendrarudraiḥ 
kathaṃ bhavān vetsyati durvibhāvyām 
sa vākyam ākarṇya mahāmaharṣir 
uvāca bhaktiṃ mama dehi viṣṇo 
prāpte atha kāle smaraṇaṃ tathaiva 
sadā ca saṃdarśanam īśa te astu 
yatrāham ārtaś citim adya rūḍhas 
tat tīrtham astv acyutapāpahantrā 
adhiṣṭhitaṃ keśava nityam eva 
tvayā sahāsaṃ kamalodbhavena 
tato mayokto dvija nārado asau 
tīrthaṃ sitode hi citis tavāstu 
sthāsyāmy ahaṃ cātra sadaiva viṣṇur 
maheśvaraḥ sthāsyati cottareṇa 
yadā virañcer vadanaṃ trinetraḥ 
sa cchetsyateyaṃ ca mamogravācam 
tadā kapālasya tu mocanāya 
sameṣyate tīrtham idaṃ tvadīyam 
snātasya tīrthe tripurāntakasya 
patiṣyate bhūmitale kapālam 
tatas tu tīrtheti kapālamocanaṃ 
khyātaṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca bhaviṣyate tat 
tadā prabhṛty ambudavāhano asau 
na mokṣyate tīrthavaraṃ supuṇyam 
na caiva tasmin dvija saṃpracakṣate 
tat kṣetram ugraṃ tv atha brahmavadhyā 
yadā na mokṣaty amarārihantā 
tat kṣetramukhyaṃ mahad āptapuṇyam 
tadā vimukteti surai rahasyaṃ 
tīrthaṃ stutaṃ puṇyadam avyayākhyam 
kṛtvā tu pāpāni naro mahānti 
tasmin praviṣṭaḥ śucir apramādī 
yadā tu māṃ cintayate sa śuddhaḥ 
prayāti mokṣaṃ bhagavatprasādāt 
bhūtvā tasmin rudrapiśācasaṃjño 
yonyantare duḥkham upāśnute asau 
vimuktapāpo bahuvarṣapūgair 
utpattim āyāsyati vipragehe 
śucir yatātmāsya tato antakāle 
rudro hitaṃ tārakam asya kīrtayet 
ity evam uktvā dvijavarya nāradaṃ 
gato asmi dugdhārṇavam ātmageham 
sa cāpi vipras tridivaṃ cacāra 
gandharvarājena samarcyamānaḥ 
etat tavoktaṃ nanu bodhanāya 
māyā madīyā nahi śakyate sā 
jñātuṃ bhavān icchati cet tato adya 
evaṃ viśasvāpsu ca vetsi yena 
evaṃ dvijātir hariṇā prabodhito 
bhāvyarthayogān nimamajja toye 
kokāmukhe tāta tato hi kanyā 
cāṇḍālaveśmany abhavad dvijaḥ saḥ 
rūpānvitā śīlaguṇopapannā 
avāpa sā yauvanam āsasāda 
cāṇḍālaputreṇa subāhunāpi 
vivāhitā rūpavivarjitena 
patir na tasyā hi mato babhūva 
sā tasya caivābhimatā babhūva 
putradvayaṃ netrahīnaṃ babhūva 
kanyā ca paścād badhirā tathānyā 
patir daridras tv atha sāpi mugdhā 
nadīgatā roditi tatra nityam 
gatā kadācit kalaśaṃ gṛhītvā 
sāntar jalaṃ snātum atha praviṣṭā 
yāvad dvijo asau punar eva tāvaj 
jātaḥ kriyāyogarataḥ suśīlaḥ 
tasyāḥ sa bhartātha ciraṃgateti 
draṣṭuṃ jagāmātha nadīṃ supuṇyām 
dadarśa kumbhaṃ na ca tāṃ taṭasthāṃ 
tato atiduḥkhāt praruroda nādayan 
tato andhayugmaṃ badhirā ca kanyā 
duḥkhānvitāsau samupājagāma 
te vai rudantaṃ pitaraṃ ca dṛṣṭvā 
duḥkhānvitā vai rurudur bhṛśārtāḥ 
tataḥ sa papraccha nadītaṭasthān 
dvijān bhavadbhir yadi yoṣid ekā 
dṛṣṭā tu toyārtham upādravantī 
ākhyāta te procur imāṃ praviṣṭā 
nadīṃ na bhūyas tu samuttatāra 
etāvad eveha samīhitaṃ naḥ 
sa tadvaco ghorataraṃ niśamya 
ruroda śokāśrupariplutākṣaḥ 
taṃ vai rudantaṃ sasutaṃ sakanyaṃ 
dṛṣṭvāham ārtaḥ sutarāṃ babhūva 
ārtiś ca me abhūd atha saṃsmṛtiś ca 
cāṇḍālayoṣāham iti kṣitīśa 
tato abravaṃ taṃ nṛpate mataṅgaṃ 
kimartham ārtena hi rudyate tvayā 
tasyā na lābho bhavitātimaurkhyād 
ākranditeneha vṛthā hi kiṃ te 
sa mām uvācātmajayugmam andhaṃ 
kanyā caikā badhireyaṃ tathaiva 
kathaṃ dvijāte adhunārtam etam 
āśvāsayiṣye apy atha poṣayiṣye 
ity evam uktvā sa sutaiś ca sārdhaṃ 
phūtkṛtya phūtkṛtya ca roditi sma 
yathā yathā roditi sa śvapākas 
tathā tathā me hy abhavat kṛtāpi 
tato aham ārtaṃ tu nivārya taṃ vai 
svavaṃśavṛttāntam athācacakṣe 
tataḥ sa duḥkhāt saha putrakaiḥ 
saṃviveśa kokāmukham ārtarūpaḥ 
praviṣṭamātre salile mataṅgas 
tīrthaprabhāvāc ca vimuktapāpaḥ 
vimānam āruhya śaśiprakāśaṃ 
yayau divaṃ tāta mamopapaśyataḥ 
tasmin praviṣṭe salile mṛte ca 
mamārtir āsīd atimohakartrī 
tato atipuṇye nṛpavarya kokā 
jale praviṣṭas tridivaṃ gataś ca 
bhūyo abhavaṃ vaiśyakule vyathārto 
jātismaras tīrthavaraprasādāt 
tato atinirviṇṇamanā gato ahaṃ 
kokāmukhaṃ saṃyatavākyacittaḥ 
vrataṃ samāsthāya kalevaraṃ svaṃ 
saṃśoṣayitvā divam āruroha 
tasmāc cyutas tvadbhavane ca jāto 
jātismaras tāta hariprasādāt 
so ahaṃ samārādhya murāridevaṃ 
kokāmukhe tyaktaśubhāśubhecchaḥ 
ity evam uktvā pitaraṃ praṇamya 
gatvā ca kokāmukham agratīrtham 
viṣṇuṃ samārādhya varāharūpam 
avāpa siddhiṃ manujarṣabho asau 
itthaṃ sa kāmadamanaḥ sahaputrapautraḥ 
kokāmukhe tīrthavare supuṇye 
tyaktvā tanuṃ doṣamayīṃ tatas tu 
gato divaṃ sūryasamair vimānaiḥ 
evaṃ mayoktā parameśvarasya 
māyā surāṇām api durvicintyā 
svapnendrajālapratimā murārer 
yayā jagan moham upaiti viprāḥ 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
asmābhis tu śrutaṃ vyāsa yat tvayā samudāhṛtam ।
prādurbhāvāśritaṃ puṇyaṃ māyā viṣṇoś ca durvidā ।।
śrotum icchāmahe tvatto yathāvad upasaṃhṛtim ।
mahāpralayasaṃjñāṃ ca kalpānte ca mahāmune ।।
{vyāsa uvāca
