śrūyatāṃ bho muniśreṣṭhā yathāvad anusaṃhṛtiḥ ।
kalpānte prākṛte caiva pralaye jāyate yathā ।।
ahorātraṃ pitṝṇāṃ tu māso abdaṃ tridivaukasām ।
caturyugasahasre tu brahmaṇo ahar dvijottamāḥ ।।
kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś ceti caturyugam ।
daivair varṣasahasrais tu tad dvādaśābhir ucyate ।।
caturyugāṇy aśeṣāṇi sadṛśāni svarūpataḥ ।
ādyaṃ kṛtayugaṃ proktaṃ munayo antyaṃ tathā kalim ।।
ādye kṛtayuge sargo brahmaṇā kriyate yataḥ ।
kriyate copasaṃhāras tathānte api kalau yuge ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kaleḥ svarūpaṃ bhagavan vistarād vaktum arhasi ।
dharmaś catuṣpād bhagavān yasmin vaikalyam ṛcchati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
kalisvarūpaṃ bho viprā yat pṛcchadhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ ।
nibodhadhvaṃ samāsena vartate yan mahattaram ।।
varṇāśramācāravatī pravṛttir na kalau nṛṇām ।
na sāma-ṛgyajurveda- viniṣpādanahaitukī ।।
vivāhā na kalau dharmā na śiṣyā gurusaṃsthitāḥ ।
na putrā dhārmikāś caiva na ca vahnikriyākramaḥ ।।
yatra tatra kule jāto balī sarveśvaraḥ kalau ।
sarvebhya eva varṇebhyo naraḥ kanyopajīvanaḥ ।।
yena tenaiva yogena dvijātir dīkṣitaḥ kalau ।
yaiva saiva ca viprendrāḥ prāyaścittakriyā kalau ।।
sarvam eva kalau śāstraṃ yasya yad vacanaṃ dvijāḥ ।
devatāś ca kalau sarvāḥ sarvaḥ sarvasya cāśramaḥ ।।
upavāsas tathāyāso vittotsargas tathā kalau ।
dharmo yathābhirucitair anuṣṭhānair anuṣṭhitaḥ ।।
vittena bhavitā puṃsāṃ svalpenaiva madaḥ kalau ।
strīṇāṃ rūpamadaś caiva keśair eva bhaviṣyati ।।
suvarṇamaṇiratnādau vastre copakṣayaṃ gate ।
kalau striyo bhaviṣyanti tadā keśair alaṃkṛtāḥ ।।
parityakṣyanti bhartāraṃ vittahīnaṃ tathā striyaḥ ।
bhartā bhaviṣyati kalau vittavān eva yoṣitām ।।
yo yo dadāti bahulaṃ sa sa svāmī tadā nṛṇām ।
svāmitvahetusaṃbandho bhavitābhijanas tadā ।।
gṛhāntā dravyasaṃghātā dravyāntā ca tathā matiḥ ।
arthāś cāthopabhogāntā bhaviṣyanti tadā kalau ।।
striyaḥ kalau bhaviṣyanti svairiṇyo lalitaspṛhāḥ ।
anyāyāvāptavitteṣu puruṣeṣu spṛhālavaḥ ।।
abhyarthito api suhṛdā svārthahāniṃ tu mānavaḥ ।
paṇasyārdhārdhamātre api kariṣyati tadā dvijāḥ ।।
sadā sapauruṣaṃ ceto bhāvi vipra tadā kalau ।
kṣīrapradānasaṃbandhi bhāti goṣu ca gauravam ।।
anāvṛṣṭibhayāt prāyaḥ prajāḥ kṣudbhayakātarāḥ ।
bhaviṣyanti tadā sarvā gaganāsaktadṛṣṭayaḥ ।।
mūlaparṇaphalāhārās tāpasā iva mānavāḥ ।
ātmānaṃ ghātayiṣyanti tadāvṛṣṭyābhiduḥkhitāḥ ।।
durbhikṣam eva satataṃ sadā kleśam anīśvarāḥ ।
prāpsyanti vyāhatasukhaṃ pramādān mānavāḥ kalau ।।
asnātabhojino nāgni- devatātithipūjanam ।
kariṣyanti kalau prāpte na ca piṇḍodakakriyām ।।
lolupā hrasvadehāś ca bahvannādanatatparāḥ ।
bahuprajālpabhāgyāś ca bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ ।।
ubhābhyām atha pāṇibhyāṃ śiraḥkaṇḍūyanaṃ striyaḥ ।
kurvatyo gurubhartṝṇām ājñāṃ bhetsyanty anāvṛtāḥ ।।
svapoṣaṇaparāḥ kruddhā dehasaṃskāravarjitāḥ ।
paruṣānṛtabhāṣiṇyo bhaviṣyanti kalau striyaḥ ।।
duḥśīlā duṣṭaśīleṣu kurvatyaḥ satataṃ spṛhām ।
asadvṛttā bhaviṣyanti puruṣeṣu kulāṅganāḥ ।।
vedādānaṃ kariṣyanti vaḍavāś ca tathāvratāḥ ।
gṛhasthāś ca na hoṣyanti na dāsyanty ucitāny api ।।
bhaveyur vanavāsā vai grāmyāhāraparigrahāḥ ।
bhikṣavaś cāpi putrā hi snehasaṃbandhayantrakāḥ ।।
arakṣitāro hartāraḥ śulkavyājena pārthivāḥ ।
hāriṇo janavittānāṃ saṃprāpte ca kalau yuge ।।
yo yo aśvarathanāgāḍhyaḥ sa sa rājā bhaviṣyati ।
yaś ca yaś cābalaḥ sarvaḥ sa sa bhṛtyaḥ kalau yuge ।।
vaiśyāḥ kṛṣivaṇijyādi saṃtyajya nijakarma yat ।
śūdravṛttyā bhaviṣyanti kārukarmopajīvinaḥ ।।
bhaikṣyavratās tathā śūdrāḥ pravrajyāliṅgino adhamāḥ ।
pākhaṇḍasaṃśrayāṃ vṛttim āśrayiṣyanty asaṃskṛtāḥ ।।
durbhikṣakarapīḍābhir atīvopadrutā janāḥ ।
godhūmānnayavānnādyān deśān yāsyanti duḥkhitāḥ ।।
vedamārge pralīne ca pākhaṇḍāḍhye tato jane ।
adharmavṛddhyā lokānām alpam āyur bhaviṣyati ।।
aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyamāneṣu vai tapaḥ ।
nareṣu nṛpadoṣeṇa bālamṛtyur bhaviṣyati ।।
bhavitrī yoṣitāṃ sūtiḥ pañcaṣaṭsaptavārṣikī ।
navāṣṭadaśavarṣāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tathā kalau ।।
palitodgamaś ca bhavitā tadā dvādaśavārṣikaḥ ।
na jīviṣyati vai kaścit kalau varṣāṇi viṃśatim ।।
alpaprajñā vṛthāliṅgā duṣṭāntaḥkaraṇāḥ kalau ।
yatas tato vinaśyanti kālenālpena mānavāḥ ।।
yadā yadā hi pākhaṇḍa- vṛttir atropalakṣyate ।
tadā tadā kaler vṛddhir anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ ।।
yadā yadā satāṃ hānir vedamārgānusāriṇām ।
tadā tadā kaler vṛddhir anumeyā vicakṣaṇaiḥ ।।
prārambhāś cāvasīdanti yadā dharmakṛtāṃ nṛṇām ।
tadānumeyaṃ prādhānyaṃ kaler viprā vicakṣaṇaiḥ ।।
yadā yadā na yajñānām īśvaraḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।
ijyate puruṣair yajñais tadā jñeyaṃ kaler balam ।।
na prītir vedavādeṣu pākhaṇḍeṣu yadā ratiḥ ।
kaler vṛddhis tadā prājñair anumeyā dvijottamāḥ ।।
kalau jagatpatiṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvasraṣṭāram īśvaram ।
nārcayiṣyanti bho viprāḥ pākhaṇḍopahatā narāḥ ।।
kiṃ devaiḥ kiṃ dvijair vedaiḥ kiṃ śaucenāmbujalpanā ।
ity evaṃ pralapiṣyanti pākhaṇḍopahatā narāḥ ।।
alpavṛṣṭiś ca parjanyaḥ svalpaṃ sasyaphalaṃ tathā ।
phalaṃ tathālpasāraṃ ca viprāḥ prāpte kalau yuge ।।
jānuprāyāṇi vastrāṇi śamīprāyā mahīruhāḥ ।
śūdraprāyās tathā varṇā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge ।।
aṇuprāyāṇi dhānyāni ājaprāyaṃ tathā payaḥ ।
bhaviṣyati kalau prāpta auśīraṃ cānulepanam ।।
śvaśrūśvaśurabhūyiṣṭhā guravaś ca nṛṇāṃ kalau ।
śālādyāhāribhāryāś ca suhṛdo munisattamāḥ ।।
kasya mātā pitā kasya yadā karmātmakaḥ pumān ।
iti codāhariṣyanti śvaśurānugatā narāḥ ।।
vāṅmanaḥkāyajair doṣair abhibhūtāḥ punaḥ punaḥ ।
narāḥ pāpāny anudinaṃ kariṣyanty alpamedhasaḥ ।।
niḥsatyānām aśaucānāṃ nirhrīkāṇāṃ tathā dvijāḥ ।
yad yad duḥkhāya tat sarvaṃ kalikāle bhaviṣyati ।।
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāre svadhāsvāhāvivarjite ।
tadā praviralo vipraḥ kaścil loke bhaviṣyati ।।
tatrālpenaiva kālena puṇyaskandham anuttamam ।
karoti yaḥ kṛtayuge kriyate tapasā hi yaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kasmin kāle alpako dharmo dadāti sumahāphalam ।
vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa śrotuṃ vāñchā pravartate ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
dhanye kalau bhaved viprās tv alpakleśair mahat phalam ।
tathā bhavetāṃ strīśūdrau dhanyau cānyan nibodhata ।।
yat kṛte daśabhir varṣais tretāyāṃ hāyanena tat ।
dvāpare tac ca māsena ahorātreṇa tat kalau ।।
tapaso brahmacaryasya japādeś ca phalaṃ dvijāḥ ।
prāpnoti puruṣas tena kalau sādhv iti bhāṣitum ।।
dhyāyan kṛte yajan yajñais tretāyāṃ dvāpare arcayan ।
yad āpnoti tad āpnoti kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam ।।
dharmotkarṣam atīvātra prāpnoti puruṣaḥ kalau ।
svalpāyāsena dharmajñās tena tuṣṭo asmy ahaṃ kalau ।।
vratacaryāparair grāhyā vedāḥ pūrvaṃ dvijātibhiḥ ।
tatas tu dharmasaṃprāptair yaṣṭavyaṃ vidhivad dhanaiḥ ।।
vṛthā kathā vṛthā bhojyaṃ vṛthā svaṃ ca dvijanmanām ।
patanāya tathā bhāvyaṃ tais tu saṃyatibhiḥ saha ।।
asamyakkaraṇe doṣās teṣāṃ sarveṣu vastuṣu ।
bhojyapeyādikaṃ caiṣāṃ necchāprāptikaraṃ dvijāḥ ।।
pāratantryāt samasteṣu teṣāṃ kāryeṣu vai tataḥ ।
lokān kleśena mahatā yajanti vinayānvitāḥ ।।
dvijaśuśrūṣaṇenaiva pākayajñādhikāravān ।
nijaṃ jayati vai lokaṃ śūdro dhanyataras tataḥ ।।
bhakṣyābhakṣyeṣu nāśāsti yeṣāṃ pāpeṣu vā yataḥ ।
niyamo muniśārdūlās tenāsau sādhv itīritam ।।
svadharmasyāvirodhena narair labhyaṃ dhanaṃ sadā ।
pratipādanīyaṃ pātreṣu yaṣṭavyaṃ ca yathāvidhi ।।
tasyārjane mahān kleśaḥ pālanena dvijottamāḥ ।
tathā sadviniyogāya vijñeyaṃ gahanaṃ nṛṇām ।।
ebhir anyais tathā kleśaiḥ puruṣā dvijasattamāḥ ।
nijāñ jayanti vai lokān prājāpatyādikān kramāt ।।
yoṣic chuśrūṣaṇād bhartuḥ karmaṇā manasā girā ।
etad viṣayam āpnoti tatsālokyaṃ yato dvijāḥ ।।
nātikleśena mahatā tān eva puruṣo yathā ।
tṛtīyaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ tena mayā sādhv iti yoṣitaḥ ।।
etad vaḥ kathitaṃ viprā yannimittam ihāgatāḥ ।
tat pṛcchadhvaṃ yathākāmam ahaṃ vakṣyāmi vaḥ sphuṭam ।।
alpenaiva prayatnena dharmaḥ sidhyati vai kalau ।
narair ātmaguṇāmbhobhiḥ kṣālitākhilakilbiṣaiḥ ।।
śūdraiś ca dvijaśuśrūṣā- tatparair munisattamāḥ ।
tathā strībhir anāyāsāt patiśuśrūṣayaiva hi ।।
tatas tritayam apy etan mama dhanyatamaṃ matam ।
dharmasaṃrādhane kleśo dvijātīnāṃ kṛtādiṣu ।।
tathā svalpena tapasā siddhiṃ yāsyanti mānavāḥ ।
dhanyā dharmaṃ cariṣyanti yugānte munisattamāḥ ।।
bhavadbhir yad abhipretaṃ tad etat kathitaṃ mayā ।
apṛṣṭenāpi dharmajñāḥ kim anyat kriyatāṃ dvijāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
āsannaṃ viprakṛṣṭaṃ vā yadi kālaṃ na vidmahe ।
tato dvāparavidhvaṃsaṃ yugāntaṃ spṛhayāmahe ।।
prāptā vayaṃ hi tat kālam anayā dharmatṛṣṇayā ।
ādadyāma paraṃ dharmaṃ sukham alpena karmaṇā ।।
saṃtrāsodvegajananaṃ yugāntaṃ samupasthitam ।
pranaṣṭadharmaṃ dharmajña nimittair vaktum arhasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
arakṣitāro hartāro balibhāgasya pārthivāḥ ।
yugānte prabhaviṣyanti svarakṣaṇaparāyaṇāḥ ।।
akṣatriyāś ca rājāno viprāḥ śūdropajīvinaḥ ।
śūdrāś ca brāhmaṇācārā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye ।।
śrotriyāḥ kāṇḍapṛṣṭhāś ca niṣkarmāṇi havīṃṣi ca ।
ekapaṅktyām aśiṣyanti yugānte munisattamāḥ ।।
aśiṣṭavanto arthaparā narā madyāmiṣapriyāḥ ।
mitrabhāryāṃ bhajiṣyanti yugānte puruṣādhamāḥ ।।
rājavṛttisthitāś caurā rājānaś cauraśīlinaḥ ।
bhṛtyā hy anirdiṣṭabhujo bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye ।।
dhanāni ślāghanīyāni satāṃ vṛttam apūjitam ।
akutsanā ca patite bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye ।।
pranaṣṭanāsāḥ puruṣā muktakeśā virūpiṇaḥ ।
ūnaṣoḍaśavarṣāś ca prasoṣyanti tathā striyaḥ ।।
aṭṭaśūlā janapadāḥ śivaśūlāś catuṣpathāḥ ।
pramadāḥ keśaśūlāś ca bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye ।।
sarve brahma vadiṣyanti dvijā vājasaneyikāḥ ।
śūdrābhā vādinaś caiva brāhmaṇāś cāntyavāsinaḥ ।।
śukladantā jitākṣāś ca muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavāsasaḥ ।
śūdrā dharmaṃ vadiṣyanti śāṭhyabuddhyopajīvinaḥ ।।
śvāpadapracuratvaṃ ca gavāṃ caiva parikṣayaḥ ।
sādhūnāṃ parivṛttiś ca vidyād antagate yuge ।।
antyā madhye nivatsyanti madhyāś cāntanivāsinaḥ ।
nirhrīkāś ca prajāḥ sarvā naṣṭās tatra yugakṣaye ।।
tapoyajñaphalānāṃ ca vikretāro dvijottamāḥ ।
ṛtavo viparītāś ca bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye ।।
tathā dvihāyanā damyāḥ kalau lāṅgaladhāriṇaḥ ।
citravarṣī ca parjanyo yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati ।।
sarve śūrakule jātāḥ kṣamānāthā bhavanti hi ।
yathā nimnāḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye ।।
pitṛdeyāni dattāni bhaviṣyanti tathā sutāḥ ।
na ca dharmaṃ cariṣyanti mānavā nirgate yuge ।।
ūṣarā bahulā bhūmiḥ panthānas taskarāvṛtāḥ ।
sarve vāṇikāś caiva bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye ।।
pitṛdāyādadattāni vibhajanti tathā sutāḥ ।
haraṇe yatnavanto api lobhādibhir virodhinaḥ ।।
saukumārye tathā rūpe ratne copakṣayaṃ gate ।
bhaviṣyanti yugasyānte nāryaḥ keśair alaṃkṛtāḥ ।।
nirvīryasya ratis tatra gṛhasthasya bhaviṣyati ।
yugānte samanuprāpte nānyā bhāryāsamā ratiḥ ।।
kuśīlānāryabhūyiṣṭhā vṛthārūpasamanvitāḥ ।
puruṣālpaṃ bahustrīkaṃ tad yugāntasya lakṣaṇam ।।
bahuyācanako loko na dāsyati parasparam ।
rājacaurāgnidaṇḍādi- kṣīṇaḥ kṣayam upaiṣyati ।।
aphalāni ca sasyāni taruṇā vṛddhaśīlinaḥ ।
aśīlāḥ sukhino loke bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye ।।
varṣāsu paruṣā vātā nīcāḥ śarkaravarṣiṇaḥ ।
saṃdigdhaḥ paralokaś ca bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye ।।
vaiśyā iva ca rājanyā dhanadhānyopajīvinaḥ ।
yugāpakramaṇe pūrvaṃ bhaviṣyanti na bāndhavāḥ ।।
apravṛttāḥ prapaśyanti samayāḥ śapathās tathā ।
ṛṇaṃ savinayabhraṃśaṃ yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati ।।
bhaviṣyaty aphalo harṣaḥ krodhaś ca saphalo nṛṇām ।
ajāś cāpi nirotsyanti payaso arthe yugakṣaye ।।
aśāstravihito yajña evam eva bhaviṣyati ।
apramāṇaṃ kariṣyanti narāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ ।।
śāstroktasyāpravaktāro bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ ।
sarvaḥ sarvaṃ vijānāti vṛddhān anupasevya vai ।।
na kaścid akavir nāma yugānte samupasthite ।
nakṣatrāṇi viyogāni na karmasthā dvijātayaḥ ।।
cauraprāyāś ca rājāno yugānte samupasthite ।
kuṇḍīvṛṣā naikṛtikāḥ surāpā brahmavādinaḥ ।।
aśvamedhena yakṣyante yugānte dvijasattamāḥ ।
yājayiṣyanty ayājyāṃs tu tathābhakṣyasya bhakṣiṇaḥ ।।
brāhmaṇā dhanatṛṣṇārtā yugānte samupasthite ।
bhoḥśabdam abhidhāsyanti na ca kaścit paṭhiṣyati ।।
ekaśaṅkhās tathā nāryo gavedhukapinaddhakāḥ ।
nakṣatrāṇi vivarṇāni viparitā diśo daśa ।।
saṃdhyārāgo vidagdhāṅgo bhaviṣyati yugakṣaye ।
preṣayanti pitṝn putrā vadhūḥ śvaśrūḥ svakarmasu ।।
yugeṣv evaṃ nivatsyanti pramadāś ca narās tathā ।
akṛtvāgrāṇi bhokṣyanti dvijāś caivāhutāgnayaḥ ।।
bhikṣāṃ balim adattvā ca bhokṣyanti puruṣāḥ svayam ।
vañcayitvā patīn suptān gamiṣyanti striyo anyataḥ ।।
na vyādhitān nāpy arūpān nodyatān nāpy asūyakān ।
kṛte na pratikartā ca yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
evaṃ vilambite dharme mānuṣāḥ karapīḍitāḥ ।
kutra deśe nivatsyanti kimāhāravihāriṇaḥ ।।
kiṃkarmāṇaḥ kimīhantaḥ kiṃpramāṇāḥ kimāyuṣaḥ ।
kāṃ ca kāṣṭhāṃ samāsādya prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ata ūrdhvaṃ cyute dharme guṇahīnāḥ prajās tathā ।
śīlavyasanam āsādya prāpsyanti hrāsam āyuṣaḥ ।।
āyurhānyā balagnānir balagnānyā vivarṇatā ।
vaivarṇyād vyādhisaṃpīḍā nirvedo vyādhipīḍanāt ।।
nirvedād ātmasaṃbodhaḥ saṃbodhād dharmaśīlatā ।
evaṃ gatvā parāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ prapatsyanti kṛtaṃ yugam ।।
uddeśato dharmaśīlāḥ kecin madhyasthatāṃ gatāḥ ।
kiṃdharmaśīlāḥ kecit tu kecid atra kutūhalāḥ ।।
pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca pramāṇam iti niścitāḥ ।
apramāṇaṃ kariṣyanti sarvam ity apare janāḥ ।।
nāstikyaparatāś cāpi kecid dharmavilopakāḥ ।
bhaviṣyanti narā mūḍhā dvijāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ ।।
tadātvamātraśraddheyā śāstrajñānabahiṣkṛtāḥ ।
dāmbhikās te bhaviṣyanti narā jñānavilopitāḥ ।।
tathā vilulite dharme janāḥ śreṣṭhapuraskṛtāḥ ।
śubhān samācariṣyanti dānaśīlaparāyaṇāḥ ।।
sarvabhakṣāḥ svayaṃguptā nirghṛṇā nirapatrapāḥ ।
bhaviṣyanti tadā loke tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam ।।
kaṣāyopaplave kāle jñānaniṣṭhāpraṇāśane ।
siddhim alpena kālena prāpsyanti nirupaskṛtāḥ ।।
viprāṇāṃ śāśvatīṃ vṛttiṃ yadā varṇāvare janāḥ ।
saṃśrayiṣyanti bho viprās tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam ।।
mahāyuddhaṃ mahāvarṣaṃ mahāvātaṃ mahātapaḥ ।
bhaviṣyati yuge kṣīṇe tat kaṣāyasya lakṣaṇam ।।
viprarūpeṇa yakṣāṃsi rājānaḥ karṇavedinaḥ ।
pṛthivīm upabhokṣyanti yugānte samupasthite ।।
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārāḥ kunetāro abhimāninaḥ ।
kravyādā brahmarūpeṇa sarvabhakṣyā vṛthāvratāḥ ।।
mūrkhāś cārthaparā lubdhāḥ kṣudrāḥ kṣudraparicchadāḥ ।
vyavahāropavṛttāś ca cyutā dharmāś ca śāśvatāt ।।
hartāraḥ pararatnānāṃ paradārapradharṣakāḥ ।
kāmātmāno durātmānaḥ sopadhāḥ priyasāhasāḥ ।।
teṣu prabhavamāṇeṣu janeṣv api ca sarvaśaḥ ।
abhāvino bhaviṣyanti munayo bahurūpiṇaḥ ।।
kalau yuge samutpannāḥ pradhānapuruṣāś ca ye ।
kathāyogena tān sarvān pūjayiṣyanti mānavāḥ ।।
sasyacaurā bhaviṣyanti tathā cailāpahāriṇaḥ ।
bhokṣyabhojyaharāś caiva karaṇḍānāṃ ca hāriṇaḥ ।।
caurāś caurasya hartāro hantā hantur bhaviṣyati ।
cauraiś caurakṣaye cāpi kṛte kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati ।।
niḥsāre kṣubhite kāle niṣkriye saṃvyavasthite ।
narā vanaṃ śrayiṣyanti karabhāraprapīḍitāḥ ।।
yajñakarmaṇy uparate rakṣāṃsi śvāpadāni ca ।
kīṭamūṣikasarpāś ca dharṣayiṣyanti mānavān ।।
kṣemaṃ subhikṣam ārogyaṃ sāmagryaṃ caiva bandhuṣu ।
uddeśeṣu narāḥ śreṣṭhā bhaviṣyanti yugakṣaye ।।
svayaṃpālāḥ svayaṃ caurāḥ plavasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtāḥ ।
maṇḍalaiḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti deśe deśe pṛthak pṛthak ।।
svadeśebhyaḥ paribhraṣṭā niḥsārāḥ saha bandhubhiḥ ।
narāḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti tadā kālaparikṣayāt ।।
tataḥ sarve samādāya kumārān pradrutā bhayāt ।
kauśikīṃ saṃtariṣyanti narāḥ kṣudbhayapīḍitāḥ ।।
aṅgān vaṅgān kaliṅgāṃś ca kāśmīrān atha kośalān ।
ṛṣikāntagiridroṇīḥ saṃśrayiṣyanti mānavāḥ ।।
kṛtsnaṃ ca himavatpārśvaṃ kūlaṃ ca lavaṇāmbhasaḥ ।
vividhaṃ jīrṇapattraṃ ca valkalāny ajināni ca ।।
svayaṃ kṛtvā nivatsyanti tasmin bhūte yugakṣaye ।
araṇyeṣu ca vatsyanti narā mlecchagaṇaiḥ saha ।।
naiva śūnyā navāraṇyā bhaviṣyati vasuṃdharā ।
agoptāraś ca goptāro bhaviṣyanti narādhipāḥ ।।
mṛgair matsyair vihaṃgaiś ca śvāpadaiḥ sarpakīṭakaiḥ ।
madhuśākaphalair mūlair vartayiṣyanti mānavāḥ ।।
śīrṇaparṇaphalāhārā valkalāny ajināni ca ।
svayaṃ kṛtvā nivatsyanti yathā munijanas tathā ।।
bījānām akṛtasnehā āhatāḥ kāṣṭhaśaṅkubhiḥ ।
ajaiḍakaṃ kharoṣṭraṃ ca pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ ।।
nadīsrotāṃsi rotsyanti toyārthaṃ kūlam āśritāḥ ।
pakvānnavyavahāreṇa vipaṇantaḥ parasparam ।।
tanūruhair yathājātaiḥ samalāntarasaṃbhṛtaiḥ ।
bahvapatyāḥ prajāhīnāḥ kulaśīlavivarjitāḥ ।।
evaṃ bhaviṣyanti tadā narāś cādharmajīvinaḥ ।
hīnā hīnaṃ tathā dharmaṃ prajā samanuvatsyati ।।
āyus tatra ca martyānāṃ paraṃ triṃśad bhaviṣyati ।
durbalā viṣayaglānā jarāśokair abhiplutāḥ ।।
bhaviṣyanti tadā teṣāṃ rogair indriyasaṃkṣayaḥ ।
āyuḥpratyayasaṃrodhād viṣayād uparaṃsyate ।।
śuśrūṣavo bhaviṣyanti sādhūnāṃ darśane ratāḥ ।
satyaṃ ca pratipatsyanti vyavahāropasaṃkṣayāt ।।
bhaviṣyanti ca kāmānām alābhād dharmaśīlinaḥ ।
kariṣyanti ca saṃskāraṃ svayaṃ ca kṣayapīḍitāḥ ।।
evaṃ śuśrūṣavo dāne satye prāṇyabhirakṣaṇe ।
tataḥ pādapravṛtte tu dharme śreyo nipatsyate ।।
teṣāṃ labdhānumānānāṃ guṇeṣu parivartatām ।
svādu kiṃ tv iti vijñāya dharma eva ca dṛśyate ।।
yathā hānikramaṃ prāptās tathā ṛddhikramaṃ gatāḥ ।
pragṛhīte tato dharme prapaśyanti kṛtaṃ yugam ।।
sādhuvṛttiḥ kṛtayuge kaṣāye hānir ucyate ।
eka eva tu kālo ayaṃ hīnavarṇo yathā śaśī ।।
channaś ca tamasā somo yathā kaliyugaṃ tathā ।
muktaś ca tamasā soma evaṃ kṛtayugaṃ ca tat ।।
arthavādaḥ paraṃ brahma vedārtha iti taṃ viduḥ ।
aviviktam avijñātaṃ dāyādyam iha dhāryate ।।
iṣṭavādas tapo nāma tapo hi sthavirīkṛtaḥ ।
guṇaiḥ karmābhinirvṛttir guṇāḥ śudhyanti karmaṇā ।।
āśīs tu puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā deśakālānuvartinī ।
yuge yuge yathākālam ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā ।।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ devānāṃ ca pratikriyā ।
āśiṣaś ca śivāḥ puṇyās tathaivāyur yuge yuge ।।
tathā yugānāṃ parivartanāni 
cirapravṛttāni vidhisvabhāvāt 
kṣaṇaṃ na saṃtiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ 
kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ 
{vyāsa uvāca 
sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ trividhaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ ।
naimittikaḥ prākṛtikas tathaivātyantiko mataḥ ।।
brāhmo naimittikas teṣāṃ kalpānte pratisaṃcaraḥ ।
ātyantiko vai mokṣaś ca prākṛto dviparārdhikaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
parārdhasaṃkhyāṃ bhagavaṃs tvam ācakṣva yathoditām ।
dviguṇīkṛtayajjñeyaḥ prākṛtaḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sthānāt sthānaṃ daśaguṇam ekaikaṃ gaṇyate dvijāḥ ।
tato aṣṭādaśame bhāge parārdham abhidhīyate ।।
parārdhaṃ dviguṇaṃ yat tu prākṛtaḥ sa layo dvijāḥ ।
tadāvyakte akhilaṃ vyaktaṃ sahetau layam eti vai ।।
nimeṣo mānuṣo yo ayaṃ mātrāmātrapramāṇataḥ ।
taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśat kāṣṭhās tathā kalā ।।
nāḍikā tu pramāṇena kalā ca daśa pañca ca ।
unmānenāmbhasaḥ sā tu palāny ardhatrayodaśa ।।
hemamāṣaiḥ kṛtacchidrā caturbhiś caturaṅgulaiḥ ।
māgadhena pramāṇena jalaprasthas tu sa smṛtaḥ ।।
nāḍikābhyām atha dvābhyāṃ muhūrto dvijasattamāḥ ।
ahorātraṃ muhūrtās tu triṃśan māso dinais tathā ।।
māsair dvādaśabhir varṣam ahorātraṃ tu tad divi ।
tribhir varṣaśatair varṣaṃ ṣaṣṭyā caivāsuradviṣām ।।
tais tu dvādaśasāhasraiś caturyugam udāhṛtam ।
caturyugasahasraṃ tu kathyate brahmaṇo dinam ।।
sa kalpas tatra manavaś caturdaśa dvijottamāḥ ।
tadante caiva bho viprā brahmanaimittiko layaḥ ।।
tasya svarūpam atyugraṃ dvijendrā gadato mama ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ prākṛtaṃ bhūyas tato vakṣyāmy ahaṃ layam ।।
caturyugasahasrānte kṣīṇaprāye mahītale ।
anāvṛṣṭir atīvogrā jāyate śatavārṣikī ।।
tato yāny alpasārāṇi tāni sattvāny anekaśaḥ ।
kṣayaṃ yānti muniśreṣṭhāḥ pārthivāny atipīḍanāt ।।
tataḥ sa bhagavān kṛṣṇo rudrarūpī tathāvyayaḥ ।
kṣayāya yatate kartum ātmasthāḥ sakalāḥ prajāḥ ।।
tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur bhānoḥ saptasu raśmiṣu ।
sthitaḥ pibaty aśeṣāṇi jalāni munisattamāḥ ।।
pītvāmbhāṃsi samastāni prāṇibhūtagatāni vai ।
śoṣaṃ nayati bho viprāḥ samastaṃ pṛthivītalam ।।
samudrān saritaḥ śailāñ śailaprasravaṇāni ca ।
pātāleṣu ca yat toyaṃ tat sarvaṃ nayati kṣayam ।।
tatas tasyāpy abhāvena toyāhāropabṛṃhitāḥ ।
sahasraraśmayaḥ sapta jāyante tatra bhāskarāḥ ।।
adhaś cordhvaṃ ca te dīptās tataḥ sapta divākarāḥ ।
dahanty aśeṣaṃ trailokyaṃ sapātālatalaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
dahyamānaṃ tu tair dīptais trailokyaṃ dīptabhāskaraiḥ ।
sādrinagārṇavābhogaṃ niḥsneham abhijāyate ।।
tato nirdagdhavṛkṣāmbu trailokyam akhilaṃ dvijāḥ ।
bhavaty eṣā ca vasudhā kūrmapṛṣṭhopamākṛtiḥ ।।
tataḥ kālāgnirudro asau bhūtasargaharo haraḥ ।
śeṣāhiśvāsasaṃtāpāt pātālāni dahaty adhaḥ ।।
pātālāni samastāni sa dagdhvā jvalano mahān ।
bhūmim abhyetya sakalaṃ dagdhvā tu vasudhātalam ।।
bhuvo lokaṃ tataḥ sarvaṃ svargalokaṃ ca dāruṇaḥ ।
jvālāmālāmahāvartas tatraiva parivartate ।।
ambarīṣam ivābhāti trailokyam akhilaṃ tadā ।
jvālāvartaparīvāram upakṣīṇabalās tataḥ ।।
tatas tāpaparītās tu lokadvayanivāsinaḥ ।
hṛtāvakāśā gacchanti maharlokaṃ dvijās tadā ।।
tasmād api mahātāpa- taptā lokās tataḥ param ।
gacchanti janalokaṃ te daśāvṛtyā paraiṣiṇaḥ ।।
tato dagdhvā jagat sarvaṃ rudrarūpī janārdanaḥ ।
mukhaniḥśvāsajān meghān karoti munisattamāḥ ।।
tato gajakulaprakhyās taḍidvanto ninādinaḥ ।
uttiṣṭhanti tadā vyomni ghorāḥ saṃvartakā ghanāḥ ।।
kecid añjanasaṃkāśāḥ kecit kumudasaṃnibhāḥ ।
dhūmavarṇā ghanāḥ kecit kecit pītāḥ payodharāḥ ।।
kecid dharidrāvarṇābhā lākṣārasanibhās tathā ।
kecid vaidūryasaṃkāśā indranīlanibhās tathā ।।
śaṅkhakundanibhāś cānye jātīkundanibhās tathā ।
indragopanibhāḥ kecin manaḥśilānibhās tathā ।।
padmapattranibhāḥ kecid uttiṣṭhanti ghanāghanāḥ ।
kecit puravarākārāḥ kecit parvatasaṃnibhāḥ ।।
kūṭāgāranibhāś cānye kecit sthalanibhā ghanāḥ ।
mahākāyā mahārāvā pūrayanti nabhastalam ।।
varṣantas te mahāsārās tam agnim atibhairavam ।
śamayanty akhilaṃ viprās trailokyāntaravistṛtam ।।
naṣṭe cāgnau śataṃ te api varṣāṇām adhikaṃ ghanāḥ ।
plāvayanto jagat sarvaṃ varṣanti munisattamāḥ ।।
dhārābhir akṣamātrābhiḥ plāvayitvākhilāṃ bhuvam ।
bhuvo lokaṃ tathaivordhvaṃ plāvayanti divaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
andhakārīkṛte loke naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame ।
varṣanti te mahāmeghā varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
saptarṣisthānam ākramya sthite ambhasi dvijottamāḥ ।
ekārṇavaṃ bhavaty etat trailokyam akhilaṃ tataḥ ।।
atha niḥśvāsajo viṣṇor vāyus tāñ jaladāṃs tataḥ ।
nāśaṃ nayati bho viprā varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam ।।
sarvabhūtamayo acintyo bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ ।
anādir ādir viśvasya pītvā vāyum aśeṣataḥ ।।
ekārṇave tatas tasmiñ śeṣaśayyāsthitaḥ prabhuḥ ।
brahmarūpadharaḥ śete bhagavān ādikṛd dhariḥ ।।
janalokagataiḥ siddhaiḥ sanakādyair abhiṣṭutaḥ ।
brahmalokagataiś caiva cintyamāno mumukṣubhiḥ ।।
ātmamāyāmayīṃ divyāṃ yoganidrāṃ samāsthitaḥ ।
ātmānaṃ vāsudevākhyaṃ cintayan parameśvaraḥ ।।
eṣa naimittiko nāma viprendrāḥ pratisaṃcaraḥ ।
nimittaṃ tatra yac chete brahmarūpadharo hariḥ ।।
yadā jāgarti sarvātmā sa tadā ceṣṭate jagat ।
nimīlaty etad akhilaṃ māyāśayyāśaye acyute ।।
padmayoner dinaṃ yat tu caturyugasahasravat ।
ekārṇavakṛte loke tāvatī rātrir ucyate ।।
tataḥ prabuddho rātryante punaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ karoty ajaḥ ।
brahmasvarūpadhṛg viṣṇur yathā vaḥ kathitaṃ purā ।।
ity eṣa kalpasaṃhāro antarapralayo dvijāḥ ।
naimittiko vaḥ kathitaḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ prākṛtaṃ param ।।
avṛṣṭyagnyādibhiḥ samyak kṛte śayyālaye dvijāḥ ।
samasteṣv eva lokeṣu pātāleṣv akhileṣu ca ।।
mahadāder vikārasya viśeṣāt tatra saṃkṣaye ।
kṛṣṇecchākārite tasmin pravṛtte pratisaṃcare ।।
āpo grasanti vai pūrvaṃ bhūmer gandhādikaṃ guṇam ।
āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ pralayāya prakalpate ।।
pranaṣṭe gandhatanmātre bhavaty urvī jalātmikā ।
āpas tadā pravṛttās tu vegavatyo mahāsvanāḥ ।।
sarvam āpūrayantīdaṃ tiṣṭhanti vicaranti ca ।
salilenaivormimatā lokālokaḥ samantataḥ ।।
apām api guṇo yas tu jyotiṣā pīyate tu saḥ ।
naśyanty āpaḥ sutaptāś ca rasatanmātrasaṃkṣayāt ।।
tataś cāpo amṛtarasā jyotiṣṭvaṃ prāpnuvanti vai ।
agnyavasthe tu salile tejasā sarvato vṛte ।।
sa cāgniḥ sarvato vyāpya ādatte taj jalaṃ tadā ।
sarvam āpūryato cābhis tadā jagad idaṃ śanaiḥ ।।
arcibhiḥ saṃtate tasmiṃs tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā ।
jyotiṣo api paraṃ rūpaṃ vāyur atti prabhākaram ।।
pralīne ca tatas tasmin vāyubhūte akhilātmake ।
pranaṣṭe rūpatanmātre kṛtarūpo vibhāvasuḥ ।।
praśāmyati tadā jyotir vāyur dodhūyate mahān ।
nirāloke tadā loke vāyusaṃsthe ca tejasi ।।
tataḥ pralayam āsādya vāyusaṃbhavam ātmanaḥ ।
ūrdhvaṃ ca vāyus tiryak ca dodhavīti diśo daśa ।।
vāyos tv api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate tataḥ ।
praśāmyati tadā vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhaty anāvṛtam ।।
arūpam arasasparśam agandhavad amūrtimat ।
sarvam āpūrayac caiva sumahat tat prakāśate ।।
parimaṇḍalatas tat tu ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam ।
śabdamātraṃ tathākāśaṃ sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati ।।
tataḥ śabdaguṇaṃ tasya bhūtādir grasate punaḥ ।
bhūtendriyeṣu yugapad bhūtādau saṃsthiteṣu vai ।।
abhimānātmako hy eṣa bhūtādis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ ।
bhūtādiṃ grasate cāpi mahābuddhir vicakṣaṇā ।।
urvī mahāṃś ca jagataḥ prānte antar bāhyatas tathā ।
evaṃ sapta mahābuddhiḥ kramāt prakṛtayas tathā ।।
pratyāhārais tu tāḥ sarvāḥ praviśanti parasparam ।
yenedam āvṛtaṃ sarvam aṇḍam apsu pralīyate ।।
saptadvīpasamudrāntaṃ saptalokaṃ saparvatam ।
udakāvaraṇaṃ hy atra jyotiṣā pīyate tu tat ।।
jyotir vāyau layaṃ yāti yāty ākāśe samīraṇaḥ ।
ākāśaṃ caiva bhūtādir grasate taṃ tathā mahān ।।
mahāntam ebhiḥ sahitaṃ prakṛtir grasate dvijāḥ ।
guṇasāmyam anudriktam anyūnaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ ।।
procyate prakṛtir hetuḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ param ।
ity eṣā prakṛtiḥ sarvā vyaktāvyaktasvarūpiṇī ।।
vyaktasvarūpam avyakte tasyāṃ viprāḥ pralīyate ।
ekaḥ śuddho akṣaro nityaḥ sarvavyāpī tathā punaḥ ।।
so apy aṃśaḥ sarvabhūtasya dvijendrāḥ paramātmanaḥ ।
naśyanti sarvā yatrāpi nāmajātyādikalpanāḥ ।।
sattāmātrātmake jñeye jñānātmany ātmanaḥ pare ।
sa brahma tat paraṃ dhāma paramātmā pareśvaraḥ ।।
sa viṣṇuḥ sarvam evedaṃ yato nāvartate punaḥ ।
prakṛtir yā mayākhyātā vyaktāvyaktasvarūpiṇī ।।
puruṣaś cāpy ubhāv etau līyete paramātmani ।
paramātmā ca sarveṣām ādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ ।।
viṣṇunāmnā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate ।
pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam ।।
tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ puruṣair yajñamūrtiḥ sa ijyate ।
ṛgyajuḥsāmabhir mārgaiḥ pravṛttair ijyate hy asau ।।
yajñeśvaro yajñapumān puruṣaiḥ puruṣottamaḥ ।
jñānātmā jñānayogena jñānamūrtiḥ sa ijyate ।।
nivṛttair yogamārgaiś ca viṣṇur muktiphalapradaḥ ।
hrasvadīrghaplutair yat tu kiṃcid vastv abhidhīyate ।।
yac ca vācām aviṣayas tat sarvaṃ viṣṇur avyayaḥ ।
vyaktaḥ sa evam avyaktaḥ sa eva puruṣo avyayaḥ ।।
paramātmā ca viśvātmā viśvarūpadharo hariḥ ।
vyaktāvyaktātmikā tasmin prakṛtiḥ sā vilīyate ।।
puruṣaś cāpi bho viprā yas tad avyākṛtātmani ।
dviparārdhātmakaḥ kālaḥ kathito yo mayā dvijāḥ ।।
tad ahas tasya viprendrā viṣṇor īśasya kathyate ।
vyakte tu prakṛtau līne prakṛtyāṃ puruṣe tathā ।।
tatrāsthite niśā tasya tatpramāṇā tapodhanāḥ ।
naivāhas tasya ca niśā nityasya paramātmanaḥ ।।
upacārāt tathāpy etat tasyeśasya tu kathyate ।
ity eṣa muniśārdūlāḥ kathitaḥ prākṛto layaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
ādhyātmikādi bho viprā jñātvā tāpatrayaṃ budhaḥ ।
utpannajñānavairāgyaḥ prāpnoty ātyantikaṃ layam ।।
ādhyātmiko api dvividhaḥ śārīro mānasas tathā ।
śārīro bahubhir bhedair bhidyate śrūyatāṃ ca saḥ ।।
śirorogapratiśyāya- jvaraśūlabhagaṃdaraiḥ ।
gulmārśaḥśvayathuśvāsa- cchardyādibhir anekadhā ।।
tathākṣirogātīsāra- kuṣṭhāṅgāmayasaṃjñakaiḥ ।
bhidyate dehajas tāpo mānasaṃ śrotum arhatha ।।
kāmakrodhabhayadveṣa- lobhamohaviṣādajaḥ ।
śokāsūyāvamānerṣyā- mātsaryābhibhavas tathā ।।
mānaso api dvijaśreṣṭhās tāpo bhavati naikadhā ।
ity evamādibhir bhedais tāpo hy ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
mṛgapakṣimanuṣyādyaiḥ piśācoragarākṣasaiḥ ।
sarīsṛpādyaiś ca nṛṇāṃ janyate cādhibhautikaḥ ।।
śītoṣṇavātavarṣāmbu- vaidyutādisamudbhavaḥ ।
tāpo dvijavaraśreṣṭhāḥ kathyate cādhidaivikaḥ ।।
garbhajanmajarājñāna- mṛtyunārakajaṃ tathā ।
duḥkhaṃ sahasraśo bhedair bhidyate munisattamāḥ ।।
sukumāratanur garbhe jantur bahumalāvṛte ।
ulbasaṃveṣṭito bhagna- pṛṣṭhagrīvāsthisaṃhatiḥ ।।
atyamlakaṭutīkṣṇoṣṇa- lavaṇair mātṛbhojanaiḥ ।
atitāpibhir atyarthaṃ bādhyamāno ativedanaḥ ।।
prasāraṇākuñcanādau nāgānāṃ prabhur ātmanaḥ ।
śakṛnmūtramahāpaṅka- śāyī sarvatra pīḍitaḥ ।।
nirucchvāsaḥ sacaitanyaḥ smarañ janmaśatāny atha ।
āste garbhe atiduḥkhena nijakarmanibandhanaḥ ।।
jāyamānaḥ purīṣāsṛṅ- mūtraśukrāvilānanaḥ ।
prājāpatyena vātena pīḍyamānāsthibandhanaḥ ।।
adhomukhas taiḥ kriyate prabalaiḥ sūtimārutaiḥ ।
kleśair niṣkrāntim āpnoti jaṭharān mātur āturaḥ ।।
mūrchām avāpya mahatīṃ saṃspṛṣṭo bāhyavāyunā ।
vijñānabhraṃśam āpnoti jātas tu munisattamāḥ ।।
kaṇṭakair iva tunnāṅgaḥ krakacair iva dāritaḥ ।
pūtivraṇān nipatito dharaṇyāṃ krimiko yathā ।।
kaṇḍūyane api cāśaktaḥ parivarte apy anīśvaraḥ ।
stanapānādikāhāram avāpnoti parecchayā ।।
aśucisrastare suptaḥ kīṭadaṃśādibhis tathā ।
bhakṣyamāṇo api naivaiṣāṃ samartho vinivāraṇe ।।
janmaduḥkhāny anekāni janmano anantarāṇi ca ।
bālabhāve yadāpnoti ādhibhūtādikāni ca ।।
ajñānatamasā channo mūḍhāntaḥkaraṇo naraḥ ।
na jānāti kutaḥ ko ahaṃ kutra gantā kimātmakaḥ ।।
kena bandhena baddho ahaṃ kāraṇaṃ kim akāraṇam ।
kiṃ kāryaṃ kim akāryaṃ vā kiṃ vācyaṃ kiṃ na cocyate ।।
ko dharmaḥ kaś ca vādharmaḥ kasmin varteta vai katham ।
kiṃ kartavyam akartavyaṃ kiṃ vā kiṃ guṇadoṣavat ।।
evaṃ paśusamair mūḍhair ajñānaprabhavaṃ mahat ।
avāpyate narair duḥkhaṃ śiśnodaraparāyaṇaiḥ ।।
ajñānaṃ tāmaso bhāvaḥ kāryārambhapravṛttayaḥ ।
ajñānināṃ pravartante karmalopas tato dvijāḥ ।।
narakaṃ karmaṇāṃ lopāt phalam āhur maharṣayaḥ ।
tasmād ajñānināṃ duḥkham iha cāmutra cottamam ।।
jarājarjaradehaś ca śithilāvayavaḥ pumān ।
vicalacchīrṇadaśano valisnāyuśirāvṛtaḥ ।।
dūrapranaṣṭanayano vyomāntargatatārakaḥ ।
nāsāvivaraniryāta- romapuñjaś caladvapuḥ ।।
prakaṭībhūtasarvāsthir natapṛṣṭhāsthisaṃhatiḥ ।
utsannajaṭharāgnitvād alpāhāro alpaceṣṭitaḥ ।।
kṛcchracaṅkramaṇotthāna- śayanāsanaceṣṭitaḥ ।
mandībhavacchrotranetra- galallālāvilānanaḥ ।।
anāyattaiḥ samastaiś ca karaṇair maraṇonmukhaḥ ।
tatkṣaṇe apy anubhūtānām asmartākhilavastunām ।।
sakṛd uccārite vākye samudbhūtamahāśramaḥ ।
śvāsakāsāmayāyāsa- samudbhūtaprajāgaraḥ ।।
anyenotthāpyate anyena tathā saṃveśyate jarī ।
bhṛtyātmaputradārāṇām apamānaparākṛtaḥ ।।
prakṣīṇākhilaśaucaś ca vihārāhārasaṃspṛhaḥ ।
hāsyaḥ parijanasyāpi nirviṇṇāśeṣabāndhavaḥ ।।
anubhūtam ivānyasmiñ janmany ātmaviceṣṭitam ।
saṃsmaran yauvane dīrghaṃ niśvasity atitāpitaḥ ।।
evamādīni duḥkhāni jarāyām anubhūya ca ।
maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni prāpnoti śṛṇu tāny api ।।
ślathagrīvāṅghrihasto atha prāpto vepathunā naraḥ ।
muhur glāniparaś cāsau muhur jñānabalānvitaḥ ।।
hiraṇyadhānyatanaya- bhāryābhṛtyagṛhādiṣu ।
ete kathaṃ bhaviṣyantīty atīva mamatākulaḥ ।।
marmavidbhir mahārogaiḥ krakacair iva dāruṇaiḥ ।
śarair ivāntakasyograiś chidyamānāsthibandhanaḥ ।।
parivartamānatārākṣi hastapādaṃ muhuḥ kṣipan ।
saṃśuṣyamāṇatālvoṣṭha- kaṇṭho ghuraghurāyate ।।
niruddhakaṇṭhadeśo api udānaśvāsapīḍitaḥ ।
tāpena mahatā vyāptas tṛṣā vyāptas tathā kṣudhā ।।
kleśād utkrāntim āpnoti yāmyakiṃkarapīḍitaḥ ।
tataś ca yātanādehaṃ kleśena pratipadyate ।।
etāny anyāni cogrāṇi duḥkhāni maraṇe nṛṇām ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ narake yāni prāpyante puruṣair mṛtaiḥ ।।
yāmyakiṃkarapāśādi- grahaṇaṃ daṇḍatāḍanam ।
yamasya darśanaṃ cogram ugramārgavilokanam ।।
karambhavālukāvahni- yantraśastrādibhīṣaṇe ।
pratyekaṃ yātanāyāś ca yātanādi dvijottamāḥ ।।
krakacaiḥ pīḍyamānānāṃ mṛṣāyāṃ cāpi dhmāpyatām ।
kuṭhāraiḥ pāṭyamānānāṃ bhūmau cāpi nikhanyatām ।।
śūleṣv āropyamāṇānāṃ vyāghravaktre praveśyatām ।
gṛdhraiḥ saṃbhakṣyamāṇānāṃ dvīpibhiś copabhujyatām ।।
kvathyatāṃ tailamadhye ca klidyatāṃ kṣārakardame ।
uccān nipātyamānānāṃ kṣipyatāṃ kṣepayantrakaiḥ ।।
narake yāni duḥkhāni pāpahetūdbhavāni vai ।
prāpyante nārakair viprās teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate ।।
na kevalaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhā narake duḥkhapaddhatiḥ ।
svarge api pātabhītasya kṣayiṣṇor nāsti nirvṛtiḥ ।।
punaś ca garbho bhavati jāyate ca punar naraḥ ।
garbhe vilīyate bhūyo jāyamāno astam eti ca ।।
jātamātraś ca mriyate bālabhāve ca yauvane ।
yad yat prītikaraṃ puṃsāṃ vastu viprāḥ prajāyate ।।
tad eva duḥkhavṛkṣasya bījatvam upagacchati ।
kalatraputramitrādi- gṛhakṣetradhanādikaiḥ ।।
kriyate na tathā bhūri sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ yathāsukham ।
iti saṃsāraduḥkhārka- tāpatāpitacetasām ।।
vimuktipādapacchāyām ṛte kutra sukhaṃ nṛṇām ।
tad asya trividhasyāpi duḥkhajātasya paṇḍitaiḥ ।।
garbhajanmajarādyeṣu sthāneṣu prabhaviṣyataḥ ।
nirastātiśayāhlādaṃ sukhabhāvaikalakṣaṇam ।।
bheṣajaṃ bhagavatprāptir ekā cātyantikī matā ।
tasmāt tatprāptaye yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ paṇḍitair naraiḥ ।।
tatprāptihetur jñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
āgamotthaṃ vivekāc ca dvidhā jñānaṃ tathocyate ।।
śabdabrahmāgamamayaṃ paraṃ brahma vivekajam ।
andhaṃ tama ivājñānaṃ dīpavac cendriyodbhavam ।।
yathā sūryas tathā jñānaṃ yad vai viprā vivekajam ।
manur apy āha vedārthaṃ smṛtvā yan munisattamāḥ ।।
tad etac chrūyatām atra saṃbandhe gadato mama ।
dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat ।।
śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati ।
dve vidye vai veditavye iti cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ ।।
parayā hy akṣaraprāptir ṛgvedādimayāparā ।
yat tad avyaktam ajaram acintyam ajam avyayam ।।
anirdeśyam arūpaṃ ca pāṇipādādyasaṃyutam ।
vittaṃ sarvagataṃ nityaṃ bhūtayonim akāraṇam ।।
vyāpyaṃ vyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ tad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ ।
tad brahma paramaṃ dhāma tad dheyaṃ mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ ।।
śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam ।
utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim ।।
vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti ।
jñānaśaktibalaiśvarya- vīryatejāṃsy aśeṣataḥ ।।
bhagavacchabdavācyāni vinā heyair guṇādibhiḥ ।
sarvāṇi tatra bhūtāni nivasanti parātmani ।।
bhūteṣu ca sa sarvātmā vāsudevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ ।
uvācedaṃ maharṣibhyaḥ purā pṛṣṭaḥ prajāpatiḥ ।।
nāmavyākhyām anantasya vāsudevasya tattvataḥ ।
bhūteṣu vasate yo antar vasanty atra ca tāni yat ।
dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevas tataḥ prabhuḥ ।।
sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtir guṇāṃś ca 
doṣāṃś ca sarvān saguṇo hy atītaḥ 
atītasarvāvaraṇo akhilātmā 
tenāvṛtaṃ yad bhuvanāntarālam 
samastakalyāṇaguṇātmako hi 
svaśaktileśādṛtabhūtasargaḥ 
icchāgṛhītābhimatorudehaḥ 
saṃsādhitāśeṣajagaddhito asau 
tejobalaiśvaryamahāvarodhaḥ 
svavīryaśaktyādiguṇaikarāśiḥ 
paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra 
kleśādayaḥ santi parāpareśe 
sa īśvaro vyaṣṭisamaṣṭirūpo 
avyaktasvarūpaḥ prakaṭasvarūpaḥ 
sarveśvaraḥ sarvadṛk sarvavettā 
samastaśaktiḥ parameśvarākhyaḥ 
saṃjñāyate yena tad astadoṣaṃ 
śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalam ekarūpam 
saṃdṛśyate vāpy atha gamyate vā 
taj jñānam ajñānam ato anyad uktam 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
idānīṃ brūhi yogaṃ ca duḥkhasaṃyogabheṣajam ।
yaṃ viditvāvyayaṃ tatra yuñjāmaḥ puruṣottamam ।।
śrutvā sa vacanaṃ teṣāṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā ।
abravīt paramaprīto yogī yogavidāṃ varaḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
yogaṃ vakṣyāmi bho viprāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ bhavanāśanam ।
yam abhyasyāpnuyād yogī mokṣaṃ paramadurlabham ।।
śrutvādau yogaśāstrāṇi gurum ārādhya bhaktitaḥ ।
itihāsaṃ purāṇaṃ ca vedāṃś caiva vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
āhāraṃ yogadoṣāṃś ca deśakālaṃ ca buddhimān ।
jñātvā samabhyased yogaṃ nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ ।।
bhuñjan saktuṃ yavāgūṃ ca takramūlaphalaṃ payaḥ ।
yāvakaṃ kaṇapiṇyākam āhāraṃ yogasādhanam ।।
na manovikale dhmāte na śrānte kṣudhite tathā ।
na dvaṃdve na ca śīte ca na coṣṇe nānilātmake ।।
saśabde na jalābhyāse jīrṇagoṣṭhe catuṣpathe ।
sarīsṛpe śmaśāne ca na nadyante agnisaṃnidhau ।।
na caitye na ca valmīke sabhaye kūpasaṃnidhau ।
na śuṣkaparṇanicaye yogaṃ yuñjīta karhicit ।।
deśān etān anādṛtya mūḍhatvād yo yunakti vai ।
pravakṣye tasya ye doṣā jāyante vighnakārakāḥ ।।
bādhiryaṃ jaḍatā lopaḥ smṛter mūkatvam andhatā ।
jvaraś ca jāyate sadyas tadvad ajñānasaṃbhavaḥ ।।
tasmāt sarvātmanā kāryā rakṣā yogavidā sadā ।
dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ śarīraṃ sādhanaṃ yataḥ ।।
āśrame vijane guhye niḥśabde nirbhaye nage ।
śūnyāgāre śucau ramye caikānte devatālaye ।।
rajanyāḥ paścime yāme pūrve ca susamāhitaḥ ।
pūrvāhṇe madhyame cāhni yuktāhāro jitendriyaḥ ।।
āsīnaḥ prāṅmukho ramya āsane sukhaniścale ।
nātinīce na cocchrite niḥspṛhaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ ।।
yuktanidro jitakrodhaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ ।
sarvadvaṃdvasaho dhīraḥ samakāyāṅghrimastakaḥ ।।
nābhau nidhāya hastau dvau śāntaḥ padmāsane sthitaḥ ।
saṃsthāpya dṛṣṭiṃ nāsāgre prāṇān āyamya vāgyataḥ ।।
samāhṛtyendriyagrāmaṃ manasā hṛdaye muniḥ ।
praṇavaṃ dīrgham udyamya saṃvṛtāsyaḥ suniścalaḥ ।।
rajasā tamaso vṛttiṃ sattvena rajasas tathā ।
saṃchādya nirmale śānte sthitaḥ saṃvṛtalocanaḥ ।।
hṛtpadmakoṭare līnaṃ sarvavyāpi nirañjanam ।
yuñjīta satataṃ yogī muktidaṃ puruṣottamam ।।
karaṇendriyabhūtāni kṣetrajñe prathamaṃ nyaset ।
kṣetrajñaś ca pare yojyas tato yuñjati yogavit ।।
mano yasyāntam abhyeti paramātmani cañcalam ।
saṃtyajya viṣayāṃs tasya yogasiddhiḥ prakāśitā ।।
yadā nirviṣayaṃ cittaṃ pare brahmaṇi līyate ।
samādhau yogayuktasya tadābhyeti paraṃ padam ।।
asaṃsaktaṃ yadā cittaṃ yoginaḥ sarvakarmasu ।
bhavaty ānandam āsādya tadā nirvāṇam ṛcchati ।।
śuddhaṃ dhāmatrayātītaṃ turyākhyaṃ puruṣottamam ।
prāpya yogabalād yogī mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyaḥ sarvatra priyadarśanaḥ ।
sarvatrānityabuddhis tu yogī mucyeta nānyathā ।।
indriyāṇi na seveta vairāgyeṇa ca yogavit ।
sadā cābhyāsayogena mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
na ca padmāsanād yogo na nāsāgranirīkṣaṇāt ।
manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogo yoga ucyate ।।
evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhā yogaḥ prokto vimuktidaḥ ।
saṃsāramokṣahetuś ca kim anyac chrotum icchatha ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
śrutvā te vacanaṃ tasya sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan ।
vyāsaṃ praśasya saṃpūjya punaḥ praṣṭuṃ samudyatāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
tava vaktrābdhisaṃbhūtam amṛtaṃ vāṅmayaṃ mune ।
pibatāṃ no dvijaśreṣṭha na tṛptir iha dṛśyate ।।
tasmād yogaṃ mune brūhi vistareṇa vimuktidam ।
sāṃkhyaṃ ca dvipadāṃ śreṣṭha śrotum icchāmahe vayam ।।
prajñāvāñ śrotriyo yajvā khyātaḥ prājño anasūyakaḥ ।
satyadharmamatir brahman kathaṃ brahmādhigacchati ।।
tapasā brahmacaryeṇa sarvatyāgena medhayā ।
sāṃkhye vā yadi vā yoga etat pṛṣṭo vadasva naḥ ।।
manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca yathaikāgryam avāpyate ।
yenopāyena puruṣas tat tvaṃ vyākhyātum arhasi ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
nānyatra jñānatapasor nānyatrendriyanigrahāt ।
nānyatra sarvasaṃtyāgāt siddhiṃ vindati kaścana ।।
mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi pūrvasṛṣṭiḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ ।
bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prāṇabhṛdgrāme niviṣṭāni śarīriṣu ।।
bhūmer deho jalāt sneho jyotiṣaś cakṣuṣī smṛte ।
prāṇāpānāśrayo vāyuḥ koṣṭhāākāśaṃ śarīriṇām ।।
krāntau viṣṇur bale śakraḥ koṣṭhe agnir bhoktum icchati ।
karṇayoḥ pradiśaḥ śrotre jihvāyāṃ vāk sarasvatī ।।
karṇau tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī ।
daśa tānīndriyoktāni dvārāṇy āhārasiddhaye ।।
śabdasparśau tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca pañcamam ।
indriyārthān pṛthag vidyād indriyebhyas tu nityadā ।।
indriyāṇi mano yuṅkte avaśyān iva rājinaḥ ।
manaś cāpi sadā yuṅkte bhūtātmā hṛdayāśritaḥ ।।
indriyāṇāṃ tathaivaiṣāṃ sarveṣām īśvaraṃ manaḥ ।
niyame ca visarge ca bhūtātmā manasas tathā ।।
indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca svabhāvaś cetanā manaḥ ।
prāṇāpānau ca jīvaś ca nityaṃ deheṣu dehinām ।।
āśrayo nāsti sattvasya guṇaśabdo na cetanāḥ ।
sattvaṃ hi tejaḥ sṛjati na guṇān vai kathaṃcana ।।
evaṃ saptadaśaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ ।
manīṣī manasā viprāḥ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani ।।
na hy ayaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛśyo na ca sarvair apīndriyaiḥ ।
manasā tu pradīptena mahān ātmā prakāśate ।।
aśabdasparśarūpaṃ tac cārasāgandham avyayam ।
aśarīraṃ śarīre sve nirīkṣeta nirindriyam ।।
avyaktaṃ sarvadeheṣu martyeṣu paramārcitam ।
yo anupaśyati sa pretya kalpate brahmabhūyataḥ ।।
vidyāvinayasaṃpanna- brāhmaṇe gavi hastini ।
śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ ।।
sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu jaṅgameṣu dhruveṣu ca ।
vasaty eko mahān ātmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatam ।।
sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani ।
yadā paśyati bhūtātmā brahma saṃpadyate tadā ।।
yāvān ātmani vedātmā tāvān ātmā parātmani ।
ya evaṃ satataṃ veda so amṛtatvāya kalpate ।।
sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya sarvabhūtahitasya ca ।
devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ ।।
śakuntānām ivākāśe matsyānām iva codake ।
yathā gatir na dṛśyeta tathā jñānavidāṃ gatiḥ ।।
kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni sarvāṇy evātmanātmani ।
yasmiṃs tu pacyate kālas tan na vedeha kaścana ।।
na tad ūrdhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādho na ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
na madhye pratigṛhṇīte naiva kiṃcin na kaścana ।।
sarve tatsthā ime lokā bāhyam eṣāṃ na kiṃcana ।
yady apy agre samāgacched yathā bāṇo guṇacyutaḥ ।।
naivāntaṃ kāraṇasyeyād yady api syān manojavaḥ ।
tasmāt sūkṣmataraṃ nāsti nāsti sthūlataraṃ tathā ।।
sarvataḥpāṇipādaṃ tat sarvatokṣiśiromukham ।
sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati ।।
tad evāṇor aṇutaraṃ tan mahadbhyo mahattaram ।
tad antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate ।।
akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva dvedhā bhāvo ayam ātmanaḥ ।
kṣaraḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu divyaṃ tv amṛtam akṣaram ।।
navadvāraṃ puraṃ kṛtvā haṃso hi niyato vaśī ।
īdṛśaḥ sarvabhūtasya sthāvarasya carasya ca ।।
hānenābhivikalpānāṃ narāṇāṃ saṃcayena ca ।
śarīrāṇām ajasyāhur haṃsatvaṃ pāradarśinaḥ ।।
haṃsoktaṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva kūṭasthaṃ yat tad akṣaram ।
tad vidvān akṣaraṃ prāpya jahāti prāṇajanmanī ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
bhavatāṃ pṛcchatāṃ viprā yathāvad iha tattvataḥ ।
sāṃkhyaṃ jñānena saṃyuktaṃ yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā ।।
yogakṛtyaṃ tu bho viprāḥ kīrtayiṣyāmy ataḥ param ।
ekatvaṃ buddhimanasor indriyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ ।।
ātmano vyāpino jñānaṃ jñānam etad anuttamam ।
tad etad upaśāntena dāntenādhyātmaśīlinā ।।
ātmārāmeṇa buddhena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā ।
yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ ।।
kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam ।
krodhaṃ śamena jayati kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt ।।
sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchettum arhati ।
dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā ।।
cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca karmaṇā ।
apramādād bhayaṃ jahyād dambhaṃ prājñopasevanāt ।।
evam etān yogadoṣāñ jayen nityam atandritaḥ ।
agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cātha devatāḥ praṇamet sadā ।।
varjayed uddhatāṃ vācaṃ hiṃsāyuktāṃ manonugām ।
brahmatejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ jagat ।।
etasya bhūtabhūtasya dṛṣṭaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam ।
dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā ।।
śaucaṃ caivātmanaḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahaḥ ।
etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānaṃ cāpakarṣati ।।
samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu labhyālabhyena vartayan ।
dhūtapāpmā tu tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ ।।
kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā niṣeved brahmaṇaḥ padam ।
manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca kṛtvaikāgryaṃ samāhitaḥ ।।
pūrvarātre parārdhe ca dhārayen mana ātmanaḥ ।
jantoḥ pañcendriyasyāsya yady ekaṃ klinnam indriyam ।।
tato asya sravati prajñā gireḥ pādād ivodakam ।
manasaḥ pūrvam ādadyāt kūrmāṇām iva matsyahā ।।
tataḥ śrotraṃ tataś cakṣur jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca yogavit ।
tata etāni saṃyamya manasi sthāpayed yadi ।।
tathaivāpohya saṃkalpān mano hy ātmani dhārayet ।
pañcendriyāṇi manasi hṛdi saṃsthāpayed yadi ।।
yadaitāny avatiṣṭhante manaḥṣaṣṭhāni cātmani ।
prasīdanti ca saṃsthāyāṃ tadā brahma prakāśate ।।
vidhūma iva dīptārcir āditya iva dīptimān ।
vaidyuto agnir ivākāśe paśyanty ātmānam ātmani ।।
sarvaṃ tatra tu sarvatra vyāpakatvāc ca dṛśyate ।
taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
dhṛtimanto mahāprājñāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ ।
evaṃ parimitaṃ kālam ācaran saṃśitavrataḥ ।।
āsīno hi rahasy eko gacched akṣarasāmyatām ।
pramoho bhrama āvarto ghrāṇaṃ śravaṇadarśane ।।
adbhutāni rasaḥ sparśaḥ śītoṣṇamārutākṛtiḥ ।
pratibhān upasargāś ca pratisaṃgṛhya yogataḥ ।।
tāṃs tattvavid anādṛtya sāmyenaiva nivartayet ।
kuryāt paricayaṃ yoge trailokye niyato muniḥ ।।
giriśṛṅge tathā caitye vṛkṣamūleṣu yojayet ।
saṃniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ koṣṭhe bhāṇḍamanā iva ।।
ekāgraṃ cintayen nityaṃ yogān nodvijate manaḥ ।
yenopāyena śakyeta niyantuṃ cañcalaṃ manaḥ ।।
tatra yukto niṣeveta na caiva vicalet tataḥ ।
śūnyāgārāṇi caikāgro nivāsārtham upakramet ।।
nātivrajet paraṃ vācā karmaṇā manasāpi vā ।
upekṣako yatāhāro labdhālabdhasamo bhavet ।।
yaś cainam abhinandeta yaś cainam abhivādayet ।
samas tayoś cāpy ubhayor nābhidhyāyec chubhāśubham ।।
na prahṛṣyeta lābheṣu nālābheṣu ca cintayet ।
samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sadharmā mātariśvanaḥ ।।
evaṃ svasthātmanaḥ sādhoḥ sarvatra samadarśinaḥ ।
ṣaṇ māsān nityayuktasya śabdabrahmābhivartate ।।
vedanārtān parān dṛṣṭvā samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ ।
evaṃ tu nirato mārgaṃ viramen na vimohitaḥ ।।
api varṇāvakṛṣṭas tu nārī vā dharmakāṅkṣiṇī ।
tāv apy etena mārgeṇa gacchetāṃ paramāṃ gatim ।।
ajaṃ purāṇam ajaraṃ sanātanaṃ 
yam indriyātigam agocaraṃ dvijāḥ 
avekṣya cemāṃ parameṣṭhisāmyatāṃ 
prayānty anāvṛttigatiṃ manīṣiṇaḥ 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
yady evaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca ।
kāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti kāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇā ।।
etad vai śrotum icchāmas tad bhavān prabravītu naḥ ।
etad anyonyavairūpyaṃ vartate pratikūlataḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlā yat pṛcchadhvaṃ samāsataḥ ।
karmavidyāmayau cobhau vyākhyāsyāmi kṣarākṣarau ।।
yāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti yāṃ gacchanti ca karmaṇā ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ sāṃprataṃ viprā gahanaṃ hy etad uttaram ।।
asti dharma iti yuktaṃ nāsti tatraiva yo vadet ।
yakṣasya sādṛśyam idaṃ yakṣasyedaṃ bhaved atha ।।
dvāv imāv atha panthānau yatra vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ ।
pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo nivṛtto vā vibhāṣitaḥ ।।
karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā ca vimucyate ।
tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥ ।।
karmaṇā jāyate pretya mūrtimān ṣoḍaśātmakaḥ ।
vidyayā jāyate nityam avyaktaṃ hy akṣarātmakam ।।
karma tv eke praśaṃsanti svalpabuddhiratā narāḥ ।
tena te dehajālena ramayanta upāsate ।।
ye tu buddhiṃ parāṃ prāptā dharmanaipuṇyadarśinaḥ ।
na te karma praśaṃsanti kūpaṃ nadyāṃ pibann iva ।।
karmaṇāṃ phalam āpnoti sukhaduḥkhe bhavābhavau ।
vidyayā tad avāpnoti yatra gatvā na śocati ।।
na mriyate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na jāyate ।
na jīryate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na vardhate ।।
yatra tad brahma paramam avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam ।
avyākṛtam anāyāmam amṛtaṃ cādhiyogavit ।।
dvaṃdvair na yatra bādhyante mānasena ca karmaṇā ।
samāḥ sarvatra maitrāś ca sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ ।।
vidyāmayo anyaḥ puruṣo dvijāḥ karmamayo aparaḥ ।
viprāś candrasamasparśaḥ sūkṣmayā kalayā sthitaḥ ।।
tad etad ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vistareṇānugīyate ।
na vaktuṃ śakyate draṣṭuṃ cakratantum ivāmbare ।।
ekādaśavikārātmā kalāsaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtaḥ ।
mūrtimān iti taṃ vidyād viprāḥ karmaguṇātmakam ।।
devo yaḥ saṃśritas tasmin buddhīndur iva puṣkare ।
kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīyān nityaṃ yogajitātmakam ।।
tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca jñeyaṃ jīvaguṇātmakam ।
jīvam ātmaguṇaṃ vidyād ātmānaṃ paramātmanaḥ ।।
sacetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti 
sa ceṣṭate jīvaguṇaṃ ca sarvam 
tataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti 
prakalpayanto bhuvanāni sapta 
{vyāsa uvāca 
prakṛtyās tu vikārā ye kṣetrajñās te pariśrutāḥ ।
te cainaṃ na prajānanti na jānāti sa tān api ।।
taiś caiva kurute kāryaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭhair ihendriyaiḥ ।
sudāntair iva saṃyantā dṛḍhaḥ paramavājibhiḥ ।।
indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥ ।
manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ ।।
mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt parato amṛtam ।
amṛtān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā paramā gatiḥ ।।
evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhātmā na prakāśate ।
dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ ।।
antarātmani saṃlīya manaḥṣaṣṭhāni medhayā ।
indriyair indriyārthāṃś ca bahucittam acintayan ।।
dhyāne api paramaṃ kṛtvā vidyāsaṃpāditaṃ manaḥ ।
anīśvaraḥ praśāntātmā tato gacchet paraṃ padam ।।
indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ vaśyātmā calitasmṛtiḥ ।
ātmanaḥ saṃpradānena martyo mṛtyum upāśnute ।।
vihatya sarvasaṃkalpān sattve cittaṃ niveśayet ।
sattve cittaṃ samāveśya tataḥ kālañjaro bhavet ।।
cittaprasādena yatir jahātīha śubhāśubham ।
prasannātmātmani sthitvā sukham atyantam aśnute ।।
lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā svapne sukhaṃ bhavet ।
nirvāte vā yathā dīpo dīpyamāno na kampate ।।
evaṃ pūrvāpare rātre yuñjann ātmānam ātmanā ।
laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā paśyaty ātmānam ātmani ।।
rahasyaṃ sarvavedānām anaitihyam anāgamam ।
ātmapratyāyakaṃ śāstram idaṃ putrānuśāsanam ।।
dharmākhyāneṣu sarveṣu satyākhyāneṣu yad vasu ।
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi nirmathyāmṛtam uddhṛtam ।।
navanītaṃ yathā dadhnaḥ kāṣṭhād agnir yathaiva ca ।
tathaiva viduṣāṃ jñānaṃ muktihetoḥ samuddhṛtam ।।
snātakānām idaṃ śāstraṃ vācyaṃ putrānuśāsanam ।
tad idaṃ nāpraśāntāya nādāntāya tapasvine ।।
nāvedaviduṣe vācyaṃ tathā nānugatāya ca ।
nāsūyakāyānṛjave na cānirdiṣṭakāriṇe ।।
na tarkaśāstradagdhāya tathaiva piśunāya ca ।
ślāghine ślāghanīyāya praśāntāya tapasvine ।।
idaṃ priyāya putrāya śiṣyāyānugatāya tu ।
rahasyadharmaṃ vaktavyaṃ nānyasmai tu kathaṃcana ।।
yad apy asya mahīṃ dadyād ratnapūrṇām imāṃ naraḥ ।
idam eva tataḥ śreya iti manyeta tattvavit ।।
ato guhyatarārthaṃ tad adhyātmam atimānuṣam ।
yat tan maharṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu ca gīyate ।।
tad yuṣmabhyaṃ prayacchāmi yan māṃ pṛcchata sattamāḥ ।
yan me manasi varteta yas tu vo hṛdi saṃśayaḥ ।
śrutaṃ bhavadbhis tat sarvaṃ kim anyat kathayāmi vaḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
adhyātmaṃ vistareṇeha punar eva vadasva naḥ ।
yad adhyātmaṃ yathā vidmo bhagavann ṛṣisattama ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
adhyātmaṃ yad idaṃ viprāḥ puruṣasyeha paṭhyate ।
yuṣmabhyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi tasya vyākhyāvadhāryatām ।।
bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva ca ।
mahābhūtāni yaś caiva sarvabhūteṣu bhūtakṛt ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
ākāraṃ tu bhaved yasya yasmin dehaṃ na paśyati ।
ākāśādyaṃ śarīreṣu kathaṃ tad upavarṇayet ।
indriyāṇāṃ guṇāḥ kecit kathaṃ tān upalakṣayet ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
etad vo varṇayiṣyāmi yathāvad anudarśanam ।
śṛṇudhvaṃ tad ihaikāgryā yathātattvaṃ yathā ca tat ।।
śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśalakṣaṇam ।
prāṇaś ceṣṭā tathā sparśa ete vāyuguṇās trayaḥ ।।
rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca tridhā jyotir vidhīyate ।
raso atha rasanaṃ svedo guṇās tv ete trayo ambhasām ।।
ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca bhūmer ete guṇās trayaḥ ।
etāvān indriyagrāmo vyākhyātaḥ pāñcabhautikaḥ ।।
vāyoḥ sparśo raso adbhyaś ca jyotiṣo rūpam ucyate ।
ākāśaprabhavaḥ śabdo gandho bhūmiguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
mano buddhiḥ svabhāvaś ca guṇā ete svayonijāḥ ।
te guṇān ativartante guṇebhyaḥ paramā matāḥ ।।
yathā kūrma ivāṅgāni prasārya saṃniyacchati ।
evam evendriyagrāmaṃ buddhiśreṣṭho niyacchati ।।
yad ūrdhvaṃ pādatalayor avārkordhvaṃ ca paśyati ।
etasminn eva kṛtye sā vartate buddhir uttamā ।।
guṇais tu nīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy api ।
manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi buddhyā bhāvāt kuto guṇāḥ ।।
indriyāṇi naraiḥ pañca ṣaṣṭhaṃ tan mana ucyate ।
saptamīṃ buddhim evāhuḥ kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi cāṣṭamam ।।
cakṣur ālokanāyaiva saṃśayaṃ kurute manaḥ ।
buddhir adhyavasānāya sākṣī kṣetrajña ucyate ।।
rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca traya ete svayonijāḥ ।
samāḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tān guṇān upalakṣayet ।।
tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kiṃcid ātmani lakṣayet ।
praśāntam iva saṃyuktaṃ sattvaṃ tad upadhārayet ।।
yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet ।
pravṛttaṃ raja ity evaṃ tatra cāpy upalakṣayet ।।
yat tu saṃmohasaṃyuktam avyaktaṃ viṣamaṃ bhavet ।
apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet ।।
praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaṃ svāmyaṃ svasthātmacittatā ।
akasmād yadi vā kasmād vadanti sāttvikān guṇān ।।
abhimāno mṛṣāvādo lobho mohas tathākṣamā ।
liṅgāni rajasas tāni vartante hetutattvataḥ ।।
tathā mohaḥ pramādaś ca tandrī nidrāprabodhitā ।
kathaṃcid abhivartante vijñeyās tāmasā guṇāḥ ।।
manaḥ prasṛjate bhāvaṃ buddhir adhyavasāyinī ।
hṛdayaṃ priyam eveha trividhā karmacodanā ।।
indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ ।
manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā paraḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
buddhir ātmā manuṣyasya buddhir evātmanāyikā ।
yadā vikurute bhāvaṃ tadā bhavati sā manaḥ ।।
indriyāṇāṃ pṛthagbhāvād buddhir vikurute hy anu ।
śṛṇvatī bhavati śrotraṃ spṛśatī sparśa ucyate ।।
paśyantī ca bhaved dṛṣṭī rasantī rasanā bhavet ।
jighrantī bhavati ghrāṇaṃ buddhir vikurute pṛthak ।।
indriyāṇi tu tāny āhus teṣāṃ vṛttyā vitiṣṭhati ।
tiṣṭhati puruṣe buddhir buddhibhāvavyavasthitā ।।
kadācil labhate prītiṃ kadācid api śocati ।
na sukhena ca duḥkhena kadācid iha muhyate ।।
svayaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān ativartate ।
saritāṃ sāgaro bhartā mahāvelām ivormimān ।।
yadā prārthayate kiṃcit tadā bhavati sā manaḥ ।
adhiṣṭhāne ca vai buddhyā pṛthag etāni saṃsmaret ।।
indriyāṇi ca medhyāni vicetavyāni kṛtsnaśaḥ ।
sarvāṇy evānupūrveṇa yad yadā ca vidhīyate ।।
avibhāgamanā buddhir bhāvo manasi vartate ।
pravartamānas tu rajaḥ sattvam apy ativartate ।।
ye vai bhāvena vartante sarveṣv eteṣu te triṣu ।
anv arthān saṃpravartante rathanemim arā iva ।।
pradīpārthaṃ manaḥ kuryād indriyair buddhisattamaiḥ ।
niścaradbhir yathāyogam udāsīnair yadṛcchayā ।।
evaṃsvabhāvam evedam iti buddhvā na muhyati ।
aśocan saṃprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥ ।।
na hy ātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyaiḥ kāmagocaraiḥ ।
pravartamānair anekair durdharair akṛtātmabhiḥ ।।
teṣāṃ tu manasā raśmīn yadā samyaṅ niyacchati ।
tadā prakāśate śyātmā dīpadīptā yathākṛtiḥ ।।
sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ tamasy upagate yathā ।
prakāśaṃ bhavate sarvaṃ tathaivam upadhāryatām ।।
yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī na lipyati jale caran ।
vimuktātmā tathā yogī guṇadoṣair na lipyate ।।
evam eva kṛtaprajño na doṣair viṣayāṃś caran ।
asajjamānaḥ sarveṣu na kathaṃcit pralipyate ।।
tyaktvā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma ratir yasya sadātmani ।
sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya guṇasaṅgena sajjataḥ ।।
svayam ātmā prasavati guṇeṣv api kadācana ।
na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ guṇān veda sa sarvadā ।।
paridadhyād guṇānāṃ sa draṣṭā caiva yathātatham ।
sattvakṣetrajñayor evam antaraṃ lakṣayen naraḥ ।।
sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇān ।
pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyaitau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā ।।
yathāśmanā hiraṇyasya saṃprayuktau tathaiva tau ।
maśakodumbarau vāpi saṃprayuktau yathā saha ।।
iṣikā vā yathā muñje pṛthak ca saha caiva ha ।
tathaiva sahitāv etau anyonyasmin pratiṣṭhitau ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sṛjate tu guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñas tv adhitiṣṭhati ।
guṇān vikriyataḥ sarvān udāsīnavad īśvaraḥ ।।
svabhāvayuktaṃ tat sarvaṃ yad imān sṛjate guṇān ।
ūrṇanābhir yathā sūtraṃ sṛjate tad guṇāṃs tathā ।।
pravṛttā na nivartante pravṛttir nopalabhyate ।
evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttim iti cāpare ।।
ubhayaṃ saṃpradhāryaitad adhyavasyed yathāmati ।
anenaiva vidhānena bhaved vai saṃśayo mahān ।।
anādinidhano hy ātmā taṃ buddhvā viharen naraḥ ।
akrudhyann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥ ।।
ity evaṃ hṛdaye sarvo buddhicintāmayaṃ dṛḍham ।
anityaṃ sukham āsīnam aśocyaṃ chinnasaṃśayaḥ ।।
tarayet pracyutāṃ pṛthvīṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ ।
avagāhya ca vidvāṃso viprā lolam imaṃ tathā ।।
na tu tapyati vai vidvān sthale carati tattvavit ।
evaṃ vicintya cātmānaṃ kevalaṃ jñānam ātmanaḥ ।।
tāṃ tu buddhvā naraḥ sargaṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim ।
samaceṣṭaś ca vai samyag labhate śamam uttamam ।।
etad dvijanmasāmagryaṃ brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ ।
ātmajñānasamasneha- paryāptaṃ tatparāyaṇam ।।
tattvaṃ buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam ।
vijñāyaitad vimucyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
na bhavati viduṣāṃ mahad bhayaṃ 
yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ paratra 
nahi gatir adhikāsti kasyacid 
bhavati hi yā viduṣaḥ sanātanī 
loke mātaram asūyate naras 
tatra devam anirīkṣya śocate 
tatra cet kuśalo na śocate 
ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ kṛtākṛtam 
yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ 
tac ca nindayati yat purā kṛtam 
yat priyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ na vāpriyaṃ 
tasya taj janayatīha kurvataḥ 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
yasmād dharmāt paro dharmo vidyate neha kaścana ।
yo viśiṣṭaś ca bhūtebhyas tad bhavān prabravītu naḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
dharmaṃ ca saṃpravakṣyāmi purāṇam ṛṣibhiḥ stutam ।
viśiṣṭaṃ sarvadharmebhyaḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
indriyāṇi pramāthīni buddhyā saṃyamya tattvataḥ ।
sarvataḥ prasṛtānīha pitā bālān ivātmajān ।।
manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ cāpy aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ ।
vijñeyaḥ sarvadharmebhyaḥ sa dharmaḥ para ucyate ।।
tāni sarvāṇi saṃdhāya manaḥṣaṣṭhāni medhayā ।
ātmatṛptaḥ sa evāsīd bahucintyam acintayan ।।
gocarebhyo nivṛttāni yadā sthāsyanti veśmani ।
tadā caivātmanātmānaṃ paraṃ drakṣyatha śāśvatam ।।
sarvātmānaṃ mahātmānaṃ vidhūmam iva pāvakam ।
prapaśyanti mahātmānaṃ brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
yathā puṣpaphalopeto bahuśākho mahādrumaḥ ।
ātmano nābhijānīte kva me puṣpaṃ kva me phalam ।।
evam ātmā na jānīte kva gamiṣye kuto anv aham ।
anyo hy asyāntarātmāsti yaḥ sarvam anupaśyati ।।
jñānadīpena dīptena paśyaty ātmānam ātmanā ।
dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā yūyaṃ virāgā bhavata dvijāḥ ।।
vimuktāḥ sarvapāpebhyo muktatvaca ivoragāḥ ।
parāṃ buddhim avāpyehāpy acintā vigatajvarāḥ ।।
sarvataḥsrotasaṃ ghorāṃ nadīṃ lokapravāhiṇīm ।
pañcendriyagrāhavatīṃ manaḥsaṃkalparodhasam ।।
lobhamohatṛṇacchannāṃ kāmakrodhasarīsṛpām ।
satyatīrthānṛtakṣobhāṃ krodhapaṅkāṃ saridvarām ।।
avyaktaprabhavāṃ śīghrāṃ kāmakrodhasamākulām ।
prataradhvaṃ nadīṃ buddhyā dustarām akṛtātmabhiḥ ।।
saṃsārasāgaragamāṃ yonipātāladustarām ।
ātmajanmodbhavāṃ tāṃ tu jihvāvartadurāsadām ।।
yāṃ taranti kṛtaprajñā dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥ ।
tāṃ tīrṇaḥ sarvato mukto vidhūtātmātmavāñ śuciḥ ।।
uttamāṃ buddhim āsthāya brahmabhūyāya kalpate ।
uttīrṇaḥ sarvasaṃkleśān prasannātmā vikalmaṣaḥ ।।
bhūyiṣṭhānīva bhūtāni sarvasthānān nirīkṣya ca ।
akrudhyann aprasīdaṃś ca nanṛśaṃsamatis tathā ।।
tato drakṣyatha sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayam ।
etad dhi sarvadharmebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ menire budhāḥ ।।
dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhā munayaḥ satyadarśinaḥ ।
ātmāno vyāpino viprā iti putrānuśāsanam ।।
prayatāya pravaktavyaṃ hitāyānugatāya ca ।
ātmajñānam idaṃ guhyaṃ sarvaguhyatamaṃ mahat ।।
abravaṃ yad ahaṃ viprā ātmasākṣikam añjasā ।
naiva strī na pumān evaṃ na caivedaṃ napuṃsakam ।।
aduḥkham asukhaṃ brahma bhūtabhavyabhavātmakam ।
naitaj jñātvā pumān strī vā punarbhavam avāpnuyāt ।।
yathā matāni sarvāṇi tathaitāni yathā tathā ।
kathitāni mayā viprā bhavanti na bhavanti ca ।।
tatprītiyuktena guṇānvitena 
putreṇa satputradayānvitena 
dṛṣṭvā hitaṃ prītamanā yadarthaṃ 
brūyāt sutasyeha yad uktam etat 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
mokṣaḥ pitāmahenokta upāyān nānupāyataḥ ।
tam upāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śrotum icchāmahe mune ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
asmāsu tan mahāprājñā yuktaṃ nipuṇadarśanam ।
yadupāyena sarvārthān mṛgayadhvaṃ sadānaghāḥ ।।
ghaṭopakaraṇe buddhir ghaṭotpattau na sā matā ।
evaṃ dharmādyupāyārthe nānyadharmeṣu kāraṇam ।।
pūrve samudre yaḥ panthā na sa gacchati paścimam ।
ekaḥ panthā hi mokṣasya tac chṛṇudhvaṃ mamānaghāḥ ।।
kṣamayā krodham ucchindyāt kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt ।
sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchettum arhati ।।
apramādād bhayaṃ rakṣed rakṣet kṣetraṃ ca saṃvidam ।
icchāṃ dveṣaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dhairyeṇa vinivartayet ।।
nidrāṃ ca pratibhāṃ caiva jñānābhyāsena tattvavit ।
upadravāṃs tathā yogī hitajīrṇamitāśanāt ।।
lobhaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃtoṣād viṣayāṃs tattvadarśanāt ।
anukrośād adharmaṃ ca jayed dharmam upekṣayā ।।
āyatyā ca jayed āśāṃ sāmarthyaṃ saṅgavarjanāt ।
anityatvena ca snehaṃ kṣudhāṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥ ।।
kāruṇyenātmanātmānaṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca paritoṣataḥ ।
utthānena jayet tandrāṃ vitarkaṃ niścayāj jayet ।।
maunena bahubhāṣāṃ ca śauryeṇa ca bhayaṃ jayet ।
yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā tāṃ yacchej jñānacakṣuṣā ।।
jñānam ātmā mahān yacchet taṃ yacchec chāntir ātmanaḥ ।
tad etad upaśāntena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā ।।
yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ ।
kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam ।।
parityajya niṣeveta yathāvad yogasādhanāt ।
dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā ।।
śaucam ācārataḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ ।
etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānam upahanti ca ।।
sidhyanti cāsya saṃkalpā vijñānaṃ ca pravartate ।
dhūtapāpaḥ sa tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ ।।
kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā nirviśed brahmaṇaḥ padam ।
amūḍhatvam asaṅgitvaṃ kāmakrodhavivarjanam ।।
adainyam anudīrṇatvam anudvego hy avasthitiḥ ।
eṣa mārgo hi mokṣasya prasanno vimalaḥ śuciḥ ।
tathā vākkāyamanasāṃ niyamāḥ kāmato avyayāḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
sāṃkhyaṃ yogasya no vipra viśeṣaṃ vaktum arhasi ।
tava dharmajña sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ munisattama ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
sāṃkhyāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ praśaṃsanti yogān yogaviduttamāḥ ।
vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śreṣṭhaiḥ svapakṣodbhavanāya vai ।।
anīśvaraḥ kathaṃ mucyed ity evaṃ munisattamāḥ ।
vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yogaṃ samyaṅ manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
vadanti kāraṇaṃ vedaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ samyag dvijātayaḥ ।
vijñāyeha gatīḥ sarvā virakto viṣayeṣu yaḥ ।।
ūrdhvaṃ sa dehāt suvyaktaṃ vimucyed iti nānyathā ।
etad āhur mahāprājñāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ vai mokṣadarśanam ।।
svapakṣe kāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ samarthaṃ vacanaṃ hitam ।
śiṣṭānāṃ hi mataṃ grāhyaṃ bhavadbhiḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataiḥ ।।
pratyakṣaṃ hetavo yogāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śāstraviniścayāḥ ।
ubhe caite mate tattve samavete dvijottamāḥ ।।
ubhe caite mate jñāte munīndrāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmate ।
anuṣṭhite yathāśāstraṃ nayetāṃ paramāṃ gatim ।।
tulyaṃ śaucaṃ tayor yuktaṃ dayā bhūteṣu cānaghāḥ ।
vratānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ tulyaṃ darśanaṃ tv asamaṃ tayoḥ ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
yadi tulyaṃ vrataṃ śaucaṃ dayā cātra mahāmune ।
tulyaṃ taddarśanaṃ kasmāt tan no brūhi dvijottama ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
rāgaṃ mohaṃ tathā snehaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca kevalam ।
yogāsthiroditān doṣān pañcaitān prāpnuvanti tān ।।
yathā vānimiṣāḥ sthūlaṃ jālaṃ chittvā punar jalam ।
prāpnuvanti tathā yogāt tat padaṃ vītakalmaṣāḥ ।।
tathaiva vāgurāṃ chittvā balavanto yathā mṛgāḥ ।
prāpnuyur vimalaṃ mārgaṃ vimuktāḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ ।।
lobhajāni tathā viprā bandhanāni balānvitaḥ ।
chittvā yogāt paraṃ mārgaṃ gacchanti vimalaṃ śubham ।।
acalās tv āvilā viprā vāgurāsu tathāpare ।
vinaśyanti na saṃdehas tadvad yogabalād ṛte ।।
balahīnāś ca viprendrā yathā jālaṃ gatā dvijāḥ ।
bandhaṃ na gacchanty anaghā yogās te tu sudurlabhāḥ ।।
yathā ca śakunāḥ sūkṣmaṃ prāpya jālam ariṃdamāḥ ।
tatrāśaktā vipadyante mucyante tu balānvitāḥ ।।
karmajair bandhanair baddhās tadvad yogaparā dvijāḥ ।
abalā na vimucyante mucyante ca balānvitāḥ ।।
alpakaś ca yathā viprā vahniḥ śāmyati durbalaḥ ।
ākrānta indhanaiḥ sthūlais tadvad yogabalaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
sa eva ca tadā viprā vahnir jātabalaḥ punaḥ ।
samīraṇagataḥ kṛtsnāṃ dahet kṣipraṃ mahīm imām ।।
tattvajñānabalo yogī dīptatejā mahābalaḥ ।
antakāla ivādityaḥ kṛtsnaṃ saṃśoṣayej jagat ।।
durbalaś ca yathā viprāḥ srotasā hriyate naraḥ ।
balahīnas tathā yogī viṣayair hriyate ca saḥ ।।
tad eva tu yathā sroto viṣkambhayati vāraṇaḥ ।
tadvad yogabalaṃ labdhvā na bhaved viṣayair hṛtaḥ ।।
viśanti vā vaśād vātha yogād yogabalānvitāḥ ।
prajāpatīn manūn sarvān mahābhūtāni ceśvarāḥ ।।
na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho na mṛtyur bhīmavikramaḥ ।
viśante tad dvijāḥ sarve yogasyāmitatejasaḥ ।।
ātmanāṃ ca sahasrāṇi bahūni dvijasattamāḥ ।
yogaṃ kuryād balaṃ prāpya taiś ca sarvair mahīṃ caret ।।
prāpnuyād viṣayān kaścit punaś cograṃ tapaś caret ।
saṃkṣipyec ca punar viprāḥ sūryas tejoguṇān iva ।।
balasthasya hi yogasya balārthaṃ munisattamāḥ ।
vimokṣaprabhavaṃ viṣṇum upapannam asaṃśayam ।।
balāni yogaproktāni mayaitāni dvijottamāḥ ।
nidarśanārthaṃ sūkṣmāṇi vakṣyāmi ca punar dvijāḥ ।।
ātmanaś ca samādhāne dhāraṇāṃ prati vā dvijāḥ ।
nidarśanāni sūkṣmāṇi śṛṇudhvaṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
apramatto yathā dhanvī lakṣyaṃ hanti samāhitaḥ ।
yuktaḥ samyak tathā yogī mokṣaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam ।।
snehapātre yathā pūrṇe mana ādhāya niścalam ।
puruṣo yukta ārohet sopānaṃ yuktamānasaḥ ।।
muktas tathāyam ātmānaṃ yogaṃ tadvat suniścalam ।
karoty amalam ātmānaṃ bhāskaropamadarśane ।।
yathā ca nāvaṃ viprendrāḥ karṇadhāraḥ samāhitaḥ ।
mahārṇavagatāṃ śīghraṃ nayed viprāṃs tu pattanam ।।
tadvad ātmasamādhānaṃ yukto yogena yogavit ।
durgamaṃ sthānam āpnoti hitvā deham imaṃ dvijāḥ ।।
sārathiś ca yathā yuktaḥ sadaśvān susamāhitaḥ ।
deśam iṣṭaṃ nayaty āśu dhanvinaṃ puruṣarṣabham ।।
tathaiva ca dvijā yogī dhāraṇāsu samāhitaḥ ।
prāpnoty āśu paraṃ sthānaṃ lakṣyamukta ivāśugaḥ ।।
āviśyātmani cātmānaṃ yo avatiṣṭhati so acalaḥ ।
pāśaṃ hatveva mīnānāṃ padam āpnoti so ajaram ।।
nābhyāṃ śīrṣe ca kukṣau ca hṛdi vakṣasi pārśvayoḥ ।
darśane śravaṇe vāpi ghrāṇe cāmitavikramaḥ ।।
sthāneṣv eteṣu yo yogī mahāvratasamāhitaḥ ।
ātmanā sūkṣmam ātmānaṃ yuṅkte samyag dvijottamāḥ ।।
suśīghram acalaprakhyaṃ karma dagdhvā śubhāśubham ।
uttamaṃ yogam āsthāya yadīcchati vimucyate ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
āhārān kīdṛśān kṛtvā kāni jitvā ca sattama ।
yogī balam avāpnoti tad bhavān vaktum arhati ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
kaṇānāṃ bhakṣaṇe yuktaḥ piṇyākasya ca bho dvijāḥ ।
snehānāṃ varjane yukto yogī balam avāpnuyāt ।।
bhuñjāno yāvakaṃ rūkṣaṃ dīrghakālaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
ekāhārī viśuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt ।।
pakṣān māsān ṛtūṃś citrān saṃcaraṃś ca guhās tathā ।
apaḥ pītvā payomiśrā yogī balam avāpnuyāt ।।
akhaṇḍam api vā māsaṃ satataṃ munisattamāḥ ।
upoṣya samyak śuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt ।।
kāmaṃ jitvā tathā krodhaṃ śītoṣṇaṃ varṣam eva ca ।
bhayaṃ śokaṃ tathā svāpaṃ pauruṣān viṣayāṃs tathā ।।
aratiṃ durjayāṃ caiva ghorāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca bho dvijāḥ ।
sparśaṃ nidrāṃ tathā tandrāṃ durjayāṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
dīpayanti mahātmānaṃ sūkṣmam ātmānam ātmanā ।
vītarāgā mahāprājñā dhyānādhyayanasaṃpadā ।।
durgas tv eṣa mataḥ panthā brāhmaṇānāṃ vipaścitām ।
yaḥ kaścid vrajati kṣipraṃ kṣemeṇa munipuṃgavāḥ ।।
yathā kaścid vanaṃ ghoraṃ bahusarpasarīsṛpam ।
śvabhravat toyahīnaṃ ca durgamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam ।।
abhaktam aṭavīprāyaṃ dāvadagdhamahīruham ।
panthānaṃ taskarākīrṇaṃ kṣemeṇābhipatet tathā ।।
yogamārgaṃ samāsādya yaḥ kaścid vrajate dvijaḥ ।
kṣemeṇoparamen mārgād bahudoṣo api saṃmataḥ ।।
āstheyaṃ kṣuradhārāsu niśitāsu dvijottamāḥ ।
dhāraṇā sā tu yogasya durgeyam akṛtātmabhiḥ ।।
viṣamā dhāraṇā viprā yānti vai na śubhāṃ gatim ।
netṛhīnā yathā nāvaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ tu vai dvijāḥ ।।
yas tu tiṣṭhati yogādhau dhāraṇāsu yathāvidhi ।
maraṇaṃ janmaduḥkhitvaṃ sukhitvaṃ sa viśiṣyate ।।
nānāśāstreṣu niyataṃ nānāmuniniṣevitam ।
paraṃ yogasya panthānaṃ niścitaṃ taṃ dvijātiṣu ।।
paraṃ hi tad brahmamayaṃ munīndrā 
brahmāṇam īśaṃ varadaṃ ca viṣṇum 
bhavaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca mahānubhāvaṃ 
yad brahmaputrān sumahānubhāvān 
tamaś ca kaṣṭaṃ sumahad rajaś ca 
sattvaṃ ca śuddhaṃ prakṛtiṃ parāṃ ca 
siddhiṃ ca devīṃ varuṇasya patnīṃ 
tejaś ca kṛtsnaṃ sumahac ca dhairyam 
tārādhipaṃ khe vimalaṃ sutāraṃ 
viśvāṃś ca devān uragān pitṝṃś ca 
śailāṃś ca kṛtsnān udadhīṃś ca vācalān 
nadīś ca sarvāḥ sanagāṃś ca nāgān 
sādhyāṃs tathā yakṣagaṇān diśaś ca 
gandharvasiddhān puruṣān striyaś ca 
parasparaṃ prāpya mahān mahātmā 
viśeta yogī nacirād vimuktaḥ 
kathā ca yā vipravarāḥ prasaktā 
daive mahāvīryamatau śubheyam 
yogān sa sarvān anubhūya martyā 
nārāyaṇaṃ taṃ drutam āpnuvanti 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
samyak kriyeyaṃ viprendra varṇitā śiṣṭasaṃmatā ।
yogamārgo yathānyāyaṃ śiṣyāyeha hitaiṣiṇā ।।
sāṃkhye tv idānīṃ dharmasya vidhiṃ prabrūhi tattvataḥ ।
triṣu lokeṣu yaj jñānaṃ sarvaṃ tad viditaṃ hi te ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
śṛṇudhvaṃ munayaḥ sarvam ākhyānaṃ viditātmanām ।
vihitaṃ yatibhir vṛddhaiḥ kapilādibhir īśvaraiḥ ।।
yasmin suvibhramāḥ kecid dṛśyante munisattamāḥ ।
guṇāś ca yasmin bahavo doṣahāniś ca kevalā ।।
jñānena parisaṃkhyāya sadoṣān viṣayān dvijāḥ ।
mānuṣān durjayān kṛtsnān paiśācān viṣayāṃs tathā ।।
viṣayān auragāñ jñātvā gandharvaviṣayāṃs tathā ।
pitṝṇāṃ viṣayāñ jñātvā tiryaktvaṃ caratāṃ dvijāḥ ।।
suparṇaviṣayāñ jñātvā marutāṃ viṣayāṃs tathā ।
maharṣiviṣayāṃś caiva rājarṣiviṣayāṃs tathā ।।
āsurān viṣayāñ jñātvā vaiśvadevāṃs tathaiva ca ।
devarṣiviṣayāñ jñātvā yogānām api vai parān ।।
viṣayāṃś ca pramāṇasya brahmaṇo viṣayāṃs tathā ।
āyuṣaś ca paraṃ kālaṃ lokair vijñāya tattvataḥ ।।
sukhasya ca paraṃ kālaṃ vijñāya munisattamāḥ ।
prāptakāle ca yad duḥkhaṃ patatāṃ viṣayaiṣiṇām ।।
tiryaktve patatāṃ viprās tathaiva narakeṣu yat ।
svargasya ca guṇāñ jñātvā doṣān sarvāṃś ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
vedavāde ca ye doṣā guṇā ye cāpi vaidikāḥ ।
jñānayoge ca ye doṣā jñānayoge ca ye guṇāḥ ।।
sāṃkhyajñāne ca ye doṣāṃs tathaiva ca guṇā dvijāḥ ।
sattvaṃ daśaguṇaṃ jñātvā rajo navaguṇaṃ tathā ।।
tamaś cāṣṭaguṇaṃ jñātvā buddhiṃ saptaguṇāṃ tathā ।
ṣaḍguṇaṃ ca nabho jñātvā tamaś ca triguṇaṃ mahat ।।
dviguṇaṃ ca rajo jñātvā sattvaṃ caikaguṇaṃ punaḥ ।
mārgaṃ vijñāya tattvena pralayaprekṣaṇena tu ।।
jñānavijñānasaṃpannāḥ kāraṇair bhāvitātmabhiḥ ।
prāpnuvanti śubhaṃ mokṣaṃ sūkṣmā iva nabhaḥ param ।।
rūpeṇa dṛṣṭiṃ saṃyuktāṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhaguṇena ca ।
śabdagrāhyaṃ tathā śrotraṃ jihvāṃ rasaguṇena ca ।।
tvacaṃ sparśaṃ tathā śakyaṃ vāyuṃ caiva tadāśritam ।
mohaṃ tamasi saṃyuktaṃ lobhaṃ moheṣu saṃśritam ।।
viṣṇuṃ krānte bale śakraṃ koṣṭhe saktaṃ tathānalam ।
apsu devīṃ samāyuktām āpas tejasi saṃśritāḥ ।।
tejo vāyau tu saṃyuktaṃ vāyuṃ nabhasi cāśritam ।
nabho mahati saṃyuktaṃ tamo mahasi saṃsthitam ।।
rajaḥ sattvaṃ tathā saktaṃ sattvaṃ saktaṃ tathātmani ।
saktam ātmānam īśe ca deve nārāyaṇe tathā ।।
devaṃ mokṣe ca saṃyuktaṃ tato mokṣaṃ ca na kvacit ।
jñātvā sattvaguṇaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ ।।
svabhāvaṃ bhāvanāṃ caiva jñātvā dehasamāśritām ।
madhyastham iva cātmānaṃ pāpaṃ yasmin na vidyate ।।
dvitīyaṃ karma vai jñātvā viprendrā viṣayaiṣiṇām ।
indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃś ca sarvān ātmani saṃśritān ।।
durlabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya vijñāya śrutipūrvakam ।
prāṇāpānau samānaṃ ca vyānodānau ca tattvataḥ ।।
ādyaṃ caivānilaṃ jñātvā prabhavaṃ cānilaṃ punaḥ ।
saptadhā tāṃs tathā śeṣān saptadhā vidhivat punaḥ ।।
prajāpatīn ṛṣīṃś caiva sargāṃś ca subahūn varān ।
saptarṣīṃś ca bahūñ jñātvā rājarṣīṃś ca paraṃtapān ।।
surarṣīn marutaś cānyān brahmarṣīn sūryasaṃnibhān ।
aiśvaryāc cyāvitān dṛṣṭvā kālena mahatā dvijāḥ ।।
mahatāṃ bhūtasaṃghānāṃ śrutvā nāśaṃ ca bho dvijāḥ ।
gatiṃ vācāṃ śubhāṃ jñātvā arcārhāḥ pāpakarmaṇām ।।
vaitaraṇyāṃ ca yad duḥkhaṃ patitānāṃ yamakṣaye ।
yoniṣu ca vicitrāsu saṃcārān aśubhāṃs tathā ।।
jaṭhare cāśubhe vāsaṃ śoṇitodakabhājane ।
śleṣmamūtrapurīṣe ca tīvragandhasamanvite ।।
śukraśoṇitasaṃghāte majjāsnāyuparigrahe ।
śirāśatasamākīrṇe navadvāre pure atha vai ।।
vijñāya hitam ātmānaṃ yogāṃś ca vividhān dvijāḥ ।
tāmasānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ ramaṇīyānṛtātmanām ।।
sāttvikānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ kutsitaṃ munisattamāḥ ।
garhitaṃ mahatām arthe sāṃkhyānāṃ viditātmanām ।।
upaplavāṃs tathā ghorāñ śaśinas tejasas tathā ।
tārāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca paryayam ।।
dvaṃdvānāṃ viprayogaṃ ca vijñāya kṛpaṇaṃ dvijāḥ ।
anyonyabhakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūtānām api cāśubham ।।
bālye mohaṃ ca vijñāya pakṣadehasya cāśubham ।
rāgaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃprāptaṃ kvacit sattvaṃ samāśritam ।।
sahasreṣu naraḥ kaścin mokṣabuddhiṃ samāśritaḥ ।
durlabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya vijñānaṃ śrutipūrvakam ।।
bahumānam alabdheṣu labdhe madhyasthatāṃ punaḥ ।
viṣayāṇāṃ ca daurātmyaṃ vijñāya ca punar dvijāḥ ।।
gatāsūnāṃ ca sattvānāṃ dehān bhittvā tathā śubhān ।
vāsaṃ kuleṣu jantūnāṃ maraṇāya dhṛtātmanām ।।
sāttvikānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ duḥkhaṃ vijñāya bho dvijāḥ ।
brahmaghnānāṃ gatiṃ jñātvā patitānāṃ sudāruṇām ।।
surāpāne ca saktānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ durātmanām ।
gurudāraprasaktānāṃ gatiṃ vijñāya cāśubhām ।।
jananīṣu ca vartante yena samyag dvijottamāḥ ।
sadevakeṣu lokeṣu yena vartanti mānavāḥ ।।
tena jñānena vijñāya gatiṃ cāśubhakarmaṇām ।
tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca vijñāya ca gatīḥ pṛthak ।।
vedavādāṃs tathā citrān ṛtūnāṃ paryayāṃs tathā ।
kṣayaṃ saṃvatsarāṇāṃ ca māsānāṃ ca kṣayaṃ tathā ।।
pakṣakṣayaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā divasānāṃ ca saṃkṣayam ।
kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca candrasya dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣatas tathā ।।
vṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā samudrāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ teṣāṃ tathā punaḥ ।
kṣayaṃ dhanānāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar vṛddhiṃ tathaiva ca ।।
saṃyogānāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā yugānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ ।
dehavaiklavyatāṃ caiva samyag vijñāya tattvataḥ ।।
ātmadoṣāṃś ca vijñāya sarvān ātmani saṃsthitān ।
svadehād utthitān gandhāṃs tathā vijñāya cāśubhān ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kān utpātabhavān doṣān paśyasi brahmavittama ।
etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
pañca doṣān dvijā dehe pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।
mārgajñāḥ kāpilāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ munisattamāḥ ।।
kāmakrodhau bhayaṃ nidrā pañcamaḥ śvāsa ucyate ।
ete doṣāḥ śarīreṣu dṛśyante sarvadehinām ।।
chindanti kṣamayā krodhaṃ kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt ।
sattvasaṃsevanān nidrām apramādād bhayaṃ tathā ।।
chindanti pañcamaṃ śvāsam alpāhāratayā dvijāḥ ।
guṇān guṇaśatair jñātvā doṣān doṣaśatair api ।।
hetūn hetuśataiś citraiś citrān vijñāya tattvataḥ ।
apāṃ phenopamaṃ lokaṃ viṣṇor māyāśataiḥ kṛtam ।।
citrabhittipratīkāśaṃ nalasāram anarthakam ।
tamaḥsaṃbhramitaṃ dṛṣṭvā varṣabudbudasaṃnibham ।।
nāśaprāyaṃ sukhādhānaṃ nāśottaramahābhayam ।
rajas tamasi saṃmagnaṃ paṅke dvipam ivāvaśam ।।
sāṃkhyā viprā mahāprājñās tyaktvā snehaṃ prajākṛtam ।
jñānajñeyena sāṃkhyena vyāpinā mahatā dvijāḥ ।।
rājasān aśubhān gandhāṃs tāmasāṃś ca tathāvidhān ।
puṇyāṃś ca sāttvikān gandhān sparśajān dehasaṃśritān ।।
chittvātmajñānaśastreṇa tapodaṇḍena sattamāḥ ।
tato duḥkhādikaṃ ghoraṃ cintāśokamahāhradam ।।
vyādhimṛtyumahāghoraṃ mahābhayamahoragam ।
tamaḥkūrmaṃ rajomīnaṃ prajñayā saṃtaranty uta ।।
snehapaṅkaṃ jarādurgaṃ sparśadvīpaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।
karmāgādhaṃ satyatīraṃ sthitaṃ vratamanīṣiṇaḥ ।।
harṣasaṃghamahāvegaṃ nānārasasamākulam ।
nānāprītimahāratnaṃ duḥkhajvarasamīritam ।।
śokatṛṣṇāmahāvartaṃ tīkṣṇavyādhimahārujam ।
asthisaṃghātasaṃghaṭṭaṃ śleṣmayogaṃ dvijottamāḥ ।।
dānamuktākaraṃ ghoraṃ śoṇitodgāravidrumam ।
hasitotkruṣṭanirghoṣaṃ nānājñānasuduṣkaram ।।
rodanāśrumalakṣāraṃ saṅgayogaparāyaṇam ।
pralabdhvā janmaloko yaṃ putrabāndhavapattanam ।।
ahiṃsāsatyamaryādaṃ prāṇayogamayormilam ।
vṛndānugāminaṃ kṣīraṃ sarvabhūtapayodadhim ।।
mokṣadurlabhaviṣayaṃ vāḍavāsukhasāgaram ।
taranti yatayaḥ siddhā jñānayogena cānaghāḥ ।।
tīrtvā ca dustaraṃ janma viśanti vimalaṃ nabhaḥ ।
tatas tān sukṛtīñ jñātvā sūryo vahati raśmibhiḥ ।।
padmatantuvad āviśya pravahan viṣayān dvijāḥ ।
tatra tān pravaho vāyuḥ pratigṛhṇāti cānaghāḥ ।।
vītarāgān yatīn siddhān vīryayuktāṃs tapodhanān ।
sūkṣmaḥ śītaḥ sugandhaś ca sukhasparśaś ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
saptānāṃ marutāṃ śreṣṭho lokān gacchati yaḥ śubhān ।
sa tān vahati viprendrā nabhasaḥ paramāṃ gatim ।।
nabho vahati lokeśān rajasaḥ paramāṃ gatim ।
rajo vahati viprendrāḥ sattvasya paramāṃ gatim ।।
sattvaṃ vahati śuddhātmā paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum ।
prabhur vahati śuddhātmā paramātmānam ātmanā ।।
paramātmānam āsādya tadbhūtā yatayo amalāḥ ।
amṛtatvāya kalpante na nivartanti ca dvijāḥ ।।
paramā sā gatir viprā nirdvaṃdvānāṃ mahātmanām ।
satyārjavaratānāṃ vai sarvabhūtadayāvatām ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
sthānam uttamam āsādya bhagavantaṃ sthiravratāḥ ।
ājanmamaraṇaṃ vā te ramante tatra vā na vā ।।
yad atra tathyaṃ tattvaṃ no yathāvad vaktum arhasi ।
tvadṛte mānavaṃ nānyaṃ praṣṭum arhāma sattama ।।
mokṣadoṣo mahān eṣa prāpya siddhiṃ gatān ṛṣīn ।
yadi tatraiva vijñāne vartante yatayaḥ pare ।।
pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ paśyāma paramaṃ dvija ।
magnasya hi pare jñāne kiṃtu duḥkhāntaraṃ bhavet ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
yathānyāyaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ praśnaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca saṃkaṭaḥ ।
budhānām api saṃmohaḥ praśne asmin munisattamāḥ ।।
atrāpi tattvaṃ paramaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ vacanaṃ mama ।
buddhiś ca paramā yatra kapilānāṃ mahātmanām ।।
indriyāṇy api budhyante svadehaṃ dehināṃ dvijāḥ ।
karaṇāny ātmanas tāni sūkṣmaṃ paśyanti tais tu saḥ ।।
ātmanā viprahīṇāni kāṣṭhakuḍyasamāni tu ।
vinaśyanti na saṃdeho velā iva mahārṇave ।।
indriyaiḥ saha suptasya dehino dvijasattamāḥ ।
sūkṣmaś carati sarvatra nabhasīva samīraṇaḥ ।।
sa paśyati yathānyāyaṃ smṛtvā spṛśati cānaghāḥ ।
budhyamāno yathāpūrvam akhileneha bho dvijāḥ ।।
indriyāṇi ha sarvāṇi sve sve sthāne yathāvidhi ।
anīśatvāt pralīyante sarpā viṣahatā iva ।।
indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ svasthāneṣv eva sarvaśaḥ ।
ākramya gatayaḥ sūkṣmā varaty ātmā na saṃśayaḥ ।।
sattvasya ca guṇān kṛtsnān rajasaś ca guṇān punaḥ ।
guṇāṃś ca tamasaḥ sarvān guṇān buddheś ca sattamāḥ ।।
guṇāṃś ca manasaś cāpi nabhasaś ca guṇāṃs tathā ।
guṇān vāyoś ca sarvajñāḥ snehajāṃś ca guṇān punaḥ ।।
apāṃ guṇās tathā viprāḥ pārthivāṃś ca guṇān api ।
sarvān eva guṇair vyāpya kṣetrajñeṣu dvijottamāḥ ।।
ātmā carati kṣetrajñaḥ karmaṇā ca śubhāśubhe ।
śiṣyā iva mahātmānam indriyāṇi ca taṃ dvijāḥ ।।
prakṛtiṃ cāpy atikramya śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ parāt param ।
nārāyaṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ nirvikāraṃ parāt param ।।
vimuktaṃ sarvapāpebhyaḥ praviṣṭaṃ ca hy anāmayam ।
paramātmānam aguṇaṃ nirvṛtaṃ taṃ ca sattamāḥ ।।
śreṣṭhaṃ tatra mano viprā indriyāṇi ca bho dvijāḥ ।
āgacchanti yathākālaṃ guroḥ saṃdeśakāriṇaḥ ।।
śakyaṃ vālpena kālena śāntiṃ prāptuṃ guṇāṃs tathā ।
evam uktena viprendrāḥ sāṃkhyayogena mokṣiṇīm ।।
sāṃkhyā viprā mahāprājñā gacchanti paramāṃ gatim ।
jñānenānena viprendrās tulyaṃ jñānaṃ na vidyate ।।
atra vaḥ saṃśayo mā bhūj jñānaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ paraṃ matam ।
akṣaraṃ dhruvam evoktaṃ pūrvaṃ brahma sanātanam ।।
anādimadhyanidhanaṃ nirdvaṃdvaṃ kartṛ śāśvatam ।
kūṭasthaṃ caiva nityaṃ ca yad vadanti śamātmakāḥ ।।
yataḥ sarvāḥ pravartante sargapralayavikriyāḥ ।
evaṃ śaṃsanti śāstreṣu pravaktāro maharṣayaḥ ।।
sarve viprāś ca vedāś ca tathā sāmavido janāḥ ।
brahmaṇyaṃ paramaṃ devam anantaṃ paramācyutam ।।
prārthayantaś ca taṃ viprā vadanti guṇabuddhayaḥ ।
samyag uktās tathā yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś cāmitadarśanāḥ ।।
amūrtis tasya viprendrāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ mūrtir iti śrutiḥ ।
abhijñānāni tasyāhur mahānti munisattamāḥ ।।
dvividhāni hi bhūtāni pṛthivyāṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
agamyagamyasaṃjñāni gamyaṃ tatra viśiṣyate ।।
jñānaṃ mahad vai mahataś ca viprā 
vedeṣu sāṃkhyeṣu tathaiva yoge 
yac cāpi dṛṣṭaṃ vidhivat purāṇe 
sāṃkhyāgataṃ tan nikhilaṃ munīndrāḥ 
yac cetihāseṣu mahatsu dṛṣṭaṃ 
yathārthaśāstreṣu viśiṣṭadṛṣṭam 
jñānaṃ ca loke yad ihāsti kiṃcit 
sāṃkhyāgataṃ tac ca mahāmunīndrāḥ 
samastadṛṣṭaṃ paramaṃ balaṃ ca 
jñānaṃ ca mokṣaś ca yathāvad uktam 
tapāṃsi sūkṣmāṇi ca yāni caiva 
sāṃkhye yathāvad vihitāni viprāḥ 
viparyayaṃ tasya hitaṃ sadaiva 
gacchanti sāṃkhyāḥ satataṃ sukhena 
tāṃś cāpi saṃdhārya tataḥ kṛtārthāḥ 
patanti viprāyataneṣu bhūyaḥ 
hitvā ca dehaṃ praviśanti mokṣaṃ 
divaukasaś cāpi ca yogasāṃkhyāḥ 
ato adhikaṃ te abhiratā mahārhe 
sāṃkhye dvijā bho iha śiṣṭajuṣṭe 
teṣāṃ tu tiryaggamanaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ 
nādho gatiḥ pāpakṛtāṃ nivāsaḥ 
na vā pradhānā api te dvijātayo 
ye jñānam etan munayo na saktāḥ 
sāṃkhyaṃ viśālaṃ paramaṃ purāṇaṃ 
mahārṇavaṃ vimalam udārakāntam 
kṛtsnaṃ hi sāṃkhyā munayo mahātma 
nārāyaṇe dhārayatāprameyam 
etan mayoktaṃ paramaṃ hi tattvaṃ 
nārāyaṇād viśvam idaṃ purāṇam 
sa sargakāle ca karoti sargaṃ 
saṃhārakāle ca hareta bhūyaḥ 
{munaya ūcuḥ 
kiṃ tad akṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ ।
kiṃsvit tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmād āvartate punaḥ ।।
akṣarākṣarayor vyaktiṃ pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mahāmune ।
upalabdhuṃ muniśreṣṭha tattvena munipuṃgava ।।
tvaṃ hi jñānavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ procyase vedapāragaiḥ ।
ṛṣibhiś ca mahābhāgair yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ ।।
tad etac chrotum icchāmas tvattaḥ sarvaṃ mahāmate ।
na tṛptim adhigacchāmaḥ śṛṇvanto amṛtam uttamam ।।
{vyāsa uvāca 
atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam ।
vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃvādaṃ karālajanakasya ca ।।
vasiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭham āsīnam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāskaradyutim ।
papraccha janako rājā jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ param ।।
paramātmani kuśalam adhyātmagatiniścayam ।
maitrāvaruṇim āsīnam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ ।।
svacchandaṃ sukṛtaṃ caiva madhuraṃ cāpy anulbaṇam ।
papraccharṣivaraṃ rājā karālajanakaḥ purā ।।
{karālajanaka uvāca 
bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi paraṃ brahma sanātanam ।
yasmin na punarāvṛttiṃ prāpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
yac ca tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yatredaṃ kṣarate jagat ।
yac cākṣaram iti proktaṃ śivaṃ kṣemam anāmayam ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
śrūyatāṃ pṛthivīpāla kṣaratīdaṃ yathā jagat ।
yatra kṣarati pūrveṇa yāvatkālena cāpy atha ।।
yugaṃ dvādaśasāhasryaṃ kalpaṃ viddhi caturyugam ।
daśakalpaśatāvartam ahas tad brāhmam ucyate ।।
rātriś caitāvatī rājan yasyānte pratibudhyate ।
sṛjaty anantakarmāṇi mahāntaṃ bhūtam agrajam ।।
mūrtimantam amūrtātmā viśvaṃ śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ ।
yatrotpattiṃ pravakṣyāmi mūlato nṛpasattama ।।
aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśānaṃ jyotir avyayam ।
sarvataḥpāṇipādāntaṃ sarvatokṣiśiromukham ।।
sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati ।
hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān eṣa buddhir iti smṛtiḥ ।।
mahān iti ca yogeṣu viriñcir iti cāpy atha ।
sāṃkhye ca paṭhyate śāstre nāmabhir bahudhātmakaḥ ।।
vicitrarūpo viśvātmā ekākṣara iti smṛtaḥ ।
dhṛtam ekātmakaṃ yena kṛtsnaṃ trailokyam ātmanā ।।
tathaiva bahurūpatvād viśvarūpa iti śrutaḥ ।
eṣa vai vikriyāpannaḥ sṛjaty ātmānam ātmanā ।।
pradhānaṃ tasya saṃyogād utpannaṃ sumahat puram ।
ahaṃkāraṃ mahātejāḥ prajāpatinamaskṛtam ।।
avyaktād vyaktim āpannaṃ vidyāsargaṃ vadanti tam ।
mahāntaṃ cāpy ahaṃkāram avidyāsarga eva ca ।।
acaraś ca caraś caiva samutpannau tathaikataḥ ।
vidyāvidyeti vikhyāte śrutiśāstrānucintakaiḥ ।।
bhūtasargam ahaṃkārāt tṛtīyaṃ viddhi pārthiva ।
ahaṃkāreṣu nṛpate caturthaṃ viddhi vaikṛtam ।।
vāyur jyotir athākāśam āpo atha pṛthivī tathā ।
śabdasparśau ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca ।।
evaṃ yugapad utpannaṃ daśavargam asaṃśayam ।
pañcamaṃ viddhi rājendra bhautikaṃ sargam arthakṛt ।।
śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇam eva ca pañcamam ।
vāg hastau caiva pādau ca pāyur meḍhraṃ tathaiva ca ।।
buddhīndriyāṇi caitāni tathā karmendriyāṇi ca ।
saṃbhūtānīha yugapan manasā saha pārthiva ।।
eṣā tattvacaturviṃśā sarvākṛtiḥ pravartate ।
yāṃ jñātvā nābhiśocanti brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ ।।
evam etat samutpannaṃ trailokyam idam uttamam ।
veditavyaṃ naraśreṣṭha sadaiva narakārṇave ।।
sayakṣabhūtagandharve sakiṃnaramahorage ।
sacāraṇapiśāce vai sadevarṣiniśācare ।।
sadaṃśakīṭamaśake sapūtikṛmimūṣake ।
śuni śvapāke caiṇeye sacāṇḍāle sapulkase ।।
hastyaśvakharaśārdūle savṛke gavi caiva ha ।
yā ca mūrtiś ca yat kiṃcit sarvatraitan nidarśanam ।।
jale bhuvi tathākāśe nānyatreti viniścayaḥ ।
sthānaṃ dehavatām āsīd ity evam anuśuśruma ।।
kṛtsnam etāvatas tāta kṣarate vyaktasaṃjñakaḥ ।
ahany ahani bhūtātmā yac cākṣara iti smṛtam ।।
tatas tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ kṣaratīdaṃ yathā jagat ।
jagan mohātmakaṃ cāhur avyaktād vyaktasaṃjñakam ।।
mahāṃś caivākṣaro nityam etat kṣaravivarjanam ।
kathitaṃ te mahārāja yasmān nāvartate punaḥ ।।
pañcaviṃśatiko amūrtaḥ sa nityas tattvasaṃjñakaḥ ।
sattvasaṃśrayaṇāt tattvaṃ sattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
yad amūrtiḥ sṛjad vyaktaṃ tan mūrtim adhitiṣṭhati ।
caturviṃśatimo vyakto hy amūrtiḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ ।।
sa eva hṛdi sarvāsu mūrtiṣv ātiṣṭhatātmavān ।
cetayaṃś cetano nityaṃ sarvamūrtir amūrtimān ।।
sargapralayadharmeṇa sa sargapralayātmakaḥ ।
gocare vartate nityaṃ nirguṇo guṇasaṃjñitaḥ ।।
evam eṣa mahātmā ca sargapralayakoṭiśaḥ ।
vikurvāṇaḥ prakṛtimān nābhimanyeta buddhimān ।।
tamaḥsattvarajoyuktas tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu ।
līyate pratibuddhatvād abuddhajanasevanāt ।।
sahavāsanivāsatvād bālo aham iti manyate ।
yo ahaṃ na so aham ity ukto guṇān evānuvartate ।।
tamasā tāmasān bhāvān vividhān pratipadyate ।
rajasā rājasāṃś caiva sāttvikān sattvasaṃśrayāt ।।
śuklalohitakṛṣṇāni rūpāṇy etāni trīṇi tu ।
sarvāṇy etāni rūpāṇi jānīhi prākṛtāni tu ।।
tāmasā nirayaṃ yānti rājasā mānuṣān atha ।
sāttvikā devalokāya gacchanti sukhabhāginaḥ ।।
niṣkevalena pāpena tiryagyonim avāpnuyāt ।
puṇyapāpeṣu mānuṣyaṃ puṇyamātreṇa devatāḥ ।।
evam avyaktaviṣayaṃ mokṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
pañcaviṃśatimo yo ayaṃ jñānād eva pravartate ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
evam apratibuddhatvād abuddham anuvartate ।
dehād dehasahasrāṇi tathā ca na sa bhidyate ।।
tiryagyonisahasreṣu kadācid devatāsv api ।
utpadyati tapoyogād guṇaiḥ saha guṇakṣayāt ।।
manuṣyatvād divaṃ yāti devo mānuṣyam eti ca ।
mānuṣyān nirayasthānam ālayaṃ pratipadyate ।।
koṣakāro yathātmānaṃ kīṭaḥ samabhirundhati ।
sūtratantuguṇair nityaṃ tathāyam aguṇo guṇaiḥ ।।
dvaṃdvam eti ca nirdvaṃdvas tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu ।
śīrṣaroge akṣiroge ca dantaśūle galagrahe ।।
jalodare atisāre ca gaṇḍamālāvicarcike ।
śvitrakuṣṭhe agnidagdhe ca sidhmāpasmārayor api ।।
