yāni cānyāni dvaṃdvāni prākṛtāni śarīriṇām ।
utpadyante vicitrāṇi tāny evātmābhimanyate ।।
abhimānātimānānāṃ tathaiva sukṛtāny api ।
ekavāsāś caturvāsāḥ śāyī nityam adhas tathā ।।
maṇḍūkaśāyī ca tathā vīrāsanagatas tathā ।
vīram āsanam ākāśe tathā śayanam eva ca ।।
iṣṭakāprastare caiva cakrakaprastare tathā ।
bhasmaprastaraśāyī ca bhūmiśayyānulepanaḥ ।।
vīrasthānāmbupāke ca śayanaṃ phalakeṣu ca ।
vividhāsu ca śayyāsu phalagṛhyānvitāsu ca ।।
udyāne khalalagne tu kṣaumakṛṣṇājinānvitaḥ ।
maṇivālaparīdhāno vyāghracarmaparicchadaḥ ।।
siṃhacarmaparīdhānaḥ paṭṭavāsās tathaiva ca ।
phalakaṃ paridhānaś ca tathā kaṭakavastradhṛk ।।
kaṭaikavasanaś caiva cīravāsās tathaiva ca ।
vastrāṇi cānyāni bahūny abhimatya ca buddhimān ।।
bhojanāni vicitrāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca ।
ekarātrāntarāśitvam ekakālikabhojanam ।।
caturthāṣṭamakālaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhakālikam eva ca ।
ṣaḍrātrabhojanaś caiva tathā cāṣṭāhabhojanaḥ ।।
māsopavāsī mūlāśī phalāhāras tathaiva ca ।
vāyubhakṣaś ca piṇyāka- dadhigomayabhojanaḥ ।।
gomūtrabhojanaś caiva kāśapuṣpāśanas tathā ।
śaivālabhojanaś caiva tathā cānyena vartayan ।।
vartayañ śīrṇaparṇaiś ca prakīrṇaphalabhojanaḥ ।
vividhāni ca kṛcchrāṇi sevate siddhikāṅkṣayā ।।
cāndrāyaṇāni vidhival liṅgāni vividhāni ca ।
cāturāśramyayuktāni dharmādharmāśrayāṇy api ।।
upāśrayān apy aparān pākhaṇḍān vividhān api ।
viviktāś ca śilāchāyās tathā prasravaṇāni ca ।।
pulināni viviktāni vividhāni vanāni ca ।
kānaneṣu viviktāś ca śailānāṃ mahatīr guhāḥ ।।
niyamān vividhāṃś cāpi vividhāni tapāṃsi ca ।
yajñāṃś ca vividhākārān vidyāś ca vividhās tathā ।।
vaṇikpathaṃ dvijakṣatra- vaiśyaśūdrāṃs tathaiva ca ।
dānaṃ ca vividhākāraṃ dīnāndhakṛpaṇādiṣu ।।
abhimanyeta saṃdhātuṃ tathaiva vividhān guṇān ।
sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva dharmārthau kāma eva ca ।।
prakṛtyātmānam evātmā evaṃ pravibhajaty uta ।
svāhākāravaṣaṭkārau svadhākāranamaskriye ।।
yajanādhyayane dānaṃ tathaivāhuḥ pratigraham ।
yājanādhyāpane caiva tathānyad api kiṃcana ।।
janmamṛtyuvidhānena tathā viśasanena ca ।
śubhāśubhabhayaṃ sarvam etad āhuḥ sanātanam ।।
prakṛtiḥ kurute devī bhayaṃ pralayam eva ca ।
divasānte guṇān etān atītyaiko avatiṣṭhate ।।
raśmijālam ivādityas tatkālaṃ saṃniyacchati ।
evam evaiṣa tat sarvaṃ krīḍārtham abhimanyate ।।
ātmarūpaguṇān etān vividhān hṛdayapriyān ।
evam etāṃ prakurvāṇaḥ sargapralayadharmiṇīm ।।
kriyāṃ kriyāpathe raktas triguṇas triguṇādhipaḥ ।
kriyākriyāpathopetas tathā tad iti manyate ।।
prakṛtyā sarvam evedaṃ jagad andhīkṛtaṃ vibho ।
rajasā tamasā caiva vyāptaṃ sarvam anekadhā ।।
evaṃ dvaṃdvāny atītāni mama vartanti nityaśaḥ ।
matta etāni jāyante pralaye yānti mām api ।।
nistartavyāṇy athaitāni sarvāṇīti narādhipa ।
manyate pakṣabuddhitvāt tathaiva sukṛtāny api ।।
bhoktavyāni mamaitāni devalokagatena vai ।
ihaiva cainaṃ bhokṣyāmi śubhāśubhaphalodayam ।।
sukham evaṃ tu kartavyaṃ sakṛt kṛtvā sukhaṃ mama ।
yāvad eva tu me saukhyaṃ jātyāṃ jātyāṃ bhaviṣyati ।।
bhaviṣyati na me duḥkhaṃ kṛtenehāpy anantakam ।
sukhaduḥkhaṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ niraye cāpi majjanam ।।
nirayāc cāpi mānuṣyaṃ kālenaiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ ।
manuṣyatvāc ca devatvaṃ devatvāt pauruṣaṃ punaḥ ।।
manuṣyatvāc ca nirayaṃ paryāyeṇopagacchati ।
eṣa evaṃ dvijātīnām ātmā vai sa guṇair vṛtaḥ ।।
tena devamanuṣyeṣu nirayaṃ copapadyate ।
mamatvenāvṛto nityaṃ tatraiva parivartate ।।
sargakoṭisahasrāṇi maraṇāntāsu mūrtiṣu ।
ya evaṃ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakam ।।
sa evaṃ phalam āpnoti triṣu lokeṣu mūrtimān ।
prakṛtiḥ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakam ।।
prakṛtiś ca tathāpnoti triṣu lokeṣu kāmagā ।
tiryagyonimanuṣyatve devaloke tathaiva ca ।।
trīṇi sthānāni caitāni jānīyāt prākṛtāni ha ।
aliṅgaprakṛtitvāc ca liṅgair apy anumīyate ।।
tathaiva pauruṣaṃ liṅgam anumānād dhi manyate ।
sa liṅgāntaram āsādya prākṛtaṃ liṅgam avraṇam ।।
vraṇadvārāṇy adhiṣṭhāya karmāṇy ātmani manyate ।
śrotrādīni tu sarvāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇy atha ।।
rāgādīni pravartante guṇeṣv iha guṇaiḥ saha ।
aham etāni vai kurvan mamaitānīndriyāṇi ha ।।
nirindriyo hi manyeta vraṇavān asmi nirvraṇaḥ ।
aliṅgo liṅgam ātmānam akālaṃ kālam ātmanaḥ ।।
asattvaṃ sattvam ātmānam amṛtaṃ mṛtam ātmanaḥ ।
amṛtyuṃ mṛtyum ātmānam acaraṃ caram ātmanaḥ ।।
akṣetraṃ kṣetram ātmānam asaṅgaṃ saṅgam ātmanaḥ ।
atattvaṃ tattvam ātmānam abhavaṃ bhavam ātmanaḥ ।।
akṣaraṃ kṣaram ātmānam abuddhatvād dhi manyate ।
evam apratibuddhatvād abuddhajanasevanāt ।।
sargakoṭisahasrāṇi patanāntāni gacchati ।
janmāntarasahasrāṇi maraṇāntāni gacchati ।।
tiryagyonimanuṣyatve devaloke tathaiva ca ।
candramā iva kośānāṃ punas tatra sahasraśaḥ ।।
nīyate apratibuddhatvād evam eva kubuddhimān ।
kalā pañcadaśī yonis tad dhāma iti paṭhyate ।।
nityam eva vijānīhi somaṃ vai ṣoḍaśāṃśakaiḥ ।
kalayā jāyate ajasraṃ punaḥ punar abuddhimān ।।
dhīmāṃś cāyaṃ na bhavati nṛpa evaṃ hi jāyate ।
ṣoḍaśī tu kalā sūkṣmā sa soma upadhāryatām ।।
na tūpayujyate devair devān api yunakti saḥ ।
mamatvaṃ kṣapayitvā tu jāyate nṛpasattama ।
prakṛtes triguṇāyās tu sa eva triguṇo bhavet ।।
{janaka uvāca 
akṣarakṣarayor eṣa dvayoḥ saṃbandha iṣyate ।
strīpuṃsayor vā saṃbandhaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate ।।
ṛte tu puruṣaṃ neha strī garbhān dhārayaty uta ।
ṛte striyaṃ na puruṣo rūpaṃ nirvartate tathā ।।
anyonyasyābhisaṃbandhād anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayāt ।
rūpaṃ nirvartayed etad evaṃ sarvāsu yoniṣu ।।
ratyartham atisaṃyogād anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayāt ।
ṛtau nirvartate rūpaṃ tad vakṣyāmi nidarśanam ।।
ye guṇāḥ puruṣasyeha ye ca mātur guṇās tathā ।
asthi snāyu ca majjā ca jānīmaḥ pitṛto dvija ।।
tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitaṃ ceti mātṛjāny anuśuśruma ।
evam etad dvijaśreṣṭha vedaśāstreṣu paṭhyate ।।
pramāṇaṃ yac ca vedoktaṃ śāstroktaṃ yac ca paṭhyate ।
vedaśāstrapramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tat sanātanam ।।
evam evābhisaṃbandhau nityaṃ prakṛtipūruṣau ।
yac cāpi bhagavaṃs tasmān mokṣadharmo na vidyate ।।
athavānantarakṛtaṃ kiṃcid eva nidarśanam ।
tan mamācakṣva tattvena pratyakṣo hy asi sarvadā ।।
mokṣakāmā vayaṃ cāpi kāṅkṣāmo yad anāmayam ।
ajeyam ajaraṃ nityam atīndriyam anīśvaram ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā vedaśāstranidarśanam ।
evam etad yathā vakṣye tattvagrāhī yathā bhavān ।।
dhāryate hi tvayā grantha ubhayor vedaśāstrayoḥ ।
na ca granthasya tattvajño yathātattvaṃ nareśvara ।।
yo hi vede ca śāstre ca granthadhāraṇatatparaḥ ।
na ca granthārthatattvajñas tasya taddhāraṇaṃ vṛthā ।।
bhāraṃ sa vahate tasya granthasyārthaṃ na vetti yaḥ ।
yas tu granthārthatattvajño nāsya granthāgamo vṛthā ।।
granthasyārthaṃ sa pṛṣṭas tu mādṛśo vaktum arhati ।
yathātattvābhigamanād arthaṃ tasya sa vindati ।।
na yaḥ samutsukaḥ kaścid granthārthaṃ sthūlabuddhimān ।
sa kathaṃ mandavijñāno granthaṃ vakṣyati nirṇayāt ।।
ajñātvā granthatattvāni vādaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ ।
lobhād vāpy athavā dambhāt sa pāpī narakaṃ vrajet ।।
nirṇayaṃ cāpi cchidrātmā na tad vakṣyati tattvataḥ ।
so apīhāsyārthatattvajño yasmān naivātmavān api ।।
tasmāt tvaṃ śṛṇu rājendra yathaitad anudṛśyate ।
yathā tattvena sāṃkhyeṣu yogeṣu ca mahātmasu ।।
yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti sāṃkhyaṃ tad anugamyate ।
ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa buddhimān ।।
tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca ।
etad aindriyakaṃ tāta yad bhavān ittham āttha mām ।।
dravyād dravyasya nirvṛttir indriyād indriyaṃ tathā ।
dehād deham avāpnoti bījād bījaṃ tathaiva ca ।।
nirindriyasya bījasya nirdravyasyāpi dehinaḥ ।
kathaṃ guṇā bhaviṣyanti nirguṇatvān mahātmanaḥ ।।
guṇā guṇeṣu jāyante tatraiva viramanti ca ।
evaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtijā jāyante na ca yānti ca ।।
tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca ।
aṣṭau tāny atha śukreṇa jānīhi prākṛtena vai ।।
pumāṃś caivāpumāṃś caiva strīliṅgaṃ prākṛtaṃ smṛtam ।
vāyur eṣa pumāṃś caiva rasa ity abhidhīyate ।।
aliṅgā prakṛtir liṅgair upalabhyati sātmajaiḥ ।
yathā puṣpaphalair nityaṃ mūrtaṃ cāmūrtayas tathā ।।
evam apy anumānena sa liṅgam upalabhyate ।
pañcaviṃśatikas tāta liṅgeṣu niyatātmakaḥ ।।
anādinidhano anantaḥ sarvadarśanakevalaḥ ।
kevalaṃ tv abhimānitvād guṇeṣu guṇa ucyate ।।
guṇā guṇavataḥ santi nirguṇasya kuto guṇāḥ ।
tasmād evaṃ vijānanti ye janā guṇadarśinaḥ ।।
yadā tv eṣa guṇān etān prākṛtān abhimanyate ।
tadā sa guṇavān eva guṇabhedān prapaśyati ।।
yat tad buddheḥ paraṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ ।
budhyamānaṃ mahāprājñāḥ prabuddhaparivarjanāt ।।
aprabuddhaṃ yathā vyaktaṃ svaguṇaiḥ prāhur īśvaram ।
nirguṇaṃ ceśvaraṃ nityam adhiṣṭhātāram eva ca ।।
prakṛteś ca guṇānāṃ ca pañcaviṃśatikaṃ budhāḥ ।
sāṃkhyayoge ca kuśalā budhyante paramaiṣiṇaḥ ।।
yadā prabuddham avyaktam avasthātananīravaḥ ।
budhyamānaṃ na budhyante avagacchanti samaṃ tadā ।।
etan nidarśanaṃ samyaṅ na samyag anudarśanam ।
budhyamānaṃ prabudhyante dvābhyāṃ pṛthag ariṃdama ।।
paraspareṇaitad uktaṃ kṣarākṣaranidarśanam ।
ekatvam akṣaraṃ prāhur nānātvaṃ kṣaram ucyate ।।
pañcaviṃśatiniṣṭho ayaṃ tadā samyak pracakṣate ।
ekatvadarśanaṃ cāsya nānātvaṃ cāsya darśanam ।।
tattvavit tattvayor eva pṛthag etan nidarśanam ।
pañcaviṃśatibhis tattvaṃ tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
nistattvaṃ pañcaviṃśasya param āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
varjyasya varjyam ācāraṃ tattvaṃ tattvāt sanātanam ।।
{karālajanaka uvāca 
nānātvaikatvam ity uktaṃ tvayaitad dvijasattama ।
paśyatas tad dhi saṃdigdham etayor vai nidarśanam ।।
tathā buddhaprabuddhābhyāṃ budhyamānasya cānagha ।
sthūlabuddhyā na paśyāmi tattvam etan na saṃśayaḥ ।।
akṣarakṣarayor uktaṃ tvayā yad api kāraṇam ।
tad apy asthirabuddhitvāt pranaṣṭam iva me anagha ।।
tad etac chrotum icchāmi nānātvaikatvadarśanam ।
dvaṃdvaṃ caivāniruddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ ।।
vidyāvidye ca bhagavann akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva ca ।
sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca kṛtsnena buddhābuddhiṃ pṛthak pṛthak ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi yad etad anupṛcchasi ।
yogakṛtyaṃ mahārāja pṛthag eva śṛṇuṣva me ।।
yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ dhyānam eva paraṃ balam ।
tac cāpi dvividhaṃ dhyānam āhur vidyāvido janāḥ ।।
ekāgratā ca manasaḥ prāṇāyāmas tathaiva ca ।
prāṇāyāmas tu saguṇo nirguṇo mānasas tathā ।।
mūtrotsarge purīṣe ca bhojane ca narādhipa ।
dvikālaṃ nopabhuñjīta śeṣaṃ bhuñjīta tatparaḥ ।।
indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo nivartya manasā muniḥ ।
daśadvādaśabhir vāpi caturviṃśāt paraṃ yataḥ ।।
sa codanābhir matimān nātmānaṃ codayed atha ।
tiṣṭhantam ajaraṃ taṃ tu yat tad uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ ।।
viśvātmā satataṃ jñeya ity evam anuśuśruma ।
dravyaṃ hy ahīnamanaso nānyatheti viniścayaḥ ।।
vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyo laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ ।
pūrvarātre parārdhe ca dhārayīta mano hṛdi ।।
sthirīkṛtyendriyagrāmaṃ manasā mithileśvara ।
mano buddhyā sthiraṃ kṛtvā pāṣāṇa iva niścalaḥ ।।
sthāṇuvac cāpy akampyaḥ syād dāruvac cāpi niścalaḥ ।
buddhyā vidhividhānajñas tato yuktaṃ pracakṣate ।।
na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na ca paśyati kiṃcana ।
na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na ca saṃkalpate manaḥ ।।
na cāpi manyate kiṃcin na ca budhyeta kāṣṭhavat ।
tadā prakṛtim āpannaṃ yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
na bhāti hi yathā dīpo dīptis tadvac ca dṛśyate ।
niliṅgaś cādhaś cordhvaṃ ca tiryaggatim avāpnuyāt ।।
tadā tadupapannaś ca yasmin dṛṣṭe ca kathyate ।
hṛdayastho antarātmeti jñeyo jñas tāta madvidhaiḥ ।।
nirdhūma iva saptārcir āditya iva raśmivān ।
vaidyuto agnir ivākāśe paśyaty ātmānam ātmani ।।
yaṃ paśyanti mahātmāno dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥ ।
brāhmaṇā brahmayonisthā hy ayonim amṛtātmakam ।।
tad evāhur aṇubhyo aṇu tan mahadbhyo mahattaram ।
sarvatra sarvabhūteṣu dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate ।।
buddhidravyeṇa dṛśyena manodīpena lokakṛt ।
mahatas tamasas tāta pāre tiṣṭhan na tāmasaḥ ।।
tamaso dūra ity uktas tattvajñair vedapāragaiḥ ।
vimalo vimataś caiva nirliṅgo aliṅgasaṃjñakaḥ ।।
yoga eṣa hi lokānāṃ kim anyad yogalakṣaṇam ।
evaṃ paśyan prapaśyeta ātmānam ajaraṃ param ।।
yogadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te tattvato mayā ।
sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi parisaṃkhyānidarśanam ।।
avyaktam āhuḥ prakhyānaṃ parāṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ ।
tasmān mahat samutpannaṃ dvitīyaṃ rājasattama ।।
ahaṃkāras tu mahatas tṛtīya iti naḥ śrutam ।
pañcabhūtāny ahaṃkārād āhuḥ sāṃkhyātmadarśinaḥ ।।
etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa ।
pañca caiva viśeṣāś ca tathā pañcendriyāṇi ca ।।
etāvad eva tattvānāṃ sāṃkhyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
sāṃkhye sāṃkhyavidhānajñā nityaṃ sāṃkhyapathe sthitāḥ ।।
yasmād yad abhijāyeta tat tatraiva pralīyate ।
līyante pratilomāni gṛhyante cāntarātmanā ।।
ānulomyena jāyante līyante pratilomataḥ ।
guṇā guṇeṣu satataṃ sāgarasyormayo yathā ।।
sargapralaya etāvān prakṛter nṛpasattama ।
ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca tathā sṛji ।।
evam eva ca rājendra vijñeyaṃ jñānakovidaiḥ ।
adhiṣṭhātāram avyaktam asyāpy etan nidarśanam ।।
ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca prakṛter anu tattvavān ।
ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca pravartanāt ।।
bahudhātmā prakurvīta prakṛtiṃ prasavātmikām ।
tac ca kṣetraṃ mahān ātmā pañcaviṃśo adhitiṣṭhati ।।
adhiṣṭhāteti rājendra procyate yatisattamaiḥ ।
adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrāṇām iti naḥ śrutam ।।
kṣetraṃ jānāti cāvyaktaṃ kṣetrajña iti cocyate ।
avyaktike pure śete puruṣaś ceti kathyate ।।
anyad eva ca kṣetraṃ syād anyaḥ kṣetrajña ucyate ।
kṣetram avyakta ity uktaṃ jñātāraṃ pañcaviṃśakam ।।
anyad eva ca jñānaṃ syād anyaj jñeyaṃ tad ucyate ।
jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyo vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ ।।
avyaktaṃ kṣetram ity uktaṃ tathā sattvaṃ tatheśvaram ।
anīśvaram atattvaṃ ca tattvaṃ tat pañcaviṃśakam ।।
sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvat parisaṃkhyā na vidyate ।
saṃkhyā prakurute caiva prakṛtiṃ ca pravakṣyate ।।
catvāriṃśac caturviṃśat pratisaṃkhyāya tattvataḥ ।
saṃkhyā sahasrakṛtyā tu nistattvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ ।।
pañcaviṃśat prabuddhātmā budhyamāna iti śrutaḥ ।
yadā budhyati ātmānaṃ tadā bhavati kevalaḥ ।।
samyagdarśanam etāvad bhāṣitaṃ tava tattvataḥ ।
evam etad vijānantaḥ sāmyatāṃ pratiyānty uta ।।
samyaṅnidarśanaṃ nāma pratyakṣaṃ prakṛtes tathā ।
guṇavattvād yathaitāni nirguṇebhyas tathā bhavet ।।
na tv evaṃ vartamānānām āvṛttir vartate punaḥ ।
vidyate kṣarabhāvaś ca na parasparam avyayam ।।
paśyanty amatayo ye na samyak teṣu ca darśanam ।
te vyaktiṃ pratipadyante punaḥ punar ariṃdama ।।
sarvam etad vijānanto na sarvasya prabodhanāt ।
vyaktibhūtā bhaviṣyanti vyaktasyaivānuvartanāt ।।
sarvam avyaktam ity uktam asarvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ ।
ya evam abhijānanti na bhayaṃ teṣu vidyate ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te nṛpasattama ।
vidyāvidye tv idānīṃ me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ ।।
abhedyam āhur avyaktaṃ sargapralayadharmiṇaḥ ।
sargapralaya ity uktaṃ vidyāvidye ca viṃśakaḥ ।।
parasparasya vidyā vai tan nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ ।
yathoktam ṛṣibhis tāta sāṃkhyasyātinidarśanam ।।
karmendriyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ vidyā buddhīndriyaṃ smṛtam ।
buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca tathā viśeṣā iti naḥ śrutam ।।
viṣayāṇāṃ manas teṣāṃ vidyām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ ।
manasaḥ pañca bhūtāni vidyā ity abhicakṣate ।।
ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ ।
ahaṃkāras tathā vidyā buddhir vidyā nareśvara ।।
buddhyā prakṛtir avyaktaṃ tattvānāṃ parameśvaraḥ ।
vidyā jñeyā naraśreṣṭha vidhiś ca paramaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
avyaktam aparaṃ prāhur vidyā vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ ।
sarvasya sarvam ity uktaṃ jñeyajñānasya pāragaḥ ।।
jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam ।
tathaiva jñānam avyaktaṃ vijñātā pañcaviṃśakaḥ ।।
vidyāvidye tu tattvena mayokte vai viśeṣataḥ ।
akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yad uktaṃ tan nibodha me ।।
ubhāv etau kṣarāv uktau ubhāv etāv anakṣarau ।
kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathājñānaṃ tu jñānataḥ ।।
anādinidhanāv etau ubhāv eveśvarau matau ।
tattvasaṃjñāv ubhāv eva procyete jñānacintakaiḥ ।।
sargapralayadharmitvād avyaktaṃ prāhur avyayam ।
tad etad guṇasargāya vikurvāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ ।।
guṇānāṃ mahadādīnām utpadyati parasparam ।
adhiṣṭhānaṃ kṣetram āhur etad vai pañcaviṃśakam ।।
yad antarguṇajālaṃ tu tad vyaktātmani saṃkṣipet ।
tad ahaṃ tad guṇais tais tu pañcaviṃśe vilīyate ।।
guṇā guṇeṣu līyante tad ekā prakṛtir bhavet ।
kṣetrajño api tadā tāvat kṣetrajñaḥ saṃpraṇīyate ।।
yadākṣaraṃ prakṛtir yaṃ gacchate guṇasaṃjñitā ।
nirguṇatvaṃ ca vai dehe guṇeṣu parivartanāt ।।
evam eva ca kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrajñānaparikṣayāt ।
prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa ity evam anuśuśruma ।।
kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā guṇavatī guṇeṣv atha ।
prakṛtiṃ tv atha jānāti nirguṇatvaṃ tathātmanaḥ ।।
tathā viśuddho bhavati prakṛteḥ parivarjanāt ।
anyo aham anyeyam iti yadā budhyati buddhimān ।।
tadaiṣo avyathatām eti na ca miśratvam āvrajet ।
prakṛtyā caiṣa rājendra miśro anyo anyasya dṛśyate ।।
yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat prākṛtaṃ vijugupsate ।
paśyate ca paraṃ paśyaṃs tadā paśyan nu saṃsṛjet ।।
kiṃ mayā kṛtam etāvad yo ahaṃ kālanimajjanaḥ ।
yathā matsyo hy abhijñānād anuvartitavāñ jalam ।।
aham eva hi saṃmohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam ।
matsyo yathodakajñānād anuvartitavān iha ।।
matsyo anyatvam athājñānād udakān nābhimanyate ।
ātmānaṃ tad avajñānād anyaṃ caiva na vedmy aham ।।
mamāstu dhik kubuddhasya yo ahaṃ magna imaṃ punaḥ ।
anuvartitavān mohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam ।।
ayam anubhaved bandhur anena saha me kṣayam ।
sāmyam ekatvatāṃ yāto yādṛśas tādṛśas tv aham ।।
tulyatām iha paśyāmi sadṛśo aham anena vai ।
ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam aham īdṛśakas tadā ।।
yo aham ajñānasaṃmohād ajñayā saṃpravṛttavān ।
saṃsargād atisaṃsargāt sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv aham ।।
so aham evaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ kālam etaṃ na buddhavān ।
uttamādhamamadhyānāṃ tām ahaṃ katham āvase ।।
samānamāyayā ceha sahavāsam ahaṃ katham ।
gacchāmy abuddhabhāvatvād ihedānīṃ sthiro bhava ।।
sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi kālam etaṃ vivañcanāt ।
vañcito hy anayā yad dhi nirvikāro vikārayā ।।
na tat tadaparāddhaṃ syād aparādho hy ayaṃ mama ।
yo aham atrābhavaṃ saktaḥ parāṅmukham upasthitaḥ ।।
tato asmin bahurūpo atha sthito mūrtir amūrtimān ।
amūrtiś cāpy amūrtātmā mamatvena pradharṣitaḥ ।।
prakṛtyā ca tayā tena tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu ।
nirmamasya mamatvena vikṛtaṃ tāsu tāsu ca ।।
yoniṣu vartamānena naṣṭasaṃjñena cetasā ।
samatā na mayā kācid ahaṃkāre kṛtā mayā ।।
ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā so ayaṃ bhūyo yunakti mām ।
idānīm avabuddho asmi nirmamo nirahaṃkṛtaḥ ।।
mamatvaṃ manasā nityam ahaṃkārakṛtātmakam ।
apalagnām imāṃ hitvā saṃśrayiṣye nirāmayam ।।
anena sāmyaṃ yāsyāmi nānayāham acetasā ।
kṣemaṃ mama sahānena naivaikam anayā saha ।।
evaṃ paramasaṃbodhāt pañcaviṃśo anubuddhavān ।
akṣaratvaṃ nigacchati tyaktvā kṣaram anāmayam ।।
avyaktaṃ vyaktadharmāṇaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ tathā ।
nirguṇaṃ prathamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛg bhavati maithila ।।
akṣarakṣarayor etad uktaṃ tava nidarśanam ।
mayeha jñānasaṃpannaṃ yathā śrutinidarśanāt ।।
niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca viśuddhaṃ vimalaṃ tathā ।
pravakṣyāmi tu te bhūyas tan nibodha yathāśrutam ।।
sāṃkhyayogo mayā proktaḥ śāstradvayanidarśanāt ।
yad eva sāṃkhyaśāstroktaṃ yogadarśanam eva tat ।।
prabodhanaparaṃ jñānaṃ sāṃkhyānām avanīpate ।
vispaṣṭaṃ procyate tatra śiṣyāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā ।।
bṛhac caivam idaṃ śāstram ity āhur viduṣo janāḥ ।
asmiṃś ca śāstre yogānāṃ punarbhavapuraḥsaram ।।
pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ tattvaṃ paṭhyate ca narādhipa ।
sāṃkhyānāṃ tu paraṃ tattvaṃ yathāvad anuvarṇitam ।।
buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ ।
budhyamānaṃ ca buddhatvaṃ prāhur yoganidarśanam ।।
{vasiṣṭha uvāca 
aprabuddham athāvyaktam imaṃ guṇanidhiṃ sadā ।
guṇānāṃ dhāryatāṃ tattvaṃ sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā ।।
ajo hi krīḍayā bhūpa vikriyāṃ prāpta ity uta ।
ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā nāneva praticakṣate ।।
etad evaṃ vikurvāṇo budhyamāno na budhyate ।
guṇān ācarate hy eṣa sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā ।।
avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty api ।
na tv evaṃ budhyate avyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ tāta nirguṇam ।।
kadācit tv eva khalv etat tad āhuḥ pratibuddhakam ।
budhyate yadi cāvyaktam etad vai pañcaviṃśakam ।।
budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa mamātmaka iti śrutaḥ ।
anyonyapratibuddhena vadanty avyaktam acyutam ।।
avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty uta ।
pañcaviṃśaṃ mahātmānaṃ na cāsāv api budhyate ।।
ṣaḍviṃśaṃ vimalaṃ buddham aprameyaṃ sanātanam ।
satataṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ tu caturviṃśaṃ vibudhyate ।।
dṛśyādṛśye hy anugata- tatsvabhāve mahādyute ।
avyaktaṃ caiva tad brahma budhyate tāta kevalam ।।
pañcaviṃśaṃ caturviṃśam ātmānam anupaśyati ।
budhyamāno yadātmānam anyo aham iti manyate ।।
tadā prakṛtimān eṣa bhavaty avyaktalocanaḥ ।
budhyate ca parāṃ buddhiṃ viśuddhām amalāṃ yathā ।।
ṣaḍviṃśaṃ rājaśārdūla tadā buddhaḥ kṛto vrajet ।
tatas tyajati so avyaktaṃ sargapralayadharmiṇam ।।
nirguṇāṃ prakṛtiṃ veda guṇayuktām acetanām ।
tataḥ kevaladharmāsau bhavaty avyaktadarśanāt ।।
kevalena samāgamya vimuktātmānam āpnuyāt ।
etat tu tattvam ity āhur nistattvam ajarāmaram ।।
tattvasaṃśravaṇād eva tattvajño jāyate nṛpa ।
pañcaviṃśatitattvāni pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ ।।
na caiva tattvavāṃs tāta saṃsāreṣu nimajjati ।
eṣām upaiti tattvaṃ hi kṣipraṃ budhyasva lakṣaṇam ।।
ṣaḍviṃśo ayam iti prājño gṛhyamāṇo ajarāmaraḥ ।
kevalena balenaiva samatāṃ yāty asaṃśayam ।।
ṣaḍviṃśena prabuddhena budhyamāno apy abuddhimān ।
etan nānātvam ity uktaṃ sāṃkhyaśrutinidarśanāt ।।
cetanena sametasya pañcaviṃśatikasya ha ।
ekatvaṃ vai bhavet tasya yadā buddhyānubudhyate ।।
budhyamānena buddhena samatāṃ yāti maithila ।
saṅgadharmā bhavaty eṣa niḥsaṅgātmā narādhipa ।।
niḥsaṅgātmānam āsādya ṣaḍviṃśaṃ karmajaṃ viduḥ ।
vibhus tyajati cāvyaktaṃ yadā tv etad vibudhyate ।।
caturviṃśam agādhaṃ ca ṣaḍviṃśasya prabodhanāt ।
eṣa hy apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānas tu te anagha ।।
ukto buddhaś ca tattvena yathāśrutinidarśanāt ।
maśakodumbare yadvad anyatvaṃ tadvad etayoḥ ।।
matsyodake yathā tadvad anyatvam upalabhyate ।
evam eva ca gantavyaṃ nānātvaikatvam etayoḥ ।।
etāvan mokṣa ity ukto jñānavijñānasaṃjñitaḥ ।
pañcaviṃśatikasyāśu yo ayaṃ dehe pravartate ।।
eṣa mokṣayitavyaiti prāhur avyaktagocarāt ।
so ayam evaṃ vimucyeta nānyatheti viniścayaḥ ।।
paraś ca paradharmā ca bhavaty eva sametya vai ।
viśuddhadharmā śuddhena nāśuddhena ca buddhimān ।।
vimuktadharmā buddhena sametya puruṣarṣabha ।
viyogadharmiṇā caiva vimuktātmā bhavaty atha ।।
vimokṣiṇā vimokṣaś ca sametyeha tathā bhavet ।
śucikarmā śuciś caiva bhavaty amitabuddhimān ।।
vimalātmā ca bhavati sametya vimalātmanā ।
kevalātmā tathā caiva kevalena sametya vai ।
svatantraś ca svatantreṇa svatantratvam avāpyate ।।
etāvad etat kathitaṃ mayā te 
tathyaṃ mahārāja yathārthatattvam 
amatsaras tvaṃ pratigṛhya buddhyā 
sanātanaṃ brahma viśuddham ādyam 
tad vedaniṣṭhasya janasya rājan 
pradeyam etat paramaṃ tvayā bhavet 
vidhitsamānāya nibodhakārakaṃ 
prabodhahetoḥ praṇatasya śāsanam 
na deyam etac ca yathānṛtātmane 
śaṭhāya klībāya na jihmabuddhaye 
na paṇḍitajñānaparopatāpine 
deyaṃ tathā śiṣyavibodhanāya 
śraddhānvitāyātha guṇānvitāya 
parāpavādād viratāya nityam 
viśuddhayogāya budhāya caiva 
kṛpāvate atha kṣamiṇe hitāya 
viviktaśīlāya vidhipriyāya 
vivādahīnāya bahuśrutāya 
vinītaveśāya nahaitukātmane 
sadaiva guhyaṃ tv idam eva deyam 
etair guṇair hīnatame na deyam 
etat paraṃ brahma viśuddham āhuḥ 
na śreyase yokṣyati tādṛśe kṛtaṃ 
dharmapravaktāram apātradānāt 
pṛthvīm imāṃ vā yadi ratnapūrṇāṃ 
dadyād adeyaṃ tv idam avratāya 
jitendriyāya prayatāya deyaṃ 
deyaṃ paraṃ tattvavide narendra 
karāla mā te bhayam asti kiṃcid 
etac chrutaṃ brahma paraṃ tvayādya 
yathāvad uktaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ 
viśokam atyantam anādimadhyam 
agādham etad ajarāmaraṃ ca 
nirāmayaṃ vītabhayaṃ śivaṃ ca 
samīkṣya mohaṃ paravādasaṃjñam 
etasya tattvārtham imaṃ viditvā 
avāptam etad dhi purā sanātanād 
dhiraṇyagarbhād dhi tato narādhipa 
prasādya yatnena tam ugratejasaṃ 
sanātanaṃ brahma yathā tvayaitat 
pṛṣṭas tvayā cāsmi yathā narendra 
tathā mayedaṃ tvayi noktam anyat 
yathāvāptaṃ brahmaṇo me narendra 
mahājñānaṃ mokṣavidāṃ parāyaṇam 
{vyāsa uvāca 
etad uktaṃ paraṃ brahma yasmān nāvartate punaḥ ।
pañcaviṃśaṃ muniśreṣṭhā vasiṣṭhena yathā purā ।।
punarāvṛttim āpnoti paramaṃ jñānam avyayam ।
nāti budhyati tattvena budhyamāno ajarāmaram ।।
etan niḥśreyasakaraṃ jñānaṃ bhoḥ paramaṃ mayā ।
kathitaṃ tattvato viprāḥ śrutvā devarṣito dvijāḥ ।।
hiraṇyagarbhād ṛṣiṇā vasiṣṭhena samāhṛtam ।
vasiṣṭhād ṛṣiśārdūlo nārado avāptavān idam ।।
nāradād viditaṃ mahyam etad uktaṃ sanātanam ।
mā śucadhvaṃ muniśreṣṭhāḥ śrutvaitat paramaṃ padam ।।
yena kṣarākṣare bhinne na bhayaṃ tasya vidyate ।
vidyate tu bhayaṃ yasya yo nainaṃ vetti tattvataḥ ।।
avijñānāc ca mūḍhātmā punaḥ punar upadravān ।
pretya jātisahasrāṇi maraṇāntāny upāśnute ।।
devalokaṃ tathā tiryaṅ mānuṣyam api cāśnute ।
yadi vā mucyate vāpi tasmād ajñānasāgarāt ।।
ajñānasāgare ghore hy avyaktāgādha ucyate ।
ahany ahani majjanti yatra bhūtāni bho dvijāḥ ।।
tasmād agādhād avyaktād upakṣīṇāt sanātanāt ।
tasmād yūyaṃ virajaskā vitamaskāś ca bho dvijāḥ ।।
evaṃ mayā muniśreṣṭhāḥ sārāt sārataraṃ param ।
kathitaṃ paramaṃ mokṣaṃ yaṃ jñātvā na nivartate ।।
na nāstikāya dātavyaṃ nābhaktāya kadācana ।
na duṣṭamataye viprā na śraddhāvimukhāya ca ।।
{lomaharṣaṇa uvāca 
evaṃ purā munīn vyāsaḥ purāṇaṃ ślakṣṇayā girā ।
daśāṣṭadoṣarahitair vākyaiḥ sāratarair dvijāḥ ।।
pūrṇam astamalaiḥ śuddhair nānāśāstrasamuccayaiḥ ।
jātiśuddhasamāyuktaṃ sādhuśabdopaśobhitam ।।
pūrvapakṣoktisiddhānta- pariniṣṭhāsamanvitam ।
śrāvayitvā yathānyāyaṃ virarāma mahāmatiḥ ।।
te api śrutvā muniśreṣṭhāḥ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam ।
ādyaṃ brāhmābhidhānaṃ ca sarvavāñchāphalapradam ।।
hṛṣṭā babhūvuḥ suprītā vismitāś ca punaḥ punaḥ ।
praśaśaṃsus tadā vyāsaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ munim ।।
{munaya ūcuḥ 
aho tvayā muniśreṣṭha purāṇaṃ śrutisaṃmitam ।
sarvābhipretaphaladaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ param ।।
proktaṃ śrutaṃ tathāsmābhir vicitrapadam akṣaram ।
na te asty aviditaṃ kiṃcit triṣu lokeṣu vai prabho ।।
sarvajñas tvaṃ mahābhāga deveṣv iva bṛhaspatiḥ ।
namasyāmo mahāprājñaṃ brahmiṣṭhaṃ tvāṃ mahāmunim ।।
yena tvayā tu vedārthā bhārate prakaṭīkṛtāḥ ।
kaḥ śaknoti guṇān vaktuṃ tava sarvān mahāmune ।।
adhītya caturo vedān sāṅgān vyākaraṇāni ca ।
kṛtavān bhārataṃ śāstraṃ tasmai jñānātmane namaḥ ।।
namo astu te vyāsa viśālabuddhe 
phullāravindāyatapattranetra 
yena tvayā bhāratatailapūrṇaḥ 
prajvālito jñānamayaḥ pradīpaḥ 
ajñānatimirāndhānāṃ bhrāmitānāṃ kudṛṣṭibhiḥ ।
jñānāñjanaśalākena tvayā conmīlitā dṛśaḥ ।।
evam uktvā samabhyarcya vyāsaṃ te caiva pūjitāḥ ।
jagmur yathāgataṃ sarve kṛtakṛtyāḥ svam āśramam ।।
tathā mayā muniśreṣṭhā kathitaṃ hi sanātanam ।
purāṇaṃ sumahāpuṇyaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam ।।
yathā bhavadbhiḥ pṛṣṭo ahaṃ saṃpraśnaṃ dvijasattamāḥ ।
vyāsaprasādāt tat sarvaṃ mayā saṃparikīrtitam ।।
idaṃ gṛhasthaiḥ śrotavyaṃ yatibhir brahmacāribhiḥ ।
dhanasaukhyapradaṃ nṝṇāṃ pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam ।।
tathā brahmaparair viprair brāhmaṇādyaiḥ susaṃyataiḥ ।
śrotavyaṃ suprayatnena samyak śreyobhikāṅkṣibhiḥ ।।
prāpnoti brāhmaṇo vidyāṃ kṣatriyo vijayaṃ raṇe ।
vaiśyas tu dhanam akṣayyaṃ śūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt ।।
yaṃ yaṃ kāmam abhidhyāyañ śṛṇoti puruṣaḥ śuciḥ ।
taṃ taṃ kāmam avāpnoti naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ ।।
purāṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ tv etat sarvakilbiṣanāśanam ।
viśiṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstrebhyaḥ puruṣārthopapādakam ।।
etad vo yan mayākhyātaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam ।
śrute asmin sarvadoṣotthaḥ pāparāśiḥ praṇaśyati ।।
prayāge puṣkare caiva kurukṣetre tathārbude ।
upoṣya yad avāpnoti tad asya śravaṇān naraḥ ।।
yad agnihotre suhute varṣe nāpnoti vai phalam ।
mahāpuṇyamayaṃ viprās tad asya śravaṇāt sakṛt ।।
yaj jyeṣṭhaśukladvādaśyāṃ snātvā vai yamunājale ।
mathurāyāṃ hariṃ dṛṣṭvā prāpnoti puruṣaḥ phalam ।।
tad āpnoti phalaṃ samyak samādhānena kīrtanāt ।
purāṇe asya hito viprāḥ keśavārpitamānasaḥ ।।
yat phalaṃ kriyam ālokya puruṣo atha labhen naraḥ ।
tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād api ।।
idaṃ yaḥ śraddhayā nityaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam ।
yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyān martyaḥ sa yāti bhuvanaṃ hareḥ ।।
śrāvayed brāhmaṇo yas tu sadā parvasu saṃyataḥ ।
ekādaśyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ ca viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati ।।
idaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ sukhadaṃ kīrtivardhanam ।
balapuṣṭipradaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanyaṃ duḥsvapnanāśanam ।।
trisaṃdhyaṃ yaḥ paṭhed vidvāñ śraddhayā susamāhitaḥ ।
idaṃ variṣṭham ākhyānaṃ sa sarvam īpsitaṃ labhet ।।
rogārto mucyate rogād baddho mucyeta bandhanāt ।
bhayād vimucyate bhīta āpadāpanna āpadaḥ ।।
jātismaratvaṃ vidyāṃ ca putrān medhāṃ paśūn dhṛtim ।
dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ tu labhate naraḥ ।।
yān yān kāmān abhipretya paṭhet prayatamānasaḥ ।
tāṃs tān sarvān avāpnoti puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ ।।
yaś cedaṃ satataṃ śṛṇoti manujaḥ svargāpavargapradaṃ 
viṣṇuṃ lokaguruṃ praṇamya varadaṃ bhaktyekacittaḥ śuciḥ 
bhuktvā cātra sukhaṃ vimuktakaluṣaḥ svarge ca divyaṃ sukhaṃ 
paścād yāti hareḥ padaṃ suvimalaṃ mukto guṇaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ 
tasmād vipravaraiḥ svadharmaniratair muktyekamārgepsubhis 
tadvat kṣatriyapuṃgavais tu niyataiḥ śreyorthibhiḥ sarvadā 
vaiśyaiś cānudinaṃ viśuddhakulajaiḥ śūdrais tathā dhārmikaiḥ 
śrotavyaṃ tv idam uttamaṃ bahuphalaṃ dharmārthamokṣapradam 
dharme matir bhavatu vaḥ puruṣottamānāṃ 
sa hy eka eva paralokagatasya bandhuḥ 
arthāḥ striyaś ca nipuṇair api sevyamānā 
naiva prabhāvam upayānti na ca sthiratvam 
dharmeṇa rājyaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ 
svargaṃ ca dharmeṇa naraḥ prayāti 
āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca tapaś ca dharmaṃ 
dharmeṇa mokṣaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ 
dharmo atra mātāpitarau narasya 
dharmaḥ sakhā cātra pare ca loke 
trātā ca dharmas tv iha mokṣadaś ca 
dharmād ṛte nāsti tu kiṃcid eva 
idaṃ rahasyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ca purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam ।
na deyaṃ duṣṭamataye nāstikāya viśeṣataḥ ।।
idaṃ mayoktaṃ pravaraṃ purāṇaṃ 
pāpāpahaṃ dharmavivardhanaṃ ca 
śrutaṃ bhavadbhiḥ paramaṃ rahasyam 
ājñāpayadhvaṃ munayo vrajāmi
